Mbɛ a fɛ denɛ n gbɛn‑da a ma, mbɛ an dɔ, “I‑a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ i‑a bai min fɔ ka, a don‑da wan Fayisii mɔɛ chɛ n ma kaka?”
Mbɛ a ɔ, “Fa min mbe banda bu ɔ, ɛ nyan fen kan kɔ kan kuu bɔ‑a wan, a ma min chin ni.

Wo faa ma gbaa Fayisii mɔɛ chɛ n ko a. An maen fan mu yɔ ya te tɔɛ nu, miin toen mu an ni chia yian an bɔ ya te tɔɛ n na. Ni ya te tɔɛ‑a chia yian ya te tɔɛ a, an fea gbɛɛ ɛ bea wan sonɛ ɔ chia kuu a.”
Mbɛ Pita ɔ, “Bai chɛ fasai wɛ nn ye, i‑a min fɔ ka, a si mɔɛ ma nyamui koe ma.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo e ka n fɛ wan, chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, wo 'a yiima tɛ ɔ dɔɔ.
Fen kɔ fen mɔ gbu ɛ min daun, ɛ yii mɔ bu ɔ wan, mbɛ a ta‑a kumbai a kanɛ ɔ. Wo ma chɛ ɔ sɔn?
Chɛɛ bai min mbe bɔ mɔ gbu da ɔ, ɛ ka mɔ yiima ɔ wan. A sin fan mbe mɔ ma nyamui Yataa ya kɔɔ.

A mu min na, ko yama gbɛɛ ɛ bɔ mɔ gbu yiima an dɔ. A ni ma mɔ fa koe an na, kanka chɛ ko mu, fania fɔ mu, ni tɔ ɔ tɛ yama chɛ. A yɛ to, a ni ma waa ma basan koe a mɔɛ a, wo ee fuu ɔ min na, ni ko tɛ koe wɛɛ.
Koe chɛ n gbɛɛ fan mbe a ma, mɔ gbu ma ni nyamui Yataa ya kɔɔ. Chɛɛ daun chɛ koe a, ni mɔ ma i boo a ko ni a chia ma, a ee a ma mɔ ma ni nyamui Yataa ya kɔɔ.”
Chɛ gbakɔ, Chisɔsi bɔ‑a wan nɔ, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na, mbɛ an ta‑a Taya tanda ɔ, ni Sidon.

Mbɛ a tima chɛ a, musu dɔndɔ ni wan an tanda chɛ ɔ, min ni Kenaan mɔɛ a. A na‑a wan Chisɔsi tena. A bun‑da yee tɛ‑a, a ɔ, “I wɛn bɔ‑a Mansa Defidi 'a dambi ɔ, chinchin n ma. Mansa, n 'na den musuma gbandien mu a yama boo a, nyina yama ɛ a tɔɔ tena.”
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi nii ma koɔ ni musu chɛ tena ɛnden bɛɛ a. Mbɛ a fɛ denɛ n gbɛn‑da a ma, mbɛ an dɔ, “A fɔ musu chɛ ye, a ni ka mmɔ fɛ a 'a yee wa tɛ chɛ a.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ musu chɛ ye, a ɔ, “Yataa‑a n sɔ Chu mɔɛ n fan ko a dechee, an fan mbe yɔ sa nu miin toenɛ a ɔ. Chɛɛ a ma n sɔ ni mɔ dɔ gbɛɛ n tena.”
Chɛɛ musu chɛ na‑a wan, mbɛ a bea‑a a chen na disa‑a, a ɔ, “Mansa, basan n ma.”
Mbɛ a ɔ, “A ma nyin mɔ ni den mɛsɛ n 'na daun fenɛ bɔ an da a, i ni a be wuu n ma.”
Mbɛ musu chɛ ɔ, “Mansa, i‑a tea fɔ. Chɛɛ wuu miin bɛɛ ɛ ma si ɔ den mɛsɛ n baima, ni an da a pɛɛ bea‑a duu ma, an mbe a daun fan.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ te gbɛ, “E. Bɔɔɛ, i 'a danaya n ko a, a da a koo. I toen mu koe min na, n mbe a chɛ‑a wan i ye.” A tima chɛ a, Yataa‑a a 'a den chɛ baun fan.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ni ma, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na, an bɔ‑a wan nɔ, mbɛ an ta‑a Kadidi yii wa chɛ a sanɛ. An sɛ‑a wan nɔ kɔnkɔ dɔndɔ ɔ, mbɛ a si‑a nɔ.

Mɔ sɛsɛ a sɔn‑da wan a ma. Mɔɛ chɛ n na‑a wan gbandi mɔ sɛsɛ a. Dɔ n namaaenɛ ɛ, dɔ nu, an fiondenɛ ɛ, dɔ n mumundenɛ ɛ, dɔ n boo faenɛ ɛ an ma, a basan an chenɛ a. An na‑a an gbɛɛ a Chisɔsi chen kɔɔ, a sin, a‑a an gbɛɛ baun fan.

Mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ tɛnɛ‑a wan a a, kɛn Chisɔsi‑a chɛ ma. An‑na a ɔ yen mumunɛ n koɔ‑a, namaa n tachɛ‑a, mbɛ ya te tɔɛ n‑na kaina yen. An‑na a ɔ yen fan to, miin bɛɛ boo n faen ni an ma, an baun‑da, a basan chɛ n na, miin chenɛ n faen ni an ma. Chɛ ko a, an‑na tando be wan Yataa ma, Chu mɔɛ n ni Yataa min fai.

Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɛ denɛ n chee wan kaina dɔndɔ, a ɔ, “Mɔɛ chɛ n ma chinchinden mu n ye. Tee sawa an nɛ ka gbɛ, an mbe nɛ mmɔ fɛ, daun fen mbe ee nɔ. Ni n‑na a ma sunɛ an ni ta an kɔnkɔ tɔɛ a, an mbe ka‑a wan an chenɛ kɔɔ chia a, an ni bɔn a ma.”
Mbɛ an dɔ, “Mɔ ee che daun fenɛ sɔn‑da nɛ kan kɔ kan, fuin chɛ ma, mɔ ɛ mɔ fanka chɛ da kɔ min na.”
Mbɛ a ɔ, “Biidi yuu ɛ nɛ wo boo ɔ?” An dɔ, “Biidi gbugbu wɔnfea an mbe nn boo ɔ, ni nyɛ mɛsɛ ɛnden.”
Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ tɛtɛ ye, a ɔ an ni si duu ma, mbɛ an gbɛɛ si‑a.

An si‑a kɛn, a‑a biidi wɔnfea chɛ ya, a basan nyɛ mɛsɛ ɛnden chɛ a, mbɛ a‑a Yataa wai bɔ daun fen chɛ ko a. Mbɛ a‑a a ɔ kai kai, biidi chɛ basan nyɛ a, mbɛ a‑a a be a fɛ denɛ n ma, mbɛ an bɛɛ‑a a du du mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ tɛtɛ ma.
An gbɛɛ‑a an bu fa daunɛ chɛ wan. Mbɛ a fɛ denɛ n‑na mɔɛ chɛ n da tɔɛ a sɔn sɔn, a bɛn‑da wan samba sɛmbɛnden wɔnfea da a faenɛ ma gban.
Mɔ kaima miin na‑a an daun fen chɛ daun, an danɛ taen fan ni mɔ wu naanin dɔ. Musu n bɛ den mɛsɛ n na, an na‑a daunɛ chɛ wan, chɛɛ an nii ma an dan ni.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a saa mɔɛ chɛ n na, an yɛ‑a an baa nu. A wan ni ma, ni a fɛ denɛ nu, an sɛ‑a wan dɛndɛ ɔ, mbɛ an ta‑a Makadan tanda ɔ.

Tima ɛnden gbakɔ, Chu mɔɛ nu, miin ni Fayisii n na, an bɛ chɛ n na, miin ni Sadusii n na, an na‑a wan Chisɔsi tena. An toen ni an ni a bia a chen kɔ. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, an‑na a ɔ tisa, an dɔ, a ni kamaya koe ma an ye, min mbe a ɔ yian, mbɛ a 'a gbasaya kaen ni Yataa an tena.
Chɛɛ a ɔ, “Ni banda yawa‑a tee bea ma, a a fiandenɛ ɛ, wo‑a a fɔ wan, wo ɔ, ‘Sinan banda ɛ nyan‑da wan, a mu min na, banda yawa‑a.’

Tee dɔ n na, ni banda ɔ ka‑a, wo e banda yen fan a yawaenɛ ɛ, a maenɛ ɛ to digbi digbi. Ni chɛ ma‑a, wo‑a a fɔ wan, wo ɔ, ‘Sona ɛ na‑a wan bi. A mu min na, banda yawa‑a, a sin sona gbiienɛ ɛ to.’ Wo e banda ma fɛn fan, mbɛ wo‑a a ɔ sɔn, ni ɛ nyan tena wan, chɛ ma, ni a ee nyan tena. Wo e chɛ n dɔ gbɛ wan, chɛɛ wo ee sanche koe n dɔ gbɛ, miin mbe ma tena.

Wo mɔ bonda chɛ sima nu, wo yau yama yama, wo sin mbe ee dan ko a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo e n dɔ tisa tena kamaya koe ma koe a. Chɛɛ wo ee tɔmɔsi dɔndɔ wɛɛ ma sɔn‑da, mɔɔ dechee Yataa‑a tɔmɔsi min na ben a 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ Chona a, a 'a mɔɛ n tena.” Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a an to, mbɛ a ta‑a.
Chisɔsi n bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na, an sɛ‑a wan dɛndɛ ɔ, mbɛ an‑na yii wa chɛ tɛ a kaka dɔndɔɛ ma. Chɛɛ a fɛ denɛ n na‑a nyina wan ta koe a daun fenɛ a an boo ɔ.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ an nu ma, “Yisinɛ min mbe mmɔ 'a mɔɛ chɛ n boo ɔ, miin mu Fayisii n na, an bɛ Sadusii n na, wo wo kun ma fɛn a boo ɔ.”
Mbɛ an bun‑da a tɛnsɛ‑a an nyɔn tɛ ɔ, an dɔ, “A‑a chɛ fɔ, a mu min na, mmɔ nyina‑a mmɔ ma na ni biidi a mmɔ boo ɔ.”
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, an ni koe min tɛnsɛ tena an nyɔn tɛ ɔ. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Wo 'a danaya ɔ dɔɔ n ko a. Ni chɛ ma, wo yiima nii ta biidi ko ɔ.

Wo ma n dɔ gbɛ nin bɛ. Wo wandi gbu, wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, n‑na mɔ kaima wu duu da kɔ buɛ min dɔ biidi gbugbu duu a. Chɛ to‑a wan wo yii ma. Mɔ a yen, wo nyina‑a, n‑na mɔ kaima wu naanin chɛ n bɛɛ da kɔ buɛ min dɔ biidi gbugbu wɔnfea a. Gba si tena fea chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, a tɔɛ an mbe to. A tɔɛ chɛ min sin to‑a, a‑a samba sɛsɛ a fa wan gban.

N‑na a fɔɛ min chɛ wo ye, n dɔ, yisinɛ min mbe Fayisii chɛ n boo ɔ, an bɛ Sadusii chɛ n na, n dɔ, wo ni wo kun ma fɛn a a, n mbe ee bai sa tena a si biidi an ma. Wo ni che wan chɛ ɔ gbɛ‑a. Ka n mbe yɛ to n da a kuiɛ ɔ, an 'na yisin chɛ an boo ɔ, wo wo kun ma fɛn a a.”
Mbɛ an‑na a ɔ gbɛ wan gbɛ, mbɛ a ni an na si tena a si kanɛ an ma, Fayisii chɛ n ni min chɛ mɔɛ n na, an bɛ Sadusii n na. Chɛɛ a nii koɔ tena a si yisinɛ an ma, an mbe min chɛ biidi ɔ.
Chisɔsi ta‑a Sisayea Fiipai tanda ɔ, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Mɔɛ n ta yiima ɔ, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mu nyɔn na?”

Mbɛ an dɔ, “Mɔɛ dɔ n mbe a fɔ tena wan, mbɛ i mu Chɔn fan na, min ni yii chɛ mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a. Dɔ n sin mbe a fɔ wan, mbɛ i mu Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔ dɔndɔ an na suun, min tɔ mu Idaicha. Mbɛ dɔ n sin dɔ, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛ wɛɛ suun, min tɔ ni Chɛyimaya, a mu i a. Dɔ n mbe ta‑a a fɔ‑a, an dɔ, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ dɔ gbɛɛ mu i a.”
Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ to, a ɔ, “Chɛɛ wo wandi gbu, wo ta yiima ɔ, n mu nyɔn na?”
Mbɛ Saimɔn Pita ɔ, “I mu Chasi an na, nn kun ka mansa. Yataa min mbe ee fa kuɔ fɔ ko a, a 'a denɛ mu i wan na.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “I duaen ba mu, Saimɔn, Chɔn 'na denɛ. A mu min na, mɔ gbu an ma koe chɛ ɔ yian ni i a. Fa min mbe banda bu ɔ, an‑na a ɔ yian i a.

I tɔɛ ma sien mu Pita, min fasaien mu, faa gbanɛ a. Mɔɛ miin mbe an kai fa‑a n na, an mbe ma‑a wan yɔ chenɛ. N ni a ma din i tena, mbɛ n sin mbe chen chɛ sɔ‑a faa gban chɛ an ma. Gbasaya kan kɔ kan mbe ee ma‑a saya boo ɔ chen chɛ kun ma.

N mbe gbasaya be‑a wan i ma mɔɛ chɛ n kun ma, miin mbe Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ. Ni i ma dɔn ni ko ɔ ko ma dunya chɛ ɔ, Yataa wɛɛ ee dɔn‑da a koe chɛ ma. Chɛɛ ni i dɔn‑da ko ɔ ko ma dunya chɛ ɔ, Yataa wɛɛ ɛ dɔn‑da wan an koe chɛ ma.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɛ denɛ n na si gbau gbau, a ɔ, an ma a ɔ yian mɔ ɔ mɔ a, mbɛ an mu Chasi a, mɔɛ n kun ka mansa.

A ka gbɛ an tima chɛ ma, Chisɔsi‑a a kuu sɔ wan a ɔ yian‑da a fɛ denɛ n na, mbɛ Yataa ta tima ɛ na tena wan che‑a a ta koe a Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. A ɔ, a sin nɔ mu mɔɛ n mbe an kun puin‑da a ma. A ɔ, nɔ chɛnyɛ gbakoo n ni ma, ni nɔ Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa nu, an bɛ Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ n na, an mbe a bia‑a wan. A ɔ, mbɛ an‑na a a tɔɔya, mbɛ an yɛ‑a, an‑na a be a fa mɔɛ n ma. A ɔ, chɛɛ ni an‑na a fa, an ni a tɔn, a ɔ, tee fea a sawan bɔɛ ma, Yataa ɛ a kɔɔ sɔ‑a wan a ka saya ɔ.
Mbɛ Pita‑a Chisɔsi pɛn, a ɔ, an ni sɔ an fea a. An sɔ‑a kɛn, mbɛ Pita‑a a fɔ a ye, a ɔ, “I ma dua chɛ a, i fa koe a. Yataa wɛɛ ee dɔn‑da i ni fa.”
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi‑a a ya a mun, a ɔ Pita ma, “Ka n fɛ, e ka Sitana 'a wai an chɛ tena. E ee ka basan tena wan n ma. Koe min na mu, mɔ gbu yiinachii an mbe ka i ɔ. Yataa ta yiinachii ma chɛ a.”
Mbɛ a ɔ an gbɛɛ ma, “Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ toen mu a ni bea n fɛ, an mɔɛ chɛ ni nyina a faa ma koe n ma. Mbɛ a‑a a ma bɛn mɔnɛ ɔ bia koe a n ko a, a basan fa koe a.
Koe min na mu, ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ban‑da bea koe a n fɛ, a wandi fɔɛ ma kanda koe a, an mɔɛ chɛ ee kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da. Chɛɛ mɔɛ min mbe a yii bɔ‑a a fɔɛ ɔ n ko a, an mɔɛ chɛ ɛ kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da wan.
Dunya chɛ ma nyanɛ gbɛɛ, min mbe a ma, mɔ ni a sɔn bɛɛ, mɔ ni fo kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ a, tɔnɔn ma a a. Fen kɔ fen mbe ee nɔ, mɔ gbu ɛ che min be‑a, kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ko a.

Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo ma ka n fɛ. Koe min na mu, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe na‑a wan to dunya chɛ ɔ, nn bɛ n 'na maeka n na. Ni nn sin ma‑a na‑a, nn mbe ma‑a wan man‑da Fa Yataa 'a manɛ a. An tima chɛ a, n mbe mɔ ɔ mɔ pawa‑a wan a 'a wai ko a, ɛ min chɛ‑a.
N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ mɔɛ dɔ nu nɛ sɔ ɔ sanche, an mbe ma‑a wan fɔɛ ɔ aan an ni chɛ ɔ yen. An mbe a ɔ yen‑da wan n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe na‑a tima min na n 'na mansaya ɔ.”
Tee wɔdɔ gbakɔ, Chisɔsi‑a Pita ya, mbɛ an sɛ‑a kɔnkɔ a yansama dɔndɔ kun tɛ, an bɛ Chimisi a, ni a dɔɛ Chɔn. An dechee an sɛ‑a nɔ.
An ya to‑a wan Chisɔsi a, mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ bun‑da man‑da yɔ tee, mbɛ a ma doma gbɛ‑a fo fo, ɛ ta‑a man‑da taun a ben doma kan kɔ kan ma. Chisɔsi ma fan‑da ka wan.
Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, an‑na Mosisi yen, an fea Idaicha a, an mbe chia ɔ bɔɛ chɛ‑a an bɛ Chisɔsi a.

Mbɛ Pita‑a a fɔ Chisɔsi ye, a ɔ, “Mansa, a nyan‑da wan mmɔ ɛ nɛ chɛ. Ni i toen fan mu a a, n mbe ku dɔndɔ dɔndɔ bun‑da wan nɛ wo sawa chɛ ko a. Dɔndɔ i ko a, dɔndɔ kai Mosisi ko a, a sawan bɔɛ kai Idaicha ko a.”

Pita to‑a koɔ tena wan Chisɔsi tena, mbɛ dingbii gbɛenɛ fo fo yii‑a an kun na, mbɛ Yataa koɔ‑a an dingbii chɛ ɔ, a ɔ, “N 'na denɛ an nɛ, a ko a di n ye kaka. N faa chimaen mu a ko a. Wo a da a kuiɛ a min.”
Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ n‑na Yataa kuiɛ chɛ a min kɛn, chiandia‑a an gboo fa wan gban. Mbɛ an bea‑a duu ma susu gbuu, an ya kɔɔɛ a bundenɛ ɛ gbudu.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi na‑a an tena, a‑a a boo bun an ma, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Wo ma chian. Wo wo kɔɔ sɔ.”
Mbɛ an‑na an kunɛ kɔɔ sɔ. An mbe na mɔɛ min yen gbɛ dechee, mɔɔ Chisɔsi.

Mbɛ an‑na a kuu sɔ kɔnkɔɛ yii‑a. An mbe yii tena kɔnkɔɛ chɛ an na, mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “Wo‑a koe min dɔ yen ka, wo ma a ɔ yian mɔ dɔ mende kan kɔ kan na. Wo a sa wo yii ma, aan n 'na tee ni che, tee min ma, Yataa ɛ n na sɔ‑a a ka saya ɔ, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ.”
Mbɛ an dɔ, “Chɛɛ mmɔ 'a sawa kan mɔɛ chɛ n mbe a fɔ wan, mbɛ Idaicha ɛ na‑a pɛn, kunka mansa e na na. Fen‑na a ma gbɛ Idaicha ma na nin bɛ?”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Tea gbu mu, Idaicha an mu ya ɔ sɔɛ a. An mbe ko ɔ ko sɔ a chia ma kunka mansa ya ɔ.

Chɛɛ n ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ Idaicha gbu na‑a na wan. Chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ nii ma a sɔn ni, ni an mu Idaicha a. An sin na‑a wai min si a a, a nii ma dɔɔ. N fandi gbu wɛɛ, an mbe a ma‑a wan, n ni mɔnɛ ɔ bia, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ.”
Mbɛ an na‑a a ɔ gbɛ wan gbɛ, mbɛ Chisɔsi ni bai min sa tena a sien ni Chɔn fan ma, min ni yii chɛ mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a kɔnkɔɛ chɛ yii, an bɛ a fɛ den sawa chɛ n na. An na‑a kɛn, an che‑a mɔ fanka ma. Mbɛ kamin dɔndɔ na‑a, a‑a a kumbai gbangban Chisɔsi chen kɔɔ,
a ɔ, “Mansa, gbɔgbɔi an mbe n 'na den kaienɛ ma. Ɛ a tɔɔya tena, a ma chianden mu. Tima sɛsɛ ko a, ɛ a a bea wan ta ɔ. Dɔ n na, ɛ a a dɛ wan yii wɛɛ ɔ. Chɛ an fɛ mu, chinchin n 'na den chɛ ma.
N na‑a wan a a i fɛ denɛ n tena, chɛɛ an ma kun ni a baun koe a.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo e ka buɛ min dɔ, wo too ɔ gbɛ kaka, a sin wo ee dan ko a. A ɔ yansan gbɛ mmɔ bɛ ɛ mmɔ nyɔn fɛ, fen mu wo ee dan n na? N ma a ɔ sɔn, n mbe fen ma to wo ko a. Na nɛ i 'a denɛ a.”
Mbɛ an na‑a den chɛ a a tena. Nyina yama min ni ka den chɛ fɛ, Chisɔsi ɔ te, a ni ka a fɛ. Nyina yama chɛ ka‑a wan a fɛ, a baun‑da a ya kɔɔɛ a.
Chɛ gbakɔ, a fɛ denɛ n na‑a a tena, mbɛ an‑na a ɔ tisa an dechee a, an dɔ, “Nn toen fan ni nn ni nyina chɛ gbain kaien chɛ fɛ, chɛɛ nn ma kun ni. Fen mu chɛ ma‑a nn na?”

Mbɛ a ɔ an ma, “Danaya a tenden mbe ee wo ɔ Yataa ko a. Chɛ an‑na a ma, wo ma che ni nyina chɛ gbain‑da kaien chɛ fɛ. N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ ni danaya ɛnden bɛɛ yɔ chin fen kuu dɔɔma ɛndenɛ wɛɛ, a ma‑a wo ɔ Yataa ko a, ko ɔ ko ee ma‑a nɔ, wo ee che‑a min ma‑a. Wo e kun‑da wan wo ni a fɔ kɔnkɔɛ chɛ ye, wo ɔ, a ni a wandi kuɛn, wo ɔ, a ni ta kaina dɔ mende, mbɛ a kuɛn‑da.”
Tima dɔndɔ a, Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ n gbɛɛ a kan‑da wan a ma Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ, mbɛ a ɔ, “N fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, an mbe na tena wan n ma tachɛ‑a, mɔɛ n ma.
An mbe n fa‑a wan, chɛɛ tee fea ni a sawan bɔɛ gbakɔ, n mbe n kɔɔ sɔ‑a wan a ka saya ɔ.” A‑a bai chɛ fɔ kɛn, a fɛ denɛ n faa yɔn‑da wan kaka.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi na‑a Kapanaun duu ɔ, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na. Mɔɛ miin ni pawa bia Yataa 'a kata ko a, an na‑a Pita tena, mbɛ an dɔ, “Wo 'a ticha chɛ, ɛ pawa chɛ wan Yataa 'a kata ko a, ae?”

Mbɛ Pita ɔ, “Mm, ɛ a chɛ wan.” Chɛɛ Pita don‑da kɛn chen chɛ a Chisɔsi ni ka kaina, Chisɔsi pɛn koɔ‑a a tena, a ɔ, “Saimɔn, i ta yiinachii ɔ, dunya chɛ ɔ mansa n mbe pawa kain nyɔn ma, an ta denɛ nu mu baa, ka mɔɛ tɔɛ nu?”
Mbɛ Pita ɔ, “Mɔɛ tɔɛ n fan mbe a be.” Chisɔsi ɔ, “Chɛ nyin fan. Chɛ a ɔ yian fan mbɛ an 'na denɛ n mbe ee pawa chɛ.

Chɛɛ min mbe a ma, mɔɛ chɛ n faa ma na tɛ mɔ ma, i 'a duinɛ ya, i ni ta Kadidi yii wa chɛ da a, duin na dɛ tena. E nyɛ saa saa min bɔ‑a, a da a ka, e kɔpɔɛ yen‑da wan a da ɔ. A kɔpɔɛ chɛ ɛ kun fan, a ni mɔ fea ma pawa chɛ Yataa 'a kata chɛ ko a. A ya, i ni ta a a, i ni mɔ fea ma pawa chɛ a a.” Mbɛ Pita ta‑a, a‑a a ma yɔ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ a ye, a ma koe a.
A tima chɛ a, Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ n na‑a wan a tena, an dɔ, “Nyɔn mbe ma‑a mɔ chenama a, mɔɛ chɛ n tɛ ɔ, miin mbe Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ?”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a den mɛsɛ ɛndenɛ chee, mbɛ a na‑a a tena. Den den chɛ na‑a kɛn Chisɔsi tena, a‑a a ma wan, a sɔ‑a an gbɛɛ ya kɔɔ.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N ni a ma din wo tena, ni wo ma wo sɔnɛ mun ni, wo ni ma yɔ den mɛsɛ nu, wo ee don‑da Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ.
Mɔɛ min mbe ma‑a mɔ chenama a, mɔɛ chɛ n tɛ ɔ Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ, ɛ ma‑a mɔɛ an na, min mbe a wandi a yii‑a yɔ den mɛsɛ chɛ.
A sin, ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a boo si den den chɛ nyɔn sima kɔɔ n tɔɛ ɔ, a‑a a boo si ka n fan kɔɔ.”

Chisɔsi ɔ, “Chɛɛ n fɛ denɛ den tachɛen bɛɛ, miin kai faen mu n na, mɔ ɔ mɔ kan kɔ kan, i wɛn mbe an na dɛ‑a ko yama ɔ, i‑a ko yama ma. Ɛ nyan‑da wan i mɔɛ chɛ ko a, an ni sen kanɛ chii i kan na, mbɛ an‑na i a dɛ yii wa ɔ.
A yau gba mɔɛ n ko a dunya ɔ, a mu min na, koe n mbe wan nɔ, miin mbe an na dɛ‑a ko yama ma ɔ. Ko yama gbu n mbe ma wan, chɛɛ a yau gba mɔɛ chɛ ko a, min mbe a bɔ mɔ gbu a dɛ‑a ko yama ma ɔ.

“A sin, ni i boo‑a i a dɛ ko yama ɔ, a tɛ a a, i ni a a dɛ. Ni i chenɛ wɛɛ‑a i a dɛ ko yama ɔ, a wɛɛ tɛ a a, i ni a a dɛ. Koe min na mu, tamban tɔɛ wɛɛ ɛ kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da wan, ni a ma dɛ ni ko yama ɔ. Chɛɛ a ma nyin, i boo fea a kandenɛ ni ma, a basan i chen fea a, mbɛ i ta‑a ta ɔ, min mbe ee dufɛn kuɔ fɔ ko a.
Ni i ya nan fan bɛɛ‑a i a dɛ ko yama ɔ, a bɔ, i ni a a dɛ. A nyin i ni kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn, ya dɔndɔɛ wɛɛ a. Chɛɛ a yau, i ya a kan denɛ ni ma, mbɛ i ta‑a ta ɔ.”
Chisɔsi ɔ te to, “Wo wo kun ma fɛn. Wo ma wo ya a yii n fɛ denɛ den tachɛen bɛɛ ma. N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ maeka n mbe wan an boo ɔ banda bu ɔ, tɛɛ ee miin tɛ an bɛ Fa Yataa a.

“Ka wɛ n ni wo ɔ tisa. Ni sa chɛmɛ dɔndɔ ma‑a wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ boo ɔ, mbɛ dɔndɔɛ to‑a a ɔ, a ee to ka. Chɛɛ ɛ sa bi kɔnɔntɔ kun ma kɔnɔntɔɛ chɛ n to wan daun chɛ‑a kɔnkɔɛ kaa fɛ, mbɛ a ta‑a a ya a kan‑da dɔndɔɛ chɛ a min to‑a ka a ɔ. A ee ma ka wan?
N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ ni a‑a sa dɔndɔɛ chɛ yen, a bu ɔ dia‑a wan kaka a ko a, a ben sa bi kɔnɔntɔ kun ma kɔnɔntɔɛ chɛ n ma, miin ma to ni ka a ɔ.
A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a mu, Fa Yataa wɛɛ, min mbe banda bu ɔ, a ma to ni n fɛ denɛ den tachɛen bɛɛ ni fo kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ a.”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo wɛn mbe ka n fɛ, ni i bɔɛ‑a ko yama ma i a, ta a tena wo fea gbe a, mbɛ i‑a a ɔ yian a a, a‑a koe min ma i a. Ni a dɔn‑da a 'a ko yama ma gba chɛ ma, mbɛ wo fea ma‑a to a a kuiɛ dɔndɔɛ ɔ.

Chɛɛ ni a ma dɔn ni a 'a ko yama ma gba chɛ ma, ta to a tena wo bɛ mɔ fea, sawa a. A mu min na, a nyɛnden fan mu Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, ‘Ni an‑na kunɛ si mɔ ɔ mɔ kun ma, siiya fea, sawa an mbe bɔ a ma, an mbe e na to kaa a tɛ‑a, a si an bai chɛ ma.’
Ni chɛ wɛɛ ma‑a, chɛɛ a ma dɔn ni a 'a ko yama ma gba chɛ ma to, a ma siibia gbɛ chɔchi gbu ɔ. Ni a ma a too ma sɔ ni gbɛ chɔchi mɔɛ n bɛɛ ma, ka a fɛ, a bia yɔ mɔɛ min ma Yataa sɔn.
“Mbɛ n ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ ni wo ma dɔn ni ko ɔ ko ma dunya chɛ ɔ, Yataa wɛɛ ee dɔn‑da a koe chɛ ma. Chɛɛ ni wo dɔn‑da ko ɔ ko ma dunya chɛ ɔ, Yataa wɛɛ ɛ dɔn‑da wan an koe chɛ ma.
“N ni a ma din to wo tena. Ni wo mɔ fea gbe wɛɛ dɔn‑da nɛ dunya chɛ ɔ ko dɔndɔɛ ma koe a, mbɛ wo‑a Fa Yataa ɔ tisa an koe chɛ ko a, ɛ a ma‑a wan wo ye.
Koe min na mu, ni mɔ fea, sawa bɛn‑da kaina min n 'na fɛ dencha ɔ, n bɛɛ n mbe ma‑a wan nɔ an tɛ ɔ.”
Mbɛ Pita gbɛn‑da Chisɔsi ma, a ɔ, “Mansa, nn fɛn mbe ka i fɛ, ni dɔndɔ‑a ko yama ma n na gba sɛsɛ ko a, gba yuu ko a mu, n mbe n boo bɔ‑a a ɔ? N ni n boo bɔ a ɔ, gba wɔnfea an ko a?”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a ma din a tena, a ɔ, “A an, i ma a to nɔ gba wɔnfea dechee. Chɛɛ a to nɔ tima kan kɔ kan na, ni a‑a ko yama ma i a.
A mu min na, Yataa 'a mansaya maen fan mu yɔ min ma‑a tai chɛ ɔ. Mansa dɔndɔ toen ni a ni a ɔ sɔn, ni a 'a kuiɛ min nyɔn sima ni a 'a wai chɛ mɔ kan kɔ kan ma.
An to‑a kɔndi chɛ an bɔ tena, mbɛ an na‑a a 'a wai chɛ mɔ dɔndɔ a a tena. Kuiɛ ni wan an wai chɛ mɔɛ chɛ ma min ni kɔpɔ ma chianden ba a.

Chɛɛ fen na tenden nii kamin chɛ boo ɔ. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, mbɛ mansa chɛ‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, an ni a ma tachɛ yɔncha ɔ. A wan ni ma, a 'a musu, a 'a denɛ nu, a basan fen kɔ fen na min ni a boo ɔ, an ni an gbɛɛ ma tachɛ, mansa chɛ 'a kuiɛ bɔɛ a.
Mbɛ kamin chɛ bea‑a mansa chɛ chen na, mbɛ a‑a a disa, a ɔ, ‘Fa, i dimu, i faa bia n na. N mbe i 'a kuiɛ chɛ gbɛɛ bɔ‑a wan.’
Mansa chɛ chinchin‑da wan a ma, mbɛ a‑a a boo bɔ kuiɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, a ɔ, a ni ta.

“Chɛɛ kamin chɛ ta‑a kɛn dechee, mbɛ a‑a a bɔ wai chɛ mɔ dɔndɔ tan. A 'a kuiɛ ni wan a ma kɔpɔɛ a min sɛmbɛnden ni ɛnden na. Mbɛ a‑a a bɔɛ chɛ bia a kanɛ a fɔin, a ɔ, ‘N 'na kuiɛ min gbɛɛ ɛ i ma, a bɔ bi.’
Mbɛ a bɔɛ wai chɛ mɔɛ chɛ bea‑a a chen na, mbɛ a‑a a disa, a ɔ, ‘I faa bia n na, n mbe i 'a kuiɛ gbɛɛ bɔ‑a wan.’
Chɛɛ a ma dɔn ni. A‑a min ma, a‑a a bɔɛ chɛ a dɛ pimbi chenɛ a, aan a ni a 'a kuiɛ bɔ tima min na.
A bɔ wai chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n‑na chɛ ɔ yen kɛn, an faa yɔn‑da wan kaka. Mbɛ an ta‑a wan mansa chɛ tena, mbɛ an‑na ko ɔ ko ɔ yian a a.
Mbɛ mansa chɛ‑a an kamin chɛ gbu chee. A na‑a kɛn, mbɛ mansa chɛ ɔ, ‘I wan mɔ yama wa chɛ, n‑na n boo ka n 'na kuiɛ a, min ni i ma, a mu min na, i‑a n disa.
I wɛɛ ni kun fan i ni chinchin i bɔɛ chɛ ma, yɔ n chinchin‑da buɛ min dɔ i ma.’
Mansa chɛ faa tɛ‑a wan a ɔ benden ba a. Mbɛ a‑a an kamin chɛ a dɛ pimbi chenɛ a. A ɔ, an ni a a mɔnɛ aan a ni kuiɛ chɛ gbɛɛ bɔ a nyɔ na.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ te gbɛ, “Ni wo ma chinchin ni wo bɔɛ n ma, wo ni wo boo bɔ an 'na ko yama n dɔ, Fa Yataa wɛɛ, ɛ a ma‑a ka wan wo wɛɛ a, yɔ mansa chɛ‑a a ma buɛ min dɔ kamin chɛ a.”
Chisɔsi ban‑da kɛn koɔ‑a mɔɛ chɛ n tena, a bɔ‑a Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ, mbɛ a yɛ‑a Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ. A na‑a Chɔdan yii an tɛ, mbɛ a ta‑a Chudia.
Mɔ sɛsɛ bea‑a wan a fɛ nɔ, a sin‑na mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ baun fan, miin gbandien ni an tɛ ɔ.

Chu mɔɛ chɛ dɔ nu, miin ni Fayisii n na, an na‑a wan a tena. An toen ni an ni a bia a chen kɔ. Mbɛ an dɔ, “Nn toen mu nn ni a ɔ sɔn, ni mmɔ 'a sawa dɔnden fan mu musu si kai ni a boo ka a 'a musu a, yɔ a toen mu a a buɛ min dɔ.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ɛ wan n yii ma, mbɛ wo‑a a kan fan Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ dunya a dan tima a, Yataa‑a mɔ gbu nyan fea an na, kai an fea musu a.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, Yataa‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, ‘Ni mɔ kaima‑a musu fuu, ɛ a de to wan, a basan a fa a, mbɛ an chɛ‑a an nyɔn dɔ, an fea a 'a musu a. A sin, an fea chɛ, an mbe ma‑a wan mɔ dɔndɔɛ a.’
Chɛ‑a a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ mɔ fea ma to an na, chɛɛ mɔ dɔndɔ gbe mu gbɛ an na. Chɛ an fɛ mu, fuu ɔ, ni Yataa‑a mɔ fea chɛ an nyɔn dɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ kan kɔ kan ma an tɛ du.”

Mbɛ Fayisii chɛ n dɔ te to, “Chɛɛ Mosisi‑a sawa min sa, a dɔnden fan mu, nn ni nn 'na musu n boo ka. Koe min na mu, sawa chɛ ɔ te, mɔɛ e i 'a musu boo ka wan, ni i‑a siiya gboo be a ma, min mbe a ɔ yian, mbɛ i wan‑na i boo ka a a. Fen ko a mu, chɛ ɛ ma?”
Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo 'a tooɔgbɛa, an‑na a ma, Mosisi dɔn‑da wo ni wo boo ka wo 'a musu n na. Chɛɛ a nii ka wan Yataa yii ma, tima min na a‑a dunya a dan.

A sin, n ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a boo ka a 'a musu a, ko dɔ mende ko a, min ma waa ma basan koe a kai dɔ mende a, mbɛ a‑a musu dɔ gbɛɛ si, a‑a waa ma basan musu a, a ee fuu ɔ min na, Yataa ya a.”
Mbɛ a fɛ denɛ n‑na a fɔ a ye, an dɔ, “O, ni musu si ɛ ka wan, mbɛ a nyin mɔ ma musu si.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Mɔɛ gbɛɛ an mbe ee bai chɛ ɔ bia, mɔɔ dechee Yataa basan‑da miin ma.

A mu min na, ko sɛsɛ ɛ wan nɔ, min mbe a ma, mɔ kaima dɔ n mbe ee che musu si‑a. Mɔ kaima dɔ n mbe wan nɔ, an‑na an suun an kai chiayaenɛ an na. Mɔɛ dɔ n sin 'na kai chiaya kaen mu an fian mɔ gbu n fan na. Mɔɛ dɔ n sin ma dɔn ni an ni musu si, a mu min na, an toen mu an ni an fɔɛ gbɛɛ be Yataa 'a mansaya ta koe a ya ɔ ma. Mɔɛ miin mbe kun an ni bai chɛ ɔ bia, an ni a ɔ bia.”
Mbɛ mɔɛ dɔ n na‑a wan an 'na den mɛsɛ n na Chisɔsi tena. An toen ni a ni a boo bun an kun ma, a ni samunɛ chɛ an ko a. Chɛɛ a fɛ denɛ chɛ n‑na chɛ ɔ yen kɛn, an‑na mɔɛ chɛ n na gban fan.
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo ma an ma bai. Wo a ma den mɛsɛ n ni na n tena. Koe min na mu, mɔɛ miin maen mu yɔ den mɛsɛ chɛ nu, Yataa an mbe ma‑a an 'na mansa a.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a boo bun den mɛsɛ chɛ n ma, dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a, ɛ ta‑a an dua‑a. Mbɛ a ka‑a an kaina chɛ, a ta‑a.
Tima dɔndɔ a, kamin dɔndɔ na‑a wan Chisɔsi tena, mbɛ a ɔ, “Ticha, n mbe ko chɛndɛ minan nyɔn sima ma, min mbe a ma, n ni kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn?”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Fen mu i toen mu n fan ni a ɔ yian i a, ni koe min nyin a ma koe a? Yataa dɔndɔ gbe an mu mɔ chɛndɛ a. Ni i toen mu i ni kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn, mbɛ don a 'a sawa n kɔɔ.”

Mbɛ kamin chɛ ɔ, “Sawa minan nu mu?” Chisɔsi ɔ, “Yataa ɔ te, wo ma mɔ fa, ni sawa ma min fɔ ni, a ɔ, wo ee waa ma basan mɔɛ a, wo ee fuu ɔ min na, a ɔ, wo ma kanka chɛ, a ɔ, wo ma fania fɔ mɔ ɔ mɔ ma,
a ɔ, wo ni kooya be wo fa ma, a basan wo de a, mbɛ a ɔ, wo ni to wo 'a mɔɛ n na, yɔ wo toen mu buɛ min dɔ wo wandi a.”
Mbɛ kamin tɔngbɔɛ chɛ ɔ, “Sawa chɛ n gbɛɛ biaen fan mu gbɛ n boo ɔ. Fen to‑a to, n mbe min ma, a ka sawa chɛ n ma, i‑a miin ma dan ka?”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ni i ma to ni tɔmbɛ sima wɛɛ ni ma i ma Yataa tena, ta, i ni i boo fenɛ n gbɛɛ ma tachɛ. Mbɛ i‑a a kɔpɔɛ chɛ ya, i‑a a be yɔn tɔɛ n ma. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, i ni nyanɛ ma sɔn banda bu ɔ. Ni i‑a chɛ ma, mbɛ i na‑a i ma‑a n fɛ denɛ a.”
Kamin tɔngbɔɛ chɛ‑a bai chɛ a min kɛn, mbɛ a ta‑a faayɔnɛ ɔ. Koe min na mu, nyan tɔ wa ni a a.
Kamin tɔngbɔɛ chɛ ta‑a kɛn, mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ a fɛ denɛ n ye, a ɔ, “N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ a ɔ gbɛ nyan tɔɛ n ko a, an ni don Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ.
Ka wɛ n mbe a ma din to wo tena, mbɛ a ɔ gbɛ kaka nyan tɔɛ ko a, a ni don Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ, a ni ben ninchi don koe ma miichi woe a.”
An‑na bai chɛ a min kɛn, a‑a an da a fa wan gban. Mbɛ an dɔ, “Mbɛ nyɔn mbe bauncha chɛ ma sɔn‑da gbɛ?”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a an gbɛɛ ma fɛn, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Mɔ gbu ee che koe chɛ n ma‑a, chɛɛ Yataa ɛ che wan ko ɔ ko ma‑a.”
Mbɛ Pita ɔ, “A yen ko, nn‑na nn kan kɔ sɔ fen kɔ fen na, mbɛ nn bea‑a i fɛ. Yataa ɛ tɔnɔnɛ minan nyɔn sima be‑a nn ma?”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo dan a a, mbɛ a tɔnɔnɛ ɛ koa‑a wan. Tima min na Yataa 'a dunya nama chɛ ɔ na tena, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe si‑a n 'na mansa sea a. Wo wɛɛ wo mɔ tan kun ma fea chɛ nu, wo e si‑a wan mansa sea tan kun ma fea n na. Mbɛ wo ma‑a mansa n na dambi tan kun ma fea chɛ n ko a Chu mɔɛ n tɛ ɔ.

Chenɛ, suun ma nyɔɛ nu, woo mɔɛ nu, denɛ nu, a basan sɛnɛ n na, an nyin fan. Chɛɛ mɔɛ min mbe an dɔndɔ wɛɛ to‑a n ko a, Yataa ɛ a kɔ‑a wan an fen chɛ a, a si tena chɛmɛ dɔndɔ ni a kun ma a a. A sin, Yataa ɛ kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ be‑a wan to a ma.
Chɛɛ mɔ sɛsɛ nu, miin mbe sɔ ɔ ya ɔ sanche, Yataa ɛ an na yɛ‑a wan gbaa a. Mɔɛ miin mbe gbaa sanche, Yataa ɛ an sɔ‑a wan ya ɔ dunya nama chɛ ɔ.”

Chisɔsi ɔ, “N‑na chɛ fɔ koe min na, Yataa 'a mansaya maen fan mu yɔ min ma‑a tai chɛ ɔ. Kamin dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, yadi ni min boo ɔ. Mbɛ tee dɔndɔ a, a‑a a kɔɔ sɔ sau sau ma, mbɛ a ta‑a wan wai chɛ mɔ yan tena. A toen ni mɔɛ n fan na, miin mbe wai chɛ a 'a yadi chɛ ɔ, ɛ miin pawa tee ma.
An kuiɛ bɛn‑da wan kaina dɔndɔ, an bɛ mɔɛ chɛ n na, mbɛ ɛ an pawa‑a wan yɔ an ni debea n pawa min nyɔn na tee ma. An‑na dɔbɛn chɛ chɛ kɛn, mbɛ a‑a an na ta a 'a yadi chɛ ɔ wai chɛ tena.
Tee kain 'na kɔɔɛ a, mbɛ a ta‑a machiti ɔ. A‑a mɔɛ dɔ n tan fan nɔ sɔ ɔ gbama gbama a, an mbe ee wai ɔ wai‑a.
Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an bɛɛ ye, a ɔ, ‘Wo wɛɛ, wo na, wo ni ta wai chɛ n 'na yadi ɔ. N mbe wo buɔdia pawa chɛ‑a wan wo a.’
Mbɛ an dɔn‑da, an ta‑a. A yɛ‑a wan to machiti chɛ ɔ tee kun tɛ, mbɛ a‑a mɔɛ n na ta to wai chɛ koe a yadi chɛ ɔ. A‑a a ma ka wan to tee kɔ kai wɛɛ ma.

A danka a gbɛ, tee bea ma, a ta‑a wan to machiti chɛ ɔ. Mbɛ a‑a mɔɛ n yen to nɔ sɔ ɔ gbama a, an mbe ee wai kan kɔ kan na. Mbɛ a ɔ, ‘Wo ten‑da ka nɛ sɔ ɔ machiti chɛ ɔ gbɛn, gbama gbama a. Wo e chɛ ma tena fen ko a?’
Mbɛ an dɔ, ‘Chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ ma nn ya ni wai chɛ ko a, nn ni ban.’ Mbɛ kamin chɛ ɔ, ‘Wo na, wo ni ta wai chɛ n 'na yadi ɔ.’ Mbɛ an bɛɛ ta‑a.

“Tee bea‑a kɛn, mbɛ kamin chɛ‑a a fɔ a 'a kamin ya ɔ sɔɛ ma, a ɔ, ‘Wai chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n chee, i ni an pawa. A kuu sɔ wai chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n fan pawa‑a, miin danka‑a ka na‑a, aan i ni danka mɔɛ saa chɛ n ma, n‑na miin ya ka bi sau sau ma.’
Mɔɛ miin danka‑a ka na‑a wai chɛ tena chɛ, a‑a an pawa tee dɔndɔ 'a pawa da faenɛ a gban.

Chɛɛ mɔɛ saa saa chɛ nu, miin na‑a wai kuu sɔ ka sau sau ma, an yiima ni di wan. A ni wan an yii ma, mbɛ an fan mbe pawa sɔn‑da, a ni ben an bɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ n ma. Chɛɛ an che‑a kɛn an ma, an‑na an bɛɛ pawa tee dɔndɔ debea pawa an na.
An‑na pawa chɛ be kɛn an ma, an gbonyɛ‑a wan kaka yadi ti chɛ a.
Mbɛ an dɔ, ‘Nn fɛn ten‑da nɛ wai chɛ‑a tee gbɛɛ wa chɛ a, i‑a nn na kan pawa ɔ, nn bɛ chɛ n na, miin danka‑a na‑a yɛ ma tee chɛ a. An‑na wai chɛ dechee awa dɔndɔ gbe an ko a.’
“Mbɛ yadi ti chɛ‑a a fɔ an dɔndɔ ye, a ɔ, ‘N dia nyɔɛ, i too ma sɔ. N ma wo kafa ni ɛnden bɛɛ a. Mmɔ na‑a a ɔ bɛn, mbɛ n mbe mɔ ɔ mɔ pawa tee dɔndɔ debea pawa an na. A ma ma ni ka wan?
I 'a pawa ya, i ni ta. An danka‑a wɛɛ na‑a, chɛɛ n toen mu n ni an pawa, yɔ wo wɛn pɛn na‑a.
Gbasaya ɛ wan n ye, n ni n 'na kɔpɔɛ ma boo ɔ boo. A ma nyin wo ni too wo bɔɛ chɛ n na, a mu min na, n‑na ko chɛndɛ ma an na.’ ”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ te gbɛ, “Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, mɔ sɛsɛ nu, miin mbe gbaa sanche, Yataa ɛ an na na‑a wan ya ɔ. Mbɛ miin sin mbe sɔ ɔ ya ɔ sanche, Yataa ɛ an 'na yɛ‑a wan gbaa a.”
Chɛ gbakɔ, Chisɔsi bun‑da sɛ‑a Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na, ni mɔɛ dɔ nu. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ a fɛ den tan kun ma fea chɛ n ma, a ɔ, an ni sɔ. Mbɛ an ka‑a mɔɛ chɛ n baima, mbɛ a ɔ,

“Mmɔ yen ko ta‑a gbɛ Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. An mbe n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, an mbe n bia tena wan nɔ, mbɛ an‑na n ma tachɛ Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa n ma, a basan Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ n na. An mbe kaa a tɛ‑a wan n bakoe ma, n fa koe a,

mbɛ an‑na n be mɔɛ chɛ n ma, miin ma Chu mɔ n na. An mbe n ma yɛn‑da wan, an ni n bosa, mbɛ an‑na n gbangban kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma, n mbe fa‑a kaina. Chɛɛ tee fea, a sawan bɔɛ, Yataa ɛ a ma‑a wan, n ni n kɔɔ sɔ a ka saya ɔ.”
Chɛ gbakɔ, kai Sɛbɛdi 'a musu na‑a Chisɔsi tena, an bɛ a 'a den kaien fean na. Mbɛ a bea‑a a chen na, a ɔ, a ni basan a ma.

Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “I toen mu n ni fen ko chɛ i ye?” Mbɛ a ɔ, “N toen mu, i ni n deman n 'na den kaima fea chɛ n ma. I ni a ma dɔndɔ ni si i boo nyima ɔ, mbɛ dɔndɔɛ si‑a i manɛ ɔ, tima min na, e ma‑a i 'a mansaya ɔ.”
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ an mɔ fea chɛ n ma, a ɔ, “Wo ma a ɔ sɔn, wo e fen dɔ tisa tena. Wo e kun fan wo ni ko yawaen chɛ ɔ bia, n mbe na tena min dɔ bia‑a?” Mbɛ an dɔ, “Mm. Nn mbe kun fan.”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ko yawaen chɛ, min mbe na tena n tan‑da, ɛ wo wɛɛ tan‑da wan. Chɛɛ n mbe ee che n faa ma ya a, si koe a n baima n 'na mansaya ɔ. Fa Yataa, an‑na an si tena chɛ n dɔ bɛn, mɔɛ chɛ n ko a, a‑a a boo sɔ miin ma.”
A fɛ den tanɛ tɔɛ chɛ n‑na bai chɛ a min kɛn, Chimisi an fea Chɔn‑na min fɔ, an faa tɛ‑a wan an ma.

Chɛɛ Chisɔsi‑a an gbɛɛ chee wan kaina dɔndɔ, mbɛ a ɔ, “Wo faa ma tɛ. Wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ mansa nu, mɔɛ chɛ n ko a, miin ma Chu mɔ n na, an mbe an 'na gbasaya yian fan an na. An 'na ya ɔ sɔɛ n bɛɛ, gbasaya ɛ wan an boo ɔ an kun ma.
Chɛɛ a ee ka wo tɛ ɔ. Ni wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ min toen mu a ni ma mɔ chenama a wo tɛ, an mɔɛ chɛ ni a wandi ma bɔi denɛ a, wo tɔɛ n gbɛɛ ko a.
Ni wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ sin toen mu to, a ni ma ya ɔ sɔɛ a, a tɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ ko a, an mɔɛ chɛ ni ma an 'na yɔnɛ a.
Koe min na mu, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ wɛɛ, n ma na ni, mɔɛ n ni wai chɛ n ko a. Chɛɛ n na‑a, min mbe a ma, n ni mɔɛ n ma wai n chɛ. A yɛ to, n ni yɛ, n ni n fɔɛ be mɔ gbu n kun ka koe a.”
Chɛ gbakɔ, mɔ fanka wa‑a a sɔ wan Chisɔsi fɛ, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na, an ni bɔ tena tima min na Chɛiko duu ɔ.

A tima chɛ a, mɔ kaima fea n ni wan nɔ si ɔ chia tɔnfɛ, an fiondenɛ ni. An‑na Chisɔsi ma tɔɛ a min kɛn ben tena, an bun‑da yee tɛ‑a, an dɔ, “I wɛn bɔ‑a Mansa Defidi 'a dambi ɔ, chinchin nn ma, mansa.”
Mbɛ mɔ sɛsɛ miin ni ka nɔ, an‑na an na gban fan, an dɔ, an ni sɛmbɛ yee tɛ‑a. Chɛɛ a tima a ni, an‑na yee tɛ gbu chɛndɛ chɛ, an dɔ, “I wɛn bɔ‑a Mansa Defidi 'a dambi ɔ, chinchin nn ma, mansa.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi sɔ‑a, mbɛ a‑a ya te tɔ fea chɛ n chee, a ɔ, “Wo toen mu n ni fen ko chɛ wo ye?”
Mbɛ an dɔ, “Mansa, a ma nn ya a ni ka.”
Mbɛ an ma chinchinɛ‑a a bia. Mbɛ a tu‑a an ya n na. Mbɛ an‑na kaina yen a ya kɔɔɛ a. An‑na kaina yen kɛn, mbɛ an bea‑a Chisɔsi fɛ.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fo Bɛfachi konko baima, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na. Bɛfachi chɛ ni Wodifi kɔnkɔɛ ma wan, a sin dɔ nii ma yansan Chuusaɛn duu ɔ a. Nɔ ni, a‑a a fɛ den fea n na ta an ya ɔ,
a ɔ, “Wo ta konko chɛ ɔ wo ya teen ma. Ni wo che‑a nɔ, wo e sofɛ tan‑da wan nɔ, ɛ sɔ ɔ yuu a, a 'a denɛ ɛ sɔ ɔ a baima. Wo a fuin, mbɛ wo na‑a a a.
Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a wo ɔ tisa, wo a fɔ a ye, wo ɔ, mansa an mbe a ma gbɔsɔɛ bɔ tena a a. Wo ɔ, ni n ban‑da dechee, n mbe an na yɛ‑a wan dɔndɔ gbe.”
Koe chɛ gbɛɛ ma‑a, min mbe a ma, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ na‑a min fɔ, a ni bɔ a a. A na‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ,
“Wo a fɔ mɔɛ n ye Chuusaɛn duu wa chɛ ɔ, wo ɔ, an ni an ya a ta, an 'na mansa yen ko na‑a an tena. Wo ɔ, a ɔ ma panda ni. Wo ɔ, a sin mbe si ɔ sofɛ an kɔ, sofɛ den tɔngbɔɛ kaima.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi fɛ den fea chɛ n ta‑a, an‑na a ma, yɔ a‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ an ye.
An na‑a sofɛ chɛ a Chisɔsi tena, an fea a denɛ tɔngbɔɛ a. An na‑a kɛn an na, mbɛ an‑na an 'na doma kai n dɔ fuin fan an ma. Chisɔsi si‑a wan dɔndɔ kun ma, mbɛ a bun‑da ta‑a.
Mɔ sɛsɛ toen ni a tima chɛ a, an ni basɔmaya be Chisɔsi ma. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, an‑na an 'na doma kai n dɔ fuin fan chia a a ya ɔ. Mbɛ dɔ n sin‑na nyanda bɔ, an‑na a ɔ fuin ta‑a.

A ya ɔ mɔɛ nu, a basan a gbaa mɔɛ n na, an‑na yee tɛ wan, an dɔ, “I wɛn bɔ‑a Mansa Defidi 'a dambi ɔ, nn ni i tando. Mansa Yataa ni mɔɛ chɛ dua, min na‑a a tɔɛ ɔ. Tando ni ma Yataa tɔɛ ma banda bu ɔ.”
Chisɔsi don‑da kɛn Chuusaɛn duu bu ɔ, duu gbɛɛ ɔ ma‑a wan. Mɔɛ gbɛɛ ɔ te, “Nyɔn mbe e nɛ?”
Mbɛ mɔ fanka chɛ nu na‑a, an dɔ, “Chisɔsi an nɛ, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ. A ka‑a Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ wan, Nasaɛti duu ɔ.”

Chisɔsi ta‑a wan Yataa 'a kata ɔ, mbɛ a‑a mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ gbain, miin ni fee fenɛ n ma tachɛ tena, a basan a san mɔɛ n na. A‑a kɔpɔ sinchi mɔɛ chɛ n 'na tebu n na bea bea wan, a basan si fenɛ n na, bugbɔ n ma tachɛ mɔɛ n mbe si miin ma.
Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “A nyɛnden fan mu Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ Yataa‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, a 'a chenɛ ɛ ma‑a samun chɛ koe an na. Chɛɛ wo‑a a 'a chen chɛ mun gbɛ kanka n nun tena an na.”
Mbɛ ya te tɔɛ dɔ nu, an bɛ tamban tɔɛ n na, an na‑a wan nɔ a tena Yataa 'a kata chɛ ɔ, mbɛ a‑a an baun.

Mbɛ den mɛsɛ n bun‑da yee tɛ‑a Yataa 'a kata chɛ ɔ, an dɔ, “I wɛn bɔ‑a Mansa Defidi 'a dambi ɔ, nn ni i tando.” Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa dɔ n ni wan nɔ, an bɛ Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ n na. An faa tɛ‑a wan, kɛn an‑na yee chɛ a min, a basan kamaya koe chɛ n na, an‑na Chisɔsi yen miin ma‑a.

Mbɛ an‑na a fɔ Chisɔsi ye, an dɔ, “I‑a a a min, an mbe bai min fɔ tena?” Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Mm, n mbe a a min tena wan. Chɛɛ ɛ wan n yii ma, mbɛ wo‑a a kan fan Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ a 'a gboo kaka min‑na a fɔ, a ɔ, den toa an bɛ den mɛsɛ n na, Yataa‑a an kan fan a tando koe a chɛndɛ chɛ.”
Mbɛ a‑a mɔɛ chɛ n to Yataa 'a kata chɛ ɔ, mbɛ a ta‑a Bɛtani duu ɔ, mbɛ a chi‑a nɔ.
Sayi ma, Chisɔsi bɔ‑a wan Bɛtani duu ɔ, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na, mbɛ an yɛ‑a Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. An mbe yɛ tena wan, mbɛ kɔnkɔɛ‑a Chisɔsi bia.

Mbɛ a‑a gbɔ kɔn dɔndɔ yen, min tɔ ni fiki, ɛ sɔ ɔ chia fɛ. Mbɛ a ta‑a kɔn chɛ tena, chɛɛ a nii ma a gbɔ kan kɔ kan tan ni a a, mɔɔ a yamba min na gbiien ni. Chɛ fɛ, a‑a a fɔ wan kɔn chɛ ma, a ɔ, “Mɔ ɔ mɔ ee i gbɔɛ daun‑da to kuɔ fɔ.” Mbɛ kɔnɛ gbu gbaa‑a a ya kɔɔɛ a.
A fɛ den chɛ n‑na chɛ ɔ yen kɛn, an da ɔ gbaa‑a wan. Mbɛ an dɔ, “Fen‑na a ma, kɔn chɛ gbaa‑a ka buɛ chɛ ɔ bui chɛ bui chɛ a?”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N ni a ma din wo tena, wo e koe chɛ ma wan, n‑na min ma ka fiki kɔn chɛ a, ni danaya ma‑a wo ɔ Yataa ko a, mbɛ a sin sika ee wo ɔ. A sin mbe ee danka‑a chɛ dechee an ma. Chɛɛ wo e a fɔ‑a wan kɔnkɔɛ chɛ ma, wo ɔ, a ni kuɛn, a ni ta, a ni si yii wa ɔ, mbɛ a ma‑a, yɔ wo‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ.
Ni danaya ma‑a wo ɔ Yataa ko a, ɛ ko ɔ ko chɛ‑a wan wo ye, wo e samunɛ chɛ‑a min ko a.”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi yɛ‑a to Yataa 'a kata chɛ ɔ. A yɛ‑a kɛn, a‑a a kuu sɔ wan mɔɛ n kan‑da, miin ni ka nɔ. Ɛ an kan tena chɛ wan, mbɛ Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa dɔ nu, an bɛ Chu gbakoo n na, an na‑a a tena, an dɔ, “E koe miin ma ka, gbasaya minan mbe i boo ɔ, an ma koe a? An gbasaya chɛ sin, nyɔn‑na a be i ma?”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ka wɛ, n mbe wo ɔ tisa, tisa dɔndɔ gbe a. Ni wo‑a a yɛman chɛndɛ, mbɛ n‑na a fɔ wo ye, mɔɛ min‑na gbasaya chɛ be n ma, koe chɛ n ma koe a.

Chɔn ni yii chɛ wan mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a. Yataa an fea mɔ gbu a, nyɔn‑na gbasaya chɛ be a ma?” Mbɛ an‑na a kuu sɔ a tɛnsɛ‑a an nyɔn tɛ ɔ, an dɔ te, “Mmɔ ɛ fen fɔ kamin che ye? Ni mmɔ‑a a fɔ, mbɛ Chɔn 'na gbasaya ka‑a Yataa an tena, ɛ a fɔ‑a wan, mbɛ fen na‑a a ma, mmɔ nii ma dan ni Chɔn na.

Chɛɛ ni mmɔ sin‑na a fɔ to, mbɛ Chɔn 'na gbasaya ka‑a mɔ gbu an na, mɔ fanka fanka min mbe ka nɛ, an mbe ko yama ma‑a wan mmɔ a. A mu min na, an gbɛɛ danden fan mu a a, mbɛ Chɔn ni Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ an na.”

Chɛ ko a, an‑na a fɔ wan Chisɔsi ye, an dɔ, “Nn ma a ɔ sɔn, ni Chɔn na‑a a 'a gbasaya chɛ ma sɔn kaina.” Mbɛ a wɛɛ ɔ, “N bɛɛ n mbe ee a ɔ yian wo a, ni nyɔn 'na gbasaya ɔ mu, n mbe koe chɛ n ma tena.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo tai chɛ yen bɛ, a si kamin dɔndɔ ma, an bɛ a 'a den kaien fea n na. Tima dɔndɔ che‑a wan, mbɛ kamin chɛ ta‑a a 'a denɛ chenama tena. Mbɛ a ɔ, ‘Saa, ta bi, i ni wai chɛ yadi ɔ.’
A 'a den chɛ ban‑da wan a ye ta koe a. Chɛɛ a banden chɛ gbakɔ a fa ye, a‑a a yii na chii wan, mbɛ a ta‑a.
Mbɛ chɛ gbakɔ, kamin chɛ ta‑a wan a 'a denɛ dɔɔma tena. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ a wɛɛ ye, a ɔ, a ni ta, a ni wai chɛ yadi ɔ. Den chɛ dɔn‑da wan a fa ya kɔɔɛ ma, chɛɛ a fa‑a a kan kɔ sɔ kɛn, a ma dɔn ni a ni ta.

Den fea chɛ n tɛ ɔ, nyɔn‑na a fa faa ma koe ma?” Mbɛ an dɔ, “Denɛ chenama chɛ.” Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ mɔ yama chɛ nu, miin mu pawa bia mɔɛ chɛ n na, an bɛ duu dia chɛ n na, an fan mbe ka don‑da Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ wo ya ɔ. Chɛɛ wo tana, wo ee don‑da nɔ sanche.

A mu min na, Chɔn na‑a wan, mbɛ a‑a a ɔ yian Chu mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a, Yataa toen mu a ni wo sɔ buɛ min dɔ chia ma dunya chɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ wo ma dan ni a a. Mɔɛ miin dan‑da a 'a sakana bai a, an fan nɛ pawa bia mɔɛ chɛ n na, an bɛ duu dia chɛ n na. Wo‑a chɛ ɔ yen bɛɛ, chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, wo ma wo yiima mun ni, wo ni dan sakana bai chɛ a, a‑a min fɔ wo ye.”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ te to, “Wo wo too ma sɔ tai chɛ wɛɛ ma. Kaminɛ ni wan nɔ, min‑na yadi sa. Mbɛ a‑a yadi chɛ da a sansa gbɛɛ, a‑a a a bɛn. Mbɛ a yɛ‑a, a‑a bondonɛ nyan, ɛ a tɛn kaina, a ni a yii bɔ a ɔ. Mbɛ a‑a gbasa sɔ a 'a yadi kun ma fɛn koe a. A ban‑da kɛn chɛ gbɛɛ ma‑a, mbɛ a‑a yadi chɛ kunɛ don mɔɛ n boo ɔ, a kun ma fɛn koe a, mbɛ a ta‑a chɛnyɛ dɔ mende ɔ.
Chin fen chɛ kai tima che‑a kɛn, yadi ti chɛ‑a a 'a bɔi denɛ n na ta wan yadi kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ n tena. A toen ni an ni a ta chin fenɛ be an ma, mbɛ an na‑a a a a ye.
Chɛɛ yadi kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ n chɛ‑a wan bɔi den chɛ n ma. An‑na dɔndɔɛ bia wan, an‑na a gbasi, an‑na dɔndɔɛ fa, mbɛ an‑na dɔndɔɛ ma bon bon, a fa koe a.
Mbɛ yadi ti chɛ‑a a 'a bɔi den dɔ mende n sɔ to nɔ, miin kɔ ni koo a ben a saa ma. Chɛɛ yadi kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ n‑na an bɛɛ bia ka wan, yɔ a saa nu.
Kamin chɛ‑a a fɔ wan gbɛ, a yiima ɔ, a ɔ, ‘N danden fan mu a a, mbɛ an mbe basɔmaya be‑a wan n 'na denɛ wandi gbu ma, ni n na a sɔ an tena.’ Mbɛ a‑a a a ta an tena.
Chɛɛ yadi kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ n‑na a wɛɛ yen kɛn, an‑na a fɔ wan an nyɔn tɛ ɔ, an dɔ, ‘Yadi ti chɛ 'a denɛ wandi gbu an nɛ. Mmɔ a fa, min mbe a ma, boo fen chɛ gbɛɛ ni ma mmɔ ta a.’
Mbɛ an‑na a 'a den chɛ bia, mbɛ an bɔ‑a a a yadi chɛ ɔ, mbɛ an‑na a fa.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo ta yiima ɔ, ni yadi ti chɛ na‑a tima min na, ɛ fen ma‑a yadi kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ n na?”
Mbɛ an dɔ, “Ɛ an mɔ yama chɛ n fa wan dɔndɔ gbe, a yama yama buɛ a. Mbɛ a‑a yadi kun don mɔ dɔ mende n boo ɔ, miin mbe che a kɔ‑a a ta chin fen gbɔɛ ɔ, chin fen ya tima a.”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ɛ wan n yii ma, mbɛ wo‑a a kan fan Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, a 'a gboo kaka min‑na a fɔ, a ɔ, ‘Chen sɔ mɔɛ n na‑a ban senɛ min dɔ, an dɔ, a ma nyin, an gbu ma‑a gbɛ senɛ kuu ba wandi a, chenɛ gbu ko a. Yataa an‑na chɛ ma. A sin mu kamaya koe an na mmɔ ya a.’ ”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ te gbɛ, “Chɛ an fɛ mu, n ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ gbasaya min gbɛɛ ɛ wo boo ɔ, ma koe a Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ, Yataa ɛ a gbasaya chɛ bɔ‑a wan wo boo ɔ. Mbɛ a‑a a be mɔɛ chɛ n ma, miin mbe a faa ma koe n ma‑a.
Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ kan kɔ kan bea‑a an sen chɛ ma, ɛ a ma kai‑a wan. A sin to, ni sen chɛ sin bea‑a mɔ ɔ mɔ ma, ɛ a mɔɛ chɛ ɔ funku funku‑a wan.”
Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa nu, an‑na Chisɔsi 'a tai chɛ n na min fan, an bɛ Fayisii mɔɛ n na. An sin na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ a 'a tai chɛ n sien mu an fan ma.
Chɛ‑a a ma wan, an toen ni an ni a bia. Chɛɛ an chianden fan ni mɔ fanka fanka chɛ ma, miin danden ni a a, mbɛ Chisɔsi mu Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ an na.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a tai n tɛ wan to mɔɛ chɛ n tena, a ɔ,

“Yataa 'a mansaya maen fan mu yɔ min ma‑a tai chɛ ɔ. Mansa dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, min 'na denɛ ni musu si tena. Mansa chɛ na‑a mɔ sɛsɛ chee wan, na koe a bɛn‑da an musu si chɛ ɔ. A sin‑na daun fen ba ɔ bɛn ka wan an ko a.
Bɛn chɛ tima a, mbɛ a‑a a 'a bɔi denɛ n sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n tena, a na‑a miin chee bɛn chɛ ɔ, a ɔ, an ni na. Chɛɛ an ma dɔn ni, an ni na.

Mbɛ a‑a a 'a bɔi den dɔ mende n chee. A‑a sakana be an ma, mɔɛ chɛ n ko a, a ɔ, ‘Wo a fɔ an ye, wo ɔ, an ni na. Wo ɔ, n ban‑da n ma bɛn‑da. N‑na n 'na ninchi busi wa n fa, tawa chɛ‑a, a ban‑da gbae. Wo ɔ, n mbe gbɛ an fan ma kɔn tena.’
Chɛɛ an mɔɛ chɛ n ma an too ma sɔ ni, kai chɛ 'a sakana chɛ ma. Mɔɛ dɔndɔɛ ta‑a wan a 'a sɛnɛ ɔ, dɔndɔɛ sin ta‑a fee fen ma tachɛ tena. An dɔ n ta‑a an ma gbɔsɔɛ n dɔ.
Chɛɛ dɔ n sin chɛ‑a wan bɔi den chɛ n ma, mbɛ an‑na an popoya, an mbe e na to an fa‑a.
Mansa chɛ‑a chɛ a min kɛn, a faa tɛ‑a wan kaka, mbɛ a‑a soya n sɔ, a ɔ, an ni mɔɛ chɛ n fa, miin‑na a 'a bɔi den chɛ n fa, mbɛ an‑na an 'na duu wɛɛ minda.
Mbɛ mansa chɛ‑a bɔi den dɔ mende n chee, a ɔ, ‘N 'na denɛ 'a musu si bɛnɛ gbu che‑a a ma. Chɛɛ n na‑a mɔɛ miin chee bɛn chɛ ɔ, an ma mɔ a tenden na.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo ta dani n ma, mbɛ ni wo‑a mɔ ɔ mɔ yen nɔ, an ni na bɛn chɛ ɔ.’

Mbɛ bɔi den chɛ n ta‑a dani n ma, mbɛ an‑na mɔ sɛsɛ n na sɔn, an boo kun‑da miin ma, na koe a an na bɛn chɛ ɔ. Mɔ yama an basan a chɛndɛ n na, an na‑a wan an gbɛɛ a. Mbɛ an‑na chen chɛ a fa gban, bɛn chɛ ni bia tena kaina.
“Chɛɛ mansa chɛ don‑da kɛn chen chɛ a, a bun‑da a ya a ben ben‑da mɔɛ chɛ n kun ma. Mbɛ a‑a kamin dɔndɔ yen, min nii ma a ma bɛn ni yɔ mɔɛ min na‑a musu si bɛnɛ ɔ.
Mbɛ mansa chɛ ɔ kamin chɛ ma, ‘N dia nyɔɛ, doma min mbe ka i ma, musu si bɛn dɔ doma ma chɛ a. I don‑da ka ma nɛ?’ Chɛɛ kamin chɛ wɛɛ ma bai ɔ bai fɔ ni.
Mbɛ mansa chɛ‑a a fɔ bɔi den chɛ n ye, a ɔ, ‘Wo kamin chɛ boo ɔ chii, a basan a chenɛ a, mbɛ wo‑a a a dɛ baa ma, pimbi wa chɛ ɔ. Ɛ ma‑a kaina di chɛ‑a, a basan a nyinɛ a daunɛ a tɔɔya a.’ ”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ te gbɛ, “Yataa 'a chenɛ da a kaen fan mu mɔ sɛsɛ ko a, chɛɛ miin mbe don nɔ, an ma kɔkoo.”
Tima ɛnden gbakɔ, mbɛ Chu mɔɛ dɔ nu, miin ni Fayisii n na, an bɛn‑da wan, an kun puin koe a kaina dɔndɔ. An toen ni, an ni Chisɔsi ɔ chɛ tisa chɛ a a, mbɛ an‑na a bia.

Mbɛ an‑na an fɛ mɔɛ dɔ n na ta Chisɔsi tena, a basan Mansa Ɛdɔdi fɛ mɔɛ dɔ n na. An che‑a kɛn a ma, an dɔ, “Ticha, nn‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ danaya tɔɛ mu i a. A yɛ to, e mɔɛ n kan Yataa 'a bai miin gbɛɛ a, tea mu a a. I ma i gbɔsɔ ni, mɔ gbu ɛ min fɔ a si i ma, chɛɛ e tea an na tachɛ tun. A yɛ to, nn‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ e tea be tea ti an ma.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, a yen ko, mmɔ ɛ pawa chɛ tima ɔ tima, Domi kun ti wa tena. A ɔ yian bɛ nn na, i ta yiima ɔ, i‑a pawa chɛ be koe yen ka ma, a nyin fan?”
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi na‑a an 'na yiinachii yama chɛ kɔɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Wo wan, nɛnɛn fea ti mu wo a. Fen mu wo toen mu wo ni n dɔ chɛ?
Wo kain gbɛnsɛn dɔndɔ yian bɛ n na, wo e pawa chɛ min na.” Mbɛ an na‑a kain gbɛnsɛnɛ gbu a a tena.
Mbɛ a ɔ, “Nyɔn ya kɔɔɛ ɛ ka a ma, a basan a tɔɛ a?”
Mbɛ an dɔ, “Domi kun ti wa an nɛ.” Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Mbɛ fen chɛ nu, miin mu Domi kun ti wa boo fenɛ a, wo an be a ma. Mbɛ wo yɛ‑a, fen chɛ nu, miin mbe Yataa ko a, wo‑a an be Yataa ma.”
An tɛnɛ‑a wan a a, kɛn an‑na a a min, Chisɔsi‑a an yɛman buɛ chɛ ɔ. Mbɛ an‑na a to, an ta‑a.
A tee dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, Chu mɔɛ chɛ dɔ nu, miin ni Sadusii n na, an na‑a wan Chisɔsi tena. Sadusii chɛ n nii ma dan ni a a, mbɛ mɔ gbu ɛ a kɔɔ sɔ wan a ka saya ɔ. Mbɛ an‑na a fɔ a ye,

an dɔ, “Ticha, Mosisi‑a chɛ an fɔ, a si musu si kai ma, min ma den suun ni a 'a musu ma, mbɛ a fa‑a. A ɔ, a dinden fan mu ta mɔɛ chɛ suun ma nyɔɛ kaima ma, mbɛ ɛ chenɛ da mun fan, a ni denɛ n suun a ma. A sin an mbe an den chɛ n ya wan, ta mɔɛ chɛ 'a denɛ n na.

Chɛɛ den kai wɔnfea yen ko gbɛ, an de bu ɔ mmɔ tɛ ɔ. Mbɛ min ni chenan an gbɛɛ ma, a‑a musu si. Chɛɛ a ma den suun ni musu chɛ ma, mbɛ a fa‑a. Mbɛ denɛ kaima fean bɔɛ chɛ wɛɛ‑a musu dɔndɔ gbe chɛ si to musu a.

Ko dɔndɔ gbe chɛ an ma‑a denɛ fean bɔɛ chɛ wɛɛ a, a basan a sawan bɔɛ wɛɛ a. Musu chɛ si‑a ka wan an bɛ kai chɛ n na dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a. An gbɛɛ ban‑da fa‑a, musu chɛ ma den suun ni an wɔnfea dɔndɔ wɛɛ a.
A danka a, mbɛ musu chɛ wɛɛ gbu fa‑a.
A yen ko gbɛ, a ma‑a suun ma nyɔɛ wɔnfea chɛ n gbɛɛ 'a musu a, a e na to fa‑a. Ni tee che‑a, faa mɔɛ n gbɛɛ ni an kɔɔ sɔ a ka saya ɔ, ɛ ma‑a nyɔn 'na musu a gbɛ?”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo saman‑da kaka a fɔ koe a, mbɛ ni mɔɛ fa‑a, a ee a kɔɔ sɔ to a ka saya ɔ. Chɛɛ koe min‑na a ma wo saman‑da, wo ma Yataa 'a gboo ɔ gbɛ ni, mbɛ a yɛ to, wo ma ko ɔ ko ɔ sɔn a si Yataa 'a gbasaya ma.
Tima min na, mɔɛ n mbe an kɔɔ sɔ‑a a ka saya ɔ, musu si basan kai sɔnɛ a, a ee ma‑a nɔ. Mɔ gbu gbɛɛ ɛ ma‑a wan yɔ maeka nu banda bu ɔ.
Min sin sien mu faa mɔɛ n kɔɔ sɔ koe ma, a ka saya ɔ, ɛ wan n yii ma, mbɛ wo‑a a kan fan Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ,
Yataa mu a wan na Ebeami ko a, a basan Aisaki an fea Chekɔpi a. A ɔ, an mbe a wan fai. Chɛ‑a a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ chɛndɛ ba n fan mbe Yataa fai. Mɔɛ min faen mu, a ee Yataa fai.”
Mɔ fanka wa chɛ n‑na chɛ a min kɛn, an da a fa‑a wan gban, a si a‑a kan chɛ buɛ ma.

Chisɔsi 'a tisa gbɛmbo buɛ‑a a ma wan, tisa ban‑da a ko a, Chu mɔɛ chɛ n da ɔ, miin ni Sadusii n na. Chu mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ, miin ni Fayisii n na, an‑na chɛ a min kɛn, a ma an to ni. Mbɛ an bɛɛ‑a an kun puin kaina dɔndɔɛ, mbɛ an na‑a a tena.
An tɛ ɔ, Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔ dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ. An sawa kan mɔɛ chɛ‑a kan gbɛn tisa chɛ wan Chisɔsi a, min mbe a ma, a ni a bia a chen kɔ.
A ɔ, “Ticha, Mosisi‑a sawa sɛsɛ be wan mmɔ ma. An tɛ ɔ, sawa minan mu a chenama a?”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Sawa chenama gbu, min benden mu sawa tɔɛ n gbɛɛ ma, a yen ko. A ɔ, ‘Wo to Mansa Yataa a, wo faa gbɛɛ a, wo ni to a a, wo 'a fɔɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, wo ni to a a, wo yiima gbɛɛ a.’
Sawa chenama fean bɔɛ ɛ wan yɔ a saa chɛ. A ɔ, ‘Wo to wo 'a mɔɛ n na, yɔ wo toen mu buɛ min dɔ wo wandi a.’
Ko ɔ ko ɛ wan sawa fea chɛ ɔ, sawa chɛ n tɛ ɔ, Yataa‑a miin be Mosisi ma, a basan bai chɛ n na, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n na‑a miin fɔ.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a Fayisii mɔɛ chɛ n dɔ tisa, miin na sɔndenɛ ni ka a tindanɛ,
a ɔ, “Chasi yen ko, kunka mansa. Wo ta yiima ɔ, ɛ bɔ‑a nyɔn 'na dambi ɔ?” Mbɛ an dɔ, “Ɛ bɔ‑a Mansa Defidi 'a dambi an dɔ.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Fen mu gbɛ Yataa Nyina‑a a ma, Defidi‑a Chasi chɛ chee a 'a Mansa a? A mu min na, Defidi na‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ,
‘Mansa Yataa‑a a fɔ n 'na Mansa ye, a ɔ, “Si nɛ n boo nyima ɔ, aan n ni i chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ n don i kɔɔ.” ’
Defidi wandi gbu yen ko gbɛ, a ɔ, kunka mansa chɛ benden mu a ma. Chɛɛ mɔ kun ma kundi ee koa, a ni ben i ma. A fɔen mu gbɛ, mbɛ kunka mansa chɛ, a bɔ‑a Defidi 'a dambi an dɔ. Fen ko a chɛ ɛ ma?”
Mɔ ɔ mɔ nii ma kun ni, a ni Chisɔsi 'a tisa chɛ yɛman, a‑a min chɛ Fayisii mɔɛ chɛ n na. A sin, a ka a tima chɛ ma aan a ta, mɔ ɔ mɔ chian‑da wan a ɔ tisa koe a, kan gbɛn tisa a.
Chɛ gbakɔ, mbɛ Chisɔsi koɔ‑a mɔ fanka chɛ tena, a basan a fɛ denɛ n na, a ɔ,
“Yataa‑a sawa min be Mosisi ma, a fasai koe wo tena, a gbasaya ɛ mmɔ 'a sawa kan mɔɛ n fan boo ɔ, a basan mɔɛ chɛ n na, miin mu Fayisii n na.

Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo kooya be an ma. A yɛ to, ni an‑na ko ɔ ko fɔ wo ye a ma koe a, wo a ma. Chɛɛ wo ma bea an chɛ chɛ wai fɛ. A mu min na, an mbe min fɔ wo ye, a si mɔɛ e Yataa 'a sawa a wai buɛ min dɔ, an fandi ee a ma ka.
An mbe suun fanka ma si wan mɔɛ n kun ma, chɛɛ an fandi ee fen kɔ fen bia an boo wɛɛ a.
An toen mu an ni an fandi ɔ yian ko ɔ ko ɔ, an mbe min ma. An 'na ma bɛn chɛ buɛ wɛɛ, an ni a ɔ ben fan, a ɔ yian koe a, mbɛ an‑na Yataa sɔn, a ni ben an bɔ n ma.
Ni an ta‑a daun chɛ bɛnɛ wɛɛ ɔ, an toen mu si koe a gbakoo n fan tɛ. Mmɔ 'a samun chɛ chenɛ n bɛɛ a, an toen mu si tena ma benden ba an na.
Ni an ta‑a machiti an dɔ, an toen mu mɔɛ n ni basɔmaya kɔndɔnɛ chɛ an na. An toen mu mɔɛ n ni an chee, an dɔ, kan mɔ.
Chɛɛ wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ ma dɔn mɔɛ n ni wo chee, kan mɔ, koe min na mu, wo gbɛɛ mu mɔ dɔndɔɛ n fan na. A sin, kan mɔ dɔndɔ gbe an mbe wo ko a.
Wo ma mɔ ɔ mɔ dɔ mende chee dunya chɛ ɔ, wo ɔ, fa. A mu min na, wo Fa ɛ dɔndɔ gbe, min mbe banda bu ɔ.
Wo ma a ma mɔ ɔ mɔ ni wo chee, kun ti a. A mu min na, mɔ dɔndɔ gbe an mbe nɔ, min mu wo kun ti a. An nɛ n na, n fan, kunka mansa.
Ni wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ min toen mu a ni ma mɔ chenama a wo tɛ, an mɔɛ chɛ ni a wandi ma bɔi denɛ a, wo tɔɛ n gbɛɛ ko a.
Koe min na mu, ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a wandi a sɛ, Yataa ɛ a mɔɛ chɛ a yii‑a wan. Chɛɛ ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a wandi a yii, Yataa ɛ a mɔɛ chɛ a sɛ‑a wan.”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “Wo wan sawa kan mɔɛ chɛ nu, wo wan Fayisii nu, koe min mbe wo tan‑da, a yau gba wo ko a. Nɛnɛn fea ti mu wo a. Koe min na mu, wo ban‑da don koe a Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ, mbɛ wo‑a chia tɛ wo bɔ n bɛɛ ya ɔ don koe a nɔ.

“Wo wan sawa kan mɔɛ chɛ nu, wo wan Fayisii nu, koe min mbe wo tan‑da, a yau gba wo ko a. Nɛnɛn fea ti mu wo a. Su ni tee a, wo e sɔ ɔ wo chenɛ a, mɔ yanɛ a kan kɔ kan. Ni wo‑a mɔ dɔndɔ ma sɔn, wo fɛ den chɛ a, wo e chia a ka wan a ko a gbadan, min mbe a ma, wo bɛ ni ta ta ɔ. Ni wo sin ta‑a, gbɛmbo ee ma‑a a ma, koe min na mu, wo ban‑da a ma‑a wo kan mɔ a, ko yama ma ɔ.

“Wo wan ko sɔn bai chɛ nu, koe min mbe wo tan‑da, a yau gba wo ko a. Wo e mɔɛ n kan‑da koe n na, wo wandi ma miin dɔ gbɛ ni. Wo ɔ, ni mɔɛ‑a a gboo Yataa 'a kata ɔ, a ma ma chian ni, a ni che chɛ ɔ, yɔ ni mɔɛ‑a a gboo sanu chɛ an dɔ, min mbe Yataa 'a kata ɔ.
Wo wan ko sɔn bai wooen ba chɛ nu. Sanu chɛ ɛ Yataa 'a kata ɔ wan. Ni sanu chɛ ee Yataa 'a kata chɛ ɔ, Yataa ta ma a a. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, Yataa 'a kata ma chianden mu a ben sanu chɛ ma.
Wo e mɔɛ n kan fan to, wo ɔ, ni mɔɛ‑a a gboo gbengbe ma, an mbe yasi minda kaina Yataa tena, a ma ma chian ni, a ni che chɛ ɔ, yɔ ni a‑a a gboo yasi wandi ɔ.
Wo wan ko sɔn bai chɛ nu. Yasi bɔ tena ma chianden mu, a ni ben yasi wandi ma.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, mɔ ɔ mɔ, min mbe a gboo gbengbe chɛ ma, a‑a a gboo ka fen kɔ fen fan dɔ, min mbe gbengbe chɛ ma.
A sin, ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a gboo Yataa 'a kata ɔ, a‑a a gboo ka Yataa wandi an dɔ, min ta mu an kata chɛ a.
A sin to, ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a gboo banda bu ɔ ɔ, a‑a a gboo ka Yataa 'a mansaya sea chɛ an dɔ, a basan Yataa a, a wɛn mbe si ɔ an mansaya sea chɛ a.

“Wo wan sawa kan mɔɛ chɛ nu, wo wan Fayisii nu, koe min mbe wo tan‑da, a yau gba wo ko a. Nɛnɛn fea ti mu wo a. Ko chɛndɛ yen ko, wo e min ma. Boo fen kan kɔ kan, wo e min sɔn, wo e a du wan si tena tanɛ a, mbɛ wo‑a si tena dɔndɔ be Yataa ma. Boo fenɛ tatayaenɛ wɛɛ, wo e Yataa kɔ wan a ɔ. Chɛɛ wo ma wo gbɔsɔ ni bea koe a a 'a sawa chenama wa an fɛ. Wo ma wo gbɔsɔ ni tea koe n ma koe a wo bɔɛ n na. Chinchimaya ee wo ɔ wo bɔɛ n ko a, mbɛ a sin to, wo ma danaya ni wo bɔɛ n tena. Koe chɛ n gbɛɛ, wo an ma. A sin to, wo a a tun wo boo fenɛ n be koe a Yataa ma.

Wo wan ko sɔn bai chɛ nu, wo e mɔɛ n kan‑da koe n na, wo wandi ma miin dɔ gbɛ ni. Wo e tima ya wan bea koe a Yataa 'a sawa mɛsɛ mɛsɛ n fɛ, yɔ wo e tima ya buɛ min dɔ, fen chɛ n ma soan koe a, wo e miin min, wo ma na tumbu n kanun. Chɛɛ wo ma wo gbɔsɔ ni bea koe a, a 'a sawa chenama an fɛ.

“Wo wan sawa kan mɔɛ chɛ nu, wo wan Fayisii nu, koe min mbe wo tan‑da, a yau gba wo ko a. Nɛnɛn fea ti mu wo a. Wo e wan yɔ kɔpu chɛ nu, miin kɔɛ koenɛ ɛ ka, chɛɛ an bu ɔ nɔɔenɛ ɛ. Wo faa n dɔ ma gbɛ ni. Wo e mɔɛ n boo fenɛ bɔ wan an boo ɔ, bemaya ɔ, a sin to wo gbɔsɔen mu wo wandi an ko a dechee.
Wo ko sɔn bai ya Fayisii nu, wo wo 'a kɔpu bu pɛn dɔ ko, an mbe a ma, a ni gbɛ fo.

“Wo wan sawa kan mɔɛ chɛ nu, wo wan Fayisii nu, koe min mbe wo tan‑da, a yau gba wo ko a. Nɛnɛn fea ti mu wo a. Wo e wan yɔ kamba nu miin nyin an baa ma chia a, chɛɛ an bu ɔ, mɔ kuu dechee n fan mbe nɔ, a basan fen tui kan kɔ kan na.
Wo wɛɛ wo e ka wan. Wo bɔen mu mɔɛ n na miin tanden mu Yataa tena. Chɛɛ wo faa ɔ ma gbɛ ni. Nɛnɛn fea ti mu wo a, mbɛ a yɛ to, ko yama ma mɔɛ mu wo a.

“Wo wan sawa kan mɔɛ chɛ nu, wo wan Fayisii nu, koe min mbe wo tan‑da, a yau gba wo ko a. Nɛnɛn fea ti mu wo a. Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu suun, wo‑a an kamba n ma bɛn nyima nyima, a basan mɔɛ chɛ n na, miin tanden ni Yataa tena.
Wo ɔ, ni wo na‑a bɔ suun wo bemba n ta bemba n ta tima an na, wo ɔ, wo nii basan‑da an ma Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n fa koe a suun ɛnden bɛɛ a.
Wo wandi gbu wo da a kuiɛ an mu sii a wo wandi ko a, a mu min na, wo ban‑da dɔn‑da a ma, mbɛ wo bemba n fan‑na Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n fa suun.
Wo wo bemba n ta bemba n 'na wai a ban fan gbɛ, an na‑a wai min kuu sɔ suun.
Wo yauaen ba chɛ nu yɔ ka. Wo ee kun wo ni wo kunɛ bɔ Yataa 'a mɔnɛ kɔɔ min mbe wo ko a. Yataa ɛ wo a ta‑a wan ta ɔ.

Chɛ an fɛ mu, n yen ko Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n na na‑a wo tena. N mbe dɔ sɔ tɔɛ n bɛɛ a na‑a wan, a basan Yataa 'a sawa kan mɔɛ n na. Chɛɛ wo e an dɔ n fa‑a wan kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma, wo ni dɔ n fa chia dɔ mende a, mbɛ wo‑a dɔ n bosa mmɔ 'a samun chɛ chenɛ n na. A tɔɛ n sin, wo e an gbain‑da wan a bɔ duu kan kɔ kan dɔ, an mbe ta‑a kaina.

Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, wo ni tɔɔya ma sɔn. Wo e tɔɔya‑a wan mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ fa koe a suun, miin nii ma ko yama kan kɔ kan ma ni. Wo e tɔɔya‑a wan Ebɛɛ 'a saya ko a suun, aan a ta mɔɛ dankama 'a saya ma, min ni kai Baakia 'a denɛ Sakaaya a. An na‑a Sakaaya chɛ fa nɛ Yataa 'a kata chɛ an dɔ, Yataa 'a chen chɛ n tɛ yasi minda gbengbe chɛ a.
N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ an na‑a mɔɛ chɛ miin gbɛɛ fa suun, a tɔɔya chɛ ɛ ma‑a wo mɔ bonda chɛ n sima an ma.”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo wan Chuusaɛn mɔɛ nu, wo‑a a tun Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n fa koe a. A yɛ to, Yataa ɛ a 'a sɔ mɔɛ miin na na wo tena, wo‑a a tun to an bon koe a, an ni fa. Tima sɛsɛ ko a, n toen ni, n ni wo a sɔn sɔn kaina dɔndɔɛ, yɔ tɛ kuinsa ɛ a 'a denɛ n don buɛ min dɔ a kambanɛ kɔɔ. Chɛɛ wo ma dɔn ni n ye.
A yen ko gbɛ, Yataa 'a chen chɛ a senɛ to‑a, a sin pombonɛ mu gbɛ.
N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ a ka sanche ma, wo ee n yen‑da to, aan a ta tima chɛ ma, wo e a fɔ tima min na, wo ɔ, Mansa Yataa ni mɔɛ chɛ dua, min mbe na‑a a tɔɛ ɔ.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi bɔ‑a Yataa 'a kata chɛ ɔ, a bun‑da ta‑a. Mbɛ a fɛ denɛ n gbɛn‑da a ma, an dɔ, a ni a ya a yɛ Yataa 'a kata chɛ ma.

Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Mm, an gbɛɛ ma kawaen fan mu. Chɛɛ n ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ kata chɛ gbɛɛ, wo e ka min yen‑da, tima ɛ che‑a wan, a ni te gbo. A sɔ senɛ dɔndɔ wɛɛ ee to‑a sɔ ɔ, a gbɛɛ a ɛ kan‑da wan duu gboo a.”

Chɛ gbakɔ, Chisɔsi ni wan si ɔ Wodifi kɔnkɔɛ kun ma, mbɛ a fɛ denɛ n na‑a a tena. Mbɛ an dechee a nɔ, an dɔ, “I‑a bai miin fɔ ka, a ɔ yian nn na, ni sɔyɔ mu koe chɛ n mbe ma‑a. Nn mbe a ɔ sɔn‑da ka ma, mbɛ dunya danka che‑a, i na koe a? A tɔmɔsi ɛ ma‑a fen na?”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo wo kun ma fɛn, an ma na wo woo.
Koe min na mu, mɔ sɛsɛ n mbe na‑a wan n tɔɛ ɔ. An mbe a fɔ‑a wan, an dɔ, an fan mu Chasi a, kunka mansa. A sin, an mɔɛ chɛ n mbe mɔ sɛsɛ sɔ‑a wan chia yama ma.
Wo e chɛɛ ma tɔɛ a min‑da wan wo a tindanɛ, wo ni chɛɛ ma tɔɛ a min pɔɔ. Koe chɛ n mbe ma‑a wan, chɛɛ wo ma chian. Chɛ ni ma wɛɛ, a ee a ɔ yian, mbɛ tima che‑a dunya ban koe a.

A yɛ to, chɛnyɛ n mbe butuinɛ chɛ‑a wan an nyɔn na, mbɛ chɛnyɛ mɔɛ dɔndɔɛ n‑na chɛɛ chɛ an bɛ chɛnyɛ mɔ dɔ mende n na. Kɔnkɔ ma chianden ba ɛ ma‑a wan chɛnyɛ sɛsɛ ɔ, a sin to, duu gboo wɛɛ ɛ samba‑a wan chɛnyɛ sɛsɛ ɔ, dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a.
Ko yawaenɛ saa n fan nɛ ka miin mbe ma‑a. Ko yawaenɛ chenama n mbe gbaa, miin mbe na tena ma‑a chɛ n gbakɔ.
“Mɔɛ nu dunya gbɛɛ ɔ, an mbe too‑a wan wo a, a mu min na, n fɛ mɔɛ mu wo a. An mbe wo bia‑a wan, mbɛ an‑na ko ma gbaaenɛ sa wo ma, mbɛ an‑na wo fa.
N fɛ mɔɛ n sɛsɛ mbe ka‑a wan n fɛ a tima chɛ a. An mbe too‑a wan an nyɔn na, mbɛ an‑na an nyɔn ma tachɛ ya ɔ sɔɛ n ma.
A tima chɛ a, mɔ sɛsɛ n mbe fania fɔ‑a wan, mbɛ Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ mu an na. An sin mbe mɔ sɛsɛ n sɔ‑a wan chia yama ma.
Ko yama ma mɔɛ n mbe kɔkoa‑a wan kan kɔ kan dunya ɔ. Ni chɛ sin ma‑a, mɔ gbu sɛsɛ ee to‑a to a fian mɔ gbu a.
Chɛɛ i wɛn mbe i faa bia‑a aan a danka a, Yataa ɛ i baun‑da wan.

Mbɛ a sin, sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ, a si Yataa 'a mansaya ma, mɔɛ n mbe a ɔ yian‑da wan mɔɛ gbɛɛ a dunya gbɛɛ ɔ. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, mɔɛ n ni sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a min chɛnyɛ koɛ kan kɔ kan dɔ. A sin, a tima a mu dechee, dunya ɛ danka‑a.”

Chisɔsi ɔ, “Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ Danɛɛ na‑a bai fɔ wan suun a 'a gboo ɔ, a si fen ma nyamuienɛ ma, miin mbe fenɛ n yɔn. Wo wɛn mbe gboo chɛ kan‑da, wo ni a ɔ gbɛ chɛndɛ chɛ ni bai chɛ fasaien mu fen na. Fen ma nyamuien chɛ, wo e a yen‑da wan sɔ ɔ Yataa 'a kata ɔ.
Ni wo‑a chɛ yen ma‑a, wo wɛn mbe Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ, wo bui sa a a kɔnkɔɛ n dɔ, wo fɔɛ ko a.
I wɛn mbe baa ma, i ma don to chenɛ a, i boo fen kan kɔ kan ya koe a.
I wɛn mbe i 'a sɛnɛ ɔ, i ma yɛ to duu ɔ, koa ya koe a.
A tima chɛ a, koe n mbe yaua‑a gba, miin mbe bu ma musu n nan gbu tan‑da, a basan kuinsa n na.
Wo samunɛ chɛ Yataa tena, wo ma na bui chɛ chɛ sama ɔ, ni chɛ ma, wo ma na a chɛ suin tee ma.
Koe min na mu, an tima chɛ a, ko yawaenɛ min mbe ma‑a, ɛ ben‑da wan a kɔma ma, min ma‑a a ka dunya a dan tima ma, a sɔ sanche ma. A sin a nyɔn sima ee ma‑a to kuɔ fɔ.

Chɛɛ Yataa‑a a tee chɛ n ma wua, ko yawaen bia tee chɛ nu. Ni a nii ma an ma wua ni, mɔ gbu kan kɔ kan kun nii bɔ‑a a ɔ. Chɛɛ a‑a tee chɛ n ma wua a 'a mɔɛ chɛ n fan ko a, a‑a a boo sɔ miin ma, an ma koe a a 'a mɔɛ n na.”
Chisɔsi ɔ, “A tima chɛ a, ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a fɔ i ye, a ɔ, i ya a na wɛ, i ni mmɔ kun ka mansa yen nɛ, i ma dan a a. Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, a yen ko pan, i ma dan a wɛɛ a.

A mu min na, fania kunka mansa an mbe na‑a wan, an basan fania fɔ mɔɛ n na, miin mbe an fandi ya Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n na. An mbe kamaya koe n ma‑a wan, an ni koe tɔmɔsi n yian, mɔɛ n woo koe a. Ni an mbe kun fan, an mbe mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ woo‑a wan, Yataa‑a a boo sɔ miin ma, ma koe a a 'a mɔɛ n na.
Wo‑a ɔ yen gbɛ, mbɛ koe miin mbe na tena ma‑a, n ban‑da an dɔ yian‑da wo a.
“Chɛ an fɛ mu, ni mɔɛ n n‑na a fɔ wo ye, an dɔ, wo ni wo ya a ta, wo ni kunka mansa yen fuinɛ ma, wo ma ta nɔ. Ni an‑na a fɔ, an dɔ, a yen ko nun dɔ dumu chɛ ɔ, wo ma dan a wɛɛ a.
Koe min na mu, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe na‑a wan mɔ ɔ mɔ ni n yen, yɔ mɔ ɔ mɔ ɛ banda manɛ yen buɛ min dɔ, ni a man‑da mia banda a.
Ni doa n ma‑a kaina min, fen su ɛ nɔ a tindanɛ. Koe tɔmɔsi chɛ n bɛɛ, an mbe a ɔ yian‑da wan wo a, mbɛ tima che‑a n na koe a to.
“Ko yawaen tee chɛ n mbe ben‑da dechee, mbɛ tee ee na‑a man‑da, mbɛ kau wɛɛ ɛ pimbi‑a wan. Tɔmbuaka n mbe bea‑a wan a ka banda a. Fen kɔ fen min mbe banda a, Yataa ɛ a ɔ samba‑a wan a ka a gba ɔ.

Mbɛ fenɛ ɛ ma‑a wan banda ma, min mbe a ɔ yian‑da mɔɛ n na, mbɛ n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe ka na‑a na. Ni n sin ma‑a na‑a, mɔɛ nu dunya gbɛɛ ɔ, an mbe di chɛ‑a wan chinchimaya ɔ. Koe min na mu, mɔɛ gbɛɛ ɛ n yen‑da wan na‑a gbasaya wa ɔ dugbu ɔ, a yɛ to, n mbe ma‑a wan man‑da Yataa 'a manɛ a.
Ni buu fɛ‑a gbankon, n mbe n 'na maeka n na ta‑a wan dunya gbɛɛ ɔ, an ni mɔɛ chɛ n na sɔn sɔn, n‑na n boo sɔ miin ma, ma koe a n 'na mɔɛ n na.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo wo yii na chii kɔnɛ ma. Ni wo‑a a yen pɔmbɔ‑a, a ni ma gbɛ wo yii ma, mbɛ sama ɔ ma yansan to.
A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a mu, ni wo‑a koe chɛ n yen ma‑a, a ni ma wo yii ma, mbɛ tima ɔ ma yansan to, n na koe a.
N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ koe chɛ n gbɛɛ mbe ma‑a pɛn, wo nyɔn sima chɛ n mbe e na ban dunya ɔ.
Dunya gbɛɛ ɛ ban‑da wan, chɛɛ n da a bai ee ka‑a a gba ɔ kuɔ fɔ ko a.”

Chisɔsi ɔ, “Chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ ma a tee gbu sɔn, a basan a tima a, n na koe a. N fan, Yataa 'a denɛ wɛɛ, n ma a ɔ sɔn, ni n mbe na‑a tima min na. Maeka n bɛɛ, an ma a ɔ sɔn. Fa Yataa dɔndɔ gbe, an‑na a ɔ sɔn.
Tima min na, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe yɛ‑a dunya chɛ ɔ to, koe n mbe ma‑a ka wan, yɔ an ni buɛ min dɔ Nowa 'a tima a.

Mɔɛ n ni wan ko ɔ ko ma‑a Nowa 'a tima a, yɔ mɔ gbu kan kɔ kan mbe min ma. An ni daun fenɛ n daun fan, a yɛ to, an mbe an min. Mɔɛ n ni musu n fuu wan, musu n sin ni be wan kai n ma. Chɛ an ni a a, yii nii ma dunya ya ni tima min na, mbɛ Nowa sɛ‑a dɛndɛ wa dɛgbɛ ɔ.
A sin, mɔɛ chɛ n nii ma ko ɔ ko ɔ sɔn ni, aan yii‑a dunya gbɛɛ a tunɛ, mbɛ a‑a an gbɛɛ fa. Ɛ ma‑a ka wan to an tee chɛ ma, tee min ma, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe na‑a tee min na.
A tee chɛ a, ni kamin fea ma‑a wai chɛ‑a sɛnɛ ɔ, dɔndɔɛ ɛ ya‑a wan, mbɛ dɔndɔɛ sin to‑a nɔ.
Ni musu fea ma‑a tu chɛ‑a mun dɔndɔɛ ɔ, dɔndɔɛ ɛ ya‑a wan, mbɛ dɔndɔɛ wɛɛ to‑a nɔ.
“Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo wo kun ma fɛn, a mu min na, wo ma tee sɔn, tee min na, wo 'a mansa ɛ na‑a.
Ni chen ti na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, tima min na mu, kanka ɛ na su ɔ, a nii dɔn‑da a ni chinɔ. A ni ma‑a wan a ya a aan, min ni a ma‑a, kanka chɛ nii a 'a chenɛ da yɔn, a ni don.
Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo ma bɛndenɛ ni ma tima ɔ tima ko a. A mu min na, wo ee na‑a tee sɔn‑da, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe na‑a tee min ma.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a tai tɛ, a ɔ, “Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo ma yɔ bɔi denɛ, danaya ni min dɔ, a basan yiimatɛ a. Ni a kun ti ma‑a ta‑a tachɛ ɔ, ɛ a to wan a bɔɛ n kun ma, daun fenɛ be koe a an nu ma, tima ma.
Ni a kun ti yɛ‑a, a ni a tan, ɛ koe chɛ n ma‑a, yɔ a‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ a ye, ɛ ma wan ko chɛndɛ a a ko a.
N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ kun ti chɛ ɛ gbasaya be‑a wan a ma, ma koe a a 'a chenɛ gbɛɛ kun ma.
Chɛɛ bɔi den chɛ, ni bɔi den chɛndɛ ma a a, ɛ a fɔ‑a wan, a ɔ, mbɛ kun ti chɛ ee fua tena yɛ‑a,
mbɛ a bun‑da a bɔɛ n gbasi‑a. A yɛ to, mbɛ a bea‑a daun ba chɛ fɛ, a basan gbɛ min ba a, an bɛ kɔn gbasi kai n na.
Chɛɛ a kun ti chɛ ɛ yɛ‑a wan tee dɔndɔ a, a yii mbe ee ma‑a a yɛ koe ɔ tima min na.

Kun ti chɛ ɛ bɔi den chɛ a tɔɔya‑a wan a yama yama boo a, mbɛ a‑a a bia, yɔ nɛnɛn fea ti chɛ n mbe bia buɛ min dɔ. Bɔi den chɛ, ɛ ma‑a wan kaina dɔndɔɛ, di chɛ a, a basan mɔnɛ ɔ nyin na daunɛ a, an bɛ nɛnɛn fea ti chɛ n na.”
Chisɔsi ɔ, “Yataa 'a mansaya ɔ yian tima, ɛ ma‑a ka wan, yɔ koe min ma‑a sunkun tɔngbɔ tanɛ n na. Yɛɛ dɔndɔ ma, an‑na dambo ya wan, ta koe a mɔ kaima chɛ tan‑da, min ni na tena musu si tena.
An mɔ tan chɛ tɛ ɔ, mɔ duu ni nɔ, an yiima tɛen ni kaka, duu sin yiima nii ma tɛ ni.
Mɔ duu chɛ nu, miin yiima nii ma tɛ ni, an ta‑a wan dambo n na an boo a, chɛɛ tu nii ma koo an dɔ, man koe a.
Chɛɛ yiimatɛ tɔ duu chɛ n tana, an ta‑a wan tu sani a faenɛ a an boo a.
Kaminɛ min ni na tena musu si‑a, a ma fua ni na‑a. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, sunkun tɔngbɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ bun‑da ta‑a chinɔɛ a.
“Su tɛ ɛ che‑a, mbɛ mɔ dɔndɔ‑a yee tɛ. A ɔ, kai gbu na‑a, an mbe min ma kɔn tena, a ɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ ni bɔ baa ma, an ni a tan.
Mbɛ sunkun tɔngbɔ tan chɛ n kunɛ‑a, mbɛ an‑na an 'na saaba n na sɛ.
Chɛɛ sunkun tɔngbɔ duu chɛ nu, miin yiima nii ma tɛ ni, an dɔ yiimatɛ tɔɛ chɛ n ma, ‘Wo dimu, nn 'na dambo n mbe e na dufɛn‑da, wo nn kɔ tu sima ɔ.’
Chɛɛ an bɔɛ chɛ n dɔ, ‘Ni nn‑na chɛ ma, tu min mbe nn boo ɔ, a ee na‑a kun‑da mmɔ gbɛɛ ko a. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo ta tu ma tachɛ mɔɛ n tena, wo ni wo ta san.’

Mbɛ sunkun tɔngbɔɛ chɛ nu, miin yiima nii ma tɛ ni ka, an ta‑a tu san tena. An ta‑a kɛn, mbɛ mɔ kaima min ni na tena ka musu si‑a, a na‑a an gbaa. Sunkun tɔngbɔ duu chɛ nu, miin ma bɛnden ni ka, an fan don‑da an bɛn chɛ ɔ, an bɛ kai chɛ n na. An don‑da kɛn, mbɛ an‑na chenɛ da a tɔn an gbaa chia a.
“Chɛ gbakɔ, mbɛ sunkun tɔngbɔɛ chɛ nu, miin ta‑a ka tu san tena, an na‑a, mbɛ an‑na chenɛ chɛ da a tɔndenɛ tan. Mbɛ an‑na a kuu sɔ chenɛ gbu da tu‑a, an dɔ, ‘Fa, Fa, chenɛ da a ka nn ye, nn mbe don.’
Chɛɛ kamin chɛ ɔ, ‘N mbe ee dɔn. N ma a ɔ sɔn ni nyɔn mu wo a.’ ”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ te gbɛ, “Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo wo kun ma fɛn. Koe min na mu, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, wo ma tee chɛ sɔn, n mbe na‑a min ma, n mbe ee baa tima chɛ ma, n mbe na‑a min kɔɔ.”

Chisɔsi ɔ te to, “Tima min na Yataa ɛ ma‑a a 'a mansaya ɔ yian‑da, ɛ ma‑a ka wan, yɔ min ma‑a tai chɛ ɔ. Kun ti dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, min toen ni a ni ta tachɛ ɔ yansama ɔ. Mbɛ a‑a a 'a sɛn dɔ kamin sawa an chee, a ɔ, an ni to a boo fenɛ gbɛɛ kun ma.
Kamin chɛ na‑a a 'a sɛn dɔ kamin chɛ n sɔn fan chɛndɛ chɛ. A‑a kɔpɔ sɛmbɛnden to wan an boo ɔ. A‑a a be dɔndɔ ma kain gbɛnsɛn wu duu, dɔndɔɛ wu fea, a sawan bɔɛ sin, wu dɔndɔ. Mbɛ a ta‑a tachɛ chɛ ɔ.
Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, sɛn dɔ kaminɛ, min na‑a kain gbɛnsɛn wu duu chɛ ma sɔn ka, a ta‑a. Mbɛ a bun‑da fee fenɛ san‑da, ɛ a ma tachɛ. A‑a chɛ ma kɛn, a kun‑da wan kain gbɛnsɛn wu duu dɔ mende ma.
Sɛn dɔ kamin fean bɔɛ chɛ wɛɛ, a‑a a ma ka wan. Mbɛ a wɛɛ‑a kain gbɛnsɛn wu fea a sɛ a ta kun ma.
Chɛɛ sɛn dɔ kaminɛ sawan bɔɛ chɛ tana, a ma fen na sɛ ni a 'a wu dɔndɔɛ chɛ kun ma. A‑a min ma, a ta‑a wan, a‑a sonɛ sin, mbɛ a‑a kɔpɔɛ chɛ nun a ɔ.
“A ɔ mɛenɛ gbakɔ, an kun ti chɛ yɛ‑a, a ka a 'a tachɛ ɔ. A‑a a fo kɛn, mbɛ a‑a an chee, a ɔ, an ni a ɔ yian a a, an‑na fen ma kɔpɔɛ chɛ a, min to‑a an boo ɔ.
Mbɛ sɛn dɔ kamin chɛ, min na‑a wu duu chɛ ma sɔn, a don‑da. Mbɛ a‑a wu tanɛ be a kun ti chɛ ma. A‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, ‘Fa, i‑a wu duu min be n ma, n‑na wu duu an na sɛ a kun ma.’
Mbɛ a ɔ, ‘En wai. Mɔ chɛndɛ mu i a, i sin‑na a ɔ yian n na, mbɛ i danayaen mu kɔpɔ ɛnden bɛɛ kun ma. Chɛ ko a, n mbe kɔpɔ sɛmbɛnden be‑a wan i ma, i ni a kun ma fɛn. Na, mɔ ni buɔdia bɔ.’
“Mbɛ sɛn dɔ kaminɛ fean bɔɛ chɛ don‑da, min na‑a wu fea ma sɔn. A ɔ, ‘Fa, i‑a wu fea min be n ma, n‑na wu fea an na sɛ a kun ma.’
Mbɛ a ɔ, ‘En wai. Mɔ chɛndɛ mu i a, i sin‑na a ɔ yian n na, mbɛ i danayaen mu kɔpɔ ɛnden bɛɛ kun ma. Chɛ ko a, n mbe kɔpɔ sɛmbɛnden be‑a wan i ma, i ni a kun ma fɛn. Na, mɔ ni buɔdia bɔ.’

“Mbɛ sɛn dɔ kaminɛ sawan bɔɛ chɛ don‑da, kain gbɛnsɛn wu dɔndɔɛ be‑a min ma. Chɛɛ a ma fen na sɛ ni a kun ma. A ɔ, ‘Fa, n‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ i faa a kɔɔen mu kaka. A sin, mɔɛ mu i a, min mbe mɔɛ n kuu kɔ gba ma i ta a. Mbɛ i yɛ‑a, i‑a chin fenɛ ya, i ma min chin ni.
N chian‑da wan i ma. Chɛ an‑na a ma, n‑na i 'a kɔpɔɛ chɛ nun duu gboo ɔ. A yen ko, n na‑a a a.’
Mbɛ kun ti chɛ ɔ, ‘Mɔ yama mu i a. A sin, i gboo ɔ faen mu. I na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ n faa a kɔɔen mu, mbɛ n mbe mɔɛ n kuu kɔ gba an ma n ta a, a yɛ to, n mbe ee chin fenɛ min chin, n mbe an ya.
I na‑a chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ sɔn fan a si n ma, chɛɛ i ma n 'na kɔpɔɛ sa ni banchi ma. Ni n na‑a yɛ tima min na, n ni chini sima tan‑da wan a kun ma.’
Mbɛ a ɔ, ‘Wo kain gbɛnsɛn wu dɔndɔɛ chɛ wɛɛ bia a boo ɔ, mbɛ wo‑a a be sɛn dɔ kaminɛ saa chɛ ma, kain gbɛnsɛn wu tan chɛ ɛ ka min boo ɔ.
Koe min na mu, mɔɛ min mbe a 'a wai ma ti bia chɛndɛ chɛ, ɛ wai ma munda sɔn fan. Chɛɛ mɔɛ min mbe ee a 'a wai ɛnden chɛ ma ti bia, ɛ fo‑a wan an wai ɛnden chɛ wɛɛ a.
Min sien mu sɛn dɔ kamin fufafuu chɛ ma, wo a a dɛ baa ma pimbi pimbi ɔ. Ɛ ma‑a kaina di chɛ‑a, a basan a nyinɛ a daunɛ a tɔɔya a.’ ”
Chisɔsi ɔ, “N fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe na‑a wan to dunya chɛ ɔ, nn bɛ maeka n gbɛɛ a. Ni n sin ma‑a na‑a, n mbe ma‑a wan man‑da, mbɛ n si‑a n 'na mansa sea chɛ a, Yataa 'a manɛ ɔ.
A sin, mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ an mbe dunya ma, an na ɛ kan‑da wan n chen kɔɔ. Ni an na kan‑da, n mbe an tɛ du‑a wan fea a, yɔ sɔ fen kun ma fɛn mɔɛ, ɛ sa n tɛ du buɛ min dɔ, an bɛ ba n na.
A tima chɛ a, mɔɛ miin maen mu ka yɔ sa nu, n mbe an na yɛ‑a wan n boo nyima ɔ. Mbɛ chɛ nu, miin maenɛ ɛ yɔ ba nu, n‑na an sin na yɛ n manɛ ɔ.

Mbɛ n fan mansa chɛ, n mbe a fɔ‑a wan mɔɛ chɛ n ye, n boo nyima ɔ, n dɔ, an ni na. N dɔ, Fa Yataa‑a an dua. N dɔ, an ni na, an ni Yataa 'a mansaya tɔnɔnɛ ma sɔn, min dɔ bɛn‑da suun an ko a, a ka dunya a dan tima ma.

N dɔ, koe min na mu chɛ ma‑a, tima min na kɔnkɔɛ ni n na, an‑na daun fenɛ be wan n ma, a daun koe a. N dɔ, n kanɛ a gbaaen ni kɛn, an‑na yii be wan n ma, a min koe a. N dɔ, sonda wɛɛ ni n na, an na‑a n yia wan buɔdia ɔ.
N dɔ, fai‑a n bia kɛn, an‑na n fai bɔ wan. N dɔ, n gbandi‑a wɛɛ, an‑na an boo a si wan n kɔɔ. N dɔ, n ni pimbi chenɛ min bɛɛ a, an ta‑a wan nɔ, an‑na n deman.

Mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin tanden mu Yataa tena, an mbe a fɔ‑a wan, an dɔ, ‘Mansa, tima minan na mu, nn‑na i kɔnkɔ tɔɛ yen, mbɛ nn‑na daun fenɛ be i ma, a daun koe a? Nn‑na i kanɛ a gbaaenɛ yen sɔyɔ, mbɛ nn‑na yii be i ma, a min koe a?
I na‑a tima minan na sonda ni i a, mbɛ nn‑na i yia? I faienɛ to, mbɛ nn‑na i fai bɔ?
Tima minan na mu, i gbandi‑a? Nn‑na i deman sɔyɔ pimbi chenɛ a?’

Mbɛ n fan mansa chɛ, n mbe a fɔ‑a wan, n dɔ, n ni a ma din an ye, mbɛ ni an na‑a koe chɛ n gbɛɛ chɛ wan n fɛ mɔɛ den tachɛen bɛɛ ye, baa ee miin ma an tɛ ɔ, n dɔ, an nii ma a chɛ ni ka an fan ye, an na‑a a chɛ ka n fan ye.

“Mbɛ n fan mansa chɛ, mɔɛ chɛ nu n manɛ ɔ, n mbe a fɔ‑a wan an ye, n dɔ, an ni ka n ya a. N dɔ, Yataa‑a an danka. N dɔ, an ni ta pan kuɔ fɔ ta man chɛ ɔ, Yataa‑a min dɔ bɛn Sitana ko a, nyina yama n kun ti, an bɛ a 'a nyina yama n na.
N dɔ, koe min na mu, tima min na kɔnkɔɛ ni n na, an ma daun fen be ni n ma, a daun koe a. N dɔ, n kanɛ a gbaaenɛ ni wɛɛ, an ma yii be ni n ma, a min koe a.

N dɔ, n na‑a wɛɛ sondaya ɔ, an ma dɔn ni an ni sa tena be n ma an 'na chenɛ a. N dɔ, fai‑a n bia tima min na, an ma n fai bɔ ni. N dɔ, tima min na n gbandienɛ ni, n mbe sa ɔ pimbi chenɛ a, an ma ta ni nɔ, an ni n deman.
Mbɛ an bɛɛ, an mbe n dɔ tisa‑a wan, an dɔ, ‘Mansa, tima minan na mu, nn ma i deman ni, koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ɔ, min‑na i tan fɔɛ ɔ?’
Mbɛ n fan mansa chɛ, n mbe a fɔ‑a wan, n dɔ, n ni a ma din an ye, mbɛ ni an ban‑da wan koe chɛ n chɛ koe a, n fɛ mɔɛ den tachɛen bɛɛ ye, mbɛ an ban‑da ka a chɛ koe a n fan ye.
A sin, Yataa ɛ mɔ bonda chɛ n na ta‑a wan kaina, an mbe ma‑a kaina mɔnɛ ɔ bia‑a kuɔ fɔ ko a. Chɛɛ mɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ nu, miin tanden mu Yataa tena, an mbe kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da wan.”
Chisɔsi ban‑da kɛn mɔɛ n kan‑da bai chɛ n gbɛɛ a, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ a fɛ denɛ n ye, a ɔ,
“Wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ a to‑a bi tee fea, mbɛ kun bɔ a ɔ bɛnɛ tima chɛ che‑a. A tima chɛ a, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, an mbe n be‑a wan mɔɛ chɛ n ma, miin mbe n fa‑a kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma.”
Mbɛ Chu n tɛ ɔ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa nu, a basan Chu gbakoo n na, an bɛn‑da kaina dɔndɔ, an 'na tɛ mɔ wa Yataa tena, a 'a chenɛ a. An 'na tɛ mɔ wa chɛ tɔ ni Kayafasi.
An bɛn‑da kɛn, an‑na dɔbɛnɛ chɛ wan, an ni Chisɔsi bia nun dɔ, mbɛ an‑na a fa.
Chɛɛ an‑na a fɔ wan an nyɔn ye, an dɔ, “Mmɔ ma a ma bɛn chɛ kun ma, an ma na gbunɛ a bea.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi che‑a Bɛtani duu ɔ. A yia‑a wan kamin dɔndɔ 'a chenɛ a, min tɔ ni Saimɔn. Saimɔn chɛ ni mɔɛ an na, gbandi yama bɔen ni tee min gboo ma.

An fea Chisɔsi a an ni kɛn si ɔ daun chɛ a, musu dɔndɔ na‑a wan tu kunyɛ a diama wa a an chen chɛ a. Tu chɛ ni baa an dɔ min nyanden ni senɛ ɔ. An sen baa chɛ baa ni gbɛ kaka, a basan tu a, min ni a ɔ. A‑a an tu chɛ gbɛɛ chɛ wan Chisɔsi kunɛ ɔ.
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ n‑na chɛ ɔ yen kɛn, an faa tɛ‑a wan. An dɔ, “Musu chɛ‑a tu bonda chɛ gbɛɛ yayi fen ko a?
Koe min na mu, a ni a ma tachɛ wan bɛɛ kɔpɔ sɛmbɛnden na, mbɛ a‑a a be yɔn tɔɛ n ma.”
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ an faa tɛen fan ni. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Wo wo boo ka musu chɛ a. Fen ko a mu, wo e a ma bɔ tena? A‑a ko ma kawaen ba an ma ka n tena.
A mu min na, yɔn tɔɛ n mbe ma‑a wan wo tɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ n tana, n mbe ee ma‑a wo tɛ ɔ tima ɔ tima ko a.
A‑a tu min chɛ ka n kunɛ ɔ, a‑a n ma bɛn fan ka n tɔn koe a, n fa tima ya ɔ.
A‑a min ma ka, n ni a ma din wo tena, a ee danka‑a nɛ. Chɛɛ kan kɔ kan dunya chɛ ɔ, sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɛ fɔ‑a kaina, musu chɛ 'a ko chɛndɛ chɛ wɛɛ, ɛ fɔ‑a wan nɔ, mɔɛ n gbɛɛ ni a a min.”
Chɛ gbakɔ, Chudasi Isikayɔti, min ni Chisɔsi fɛ den tan kun ma fea chɛ n dɔndɔ a, a ta‑a Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa n tan.
Mbɛ a ɔ, “Ni n basan‑da wo ma Chisɔsi bia koe a, wo e fen be‑a n ma?” Mbɛ an bɛɛ an‑na kain gbɛnsɛn bi sawa dan, mbɛ an‑na a be a ma.
A ka gbɛ a tee chɛ ma, Chudasi ni wan gbɛ chia yan‑da, ɛ kun buɛ min dɔ a ni Chisɔsi ma tachɛ mɔɛ chɛ n ma.
Mbɛ tee saa saa che‑a bɛn chɛ ko a, biidi dɛnfɛ daun bɛn chɛ. Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ n na‑a a tena, an dɔ, “Kan mɔ, nn mbe ta mende, nn ni daun fen chɛ ɔ bɛn mmɔ ko a, kun bɔ a ɔ daun fen chɛ?”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Wo ta kamin chɛ tena duu ɔ. Ni wo ta‑a, wo a fɔ a ye, wo ɔ, n dɔ te, n 'na tima che‑a. Mbɛ a sin, n mbe kun bɔ a ɔ daunɛ chɛ tena nɔ wan a waa chenɛ a, mmɔ bɛ wo a.”
Chisɔsi fɛ den chɛ n ta‑a wan, mbɛ an‑na a ma, yɔ a‑a min fɔ an ye a ma koe a. Mbɛ an‑na daun fen chɛ gbu ɔ bɛn, kun bɔ a ɔ bɛn chɛ ko a.
A yɛɛ ma tee chɛ a, Chisɔsi si‑a wan daun chɛ koe a, an bɛ a fɛ den tan kun ma fea chɛ n na.
An to‑a daun chɛ tena wan, mbɛ a ɔ, “N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ wo dɔndɔ ɛ na tena wan n ma tachɛ‑a.”
A fɛ den chɛ n‑na bai chɛ a min kɛn, an faa yɔn‑da wan kaka. Mbɛ an bun‑da Chisɔsi ɔ tisa‑a dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a, an dɔ, “Mansa, n gbee ma chɛ a, ae?”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo dɔndɔ, ɛ na tena wan n ma tachɛ‑a. Nn fea gbu nn mbe daunɛ chɛ tena koen dɔndɔɛ ɔ min na.

N fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe na tena wan fa‑a, yɔ a nyɛnden mu buɛ min dɔ Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, a si n ma. Chɛɛ ɛ yaua‑a gba mɔɛ chɛ ko a, min mbe n ma tachɛ‑a. Ni a nii ma suun ni, a ni nyan‑da wan a ko a.”
Mbɛ Chudasi, min dɔn‑da Chisɔsi ma tachɛ koe a, a koɔ‑a, a ɔ, “Kan mɔ, n gbee ma chɛ a, ae?” Chisɔsi ɔ, “I wandi da an‑na a fɔ ka.”

An mbe kɛn daun chɛ chɛ‑a, Chisɔsi‑a biidi dɔndɔ ya. Mbɛ a‑a Yataa ɔ tisa, a ni biidi chɛ dua. Mbɛ a‑a a ɔ kai kai, mbɛ a‑a a du du an ma, ɛ ta‑a a fɔ‑a, a ɔ, “N fandi gbu, n gboo an nɛ. Wo a bia, wo ni a daun.”
Mbɛ a‑a kɔpu ya, gbɛ ni min dɔ. Mbɛ a‑a Yataa wai bɔ, a‑a a be an ma, ɛ ta‑a a fɔ‑a, a ɔ, “Wo gbɛɛ, wo chɛ sima kai a a dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a.
A mu min na, n wii an nɛ, n mbe na tena min na bɔn‑da mɔ gbu gbɛɛ ko a, min mbe a ma, Yataa ni a boo bɔ wo 'a ko yama n dɔ. N wii chɛ, Yataa ɛ an ya tena, mbɛ a‑a dɔbɛn nama chɛ a 'a mɔɛ n na.
Ka wɛ, n ni a ma din wo tena. N mbe ee gbɛ chɛ min‑da to, mɔɔ dechee tima chɛ a, tima min na Fa Yataa ɛ a 'a mansaya ɔ yian‑da. A tima an na mu, n mbe gbɛ nama min‑da, mmɔ bɛ.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi n‑na Yataa si sa, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na. Mbɛ an ta‑a kɔnkɔɛ chɛ ɔ, min tɔ ni Wodifi kɔnkɔɛ.

An che‑a kɛn Wodifi kɔnkɔɛ ɔ, mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo gbɛɛ, wo e na tena wan ka‑a n fɛ su chɛ ɔ. Koe min na mu, a nyɛnden fan mu Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ ni Yataa‑a sa kun ma fɛn mɔɛ ya, mbɛ sa n dɔ ɛ fasan fan.
Chɛɛ tima min na Yataa ɛ n kɔɔ sɔ‑a, a ka saya ɔ, n mbe ta‑a wan wo ya ɔ Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ.”
Chɛɛ Pita‑a a fɔ wan Chisɔsi ye, a ɔ, “N bɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ ni ka wɛɛ i fɛ, n tana, n mbe ee ka‑a i fɛ.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Pita, n ni a ma din i tena, mbɛ tɛ kɔnɛ e na konchee sayi chɛ ma, e kɔɔsa bia chɛ‑a wan gba sawa, a si n sɔn koe ma i boo ɔ.”
Chɛɛ Pita ɔ, “I fa tena, n fa tena. N mbe ee kɔɔsa bia chɛ‑a i wakoe ma.” Mbɛ Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ tɔɛ n gbɛɛ, an‑na a fɔ ka wan.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ta‑a kaina dɔndɔ, min tɔ ni, Kɛsemani, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na. An‑na a fo nɔ, mbɛ a ɔ, “Wo si nɛ, n mbe ta pan, n ni samunɛ chɛ.”
Mbɛ a‑a Pita ya, a basan kai Sɛbɛdi 'a den kaien fea an na, mbɛ an‑na an ma ta ɛnden na. Mbɛ mɔnɛ koa‑a a ma a ya a, a faa yɔn‑da kaka.
Mbɛ a ɔ, “Faayɔnɛ min mbe n ma, a da a koo. A toen mu, a ni ta n na faa. Wo ma chinɔ nɛ, mmɔ ma kɔnɛ chɛ, mmɔ bɛ.”

Mbɛ a ka‑a wan an baima ɛnden na, mbɛ a‑a a wandi ɔ fuin duu ma susu gbuu, a bun‑da samunɛ chɛ‑a. A ɔ, “Fa, ni ɛ bɛn fan, a ma ko yawaen chɛ ni ka n teen na. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, n ta faa ma koe, an ma ma. Chɛɛ i ta faa ma koe, an ni ma.”
Mbɛ a yɛ‑a a fɛ den chɛ n tena. A‑a an tan sa ɔ chinɔɛ ɔ. Mbɛ a ɔ Pita ma, “Mmɔ bɛ ee che ma‑a mmɔ ya a, awa dɔndɔ wɛɛ ko a?
Wo wo kɔɔ sɔ, wo ma chinɔ. Wo samunɛ ma ti bia, Sitana ma na a ma, wo ni wo kan kɔ sɔ Yataa a. Wo toen mu wo ni Yataa faa ma koe n ma, chɛɛ a gbasaya ee wo boo ɔ an ma koe a.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi yɛ‑a to, a fean bɔɛ ɔ, mbɛ a‑a samunɛ chɛ. A ɔ, “Fa, ni ko yawaen chɛ ee che ben‑da n ma, mɔɔ ni n‑na a ɔ bia, mbɛ i faa ma, an ni ma.”
Mbɛ a na‑a to, a‑a an tan sa ɔ to chinɔɛ ɔ. Chinɔɛ fankaen ba ni an ya a, an nii kun an ni an ya a ka.
Mbɛ a yɛ‑a to, a gba sawan bɔɛ ɔ, samun chɛ tena. A‑a samunɛ chɛ da a kuiɛ dɔndɔ gbe chɛ an dɔ.

A ban‑da kɛn samun‑da, a‑a a kɔɔ sɔ wan, mbɛ a ta‑a a fɛ den chɛ n tan to. Mbɛ a ɔ, “Wo e ka sa ɔ chinɔɛ an dɔ tun? Wo e wo suin‑da? A yen ko, tima che‑a n ko a. N fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n ma tachɛ koe a, ko yama ma mɔɛ n ma.
Wo wo a sɔ, mmɔ ni bun ta‑a. Wo wo ya a ta pan. Mɔɛ min mbe n ma tachɛ tena, a yen ko na‑a.”

Chisɔsi to‑a koɔ an na, mbɛ Chudasi, min ni a fɛ den tan kun ma fea chɛ n dɔndɔ a, a na‑a, an bɛ mɔ fanka a. Kɔn kundu ma tɛenɛ, a basan chɛɛ chɛ mɛ a, ɛ an boo ɔ. Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa nu, an bɛ Chu gbakoo n na, an fan na‑a mɔɛ chɛ n na na.
An mbe e na to na‑a, Chudasi na‑a a fɔ wan mɔɛ chɛ n ye, a ɔ, ɛ mɔɛ min kɔndɔn‑da, a ɔ, an nɛ. A ɔ, an ni dɛ a ma, an ni a bia.
Chɛ an‑na a ma, Chudasi‑a a fo kɛn, mbɛ a ta‑a Chisɔsi tan a ya kɔɔɛ a. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “Kan mɔ, en wua,” mbɛ a‑a a kɔndɔn.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N dia nyɔɛ, i na‑a wai min chɛ koe a, a chɛ dechee.” Mbɛ an na‑a, an dɛ‑a Chisɔsi ma, an‑na a bia gban.
Chɛɛ Chu n 'na tɛ mɔ wa Yataa tena, a 'a bɔi denɛ, a ni wan an mɔɛ chɛ n tɛ ɔ. An‑na Chisɔsi bia kɛn, mbɛ a yen ko, a fɛ mɔɛ dɔndɔɛ, a‑a chɛɛ chɛ mɛ bɔ a a, mbɛ a‑a bɔi denɛ chɛ too tɛ a a gbeda.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “I 'a mɛ a yɛ a sa ɔ. Mɔɛ min mbe mɛ ya butuin chɛ koe a, an mbe a wɛɛ fa‑a mɛ an na.
A ni ma wo yii ma, mbɛ n mbe kun fan n ni Fa Yataa ɔ tisa, basan koe a n ma. A sin, a ɛ maeka wu sɛsɛ a na‑a wan, an ni butuinɛ chɛ n ko a.
Chɛɛ ni Yataa‑a chɛ ma, mbɛ a 'a gboo‑a min fɔ, mbɛ koe chɛ n mbe n tan‑da wan, a ee na‑a bɔ a a.”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ mɔ fanka chɛ ma, miin na‑a ka a bia‑a, a ɔ, “Wo nii wo wandi tɔɔ na koe a, chɛɛ chɛ mɛ n na wo boo ɔ, a basan kɔn ma tɛenɛ a, n bia koe a. Kanka ma chianden ma n na. Mmɔ‑a tee sɛsɛ wa chɛ gbɛɛ ban, Yataa 'a kata chɛ ɔ, n mbe kan chɛ‑a, wo ma n bia ni.
Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɛ ma tena, min mbe a ma, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n na‑a miin nyɛn Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, an ni bɔ a a.” Mbɛ Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ n gbɛɛ, an‑na a dɔndɔ gbe to, mbɛ an ben‑da bui‑a.
Mɔɛ miin na‑a Chisɔsi bia, an ta‑a wan a a Kayafasi 'a chenɛ a, min ni Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na tɛ mɔ wa a. A tima chɛ a, Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ n na kanden fan ni nɔ, an bɛ Chu gbakoo n na.

Pita‑a a sɔ Chisɔsi fɛ, chɛɛ a ma dɔn ni a ni gbɛn an ma gbɛdɛn. An ta‑a wan aan, a che an kata chɛ ɔ. Mbɛ an don‑da nɔ. Pita wɛɛ don‑da wan, mbɛ a si‑a, an bɛ kata chɛ kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ n na. A toen ni a ni a ɔ sɔn ni an mbe fen ma‑a Chisɔsi a.
Mbɛ Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa nu, an bɛ Chu kuti wa ɔ mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a, an bun‑da fania siiya yan‑da, a si Chisɔsi ma. An toen ni chia an na, a fa koe a.
Mɔ sɛsɛ n na‑a wan, an‑na fania fɔ Chisɔsi ma. Chɛɛ an‑na chɛ ma wɛɛ, fania nii nɔ, min mbe a ma, an ni a fa. Mbɛ a danka a, mɔ fea n‑na an kɔɔ sɔ, siiya ma munda bɔ koe a.
Mbɛ an dɔ, “Kamin chɛ na‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, ɛ kun fan a ni Yataa 'a chen chɛ te, mbɛ a‑a a sɔ tee sawa tɛ ɔ.”

Mbɛ Chu n 'na tɛ mɔ wa Yataa tena, a‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, mbɛ a sɔ‑a. Mbɛ a‑a Chisɔsi ɔ tisa, a ɔ, “A yen ko gbɛ siiya n‑na bai chɛ gbɛɛ fɔ, a si i ma. Bai ɔ bai ee i da a, e min fɔ, min mbe i kun bɔ koe chɛ ɔ?”
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ma bai ɔ bai fɔ ni, a‑a a ma maun fan. Mbɛ tɛ mɔ wa chɛ ɔ, “Tea fɔ nn ye, Yataa ko a, ni i wan mu Chasi a, kunka mansa chɛ a, Yataa 'a denɛ chɛ.”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “I‑a an fɔ ka. Chɛɛ n ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ a ka sanche ma aan a ta, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, wo e n yen‑da wan si ɔ kaina ma bɛndenɛ Yataa boo nyima ɔ, gbasaya ɔ. A sin, wo e n yen‑da wan na‑a, banda a dugbu ɔ.”
Tɛ mɔ wa chɛ‑a bai chɛ a min kɛn Chisɔsi da a, a‑a a ma doma a panda wan. A ɔ, “A‑a Yataa main. Mmɔ ɛ to‑a to siiya dɔ mende minan na? Mmɔ ban‑da a a min‑da a wandi da a, ɛ Yataa main‑da.
Fen bai ɛ wo da a, a fɔ koe a?” Mbɛ Chu kun ti chɛ n dɔ, “A nyin a ni fa. Koe min na mu, a yɛi mu.”
Mbɛ an‑na an da yii fu Chisɔsi ya a, dɔ n‑na a tu botani a, dɔ n sin‑na a gban fɛ gbasi.
An mbe ta‑a a fɔ‑a, an dɔ, “Kunka mansa, a ɔ yian bɛ nn na. Nyɔn mbe ka i gbasi‑a?”
Pita‑a a tun fan si koe a kata chɛ ɔ, mbɛ bɔi den musuma tɔngbɔ dɔndɔ, min ni tɛ mɔ wa chɛ 'a chenɛ a, a na‑a Pita tena. Mbɛ a ɔ, “I wɛɛ, i ni wan Chisɔsi fɛ, Kadidi mɔɛ chɛ.”
Chɛɛ Pita‑a kɔɔsa bia chɛ wan a ma, mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ ya kɔɔɛ. A ɔ, “N ma a ɔ sɔn, e ka bai min sa tena.”
A ta‑a to kata chɛ da wɛɛ a, mbɛ bɔi den musuma dɔndɔ‑a a yen to nɔ sɔ ɔ. Mbɛ a wɛɛ ɔ, “Kamin chɛ wɛɛ ni wan Chisɔsi chɛ fɛ, min ka‑a Nasaɛti duu ɔ.”
Pita‑a chɛ wɛɛ kɔɔsa bia wan, kai wandi ɔ. A ɔ, “N mbe a fɔ tena Yataa chen kɔɔ nɛ, mbɛ n ma kamin chɛ sɔn, min tɔ mu Chisɔsi.”
A ɔ ma yansan ni to, mbɛ mɔɛ miin ni ka nɔ sɔ ɔ, an bɛɛ gbɛn‑da a ma. Mbɛ an dɔ, “Mɔ dɔndɔ mu i a, min ni Chisɔsi fɛ. Nn‑na chɛ ɔ sɔn i koɔ buɛ an ma.”
Chɛɛ Pita ɔ, “Yataa ni n tɔɔya, ni n mbe ka fania an fɔ tena. N ma kamin chɛ sɔn.” Ɛ bai chɛ fɔ‑a dechee, mbɛ tɛ kɔnɛ konchee‑a.
Mbɛ a puin‑da Pita yii ma, mbɛ Chisɔsi na‑a a fɔ wan a ye, a ɔ, “Pita, tɛ kɔnɛ e na konchee, e a fɔ‑a wan yɔ i ma n sɔn, gba sawa ko a.” Chɛ‑a a ma wan, Pita bɔ‑a baa ma, mbɛ a puyɛ‑a di a.
A banda ka sayi ma, Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa n bɛn‑da an bɛ Chu gbakoo n na. Mbɛ an gbɛɛ kuiɛ bɛn‑da kaina dɔndɔɛ, mbɛ an mbe Chisɔsi fa wan.
Mbɛ an‑na a ma, mɔɛ n‑na Chisɔsi chii. Mbɛ an ta‑a a a, an‑na a ma konan Kɔfana Padeti ma, min ni kɔfana a Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ, Domi kun ti wa kɔɔ.

Mbɛ Chudasi, min‑na Chisɔsi ma tachɛ ka, a‑a a ɔ yen, an‑na kaa a tɛ buɛ min dɔ a fa koe ma. A faa yɔn‑da wan kaka, mbɛ a‑a a a tinsɔn, mbɛ a‑a koe min ma ka, a ma nyin. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, a ta‑a kain gbɛnsɛn bi sawa chɛ a, an‑na Chisɔsi san a ma min na, mbɛ a‑a a a yɛ an ma.

Ɛ kɔpɔɛ chɛ a yɛ‑a kɛn an ma, a ɔ, “N‑na ko yama an ma ka. N‑na kamin chɛ min ma tachɛ ka, a ma ko yama kan kɔ kan man ni, ɛ ka na tena fa‑a fuu.” Chɛɛ an dɔ, “I ta ɔ wan nɛ chɛ nɛnɛ a. Nn ma to ni nn ni a ɔ sɔn ɛnden bɛɛ a.”
Mbɛ Chudasi‑a kɔpɔɛ gbu a dɛ nɔ Yataa 'a chen chɛ bu ɔ. Mbɛ a ta‑a, a‑a a wandi dɛn, a fa‑a nɔ.

Chɛɛ Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa 'a, an 'na mansa chɛ n‑na kɔpɔɛ chɛ a sɔn sɔn fan. Mbɛ an dɔ, “Mmɔ 'a sawa ma dɔn ni mmɔ ni kɔpɔ bonda chɛ sa tena ɔ bɛn, kɔpɔ sa tena ɔ bɛn tena, Yataa 'a chenɛ a. Wii kɔpɔɛ an nɛ.”
Mbɛ an‑na an kun puin, an kuiɛ bɛn‑da kaina dɔndɔ, a si kɔpɔɛ chɛ ma. Mbɛ an‑na duu gboo san, min tɔ ni da nyan mɔɛ 'a duu gboo. An‑na nɔ ma bɛnkuɛ a, an ni mɔɛ n tɔn kaina, miin ni sonda n na.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, an‑na an duu gboo chɛ chee, an dɔ, wii duu gboo. Koe min na mu, a san‑da wii kɔpɔɛ an na.

Koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ma‑a, min mbe a ma, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ Chɛyimaya na‑a bai miin fɔ, an ni bɔ a a. A na‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “An kuiɛ ɛ bɛn‑da kain gbɛnsɛn bi sawa an ma, Chu mɔɛ dɔ n mbe na‑a a baa min tɛ‑a.
