An mbe na‑a an kɔpɔ gbɛnsɛn bi sawa chɛ an be‑a da nyan duu gboo chɛ sɔnkɔɛ a, yɔ Mansa Yataa na‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ n ye, an ni a ma.”
A tima chɛ a, an‑na a ma wan, Chisɔsi sɔ‑a Kɔfana Padeti chen kɔɔ. Mbɛ kɔfana chɛ‑a a ɔ tisa, a ɔ, “I wan mu Chu mɔɛ n 'na mansa a?” Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “I‑a an fɔ ka.”
Chɛɛ Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa nu, an bɛ gbakoo n na, an‑na kun sɛsɛ si a kun ma, chɛɛ a ma bai ɔ bai fɔ ni.
Chɛ‑a a ma wan, Kɔfana Padeti ɔ a ma, “Kun sɛsɛ, an mbe ka an si tena i kun ma. I gbu ee a a min tena, an mbe min fɔ tena a si i ma?”
Chɛɛ chɛ wɛɛ ɔ to, Chisɔsi ma a tɛ ni a ma gbukuu wɛɛ. Chɛ‑a Kɔfana Padeti da a fa wan gban.

San kɔ san na, kun bɔ a ɔ bɛnɛ kun ma, manda ni nɔ dɔndɔ, Kɔfana Padeti ni min na tachɛ. An ni mɔ dɔndɔ boo ka wan, min mbe sa ɔ pimbi chenɛ a, mɔ dɔndɔ kan kɔ kan, mɔ fanka chɛ ɛ a ɔ tisa min boo ka koe a.
A san chɛ a, pimbi chen na sa mɔ dɔndɔ, min tɔ ni Baabasi, a tɔɛ bɔen ni yama yama.
Fanka chɛ a kan‑da kɛn, mbɛ Kɔfana Padeti‑a an dɔ tisa, a ɔ, “Baabasi yen ko bia ɔ, an fea Chisɔsi a, an mbe min chee, an dɔ, kunka mansa. Wo toen mu n ni n boo ka mɔɛ minan na, mɔ fea chɛ n tɛ ɔ?”
Kɔfana Padeti‑a tisa chɛ chɛ, koe min na mu, a na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ toomaya an na‑a a ma, Chu n kun ti n na‑a Chisɔsi a a chen kɔɔ.

Kɔfana Padeti to‑a si ɔ tongbo kɔɔ wan bai chɛ kun ma, mbɛ a 'a musu‑a sakana a na a tena, a si Chisɔsi ma. Musu chɛ‑a a fɔ wan sakana chɛ ɔ, mbɛ Kɔfana Padeti ma a boo kan kɔ kan chɛ Chisɔsi fa koe ɔ. A ɔ, Chisɔsi mu mɔ tanden ba an na, min ma ko yama kan kɔ kan ma ni. A ɔ, a faa gbaaen ba mu, a si cho ma, a‑a min chɛ an su chɛ ɔ, a si Chisɔsi ma.

Chɛɛ Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa n yiima ni dama, an bɛ Chu gbakoo n na. An don‑da wan fanka chɛ ɔ, min mbe a ma, an ni Kɔfana Padeti ɔ tisa, a ni a boo ka Baabasi a, an ni Chisɔsi be a fa koe a.
Mbɛ Kɔfana Padeti‑a mɔ fanka chɛ ɔ tisa wan to, a ɔ, “Mɔ fea chɛ n tɛ ɔ, wo toen mu n ni n boo ka nyɔn na wo ye?” Mbɛ an dɔ, “Baabasi.”
Mbɛ Kɔfana Padeti ɔ, “Wo toen mu gbɛ n ni fen ma Chisɔsi a, an mbe min chee, an dɔ, Chasi, kunka mansa chɛ?” Mbɛ an gbɛɛ ɔ, “A ma an ni a gbangban kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma, a ni fa nɔ.”
Chɛɛ Kɔfana Padeti ɔ, “Fen ko a chɛ ɛ ma? Kamin chɛ gbu, a‑a fen ko yama ma?” Mbɛ an gbu‑a yee ma munda tɛ, an dɔ, “A ma an ni kamin chɛ gbangban kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma, a ni fa nɔ.”

Kɔfana Padeti‑a a ɔ yen, mbɛ a boo ee kun bai chɛ ma. A sin, ni a chii‑a a boo ka koe ma Chisɔsi a, mbɛ gbunɛ an mbe bɔ‑a a ɔ. A‑a chɛ ɔ yen kɛn, mbɛ a‑a yii ya, mbɛ a‑a a boo a ko, an gbɛɛ ya kɔɔ, ɛ ta‑a a fɔ‑a, a ɔ, “N boo ee kamin chɛ fa koe ɔ. Wo wan mbe a nɛnɛ ma yɛman‑da.”
Chɛɛ mɔ fanka chɛ ɔ, “Aa. A fa koe ni sɛ nn kun ma, nn bɛ nn 'na denɛ n na.”
Mbɛ Kɔfana Padeti‑a a boo ka Baabasi a an ye. Mbɛ a‑a a ma kɛn an‑na Chisɔsi boan pien, mbɛ a‑a a be, an ni a gbangban kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma, a ni fa nɔ.
Chɛ gbakɔ, mbɛ soya chɛ nu, miin ni Kɔfana Padeti kɔɔ, an don‑da Chisɔsi a kɔfana 'a kata chɛ ɔ. Mbɛ an‑na an bɔɛ tɔɛ n gbɛɛ a kan Chisɔsi 'a tindanɛ.
An na kan‑da kɛn a ma, an‑na a ta koa bɔ wan a ma, mbɛ an‑na an fandi ta doma kai yawaenɛ don a ma.

Mbɛ an yɛ‑a wan to, an‑na banfua nyan wai ɔ, mbɛ an‑na a si a kun na. An dɔ, a 'a mansa banfua an nɛ. An‑na kɔnɛ don fan a boo nyima ɔ boo a, an dɔ, a 'a tungbɔɛ an nɛ. Mbɛ an‑na an kumbai gbangban a chen kɔɔ, an mbe ta‑a a ma yɛn‑da, an dɔ, “Chu mɔɛ n 'na mansa chɛ ni mɛ.”
Mbɛ an‑na an da yii chɛ a ma. Mbɛ an yɛ‑a, an‑na tungbɔɛ chɛ bɔ a boo ɔ, mbɛ an‑na a gbasi a kun tɛ pɛɛ pɛɛ.
An ban‑da kɛn a ma yɛn‑da, an‑na doma kai chɛ bɔ a ma. Mbɛ an‑na a wandi ta doma don a ma gbɛ. Mbɛ an bɔ‑a a a, ta koe a a fa‑a kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma.

An to‑a bɔ an na Chuusaɛn duu chɛ ɔ, mbɛ an bɛn‑da kamin dɔndɔ a. Kamin chɛ tɔ ni Saimɔn. A sin, a ni ka tena Sayini duu ɔ wan, ɛ na‑a Chuusaɛn. An‑na a din fan a ma, a ni ta kɔn gbengbanden chɛ a Chisɔsi ko a.
A na‑a che wan kaina dɔndɔ, an ni min chee, an dɔ, Kɔkɔta, min fasaien mu, kun konkon ma.
Nɔ ni, mbɛ an‑na gbɛ be a ma, min dɔ basandenɛ ni gboo ɔ dumɛ bui a. Chɛɛ a‑a a sima ma fɛn kɛn, a ma dɔn ni a min koe a.
Mbɛ an‑na a gbangban kɔn gbengbanden chɛ ma nɔ. Mbɛ an yɛ‑a, an‑na chɛ fenɛ chɛ, a ma koa n ko a.

An na‑a a gbangban kɔn chɛ ma kaina dɔndɔ wan, an bɛ kanka fea chɛ n na. Dɔndɔɛ ni a boo nyima ɔ wan, dɔndɔɛ ɛ a manɛ ɔ. An‑na a nyɛn fan kɔn dɛnfɛ ma, an dɔ, Chu mɔɛ n 'na mansa an nɛ, Chisɔsi. Mbɛ an‑na a gbangban a kun ma chia a, kɔn gbengbanden chɛ ma. Yiima chɛ an na‑a a ma, an‑na Chisɔsi fa. Chɛ gbakɔ mbɛ an si‑a gbɛ, an bun‑da Chisɔsi a tɛ‑a.
Mbɛ chia a ben mɔɛ n bɛɛ, an‑na an kunɛ fichi fichi wan. Mbɛ an bun‑da a main‑da,
an dɔ, “Wua. O, i wɛn‑na a fɔ, i ɔ, e Yataa 'a chenɛ te wan, mbɛ i‑a a sɔ tee sawa tɛ. Ni Yataa 'a denɛ mu i a, puin bɛ kɔn gbengbanden chɛ ma, mbɛ i‑a i wandi kun bɔ saya yuu chɛ ɔ.”
Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa n bɛɛ, an‑na a ma yɛn ka wan. Chu sawa kan mɔɛ n bɛɛ, a basan an 'na gbakoo n na, an‑na a ma yɛn fan.

An dɔ, “A‑a mɔ dɔ mende n baun, chɛɛ a ee che a ni a wandi baun. Kamin chɛ an‑na a fɔ, a ɔ, an mu Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n 'na mansa a. Ni a wan mu a a, a ni puin bɛ kɔn gbengbanden chɛ ma sanche, min mbe a ma, nn ni dan a a.
A danden fan mu a a, mbɛ Yataa ɛ wan a fɛ tima ɔ tima ko a. Mbɛ Yataa ni a wan Chisɔsi baun bɛ sanche, sanche, ni a toen fan mu a a. Koe min na mu, a ɔ, Yataa 'a denɛ mu an na.”
An bɛ gbangban‑da ka kanka fea miin na dɔndɔ a, an bɛɛ, an‑na a main ka wan to.
Chɛ gbakɔ, tee che‑a kɛn kun tɛ, pimbi bun‑da wan chɛnyɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, aan awa sawa ko a.
Mbɛ tee kɔ kai ma, Chisɔsi‑a yee tɛ wan gbankon, mbɛ a ɔ, “N 'na Yataa, n 'na Yataa, fen mu i ban‑da n dɔ?”
Mbɛ mɔɛ dɔ nu nɔ sɔ ɔ, an‑na a a min kɛn a‑a min fɔ, mbɛ an dɔ, “Ɛ ka kai Idaicha an chee‑a, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛ suun.”
Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, an dɔndɔ‑a bui sa a a, mbɛ a ta‑a, a na‑a fen yɔfu yɔfu a. Mbɛ a‑a a chima gbɛ a, min baa nii ma gbɛ. Mbɛ a‑a a don kɔnɛ ma, a‑a a a sɛ, a ni a don Chisɔsi da a, a susu koe a.
Chɛɛ a bɔɛ tɔɛ n dɔ, “Mmɔ a ma kɔn bɛ, kɔkɔɛ Idaicha ɛ na‑a wan, a ni a kun bɔ saya yuu chɛ ɔ.”
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi‑a yee tɛ wan to gbankon, mbɛ a fa‑a.
Tɛndi ni wan dɛn dɔ Yataa 'a chen chɛ bu ɔ. Mbɛ a yen ko, chɛ ma‑a kɛn, mbɛ tɛndi chɛ tɛka‑a fea a, a ka a kandɔɛ, aan a yii denka ɔ. Mbɛ duu gboo wɛɛ samba‑a, mbɛ faa gbanɛ n tɛka tɛka‑a.
A yɛ to, kamba n bɛɛ na ka‑a wan. Mbɛ mɔɛ n na sɔ‑a, a ka saya ɔ, mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin tanden ni Yataa tena an 'na fɔɛ ɔ.
Mbɛ an bɔ‑a an kamba n dɔ. A sin, Chisɔsi 'a sɔenɛ gbakɔ a ka saya ɔ, an mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ, an ta‑a wan Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. Mɔ sɛsɛ‑a an yen fan nɔ.

Domi soya gbakoo chɛ, min ni Chisɔsi a tɛ tena, a‑a a ɔ yen min ma‑a. A 'a soya n bɛɛ, an‑na a ɔ yen fan. An‑na a ɔ yen kɛn duu gboo samba‑a, a basan koe chɛ n gbɛɛ a miin ma‑a, chiandia‑a an gboo fa wan. Mbɛ an dɔ, “Kamin chɛ ni Yataa 'a denɛ chɛndɛ chɛndɛ gbu an na.”
Musu sɛsɛ n bɛɛ ni wan nɔ, miin na‑a a sɔ Chisɔsi fɛ a ka Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ. A sin, an fan ni a deman chia sɛsɛ a. An sɔ‑a wan pɔɔ, an mbe koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ma mɛn‑da.
Musu chɛ n tɛ ɔ, bɔɔɛ Mɛi ni wan nɔ, min ka‑a Makadaa duu ɔ. Bɔɔɛ Mɛi dɔndɔɛ wɛɛ, min 'na denɛ n ni Chimisi n fea Chosɛfi a, a ni wan nɔ, a basan kai Sɛbɛdi 'a musu a.
Tee bea ma, nyan tɔ dɔndɔ na‑a, a ka duu dɔndɔ ɔ min tɔ ni Ayimatia. A tɔ ni Chosɛfi. A sin, a wɛɛ ni Chisɔsi fɛ mɔɛ dɔndɔ an na.
A ta‑a wan Kɔfana Padeti tena, mbɛ a‑a Chisɔsi su ɔ tisa a ma. Kɔfana Padeti‑a a fɔ wan soya n ye, a ɔ, an ni Chisɔsi su be Chosɛfi ma.
Mbɛ Chosɛfi‑a fen gbɛ ya, mbɛ a‑a a mendemende su chɛ a.
Mbɛ a ta‑a a a, mbɛ a‑a a tɔn a wan Chosɛfi gbu ta kamba ɔ, min sinden ni senɛ ɔ. Mbɛ a‑a faa gban ba tundun kamba chɛ da a, mbɛ a ka‑a nɔ.
A tima chɛ a, Mɛi min ka‑a Makadaa, an fea Mɛi dɔndɔɛ a, an ni nɔ wan si ɔ, kamba chɛ ya teen ma.
Tee dɔndɔɛ ma, min ni suin tee a, Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa nu, an bɛn‑da wan Kɔfana Padeti tena. Chu mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ, miin ni Fayisii n na, an ni wan an bɛn chɛ ɔ.
Mbɛ an dɔ, “Mansa, tima min na da ɔ gbaa tɔɛ chɛ ni fɔɛ ɔ, nn yii to‑a wan a ɔ, a na‑a bai min fɔ. A na‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, Yataa ɛ a kɔɔ sɔ‑a wan a ka saya ɔ, tee fea a sawan bɔɛ ma.

Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, soya n na ta a kamba chɛ ma, an ni a kun ma fɛn chɛndɛ chɛ, aan tee sawan bɔɛ ma. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, a fɛ denɛ n mbe ee na‑a che‑a an ni a su kanka. Mbɛ an yɛ‑a, an‑na fania fɔ mɔɛ n ye, mbɛ a wan Chisɔsi‑a a kɔɔ sɔ a ka saya ɔ. Fania chɛ nɛnɛ, a dankama nɛn chɛ, ɛ na‑a ben‑da a saa gbɛɛ ma.”
Mbɛ Kɔfana Padeti ɔ, “Wo soya n ya, an ni ta, an ni kamba chɛ kun ma fɛn chɛndɛ chɛ.”
Mbɛ an ta‑a, an‑na an boo gba to kamba chɛ ma chɛndɛ chɛ. Mbɛ an‑na soya n to nɔ, a kun ma fɛn koe a.
Suin tee chɛ ben‑da kɛn, mbɛ Tɛnɛ kan kɔ dɔɛ sayi ma che‑a. Mɛi min ka‑a Makadaa duu ɔ, a ta‑a wan kamba chɛ ma, an fea Mɛi dɔndɔɛ a.
A yen ko gbɛ, an tɛnɛ‑a a a, mbɛ duu gboo bun‑da samba‑a, mbɛ Mansa Yataa 'a maeka dɔndɔ wɛɛ yii‑a. Maeka chɛ‑a faa gban chɛ ka wan kamba chɛ da a, mbɛ a si‑a a kun ma.
Ɛ si ɔ kɛn nɔ, a ni man tena wan, yɔ banda manɛ, mbɛ a ma koa wɛɛ gbɛenɛ ɛ fo fo, yɔ fande funku.
Soya miin ni ka kamba chɛ kun ma fɛn‑da, an chian‑da wan a ma kaka. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, mbɛ an bea‑a duu ma, an chima‑a yɔ su.
Chɛɛ maeka chɛ‑a a fɔ wan musu chɛ n ye, a ɔ, “Wo ma chian. A mu min na, n‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ wo e wo ya a kan tena Chisɔsi an na, an‑na min gbangban kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma, a tɔn‑da kaina.
A ee nɛ. Yataa‑a a ma, a‑a a a sɔ a ka saya ɔ, yɔ a wandi na‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, mbɛ ɛ ma‑a ka wan. Wo na nɛ. Wo ni nɔ yen, a ni sa ɔ kaina min.

Mbɛ n 'na sakana bai an nɛ wo tena gbɛ. Wo yɛ gbɛ bui‑a, wo ni a fɔ a fɛ mɔɛ n ye, wo ɔ, Yataa‑a a kɔɔ sɔ a ka saya ɔ. Wo ɔ, a sin, ɛ ta tena an ya ɔ Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ, an mbe a yen‑da kaina min pɛnɛnɛ.”
Mbɛ an yɛ‑a bui chɛ bui chɛ‑a. An ta‑a, chiandia ɛ an dɔ, chɛɛ an bu ɔ ni di kaka. Mbɛ an ta‑a koe chɛ ɔ yian koe a a fɛ denɛ n na.

An mbe ta‑a bui chɛ chɛ an na, mbɛ a yen ko, an‑na Chisɔsi yen sɔ ɔ an ya ɔ. Mbɛ a‑a an kɔndɔn, a ɔ, “Wo en chɛɛ n na.” A‑a an kɔndɔn kɛn, mbɛ an bea‑a a chen na, an‑na a chen kana bia, mbɛ an‑na a fai.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ an ma, “Wo ma chian. Wo ta, wo ni a fɔ n suun ma nyɔɛ n ye, mbɛ an ni ta Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ. An mbe n yen‑da wan nɔ.”
Musu chɛ n mbe yɛ‑a, a yen ko, mbɛ soya chɛ dɔ n bɛɛ yɛ‑a duu ɔ. Mbɛ an si‑a ko ɔ ko ma, maeka chɛ‑a min ma kamba chɛ ma, an‑na a ɔ yian Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa n na.

An‑na bai chɛ a min, soya chɛ n‑na min dɔ yian. Mbɛ an‑na an kun puin fan kaina dɔndɔ, an bɛ Chu n 'na gbakoo n na. Mbɛ an‑na kɔpɔ sɛmbɛnden ya, mbɛ an‑na soya chɛ nu, miin ni kamba chɛ kun ma fɛn tena, an‑na an da a tɔn a a.
An dɔ, “Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a wo ɔ tisa, a si Chisɔsi su tuin koe ma kamba chɛ ɔ, wo‑a a fɔ dechee, mbɛ wo to‑a sa ɔ chinɔɛ ɔ wan, mbɛ a fɛ denɛ n na‑a su ɔ, mbɛ an‑na a su kanka.”
An yɛ‑a wan to, an‑na soya chɛ n too ɔ dia. An dɔ, an faa ma gbaa, ni kɔfana‑a a a min bɛɛ, mbɛ an chinɔ‑a wan. An dɔ, an mbe koɔ‑a wan a tena, min mbe a ma, ko ɔ ko ee bɔ‑a a ɔ.

Mbɛ an‑na kɔpɔɛ chɛ bia, an‑na a ma yɔ a fɔ‑a buɛ min dɔ an ye. A ka gbɛ a tima chɛ ma, a che gboo chɛ nyɛn tima ma, Chu mɔɛ n mbe bai dɔndɔ gbe chɛ an dɔ yian. Mbɛ Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ n fan na‑a a su kanka, a bɔ kamba ɔ.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi fɛ den tan kun ma dɔndɔɛ miin to‑a ka, an ta‑a Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ. An ta‑a wan kɔnkɔɛ dɔndɔ ɔ, Chisɔsi na‑a a fɔ an ye, an ni ta kaina.
Kɔnkɔɛ chɛ ɔ ni, mbɛ an‑na Chisɔsi yen. A na‑a an tan kɛn, mbɛ an bea‑a a chen na, mbɛ an‑na a fai. Chɛɛ an dɔ nu, an nii ma dan ni a a chɛndɛ chɛ ni an nɛ.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi gbɛn‑da an ma, mbɛ a ɔ, “Fa min mbe banda bu ɔ, a‑a gbasaya gbɛɛ be n ma, fen fen kan kɔ kan kun ma, banda bu ɔ a basan dunya chɛ ma a.
Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo ta mɔɛ n gbɛɛ tena dunya chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, mbɛ wo‑a an ma n fɛ denɛ n na. Wo ni yɛ, wo ni yii chɛ an kunɛ ɔ Fa Yataa tɔɛ ɔ, n tɔɛ ɔ, a basan Yataa Nyina tɔɛ ɔ a.
A sin, wo ni mɔɛ n kan sawa chɛ n gbɛɛ bia koe a, n na‑a miin be wo ma. Wo sin ni dan to a a, mbɛ n mbe ma‑a wan wo fɛ tima ɔ tima, aan dunya chɛ ni ban bɛɛ.”
Sakana bai chɛndɛ kuu sɔɛ an nɛ, a si Chisɔsi Chasi ma, Yataa 'a denɛ.
Ɛ wan yɔ Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ Aisaya‑a min fɔ. A na‑a a nyɛn fan suun a 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, mbɛ Yataa ɔ te a 'a denɛ ma, a ɔ, a yen ko, ɛ a 'a dɛya sɔ tena wan a ya ɔ, min mbe dɔbɛnɛ chɛ‑a a ko a.
Aisaya‑a a nyɛn fan to, a ɔ, “Mɔɛ yen ko gbonka chɛ‑a fuinɛ ma, a ɔ, mɔɛ n ni tan Yataa tena. A ɔ, an ni an fandi n dɔ bɛn Mansa Yataa ya ɔ, yɔ an mbe chia ɔ bɛn buɛ min dɔ an 'na mansa n ya ɔ.”

Chɛ ko a, mɔɛ na‑a wan fuinɛ ma, min tɔ ni Chɔn. A bun‑da yii chɛ‑a mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a. A ni yɛ wan to, a ɛ Yataa bai ɔ yian mɔɛ n na. A ɔ, an ni an kan kɔ sɔ an 'na ko yama n na, a ɔ, mbɛ a‑a yii chɛ an kunɛ ɔ, Yataa ni a boo bɔ an 'na ko yama n dɔ.

A sin, mɔɛ n gbɛɛ ni ka wan Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, an mbe ka duu tɔɛ n dɔ, Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ. An ni na wan, mbɛ an‑na Chɔn tan. An ni dɔn fan ko yama n ma, an na‑a miin ma. Chɔn ni yii chɛ wan an kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, Chɔdan yii ɔ.
Chɔn ma chii ni koa min na, a nyanden ni soe ti an na. A bu tɛ chiienɛ ni soe gboo an na. A 'a daun fenɛ sin ni kondonɛ an na, a basan kumin tuu a.
Chɔn ni a fɔ wan mɔɛ chɛ n ye, a ɔ, “Kai min mbe na tena, n gbaa chia a, a 'a gbasaya benden mu n ta ma. A mɔ ma n na, n ni n ma bun, a 'a kɔɔwa yuu gbu wɛɛ fuin koe a.
N tana, n mbe yii an chɛ wo kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a. Chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ min mbe na‑a, ɛ Yataa Nyina an na yii‑a, ma koe a wo fɛ.”
A tima chɛ a, a ɔ nii ma yansan ni, mbɛ Chisɔsi na‑a, a ka Nasaɛti duu ɔ, Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ. A‑a Chɔn tan, mbɛ a‑a yii chɛ wan Chisɔsi kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, Chɔdan yii ɔ.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi bun‑da bɔ‑a yii chɛ ɔ, a sɛ tindi ma. Chɛ ɛ ma‑a dechee, mbɛ a‑a banda yen, a da a ka‑a dɔndɔ a. Ɛ ta ta‑a Yataa Nyina yen‑da yii‑a a kun ma, yɔ bugbɔɛ, mbɛ a si‑a a kun ma.
Mbɛ kuiɛ a min‑da gbankon, a ka banda bu ɔ. A ɔ, “I mu n 'na denɛ an na, min ko a di n ye kaka. N faa chimaen mu i ko a.”
Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, Yataa Nyina chɛ‑a Chisɔsi ya, a ta‑a a a fuinɛ ma.
Chisɔsi ni nɔ wan, tee bi naanin ko a, Sitana ɛ a yiima yan‑da, ni ɛ ko yama ma‑a wan. Chisɔsi ni nɔ soe yama n fan tɛ, maeka n mbe basan‑da a ma.
Mbɛ an‑na Chɔn sa pimbi chenɛ a. Chɛ gbakɔ, Chisɔsi ta‑a Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ, Yataa 'a sakana bai chɛndɛ sa koe a mɔɛ n tena.
A‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “Tima gbu che‑a gbɛ. Ɛnden fan to‑a gbɛ, Yataa ni a 'a mansaya ɔ yian. Wo wo kan kɔ sɔ, wo 'a ko yama n na, wo ni dan sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a.”
Tee dɔndɔ a, Chisɔsi to‑a tachɛ an na, Kadidi yii wa fɛ, mbɛ a‑a kamin fea n yen, nyɛ gbainɛ a. Saimɔn ni ma, an fea a dɔɛ Anduu a, an mbe an 'na yaa a dɛ‑a yii ɔ.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ an ma, “Wo bea n fɛ. N ni wo kan, wo e kun buɛ min dɔ, wo ni na mɔɛ n na n tena, yɔ wo e nyɛ gbain buɛ min dɔ.”
A ya kɔɔɛ a, an‑na an boo ka nyɛ gbain yaa chɛ n na, mbɛ an bea‑a Chisɔsi fɛ.
A sɛ‑a ɛnden fan na, yii chɛ a sanɛ, mbɛ a‑a kai Sɛbɛdi 'a den kaima fea n tan. Chimisi ni ma, an fea a dɔɛ Chɔn na, an mbe dɛndɛ ɔ, an 'na nyɛ gbain yaa, an mbe an dɔ bɛn‑da.
Chisɔsi‑a an yen kɛn dechee, mbɛ a‑a an bɛɛ chee. Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, an fa Sɛbɛdi, a basan a 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ n na, a 'a den chɛ n‑na an to an dɛndɛ ɔ, mbɛ an bea‑a Chisɔsi fɛ, an ta‑a.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi na‑a Kapanaun duu ɔ, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na. A sin, Chu n 'na suin tee che‑a kɛn, Chisɔsi ta‑a wan an 'na samun chɛ chenɛ a. Mbɛ a bun‑da mɔɛ n kan‑da nɔ, Yataa koe ma.
A‑a miin kan ka, an da ɔ gbaa‑a wan, a 'a kan chɛ buɛ a. A ta kanɛ, gbasaya wa, an ni a ɔ, a ben mɔɛ chɛ n ma, miin ni Chu n 'na sawa kan.
Yatina, kaminɛ ni wan nɔ, an 'na samun chɛ chen chɛ a, nyina yama ni min fɛ. Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, a‑a yee tɛ,
a ɔ, “Chisɔsi, Nasaɛti mɔɛ, i ma nn tɔɔ. I na‑a nn kasaa koe an na? N‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, i mu mɔɛ min na. I wan mu mɔɛ a tenchen, Yataa‑a min sɔ, a 'a wai chɛ koe a.”
Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ wan nyina yama chɛ ma, a ɔ, “I da a tɔn, i ni ka kamin chɛ fɛ!”
Nyina yama chɛ‑a kamin chɛ bondan fan gbasaya a, a‑a yee wa tɛ, mbɛ a ka‑a a fɛ.

Mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ ni nɔ, an da ɔ gbaa‑a wan. An bun‑da a fɔ‑a, an nyɔn ye, an dɔ, “Fen koe e nɛ? Kan chɛ buɛ nama an nɛ. Ɛ a fɔ wan nyina yama n bɛɛ ye, an mbe koe min ma. An sin, a 'a gbasaya chɛ, an mbe a ya wan.”
Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, Chisɔsi ma tɔɛ ta‑a wan kan kɔ kan Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi bɔ‑a Chu n 'na samun chɛ chen chɛ a, an bɛ Chimisi a, ni Chɔn, a basan a fɛ denɛ tɔɛ n na. Mbɛ an ta‑a dɔndɔ gbe, Saimɔn n 'na chenɛ a, an fea a dɔɛ Anduu a.
Mbɛ an‑na a tan, Saimɔn bian musu ɛ sa ɔ sofa a, chima bɔndenɛ ɛ a ma. Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, an‑na a ɔ yian Chisɔsi a.
Mbɛ a ta‑a musu chɛ tena, a‑a a bia a boo ma, mbɛ a basan‑da a ma, a kɔɔ sɔ koe a. Mbɛ chima gbu bɔ‑a a ɔ, a bun‑da tawa chɛ‑a an ye.
A duina chɛ, tee beaenɛ gbakɔ, mɔɛ n na‑a wan gbandi mɔɛ n na Chisɔsi tena. An na‑a wan chɛ n bɛɛ a, nyina yama ni miin fɛ.
Mbɛ mɔɛ n gbɛɛ Kapanaun duu chɛ ɔ, an na kan‑da wan a ma chen da a.
Chisɔsi‑a mɔɛ n baun fan gbandi sɛsɛ n dɔ. A‑a nyina yama n gbain fan, mɔ sɛsɛ n fɛ. A sin, a ee dɔn, nyina yama chɛ n ni koɔ, koe min na mu, an‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mɔɛ min sima mu a a.
Sayi ma pimbi ɔ, Chisɔsi‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, mbɛ a bɔ‑a chenɛ a. Mbɛ a‑a duu boo ka, a ta‑a, mɔ ɔ mɔ nii kaina min, mbɛ a‑a samunɛ chɛ.
Chɛɛ Saimɔn bɛ a bɔɛ n na, an ta‑a wan ben‑da an ya a kan‑da Chisɔsi a.
An sin‑na a yen kɛn, an dɔ, “Mɔɛ n gbɛɛ, an mbe ka i wan yan‑da.”
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ an ma, “Mmɔ ka nɛ, mmɔ ni ta duu tɔɛ n dɔ ben‑da, min mbe a ma, n ni Yataa 'a sakana bai sa an bɛɛ ɔ. Koe min na mu, n na‑a wai chɛ an chɛ koe a.”
Mbɛ an ben ben‑da Kadidi chɛnyɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, ɛ ta‑a Yataa 'a bai sa‑a Chu n 'na samun chɛ chenɛ n na, a basan nyina yama n gbainɛ a, mɔɛ n fɛ.
Tima dɔndɔ a, mɔ kaima dɔndɔ na‑a wan Chisɔsi tena, gbandi yama bɔen ni min gboo gbɛɛ ma. Mbɛ a‑a a kumbai gbangban, Chisɔsi chen kɔɔ, disa ɔ, a ɔ, “Fa, ni a a di i ye, e kun fan i ni n baun.”
Chinchincha‑a Chisɔsi gboo fa wan gban. Mbɛ a‑a a boo a ta, mbɛ a tu‑a kamin chɛ a. A ɔ, “A a di n ye, i ni bauncha ma sɔn. Baun gbɛ gbandi chɛ ɔ.”
Mɔ kaima chɛ gboo gbongbon‑da wan, a baun‑da a ya kɔɔɛ a.

Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a dasi gbau gbau be a ma, a ɔ, “I too ma sɔ. I ma koe chɛ ɔ yian mɔ ɔ mɔ a. Chɛɛ ta dɔndɔ gbe mɔɛ chɛ tena, min mbe mmɔ tɛ ɔ, Yataa a, a ni i ma mɛn. Mbɛ min mbe a ma, mɔɛ gbɛɛ ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ i baun‑da, i ni yasi chɛ bɔ, min mbe sawa chɛ ɔ, min be‑a Mosisi ma.” Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a ma, kamin chɛ ta‑a.

Chɛɛ a ta‑a kɛn dechee, a bun‑da koɔ‑a boo ka boo ka, a‑a a ɔ yian kan kɔ kan. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, Chisɔsi nii che to bɔ‑a ya a ma, duu kan kɔ kan dɔ, fanka fanka ma chianɛ ko a. Chɛɛ a ni gbɛ ben‑da tanda n fan dɔ, mɔ ee kaina. Chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, mɔɛ n ni bɔ wan kan kɔ kan, an mbe na a tan.
Tee kuunden gbakɔ, Chisɔsi yɛ‑a to Kapanaun duu ɔ. Mbɛ sakana kuiɛ a fasan‑da a ɔ gbɛɛ ɛ, mbɛ ɛ chenɛ a.
Mbɛ mɔ sɛsɛ n na sɔn‑da wan a ma, kaina nii to chenɛ bu ɔ, a basan pɛsa wɛɛ a, mɔɛ n ko a. A sin, a ni wan sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian‑da an na.
Mbɛ mɔ kaima naaninɛ nu, an bɔ‑a a a, an mbe na‑a kaminɛ a Chisɔsi tena, a namaaenɛ ɛ.

Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, an nii che na‑a kamin chɛ a Chisɔsi tena. Koe min na mu, mɔ fanka da a ni koo. Mbɛ an sɛ‑a chenɛ gbu kun ma, mbɛ an‑na kaina ɛnden ma ka, Chisɔsi kun ma chia a. An ban‑da kɛn chen chɛ ma ka‑a, an kaina chɛ, mbɛ an‑na kamin chɛ a yii nɔ, sa ɔ yaa ɔ, an na‑a a a min dɔ.
Chisɔsi‑a a ɔ yen kɛn, danaya wa min ni mɔɛ chɛ n dɔ, a ko a, mbɛ a koɔ‑a namaa chɛ tena. A ɔ, “N 'na den, n‑na n boo bɔ i 'a ko yama n dɔ.”
Mbɛ Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ chɛ dɔ nu, miin ni nɔ si ɔ, an bun‑da an yii na chii‑a, bai chɛ ma.
An dɔ, “Fen ko a mu, mɔ bonda chɛ ɛ bai chɛ sima fɔ‑a? Ɛ ka baa an bɔ tena Yataa ma. Yataa dɔndɔ gbe, an mbe che a boo bɔ‑a mɔ gbu 'a ko yama n dɔ, chɛɛ mɔ gbu ma.”
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, a ya kɔɔɛ a, koe min ni tachɛ tena an yiima ɔ. Chɛ ko a, a ɔ an ma, “Wo sɛmbɛ wo yii na chii koe a ka.
A ɔ ma gbɛ a fɔ koe a namaa chɛ ye, mbɛ n‑na n boo bɔ a 'a ko yama ɔ. Chɛɛ a ɔ gbɛ wan a ma koe a, a ni a kɔɔ sɔ, a ni a 'a yaa ya, a ni tachɛ chɛ.
N mbe a ɔ yian‑da wan wo a gbɛ sanche, mbɛ n fan, Mɔ gbu 'a Denɛ, gbasaya ɛ wan n boo ɔ, dunya chɛ ɔ, n boo bɔ koe a mɔɛ n 'na ko yama n dɔ.” Mbɛ a koɔ‑a ka wan namaa chɛ tena,
A ɔ, “I wan, n mbe a fɔ tena i ye, mbɛ i ni i kɔɔ sɔ, i ni i 'a yaa ya, i ni ta i 'a chenɛ a.”

A ya kɔɔɛ a, an gbɛɛ ya to‑a ka wan kamin chɛ a, a‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, a‑a a 'a yaa ya, mbɛ a ta‑a gbae. An gbɛɛ da ɔ gbaa‑a wan gbechee, mbɛ an‑na Yataa tando. An dɔ, “Nn ma koe ɔ yen nin bɛ, yɔ chɛ nyɔn sima.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi bɔ‑a duu chɛ ɔ, mbɛ a yɛ‑a to Kadidi yii wa fɛ. Mɔ fanka na‑a wan a tena, mbɛ a‑a a kuu sɔ an kan‑da Yataa wakoe ma.
A to‑a tachɛ chɛ an na, mbɛ a‑a pawa bia mɔ dɔndɔ yen, an ni min chee Difai, Afiɔsi 'a denɛ. A ni si ɔ a 'a wai chɛ tena wan. Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ te a ma, “Bea n fɛ.” Mbɛ a‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, a bea‑a a fɛ.

Chɛ gbakɔ, Chisɔsi n ni wan si ɔ daun chɛ tena, Difai 'a chenɛ a. A tima chɛ a, pawa kain mɔ sɛsɛ nu, a basan mɔ dɔ mende n bɛɛ a, miin nii sɔ ɔ Yataa 'a chia ma, an gbɛɛ ni wan Chisɔsi fɛ. An sin, a sɛsɛ na‑a wan, an bun‑da daunɛ chɛ‑a an bɛ Chisɔsi a, a basan a fɛ denɛ n na.

Mbɛ Fayisii mɔɛ chɛ dɔ nu, miin ni sawa kan min be‑a Mosisi ma, an ni wan nɔ. An na‑a Chisɔsi yen fan daunɛ chɛ‑a, an bɛ mɔɛ n na, miin nii sɔ ɔ Yataa chia ma, a basan pawa kain mɔɛ chɛ n na. Mbɛ an dɔ a fɛ denɛ n ma, an dɔ, “Kai chɛ nii daunɛ chɛ ɛnden bɛɛ a, an bɛ mɔ bonda chɛ n na.”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a min kɛn, an ni min fɔ tena, mbɛ a ɔ, “Danda chɛ mɔ ma gbɔsɔ ee gboo ɔ bɔ tɔ ma, mɔɔ dechee chɛ nu, miin gbandien mu. Chɛ an fɛ mu, mɔɛ miin mu mɔ tandenɛ n na Yataa tena, n ma na ni an fan ko a. Chɛɛ mɔɛ miin mbe ee sɔ ɔ Yataa 'a chia ma, n na‑a an fan ko a.”

Tima dɔndɔ a, Chɔn, min ni yii chɛ mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, a fɛ mɔɛ n ni wan sun bia a. Mbɛ Fayisii mɔɛ chɛ nu, an na‑a a tena, an dɔ, “Chɔn fɛ denɛ n mbe sunɛ bia wan tima ɔ tima, mbɛ an‑na samunɛ chɛ. Nn fan Fayisii n bɛɛ, nn fɛ denɛ n bɛɛ mbe a ma ka wan. Chɛɛ i ta fɛ denɛ n mbe daunɛ an chɛ tun, an mbe ee sun bia. Fen ko a mu, an mbe chɛ ma tena?”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ni mɔɛ‑a musu si bɛnɛ chee, mbɛ a bɔɛ n na kan‑da, daun chɛ koe a mu. An mbe ee to nɔ a chen kɔɔ, an ni kɔnkɔɛ a dɛ an fandi ma. Tima min na wɛ musu si kai chɛ ɛ nɔ, mɔɛ chɛ n mbe kun fan, an ni daunɛ chɛ, an mbe ee to nɔ, an ni sunɛ bia.
Chɛɛ tima ɛ che‑a wan, tima min na mɔɛ n mbe musu si kai chɛ ya‑a an tɛ, a tima a mu an mbe sunɛ bia‑a.”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a tai tɛ wan an tena, a ɔ, “Mɔ ɔ mɔ ee che, i ni doma nama tɛ a a, doma kɔma dombo koe a. Ni mɔɛ‑a chɛ ma, a gba ma ee nyan‑da. Koe min na mu, woe an mbe to‑a doma nama chɛ ɔ, a koaen ba a.

A yɛ to, ni mɔ ma‑a gbɛ chɛ‑a gbɛ chɛ soe gboo ɔ, e a chɛ tena soe gboo nama an dɔ, ɛ to kaina aan a a ni kɔɔ. Chɛɛ mɔ ee gbɛ nama chɛ gbɛ chɛ soe gboo kɔma ɔ, a a kɔɔ koe a, ɛ a te wan, mbɛ i fo‑a gbɛ a, a basan soe gboo a. Mɔɛ ɛ min ma, e gbɛ nama chɛ soe gboo nama an dɔ.”
Chu mɔɛ n 'na suin tee dɔndɔ ma, Chisɔsi ni ben tena wan chia a sɛnɛ dɔndɔ tɛtɛ ma, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na. Mbɛ a fɛ denɛ n bun‑da sɛnɛ chɛ ɔ, chin fenɛ tɛ‑a an boo a.
Mbɛ Fayisii chɛ nu, an dɔ, “A yen bɛ, i fɛ denɛ n mbe koe min ma tena, a ma nyin. Mmɔ 'a sawa ma dɔn ni chɛ ma, suin tee ma.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ɛ wan n yii ma, mbɛ wo‑a a kan fan Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, Mansa Defidi na‑a koe ma wan tima dɔndɔ a. Kɔnkɔɛ na‑a a bia wan tima dɔndɔ a, an bɛ a fɛ mɔɛ n na.

Mbɛ a don‑da wan Yataa 'a chenɛ a, mbɛ biidi chɛ min been ni Yataa ma, a‑a a ya, mbɛ a‑a a daun. A yɛ‑a wan to, mbɛ a‑a a tɔɛ be a fɛ mɔɛ n ma. A na‑a mmɔ 'a sawa an yɔn ka, a mu min na, mmɔ 'a sawa na‑a a fɔ wan, mbɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ ee an biidi chɛ daun, mɔɔ dechee mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin mbe mmɔ tɛ ɔ Yataa a. Chɛɛ chɛ na‑a ma wan, tima min na Abiata ni Chu n 'na tɛ mɔ wa a, Yataa tena.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi danka‑a gbɛ min fɔ‑a an ye, a ɔ, “Suin tee chɛ, a bɔ‑a mɔ gbu an ko a, chɛɛ mɔ gbu an ma bɔ ni suin tee ko a.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a denɛ, n fan mu mansa a suin tee wɛɛ ko a.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi yɛ‑a to Chu n 'na samun chɛ chenɛ a. A na‑a kaminɛ tan fan nɔ, min boo faenɛ ni a ma.
Mɔɛ dɔ n ni wan nɔ, miin toen ni an ni Chisɔsi bia a chen kɔ. An ni wan gbɛ a ma fɛn‑da, a ɔ yen koe a, ni ɛ kamin chɛ a baun‑da wan, suin tee wɛɛ ma.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ kamin chɛ ye, min boo chɛ faen ni ka a ma, a ɔ, “I a sɔ, i ni na sɔ mɔɛ gbɛɛ ya kɔɔ.” Mbɛ a na‑a, a sɔ‑a an ya kɔɔ.

Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “A nyin fan mmɔ ni a ɔ sɔn, mmɔ 'a sawa dɔnden mu fen ma suin tee ma. Mmɔ 'a sawa dɔnden fan mu mɔ ni mɔɛ baun, a ben a fa koe ma. Mmɔ 'a sawa dɔnden fan mu to mɔ ni ko chɛndɛ ma, a ben ko yama ma koe ma.” Chɛɛ an ma bai fɔ ni, a si chɛ ma.

Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a an gbɛɛ ya kɔɔɛ ma fɛn dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a a 'a tindanɛ. A faa tɛenɛ ɛ an ma, a yɛ to, ɛ faamɔnɛ ɔ, a si an 'na faa a kɔɔɛ ma. Mbɛ a ɔ kamin chɛ ma, “I boo ɔ tan.” Mbɛ a‑a a boo ɔ sawan, mbɛ a boo baun‑da, yɔ a dɔndɔɛ ni buɛ min dɔ.
Mbɛ Fayisii chɛ n bɔ‑a baa ma. Mbɛ an bɛ mɔɛ chɛ n na, miin ni Mansa Ɛdɔdi 'a mɔɛ n na, an bun‑da an kun puin‑da kaina dɔndɔɛ, an mbe ma buɛ min dɔ, an ni Chisɔsi fa.
Chisɔsi ta‑a wan Kadidi yii wa fɛ, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na. A sin, mɔ fanka wa bea‑a wan to nɔ a fɛ. Mɔɛ chɛ n na‑a ka Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ wan, a basan Chudia a.

A yɛ to, an ka‑a wan Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, an ka‑a Idumia tanda ɔ, an ka‑a tee bɔ tena, Chɔdan yii tɔnfɛ dɔndɔɛ, mbɛ an ka‑a to Taya duu wa a a tindanɛ, a basan Sidon duu wa a. Mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ na‑a wan Chisɔsi tena. Koe min na mu, an na‑a koe n na min fan, a ni miin ma tena.
Fanka wa min na‑a ka, a na‑a a ma wan, Chisɔsi‑a a yii na chii a ma ta koe a, an ma na tindi tindi a ma. Mbɛ a ɔ, a fɛ denɛ n ni dɛndɛ ɔ bɛn, a ko a.
A mu min na, a na‑a mɔ sɛsɛ n baun fan an 'na gbandi n dɔ. Chɛ na‑a a ma wan gbɛ, gbandi mɔɛ tɔɛ n gbɛɛ, an ni wan gbɛ an fandi fɔkɔ fɔkɔ‑a, fanka chɛ ɔ, tu koe a Chisɔsi a.
A sin, nyina yama ni ka miin gbɛɛ fɛ, ni an na‑a Chisɔsi yen dechee, an ni bea wan a chen kɔɔ, an mbe yee tɛ. An dɔ, “Yataa 'a denɛ mu i a!”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a dasi gbau gbau be nyina yama chɛ n ma. A ɔ, an ma a fɔ mɔ ɔ mɔ ye, mɔɛ min sima mu a a.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi sɛ‑a kɔnkɔɛ ɔ. A to‑a nɔ wan, a‑a mɔ kaima chɛ n chee, a toen ni miin na, bea koe a a fɛ. Mbɛ an gbɛɛ na‑a a tena.
Mbɛ a‑a an mɔ tan kun ma fea n ya, a‑a an chee a 'a sɔ mɔɛ n na. Mbɛ a ɔ, a‑a an ya, an bɛ ni ma. A ɔ, a sin mbe an sɔ‑a wan, a ɔ, an ni ta mɔɛ n kan, a si Yataa ma.
A sin to, a ɔ, ɛ gbasaya be‑a wan an ma, nyina yama n gbain koe a mɔɛ n fɛ.

Chisɔsi na‑a mɔ tan kun ma fea miin ya, ma koe a a fɛ, an fan nii nɛ. Saimɔn ni ma, Chimisi, ni a dɔɛ Chɔn. Anduu n fea Fiipi a, ni Batɔɔmiu. Matiu ni Tɔmɔsi. A yɛ to, Chimisi dɔndɔɛ wɛɛ, ni Tadayɔsi. Saimɔn dɔndɔɛ wɛɛ, ni Chudasi Isikayɔti. Saimɔn saa saa, a‑a min ya, a‑a tɔ dɔ gbɛɛ be wan a ma, a ɔ, Pita. Chimisi ni a dɔɛ Chɔn, an fa tɔ ni Sɛbɛdi. Chisɔsi‑a an bɛɛ tɔɛ si wan, a ɔ, banda mɛn kaminɛ nu. (Koe min na mu, an ni kosan koɔ‑a kaka). Chimisi dɔndɔɛ fa tɔ ni Afiɔsi. Saimɔn dɔndɔɛ wɛɛ ni mɔɛ an na, min ni a 'a chɛnyɛ ma chɛɛ chɛ tena. Chudasi Isikayɔti tana, an na‑a danka Chisɔsi ma tachɛ‑a.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi yɛ‑a chenɛ a, a yiaenɛ ni kaina min. Nɔ wɛɛ to, fanka fanka wa koa‑a wan an ma. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na, tima nii nɔ daun chɛ koe a.
Chisɔsi waa mɔɛ n‑na chɛ a min, mbɛ tima ee a boo ɔ, daun chɛ koe a. An ta‑a wan, a ka an baa a, a bia koe a, gbasaya a. Koe min na mu, mɔɛ dɔ n ni a fɔ tena wan, an dɔ, a woo‑a.

Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ chɛ dɔ nu, an ni wan nɔ, a ka Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. An ni wan a fɔ‑a, an dɔ, “Nyina yama n 'na mansa chɛ, min tɔ mu Bɛɛsɛbu, an mbe a fɛ. A sin to, an mbe ka gbasaya chɛ be tena a ma, nyina yama n gbain koe a mɔɛ n fɛ.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a an chee, a koɔ‑a an tena, tai ɔ. A ɔ, “Sitana ee a wandi gbain, mɔɛ n fɛ.
Ni chɛɛ ma‑a mɔɛ n tɛ chɛnyɛ kan kɔ kan dɔ, an chɛnyɛ chɛ ɛ yɔn fan.
Suunɛ wɛɛ ɛ ka wan, koɛ ɛ a yɔn fan. A yɛ to, ni koɛ ma‑a suun chen kan kɔ kan da a, an suun chɛ ee che sɔ‑a.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, ni Sitana fɛ mɔɛ n bɛɛ n dɔ du‑a koɛ ɔ, mbɛ a bea‑a, a wandi gbu 'a mansaya danka che‑a.”
A ɔ, “Tea gbu sin ko a, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee don ka dechee kamin gbasayaen ba a chenɛ a, i ni a 'a feanka n punka. Ni a chiienɛ an ma‑a, mbɛ a boo fenɛ n mbe che wan punka‑a, a 'a chenɛ a.”
A ɔ, “N ni chɛ ma din wo tena, mbɛ Yataa ɛ mɔɛ n to‑a wan nɔ, an 'na ko yama n ko a, a basan main chɛ n na, an mbe miin chɛ n na.
Chɛɛ ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a Yataa Nyina main, Yataa ee a boo bɔ‑a a mɔ sima chɛ 'a main chɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ a mɔɛ chɛ‑a ko yama ma, kuɔ fɔ ko a.”
Chisɔsi na‑a chɛ fɔ, a tɛ‑a bai chɛ an ma, mɔɛ dɔ n ni min fɔ tena. An dɔ, “Nyina yama, an mbe mɔna chɛ fɛ.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi de na‑a a tena, an bɛ a dɔ kaima n na. An sɔ‑a baa ma, mbɛ an‑na mɔɛ a ta, a chee‑a.
Mɔ fanka ni wan si ɔ, Chisɔsi 'a tindanɛ. Mbɛ an dɔ, “A yen ko, i de ni ma, ni i dɔ kaima nu, an bɛ i dɔ musuma n na, an mbe baa ma sɔ ɔ, an toen mu an ni i yen.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo a fɔ n ye, n de mu mɔɛ min na. A yɛ to, ni n suun ma nyɔɛ mu miin na.”
Mbɛ a‑a mɔɛ n ma fɛn, miin ni ka si ɔ a 'a tindanɛ. Mbɛ a ɔ, “Wo yen bɛ, n de yen ko nɛ, a basan n suun ma nyɔɛ n na.
Mɔ ɔ mɔ, min mbe Yataa faa chima koe ma‑a, n de an nɛ, n dɔ musuma an nɛ, n dɔ kaima an nɛ.”

Mbɛ tima dɔndɔ a, Chisɔsi‑a a kuu sɔ to mɔɛ n kan‑da, Kadidi yii wa fɛ. Mɔɛ miin na sɔn‑da a ma, an kɔ ni koo. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, a sɛ‑a dɛndɛ ɔ, mbɛ a si‑a nɔ. Dɛndɛ chɛ ni si ɔ yii an na, mɔ fanka chɛ n gbɛɛ sin to‑a tindi ma.
A‑a an kan fan ko sɛsɛ ma, tai n dɔ. A‑a a fɔ wan an ye, a ɔ,
“Wo wo too ma sɔ! Tee dɔndɔ a, kamin dɔndɔ ta‑a wan a 'a sɛnɛ ɔ chin fen fasi tena.

Ɛ a fasi chɛ an na, mbɛ dɔ bea‑a chia kuu a. Mbɛ dɔ n bɛɛ bea‑a faa gban duu gboo ma, dɔ n yɛ‑a an bea‑a wai duu gboo ma, mbɛ dɔ n sin bea‑a duu gboo chɛndɛ ma. Chin fen kuu miin bea‑a ka chia kuu a, konde n‑na an sogban sogban fan. Miin sin bea‑a ka faa gban duu gboo chɛ ma, an tana, an fɛn‑da wan bui chɛ wandi a, a mu min na, fii sima ni wan nɔ. Chɛɛ tee winɛ ma kun ni an dɔ, an gbaa‑a wan, koe min na mu, an suu nii ma yii ni chɛndɛ duu gboo ɔ. Miin sin bea‑a ka wai duu gboo chɛ ma, an bɛɛ fɛn‑da wan, a basan wai chɛ a dɔndɔ a, chɛɛ wai chɛ n koa‑a wan a ben chin fen chɛ n ma. Chɛ‑a chin fen fɛn chɛ n na kɔnya wan, mbɛ an gbaa‑a. Miin bea‑a ka duu gboo chɛndɛ chɛ ma, a danka a, an gbɔ‑a wan wɔsɔkɔɔ. Dɔ n gbaa ni wan an kansanɛ ma bi sawa, bi wɔdɔ, ni chɛmɛ sɛsɛ.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo wɛn too ɛ koe a min, wo chɛ a min.”
Chisɔsi dɔndɔ gbe to‑a kɛn, mbɛ mɔɛ miin ni ka a 'a tindanɛ, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na, an‑na a ɔ tisa. An dɔ, a ni a ɔ yian an na, tai chɛ n fasai buɛ.
Mbɛ a ɔ an ma, “Mɔɛ gbɛɛ nii ma min dɔ sɔn tee a si Yataa 'a mansaya ma, a‑a an dɔ yian wo a. Chɛɛ mɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ nu, mmɔ bɛ ma miin na, n mbe koɔ an tena tai an dɔ.

Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, yɔ a nyɛnden mu buɛ min dɔ Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ ‘an ya a kaenɛ ɛ ma‑a wan, an ni kaina fɛn, chɛɛ an mbe ee ko ɔ ko ɔ yen‑da. Mbɛ an mbe an too ma sɔ‑a wan, chɛɛ an mbe ee ko ɔ ko ɔ gbɛ‑a. Ni chɛ ma, kɔkɔɛ an mbe na‑a an ya a mun‑da wan Yataa ma, mbɛ a‑a a boo bɔ an 'na ko yama n dɔ.’ ”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ an ma, “A ni nyan fan gbu, wo ni tai chɛ ɔ gbɛ. Ni wo ma tai chɛ ɔ gbɛ ni, wo e ma ka ma gbɛ, wo ni tai dɔ mende ɔ gbɛ?
Chin fen fasi mɔɛ chɛ, a na‑a Yataa 'a sakana bai an fasi ka.
Mɔɛ dɔ n mbe wan yɔ chia kuu 'a duu gboo chɛ, chin fen kuu n bea‑a min ma. Ni an‑na Yataa 'a sakana bai a min, mbɛ Sitana ɛ na wan a ya kɔɔɛ a, mbɛ a‑a bai chɛ bɔ an yiima ɔ, a ta‑a a a.
Mɔɛ dɔ n sin mbe wan yɔ faa gban duu gboo chɛ, chin fen kuu n bea‑a min ma. Ni an‑na sakana bai chɛ a min, an mbe an boo si wan a kɔɔ, buɔdia wandi gbu a, a ya kɔɔɛ a.

Chɛɛ Yataa 'a bai chɛ ee si an yiima ɔ, tima ɔ yansama ko a. An mbe dan dechee a a tima kundu ɛnden fan ko a. Ni an‑na ko ma gbaaenɛ sa an ma dechee, sakana bai chɛ wako a, an mbe an boo bɔ wan a kɔɔ.
Mɔɛ dɔ n sin mbe wan nɔ yɔ wai duu gboo chɛ, chin fen kuu chɛ n bea‑a ka min ma. An mbe sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a min fan.
Chɛɛ dunya chɛ ɔ faagbaa, a basan faagbaa a si an mbe ma buɛ min dɔ an ni nyan, a basan faagbaa tɔɛ gbɛɛ a, an mbe sakana bai chɛ kɔ din fan, fanka ee ma to a a an tena.

Chɛɛ mɔɛ dɔ n sin mbe wan yɔ duu gboo chɛndɛ chɛ, chin fen kuu n bea‑a ka min ma. An gbɔ‑a wan wɔsɔkɔɔ. Dɔ n gbaa ni wan an kansanɛ ma chɛmɛ dɔndɔ, dɔ nu bi wɔdɔ, dɔ n sin ni bi sawa. Mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ ɛ ka wan, miin mbe sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a min, mbɛ an‑na a sa an faa ɔ chɛndɛ chɛ, mbɛ an‑na a ma, yɔ sakana bai chɛ‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ an ye, a ma koe a.”

Chisɔsi‑a kan chɛ a tun, a ɔ, “Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a dambo a man, a ee samba bun a kun ma, chɛ ma, a ni a a don sofa kɔɔ. Chɛɛ ni mɔ‑a dambo a man, e a si kaina wan, min mbe a ma, ni mɔɛ n don‑da dechee i 'a chenɛ a, an mbe kun fan an ni kaina ɔ yen gbadan.
Koe min na mu, ko ɔ ko min dɔ nunden mu, ɛ bɔ‑a wan ya a ma. Koe min bɛɛ ma bunden mu, a wɛɛ ɛ bɔ‑a wan ya a ma tee dɔndɔ a.
Wo wɛn too ɛ koe a min, wo chɛ a min.”

Mbɛ a yɛ‑a, a ɔ an ma, “Wo wo too ma sɔ bai chɛ n ma, wo e miin na min. Ni wo to‑a nɔ, wo ni wo too ma sɔ chɛndɛ chɛ Yataa 'a bai ma, wo e to‑a wan nɔ, wo ni a ɔ gbɛ chɛndɛ chɛ. A sin, Yataa wɛɛ ɛ a tɔnɔnɛ be‑a wan wo ma.
Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe bai chɛ n dɔ gbɛ‑a chɛndɛ, a ta yiimatɛ kun ma ɛ sa wan. Chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe ee bai chɛ n dɔ gbɛ‑a, min bɛɛ ɛ a yii ma, ɛ bɔ‑a wan a yii ma.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ to, a ɔ, “Tai chɛ, ɛ a ɔ yian tena wan Yataa 'a mansaya ɛ buɛ min dɔ. A maen fan mu, yɔ kaminɛ min na‑a chin fen kuu fasi a 'a sɛnɛ ɔ.
Ɛ chinɔ wan yɛɛ ma, mbɛ a kunɛ‑a sau ma, ɛ ben ben. A sin, ɛ ma chɛ ma‑a su ɔ tee a, chin fen chɛ sin mbe ta‑a fɛn‑da, ɛ ta‑a koa‑a. Chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, a ee a ma a ni a ɔ sɔn, a gbu ɛ ma buɛ min dɔ.
Duu gboo wandi, an mbe a ma, chin fenɛ ɛ nyan, a ni gbɔɛ be. Koe saa mu min na, chin fenɛ ɛ gbungbu pɛn, mbɛ a bɔ‑a duu kun ma, a pɔndɛn pɔndɛnɛ. A dankama a, mbɛ a gbɔɛ si‑a a a, a ma‑a wɔsɔkɔɔ.
Ni chin fen chɛ che‑a a ya tena, mbɛ kamin chɛ‑a a 'a chin fen tɛ mɛ ɔ bɛn, koe min na mu, chin fen ya tima che‑a.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N mbe tai dɔ mende an tɛ tena to, n mbe kun n ni Yataa 'a mansaya siman min ma. Ka wɛ n mbe a bɔ nyɔɛ yian wo a.
Ɛ ka wan yɔ chin fen kuu dɔma ɛndenɛ, kamin dɔndɔ na‑a min ya, mbɛ a‑a a chin a 'a yadi ɔ. Chin fen kuu chɛ ni dɔɔ chin fen kuu gbɛɛ ma dunya ɔ.
Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, a fɛn‑da kɛn, a ma‑a wan chin fen chenama wa a, a ben chin fenɛ tɔɛ gbɛɛ ma. A pimbi bun‑da wan chin fenɛ tɔɛ n kun ma yadi chɛ ɔ. Konde n na‑a wan, an‑na an nyanɛ n sa a bonɛ n dɔ.”
Chisɔsi ni ma Yataa 'a bai sa‑a an tena, a ni a sa tai sɛsɛ bonda chɛ n fan dɔ. An sin ni che buɛ min dɔ a ɔ gbɛ‑a, a ni a fɔ ka wan an ye.
A nii bai sa mɔɛ n tena, ni a ma tai tɛ ni. Chɛɛ ni an dechee na‑a to, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na, a ni tai chɛ n gbɛɛ ɔ yian fan an na.
Tee dɔndɔ gbe chɛ ma, tee bea‑a kɛn, mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ a fɛ denɛ n ye, a ɔ, “Mmɔ yii wa chɛ tɛ tindi dɔndɔɛ ma.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ chɛ n‑na mɔ fanka chɛ n to, mbɛ an sɛ‑a dɛndɛ chɛ ɔ, ɛ ka si ɔ min dɔ. Mbɛ an bun‑da dɛndɛ gbu wii‑a, an mbe ta‑a Chisɔsi a. A sin, dɛndɛ dɔ mende n bea‑a wan Chisɔsi ta fɛ.
A yen ko, fia wa dɛgbɛ‑a a kuu sɔ bɔ‑a yii chɛ a, min‑na a kuu sɔ yii chɛ‑a dɛndɛ gbu ɔ. Ɛnden fan to‑a, yii ni a a fa.
Chisɔsi ni dɛndɛ gbaa wan pɔɔ, fenɛ ɛ sa ɔ a kunɛ kɔɔ, ɛ chinɔɛ ɔ. Mbɛ a fɛ denɛ n ta‑a, an‑na a a kunɛ bui chɛ a, an dɔ, “Kan mɔ, mmɔ ɛ ka fa an na, a gbɔsɔ ee i ma ɛnden bɛɛ a.”
Chisɔsi‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, mbɛ a ɔ fia gbu ma, “Sɛmbɛ ka!” Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ yii wɛɛ ma, a ɔ, “A ɔ maun gbɛ!” Mbɛ fia sɛmbɛ‑a bɔ‑a, yii wɛɛ ɔ maun‑da.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ a fɛ denɛ n ma, a ɔ, “Wo nii chian. Tima an nɛ gbɛ, wo ni wo kai fa n na.”
Chɛɛ chiandia ni koo an dɔ. An bun‑da an nyɔn dɔ tisa‑a, an dɔ, “Fen kamin nyɔn sima mu chɛ a? Fia wɛɛ, a basan yii a, an mbe a kuiɛ a min fan!”
Chɛ gbakɔ, mbɛ Chisɔsi che‑a Kadidi yii wa tindi dɔndɔɛ ma, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na. Chɛnyɛ chɛ nɛnɛ, a tɔ ni Kɛyasa.
An che‑a kɛn nɔ, mbɛ Chisɔsi bɔ‑a dɛndɛ ɔ. Ɛ bɔ‑a dechee a ɔ, mɔ kaima dɔndɔ na‑a a tan, min na‑a ka bɛnkuɛ ɔ. Nyina yama, an ni an kamin chɛ fɛ.
A sin, a ni chi bɛnkuɛ ɔ wan. Mɔ ɔ mɔ nii kun, a ni a sa yɔɔɛ a.
Tima sɛsɛ ko a, an na‑a a sa wan yɔɔɛ a. Chɛɛ a ni yɔɔɛ chɛ ɔ tɛ wan, a chenɛ ma, a basan a boo a. A ɔ ni gbɛɛ gbeden, mɔ ɔ mɔ nii kun a ma.
Su ɔ tee a, kamin chɛ ni ma wan sɔ ɔ, a chenɛ a, ben‑da bɛnkuɛ ɔ, a basan kɔnkɔɛ n dɔ a. Ɛ yee tɛ‑a, ɛ a wandi ma tɛ tɛ senɛ n na.
A ni pɔɔ, a‑a Chisɔsi yen, mbɛ a‑a bui sa a a. A na‑a, mbɛ a‑a a kumbai gbangban, Chisɔsi chen kɔɔ.
Mbɛ a‑a yee wa tɛ, a ɔ, “Chisɔsi, Yataa Wa 'a denɛ! I toen mu i ni fen ma n na? I dimu, I ma n tɔɔya. A chɛ Yataa ko a.”
A‑a chɛ fɔ, koe min na mu, Chisɔsi na‑a a kuu sɔ wan gbɛ a fɔ‑a nyina yama chɛ ma, a ɔ, a ni ka mɔ kaima chɛ fɛ.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “I tɔɛ?” Mbɛ a ɔ, “N tɔ mu Fanka Wa. Koe min na mu, nn kɔkoo kaka.”
Mbɛ a‑a Chisɔsi disa pien, a ɔ, a ma nyina yama chɛ n gbain an tanda chɛ ɔ.
A tima chɛ a, kɔɛnya man sɛsɛ ni wan an baima, an mbe daun chɛ‑a kɔnkɔɛ kaa fɛ.
Mbɛ nyina yama chɛ n‑na Chisɔsi disa, an dɔ, “Nn na ta kɔɛnya chɛ n tena, nn ni bea an fɛ.”

A dɔn‑da wan an ta koe ma. Mbɛ nyina yama chɛ n bɔ‑a kamin chɛ fɛ, an ta‑a, an bea‑a kɔɛnya chɛ n fɛ. Kɔɛnya chɛ n gbɛɛ, wu fea da faenɛ ɛ gban, an yii‑a bui chɛ‑a kɔnkɔɛ kaa fɛ, an dɛ‑a yii wa chɛ ɔ, an to‑a a ɔ.

Mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin ni ka kɔɛnya chɛ n kun ma fɛn tena, an ben‑da bui‑a. An ta‑a duu ɔ, mbɛ an‑na a gbɛɛ ɔ yian, min chɛ‑a a ɔ. Mbɛ an‑na a ɔ yian ben‑da an tanda chɛ ɔ. Mɔ sɛsɛ n na‑a wan, min mbe a ma, an ni a ɔ yen min ma‑a.
A sin, an che‑a kɛn, nyina yama chɛ n ni ka kaminɛ min fɛ, an‑na a tan fan, ɛ si ɔ nɔ. A ma chiienɛ ɛ, a sin, a yiima tɛenɛ ɛ. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, an gbɛɛ chian‑da.
Mɔɛ miin ni ka nɔ ko ɔ ko ma‑a, an fan‑na a gbɛɛ ɔ yian gbɛ an bɔ n na. An‑na a ɔ yian, Chisɔsi na‑a nyina yama chɛ n gbain buɛ min dɔ kamin chɛ fɛ, a basan kɔɛnya chɛ n bakoe a.
Mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ n‑na Chisɔsi disa, an dɔ, a ni bɔ an 'na chɛnyɛ ɔ.
Chisɔsi ɛ kɛn dɛ‑a dɛndɛ chɛ ɔ, mbɛ a na‑a nyina yama gbain ka kaminɛ min fɛ, a‑a disa chɛ wan, a ɔ, Chisɔsi ni a ma an bɛ ni ta.
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ma dɔn ni. Chɛɛ a‑a min fɔ, a ɔ, “Ta i waa a. I ni a ɔ yian i 'a mɔɛ n na, Mansa Chisɔsi‑a koe min chɛ i ye, a chinchin‑da buɛ min dɔ i ma.”
Mbɛ kamin chɛ wɛɛ ta‑a wan, a ben‑da Duu Tan dɔ gbɛɛ, ɛ a ɔ yian‑da mɔɛ n na, Chisɔsi na‑a min chɛ a ye. A sin, an mɔɛ n gbɛɛ da ɔ gbaa‑a wan, an koe chɛ a min koe a.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi yɛ‑a yii wa chɛ kaka dɔndɔɛ, a ka‑a kaina, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na. Mɔ fanka wa an na sɔn‑da nɔ a ma, yii chɛ da a.
Mɔ dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, min tɔ ni Chayɔsi. A ni mɔ chenama dɔndɔ an na, Chu n 'na samun chɛ chenɛ a. Mbɛ a na‑a Chisɔsi tan. A‑a Chisɔsi tan kɛn, mbɛ a bea‑a a chen na.
A‑a a disa, a sɔɛ gbɛɛ a, a ɔ, “N 'na den musuenɛ e na fa‑a. I dimu, na i ni i boo bun a ma, a ni baun, a fɔɛ ni yɛ to a ma.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi bea‑a Chayɔsi fɛ, an bun‑da ta‑a. Mɔ sɛsɛ ta‑a wan an na saan‑da, an findi findienɛ ɛ a ma, a ka kaka kan kɔ kan ma.
Musu dɔndɔ ni wan fanka chɛ tɛ ɔ, musu n 'na kau ma gbandi ni min ma, san tan kun ma fea ko a.
A na‑a tɔɔ wan bui ti sɛsɛ ye. A‑a a boo fenɛ gbɛɛ ma tachɛ wɛɛ, chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, a ma gboo ɔ bɔɛ ma sɔn ni, gbandi gbu ta‑a wan ya ɔ ma.

A na‑a Chisɔsi ma tɔɛ a min fan, a kɔma a. Chɛ ko a, a na‑a wan a gbaa chia a, fanka chɛ ɔ. A ni wan a fɔ‑a, a yiima ɔ, a ɔ “Ni n tu‑a a ma doma a dechee, n mbe baun‑da wan gbandi chɛ ɔ.” Mbɛ a tu‑a Chisɔsi 'a doma a.
A ya kɔɔɛ a, a 'a kau ma gbandi chɛ sɛmbɛ‑a. Mbɛ a‑a a gboo gbu a tinsɔn, mbɛ a baun‑da gbɛ.
A ya kɔɔɛ a, Chisɔsi‑a a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ gbasaya, min ni a ɔ mɔɛ n baun koe a, dɔ bɔ‑a a ɔ. Mbɛ a‑a a ya a mun, fanka chɛ ma, a ɔ, “Nyɔn tu‑a n ma doma a?”
A fɛ denɛ n dɔ, “I‑a a ɔ yen tena wan, mɔɛ n mbe i 'a tindanɛ, an mbe tindi‑a i ma. I ni tisa chɛ to, mɔɛ tu koe a i a?”
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ma sɛmbɛ ni, a ya a ben ben koe a, a ɔ gbɛ koe a, ni mɔɛ min tu‑a a a.
Chɛɛ musu chɛ ban‑da a ɔ sɔn‑da, a gboo ɔ ɛ gbɛ buɛ min dɔ. Chɛ ko a, a bɔ‑a ya a ma, ɛ samba‑a chiandia a. Mbɛ a‑a a kumbai gbangban Chisɔsi chen kɔɔ, mbɛ a‑a tea gbu gbɛɛ ɔ yian a a.
Chisɔsi ɔ te a ma, “N 'na den, ta i faa chimaenɛ a don. I 'a danaya‑a i baun. Baun i 'a gbandi chɛ ɔ.”
Chisɔsi to‑a koɔ tena wan musu chɛ tena, mbɛ sɔ mɔɛ na‑a, a ka Chayɔsi 'a chenɛ a. Mbɛ a ɔ, a 'a den musuenɛ gbu fa‑a, a ma na sɔ to ticha tɔɔya‑a ta koe a nɔ.
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ma a too ma sɔ ni an bai chɛ ma. A‑a a fɔ wan Chayɔsi ye, a ɔ, “I ma chian, dan dechee n na.”
Chisɔsi ma dɔn ni mɔ dɔ gbɛɛ n ni bea a fɛ. A‑a Pita an ya dechee, ni Chimisi, an fea a dɔɛ Chɔn na.
Mbɛ an che‑a Chayɔsi 'a chenɛ a. An che‑a kɛn, Chisɔsi‑a a ɔ yen, sɔnkɔ sɔnkɔɛ ni buɛ min dɔ nɔ, a basan di chɛ a, ni yee tɛ.
A don‑da chenɛ bu ɔ, mbɛ a ɔ an ma, “N ma a ɔ sɔn ni fen sɔnkɔ sɔnkɔ e nɛ. Wo sɛmbɛ di chɛ‑a. Den chɛ ma fa ni, ɛ sa ɔ chinɔɛ ɔ wan dechee.”

An bun‑da a yɛn‑da a da a kuiɛ chɛ ma. Mbɛ a‑a an gbɛɛ a bɔ chen chɛ a. Mbɛ Chisɔsi fɛ den sawa chɛ nu, miin na‑a a fɛ, ni den chɛ fa an fea a de a, a‑a an ya. Mbɛ an don‑da chen chɛ dumu gbu ɔ, den su chɛ ni kaina min sa ɔ.
Chisɔsi‑a denɛ gbu ya ka wan a boo ma, mbɛ a ɔ, “Den den, n dɔ, i ni i a sɔ.”
Den chɛ ni yɛ‑a a ɔ, a‑a a kɔɔ sɔ wan dɔndɔ gbe, mbɛ a bun‑da tachɛ‑a, nɔ a 'a tindanɛ. (Den chɛ sanɛ ni tan kun ma fea). Chɛ ma‑a kɛn, an gbɛɛ da ɔ gbaa‑a wan nɔ.
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi‑a an na si wan gbau gbau, a ɔ, an ma a fɔ mɔ ɔ mɔ ye. Mbɛ a ɔ, “Wo daun fenɛ be a ma, a ni a daun.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ka‑a an kaina chɛ. A yɛ‑a a waa a, Nasaɛti duu ɔ, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na.

Chu n 'na suin tee ma, Chisɔsi‑a mɔɛ n kan fan an 'na samun chɛ chenɛ a. Mɔɛ n ni kɔkoo wan nɔ, a ni kanɛ chɛ tena tima min na. An sin, kɛn an ban‑da a da a kuiɛ a min‑da, a 'a kan chɛ buɛ‑a an da a fa wan. An dɔ, “A e na ka mende kan chɛ buɛ bonda chɛ a? Yiimatɛ chɛ sima, min been mu ka a ma, kɔndɔfii mu. Mɔ ma a ɔ sɔn, ɛ kamaya ko wa chɛ n ma buɛ min dɔ.”

Mbɛ an dɔ, “N bɔ, ka wɛ, kapinda gbama an nɛ. Mɛi 'a denɛ an nɛ. Nyɔn ma a dɔɛ n sɔn? Chimisi ni ma, ni Chosɛfi, ni Saimɔn, a basan Chudasi a. Mmɔ bɛ an mbe sɛ, mmɔ ɛ yii, mmɔ bɛ a tensa n na.” Chɛ‑a a ma wan, an nii ma an boo si ni a kɔɔ.

Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ an ma, mbɛ, “Mɔɛ n mbe basɔmaya be wan Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ ma kaina dɔ mende nu. Chɛɛ basɔmaya ee a ma, a ta suun duu ɔ, a ee ma a ma, a tuna tuna n tena, ni a suun chenɛ wandi gbu da a.”
A nii ma kun ni, kamaya ko kan kɔ kan ma koe a nɔ. A‑a min ma dechee, a na‑a a boo bun gbandi mɔɛ dɔ n fan ma, mbɛ an baun‑da.
A ɔ sɔn koe Chisɔsi boo ɔ, mbɛ a 'a mɔɛ n ma dan ni a a podon, tɛnɛ ko wa ni. Mbɛ Chisɔsi ta‑a duu n dɔ, nɔ a a tindanɛ. A ta‑a mɔɛ n kan koe a, a si Yataa ma.
Mbɛ a‑a a fɛ den tan kun ma fea chɛ n na kan, a‑a an sɔ, fea fea a. A‑a gbasaya be an ma, nyina yama n gbain koe a mɔɛ n fɛ.
A ɔ an ma, “Wo ma ta fen kɔ fen na wo boo ɔ ta chɛ ɔ, mɔɔ tachɛ chɛ tun gbɔɛ. Wo ma ta daun fen na, wo ma ta bɔɔɛ a, wo ma ta kɔpɔ wɛɛ a wo 'a pɔchiti n dɔ.
Wo kɔɔwa n fan don wo chenɛ n na, chɛɛ wo ma ta doma dɔ gbɛɛ a.”
A ɔ te to an ma, “Ni an‑na wo yia chen kan kɔ kan na, wo ma an chen chɛ an na aan, wo ni bɔ an duu chɛ ɔ.

Ni wo ta‑a duu kan kɔ kan dɔ, min dɔ mɔɛ n ma an boo si ni wo kɔɔ, an gbu ma an too ma sɔ ni wo da a kuiɛ ma, wo bɔ nɔ. Ni wo ma‑a bɔ‑a, wo wo chenɛ a gbɔngbɔn fifii chɛ a, min mbe ma‑a dasi a an tena, mbɛ an mbe ka a ma an na Yataa faa ni tɛ an ma.”
Mbɛ an gbɛɛ ta‑a, an‑na Yataa bai sa, an dɔ, an ni an kan kɔ sɔ an 'na ko yama n na.
An‑na nyina yama sɛsɛ gbain fan mɔɛ n fɛ. A yɛ to, an‑na tu sin fan gbandi mɔɛ n ma, an‑na an baun gbandi n dɔ.

Chisɔsi ma tɔ chɛndɛ ta‑a wan kan kɔ kan. Mbɛ a che‑a Mansa Ɛdɔdi ma, a‑a a ma tɔɛ a min. Mɔɛ dɔ n ni a fɔ wan, an dɔ, “Chɔn min ni yii chɛ mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, an yɛ‑a ka to fɔɛ ɔ. Chɛ an fɛ mu, gbasaya chɛ sima ɛ a boo ɔ, kamaya ko chɛ n ma koe a.”
Dɔ n sin, an dɔ, “Idaicha an nɛ.” Dɔ n sin bɔ‑a nɔ, an dɔ, “Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ an nɛ, yɔ gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n dɔndɔ suun pɔɔ.”
Mansa Ɛdɔdi na‑a a ma tɔɛ a min kɛn, a ɔ, “Chɔn fan nɛ. N na‑a a ma wan, an‑na Chɔn kunɛ tɛ a a. Chɛɛ a‑a a kɔɔ sɔ to, a ka saya ɔ.”

Mansa Ɛdɔdi wandi gbu, an na‑a mɔɛ n sɔ Chɔn bia‑a. A sin fan‑na a fɔ, an ni a sa yɔɔɛ a, pimbi chenɛ a. Mansa Ɛdɔdi na‑a chɛ ma Ɛdɔdiyasi an fɛ, a dɔɛ Fiipi 'a musu. A na‑a chɛ ɔ sɔn bɛɛ boo ɔ boo, a‑a a ma wan a 'a musu a.
Chɔn gboo ɔ nii ma fa ni, a fɔ koe a Mansa Ɛdɔdi ye pɛpɛ, mbɛ tea ko nii ma, a ni a dɔɛ a musu bɔ a boo ɔ.
Chɛ ko a, Chɔn ko don‑da wan Ɛdɔdiyasi ma kaka, a sin, a toen ni an ni Chɔn fa. Chɛɛ Mansa Ɛdɔdi an na‑a a ma, a nii kun Chɔn fa koe a.

Mansa Ɛdɔdi chianden fan ni Chɔn bakoe ma. Koe min na mu, Chɔn ni mɔ tandenɛ an na, Yataa chen kɔɔ, min ni tenchen Yataa ko a. Chɛ na‑a a ma wan, Mansa Ɛdɔdi‑a a konde gbain. A toen ni a too ma sɔ koe a, Chɔn ni ma koɔ‑a. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, a da a bai ni Mansa Ɛdɔdi kɔndɔ fii wan, tima ɔ tima ko a.

A danka a, Ɛdɔdiyasi‑a chia yen Chɔn ma. Mansa Ɛdɔdi suun tee che‑a, mbɛ a‑a daun chɛ bɛnɛ ɔ bɛn, a 'a mɔ chenama n ko a. A 'a chɛnyɛ mansa nu, soya n ya ɔ sɔɛ nu, a basan gbakoo n na, miin ni Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ.

Mbɛ Ɛdɔdiyasi 'a den musuenɛ ta‑a bɛn chɛ ɔ, a‑a a don nyima nyima. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, Mansa Ɛdɔdi bu ɔ dia‑a, an bɛ a 'a sonda n na. Chɛ ko a, Mansa Ɛdɔdi ɔ a ma, “I toen mu, n ni fen ko chɛ i ye? Ko ɔ ko e n dɔ tisa‑a min chɛ koe a i ye, n mbe an chɛ‑a.”
Mansa Ɛdɔdi‑a a kai wan, fanka chɛ ɔ den, gba sɛsɛ ko a. A ɔ, “A ni ma n ma gboo a, ni n ma fen kɔ fen be ni i ma, e n dɔ tisa‑a min ko a. A ni ma n 'na chɛnyɛ chɛ tɔnfɛ dɔndɔɛ wɛɛ a.”
Mbɛ den musuen chɛ bɔ‑a, a ta‑a a kun puin a de ma, a ɔ, “N de, n ni a ɔ tisa fen ko chɛ koe a n ye?” A de ɔ, “Chɔn, min ni yii chɛ mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, a kunɛ.”
Den chɛ yɛ‑a bui‑a mansa tena, mbɛ a ɔ, “Chɔn, min mbe yii chɛ mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, a kunɛ. N toen mu an na, sanche wɛɛ i gba chɛ ɔ, an ni a be n ma piiti ɔ.”
Bai chɛ na‑a a ma wan, mansa faa yɔn‑da kaka. Chɛɛ a nii che to ban‑da, koe min na mu, a ban‑da gbɛ a kai‑a fanka ɔ, a‑a sonda n gbɛɛ tɛ ɔ.
Chɛ ko a, soya mɔɛ min ni a baima, a‑a a sɔ wan dɔndɔ gbe. A ɔ, an ni na Chɔn kunɛ a. Mbɛ soya mɔɛ chɛ ta‑a pimbi chen chɛ a, mbɛ a‑a Chɔn kunɛ tɛ a a.
Mbɛ a na‑a a kun chɛ a, ɛ sa ɔ piiti ɔ. Mbɛ a‑a a be den musuen chɛ ma. Mbɛ a ta‑a, a‑a a be a de ma.
Chɔn fɛ denɛ n‑na a fa koe a min kɛn, an na‑a wan, an‑na a su ya, an ta‑a a a, mbɛ an‑na a tɔn.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n yɛ‑a, an‑na a tan. An‑na a ɔ yian fan a a, an na‑a koe min gbɛɛ ma, a yɛ to, an na‑a mɔɛ n kan buɛ min dɔ.

A tima chɛ a, mɔ sɛsɛ ni na wan, an mbe Chisɔsi tan, an mbe yɛ, an mbe na. Chɛ na‑a a ma wan, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na, tima wɛɛ gbu nii nɔ, daun chɛ koe wɛɛ a. Mbɛ a ɔ, “Mmɔ ta kaina, mmɔ dechee, mmɔ ɛ mmɔ suin kaina, tima kunduen ko a.”
Mbɛ an dechee si‑a dɛndɛ ɔ, an ta‑a pɔɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ nii kaina min.

Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, mɔ sɛsɛ na‑a an ta koe kɔɔ sɔn fan, an sin na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mɔɛ min nyɔn sima ni ka ta‑a. Chɛ ko a, mɔɛ n ka‑a wan duu n gbɛɛ ɔ, an ta‑a an chenɛ ma, an ya ɔ. A sin, an‑na a fo wan Chisɔsi ya ɔ, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na.
Chisɔsi bɔ‑a dɛndɛ ɔ kɛn, mbɛ a‑a mɔ fanka wa chɛ yen. Mbɛ chinchimaya koa‑a a faa ɔ, an ko a. Koe min na mu, a na‑a an yen fan, yɔ sa nu, miin kun ma fɛn mɔ ee. Mbɛ a bun‑da an kan‑da ko sɛsɛ a.
Tee bea ma, a fɛ denɛ n na‑a wan a tena, an dɔ, “Kan mɔ, tima taen mu gbɛ. A sin, nɛ chɛ ee duu baima.
Ɛ nyan fan i ni mɔɛ chɛ n na ta konko chɛ n dɔ mmɔ 'a tindanɛ, an ni daun fenɛ san, a daun koe a.”
Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo wandi gbu, wo fen den be an ma, an ni a daun.” Mbɛ an dɔ, “Wuo! Nn mbe ee kun kau sɛi pawa ma sɔn‑da, nn ni biidi samba sɛsɛ san, an da kɔ koe a.”
Mbɛ a ɔ an ma, “Wo ta, wo ni a ɔ yen, ni biidi yuu ɛ wo boo ɔ.” An ta‑a kɛn, an‑na a ɔ gbɛ, an yɛ‑a wan, an dɔ, “Fenɛ min mbe dechee nɛ nn boo ɔ, an mu biidi duu a, ni nyɛ fea.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ a fɛ denɛ n ma, a ɔ, an ni a ma, mɔɛ chɛ n ni si, an kuunɛ ma bin gbii ɔ.
Mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ n si‑a an gbee ma ta‑a, mɔ chɛmɛ dɔndɔ, dɔndɔ, ni mɔ bi duu, duu.

Mbɛ a‑a biidi duu chɛ ya, a basan nyɛ fea chɛ a, a‑a a ya a si banda a, mbɛ a‑a tando be Yataa ma daun fen chɛ ko a. Mbɛ a‑a biidi chɛ ɔ kai kai, mbɛ a‑a a be a fɛ denɛ n ma, a du du koe a mɔɛ chɛ n ma. Mbɛ a fɛ den chɛ n‑na a ɔ du du mɔɛ chɛ n ma. Nyɛ fea chɛ wɛɛ, a‑a a ɔ du du wan mɔɛ gbɛɛ ma.
Mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a daunɛ chɛ wan, a bu fa‑a gban.
Mbɛ a fɛ denɛ n‑na an da tɔɛ a sɔn. An da tɔɛ chɛ, biidi basan nyɛ a, a bɛn‑da wan samba fa tan kun ma fea.
Mɔ kaima miin ni an tɛ ɔ, miin‑na daun chɛ chɛ, an mɔ wu duu ni.

Mbɛ Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ nu, an ban‑da mɔɛ chɛ n da tɔɛ chɛ a sɔn‑da. A ya kɔɔɛ a, a‑a an na ta a ya ɔ. An ta‑a dɛndɛ ɔ, yii kaka dɔndɔɛ ma, a don Besaida duu ɔ. A wandi sin to‑a a saa‑a mɔ fanka chɛ n na, an ta koe a an baa nu.
A‑a a saa kɛn mɔɛ chɛ n na, mbɛ a sɛ‑a kɔnkɔ dɔndɔ kun tɛ, a dɔndɔ gbe, samunɛ chɛ koe a.
Fitii che‑a ka wan, a dɔndɔ gbe ɛ nɔ tun tindi ma. Chɛɛ dɛndɛ chɛ sin, a ni gbɛ yii wa chɛ tɛ tɛ ma wan, a fɛ den chɛ n na.

Sayi ma pimbi ɔ, tɛ kɔn saa n konchee tima a, Chisɔsi‑a a ɔ yen fan, mbɛ a fɛ denɛ n ni tɔɔya tena wan an 'na dɛndɛ wii koe a. Koe min na mu, an ni ta tena fia ya teen ma wan. Chɛ na‑a a ma wan, Chisɔsi tachɛ‑a yii chɛ a tan den tan den, a ta a fɛ den chɛ n tena. Ɛnden fan na‑a to, a ni ben an ma.
Chɛɛ an‑na a yen kɛn na‑a yii chɛ a, an yiima a ma ko ni. An‑na yee tɛ wan, an dɔ, “Fuɛ yen ko na‑a e!”
Chiandia‑a an gbɛɛ gboo fa wan gban, an‑na a yen kɛn. Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, Chisɔsi koɔ‑a an tena, a ɔ, “Wo sɛmbɛ ka kaina chɛ an yee tɛ‑a. N fan mu, wo ma chian.”
Mbɛ a sɛ‑a dɛndɛ ɔ an baima, mbɛ fia wa chɛ ɔ tɛ‑a. An fɛ den chɛ n da ɔ gbaa‑a wan, koe chɛ n na.
Koe min na mu, an nii ma a ɔ gbɛ ni, biidi gbugbu duu da a koa‑a koe Chisɔsi boo ɔ, a sien mu koe min ma.
Mbɛ an‑na yii wa ɔ tandin, an che‑a tindi ma kaina dɔndɔ, min tɔ ni Kɛnesayɛti. Mbɛ an‑na dɛndɛ yuu chii nɔ.
An to‑a bɔ tena wan dɛndɛ ɔ, a ya kɔɔɛ a, mbɛ nɔ mɔɛ nu, an‑na a ɔ sɔn mbɛ Chisɔsi ɛ wan an tɛ ɔ.
Mbɛ an ben‑da defe an tanda chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ. A sin, ni an na‑a Chisɔsi ma tɔɛ a min kan kɔ kan, an ni na wan, an mbe a tan gbandi mɔɛ n na, sa ɔ yaa ɔ.

A sin, Chisɔsi ni ta kaina miin gbɛɛ, a ni ma konko n na, a ni ma duu wa n na, chɛ ma, sɛnɛ n dɔ, mɔɛ n ni ta wan gbandi mɔɛ n na a tena. Machiti n bɛɛ ɔ, an ni a tan fan. An ni Chisɔsi disa wan, min mbe a ma, a ni a ma, gbandi mɔɛ chɛ n ni tu a 'a doma kai chen kana wɛɛ a. A sin, gbandi mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ tu‑a a a, an baun‑da wan.
Chu mɔɛ dɔ nu, miin ni Fayisii n na, an bɛ Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ dɔ n na, an na‑a ka wan Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. Mbɛ an na kan‑da Chisɔsi 'a tindanɛ.

An na‑a a ɔ yen fan, mbɛ an woo mɔɛ n‑na kanɛ min to an boo ɔ, Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ dɔ n nii bea tena an kan chɛ fɛ. Koe min na mu, an fɛ den chɛ nu, an mbe ee an boo a ko a chia ma, yɔ kan chɛ‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, mɔ e na daunɛ chɛ. (
Koe min na mu, Fayisii nu, ni Chu mɔɛ tɔɛ nu, an mbe bea sawa chɛ n fan fɛ, an woo mɔɛ n‑na miin to an boo ɔ. An mbe ee fen kɔ fen daun, ni an ma an boo a ko ni, a chia ma.

A sin, an gbu ee daun fen daun, ni an ka‑a machiti ɔ, mɔɔ ni an‑na an fandi ko pɛn. Sawa n ni kɔkoo, an na‑a miin ma sɔn, an sin ni bea wan an fɛ. Sawa nu, yɔ mɔɛ ɛ a boo a ko buɛ min dɔ, a chia ma. A yɛ to, kɔpu nu, da nu, pani kumusu nu, a basan sofa n bɛɛ ta sawa n na).

Mbɛ Fayisii n bɛ sawa kan mɔɛ n na, an‑na Chisɔsi ɔ tisa, an dɔ, “Mmɔ woo mɔɛ n‑na kanɛ min to mmɔ boo ɔ, a nyin fan mɔ ɔ mɔ ko a. Chɛɛ i fɛ denɛ n‑na an fandi bɔ kan chɛ kɔɔ. Koe min na mu, an mbe ee an boo a ko a chia ma, yɔ kan chɛ‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, mɔɛ e na daunɛ chɛ. I‑a chɛ yen ka ma?”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ an ma, “Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ Aisaya na‑a min fɔ suun, a si wo ma, a teaen ni gba! Nɛnɛn fea ti mu wo a, yɔ a na‑a a nyɛn buɛ min dɔ, mbɛ, ‘Yataa ɔ te, a ɔ, wo e basɔmaya be dechee a ma wo da ɔ wan. A ɔ, chɛɛ a wakoe ee wo faa ɔ.
Wo e samun gbama an chɛ a tena, koe min na mu, wo e mɔɛ n kan gbɛ wo ta kanɛ an na, wo e ta‑a a ma‑a, yɔ a 'a sawa‑a a fɔ ka wan.’ ”
Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo ta sin, wo e Yataa 'a sawa to wan, mbɛ wo bea‑a wo ta kanɛ fɛ.”
A ɔ te to an ma, “Yiimatɛ chia ɛ wan wo boo ɔ, wo kunɛ bɔ koe a Yataa 'a sawa n kɔɔ, min mbe a ma, wo ni bea wo ta sawa n fɛ.
Mosisi na‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, ‘Wo ni kooya be wo fa ma, a basan wo de a.’ A yɛ to, a ɔ, ‘Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a bai yama sa a fa ma ni a de, wo ni an mɔɛ chɛ fa.’
Chɛɛ wo tana, wo e mɔɛ n kan fan, an ni chɛ fɔ an fa n ye, a basan an de n na. Mbɛ an toen ni, an ni fenɛ min be an ma, min ma gbɔsɔɛ ɛ an ma, an ban‑da a be‑a Yataa ma.”
A ɔ, “Wo e kafai be wan mɔɛ chɛ ma, a ma na koe chɛ a fa ye, chɛ ma, a de ye.
Chia chɛ a mu, wo e kanɛ min chɛ mɔɛ n na, ɛ a ma mɔɛ n ni Yataa bai to, mbɛ an bea wo ta fɛ. Ko dɔ mende n sin mbe wan to nɔ, yɔ chɛ, wo e miin ma tena.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a mɔ fanka chɛ n chee to a tena. A ɔ, “Wo gbɛɛ, wo wo too ma sɔ, n da a bai ma, wo ni a ɔ gbɛ.
Mɔ gbu e min don i da a, an mbe ee a ma, i ma ni nyamui Yataa ya kɔɔ, fɔ e min‑na bɔ i da ɔ.”
A‑a mɔ fanka chɛ n to kɛn, mbɛ a don‑da chenɛ a, a fɛ denɛ n‑na a ɔ tisa wan, an dɔ, a ni a da a bai chɛ fasai an ye.

Chisɔsi ɔ an ma, “Wo e ka n fɛ wan, chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, wo yiima ma tɛ ni, a ni ben mɔɛ tɔɛ n ma. Wo ma chɛ ɔ gbɛ ni? Mɔ gbu e min don i da a, an mbe ee a ma, i ma ni nyamui Yataa ya kɔɔ, fɔ e min na bɔ i da ɔ.
Koe min na mu, mɔ gbu ɛ fenɛ min daun, a ee ta a faa ɔ wan. Chɛɛ ɛ yii mɔ bu ɔ wan, mbɛ a ta‑a kumbai a kanɛ ɔ.” (Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ wan ka, mbɛ daun fenɛ kan kɔ kan nyin fan, a daun koe a).
Mbɛ a ɔ te to, “Fenɛ min mbe bɔ mɔ gbu faa ɔ, an mbe a ma, a ma ni nyamui Yataa ya kɔɔ.
Koe min na mu, mɔ gbu bu ɔ mu, a faa ɔ, ko yama n mbe bɔ. Yiinachii yama nu, miin mbe mɔɛ sɔ ko tɛ ma, kanka chɛ, ni mɔ fa koe.
A ni ma waa ma basan koe an na mɔɛ a, mɔ ee fuu ɔ min na, bɛncha mu, a basan ko yama tɔɛ gbɛɛ a. Mɔɛ bun koe, kan baiya, toomaya, tɔ ɔ tɛ yama chɛ, yonka, wooya.
Ko yama chɛ n gbɛɛ, an mbe bɔ mɔ gbu faa an dɔ. An sin fan mbe a ma, mɔ gbu ma ni nyamui Yataa ya kɔɔ.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ka‑a nɔ, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na, mbɛ an ta‑a tanda ɔ, Taya duu wa a tindanɛ. A don‑da chenɛ a, a sin nii ma to ni, mɔ ɔ mɔ ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ ɛ wan nɔ. Chɛɛ a nii ma che ni to‑a an nun chɛ ɔ.
Mbɛ musu dɔndɔ, nyina yama ni min 'na den musuenɛ fɛ, a‑a Chisɔsi ma tɔɛ a min. Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, a na‑a a tena, mbɛ a bea‑a a chen kɔɔ.
Chu mɔ nii ma an musu chɛ a. A sin, a suun‑da Siyia chɛnyɛ ɔ wan, Fonisia tanda ɔ. A‑a Chisɔsi disa wan, nyina yama chɛ gbain koe a 'a den chɛ fɛ.
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Den mɛsɛ n ni daunɛ chɛ pɛn. A ma nyin, mɔɛ ni den mɛsɛ n 'na daun fenɛ bɔ an da a, a ni a be wuu n ma.”
Chɛɛ musu chɛ ɔ, “Kai, wuu gbu wɛɛ ɛ ma si ɔ den mɛsɛ n baima, ni an da a pɛɛ bea‑a duu ma, an mbe a daun fan.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ te gbɛ, “I da a bai chɛ ko a, yɛ i waa chenɛ a. I‑a a tan‑da wan, nyina yama chɛ kaenɛ ɛ gbɛ i 'a denɛ fɛ.”
Musu chɛ yɛ‑a a waa a, mbɛ a‑a a 'a denɛ tan sa ɔ sofa ma, nyina yama gbu nii to a fɛ.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi bɔ‑a Taya duu baima, mbɛ a ben‑da Sidon duu bu ɔ. Mbɛ a ta‑a chɛnyɛ dɔndɔ ɔ, an ni min chee, an dɔ, Duu Tan. A don‑da a ɔ, mbɛ a che‑a Kadidi yii wa ma.
Mɔɛ dɔ n na‑a kaminɛ a, Chisɔsi tena, min too nii koe a min, a sin, a koɔ koe wɛɛ ni gbɛɛ. An na‑a Chisɔsi ma nande wan, an dɔ, a ni a boo bun a ma, a baun koe a.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a mɔ kaima chɛ ya, a ka‑a a fanka chɛ baima. Mbɛ a‑a a boo don kamin chɛ too fea ɔ. Mbɛ a‑a a da yii a bɔ, mbɛ a tu‑a mumun chɛ nɛnɛnɛ a.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a ya a sɛ banda a. Mbɛ a kuun‑da dioo. Mbɛ a ɔ kamin chɛ ma, “A ɔ ni ka.”
A ya kɔɔɛ a, kamin chɛ che‑a koe a min‑da. A yɛ to, a koɔ koe min ni gbɛɛ ka, a bun‑da koɔ‑a chɛndɛ chɛ.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ mɔɛ chɛ n ye, a ɔ, an ma a ɔ yian mɔ ɔ mɔ a. Chɛɛ a ni a fɔ buɛ min dɔ an ye, an ni ben ka wan a ɔ yian‑da mɔ dɔ gbɛɛ n na.
A sin, mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ na‑a a min, an da ɔ gbaa‑a wan gbechee. An dɔ, “Gba! A kosan a 'a wai chɛ‑a. Ɛ a ma wan too gbee tɔɛ wɛɛ ni koe a min, mumunɛ ni koɔ.”
A tima chɛ a, mbɛ mɔ fanka dɔ gbɛɛ n na sɔn‑da Chisɔsi ma. Daun fen nii kɛn to nɔ, mɔɛ chɛ n mbe min daun, Chisɔsi na‑a a fɛ denɛ n chee wan, mbɛ a koɔ‑a an tena, a ɔ,
“Mɔɛ chɛ n ma chinchinden mu n ye. Tee sawa an nɛ ka gbɛ, an mbe nɛ mmɔ fɛ, daun fen mbe ee to nɔ.
Ni n‑na a ma sunɛ an ni ta an kɔnkɔ tɔɛ a, an mbe ka‑a wan an chenɛ kɔɔ chia a, an ni bɔn a ma. Koe min na mu, an dɔ nu, an ka‑a kaina min nu, an dɔ yansan.”
Mbɛ a fɛ denɛ n dɔ, “Mɔ ee che daun fenɛ sɔn‑da nɛ kan kɔ kan, fuin bonda chɛ ma, mɔ ɛ mɔ fanka chɛ da kɔ min na, bufa ni chɛ.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Biidi yuu ɛ nɛ, wo boo ɔ?” Mbɛ an dɔ, “Gbugbu wɔnfea.”

Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ tɛtɛ ye, a ɔ, an ni si duu ma, mbɛ an gbɛɛ si‑a. Mbɛ a‑a biidi wɔnfea chɛ ya, mbɛ a‑a Yataa wai bɔ, daun fen chɛ ko a. A‑a a ɔ kai kai wan, mbɛ a‑a a be a fɛ denɛ n ma, a ɔ du du koe a mɔɛ chɛ n ma. An sin‑na a ɔ du du wan an ma.
Nyɛ ɛndenɛ wɛɛ ni wan to nɔ an boo ɔ. Chisɔsi‑a tando be wan Yataa ma, a wɛɛ ko a, mbɛ a‑a a be a fɛ denɛ n ma, a du koe a to mɔɛ chɛ n ma.
Mɔɛ n gbɛɛ‑a an bu fa daunɛ chɛ wan. Mbɛ a fɛ denɛ n‑na mɔɛ chɛ n da tɔɛ a sɔn sɔn, a bɛn‑da wan samba sɛmbɛnden wɔnfea da a faenɛ ma gban.
Mɔɛ miin‑na an daun chɛ chɛ, an taen fan ni mɔ wu naaninɛ nyɔn sima ɔ. Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a saa mɔɛ chɛ n na.
Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, a si‑a wan dɛndɛ ɔ, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na. Mbɛ an‑na yii wa chɛ tɛ, a ta Damanuta kaka ma.

Tima ɛnden gbakɔ, Chu mɔɛ nu, miin ni Fayisii n na, an na‑a wan Chisɔsi tena, an bun‑da a kaa ɔ gbaa‑a. An toen ni, an ni a bia a chen kɔ. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, an‑na a ɔ tisa, an dɔ, a ni kamaya koe ma an ye, min mbe a ɔ yian, mbɛ a 'a gbasaya kaen ni Yataa an tena.

Chɛɛ Chisɔsi kuun‑da a ɔ yansama a, mbɛ a ɔ, “Bi tee chɛ a mɔɛ nu, an toen mu kamaya koe n fan dɔ yen koe a, dan koe a mɔɛ a. N ni a ma din wo tena, chɛ ee ma tena. N mbe ee kamaya ko kan kɔ kan ma tena, an mɔ bonda chɛ n ye.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a an to, mbɛ a yɛ‑a dɛndɛ ɔ. Mbɛ a‑a a kuu sɔ yii tɛ‑a, a yɛ a kaka dɔndɔɛ ma.
Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ n na‑a nyina wan, ta koe a daun fenɛ a an boo ɔ. A sin biidi dɔndɔ gbe, an ni an boo ɔ, dɛndɛ chɛ ɔ.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a an na si, a ɔ, “Yisinɛ min mbe Chu mɔɛ chɛ n boo ɔ, miin mu ka Fayisii n na, ni Mansa Ɛdɔdi 'a yisinɛ, wo wo kun ma fɛn a boo ɔ.”
Mbɛ an bun‑da a tɛnsɛ‑a an nyɔn tɛ ɔ, an dɔ, “A‑a chɛ fɔ, a mu min na, mmɔ nyina‑a mmɔ ma na ni biidi a mmɔ boo ɔ.”

Chɛɛ Chisɔsi na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan an ni fen tɛnsɛ tena an nyɔn tɛ ɔ. Mbɛ a ɔ an ma, “Wo ee ma chia ɔ bɔɛ chɛ‑a sanche, a si biidi an ma, min mbe ee wo boo ɔ. Wo gbu ma n sɔn nin bɛ, wo ma n dɔ gbɛ ni. Wo yiima a ma sɛn ni, koe ɔ gbɛ koe a. A ee?
Wo wan, ya ɛ wo ma, chɛɛ wo ee kaina yen. Too ɛ wo kun fɛ, chɛɛ wo ee koe a min. A gbu sin to‑a wan wo yii ma, koe min na‑a ma.
N na‑a biidi gbugbu duu ɔ kai kai buɛ min dɔ, mɔ wu duu da kɔ koe a. An da tɔɛ min na‑a to, samba fa yuu na‑a to?” Mbɛ an dɔ, “Samba tan kun ma fea.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N na‑a mɔ wu naanin chɛ n bɛɛ da kɔ tima min na biidi gbugbu wɔnfea a, samba fa yuu na‑a to, an da tɔɛ ɔ?” Mbɛ an dɔ, “Samba wɔnfea.”
Mbɛ a ɔ te gbɛ, “Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, wo ma a ɔ gbɛ nin bɛ. A e?”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi na‑a Besaida duu ɔ, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na. Mɔɛ dɔ nu nɔ, an na‑a kaminɛ a, min fionden ni, Chisɔsi tena. Mbɛ an‑na a disa, tu koe a an kamin chɛ a.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a ya te tɔɛ chɛ bia a boo ma, mbɛ a bɔ‑a a a duu chɛ ɔ. Chisɔsi ban‑da kɛn a da a yii chɛ‑a kamin chɛ ya a, mbɛ a‑a a boo bun a ma. Mbɛ a ɔ, “Ɛ ka ma, e kaina yen tena wan?”
Mbɛ kamin chɛ‑a a kunɛ kɔɔ sɔ, a ɔ, “Mm. N mbe mɔɛ n yen tena wan. Chɛɛ an maen fan mu, yɔ kɔnɛ n fan mbe ka tachɛ tachɛ‑a ben‑da.”
Chisɔsi tu‑a ka wan to kamin chɛ ya a. Chɛ nɛnɛ ɔ gbɛ, kamin chɛ a kaina fɛn fan tidan, a ya ta yɛ‑a ɔ, mbɛ a‑a fen kɔ fen yen gbadan.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a kamin chɛ boo ka, ta koe a a waa a. Chɛɛ a ɔ a ma, “I ma yɛ to konko chɛ ɔ.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ta‑a, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na, konko dɔ n dɔ, miin ni nɔ Sisayea Fiipai duu baima. An mbe kɛn ta‑a, mbɛ a‑a an dɔ tisa, a ɔ, “Wo a fɔ wɛ n ye, wo ta yiima ɔ, mɔɛ min nyɔn sima mu n na.”

Mbɛ an dɔ, “Mɔɛ dɔ n mbe a fɔ tena wan, mbɛ i mu Chɔn fan na, min ni yii chɛ mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a. Dɔ n sin mbe a fɔ wan, mbɛ i mu Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔ dɔndɔ an na suun, min tɔ mu Idaicha. Dɔ n mbe ta‑a a fɔ‑a, an dɔ, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ dɔ gbɛɛ mu i a.”
Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ to, a ɔ, “Chɛɛ wo wandi gbu, wo ta yiima ɔ, n mu nyɔn na?” Mbɛ Pita ɔ, “I mu Chasi an na, nn kun ka mansa.”
Mbɛ a‑a an na si gbau gbau, mbɛ an ma chɛ ɔ yian mɔ ɔ mɔ a, mbɛ a wan mu Chasi a, mɔɛ n kun ka mansa.

Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a kuu sɔ a fɛ denɛ n kan‑da, a ɔ, “N fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe tɔɔ‑a wan kaka. Mmɔ 'a chɛnyɛ gbakoo nu, an bɛ mɔɛ miin mbe Chu n tɛ ɔ Yataa a, an 'na mansa n na, an mbe an kan kɔ sɔ‑a wan n na. Mmɔ 'a sawa kan mɔɛ n bɛɛ, an mbe toa si‑a wan an kɔɔ. N mbe fa‑a wan mɔ boo ɔ. Chɛɛ n mbe n kɔɔ sɔ‑a wan a ka saya ɔ, tee fea a sawan bɔɛ ma.”
A sin na‑a chɛ fɔ wan, an ni a da a kuiɛ ɔ gbɛ gbadan. Mbɛ Pita‑a Chisɔsi pɛn, a ɔ, an ni sɔ an fea a. An sɔ‑a kɛn, mbɛ Pita‑a a fɔ a ye, a ɔ, a ma bai kaina chɛ fɔ.
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi‑a a ya a mun fan, a‑a a fɛ denɛ tɔɛ n ma fɛn, mbɛ a ɔ Pita ma, “Ka n fɛ, e ka Sitana 'a wai an chɛ tena. E ka mɔ gbu yiinachii an chɛ tena, Yataa ta yiinachii ma chɛ a.”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a mɔ fanka fanka chɛ n chee a tena, ni a fɛ denɛ n bɛɛ. Mbɛ a ɔ, “Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ toen mu a ni bea n fɛ, an mɔɛ chɛ ni nyina a faa ma koe n ma. Mbɛ a‑a a ma bɛn mɔnɛ ɔ bia koe a n ko a, a basan fa koe a.

Koe min na mu, ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ban‑da bea koe a n fɛ, a wandi fɔɛ ma kanda koe a, an mɔɛ chɛ ee kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da. Chɛɛ mɔɛ min mbe a yii bɔ‑a a fɔɛ ɔ, n ko a, ni sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ko a, an mɔɛ chɛ ɛ kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da wan.
Dunya chɛ ma nyanɛ gbɛɛ, min mbe a ma, mɔ ni a sɔn bɛɛ, mɔ ni fo kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ a, tɔnɔn ma a a.
Fen kɔ fen mbe ee nɔ, mɔ gbu e che min be‑a, kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ko a.

Sanche, mɔ yama yama bonda chɛ n tɛ ɔ, miin mbe ee dan ko a, ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ban‑da n dɔ, a basan n da a kuiɛ a, n bɛɛ, n mbe na‑a wan banda a ɔ. N fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe na‑a tima min na mansaya ɔ, n mbe ban‑da wan a ɔ. A tima chɛ a, n mbe ma‑a wan man‑da, Fa Yataa 'a manɛ a, nn bɛ maeka n na.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ te to an ma, “N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ mɔɛ dɔ nu nɛ sɔ ɔ sanche, an mbe ma‑a wan fɔɛ ɔ aan an ni chɛ ɔ yen. An mbe a ɔ yen‑da wan Yataa 'a mansaya ɔ ni yian, gbasaya wandi a.”
Tee wɔdɔ gbakɔ, mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a Pita ya, ni Chimisi an fea Chɔn na. Mbɛ a sɛ‑a an na kɔnkɔ a yansama dɔndɔ ɔ, an dechee. Chisɔsi kamaya‑a nɔ wan an boo ɔ.
Mbɛ a ma doma bun‑da man‑da, a gbɛenɛ ɛ fo fo. A gbɛen ni buɛ min dɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ nii che a ma‑a koa ni gbɛ ka.
Mbɛ Mosisi an fea Idaicha a, an bɔ‑a fɛ den sawa chɛ n ya a, an mbe chia ɔ bɔɛ chɛ‑a, an bɛ Chisɔsi a.
Mbɛ Pita‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “Kan mɔ, a nyan‑da wan mmɔ ɛ nɛ chɛ. Ka nn mbe ku sawa bun. Ku dɔndɔ i ko a, dɔndɔ kai Mosisi ko a, mbɛ dɔndɔɛ ma‑a kai Idaicha ko a.”
Pita na‑a chɛ fɔ, koe min na mu, chiandia na‑a an gboo fa wan gban, a gbu nii ma a ɔ sɔn a ni fen fɔ.
Mbɛ dingbii yii‑a an kun na, mbɛ Yataa koɔ‑a an dingbii chɛ ɔ. A ɔ, “N 'na denɛ an nɛ, a ko a di n ye kaka. Wo a da a kuiɛ a min.”
Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, an‑na an ya a ben ben. An mbe e na mɔɛ min yen gbɛ dechee, mɔɔ Chisɔsi.

Mbɛ an‑na a kuu sɔ kɔnkɔɛ yii‑a. An mbe yii tena kɔnkɔɛ chɛ an na, mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a dasi be an ma gbau gbau. A ɔ, an‑na koe min dɔ yen ka, a ɔ, an ma a ɔ yian mɔ dɔ mende kan kɔ kan na, a ɔ, aan a na tee ni che. A ɔ, tee chɛ, a wan Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, ɛ a kɔɔ sɔ‑a tee min kɔɔ a ka saya ɔ.
An‑na a ma wan yɔ Chisɔsi‑a an na si buɛ min dɔ. Chɛɛ an‑na bai chɛ tɛnsɛ wan an dechee tɛ ɔ, a si Chisɔsi kɔɔ sɔ koe ma a ka saya ɔ. A mu min na, a na‑a an na fii wan.
Mbɛ an‑na Chisɔsi ɔ tisa, an dɔ, “Chɛɛ mmɔ 'a sawa kan mɔɛ chɛ n mbe a fɔ wan, mbɛ Idaicha ɛ na‑a pɛn, kunka mansa e na na. Fen‑na a ma gbɛ Idaicha ma na nin bɛ?”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Tea gbu mu, Idaicha an mu ya ɔ sɔɛ a. An mbe ko ɔ ko sɔ‑a a chia ma. Chɛɛ a nyɛnden fan mu gbɛ Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe mɔnɛ sɛsɛ ɔ bia‑a wan, mbɛ an ban‑da n dɔ. Fen ko a mu chɛ ɛ ma?
Chɛɛ n ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ Idaicha gbu ban‑da na‑a. A sin, an ban‑da koe gbɛɛ sɛ‑a a ma, an toen ni an ni miin sɛ a ma. An na‑a a ma a a, yɔ Yataa 'a gboo na‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ.”
Chisɔsi n yɛ‑a kɛn, a fɛ denɛ tɔɛ chɛ n tena, an‑na fanka fanka tan fan an 'na tindanɛ. A tima chɛ a, an ni wan bai tɛnsɛ tena an nyɔn tɛ ɔ, an bɛ Chu mɔɛ n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ dɔ n na.
Mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, an‑na Chisɔsi yen kɛn dechee na‑a, an da ɔ gbaa‑a wan gbechee. Mbɛ an‑na bui sa a a a tena, an ta‑a a kɔndɔn.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ a fɛ den chɛ n ma, a ɔ, “Wo e fen kɔɔsa bia ɔ, wo bɛ mɔɛ chɛ n na?”
Mbɛ kamin dɔndɔ, fanka chɛ ɔ, a ɔ, “Ticha, n na‑a ka n 'na den kainɛ an na i tena, nyina yama ɛ min fɛ. A‑a a ma wan, den chɛ ee che koɔ‑a.

Ni nyina yama chɛ na‑a a baima tima ɔ tima, ɛ a a bea wan, mbɛ a da a yii fɔnfɔnɛ bun‑da bɔ‑a. A sin to, ɛ a nyinɛ a daun daun fan, mbɛ a gbɛa‑a gbau. N‑na i fɛ denɛ n dɔ tisa wan, an ni nyina yama chɛ gbain a fɛ, chɛɛ an ma kun ni.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “A sin, wo e ka buɛ min dɔ, wo ee dan ko a. A ɔ yansan gbɛ mmɔ bɛ ɛ mmɔ nyɔn fɛ, fen mu wo ee dan n na? N ma a ɔ sɔn n mbe fen ma to wo ko a. Na i 'a denɛ a.”
Mbɛ an na‑a denɛ gbu a a tena. Nyina yama chɛ‑a Chisɔsi yen kɛn dechee, a ya kɔɔɛ a, a‑a denɛ gbu bondan duu ma, gbɔgbɔi chɛ‑a a ɔ. Mbɛ a bun‑da a ma chɛɛ chɛ‑a, a da a yii fɔnfɔnɛ ɛ ta‑a bɔ‑a.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ den chɛ fa ma, a ɔ, “Gbandi chɛ‑a den chɛ bia sɔyɔ?” Mbɛ a ɔ, “A den mɛsɛ tɔɛ a.
A sin, tima sɛsɛ ko a, nyina yama chɛ ɛ a a bea wan ta a. Dɔ n na, ɛ a a dɛ yii wɛɛ ɔ, a fa koe a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, ni e kun fan i ni nn deman, chinchin nn ma, i ni basan nn ma.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N ta bai ma chɛ a, ni n mbe kun fan. Mɔ ɔ mɔ i wɛn mbe i kai fa‑a n na, Yataa ɛ ko ɔ ko chɛ wan i ye.”
Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, den chɛ fa chɛ ɔ, “Danaya ɛ wan n dɔ, chɛɛ a ma gbɛ, n ni che n kai fa‑a i a, basan n ma!”

Chisɔsi‑a a ɔ yen kɛn mɔ fanka da ɛ koa‑a tun, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ wan nyina yama chɛ ma, a ɔ, “I wan nyina chɛ, i wɛn mbe mɔɛ too gbee, e mɔɛ ma to mumunɛ a, ka den chɛ fɛ fion. A sin, i ma bea to a fɛ kuɔ fɔ.”
A ya kɔɔɛ a, nyina yama chɛ‑a yee tɛ gbankon, a‑a a ma, gbɔgbɔi‑a den chɛ bondan bin, mbɛ a ka‑a a fɛ. Kaienɛ gbu ma‑a yɔ su, min‑na a ma, mɔɛ sɛsɛ‑a a fɔ, an dɔ, a fa‑a.
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi‑a a bia wan a boo ma, mbɛ a‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, a sɔ‑a sa.
Chisɔsi don‑da kɛn chenɛ a, an dechee, mbɛ a fɛ denɛ n‑na a ɔ tisa. An‑na a fɔ wan, an dɔ, “Nn toen fan ni nn ni nyina chɛ gbain kaien chɛ fɛ, chɛɛ nn ma kun ni. Fen mu chɛ ma‑a nn na?”
Mbɛ a ɔ an ma, “Samunɛ dechee, an mbe a ma, wo ni kun ko bonda chɛ ma‑a.”
Chɛ gbakɔ, mbɛ Chisɔsi n ka‑a an kaina chɛ, an ben‑da Kadidi chia a. Chisɔsi nii ma to ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ni a ɔ sɔn, an mbe kaina min,

koe min na mu, a ni a fɛ denɛ n fan kan tena a tima chɛ a. A‑a a fɔ wan an ye, a ɔ, “N fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, an mbe na tena wan n ma tachɛ‑a, mɔɛ n ma. An mbe n fa‑a wan, chɛɛ tee fea ni a sawan bɔɛ gbakɔ, n mbe n kɔɔ sɔ‑a wan a ka saya ɔ.”
Chɛɛ an nii ma a gbu ɔ gbɛ ni, a ni bai min fɔ tena. Chɛɛ an chianden fan ni dechee a ɔ tisa koe a.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi n che‑a Kapanaun duu ɔ. An don‑da kɛn chenɛ a, a‑a a fɛ den chɛ n dɔ tisa, a ɔ, “Wo ni wan chia ɔ bɔɛ chɛ‑a, mmɔ ɛ kɛn na‑a chia a. A sien ni fen ma?”
Chɛɛ an‑na a ɔ maun fan don. Koe min na mu, an na‑a chia ɔ bɔɛ chɛ wan, mɔ chenama wa koe ma an tɛ ɔ.
Chisɔsi si‑a, mbɛ a‑a a fɛ den tan kun ma fea chɛ n chee. Mbɛ a ɔ, “Mɔɛ min toen mu yaɔsɔya a, mɔɔ ni a sɔ‑a pɛn gbaa chia a, a ni ma bɔi denɛ a, a bɔɛ n ko a.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a den denɛ ya, a‑a a ma a sɔ‑a an ya kɔɔ. A‑a a si a nɔnkɔnɛ ɔ, mbɛ a‑a chɛ fɔ an ye, a ɔ,
“Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe a boo si‑a den mɛsɛ bonda chɛ kɔɔ, a‑a a boo si ka n fan kɔɔ. A sin, mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe a boo si‑a n kɔɔ, a‑a a boo si ka Yataa an kɔɔ, min‑na n sɔ.”
Mbɛ Chɔn‑na a fɔ Chisɔsi ye, a ɔ, “Kan mɔ, nn‑na kamin dɔndɔ yen fan, min mbe nyina yama n gbain tena mɔɛ n fɛ i 'a gbasaya ɔ. Nn‑na a a si wan nn dɔ a ni sɛmbɛ, koe min na mu, mmɔ bɛ ma a a.”
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo ma a a gban. Koe min na mu, ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ɛ kamaya koe ma tena wan n tɔɛ ɔ, a ee kun a ni mun a ɔ wuuma a, a ni bai yama sa n ma.
Koe min na mu, ni mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe ee mmɔ chɛɛ tena, mmɔ bɛ mu a a.
Ka n mbe chɛ ma din wo tena. Mbɛ ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a yii be wo ma, n tɔɛ ɔ, a ɔ koe min na mu, n fan kunka mansa, n fɛ mɔɛ mu wo a, a gbu an mbe a tɔnɔnɛ ma sɔn‑da.”

Chisɔsi ɔ, “A sin, den mɛsɛ chɛ nu, miin‑na an kai fa ka n na, mɔ ɔ mɔ ma a ma, an ni ko yama ma. Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a chɛ ma, ɛ nyan‑da wan an mɔɛ chɛ ko a, an ni sen fanka ma chii a kanɛ a, an ni a a dɛ yii wa ɔ.

A sin, ni i boo‑a i a dɛ ko yama ɔ, a tɛ a a, i ni a a dɛ. Koe min na mu, tamban tɔɛ wɛɛ ɛ kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da wan, ni a ma dɛ ni ko yama ɔ. Chɛɛ ni i dɛ‑a ko yama ɔ, i boo fea a kandenɛ ni ma wɛɛ, e ta ta an dɔ, min mbe ee dufɛn kuɔ fɔ ko a.

A sin to, ni i chenɛ wɛɛ‑a i a dɛ ko yama ɔ, a wɛɛ tɛ a a. Koe min na mu, tamban tɔɛ wɛɛ ɛ kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da wan, ni a ma dɛ ni ko yama ɔ. Chɛɛ ni i dɛ‑a ko yama ɔ, i chen fea a kandenɛ ni ma wɛɛ, e ta ta an dɔ, min mbe ee dufɛn kuɔ fɔ ko a.
Ni i ya nan fan bɛɛ‑a i a dɛ ko yama ɔ, a bɔ, i ni a a dɛ. A nyin i ni kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn, i ya dɔndɔɛ wɛɛ a. Chɛɛ a yau, i ya a kandenɛ ni ma, mbɛ i ta‑a ta ɔ.
Tɔnɛnɛ n bɛɛ, miin mbe nɔ mɔɛ daun koe a, an mbe ee fa kuɔ fɔ ko a. Ta wɛɛ min mbe nɔ, a ɛ ka wan.
“A sin, mɔ ɔ mɔ ɛ dɔsimanɛ ɔ bia‑a wan, min kɔ gbɛ yɔ ta.
Wo a ma kuiɛ ni ma wo wandi gbu ɔ, wo ni ma faachima ɔ wo nyɔn na. Kuiɛ nyin fan, ni a ɔ ma sɛ ni. Chɛɛ ni a ɔ sɛ‑a, mɔ ee che to, i ni a ma a dia ni yɛ a ɔ.”
Chisɔsi ka‑a kɛn Kapanaun duu ɔ, a ta‑a wan Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ, a ta Chɔdan yii gbaa chia a. Mbɛ fanka a kan‑da to a ma. A sin, yɔ a ni a ma buɛ min dɔ, a na‑a an kan fan.

A sin, Chu mɔɛ dɔ nu, miin ni Fayisii n na, an na‑a wan a tena. An toen ni an ni a bia a chen kɔ. Mbɛ an dɔ, “Nn toen mu nn ni a ɔ sɔn, ni mmɔ 'a sawa dɔnden fan mu musu si kai ni a boo ka a 'a musu a.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Sawa minan mbe Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, Mosisi na‑a min fɔ wo ye, a ma koe a?”

Mbɛ an‑na a fɔ, an dɔ, “Mosisi‑a sawa min sa, a dɔnden fan mu nn ni nn 'na musu n boo ka. Koe min na mu, sawa chɛ ɔ te, e i 'a musu boo ka wan, ni i‑a siiya gboo be a ma, min mbe a ɔ yian, mbɛ i wan‑na i boo ka a a.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo 'a tooɔgbɛa, an‑na a ma, Mosisi‑a sawa chɛ n nyɛn wo ko a.
Chɛɛ Yataa 'a gboo ɔ te, mbɛ dunya a dan tima a, Yataa na‑a mɔ gbu fea an nyan, kai an fea musu a.
Yataa 'a gboo ɔ te to, a ɔ, ‘Chɛ an fɛ mu, ni mɔ kaima‑a musu fuu, ɛ a de to wan, a basan a fa a, mbɛ an chɛ‑a an nyɔn dɔ, an fea a 'a musu a.’
A ɔ, ‘A sin, an fea chɛ, an mbe ma‑a wan mɔ dɔndɔɛ a.’ Chɛ‑a a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ mɔ fea ma to an na, chɛɛ mɔ dɔndɔ gbe mu gbɛ an na.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, fuu ɔ, ni Yataa‑a mɔ fea an chɛ an nyɔn dɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ kan kɔ kan ma an tɛ du.”
An yɛ‑a kɛn chenɛ a, a fɛ denɛ n‑na a ɔ tisa wan to, a si musu ɔ ban koe dɔndɔ gbe chɛ ma.
Mbɛ a ɔ an ma, “Mɔ kaima kan kɔ kan, min mbe ban‑da a 'a musu ɔ, a ni dɔ gbɛɛ si, a‑a waa an ma basan ka musu a, a ee fuu ɔ min na, Yataa ya a.
Musu wɛɛ, ni a ban‑da a chɛɛ ɔ, a ni kai dɔ gbɛɛ sɔn, a wɛɛ‑a waa an ma basan ka kai a, a ee fuu ɔ min na, Yataa ya a.”
Chɛ gbakɔ, mɔɛ dɔ n na‑a wan an 'na den mɛsɛ n na Chisɔsi tena. An toen ni a ni a boo bun an kun ma, a ni samunɛ chɛ an ko a. Chɛɛ a fɛ denɛ n‑na chɛ ɔ yen kɛn, an‑na mɔɛ chɛ n na gban fan.

Chɛɛ Chisɔsi bu ɔ nii ma dia ni, chɛ ɔ yen koe a. Mbɛ a ɔ an ma, “Wo a ma den mɛsɛ n ni na n tena. Wo ma an ma bai. Koe min na mu, mɔɛ miin maen mu yɔ den mɛsɛ chɛ nu, Yataa an mbe ma‑a an 'na mansa a.
N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ma dɔn ni, a ni don Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ yɔ den mɛsɛ chɛ nu, an mɔɛ chɛ ee che ma‑a Yataa ta a.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a den mɛsɛ chɛ n ya dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a. Ɛ an si a kaa ma, ɛ a boo bun an ma, ɛ ta‑a an dua‑a.
Chisɔsi‑a a kuu sɔ kɛn ta‑a, a bɔ an kaina chɛ, kamin dɔndɔ na‑a bui chɛ‑a, mbɛ a bea‑a a chen kɔɔ. Mbɛ a ɔ, “Ticha, i wɛn mu mɔ chɛndɛ a, n mbe fen ma, n ni kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn?”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ a ma, “E ma ka ma i ni n chee mɔ chɛndɛ a? Mɔ ɔ mɔ ma mɔ chɛndɛ a, mɔɔ dechee Yataa dɔndɔ gbe.

I‑a sawa n sɔn fan, Yataa‑a miin be Mosisi ma. A ɔ, wo ma mɔ fa, ni sawa ma min fɔ ni. A ɔ, wo ma waa ma basan mɔɛ a, wo ee fuu ɔ min na, a ɔ, wo ma kanka chɛ, a ɔ, wo ma fania fɔ mɔ ɔ mɔ ma. A yɛ to, a ɔ, wo ma mɔ kafa, a sin, wo ni kooya be wo fa ma, a basan wo de a.”
Mbɛ kamin chɛ ɔ, “Ticha, n mbe wan sawa chɛ n gbɛɛ bia tena, aan a ka n den mɛsɛ tɔɛ ma a sɔ sanche ma.”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a kamin chɛ ma fɛn, a wakoe a dia‑a a ye. Mbɛ a ɔ kamin chɛ ma, a ɔ, “Ko dɔndɔ an to‑a, e min ma gbɛ. Ta, i ni i boo fenɛ gbɛɛ ma tachɛ. Mbɛ i‑a an kɔpɔɛ chɛ ya, i‑a a be yɔn tɔɛ n ma. Chɛ‑a a ma‑a wan, i ni nyanɛ ma sɔn banda bu ɔ. Ni i‑a chɛ ma, mbɛ i na‑a, i ma‑a n fɛ denɛ a.”
Kamin chɛ‑a bai chɛ a min kɛn, a ya kɔɔɛ ma‑a wan yama yama, mbɛ a yɛ‑a a waa a, faayɔn ba ɔ. Koe min na mu, nyan tɔ wa ni a a.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɛ denɛ n gbɛɛ ma fɛn a 'a tindanɛ, mbɛ a ɔ an ma, “A ɔ gbɛ kaka nyan tɔɛ n ko a, an ni don Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ.”
Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ n da ɔ gbaa‑a wan, a si a da a bai chɛ ma. Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ an ma, “N 'na denɛ nu, don koe a Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ, a ɔ gbɛ ka.
A ɔ gbɛ kaka nyan tɔɛ ko a, a ni don Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ, a ni ben ninchi don koe ma miichi woe a.”
Mbɛ bai gbu, a‑a an da a fa gban. Mbɛ an dɔ, “Mbɛ nyɔn mbe bauncha chɛ ma sɔn‑da gbɛ?”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a an gbɛɛ ma fɛn, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Mɔ gbu ee che chɛ chɛ‑a, chɛɛ Yataa tana, ɛ an chɛ. Koe min na mu, Yataa ɛ che wan ko ɔ ko ma‑a.”
Mbɛ Pita bun‑da a fɔ‑a, a ɔ, “A yen ko, nn‑na nn kan kɔ sɔ fen kɔ fen na, mbɛ nn bea‑a i fɛ.”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ka n mbe chɛ ma din wo tena. Chenɛ ni ma, ni suun ma nyɔɛ nu, de nu an bɛ fa n na, denɛ nu, a basan sɛnɛ n na, an nyin fan. Chɛɛ mɔɛ min mbe chɛ dɔndɔ wɛɛ to‑a n ko a, a ni a to sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ko a,

Yataa ɛ a kɔ‑a wan. Fen chɛ n gbɛɛ sanche, chenɛ n ni ma, suun ma nyɔɛ nu, de nu an bɛ denɛ n na, a basan sɛnɛ n na, Yataa ɛ a kɔ‑a wan an na dunya chɛ ɔ, si tena chɛmɛ dɔndɔ ko a. Chɛɛ a tima dɔndɔ gbe chɛ kɔɔ, ko ma gbaaenɛ ɛ si‑a wan an na. A sin, Yataa ɛ kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ be‑a wan an ma dunya nama ɔ, min mbe na tena.
Chɛɛ mɔɛ sɛsɛ nu, miin mbe sɔ ɔ ya ɔ sanche, Yataa ɛ an na yɛ‑a wan gbaa a. Mɔɛ miin sin mbe gbaa sanche, Yataa ɛ an sɔ‑a wan ya ɔ.”

Mbɛ an‑na chia bia, a sɛ Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. Chisɔsi an ni sɔ ɔ an ya ɔ. A sin, an da ɔ gbaaen fan ni. Mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ, miin ni a fɛ, chiandia ni wan an dɔ. Mbɛ a‑a a fɛ den tan kun ma fea chɛ n ya, a ta‑a an na kaina, an dechee, mbɛ a bun‑da a ɔ yian‑da an na, a si koe n ma, miin ni na tena a tan‑da Chuusaɛn duu ɔ.

Mbɛ a ɔ, “Mmɔ yen ko ta‑a gbɛ Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. An mbe n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, an mbe n bia tena wan nɔ, mbɛ an‑na n ma tachɛ Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa n ma, a basan Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ n na. An mbe kaa a tɛ‑a wan n bakoe ma, n fa koe a, mbɛ an‑na n be mɔɛ chɛ n ma, miin ma Chu mɔ n na.
A sin, an mbe n ma yɛn‑da wan, an ni an da yii chɛ n ma, an ni n bosa pien, mbɛ an‑na n fa. Chɛɛ ni an‑na chɛ ma, tee fea, a sawan bɔɛ ma, n mbe n kɔɔ sɔ‑a wan a ka saya ɔ.”
Mbɛ Chimisi n fea Chɔn na, kai Sɛbɛdi 'a denɛ nu, an na‑a Chisɔsi tena. Mbɛ an dɔ, “Kan mɔ, nn toen mu, nn ni i ɔ tisa, i ni koe an chɛ nn ye.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Fen koe sima mu, wo toen mu n ni min chɛ wo ye?”
Mbɛ an dɔ, “Tima min na e si‑a i 'a mansa sea ɔ, i 'a mansa wai chɛ koe a, nn toen mu nn dɔndɔ ni si i boo nyima ɔ, mbɛ dɔndɔ si‑a i manɛ ɔ.”
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo ma a ɔ sɔn wo e fen dɔ tisa tena. Wo e kun fan wo ni ko yawaen chɛ ɔ bia, n mbe na tena min dɔ bia‑a?”
Mbɛ an dɔ, “Mm, nn mbe kun fan.” Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ an ma, “Ko yawaen chɛ, min mbe na tena n tan‑da, ɛ wo wɛɛ tan‑da wan.
Chɛɛ n mbe ee che n faa ma ya‑a, si koe a n baima n 'na mansaya ɔ. Fa Yataa an‑na an si tena chɛ ɔ bɛn, mɔɛ chɛ n ko a, a‑a a boo sɔ miin ma.”
A fɛ den tanɛ tɔɛ chɛ n‑na bai chɛ a min kɛn, Chimisi an fea Chɔn‑na min fɔ, an faa tɛ‑a wan an ma.

Chɛɛ Chisɔsi‑a an gbɛɛ chee kaina dɔndɔ, mbɛ a ɔ, “Wo faa ma tɛ. Wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ mansa nu, mɔɛ chɛ n ko a, miin ma Chu mɔ n na, an mbe an 'na gbasaya yian fan an na. An 'na ya ɔ sɔɛ n bɛɛ, gbasaya ɛ ka wan an boo ɔ an kun ma.
Chɛɛ a ee ka wo tɛ ɔ. Ni wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ toen mu, a ni ma mɔ chenama a wo tɛ, an mɔɛ chɛ ni a wandi ma bɔi denɛ a, wo gbɛɛ ko a.
Ni wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ sin toen mu to, a ni ma ya ɔ sɔɛ a, a tɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ ko a, an mɔɛ chɛ wɛɛ ni ma an 'na yɔnɛ a.
Koe min na mu, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ wɛɛ, n ma na ni, mɔɛ n ni wai chɛ n ko a. Chɛɛ n na‑a, min mbe a ma, n ni mɔɛ n ma wai n chɛ. A yɛ to, n ni yɛ, n ni n fɔɛ be mɔ gbu n kun ka koe a.”

Mbɛ an che‑a Chɛiko duu ɔ. Chisɔsi n mbe kɛn bɔ‑a nɔ, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na, ni mɔ fanka miin ni an fɛ, an‑na kamin dɔndɔ tan fan si ɔ, chia kunɛ a. A tɔ ni Batimayɔsi, kai Timayɔsi 'a denɛ. Fion tɔɛ ni, a sin ni fenɛ an fuin.
A‑a a a min kɛn, mbɛ Chisɔsi, min ka‑a Nasaɛti duu ɔ, an mbe ka ben tena, a‑a yee tɛ gbankon, a ɔ, “Chisɔsi, i wɛn bɔ‑a Mansa Defidi 'a dambi ɔ, chinchin n ma!”
Mbɛ mɔ sɛsɛ nu nɔ, an sɔnkɔ‑a wan a ma, an dɔ, a ni a da a tɔn. Chɛɛ a tima gbu a ni gbɛ, a‑a yee tɛ a ben a saa ma, a ɔ, “I wɛn bɔ‑a Mansa Defidi 'a dambi ɔ, chinchin n ma!”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi sɔ‑a, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “Wo a chee n ye.” Mbɛ an‑na ya te tɔɛ chɛ chee, an dɔ, “I faa ma yɔn, i kɔɔ sɔ, a yen ko i chee‑a.”
Mbɛ a‑a a 'a doma kun ma doma bɔ, a‑a a a dɛ. Mbɛ a tin‑da buɔdia a, a ta‑a Chisɔsi tena.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “I toen mu n ni fen ko chɛ i ye?” Mbɛ ya te tɔɛ chɛ ɔ, “Kan mɔ, a ma n ya a ni ka.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ a ye, a ɔ, “Ta, e ta tena kaina min, i 'a danaya‑a i baun.” A ya kɔɔɛ a, kamin chɛ‑a kaina yen gbadan, mbɛ a‑a a sɔ Chisɔsi fɛ, a 'a tachɛ chia ma.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi n‑na a fo Bɛfachi konko baima, a basan Bɛtani a. Konko chɛ n ni Wodifi kɔnkɔɛ ma wan, an sin dɔ nii ma yansan Chuusaɛn duu ɔ a. Nɔ ni, a‑a a fɛ den fea an sɔ.
A ɔ, “Wo ta konko chɛ ɔ wo ya teen ma. Ni wo che‑a nɔ dechee, wo e sofɛ tɔngbɔɛ tan‑da wan, a chiienɛ ɛ, mɔ ɔ mɔ ma si nin bɛ min kɔ. Wo a fuin, wo ni na a a.
Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a wo ɔ tisa, fen ko a mu wo e chɛ ma tena, wo a fɔ a ye, wo ɔ, mansa an mbe a ma gbɔsɔɛ bɔ tena a a. Wo ɔ, ni a ban‑da dechee, wo e yɛ‑a wan a a dɔndɔ gbe.”
Mbɛ an ta‑a, an‑na sofɛ tɔngbɔɛ tan baa ma, a chiienɛ ɛ chen dɔndɔ kankanɛ ma. An bun‑da kɛn a fuin‑da,
mbɛ mɔɛ miin ni nɔ sɔ ɔ, an‑na an dɔ tisa. An dɔ, “Wo e kɛn sofɛ tɔngbɔɛ chɛ fuin‑da, wo e fen ma tena a a?”
Mbɛ an‑na Chisɔsi da a bai ɔ yian mɔɛ chɛ n na. Mbɛ an‑na a fɛ den chɛ n to nɔ, an ta‑a a a.
Mbɛ an na‑a sofɛ tɔngbɔɛ chɛ a Chisɔsi tena. Mbɛ an‑na an 'na doma kai n bɔ wan, mbɛ an‑na an dɔ sa sa sofɛ tɔngbɔɛ chɛ kɔ, mbɛ Chisɔsi si‑a a kɔ.
A sin to, mɔ sɛsɛ na‑a an 'na doma kai n dɔ fuin fan a ya ɔ chia a. Mbɛ dɔ n sin‑na yamba kuunɛ n tɛ ben‑da, an‑na an bɛɛ a bɔn a ya ɔ, basɔmaya ko a.
Mbɛ a ya ɔ mɔɛ nu, a basan a gbaa mɔɛ n na, an‑na yee wa tɛ, an dɔ, “Tando ni ma Yataa tɔɛ ma! Mansa Yataa ni mɔɛ chɛ dua, min na‑a a tɔɛ ɔ!
Yataa ni mansaya chɛ dua, min mbe na tena, min mbe ma‑a yɔ mmɔ bemba n ta bemba Defidi 'a mansaya ni buɛ min dɔ. Tando ni ma Yataa tɔɛ ma!”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi don‑da kɛn Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, a ta‑a dɔndɔ gbe Yataa 'a kata ɔ. A‑a fen kɔ fen ma mɛn fan nɔ. A tima chɛ a gbɛ, tee ni bea koe an dɔ. Mbɛ an bɛ a fɛ den tan kun ma fea n na, an bɔ‑a, an ta‑a Bɛtani duu ɔ.
Mbɛ banda ɔ ka‑a kɛn, an yɛ‑a Chuusaɛn, a ka Bɛtani. A yɛ tena chɛ, kɔnkɔɛ‑a Chisɔsi bia wan.

A‑a a ya a ta wan, mbɛ a‑a kɔnɛ yen pɔɔ, an ni min chee, an dɔ, fiki kɔnɛ, a pɔmbɔenɛ ɛ. Mbɛ a ta‑a, a ma fɛn koe a, ni a gbɔen fan ni. Chɛɛ a che‑a kɛn a ma, a nii ma a gbɔ kan kɔ kan tan ni a a, mɔɔ a yamba dechee. Koe min na mu, a gbɔ tima nii ma chɛ a.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ kɔn chɛ ma, a ɔ, “Kuɔ fɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee i gbɔɛ daun‑da to.” Mbɛ a fɛ denɛ n‑na a da a kuiɛ chɛ a min.

Mbɛ an che‑a Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. Chisɔsi ta‑a wan Yataa 'a kata ɔ, mbɛ a bun‑da mɔɛ chɛ n gbain‑da miin ni nɔ, an mbe fee fenɛ n ma tachɛ‑a, a basan a san mɔɛ n na. A‑a kɔpɔ sinchi mɔɛ n 'na tebu n na bea bea wan. Bugbɔɛ ma tachɛ mɔɛ n bɛɛ, a‑a an 'na si fenɛ n na dɛ dɛ wan.
A sin to, a nii dɔn mɔ ɔ mɔ ni don an kata chɛ ɔ, machiti a a boo ɔ.

Chɛ gbakɔ, a bun‑da an kan‑da, a ɔ, “A nyɛnden fan mu Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ Yataa‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, a 'a chenɛ ɛ dechee samun chɛ koe an na, dunya gbɛɛ ko a. Chɛɛ wo‑a an chen chɛ mun kanka n nun tena a.”

Mɔɛ miin ni Chu n tɛ ɔ Yataa a, an 'na mansa nu, an bɛ Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ n na, an‑na bai chɛ a min kɛn, an‑na a kuu sɔ wan chia yan‑da Chisɔsi fa koe a. An chiandenɛ ni a ma. Koe min na mu, a na‑a kanɛ chɛ buɛ min dɔ, fanka wa chɛ gbɛɛ nɔ, a na‑a an da a fa wan.
Mbɛ fitii che‑a kɛn, Chisɔsi bɔ‑a Chuusaɛn duu chɛ ɔ, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na.
An mbe kɛn yɛ tena sau sau ma, Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ n‑na fiki kɔn chɛ yen fan, a gbaaenɛ ɛ gbechee, a ka a yamba ma, aan a yii a suu ma.
Mbɛ Pita‑a a yii na chii, mbɛ a ɔ Chisɔsi ma, “Kan mɔ, a yen bɛ, i na‑a kɔnɛ min danka ka, a gbaa‑a pɔɛ.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo wo yii na tɛ dechee Yataa an ma.

N ni a ma din wo tena, mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe a fɔ‑a kɔnkɔɛ chɛ ma, a ɔ, a ni kuɛn, a ni ta, a ni si yii wa ɔ, ni sika ee a ɔ Yataa a, ɛ ma wan. Ni a danden fan mu a a dechee a faa ɔ, mbɛ ɛ koe min dɔ tisa tena, ɛ kun fan a ni ma, Yataa ɛ a ma wan a ye.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, n ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ ni wo‑a samunɛ chɛ fen fen ko a, wo kai faenɛ ɛ Yataa a, wo dan dechee a a, mbɛ wo‑a a ma sɔn fan.

A sin, tima ɔ tima ko a, ni wo‑a wo kɔɔ sɔ samun chɛ koe a, wo wo boo bɔ pɛn ko yama chɛ ɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ na‑a min ma wo a. Chɛ an mbe a ma‑a, wo fa wɛɛ, min mbe banda bu ɔ, a ni a boo bɔ wo 'a ko yama n dɔ, wo‑a miin ma.”
