Mbɛ an che‑a to Chuusaɛn duu ɔ kɛn, Chisɔsi don‑da Yataa 'a kata ɔ, mbɛ a bun‑da ben ben‑da a bu ɔ. Mbɛ Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa dɔ nu, ni Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ nu, an bɛ Chu gbakoo n na, an na‑a a tena.
Mbɛ an dɔ, “E koe miin ma ka, gbasaya minan mbe i boo ɔ, an ma koe a? An gbasaya chɛ sin, nyɔn‑na a be i ma?”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ka wɛ, n mbe wo ɔ tisa, tisa dɔndɔ gbe a. Chɔn ni yii chɛ wan mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a. Yataa an fea mɔ gbu a, minan na‑a an gbasaya chɛ be a ma? Wo chɛ fɔ n ye. Mbɛ n‑na a fɔ wo ye, min‑na gbasaya chɛ be n ma, koe chɛ n ma koe a.”
Mbɛ an‑na a kuu sɔ a tɛnsɛ‑a an nyɔn tɛ ɔ, an dɔ te, “Mmɔ ɛ fen fɔ kamin chɛ ye? Ni mmɔ‑a a fɔ, mbɛ Chɔn 'na gbasaya ka‑a Yataa an tena, ɛ a fɔ‑a wan, mbɛ fen na‑a a ma, mmɔ nii ma dan ni Chɔn na?

Chɛɛ mmɔ sin mbe ee che a fɔ‑a to, mbɛ Chɔn 'na gbasaya ka‑a mɔ gbu an na.” (An na‑a chɛ fɔ, a mu min na, an chianden fan ni fanka fanka chɛ n ma, miin ni nɔ. Koe min na mu, an gbɛɛ danden fan ni a a, mbɛ Chɔn ni Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛndɛ chɛndɛ an na).

Chɛ ko a, an‑na a fɔ wan Chisɔsi ye, an dɔ, “Nn ma a ɔ sɔn, ni Chɔn na‑a a 'a gbasaya chɛ sɔn kaina.” Mbɛ Chisɔsi wɛɛ ɔ, “N bɛɛ, n mbe ee a ɔ yian wo a, ni nyɔn 'na gbasaya ɔ mu, n mbe koe chɛ n ma tena.”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi bun‑da koɔ‑a an tena tai ɔ, a ɔ, “Kaminɛ ni wan nɔ, min‑na yadi sa. Mbɛ a‑a yadi chɛ da a sansa gbɛɛ, mbɛ a‑a a a bɛn. Mbɛ a yɛ‑a, a‑a bondonɛ nyan, ɛ a tɛn kaina, a ni a yii bɔ a ɔ. Mbɛ a yɛ‑a to, a‑a gbasa sɔ, a 'a yadi chɛ kun ma fɛn koe a. A ban‑da kɛn chɛ gbɛɛ ma‑a, mbɛ a‑a yadi chɛ kunɛ don mɔɛ n boo ɔ, a kun ma fɛn koe a, mbɛ a ta‑a chɛnyɛ dɔ mende ɔ.
Chin fen chɛ ya tima che‑a kɛn, yadi ti chɛ‑a a 'a bɔi denɛ dɔndɔ a ta wan yadi kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ n tena. A toen ni, an ni chin fen chɛ dɔ be a ma, mbɛ a na‑a a a ye.
Chɛɛ an chɛ‑a a ma, mbɛ an‑na a boan, an‑na a a yɛ, a boo a senɛ a.
Mbɛ yadi ti chɛ‑a a 'a bɔi denɛ dɔ mende a ta wan to, a fean bɔɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ yadi kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ n‑na a nɛnɛ ma gba wan, a kunɛ ɔ, mbɛ an‑na mauma koe n sɛ a ma.
Mbɛ a‑a dɔ mende a ta to, a sawan bɔɛ gbɛ. An‑na a nɛnɛ fa wan. An‑na bɔi denɛ to gbaa nɛnɛ n bɛɛ bia ka wan, yɔ a saa chɛ nu. An‑na dɔ n boan fan, mbɛ an‑na dɔ n sin fa.
Chɛɛ dɔndɔ gbe ni wan a boo ɔ gbɛ, a a ta koe a an tena, a 'a denɛ, min ko a ni di a ye gbeden. Mbɛ a yiima ɔ, a ɔ, ‘An mbe basɔmaya be‑a wan n 'na denɛ wandi gbu ma.’
Chɛɛ yadi kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ n‑na a fɔ wan an nyɔn ma, an dɔ, ‘Yadi ti chɛ 'a denɛ wandi gbu an nɛ. Wo na, mmɔ ni a fa, min mbe a ma, boo fenɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ni ma mmɔ ta a.’
Mbɛ an‑na a 'a den chɛ bia, an‑na a fa, mbɛ an‑na a su a dɛ yadi gbaa chia a.”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo ta yiima ɔ, ni yadi ti chɛ na‑a tima min na, ɛ fɛn ma‑a yadi kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ n na? Ɛ na‑a wan, a ni an yadi kun ma fɛn mɔɛ n kasaa, mbɛ a‑a a don a kun ma fɛn mɔɛ dɔ mende n boo ɔ.
Ɛ wan n yii ma, mbɛ wo‑a a kan fan Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, a kaka min‑na a fɔ, a ɔ, ‘Chen sɔ mɔɛ n na‑a ban senɛ min dɔ, an dɔ, a ma nyin, an gbu ma‑a gbɛ senɛ kuu ba wandi a, chenɛ gbu ko a.
Yataa an‑na chɛ ma. A sin mu kamaya koe an na mmɔ ya a.’ ”
Chu n kun ti n toen ni, an ni Chisɔsi bia. Koe min na mu, a ni wan an yii ma, a 'a tai chɛ sien mu an fan ma. Chɛɛ an chian‑da wan mɔ fanka fanka chɛ ma, mbɛ an‑na a to nɔ, an ta‑a an ye.
Mbɛ an‑na Fayisii dɔ n sɔ, an bɛ Mansa Ɛdɔdi fɛ mɔɛ dɔ n na, Chisɔsi tena. An toen ni, an ni a ɔ chɛ tisa chɛ a a, mbɛ an‑na a bia a chen kɔ, a da a bai ɔ.

An na‑a Chisɔsi tena, mbɛ an dɔ, “Ticha, nn‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ danaya tɔɛ mu i a. I ma i gbɔsɔ ni mɔ gbu ɛ min fɔ, a si i ma, chɛɛ e tea an na tachɛ tun. A yɛ to, nn‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ i ma i gbɔsɔ ni mɔ 'a sɔ tena ko a, chɛɛ e mɔɛ n kan Yataa bai miin gbɛɛ a, tea mu an na. A ɔ yian bɛ nn na, i ta yiima ɔ, i‑a pawa chɛ be koe yen ka ma Domi kun ti wa ma, a nyin fan?”
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi na‑a an 'na yiinachii yama chɛ kɔɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, “Fen mu wo toen mu wo ni n dɔ chɛ? Wo na n ye kain gbɛnsɛn dɔndɔ a, n mbe a ma fɛn.”
Mbɛ an na‑a a a, mbɛ a ɔ an ma, “Nyɔn ya kɔɔɛ ɛ ka a ma, a basan a tɔɛ a?” Mbɛ an dɔ, “Domi kun ti wa an nɛ.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Mbɛ fen chɛ nu, miin mu Domi kun ti wa boo fenɛ a, wo an be a ma. Mbɛ wo yɛ‑a, fen chɛ nu, miin be Yataa ko a, wo‑a an be Yataa ma.” An tɛnɛ‑a wan a a, a‑a an yɛman buɛ min dɔ.
Mbɛ Chu mɔɛ dɔ nu, miin ni Sadusii n na, miin nii ma dan ni mɔɛ kɔɔ sɔ koe a a ka saya ɔ, an bɛɛ na‑a Chisɔsi tena. Mbɛ an‑na a ɔ tisa, an dɔ,

“Ticha, Mosisi‑a sawa chɛ an nyɛn mmɔ ko a, a ɔ, ‘Ni mɔɛ suun ma nyɔɛ kaima fa‑a,’ a ɔ, ‘mbɛ a‑a a 'a musu to, an fea ma den suun ni min na,’ a ɔ, ‘a dinden fan mu a ma,’ a ɔ, ‘a ni chenɛ da mun, an ni denɛ suun ta mɔɛ chɛ ko a.’
Tima dɔndɔ a, kaminɛ n ni wan nɔ, an kai wɔnfea an de‑a an fɛn suun. Mbɛ a wɛn ni chenan ka an gbɛɛ ma, a‑a musu si. Mbɛ a fa‑a, a ma den suun ni, musu chɛ ma.
Mbɛ denɛ kaima fean bɔɛ chɛ wɛɛ‑a musu dɔndɔ gbe chɛ si to musu a. Mbɛ a wɛɛ fa‑a ka wan, a ma den suun ni, musu chɛ ma. A sawan bɔɛ wɛɛ ma‑a ka wan.
An wɔnfean bɔɛ gbɔdɛ, a na‑a musu chɛ si wan. Chɛɛ a wɛɛ nii ma den suun ni, musu chɛ ma, mbɛ a wɛɛ fa‑a. A danka a gbɛ, musu chɛ wɛɛ gbu fa‑a.
Ni tee che‑a, faa mɔɛ n ni an kɔɔ sɔ a ka saya ɔ, musu chɛ ɛ ma nyɔn 'na musu a gbɛ? A yen ko, a ni wan an gbɛɛ boo ɔ, musu a.”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo saman‑da kaka a fɔ koe a, mbɛ ni mɔɛ fa‑a, a ee a kɔɔ sɔ to a ka saya ɔ. Mbɛ fen‑na a ma wo saman‑da, a mu koe min na, wo ma Yataa 'a gboo ɔ gbɛ ni, mbɛ a yɛ to, wo ma ko ɔ ko sɔn a si Yataa 'a gbasaya ma.
Tima min na, mɔɛ n mbe an kɔɔ sɔ‑a a ka saya ɔ, musu si basan kai sɔnɛ a, a ee ma‑a nɔ. Mɔ gbu gbɛɛ ɛ ma‑a wan yɔ maeka nu banda bu ɔ.

Min sin sien mu faa mɔɛ n kɔɔ sɔ koe ma, a ka saya ɔ, ɛ n yii ma, mbɛ wo‑a a kan fan, Mosisi 'a gboo ɔ, a si kɔn den chɛ ma, min ni yɔ a ni minda tena wan. Yataa na‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, a ɔ, Yataa mu a wan na Ebeami ko a, a basan Aisaki an fea Chekɔpi a. A ɔ, an mbe a wan fai.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ to, a ɔ, “Chɛ‑a a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ chɛndɛ ba n fan mbe Yataa fai. Mɔɛ min faen mu, a ee Yataa fai. Tea ee wo 'a yiinachii ɔ.”

Mbɛ Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔ dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ sɔ ɔ, min ni a too ma sɔ tena an 'na chia ɔ bɔɛ chɛ ma. A‑a a ɔ yen kɛn, mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a Sadusii chɛ n 'na tisa yɛman fan chɛndɛ chɛ, a wɛɛ ɔ, “Mosisi na‑a sawa sɛsɛ be wan mmɔ ma. An tɛ ɔ, sawa minan mu a chenama a?”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Sawa chenama gbu yen ko. ‘Wo a a min, wo wan Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ nu. Mansa Yataa, an mu mmɔ 'a Yataa a. A ɛ dɔndɔ gbe.
A sin, wo to Mansa Yataa a, wo faa gbɛɛ a, wo ni to a a, wo 'a fɔɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, wo ni to a a, wo sɔɛ gbɛɛ a, wo ni to a a, wo yiima gbɛɛ a.’
Sawa fean bɔɛ chenama gbu an nɛ, ‘Wo to wo 'a mɔɛ n na, yɔ wo toen mu buɛ min dɔ wo wandi a.’ Sawa kan kɔ kan mbe ee nɔ, min benden mu sawa fea chɛ n ma.”
Mbɛ sawa kan mɔɛ chɛ ɔ, “Ticha, i‑a tea fɔ, mbɛ Mansa Yataa an mu Yataa dɔndɔ gbe a. Yataa dɔ mende kan kɔ kan mbe ee nɔ, mɔɔ a wan.

Mbɛ mɔ gbu ni to Yataa a, a faa gbɛɛ a, ni a yiima gbɛɛ a, a basan a sɔɛ gbɛɛ a. A ni yɛ to, a ni to a 'a mɔɛ n na, yɔ a toen mu buɛ min dɔ a wandi a. A ma bɛnden mu sawa fea chɛ n sa tena ɔ bɛn koe a, a ni ben yasi kan kɔ kan ma.”
Mbɛ kɛn Chisɔsi‑a a ɔ yen, mbɛ kamin chɛ‑a yiimatɛ bai fɔ, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ a ye, a ɔ, “Ɛnden fan to‑a gbɛ, mbɛ i don‑da Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ.” Chɛ gbakɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ chian‑da wan gbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ tisa koe a.
Chisɔsi to‑a kan chɛ an na Yataa 'a kata ɔ, mbɛ a‑a an dɔ tisa, a ɔ, “Mmɔ 'a sawa kan mɔɛ nu, an mbe kun ka ma an ni a fɔ, an dɔ, mbɛ kunka mansa ɛ bɔ‑a Mansa Defidi 'a dambi an dɔ? Fen mu chɛ ɛ ma?
Mansa Defidi wandi gbu wɛɛ, Yataa Nyina na‑a bai don kɛn a da ɔ, a na‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, ‘Mansa Yataa‑a a fɔ n 'na Mansa ye, a ɔ, “Si nɛ n boo nyima ɔ, aan n ni i chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ n don i kɔɔ.” ’

Mansa Defidi wandi gbu yen ko gbɛ, a ɔ, kunka mansa chɛ benden mu a ma. Chɛɛ mɔ kun ma kundi ee koa, a ni ben i ma. A fɔen mu gbɛ, mbɛ kunka mansa chɛ ɛ bɔ‑a Mansa Defidi 'a dambi an dɔ. Fen ko a, chɛ ɛ ma?” A tima chɛ a, mɔ fanka chɛ nu, an bu ɔ dia‑a wan, an too ma sɔ koe a Chisɔsi ma.

A sin ni kɛn an kan‑da, a ɔ, “Wo wo kun ma fɛn Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ chɛ n boo ɔ. An toen mu doma wa wa don koe a, an mbe ben ben. Ni an ta‑a machiti an dɔ, an toen mu mɔɛ n ni basɔmaya kɔndɔnɛ chɛ an na.
Ni an ta‑a mmɔ 'a samun chɛ chenɛ n bɛɛ a, an toen mu si tena ma bɛnden ba an na. Daun chɛ bɛnɛ wɛɛ ɔ, an toen mu si koe a gbakoo n fan tɛ.
An mbe fuinya musu n boo fenɛ n gbɛɛ daun fan, kafaya ɔ. An gba yama chɛ ma nun koe a, an mbe samun dɔ yansama an chɛ. Chɛ ko a, Yataa wɛɛ ɛ an tɔɔya‑a wan, a ni ben mɔɛ tɔɛ n gbɛɛ ma.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi si‑a kɔpɔ sa kakaa chɛ ya teen ma, Yataa 'a kata ɔ, ɛ mɔ fanka n ma fɛn‑da, an mbe an boo fenɛ n na bea‑a a ɔ. A‑a nyan tɔ sɛsɛ yen fan, an mbe boo fen chenama n na bea‑a.
Mbɛ fuinya musu na‑a, yɔn tɔɛ, mbɛ a‑a kɔpɔ gbɛnsɛn den fea a bea. An kɔpɔ gbɛnsɛn fea chɛ, a a kanden ni pɛnɛ an na.

Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɛ denɛ n chee, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Tea a, n ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ fuinya musu yɔnden chɛ, a‑a kɔpɔɛ min na bea ka, a benden mu chɛ ma, mɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, an‑na miin na bea ka.
A mu min na, chɛ n‑na min be ka, an‑na a ya a chenama an kun ma, chɛɛ musu chɛ ta kɔpɔɛ gbɛɛ an nii nɛ a boo ɔ. Kɔpɔ dɔ mende kan kɔ kan mbe ee to a boo ɔ.”
Chisɔsi ni kɛn bɔ tena Yataa 'a kata chɛ ɔ, a fɛ den dɔndɔ‑a a fɔ wan a ye, a ɔ, “Kan mɔ, i ya a ta, i ni chen nyima wa chɛ n yen, an‑na miin sɔ sen nyima chɛ n na.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “I‑a chen nyima wa chɛ n yen, tima ɛ che‑a wan an gbɛɛ ni bea. A dɔndɔ wɛɛ ee to‑a sɔ ɔ, a gbɛɛ a ɛ kan‑da wan duu gboo a.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ni kɛn si ɔ Yataa 'a kata chɛ ya teen ma, Wodifi kɔnkɔɛ kun ma, mbɛ Pita ni ma, Chimisi, Chɔn ni Anduu, an na‑a a tena. An dechee ni, mbɛ an dɔ,
“I‑a bai min fɔ ka, a ɔ yian nn na, ni sɔyɔ mu koe chɛ n mbe ma‑a. A tɔmɔsi ɛ ma‑a fen na, nn ni a ɔ sɔn mbɛ koe chɛ n gbɛɛ, an mbe ka na tena ma‑a na?”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi bun‑da a fɔ‑a an ye, a ɔ, “Wo wo kun ma fɛn, an ma na wo woo.
Mɔ sɛsɛ n mbe na‑a wan n tɔɛ ɔ, an mbe a fɔ‑a wan, an dɔ, an fan mu Chasi a, kunka mansa. A sin, an mɔɛ chɛ n mbe mɔ sɛsɛ sɔ‑a wan chia yama ma.
Wo e chɛɛ ma tɔɛ a min‑da wan wo a tindanɛ, wo ni chɛɛ ma tɔɛ a min pɔɔ. Koe chɛ n mbe ma‑a wan, chɛɛ wo ma chian. Chɛ ni ma wɛɛ, a ee a ɔ yian, mbɛ tima che‑a dunya ban koe a.

A yɛ to, chɛnyɛ n mbe butuinɛ chɛ‑a wan an nyɔn na, mbɛ chɛnyɛ mɔɛ dɔndɔɛ n‑na chɛɛ chɛ an bɛ chɛnyɛ mɔ dɔ mende n na. Kɔnkɔ ma chianden ba ɛ ma‑a wan chɛnyɛ sɛsɛ ɔ, a sin to, duu gboo wɛɛ ɛ samba‑a wan chɛnyɛ sɛsɛ ɔ, dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a. Ko yawaenɛ saa n fan nɛ ka miin mbe ma‑a. Ko yawaenɛ chenama n mbe gbaa, miin mbe na tena ma‑a chɛ n gbakɔ.

“Chɛɛ wo wo wandi kun ma fɛn. An mbe wo bia‑a wan, an ni ta wo a, gbakoo n chen kɔɔ. An mbe yɛ‑a wan to, an ni wo gbasi an 'na samun chɛ chenɛ n na. An mbe wo bia‑a wan, an ni ta wo a, chɛnyɛ ti n tena, an mbe ta‑a wan wo a, mansa wa n chen kɔɔ. An mbe chɛ gbɛɛ si‑a wan wo a, a si n bakoe ma. Chɛɛ wo e kun‑da wan Yataa 'a sakana bai chɛndɛ ɔ yian‑da an na.
Chɛ n mbe e na to ma‑a, sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ pɛn mbe fɔ‑a, mɔɛ n ye chɛnyɛ gbɛɛ ɔ.

Ni an na‑a wo a kun ti n tena, wo gbɛmbo koe a, an ni wo be gbae, wo faa ma gbaa, a si bai ma, wo e na tena min fɔ‑a. Chɛɛ bai ɔ bai, wo e min ma sɔn‑da a tima chɛ kɔɔ, wo e an fɔ. Koe min na mu, wo fɔ bai nu ma, wo e miin fɔ‑a, chɛɛ a bai chɛ n mbe ka tena Yataa Nyina an tena.
A sin, mɔɛ ɛ a suun ma nyɔɛ be‑a wan, an ni a fa. A yɛ to, mɔɛ fa ni a 'a denɛ be. Denɛ n bɛɛ gbu sin, an mbe sɔ‑a wan kan, an woo mɔɛ n na, an ni an fa.
Wo sin, mɔɛ n gbɛɛ, an mbe too‑a wan wo a, a mu min na, n fɛ mɔɛ mu wo a. Chɛɛ i wɛn mbe i faa bia‑a aan a danka a, Yataa ɛ i baun‑da wan.”

Chisɔsi ɔ, “Chɛɛ wo e fen ma nyamuienɛ n yen‑da wan, miin mbe fenɛ n yɔn, an mbe sɔ ɔ kaina, an nii ma sɔ ɔ kaina min.” (Wo wɛn mbe gboo chɛ kan‑da, wo ni a ɔ gbɛ chɛndɛ chɛ, bai chɛ fasaien mu fen na). “Ni wo‑a chɛ yen ma‑a, wo wɛn mbe Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ, wo bui sa a a kɔnkɔɛ chɛ n dɔ, wo fɔɛ ko a.
I wɛn mbe baa ma, i ma don to chenɛ a, i boo fen kan kɔ kan ya koe a.
I wɛn mbe i 'a sɛnɛ ɔ, i ma yɛ to duu ɔ, koa ya koe a.
A tima chɛ a, koe n mbe yaua‑a gba, miin mbe bu ma musu n nan gbu tan‑da, a basan kuinsa n na.
Wo samunɛ chɛ Yataa tena, wo ma na bui chɛ chɛ sama ɔ.
Koe min na mu, an tima chɛ a, ko yawaenɛ miin mbe ma‑a, ɛ ben‑da wan a kɔma ma, miin ma‑a a ka dunya a dan tima ma, a sɔ sanche ma. A sin a nyɔn sima ee ma‑a to kuɔ fɔ.

Chɛɛ Mansa Yataa‑a tee chɛ n ma wua, ko yawaen bia tee chɛ nu. Ni a nii ma an ma wua ni, mɔ gbu kan kɔ kan kun nii bɔ‑a a ɔ. Chɛɛ a‑a tee chɛ n ma wua a 'a mɔɛ chɛ n fan ko a, a‑a a boo sɔ miin ma, an ma koe a a 'a mɔɛ n na.
“Chɛɛ ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a fɔ i ye, a ɔ, i ya a na wɛ, i ni mmɔ kun ka mansa yen nɛ, i ma dan a a. Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, a yen ko pan, i ma dan a wɛɛ a.

A mu min na, fania kunka mansa an mbe na‑a wan, a basan fania fɔ mɔɛ n na, miin mbe an fandi ya Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n na. An mbe kamaya koe n ma‑a wan, an ni koe tɔmɔsi n yian, mɔɛ n woo koe a. Ni an mbe kun fan, an mbe mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ woo‑a wan, Yataa‑a a boo sɔ miin ma, ma koe a a 'a mɔɛ n na.
Chɛɛ wo wo kun ma fɛn! N ban‑da wo too kɔ‑a, an mbe e na to ma‑a.”
Chisɔsi ɔ, “Chɛɛ ni ko yawaen tee chɛ n ben‑da, tee ee na‑a man‑da, mbɛ kau wɛɛ pimbi‑a.
Tɔmbuaka n mbe bea‑a wan a ka banda a. Fen kɔ fen min mbe banda a, Yataa ɛ a ɔ samba‑a wan a ka a gba ɔ.
A sin, a tima chɛ a, an mbe n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, an mbe n yen‑da wan na‑a gbasaya wa ɔ dugbu ɔ, a yɛ to, n mbe ma‑a wan man‑da Yataa 'a manɛ a.

A sin, n mbe n 'na maeka n na ta‑a wan, an ni mɔɛ chɛ n na sɔn sɔn, n‑na n boo sɔ miin ma, ma koe a n ta mɔɛ n na. N mbe an na sɔn sɔn‑da wan, a ka dunya tɔnkɔnɛ naaninɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, a ka kan kɔ kan dunya gbɛɛ ɔ.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo wo yii na chii wɛ kɔnɛ ma. Ni wo‑a a yen pɔmbɔ‑a, a ni ma gbɛ wo yii ma, mbɛ sama ɔ ma yansan to.
A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, ni wo‑a koe chɛ n yen ma‑a, a ni ma wo yii ma, mbɛ tima ɔ ma yansan to, n na koe a.
N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ koe chɛ n gbɛɛ mbe ma‑a pɛn, wo nyɔn sima chɛ n mbe e na ban dunya ɔ.
Dunya gbɛɛ ɛ ban‑da wan, chɛɛ n da a bai ee ka‑a a gba ɔ kuɔ fɔ ko a.”

Chisɔsi ɔ, “Chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ ma a tee gbu sɔn, a basan a tima a, n na koe a. N fan, Yataa 'a denɛ wɛɛ, n ma a ɔ sɔn, ni n mbe na‑a tima min na. Maeka n bɛɛ, banda bu ɔ, an ma a sɔn. Fa Yataa dɔndɔ gbe, an‑na a ɔ sɔn.
Wo wo kun ma fɛn, wo ma bɛndenɛ ni ma. Koe min na mu, wo ma tee sɔn, n na tima ɛ che‑a tee min ma.

A ɛ wan yɔ mɔɛ, ɛ ma ta‑a tachɛ ɔ. A ɛ ma a waa boo ka‑a, ɛ a 'a bɔi denɛ n to wan chenɛ kun ma fɛn koe a. A ɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ ta wai be wan a ma, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ a 'a chen ma kɔn mɔɛ n ye, a ɔ, an ni chenɛ kun ma fɛn.

Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo ma bɛndenɛ ni ma tima ɔ tima ko a. Koe min na mu, wo ma a ɔ sɔn, chen ti chɛ ɛ na‑a tima min na, yɛɛ ma tee a mu, chɛ ma, su tɛ, chɛ ma, tɛ kɔnɛ konchee tima a sayi ma, chɛ ma, sau ma.
A ma na na, a ni i tɛnɛ, e sa ɔ chinɔɛ ɔ.
A sin, n mbe min fɔ wo ye, n mbe an fɔ mɔɛ gbɛɛ ye. Wo ma bɛndenɛ ni ma.”

A to‑a gbɛ tee fea, mbɛ Chu n 'na kun bɔ a ɔ bɛnɛ bia tima che‑a, an 'na biidi dɛnfɛ daun bɛn chɛ. A tima chɛ a, Chu n tɛ ɔ mɔɛ nu Yataa, an 'na mansa nu, an bɛ Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ n na, an toen ni an ni Chisɔsi bia nun dɔ, mbɛ an‑na a fa.
Chɛɛ an‑na a fɔ wan an nyɔn ye, an dɔ, “Mmɔ ma a ma bɛn chɛ kun ma, mɔɛ n ma na gbunɛ a bea.”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi yɛ‑a Bɛtani duu ɔ. A ta‑a wan kamin dɔndɔ 'a chenɛ a, min tɔ ni Saimɔn. Saimɔn chɛ ni mɔɛ an na, gbandi yama bɔen ni tee min gboo ma. An fea Chisɔsi a, an ni kɛn si ɔ daun chɛ a, musu dɔndɔ na‑a wan tu kunyɛ a diama wa a an chen chɛ a. Tu chɛ sin ni baa min dɔ, a nyanden ni senɛ ɔ wan. Mbɛ a‑a baa chɛ da tɛ, a‑a a chɛ Chisɔsi kunɛ ɔ.
Chɛɛ mɔɛ dɔ n ni wan nɔ, miin faa tɛen ni, an bun‑da a fɔ‑a an nyɔn ye, an dɔ, “Musu chɛ‑a tu bonda chɛ gbɛɛ yayi fen ko a ka?
Koe min na mu, a ni a ma tachɛ wan bɛɛ kɔpɔɛ a, min ni ben san dɔndɔ pawa ma, mbɛ a‑a a be yɔn tɔɛ n ma.” Mbɛ an‑na musu chɛ ma nyin, a yama boo a.
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo a to nɔ dechee. Fen ko a, wo e a ma nyin tena? A‑a koe min ma ka n na, a ma kawaen mu.

Koe min na mu, yɔn tɔɛ n tana, wo bɛ an mbe ma‑a an na tima ɔ tima ko a. A sin, ni wo toen mu, wo ni ko chɛndɛ ma an na tima ɔ tima, wo e a ma wan. Chɛɛ n tana, n mbe ee ma‑a wo tɛ ɔ tima ɔ tima ko a.
Musu chɛ‑a koe an ma ka, ɛ che min chɛ‑a, n ko a. A‑a tu min chɛ ka n kunɛ ɔ, a‑a n ma bɛn fan ka, n tɔn koe a, n fa tima ya ɔ.
A‑a min chɛ ka, n ni a ma din wo tena, a ee danka‑a nɛ. Chɛɛ kan kɔ kan dunya chɛ ɔ, sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɛ fɔ‑a kaina, musu chɛ 'a ko chɛndɛ chɛ wɛɛ, ɛ fɔ‑a wan nɔ, mɔɛ n gbɛɛ ni a a min.”
Mbɛ Chudasi Isikayɔti, min ni Chisɔsi fɛ den tan kun ma fea chɛ n dɔndɔ a, a ta‑a Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa n tena, min mbe a ma, a ni Chisɔsi ma tachɛ an ma.

An sin‑na chɛ a min kɛn a da a, an bu ɔ dia‑a wan, mbɛ an dɔn‑da kɔpɔɛ gbu be koe a a ma. Mbɛ a ka gbɛ a tee chɛ ma, Chudasi ni wan gbɛ chia yan‑da, ɛ kun buɛ min dɔ, a ni Chisɔsi ma tachɛ mɔɛ chɛ n ma.

Mbɛ tee saa saa che‑a bɛn chɛ ko a, biidi dɛnfɛ daun bɛn chɛ. A tee chɛ a ni, an ni sa n fa tee min ma, daun fenɛ a, kun bɔ a ɔ bɛn chɛ ko a. Mbɛ Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ n‑na a ɔ tisa, an dɔ, “I toen mu nn ni ta mende, nn ni kaina ɔ bɛn, daun fen chɛ daun koe a, i boo ɔ?”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɛ denɛ n sɔ, an mɔ fea, ta koe a Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. A ɔ an ma, “Wo e ma‑a wo kunɛ a don‑da duu wa chɛ ɔ, wo e kaminɛ tan‑da wan, ɛ ta‑a yii a da ɔ. Wo bea a fɛ.
A sin, ni a don‑da chen kan kɔ kan na, wo a fɔ chen ti chɛ ye, wo ɔ, ‘Nn kan mɔ‑a nn sɔ, a ɔ, i ni dumu yian nn na. A ɔ, nn ni a ɔ bɛn daun chɛ koe a, kun bɔ a ɔ bɛn chɛ ko a. Dumu gbu ɛ wan nɔ?’
A sin, ɛ dumu ɔ bɛnden ba yian‑da wan wo a, banda a chenɛ banda a. Wo ko ɔ ko ɔ bɛn nɔ, mmɔ ko a.”
Mbɛ a fɛ den fea chɛ nu, an ta‑a duu wa chɛ ɔ. Mbɛ Chisɔsi na‑a bai miin gbɛɛ fɔ an ye, a bɔ‑a wan a a. Mbɛ an‑na daun fen chɛ gbu ɔ bɛn, kun bɔ a ɔ bɛn chɛ ko a.
A sin, yɛɛ ma tee a che‑a kɛn, mbɛ Chisɔsi na‑a, an bɛ a fɛ den tan kun ma fea chɛ n na.
An sin ni kɛn si ɔ tebu ma, daun chɛ‑a, mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N mbe chɛ ma din‑da wan wo tena, mbɛ wo dɔndɔ, ɛ na tena wan n ma tachɛ‑a. Wo dɔndɔ, mmɔ bɛ, mmɔ ɛ daun chɛ‑a min na.”
Mbɛ an faa bun‑da yɔn‑da, an bun‑da a fɔ‑a a ye, dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a, chɛ ɔ, “N gbee ma chɛ a, ae?”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Mɔ dɔndɔ mu, wo mɔ tan kun ma fea chɛ n tɛ. Nn fea gbu, nn mbe daunɛ chɛ tena min na, koen dɔndɔɛ ɔ.

Koe min na mu, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe na tena wan fa‑a, yɔ a nyɛnden mu buɛ min dɔ Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, a si n ma. Chɛɛ ɛ yaua‑a gba mɔɛ chɛ ko a, min mbe n ma tachɛ‑a. Ni a nii ma suun ni, a ni nyan‑da wan a ko a.”

Mbɛ an ni kɛn daun chɛ chɛ‑a, Chisɔsi‑a biidi dɔndɔ ya. Mbɛ a‑a Yataa ɔ tisa, a ni biidi chɛ dua. Mbɛ a‑a a ɔ kai kai, a‑a a du du an ma, ɛ ta‑a a fɔ‑a, a ɔ, “N fandi gbu, n gboo an nɛ. Wo a bia, wo ni a daun.”

Mbɛ a‑a kɔpu wɛɛ ya, gbɛ ni min dɔ. Mbɛ a‑a Yataa wai bɔ, a‑a a be an ma, mbɛ a ɔ, “N wii an nɛ, n mbe na tena min na bɔn‑da mɔ gbu gbɛɛ ko a. N wii chɛ, Yataa ɛ an ya tena, mbɛ a‑a dɔbɛn nama chɛ a 'a mɔɛ n na.” Mbɛ an gbɛɛ, an‑na a bia, an‑na a min.
A ɔ, “Ka wɛ, n mbe chɛ ma din wo tena. N mbe ee gbɛ chɛ min‑da to, mɔɔ dechee tima chɛ a, tima min na Yataa ɛ a 'a mansaya ɔ yian‑da. A tima an na mu, n mbe gbɛ nama min‑da, mmɔ bɛ.”
Mbɛ an‑na Yataa si sa kɛn, an ta‑a kɔnkɔɛ chɛ ɔ, an ni min chee, an dɔ, Wodifi kɔnkɔɛ.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo gbɛɛ, wo e na tena wan ka‑a n fɛ. Koe min na mu, a nyɛnden fan mu Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ ni Yataa‑a sa kun ma fɛn mɔɛ ya, sa n dɔ ɛ fasan fan.
Chɛɛ tima min na Yataa ɛ n kɔɔ sɔ‑a, a ka saya ɔ, n mbe ta‑a wan wo ya ɔ Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ.”
Chɛɛ Pita‑a a fɔ wan Chisɔsi ye, a ɔ, “N bɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ ni ka wɛɛ i fɛ, n tana, n mbe ee ka‑a i fɛ.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Pita, n ni a ma din i tena, mbɛ tɛ kɔnɛ e na konchee gba fea sayi chɛ ma, e kɔɔsa bia chɛ‑a wan gba sawa, a si n sɔn koe ma i boo ɔ.”
Chɛɛ Pita chii‑a wan a ma Chisɔsi tena, a ɔ, “I fa tena, n fa tena. N mbe ee kɔɔsa bia chɛ‑a i wakoe ma.” Mbɛ Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ tɔɛ n gbɛɛ, an‑na a fɔ ka wan.
Mbɛ an ta‑a kaina chɛ, an ni min chee, an dɔ, Kɛsemani. Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ a fɛ denɛ n ye, a ɔ, “Wo si nɛ, n mbe samunɛ chɛ.”
Mbɛ a‑a Pita ya, ni Chimisi an fea Chɔn na. Mbɛ mɔnɛ koa‑a a ma a ya a, mbɛ a faa yɔn‑da.
Mbɛ a ɔ, “Faayɔnɛ min mbe n ma, a da a koo. A toen mu, a ni ta n na faa. Wo ma chinɔ nɛ, wo n ma kɔn.”
Mbɛ a ka‑a wan an baima ɛnden na, mbɛ a‑a a wandi ɔ fuin duu ma, a bun‑da samunɛ chɛ‑a. A‑a Yataa ɔ tisa wan, ni ɛ bɛn fan, tima chɛ a, ko yawaen chɛ ni ka a kun ma.
A ɔ, “Fa, e kun fan ko ɔ ko ma. A ma ko yawaen chɛ ni ka n teen na. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, n ta faa ma koe, an ma ma. Chɛɛ i ta faa ma koe, an ni ma.”
Mbɛ a yɛ‑a, a‑a an tan sa ɔ chinɔɛ ɔ. Mbɛ a ɔ Pita ma, “Saimɔn, e ka chinɔɛ ɔ wan? E ee kun i ni ma i ya a, awa dɔndɔ wɛɛ ko a?
Wo wo kɔɔ sɔ, wo ma chinɔ. Wo samunɛ ma ti bia, Sitana ma na a ma, wo ni wo kan kɔ sɔ Yataa a. Wo toen mu wo ni Yataa faa ma koe n ma, chɛɛ a gbasaya ee wo boo ɔ an ma koe a.”
Mbɛ a ta‑a to, a‑a samunɛ chɛ, a‑a bai dɔndɔ gbe chɛ an fɔ, a na‑a min fɔ a saa a.
Mbɛ a yɛ‑a to a fɛ den chɛ n tena. A‑a an tan to chinɔɛ ɔ. Koe min na mu, chinɔɛ ni fanka an ya a kaka. An gbu nii ma a ɔ sɔn, ni an mbe fen fɔ a ye.
Mbɛ a yɛ‑a to, a gba sawan bɔɛ ɔ, a fɛ den chɛ n tena. A ɔ, “Wo e ka sa ɔ chinɔɛ an dɔ tun? Wo e wo suin‑da? A kun‑da gbɛ. Tima che‑a, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n ma tachɛ koe a, ko yama ma mɔɛ n ma.
Wo wo a sɔ, mmɔ ni bun ta‑a. Wo wo ya a ta pan. Mɔɛ min mbe n ma tachɛ tena, a yen ko na‑a.”

Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, Chisɔsi to‑a koɔ an na, mbɛ mɔ fanka na‑a a tan. Chudasi, a fɛ den tan kun ma fea chɛ n dɔndɔ, an ni sɔ ɔ an ya ɔ. Mɔɛ miin mbe Chu n tɛ, an bɛ Yataa, an 'na mansa nu, ni Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ nu, an bɛ an 'na gbakoo n na, an fan na‑a an sɔ. Kɔn kundu ma tɛenɛ, a basan chɛɛ chɛ mɛ a, ɛ an boo ɔ.
An mbe e na to na‑a, Chudasi na‑a a fɔ wan mɔɛ chɛ n ye, a ɔ, ɛ mɔɛ min kɔndɔn‑da, a ɔ, an nɛ. A ɔ, an ni dɛ a ma, an ni a bia gban, mbɛ an ta‑a a a.
Mbɛ an‑na a fo kɛn, Chudasi ta‑a Chisɔsi tan a ya kɔɔɛ a, mbɛ a ɔ, “Kan mɔ,” mbɛ a‑a a kɔndɔn.
Mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ n dɛ‑a Chisɔsi ma, mbɛ an‑na a bia gban.
Chɛɛ Chu n 'na tɛ mɔ wa Yataa tena, a 'a bɔi denɛ, a ni wan an mɔɛ chɛ n tɛ ɔ. An‑na Chisɔsi bia kɛn, mbɛ mɔ dɔndɔ, min ni nɔ sɔ ɔ, a‑a chɛɛ chɛ mɛ bɔ a a, mbɛ a‑a bɔi denɛ chɛ too tɛ a a gbeda.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ an ma, “Wo nii wo wandi tɔɔ na koe a, chɛɛ chɛ mɛ n na wo boo ɔ, a basan kɔn ma tɛenɛ a, n bia koe. Kanka ma chianden ma n na.
Mmɔ‑a tee sɛsɛ wa chɛ gbɛɛ ban, Yataa 'a kata chɛ ɔ, n mbe kan chɛ chɛ‑a, wo ma n bia ni. Chɛɛ Yataa 'a gboo‑a min fɔ, a ni bɔ a a.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ n gbɛɛ, an‑na a dɔndɔ gbe to, mbɛ an ben‑da bui‑a.
Chɛɛ kamin tɔngbɔ dɔndɔ na‑a a sɔ wan Chisɔsi fɛ. Kamin tɔngbɔɛ chɛ, a nii ma a ma chii ni koa dɔ gbɛɛ ɔ, fɔ dechee fen gbɛ, a na‑a min wangban. An toen ni an ni a wɛɛ bia.
Chɛɛ a‑a a 'a koa chɛ to wan an boo ɔ, mbɛ a ben‑da bui‑a, a ma senɛ a.
Mbɛ an ta‑a Chisɔsi a tɛ mɔ wa chɛ chen kɔɔ, Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an kun ti chɛ. A tima chɛ a, Chu n tɛ mɔɛ n gbɛɛ Yataa a, ni an 'na sawa kan mɔɛ nu, an bɛ gbakoo n na, an na kanden fan ni nɔ.

Pita na‑a a sɔ wan Chisɔsi fɛ. Chɛɛ a ma dɔn ni, a ni gbɛn an ma gbɛdɛn. An ta‑a wan, aan a che an 'na tɛ mɔ wa chɛ 'a kata chɛ ɔ, mbɛ an don‑da nɔ. Pita wɛɛ don‑da wan, mbɛ a si‑a, an bɛ kata chɛ kun ma fɛn mɔɛ n na, ɛ a gbaa‑a ta fɛ.

Mbɛ Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa nu, an bɛ Chu kuti wa ɔ mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a, an bun‑da siiya yan‑da, a si Chisɔsi ma. An toen ni, an ni chia yan, a fa koe ma. Chɛɛ an nii ma chia sɔn ni, a fa koe a.
Mɔ sɛsɛ na‑a wan, an‑na fania fɔ Chisɔsi ma. Chɛɛ an da a kuiɛ ma bɔ ni a nyɔn na.
An dɔ nu, an sɔ‑a wan, an‑na fania siiya chɛ, a si a wan Chisɔsi ma. An dɔ te,
“Nn‑na a a min fan, a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, ɛ kun fan a ni Yataa 'a chen chɛ, mmɔ‑a min sɔ ka mmɔ boo a, a ni a te, mbɛ a‑a a sɔ tee sawa tɛ ɔ, mɔ gbu boo sin fan mbe ee a sɔ‑a.”
Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, an da a kuiɛ ma bɔ ni a nyɔn na fion.

Mbɛ Chu n 'na tɛ mɔ wa Yataa tena, a‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, mbɛ a sɔ‑a an gbɛɛ ya kɔɔ. Mbɛ a‑a Chisɔsi ɔ tisa, a ɔ, “A yen ko gbɛ, siiya n‑na bai chɛ gbɛɛ fɔ, a si i ma. Bai ɔ bai ee i da a, e min fɔ, min mbe i kun bɔ koe chɛ ɔ?”
Chɛɛ a na‑a a ma maun fan, a nii ma bai ɔ bai fɔ ni. Mbɛ tɛ mɔ wa chɛ‑a a ɔ tisa to, a ɔ, “I wan mu kunka mansa chɛ a, mɔɛ n mbe Yataa min tando, a 'a denɛ ɛ?”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N fan nɛ. A sin, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, wo e n yen‑da wan, n mbe si ɔ kaina ma bɛndenɛ Yataa boo nyima ɔ, gbasaya ɔ. A sin to, wo e n yen‑da wan na‑a, banda a dugbu ɔ.”
Mbɛ tɛ mɔ wa chɛ‑a bai chɛ a min kɛn Chisɔsi da a, a‑a a ma doma a panda wan. Mbɛ a ɔ, “Mmɔ ɛ to‑a to siiya dɔ mende minan na?
Wo ban‑da a a min‑da, a‑a Yataa main. Fen bai ɛ wo da a, a fɔ koe a?” Mbɛ kaa tɛ mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ‑a kaa a tɛ wan, mbɛ an‑na Chisɔsi yɛi. An dɔ, a nyin a ni fa.
Mbɛ an dɔ n bun‑da an da yii chɛ‑a a ma, mbɛ an‑na a ya a chii, an dɔ n sin‑na a tu botani a. An dɔ a ma, “A ɔ yian bɛ, mɔɛ min mbe ka i gbasi tena.” Mbɛ kata kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ n sin, an‑na a gbasi.
Pita na‑a a a tun fan, si koe a kata chɛ ɔ, denka ɔ chia a. Mbɛ bɔi den musuma tɔngbɔ dɔndɔ, min ni tɛ mɔ wa chɛ 'a chenɛ a, a na‑a.
A‑a Pita yen kɛn, ɛ a gbaa tena chɛ, a‑a a ma fɛn, mbɛ a ɔ, “I wɛɛ, i ni wan Chisɔsi fɛ, Nasaɛti mɔɛ chɛ.”

Chɛɛ Pita‑a kɔɔsa bia chɛ wan a ma, a ɔ, “N ma a ɔ sɔn, a yɛ to, n ma a ɔ gbɛ ni, e ka bai min fɔ tena, ni a sien mu min ma.” Mbɛ Pita‑a a a sɔ, mbɛ a bɔ‑a, a sɔ‑a kata chɛ da a. Mbɛ a tima chɛ a, tɛ kɔnɛ konchee‑a.
Mbɛ bɔi den musuma chɛ‑a a yen to nɔ, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ to mɔɛ chɛ n ye sɔ ɔ, a ɔ, “Kamin chɛ, a mu Chisɔsi fɛ mɔɛ dɔndɔ an na.”
Chɛɛ Pita yɛ‑a wan to, a‑a kɔɔsa bia chɛ chɛ wɛɛ ma. A ɔ ma yansan ni, mbɛ mɔɛ miin ni ka nɔ sɔ ɔ, an dɔ, “Mɔ dɔndɔ mu i a, min ni Chisɔsi fɛ. Koe min na mu, i wɛɛ ka‑a Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ wan.”
Chɛɛ Pita ɔ, “Yataa ni n tɔɔya, ni n mbe ka fania an fɔ tena. N ma kamin chɛ sɔn, wo e ka min bakoe fɔ tena.”

Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, tɛ kɔnɛ konchee‑a. A fean bɔɛ an nii nɛ gbɛ, tɛ chɛ‑a chɛ ma. Mbɛ a puin‑da Pita yii ma, mbɛ Chisɔsi na‑a a fɔ wan a ye, a ɔ, “Pita, tɛ kɔnɛ e na konchee, si tena fea, e a fɔ‑a wan yɔ i ma n sɔn, gba sawa ko a.” Chɛ‑a a ma wan, Pita puyɛ‑a di a.

A sau sau chɛ ma, Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa nu, ni Chu gbakoo nu, a basan Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ n na, an bɛ Chu kuti wa ɔ mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a, an bɛn‑da kun puinɛ ɔ. Mbɛ an‑na Chisɔsi chii fɔin, an ta‑a a a, mbɛ an‑na a konan Kɔfana Padeti ma.
Mbɛ Kɔfana Padeti‑a a ɔ tisa, a ɔ, “I wan mu Chu mɔɛ n 'na mansa a?” Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “I‑a an fɔ ka.”
Mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu, Chu n tɛ Yataa a, an 'na mansa chɛ nu, an‑na kun sɛsɛ si wan Chisɔsi kun ma.
Mbɛ Kɔfana Padeti‑a a ɔ tisa to, a ɔ, “Bai ɔ bai ee i da a, e min fɔ? A ɔ yen bɛ, an mbe kun sɛsɛ wa min si tena i kun ma.”
Chɛɛ chɛ wɛɛ ɔ to, Chisɔsi ma a tɛ ni a ma gbukuu wɛɛ. Chɛ‑a Kɔfana Padeti da a fa wan gban.
San kɔ san na, kun bɔ a ɔ bɛnɛ kun ma, manda ni dɔndɔ, Kɔfana Padeti ni min na tachɛ. A ni mɔ dɔndɔ boo ka wan, min mbe sa ɔ pimbi chenɛ a, an ni a ɔ tisa min boo ka koe a.

A san chɛ a, kamin dɔndɔ min tɔ ni Baabasi, a ni wan pimbi chenɛ a, an bɛ a bɔɛ dɔ mende n na. An ni mɔɛ n fan na, an na‑a miin bia butuin chɛ koe a Domi mansa n na. Baabasi chɛ na‑a mɔɛ an fa, yɔ a bɔɛ chɛ dɔ n bɛɛ.
Kɔfana Padeti ni kɛn Chisɔsi gbɛmbo‑a, mɔ fanka wa a kan‑da a ma. An‑na a ɔ tisa wan, an dɔ, a ni manda chɛ a ben, min‑na ɛ ben tee.
Mbɛ a ɔ, “Wo toen mu, n ni n boo ka nyɔn na wo ye, Chu n 'na mansa chɛ?”
Kɔfana Padeti na‑a chɛ fɔ, koe min na mu, a na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ toomaya gbama, an na‑a a ma, Chu tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa n na‑a Chisɔsi a a chen kɔɔ.
Chɛɛ a che‑a kɛn an kaina chɛ, Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa chɛ n‑na a ma wan, an‑na fanka fanka chɛ a sɛ. An dɔ, an ni yee tɛ Baabasi an boo ka koe a.
Chɛɛ Kɔfana Padeti‑a an dɔ tisa wan to, a ɔ, “Mbɛ wo toen mu gbɛ n ni fen ma kamin chɛ a, wo e min chee, wo ɔ, wo wan Chu n 'na mansa?”
Mbɛ an‑na yee tɛ to, an dɔ, “A ni gbangban kɔnɛ ma, a ni fa.”
Chɛɛ Kɔfana Padeti ɔ, “Fen ko a chɛ ɛ ma? Kamin chɛ gbu, a‑a fen ko yama ma?” Chɛɛ an‑na yee gbu ma munda wan gbɛ, an dɔ, “A ni gbangban kɔnɛ ma, a ni fa.”
Mbɛ Kɔfana Padeti‑a a boo ka wan Baabasi a, fanka fanka chɛ faa chima koe a. Mbɛ a‑a a ma, an‑na Chisɔsi gbasi bosa a pien, mbɛ a‑a a be, an ni a gbangban kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma, a ni fa nɔ.
Chɛ gbakɔ, soya chɛ nu, miin ni Kɔfana Padeti kɔɔ, an ta‑a Chisɔsi a, mbɛ an don‑da a a Kɔfana Padeti 'a kata chɛ ɔ. Mbɛ an‑na an bɔɛ tɔɛ n gbɛɛ a kan.
Mbɛ an‑na a ma chii mansa doma a, min kɔ yawaen ni. Mbɛ an yɛ‑a wan to, an‑na banfua nyan wai ɔ, mbɛ an‑na a si a kun na. An dɔ, a 'a mansa banfua an nɛ.
Mbɛ an bun‑da mansa kɔndɔnɛ chɛ‑a a a, an dɔ, “Chu mɔɛ n 'na mansa chɛ ni mɛ.”
Mbɛ an bun‑da Chisɔsi kun tɛ gbasi‑a kɔn kundu a. An mbe ta‑a an da yii wɛɛ fasi‑a a ma, mbɛ an mbe ta‑a to an kumbai gbangban‑da a chen kɔɔ.
Mbɛ an ban‑da kɛn a ma yɛn‑da, an‑na a ma bɔ wan gbae an ta mansa doma chɛ a, mbɛ an‑na a ta don a ma. Mbɛ an bɔ‑a a a, ta koe a fa a, kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma.

An to‑a ta an na Chisɔsi a, mbɛ an bɛn‑da kamin dɔndɔ a. A tɔ ni Saimɔn, a sin na‑a ka Sayini duu ɔ wan, ɛ na‑a Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. A 'a denɛ n fan nii nɛ Adɛsanda a, ni Dufɔsi. Soya chɛ n‑na a yen kɛn dechee, an‑na a din fan a ma, ta koe a kɔn gbengbanden chɛ a, Chisɔsi ko a.
Mbɛ an che‑a Chisɔsi a kaina dɔndɔ, an ni min chee, an dɔ, Kɔkɔta, min fasaien mu, kun konkon ma.
Nɔ ni, mbɛ an‑na gbɛ be a ma, min dɔ basandenɛ ni gboo ɔ dumɛ bui a. Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ma dɔn ni a ni a min.
Mbɛ an‑na a gbangban kɔn gbengbandenɛ chɛ ma nɔ. Mbɛ an yɛ‑a, an‑na chɛ fenɛ chɛ a ma koa n ko a, an ni a ɔ sɔn, ni mɔɛ ɛ min ma sɔn.
Tee kaina kɔɔɛ a ni, kɛn an‑na Chisɔsi gbangban kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma.
Mbɛ koe min gbu na‑a a ma, an‑na a gbangban kɔn gbengbanden chɛ ma, an‑na a nyɛn fan kɔn dɛnfɛ ma, an dɔ, Chu mɔɛ n 'na mansa an nɛ.
An na‑a a gbangban kɔn gbengbanden chɛ ma kaina dɔndɔɛ wan, an bɛ kanka fea an na. Dɔndɔɛ ɛ a boo nyima ɔ, dɔndɔɛ ɛ a manɛ ɔ.
Mbɛ chia a ben mɔɛ n‑na an kunɛ fichi fichi wan. Mbɛ an bun‑da a main‑da, an dɔ, “Wua! O, i wɛn‑na a fɔ, i ɔ, e Yataa 'a chenɛ te wan, mbɛ i‑a a sɔ tee sawa tɛ.
Mbɛ puin bɛ kɔn gbengbanden chɛ ma, i ni i wandi kun bɔ saya yuu chɛ ɔ.”

Mɔɛ miin ni Chu n tɛ ɔ Yataa a, an 'na mansa nu, an bɛ Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ a, an‑na mayɛma koe n sɛ wan Chisɔsi ma. An mbe a fɔ an nyɔn ye, an dɔ, “A‑a mɔ dɔ mende n baun, chɛɛ a ee che a ni a wandi baun.

Ni a wan mu kunka mansa chɛ a, Chu mɔɛ n 'na mansa, a ni puin bɛ kɔn gbengbanden chɛ ma. Chɛ an mbe a ma‑a, nn ni a wakoe ɔ yen, mbɛ nn dan‑da a a.” An bɛ gbangban‑da ka mɔ fea miin na dɔndɔ a, an bɛɛ, an‑na a main ka wan.
Tee che‑a kɛn kun tɛ, an tee chɛ ma, pimbi bun‑da wan chɛnyɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, aan awa sawa ko a.
Mbɛ tee kɔ kai ma, Chisɔsi‑a yee tɛ wan gbankon, a ɔ, “N 'na Yataa, n 'na Yataa, fen mu i ban‑da n dɔ?”
Mbɛ mɔɛ dɔ nu nɔ sɔ ɔ, an‑na a a min kɛn a‑a min fɔ, an dɔ, “Wo a yen ko, ɛ ka kai Idaicha an chee‑a, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛ suun.”

Mbɛ an dɔndɔ‑a bui sa a a, mbɛ a ta‑a, a na‑a fen yɔfu yɔfu a. Mbɛ a‑a a chima gbɛ a, min baa nii ma gbɛ. Mbɛ a‑a a don kɔnɛ a, a don koe a Chisɔsi da a, a ni a susu, ɛ ta‑a a fɔ‑a a bɔɛ n ye, a ɔ, “Mmɔ a ma kɔn, kɔkɔɛ Idaicha ɛ na‑a wan, a ni a a yii kɔn gbengbanden chɛ ma.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a yee tɛ to gbankon, mbɛ a fa‑a.
Mbɛ tɛndi, min ni dɛn dɔ Yataa 'a chen chɛ bu ɔ, a tɛka‑a fea a, a ka a kandɔɛ, aan a yii a denka ɔ.
Mbɛ Domi soya gbakoo chɛ, min ni sɔ ɔ nɔ Chisɔsi ya kɔɔɛ, a‑a a ɔ yen kɛn, mbɛ Chisɔsi fa‑a, a‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “Kamin chɛ ni Yataa 'a denɛ chɛndɛ chɛndɛ gbu an na.”

Musu n bɛɛ, an ni wan nɔ, an mbe sɔ ɔ pɔɔ, an ya bɛndenɛ ɛ a ma. Bɔɔɛ Mɛi min ka‑a Makadaa duu ɔ, a ni wan nɔ. Bɔɔɛ Mɛi dɔndɔɛ wɛɛ ni wan nɔ. A 'a denɛ ni Chimisi dɔɔma a, ni Chosesi. Bɔɔɛ Sadome wɛɛ ni wan nɔ.
Musu chɛ n fan na‑a a sɔ Chisɔsi fɛ, a ni Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ tima min na. A sin, an fan ni a deman chia sɛsɛ a. Musu sɛsɛ ni wan to nɔ, miin bea‑a a fɛ, a sɛ‑a tima min na Chuusaɛn duu ɔ.
An tee chɛ bea ma, min ni tee a Chu n ni an ma bɛn an 'na suin tee chɛ ko a,

kamin dɔndɔ na‑a wan nɔ, a ka Ayimatia duu ɔ. A tɔ ni Chosɛfi, a sin baa ni wan a ma kaka, Chu gbakoo n tɛ, miin ni si Chu kuti wa ɔ. A yɛ to, a ya ni wan tima chɛ ya ɔ, tima min na Yataa ɛ a 'a mansaya ɔ yian‑da. A sin, a na‑a a faa sɔ wan, mbɛ a ta‑a Kɔfana Padeti tena, a‑a Chisɔsi su ɔ tisa a ma.
Chɛɛ yiinachii ni wan Kɔfana Padeti ɔ, ni Chisɔsi gbu faen fan ni gbɛ. Mbɛ a 'a soya gbakoo chɛ, a‑a a chee, a‑a a ɔ tisa ni Chisɔsi faen fan ni gbɛ.
Mbɛ soya gbakoo chɛ, a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, Chisɔsi fa‑a. Kɔfana Padeti‑a chɛ a ɔ gbɛ kɛn, mbɛ a dɔn‑da a su be koe a Chosɛfi chɛ ma.
Mbɛ Chosɛfi‑a fen gbɛ san. Mbɛ a‑a Chisɔsi su a yii, a‑a a a mendemende fen gbɛ chɛ a. Mbɛ a‑a a sa kamba ɔ, min nyandenɛ ni senɛ ɔ. Mbɛ a‑a faa gban ba tundun kamba chɛ da a.
Mbɛ Mɛi, min ka‑a Makadaa, ni Mɛi dɔndɔɛ, min ni Chosesi de a, an ya ni wan kaina chɛ a, Chisɔsi na‑a tɔn ka kaina.

Mbɛ suin tee chɛ ben‑da kɛn, bɔɔɛ Mɛi, min ka‑a Makadaa duu ɔ, an fea Chimisi de Mɛi a, ni bɔɔɛ Sadome, an ta‑a, an‑na tu kunyɛ a diama san. Musu chɛ n toen ni, an ni tu kunyɛ a diama chɛ fasi fasi Chisɔsi su chɛ ma.
Mbɛ sayi ma, Tɛnɛ kan kɔ dɔɛ ma, tee kainɛ a, an ta‑a wan Chisɔsi kamba ma.
An ni kɛn ta tena, an‑na an nyɔn dɔ tisa wan, an dɔ, “Sen ba dɛgbɛ chɛ, nyɔn mbe a ka‑a kamba chɛ da a, mmɔ ye?”
Chɛɛ an‑na an kunɛ kɔɔ sɔ kɛn, mbɛ an‑na a yen, mbɛ sen ba gbu chenchendenɛ ɛ, a ka kamba gbu da a.
Mbɛ an don‑da kɛn kamba gbu bu ɔ, an‑na kamin tɔngbɔɛ yen nɔ. Kamin chɛ ni si ɔ an boo nyima ɔ wan. A sin, doma kai min ni a ma, a gbɛen fan ni. Chɛ‑a an kɔndɔ fii wan.

Mbɛ a ɔ, “Wo kɔndɔ ma fii. N‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ wo e Chisɔsi an yan tena, min ka‑a Nasaɛti duu ɔ, an‑na min gbangban kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma. A ee nɛ. Wo a yen, a ni sa ɔ kaina. Yataa‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, a ka saya ɔ.
Chɛɛ wo ta gbɛ, wo ni a ɔ yian a fɛ denɛ n na. Wo a ɔ yian Pita wɛɛ a, wo ɔ, ɛ sɔ ɔ wo ya ɔ, a ta Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ, wo ɔ, nɔ mu wo e a yen‑da, yɔ a na‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ tee wo ye.”
Mbɛ an ben‑da bui‑a, a bɔ an kamba chɛ ɔ. Koe min na mu, masamba basan kɔndɔfii a, a ni koo an dɔ. Chɛ sin‑na a ma wan, an ma che ni koɔ‑a mɔ ɔ mɔ tena, an chianden ba ɛ. [
Mbɛ Chisɔsi na‑a a kɔɔ sɔ kɛn, Tɛnɛ kan kɔɔ dɔɛ ma, a‑a a wandi yian mɔɛ min pɛn na, an nɛ Mɛi a, min ka‑a Makadaa duu ɔ. A na‑a nyina yama wɔnfea chɛ n gbain an Mɛi chɛ an fɛ.
Mbɛ Mɛi ta‑a, a‑a a fɛ mɔɛ kɔma chɛ n tan, an mbe sanka di chɛ‑a. Mbɛ a‑a a ɔ yian an na.
Chɛɛ an nii ma che ni dan‑da a a, an‑na a a min kɛn, mbɛ a wan Mɛi‑a a yen fan, a ɛ fɔɛ ɔ.
Chɛ gbakɔ, a fɛ den fea nu, an ni wan ta‑a konko dɔndɔ ɔ. Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a wandi yian an na pɛnɛnɛ mɔ ya dɔ mende ɔ.
Mbɛ an yɛ‑a, an‑na a ɔ yian an bɔɛ tɔɛ n na, chɛɛ an bɛɛ ma dan ni an da a bai chɛ a.

Chɛ gbakɔ, Chisɔsi fɛ den tan kun ma dɔndɔɛ chɛ nu, an ni wan si ɔ tebu ma, daun chɛ tena. Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a wandi yian an gbɛɛ a. A‑a an ma tɔɔ, a ɔ, an faa a kɔɔen mu, a sin, danaya ee an dɔ. A ɔ, koe min na mu, an ban‑da dan koe a mɔɛ saa an na, miin na‑a a wan Chisɔsi yen, a kɔɔ sɔenɛ gbakɔ saya ɔ.
Mbɛ a ɔ an ma, “Wo ta dunya chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, wo ni sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian mɔ ɔ mɔ a.
Mɔɛ miin mbe an kai fa‑a n na, yii ni chɛ an kunɛ ɔ Yataa chia a, an mbe bauncha ma sɔn‑da wan. Chɛɛ mɔɛ miin mbe ee an kai fa‑a n na, Yataa ɛ kaa a tɛ‑a wan an bakoe ma, an ni ma tɔɔya ɔ.
Mbɛ a sin, chɛ an mbe ma‑a tɔmɔsi a, tee ɔ tee a, chɛ n ko a miin kai faen mu n na. An mbe nyina yama n gbain‑da wan mɔɛ n fɛ, n tɔɛ ɔ, an ni koɔ chɛnyɛ koɛ n dɔ, miin mbe fɔ chɛnyɛ dɔ mende n dɔ.
Ni an‑na ka n bɛɛ bia, a ee ko ma‑a an na. Chɛ ma, an ni bɔɛɛ wɛɛ min, a ee ko ɔ ko ma‑a an na. An mbe an boo bun‑da wan gbandi mɔɛ n ma, mbɛ an baun‑da.”
Mbɛ Mansa Chisɔsi ban‑da kɛn koɔ‑a a fɛ den chɛ n tena, Yataa‑a a ya wan, a sɛ banda bu ɔ, mbɛ Chisɔsi si‑a a boo nyima ɔ.

Mbɛ a fɛ denɛ n ta‑a kan kɔ kan, an mbe ben‑da sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian‑da mɔɛ n na. Mansa Chisɔsi sin basan‑da wan an ma, an 'na wai gbɛɛ ɔ. A sin, a‑a a ɔ yian tɔmɔsi n dɔ, miin ni yen an 'na sakana bai gbaa chia a, mbɛ an mbe tea chia an na.]

Koe miin ma‑a suun, mɔ sɛsɛ n ya‑a a ɔ yen fan, a ka a kuu sɔ tena. An mɔɛ chɛ n dɔ n sin, an‑na an koe n na ben fan nn tena. Koe min na mu, Yataa 'a sakana a ben mɔɛ ni an na. Mɔɛ dɔ nu, miin‑na koe chɛ n na min, an si‑a wan, an‑na a nyɛn gboo ɔ.
N bɛɛ, n‑na an koe chɛ n ma mɛn fan chɛndɛ chɛ, a ka an kuu sɔ tena ma. Chɛ an‑na a ma, kai Tɛyɔfidɔsi, n sin mbe an bɔ tena a gbee ma gbɛ gbɛ, n ni a nyɛn i tena,
min mbe a ma, i wɛɛ ni a ɔ gbɛ chɛndɛ chɛ. I ni a ɔ gbɛ, tea min mbe koe chɛ n gbaa, i kan‑da miin ma. N bɛɛ, n mbe ka gbɛ koe chɛ n fan nyɛn‑da i tena, n‑na koe miin kɔɔ gbɛngbɛn.

Tima min na Ɛdɔdi ni mansa a Chu chɛnyɛ gbɛɛ kun ma, mɔɛ ni wan nɔ, min ni Chu n tɛ ɔ Yataa a, a tɔ ni Sakaaya. A 'a wai chɛ dɔbɛnɛ tɔ ni Abicha dɔbɛnɛ. A 'a musu tɔ ni Disabɛti. A wɛɛ na‑a bɔ mɔ kuun chɛ n fan tɛ ɔ, miin ni Chu n tɛ mɔɛ n na Yataa a.
Sakaaya tanden fan ni Yataa tena, an fea a 'a musu Disabɛti a. A sin an 'na fɔɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, an ni Mansa Yataa 'a sawa n gbɛɛ bia wan.
An fea gbɛɛ chenanchaen fan ni gbɛ, chɛɛ den nii an boo ɔ, koe min na mu, Disabɛti gbandayaen fan ni.
Tee dɔndɔ a, Sakaaya ni wan a 'a tɛ mɔ wai chɛ tena Yataa 'a kata ɔ, an bɛ a bɔɛ n na, an fɛn ni Abicha wai chɛ bɛnɛ ɔ nɔ.
Mɔ dɔndɔ an ni don Mansa Yataa 'a chenɛ a, fen kunyɛ a diama minda koe a tee ɔ tee a. A tee chɛ ma, yɔ an 'na manda‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, a bɔɛ n boo bɛn‑da an ma, don koe a a minda‑a.
Mɔ sɛsɛ ni wan baa ma samun chɛ‑a, kɛn Sakaaya ni fen kunyɛ a diama chɛ minda tena.
Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, Mansa Yataa 'a maeka bɔ‑a wan a ya a, ɛ sɔ ɔ gbengbe boo nyima ɔ, Sakaaya ni fen kunyɛ a diama chɛ minda tena min ma.
Sakaaya‑a a yen kɛn, a kɔndɔ fii‑a wan kaka, mbɛ a chian‑da a ɔ benden ba a.
Chɛɛ maeka chɛ ɔ, “Sakaaya, i ma chian, koe min na mu, Yataa‑a i 'a samunɛ a min. I 'a musu Disabɛti ɛ den kaienɛ suun‑da wan i ye. A tɔɛ ni ma Chɔn.
Wo bu ɔ dia‑a wan kaka, ni den chɛ suun‑da. Mɔ sɛsɛ n bɛɛ bu ɔ dia‑a wan.
Koe min na mu, ɛ ma‑a wan mɔ chenama a Mansa Yataa tena. A ma gbɛ kan kɔ kan min. A de e na to a suun‑da, Yataa Nyina ɛ ma‑a wan den chɛ fɛ gban.
Ɛ a ma‑a wan Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ sɛsɛ n ni yɛ an 'na Mansa Yataa chen kɔɔ.

Yataa Nyina ɛ gbasaya be‑a wan a ma, yɔ a‑a a be buɛ min dɔ Idaicha ma, min ni a 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ a suun. Ɛ na‑a wan Mansa Yataa ya ɔ, mɔ sɛsɛ n sɔ koe a chia ma. Ɛ a ma‑a wan, denɛ n ni na kuiɛ a kanɛ ɔ, an bɛ an fa n na. Ɛ a ma‑a wan to, tooɔgbɛa tɔɛ n bɛɛ ni bea tea fɛ, yɔ mɔ tandenɛ nu.”
Chɛɛ Sakaaya ɔ, “N mbe kun ka ma, n ni dan chɛ a? N chenancha buɛ chɛ, nn fea n 'na musu a.”
Mbɛ maeka chɛ ɔ, “N fan mu Chebɛɛ a. Yataa baima sɔ mɔɛ mu n fan na, a 'a wai chɛ koe a. A sin, a wan‑na n sɔ koɔ koe a i tena, a 'a sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a ben koe a.

Chɛ an fɛ mu, i ma danɛ min chɛ ni ka n na, a yen ko gbɛ, ɛ ma‑a ka wan. A ka gbɛ sanche ma, e ma‑a mumuncha an dɔ, a che a tee chɛ ma, n 'na sakana bai chɛ ɛ bɔ‑a a a tima min na. A sin ko ɔ ko ma‑a wan, yɔ ɛ ma buɛ min dɔ, a ma tima ma.”
A tima chɛ a, mɔɛ chɛ n ni wan Sakaaya ma kɔn tena baa ma. An ni wan an yiinachii a, fen mu ɛ mɛ tena ka Yataa 'a chen chɛ a.
A bɔ‑a kɛn, a ma che ni koɔ‑a an tena. A bun‑da koe siman‑da a boo a, chɛɛ a ma che ni bai dɔndɔ wɛɛ fɔ‑a. A tima a mu, mbɛ an‑na a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ a‑a kamaya koe an dɔ yen Yataa 'a chen chɛ a.
A‑a a ta tima ban Yataa 'a tɛ mɔ wai chɛ chɛ‑a, mbɛ a yɛ‑a a waa a.
Tima ɛnden gbakɔ, a 'a musu Disabɛti‑a bu ya wan. A ma bɔ ni chenɛ a aan kau duu, a ɔ,
“Mansa Yataa basan‑da gbɛ n ma, a danka a. A‑a fanka ɔ mau ka n ya a sanche, bu chɛ be koe a n ma.”
Disabɛti bu ma kau wɔdɔn bɔɛ ɔ, Yataa‑a maeka Chebɛɛ a na wan to Kadidi chɛnyɛ duu dɔndɔ ɔ, min tɔ ni Nasaɛti.

Sakana ni wan a boo ɔ, sunkun tɔngbɔ dɔndɔ ko a, min tɔ ni Mɛi. Mɛi chɛ nii ma kai ko ɔ sɔn. Tooɔdia chɛen ni a a kamin dɔndɔ an ko a, min tɔ ni Chosɛfi, a ma koe a a 'a musu a. Chosɛfi chɛ na‑a bɔ Mansa Defidi 'a dambi an dɔ.
Maeka chɛ na‑a wan Mɛi tena, mbɛ a‑a a kɔndɔn, mbɛ a ɔ, “Mansa Yataa ɛ i fɛ gban, mbɛ a sin‑na i dua a ɔ bendenɛ a.”
Mɛi kɔndɔ fii‑a wan maeka chɛ 'a bai chɛ a, mbɛ a bun‑da a yii na chii‑a a ma.
Mbɛ maeka chɛ ɔ, “Mɛi, i ma chian, koe min na mu, Yataa ɛ i dua tena wan.
A yen ko, e na tena wan bu ya‑a, mbɛ i‑a den kaienɛ suun. A tɔɛ ni ma Chisɔsi.
Ɛ ma‑a wan mɔ chenama a, a sin, an mbe a chee‑a wan, an dɔ, Yataa Wa 'a Denɛ. Mansa Yataa ɛ a ma‑a wan mansa a, yɔ a bemba n ta bemba Defidi ni buɛ min dɔ.
A sin, ɛ ma‑a wan mansa a Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n ko a kuɔ fɔ ko a, danka ee ma‑a a 'a mansaya ma.”
Mbɛ Mɛi ɔ, “Chɛɛ n ma kai ko ɔ sɔn kɛn bɛ, n mbe bu chɛ ya‑a ka ma gbɛ?”

Mbɛ maeka chɛ ɔ, “Yataa Nyina an mbe ma‑a i fɛ, mbɛ Yataa Wa 'a gbasaya, a‑a a ma, i‑a bu ya. Chɛ an fɛ mu, e denɛ min suun‑da, ɛ ma‑a tenchen Yataa 'a wai an na. A sin, an mbe a chee‑a wan, an dɔ, Yataa 'a denɛ.
I yii na chii wɛ i suun ma nyɔɛ Disabɛti ma. Mɔɛ n na‑a a fɔ wan, mbɛ gbanda musu mu a a, a ee denɛ suun‑da to kuɔ fɔ ko a. Chɛɛ a 'a chenan musuya chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, a bu ma ɛ ka gbɛ kau wɔdɔ an ko a.
Ko ɔ ko kan kɔ kan mbe ee nɔ, Yataa ee che min ma‑a.”
Mbɛ Mɛi ɔ, “N mbe nɛ. N mu Mansa Yataa 'a yɔnɛ an na. Koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ni ma n na, yɔ i‑a a fɔ ka buɛ min dɔ.” Mbɛ maeka chɛ‑a a to, mbɛ a ta‑a.
Tima kundu ɛnden gbakɔ, Mɛi‑a a ma bɛn fan, mbɛ a ta‑a dɔndɔ gbe duu dɔndɔ ɔ, min sɔen ni kɔnkɔ kɔnkɔɛ n tɛ ɔ, Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ.
A don‑da wan Sakaaya 'a chenɛ a, mbɛ a‑a Disabɛti kɔndɔn.
Mɛi‑a Disabɛti kɔndɔn kɛn dechee, mbɛ denɛ min ni Disabɛti bu ɔ, a‑a a ma ma‑a wan gbasaya a. Mbɛ Yataa Nyina bea‑a Disabɛti fɛ gban,
mbɛ a koɔ‑a a kuiɛ ma sɛenɛ a, a ɔ, “I duaen mu kaka, a ben nn fan musu n gbɛɛ ma, a sin, dua ɛ ma‑a wan den chɛ ma, e na tena min suun‑da.
N mbe ee che dan‑da a a, mbɛ n 'na mansa de ɛ na wan n kɔndɔn‑da.
A mu min na, n‑na i 'a kɔndɔn chɛ kuiɛ a min kɛn dechee, denɛ min mbe n bu ɔ, a‑a a ma ma‑a wan buɔdia a.
Mansa Yataa‑a i dua, a mu min na, i dan‑da a a, mbɛ ɛ chɛ ma‑a wan i ye, yɔ a‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ a ma koe a i ye.”
Mbɛ Mɛi‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “N‑na Mansa Yataa tando n faa gbɛɛ a.
N bu ɔ di Yataa ko a. An mu n baun mɔɛ a.
Koe min na mu, a‑a a yii na chii n na, a 'a yɔnɛ min dɔ ma koo. A yen ko gbɛ, a ka sanche ma aan kuɔ fɔ ko a, mɔɛ n gbɛɛ mbe n chee‑a wan, an dɔ, musu duaenɛ.
Koe min na mu, gbasaya gbɛɛ ɛ Yataa min boo ɔ, a basan‑da n ma a sɛmbɛnden na. A sin a kan nyɔ ee nɔ.
A 'a chinchimaya, ɛ ma‑a wan mɔɛ chɛ n ma, kuɔ fɔ ko a, mɔɛ miin chianden mu a ma.
Yataa‑a a ɔ yian, mbɛ a gbasayaen mu kaka. A‑a a ma wan dɔ koa tɔɛ n ben‑da bui‑a.
A‑a mansa chenama n bɔ an 'na mansaya n dɔ, mbɛ mɔɛ miin dɔ nii ma koo, a‑a an na sɛ.
A‑a kɔnkɔ tɔɛ n bu fa gban, chɛɛ a‑a nyan tɔɛ n na yɛ an boo a senɛ a.
A‑a mmɔ Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n deman fan, a kɔɔ mɔɛ nu. A ma nyina ni, chinchin koe a an ma,
yɔ a na‑a mmɔ bemba n too ɔ dia buɛ min dɔ, mbɛ a ee nyina‑a Ebeami ma, a basan a cheeya n na, kuɔ fɔ ko a.”
Mɛi ni wan Disabɛti 'a sondaya a kau sawa ko a, mbɛ a yɛ‑a a waa a.
Tima che‑a wan gbɛ Disabɛti suun koe a, mbɛ a‑a a suun den kaienɛ a.
A tanda ɔ si nyɔɛ nu, a basan a 'a mɔɛ n na, an‑na a a min Mansa Yataa chinchin‑da buɛ min dɔ a ma, mbɛ an gbɛɛ bu ɔ dia‑a a ko a.
Tee wɔnfean bɔɛ ma, den chɛ suundenɛ gbakɔ, an na kan‑da Sakaaya waa a. An na‑a, an ni bɛn den chɛ a kamincha tena ɔ. An toen ni an ni a fa tɔɛ Sakaaya an si a kun ma.
Chɛɛ a de‑a kɔɔsa bia chɛ wan, a ɔ, “A an. A tɔ ni ma Chɔn.”
Mbɛ an‑na a fɔ wan a ye, an dɔ, “Chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ ee wo sima n dɔ min tɔ mu ka.”
Mbɛ an‑na a siman denɛ fa tena an boo a, ni a 'a denɛ tɔɛ ɛ ma‑a ka ma.
Mbɛ Sakaaya‑a an dɔ tisa fenɛ ko a, ɛ fenɛ nyɛn min ma, mbɛ a‑a a nyɛn, a ɔ, “A tɔɛ an nɛ Chɔn.” An gbɛɛ da ɔ gbaa‑a wan.
Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, a bɔ‑a a 'a mumuncha chɛ ɔ, a bun‑da koɔ‑a, ɛ ta‑a Yataa tando‑a.
An tanda ɔ si nyɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, chiandia‑a an bia wan kaka. Koe chɛ fasan‑da wan an kɔnkɔ kɔnkɔ tanda chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ.
Mɔ ɔ mɔ miin‑na koe chɛ a min, a ma‑a wan an ma yiinachii a, mbɛ denɛ an nɛ, min 'na manɛ koo. Koe min na mu, a ɔ yenden fan ni gbɛ an boo ɔ, mbɛ Mansa Yataa ɛ wan den chɛ fɛ.
Mbɛ Yataa Nyina bea‑a wan Chɔn fa Sakaaya fɛ gban, mbɛ a‑a a kuu sɔ Yataa 'a sakana bai n dɔ yian‑da,
a ɔ, “Mmɔ Mansa Yataa tando, mmɔ Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n 'na Yataa a. A na‑a basan koe a mmɔ ma, mbɛ a‑a mmɔ kun ka.
Gbasaya tɔ wa, Yataa‑a a a na, mmɔ baun koe a. Mɔɛ chɛ kaen mu, a 'a yɔnɛ Defidi 'a dambi an dɔ,
yɔ Yataa‑a a ma suun buɛ min dɔ, a 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n na‑a a gbonka.
An mɔɛ chɛ ɛ mmɔ bɔ‑a wan mmɔ chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ chɛ n boo ɔ, a basan mmɔ ko don ma nyɔɛ n na.
Yataa‑a chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, a ni chinchin mmɔ ma, yɔ a na‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ mmɔ bemba n ye. A sin ma nyina ni dɔbɛn chɛ ma, a‑a min chɛ an na.
A 'a kai chɛ, mmɔ bemba n ta bemba Ebeami tena,
mbɛ ɛ mmɔ bɔ‑a wan mmɔ chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ n boo ɔ, mbɛ a‑a a ma, mmɔ ni wai chɛ a ko a faachima ɔ.
Yataa ɛ a ma‑a wan to, mmɔ ni mmɔ wandi gbɛɛ be a ma, mbɛ mmɔ tan‑da a tena mmɔ fɔɛ gbɛɛ ɔ.
“N 'na den, i sin, an mbe i chee‑a wan Yataa Wa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ a. I wan mbe a ma‑a mɔɛ n ni an ma bɛn chɛndɛ chɛ, Mansa Yataa na tima ya ɔ,
I wan mbe a ɔ yian mɔɛ n na, an mbe koe min ma, min mbe a ma, Yataa ni a boo bɔ an 'na ko yama n dɔ, mbɛ an‑na bauncha ma sɔn.
Chinchincha Yataa mu mmɔ 'a Yataa a. Ɛ mɔɛ a na‑a wan mmɔ baun koe a, yɔ ɛ tee kaienɛ a na buɛ min dɔ, manɛ be koe a mmɔ ma.
Mɔɛ miin mbe saya pimbi pimbi ɔ, ɛ an bɔ‑a wan a ɔ. Ɛ manɛ be‑a wan an ma, a ta faachima fɔɛ ɔ.”
Sakaaya 'a bai chɛ gbakɔ, an‑na den chɛ bɔ wan a ɔ gbɛ gbɛ, aan a koa‑a. Mbɛ Yataa wakoe a dia‑a a ye a ɔ benden ba a. A ni fuinɛ ma wan aan tima chɛ a, a bɔ‑a tima min na Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n tena fanka ɔ.
A tima chɛ a, Domi kun ti wa ni wan nɔ, min tɔ ni Ɔkɔsɔsi. An ni mansa a Domi chɛnyɛ wa kun ma. A na‑a sawa a ben fan, mbɛ mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ mbe a 'a gbasaya kɔɔ, an ni an tɔɛ n be an dan koe a.
Tima saa saa an nii nɛ mɔɛ n dan koe a, a sin Kuiniyɔsi an ni kɔfana a Siyia chɛnyɛ ɔ.
Mɔ ɔ mɔ ta‑a wan a bemba n ta bemba n suun duu ɔ, a tɔɛ be koe a.

Kamin chɛ min tɔ ni Chosɛfi, a na‑a bɔ Mansa Defidi 'a dambi ɔ wan. Chɛɛ a ni si ɔ Nasaɛti duu ɔ wan, Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ. Mbɛ a wɛɛ sɛ‑a wan Bɛtɛɛn duu ɔ, Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ, a mu min na, Mansa Defidi suun‑da nɔ wan.
An fea na‑a ta wan Mɛi a, tooɔdia chɛen ni min ma koe a a 'a musu a, an dan koe a. A bu ma ni.
An to‑a Bɛtɛɛn fan, mbɛ Mɛi bu ɔ tɛ‑a.
Mbɛ a‑a a saa denɛ suun, den kainɛ. A‑a koa n mɔndɔ mɔndɔ a, mbɛ a‑a a sa fenɛ ɔ, an ni daun fenɛ be min dɔ sɔ fenɛ n ma. Chɛ ma‑a koe min na, sa tena kan kɔ kan nii nɔ sonda yia chenɛ a.
A su chɛ ɔ, sa kun ma fɛn mɔɛ dɔ n ni wan nɔ, an chɛnyɛ chɛ kaka dɔndɔ ma, an mbe an 'na sa n kun ma fɛn‑da, sa wɛɛ n dɔ.
Mbɛ Mansa Yataa 'a maeka bɔ‑a an ya a. A sin, manɛ‑a an na bɛn fan, Mansa Yataa 'a manɛ. Mbɛ an chian‑da kaka.
Chɛɛ maeka chɛ ɔ, “Wo ma chian. N yen ko na‑a sakana bai chɛndɛ a wo ko a, min mbe na‑a buɔdia wa a, mɔɛ n gbɛɛ tena.
Den toa suun‑da Mansa Defidi 'a duu ɔ bi tee chɛ a. An den toa chɛ, an mbe wo baun‑da. An mu kunka mansa a, tea Mansa.
Wo e a ɔ sɔn‑da chɛ an ma. Ni wo ta‑a, wo e den toa tan‑da wan sa ɔ, koa mɔndɔ mɔndɔenɛ ɛ a a, ɛ sa ɔ fenɛ ɔ, an mbe daun fenɛ be min dɔ sɔ fenɛ n ma.”
Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, maeka fanka fanka n bɔ‑a an ya a, a ka banda bu ɔ. Mbɛ an sɔ‑a maeka saa chɛ baima, an mbe ta‑a tando be‑a Yataa ma, an dɔ,
“Tando ni be Yataa ma, min mbe banda bu ɔ pɔɔ, a sin, faachima ni ma mɔ gbu n ma dunya ɔ, Yataa ɛ ko chɛndɛ ma‑a miin na.”

Mbɛ maeka chɛ n yɛ‑a banda bu ɔ. Chɛ gbakɔ, sa kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ n‑na a fɔ an nyɔn ye, an dɔ, “Mmɔ ta taiya a pan Bɛtɛɛn duu chɛ ɔ, mmɔ ni koe chɛ ɔ yen, Mansa Yataa 'a maeka‑a min dɔ yian ka mmɔ a.”
An‑na a a gbandia, mbɛ an ta‑a, an‑na an ya a kan. Mbɛ an‑na Mɛi yen, an fea den toa chɛ a, a basan Chosɛfi a. Den toa chɛ ni sa ɔ fen chɛ ɔ wan, an ni daun fenɛ be min dɔ sɔ fenɛ n ma.
An‑na den toa chɛ yen kɛn, an si‑a wan ko ɔ ko ma, mbɛ an‑na a ɔ yian mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ a nɔ, maeka chɛ na‑a koe min fɔ an ye a si den chɛ ma.
Mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ tɛnɛ‑a wan a a, an‑na bai min nyɔn sima a min, sa kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ n da a.
Chɛɛ Mɛi‑a koe chɛ n gbɛɛ sa wan a yii ma, ɛ ta‑a a tɛnsɛ‑a a yiima ɔ tima ɔ tima.

Mbɛ sa kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ n yɛ‑a. An mbe kɛn yɛ‑a, an bun‑da Yataa tando‑a, an mbe ta‑a si sa‑a a tena. An bu ɔ ni di wan koe chɛ n ko a, an‑na miin na min, a basan chɛ a, an‑na min dɔ yen. A gbɛɛ ma‑a wan, yɔ maeka chɛ‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ an ye.
A suun tee wɔnfean bɔɛ ma, an‑na a a kamincha wan, mbɛ an‑na a tɔɛ wɛɛ si, an dɔ, Chisɔsi. Maeka chɛ na‑a tɔɛ chɛ an yian a ko a, pɛn a de ni a bu ya.

Tima na‑a che wan gbɛ Mɛi ma koe a sɛdɛ Yataa tena, Yataa 'a kata ɔ, yɔ Mansa Yataa 'a sawa, a‑a min be Mosisi ma, a‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, musu suundenɛ gbakɔ. Chɛ an‑na a ma, Chosɛfi sɛ‑a Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, an fea Mɛi a. An ta‑a Yataa 'a kata ɔ, an ni an 'na yasi fenɛ be Chu n tɛ mɔɛ n ma Yataa a, a ni a bɔ Yataa tena Mɛi ko a. Ni yasi chɛ ma ma ni bugbɔ fea a, ɛ ma wan kangbo den fea a, yɔ sawa chɛ‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ. An nii ma Chisɔsi to ni gbaa, koe min na mu, an ni a konan fan Mansa Yataa ma. An na‑a chɛ ma, a mu min na, Mansa Yataa 'a sawa ɔ, “Ni musu 'a denɛ saa bɛn‑da den kaienɛ ma, ɛ a be wan Mansa Yataa ma.”

A tima chɛ a, kamin dɔndɔ ni wan Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, min tɔ ni Simiyɔn. Kamin chɛ tanden fan ni Yataa tena. A yɛ to, a Yataa koen ni kaka. A ni gbɛ tima an ma kɔn tena, tima min na, Yataa ɛ di ka‑a Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n ya a. Yataa Nyina ni wan a fɛ.
Yataa Nyina chɛ sin na‑a a yiima dia wan, mbɛ a ee fa‑a, ni a ma kunka mansa yen ni, Mansa Yataa ɛ min sɔ‑a.
Tee min ma an ni na Chisɔsi a Yataa 'a kata ɔ, Yataa Nyina chɛ‑a a ma wan Simiyɔn ta‑a nɔ. Mbɛ Chisɔsi woo mɔɛ nu, a ma koe a, yɔ Yataa 'a sawa‑a min fɔ, an don‑da a a Yataa 'a kata chɛ ɔ.
Simiyɔn‑na den toa chɛ ya wan, a‑a a sa a nɔnkɔnɛ ɔ, mbɛ a‑a Yataa wai bɔ, a ɔ,
“Fa, i 'a yɔnɛ mu n na, n mbe ee ka gbɛ fa‑a faachima ɔ, koe min na mu, i ma i da a kuiɛ yɔn ni n tena.
N‑na i 'a mɔɛ yen gbɛ pɛnɛnɛ, min na‑a bauncha a.
Dunya gbɛɛ sin mbe a yen‑da wan.
Manɛ mu a a, mɔɛ n gbɛɛ tena, miin ma i sɔn tee, an ni i sɔn. Ɛ a ma‑a wan, basɔmaya wa ni ma i 'a mɔɛ n ma, nn fan Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ nu.”
Den chɛ woo mɔɛ nu, an da a fa‑a wan bai chɛ n na, Simiyɔn‑na miin fɔ, a si an 'na den chɛ ma.

Mbɛ Simiyɔn‑na an dua, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ den chɛ de Mɛi ye, a ɔ, “Denɛ chɛ i boo ɔ, ɛ a ma‑a wan mmɔ Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ nu, Yataa ni mmɔ sɛsɛ kondon, mbɛ a yɛ‑a, a‑a mmɔ sɛsɛ a sɛ. An mbe a ma‑a, mmɔ Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n ni tea a min. Chɛɛ mmɔ sɛsɛ ɛ ban‑da wan a ɔ.
Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, mɔ sɛsɛ n faa n dɔ koe n dɔ ni sɔn. I sin, Mɛi, ɛ ma‑a wan i ma faayɔn ba dɛgbɛ a, koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ɛ ma‑a tima min na.”

A tima chɛ a, bɔɔɛ dɔndɔ wɛɛ ni wan nɔ, min ni Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ a. A tɔ ni Ana, kai Fanuɛɛ 'a denɛ. Kai Fanuɛɛ chɛ na‑a bɔ Asaa 'a dambi ɔ wan. Bɔɔɛ Ana ni kai chia a san wɔnfea gbe, mbɛ a chɛɛ fa‑a, a chɛɛ min na‑a koa chii a a. A chenanchaen ba ni gbɛ.
A to‑a fuinyaya chɛ an dɔ gbɛ, aan a sanɛ che‑a san bi sɛi kun ma naaninɛ ɔ. A nii bɔ Yataa 'a kata chɛ ɔ. Su ɔ ni tee a, ɛ Yataa fai wan nɔ, ɛ samunɛ chɛ, a basan sun bia a.
A tima dɔndɔ gbe chɛ kɔɔ, a wɛɛ‑a Chisɔsi n tan fan, an bɛ a woo n na. Mbɛ a bun‑da Yataa wai bɔ‑a. A‑a bai sa wan, a si den chɛ ma, mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ tena, mɔɛ miin ni Chuusaɛn kun ka koe ma kɔn tena.
Chosɛfi n fea Mɛi a, an ban‑da manda chɛ n gbɛɛ a tachɛ‑a, yɔ Mansa Yataa 'a sawa‑a min fɔ. Mbɛ an yɛ‑a an baa a, Nasaɛti duu ɔ, Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ.
Den chɛ koa‑a wan, mbɛ a ɔ gbɛa‑a. A yiima tɛen ni kaka, a sin Yataa 'a dua ni wan a fɛ.
San kɔ san na, Chisɔsi woo mɔɛ n ni ta wan Chuusaɛn duu ɔ bɛn ba chɛ ko a, min ni Chu n 'na kun bɔ a ɔ bɛnɛ a.
Chisɔsi ni kɛn san tan kun ma fea, an bɛ sɛ‑a wan bɛn chɛ ɔ, yɔ a woo mɔɛ n ni a ma buɛ min dɔ tee.
Bɛn chɛ ka‑a kɛn a a, an‑na chia bia wan yɛ koe a an baa a. Chɛɛ yatina, Chisɔsi to‑a wan gbaa Chuusaɛn. A woo mɔɛ n nii ma chɛ ɔ sɔn.
A ni an yii ma, mbɛ ɛ fanka fanka chɛ ɔ, miin ni ka yɛ tena an baa nu. An‑na tachɛ chɛ tee dɔndɔ, mbɛ an‑na a kuu sɔ an ya a kan‑da a a, an baa mɔɛ n tɛ ɔ, a basan an dia nyɔɛ n na.
Chɛɛ an ma a yen ni kɛn, an yɛ‑a to Chuusaɛn, an ya a kan‑da a a.
Tee sawan bɔɛ ma, an‑na a yen fan Yataa 'a kata ɔ. An bɛ an ni si ɔ, Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ n na, a too ma sɔenɛ an ma, ɛ ta‑a an dɔ tisa‑a.
Mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ ni nɔ, an da ɔ gbaa‑a wan yiimatɛ a, min ni a 'a tisa yɛman buɛ ɔ.
A de n fea a fa a, an‑na a yen kɛn, an tɛnɛ‑a wan a a. Mbɛ a de ɔ, “N 'na den, fen mu i‑a nn tɔɔya ka? Nn mbe faagbaa wa an dɔ i ko a, nn‑na nn ya a kan fan i a, kan kɔ kan ka gbɛ, nn fea i fa a.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Fen ko a mu, wo ni n yan tena? Wo ni kun fan, wo ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ n mbe ma‑a wan nɛ Fa 'a kata chɛ ɔ. Wo nii n yan.”
Chɛɛ a woo mɔɛ n nii ma a da a bai chɛ ɔ gbɛ ni, a‑a min fɔ ka an ye.
Chɛ gbakɔ, Chisɔsi yii‑a wan Nasaɛti duu ɔ, an bɛ an na, a sin‑na kooya be wan an ma. A de‑a koe chɛ n gbɛɛ sa wan a yii ma, ɛ an tɛnsɛ a yiima ɔ.
Chisɔsi koa‑a, mbɛ a 'a yiimatɛ da a koa‑a. Mɔɛ n toen fan ni a a, a sin Yataa wɛɛ toen ni ka wan to a a.

Chɛ ɔ mɛen gbakɔ, Sakaaya 'a denɛ Chɔn ni gbɛ fuinɛ ma wan, mbɛ Yataa koɔ‑a a tena. Chɛ ɛ ma‑a tima min na, Tibɛyɔsi ni a sanɛ tan kun ma duun bɔɛ an dɔ, Domi kun ti wa ya a. Pɔnchɔsi Padeti an ni kɔfana a Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ. Kadidi chɛnyɛ sin dɔ kun ti tɔ ni Ɛdɔdi. A kɔɔ Fiipi wɛɛ ni kun ti an na Ituyia chɛnyɛ kun ma, a basan Takonitisi a. Abidini chɛnyɛ kun ti ni Disanyasi an na. Chu n 'na tɛ mɔ wa nu Yataa tena, an ni Anasi n fea n na Kayafasi a.

Yataa koɔ‑a kɛn Chɔn tena, a ta‑a wan tanda n dɔ, Chɔdan yii a sanɛ gbɛɛ. Ɛ ta‑a Yataa 'a sakana bai ɔ yian‑da mɔɛ n na, a ɔ, mɔɛ n ni an kan kɔ sɔ an 'na ko yama a. A ɔ, mbɛ a‑a yii chɛ an kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, a ɔ, min mbe a ma, Yataa ni a boo bɔ an 'na ko yama ɔ.

Chɛ ma‑a wan, yɔ Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ Aisaya na‑a a nyɛn suun buɛ min dɔ, a ɔ, “Mɔɛ yen ko gbonka chɛ‑a fuinɛ ma, a ɔ, mɔɛ n ni tan Yataa tena. A ɔ, an ni an fandi n dɔ bɛn Mansa Yataa ya ɔ, yɔ an mbe chia ɔ bɛn buɛ min dɔ, an 'na mansa n ya ɔ. A ɔ, an mbe a tan fan, mbɛ an‑na kaina ɔ yiienɛ n gbɛɛ a fa fa. A ɔ, mbɛ an‑na kɔnkɔ kɔnkɔɛ n te, mbɛ an yɛ‑a an‑na kaina gbukusa gbukusaenɛ n gbɛɛ a kan kan, a ɔ bɛn koe a.
A ɔ, a sin, a tima chɛ a, mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a ɔ yen‑da wan, Yataa ɛ mɔɛ n baun buɛ min dɔ.”

Chɔn ni kɛn Chɔdan yii da a, mɔ fanka fanka ni na wan a tena, yii chɛ koe a an kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a. Mbɛ a ni a fɔ wan an ye, a ɔ, “Wo yauaen ba chɛ nu, yɔ ka. Wo ee che wo nun‑da Yataa 'a mɔnɛ ma, min mbe wo ko a.

Wo chɛ chɛ wai n ni a ɔ yian, mbɛ wo‑a wo kan kɔ sɔ wo 'a ko yama n na. Wo ma bun kafai be‑a a fɔ koe a, mbɛ Ebeami cheeya mu wo a. A ni ma wo yii ma, mbɛ Yataa ɛ kun fan a ni sen chɛ n ya, a ni Ebeami cheeya n nyan an dɔ.
Ni kɔnɛ ma gbɔ chɛndɛ be ni, mɔɛ ɛ a tɛ wan a suu ma, mbɛ a‑a a minda. Wo gbɛɛ wo maen fan mu yɔ kɔnɛ nu. Yataa 'a yende a saen fan mu wo dɔ n tɛ koe a wo suu ma, wo wɛn mbe ee ko chɛndɛ ma‑a.”
Mbɛ mɔɛ dɔ nu mɔ fanka chɛ ɔ, an dɔ, “Nn mbe ma ka ma gbɛ?”
Mbɛ Chɔn dɔ an ma, “Doma fea ɛ mɔɛ min boo ɔ, a ni dɔndɔ be a bɔɛ ma, a ee min boo ɔ. Mbɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ daun fenɛ koo min boo ɔ, a ni a du an fea a bɔɛ a.”
Pawa bia mɔɛ dɔ n bɛɛ na‑a wan Chɔn tena, yii chɛ koe a an kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a. Mbɛ an dɔ, “Ticha, nn mbe ma ka ma?”
A ɔ, “Wo ma pawa bia mɔɛ n boo ɔ, sawa ma min fɔ ni.”
Soya dɔ n bɛɛ na‑a wan, an dɔ, “Nn bɛɛ sin? Nn mbe ma ka ma?” Mbɛ a ɔ, “Wo ma kɔpɔɛ bia mɔ ɔ mɔ boo ɔ gbasaya a. A yɛ to, wo ma fania fɔ mɔ ɔ mɔ ma. Wo faa ni chima wo 'a pawa a.”
A tima chɛ a, Chu mɔɛ n gbɛɛ ya mɛen fan ni gbɛ an kun ka mansa ya ɔ, min na koe ni a ɔ. An bun‑da an yii na chii‑a Chɔn na, an dɔ, kɔkɔɛ kunka mansa chɛ gbu an nɛ.

Mbɛ Chɔn‑na a fɔ an gbɛɛ ye, a ɔ, “N fan, n mbe yii an chɛ wo kunɛ ɔ, chɛɛ mɔ dɔndɔ ɛ na tena n gbaa, a benden mu n ma kaka. N gbu sin mbe ee che a 'a kɔɔwa yuu wɛɛ fuin koe a. A tana, ɛ Yataa Nyina a na‑a wan ma koe a wo fɛ, wo wɛn mbe wo kan kɔ sɔ‑a wo 'a ko yama n na. Chɛɛ wo wɛn mbe ee wo kan kɔ sɔ‑a wo 'a ko yama n na, ɛ wo a ta‑a wan ta ɔ.

Ɛ mɔ gbu gbɛɛ gbɛmbo‑a wan. Ɛ mɔ gbu chɛndɛ n bɔ‑a wan a yama n ya a, yɔ sɛnɛ sa mɔɛ ɛ fenɛ ɔ fɛ buɛ min dɔ, a pofe bɔ koe a a chɛndɛ ya a. Ɛ a pofe a dɛ‑a wan, mbɛ a‑a a chɛndɛ si tena ɔ bɛn. Ɛ mɔ yama n tɔɔya‑a wan kuɔ fɔ ta ɔ, yɔ mɔɛ ɛ a fonɛ minda buɛ min dɔ ta a.”
Chɔn‑na mɔɛ chɛ n kan fan chia sɛsɛ a, sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a, a basan an boo si koe a a kɔɔ.

Chɛɛ chɛ gbakɔ, Chɔn‑na tea fɔ wan Mansa Ɛdɔdi ye. A ɔ, a ma tea ko ma ni, a kɔɔ kaima 'a musu Ɛdɔdiyasi bɔ koe a a boo ɔ, a ni a ma a 'a musu a. Mansa chɛ 'a ko yama ma gba dɔ mende nu, a‑a an bɛɛ fɔ wan a ye.
A ka Mansa Ɛdɔdi 'a ko yama maenɛ saa chɛ n ma, a‑a a ma wan to, an‑na Chɔn bia, mbɛ an‑na a sa pimbi chenɛ a.
Chɔn ni tima min na yii chɛ‑a mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, a‑a a chɛ wan Chisɔsi wɛɛ kunɛ ɔ. Chisɔsi bun‑da samunɛ chɛ‑a, mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, banda da a ka‑a.
Mbɛ Yataa Nyina yii‑a, bugbɔya ɔ, mbɛ a si‑a a kun ma. Mbɛ kuiɛ ka‑a banda bu ɔ, a ɔ, “N 'na denɛ mu i a, i ko a di n ye kaka. N faa chimaen mu i ko a chɛndɛ chɛ.”
Chisɔsi‑a a kuu sɔ tima min na a 'a wai chɛ‑a, a sanɛ ni wan san bi sawa nyɔn sima. A fa tɔ ni Chosɛfi, yɔ a ni buɛ min dɔ mɔɛ n yii ma. Chosɛfi fa tɔ ni Edi,
Edi fa tɔ ni Matati, Matati fa tɔ ni Difai, Difai fa tɔ ni Mɛki, Mɛki fa tɔ ni Chanai, Chanai fa tɔ ni Chosɛfi,
Chosɛfi fa tɔ ni Matatiyasi, Matatiyasi fa tɔ ni Emɔsi, Emɔsi fa tɔ ni Naun, Naun fa tɔ ni Ɛsi, Ɛsi fa tɔ ni Nakai,
Nakai fa tɔ ni Maati, Maati fa tɔ ni Matatiyasi, Matatiyasi fa tɔ ni Sɛmɛyin, Sɛmɛyin fa tɔ ni Chosɛki, Chosɛki fa tɔ ni Choda,
Choda fa tɔ ni Chowanan, Chowanan fa tɔ ni Desa, Desa fa tɔ ni Sɔɔbabɛɛ, Sɔɔbabɛɛ fa tɔ ni Sadatiyɛ, Sadatiyɛ fa tɔ ni Neyi,
Neyi fa tɔ ni Mɛki, Mɛki fa tɔ ni Adi, Adi fa tɔ ni Kosan, Kosan fa tɔ ni Ɛmadan, Ɛmadan fa tɔ ni Ea,
Ea fa tɔ ni Chɔsowa, Chɔsowa fa tɔ ni Ɛdiyɛsa, Ɛdiyɛsa fa tɔ ni Choyin, Choyin fa tɔ ni Matati, Matati fa tɔ ni Difai,
Difai fa tɔ ni Simiyɔn, Simiyɔn fa tɔ ni Chuda, Chuda fa tɔ ni Chosɛfi, Chosɛfi fa tɔ ni Chonan, Chonan fa tɔ ni Ɛdiakin,
Ɛdiakin fa tɔ ni Mɛdɛya, Mɛdɛya fa tɔ ni Mɛna, Mɛna fa tɔ ni Matata, Matata fa tɔ ni Natan, Natan fa tɔ ni Defidi,
Defidi fa tɔ ni Chɛsi, Chɛsi fa tɔ ni Wobɛdi, Wobɛdi fa tɔ ni Bowasi, Bowasi fa tɔ ni Samon, Samon fa to ni Naason,
Naason fa tɔ ni Aminadabi, Aminadabi fa tɔ ni Amin, Amin fa tɔ ni Ani, Ani fa tɔ ni Ɛson, Ɛson fa tɔ ni Pɛɛsi, Pɛɛsi fa tɔ ni Chuda,
Chuda fa tɔ ni Chekɔpi, Chekɔpi fa tɔ ni Aisaki, Aisaki fa tɔ ni Ebeami, Ebeami fa tɔ ni Tɛya, Tɛya fa tɔ ni Nawo,
Nawo fa tɔ ni Sɛyuku, Sɛyuku fa tɔ ni Du, Du fa tɔ ni Pɛdɛki, Pɛdɛki fa tɔ ni Ɛba, Ɛba fa tɔ ni Sɛda,
Sɛda fa tɔ ni Kainan, Kainan fa tɔ ni Afasadi, Afasadi fa tɔ ni Sɛn, Sɛn fa tɔ ni Nowa, Nowa fa tɔ ni Damɛki,
Damɛki fa tɔ ni Mɛtusɛda, Mɛtusɛda fa tɔ ni Ɛnoku, Ɛnoku fa tɔ ni Chayɛdi, Chayɛdi fa tɔ ni Maadadɛɛ, Maadadɛɛ fa tɔ ni Kainan,
Kainan fa tɔ ni Ɛnosi, Ɛnosi fa tɔ ni Sɛti, Sɛti fa tɔ ni Adami, min ni Yataa 'a denɛ a.
Chisɔsi ɛ gbɛ ka‑a Chɔdan yii da a, Yataa Nyina ni wan a fɛ gban. A sin, Yataa Nyina chɛ‑a a a ya wan, mbɛ a ben ben‑da a a fuinɛ ɔ,

tee bi naanin ni pimbi bi naanin ko a. A tima chɛ kɔɔ, Sitana ni wan sɔ ɔ a yiima yan‑da, ni ɛ ko yama ma‑a wan. Chisɔsi sin nii ma fen kɔ fen daun ni. Tee bi naanin ni pimbi bi naanin chɛ ban‑da kɛn, kɔnkɔɛ‑a a bia wan.
Mbɛ Sitana ɔ, “Ni Yataa 'a denɛ gbu mu i a, a ma wɛ senɛ chɛ ni mun biidi a.”
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Yataa 'a gboo ɔ te, ‘Daun fenɛ dechee ma fenɛ a, min mbe a ma, mɔ gbu ni ma fɔɛ ɔ.’ ”
Mbɛ Sitana sɛ‑a a a kɔnkɔ wa kun tɛ, mbɛ a‑a chɛnyɛ n gbɛɛ yian a a dunya chɛ ɔ, bui chɛ bui chɛ wandi a.

Mbɛ Sitana ɔ, “N mbe gbasaya be‑a wan i ma chɛnyɛ chɛ gbɛɛ kun ma, a sin, nyan chɛ gbɛɛ dunya chɛ ɔ, ɛ ma‑a i ta an na. N fan ta mu gbɛ an gbɛɛ a, n sin mbe kun fan, n ni a be mɔ ɔ mɔ ma, n toen mu mɔɛ min na.
Ni i‑a n fai dechee, chɛ gbɛɛ ɛ ma‑a i ta an na.”
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Yataa 'a gboo ɔ te, ‘Mɔ ɛ i 'a mansa Yataa dɔndɔ gbe an fai dechee, mbɛ i yɛ‑a, i‑a a ma wai chɛ.’ ”
Mbɛ Sitana‑a a ya to, mbɛ a ta‑a gbɛ a a Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. Mbɛ a sɛ‑a a a Yataa 'a kata kun tɛ, kaina a yansama wa. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ a ma, a ɔ, “Ni Yataa 'a denɛ gbu mu i a, tin bɛ duu ma a ka nɛ.
Koe min na mu, Yataa 'a gboo ɔ te, a ɔ, ‘Yataa ɛ a fɔ‑a wan a 'a maeka n ye, an ni i kun ma fɛn chɛndɛ chɛ.
A ɔ, an mbe an boo si‑a wan i kɔɔ, min mbe a ma‑a, i chenɛ wɛɛ ee tu‑a senɛ a.’ ”
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, ‘I ma i 'a mansa Yataa ɔ siman.’ ”
Sitana‑a a chɛ kɛn chia ɔ chia a, Chisɔsi yiima yan‑da, chɛɛ a ma kun ni, a‑a a to wan nɔ, aan tima dɔ gbɛɛ ko a.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi yɛ‑a Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ, Yataa Nyina ɛ a fɛ, gbasaya be koe a a ma. Mɔɛ n‑na a ma tɔɛ a min fan Kadidi tanda gbɛɛ ɔ.
A ni ben fan kan chɛ‑a Chu n 'na samun chɛ chenɛ n na, a sin, mɔɛ n gbɛɛ ni a tando wan.

Mbɛ Chisɔsi yɛ‑a Nasaɛti duu ɔ, a bɔ‑a a ɔ kaina. Chu n 'na suin tee ma, a ta‑a wan an 'na samun chɛ chenɛ a, yɔ a ni a ma tee buɛ min dɔ. Mbɛ a‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, a sɔ‑a Yataa 'a gboo kan koe a mɔɛ chɛ n tena.
Mbɛ an‑na gboo be a ma a kan koe a, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ Aisaya na‑a min nyɛn. Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a gboo chɛ da a ka a kaka dɔndɔ tena. Mbɛ a kuiɛ ma sɛenɛ a, a‑a a kan, a ɔ,

“Mansa Yataa Nyina ɛ n fɛ, koe min na mu, Mansa Yataa‑a a boo sɔ n ma, sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian koe a yɔn tɔɛ n na. A‑a n sɔ a fɔ koe a mɔɛ n ye, miin mbe bia ɔ, mbɛ an mbe bɔ‑a wan a ɔ, mbɛ ya te tɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ, an mbe kaina yen‑da wan to. A‑a n na na, chɛ n bɔ koe a mɔɛ chɛ n 'na gbasaya kɔɔ, miin mbe an yɔn bia chɛ tena.
A ɔ, mbɛ n ni a fɔ mɔ gbu gbɛɛ ye, mbɛ tima che‑a, tima min na mu, Mansa Yataa ɛ a 'a koadia ɔ yian‑da a 'a mɔɛ n na.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a gboo chɛ da a tɔn, mbɛ a‑a a a yɛ chen kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ ma. Mbɛ a yɛ‑a, a si‑a an kan koe a. Mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ ni ka samun chɛ chen chɛ a, an‑na an ya bɛn a ma.
Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “Wo‑a min na min ka, n‑na a kan wo tena Yataa 'a gboo chɛ ɔ, wo e ka an dɔ yen‑da gbɛ bi chɛndɛ chɛ.”
An gbɛɛ bun‑da bai ma kawaenɛ n fɔ‑a, a si Chisɔsi ma. A sin, an tɛnɛ‑a wan a a, a koɔ‑a buɛ min dɔ chɛndɛ chɛ. Chɛɛ an yɛ‑a wan, an‑na a fɔ, an dɔ te, “N bɔ, ka wɛ, Chosɛfi 'a denɛ an nɛ.”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N danden fan mu a a, mbɛ wo e tai chɛ tɛ‑a wan a si n ma, min‑na a fɔ, a ɔ, ‘Danda chɛ mɔɛ, i wandi baun.’ Wo e a fɔ‑a wan to n ye, wo ɔ, wo‑a a a min fan, n‑na min ma Kapanaun duu ɔ, wo ɔ, n ni a nyɔn sima ma wɛ nɛ wɛɛ, n ta suun duu gbu ɔ.
N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ an mbe ee dan Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ kan kɔ kan na, a wandi gbu ta suun duu ɔ.

“Wo wo too ma sɔ n ma. Tima na‑a che wan mmɔ 'a Isɔɛɛ chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ Idaicha 'a tima a, sona nii ma na ni san sawa, ni kau wɔdɔ ko a. Kɔnkɔ wa na‑a wan a tima chɛ a chɛnyɛ chɛ gbu gbɛɛ ɔ. A sin to, fuinya musu n kɔ ni koo nɔ.

Chɛɛ Yataa nii ma Idaicha a ta ni fuinya musu chɛ n dɔndɔ wɛɛ tena basan koe a an ma. A na‑a a a ta dechee fuinya musu dɔndɔ an tena, min nii ma Isɔɛɛ mɔ a. An fuinya musu chɛ ni duu min dɔ, a tɔ ni Sayɛfati, min ni Sidon tanda ɔ.

A yɛ to, tima min na to, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ Ɛdisa ta tima wɛɛ a to mmɔ 'a Isɔɛɛ chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ, gbandi yama yama ni wan mɔ sɛsɛ gboo ma nɛ. Chɛɛ a nii ma an dɔndɔ wɛɛ a baun ni, mɔɔ dechee Naaman min na‑a ka Siyia chɛnyɛ ɔ, a‑a an baun.”
Mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ samun chɛ chen chɛ a, an‑na Chisɔsi da a bai chɛ n na min kɛn, an gbɛɛ faa bɔ‑a wan.

Mbɛ an‑na an kɔɔ sɔ wan a tima chɛ a, mbɛ an‑na Chisɔsi konkon a bɔ an duu chɛ gbu ɔ. Mbɛ an ta‑a a a kɔnkɔ a yansama kun tɛ, an 'na duu chɛ gbu sɔen ni min ma. An toen ni, an ni a a nyɔndɔn, a bɔ kɔnkɔɛ chɛ gbu chechee tena.
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi bɔ‑a wan an tɛ ɔ, mbɛ a ta‑a a ta chia a.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi yii‑a Kapanaun duu ɔ, Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ, a‑a mɔɛ n kan kaina Chu n 'na suin tee ma.
An gbɛɛ da a fa‑a wan, a na‑a Yataa bai sa buɛ min dɔ an tena. Koe min na mu, a da a kuiɛ ni gbasa.
Kamin dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ samun chɛ chen chɛ a, nyina yama ni min fɛ. Mbɛ a‑a yee tɛ gbankon, a ɔ,

“Ee, Chisɔsi, Nasaɛti mɔɛ, a nyin i ni nn to nɔ, yɔ i‑a nn yen buɛ min dɔ. I na‑a nn fa koe an na? N‑na a ɔ sɔn fan mɔɛ min nyɔn sima mu i a. Mɔɛ mu i a, min ka‑a Yataa tena, a 'a wai tenchenɛ chɛ koe a.”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ nyina yama chɛ ma, a ɔ, a ni a da a tɔn, mbɛ a sin ni ka kamin chɛ fɛ. Nyina yama chɛ‑a kamin chɛ a bea duu ma an gbɛɛ ya kɔɔ, mbɛ a ka‑a a fɛ, a sin nii ma ko yama kan kɔ kan ma ni a a.
Mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ da a fa‑a wan a a, mbɛ an dɔ, “Kan chɛ buɛ nyɔn sima minan mbe nɛ? Ɛ gbasaya din fan nyina yama n bɛɛ ma, an ni ka mɔɛ fɛ. An sin mbe a da a kuiɛ a min fan, mbɛ an ka‑a an fɛ.”
Mbɛ mɔɛ n‑na a ma tɔɛ a min fan an tanda chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi bɔ‑a samun chɛ chen chɛ a, a ta‑a Saimɔn 'na chenɛ a. A‑a a tan fan, chima yama bɔndenɛ ɛ Saimɔn 'na musu de ma. Mbɛ an‑na Chisɔsi ɔ tisa a danda koe a.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ta‑a, a sɔ‑a a 'a sofa kaa a, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, chima gbu ni bɔ musu gbu ɔ, mbɛ chima chɛ bɔ‑a a ɔ. Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, musu chɛ‑a a a kɔɔ sɔ, mbɛ a‑a daun fenɛ be an ma a daun koe a.
Tee bea‑a kɛn, mɔɛ n na‑a wan mɔ sɛsɛ a Chisɔsi tena, gbandi yama sɛsɛ ni miin ma. Mbɛ a‑a a boo bun buɛ min dɔ an gbɛɛ ma dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a, an baun‑da ka wan ta‑a gbɛɛ.

A na‑a nyina yama n bɛɛ gbain fan to mɔ sɛsɛ fɛ. An sin ni kɛn ka tena mɔɛ chɛ n fɛ, an ni wan yee tɛ‑a, an dɔ, “Yataa 'a denɛ mu i a.” Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, an ni an da a tɔn. A sin nii ma dɔn ni an ni koɔ to, a mu min na, an na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ kunka mansa mu an na.
Banda ɔ ka da ma, Chisɔsi bɔ‑a wan duu ɔ, mbɛ a ta‑a kaina dɔndɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ nii kaina. Mbɛ mɔɛ n‑na a kuu sɔ a yan‑da. An‑na a yen kɛn, an nii ma to ni to, a ni bɔ an 'na duu ɔ.
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Yataa‑a n na na, min mbe a ma, n ni sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian duu dɔ mende n bɛɛ ɔ, a si Yataa 'a mansaya ma. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, a dinden fan mu n ma, n ni an wai chɛ chɛ.”
Chɛ ko a, a na‑a a a tun fan sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yianɛ a, Chu n 'na samun chɛ chen chɛ n gbɛɛ a, Chu chɛnyɛ gbɛɛ ɔ.
Tee dɔndɔ a, Chisɔsi ni wan sɔ ɔ yii wa dɔndɔ tindi ma, min tɔ ni Kɛnesayɛti. Mɔɛ n ni wan an nyɔn na nyɔndɔn‑da, min mbe a ma, an ni na, an ni an too ma sɔ Yataa 'a bai ma.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a ɔ yen fan, mɔɛ n‑na dɛndɛ fea chii tindi ma. Chɛɛ nyɛ gbain mɔɛ chɛ n nii an dɔ, an ni an 'na yaa n na ko tena wan tindi ma.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi sɛ‑a dɛndɛ chɛ dɔndɔ ɔ, min ni Saimɔn 'na dɛndɛ a, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ a ye, a ɔ, a ni dɛndɛ gbu tundun yii ɔ ɛnden na. Chisɔsi si‑a dɛndɛ gbu ɔ, mbɛ a bun‑da mɔɛ n kan‑da.
A ban‑da kɛn koɔ‑a, a‑a a fɔ wan Saimɔn ye, a ɔ, “Dɛndɛ chɛ wii a ta yii chɛ ɔ yii tena, mbɛ wo‑a wo 'a yaa n na dɛ a ɔ, min mbe a ma, wo ni nyɛ n bia.”
Chɛɛ Saimɔn dɔ, “Kan mɔ, nn chia nn ya a pii, nyɛ gbain chɛ an na, chɛɛ nn ma‑a nyɛ dɔndɔ wɛɛ bia ni. Chɛɛ ni i‑a a fɔ, i ɔ, nn ni nn 'na yaa n na dɛ to yii ɔ, nn mbe a ma‑a wan.”
Mbɛ an‑na yaa chɛ n na dɛ yii ɔ, an‑na nyɛ n bia aan, ɛnden fan na‑a to yaa n gbu n na ni panda panda.

Mbɛ an‑na an boo kai an bɔɛ n ma dɛndɛ dɔndɔ ɔ, min mbe a ma, an ni na, an ni basan an ma. Mbɛ an na‑a, an gbɛɛ‑a nyɛ n bɔ yaa chɛ n na aan, an‑na dɛndɛ fea n na fa‑a gban. Ɛnden fan na‑a to dɛndɛ n gbu ni tunɛ yii ɔ.
Saimɔn Pita‑a chɛ an dɔ yen, mbɛ a bea‑a Chisɔsi chen na, a ɔ, “Fa, n to, i ni ta. Ko yama ma mɔɛ mu n na.”
A‑a chɛ fɔ, a mu min na, an bɛ a bɔɛ n na, an gbɛɛ da ɔ gbaa‑a wan, a si nyɛ koaen bonda chɛ nyɔn sima ma, an‑na miin bia ka.

Chimisi wɛɛ tɛnɛ‑a wan a a, an fea Chɔn na, kai Sɛbɛdi 'a denɛ nu. An bɛ gbɛɛ ni an bɛ Saimɔn na wai chɛ a. Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ Saimɔn ye, a ɔ, “I ma chian, a mu min na, a ka gbɛ bi ma, aan a ta a nyɔn na, e ma‑a na‑a mɔɛ n fan na n tena, yɔ e nyɛ n bia buɛ min dɔ tee.”
Chɛ fɔenɛ gbakɔ Saimɔn ye, an‑na an 'na dɛndɛ n chii wan tindi ma, mbɛ an‑na fen kɔ fen to, mbɛ an bea‑a Chisɔsi fɛ.

Tima dɔndɔ a, Chisɔsi ni kɛn duu dɔndɔ ɔ, kamin dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, gbandi yama bɔen ni min gboo gbɛɛ ma. A‑a Chisɔsi yen kɛn, a bea‑a wan a chen na, mbɛ a‑a a disa, a ɔ, “Fa, ni a a di i ye, e kun fan i ni n baun.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a boo a ta, mbɛ a tu‑a kamin chɛ a. Mbɛ a ɔ, “I baun koe a di n ye. Baun gbɛ sanche.” Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, gbandi chɛ baun‑da kamin chɛ ma.

Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a dasi gbau gbau be a ma, a ɔ, “I ma koe chɛ ɔ yian mɔ ɔ mɔ a, chɛɛ ta dɔndɔ gbe mɔɛ chɛ tena, min mbe mmɔ tɛ ɔ Yataa a, a ni i ma fɛn. Mbɛ i‑a yasi chɛ bɔ nɔ Yataa tena, yɔ sawa, Yataa‑a min be Mosisi ma, a‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ. Chɛ an mbe a ɔ yian‑da mɔ ɔ mɔ a, mbɛ i baun‑da.”
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ma tɔɛ ta‑a wan a tima gbu a kan kɔ kan. A sin, mɔ fanka fanka ni na wan Chisɔsi kuiɛ a min koe a, a basan an baun koe a an 'na gbandi n dɔ.
Chɛɛ a ni an to wan tima dɔ n na, mbɛ a ta‑a kaina nu, mɔ ɔ mɔ nii kaina miin, mbɛ a‑a samunɛ chɛ.

Tee dɔndɔ a, Chisɔsi ni kɛn kan chɛ tena, mɔɛ dɔ n ni wan nɔ si ɔ, miin ni Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ n na, a basan Chu mɔɛ n na, miin ni Fayisii n na. An ka‑a wan Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, a basan Chudia chɛnyɛ gbɛɛ ɔ a. An ka‑a wan duu kan kɔ kan dɔ Kadidi chɛnyɛ wɛɛ ɔ. A tee chɛ a, Chisɔsi ni wan mɔɛ n baun‑da an 'na gbandi n dɔ, Mansa Yataa 'a gbasaya ɔ.
Yatina a tima chɛ a, kaminɛ n na‑a wan namaa tɔ dɔndɔ a, ɛ sa ɔ yaa ɔ. An toen ni an ni don kamin chɛ a chen chɛ a, Chisɔsi ni ka kaina, a sa koe a a chen kɔɔ.

Chɛɛ an ma an don chia sɔn ni, a mu min na, fanka da a ni koo kaka. Chɛ ko a, an‑na kaminɛ gbu ya wan, mbɛ an sɛ‑a a a chenɛ gbu kan ma. An‑na kaina ɛnden ma ka wan chen chɛ kun tɛ, mbɛ an‑na gbandi mɔɛ gbu a yii yaa ɔ chen chɛ tɛtɛ ma, Chisɔsi chen kɔɔɛ wandi gbu.
Chisɔsi‑a a ɔ yen kɛn danaya min nyɔn sima ni mɔɛ chɛ n dɔ, a‑a a fɔ wan gbandi mɔɛ chɛ ye, a ɔ, “N bɔ, n mbe a fɔ tena i ye, mbɛ n‑na n boo bɔ i 'a ko yama ɔ.”

Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ chɛ n‑na bai chɛ a min kɛn, an bɛ Fayisii n na, an bun‑da a fɔ‑a an yiima ɔ, an dɔ, “Kamin chɛ e na ma nyɔn na koɔ koe a ka buɛ chɛ ɔ. Ɛ ka Yataa an main‑da. Mɔ ɔ mɔ ee nɔ min mbe kun, a ni a boo bɔ mɔ gbu 'a ko yama ɔ, mɔɔ Yataa dɔndɔ gbe.”
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi na‑a an yii ma koe n dɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Yiinachii chɛ ma ma wo ɔ, mbɛ n‑na bai min fɔ ka, a ma nyin a fɔ koe a.
A ɔ ma gbɛ a fɔ koe a namaa chɛ ye, mbɛ n‑na n boo bɔ a 'a ko yama ɔ. Chɛɛ a ɔ gbɛ wan a ma koe a, a ni a kɔɔ sɔ, a ni tachɛ chɛ.

N mbe a ɔ yian‑da wan gbɛ wo a, mbɛ gbasaya ɛ wan n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ boo ɔ dunya chɛ ɔ, n boo bɔ koe a ko yama ɔ.” Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ namaa chɛ ma, a ɔ, “N mbe a fɔ tena gbɛ i ye, mbɛ i ni i kɔɔ sɔ, i ni i 'a yaa ya, i ni ta i waa a.”
Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, kamin chɛ‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, a sɔ‑a. Mbɛ a‑a a 'a yaa ya, a ni ka sa ɔ min dɔ, an gbɛɛ ya kɔɔ, mbɛ a ta‑a a waa a, ɛ ta‑a Yataa tando‑a.
An gbɛɛ da ɔ gbaa‑a wan a ɔ benden ba a. Chiandia don‑da wan an gbɛɛ ɔ, mbɛ an bun‑da Yataa tando‑a, an dɔ, “Nn‑na kamaya koe n dɔ yen bi.”
Chɛ gbakɔ, Chisɔsi bɔ‑a wan baa ma. Mbɛ a‑a kamin dɔndɔ yen, min ni pawa kain mɔɛ a, a tɔ ni Difai. A ni si ɔ a 'a pawa kain chenɛ a wan, mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ a ma, a ɔ, “Bea n fɛ.”
Mbɛ Difai‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, mbɛ a‑a a boo fenɛ n gbɛɛ to, mbɛ a bea‑a Chisɔsi fɛ.
Mbɛ Difai‑a daun chɛ bɛn ba ɔ bɛn fan a 'a chenɛ a, Chisɔsi ko a. Pawa kain mɔ sɛsɛ ni wan nɔ, ni mɔ dɔ mende nu, an bɛn chɛ ɔ, an gbɛɛ mbe si ɔ daun chɛ a, an bɛ Chisɔsi n na.

Mbɛ Chu mɔɛ dɔ nu miin ni Fayisii n na, an bɛ an 'na mɔɛ n na, miin ni Chu n 'na sawa kan, an bu ɔ nii ma dia ni. An gbonyɛ‑a wan Chisɔsi a, a fɛ denɛ n tena, an dɔ, “Wo kan mɔ ee ka ko chɛndɛ a. A ma nyin wo ni daunɛ chɛ kaina dɔndɔɛ, wo bɛ pawa kain mɔɛ chɛ n na, a basan mɔ dɔ gbɛɛ n bɛɛ a, miin mbe ee sɔ ɔ Yataa 'a chia ma.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Danda chɛ mɔ ma gbɔsɔ ee gboo ɔ bɔ tɔ ma, mɔɔ dechee chɛ nu, miin gbandien mu.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, mɔɛ miin mu mɔ tandenɛ n na Yataa tena, n ma na ni an fan ko a. Chɛɛ mɔɛ miin mbe ee sɔ ɔ Yataa 'a chia ma, n na‑a an fan ko a, min mbe a ma, an ni an kan kɔ sɔ an 'na ko yama n na.”

Mbɛ an dɔ Chisɔsi ma, “Chɔn fɛ denɛ n mbe sunɛ bia wan tima ɔ tima, mbɛ an‑na samunɛ chɛ. Nn fan Fayisii n bɛɛ, nn fɛ denɛ n bɛɛ mbe a ma ka wan. Chɛɛ i ta fɛ denɛ n mbe daunɛ an chɛ tun, an mbe ee sun bia. Fen ko a mu, an mbe chɛ ma tena?”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ni mɔɛ‑a musu si bɛnɛ chee, mbɛ a bɔɛ n na kan‑da, daun chɛ koe a mu. An mbe ee to nɔ a chen kɔɔ an ni kɔnkɔɛ a dɛ an fandi ma.
Chɛɛ tima min na mɔɛ n mbe musu si kai chɛ ya‑a an tɛ, a tima a mu, an mbe sunɛ bia‑a.”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a tai tɛ wan an tena, a ɔ, “Mɔ ɔ mɔ ee che i ni doma nama tɛ a a, doma kɔma dombo koe a. Ni mɔɛ‑a chɛ ma, a gba ma ee nyan‑da. Koe min na mu, woe an mbe to‑a doma nama chɛ ɔ. A sin, doma nama pisi chɛ ee na‑a bɛn‑da doma kɔma chɛ ya a.

A yɛ to, ni mɔ ma‑a gbɛ chɛ‑a gbɛ chɛ soe gboo ɔ, e a chɛ tena soe gboo nama an dɔ, ɛ to kaina aan a a ni kɔɔ. Chɛɛ mɔ ee gbɛ nama chɛ gbɛ chɛ soe gboo kɔma ɔ, a a kɔɔ koe a, ɛ a te wan, mbɛ i fo‑a gbɛ a, a basan soe gboo a.
Mɔ ɛ min ma, e gbɛ nama chɛ soe gboo nama an dɔ.”
A ɔ te to, “Mɔ ɔ mɔ ee ka gbɛ kɔma min tena, mbɛ a bun‑da di chɛ‑a gbɛ nama wakoe a. Koe min na mu, ɛ a fɔ‑a wan, a ɔ, gbɛ kɔma nyin a ni ben gbɛ nama ma.”

Chu mɔɛ n 'na suin tee dɔndɔ ma, Chisɔsi ni ben tena wan chia a sɛnɛ dɔndɔ tɛtɛ ma, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na. Mbɛ a fɛ denɛ n bun‑da sɛnɛ chɛ ɔ chin fenɛ tɛ‑a an boo a, an mbe a yoyɛ‑a, an mbe ta‑a a daun‑da.
Mbɛ Chu mɔɛ dɔ nu nɔ, miin ni Fayisii n na, an dɔ, “Wo e ka ko bonda min ma tena suin tee ma, a ma nyin ɛnden bɛɛ a. Mmɔ 'a sawa ma dɔn ni, mɔ ni wai chɛ suin tee ma.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Mansa Defidi na‑a koe ma wan tima dɔndɔ a. Chɛɛ n ma dan ni a a, mbɛ wo‑a a kan fan bɛ Yataa 'a gboo ɔ. Mbɛ kɔnkɔɛ na‑a a bia tima min na, an bɛ a fɛ mɔɛ n na,

a don‑da wan Yataa 'a chenɛ a, mbɛ biidi chɛ min been ni Yataa ma, a‑a a ya, mbɛ a‑a a daun. A yɛ‑a wan to, mbɛ a‑a a tɔɛ be a fɛ mɔɛ n ma. A na‑a mmɔ 'a sawa an yɔn ka, a mu min na, mmɔ 'a sawa na‑a a fɔ wan, mbɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ ee an biidi chɛ daun, mɔɔ dechee mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin mbe mmɔ tɛ ɔ Yataa a.”
Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “N fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n fan mu mansa a suin tee ko a.”
Suin tee dɔ mende ma, Chisɔsi don‑da wan Chu n 'na samun chɛ chen dɔndɔ a, mbɛ a‑a mɔɛ n kan nɔ. Kamin dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, min boo nyima faen ni a ma.

Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ dɔ nu, a basan Chu mɔɛ dɔ n na, miin ni Fayisii n na, an toen ni an ni chia an yan koɛ be koe a Chisɔsi ma. An‑na a a tɛ wan chɛndɛ chɛ, min mbe a ma, an ni a ɔ yen, ni ɛ mɔɛ chɛ baun‑da wan suin tee ma.
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi na‑a an yii ma koe sɔn fan, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ kamin chɛ ye, min boo chɛ faen ni ka a ma, a ɔ, “I kɔɔ sɔ, i ni na nɛ ya ɔ.” Kamin chɛ na‑a wan, mbɛ a sɔ‑a an ya kɔɔ.

Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “A nyin fan, mmɔ ni a ɔ sɔn, mmɔ 'a sawa dɔnden mu fen ma suin tee ma. Mmɔ 'a sawa dɔnden fan mu mɔ ni mɔɛ baun, a ben a fa koe ma. Mmɔ 'a sawa dɔnden fan mu to mɔ ni ko chɛndɛ ma, a ben ko yama ma koe ma.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a an gbɛɛ ya kɔɔɛ ma fɛn dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a a 'a tindanɛ, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ kamin chɛ ye, a ɔ, “I boo ɔ sawan.” Mbɛ a‑a a boo ɔ sawan, mbɛ a boo baun‑da, yɔ a dɔndɔɛ ni buɛ min dɔ.
Mbɛ sawa kan mɔɛ chɛ n faa tɛ‑a a ɔ benden ba a, an bɛ Fayisii chɛ n na. Mbɛ an bun‑da a tɛnsɛ‑a an nyɔn tɛ ɔ, ni an mbe fen ma Chisɔsi a.
Tima dɔndɔ a, Chisɔsi sɛ‑a wan kɔnkɔ dɔndɔ kun tɛ samun chɛ koe a. A chi‑a nɔ wan kudu ɛ samun chɛ‑a Yataa tena.
Banda ɔ ka‑a kɛn, a‑a a fɛ denɛ n gbɛɛ chee wan, mbɛ a‑a a boo sɔ mɔ tan kun ma fea n ma an tɛ. Mbɛ a‑a an ma a 'a sɔ mɔɛ n na.

A na‑a a boo sɔ chɛ n fan ma: Saimɔn, ni a dɔɛ Anduu, Chimisi ni Chɔn, Fiipi, Batɔɔmiu, Matiu, Tɔmɔsi, Chimisi dɔndɔɛ, Saimɔn, Chudasi ni Chudasi Isikayɔti. Saimɔn saa saa, a‑a min ya, a‑a tɔ dɔ gbɛɛ be wan a ma a ɔ Pita. Chimisi fean bɔɛ fa tɔ ni Afiɔsi. Saimɔn dɔndɔɛ wɛɛ ni mɔɛ an na, min ni a 'a chɛnyɛ ma chɛɛ chɛ tena. Chudasi saa fa tɔ ni Chimisi. Chudasi Isikayɔti ni mɔɛ an na min danka‑a Chisɔsi ma tachɛ‑a.

Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a kɔnkɔɛ chɛ yii, an bɛ a 'a sɔ mɔɛ tan kun ma fea chɛ n na. Mbɛ a sɔ‑a nɛngbunɛ ɔ. A fɛ denɛ sɛsɛ dɔ mende n ni wan nɔ, a basan mɔ fanka fanka a. Mɔɛ chɛ n tɛ ɔ, dɔ n ka‑a wan Chuusaɛn duu ɔ ni Chudia chɛnyɛ tɔɛ n gbɛɛ ɔ. A yɛ to, dɔ n ka‑a wan Taya ni Sidon duu ɔ, miin ni kɔ yii a sanɛ.
An na‑a na, min mbe a ma, an ni Chisɔsi da a kuiɛ a min. An toen ni to, a ni an baun an 'na gbandi n dɔ. Nyina yama ni miin fɛ, an bɛɛ na‑a na wan, mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a an baun.
Mɔɛ n gbɛɛ‑a butuin chɛ wan, min mbe a ma, an ni tu Chisɔsi a, koe min na mu, bauncha gbasaya ni wan ka tena a tena, ɛ ta‑a mɔɛ n gbɛɛ baun‑da.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a ya a mun a fɛ denɛ n ma, a ɔ, “Wo duaen mu, wo wɛn yɔnden mu. A mu min na, Yataa ma‑a wo 'a mansa a.
Wo duaen mu, kɔnkɔɛ ɛ wo wɛn na sanche. Yataa ɛ wo bu fa‑a wan. Wo duaen mu, wo wɛn mbe di chɛ‑a sanche. Wo e yɛn‑da wan.
“Ni mɔ gbu n too‑a wo a a si n ma, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, dua mu a a wo ma. Ni an‑na an kan kɔ sɔ wo a, mbɛ an‑na wo main, mbɛ an yɛ‑a, an‑na bai yama sa wo ma.

Ni koe chɛ n si‑a wo a, wo bu ɔ ni dia. Wo buɔdia tɔmbɔɛ don, koe min na mu, Yataa ɛ tɔnɔnɛ chenama sa tena ɔ bɛn‑da wan wo ko a banda bu ɔ. Wo bu ɔ ni dia, a mu min na, an‑na ko ma gbaaen dɔndɔ gbe chɛ nyɔn sima sa wo ma, yɔ an bemba n ta bemba n‑na min sa suun Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n ma.
“Chɛɛ koe chɛ n mbe yaua‑a gba, miin mbe wo tan‑da, wo wɛn nyanden mu sanche. A mu min na, wo ban‑da wo ta buɔdia bɔ‑a dunya chɛ ɔ.

Koe chɛ n mbe yaua‑a gba, miin mbe wo tan‑da, wo wɛn bu faen mu gban sanche. Kɔnkɔɛ ɛ wo bia‑a wan. Koe chɛ n mbe yaua‑a gba, miin mbe wo tan‑da, wo wɛn mbe yɛn tena sanche. Wo e chinchin di chɛ‑a wan.

“Ni mɔɛ n gbɛɛ‑a wo tɔ a diama fɔ, koe miin mbe wo tan‑da, ɛ yaua‑a gba. Koe min na mu, an bemba n ta bemba n‑na tɔ a dia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ an chɛ suun chɛ n na, miin ni fania fɔ, mbɛ Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ mu an na.”
Chisɔsi ɔ, “Chɛɛ n ni a fɔ wo ye, wo wɛn mbe n kuiɛ a min tena sanche. Wo ko don ma nyɔɛ mu miin na, wo to an na. Mɔɛ miin tooen mu wo a, wo ko chɛndɛ ma an na.
Mɔɛ miin mbe wo danka tena, wo an dua. Miin mbe ko yama ma tena wo a, mbɛ wo‑a samunɛ chɛ an ko a.
Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a wo gban fɛ dɔndɔɛ gbasi, wo dɔndɔɛ wɛɛ a mun, a ni a wɛɛ gbasi. Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a wo 'a doma kun ma doma ya, wo a kɔɔ nɛnɛ wɛɛ be a ma.
Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a wo ɔ tisa a deman koe a, wo a deman. Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a wo boo fenɛ ya, wo ma a ɔ tisa to a a yɛ koe a wo ma.
Wo toen mu mɔɛ n ni koe min nyɔn sima a tachɛ wo tena, min na di wo ye, wo a nyɔn sima an na tachɛ an bɛɛ tena.
“Mɔɛ miin toen mu wo a, ni wo to‑a nɔ, wo ni to dechee an fan na, Yataa ee wo dua‑a. A mu min na, ko yama ma mɔɛ n bɛɛ toen fan mu mɔɛ n na, miin toen mu an na.
Mɔɛ miin mbe ko chɛndɛ ma wo a, ni wo e ko chɛndɛ ma dechee an fan na, Yataa ee wo dua‑a. Ko yama ma mɔɛ n bɛɛ mbe chɛ an ma.

Mɔɛ miin mbe che wo 'a kuiɛ n bɔ‑a, ni wo e kuiɛ be dechee an fan ma, Yataa ee wo dua‑a. Ko yama ma mɔɛ n bɛɛ mbe kuiɛ be wan an bɔɛ ko yama ma mɔɛ n ma, koe min na mu, an‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ an mbe a ma sɔn‑da wan.

Chɛɛ wo e min ma, wo to wo ko don ma nyɔɛ n na, mbɛ wo‑a ko chɛndɛ ma an na. Kuiɛ a dɛ, a sin wo ma wo yii na chii a a yɛ koe a wo ma. Ni wo‑a koe chɛ n ma, Yataa ɛ tɔnɔnɛ chenama be‑a wan wo ma, mbɛ wo sɔnɛ bɔ‑a Yataa Wa sɔnɛ a. A mu min na, ɛ ko chɛndɛ ma wan wai nyima sɔn bai n na, a basan chɛ n na, miin yau kaka.
Chinchimaya ni ma wo ɔ, yɔ Fa Yataa wɛɛ chinchimayaen mu buɛ min dɔ.”

Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo ma wo bɔɛ n ma bɔ. Ni wo ma chɛ ma ni, Yataa wɛɛ ee kaa a tɛ‑a wo wakoe ma. Wo ma kaa yama a tɛ. Ni wo ma chɛ ma ni, Yataa wɛɛ ee wo yɛi‑a. Wo wo boo bɔ wo bɔɛ n 'na ko yama maenɛ n dɔ wo a. Ni wo‑a chɛ ma, Yataa wɛɛ‑a a boo bɔ‑a wan wo ta ko yama maenɛ n dɔ.

Wo wai nyima chɛ wo bɔɛ n na. Ni wo‑a chɛ ma, Yataa wɛɛ ɛ wai nyima chɛ‑a wan wo a. Ɛ fenɛ miin be‑a wo ma, ɛ kɔkoa‑a wan aan, a sin mbe ma‑a wan, yɔ ni an‑na pani a fa gban, mbɛ an‑na a ma din, mbɛ an‑na a a fa to, ɛ bɔn fan a ma. Wo‑a a be‑a buɛ min dɔ wo bɔɛ n ma, Yataa wɛɛ‑a a be‑a ka wan wo wɛɛ ma.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a tai chɛ tɛ an tena, a ɔ, “Ya te tɔɛ ee che chia yian‑da a bɔɛ ya te tɔɛ a. Ni a‑a chɛ ma, an fea gbɛɛ ɛ bea‑a wan sonɛ ɔ.
A yɛ to, kan den kan kɔ kan ma ben ni a kan mɔɛ ma. Chɛɛ kan den kan kɔ kan, ni a‑a kanɛ a ban, ɛ ma wan yɔ a kan mɔɛ.
“Ni kɔn gbondo ma‑a wo ta ya a, wo ma wo faa gbaa bubuu ko a wo bɔ n ya a.

Wo ee kun wo ni a fɔ wo bɔɛ ye, wo ɔ, a ni ka wɛ, wo ni bubuu ɛnden chɛ bɔ a ya a, min mu ka, kɔn gbondo chɛ ɛ sa ɔ wo ta ya a. Wo wan nɛnɛn fea ti chɛ nu, wo kɔn gbondo chɛ bɔ pɛn wo ta ya a, mbɛ wo kun‑da gbɛ kaina yen koe a gbadan, a bubuu chɛ bɔ koe a wo bɔɛ ya a.”
Chisɔsi ɔ, “Kɔn chɛndɛ ee gbɔ yama be, n mbe ee baa kɔn yama ni gbɔ chɛndɛ be.
Kɔn kan kɔ kan mbe sɔn a gbɔɛ an ma, ɛ min be. Mɔ ee che kɔn gbɔ chɛndɛ kai‑a kɔn yama ɔ.

A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, mɔ chɛndɛ ɛ ko chɛndɛ an ma, a mu min na, a faa ɔ gbɛen fan mu. Mbɛ mɔ yama sin mbe ko yama an ma, a mu min na, a faa ɔ finden fan mu. Koe min mbe mɔ gbu faa ɔ, an mbe bɔ a da ɔ.”
Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ni wo ee na‑a n da a kuiɛ a min‑da, wo ma n chee, ‘Mansa, Mansa.’
Mɔ ɔ mɔ kan kɔ kan, min mbe na‑a n tena, a ni a too ma sɔ n 'na bai ma, mbɛ a‑a a ma, yɔ n toen mu buɛ min dɔ a ma koe a. N mbe a ɔ yian‑da wan wo a, an mɔɛ chɛ ɛ buɛ min dɔ.

Ɛ ka wan yɔ kamin chɛ min ni chen sɔɛ a. A‑a son dɔ yiienɛ sin pɛn, mbɛ a‑a a 'a chenɛ kuu si gban son chɛ ɔ. A ban‑da kɛn an chenɛ sɔ‑a, yii fa‑a wan, mbɛ a sɛ‑a a kuu ma. Chɛɛ a ma che ni a ni a a bɔn, koe min na mu, a sɔen fan ni chɛndɛ chɛ.
