Chɛɛ mɔɛ min mbe n 'na bai a min‑da, mbɛ a ma a ma ni, yɔ n toen mu buɛ min dɔ a ma koe a, ɛ wan yɔ kaminɛ min‑na chenɛ sɔ, chɛɛ a ma a kuu si ni chɛndɛ. Yii fa chɛ sɛ‑a kɛn chen chɛ kuu ma, a bea‑a wan dɔndɔ gbe. A yɔn‑da wan a yama boo a.”
Chisɔsi ban‑da kɛn koɔ‑a mɔɛ chɛ n tena, mbɛ a ta‑a Kapanaun duu ɔ.

Soya gbakoo dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, min ka‑a Domi chɛnyɛ ɔ. Soya chɛmɛ dɔndɔ ni wan a kɔɔ. Bɔi denɛ ni wan a boo ɔ, min bakoe a ni di a ye gbeden. Bɔi den chɛ gbandi‑a wan, min‑na a ma, ɛnden fan na‑a to a ni fa.
A‑a Chisɔsi ma tɔɛ a min kɛn, a‑a Chu gbakoo dɔ n sɔ wan a tena. A toen ni an ni a disa, min mbe a ma, a ni na, a ni a 'a bɔi denɛ baun.
An ta‑a, mbɛ an‑na Chisɔsi tan, an dɔ, “Fa, i dimu, mmɔ ta, i ni kai chɛ 'a bɔi den chɛ baun, a mu min na, mɔ chɛndɛ wa mu a a.
A yɛ to, a toen mu mmɔ 'a mɔɛ n na sai ma. A wandi gbu an‑na nn 'na samun chɛ chen chɛ sɔ nn ye.”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi ta‑a an bɛ an na. An che‑a kɛn chenɛ baima gbɛdɛn, mbɛ soya mɔɛ chɛ‑a a dia nyɔɛ n sɔ Chisɔsi ya ɔ. A ɔ, an ni a fɔ a ye ka, “Fa, i ma i wandi tɔɔya. A mu min na, mɔ a tenden ma n na i don koe a n 'na chenɛ a.
N ma buɛ chɛ gbu an fɛ ni, n‑na n yii na chii, mbɛ a gbu ma nyin, n fandi n ni ta i tan. Chɛɛ i da a kuiɛ a ben dechee, n 'na bɔi denɛ ɛ baun‑da wan.

A mu min na, n fandi gbu wɛɛ, n mbe mɔɛ n fan 'na gbasaya kɔɔ. N bɛɛ, soya n mbe wan n kɔɔ. N mbe a fɔ wan dɔndɔ ye, n dɔ, ‘Ta,’ mbɛ a ta‑a. N mbe a fɔ wan dɔndɔ wɛɛ ma, n dɔ ‘Na,’ mbɛ a na‑a. Mbɛ n‑na a fɔ n 'na bɔi denɛ ma, n dɔ, ‘Chɛ ma,’ mbɛ a‑a a ma.”

Chisɔsi tɛnɛ‑a wan a a, bai chɛ a min koe a. Mbɛ a‑a a ya a mun fanka wa chɛ ma, min ni a sɔ tena a fɛ, mbɛ a ɔ, “Kɛn gba, n ma mɔ bonda chɛ yen nin bɛ mmɔ Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n gbɛɛ tɛ ɔ, min danden mu ka n na.”
Sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n yɛenɛ a chenɛ a, an‑na a tan gbɛ, bɔi den chɛ baundenɛ ɛ.
Chɛ gbakɔ, a ɔ ma yansan ni, mbɛ Chisɔsi ta‑a duu dɔndɔ ɔ, an ni min chee, an dɔ, Nain. An bɛ an na‑a ta a fɛ denɛ n na, a basan mɔ fanka dɔ mende n na.

A yen ko, an che‑a kɛn duu sundu kunɛ a, an‑na mɔ sɛsɛ tan fan, an mbe ta‑a kamin dɔndɔ tɔn‑da. An ni ta tena mɔɛ min tɔn‑da, a de ni fuinya musu an na, a sin a dɔndɔ gbe an ni a de boo ɔ den kaienɛ a. Mɔ sɛsɛ‑a a sɔ wan su chɛ fɛ a ka an duu chɛ ɔ.
Mansa Chisɔsi‑a sunkun chɛ yen kɛn, a ma chinchinɛ‑a a bia wan, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ a ye, a ɔ, “Sɛmbɛ di‑a.”
Mbɛ a na‑a, a tu‑a su sa kɔn chɛ a, mbɛ miin ni ta tena su chɛ a, an sɔ‑a an gba ɔ. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “Kamin tɔngbɔɛ, n mbe a fɔ tena i ye, i ni i kɔɔ sɔ.”
Mbɛ kamin chɛ min faenɛ ni ka, a‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, a si‑a, a bun‑da koɔ‑a. Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a be a de ma.
Chiandia‑a an gbɛɛ bia wan, mbɛ an‑na Yataa tando, an dɔ, “Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔ wa na‑a mmɔ tɛ ɔ. A sin Yataa na‑a a 'a mɔɛ n baun koe a.”
Chisɔsi na‑a koe min ma ka, a‑a a ma wan a ma tɔɛ ta‑a Chudia chɛnyɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, a basan chɛnyɛ chɛ n na a a tindanɛ.
Mbɛ Chɔn fɛ denɛ n ta‑a pimbi chenɛ a, mbɛ an‑na ko ɔ ko ɔ yian a a. Mbɛ a‑a mɔ fea n chee an tɛ ɔ,
mbɛ a‑a an sɔ Mansa Chisɔsi tena, a ɔ tisa koe a, ni a wan mu mɔɛ chɛ a, a wan Chɔn ni gbonka chɛ tena min na koe a. A ɔ, kɔ an ni chia a fɛn mɔ dɔ mende ya ɔ.

Mbɛ an na‑a Chisɔsi tena, an dɔ, “Chɔn, min ni yii chɛ mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, an‑na nn sɔ i tena. A ɔ, nn ni i ɔ tisa, ni i wan mu mɔɛ chɛ a, a ni gbonka chɛ tena min na koe a. A ɔ, kɔ nn ni chia a fɛn mɔ dɔ mende ya ɔ?”
A tima dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, Chisɔsi ni wan mɔ sɛsɛ baun‑da an 'na gbandi n dɔ. A sin na‑a nyina yama n gbain fan mɔɛ dɔ n fɛ. A yɛ to, a‑a ya te tɔ sɛsɛ ya a ka wan.

Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ Chɔn 'na sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n ye, a ɔ, “Wo yɛ, wo ta yiima ɔ, wo ni a ɔ yian kai Chɔn na, wo‑a koe miin dɔ yen, ni wo‑a miin na min. Wo a fɔ a ye, wo ta yiima ɔ, mbɛ ya te tɔɛ nu, an‑na kaina ɔ yen, wo ɔ, namaa an sɔ‑a. Wo a fɔ a ye to, wo ta yiima ɔ, wo ɔ, gbandi yama ni miin gboo ma, an baun‑da, wo ɔ, too gbee tɔɛ nu, an‑na koe a min, wo ɔ, miin faen ni, an‑na fɔɛ ma sɔn to, wo ɔ, yɔn tɔɛ n bɛɛ, an‑na sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a min.
Wo a fɔ a ye, wo ɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ, i wɛn gboo ɔ ma fa ni dan koe a n na, e dua ma sɔn‑da wan.”

Chɔn 'na sɔ mɔɛ n yɛ‑a kɛn, Chisɔsi‑a a kuu sɔ wan bai sa‑a a si Chɔn ma fanka fanka chɛ tena, a ɔ, “Wo ta‑a kɛn Chɔn tena fuinɛ ma, wo yii na chiien ni mɔɛ minan nyɔn sima tan koe a? Wo nii ma ta ni maa yamba ma kaminɛ an yen koe a.

Wo na‑a ta nyɔn yen koe a? Wo nii ma ta ni mɔɛ an yen koe a, min ma chiien ni koa baa gbandenɛ ɔ. Tea ko a, mɔɛ miin mbe an ma chii ka, a sin, nyan fen kan kɔ kan mbe an boo ɔ, an mbe ma kata n fan dɔ.

Wo a fɔ wɛ gbu n ye, wo toen ni wo ni nyɔn yen, min ta‑a wo a? Wo toen ni wo ni Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ an yen? Tea tea a, n ni a fɔ wo ye, wo ban‑da Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ yen‑da, min benden mu Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ tɔɛ n ma.
A mu min na, Chɔn fan mu sɔ mɔɛ chɛ a, Yataa 'a gboo‑a bai sa a si min ma, a ɔ, ‘Yataa ɔ te kunka mansa Chasi ma, a ɔ, a yen ko, ɛ a 'a dɛya sɔ tena wan a ya ɔ, min mbe dɔbɛnɛ chɛ‑a a ko a.’
N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ ee wɛ nɔ dunya ɔ, min benden mu Chɔn ma. Chɛɛ mɔɛ den toa wɛɛ mɔɛ n tɛ ɔ, miin don‑da Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ, a benden mu a wan Chɔn sin ma.”

Mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, a basan pawa kain mɔɛ chɛ n na, an‑na a a min, Chisɔsi‑a bai min fɔ. A sin an gbɛɛ dɔn‑da wan a ma, mbɛ Yataa toen mu koe min na, a mu tea koe an na. A mu min na, Chɔn na‑a yii chɛ wan an kunɛ ɔ tee, Yataa chia a.

Chɛɛ Chu mɔɛ chɛ nu miin ni Fayisii n na, an bɛ Chu n n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ n na, an ban‑da bɔ koe a chia chɛ a, Yataa toen ni an ni bɔ min na. Koe min na mu, an ban‑da Chɔn ye yii chɛ koe a an kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ te to, “N mbe mɔɛ chɛ n siman fen ma gbɛ? Mɔɛ minan sima n mbe nɛ?

An maen fan mu yɔ den mɛsɛ nu tɔmbɔ chɛ baa ma. Chɛ n mbe denka ɔ, chɛ n mbe kandɔɛ. Miin mbe denka ɔ, an‑na yee tɛ wan kandɔ mɔɛ n tena, an dɔ, ‘Mmɔ si a bɔ, mmɔ ni mmɔ don.’ Chɛɛ kandɔ kaka ma dɔn ni. Mbɛ denka ɔ kaka‑a a fɔ to, an dɔ, ‘Mmɔ di chɛ wɛ.’ Chɛɛ an ma dɔn ni chɛ wɛɛ ma.
Chɛ tɛen mu min ma, Chɔn min ni yii chɛ mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, a na‑a wan. A yɛ to, a ni sunɛ bia wan, a sin nii gbɛ min. Wo ɔ te, ɛ dama. Wo ɔ, nyina yama an mbe a fɛ.

Chɛɛ n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n na‑a, n mbe daunɛ chɛ, a yɛ to, n mbe gbɛ min fan. Wo‑a a fɔ wan to, wo ɔ, nun namaya tɔɛ mu n na, wo ɔ, kɔn gbasi kai mu to n na. Wo ɔ te to, n fan mu pawa kain mɔɛ n dia nyɔɛ a, a basan mɔɛ tɔɛ n na, miin mbe ee sɔ ɔ Yataa 'a chia ma.
Chɛɛ mɔɛ n mbe a ɔ yen‑da wan, mbɛ Yataa 'a yiimatɛ an mu tea tea yiimatɛ a. An mbe chɛ ɔ yen‑da koe n fan ma, mɔɛ chɛ n mbe miin ma‑a, mɔɛ chɛ nu, Yataa‑a a 'a yiimatɛ chɛ be miin ma.”
Mɔ dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, min ni Fayisii a, a tɔ ni Saimɔn. A na‑a Chisɔsi chee wan, kɔ a ni ta an ni daunɛ chɛ. Chisɔsi dɔn‑da wan, mbɛ a ta‑a Saimɔn 'na chenɛ a. A che‑a kɛn, mbɛ a si‑a daun chɛ tena.

Yatina, a tima chɛ a, duu dia dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ an duu chɛ ɔ. A na‑a Chisɔsi ma tɔɛ a min fan, mbɛ ɛ daun chɛ‑a Fayisii chɛ 'a chenɛ a. A ta‑a wan tu kunyɛ a diama wa a an chen chɛ a. Tu chɛ ni baa an dɔ min nyanden ni senɛ ɔ. An sen baa chɛ baa ni gbɛ kaka.

Musu chɛ don‑da kɛn Fayisii chɛ 'a chenɛ a, a‑a a ma bun fan Chisɔsi gbaa chia a, a chenɛ ɔ fuinden ni kaina, mbɛ a bun‑da di chɛ‑a fiko fiko. A ya yii min ni ka bɔ tena, a‑a Chisɔsi chenɛ n ma chima wan. A‑a a kundi an ya, a‑a Chisɔsi chenɛ n ma fian a a. A yɛ‑a wan to, a‑a a da tu Chisɔsi chenɛ n na, a ɔ yian koe a, mbɛ basɔmaya ɛ wan a boo ɔ Chisɔsi ko a. A‑a tu kunyɛ a diama chɛ ya, mbɛ a‑a Chisɔsi chenɛ ma mun a gbɛɛ a.

Fayisii chɛ, min‑na Chisɔsi chee ka a 'a chenɛ a daun chɛ koe a, a‑a koe chɛ ɔ yen kɛn, a‑a a fɔ wan a yiima ɔ, a ɔ, “Ni kamin chɛ ni Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ an na tea a, a ni a ɔ sɔn‑da wan musu min nyɔn sima ɛ ka tu tena a a. A ni a ɔ sɔn‑da wan, mbɛ mɔɛ an nɛ, min mbe ee sɔ ɔ Yataa 'a chia ma.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi koɔ‑a, a ɔ, “Saimɔn, bai an mbe n da a i ko a.” Mbɛ Saimɔn dɔ, “Ticha, fen bai mu?”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Kamin dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, min 'na kuiɛ ni kamin fea n ma. Kuiɛ ni wan kaminɛ dɔndɔɛ ma, min taen ni kain gbɛnsɛn chɛmɛ duu a, mbɛ dɔndɔɛ sin kain gbɛnsɛn bi duu.
An fea dɔndɔ wɛɛ ma kun ni an ni kamin chɛ 'a kuiɛ bɔ, min‑na a ma, a‑a a boo bɔ an fea gbɛɛ 'a kuiɛ chɛ ɔ. Mɔ fea chɛ n tɛ ɔ, minan mbe to kuiɛ ti chɛ a, a ni ben a bɔɛ ma?”
Mbɛ Saimɔn dɔ, “N tana, n 'na yiinachii ɔ, kuiɛ chenama chɛ ni ka min ma.” Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “I‑a tea fɔ.”

A‑a a tindan musu chɛ tena, mbɛ a ɔ Saimɔn ma, “I‑a a ɔ yen fan, musu chɛ‑a koe min ma n tena, ae? N don‑da kɛn bi i 'a chen chɛ a, i ma yii be ni n ma, n chenɛ wɛɛ ma ko koe a. Chɛɛ musu chɛ to‑a wan di chɛ‑a aan, a ya yii‑a n chenɛ ma chima, a sin‑na a kundi an ya to, a‑a n chenɛ n ma fian a a.
N don‑da kɛn i 'a chen chɛ a, i ma n kɔndɔn ni koadia ɔ, chɛɛ aan n na‑a bi tima min na, musu chɛ ɛ tun a da tu tu‑a n chenɛ n fan na koadia ɔ.
I ma n kɔ ni tu ɔ, a sin koe a n kunɛ a, chɛɛ musu chɛ‑a tu kunyɛ a diama sin fan n chenɛ ma.

Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, n ni a ma din i tena, mbɛ musu chɛ‑a koadia chenama min dɔ yian ka n na, a‑a a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ Yataa‑a a boo bɔ a 'a ko yama chɛ n gbɛɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ Yataa ɛ a boo bɔ‑a mɔɛ min 'na ko yama sima sima ɔ dechee, a mɔɛ chɛ ee koadia chenama ɔ yian.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ musu chɛ ye, a ɔ, “N‑na n boo bɔ i 'a ko yama ɔ.”
Mbɛ mɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ nu, miin ni ka si ɔ daun chɛ tena chɛ, an‑na a kuu sɔ a fɔ‑a an nyɔn ye, an dɔ, “Kamin chɛ e na ma nyɔn na, a boo bɔ koe a mɔɛ n 'na ko yama n bɛɛ ɔ?”
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ wan musu chɛ ye, a ɔ, “Ta i faa chimaenɛ a don, i 'a danaya‑a i baun.”
Tima ɛnden gbakɔ, Chisɔsi ben ben‑da wan duu n dɔ, ɛ ta‑a sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian‑da mɔɛ n na, a si Yataa 'a mansaya ma. A fɛ den tan kun ma fea n bɛɛ ni wan a fɛ.

Musu dɔ n bɛɛ ni wan a fɛ. An ni musu n fan na, Chisɔsi na‑a miin baun an 'na gbandi ɔ. An dɔ n sin, a na‑a nyina yama n fan gbain an fɛ. Musu chɛ n gbu sin tɛ ɔ, musu dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, min tɔ ni Mɛi, min ka‑a Makadaa duu ɔ. Chisɔsi na‑a nyina yama wɔnfea gbain an fɛ.

Chowana wɛɛ ni to an musu chɛ n dɔndɔ an na, min chɛɛ ni wai chɛ tena Mansa Ɛdɔdi ko a. Susana wɛɛ ni wan nɔ, a basan musu sɛsɛ dɔ gbɛɛ n na. Musu chɛ n ni an fandi ta boo fenɛ n be wan Chisɔsi ma, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na, an ta basamaya a.
Mɔɛ n ni wan tun na‑a Chisɔsi tena, a ka duu sɛsɛ n dɔ, mbɛ fanka wa a kan‑da kɛn, Chisɔsi‑a tai chɛ an tɛ an tena.

A ɔ, “Tee dɔndɔ a, kamin dɔndɔ ta‑a wan a 'a sɛnɛ ɔ, chin fen fasi tena. Ɛ a fasi chɛ an na, mbɛ dɔ bea‑a chia kuu a. Mbɛ dɔ n bɛɛ bea‑a faa gban duu gboo ma, dɔ n yɛ‑a an bea‑a wai duu gboo ma, mbɛ dɔ n sin bea‑a duu gboo chɛndɛ ma. Chin fen kuu miin bea‑a ka chia kuu a, mɔɛ n tɛn tɛn‑da wan a ɔ, mbɛ konde n bɛɛ‑a an sogban sogban fan. Miin sin bea‑a ka faa gban duu gboo chɛ ma, an fɛn‑da wan, chɛɛ an fa‑a wan. Koe min na mu, yii kan kɔ kan nii an duu gboo chɛ ɔ. Miin sin bea‑a ka wai duu gboo chɛ ma, an bɛɛ fɛn‑da wan, a basan wai chɛ a dɔndɔ a, chɛɛ wai chɛ n koa‑a wan a ben chin fen chɛ n ma. Chɛ‑a chin fen fɛn chɛ n na kɔnya wan, mbɛ an gbaa‑a. Miin bea‑a ka duu gboo chɛndɛ chɛ ma, an fɛn‑da wan, a danka a, an gbɔ‑a wan wɔsɔkɔɔ. An yii‑a wan gbaa chɛmɛ dɔndɔ ko a.” Chisɔsi ɔ te gbɛ, “Wo wɛn too ɛ koe a min, wo chɛ a min.”
Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ n‑na a ɔ tisa wan, ni a‑a tai min tɛ ka a fasaien mu fen na.

Mbɛ a ɔ, “Mɔɛ gbɛɛ nii ma min dɔ sɔn tee, a si Yataa 'a mansaya ma, a‑a an dɔ yian wo a. Chɛɛ mɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ nu, n mbe koɔ an tena tai an dɔ. Min mbe a ma, an ya a kaenɛ ɛ ma‑a wan, an ni kaina fɛn, chɛɛ an mbe ee ko ɔ ko ɔ yen‑da. Mbɛ an mbe an too ma sɔ‑a wan, chɛɛ an mbe ee ko ɔ ko ɔ gbɛ‑a.”
Chisɔsi ɔ, “Tai chɛ tɔmɔsi an nɛ. Chin fen kuu chɛ mu Yataa 'a bai an na.

Mɔɛ dɔ n mbe wan yɔ chia a duu gboo chɛ, chin fen kuu n bea‑a min ma. Ni an‑na Yataa 'a sakana bai a min, Sitana ɛ na wan a ya kɔɔɛ a, mbɛ a‑a bai chɛ bɔ an yiima ɔ, min mbe a ma, an ma na dan sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a, mbɛ an‑na bauncha ma sɔn.

Mɔɛ dɔ n sin mbe wan yɔ faa gban duu gboo chɛ, chin fen kuu n bea‑a min ma. Ni an‑na sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a min, an mbe an boo si wan a kɔɔ, buɔdia wandi gbu a. Chɛɛ Yataa 'a bai chɛ ee sa an yiima ɔ chɛndɛ chɛ, a ni tima ɔ yansama ya nɔ. An mbe dan dechee a a tima ɛnden fan ko a, chɛɛ ni koe ɔ gbɛa‑a an ma, mbɛ an‑na an boo bɔ a kɔɔ.

Mɔɛ dɔ n sin mbe wan nɔ yɔ wai duu gboo chɛ, chin fen kuu chɛ n bea‑a ka min ma. An mbe sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a min fan, chɛɛ faagbaa ɛ wan an mɔɛ chɛ n ma, dunya chɛ ɔ nyanɛ ko a, a basan a ɔ buɔdia a. Ni chɛ ma‑a an yii ma, an mbe ee che an gbɔsɔ‑a Yataa 'a wai chɛ koe a.

Mɔɛ dɔ n sin mbe wan yɔ duu gboo chɛndɛ chɛ, chin fen kuu n bea‑a ka min ma. Ni an‑na sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a min, an mbe a sa wan an yii ma chɛndɛ chɛ, mbɛ an‑na a ma, yɔ sakana bai chɛ‑a min fɔ an ye a ma koe a. A sin to, yakɔɔtawa kan kɔ kan ni an tan bɛɛ, an mbe ee sɛmbɛ dan koe a Yataa a.”

Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a dambo a man, a ee samba bun a kun ma, chɛ ma, a ni a a don sofa kɔɔ. Chɛɛ ni mɔ‑a dambo a man, e a si kaina wan, min mbe a ma, ni mɔɛ n don‑da dechee i 'a chenɛ a, an mbe kun fan an ni kaina ɔ yen gbadan.
“Koe min na mu, ko ɔ ko min dɔ nunden mu, ɛ bɔ‑a wan ya a ma. Koe min bɛɛ ma bunden mu, a wɛɛ ɛ bɔ‑a wan ya a ma tee dɔndɔ a.

“Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo wo kun ma fɛn wo e wo too ma sɔ‑a buɛ min dɔ. A mu min na, miin mbe an too ma sɔ‑a chɛndɛ chɛ, Yataa ɛ an 'na yiimatɛ ma munda‑a wan. Chɛɛ mɔɛ miin mbe ee dɔn‑da an too ma sɔ‑a, yiimatɛ ɛnden chɛ wɛɛ min mbe ma‑a an dɔ, Yataa ɛ a ma‑a wan an ni fo a.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi de na‑a a tena, an bɛ a dɔ kaima n na. Chɛɛ an ma kun ni, an ni gbɛn a ma, a mu min na, fanka da a ni koo kaka a 'a tindanɛ.
Mbɛ mɔ dɔndɔ‑a a fɔ Chisɔsi ye, a ɔ, “I de yen ko sɔ ɔ baa ma, an bɛ i dɔ kaima n na. An toen mu an ni i yen.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ an gbɛɛ ye, a ɔ, “Mɔɛ miin mbe Yataa 'a bai a min‑da, mbɛ an‑na an boo si a kɔɔ, n de mu an fan na. N dɔ kaima n bɛɛ mu an mɔ dɔndɔ gbe chɛ n fan na.”
Tee dɔndɔ a, Chisɔsi sɛ‑a dɛndɛ dɔndɔ ɔ, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na. Mbɛ a ɔ, an ni yii wa chɛ tɛ tindi dɔndɔɛ ma. Mbɛ an bun‑da ta‑a dɛndɛ chɛ ɔ.
An to‑a ta an na yii chɛ a, mbɛ Chisɔsi chinɔ‑a a ye. Mbɛ fia wa‑a a kuu sɔ bɔ‑a, min‑na a ma, yii bun‑da chɛ‑a dɛndɛ gbu ɔ. A na‑a to ɛnden fan na, dɛndɛ gbu ni tunɛ an na yii ɔ.

Mbɛ a fɛ denɛ n bun‑da a a kunɛ‑a. An dɔ, “Kan mɔ, kan mɔ, mmɔ yen ko to‑a yii ɔ.” Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, a‑a yii chɛ, min kɔnkɔɛ ni sɔ ka dengben, a ɔ ɛ gbasi, a fea fia min bɛɛ ni bɔ tena, a‑a an na gban. Mbɛ fia ɔ maun‑da don, mbɛ yii wɛɛ si‑a chidi.

Mbɛ a ɔ an ma, “Fen ko a mu, wo ma dan ni n na?” Chɛɛ an da ɔ gbaa‑a wan, a sin, an chian‑da wan, mbɛ an dɔ an nyɔn ma, “Fen kamin nyɔn sima mu chɛ a? Ɛ koe min fɔ fia wɛɛ yɛ, a basan yii a, an mbe ma.”
Chɛ gbakɔ, Chisɔsi n‑na a fo wan gbɛ yii wa chɛ tindi ma Kɛyasa chɛnyɛ ɔ, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na. Kɛyasa chɛnyɛ chɛ ni Kadidi chɛnyɛ ya teen ma wan.

An che‑a kɛn nɔ, Chisɔsi ɛ bɔ‑a dechee dɛndɛ chɛ ɔ a sɛ tindi ma, kamin dɔndɔ min bɔ‑a Kɛyasa duu ɔ, a na‑a wan, a‑a Chisɔsi tan. Kamin chɛ nyina yama n fan ni a fɛ. A na‑a tima ɔ yansama ya wan a ma senɛ ɛ, a sin nii ta chenɛ a. A ni chi fanɛ a wan bɛnkuɛ ɔ.

Tima sɛsɛ ko a, nyina yama chɛ n ni a ma wan, kamin chɛ ni bui, a ni ta kaina mɔ ɔ mɔ ee kaina min. Mɔɛ n ni a chenɛ ɔ chii wɛɛ yɔɔɛ a, a basan a boo a, a ni yɔɔɛ chɛ ɔ tɛ tɛ wan, mbɛ nyina yama chɛ n‑na a ma, a ben‑da bui‑a. A‑a Chisɔsi yen kɛn dechee, a‑a yee tɛ wan gbankon, mbɛ a bea‑a a chen na. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ a kuiɛ ma sɛenɛ a, a ɔ, “Chisɔsi, Yataa Wa 'a denɛ, i toen mu i ni fen ma n na? I dimu, i ma n mɔnɛ.” A‑a chɛ fɔ, a mu min na, Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ wan nyina yama chɛ n ye, a ɔ, an ni ka a fɛ.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “I tɔɛ?” Mbɛ a ɔ, “N tɔ mu Fanka Wa.” A‑a chɛ fɔ, a mu min na, nyina yama sɛsɛ ni wan a fɛ.
Nyina yama chɛ n yɛ‑a wan, an‑na Chisɔsi disa, min mbe a ma, a ma na an na ta ta ɔ tɔɔya koe a.
A tima chɛ a, kɔɛnya man sɛsɛ ni wan daun chɛ‑a an baima kɔnkɔɛ kaa fɛ. Nyina yama chɛ n‑na Chisɔsi disa wan, min mbe a ma, a ni dɔn an ye an ni bea kɔɛnya chɛ n fɛ. A dɔn‑da wan an da a kuiɛ ma.
Nyina yama chɛ n ka‑a wan kamin chɛ fɛ, mbɛ an bea‑a kɔɛnya chɛ n fɛ. Kɔɛnya man chɛ n ben‑da wan bui‑a, a ka kɔnkɔɛ chɛ kaa fɛ. An yii‑a wan an dɛ‑a yii ɔ, mbɛ an to‑a an yii gbu ɔ.
Mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin ni ka kɔɛnya chɛ n kun ma fɛn tena, an‑na a ɔ yen kɛn koe min ma‑a, an ben‑da wan bui chɛ‑a. Mbɛ an ta‑a, an‑na a ɔ yian mɔɛ n na duu ɔ, a basan konko mɛsɛ chɛ n dɔ a.

Mɔ sɛsɛ n na‑a wan, min mbe a ma, an ni a ɔ yen min ma‑a. An che‑a kɛn, nyina yama chɛ n ni ka kaminɛ min fɛ, an‑na a tan fan, ɛ si ɔ Chisɔsi chen kɔɔ. A ma chiienɛ ɛ, a sin a yiima tɛenɛ ɛ. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, an gbɛɛ chian‑da.
Mɔɛ miin ni ka nɔ ko ɔ ko ma‑a, an fan‑na a ɔ yian gbɛ an bɔ n na, Chisɔsi‑a nyina yama chɛ n gbain buɛ min dɔ kamin chɛ fɛ.
Mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ miin ka‑a ka Kɛyasa chɛnyɛ ɔ, an‑na Chisɔsi disa, an dɔ, a ni bɔ an 'na tanda ɔ. Koe min na mu, an chian‑da wan kaka. Mbɛ Chisɔsi sɛ‑a dɛndɛ ɔ yɛ koe a.
A tima chɛ a, kamin chɛ, Chisɔsi na‑a nyina yama chɛ n gbain ka min fɛ, a‑a disa chɛ wan, a ɔ, Chisɔsi ni a ma an bɛ ni ta. Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ,
“Ta i 'a mɔɛ n tena. I ni a ɔ yian an na, Yataa‑a koe min chɛ i ye.” Kamin chɛ wɛɛ ta‑a wan, mbɛ a ben ben‑da duu chɛ ɔ gbɛɛ, ɛ a ɔ yian‑da, Chisɔsi‑a koe min chɛ a ye.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi yɛ‑a yii wa chɛ kaka dɔndɔɛ, a ka‑a kaina, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na. An‑na mɔ fanka tan a ma kɔn‑da, a sin mɔɛ chɛ n bu ɔ dia‑a wan an yen koe a.
Mɔ chenama dɔndɔ Chu n 'na samun chɛ chenɛ a, min tɔ ni Chayɔsi, a na‑a wan, mbɛ a bea‑a Chisɔsi chen na. Mbɛ a‑a a disa, a ɔ, an ni ta a 'a chenɛ a.

Koe min na mu, a 'a den musuen dɔndɔ gbe, min sanɛ ni gbɛ san tan kun ma fea, a ni gbɛ a ni ma tanka an na dechee. Chisɔsi‑a a kuu sɔ kɛn ta‑a dechee, mɔɛ n findi findi‑a wan a ma, a ka kaka kan kɔ kan ma.

Musu dɔndɔ ni wan fanka chɛ tɛ ɔ, musu n 'na kau ma gbandi ni min ma, san tan kun ma fea ko a. A na‑a a boo fenɛ gbɛɛ ma tachɛ wan buii ti n ma, chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ ma kun ni, a ni a 'a gbandi chɛ danda a ma.
A na‑a na wan fanka fanka chɛ ɔ Chisɔsi gbaa chia a, mbɛ a tu‑a Chisɔsi 'a doma kai chɛ da a. Mbɛ a 'a wii chɛ ɔ tɛ‑a a ma a ya kɔɔɛ a.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Nyɔn tu‑a n na?” Mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a kɔɔsa bia chɛ wan tu koe a a a. Mbɛ Pita ɔ, “Kan mɔ, mɔɛ n mbe i a tindanɛ, an mbe tindi tindi‑a i ma, mbɛ i ni tisa chɛ to mɔɛ tu koe a i a?”
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ wan tun, a ɔ, “Mɔɛ an tu‑a n na, a mu min na, n‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ gbasaya dɔ bɔ‑a n dɔ, danda chɛ koe a.”

Mbɛ musu chɛ‑a a ɔ yen fan, mbɛ a‑a min ma, a bɔ‑a ya a ma. Chɛ ko a, a na‑a wan, a ma samba sambaenɛ ɛ, mbɛ a bea‑a Chisɔsi chen na. A tima a, mɔɛ gbɛɛ ya kɔɔ, a‑a a ɔ yian Chisɔsi a, fen na‑a a ma a tu‑a a a. A sin to, a baun‑da buɛ min dɔ a ya kɔɔɛ a.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Bɔɔɛ, ta i faa chimaenɛ a don. I 'a danaya‑a i baun. ”
Chisɔsi to‑a koɔ tena wan musu chɛ tena, mbɛ sɔ mɔɛ na‑a a ka Chayɔsi 'a chenɛ a. Mbɛ a ɔ, a 'a den musuenɛ gbu fa‑a, a ma na sɔ to ticha tɔɔya‑a ta koe a nɔ.
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi na‑a bai chɛ a min fan, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ Chayɔsi ye, a ɔ, “I ma chian, dan dechee a a, mbɛ ɛ baun‑da wan.”
A che‑a kɛn Chayɔsi 'a chenɛ a, a nii ma dɔn ni, mɔ dɔ mende kan kɔ kan ni don a san‑da, mɔɔ dechee Pita, Chɔn, Chimisi, den chɛ fa, a basan den chɛ de a.
Mɔɛ n gbɛɛ ni wan yee tɛ‑a, an mbe ta‑a di chɛ‑a den chɛ kun ma. Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo sɛmbɛ di chɛ‑a, den chɛ ma fa ni, ɛ sa ɔ chinɔɛ ɔ wan dechee.”
A‑a bai chɛ fɔ kɛn, mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ‑a a yɛn fan, a mu min na, an na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ den chɛ faen fan ni tea tea a.
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi‑a den chɛ ya wan a boo ma, mbɛ a‑a a chee banda a, a ɔ, “N 'na den, i kɔɔ sɔ.”
Mbɛ den chɛ ni yɛ‑a a ɔ, mbɛ a‑a a kɔɔ sɔ bui a. Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a an sɔ, a ɔ, an ni daun fen den be a ma, a ni a daun.
A woo mɔɛ n da a fa‑a wan koe chɛ a. Chɛɛ Chisɔsi‑a an na si wan gbau gbau, mbɛ an ma a ɔ yian mɔ ɔ mɔ a, min ma‑a ka.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a 'a sɔ mɔ tan kun ma fea n chee a tena. Mbɛ a‑a gbasaya be an ma nyina yama n gbain koe a mɔɛ n fɛ, a basan mɔɛ n baun koe a an 'na gbandi n dɔ.
Mbɛ a‑a an sɔ Yataa 'a mansaya ɔ yian koe a kan kɔ kan mɔɛ n na, a basan gbandi mɔɛ n baun koe a.

A yɛ‑a wan to, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Ni wo ma‑a ta‑a, wo ma fen kɔ fen bia wo boo ɔ. Wo ma tungbɔɛ ya, wo ma basachi bia wo boo a, wo ma ta daun fenɛ a wo boo ɔ, wo ma ta kɔpɔ a, n mbe ee baa doma fea ya koe a.
Ni an‑na wo yia chen kan kɔ kan na, wo ma an chen chɛ an na aan, wo ni bɔ an duu chɛ ɔ.

Ni wo ta‑a duu kan kɔ kan dɔ, min dɔ mɔɛ n ma an too n ma sɔ ni wo ma, wo bɔ nɔ. Ni wo ma‑a bɔ‑a, wo wo chenɛ a gbɔngbɔn fifii chɛ a, min mbe ma‑a dasi a an tena, mbɛ an mbe ka a ma an na, Yataa faa ni tɛ an ma.”
Chisɔsi ban‑da kɛn bai chɛ n fɔ‑a an ye, mbɛ an ta‑a, an ben ben‑da konko n gbɛɛ ɔ. An‑na sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian fan mɔɛ n na, an mbe ta‑a mɔɛ n baun‑da, ni an che‑a kan kɔ kan.

Mansa Ɛdɔdi, min ni Kadidi chɛnyɛ kun ma, a‑a koe chɛ n gbɛɛ a min, min ni ma tena gbɛ. A a fii‑a wan, koe min na mu, mɔɛ dɔ n ni wan a fɔ tena, mbɛ Chɔn, min ni yii chɛ mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, an yɛ‑a ka to fɔɛ ɔ.
Mɔɛ dɔ n sin dɔ, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔ dɔndɔ an nɛ suun, min tɔ ni Idaicha, an bɔ‑a ka to. Mɔɛ dɔ n yɛ‑a, an dɔ, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ dɔ gbɛɛ suun, an yɛ‑a ka to fɔɛ ɔ.

Mbɛ Mansa Ɛdɔdi ɔ, “N na‑a a ma wan, an‑na Chɔn kunɛ tɛ a a. Chɛɛ nyɔn mu to mɔɛ chɛ a, n mbe ka koe chɛ n na min tena, a si min ma?” Chɛ‑a a ma wan, a‑a butuinɛ chɛ, min mbe a ma, a ni Chisɔsi wandi gbugbu yen.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n yɛ‑a a tena, an si‑a ko ɔ ko ma, an‑na min ma, mbɛ an‑na a ɔ yian a a. A‑a an ya wan, an dechee, mbɛ an ta‑a duu dɔndɔ baima, min tɔ ni Besaida.

Chɛɛ mɔɛ n‑na a ta koe kɔɔ sɔn, mbɛ mɔ fanka‑a a san, mbɛ an‑na an tan. Chisɔsi bu ɔ dia‑a wan an yen koe a. A koɔ‑a wan an tena a si Yataa 'a mansaya ma, mbɛ mɔɛ miin gbandien ni an tɛ ɔ, a‑a an baun.

Tee bea ma, Chisɔsi fɛ den tan kun ma fea chɛ n gbɛn‑da wan a ma, an dɔ, “I boo ka gbɛ mɔɛ chɛ n na, min mbe a ma, an ni ta duu chɛ n dɔ nɛ a tindanɛ, an ni daun fenɛ san, mbɛ an‑na sa tena yan. Koe min na mu, mmɔ ɛ ka nɛ fia tamba ma wan.”

Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ an ma, “Wo wandi wo fen den be an ma, an ni a daun.” Mbɛ an dɔ, “Fenɛ min mbe dechee nɛ nn boo ɔ, an mu biidi duu a, ni nyɛ fea. Nn mbe ee che ta‑a, nn ni daun fenɛ san fanka fanka chɛ gbɛɛ ko a.”
Mɔ kaima miin ni nɔ, an taen fan ni wu duu nyɔn sima a. Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo a ma mɔɛ chɛ n ni si an kuunɛ ma, bi duu duu ma.”
Mbɛ an‑na a ma, yɔ a‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ an ye, mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ si‑a.

Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a biidi duu chɛ ya, a basan nyɛ fea chɛ a. Mbɛ a‑a a ya a si banda a, mbɛ a‑a Yataa wai bɔ daun fen chɛ ko a. Mbɛ a‑a an dɔ kai kai, mbɛ a‑a a be a fɛ denɛ n ma, a du du koe a mɔɛ chɛ n ma.
An gbɛɛ‑a an bu fa daun fenɛ daun fan. A sin, a fɛ denɛ n‑na an da tɔɛ min na sɔn, a bɛn‑da wan samba fa tan kun ma fea ma.
Tee dɔndɔ a, Chisɔsi dɔndɔ gbe ni kɛn samun chɛ‑a, a fɛ denɛ n na‑a wan a tena. Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ɛ mɔɛ n yii ma, n mu nyɔn na?”

Mbɛ an dɔ, “Mɔɛ dɔ n mbe a fɔ tena wan, mbɛ i mu Chɔn fan na, min ni yii chɛ mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a. Dɔ n sin mbe a fɔ wan, mbɛ i mu Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔ dɔndɔ an na suun, min tɔ ni Idaicha. Dɔ n sin bɛɛ ɔ te, mbɛ i mu Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ dɔ mende an na, min fa‑a suun, mbɛ a yɛ‑a to fɔɛ ɔ.”
Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ to, a ɔ, “Chɛɛ wo wandi gbu, wo ta yiima ɔ, n mu nyɔn na?” Mbɛ Pita ɔ, “I mu Chasi an na, nn kun ka mansa, Yataa‑a min sɔ.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a an na si gbau gbau, a ɔ, an ma chɛ ɔ yian mɔ ɔ mɔ a.

Chisɔsi yɛ‑a wan to, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “N fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe tɔɔ‑a wan kaka. Mmɔ 'a chɛnyɛ gbakoo nu, an bɛ mɔɛ miin mbe Chu n tɛ ɔ Yataa a, an 'na mansa n na, an mbe an kan kɔ sɔ‑a wan n na. Mmɔ 'a sawa kan mɔɛ n bɛɛ‑a toa si wan an kɔɔ. N mbe fa‑a wan mɔ boo ɔ. Chɛɛ n mbe n kɔɔ sɔ‑a wan a ka saya ɔ, tee fea a sawan bɔɛ ma.”
Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an gbɛɛ ye, a ɔ, “Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ toen mu a ni bea n fɛ, an mɔɛ chɛ ni nyina a faa ma koe n ma. Mbɛ a‑a a ma bɛn tee ɔ tee a, mɔnɛ ɔ bia koe a n ko a, a basan fa koe a.
Koe min na mu, ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ban‑da bea koe a n fɛ, a wandi fɔɛ ma kanda koe a, an mɔɛ chɛ ee kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da. Chɛɛ mɔɛ min mbe a yii bɔ‑a a fɔɛ ɔ n ko a, an mɔɛ chɛ ɛ kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da wan.
Dunya chɛ ma nyanɛ gbɛɛ, min mbe a ma, mɔ ni fo kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ a, tɔnɔn ma a a.
Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ban‑da n dɔ, a basan n da a kuiɛ a, n bɛɛ, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe na‑a tima min na mansaya ɔ, n mbe ban‑da wan a ɔ. A tima chɛ a, n mbe ma‑a wan man‑da Fa Yataa 'a manɛ a, nn bɛ maeka n na.
N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ mɔɛ dɔ nu nɛ sɔ ɔ sanche, an mbe ma‑a wan fɔɛ ɔ aan an ni chɛ ɔ yen. An mbe a ɔ yen‑da wan Yataa 'a mansaya ɔ ni yian.”
Chisɔsi bandenɛ a bai chɛ n fɔ‑a, tee sɛi gbakɔ, mbɛ a sɛ‑a kɔnkɔɛ ɔ samun chɛ koe a. An bɛ an na‑a sɛ Pita a, Chɔn, ni Chimisi.
A to‑a samun chɛ chɛ an na, mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ kamaya‑a, a yɛ to, a 'a doma kai wɛɛ gbɛ‑a fo fo, a ben fen gbɛ ma, ɛ ta man‑da taun. Chisɔsi ma fan‑da ka wan.
Mbɛ a yen ko, mɔ fea n bɔ‑a a a. Mbɛ an‑na a kuu sɔ chia ɔ bɔɛ chɛ‑a, an bɛ Chisɔsi a. A mɔ fea chɛ n ni Mosisi an na, ni Idaicha.
An ni man tena Yataa 'a manɛ an na. An sin ni chia ɔ bɔɛ chɛ tena, a si Chisɔsi ɛ fa‑a buɛ min dɔ Chuusaɛn duu ɔ.
Chɛ gbɛɛ ɛ ma‑a, Pita ni chinɔɛ ɔ wan, an bɛ a bɔɛ n na. Chɛɛ an tima chɛ a gbɛ, an kunɛ‑a wan, mbɛ an‑na man ba dɛgbɛ chɛ yen fan Chisɔsi a tindanɛ, a basan mɔ fea chɛ n na, an bɛ ni sɔ ɔ miin na.

Mosisi an fea Idaicha a, an ni gbɛ Chisɔsi to an na, an mbe ta‑a. Mbɛ Pita‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “Kan mɔ, a nyan‑da wan mmɔ ɛ nɛ chɛ. Ka nn mbe ku sawa bun. Ku dɔndɔ i ko a, dɔndɔ kai Mosisi ko a, mbɛ dɔndɔɛ ma‑a kai Idaicha ko a.” Chɛɛ Pita gbu nii ma a ɔ sɔn ni, a ni ka fen fɔ tena.
Pita to‑a chɛ an fɔ‑a, mbɛ dingbii yii‑a, mbɛ a‑a an na tunɛ. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, Chisɔsi fɛ den chɛ n chian‑da a ɔ benden ba a.
Mbɛ an‑na Yataa kuiɛ a min dingbii chɛ ɔ, a ɔ, “N 'na denɛ an nɛ, n‑na n boo sɔ min ma, wo wo too ma sɔ a ma.”
Yataa koɔen chɛ gbakɔ, an‑na Chisɔsi dɔndɔ gbe an yen gbɛ sɔ ɔ. A fɛ den chɛ n‑na koe chɛ n gbɛɛ sa wan an yii ma, an‑na miin gbɛɛ ɔ yen. An nii ma fua ni a ɔ yian‑da mɔ ɔ mɔ a.
A banda ka, Chisɔsi yiienɛ ma, a ka kɔnkɔɛ chɛ ɔ, an bɛ a fɛ den sawa chɛ n na, mɔ fanka wa‑a a tan fan.
Mbɛ kamin dɔndɔ yen ko an fanka chɛ ɔ, ɛ yee tɛ‑a, a ɔ, “Ticha, n 'na den kaima an nɛ, n 'na den dɔndɔ gbe. N mbe i disa tena, i ni n deman a a.

A yen ko, nyina yama an mbe a a bea tima ɔ tima. Ni nyina chɛ‑a a a bea dechee, ɛ a kuu sɔ wan yee tɛ‑a, mbɛ a da yii fɔnfɔnɛ bun‑da bɔ‑a. Ɛ a ma chɛɛ chɛ wan tima ɔ yansama ko a, a ee fua a boo ka‑a a a.
N‑na i fɛ denɛ n disa wan, an ni nyina yama chɛ gbain a fɛ, chɛɛ an ma kun ni.”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo e ka buɛ min dɔ, wo too ɔ gbɛ kaka, a sin wo ee dan ko a. A ɔ yansan gbɛ mmɔ bɛ ɛ mmɔ nyɔn fɛ, fen mu wo ee dan n na? N ma a ɔ sɔn, n mbe fen ma to wo ko a.” Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ kaminɛ gbu ye, a ɔ, “Na nɛ i 'a denɛ a.”

Den chɛ to‑a na an na, mbɛ nyina yama chɛ‑a a a bea duu ma, mbɛ a bun‑da a ma chɛɛ chɛ‑a. Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ nyina yama chɛ ma, a ɔ, a ni ka den chɛ fɛ. Nyina yama chɛ ka‑a wan a fɛ. Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a a yɛ a fa ma.
Mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ ni ka nɔ, an da a fa‑a wan, a si Yataa 'a gbasaya ko wa chɛ ma. Mɔɛ chɛ n to‑a da ɔ gbaa chɛ an dɔ, a si koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ma, Chisɔsi ni miin ma tena, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ a fɛ denɛ n ye, a ɔ,
“N mbe na tena bai min fɔ‑a wo ye, n toen mu wo ni wo too ma sɔ a ma chɛndɛ chɛ. N fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, an mbe na tena wan n ma tachɛ‑a, mɔɛ n ma.”
Chɛɛ a fɛ den chɛ n nii ma bai chɛ ɔ gbɛ ni, a mu min na, a nunden fan ni an ma, a ɔ gbɛ koe a. An sin chian‑da wan a ɔ tisa koe a, bai chɛ fasai koe a an ye.
Mbɛ kɔɔsa don‑da Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ n tɛ ɔ, a si mɔ chenama wa wakoe ma an tɛ.
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, an ni fen tɛnsɛ tena an nyɔn tɛ, min‑na a ma, a‑a den mɛsɛ ya, mbɛ a‑a a sɔ a tɔnfɛ.

Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a boo si den den chɛ nyɔn sima kɔɔ n tɔɛ ɔ, a‑a a boo si ka n fan kɔɔ. A sin, ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a boo si n kɔɔ, a‑a a boo si ka Yataa an kɔɔ, min‑na n na na. A mu min na, mɔ ɔ mɔ min mu mɔ dɔma a wo gbɛɛ wo tɛ ɔ, an mu mɔ chenama a.”
Mbɛ Chɔn dɔ, “Kan mɔ, nn‑na kamin dɔndɔ yen fan, ɛ ben‑da i tɔɛ ɔ, nyina yama n gbain‑da mɔɛ n fɛ. Mbɛ nn‑na a a si, nn dɔ, a ni sɛmbɛ, koe min na mu, mmɔ bɛ ma a a.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ a ye, ni a fɛ denɛ tɔɛ chɛ nu, a ɔ, “Wo ma a a gban. Koe min na mu, ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ee i chɛɛ tena, wo fea mu a a.”
Tima chɛ ma ni kɛn gbɛ dɔɔya tena, Yataa na‑a tima min dɔ bɛn, Chisɔsi ya koe a a sɛ banda bu ɔ, Chisɔsi‑a a yiima ɔ bɛn fan sɛ koe a Chuusaɛn duu ɔ.
A‑a sɔ mɔɛ n na ta wan a ya ɔ. Sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n ta‑a wan konko dɔndɔ ɔ Samayia chɛnyɛ ɔ, min mbe a ma, an ni ko ɔ ko ɔ bɛn a ya ɔ.
Chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu an konko chɛ ɔ, an ma a yia tena be ni, a mu min na, an na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ a ni ta tena Chuusaɛn fan.
A fɛ denɛ Chimisi n fea Chɔn na, an‑na chɛ ɔ yen kɛn, an dɔ, “Fa, i toen fan mu nn ni a ma, ta ni yii a ka banda bu ɔ, a ni mɔɛ chɛ n minda?”
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi‑a a ya a yɛ wan, mbɛ a‑a an na gban, bai bonda chɛ fɔ koe a.
Mbɛ an ta‑a konko dɔ mende ɔ.
An mbe tachɛ chia chɛ an ma, mbɛ kamin dɔndɔ‑a a fɔ Chisɔsi ye, a ɔ, “N ma bɛndenɛ mu bea koe a i fɛ kan kɔ kan, e ta‑a kaina min.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Sonɛ n mbe fia ɔ soe n boo ɔ, a sin konde n bɛɛ nyanɛ n mbe. Chɛɛ kaina kan kɔ kan mbe ee n boo ɔ, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe n gbɛnku kaina, n ni n suin.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ kamin dɔndɔ wɛɛ ye, a ɔ, “Bea n fɛ.” Chɛɛ kamin chɛ ɔ, “Fa, a ma n ni yɛ pɛn, n ni fa tɔn.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi wɛɛ ɔ, “Mɔɛ miin mbe yɔ mɔ faenɛ nu, an to nɔ, an ni an 'na mɔ faenɛ n tɔn. Chɛɛ i tana, a nyin i ni ta, i ni Yataa 'a mansaya ɔ yian mɔɛ n na.”
Mbɛ mɔɛ dɔndɔɛ wɛɛ‑a a fɔ a ye, a ɔ, “Fa, n ma bɛnden mu n ni bea i fɛ, chɛɛ a ma n ni ta pɛn, n ni n saa n baa mɔɛ n na.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a fɔ, e bea‑a n fɛ, chɛɛ i yiima duenɛ ɛ fea a, e ee che a ma‑a mɔɛ a, Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ.”

Koe chɛ n gbɛɛ maenɛ gbakɔ, Mansa Chisɔsi‑a a boo sɔ wan mɔ bi wɔnfea kun ma fea n ma. Mbɛ a‑a an du fea fea a, a‑a an na ta a ya ɔ duu kan kɔ kan dɔ, a basan kaina kan kɔ kan na, a wandi ni ta tena kaina min nu.

Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Chin fen chɛ a sɔndenɛ kaina dɔndɔɛ, a koo kaka. Chɛɛ a 'a sɔn mɔɛ n ma kɔkoo. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo chin fen ti ɔ tisa, a ni wai chɛ mɔɛ n ma munda n na ta, chin fen chɛ a sɔn koe a.
A yen ko, n mbe wo sɔ tena yɔ sa denɛ nu kui n tɛ ɔ. Wo ta gbɛ.
Ni wo ma‑a ta‑a, wo ma ta kɔpɔ a wo boo ɔ, wo ma basachi bia wo boo ɔ, wo ma kɔɔwa fean bɔɛ ya, n mbe ee baa, wo ni sɔ chia a, kɔndɔn chɛ koe a.
Ni wo don‑da chen kan kɔ kan na, wo a fɔ an ye chen chɛ a, wo ɔ, Yataa ni an gbɛɛ dua, an fɛn mbe an 'na chen chɛ a.
Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ɛ wan nɔ an chen chɛ a, min mu faachima tɔɛ a, ɛ a boo si‑a wan wo 'a dua chɛ kɔɔ. Ni a mɔɛ chɛ nyɔn sima ee nɔ, an mbe fo‑a wan dua chɛ a.

Wo ma wo yia chenɛ saa saa an na aan, wo ni bɔ an duu chɛ ɔ. Wo ma wo yia chenɛ ma fea. An mbe fen kɔ fen min be‑a wo ma, a daun koe a, a basan a min koe a, wo a bia. A mu min na, a nyin wai chɛ mɔɛ ni a 'a pawa ma sɔn.
Ni wo ta‑a duu kan kɔ kan dɔ, mbɛ an‑na an boo si wo kɔɔ, ni an‑na fen kɔ fen be wo ma, wo a daun.
Wo gbandi mɔɛ n baun an duu chɛ ɔ, mbɛ wo a fɔ an ye, wo ɔ, ɛnden fan to‑a gbɛ, wo ɔ, mɔɛ n ni don Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ.
Chɛɛ ni wo ta‑a duu kan kɔ kan dɔ, mbɛ an ma an boo si ni wo kɔɔ, wo ta chia kunɛ a, mbɛ wo‑a a fɔ an ye, wo ɔ,

fifii min bɛɛ to‑a wo chenɛ a, a ka an 'na duu ɔ, wo ɔ, wo‑a a a gbɔngbɔn, wo ɔ, min mbe ma‑a dasi a an tena, mbɛ an mbe ka a ma an na, wo ɔ, Yataa faa ni tɛ an ma. Wo ɔ, chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, wo ɔ, an ma nyina, mbɛ ɛnden fan to‑a gbɛ, wo ɔ, an ni don Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ.
N ni a ma din wo tena, mɔ yama chɛ nu suun Sɔdɔn duu ɔ, an mbe ee tɔɔya‑a, Yataa ɛ dunya gbɛmbo‑a tee min na, yɔ chɛ nu an duu chɛ ɔ, an mbe tɔɔya‑a buɛ min dɔ.”

Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo wan, wo wɛn mbe ka Koyasin duu ɔ, ni wo wɛn mbe Besaida, koe miin mbe wo tan‑da, an mbe yaua‑a gba wo ko a. N‑na kamaya koe sɛsɛ n ma wan wo 'a duu n dɔ. Mɔɛ miin mbe ka Taya duu ɔ, a basan Sidon duu ɔ a, ni an na‑a ko bonda chɛ n dɔ yen fan, an nii ma‑a ka yɔ wo wan. An na‑a an kan kɔ sɔ an 'na ko yama n na suun gbɔɔ. An ni ma‑a gbɛ di chɛ an na an 'na ko yama n ko a.
Chɛɛ mɔ yama chɛ nu suun Taya duu ɔ, ni Sidon duu ɔ, an mbe ee tɔɔya‑a, yɔ wo e tɔɔya‑a buɛ min dɔ, Yataa ɛ dunya gbɛmbo‑a tee min na.
Wo wɛn sin mbe ka Kapanaun duu ɔ, wo‑a wo wandi a sɛ banda a, chɛɛ Yataa ɛ wo a yii‑a wan duu ma.”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ a fɛ denɛ n ye, a ɔ, “Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a too ma sɔ wo ma, a‑a a too ma sɔ ka n fan ma. Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ban‑da wo ɔ, a ban‑da ka n fan dɔ. Chɛɛ a sin mɔɛ min mbe ban‑da n dɔ, a ban‑da ka Yataa an dɔ, min‑na n na na.”
Chɛ gbakɔ, mɔ bi wɔnfea kun ma fea chɛ n yɛ‑a wan Chisɔsi tena buɔdia wa ɔ. Mbɛ an dɔ, “Mansa, nyina yama n bɛɛ, an‑na nn da a kuiɛ n na min fan i tɔɛ ɔ.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N‑na Sitana yen fan bea‑a a ka banda bu ɔ, yɔ banda manɛ.

A yen ko, n‑na gbasaya be wo ma. Wo e tɛn‑da wan ka n ma, a basan chinchima n na, chɛɛ an mbe ee ko ɔ ko ma‑a wo a. N‑na gbasaya be wo ma, Sitana 'a gbasaya gbɛɛ kun ma, ko yama kan kɔ kan mbe ee ma‑a wo a.
Chɛɛ wo bu ɔ ma dia, koe min na mu, nyina yama n mbe wo da a kuiɛ n na min. Chɛɛ wo bu ɔ ni dia, a mu min na, wo tɔɛ n nyɛn‑da banda bu ɔ.”

A tima chɛ a, Yataa Nyina‑a a ma Chisɔsi bu ɔ dia‑a, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “Fa, n‑na i wai bɔ, i wɛn mu mansa a banda bu ɔ ni dunya ɔ. A mu min na, i‑a koe chɛ n dɔ nun fan chɛ nu ma, ɛ miin ta yiima ɔ, mbɛ an dɔ sɔen mu. Chɛɛ i‑a an dɔ yian fan chɛ n na, miin‑na an fandi a yii i tena. Fa, n‑na i wai bɔ, koe min na mu, i toen ni a ni ma ka wan.”

Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ mɔɛ chɛ n ye, a ɔ, “Fa‑a gbasaya gbɛɛ be n ma, ko ɔ ko kun ma. Fa dɔndɔ gbe an‑na a ɔ sɔn chɛndɛ chɛ, mɔɛ min mu n na. N bɛɛ n dɔndɔ gbe an‑na a ɔ sɔn chɛndɛ chɛ, mɔɛ min mu Fa a. N‑na mɔɛ miin ya Fa sɔn koe a, an bɛɛ‑a a ɔ sɔn‑da wan chɛndɛ chɛ, mɔɛ min mu Fa a.”
Mbɛ a ɔ a fɛ denɛ n ma, an dechee a, a ɔ, “Mɔ ɔ mɔ min‑na koe chɛ n dɔ yen, wo‑a miin dɔ yen ka, a duaen mu.

N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔ sɛsɛ, a basan mansa sɛsɛ a, an toen ni an ni koe chɛ n dɔ yen, wo‑a miin dɔ yen ka, chɛɛ an ma an dɔ yen ni. An toen ni to an ni an na min, wo‑a miin‑na min ka, chɛɛ an ma an na min ni.”
Mbɛ Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔ dɔndɔ yen ko, a toen ni a ni Chisɔsi ɔ siman. A‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, a sɔ‑a, a ɔ, “Ticha, n mbe fen ma, min mbe a ma, n ni kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn?”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Yataa 'a sawa‑a fen fɔ? E a fasai ka ma?”

Mbɛ kamin chɛ ɔ, “Yataa ɔ te, mmɔ ni to mmɔ 'a mansa Yataa a, mmɔ faa gbɛɛ a, mmɔ ni to a a, mmɔ fɔɛ gbɛɛ a, mmɔ ni to a a, mmɔ sɔɛ gbɛɛ a, mmɔ ni to a a, mmɔ yiima gbɛɛ a. Mbɛ a yɛ to, Yataa ɔ te, mmɔ ni to mmɔ 'a mɔɛ n na, yɔ mmɔ toen mu buɛ min dɔ mmɔ wandi a.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “An nɛ, i ma a ma sa ni ɛnden bɛɛ a. Koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ma, e kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da wan.”
Chɛɛ kamin chɛ nii ma to ni, a ni mau a bɔɛ n tena. Chɛ an fɛ ni, a‑a a fɔ to, a ɔ, “Nyɔn n gbu mu n 'na mɔɛ n na?”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Tee dɔndɔ a, kamin dɔndɔ ni ka tena wan Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, a yii Chɛiko duu ɔ. Kanka n chɛ‑a a ma, mbɛ an‑na a ma bɔ, an‑na a gbasi yama yama, mbɛ an‑na a to sa ɔ, ɛ a ni ma tanka‑a.
Mbɛ Yataa‑a a ma, mmɔ chɛnyɛ mɔ dɔndɔ, min ni mmɔ tɛ ɔ Yataa a, a ni ben tena wan an chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a. Chɛɛ kɛn a‑a mmɔ chɛnyɛ nyɔɛ chɛ yen sa ɔ, a‑a a ma sangba wan chia kaka dɔndɔɛ ma, a ta‑a.
Mbɛ mɔ dɔndɔ min bɛɛ ni mmɔ chɛnyɛ nyɔɛ a, a bɔ Difai dambi ɔ, a wɛɛ na‑a na wan, mbɛ a‑a kamin chɛ yen. Chɛɛ a wɛɛ‑a a ma sangba wan chia kaka dɔndɔɛ ma.
Chɛɛ sonda dɔndɔ, min ka‑a Samayia chɛnyɛ ɔ, a wɛɛ ni wan ben tena an chia chɛ a. A na‑a wan, a‑a kamin chɛ tan sa ɔ. A‑a a yen kɛn, a ma chinchin‑da wan a ye.

Mbɛ a ta‑a a tena. A ma gba tena chɛ nu, a‑a an na ko fo, mbɛ a‑a buii sa an na, mbɛ a‑a an na chii. A yɛ‑a wan to, mbɛ a‑a kamin chɛ a sɛ a wandi ta sofɛ kɔ, mbɛ a ta‑a a a sonda yia chenɛ a, a kun ma fɛn tena.

Mbɛ banda ɔ ka‑a, Samayia kaminɛ chɛ toen ni a ni ta. Mbɛ a‑a kɔpɔɛ ɛnden ya, mbɛ a‑a a be chen ti chɛ ma, a ɔ, ‘N dia nyɔɛ, i dimu, kamin chɛ danda n ye. Ni kɔpɔɛ chɛ ma a kun ni, n mbe ma‑a yɛ‑a to nɛ chia a, n mbe i ta a a yɛ‑a wan, e min sa‑a chɛ kun ma.’ ”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ te gbɛ a ma, a ɔ, “I ta yiima ɔ, mɔ sawa chɛ n tɛ ɔ, nyɔn ni kamin chɛ 'a mɔɛ a, kanka ni ka min fa‑a?”
Sawa kan mɔɛ chɛ ɔ, “Mɔɛ min chinchin‑da ka a ma.” Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “I wɛɛ ta, i ni sɔ kamin chɛ chen gba ɔ.”
Chisɔsi n ben‑da, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na, an ta‑a, mbɛ an che‑a duu dɔndɔ ɔ. Musu dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, min tɔ ni Mata. Mbɛ a‑a Chisɔsi 'a sondaya bɔɔɛ dɛn a 'a chenɛ a.
A dɔ musuma ni wan nɔ, min tɔ ni Mɛi. Mɛi na‑a si wan Mansa Chisɔsi baima gbɛdɛn, ɛ a a min‑da, Chisɔsi ni bai miin fɔ tena.

Chɛɛ chen dɔ bɛnɛ min ni Mata ma, a na‑a a dɔndɔ gbe ya kɔɔ tawa wan. Chɛ ko a, a ta‑a wan, mbɛ a‑a Chisɔsi tan, a ɔ, “Fa, n dɔɛ chɛ yen ko, a‑a chen na wai gbɛɛ to n dɔndɔ gbe an kan na. Fen tea ɛ chɛ ɔ? A fɔ a ye, a ni na, a ni basan n ma.”
Chɛɛ Mansa Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ee Mata, i 'a faagbaa sien mu ko sɛsɛ an fan ma,
chɛɛ ko dɔndɔ gbe an ma biaen mu a ma koe a. Mɛi ɛ ka sɔ chia gbu an ma, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee a bɔ an chia chɛ ma.”
Tee dɔndɔ a, Chisɔsi ni wan samun chɛ‑a kaina dɔndɔ. A ban‑da kɛn, a fɛ denɛ dɔndɔ‑a a fɔ wan a ye, a ɔ, “Fa, nn kan samun chɛ koe a, yɔ kai Chɔn‑na a fɛ denɛ n kan buɛ min dɔ.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ wan an ye, a ɔ, “Ni wo toen mu wo ni samunɛ chɛ, wo a fɔ, wo ɔ, ‘Fa Yataa, mɔ ɔ mɔ ni tando be i ma. A ɔ ma yansan to, i ni ma mansa a dunya chɛ gbɛɛ kun ma.
Nn kɔ nn daun fenɛ a tee ɔ tee a.
I boo bɔ nn 'na ko yama n dɔ, a mu min na, miin mbe ko yama n ma nn na, nn bɛɛ nn mbe nn boo bɔ wan an 'na ko yama n dɔ. I ma dɔn ko ɔ ko ni a ma, nn ni ko yama ma.’ ”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ to, a ɔ, “Ni wo dɔndɔ ta‑a wo dia nyɔɛ dɔndɔ 'a chenɛ a su tɛtɛ ma, mbɛ a ɔ, ‘N bɔ, kuiɛ be n ma biidi sawa a.’
A ɔ, ‘N dia nyɔ dɔndɔ an na‑a ka n tena,’ a ɔ, ‘ɛ tachɛ chia an ma.’ A ɔ, ‘Chɛɛ daun fen kan kɔ kan mbe ee n boo ɔ, ɛ min daun.’

Chɛɛ ni i dia nyɔɛ chɛ to‑a a 'a chenɛ bu ɔ, mbɛ a ɔ, ‘I ma n ya kɔɔ tawa,’ a ɔ, ‘n ban‑da gbɛ chenɛ da a tɔn‑da, a sin, n mbe gbɛ sa ɔ wan.’ A ɔ, ‘N 'na denɛ n gbɛɛ mbe gbɛ chinɔɛ ɔ wan.’ A ɔ, ‘N mbe ee che to sanche, n kɔɔ sɔ‑a fen kan kɔ kan be koe a i ma.’ ”

Chisɔsi ɔ te gbɛ, “N ni a ma din wo tena, ni kamin chɛ min mbe ka chinɔɛ ɔ, a ma a kɔɔ sɔ ni, a ni biidi chɛ be a bɔɛ chɛ ma, an 'na dia nyɔncha ko a, ɛ a kɔɔ sɔ‑a wan, a ni a be a ma, koe min na mu, a chii‑a a ma a disa‑a.

“Chɛ an fɛ mu, n mbe a fɔ tena wo ye, wo a a tun Yataa ɔ tisa koe a fen kɔ fen ko a, ɛ a be‑a wan wo ma. Wo a a tun wo ya a kan koe a chɛndɛ chɛ, wo e min yan tena, wo e a yen‑da wan. Wo a a tun chenɛ da tu koe a, Yataa ɛ a da a ka‑a wan wo ye.

Koe min na mu, mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe a a tun‑da Yataa ɔ tisa koe a fen kɔ fen ko a, ɛ a be‑a wan an mɔɛ chɛ ma. Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe a a tun‑da a ya a kan‑da fenɛ a chɛndɛ chɛ, ɛ a yen‑da wan. Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe a a tun‑da chenɛ da tu koe a, Yataa ɛ a da a ka‑a wan a ye.
Wo wɛn mu ka den suun kai n na, ni i 'a denɛ‑a i ɔ tisa nyɛ ko a, e ee ka be a ma.
Ni a‑a i ɔ tisa tɛ chii ko a, e ee chinchima be a ma.

Ni wo wɛn sɔnɛ yau ka, ni wo kosan fan fen chɛndɛ n be‑a wo 'a denɛ n ma, mmɔ Fa sin gbɛ, min mbe banda bu ɔ, ɛ fen chɛndɛ be‑a wan wo ma, min benden mu wo ta n ma. Ɛ Yataa Nyina be‑a wan chɛ n ma, miin mbe a ɔ tisa‑a a ko a.”

Kamin dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, nyina yama ni min fɛ. An nyina yama chɛ nii dɔn kamin chɛ ni koɔ. Tee dɔndɔ a, Chisɔsi na‑a an nyina yama chɛ gbain fan an kamin chɛ fɛ. A ka‑a kɛn a fɛ, kamin chɛ‑a a kuu sɔ wan gbɛ koɔ‑a. An mɔ fanka chɛ n tɛnɛ‑a wan koe chɛ a.
Chɛɛ mɔɛ dɔ nu fanka chɛ ɔ, an dɔ, “Nyina yama n 'na mansa chɛ, min tɔ mu Bɛɛsɛbu, an mbe ka gbasaya chɛ be tena a ma, nyina yama n gbain koe a mɔɛ n fɛ.”
Mɔɛ dɔ n sin toen ni an ni Chisɔsi bia a chen kɔ, min‑na a ma, an‑na a ɔ tisa, an dɔ, a ni kamaya koe ma, min mbe a ɔ yian, mbɛ Yataa an‑na gbasaya chɛ be a ma tea tea a.

Chɛɛ Chisɔsi na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, an ni an yii na chii tena koe min na. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Ni chɛɛ ma‑a mɔɛ n tɛ chɛnyɛ kan kɔ kan dɔ, an chɛnyɛ chɛ ɛ yɔn fan. A yɛ to, koɛ ɛ suunɛ min bɛɛ ɔ, an suun chɛ ɛ yɔn fan.

A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, ni Sitana 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ n ma‑a butuinɛ chɛ‑a an nyɔn na, a 'a mansaya ee ta ya ɔ ma. N mbe chɛ fɔ tena, a mu min na, wo ɔ, mbɛ nyina yama n 'na mansa, min tɔ mu Bɛɛsɛbu, an mbe gbasaya be tena n ma, nyina yama n gbain koe a mɔɛ n fɛ.

Wo ta mɔɛ n bɛɛ mbe nyina yama n gbain fan mɔɛ n fɛ. Chɛɛ wo e a fɔ n fan ma, wo ɔ, n mbe a ma tena Bɛɛsɛbu 'a gbasaya an dɔ. Wo ta mɔɛ n gbu mbe koe miin ma tena, an fan mbe a ɔ yian, mbɛ tea ee wo boo ɔ.
N mbe ee nyina yama n gbain tena mɔɛ n fɛ Bɛɛsɛbu 'a gbasaya ɔ. Chɛɛ n mbe an gbain tena Yataa 'a gbasaya an dɔ. Chɛ‑a a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ Yataa 'a mansaya ɛ gbɛ wo tɛ ɔ.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a Sitana ya yɔ kamin gbasayaen ba, a ɔ, “Ni kamin gbasayaen ba, chɛɛ chɛ fenɛ ɛ min boo ɔ, a ma‑a a wandi a chenɛ kun ma fɛn‑da, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee che a kanka‑a.

Chɛɛ ni mɔɛ min gbasayaen mu a ni ben a ma, a dɛ‑a a ma butuinɛ a, ɛ a boan fan. Ni a‑a a boan, ɛ a 'a chɛɛ chɛ feanka n gbɛɛ bɔ wan a boo ɔ, mbɛ a ta‑a a a, a basan a boo fenɛ n gbɛɛ a, a ni miin ma butuin chɛ tena, mbɛ a‑a an du.
“Mɔɛ min mbe ee n ko a, n chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ mu a a. Mɔɛ min mbe ee n deman‑da a a kan koe a kaina dɔndɔɛ, ɛ a a fasan‑da wan.”

Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ni nyina yama ka‑a mɔɛ fɛ, nyina chɛ ɛ ta wan ben ben‑da kaina ɔ gbaa gbaaenɛ ɔ, ɛ a ya a kan‑da kaina ɔ chimaenɛ a, a suin koe a. Chɛɛ a ee kaina ma sɔn. Ɛ si wan, a‑a a yii na chii, a ɔ, ‘N ka‑a kaina, ka wɛ n mbe yɛ to nɔ.’
Ni a na‑a, mbɛ a ma Yataa Nyina tan ni mɔɛ chɛ fɛ, a sin mbe ee kun kɔɔ,
a dɔndɔ gbe ee bea to a fɛ. Chɛɛ ɛ a bɔ nyina yama wɔnfea chee wan, miin yau a ni ben a ma, mbɛ an gbɛɛ ma‑a kamin chɛ fɛ. Chɛ‑a a ma wan gbɛ, kamin chɛ ma buɛ ni yaua kaka, a ni ben a kɔma ma.”
Chisɔsi to‑a koɔ an na, mbɛ musu dɔndɔ fanka chɛ tɛ ɔ, a kuiɛ ma sɛenɛ ɔ, a ɔ, “Musu min‑na i suun, mbɛ i‑a a susu min, a duaen ba mu.”
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “I‑a tea an fɔ ka, chɛɛ miin mbe Yataa 'a bai a min‑da, mbɛ an‑na a ma, yɔ bai chɛ‑a min fɔ an ye a ma koe a, dua chenama wa gbu ɛ ma‑a an fan ma.”

Mɔ sɛsɛ n na ni kan tena wan tun Chisɔsi ma. Mbɛ a ɔ, “Mɔɛ miin mbe n dɔ tisa‑a, n ni kamaya koe a dan, mɔ yauaen ba mu an mɔ bonda chɛ sima n na. Chɛɛ an mbe ee tɔmɔsi dɔndɔ wɛɛ ma sɔn‑da, mɔɔ dechee Yataa‑a tɔmɔsi min na ben a 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ Chona a.
N fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe ma‑a wan tɔmɔsi a an mɔɛ chɛ n ko a, yɔ Chona ma‑a buɛ min dɔ suun tɔmɔsi a, Ninifɛ duu ɔ mɔɛ n tena.

A sin tee min ma Yataa ɛ ma‑a dunya gbɛmbo‑a, musu min ni mansa a Seba chɛnyɛ ɔ, a wɛɛ‑a a kɔɔ sɔ‑a wan, mbɛ a‑a mɔɛ chɛ n yɛi siiya bɔ. A mu min na, a na‑a ka wan dunya danka a, na koe a, a too ma sɔ‑a Sɔɔmon 'na yiimatɛ bai n ma. Mɔɛ yen ko nɛ an tɛ gbɛ min benden mu Sɔɔmon ma, chɛɛ an mbe ee an too ma sɔ tena a ma.

A sin tima min na Yataa ɛ ma‑a dunya gbɛmbo‑a, Ninifɛ mɔɛ chɛ n mbe an kɔɔ sɔ‑a wan a ka saya ɔ, mbɛ an‑na mɔɛ chɛ n yɛi siiya bɔ. A mu min na, tima min na Chona na‑a Yataa bai sa Ninifɛ mɔɛ chɛ n tena, an‑na an kan kɔ sɔ wan an 'na ko yama n na. Mɔɛ yen ko nɛ mɔɛ dɔndɔɛ chɛ n tɛ gbɛ min benden mu Chona ma, chɛɛ an mbe ee an too ma sɔ tena a ma.”

Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a dambo a man, a ee a nun, chɛ ma, a ni samba bun a kun ma. Chɛɛ ni mɔ‑a dambo a man, e a si kaina wan, min mbe a ma, ni mɔɛ n don‑da dechee i 'a chenɛ a, an mbe kun fan an ni kaina ɔ yen gbadan.
Mɔ gbu ya ɛ wan yɔ dambo manɛ a gboo ko a. Ni mɔ ya a kaenɛ ma‑a gboden, a gboo gbɛɛ ɛ ma manɛ an dɔ. Chɛɛ ni a ya a pimbienɛ ma‑a, a gboo gbɛɛ ɛ ma pimbi an dɔ.
Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo wo kun ma fɛn, min mbe a ma, wo ya a ma na pimbi, mbɛ wo to‑a pimbi ɔ.
Ni wo ya a kaenɛ ma‑a gboden, a dɔndɔ wɛɛ ma te ni, wo e kaina kan kɔ kan dɔ yen fan, yɔ dambo ɛ man buɛ min dɔ taun wo ya ɔ yen koe a.”
Chisɔsi bandenɛ ma koɔ‑a, mɔ dɔndɔ min ni Fayisii a, a‑a a chee wan a 'a chenɛ a, ta koe a an ni daunɛ chɛ an fea a a. Mbɛ an ta‑a, an si‑a, mbɛ an bun‑da daunɛ chɛ‑a.
Chisɔsi nii ma a boo a ko ni a chia ma, yɔ Fayisii manda‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, a e na to a kuu sɔ‑a daunɛ chɛ‑a. Chɛ na‑a ma wan tɛnɛmaya ko wa a Fayisii chɛ tena.

Mbɛ Mansa Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ a ye, a ɔ, “Wo wan Fayisii chɛ nu, tea mu a a, wo e wan yɔ kɔpu, min kɔɛ koenɛ ɛ, chɛɛ a bu ɔ nɔɔenɛ ɛ. Wo e nyima yɛnɛ an chɛ dechee mɔɛ n na, chɛɛ wo gbɔsɔen mu dechee wo wandi an ko a, a sin wo faa n dɔ finden mu kaka.
Wo kun dɔ ban tɔɛ chɛ nu, Yataa min‑na gboo a dan, an‑na faa don bu ɔ, a sin an fea gbɛɛ wakoe ɛ wan sa ɔ a faa ma.
Chɛɛ wo wo boo fenɛ n be yɔn tɔɛ n ma, wo faa gbɛɛ a. Ni wo‑a chɛ ma, ko kan kɔ kan wo e min ma‑a, ɛ Yataa faa chima‑a wan.

“Wo wan Fayisii nu, koe min mbe wo tan‑da, a yau gba wo ko a. Ko chɛndɛ yen ko, wo e min ma. Boo fen kan kɔ kan, wo e min sɔn, wo e a du wan si tena tanɛ a, mbɛ wo‑a si tena dɔndɔ be Yataa ma. Boo fenɛ tatayaenɛ wɛɛ, wo e Yataa kɔ wan a ɔ. Chɛɛ wo ma wo gbɔsɔ ni tea koe ma koe a wo bɔɛ n na, a yɛ to, wo ma wo gbɔsɔ ni to koe a Yataa a. Koe chɛ n gbɛɛ, wo an ma. A sin to, wo a a tun wo boo fenɛ n be koe a Yataa ma.

“Wo wan Fayisii nu, koe min mbe wo tan‑da, a yau gba wo ko a. Ni wo ta‑a samun chɛ chenɛ a, wo toen mu si tena ma bɛnden ba an na. Ni wo ta‑a machiti wɛɛ ɔ, wo toen mu mɔɛ n ni basɔmaya kɔndɔnɛ chɛ wo a.

Koe min mbe wo tan‑da, a yau gba wo ko a. A mu min na, wo ma buɛ ee a ɔ yian mɔɛ n na, mbɛ wo sɔnɛ n yau wan. An mbe ee a ɔ sɔn ni wo sɔnɛ n yau wan, chɛɛ ni an gbɛn‑da dechee wo ma, mbɛ wo‑a wo sɔn yama chɛ n chɛ an dɔ, mbɛ an ma‑a yɔ wo e buɛ min dɔ.”
Mbɛ Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔ dɔndɔ‑a a fɔ a ye, a ɔ, “Ticha, i 'a bai chɛ n gbɛɛ tu‑a wan nn bɛɛ a, i‑a miin fɔ ka. Main bai n dechee n fan nɛ.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo wan sawa kan mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ, koe min mbe wo tan‑da, a yau gba wo ko a. Wo e suun feanka fanka ma si wan mɔɛ n kun ma ta koe a, chɛɛ wo wandi gbu ee deman an ma ɛnden bɛɛ a.
Koe min mbe wo tan‑da, a yau gba wo ko a. A mu min na, wo bemba n ta bemba n‑na Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ miin fa suun, wo sin mbe an kamba n ma bɛn nyima nyima.

Chɛ‑a a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ wo bɛ wo bemba n ta bemba chɛ n na, wo kuiɛ ɛ dɔndɔ gbe, an ban koe a an boo si koe a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n 'na sakana bai n kɔɔ. Koe min na mu, an na‑a an fa wan, mbɛ wo sin mbe an kamba n ma bɛn nyima nyima.

Chɛ an ko a ni, Yataa min yiima tɛen mu, a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, ‘N mbe n 'na gbonka chɛ mɔɛ nu, a basan n 'na sɔ mɔɛ n na, n mbe an na ta‑a wan an tena. An mbe an dɔ n fa‑a wan, mbɛ an‑na ko yawaenɛ sa a tɔɛ n ma.’
Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo nyɔn sima chɛ nu, Yataa ɛ wo wan tɔɔya‑a, a 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n fa koe a, a ka suun dunya kuu sɔ tima ma.

Wo e tɔɔya‑a wan Ebɛɛ 'a saya ko a suun, aan a ta Sakaaya 'a saya ma. An na‑a Sakaaya chɛ fa Yataa 'a kata chɛ an dɔ, Yataa 'a chen chɛ n tɛ yasi minda gbengbe chɛ tena a. N mbe a ma din tena wo tena, tea ɔ, mbɛ wo nyɔn sima chɛ n fan mbe tɔɔya ɔ bia‑a, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n wii chɛ ko a.

“Wo wan sawa kan mɔɛ chɛ nu, koe min mbe wo tan‑da, a yau gba wo ko a. A mu min na, mɔɛ ɛ bɔ chia min na, a ni Yataa sɔn, wo‑a a ma wo ta a. Wo ee dɔn, mɔɛ miin toen mu an ni Yataa sɔn, an ni an chia chɛ ma sɔn, wo wandi gbu sin ma Yataa sɔn.”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi bɔ‑a Fayisii chɛ 'a chenɛ a. A bɔ‑a kɛn, Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ chɛ nu, an bɛ Fayisii chɛ n na, an‑na a kuu sɔ wan a ma bɔ‑a a yama yama boo a. A ka a tima chɛ ma, an bun‑da a ɔ tisa‑a tisa n na a si ko sɛsɛ ma,
an mbe ta‑a butuinɛ chɛ‑a, min mbe a ma, an ni fɛɛ sa a ye, mbɛ an‑na a bia a chen kɔ, a da a bai ɔ.

A tima chɛ a, mɔ wu sɛsɛ a kan‑da wan Chisɔsi tena. Mɔɛ n da a ni koo, an ni ka wan tɛn tɛn‑da an nyɔn ma. Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a kuu sɔ a fɔ‑a a fɛ denɛ n pɛn ye, a ɔ, “Mmɔ 'a Chu mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin mu Fayisii n na, yisinɛ ɛ wan an boo ɔ. Wo wo kun ma fɛn an yisinɛ chɛ boo ɔ. Yisin chɛ mu an 'na nɛnɛn feaya an na.
Koe min na mu, boo kundu ee to doma kɔɔ, ɛ bɔ wan ya a ma tee dɔndɔ a.
Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo e bai kan kɔ kan min fɔ‑a wo dechee a, mɔɛ n mbe a a min‑da wan baa kun tɛ. A sin, wo dechee ɛ wɛwɛɛ min fɔ‑a, dunya ɛ a a min‑da wan chɛndɛ chɛ.
“N dia nyɔɛ nu, n ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ wo ma chian mɔ gbu ma wo fa ko a. Ɛ wo fa‑a wan, chɛɛ a ee ko ɔ ko dɔ mende ma‑a chɛ gbakɔ.
Chɛɛ wo e chian min ma, n mbe a yian‑da wan wo a. Wo chian Yataa dɔndɔ gbe an ma. An mbe mɔ gbu fa, mbɛ a‑a a a ta ta ɔ, ɛ minda kaina. Wo dan chɛ a, mbɛ wo ni chian Yataa ma.
“Baa ee soenɛ ma mɔ gbu ya a. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, Yataa ee nyina an dɔndɔ wɛɛ ma.
Wo sin benden mu kaka soenɛ n ma. Wo kundi nan fan bɛɛ wo kun ma, Fa Yataa‑a a danɛ sɔn fan. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo ma chian mɔ gbu ma.
“N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ ni mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe dɔn‑da fanka ɔ, mbɛ n fɛ mɔɛ mu a a, n bɛɛ, n fan Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe dɔn‑da wan an mɔɛ chɛ wakoe ma maeka n ya kɔɔ.
Chɛɛ ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a fɔ fanka ɔ, mbɛ n fɛ mɔ ma a a, n bɛɛ n mbe a fɔ‑a wan maeka n ya kɔɔ, mbɛ n fɛ mɔ ma a a.
“A sin, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a n main, Yataa ɛ kun fan a ni a boo bɔ a ɔ. Chɛɛ ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a Yataa Nyina main, a ee a boo bɔ‑a a mɔ sima chɛ 'a main chɛ ɔ.
“Ni an na‑a wo a wo gbɛmbo koe a mmɔ 'a samun chɛ chenɛ n na, ni an na‑a wo a ya ɔ sɔɛ n chen kɔɔ, ni an na‑a wo a kun ti n bɛɛ chen kɔɔ, wo ma wo faa gbaa wo fɔ bai ko a, ni a fɔ buɛ ko a.
A mu min na, Yataa Nyina ɛ wo kan‑da wan a tima chɛ a, wo e bai min fɔ‑a.”
Mbɛ kamin dɔndɔ fanka chɛ ɔ, a‑a a fɔ Chisɔsi ye, a ɔ, “Ticha, nn fa 'a fenɛ min to nn ko a, a fɔ n kɔɔ kaima ye, a ni a du nn ma.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Mɔ ɔ mɔ ma gbasaya be ni n ma, wo fa chɛ du koe a, wo tɛ wo fea i kɔɔɛ a.”
Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Wo wo kun ma fɛn, fen koya yama min kɔ min boo ɔ. Koe min na mu, mɔ gbu ni nyan boo ɔ boo, chɛ an mbe ee a ma i ni fɔɛ chɛndɛ ma sɔn.”
Mbɛ a‑a tai chɛ tɛ an tena, a ɔ, “Nyan tɔ dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, sɛnɛ ni min boo ɔ. Chin fen sɛsɛ na‑a ma wan a a, an sɛnɛ chɛ ɔ.
Chɛ ko a, a‑a a yii na chii wan, a ɔ, ‘Kaina ɔ ma koo, n mbe n 'na chin fen chɛ n gbɛɛ a sɔn kaina. N mbe fen ma gbɛ sanche?’
Mbɛ a ɔ, ‘N yii puin‑da, n mbe bea kɔma chɛ n fasan‑da wan, mbɛ n‑na a chenama n sɔ. Ni n‑na chɛ ma, n mbe chin fen chɛ n gbɛɛ, ni fen dɔ mende nu, n ta mu miin na, n mbe an gbɛɛ chɛ‑a wan nɔ.

Mbɛ n mbe a fɔ‑a wan n fandi ye, n dɔ, “Nɛma tɔɛ, fen chɛndɛ gbɛɛ, n toen mu miin na fɔɛ chɛ ɔ, an mbe wan n boo ɔ. An sin mbe san sɛsɛ ya‑a wan n na. N faa ma gbaa ni to fɔɛ chɛ ɔ fen kan kɔ kan ko a. Chɛɛ n mbe daunɛ chɛ‑a wan, n ni minɛ chɛ, mbɛ n yɛ‑a, n‑na buɔdia bɔ.” ’
Chɛɛ Yataa‑a a fɔ wan a ye, a ɔ, ‘I wooen mu. Yɛɛ chɛ ma, e fa tena wan. Ni i sin fa‑a, fen chɛ n gbɛɛ, i‑a miin na sɔn ka i wandi ko a, i wan ta ee ma‑a an na.’ ”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ te gbɛ, “Chɛ n bɛɛ mbe ka wan, miin mbe nyanɛ a sɔn an fandi ko a, chɛɛ an ma nyan ni Yataa ta chia a.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ a fɛ denɛ n ye, a ɔ, “Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, n ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ wo ma wo gbɔsɔ wo da daun fenɛ ko a, ma koe a fɔɛ ɔ. N mbe ee baa, wo ni wo gbɔsɔ wo gboo ko a, wo e fen chii.
Koe min na mu, mɔ gbu fɔɛ ma daun fenɛ dechee an na, a yɛ to, koa dechee an ma koe a mɔ gbu gboo ko a.
Wo ŋaŋaa n yen bɛ, an mbe ee chin fen chin, n mbe ee baa, an ni a a sɛ bea a. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, Yataa ɛ an da kɔ wan. Wo nan gbu sin benden mu kaka ŋaŋaa n ma.
Wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ, faa ni gbaa boo ɔ boo a 'a fɔɛ ko a, chɛ ee a ma tima kundu ɛnden bɛɛ ni sa a kun ma.
Koe ɛnden chɛ, wo ee che ka buɛ min dɔ a ma‑a, wo ma wo faa gbaa koe tɔɛ chɛ n ko a.

Wo fia ɔ kɔn chɛ n yen bɛ, miin mbe fu, an mbe koa buɛ min dɔ. An mbe ee wai chɛ, an sin mbe ee koa nyan an fandi ko a. Chɛɛ n ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ mansa Sɔɔmon nyanden ni wɛɛ boo ɔ boo, koa nii a ma, min ni nyin a ni che kɔn fu chɛ n dɔ.
Yataa an mbe kɔnɛ chɛ n ma chii, kɔnɛ min mu ɛ nɛ bi, mbɛ sinan a tɛ‑a, mbɛ wo‑a a minda. Ni ɛ ka wan, wo ma chii koe a boo ɔ, a mu a ma gbɔsɔɛ an na. Wo 'a danaya ɔ dɔɔ gba.
“Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo faa ma gbaa wo daun fen ko a, a basan wo min fen na.
A mu min na, wo Fa Yataa‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ wo gbɔsɔen fan mu chɛ n gbɛɛ ko a. Yataa sɔn bai n fan faa ɛ gbaa tima ɔ tima fen chɛ n ko a.
Chɛɛ wo e min ma, wo a ma wo ma gbɔsɔɛ a don koe a Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ. Ni wo‑a chɛ ma, ɛ to‑a wan nɔ a ni fen chɛ n gbɛɛ be wo ma, miin ma gbɔsɔɛ ɛ wo ma.”
Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo wɛn mbe n fɛ, wo ma kɔkoo, chɛɛ wo ma chian. A a di wan Fa Yataa ye, na koe a wo a, a 'a mansaya kɔɔ.

Wo wo boo fenɛ n ma tachɛ kɔpɔɛ a, mbɛ wo‑a a kɔpɔɛ chɛ n be yɔn tɔɛ n ma. Ni wo‑a chɛ ma, wo e ma‑a ka nyanɛ an na sɔn‑da wo wandi ko a banda bu ɔ. Kɔpɔ sa basachi nu, miin mbe banda bu ɔ, an mbe ee taa, an sin mbe ee pumbɔ. Wo 'a nyan fen chɛ nu banda bu ɔ, an mbe ee ban kuɔ fɔ ko a. Kanka ee che an kanka‑a. Chisi sin mbe ee che an yɔn‑da.
A mu min na, wo 'a nyanɛ ɛ ma‑a sa ɔ kaina, wo faa ɛ ma‑a nɔ wan tima ɔ tima.”
Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo wo ma bɛn, mbɛ wo‑a wo 'a dambo a man wai chɛ koe a.
Wo ma‑a yɔ bɔi denɛ nu, miin mbe an kun ti ma kɔn tena a na koe a chenɛ a, a ka musu si tɔmbɔɛ ɔ. Min mbe a ma, ni a na‑a, a ni chenɛ da tu, an mbe chenɛ da a ka‑a wan a ye bui chɛ a.

Ɛ ma‑a wan bɔi den chɛ n ma buɔdia a, miin mbe ee chinɔ‑a, aan an kun ti ni yɛ. N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ kun ti chɛ ɛ a ma bɛn‑da wan, mbɛ a‑a a 'a bɔi den chɛ n chee, mbɛ a wandi gbu‑a daun fenɛ ya, a‑a a be an ma a daun koe a.
Ni a na‑a su tɛ wɛɛ, ni a na‑a sayi ma pimbi wɛɛ ɔ a, ɛ miin tan‑da an ya a, ɛ ma‑a an ma buɔdia wa an na.
Chɛɛ n ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ ni chen ti ɛ a ɔ sɔn fan tima min na kanka ɛ na‑a a kanka koe a, a ee dɔn kanka ni a 'a chenɛ te, a ni don nɔ.
A sin wo wɛɛ, wo wo ma bɛn, koe min na mu, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe na‑a wan tima ɔ tima, wo yii n mbe ee na‑a ma‑a min dɔ n na koe a.”
Mbɛ Pita ɔ, “Fa, i‑a tai chɛ tɛ nn fan ko a, nn fɛn mu i fɛ denɛ n na, kɔ i‑a a tɛ mɔɛ gbɛɛ an ko a?”
Mbɛ Mansa Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo ma yɔ wai chɛ mɔɛ, danaya ni min dɔ, a basan yiimatɛ a. Ni a kun ti ma‑a ta‑a tachɛ ɔ, ɛ a to wan a bɔɛ n kun ma, daun fenɛ be koe a an ma, tima ma.
Ni a kun ti yɛ‑a, a ni a tan, ɛ koe chɛ n ma‑a, yɔ a‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ a ye, ɛ ma wan ko chɛndɛ a a ko a.
N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ kun ti chɛ ɛ gbasaya be‑a wan a ma, ma koe a a 'a chenɛ gbɛɛ kun ma.

Chɛɛ ni wai chɛ mɔɛ chɛ‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, mbɛ kun ti chɛ ee fua tena yɛ‑a, mbɛ a bun‑da a bɔɛ n gbasi‑a, kai nu a basan musu n na. Ɛ ma‑a gbɛ daun chɛ an na, ni gbɛ min ba a, min mbe a bia‑a a ɔ bendenɛ a.

Chɛɛ a kun ti chɛ ɛ yɛ‑a wan tee dɔndɔ a, a yii n mbe ee ma‑a a yɛ koe ɔ tima min na. Kun ti chɛ ɛ wai chɛ mɔɛ chɛ a tɔɔya‑a wan a yama yama boo a, mbɛ a‑a a bia, yɔ mɔɛ chɛ nu, a ee che a fa‑a miin na.
“Mbɛ ni wai chɛ mɔɛ‑a a ɔ sɔn, a kun ti toen mu a ni fen ma a ye, chɛɛ a ma a ma ni, yɔ a kun ti toen mu min ni ma, ɛ gbasi sɛmbɛndenɛ ma sɔn‑da wan.

Chɛɛ ni wai chɛ mɔɛ ma a ɔ sɔn a kun ti toen mu fen na, mbɛ a‑a ko dɔ mende ma, ɛ gbasi ma sɔn min ko a, ɛ gbasi ɛndenɛ an ma sɔn‑da. Ni a chenama ma‑a mɔ ɔ mɔ boo ɔ, a ni a wai chenama chɛ. I boo ɛ che‑a buɛ min dɔ a ma sɔn koe a, i ni a chɛ ka a buɛ chɛ ɔ, a ma sɛenɛ a.”
Chisɔsi ɔ, “N na‑a ta an sɔ koe a dunya chɛ a. Ɛ ma‑a wan n ma buɔdia a, ni an ta chɛ ma‑a bia‑a gbɛ.
Chɛɛ chɛ e na to ma‑a, n mbe tɔɔya ɔ bia‑a wan a ɔ benden ba a. N mbe ma‑a wan faayɔn ba ɔ aan an tɔɔya chɛ danka a ni si.
A ma ma wo yii ma, mbɛ n na‑a dunya chɛ ɔ, min mbe a ma, kuiɛ a kanɛ ni ma mɔɛ n tɛ ɔ. N ma na ni an na, chɛɛ n na‑a dɔfasanɛ an na an tɛ ɔ.
A ka gbɛ sanche ma, suun ma nyɔ duu n tɛ ɛ du‑a wan, mɔ sawa n mbe yɛ‑a wan kaka dɔndɔɛ ma, mbɛ mɔ fea n yɛ‑a kaka dɔndɔɛ ma.

Fa n bɛ an 'na denɛ kaima n na, an mbe sɔ‑a wan an nyɔn na kan. Den suun musu n bɛɛ mbe sɔ‑a ka wan an nyɔn na an bɛ an 'na denɛ musuma n na. Mbɛ de mɔɛ n bɛ an 'na den 'na musu n na, an bɛɛ sɔ‑a an nyɔn na kan.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ to mɔ fanka fanka chɛ ye, a ɔ, “Ni wo‑a dingbii yen ka‑a tee bea tena, wo e a fɔ wan dɔndɔ gbe, mbɛ sona ɛ na tena wan, a sin ɛ na wan.
Mbɛ ni wo‑a fia a tinsɔn ɛ bɔ‑a a ka dunya denkɔɛ, wo e a fɔ wan to, mbɛ kaina ɛ na tena wan win‑da, a sin mbe ma wan.

Wo wan nɛnɛn fea ti nu, wo e banda ma fɛn fan, an fea duu gboo a, mbɛ wo‑a a ɔ sɔn ni banda ɛ na tena wan nyan‑da. Wo e a ɔ sɔn fan to ni a ee nyan tena. Chɛɛ wo ee che koe chɛ n sin fasai‑a, miin mbe ma tena sanche.
“A nyin fan wo wandi ni a ɔ sɔn, koe min nyin a ma koe a wo boo ɔ.

Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a i ma siibia, a ma i ma gbɔsɔɛ a bai chɛ ni sa wo tɛ ɔ. I ma dɔn wo ni ta kuti ɔ, min mbe a ma, wo ni sɔ chiti tɛ mɔɛ n chen kɔɔ. Ni chɛ ma‑a, chiti tɛ mɔɛ n bɛɛ mbe i be‑a wan sawa kun ma fɛn mɔɛ n ma, mbɛ sawa kun ma fɛn mɔɛ n bɛɛ‑a i sa pimbi chenɛ a.
N ni a ma din i tena, mbɛ e ee bɔ‑a pimbi chen chɛ a aan, kɔpɔɛ chɛ dankama gbɔdɛ, an mbe i a bɔnɔ‑a min na, i ni a be.”

A tima dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a ni, mbɛ mɔɛ dɔ nu, miin bɛ ni Chisɔsi a, an‑na ko yama wa ɔ yian a a. Ko yama wa chɛ na‑a ma mɔɛ dɔ n fan na, miin na‑a ka Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ. An na‑a na Yataa 'a kata ɔ wan, min mbe a ma, an ni soe n minda, a be koe a Yataa ma an 'na yasi a. An to‑a yasi chɛ n fan bɔ‑a Yataa 'a kata chɛ ɔ, mbɛ Kɔfana Padeti‑a a ma, an‑na an fa. An faen chɛ a, an wii ɔ basan‑da wan soe chɛ n wii a, an na‑a miin bɔ ka yasi a.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ɛ wo ta yiima ɔ, mbɛ an‑na Kadidi mɔɛ chɛ miin fa ka buɛ chɛ ɔ, mbɛ ko yama ma mɔ wa ni an na. A ma ma ka wo yii ma, mbɛ an benden ni Kadidi mɔɛ tɔɛ n gbɛɛ ma ko yama ma ɔ.
N ni a ma din wo tena, a ee ka wan ɛnden bɛɛ a. A sin, ni wo ma wo kan kɔ sɔ ni wo 'a ko yama n na, wo wɛɛ, wo gbɛɛ ɛ kasaa‑a wan.
A ka to chɛ ma, tima min na banda a chen chɛ na‑a bea Sidowan fɔnɛ ɔ, mɔ tan kun ma sɛi an fa‑a. Chɛɛ a ma ma wo yii ma, mbɛ a mɔɛ chɛ n ni yau a ben mɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ ma Chuusaɛn duu ɔ.
N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ a ee ka ɛnden bɛɛ a. Ni wo sin ma wo kan kɔ sɔ ni wo 'a ko yama n na, wo wɛɛ gbɛɛ ɛ kasaa‑a wan.”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a tai chɛ tɛ an tena, a ɔ, “Kamin dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, yadi ni min boo ɔ. Gbɔ kɔnɛ ni wan nɔ an yadi chɛ ɔ. Mbɛ tee dɔndɔ a, yadi ti chɛ ta‑a wan kɔn chɛ gbɔɛ kai koe a. Chɛɛ a ma a gbɔ dɔndɔ wɛɛ tan ni a a.

Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ a 'a yadi kun ma fɛn mɔɛ ye, a ɔ, ‘A yen ko san sawa ko a ka gbɛ, n mbe na yadi chɛ ɔ, gbɔ kɔn chɛ gbɔɛ kai koe a, chɛɛ tima ɔ tima n ni n na‑a, n mbe ee a gbɔ kan kɔ kan tan a a. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, a tɛ, i ni a a bea. A ma nyin a ni duu gboo ma bia gbama a.’
Chɛɛ yadi kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ ɔ, ‘Fa, a to nɔ san dɔndɔ gbe chɛ ko a. N mbe sonɛ sin‑da wan a 'a tindanɛ, mbɛ n‑na sundu tui chɛ a kuu ma.
Ni a gbɔ‑a yɛi, ɛ nyan‑da wan, chɛɛ ni a ma gbɔ ni, mbɛ a tima chɛ a, a tɛ‑a.’ ”
Chu n 'na suin tee dɔndɔ ma, Chisɔsi ni wan kan chɛ tena an 'na samun chɛ chenɛ a.
Musu dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, nyina yama ni min fɛ, min‑na a ma, a gbandienɛ ni san tan kun ma sɛi ko a. A ma bundenɛ ni, mbɛ a sin, a nii che a ɔ tan‑da ɛnden bɛɛ a.
Chisɔsi‑a a yen kɛn, a‑a a chee, mbɛ a ɔ, “Bɔɔɛ, i baun‑da gbɛ i 'a gbandi chɛ ɔ sanche.”
Mbɛ a‑a a boo bun musu chɛ ma. Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, musu chɛ sɔ‑a den, mbɛ a‑a tando be Yataa ma.

Chɛɛ kun ti chɛ samun chɛ chen chɛ a, a faa tɛ‑a wan kaka, koe min na mu, Chisɔsi‑a mɔɛ baun suin tee ma. Chɛ ko a, a ɔ mɔɛ chɛ n ma, “Tee wɔdɔ an mbe mɔ gbu ko a wai chɛ koe a wichi kan kɔ kan dɔ. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo na a tee wɔdɔɛ chɛ tɛ ɔ, an ni wo baun wo 'a gbandi n dɔ. Chɛɛ wo ma na suin tee ma.”

Chɛɛ Mansa Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo wan nɛnɛn fea ti nu, wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ ee nɛ, min 'na ninchi kanɛ a ɛ gbaa, a 'a sofɛ kanɛ a ni gbaa, suin tee wɛɛ ma a, ni a ee a fuin‑da, a ni ta a a yii da a, a ni a min. Ni wo e chɛ ma wan, mbɛ wo‑a wai an chɛ ka suin tee ma.

Mbɛ sanche gbɛ wo a yen ko, mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ dɔndɔ an nɛ musu chɛ a, mmɔ gbɛɛ bɔ‑a Ebeami 'a dambi dɔndɔ gbe chɛ an dɔ. Sitana‑a a chii wan, ɛ tɔɔya ɔ san tan kun ma sɛi ko a. Chia ɔ chia a, fɔ ni a fuin‑da wan, a ni ma suin tee wɛɛ ma a.”
A 'a bai chɛ‑a a ma wan, mbɛ a chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ n gbɛɛ mau‑a an fandi ma. Chɛɛ mɔɛ tɔɛ n gbɛɛ‑a buɔdia bɔ wan, a si kamaya koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ma, Chisɔsi‑a miin ma.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ka wɛ n mbe a ɔ yian wo a, Yataa 'a mansaya ɛ buɛ min dɔ. Ka wɛ n mbe a bɔ nyɔɛ yian wo a.
Ɛ ka wan yɔ kamin dɔndɔ min‑na chin fen kuu dɔma ɛndenɛ ya, mbɛ a‑a a chin a 'a yadi ɔ. A fɛn‑da, mbɛ a ma‑a kɔn chenama wa a. Mbɛ konde n‑na an nyanɛ sa a bonɛ n dɔ.”
Mbɛ a ɔ te to, “Ka wɛ n mbe a ɔ yian to wo a, Yataa 'a mansaya bɔen mu to fenɛ min na.
Ɛ ka wan to yɔ yisin denɛ, musu dɔndɔ‑a min ya, mbɛ a‑a a chɛ feawa funku wa ɔ, konko pani ɔ biidi nyan koe a. Yisin chɛ kun‑da wan feawa funku chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, mbɛ feawa chɛ sɛ‑a.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi bun‑da to a 'a tachɛ ma, a ta Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. A ta‑a wan mɔɛ n kan‑da duu chɛ n gbɛɛ ɔ, a‑a miin dɔ tandin.
A tima chɛ a, mɔ dɔndɔ ɔ, “Fa, Yataa ɛ kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ be‑a dechee mɔ kuundenɛ n fan ma?” Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ,

“Wo butuinɛ chɛ, wo ni ben an chen da a dɔɔyaen chɛ a, don koe a Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ. Koe min na mu, n ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ mɔ sɛsɛ n mbe butuinɛ chɛ‑a wan tee dɔndɔɛ kɔɔ don koe a nɔ, chɛɛ an mbe ee na‑a kun‑da.

Tima ɛ che‑a wan, tima min na chen chɛ kun ti ɛ a kɔɔ sɔ‑a, mbɛ a‑a chen chɛ da a tɔn. A tima chɛ a gbɛ, ni wo e sɔ ɔ baa ma wan, wo e chen chɛ da tu‑a wan, wo ɔ, kun ti chɛ ni a ma wo ni don. Chɛɛ ɛ a fɔ‑a wan wo ye, a ɔ, a ma wo sɔn ɛnden bɛɛ a.
Wo wɛɛ, wo‑a a fɔ wan, wo ɔ, wo bɛ na‑a daunɛ chɛ wan kaina dɔndɔ tee. A yɛ to, wo ɔ, a na‑a kanɛ chɛ wan wo 'a duu n dɔ.
Chɛɛ ɛ a fɔ‑a wan to, a ɔ, a ma wo sɔn ɛnden bɛɛ a. A ɔ, ko yama ma mɔɛ mu wo a, a ɔ, wo ni ka a fɛ.

A tima chɛ a, wo e Ebeami yen‑da wan, wo ni Aisaki yen, mbɛ wo‑a Chekɔpi yen. Wo e Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ yen‑da wan. An gbɛɛ ɛ ma‑a wan Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ, wo sin mbe sɔ ɔ baa ma, wo ee che don‑da. Wo e ma‑a wan di chɛ‑a fiko fiko faayɔn ba ɔ, wo e ta‑a wo nyinɛ a daun‑da.
A sin, mɔɛ n mbe na‑a wan a ka dunya tɔnkɔnɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, mbɛ an si‑a daun chɛ tena, tima min na Yataa ɛ a 'a mansaya ɔ yian‑da.
A yen ko gbɛ, mɔɛ dɔ nu miin mbe gbaa, an mbe ma‑a wan ya ɔ sɔɛ n na, mbɛ ya ɔ sɔɛ dɔ n sin ma‑a gbaa mɔɛ n na.”
A tima dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, Chu mɔɛ dɔ nu, miin ni Fayisii n na, an na‑a wan Chisɔsi tena, mbɛ an dɔ, “Bɔ nɛ, i ni ta kaina dɔ mende, koe min na mu, Mansa Ɛdɔdi toen mu a ni i fa.”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo ta, wo ni a fɔ an kamin yaaen chɛ ye, wo ɔ, n yen ko n mbe nyina yama n gbain‑da mɔɛ n fɛ, a yɛ to, n mbe gbandi mɔɛ n baun‑da tima kundu ɛnden ko a sanche wɛ. Ni a tima chɛ ban‑da, n mbe na‑a ban‑da wan gbɛ n 'na wai chɛ‑a.
Chɛ ni ma wɛɛ, n mbe ma‑a wan n ta chia ma tima ɛnden tɛ ɔ. A mu min na, Chuusaɛn an mu dechee duu a, a nyin an ni Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ ni a fii kaina.”

Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ to, a ɔ, “Wo wan Chuusaɛn mɔɛ nu, wo toen mu Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n fa koe a. A yɛ to, wo toen mu Yataa 'a sɔ mɔɛ n bon koe a, ɛ miin na na wo tena. Tima sɛsɛ ko a, n toen ni, n ni wo a sɔn sɔn kaina dɔndɔɛ, yɔ tɛ kuinsa ɛ a 'a denɛ n don buɛ min dɔ a kambanɛ kɔɔ. Chɛɛ wo ma dɔn ni n ye.

A yen ko gbɛ, Yataa 'a chen chɛ a senɛ to‑a, a sin pombonɛ mu gbɛ. N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ a ka sanche ma, wo ee n yen‑da to, aan a ta tima chɛ ma, wo e a fɔ‑a tima min na, wo ɔ, Mansa Yataa ni mɔɛ chɛ dua, min mbe na‑a a tɔɛ ɔ.”
Chu n 'na suin tee dɔndɔ ma, Chisɔsi ta‑a wan daun chɛ tena mɔ dɔndɔ 'a chenɛ a, min ni Fayisii n kun ti a. A tima chɛ a, an ni wan Chisɔsi a tɛ tena chɛndɛ chɛ.
Mbɛ a yen ko, kamin dɔndɔ min chenɛ n fa faen ni, a basan a boo gbɛɛ a, a ni wan nɔ Chisɔsi ya kɔɔ.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ chɛ n ye, a basan Fayisii chɛ n na, a ɔ, “Mmɔ 'a sawa dɔnden fan mu mmɔ ni mɔɛ a baun suin tee ma, kɔ a ma a fɔ ni ka?”
Chɛɛ an‑na a ɔ maun fan don. An ma bai ɔ bai fɔ ni. Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a kamin chɛ bia, mbɛ a‑a a baun. Mbɛ a‑a a boo ka, a ta‑a a waa a.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Ni wo dɔndɔ 'a denɛ bea‑a yii sonɛ ɔ suin tee ma, ni wo 'a ninchi wɛɛ mu, wo e a bɔ wan nɔ bui chɛ a, ae?”
Chɛɛ bai ɔ bai ma che ni bɔ‑a an da a, a fɔ koe a a ye.
Chisɔsi na‑a a ɔ yen fan, mbɛ mɔɛ miin chee‑a ka daun chɛ bɛn chɛ ɔ, an ni wan si tena chɛndɛ chɛndɛ n ya‑a an fandi ko a. Mbɛ a‑a tai chɛ tɛ an gbɛɛ tena, a ɔ,
“Ni mɔɛ min mbe ma‑a musu si‑a, a‑a i chee an musu si daun chɛ bɛn chɛ ɔ, i ma ta i ni si tena chɛndɛ ya i wandi ko a. Koe min na mu, kɔkɔɛ mɔ chenama dɔ mende cheeen fan mu, min benden mu i ma.
Mbɛ mɔɛ min sin‑na wo fea gbɛɛ chee ka, ɛ na‑a wan, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ i ye, a ɔ, i ni i kafai, a ɔ, kaina chɛ ɛ kai chɛ an ko a. Mbɛ a tima chɛ a, e mau‑a wan ta koe a si‑a kaina, baa ɛnden bɛɛ ee min ma.

Chɛɛ ni an‑na i chee tima ɔ tima bɛnɛ ɔ, ta, mbɛ i si‑a kaina, baa ɛnden bɛɛ ee min ma. Ni i yaa yii na‑a, a ni i tan nɔ si ɔ, ɛ a fɔ‑a wan i ma, a ɔ, i ni ta, a ɔ, i ni si gbakoo kaina. Chɛ ɛ ma‑a wan basɔmaya a i tena, mɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ ya kɔɔ, an‑na miin chee ka.
Koe min na mu, ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a wandi a sɛ, Yataa ɛ a mɔɛ chɛ a yii‑a wan. Chɛɛ ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a wandi a yii, Yataa ɛ a mɔɛ chɛ a sɛ‑a wan.”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ a yaa yii chɛ wɛɛ ye, a ɔ, “Ni i‑a daun chɛ bɛnɛ ɔ bɛn, i ma to nɔ i ni i dia nyɔɛ n fan chee dechee. I ma i suun ma nyɔɛ n dechee chee, a basan nyan tɔɛ n na. A mu koe min na, an bɛɛ i chee‑a wan to tima dɔ mende a an ta daun chɛ bɛnɛ n dɔ. Ni chɛ ma‑a, mbɛ i ban‑da i 'a pawa ma sɔn‑da koe chɛ ko a, i na‑a min chɛ an ye.
Chɛɛ ni i‑a daun chɛ bɛnɛ ɔ bɛn, chɛ n chee miin yɔnden mu. Namaa n chee, i ni tamban tɔɛ n chee, a basan ya te tɔɛ n na.

Mɔɛ n fan nɛ, miin mbe ee che i ta wai nyima a yɛ‑a. Chɛɛ ni i‑a chɛ ma, e dua ma sɔn‑da wan. Tima min na, mɔɛ miin tanden ni Yataa tena, an mbe ma‑a an kɔɔ sɔ‑a a ka saya ɔ, Yataa ɛ a tɔnɔnɛ be‑a wan i ma.”

Kamin dɔndɔ min ni nɔ si ɔ daun chɛ tena chɛ, an bɛ Chisɔsi a, a‑a bai chɛ a min kɛn, a‑a a fɔ wan Chisɔsi ye, a ɔ, “Dua ɛ ma‑a wan mɔɛ chɛ n ma, Yataa ɛ miin chee‑a a 'a daun chɛ bɛnɛ ɔ, tima min na mu, ɛ a 'a mansaya ɔ yian‑da.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Tima dɔndɔ a, kamin dɔndɔ na‑a daun chɛ bɛnɛ ɔ bɛn fan, mbɛ a‑a mɔ sɛsɛ chee an daun chɛ bɛn chɛ ɔ.
Tima che‑a kɛn an bɛn chɛ ko a, a‑a bɔi den dɔndɔ a ta wan mɔɛ chɛ n tena, a‑a miin chee, a ɔ, an ni na, a ɔ, a ban‑da ko ɔ ko ɔ bɛn‑da.

Chɛɛ a tima chɛ a, an gbɛɛ‑a a kuu sɔ wan kafai be‑a dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a. Mɔɛ saa saa‑a a fɔ wan bɔi den chɛ ye, a ɔ, ‘N 'na denɛ n‑na a kuu sɔ n 'na sɛnɛ wai a, chɛ an‑na a fɔ, n toen mu n ni ta, n ni a fo nɔ. A fɔ a ye, i ɔ, a ni n kafai.’
Mbɛ dɔndɔ wɛɛ‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, ‘N‑na ninchi tan fan san ka sanche. N toen mu n ni ta an na wɛɛ ɔ. A fɔ a ye, a ni n kafai.’
Mbɛ a sawan bɔɛ chɛ wɛɛ‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, ‘N‑na musu si ka sanche, chɛ ko a, n mbe ee che‑a ta‑a.’

“Mbɛ bɔi den chɛ yɛ‑a, mbɛ a‑a koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ɔ yian a kun ti chɛ a. Kun ti chɛ faa tɛ‑a wan gbeden, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ bɔi den chɛ ye, a ɔ, ‘A a gbandia, i ni ta chia kuu chɛ n na, a basan duu tɔnkɔnɛ n gbɛɛ ɔ, i ni na yɔn tɔɛ n na, ya te tɔɛ nu, a basan namaa n na.’
Mɔɛ chɛ n cheeenɛ gbakɔ, a na‑a wan to, mbɛ a‑a a ɔ yian a kun ti chɛ a, mbɛ a‑a a sɔ wai min na, a‑a a chɛ, chɛɛ kaina a ma fa nin bɛ.
Mbɛ kun ti chɛ‑a a fɔ to a 'a bɔi den chɛ ye, a ɔ, ‘Ta duu sundu kunɛ n na, a basan fia ɔ chia chɛ n na, mbɛ i‑a a din an ma fɔsɛɛ a, min mbe a ma, an ni na, mbɛ n 'na chenɛ a fa‑a.
N ni a ma din i tena, mbɛ n‑na mɔɛ miin chee ka a saa a, mbɛ an dɔndɔ wɛɛ ee n 'na daun fen chɛ sima wɛɛ puin an da ɔ.’ ”
A tima chɛ a, mɔ sɛsɛ bea‑a wan Chisɔsi fɛ, an bɛ ni ta tena miin na. Mbɛ a‑a a ya a mun an ma, a ɔ,

“Mɔ kan kɔ kan min mbe na‑a n tena, a ee che ma‑a n fɛ denɛ a, mɔɔ ni n bakoe a dia‑a a ye, a ni ben a fa ma, a ni ben a de ma, a ni ben a 'a denɛ ma, a ni ben a suun ma nyɔɛ ma, a ben a 'a musu wɛɛ ma, a basan an mɔɛ chɛ wandi gbu wɛɛ a.
Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ma nyina ni a faa ma koe ma, a ni a ma bɛn mɔnɛ ɔ bia koe a, a basan fa koe a n ko a, a ee che bea‑a n fɛ.
“Ni wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ toen mu a ni banda a chenɛ sɔ, a ee a kuu sɔ ka dechee. Ɛ si pɛn, a ni a ɔ yen, ni fen nyɔn mbe a boo ɔ. Ɛ a ɔ yen pɛn, ni an kɔpɔɛ chɛ ɛ chen chɛ a ban fan.
Ni a ma chɛ ma ni, ni a‑a chenɛ gbu kuu si, a ee na‑a kun‑da a ni wai chɛ a ban. Mbɛ mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ‑a a ɔ yen‑da fen ma‑a, an mbe a ma yɛn‑da wan.
An mbe a fɔ‑a wan, an dɔ, ‘Kamin chɛ‑a a kuu sɔ chen chɛ sɔ‑a, chɛɛ a ma kun ni a ni a a ban.’

“Mansa dɔndɔ yen ko, soya wu tanɛ ɛ a boo ɔ. A bɔ mansa dɔ mende, soya wu bi fea ɛ min boo ɔ, a toen ni a ni chɛɛ bun a ma. Mansa chɛ, soya wu tanɛ ɛ ka min boo ɔ, a ee ta ka dechee chɛɛ chɛ tena. Ɛ si pɛn, a ni a yii na chii, ni ɛ che wan chɛɛ chɛ chɛ‑a, a e na to ta‑a.
Ni a ee kun, ɛ to pɔɔ wan, mbɛ a‑a sakana a ta a bɔɛ mansa chɛ tena, min mbe a ma, an ni ma kuiɛ dɔndɔɛ ɔ.
Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ ee che ma‑a n fɛ denɛ a, mɔɔ ni a mɔɛ chɛ‑a a kan kɔ sɔ fen kɔ fen na, min mbe a boo ɔ.
“Kuiɛ nyin fan, chɛɛ ni a ɔ sɛ‑a, mɔ ee che to i ni a ma a dia ni yɛ a ɔ.
A ma nyin to fen kɔ fen ko a, n mbe ee baa a ma koe a duu gboo wɛɛ ni nyan. A nyin dechee mɔ ni a a dɛ fia ɔ. Wo wɛn too ɛ koe a min, wo chɛ a min.”
Tima dɔndɔ a, pawa kain mɔɛ nu, ni mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin nii sɔ ɔ Yataa 'a chia ma, an gbɛɛ na‑a wan, an too ma sɔ koe a Chisɔsi ma.

Chɛɛ Chu mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin ni Fayisii n na, an bɛ Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ n na, an bun‑da gbonyɛ‑a Chisɔsi a, an dɔ, “Kamin chɛ ɛ a boo si wan mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ kɔɔ, miin mbe ee sɔ ɔ Yataa 'a chia ma, mbɛ an‑na daunɛ chɛ kaina dɔndɔ.”
Chɛ‑a a ma wan, mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a tai chɛ tɛ an tena, a ɔ,

“Mmɔ a ya, mbɛ sa chɛmɛ dɔndɔ ɛ wo dɔndɔ boo ɔ. Ɛ fen ma, ni dɔndɔ to‑a a ɔ? Ɛ sa bi kɔnɔntɔ kun ma kɔnɔntɔɛ chɛ n to wan daun chɛ a. Ɛ ta wan a ya a kan‑da sa dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, min to‑a a ɔ ka. Ɛ a ya a kan fan, aan a ni a yen.
Ni a‑a a yen, a bu ɔ dia‑a wan, mbɛ a‑a a sa a kan ma,
mbɛ a yɛ‑a a a a waa a. Mbɛ ɛ a dia nyɔɛ n chee wan kaina dɔndɔ, a basan a baachenɛ n na, mbɛ a ɔ, ‘N‑na n 'na sa yen. Mmɔ buɔdia bɔ.’

A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, n ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ ni mɔ dɔndɔ gbe, min mbe ee sɔ ɔ Yataa 'a chia ma, ni a‑a a kan kɔ sɔ a 'a ko yama an na, buɔdia chenama ɛ ma‑a wan banda bu ɔ. An buɔdia chɛ sin gbu benden mu buɔdia chɛ ma, min sien mu mɔ bi kɔnɔntɔ kun ma kɔnɔntɔɛ chɛ n ma, miin‑na an yii na chii an fandi a, mbɛ mɔ tandenɛ mu an na. Mbɛ an sin kan kɔ sɔ ee to an ma.”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a tai dɔ mende tɛ an ye, a ɔ, “Kain gbɛnsɛn tanɛ ɛ musu boo ɔ, kain ba nu. Ni dɔndɔ gbe to‑a a ɔ, ɛ fen ma? Mɔ a yen, mbɛ ɛ dambo a man fan, mbɛ a‑a chenɛ chɛ doee gbɛɛ ɔ fian fo, ɛ a ya a kan‑da a 'a kain chɛ a kɔdɛɛ, aan a ni to a ɔ, a ni a yen.
Ni a‑a a yen, ɛ a dia nyɔɛ n chee‑a wan, a basan a baachenɛ n na, mbɛ a ɔ, ‘N‑na n 'na kainɛ yen. Mmɔ buɔdia bɔ.’
A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, n ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ ni mɔ dɔndɔ gbe, min mbe ee sɔ ɔ Yataa 'a chia ma, ni a‑a a kan kɔ sɔ a 'a ko yama an na, maeka n bɛɛ bu ɔ dia‑a ka wan.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ to an ye, a ɔ, “Kamin dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, den kaien fea ni min boo ɔ.
Tima dɔndɔ che‑a wan, mbɛ denɛ dɔma‑a a fa ɔ tisa, a ɔ, a fa ni a boo fenɛ du, a ni a ta be a ma. Mbɛ a fa wɛɛ‑a a boo fenɛ n gbɛɛ du, mbɛ a‑a a 'a denɛ dɔma chɛ ta be a ma.

Tee kuun den ben‑da kɛn, denɛ dɔma chɛ‑a a ta boo fen chɛ n gbɛɛ ma tachɛ, mbɛ a bɔ‑a a waa duu chɛ ɔ, kɔpɔɛ chɛ ɛ a boo ɔ. A ta‑a chɛnyɛ min dɔ, a ɔ ni yansan kaka. A ni kɛn nɔ an chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ, a‑a kɔpɔɛ chɛ gbɛɛ yɔn baa baa chia an fan na.
Kɔpɔɛ gbɛɛ min ni a boo ɔ, a ban‑da wan fion. Mbɛ a tima chɛ a, kɔnkɔ wa dɛgbɛ na‑a an chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ. Mbɛ koe ɔ bun‑da gbɛa‑a a ma.
Chɛ‑a a ma wan, mbɛ a ta‑a wai chɛ koe a chɛnyɛ den dɔndɔ tena. Kamin chɛ wɛɛ‑a a a ta wan a 'a kɔɛnya kuii ɔ a 'a sɛnɛ ɔ, a ni a 'a kɔɛnya n da kɔ.
A ni wan a yii ma, a ni kɔɛnya chɛ n da tɔɛ daun, chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ ma fen kɔ fen be ni a ma.

“Chɛɛ ko bonda chɛ si‑a kɛn a a, a danka a, a‑a yiimatɛ ma sɔn fan gbɛ, mbɛ a ɔ, ‘Daun fenɛ ɛ wan fa 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ n gbɛɛ boo ɔ, an mbe min daun a tɔɛ ɛ to. Chɛɛ n sin yen ko gbɛ nɛ, n mbe fa‑a kɔnkɔɛ a.
N mbe ee chɛ ɔ si chɛ tena. N mbe n kɔɔ sɔ‑a wan, n ni ta, n ni fa tan. Mbɛ n‑na a fɔ a ye, n dɔ, “Fa, n‑na ko yama ma i a, wo fea Yataa a.
A ma nyin to i ni n ya i 'a denɛ a. N ya yɔ i 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n dɔndɔ.” ’

Mbɛ a‑a a a sɔ wan, mbɛ a‑a chia bia ta koe a a fa tan‑da. “Chɛɛ a to‑a pɔɔ wan, mbɛ a fa‑a a yen, mbɛ a ma chinchinɛ‑a a fa bia. Mbɛ a fa‑a bui sa a a, mbɛ a‑a a 'a denɛ tan. Mbɛ a bea‑a a kaa ɔ, mbɛ a‑a a kɔndɔn buɔdia wandi ɔ.
Mbɛ den chɛ ɔ, ‘Fa, n‑na ko yama ma i a, wo fea Yataa a. A ma nyin to i ni n ya i 'a denɛ a.’
Chɛɛ a fa‑a a fɔ wan a 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ n ye, a ɔ, ‘Wo a a gbandia. Wo ta na doma kai nyima nyima a, wo ni a don a ma. Wo chia don a boo ma, mbɛ wo‑a kɔɔwa don a chen na.
Mbɛ wo ta‑a, wo‑a ninchi busi ya, min maen mu buchɛ buchɛ. Mbɛ wo‑a a fa, mbɛ mmɔ‑a daun chɛ buɔdia bɔ.
Koe min na mu, n 'na den chɛ faen fan ni, chɛɛ a yɛ‑a gbɛ fɔɛ ɔ. A toen fan ni a ɔ, chɛɛ a yen‑da gbɛ.’ Mbɛ an‑na a kuu sɔ daunɛ chɛ‑a an mbe ta‑a tɔmbɔɛ don‑da a boo ɔ.
“Koe chɛ n gbɛɛ mbe ma tena tima min na, denɛ kaima chenama ni sɛnɛ ɔ wan wai chɛ‑a. Mbɛ a na‑a duu ɔ. A foenɛ a an 'na chenɛ baima, mbɛ a‑a kuiɛ fenɛ kuiɛ a min, a basan mɔɛ n tɔmbɔ don kuiɛ a.
Chɛ‑a a ma wan, mbɛ a‑a a fa 'a wai chɛ den dɔndɔ chee, mbɛ a‑a a ɔ tisa ni fen mbe ma tena chenɛ a.
Mbɛ wai chɛ mɔɛ chɛ ɔ, ‘I dɔɛ an na‑a ka bi. Chɛ ko a, i fa‑a a ma wan, nn‑na ninchi busi chɛ fa, a mu min na, i dɔɛ yɛ‑a a fɔɛ a a sun da a.’
“Chɛɛ denɛ chenama chɛ‑a bai chɛ a min kɛn, a faa tɛ‑a wan gbeden, mbɛ a ban‑da don koe a chenɛ a. Mbɛ a fa bɔ‑a, a‑a a tan. Mbɛ a‑a a ma nande, a ɔ, a ni don chenɛ a.

Chɛɛ den chɛ‑a a fɔ wan a fa ye, a ɔ, ‘A yen bɛ, san sɛsɛ wa chɛ gbɛɛ ko a, n wai‑a wan i ye yɔ yɔnɛ. A sin, n ma i da a kuiɛ yɔn ni tee dɔndɔ wɛɛ a. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, i ma fen kɔ fen be ni n ma. I ma ba den bɛɛ be ni n ma, min mbe a ma, nn bɛɛ n dia nyɔɛ n na, nn ni tee dɔndɔ 'a buɔdia wɛɛ bɔ.
Chɛɛ i 'a den chɛ‑a i boo fenɛ gbɛɛ ɔ yufuyufu dani ma gbankanda an ma. A yɛ‑a kɛn gbɛ sanche, i‑a ninchi busi chɛ an fa a ye.’
Mbɛ a fa ɔ, ‘N 'na den, mɔ fea an mbe tima ɔ tima ko a, a sin, fen kɔ fen min mbe n boo ɔ, i wan ta mu a a.
Chɛɛ mɔɔ ni mmɔ‑a buɔdia bonda chɛ bɔ, a mu min na, i dɔɛ chɛ faen fan ni, chɛɛ a yɛ‑a gbɛ fɔɛ ɔ. A toen fan ni a ɔ, chɛɛ a yen‑da gbɛ sanche.’ ”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ a fɛ denɛ n ye, a ɔ, “Nyan tɔ dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, wai chɛ mɔɛ ni min boo ɔ. Wai chɛ mɔɛ chɛ, an ni nyan tɔɛ chɛ boo fenɛ n gbɛɛ kun ma. Mɔɛ n na‑a a ɔ yian fan nyan tɔɛ chɛ a, mbɛ an wai chɛ mɔɛ chɛ, ɛ a boo fenɛ ɔ yayi tena wan.

Chɛ fɛ, a‑a mɔɛ a ta wan wai chɛ mɔɛ chɛ chee‑a. A na‑a kɛn, nyan tɔɛ chɛ‑a a fɔ wan a ye, a ɔ, ‘N‑na koe miin na min, a si i ma, an na ma di n ye.’ A ɔ, ‘Na,’ a ɔ, ‘i ni i konan a si i 'a wai gbɛɛ ma, e min chɛ tee.’ A ɔ, ‘A mu min na,’ a ɔ, ‘e ee che to ma‑a n boo fen kan kɔ kan kun ma.’

Mbɛ wai chɛ mɔɛ chɛ‑a a fɔ a yiima ɔ, a ɔ, ‘N ma a ɔ sɔn, n mbe fen ma‑a gbɛ sanche.’ A ɔ, ‘N kun ti ɛ na tena wan gbɛ n bɔ‑a wai chɛ ɔ.’ A ɔ, ‘N dɔ ma gbɛ sɛnɛ sa koe a,’ a ɔ, ‘a yɛ to,’ a ɔ, ‘n mbe mau‑a wan n ni ben ben fen fuinɛ a.’

A ɔ, ‘N yii puin‑da, n mbe koe min ma tena,’ a ɔ, ‘min mbe a ma,’ a ɔ, ‘ni an‑na n bɔ wai chɛ ɔ,’ a ɔ, ‘n dia nyɔɛ n ni ma.’ A ɔ, ‘N dia nyɔɛ n mbe ma‑a wan,’ a ɔ, ‘miin mbe an boo si‑a n kɔɔ an 'na chenɛ n na.’
“Mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, a kun ti chɛ 'a kuiɛ ni ka miin ma, a‑a an chee dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a. Mbɛ a‑a kuiɛ bia mɔɛ saa chɛ ɔ tisa, a ɔ, ‘N kun ti chɛ,’ a ɔ, ‘a 'a kuiɛ minan nyɔn sima ɛ i ma?’
Mbɛ mɔɛ saa ɔ, ‘Tu kadɔn chɛmɛ sɛi an mbe n ma.’ Mbɛ wai chɛ mɔɛ chɛ ɔ, ‘I 'a kuiɛ gboo yen ko,’ a ɔ, ‘si, i ni a nyɛn yɔ tu kadɔn chɛmɛ naanin an mbe i ma.’

Mbɛ a‑a mɔɛ fean bɔɛ chɛ ɔ tisa, a ɔ, ‘Kuiɛ minan nyɔn sima ɛ i ma?’ Mbɛ a ɔ, ‘Chin fen kuu busɛ wu dɔndɔ an mbe n ma kuiɛ a.’ Mbɛ wai chɛ mɔɛ chɛ ɔ, ‘I 'a kuiɛ gboo yen ko,’ a ɔ, ‘si, i ni a nyɛn yɔ busɛ chɛmɛ sɛi an mbe i ma.’

“Chɛ gbakɔ, kun ti chɛ‑a wai chɛ mɔ kafaen chɛ tando wan. A nii ma a tando ni a 'a kafaya chɛ an ko a. A na‑a a tando yiinadia chɛ an ko a, a‑a min bɔ. Dunya chɛ ɔ mɔɛ n yii na di kaka tachɛ koe a an nyɔn na, a ni ben Yataa 'a mɔɛ n ma.

“Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, n ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ wo ni wo dia nyɔɛ n yan wo 'a nyan chɛ n dɔ, wo e miin chɛ‑a nɛ dunya chɛ ɔ. Ni wo‑a chɛ ma, wo dia nyɔɛ n mbe ma‑a wan banda bu ɔ, miin mbe an boo a si‑a wo kɔɔ.
Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a danaya yian koe ɛndenɛ ɔ, ɛ danaya yian fan ko chenama wɛɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ min ma danaya yian ni koe ɛndenɛ ɔ, a ee che danaya a ko chenama wɛɛ ɔ.
Ni wo ma danaya bɔ ni dunya chɛ ɔ nyanɛ ɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee to‑a nɔ, a ni nyanɛ chɛndɛ konan wo ma.
Mbɛ a sin, ni wo ma danaya bɔ ni mɔ dɔ mende ta boo fenɛ kun ma, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee to‑a nɔ a ni dan wo a, a ni fenɛ be wo ma wo wandi ta a a.

“Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee che ma‑a wai chɛ mɔɛ a kun ti fea kɔɔ. Ni chɛ ma‑a, dɔndɔɛ ko a ee dia a ye a ni che dɔndɔɛ ɔ. Ɛ kooya be‑a wan dɔndɔɛ ma, a ni ben a bɔɛ ma. Chɛ an fɛ mu, e ee che wai chɛ‑a Yataa ye, mbɛ i‑a wai chɛ kɔpɔɛ wɛɛ ye dɔndɔ a.”
Chu mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin ni Fayisii n na, an‑na Chisɔsi da a bai chɛ n na min kɛn, an‑na an pɔsɛ a di wan a ma, a mu min na, an kɔpɔ koen ni kaka.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Mɔɛ n mu wo a, miin mbe an fandi n ma mɔ chɛndɛ n na an bɔɛ n ya kɔɔ, chɛɛ Yataa‑a wo faa n dɔ sɔn fan. Mɔ gbu n mbe fenɛ min ya fen ma kawaenɛ a, an mu fen ma nyamuienɛ a Yataa tena.

“Yataa‑a sawa miin be Mosisi ma, a basan da a bai chɛ n na, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n‑na miin nyɛn, an ni wan nɔ gbau gbau a. Mɔɛ n ni wan an kɔɔ aan Chɔn na‑a tima min na, min ni yii chɛ mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a. A ka gbɛ a tima chɛ ma, sakana bai chɛndɛ a si Yataa 'a mansaya ma, an mbe gbɛ fɔ tena mɔɛ n ye, mbɛ a sin, mɔ ɔ mɔ ɛ gbɛ butuinɛ an chɛ tena don koe a an mansaya chɛ kɔɔ.
A ɔ gbɛ dunya chɛ gbɛɛ ni ban. Sawa chɛ ɛnden bɛɛ nan gbu sin, a ka koe a a gba ɔ, a ɔ gbɛ kaka, a ni ben dunya ban koe ma.

“A yɛ to, ni mɔ kaima kan kɔ kan ban‑da a 'a musu ɔ, mbɛ a‑a musu dɔ gbɛɛ si, mɔɛ chɛ‑a waa an ma basan ka musu a, a ee fuu ɔ min na, Yataa ya a. Mɔ kaima min sin mbe musu si‑a min chɛɛ ban‑da a ɔ, a mɔ kaima chɛ wɛɛ‑a waa an ma basan ka musu a, a ee fuu ɔ min na, Yataa ya a.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Tima dɔndɔ a, nyan tɔ dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, min toen ni a ma chii koe a koa baa gbanden ba n dɔ, mbɛ a sin tee ɔ tee a, a ni buɔdia wa an dɔ.
Yɔn tɔ dɔndɔ wɛɛ ni wan nɔ, min tɔ ni Dasayɔsi. A gboo gbɛɛ ma banden fan ni tɛɛ mɛsɛ a. An ni na wan a a, nyan tɔɛ chɛ 'a chenɛ da a.
An ni chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, yɔn tɔɛ chɛ ɛ kun fan a ni daun fen pɛɛ mɛsɛ chɛ n sɔn sɔn a daun koe a a boo ɔ. A tima chɛ n na, wuu n bɛɛ ni na wan, an mbe a 'a tɛɛ chɛ n na fian fian.
“Tima che‑a wan, mbɛ yɔn tɔɛ chɛ fa‑a, mbɛ maeka n ta‑a a a, an‑na a si kai Ebeami baima, banda bu ɔ. Mbɛ chɛ gbakɔ, nyan tɔɛ chɛ wɛɛ fa‑a, mbɛ an‑na a tɔn,
chɛɛ a ta‑a ta ɔ wan, a ni kaina tɔɔya wa ɔ. Mbɛ a‑a a ya a sɛ, mbɛ a‑a Ebeami yen pɔɔ, Dasayɔsi ɛ si ɔ a baima.

Mbɛ a‑a chee chɛ, a ɔ, ‘Fa Ebeami, n mbe nɛ tɔɔya wa an dɔ ta chɛ ɔ. Chinchin n ma, i ni Dasayɔsi sɔ n tena. A ni a boo ɛndenɛ don yii ɔ, a ni na, mbɛ a‑a a puin n da ɔ, min mbe a ma, n nɛnɛnɛ ma ni chima.’

“Chɛɛ Ebeami ɔ, ‘N 'na den, i yii na chii, mbɛ tima min na i ni fɔɛ ɔ, Yataa na‑a fen chɛndɛ kan kɔ kan be wan i ma, i toen ni min na. Chɛɛ Dasayɔsi tana, a na‑a ko yawaenɛ dechee an dɔ yen. Chɛɛ sanche gbɛ, ɛ gbɛ buɔdia wa an dɔ nɛ, i sin mbe tɔɔya ɔ.
A ka chɛ gbɛɛ ma, son ba an sinden mu mmɔ tɛ mmɔ bɛ. Mɔ ee che ka‑a nɛ a ta wo tena, n mbe ee baa, mɔɛ ka koe ma wo tena, a ben koe a nɛ nn tena.’
Mbɛ nyan tɔɛ chɛ ɔ, ‘Fa Ebeami, ni koe n mbe ka wan, n mbe i disa tena, i ni Dasayɔsi a ta fa 'a chenɛ a,
a mu min na, n dɔ kaima duu n mbe nɔ. A ni ta, a ni an na si, min mbe a ma, an bɛɛ ma na na nɛ tɔɔya chɛ ɔ, n mbe ka min dɔ.’

“Mbɛ Ebeami ɔ, ‘Mosisi‑a gboo min nyɛn, ɛ wan i dɔɛ n boo ɔ, a basan gboo chɛ n na, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ tɔɛ n‑na miin nyɛn. I dɔɛ n ni an kan. Ni an‑na an kan, an ni an too ma sɔ bai chɛ n ma, miin mbe an dɔ.’
Mbɛ nyan tɔɛ chɛ ɔ, ‘Fa Ebeami, chɛ ee kun a ni a ma, an ni an too ma sɔ. Chɛɛ ni mɔɛ ɛ kun fan a ni a kɔɔ sɔ a ka saya ɔ, a ni ta an tena, a tima a mu, an mbe an kan kɔ sɔ‑a an 'na ko yama n na.’
Chɛɛ Ebeami ɔ, ‘Ni an mbe ee che an too ma sɔ‑a bai chɛ n ma gboo chɛ n dɔ, an mbe ee na‑a che‑a an ni dan a a, ni mɔɛ wɛɛ‑a a kɔɔ sɔ a ka saya ɔ.’ ”
Tee dɔndɔ a, Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ wan a fɛ denɛ n ye, a ɔ, “Koe n mbe ma‑a wan, min mbe a ma, mɔ gbu n ni dɛ ko yama ma ɔ. Chɛɛ a yau gba mɔɛ chɛ ko a, min mbe a bɔ mɔ gbu a dɛ‑a ko yama ma ɔ.
Ɛ nyan fan a mɔ bonda chɛ ko a, sen kanɛ ni chii a kan na, mbɛ an ni a a dɛ yii wa ɔ. A mɔɛ chɛ e na to a ma‑a, mɔɛ miin dan‑da ka n na sanche, an dɔndɔ wɛɛ ni dɛ ko yama ma ɔ.

Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo wo kun ma fɛn, ni wo ma‑a ko ɔ ko ma‑a. “Ni wo bɔɛ‑a ko yama ma wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ a, wo a fɔ a ye, mbɛ a‑a ko yama an ma ka. Ni a dɔn‑da a ma, mbɛ a‑a ko yama an ma ka, wo wo boo bɔ a 'a ko yama maen chɛ ɔ wo a.
Ni a sin‑na ko yama ma wo a, si tena wɔnfea wɛɛ tee ma, mbɛ ɛ wo disa tima ɔ tima a 'a ko yama chɛ ko a, wo wo boo bɔ a 'a ko yama maen chɛ n dɔ wo a.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n‑na a fɔ Mansa Chisɔsi ye, an dɔ, “Basan nn ma, nn 'na danaya Yataa a, a ma ni munda.”

Mbɛ a ɔ, “Ni danaya ɛnden bɛɛ yɔ chin fen kuu dɔma ɛndenɛ, a ni wan wo ɔ Yataa ko a, wo ni kun fan wo ni a fɔ kɔn ba chɛ ye, wo ɔ, a kuu ni bɔ, a ni ta, a ni sɔ yii ɔ. Mbɛ a ma‑a, yɔ wo‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ.
“Mmɔ a ya, mbɛ bɔi denɛ ɛ wo dɔndɔ boo ɔ. Ni a na‑a a ka i 'a fen fɛn tena, chɛ ma, ni a na‑a a ka i 'a sa kun ma fɛn tena, e ee a fɔ a ye, i ɔ, a pɛn ni daunɛ chɛ.
Chɛɛ e a fɔ‑a wan, i ɔ, a ni daun fenɛ ɔ bɛn i ye. Mbɛ a na‑a fen kɔ fen na, e min daun. Ni i ban‑da daunɛ chɛ‑a, a tima an na mu, ɛ a ta daunɛ chɛ.
Wai bɔ ee bɔi den chɛ ma, koe min na mu, ɛ nɔ wai chɛ an chɛ koe a, i toen mu a ni min chɛ.
