Wo wɛɛ, wo e ka wan. Ni wo ban‑da koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ma‑a, n mbe wo sɔ‑a min chɛ koe a, wo e a fɔ‑a wan, wo ɔ, bɔi den gbama mu wo a. Wo ɔ, wai bɔ ee wo ko a.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi bun‑da to a 'a tachɛ ma, a ta Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. A ben‑da wan Samayia chɛnyɛ a sanɛ, a basan Kadidi chɛnyɛ a.
A ni don tena gbɛ konko dɔndɔ an dɔ, mbɛ kamin tanɛ n‑na a tan, gbandi yama yama bɔen ni miin gboo gbɛɛ ma. An sɔ‑a wan pɔɔ,
mbɛ an‑na yee tɛ, an dɔ, “Chisɔsi, kan mɔ, i dimu, chinchin nn ma.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a an yen, mbɛ a ɔ, “Wo ta, mɔɛ chɛ n tena, miin mbe mmɔ tɛ Yataa a, an ni wo ma fɛn, ni wo baunden fan mu.” An to‑a ta an na mɔɛ chɛ n gbu tena, mbɛ an baun‑da chia a.
An dɔndɔ‑a a ɔ yen kɛn, mbɛ a baun‑da, a yɛ‑a wan Chisɔsi tena, ɛ ta‑a Yataa tando‑a, a kuiɛ ma sɛenɛ a.
Mbɛ a‑a a wandi ɔ fuin fan duu ma fugbu Chisɔsi chen kɔɔ, mbɛ a‑a a wai bɔ ka. Samayia mɔɛ ni an kamin chɛ a.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N‑na an mɔ tanɛ n gbɛɛ baun fan. Mɔ kɔnɔntɔɛ chɛ nɛnɛ nu, an ma an ya wɛɛ a yɛ ni to.
Chɛɛ sonda chɛ dɔndɔ gbe an yɛ‑a, Yataa wai bɔ koe a.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ a ye, a ɔ, “I kɔɔ sɔ, i ni ta, i 'a danaya‑a i baun.”

Mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu miin ni Fayisii n na, an‑na Chisɔsi ɔ tisa, an dɔ, tima minan na mu, Yataa ɛ a 'a mansaya ɔ yian‑da. Mbɛ a ɔ, “Tima min na Yataa ɛ a 'a mansaya ɔ yian‑da, koe n fan mbe ee ma‑a, miin mbe a ɔ yian‑da, mbɛ tima gbu an che‑a ka Yataa 'a mansaya ɔ yian koe a.
Mɔ ɔ mɔ ee a fɔ‑a, a ɔ, ‘I ya a na nɛ, a yen ko nɛ.’ Mɔ ɔ mɔ ee a fɔ‑a, a ɔ, ‘A yen ko pan.’ A mu min na, Yataa 'a mansaya ɔ yianden fan mu gbɛ wo nan tɛ.”
Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ a fɛ denɛ n ye, a ɔ, “Tima ɛ che‑a wan, tima min na mu, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe ee na‑a ma‑a wo tɛ ɔ. A tima chɛ a, wo e na‑a to‑a wan n ni ma wo tɛ ɔ tee dɔndɔ gbe wɛɛ ko a.
Mɔɛ dɔ n mbe a fɔ‑a wan wo ye, an dɔ, ‘Wo wo ya a ta pan, wo ni Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ yen.’ Dɔ n sin dɔ, ‘A yen ko nɛ.’ Chɛɛ wo ma bea an mɔɛ chɛ n fɛ ta koe a an kaina chɛ nu.
A mu min na, ni banda bea‑a kan kɔ kan, mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a ɔ yen fan, ni fen ko ma‑a ka. A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a mu, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe na‑a tima min na, mɔ ɔ mɔ ɛ a ɔ yen‑da wan.
Chɛɛ chɛ e na to ma‑a, n mbe tɔɔ‑a wan kaka, mbɛ mɔ bonda chɛ siman‑na an kan kɔ sɔ n na.
Tima min na, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe yɛ‑a dunya chɛ ɔ to, koe n mbe ma‑a ka wan, yɔ an ni buɛ min dɔ Nowa 'a tima a.

Mɔɛ n ni wan ko ɔ ko ma‑a Nowa 'a tima a, mɔ gbu ɛ ko ɔ ko kan kɔ kan min ma. Mɔɛ n ni daun fenɛ n daun fan, a yɛ to, an mbe an min. Mɔɛ n ni musu fuu wan, musu n sin ni be wan kai ma. Chɛ an ni a a, yii nii ma dunya ya ni tima min na, mbɛ Nowa sɛ‑a dɛndɛ wa dɛgbɛ ɔ. Mbɛ yii‑a an 'na dunya gbu gbɛɛ ya, mbɛ a‑a an gbɛɛ ban.

Koe n mbe ma‑a ka wan, yɔ an ni buɛ min dɔ Dɔti ta tima wɛɛ a. Mɔɛ n ni daun fenɛ n daun fan, a yɛ to, an mbe an min. An ni fee fenɛ n san fan, an mbe ta‑a an ma tachɛ‑a. An ni chin fenɛ n chin fan, mbɛ an‑na chenɛ n sɔ.

Chɛɛ tee min ma Dɔti bɔ‑a Sɔdɔn duu ɔ, Yataa‑a a ma wan ta yii‑a a ka banda a, a basan senɛ n na, miin ni gbandi yɔ ta. An yii‑a wan a ka banda a, yɔ sona ɛ chɛ buɛ min dɔ, mbɛ an‑na mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ fa nɔ an duu chɛ ɔ.
Ɛ ma‑a ka wan to an tee chɛ ma, tee min ma, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe n 'na gbasaya ɔ yian‑da.

“A tee chɛ a, mɔɛ min mbe ma‑a a 'a chenɛ baa ma, a ma na to a don koe a chenɛ a, a boo fenɛ n ya koe a. A tima dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a to, mɔɛ min mbe ma‑a a 'a sɛnɛ ɔ, a wɛɛ ma yɛ to duu ɔ ta koe a a 'a chenɛ a.
Wo wo yii na chii, koe min si‑a Dɔti 'a musu a.
Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a wandi fɔɛ ma sansa, an mɔɛ chɛ ee kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da. Chɛɛ mɔɛ min mbe a yii bɔ‑a a fɔɛ ɔ, an mɔɛ chɛ ɛ kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da wan.
N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ a tima chɛ a, mɔ fea n mbe ma‑a wan sa ɔ chinɔɛ ɔ sofa dɔndɔɛ ma yɛɛ ma, mbɛ dɔndɔɛ ya‑a, mbɛ dɔndɔɛ sin to‑a nɔ.
Musu fea n mbe ma‑a wan tu chɛ‑a mun dɔndɔɛ ɔ, mbɛ dɔndɔɛ ya‑a, mbɛ dɔndɔɛ wɛɛ to‑a nɔ.”
Mbɛ a fɛ denɛ n dɔ, “Fa, koe chɛ n mbe ma‑a mende?” Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ni wo ee doa n yen fen su a tindanɛ, mbɛ wo ee an kaina chɛ sɔn‑da.”
Tee dɔndɔ a, Chisɔsi‑a tai tɛ wan a fɛ denɛ n tena. Tai chɛ‑a a ɔ yian fan an na, mbɛ a nyin fan an ni samunɛ ma ti bia tima ɔ tima ko a. A yɛ to, an gboo ɔ ma fa samun chɛ a.
Mbɛ a ɔ, “Chiti tɛ mɔ dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ duu dɔndɔ ɔ, min nii ma chian ni Yataa ma ɛnden bɛɛ a. A yɛ to, a nii ma baa sɔn a fian mɔ gbu kan kɔ kan ma.

An duu dɔndɔ gbe chɛ ɔ, fuinya musu dɔndɔ wɛɛ ni wan nɔ. A na‑a mɔɛ ma siibia wan an chiti tɛ mɔɛ chɛ a. Chɛ ko a, a ni na wan chiti tɛ mɔɛ chɛ tena tima ɔ tima a, a ɔ, a ni kaa a tɛ an tɛ an fea a koɔ nyɔɛ a.
Tima ɔ yansama ko a, chiti tɛ mɔɛ chɛ ma dɔn ni, a ni bai chɛ sa. Chɛɛ a danka a, a‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, ‘N mbe ee chian Yataa ma, n sin ma baa be ni n fian mɔ gbu wɛɛ ma.
Chɛɛ fɔ ni n‑na fuinya musu chɛ 'a tea be a ma. A‑a n na mankan gbɛ kaka. Ni n ma kaa a tɛ ni a 'a bai chɛ ma, n mbe ee na‑a fɔɛ‑a a boo ɔ.’ ”
Mbɛ Mansa Chisɔsi ɔ te gbɛ, “Wo‑a a a min, chiti yama 'a tɛ mɔɛ chɛ‑a bai min fɔ.
Ni ɛ chɛ ma wan, mbɛ Yataa ɛ tea be‑a wan a 'a mɔɛ n ma, miin mbe di chɛ‑a a tena su ɔ tee a. A ee wo sa‑a tima ma, tee ɔ tee a.

N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ ɛ a a gbandia‑a wan, a ni tea be an ma. N fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe yɛ‑a wan to dunya chɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ a tima chɛ a, n mbe na‑a mɔɛ n tan‑da wan to, miin kai faenɛ ɛ ma‑a n na?”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a tai chɛ tɛ chɛ n tena, miin yii na tɛen ni an 'na ko chɛndɛ ma an na, min‑na a ma, an‑na an yii na chii, mbɛ an fisa mɔ ɔ mɔ ma Yataa tena.
A ɔ, “Tima dɔndɔ a, kamin fea n ta‑a wan Yataa 'a kata ɔ samun chɛ tena. Dɔndɔɛ ni Fayisii an na, mbɛ dɔndɔɛ sin ni pawa kain mɔɛ an na.

“Fayisii chɛ ka‑a wan mɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ n baima, mbɛ a ta‑a a sɔ‑a a dɔndɔ gbe a, mbɛ a‑a a kuu sɔ samunɛ chɛ‑a. A ɔ, ‘Yataa, en wai, n ta n mbe ee ka yɔ mɔ dɔ gbɛɛ nu. N ta, n ma bɛnchɛ, n sin ma kafa tɔ a. A yɛ to, n mbe ee waa ma basan musu a, n ma miin fuu ni. Mɔɛ dɔ n mbe ka wan, chɛɛ n ta, n mbe ee ka. En wai, a mu min na, n mbe ee ka yɔ pawa kain mɔɛ chɛ wɛɛ pande sɔ ɔ.
Wichi kan kɔ kan dɔ, n mbe sunɛ bia tee fea, i fai koe a. N mbe n boo fenɛ n du wan si tena tanɛ a, mbɛ n‑na a si tena dɔndɔɛ be i ma.’
“Chɛɛ pawa kain mɔɛ chɛ sɔ‑a wan pɔɔ, a 'a ko yama maenɛ koa‑a a ma, a‑a a kunɛ a bun gbudu. Mbɛ a‑a a boo bun a kaa ɔ, a ɔ, ‘Yataa, chinchin n ma. Ko yama ma mɔɛ mu n na.’ ”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ te gbɛ, “N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ pawa kain mɔɛ chɛ e na to yɛ‑a a 'a chenɛ a, Yataa na‑a a ya wan mɔɛ a, min tanden ni a tena. Chɛɛ Yataa ma Fayisii chɛ ya ni mɔɛ a, min tanden ni a tena. Koe min na mu, ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a wandi a sɛ, Yataa ɛ a mɔɛ chɛ a yii‑a wan. Chɛɛ ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a wandi a yii, Yataa ɛ a mɔɛ chɛ a sɛ‑a wan.”
Mbɛ mɔɛ dɔ n na‑a wan an 'na den toa n bɛɛ a, an dɔ, Chisɔsi ni a boo bun an ma, mbɛ a‑a an dua. A fɛ den chɛ n‑na chɛ ɔ yen kɛn, an‑na mɔɛ chɛ n na gban fan.

Chɛɛ Chisɔsi na‑a a ma wan, an na‑a den chɛ n na a tena, mbɛ a ɔ, “Wo a ma den mɛsɛ n ni na n tena. Wo ma an ma bai. Koe min na mu, mɔɛ miin maen mu yɔ den mɛsɛ chɛ nu, Yataa an mbe ma‑a an 'na mansa a.
N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ma dɔn ni, a ni don Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ yɔ den mɛsɛ chɛ nu, an mɔɛ chɛ ee ma‑a Yataa ta mɔɛ a.”
Chu kun ti dɔndɔ na‑a wan Chisɔsi tena, mbɛ a ɔ, “Ticha, i wɛn mu mɔ chɛndɛ a, n mbe fen ma, n ni kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn?”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “E ma ka ma, i ni n chee mɔ chɛndɛ a? Mɔ ɔ mɔ ma mɔ chɛndɛ a, mɔɔ dechee Yataa dɔndɔ gbe.

I‑a sawa n sɔn fan, Yataa‑a miin be Mosisi ma. A ɔ, wo ma waa ma basan mɔɛ a, wo ee fuu ɔ min na, a ɔ, wo ma mɔ fa, ni sawa ma min fɔ ni, a ɔ, wo ma kanka chɛ, a ɔ, wo ma fania fɔ mɔ ɔ mɔ ma, a ɔ, wo ni kooya be wo fa ma, a basan wo de a.”
Mbɛ kamin chɛ ɔ, “N mbe wan sawa chɛ n gbɛɛ bia tena, aan a ka n den mɛsɛ tɔɛ ma a sɔ sanche ma.”

Chisɔsi‑a chɛ a min kɛn, mbɛ a ɔ, “Ko dɔndɔ gbe an to‑a, e min ma gbɛ. I boo fenɛ n gbɛɛ ma tachɛ. Mbɛ i‑a a kɔpɔɛ chɛ ya, i‑a a be yɔn tɔɛ n ma. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, i ni nyanɛ ma sɔn banda bu ɔ. Ni i‑a chɛ ma, mbɛ i na‑a i ma‑a n fɛ denɛ a.”
Chɛɛ kɛn kamin chɛ‑a bai chɛ a min, a faa yɔn‑da wan a ɔ benden ba a. Koe min na mu, nyan tɔ wa ni a a.
Chisɔsi‑a a ɔ yen kɛn, mbɛ bai chɛ‑a kamin chɛ faa yɔn kaka, mbɛ a ɔ, “A ɔ gbɛ nyan tɔɛ ni don Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ.
A ɔ gbɛ kaka nyan tɔɛ ko a, a ni don Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ, a ni ben ninchi don koe ma miichi woe a.”
Mɔɛ miin‑na bai chɛ a min, an dɔ, “Mbɛ nyɔn mbe bauncha chɛ ma sɔn‑da gbɛ?”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Mɔ gbu ee che koe min ma‑a, Yataa ɛ an ma.”
Mbɛ Pita ɔ, “A yen ko, nn‑na nn kan kɔ sɔ fen kɔ fen na, mbɛ nn bea‑a i fɛ.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Chenɛ, musu, suun ma nyɔɛ nu, mɔ woo mɔɛ nu, a basan denɛ n na, an nyin fan. Chɛɛ n ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ mɔɛ min mbe an dɔndɔ wɛɛ to‑a, Yataa 'a mansaya a ta koe a ya ɔ ma,
Yataa ɛ a kɔ‑a wan dunya chɛ ɔ gba sɛsɛ ko a, an fen chɛ a, min ni a boo ɔ a kɔ ma a. A yɛ to, Yataa ɛ kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ be‑a wan a ma dunya nama ɔ, min mbe na tena.”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɛ den tan kun ma fea chɛ n bɔ mɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ n tɛ ɔ, miin na‑a bea ka a fɛ. Mbɛ an dechee ma tɛenɛ to‑a, mbɛ a ɔ, “Mmɔ yen ko ta‑a gbɛ Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. Nɔ mu ko ɔ ko ɛ na tena bɔ‑a a a, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n na‑a min nyɛn suun, a si n ma, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ.
An mbe n be‑a wan mɔɛ chɛ n ma, Chu mɔ ma miin na. An mɔɛ chɛ n mbe na‑a n ma yɛn‑da wan, an ni n main, mbɛ an‑na an da yii chɛ n ma.
An mbe n gbasi‑a wan faa a, mbɛ an‑na n fa. Chɛɛ tee fea, a sawan bɔɛ, n mbe n kɔɔ sɔ‑a wan a ka saya ɔ.”
Chɛɛ a fɛ den chɛ n nii ma ko ɔ ko ɔ gbɛ ni, a si a 'a bai chɛ ma, koe min na mu, a fasai buɛ ɔ nunden fan ni an ma.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi gbɛn‑da Chɛiko duu baima. A tima chɛ a ni, a‑a ya te tɔ dɔndɔ tan si ɔ chia tɔnfɛ, ɛ fen fuinɛ a.
Ya te tɔɛ chɛ, a‑a fanka fanka chɛ sɔnkɔ chɛ kuiɛ a min, mbɛ a‑a tisa chɛ, ni fen mbe ka ma‑a.
Mbɛ mɔɛ n‑na a fɔ a ye, an dɔ, “Chisɔsi, an mbe ka ben tena, min ka‑a Nasaɛti duu ɔ.”
Mbɛ a‑a yee tɛ gbankon, a ɔ, “Chisɔsi, i wɛn bɔ‑a Mansa Defidi 'a dambi ɔ, chinchin n ma.”
Mbɛ mɔɛ miin ni ka sɔ ɔ ya ɔ, an sɔnkɔ‑a a ma, an dɔ, a ni a da a tɔn. Chɛɛ a tima gbu a ni gbɛ, a‑a yee tɛ a ben a kɔma ma, a ɔ, “I wɛn bɔ‑a Mansa Defidi 'a dambi ɔ, chinchin n ma.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi sɔ‑a, mbɛ a‑a a ma, an na‑a ya te tɔɛ chɛ a a tena. A che‑a kɛn a baima, mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ,
“I toen mu n ni fen ko chɛ i ye?” Mbɛ a ɔ, “Fa, a ma n ya a ni ka.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “I 'a danaya‑a i baun. Kaina yen gbadan.”
A ya kɔɔɛ a, kamin chɛ ya a ka‑a, mbɛ a‑a kaina yen gbadan. Mbɛ a‑a a sɔ Chisɔsi fɛ, ɛ ta‑a Yataa tando‑a. Mɔ fanka fanka chɛ‑a koe chɛ ɔ yen kɛn, an gbɛɛ‑a tando be wan Yataa ma.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi don‑da Chɛiko duu ɔ, ɛ ben‑da, ɛ ta‑a Chuusaɛn duu ɔ.
Yatina, pawa kain mɔɛ n ya ɔ sɔɛ ni wan nɔ Chɛiko, min tɔ ni Sakayɔsi. Nyan tɔ wa ni a a.
A toen ni a ni mɔɛ chɛ gbu yen, an ni min chee Chisɔsi. Chɛɛ a ni wuu, a nii che Chisɔsi yen‑da, koe min na mu, fanka da a ni koo.
Chɛ fɛ, a ta‑a wan bui a fanka chɛ ya ɔ, mbɛ a sɛ‑a kɔnɛ ɔ, ɛ to kaina a ni Chisɔsi yen ben‑da. An ni kɔn chɛ chee, an dɔ, sikamɔ kɔnɛ.
Chisɔsi che‑a kɛn an kaina chɛ, a‑a a ya a sɛ wan kɔn chɛ ɔ, mbɛ a‑a Sakayɔsi yen. Mbɛ a ɔ, “Sakayɔsi, a a gbandia, i ni puin, a mu min na, n mbe bi i wan 'na sondaya a.”
Sakayɔsi‑a a a gbandia wan, mbɛ a puin‑da kɔn chɛ ɔ. A ta‑a wan Chisɔsi a a 'a chenɛ a, a bu ɔ diaen ba ɛ.
Mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ‑a koe chɛ ɔ yen ka, an bun‑da gbonyɛ‑a, an dɔ, “A yen bɛ, ɛ ta‑a kamin chɛ 'a sondaya a, min mbe ee sɔ ɔ Yataa 'a chia ma.”

Chɛɛ Sakayɔsi sɔ‑a wan Mansa Chisɔsi ya kɔɔ, mbɛ a ɔ, “Fa, n yen ko, n boo fenɛ gbɛɛ, n mbe a du‑a wan si tena fea a, mbɛ n‑na a kaka dɔndɔɛ be yɔn tɔɛ n ma. A sin, ni n‑na mɔ ɔ mɔ kafa fen kɔ fen na, n mbe a a yɛ‑a wan a ma, si tena naanin dɔ.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ a ye, a ɔ, “A ka bi ma, i 'a chenɛ‑a bauncha ma sɔn. A mu min na, i dan‑da gbɛ Yataa a, yɔ Ebeami danden ni a a buɛ min dɔ.
N fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n naen mu dunya chɛ ɔ mɔɛ n fan yan koe a, miin toen mu a ɔ Yataa ma, n ni an kun ka.”

Mɔɛ n‑na an too ma sɔ wan Chisɔsi da a bai chɛ n ma. A to‑a wan koɔ‑a an tena, mbɛ a‑a tai tɛ an ye. Koe min na mu, Chuusaɛn duu ɔ nii ma yansan to. A sin, a ni wan mɔɛ chɛ n yii ma, mbɛ Yataa ni ka gbɛ na‑a na a 'a mansaya ɔ yian‑da.
Chɛ‑a a ma wan, a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “Mansa den dɔndɔ bɔ‑a wan a 'a chɛnyɛ ɔ, mbɛ a ta‑a gboo mansa chɛnyɛ dɔ mende ɔ pɔɔ. A toen ni kun ti wa min ni nɔ, a ni a si mansa a, mbɛ a yɛ‑a a waa a.

A e na to ta‑a, a‑a a 'a bɔi den tanɛ n chee wan, mbɛ a‑a sanu gbɛnsɛn tanɛ du an ma dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a, a ɔ, ‘Wo a ɔ yen, wo e fen nyɔn na sɛ‑a kɔpɔɛ chɛ kun ma, n‑na miin be ka wo ma, n mbe na ka tachɛ chɛ ɔ.’

Chɛɛ a 'a chɛnyɛ ɔ mɔɛ n nii ma to ni a a. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, kɛn a‑a chia bia ta koe a, an‑na mɔɛ n sɔ wan a san‑da chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ. An dɔ, an ni a fɔ kun ti wa chɛ ye, mbɛ an ma to ni mansa den chɛ a, a ni ma an 'na mansa a.

“Chɛ gbɛɛ ma‑a wɛɛ, an‑na kamin chɛ ma wan mansa a, mbɛ a yɛ‑a a waa a. A ya kɔɔɛ a, a‑a a ma wan, an‑na a 'a bɔi den tanɛ chɛ n chee a chen kɔɔ. A toen ni a ni a ɔ sɔn, ni bɔi den chɛ n‑na fen nyɔn ma sɔn dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a.
Bɔi denɛ saa na‑a wan, mbɛ a ɔ, ‘Fa, i 'a sanu gbɛnsɛn dɔndɔɛ chɛ, i‑a min be n ma, n‑na sanu gbɛnsɛn tan fan na sɛ a kun ma.’
Mbɛ mansa chɛ ɔ, ‘En wai, en wai, wai chɛ mɔ chɛndɛ mu i a. I‑a danaya min bɔ ka fen denɛ kun ma, n mbe i ma‑a wan ya ɔ sɔɛ a, duu tan kun ma.’
Mbɛ bɔi denɛ fean bɔɛ chɛ wɛɛ na‑a, a ɔ, ‘Fa, i 'a sanu gbɛnsɛn dɔndɔɛ chɛ, i‑a min be n ma, n‑na sanu gbɛnsɛn duu an na sɛ a kun ma.’
Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ chɛ wɛɛ ye, a ɔ, ‘N mbe i ma‑a wan ya ɔ sɔɛ a, duu kun duu kun ma.’
“Mbɛ bɔi denɛ dɔ mende na‑a, a ɔ, ‘Fa, i 'a sanu gbɛnsɛn dɔndɔɛ chɛ yen ko, i na‑a min be n ma. N‑na a a chii wan pɔchitanɛ ɔ, mbɛ n‑na a sa tena ɔ bɛn.
N chian‑da wan i ma, a mu min na, i faa a kɔɔen ba mu. E mɔɛ n kuu kɔ gba an ma i ta a, a yɛ to, i ta ma chin fenɛ min na, e an ya.’

Mansa chɛ ɔ, ‘I wan, wai chɛ mɔ yama mu i a. I wandi gbu da a kuiɛ chɛ, n mbe an ya‑a, mbɛ n‑na chiti tɛ i wakoe ma. I‑a a fɔ, i ɔ, i na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ n faa a kɔɔen ba mu, mbɛ n mbe mɔɛ n kuu kɔ gba an ma n ta a, mbɛ n mbe ee chin fenɛ min chin, n mbe an ya.
Ni i na‑a chɛ ɔ sɔn fan a si n ma, fen‑na a ma, i ma n 'na kɔpɔɛ sa ni banchi ma? N ni n na‑a yɛ tima min na, n ni chini sima tan‑da wan a kun ma.’
“Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ mɔɛ chɛ n ye, miin ni ka a 'a tindanɛ, a ɔ, ‘Wo sanu gbɛnsɛn dɔndɔɛ chɛ wɛɛ bia a boo ɔ, mbɛ wo‑a a be bɔi den chɛ ma, sanu gbɛnsɛn tan chɛ ɛ ka min boo ɔ.’
Chɛɛ an dɔ, ‘Fa, sanu gbɛnsɛn tanɛ ɛ gbɛ a boo ɔ.’
Mbɛ mansa chɛ ɔ, ‘N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ mɔɛ min mbe a 'a wai ma ti bia chɛndɛ chɛ, ɛ wai ma munda sɔn fan. Chɛɛ mɔɛ min mbe ee a 'a wai ɛnden chɛ ma ti bia, ɛ fo‑a wan an wai ɛnden chɛ wɛɛ a.
Mbɛ a si n chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ chɛ n sin ma, miin nii ma to ni, n ni ma an 'na mansa a, wo na an na nɛ, mbɛ wo‑a an fa n ya kɔɔɛ ma.’ ”
Chisɔsi ban‑da kɛn tai chɛ tɛ‑a mɔɛ chɛ n tena, a sɔ‑a wan a fɛ den chɛ n ya ɔ, a sɛ Chuusaɛn duu ɔ.
Mbɛ an che‑a Bɛfachi konko baima, a basan Bɛtani a. Konko chɛ n ni kɔnkɔɛ chɛ an kaa a, min tɔ ni Wodifi kɔnkɔɛ. Nɔ ni, mbɛ a‑a a fɛ den fea n na ta a ya ɔ.
A ɔ, “Wo ta konko chɛ ɔ wo ya ɔ. Ni wo che‑a nɔ, wo e sofɛ tɔngbɔɛ tan‑da wan, mɔ ɔ mɔ ma si nin bɛ min kɔ, a chiienɛ ɛ. Wo a fuin, mbɛ wo na‑a a a nɛ n tena.
Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a wo ɔ tisa, fen mu wo e a fuin‑da, wo a fɔ a mɔɛ chɛ ye, wo ɔ, mansa an mbe a ma gbɔsɔɛ bɔ tena a a.”
Mbɛ an‑na chia bia, mbɛ an ta‑a, an‑na a tan, yɔ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ an ye.
An to‑a sofɛ tɔngbɔɛ chɛ fuin tena wan, mbɛ a ti n‑na an dɔ tisa, an dɔ, “Fen mu, wo e sofɛ chɛ fuin tena?”
An bɛɛ, an dɔ, “Mmɔ 'a mansa an mbe a ma gbɔsɔɛ bɔ tena a a.”

Mbɛ an na‑a sofɛ tɔngbɔɛ chɛ a a tena. Mbɛ an‑na an 'na doma kai n bɔ wan, mbɛ an‑na an dɔ sa sa sofɛ tɔngbɔɛ chɛ kun ma, Chisɔsi si koe a a ma. Chɛ maenɛ gbakɔ, an basan‑da wan a ma a sɛ koe a sofɛ chɛ gbu kɔ.
A ni kɛn sofɛ chɛ kɔ ɛ ta‑a, mɔɛ n‑na an 'na doma kai n dɔ fuin fan chia a.

Ɛ gbɛ gbɛn‑da Chuusaɛn baima, chia kunɛ a yiienɛ ni kaina min ɛnden na, Wodifi kɔnkɔɛ kaa a, a fɛ den fanka fanka chɛ nu, an‑na a kuu sɔ wan Yataa tando‑a, an kuiɛ ma sɛenɛ a. An bu ɔ ni di kaka kamaya koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ko a, an‑na miin dɔ yen.
An dɔ, “Mansa Yataa ni mansa chɛ dua, min na‑a a tɔɛ ɔ. Mɔɛ n ni ma kuiɛ dɔndɔɛ ɔ Yataa a, a sin tando ni ma Yataa ma.”
Mbɛ Chu mɔɛ chɛ dɔ nu fanka chɛ ɔ, miin ni Fayisii n na, an dɔ, “Ticha, a fɔ i fɛ denɛ n ye, an ni sɛmbɛ bai bonda chɛ sima fɔ‑a.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ ni an‑na an ma maun bɛɛ, sen chɛ n bɛɛ, an mbe a kuu sɔ‑a wan yee tɛ‑a.”
Chisɔsi gbɛn‑da kɛn gbɛ gbɛdɛn Chuusaɛn duu baima, mbɛ a‑a nɔ yen, mbɛ a puyɛ‑a di a a ko a.
Mbɛ a ɔ, “A ni nyan‑da wan wo ko a, ni wo wan Chuusaɛn mɔɛ nu, wo na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan bi, wo e min ma, wo ni ma kuiɛ dɔndɔɛ ɔ Yataa a. Chɛɛ sanche chɛ ɔ, a ɔ nunden fan mu wo ma.
Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, tima ɛ che‑a wan, wo chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ n ni wo a tindan. An mbe gbuu tɛ‑a wan wo ma, mbɛ an‑na wo a bɛn piɔ. Wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ kun mbe ee che‑a bɔ‑a a ɔ.

An mbe wo 'a duu chɛ te‑a wan gbɔkɔɔ, mbɛ an‑na wo wandi sa a kun ma. Wo 'a chen kan kɔ kan mbe ee to‑a sɔ ɔ. Wo 'a chenɛ n sɔ sen kan kɔ kan mbe ee to‑a sa ɔ a nyɔn kundu a. Chɛ n mbe ma‑a koe min na, wo nii ma a ɔ sɔn ni, mbɛ tima an nii nɛ, tima min na Yataa na‑a na wo baun koe a.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi don‑da Yataa 'a kata ɔ, nɔ Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. Mbɛ a‑a mɔɛ n tan nɔ fee fen ma tachɛ‑a, mbɛ a bun‑da an gbain‑da.
A ɔ, “A nyɛnden fan mu Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ Yataa‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, a 'a chenɛ ɛ samun chɛ koe an na. Chɛɛ wo‑a a 'a chen chɛ mun gbɛ kanka n nun tena an na.”

Tee ɔ tee a gbɛ, Chisɔsi ni kanɛ chɛ wan Yataa 'a kata chɛ ɔ. Mɔɛ miin ni Chu n tɛ ɔ Yataa a, an 'na mansa nu, an toen ni an ni Chisɔsi fa. An bɛ Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ n na, a basan ya ɔ sɔɛ gbakoo n na, an yiima ni dɔndɔ.
Chɛɛ an nii ma chia kan kɔ kan sɔn ni a ma koe a, a mu min na, mɔɛ n gbɛɛ na‑a an too be wan Chisɔsi ma a tima chɛ a. An nii ma to ni a da a bai dɔndɔ wɛɛ ni fo an too a.

Tee dɔndɔ a, Chisɔsi ni wan mɔɛ n kan‑da Yataa 'a kata ɔ, ɛ ta‑a Yataa 'a sakana bai chɛndɛ ɔ yian‑da an na. Mbɛ mɔɛ miin ni Chu n tɛ ɔ Yataa a, an 'na mansa nu, an na‑a a tena, an bɛ Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ n na, a basan Chu gbakoo n na.
Mbɛ an dɔ, “E koe miin ma ka, gbasaya minan mbe i boo ɔ, an ma koe a? An gbasaya chɛ sin, nyɔn‑na a be i ma?”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ka wɛ, n mbe wo ɔ tisa, tisa dɔndɔ gbe a. Wo chɛ fɔ n ye.
Chɔn ni yii chɛ wan mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a. Yataa an fea mɔ gbu a, minan na‑a an gbasaya chɛ be a ma?”
Mbɛ an‑na a kuu sɔ a tɛnsɛ‑a an nyɔn tɛ ɔ, an dɔ te, “Mmɔ ɛ fen fɔ kamin chɛ ye? Ni mmɔ‑a a fɔ, mbɛ Chɔn 'na gbasaya ka‑a Yataa an tena, ɛ a fɔ‑a wan, mbɛ fen na‑a a ma, mmɔ nii ma dan ni Chɔn na.

Chɛɛ ni mmɔ sin‑na a fɔ to, mbɛ Chɔn 'na gbasaya ka‑a mɔ gbu an na, mɔ fanka fanka min mbe ka nɛ, an mbe mmɔ bon‑da wan. A mu min na, an gbɛɛ danden fan mu a a, mbɛ Chɔn ni Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ an na.”
Chɛ ko a, an‑na a fɔ wan Chisɔsi ye, an dɔ, “Nn ma a ɔ sɔn, ni Chɔn na‑a a 'a gbasaya chɛ ma sɔn kaina.”
Mbɛ a wɛɛ ɔ, “N bɛɛ n mbe ee a ɔ yian wo a, ni nyɔn 'na gbasaya ɔ mu, n mbe koe chɛ n ma tena.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a tai chɛ tɛ gbɛ mɔɛ n gbɛɛ tena, a ɔ, “Kaminɛ ni wan nɔ, min‑na yadi sa, mbɛ a‑a mɔɛ n ya a kun ma fɛn koe a. Mbɛ a bɔ‑a wan a waa a, mbɛ a ta‑a tachɛ ɔ tima ɔ yansama ko a.

Chin fen chɛ kai tima che‑a kɛn, yadi ti chɛ‑a a 'a bɔi denɛ dɔndɔ a ta wan yadi kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ n tena. A toen ni an ni a ta chin fenɛ be a ma, mbɛ a na‑a a a a ye. Chɛɛ yadi kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ n‑na bɔi denɛ chɛ a boan fan, mbɛ an‑na a a yɛ a boo a senɛ a.
Mbɛ yadi ti chɛ‑a a 'a bɔi denɛ dɔ mende a ta wan to a fean bɔɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ yadi kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ n‑na a wɛɛ a boan fan to, mbɛ an‑na mauma koe n gbɛɛ sɛ a ma, mbɛ an‑na a wɛɛ a yɛ a boo a senɛ a.
Mbɛ a to‑a wan to nɔ, mbɛ a‑a a 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ dɔ mende a ta to, a si tena sawan bɔɛ ɔ. Yadi kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ n‑na a wɛɛ ma gba gba wan, mbɛ an‑na a a nyɔndɔn a bɔ yadi gbu ɔ.
An‑na chɛ gbɛɛ ma kɛn, yadi ti chɛ‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, ‘N mbe fen ma gbɛ? Ka wɛ, n mbe n faa ma denɛ gbu a ta mɔɛ chɛ n tena. N danden mu a a, an mbe baa be‑a wan a nan ma.’
Chɛɛ yadi kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ n‑na a 'a den chɛ yen kɛn na‑a, an dɔ, ‘Yadi ti chɛ 'a denɛ wandi gbu an nɛ. Mmɔ a fa, min mbe a ma, boo fen chɛ gbɛɛ ni ma mmɔ ta a.’
Mbɛ an bɔ‑a a a yadi gbu ɔ, mbɛ an‑na a fa.” Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo ta yiima ɔ, yadi ti chɛ ɛ fen ma‑a yadi kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ n na?
Ɛ na‑a wan, mbɛ a‑a mɔɛ chɛ n fa, mbɛ a‑a yadi chɛ be a kun ma fɛn mɔ dɔ mende n ma.” Mɔɛ chɛ n‑na bai chɛ a min kɛn, an dɔ, “Gbuama sɛkɔ.”

Chɛɛ Chisɔsi‑a mɔɛ chɛ n ma fɛn fan, mbɛ a ɔ, “Ni wo‑a a fɔ, wo ɔ, gbuama bai an nɛ, mbɛ fen mu a nyɛndenɛ ɛ Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ ‘Chen sɔ mɔɛ n na‑a ban senɛ min dɔ, an dɔ, a ma nyin, an gbu ma‑a gbɛ senɛ kuu ba wandi a, chenɛ gbu ko a.’
Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ kan kɔ kan bea‑a an sen chɛ ma, ɛ a ma kai‑a wan. A sin to, ni sen chɛ sin bea‑a mɔ ɔ mɔ ma, ɛ a mɔɛ chɛ ɔ funku funku‑a wan.”

A tima chɛ a, Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ chɛ nu, an bɛ Chu n tɛ ɔ mɔɛ n na Yataa a, an 'na mansa n na, an na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ Chisɔsi ni tai chɛ tɛ tena a si an fan ma. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, an toen ni, an ni a bia nɔ a gba chɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ an chian‑da wan mɔɛ n ma.

An nii ma chinɔ ni a a tɛ koe a, a basan chia yanɛ a, min mbe a ma, an ni a bia. Chɛ ko a, an‑na mɔɛ n na dɛ wan a ma, a ɔ tisa koe a yiima yiima tisa n na. An toen ni, a da a bai ni a wandi ma tachɛ an ma. Mbɛ an‑na a be chɛnyɛ kun ma kɔfana ma, chɛnyɛ sawa a tachɛ koe a.
Mbɛ sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n na‑a, an dɔ, “Ticha, nn‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ e bai miin gbɛɛ fɔ, tea mu. Nn‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ ee i boo don mɔ gbu n tɛ ɔ, chɛɛ e mɔɛ n kan Yataa 'a bai miin gbɛɛ a, tea mu a a.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, a yen ko, mmɔ ɛ pawa chɛ tima ɔ tima Domi kun ti wa tena. I‑a pawa chɛ be koe yen ka ma, a nyin fan?”
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi na‑a an 'na yaa kɔɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ a wɛɛ‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ,
“Wo kain gbɛnsɛn dɔndɔ yian bɛ n na. Nyɔn ya kɔɔɛ ɛ ka a ma, a basan a tɔɛ a?” Mbɛ an dɔ, “Domi kun ti wa an nɛ.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Mbɛ fen chɛ nu, miin mu Domi kun ti wa boo fenɛ a, wo an be a ma. Mbɛ wo yɛ‑a, fen chɛ nu, miin mbe Yataa ko a, wo‑a an be Yataa ma.”
An tɛnɛ‑a wan a a, a‑a tisa n yɛman buɛ min dɔ. An ma chia kan kɔ kan sɔn ni, an mbe bɔ min na, an ni a bia. Mbɛ an‑na an ma maun.
Chɛ gbakɔ, Chu mɔɛ dɔ nu, miin ni Sadusii n na, an bɛɛ na‑a wan Chisɔsi tena. Sadusii n nii ma dan ni a a, mbɛ mɔ gbu ɛ a kɔɔ sɔ wan a ka saya ɔ. Mbɛ an‑na a fɔ a ye,

an dɔ, “Ticha, Mosisi‑a sawa chɛ an nyɛn mmɔ ko a, a ɔ te, ni mɔɛ suun ma nyɔɛ kaima fa‑a, a ɔ, mbɛ a‑a a 'a musu to, an fea ma den suun ni min na, a ɔ, a dinden fan mu a ma, a ɔ, a ni chenɛ da mun, a ni denɛ n suun a ma. A sin an mbe an den chɛ n ya wan, a suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ 'a denɛ n na.
Tima dɔndɔ a, kaminɛ ni wan nɔ, an kai wɔnfea an de‑a an fɛn suun. Mbɛ a wɛn ni chenan ka an gbɛɛ ma, a‑a musu si. Chɛɛ a ma den suun ni musu chɛ ma, mbɛ a fa‑a.
Mbɛ denɛ kaima fean bɔɛ chɛ wɛɛ‑a musu dɔndɔ gbe chɛ si to musu a. Mbɛ a wɛɛ fa‑a ka wan.
A sawan bɔɛ wɛɛ‑a a si ka wan to musu a. Mbɛ a wɛɛ fa‑a. Ko dɔndɔ gbe chɛ an ma‑a to suun ma nyɔ wɔnfea chɛ n gbɛɛ a. An gbɛɛ fa‑a ka wan an ma den kan kɔ kan suun ni musu chɛ ma.
A danka a, mbɛ musu chɛ wɛɛ gbu fa‑a.
A yen ko gbɛ, a ma‑a suun ma nyɔɛ wɔnfea chɛ n gbɛɛ 'a musu a, a e na to fa‑a. Ni tee che‑a, faa mɔɛ n gbɛɛ ni an kɔɔ sɔ a ka saya ɔ, ɛ ma‑a nyɔn 'na musu a gbɛ?”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Musu si basan kai sɔnɛ a, ɛ nɛ wan dunya chɛ ɔ,
chɛɛ a ee an dunya nama chɛ ɔ, min mbe na tena. Yataa ɛ mɔɛ miin ya‑a mɔ chɛndɛ n na, an kɔɔ sɔ koe a a ka saya ɔ, an mbe ee musu si‑a, n mbe ee baa an ni kai sɔn.
An mbe ee fa‑a to, koe min na mu, an mbe ma‑a wan yɔ maeka nu. An mbe ma‑a wan Yataa 'a denɛ n na, koe min na mu, Yataa‑a an kɔɔ sɔ a ka saya ɔ.

Min sin sien mu mɔɛ n kɔɔ sɔ koe ma, a ka saya ɔ, Mosisi wandi‑a a ɔ yian fan gboo chɛ ɔ, a‑a min nyɛn, mbɛ ɛ ma‑a wan tea gbu a. A mu min na, a‑a a ɔ yian fan an gboo chɛ ɔ, Yataa bɔ‑a buɛ min dɔ a ya a kɔn den chɛ ɔ, ta ni min dɔ, chɛɛ a nii a minda. A‑a bai sa nɔ wan a si Mansa Yataa ma, a ɔ, Yataa mu a wan na Ebeami ko a, a basan Aisaki an fea Chekɔpi a. A ɔ, an mbe a wan fai.
Chɛ‑a a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ chɛndɛ ba n fan mbe Yataa fai. Mɔɛ min faen mu, a ee Yataa fai. Mɔ ɔ mɔ ɛ ma‑a wan fɔɛ ɔ tima ɔ tima Yataa tena.”
Mbɛ Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ dɔ n‑na a fɔ, an dɔ, “Ticha, i‑a an 'na tisa yɛman fan chɛndɛ chɛ.”
Chɛ gbakɔ, kai nii ma to mɔ ɔ mɔ a, Chisɔsi ɔ tisa koe a tisa dɔ mende a.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Mɔɛ n dɔ, kunka mansa ɛ bɔ‑a Mansa Defidi 'a dambi an dɔ. Fen mu chɛ ɛ ma?
A mu min na, Mansa Defidi wandi‑a a fɔ wan Yataa tando si gboo ɔ, a ɔ, ‘Mansa Yataa‑a a fɔ wan n 'na Mansa ye, a ɔ, “Si nɛ n boo nyima ɔ,
aan n ni i chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ n don i kɔɔ, n ni an popoya i ya kɔɔ.” ’
Defidi wandi gbu yen ko gbɛ, a ɔ, kunka mansa chɛ benden mu a ma. Chɛɛ mɔ kun ma kundi ee koa, a ni ben i ma. A fɔen mu gbɛ, mbɛ kunka mansa chɛ, a bɔ‑a Defidi 'a dambi an dɔ. Fen ko a chɛ ɛ ma?”
Mɔɛ n gbɛɛ too ma sɔenɛ ni Chisɔsi ma, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ a fɛ denɛ n ye, a ɔ,

“Wo wo kun ma fɛn Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ chɛ n boo ɔ. An toen mu doma wa wa n don koe a, an mbe ben ben. Ni an ta‑a machiti an dɔ, an toen mu mɔɛ n ni basɔmaya kɔndɔnɛ chɛ an na. Ni an ta‑a mmɔ 'a samun chɛ chenɛ n bɛɛ a, an toen mu si tena ma bɛnden ba an na. Daun chɛ bɛnɛ wɛɛ ɔ, an toen mu si koe a gbakoo n fan tɛ.
An mbe fuinya musu n boo fenɛ n gbɛɛ daun fan, kafaya ɔ. An gba yama chɛ ma nun koe a, an mbe samun dɔ yansama an chɛ. Chɛ ko a, Yataa ɛ an tɔɔya‑a wan, a ni ben mɔɛ tɔɛ n gbɛɛ ma.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a kunɛ kɔɔ sɔ, a‑a nyan tɔɛ chɛ n yen Yataa 'a kata chɛ ɔ, an mbe an boo fenɛ n na bea‑a kɔpɔ sa kakaa chɛ ɔ.
Mbɛ a yɛ‑a wan to, a‑a fuinya musu yɔnden dɔndɔ yen, ɛ kɔpɔ gbɛnsɛn den fea a bea‑a.
Mbɛ a ɔ, “Tea a, n ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ fuinya musu yɔnden chɛ, a‑a kɔpɔɛ min na bea ka, a benden mu mɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ‑a kɔpɔɛ miin na bea ka.
A mu min na, chɛ n‑na min be ka, an‑na a ya a chenama an kun ma, chɛɛ musu chɛ ta kɔpɔɛ gbɛɛ an nɛ a boo ɔ. Kɔpɔ dɔ mende kan kɔ kan mbe ee to a boo ɔ.”
Mɔɛ dɔ n ni wan Yataa 'a kata ma dia‑a tena. An dɔ, a ni nyin kaka, a nyanden mu sen nyima nyima n fan dɔ. A sin, mɔɛ n‑na an boo fenɛ siama be wan kata chɛ gbu a bonchen koe a. Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ,
“Wo e ka kawa‑a sanche fenɛ miin gbɛɛ ma, tima ɛ che‑a wan, an gbɛɛ ni yɔn. Ɛ te‑a wan, a sen kan kɔ kan mbe ee to‑a sa ɔ a nyɔn kundu a.”
Mɔɛ dɔ n‑na a ɔ tisa wan, an dɔ, “Ticha, koe chɛ n mbe ma‑a sɔyɔ? Ni tima sin ma‑a che‑a, koe chɛ n mbe ma‑a tima min na, fen mbe ma‑a an tɔmɔsi a?”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo wo kun ma fɛn, an ma na wo woo. Koe min na mu, mɔ sɛsɛ mbe na‑a wan n tɔɛ ɔ, an mbe a fɔ‑a wan, an dɔ, an fan mu Chasi a, kunka mansa. Mbɛ an‑na a fɔ to, an dɔ, tima gbu, an che‑a ka. Chɛɛ wo ma bea an fɛ.
Ni wo sin‑na chɛɛ n ma tɔɛ a min, a basan butuinɛ n bɛɛ a, wo ma chian. Koe min na mu, koe chɛ n pɛn pɛn fan mbe ma‑a. Chɛɛ chɛ an mbe ee a ɔ yian‑da, mbɛ tima gbu che‑a.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ to an ye, a ɔ, “Chɛnyɛ n mbe butuinɛ chɛ‑a wan an nyɔn na, mbɛ chɛnyɛ mɔɛ dɔndɔɛ n‑na chɛɛ chɛ an bɛ chɛnyɛ mɔ dɔ mende n na.

Duu gboo ɛ samba‑a wan a ma chianden ba a, dunya gbɛɛ ɔ dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a. Kɔnkɔ ma chianden ba ɛ ma‑a wan kaina sɛsɛ, a basan gbandi n na. Banda wɛɛ a, ko ma chiandenɛ n mbe ma‑a wan, a basan koe tɔmɔsi chenama dɔ mende n na.

Chɛɛ koe chɛ n gbɛɛ mbe e na to ma‑a, an mbe wo bia‑a wan, mbɛ an‑na ko ma gbaaenɛ sa wo ma. An mbe ta‑a wan wo a, wo gbɛmbo koe a, mmɔ 'a samun chɛ chenɛ n na, mbɛ an‑na wo sa pimbi chenɛ a. An mbe na‑a wan wo a, mansa n chen kɔɔ, an bɛ kun ti n na. An mbe chɛ gbɛɛ si‑a wan wo a, a si n bakoe ma.
Chɛɛ chɛ an mbe ma‑a tima a wo ko a, wo ni Yataa 'a sakana bai chɛndɛ ɔ yian mɔɛ chɛ n na.
Wo wo yiima ɔ bɛn tima ya ɔ, min mbe a ma, wo ma na wo faa gbaa wo wandi ma fɔ koe a.
Koe min na mu, n mbe bai n don‑da wan wo da a, mbɛ n‑na yiimatɛ be wo ma. Ni wo‑a bai kan kɔ kan fɔ, wo chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ n mbe ee che‑a kɔɔsa bia chɛ‑a a ma.
Wo woo mɔɛ n fandi gbu, ni wo suun ma nyɔɛ nu, a basan wo baachenɛ n fandi gbu a, an fan bɛɛ gbu n mbe wo be‑a kun ti n ma. An mbe wo dɔ n sin fa‑a wan.
Mɔɛ n gbɛɛ mbe too‑a wan wo a, a si n ma.
Chɛɛ wo kundi dɔndɔ wɛɛ wo kun ma, a ee to‑a a ɔ.
Ni wo sɔ‑a gban, wo e kun‑da wan wo ni kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn wo wandi ko a.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ni wo‑a Chuusaɛn duu yen, soya n‑na a a tindan, a tima a mu wo e a ɔ sɔn‑da, mbɛ a ɔ ma yansan to a te koe a.
A tima chɛ a, mɔɛ miin mbe ma‑a Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ, an ni bui sa a a kɔnkɔɛ n dɔ. Miin mbe ma‑a nɛ Chuusaɛn duu chɛ ɔ, an ni bɔ nɛ. Mɔɛ miin mbe tanda n bɛɛ ɔ, an ma yɛ to nɛ.
A mu min na, a tee chɛ n ma, Yataa ɛ duu chɛ ɔ mɔɛ n tɔɔ‑a wan. A tima an na mu, koe miin gbɛɛ nyɛndenɛ ɛ Yataa 'a gboo ɔ a si an ma, an mbe bɔ‑a a a.
A tima chɛ a, koe n mbe yaua‑a gba, miin mbe bu ma musu n nan gbu tan‑da, a basan kuinsa n na. Faayɔn ba ɛ na‑a wan chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ, a sin, Yataa ɛ mɔɛ chɛ n mɔnɛ‑a wan.

An chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ n mbe an dɔ n fa‑a wan, mbɛ an‑na an dɔ n ma yɔnɛ n na, chɛnyɛ dɔ mende tɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ ɔ. A sin, mɔɛ miin ma Chu mɔɛ n na, an mbe gbasaya din‑da wan Chuusaɛn mɔɛ n ma, aan an ta tima ni ban.”

Chisɔsi ɔ, “Da fii koe n mbe bun‑da wan ma‑a kau a, ni tee, a basan tɔmbuaka n na. Faayɔn ba basan kɔndɔfii wa a, an mbe ma‑a wan chɛnyɛ n dɔ, dunya ma. Chianɛ ɛ ma‑a wan mɔɛ n dɔ, a si yii wa n tu kuiɛ ma, a basan an fonfo yii kuiɛ a.
Mɔɛ n mbe bɔn‑da wan a ma chiandia a, ni an‑na an yii na chii koe chɛ n ma, miin mbe na tena ma‑a dunya ɔ. Koe min na mu, gbasaya fenɛ miin gbɛɛ ɛ banda a, an dɔ ɛ ma‑a wan a ka an gba n dɔ.
Mbɛ an mbe n yen‑da wan, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe ma‑a na‑a gbasaya wa ɔ dugbu ɔ. A yɛ to, n mbe ma‑a wan man‑da Yataa 'a manɛ a.
Ni koe chɛ n‑na a kuu sɔ ma‑a, wo wo faa bia, wo yiima diaenɛ ni ma. Koe min na mu, a ɔ ee yansan‑da to, mbɛ Yataa‑a wo kun ka.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a tai chɛ tɛ an tena, a ɔ, “Wo wo yii na chii wɛ foa kɔnɛ ma, a basan kɔnɛ tɔɛ n na.
Ni wo‑a an yamba n yen, an mbe pɔmbɔ‑a, a ni ma gbɛ wo yii ma, mbɛ sama ɔ ma yansan to.
A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a mu, ni wo‑a koe chɛ n yen ma‑a, wo ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ tima ɔ ma yansan to, Yataa ni a 'a mansaya ɔ yian.
“N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ koe chɛ n gbɛɛ mbe ma‑a pɛn, wo nyɔn sima chɛ n mbe e na ban dunya ɔ.
Dunya gbɛɛ ɛ ban‑da wan, chɛɛ n da a bai ee ka‑a a gba ɔ kuɔ fɔ ko a.”

Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo wo wandi kun ma fɛn. Wo ma daun chɛ ma wo ma gbɔsɔɛ a, a basan gbɛ a kɔɔen minɛ a. A yɛ to, wo ma dunya chɛ ɔ faagbaa n sa wo kun ma. Ni wo‑a chɛ ma, ni n 'na tima che‑a, koe chɛ n gbɛɛ, an mbe a ma wan, n ni wo tɛnɛ.
A mu min na, a tee chɛ, ɛ ma‑a mɔ gbu gbɛɛ ma dunya ɔ tɛnɛ ma koe an na.

Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo wo kun ma fɛn, a yɛ to, wo samunɛ chɛ tee ɔ tee a. Wo samunɛ chɛ, wo ni gbasaya ma sɔn koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ɔ bia koe a, miin mbe na tena wo tan‑da, mbɛ wo‑a an dɔ tandin. A yɛ to, wo samunɛ chɛ, wo ni che sɔ‑a n chen kɔɔ, wo kunɛ kɔɔ sɔenɛ a, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe na‑a tima min na.”
Chisɔsi ni kanɛ chɛ wan tee ɔ tee a Yataa 'a kata ɔ. Ni tee na‑a bea, a ni ta wan mbɛ a chi‑a duu dɔndɔ ɔ, Wodifi kɔnkɔɛ ɔ.
Ni banda ɔ ka‑a, mɔɛ n gbɛɛ ni na wan a tena Yataa 'a kata chɛ ɔ, sau ɔ sau ma an too ma sɔ koe a a ma.
Mbɛ tima ni gbɛ che an na bɛn chɛ ko a, min tɔ ni biidi dɛnfɛ daun bɛnɛ. An ni an bɛn chɛ chee wan to, an dɔ kun bɔ a ɔ bɛnɛ.
A tima chɛ a, mɔɛ miin ni Chu n tɛ ɔ Yataa a, an 'na mansa nu, an bɛ Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ n na, an toen ni an ni Chisɔsi fa nun dɔ. Koe min na mu, an chianden fan ni mɔɛ n ma na gbunɛ a bea.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi fɛ den tan kun ma fea chɛ n tɛ ɔ, dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, min tɔ ni Chudasi. A tɔɛ ma sien fan ni to, an dɔ, Isikayɔti. Sitana bea‑a wan an Chudasi chɛ fɛ.
Mbɛ a ta‑a wan mɔɛ chɛ n tena, miin mbe Chu n tɛ ɔ Yataa a, an 'na mansa chɛ nu, a basan poesi n ya ɔ sɔɛ n na, Yataa 'a kata kun ma. Mbɛ a‑a a kun puin an na, a si Chisɔsi ma tachɛ koe ma.
An bu ɔ dia‑a wan kaka, mbɛ an dɔn‑da an ni kɔpɔɛ ɛnden be a ma.
Mbɛ a dɔn‑da dɔbɛn chɛ ma. Mbɛ a bun‑da a ya a kan‑da, ɛ chia chɛndɛ chɛndɛ ma sɔn buɛ min dɔ Chisɔsi ma tachɛ koe a, mɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ n mbe ee kun, an ni min dɔ sɔn.
Mbɛ biidi dɛnfɛ daun tee chɛ che‑a. A tee chɛ a ni, an ni sa tɔngbɔɛ n fa, kun bɔ a ɔ bɛn chɛ ko a.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a Pita sɔ, an fea Chɔn na, a ɔ, “Wo ta, wo ni daun fenɛ ɔ bɛn, mmɔ ɛ min daun‑da, kun bɔ a ɔ bɛn chɛ ko a.”
Mbɛ an dɔ, “I toen mu nn ni kaina minan dɔ bɛn daun fen chɛ daun koe a?”
Mbɛ a ɔ an ma, “A yen ko, ni wo ma‑a wo kunɛ a don‑da duu ɔ, kaminɛ ɛ wo tan‑da wan, ɛ ta‑a yii a da ɔ. Wo bea a fɛ, wo ni don chen chɛ a, ɛ don‑da min na.
Mbɛ wo‑a a fɔ chen ti chɛ ye, wo ɔ, n toen mu n ni a ɔ sɔn, ni dumu gbu ɛ mende, n mbe kun bɔ a ɔ daun fen chɛ daun kaina, mmɔ bɛ wo gbɛɛ a.
Ɛ dumu ɔ bɛnden ba yian‑da wan wo a, banda chenɛ banda a. Wo ko ɔ ko ɔ bɛn nɔ.”
Mbɛ an ta‑a. Mbɛ Chisɔsi na‑a bai miin gbɛɛ fɔ an ye, a bɔ‑a wan a a. Mbɛ an‑na daun fen chɛ gbu ɔ bɛn, kun bɔ a ɔ bɛn chɛ ko a.
Mbɛ kun bɔ a ɔ daun chɛ tima chɛ che‑a kɛn, Chisɔsi si‑a wan daun chɛ tena, an bɛ a 'a sɔ mɔɛ n na.
Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Kun bɔ a ɔ daun fen chɛ daun koe a di wan n ye kaka mmɔ bɛ, n mbe na to mɔnɛ ɔ bia‑a.
Koe min na mu, n ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ n mbe ee daun fen chɛ sima daun‑da to. Ni n‑na a daun to, fɔ dechee tima min na Yataa‑a a 'a mansaya ɔ yian, mbɛ a‑a a 'a mɔɛ n kun ka fion.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a kɔpu ya, gbɛ ni min dɔ. Mbɛ a‑a Yataa wai bɔ, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “Wo kɔpu chɛ bia, mbɛ wo‑a chɛ sima kai kai a a wo nyɔn ma.
Koe min na mu, n ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ n mbe ee gbɛ chɛ min‑da to, aan Yataa ni a 'a mansaya ɔ yian.”
Mbɛ a‑a biidi chɛ dɔndɔ ya. Mbɛ a‑a Yataa wai bɔ, mbɛ a‑a a ɔ kai kai, mbɛ a‑a a du du an ma, a ɔ, “N gboo an nɛ, n mbe min be tena wo ko a. Wo chɛ ma tima ɔ tima, wo yii na chii koe a n na.”

An ban‑da kɛn kun bɔ a ɔ daunɛ chɛ‑a, a‑a an ko dɔndɔ gbe chɛ an ma kɔpu wɛɛ a. A‑a a ya wan, mbɛ a ɔ, “N wii an nɛ, n mbe min na bɔn tena wo ko a. Yataa ɛ an ya tena, mbɛ a‑a dɔbɛn nama chɛ a 'a mɔɛ n na.
“Chɛɛ wo a yen bɛ, mɔɛ min mbe na tena n ma tachɛ‑a, ɛ nɛ si ɔ daun chɛ‑a mmɔ bɛ an na.
N fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe na tena wan fa‑a, yɔ Yataa‑a a ɔ bɛn buɛ min dɔ. Chɛɛ koe chɛ miin mbe mɔɛ chɛ tan‑da, a yau gba a ko a, mɔɛ min mbe n ma tachɛ‑a.”
Mbɛ a fɛ denɛ n bun‑da an nyɔn dɔ tisa‑a, ni nyɔn mbe na tena ko bonda chɛ sima ma‑a an tɛ ɔ.
Mbɛ an bun‑da an nyɔn kɔɔsa bia‑a, a si mɔɛ ma, min mu mɔ chenama a an tɛ ɔ.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Mansa nu, mɔɛ chɛ n ko a, miin ma Chu mɔ n na, an mbe an 'na gbasaya yian fan an na. Chɛɛ an mansa chɛ dɔ n sin mbe an fandi chee wan mɔɛ n dia nyɔɛ n na.
Chɛɛ wo tana, wo ma ma ka yɔ mɔɛ chɛ nu. Mɔɛ min toen mu a ni ma mɔ chenama a wo tɛ ɔ, a ni ma yɔ den mɛsɛ, mbɛ wo ya ɔ sɔɛ wɛɛ ni ma yɔ bɔi denɛ.

Koe min na mu, mɔ fea n yen ko. Dɔndɔɛ ɛ si ɔ, dɔndɔɛ sin mbe na‑a daun fenɛ a a tena, ɛ a be a ma. Nyɔn mu mɔ chenama a an fea chɛ tɛ ɔ? Mɔɛ min mbe ka si ɔ, a bɔɛ ɛ daun fenɛ be‑a a ma, an mu mɔ chenama a. Chɛɛ n mbe wo tɛ sanche wo ma wai n fan chɛ koe a.
“Wo to‑a wan n fɛ tima ɔ yansama ko a, n 'na ko yawaenɛ n gbɛɛ ɔ.
A sin, Fa‑a gbasaya be buɛ min dɔ n ma ma koe a mansa a, n bɛɛ n mbe an gbasaya chɛ be‑a wo wɛɛ ma.

Chɛ‑a a ma wan, tima min na Yataa ɛ n 'na mansaya ɔ yian‑da, mmɔ bɛ ɛ daunɛ chɛ‑a wan to, mmɔ ni mmɔ min, daun chɛ bɛn ba chɛ ɔ. A tima chɛ a, wo wɛɛ wo e ma‑a wan mansa n na, mmɔ 'a Isɔɛɛ dambi tan kun ma fea chɛ n kun ma.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ Pita ye, a ɔ, “Saimɔn, a yen ko, Yataa dɔn‑da Sitana ye, a ni wo gbɛɛ ɔ siman, yɔ sɛnɛ sa mɔɛ ɛ chin fenɛ ɔ fɛ buɛ min dɔ.
Saimɔn, chɛɛ n‑na samunɛ chɛ i ko a, i chenɛ ni sɔ gban i 'a danaya ɔ n na. A sin, ni i‑a i ya a yɛ to n ma, a ma i bɔɛ n bɛɛ, an chenɛ ni sɔ gban an 'na danaya ɔ n na.”
Mbɛ Pita ɔ, “Fa, chɛɛ n ma bɛnden fan mu, an ni mɔ fea sa pimbi chenɛ a dɔndɔ a, mbɛ an‑na mɔ fea fa kaina dɔndɔɛ.”
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Pita, n ni a ma din i tena, mbɛ tɛ kɔnɛ e na konchee sayi chɛ ma, e kɔɔsa bia chɛ‑a wan gba sawa, a si n sɔn koe ma i boo ɔ.”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Wo wo yii na chii tima chɛ a, tima min na n na‑a wo sɔ Yataa 'a bai ɔ yian koe a mɔɛ n na. Wo nii ma ta ni kɔpɔ a wo boo ɔ, wo ma ta ni bɔɔ a, a basan kɔɔwa fean bɔɛ wɛɛ a. Fen kɔ fen ma gbɔsɔɛ‑a wo bia wan a tima chɛ a?” Mbɛ an dɔ, “Fen kɔ fen ma gbɔsɔɛ ma nn bia ni.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Chɛɛ sanche gbɛ, ni kɔpɔɛ ɛ mɔɛ min boo ɔ, a ni a ya, a basan a 'a chia a tachɛ bɔɔɛ a. A sin, ni chɛɛ chɛ mɛ ee mɔɛ min boo ɔ, a ni a 'a doma kai ma tachɛ, a ni dɔndɔ san.

Wo e chɛ ma‑a koe n na, Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, mɔɛ n mbe n bia‑a wan, yɔ an mbe sawa yɔn mɔ wa chɛ n bia buɛ min dɔ. N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ chɛ sin fan mbe ma‑a. Koe min na mu, ko ɔ ko min nyɛnden mu, a si n ma, ɛ bɔ‑a wan a a.”
Mbɛ an dɔ, “Fa, i ya a na, chɛɛ chɛ mɛ fea n yen ko nɛ.” Mbɛ a ɔ, “A kun‑da gbɛ.”
Chisɔsi bɔ‑a wan Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, yɔ a ni a ma buɛ min dɔ tee, mbɛ a ta‑a Wodifi kɔnkɔɛ chɛ ɔ, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na.
An che‑a kɛn nɔ, a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Wo samunɛ ma ti bia, Sitana ma na a ma, wo ni wo kan kɔ sɔ Yataa a.”
Mbɛ a ka‑a wan an baima ɛnden na, mbɛ a‑a a kumbai gbangban, mbɛ a bun‑da samunɛ chɛ‑a.
A ɔ, “Fa, ni i 'a dɔbɛnɛ mu, a ma ko yawaen chɛ ni ka n teen na. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, n ta faa ma koe, an ma ma. Chɛɛ i ta faa ma koe, an ni ma.”
Mbɛ maeka ka‑a banda bu ɔ, mbɛ a bɔ‑a a ya a, mbɛ a‑a faa be a ma.
A faa yɔn‑da wan a ɔ benden ba a, mbɛ a‑a samunɛ chɛ a sɔɛ gbɛɛ a. Taa min ni bɔ tena a ma, a maen fan ni yɔ wii, ɛ bɔn‑da kaka duu ma.
A ban‑da kɛn samun‑da, a‑a a kɔɔ sɔ wan, mbɛ a ta‑a a fɛ den chɛ n tena. A‑a an tan fan sa ɔ chinɔɛ ɔ. Koe min na mu, an bɛɛ faa n yɔnden ba ni, min‑na a ma, an gboo ɔ fa‑a.
Mbɛ a‑a an na kunɛ, a ɔ, “Wo e ka sa ɔ chinɔɛ an dɔ? Wo wo kɔɔ sɔ, wo ni samunɛ ma ti bia, ko ɔ ko ma na wo yiima ɔ chɛ chɛ a si Yataa ma.”

A yen ko, Chisɔsi to‑a koɔ an na, mbɛ mɔ fanka an na‑a, mbɛ an‑na a tan. A fɛ den tan kun ma fea chɛ n dɔndɔ, min tɔ ni Chudasi, an ni sɔ ɔ mɔɛ chɛ n ya ɔ. Mbɛ a wan Chudasi chɛ na‑a wan Chisɔsi baima gbɛdɛn, min mbe a ma, a ni Chisɔsi kɔndɔn.
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Oo, Chudasi, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, e n fan ma tachɛ‑a kɔndɔnɛ ɔ?”
Chisɔsi fɛ den chɛ n‑na a ɔ yen kɛn, koe min ni na tena ma‑a, an dɔ, “Fa, nn ni nn 'na chɛɛ chɛ mɛ n ya, nn ni butuinɛ chɛ an na?”
Chu n 'na tɛ mɔ wa Yataa tena, a 'a bɔi denɛ, a ni wan an mɔɛ chɛ n tɛ ɔ. Mbɛ Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ dɔndɔɛ, a‑a chɛɛ chɛ mɛ ya, a‑a an bɔi den chɛ boo nyima ɔ too tɛ a a gbeda.
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Sɛmbɛ, ɛn to ka.” Mbɛ a tu‑a kamin chɛ too a, mbɛ a too chɛ yɛ‑a to a gba ɔ.

Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa nu, an na‑a na wan Chisɔsi bia koe a. An bɛ an na‑a na poesi n ya ɔ sɔɛ n na Yataa 'a kata ɔ, a basan Chu gbakoo n na. Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Wo nii wo wandi tɔɔ na koe a, chɛɛ chɛ mɛ n na wo boo ɔ, a basan kɔn ma tɛenɛ n na, n bia koe a. Kanka ma chianden ma n na.
Mmɔ‑a tee sɛsɛ wa chɛ gbɛɛ ban Yataa 'a kata ɔ, wo ma n bia ni. Chɛɛ wo ta tima an che‑a ka wo faa ma koe ma koe a, tima min na Sitana 'a gbasaya ɛ wɛ dunya chɛ kun ma.”
Mbɛ an‑na Chisɔsi bia, mbɛ an ta‑a a a, Chu n tɛ mɔ wa Yataa a, a 'a chenɛ a. Pita‑a a sɔ wan an fɛ, chɛɛ a ma dɔn ni a ni gbɛn an ma gbɛdɛn.
A tima chɛ a, mɔɛ n‑na ta sa wan tɛ mɔ wa chɛ 'a chen chɛ kata tɛtɛ ma, mbɛ an si‑a a fɛ. Pita wɛɛ don‑da wan kata chɛ ɔ, mbɛ a si‑a an baima ta chɛ fɛ.
Mbɛ bɔi den musuma tɔngbɔ dɔndɔ‑a a yen si ɔ ta chɛ fɛ. A‑a a ma fɛn tiin, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “Kamin chɛ ni wan Chisɔsi fɛ.”
Chɛɛ Pita‑a kɔɔsa bia chɛ wan bai chɛ ma, a ɔ, “N bian musu, n ma kamin chɛ sɔn.”
Tima ɛnden ben‑da, mbɛ kamin dɔndɔ wɛɛ‑a Pita yen. Mbɛ a ɔ, “I wan, a fɛ denɛ dɔndɔ gbu mu i a.” Chɛɛ Pita ɔ, “Mɔna, n fan ma.”
Awa dɔndɔ bendenɛ gbakɔ, kamin dɔ mende wɛɛ chii‑a wan bai chɛ ma, a ɔ, “Kamin chɛ ni wan gbu Chisɔsi fɛ, a mu min na, Kadidi mɔɛ mu a wɛɛ a.”
Chɛɛ Pita ɔ, “Mɔna, tea kan kɔ kan mbe ee bai chɛ ɔ, e ka min fɔ‑a. N ma a sɔn.” A to‑a bai chɛ an fɔ‑a, mbɛ tɛ kɔnɛ konchee‑a.

Mbɛ Mansa Chisɔsi‑a a ya a yɛ, mbɛ a‑a Pita ma fɛn. Mbɛ a puin‑da Pita yii ma, mbɛ Mansa Chisɔsi na‑a a fɔ wan a ye, a ɔ, “Pita, tɛ kɔnɛ e na to konchee‑a sayi chɛ ma, e kɔɔsa bia chɛ‑a wan gba sawa, mbɛ i ma n sɔn.”
Mbɛ Pita bɔ‑a baa ma, mbɛ a puyɛ‑a di a.
Mɔɛ miin ni ka Chisɔsi kun ma fɛn tena, an bun‑da a ma yɛn‑da, an mbe ta‑a a gbasi‑a.
Mbɛ an yɛ‑a wan to, an‑na a ya a chii koa a, an mbe ta‑a a fɔ‑a, an dɔ, “Nyɔn mbe ka i gbasi‑a? A ɔ yian bɛ nn na.”
Mbɛ an yɛ‑a wan to, an‑na a main chia sɛsɛ a.

Banda ɔ ka‑a kɛn, mbɛ Chu gbakoo n bɛn‑da kaina dɔndɔ. Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa n bɛɛ ni wan an bɛn chɛ ɔ, a basan Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ n na. Mbɛ an gbɛɛ‑a a ma, an na‑a Chisɔsi a an chen kɔɔ.
Mbɛ an‑na a fɔ a ye, an dɔ, “A ɔ yian bɛ nn na, ni i wan mu kunka mansa chɛ a.” Mbɛ a ɔ, “Ni a bɔ‑a n fan da a, wo ee dan‑da a a.
A sin, ni n‑na wo ɔ tisa, wo ee na‑a n yɛman‑da.
Chɛɛ a ka gbɛ sanche ma, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe ma‑a wan si ɔ Yataa boo nyima ɔ, gbasaya gbɛɛ ɛ min boo ɔ.”
Mbɛ an gbɛɛ‑a a fɔ, an dɔ, “Mbɛ i wan mu Yataa 'a denɛ a?” Mbɛ a ɔ, “Wo‑a an fɔ ka.”
Mbɛ an dɔ, “Siiya ee to chɛ ma. Mmɔ ban‑da bai a min‑da a wandi gbu da a.”
A tima chɛ a ni gbɛ, mbɛ chiti tɛ mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ‑a an kɔɔ sɔ, mbɛ an ta‑a Chisɔsi a kɔfana chen kɔɔ, min tɔ ni Padeti.

Nɔ ni, an‑na a kuu sɔ kunɛ si‑a a kun ma, an dɔ, “Kamin chɛ an mbe ben‑da nn 'na mɔɛ n sɔ‑a chia yama n ma, ɛ ta‑a a fɔ‑a an ye, a ɔ, an ma chɛnyɛ pawa chɛ Domi kun ti wa tena. Mbɛ a yɛ‑a, a‑a a wandi chee Chasi a, min mu mansa a.”
Mbɛ Kɔfana Padeti ɔ, “I wan mu Chu mɔɛ n 'na mansa a?” Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “I‑a an fɔ ka.”
Mbɛ Kɔfana Padeti‑a a fɔ wan Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa n ye, a basan mɔ fanka chɛ a, a ɔ, “N ma ko yama kan kɔ kan yen ni, kamin chɛ‑a min ma.”

Chɛɛ tima chɛ gbu a ni, an‑na a kɔ din gbasaya wandi gbu a, an dɔ, “Ɛ kanɛ min chɛ tena, ɛ a ma tena wan gbun ba ni gbasi Chudia chɛnyɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ. A‑a a kuu sɔ Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ wan, mbɛ sanche gbɛ a che‑a nɛ a 'a kan chɛ‑a.”
Kɔfana Padeti‑a bai chɛ an na min, mbɛ a‑a mɔɛ chɛ n dɔ tisa, a ɔ, “O, kamin chɛ mu Kadidi mɔɛ an na?”
Mbɛ a‑a a ɔ gbɛ kɛn, mbɛ Chisɔsi ka‑a Mansa Ɛdɔdi 'a chɛnyɛ ɔ wan, a sin, a wan Mansa Ɛdɔdi ni wan Chuusaɛn duu ɔ a tima chɛ a, a‑a Chisɔsi a ta wan a tena.

Mansa Ɛdɔdi‑a Chisɔsi yen kɛn, a bu ɔ dia‑a wan kaka. Koe min na mu, tima ɔ yansama ko a, a yen sɔɛ ni wan a a. A na‑a a ma tɔɛ a min fan, a sin ni gbɛ a 'a yiinachii ɔ, mbɛ a ni Chisɔsi yen kamaya koe n ma‑a.
Chɛ an‑na a ma, Mansa Ɛdɔdi‑a Chisɔsi ɔ tisa tisa sɛsɛ a, chɛɛ Chisɔsi ma bai dɔndɔ wɛɛ fɔ ni a ye.
Chɛ gbakɔ, mɔɛ miin ni Chu n tɛ ɔ Yataa a, an 'na mansa chɛ nu, an bɛ Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ chɛ n na, an bun‑da kun sɛsɛ si‑a to Chisɔsi kun ma.
Mbɛ a tima chɛ a, Mansa Ɛdɔdi an bɛ a 'a soya n na, an‑na Chisɔsi ma yɛn fan, mbɛ an‑na mauma mauma koe sɛsɛ sɛ a ma. An‑na doma kai nyima nyima don fan a ma, mbɛ a‑a a a yɛ Kɔfana Padeti tena.
A ka a tee chɛ ma, Mansa Ɛdɔdi n dia‑a wan, an fea Kɔfana Padeti a. Chɛɛ ma nyɔnɛ ni an na a kɔma a.
An yɛ‑a kɛn to Chisɔsi a, Kɔfana Padeti chen kɔɔ, mbɛ Kɔfana Padeti‑a Chu n tɛ mɔɛ Yataa a, an 'na mansa nu, a‑a an chee kaina dɔndɔɛ, an bɛ kun ti n na, a basan mɔɛ tɔɛ n gbɛɛ a.

Mbɛ a ɔ, “Wo na‑a kamin chɛ a n chen kɔɔ, wo ɔ, ɛ mɔɛ n sɔ‑a chia yama ma. A yen ko gbɛ, n‑na a wakoe kɔɔ gbɛngbɛn wo gbɛɛ ya kɔɔ, chɛɛ n ma ko ɔ ko yen ni, a‑a min ma, min mu ko yama a, yɔ wo‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ.

Mansa Ɛdɔdi wɛɛ‑a a ɔ yen fan, mbɛ kamin chɛ ma ko ɔ ko ma ni, min mu ko yama a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, a‑a a a yɛ mmɔ chen kɔɔ. Wo wandi gbu‑a a ɔ yen gbɛ, mbɛ kamin chɛ ma ko yama kan kɔ kan ma ni, min mbe a ma, a ni saya ma sɔn.
Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, n mbe a ma‑a wan an ni a pɛndɛn pien, mbɛ n‑na a boo ka, a ni ta.”
Chɛɛ an gbɛɛ‑a a fɔ wan dɔndɔ a, an kuiɛ ma sɛenɛ a, an dɔ, “Kamin chɛ fa, mbɛ i‑a i boo ka Baabasi a nn ye.”
Baabasi chɛ ni mɔɛ an na, an na‑a min sa pimbi chenɛ a, butuin chɛ koe a Domi mansa n na Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. A yɛ to, a na‑a mɔɛ fa wan.
Kɔfana Padeti toen ni a ni a boo ka Chisɔsi an na. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, a‑a mɔ fanka chɛ ɔ tisa to, min mbe a ma, a ni a boo ka Chisɔsi a.
Chɛɛ an‑na yee tɛ wan to, an dɔ, “A ni gbangban kɔnɛ ma, a ni fa. A ni gbangban kɔnɛ ma, a ni fa.”

Mbɛ Kɔfana Padeti‑a a fɔ to an ye a si tena sawan bɔɛ ɔ, a ɔ, “Fen ko a chɛ ɛ ma? Kamin chɛ gbu, a‑a fen ko yama ma? N ma ko ɔ ko yen ni, a‑a min ma, ɛ saya ma sɔn min ko a. N mbe a ma‑a wan, an ni a pɛndɛn pien, mbɛ n‑na a boo ka, a ni ta.”

Chɛɛ a tima gbu a ni, an‑na yee tɛ a sɛmbɛndenɛ a, mbɛ a ni a ma, an ni Chisɔsi gbangban kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma. Mbɛ a danka a, an kun‑da Kɔfana Padeti yiima mun koe ma. Mbɛ an‑na yee tɛ koe min ko a, an to‑a a ma.
Mbɛ Kɔfana Padeti dɔn‑da an ni Chisɔsi gbangban kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma, a ni fa nɔ, yɔ an‑na a fɔ buɛ min dɔ.
Mbɛ a‑a a boo ka kamin chɛ a, an toen ni min na, kaminɛ min ni pimbi chenɛ a butuin chɛ koe a Domi mansa n na, a basan mɔ fa koe a. Mbɛ a‑a Chisɔsi be a fa mɔɛ n ma, min ni an faa ma koe a.

Mbɛ soya n‑na Chisɔsi bia, mbɛ an ta‑a a a. An to‑a ta tena wan a a, mbɛ an bɛn‑da kamin dɔndɔ a, min tɔ ni Saimɔn. A ni ka tena Sayini duu ɔ wan, ɛ na‑a Chuusaɛn. Soya chɛ n‑na a din fan kamin chɛ ma, a ni ta kɔn gbengbanden chɛ a Chisɔsi gbaa chia a.
Mɔ fanka wa‑a a sɔ wan Chisɔsi fɛ. An tɛ ɔ, musu dɔ n ni wan nɔ, miin ni di chɛ‑a a ko a.
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi‑a a ya a yɛ wan an ma, mbɛ a ɔ, “Wo wan Chuusaɛn duu ɔ musu nu, wo ma di chɛ n fan ko a, chɛɛ wo di chɛ wo wandi ko a, a basan wo 'a denɛ n na.
Koe min na mu, a yen ko, tima ɛ che‑a wan, mɔɛ n ni a fɔ, an dɔ, musu miin gbandayaen mu, an dɔ, miin ma susu be ni den ma, an duaen mu.
A tima chɛ a, mɔɛ n mbe a fɔ‑a wan kɔnkɔɛ n ye, an dɔ, an ni bɔn an ma, an dɔ, an ni an na tunɛ.
A mu min na, ni an mbe kun fan an ni n tɔɔya buɛ chɛ ɔ, n fɛn ma ko yama kan kɔ kan ma ni, wo sin gbɛ, wo wɛn yau ka, an mbe ma‑a ka ma wo a?”
A tima chɛ a, soya chɛ n ni wan to ta tena kamin fea dɔ mende a, miin ni mɔ yama n na. An sɔen ni, an ni an bɛɛ fa, an bɛ Chisɔsi a.

An che‑a kɛn kaina chɛ, an ni min chee, an dɔ, Kun Konkon Ma, an‑na Chisɔsi gbangban fan nɔ kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma. An na‑a mɔ yama fea chɛ n bɛɛ gbangban fan to nɔ kɔn gbengbanden fea n ma. An na‑a mɔ yama dɔndɔɛ gbangban fan Chisɔsi boo nyima ɔ, mbɛ an‑na dɔndɔɛ wɛɛ gbangban a man dɔɛ.

Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Fa Yataa, i boo bɔ mɔɛ chɛ n 'na ko yama n dɔ. A mu min na, an ma a ɔ sɔn, an mbe ka koe min nyɔn sima ma tena.” Chisɔsi gbangbandenɛ gbakɔ, soya chɛ n‑na chɛ fenɛ chɛ wan a 'a koa n ko a, min mbe a ma, an ni a ɔ sɔn, ni mɔ dɔndɔɛ ɛ min ma sɔn.

Mɔɛ n ni wan nɔ sɔ ɔ, an mbe koe n dɔ gbɛ‑a miin ni ma tena. Chɛɛ Chu n kun ti n‑na ma yɛn ma koe n sɛ wan Chisɔsi ma. Mbɛ an dɔ, “A‑a mɔ dɔ mende n baun, a ni a wandi baun gbɛ, ni an mu kunka mansa a, Yataa‑a a boo sɔ min ma.”
Soya chɛ n bɛɛ‑a a ma yɛn fan. An na‑a wan a tena, mbɛ an‑na gbɛ be a ma,
mbɛ an dɔ, “I wandi baun bɛ, ni i wan mu Chu mɔɛ n 'na mansa a.”
Kɔn dɛnfɛ ni wan bun dɔ a 'a kɔn gbengbanden chɛ kun ma. A nyɛnden fan ni an kɔn chɛ ma, an dɔ, Chu mɔɛ n 'na mansa an nɛ.
Ko yama ma mɔɛ dɔndɔɛ chɛ, min ni ka nɔ dɛn dɔ, an bɛ Chisɔsi n na, a kai‑a wan Chisɔsi a manyinɛ a, a ɔ, “Kunka mansa chɛ mu i wan na, ae? Ni a mu i wan na, mbɛ i wandi baun bɛ, a basan nn bɛɛ a.”
Chɛɛ a bɔɛ dɔndɔɛ chɛ sin‑na a a gban fan, mbɛ a ɔ, “An‑na ko yawaen dɔndɔ gbe an sa ka mmɔ ma mmɔ bɛ. E ee chian Yataa ma chɛ gbu dechee wɛɛ ko a?
A sin, an teayaen fan mu, an ni ko yawaenɛ sa mɔ ma, koe min na mu, mɔ tana, mɔ ɛ ka nɛ mɔ sɔn yama an ko a. Chɛɛ a tana, a ma ko yama kan kɔ kan ma ni.”
Mbɛ a ɔ, “Kai Chisɔsi, i yii na chii n na, ni i na‑a tima min na gbasaya ɔ, i 'a mansa wai chɛ koe a.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N ni a ma din i tena, mbɛ bi tee chɛ a, mɔ fea ɛ ma‑a wan banda bu ɔ.”
Tee kun tɛ a tee chɛ ma, pimbi bun‑da wan chɛnyɛ gbɛɛ ɔ awa sawa ko a.
Koe min na mu, tee sɛmbɛ‑a wan man koe a. Mbɛ tɛndi min bɛɛ ni ka dɛn dɔ Yataa 'a chenɛ bu ɔ, a tɛ ka‑a fea a.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a yee tɛ gbankon, a ɔ, “Fa, n‑na n nyina be i ma.” A‑a chɛ fɔ kɛn dechee, mbɛ a fa‑a.
Domi soya gbakoo chɛ, min ni ka Chisɔsi ma fɛn‑da, a‑a a ɔ yen min ma‑a. Mbɛ a‑a tando be Yataa ma, a ɔ, “Tea gbu ko a, mɔ tandenɛ ni kamin chɛ a.”
Mɔ sɛsɛ wa chɛ nu, miin na‑a a ɔ yen koe a, an mbe Chisɔsi fa tena buɛ min dɔ, an na‑a ɔ yen fan, koe min ben‑da. Mbɛ an gbɛɛ yɛ‑a wan an baa nu, faayɔn ba ɔ.
Chɛɛ koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ni ben tena tima min na, Chisɔsi dia nyɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ ni wan nɔ sɔ ɔ pɔɔ, an mbe an dɔ yen‑da. Musu miin bɛɛ na‑a a ma sɔ ka, a ka Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ, an ni wan an tɛ ɔ.

Yatina, a tima chɛ a, kamin dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ min tɔ ni Chosɛfi. A na‑a ka Ayimatia duu ɔ wan, min ni Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ. A sɔnɛ ni nyin, a yɛ to, mɔ tandenɛ ni a a. A sin, a ya ni tima chɛ an ya ɔ, tima min na Yataa ɛ a 'a mansaya ɔ yian‑da dunya chɛ ɔ. Chu gbakoo dɔndɔ ni a a, miin ni chiti tɛ koe n ma. Chɛɛ a nii ma toa si ni a bɔɛ chɛ n 'na yiinachii kɔɔ, koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ma koe a Chisɔsi a.
A ta‑a wan Kɔfana Padeti tena, mbɛ a‑a a ɔ tisa, a ɔ, a ni Chisɔsi su be a ma a tɔn koe a.

Mbɛ Kɔfana Padeti dɔn‑da a ye. Mbɛ Chosɛfi‑a a ma, an‑na Chisɔsi su a yii kɔn gbengbanden chɛ ma, mbɛ a‑a a ma bɛn fen gbɛ ɔ. Mbɛ a‑a a tɔn kamba ɔ, min sinden ni senɛ ɔ, an nii ma mɔ ɔ mɔ tɔn nin bɛ min dɔ.
An tee chɛ ma ni, Chu n ni an ma bɛn an 'na suin tee chɛ ko a. A sin dɔ nii ma yansan to, a ni a kuu sɔ.
Musu miin na‑a a sɔ ka Chisɔsi fɛ a ka Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ, an ta‑a wan an bɛ Chosɛfi n na. Mbɛ an‑na kamba chɛ yen, mbɛ an‑na a ɔ sɔn Chisɔsi tɔndenɛ ni buɛ min dɔ.
Mbɛ an yɛ‑a duu ɔ, mbɛ an‑na tu kunyɛ a diama ɔ bɛn, a fasi fasi koe a Chisɔsi su ma. Chɛɛ suin tee‑a a kuu sɔ, mbɛ an‑na an suin, yɔ an 'na sawa‑a min fɔ.
Suin tee chɛ ben‑da, mbɛ Tɛnɛ kan kɔ dɔɛ sau sau ma, musu chɛ n ta‑a wan kamba ma. An ta‑a tu kunyɛ a diama chɛ a an boo ɔ, an na‑a min dɔ bɛn ka.
Chɛɛ an‑na a tan fan, senɛ chɛ, an na‑a kamba gbu da a tɔn ka min na, a chenchendenɛ ɛ, a ka a da a.
Mbɛ an don‑da a bu ɔ. Chɛɛ an nii ma Mansa Chisɔsi su tan ni to nɔ.
Mbɛ an na fii‑a, a si koe chɛ ma. An to‑a chɛ an dɔ, mbɛ a yen ko, mɔ kaima fea bɔ‑a an ya a, an mbe sɔ ɔ an baima, an ma chiienɛ ɛ koa manden ba ɔ.
Musu chɛ n chian‑da wan kaka, mbɛ an‑na an kunɛ a bun duu ma. Mbɛ kamin chɛ n dɔ, “Wo ma na wo ya a kan‑da kamba ɔ chɛndɛ ba a.
A ee nɛ. Yataa‑a a kɔɔ sɔ a ka saya ɔ. Wo wo yii na chii bai chɛ a, a‑a min fɔ wo ye, a ni tima min na Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ.

A ɔ, mbɛ an mbe a wan Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ bia‑a wan, a ɔ, an ni a be ko yama ma mɔɛ n ma. A ɔ, an mbe yɛ‑a wan to, a ɔ, an ni a gbangban kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma. A ɔ, chɛɛ tee fea a sawan bɔɛ ma, a ɔ, ɛ a kɔɔ sɔ‑a wan a ka saya ɔ, a ni yɛ to fɔɛ ɔ.”
Mbɛ a 'a bai chɛ puin‑da musu chɛ n yii ma.
Mbɛ an ka‑a kamba chɛ ma, an yɛ‑a duu ɔ. An si‑a wan ko ɔ ko ma min ma‑a, mbɛ an‑na a ɔ yian Chisɔsi fɛ den tan kun ma dɔndɔɛ chɛ n na miin to‑a, a basan a fɛ mɔɛ tɔɛ n gbɛɛ a.
Musu chɛ n fan nii nɛ, miin‑na bai chɛ ɔ yian Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ n na. Mɛi min na‑a ka Makadaa, ni Chowana, ni Mɛi dɔndɔɛ Chimisi de, a basan musu dɔ gbɛɛ n na.
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ nu, an nii ma dan ni a a, musu chɛ n‑na min dɔ yian an na. A ni an yii ma, mbɛ musu chɛ n na‑a wooya bai an dɔ yian ka an na.

Chɛɛ Pita‑a a kɔɔ sɔ wan, mbɛ a ta‑a bui a kamba chɛ ma. A che‑a kɛn, a‑a a ma bun fan kamba chɛ da a, chɛɛ a‑a kasanche chɛ an yen dechee, a ma fen dɔ mende kan kɔ kan yen ni to. Mbɛ a yɛ‑a duu ɔ, a kɔndɔ fiienɛ a, a si koe chɛ ma min ma‑a ka.
Yatina, a tee dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, Chisɔsi fɛ mɔ fea n ni wan ta tena konko dɔndɔ ɔ, min tɔ ni Emayɔsi. Emayɔsi chɛ an tɛ ɛ Chuusaɛn na, ɛ ma wan yɔ mai wɔnfea.
An ni wan ta tena chia ɔ bɔɛ chɛ‑a, a si koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ma, miin ma‑a ka.
An to‑a chia ɔ bɔɛ chɛ an na dɔndɔ a, mbɛ Chisɔsi wandi gbu gbɛn‑da an baima gbɛdɛn, mbɛ an bɛ bun‑da ta‑a an na.
An gbu na‑a a yen fan, chɛɛ an nii ma a ɔ sɔn ni, mbɛ an nɛ.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N bɔ nu, wo e ka ta tena fen chia ɔ bɔɛ ɔ?” Mbɛ an sɔ‑a gbɛ, an ya kɔɔɛ maenɛ digbi digbi.
An dɔndɔ min tɔ ni Kiyopasi, a ɔ, “Mɔna, i dɔndɔ gbe chɛ, sonda mu i wan na dechee Chuusaɛn, min ma a ɔ sɔn koe miin ben‑da nɔ tee fea chɛ ɔ.”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wuo, fen ko chɛ‑a a ɔ?” Mbɛ an dɔ, “An‑na koe miin sɛ Chisɔsi ma, min ka‑a Nasaɛti duu ɔ. Kamin chɛ, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ ni a a. A na‑a kamaya ko wa miin ma, a basan bai n na, a ni miin fɔ, an na‑a a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ Yataa ni wan a kɔ. Mɔɛ n gbɛɛ danden fan ni a a, mbɛ Yataa 'a gbasaya ni wan a ɔ.

Mmɔ 'a mansa chɛ nu, mɔɛ chɛ n ko a, miin ni mmɔ tɛ ɔ Yataa a, an bɛ mmɔ kun ti n na, an ta‑a wan a a, Kɔfana Padeti chen kɔɔ. An toen ni a ni kaa a tɛ a faa koe ma. Mbɛ an‑na a gbangban fan kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma, mbɛ a fa‑a.
Chɛɛ a ni wan nn 'na yiinachii ɔ, mbɛ an ni na tena mmɔ 'a Isɔɛɛ chɛnyɛ kun ka koe a. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, tee sawan bɔɛ an nɛ bi, kɛn an‑na a fa.
A sin to, nn bɛ ni musu miin dɔ n na, an‑na nn kɔndɔ fii wan. An ta‑a wan Chisɔsi kamba ma sayi chɛ ma,
chɛɛ an ma a su yen ni kamba gbu ɔ. An sin yɛ‑a wan, mbɛ an‑na a ɔ yian to nn na, mbɛ an‑na maeka dɔ n yen fan nɔ. An dɔ, maeka chɛ n dɔ, mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, a yɛ‑a fɔɛ ɔ.
Nn bɔɛ dɔ n bɛɛ, an ta‑a wan kamba gbu ma to, mbɛ an bɛɛ‑a a ɔ yen, yɔ musu chɛ n na‑a a ɔ yian buɛ min dɔ nn na. Chɛɛ an bɛɛ ma a wandi gbu yen ni nɔ.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo wooen ba mu. Fen mu, wo ee fua dan‑da koe chɛ n na, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n‑na miin fɔ wo ye?
A ma biaen fan ni kunka mansa ko a, a ni mɔnɛ ɔ bia. Chɛ an ni ma, Yataa e na to a kɔɔ sɔ‑a saya ɔ, a ni a sɛmbɛn banda bu ɔ.”
Mbɛ a‑a a ɔ yian an na, koe miin nyɛnden ni a si a ma Yataa 'a gboo gbɛɛ ɔ. A‑a a kuu sɔ chɛ an ma, Mosisi‑a miin nyɛn, a ta Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n gbɛɛ‑a miin nyɛn.
Mbɛ an gbɛn‑da konko chɛ baima, an ni ta tena ka min dɔ. Chisɔsi‑a a ma wan, yɔ a toen ni a ni ben an konko chɛ ma.
Chɛɛ an‑na a ɔ bia wan, an dɔ, “Mmɔ chi nɛ. Tee bea‑a gbɛ, a sin pimbi ɛ gbɛ bun koe an dɔ.” Mbɛ an bɛ ta‑a an na chenɛ a chi koe a.
Mbɛ an bɛ si‑a an na daun chɛ tena, mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a biidi ya, a‑a Yataa wai bɔ a ko a, mbɛ a‑a a tɛ kai, mbɛ a‑a a du an ma.
A ya kɔɔɛ a, mbɛ an‑na a ɔ gbɛ gbadan mbɛ Chisɔsi an nɛ. Chɛɛ a tuin‑da wan an tɛ ɔ.
Mbɛ an bun‑da a fɔ‑a an nyɔn ye, an dɔ, “Chɛ an‑na a ma, mɔ bu ɔ ni di ka, mmɔ bɛ ni na tena tima min na chia ɔ bɔ chɛ‑a chia a, a yɛ to, tima min na a ni Yataa 'a gboo chɛ fasai tena mɔ tena.”
Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, an‑na an kɔɔ sɔ, mbɛ an yɛ‑a Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. An na‑a Chisɔsi fɛ den tan kun ma dɔndɔɛ chɛ n tan fan, an na sɔndenɛ ɛ kaina dɔndɔ, an bɛ Chisɔsi fɛ mɔɛ dɔ n na,
an mbe a fɔ‑a, an dɔ, “Mansa Chisɔsi‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, tea tea a. A bɔ‑a wan Saimɔn ya a.”

Mbɛ kamin fea chɛ nu, miin ka‑a ka Emayɔsi, an‑na ko ɔ ko ɔ yian, min chɛ‑a a ɔ an tɛ an bɛ Chisɔsi a, Emayɔsi chia ma. Mbɛ an‑na a ɔ yian fan to, an fandi gbu na‑a Chisɔsi ma gbɛ buɛ min dɔ, a‑a biidi du kɛn an ma, tima min na an ni daun chɛ tena.
An to‑a bai chɛ an dɔ yian‑da, mbɛ Chisɔsi wandi gbu bɔ‑a an ya a, ɛ sɔ ɔ an tɛtɛ ma. Mbɛ a ɔ, “Yataa ni faachima be wo ma.”
Chɛɛ an ma samba‑a wan, mbɛ an chian‑da a ɔ benden ba a, a mu min na, a ni wan an yii ma, mbɛ fuɛ an bɔ‑a ka an ya a.
Chɛɛ a ɔ, “Wo ma chian n ma. A yɛ to, wo yiima ma tankan tankan a si n ma.

Wo n boo n ma fɛn bɛ, wo ni n chenɛ n ma fɛn. Wo e a ɔ yen‑da wan, mbɛ n fandi gbu an nɛ. Wo tu n na, wo ni a ɔ yen, mbɛ n gboo ɛ wan, a basan n kuu n na. Chɛ an mbe a ɔ yian‑da wo a, mbɛ n fan gbu an nɛ, fuɛ ma chɛ a. A mu min na, fuɛ gboo ee, n mbe ee baa a kuu n ni ma.”
A ban‑da kɛn chɛ fɔ‑a, mbɛ a‑a a boo n yian an na, a basan a chenɛ n na.

An nii ma dan nin bɛ a a, ni Chisɔsi an ni ka koɔ tena an tena. A mu min na, buɔdia ni koo wɛ an dɔ, an sin da ɔ gbaaen fa ni to. Chɛ an fɛ ni, a‑a an dɔ tisa, a ɔ, “Fen kɔ fen mbe wan nɛ wo boo ɔ, a daun koe a?”
Mbɛ an‑na nyɛ mindaenɛ tɛn dɔndɔ be a ma,
mbɛ a‑a a bia, a‑a a daun an gbɛɛ ya kɔɔ.

Mbɛ a ɔ, “Tima min na mmɔ bɛ ni, n na‑a a fɔ wan wo ye, mbɛ koe miin gbɛɛ nyɛndenɛ ɛ a si n ma, mbɛ an gbɛɛ ɛ bɔ‑a wan a a. Mbɛ ko ɔ ko sawa chɛ ɔ, Yataa‑a min be Mosisi ma, an bɛ Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ tɔɛ n na, a basan Yataa tando si gboo a, an gbɛɛ ɛ bɔ‑a wan a a.”
A‑a a ma wan, an‑na Yataa 'a gboo ɔ gbɛ chɛndɛ chɛ.
Mbɛ a ɔ, “Chɛ an nyɛnden mu Yataa 'a gboo ɔ. Mbɛ n fan, kunka mansa, mbɛ n mbe tɔɔya ɔ bia‑a pɛn, mbɛ n‑na n kɔɔ sɔ gbɛ a ka saya ɔ, tee fea a sawan bɔɛ ma.

Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ wan to, mbɛ a 'a sakana bai chɛ ɛ che‑a wan mɔɛ n ma dunya chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ n tɔɛ ɔ. Mbɛ mɔɛ n ni an kan kɔ sɔ an 'na ko yama n na, min mbe a ma, Yataa ni a boo bɔ an 'na ko yama n dɔ. A ɔ, an ni sakana bai chɛ ɔ yian Chuusaɛn duu pɛn dɔ.
Wo wandi gbu‑a koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ɔ yen. Wo an dɔ yian mɔ ɔ mɔ a.
Mbɛ a yen ko, n mbe a a yii‑a wan wo tena, Fa Yataa na‑a wo too ɔ dia‑a min na. Chɛɛ wo ma ka nɛ Chuusaɛn aan wo ni gbasaya ma sɔn, min mbe ka‑a banda bu ɔ.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɛ denɛ n ya wan, mbɛ a bɔ‑a an na Chuusaɛn duu bu ɔ, a ta‑a an na Bɛtani tanda ɔ. A‑a a boo dɛn an kun ma, mbɛ a‑a an dua.
A to‑a an dua an na, mbɛ a bɔ‑a an tɛ ɔ, mbɛ Yataa‑a a ya a sɛ‑a a a banda bu ɔ.
Chisɔsi fɛ den chɛ n‑na an kumbai gbangban fan, mbɛ an‑na a fai, mbɛ an yɛ‑a Chuusaɛn buɔdia wa ɔ.
An ni wan Yataa 'a kata ɔ, an mbe tando be‑a Yataa ma tima ɔ tima ko a.
Dunya e na to a kuu sɔ‑a, an mbe mɔɛ min chee, an dɔ, Bai, a ni wan gbɛ nɔ. An fea ni Yataa a, a wɛɛ ni Yataa an na.
Bai chɛ ni wan gbɛ nɔ, an fea Yataa a, a ka a tima chɛ ma.
Bai chɛ an‑na fen kɔ fen na dan. Yataa ma a ma ni, fen kɔ fen min na dan‑da, a a ni dan a gbaa.
A wan mbe fɔɛ chɛndɛ be. An fɔɛ chɛ, an mu manɛ a mɔ gbu ko a.
Man chɛ ɛ manɛ be tena wan tun pimbi pimbi ɔ. A sin, pimbi ee che kuɔ fɔ a ma‑a, a ni sɛmbɛ man koe a.
Kaminɛ ni wan nɔ, min tɔ ni Chɔn. Yataa wandi, an na‑a a sɔ.
An Chɔn chɛ na‑a, a ni man chɛ wakoe ɔ yian mɔɛ n na, min mbe a ma, mɔ ɔ mɔ ni an sakana bai chɛ a min, an sin ni dan a a.
A wandi gbu, an nii ma man chɛ a. A na‑a dechee, a ni a wakoe fɔ mɔɛ n ye.
Mɔɛ min mu tea manɛ a, min mbe manɛ be mɔ ɔ mɔ ma, a ni na tena wan dunya ɔ.
Bai chɛ ni wan dunya ɔ, a‑a dunya min na dan ka. Chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, mɔɛ n nii ma a sɔn ni a buɛ chɛ ɔ.
A ta‑a wan a waa a, chɛɛ a ta mɔɛ chɛ nu, an ma an boo a si ni a kɔɔ.
Chɛɛ mɔɛ n‑na an boo si wan a kɔɔ, miin‑na an kai fa a a. Chɛ ko a, an mɔɛ chɛ nu, a‑a gbasaya be wan an ma, ma koe a Yataa 'a denɛ n na.
An ma ma ni Yataa 'a denɛ n na mɔgbuya ta chia an na. Yataa wandi an‑na a ma, an ma‑a a 'a denɛ n na.

An ni a wɛn chee, an dɔ, Bai, a na‑a ma wan mɔ gbu a, koadia chinchimaya faenɛ ɛ a faa a, a basan danaya a Yataa tena. A ni wan nn tɛ ɔ. Nn na‑a a ɔ yen fan, a kamayaen ni buɛ min dɔ, kamaya min ni a ɔ, a wan Fa Yataa 'a Den dɔndɔ gbe.

Chɔn na‑a bai sa wan gbankon, a si a ma, a ɔ, “Mɔɛ chɛ mu, n‑na min na koe fɔ wo ye, n dɔ, ‘Mɔɛ min mbe na tena, n gbaa chia a, a gbasayaen mu a ni ben n ma.’ N dɔ, ‘Koe min na mu, a ni wan fɔɛ ɔ, n nii ma suun nin bɛ tima min na.’ ”
Koadia chinchimaya min faen mu a faa ɔ, an mbe a ma tena, ɛ mmɔ gbɛɛ dua tena tima sɛsɛ a.
Yataa na‑a a 'a sawa n na ben Mosisi an na, chɛɛ koadia chinchimaya tana, a basan danaya a, mmɔ‑a an ma sɔn Chisɔsi Chasi an na.
Mɔ ɔ mɔ ma Yataa yen nin bɛ. Chɛɛ a 'a Den dɔndɔ gbe, min fandi mu Yataa a, an fea an mbe min na tima ɔ tima, a‑a a ma, mɔɛ n‑na a Fa sɔn.

Mbɛ Chu mɔɛ nu Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, an ya ɔ sɔɛ nu, an‑na mɔɛ dɔ n sɔ wan Chɔn tena. An tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, a basan mɔɛ n na, miin bɛɛ bɔ‑a Difai 'a dambi ɔ, an‑na an sɔ wan. An dɔ, an ni Chɔn dɔ tisa, ni mɔɛ minan sima mu a a. Chɔn na‑a chɛ an fɔ an ye.
A ma ban ni koɔ koe a an tena, chɛɛ a‑a a fɔ wan an ye den, a boo kaenɛ a ma, a ɔ, “N fan ma a a, kunka mansa chɛ.”

Mbɛ an‑na a ɔ tisa to, an dɔ, “Nyɔn sin mu gbɛ i a?” An dɔ, “Idaicha an bɔ‑a ka to?” A ɔ, “N fan ma, Idaicha ma n na.” Mbɛ an dɔ te to, “Mosisi na‑a Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ dɔndɔ na koe fɔ wan. A mu i wan na?” A ɔ, “N fan ma.”
Mbɛ an dɔ te gbɛ, an dɔ, “Mbɛ a fɔ gbɛ nn ye, mɔɛ min mu i a.” An dɔ, “Ni nn yɛ‑a, mɔɛ miin‑na nn sɔ, an mbe to‑a wan i wakoe ɔ sɔn koe a.” An dɔ, “Fen mbe i da a, a si i wandi ma?”

Mbɛ Chɔn dɔ, “Mɔɛ min ni gbonka chɛ tena, fuinɛ ma, n fan mu an mɔɛ chɛ a. N dɔ, wo chia ɔ bɛn chɛndɛ, Yataa Mansa tachɛ koe a, a ni na.” Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛ suun, min tɔ ni Aisaya, a da a kuiɛ an nii nɛ, Chɔn yɛ‑a a ɔ.
Chu mɔɛ chɛ dɔ nu, an na‑a miin sɔ, Fayisii n ni an na.
Mbɛ an‑na a ɔ tisa to, an dɔ, “Ni kunka mansa chɛ ma i a, Idaicha ma i a, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛ wɛɛ a ma i a, tisa chɛ yen ko. Fen ko a mu, e yii chɛ mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a?”
A ɔ, “N mbe yii an chɛ dechee mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a. Chɛɛ mɔɛ ɛ sɔ ɔ wo tɛ ɔ, wo ma min sɔn, a sɔn buɛ a.
An mbe na tena sɔ‑a n chen gba ɔ. Chɛɛ a tɔɛ ɛ bɔ‑a wan gbeden, a sin gbu, n mbe ee che a 'a kɔɔwa yuu wɛɛ fuin koe a.”
Chɛ gbɛɛ na‑a chɛ‑a a ɔ Bɛtani duu ɔ wan, Chɔdan yii kaka dɔndɔɛ ma, tee bɔ chia a. Chɔn ni nɔ wan, ɛ yii chɛ‑a mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a.
Mbɛ banda ɔ ka‑a kɛn, tee dɔndɔɛ ma, Chɔn‑na Chisɔsi yen na‑a a tena. Mbɛ a wan Chɔn dɔ, “Yataa 'a sa tɔngbɔɛ yen ko a na‑a, mɔɛ n 'na ko yama n gbɛɛ dunya ma, an mbe si ɔ min kun ma.
Mɔɛ chɛ mu, n‑na min na koe fɔ wo ye, n dɔ, ‘Mɔɛ min mbe na tena, n gbaa chia a, a gbasayaen mu a ni ben n ma.’ N dɔ, ‘Koe min na mu, a ni wan fɔɛ ɔ, n nii ma suun nin bɛ tima min na.’
N fandi gbu wɛɛ, n nii ma an mɔɛ chɛ sɔn, a sɔn buɛ a. Chɛɛ n na‑a, n mbe yii chɛ mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, a ma koe a Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ nu, an ni a sɔn, a sɔn buɛ a.”

Chɔn na‑a a ɔ yian ka wan, koe min na‑a ma. A ɔ, “N nii ma a sɔn, a sɔn buɛ a. Chɛɛ Yataa min‑na n sɔ, yii chɛ koe a mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, a na‑a a fɔ wan n ye, a ɔ, n mbe a Nyina yen‑da wan, a ni yii, a ka banda bu ɔ, mbɛ a bea‑a mɔɛ fɛ gban. A ɔ, an mɔɛ chɛ, an mbe a ma‑a, Yataa Nyina chɛ, ɛ ma‑a mɔɛ n fɛ.” Chɔn dɔ, “A sin,” a ɔ, “n‑na Yataa Nyina chɛ yen fan, a yii‑a fɛɛ yɔ bugbɔɛ, mbɛ a bea‑a mɔɛ fɛ.”
A ɔ, “N‑na chɛ ɔ yen fan, a ma‑a,” a ɔ, “n sin mbe a fɔ tena gbɛ, mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ mu Yataa 'a denɛ an na.”
Mbɛ banda ɔ ka‑a to, tee dɔndɔɛ ma, Chɔn sɔ‑a to nɔ, an bɛ a fɛ den fea an na.
A‑a Chisɔsi yen kɛn ben‑da an baima, a ɔ, “Yataa 'a sa tɔngbɔɛ yen ko ben‑da.”
A fɛ den fea chɛ nu, an‑na a da a bai chɛ a min fan, mbɛ an bea‑a Chisɔsi fɛ.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a ya a mun, a‑a an yen, an beaenɛ ɛ a fɛ. Mbɛ a ɔ, “Wo wan, wo e fen yan tena?” Mbɛ an dɔ, “Kan mɔ, i yia tena ɛ mende?”
Mbɛ a ɔ, “Wo na, wo ni nɔ yen.” A tima chɛ a, awa naanin bɔɛ ni gbɛ che an na, tee yiienɛ ma. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, an ta‑a kɛn an‑na a waa yen, an bɛ an na tee bea gbɛ nɔ.
Mɔ fea chɛ dɔndɔ ni Anduu an na, Saimɔn Pita dɔ kaima.
Anduu‑a koe min pɛn pɛn ma, a‑a a kɔɔɛ Saimɔn yan fan. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ a ye, a ɔ, “Nn‑na mɔɛ chɛ yen, min mu kunka mansa a.” (Kiisi mɔɛ n dɔ, Chasi).
Mbɛ a ta‑a Saimɔn na Chisɔsi tena. Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a Saimɔn ma fɛn kɔdɛɛ, mbɛ a ɔ, “I tɔ mu Saimɔn, i fa sin tɔ mu Chɔn. Chɛɛ i tɔɛ ɛ ma tena Kefasi an na gbɛ.” (Tɔɛ chɛ, ni a a mun‑da, a mu Pita an na).
A banda ka dɔndɔɛ ma, mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a yii na chii, mbɛ a‑a Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ chia bia. Mbɛ a‑a Fiipi yan, mbɛ a ɔ te a ma, a ɔ, “Na, i ni ma n fɛ denɛ a.”
Fiipi chɛ, a na‑a ka Besaida wan, duu chɛ, Anduu an fea Pita a, an baa a.

Mbɛ Fiipi‑a a ya a kan Natanɛɛ a. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ a ye, a ɔ, “Mɔɛ min, Mosisi na‑a a wakoe nyɛn, sawa gboo chɛ ɔ, nn‑na a yen. A yɛ to, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n bɛɛ, an na‑a fenɛ nyɛn to, a si an ma. A tɔ mu Chisɔsi, min ka‑a Nasaɛti duu ɔ, kai chɛ, Chosɛfi, a 'a denɛ.”
Mbɛ Natanɛɛ ɔ, “Nasaɛti chɛ, fen kɔ fen mbe che wan bɔ‑a nɔ, min mbe ma tɔnɔnɛ a mɔ gbu tena?” Mbɛ Fiipi ɔ, “Na, i ni a yen.”
Chisɔsi‑a Natanɛɛ yen kɛn na‑a a tena, a‑a chɛ an fɔ, a si a ma. A ɔ, “Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ chɛndɛ chɛndɛ a yen ko na‑a, tɔɛ chɛ bɛnden mu min kun ma. Mɔɛ mu a a, a ee mɔ ɔ mɔ bun.”
Natanɛɛ‑a a ɔ tisa, a ɔ, “I ma‑a ka ma, i‑a n sɔn?” Chisɔsi ɔ, “Fiki kɔn chɛ kɔɔ, n‑na i yen nɔ wan, Fiipi e na to i chee‑a.”
Natanɛɛ ɔ, “Kan mɔ,” a ɔ, “Yataa 'a denɛ chɛndɛ chɛndɛ mu i a,” a ɔ, “Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n 'na mansa mu i a.”
Chisɔsi ɔ, “N‑na a fɔ wan i ye, mbɛ n‑na i yen fan, i ni tima min na fiki kɔn chɛ kɔɔ. Chɛ an gbu‑a a ma ka, i dan‑da ka n na? E na tena wan koe sɛsɛ ɔ yen‑da ma‑a, miin benden mu chɛ ma kaka.”
Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Ka wɛ n ni chɛ ma din wo tena. Wo e a ɔ yen‑da wan, banda bu ɔ da a ni ka, mbɛ Yataa 'a maeka n yii‑a. An mbe sɛ‑a wan, an mbe yii, n na tindanɛ, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ.”
Tee dɔndɔ bendenɛ gbakɔ, a fean bɔɛ ma, Chisɔsi de ni wan daun chɛ bɛnɛ ɔ, Kana duu ɔ, Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ. An bɛn chɛ kunɛ ni musu si koe an na.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi wɛɛ, an ni a chee sonda an na, an bɛn chɛ ɔ, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na.
Gbɛ min ni bɛn chɛ ko a, sonda chɛ n ban‑da kɛn a min‑da, mbɛ Chisɔsi de koɔ‑a a tena, a ɔ, “Gbɛ gbɛɛ tɛtɛ ban‑da.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Bɔɔɛ, a to n 'na boo ma dechee. Tima ma che nin bɛ n ko a.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi de‑a a fɔ bɔi den chɛ n ye, miin ni gbɛ kun ma, min ban‑da ka, a ɔ, “Bai ɔ bai, ɛ min fɔ‑a wo ye, wo a ma.”

Chu mɔɛ nu, an 'na Yataa fai ɔ, an 'na sawa n kɔkoo, a si an ko buɛ ma. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, yii si fenɛ n ni wan nɔ si ɔ, an ni wɔdɔ, an sin gbɛɛ ni koo wan. An nyanden ni senɛ ɔ wan, a sin, a dɔndɔɛ, a ni yii ya wan, min mbe kadɔn bi fea tɛ bi sawa a.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Yii si fen chɛ nu, wo an na fa yii a.” Mbɛ an‑na an gbɛɛ a fa gban.
Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye to, a ɔ, “Wo a sima bɔ yii si fen chɛ n dɔ, wo ni ta a a kai wandi tena, min mbe wo ya ɔ.” Mbɛ an‑na a ma ka.

Yii chɛ, min fandenɛ ni gbɛ ka gbɛ a, a‑a a ma fɛn. A nii ma a ɔ sɔn, gbɛ chɛ ka‑a kaina min. Chɛɛ bɔi den chɛ n tana, miin na‑a yii chɛ bɔ, an na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan. Mbɛ an ya ɔ sɔɛ chɛ‑a kamin chɛ chee, min‑na musu si bɛnɛ ni a ɔ, mbɛ an sɔ‑a ka wan.

Mbɛ a ɔ, “Ni i bɔ n‑na mɔɛ n chee bɛn bonda chɛ ɔ, an mbe gbɛ chɛndɛ pɛn be mɔɛ n ma. Ni an‑na a ɔ yen, mbɛ gbɛ kun‑da an gboo ɔ, mbɛ an‑na a kuu sɔ gbɛ tafu tafu be‑a. Chɛɛ i tana, i‑a gbɛ chɛndɛ si tena ɔ bɛn fan aan, mbɛ i danka‑a a a bɔ‑a sanche.”
Kamaya koe wa saa an nii nɛ, Chisɔsi na‑a min ma. A na‑a a ma Kana duu ɔ wan, Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ. A na‑a a ɔ yian nɔ wan, a kamayaen ni buɛ min dɔ, mbɛ a fɛ denɛ n‑na an kai fa a a.
Chɛ gbakɔ, Chisɔsi yii‑a Kapanaun duu ɔ. An fea ni a de a, a basan a suun ma nyɔɛ kaima n na, ni a fɛ denɛ nu. An‑na tee kuunden ben fan nɔ.
Tima ni gbɛ che koe an na, kun bɔ a ɔ bɛnɛ ko a. Chɛ ko a, Chisɔsi sɛ‑a wan Chuusaɛn duu ɔ.
A‑a a fo kɛn nɔ, a‑a mɔɛ n tan fan Yataa 'a kata ɔ, an mbe sɔ fenɛ n ma tachɛ‑a. Ninchi nu, an bɛ sa n na, a basan bugbɔɛ n bɛɛ a. Mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ, miin ni kɔpɔɛ sinchi, an ni wan nɔ si ɔ.

Mbɛ a‑a bosa nyan fan yuu ɔ, mbɛ a‑a sɔ fen chɛ n gbɛɛ gbain fan kata chɛ ɔ, sa chɛ nu, a basan ninchi chɛ n na. Mɔɛ chɛ n sin, miin ni kɔpɔɛ sinchi ka, a‑a an 'na tebu n na bɔn fan, mbɛ a‑a an 'na kɔpɔɛ a fasan fasan.
Mɔɛ chɛ n sin, miin ni ka bugbɔɛ ma tachɛ‑a, a ɔ an ma, “Wo bɔ nɛ wo 'a bugbɔɛ chɛ n na. Wo sɛmbɛ Fa 'a chenɛ ma koe a fee fen ma tachɛ chenɛ a.”
Mbɛ a puin‑da a fɛ denɛ n yii ma, mbɛ Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “Fa Yataa, i 'a chen chɛ 'a koadia koo n faa ɔ, n mbe fa tena wan a ko a.”

Mbɛ Chu mɔɛ nu, an ya ɔ sɔɛ nu, an sɔ‑a a kanɛ ɔ. An dɔ, “I‑a koe min ma ka, nn ma a ɔ sɔn ni a gbasaya chɛ ɛ wan i boo ɔ, a ma koe a. E kamaya koe minan ma‑a, a ɔ yian koe a, mbɛ a gbasaya chɛ ɛ wan i boo ɔ?”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Yataa 'a chen chɛ, wo a te wɛ. Tee sawa tɛ, n mbe a sɔ‑a wan to.”
Mbɛ an dɔ, “I ta yiima ɔ, i‑a a sɔ‑a ka ma tee sawa kɔɔ? San bi naanin, kun ma wɔdɔɛ da faenɛ ɛ gban, an‑na an ya wɛ, a sɔ koe a.”
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi yii nii Yataa 'a chenɛ an ma, a yii ni a wandi gboo an ma.
Chɛ an na‑a a ma, a na‑a a kɔɔ sɔ kɛn, a ka saya ɔ, a puin‑da a fɛ den chɛ n yii ma, a ni min fɔ tee. Mbɛ chɛ ko a, an dan‑da Yataa 'a gboo a, a basan bai chɛ n na, Chisɔsi ni miin fɔ.
Chisɔsi ni tima min na Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, kun bɔ a ɔ bɛn chɛ tima a, mɔɛ sɛsɛ na‑a an kai fa wan a a. Koe min na mu, an na‑a a ɔ yen fan, a na‑a kamaya koe miin ma.
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ma nyina ni a wandi ma an boo ɔ, koe min na mu, a na‑a mɔgbuya sɔn fan chɛndɛ chɛ.
Chisɔsi ya nii mɔ ɔ mɔ a, a ɔ yian koe a, mɔgbuya ɛ buɛ min dɔ. Koe min na mu, a wandi gbu na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, koe min gbɛɛ ni an faa ɔ.
Mbɛ kaminɛ ni wan nɔ, min tɔ ni Nikɔdemɔsi. Ya ɔ sɔɛ dɔndɔ ni a a, Chu mɔɛ chɛ n tɛ ɔ, a sin, Fayisii dɔndɔ ni to a a.

Yɛɛ dɔndɔ ma, kamin chɛ na‑a wan Chisɔsi tena, mbɛ a ɔ, “Kan mɔ, nn‑na a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ i ta tichaya, Yataa an‑na i a na. Mɔ ɔ mɔ ee che kamaya koe chɛ n ma‑a, e miin ma ka, mɔɔ ni Yataa ma‑a an mɔɛ chɛ kɔ.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N ni a ma din i tena, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee don Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ, mɔɔ ni a mɔɛ chɛ suun‑da to a nama a.
Mbɛ kamin chɛ ɔ, “Musu si kai, ɛ kun ka ma to a ni suun, a gba fean bɔɛ ko a? A de ee che kɛn to, a ni a bu ya a nama a, mbɛ a‑a a suun, gba fean bɔɛ ko a.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N ni a ma din to i tena, mbɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ ee che don‑da Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ, mɔɔ ni a suun‑da to yii a, an fea Yataa Nyina a.
Mɔ gbu woo mɔɛ nu, an fan mbe a suun dunya chɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ Yataa Nyina, an mbe a ma, mɔ gbu ni ma Yataa 'a denɛ a.
Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, a ee che ma‑a i ma kɔndɔ fii‑a, ni n‑na a fɔ, n dɔ, mɔɔ ni wo suun‑da to a nama a.

Fia toen mu a ni bɔ kaina min, ɛ bɔ nɔ wan. Mɔ ɛ a bɔ kuiɛ a min fan, chɛɛ mɔ ee che a ɔ sɔn‑da, ɛ ka tena kaka min ma. Chɛ an mbe ma mɔ gbu kan kɔ kan bɛɛ a, Yataa Nyina an mbe a ma, mɔ gbu ni suun to a nama a.”
Chɛɛ Nikɔdemɔsi ɔ, “Yataa Nyina ɛ che ka ma a ma‑a, mɔ gbu ni suun to a nama a?”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi wɛɛ ɔ, “I sin, i ticha wa chɛ Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n tɛ ɔ, fen mu ee chɛ n dɔ gbɛ?

N ni chɛ ma din i tena, mbɛ nn‑na koe miin dɔ sɔn, nn mbe koɔ a si an fan ma. A yɛ to, nn‑na koe miin dɔ yen, nn mbe siiya bɔ a si an fan ma. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ ma ma bɛn ni dan koe a nn 'na siiya a.
Ni n‑na dunya ma koe n dɔ yian wo a, wo ma dan ni n na, wo ee che‑a wo ni dan n na, ni n‑na banda bu ɔ koe n dɔ yian wo a. Chɛ ɛ ma‑a wan?
A sin ko, mɔ ɔ mɔ ma sɛ nin bɛ banda bu ɔ, mɔɔ dechee n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ. N fan ka‑a nɔ, n yii‑a nɛ dunya chɛ ɔ.
Mosisi ni tima min na suun fuinɛ ma, ka chɛ, min nyandenɛ ni kundu ɔ, a na‑a a dɛn fan kɔnɛ a. A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ wɛɛ, an mbe n dɛn‑da ka wan.
Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, mɔ ɔ mɔ min kai faen mu n na, an ni kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn.”

Yataa na‑a a 'a Den dɔndɔ gbe be wan, a ɔ yian koe a mɔɛ n na dunya ɔ, koadia min nyɔn sima ɛ a faa ɔ, mɔɛ gbɛɛ ko a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a kai fa a 'a Den chɛ a, a ee fa‑a, a ni to saya ɔ, chɛɛ ɛ kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da wan.
Koe min na mu to, Yataa ma a 'a Den chɛ a na ni dunya ɔ, kaa an na tɛ koe a mɔɛ n ma, a ni an tɔɔ. Chɛɛ a‑a a a na, a ni ma an kun ka mɔɛ a.

Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe a kai fa‑a a 'a Den chɛ a, Yataa ee kaa a tɛ‑a a wakoe ma, a ni tɔɔ. Chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ min ma a kai fa ni a a, kaa a bandenɛ mu tɛ‑a a wakoe ma, a tɔɔ koe a, a mu min na, a ma a kai fa ni Yataa 'a Den dɔndɔ gbe a.

Yataa ɛ a 'a kaa a tɛ ka wan mɔɛ n ma. Manɛ na‑a wan dunya chɛ ɔ, min mu tea a si Yataa ma. Chɛɛ mɔɛ n toen mu ma koe a an 'na ko yama n pimbi ɔ, an mbe e na ma man chɛ ɔ. Koe min na mu, an chɛ chɛ wai nu, an ma nyin.
Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe ko yama n ma, a ma to ni man chɛ a, a sin, a e na man chɛ ɛ ma kaina min. Koe min na mu, a ma to ni, man chɛ ni a 'a ko yama n na bɔ ya a ma.
Chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe ko chɛndɛ ma, an mbe na man chɛ tena. A ɛ chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, man chɛ ni a ɔ yian, mbɛ ɛ kooya be wan Yataa ma, a chɛ chɛ wai n dɔ.
Chɛ gbakɔ, mbɛ Chisɔsi ben‑da nɔ ma, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na. Mbɛ an ta‑a Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ. An‑na tima kundu ɛnden ya wan nɔ, Chisɔsi ɛ ta‑a yii chɛ‑a mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a.

A tima dɔndɔ gbe chɛ kɔɔ, Chɔn bɛɛ, a ni Ainon duu ɔ wan. Ainon chɛ, yii ni nɔ kaka, chɛ an fɛ ni, Chɔn na‑a nɔ, ɛ yii chɛ‑a mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, miin ni na an mbe a tan. A sin, Ainon chɛ tɛ ɔ nii ma yansan Sadin duu ɔ a.
Chɛ n ma‑a pɛn, an mbe e na to Chɔn sa‑a pimbi chenɛ a.
A tima chɛ a, Chɔn fɛ denɛ dɔ nu, kɔɔsa don‑da wan an tɛ, an bɛ Chu mɔ dɔndɔ a. An kɔɔsa chɛ kunɛ ni mɔɛ ɛ a wandi ma ko buɛ min dɔ Yataa ko a.

Mbɛ an na‑a Chɔn tena, an dɔ, “Kan mɔ, kaminɛ wɛɛ yen ko pan yii chɛ‑a mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a. Mɔɛ n mbe nyɔndɔn tena wan gbɛ a tena. A to‑a wan i yii ma, wo fea ni kaminɛ min na Chɔdan yii kaka dɔndɔɛ ma, e min chee ka kunka mansa a, an kamin chɛ mu.”
Chɔn dɔ, “Ni koe ma‑a ka, Yataa an dɔn‑da a ma.
Wo wandi gbu, n 'na siiya n mu wo a, mbɛ n ni a fɔ wan, n dɔ, n fan ma kunka mansa a. Chɛɛ n dɔ, n 'na naen mu dechee a ya ɔ wan, chia ɔ bɛn koe a.

Sɛnama tana, musu fuu kai an ta mu a a. Chɛɛ an kai chɛ bɔɛ tana, min mbe ta a ya ɔ, dɔbɛn chɛ koe a, a too an ma sɔenɛ ɛ ma dechee. A bu ɔ dia‑a wan, ni a‑a musu fuu kai gbu kuiɛ a min. N ta buɔdia da faen mu ka wan gbɛ.
A nyin a wan ni ma mɔ chenama wa a, n sin tana n ni ma mɔ dɔɔma a.”
Mɔɛ chɛ, min ka‑a banda bu ɔ, a benden mu mɔɛ gbɛɛ ma, tea ko a. Mɔɛ chɛ sin tana min mbe dunya chɛ ɔ, ɛ bai sa a si dunya ma koe n fan ma dechee.
Mɔɛ min ka‑a banda bu ɔ, a tana, a‑a miin dɔ yen nɔ, a‑a miin na min, ɛ an fan dɔ yian. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, mɔɛ n mbe ee an boo si a 'a sakana bai kɔɔ.
Chɛɛ mɔɛ nu, miin mbe an boo si‑a a 'a sakana chɛ kɔɔ, an mbe ma‑a ka a ɔ yian fan na, mbɛ Yataa 'a bai mu tea an na.
Mɔɛ chɛ, Yataa‑a min na na, an mbe a 'a bai sa. Koe min na mu, Yataa‑a a Nyina min na yii, a ni ma a fɛ, a da faen gban.
Mmɔ Fa Yataa toen mu a 'a Denɛ a, an‑na a ma, a‑a gbasaya be a ma fen kɔ fen kun ma.
Mɔɛ min mbe a kai fa‑a Yataa 'a denɛ a, ɛ kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da wan. Chɛɛ mɔɛ min mbe ee a kai fa‑a a 'a Denɛ a, a ee kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da. Koe min na mu, Yataa faa tɛenɛ an mbe ma‑a a ma.

Chisɔsi na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, min fɔen ni Chu mɔɛ chɛ n ye, miin ni Fayisii n na. A fɔen fan ni an ye, mbɛ mɔɛ miin mbe bea tena a wan Chisɔsi fɛ, ɛ yii chɛ tena miin kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, an da a koo, an ni ben Chɔn ta n ma.
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi wandi gbu sin fan nii yii chɛ‑a mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, a fɛ denɛ n fan ni a ma tena.
Chisɔsi‑a a a min kɛn bai min ni sa tena, a si a ma, a bɔ‑a wan Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ, mbɛ a yɛ‑a Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ.
A ni kɛn ta‑a Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ, a ben‑da Samayia chɛnyɛ ɔ chia an na.
Samayia chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ, a‑a duu dɔndɔ tan fan, min tɔ ni Sika. Nɔ tena ɔ nii ma yansan duu gboo chɛ a, kai Chekɔpi na‑a min be a 'a denɛ Chosɛfi ma.

Yii sonɛ wɛɛ, a wan kai Chekɔpi ta ni min na suun, a ni wan bɛ nɔ. Mbɛ Chisɔsi si‑a an yii son chɛ baima, koe min na mu, tachɛ ɔ yansama chɛ na‑a a gboo ɔ fa wan. A tima chɛ a, tee cheenɛ ni gbɛ mɔ kun tɛ.
A ɔ ma yansan ni, mbɛ Samayia musu dɔndɔ na‑a yii bɔ tena son chɛ ɔ. Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ a ma, “N kɔ yii ɔ, n mbe n min.”
A tima chɛ a, a fɛ denɛ n taenɛ ni duu ɔ, daun fen san tena.
Mbɛ musu chɛ ɔ, “Chɛɛ Chu mɔɛ mu i a, n sin mu Samayia mɔɛ a. Mmɔ ma to ni mmɔ nyɔn na ɛnden bɛɛ a. E kun kan ma i ni yii fuin n ma?”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ni i na‑a Yataa 'a wai nyima sɔn fan mɔɛ n tena, a sin, i na‑a n sɔn fan, n fɛn mbe ka koɔ‑a i tena, i ni tisa dɔ mende an chɛ‑a n na. A sin, n ni yii be‑a wan i ma, min mbe fɔɛ be mɔ gbu ma.”
Mbɛ musu chɛ ɔ, “Kai, yii bɔ chiti ee kɛn i boo ɔ, yii son chɛ sin dɔ yansan. E ka‑a gbɛ mende yii chɛ a, min mbe fɔɛ be mɔ gbu ma?

Nn bemba n ta bemba kai Chekɔpi, an‑na yii son chɛ to nn boo ɔ. An bɛ a 'a denɛ n na, an ni yii son chɛ an min. A 'a sɔ fenɛ n bɛɛ, yii son dɔndɔ gbe chɛ ɔ yii, an ni an min. I toen mu i ni a fɔ n ye, mbɛ i benden mu nn bemba Chekɔpi ma, ae?”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ, an mbe yii son chɛ min, an kanɛ a ɛ gbaa‑a wan to.

Chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe yii chɛ min, n mbe min be‑a a ma, a kanɛ a ee gbaa‑a to kuɔ fɔ. N mbe yii chɛ min be‑a a ma, ɛ ma‑a wan a faa ɔ. A sin, an yii chɛ ɔ ee tɛ‑a, ɛ a ma‑a wan, a ni kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn.”
Mbɛ musu chɛ ɔ, “Kai, an yii chɛ be n ma, n mbe a min, min mbe a ma‑a, n kanɛ a ee gbaa‑a to kuɔ fɔ ko a. N mbe ee ma‑a to yii chɛ ɔ chia ma, yii bɔɛ a tee ɔ tee a.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ni a fɔ gbɛ a ye, a ɔ, “Ta wɛ, i ni i chɛɛ chee, mbɛ wo fea na‑a a a.”
Mbɛ musu chɛ ɔ, “Chɛɛ kai ee kɛn n boo ɔ.” Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “I‑a a fɔɛ min chɛ, i ɔ, kai ee i boo ɔ, tea mu a a.”
A ɔ, “Kai duu an fan‑na i si ka gbɛ musu a, a sin, wo fea ɛ ka min bɛɛ a sanche, an ma i fuu ni. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, i‑a bai min fɔ ka n ye sanche, tea mu.”
Mbɛ musu chɛ ɔ gbɛ, “Kai, n‑na a ɔ yen gbɛ, mbɛ Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ mu i a.
Nn bemba n ta bemba nu, Samayia chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ, an ni Yataa fai kɔnkɔɛ chɛ an dɔ nɛ. Chɛɛ wo wan Chu mɔɛ nu, wo ɔ, mbɛ Yataa‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, mɔ ɛ a fai dechee Chuusaɛn duu ɔ wan.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Bɔɔɛ, dan n da a kuiɛ a. Tima ɛ na tena wan che‑a, tima min na, mɔɛ n mbe ee Fa Yataa fai‑a kɔnkɔɛ chɛ ma, an mbe ee a fai‑a Chuusaɛn duu wɛɛ ɔ.

Wo wan Samayia mɔɛ nu, wo ma a ɔ sɔn, wo e min gbu fai tena. Chɛɛ nn fan Chu mɔɛ nu, nn‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, nn mbe min fai. Koe min na mu, Yataa‑a nn too ɔ dia wan, a ma koe a, mɔɛ n ni a 'a bauncha ma sɔn.

Chɛɛ tima ɛ che‑a wan, a sin gbu che‑a gbɛ, tima min na, mɔɛ miin mbe Fa Yataa fai, a Nyina ni gbasaya be an ma a fai koe a. A Nyina chɛ, ɛ tea ɔ yian‑da wan to an na a si a wan Fa Yataa wandi ma. An mɔɛ chɛ n fan mbe Yataa fai tea chia a, a sin mbe an fan yan tena a fai koe a.
Yataa ma mɔ gbu a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, mɔɛ miin mbe a fai, a nyin Yataa Nyina wandi ni gbasaya be an ma, a fai koe a. A yɛ to, mbɛ a‑a tea ɔ yian an na, a si a wandi ma.”
Mbɛ musu chɛ ɔ, “N‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ Chasi, kunka mansa ɛ na tena wan. A sin mbe na‑a kɛn, ɛ ko ɔ ko ɔ yian‑da wan mmɔ a.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N fan gbu mu an mɔɛ chɛ a, n fɛn mbe ka koɔ tena i tena.”

Ɛ bai chɛ fɔ‑a dechee, mbɛ a fɛ denɛ chɛ n yɛ‑a, a ka duu ɔ. A sin, an da ɔ gbaa‑a wan, an‑na a tan kɛn chia ɔ bɔɛ ɔ, an fea musu chɛ a. Chɛɛ an dɔndɔ wɛɛ ma musu chɛ ɔ tisa ni, a ni a fɔ, a ɔ, “I toen mu fen na?” Dɔndɔ wɛɛ ma Chisɔsi ɔ tisa ni, a ni a fɔ, a ɔ, “Fen mu e koɔ‑a musu chɛ tena?”
Mbɛ musu chɛ‑a a 'a yii chiti to, mbɛ a yɛ‑a duu ɔ. Mbɛ a‑a koe chɛ ɔ yian nɔ mɔɛ n na.
Mbɛ a ɔ, “Wo na, wo ni kaminɛ yen, min‑na ko ɔ ko ɔ yian n na, n‑na miin gbɛɛ ma wɛ. A e na ma kunka mansa chɛ an na?”
Mbɛ mɔɛ n na‑a Chisɔsi tena, a ka an duu chɛ ɔ.
Chɛ ɛ ma‑a tima min na, Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ n ni a ma nande tena wan, an dɔ, “Kan mɔ, daun fenɛ sima daun gbɛ.”
Chɛɛ a ɔ, “Daun fenɛ ɛ n boo ɔ, wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ ma min bakoe ɔ sɔn.”
Mbɛ a fɛ den chɛ nu, an bun‑da an nyɔn dɔ tisa‑a, an dɔ, “Mɔɛ an mbe na na daun fenɛ a kai chɛ ye?”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Min 'na dɛya mu n na, ni n‑na a faa ma koe ma, n ni a 'a wai a ban, a‑a n sɔ min na, an mu n 'na daun fenɛ a.

Wo e a fɔ wan, wo ɔ, a ka a fɛn tima ma, wo ɔ, kau naanin fan mbe ben, wo ɔ, a tɛ koe a. Chɛɛ n ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ wo ni an sɛnɛ gbu ma mɛn, wo e a ɔ yen‑da wan, mbɛ fen chɛ n gbu, miin fɛndenɛ ɛ ka, an tɛ tima gbu che‑a.

A tɛ mɔɛ nu, an mbe wan gbɛ wai‑a, an sin mbe wan gbɛ an 'na tɔnɔnɛ ma sɔn‑da. An sin mbe an fɛn fen chɛ min na sɔn sɔn‑da, an nɛ mɔɛ n na, miin‑na kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn. A fɛn mɔɛ nu, an bɛ a tɛ mɔɛ n na, an 'na buɔdia koo.
Chɛ fɛ mu, tea mu tai chɛ a, an mbe min tɛ, an dɔ, ‘A fɛn mɔɛ ɛ gba, a tɛ mɔɛ wɛɛ ɛ gba.’
N yen ko, n‑na wo sɔ wo bɔɛ n ta tɔɔ gba tɛ‑a, wo‑a tɔnɔnɛ sɔn an 'na taa sende ɔ.”

Samayia mɔɛ chɛ n sɛsɛ nu, an duu chɛ ɔ, an na‑a an kai fa wan Chisɔsi a. Chɛ na‑a ka musu chɛ da a bai an ma, a na‑a a fɔɛ min chɛ, a ɔ, a‑a ko ɔ ko ɔ yian a a, a ɔ, a wan musu chɛ, a ɔ, a na‑a min ma fɔɛ ɔ.
Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, an na‑a kɛn Chisɔsi tena, an‑na a ɔ bia wan disa a, ma koe a nɔ an tena. Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a tee fea ben nɔ an tena.
A ka chɛ ma, mɔɛ n sɛsɛ, a‑a sakana bai min sa, an‑na a ma, an‑na an kai fa a a.

Mbɛ an dɔ musu chɛ ma, an dɔ, “I da a bai dechee an mbe ee a ma tena to, nn mbe nn kai fa tena a a. Chɛɛ koe min na mu, nn fandi gbu, nn‑na a da a bai a min. A sin, nn‑na a ɔ sɔn gbɛ, mbɛ a wan gbu mu dunya chɛ baun mɔɛ a.”
Chisɔsi‑a tee fea chɛ ben kɛn nɔ, mbɛ a ben‑da Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ.
A wandi gbu na‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “Baa ee Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ ma, a wandi gbu waa a.”

A che‑a kɛn Kadidi, nɔ mɔɛ nu, an‑na an boo si wan a kɔɔ. Koe min na mu, an bɛɛ na‑a ta wan Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, kun bɔ a ɔ bɛnɛ kun ma. A tima chɛ a, an na‑a ko ɔ ko yen fan, Chisɔsi na‑a miin ma, an bɛn chɛ ɔ.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi che‑a Kana duu ɔ, Kadidi chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ, a na‑a yii ma fan kaina min gbɛ a. Duu dɔndɔ ɔ, min tɔ ni Kapanaun, kɔmende mɔ dɔndɔ 'a den kaienɛ gbandienɛ ni wan nɔ.

Mbɛ kamin chɛ, a‑a Chisɔsi na koe a min Kadidi, a ka Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ. A‑a chɛ a min kɛn, mbɛ a na‑a a tan. Kamin chɛ‑a Chisɔsi ɔ tisa wan, disa ɔ, a ɔ, an ni yii Kapanaun, a ni a 'a denɛ a baun, min ni gbɛ sa ɔ dechee saya ma kɔnɛ a.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ a ma, a ɔ, “Wo wan, ni wo ma kamaya koe n dɔ yen ni ma‑a, wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ ee wo kai fa n na.”
Mbɛ kɔmende mɔɛ chɛ ɔ, “Kai, na, mɔ ni ta, n 'na denɛ ma na fa.”
Chisɔsi ɔ a ma, a ɔ, “Ta dechee, i 'a denɛ ɛ baun tena wan.” Kamin chɛ dan‑da wan Chisɔsi da a bai chɛ a, mbɛ a yɛ‑a.
A to‑a yɛ an na a waa a, mbɛ an bɛn‑da a 'a bɔi denɛ n na. An dɔ, “I 'a denɛ ee fa tena.”
Mbɛ a‑a an dɔ tisa, ni tima min na ni a 'a denɛ‑a a kuu sɔ fisa‑a. Mbɛ an dɔ, “Chima chɛ bɔ‑a a ɔ kunun fan, tee ben‑da kɛn ɛnden na kun tɛ ma.”
Mbɛ a puin‑da den chɛ fa yii ma, mbɛ a tima chɛ a ni kunun, Chisɔsi na‑a a fɔ a ye, a ɔ, a 'a denɛ ɛ baun‑da wan. Mbɛ a wandi ni ma, a basan a 'a chenɛ a mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a, an‑na an kai fa Chisɔsi a.
A gba fean bɔɛ an nɛ, Chisɔsi ka‑a Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ, a yɛ‑a Kadidi, mbɛ a‑a kamaya koe ma.
Chɛ gbakɔ, Chisɔsi sɛ‑a wan to Chuusaɛn, Chu n 'na bɛnɛ dɔndɔ ko a to.
Nɔ Chuusaɛn duu chɛ ɔ, ben chia ni wan nɔ sa n na, yii pai ɛ a baima. Ku ni bun dɔ duu an pai chɛ a tindanɛ ben‑da. Chu mɔɛ n ni an kaina chɛ chee, an dɔ, Betɛsɛda.
