Gbandi mɔɛ n sɛsɛ ni wan nɔ, an fanka wa, an mbe sa ɔ kuu chɛ n kɔɔ. Fion tɔɛ n ni wan nɔ, namaa n mbe nɔ, a basan chɛ n na, miin chenɛ faen ni an ma.
Kamin dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, a tima chɛ a, min gbandienɛ ni san bi sawa kun ma sɛi ko a.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a yen nɔ sa ɔ. A sin‑na a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ an kamin chɛ, ɛ ka gbɛ an gbandi chɛ ɔ, tima ɔ yansama an ko a. Chɛ ko a, mbɛ a ɔ, “I toen mu i ni baun gbandi chɛ ɔ?”
Mbɛ gbandi mɔɛ chɛ ɔ, “Kai, mɔ ee n boo ɔ nɛ, min mbe dɛ n na yii chɛ ɔ, tima ɔ tima dechee ni a ɔ ma‑a. N mbe ma n gbɔ‑a, n ni dɛ a ɔ, mɔ dɔ mende ɛ dɛ wan a ɔ n ya ɔ.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ a ma, a ɔ, “I kɔɔ sɔ, i ni i 'a waa ya, mbɛ i ta‑a.”
Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, kamin chɛ gbu baun‑da a 'a gbandi chɛ ɔ, a‑a a 'a waa ya, mbɛ a bun‑da ben ben‑da. Koe chɛ na‑a chɛ a ɔ Chu n 'na suin tee ma wan.
Chɛ‑a a ma wan, Chu mɔɛ n ya ɔ sɔɛ nu, an‑na a fɔ kamin chɛ ye, an dɔ, “Suin tee mu bi a, a sin, mmɔ 'a sawa ma dɔn ni a ma, i ni ma ka ben ben‑da i 'a waa a.”
Chɛɛ kamin chɛ ɔ, “Chɛɛ mɔɛ min‑na a ma n baun‑da, a na‑a a fɔ ka wan n ye, a ɔ, n ni n 'na waa ya, a ɔ, n ni ben ben.”
Mbɛ an‑na a ɔ tisa, an dɔ, “Mɔɛ minan mu, min‑na chɛ fɔ i ye?”
Chɛɛ kaminɛ chɛ min na‑a baun ka, a nii ma a ɔ sɔn, mɔɛ min na‑a a ma a baun‑da. Koe min na mu, fanka min ni nɔ a da a ni koo. Chɛ na‑a a ma wan Chisɔsi chen gba ɔ chɛ‑a an mɔɛ n tɛ ɔ.

Chɛɛ chɛ gbakɔ, Chisɔsi‑a kamin chɛ yen fan Yataa 'a kata ɔ, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ a ma, a ɔ, “A yen ko, i baun‑da gbɛ sanche. Chɛ an fɛ mu, i ma ko yama ma to. Ni chɛ ma, tɔɔya min mbe i tan‑da gbɛ, ɛ yaua‑a a saa ma.”
Mbɛ kamin chɛ ka‑a nɔ, a ta‑a, mbɛ a‑a Chu mɔɛ n ya ɔ sɔɛ chɛ n tan. A‑a a ɔ yian an na, mbɛ Chisɔsi an na‑a a baun gbandi chɛ ɔ.
Chu mɔɛ chɛ nu, an ya ɔ sɔɛ chɛ n‑na chɛɛ ma nyɔncha bun fan Chisɔsi ma, kamin chɛ 'a baun koe a, an 'na suin tee chɛ ma.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Fa Yataa ɛ basan fan mɔɛ n ma, tima ɔ tima ko a. N bɛɛ, a nyin n ni a ma ka.”

A 'a bai chɛ, a gbu‑a a ma gbɛ, Chu n ya ɔ sɔɛ chɛ n‑na an faa a kɔɔ gbɛ chɛndɛ chɛ, a fa koe a. An ma yiinachii chɛ chɛ ni, an 'na sawa chɛ dechee an yɔn koe ko a. Chɛɛ a‑a a fɔɛ min chɛ ka, mbɛ a fa an nɛ Yataa a. Mbɛ a chia chɛ a, a‑a a wandi ya wan ka, mbɛ an fea Yataa a, an na kanden fan mu.

Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ an ma, a ɔ, “N ni chɛ ma din wo tena, mbɛ n fan, n fɛn mu ka Yataa 'a denɛ a, n mbe ee che ko ɔ ko ma‑a, n kun ma gbasaya a. N mbe koe chɛ n fan ma dechee, n mbe Fa yen miin ma‑a. N Fa, ɛ koe miin ma, n bɛɛ, n fɛn mu a 'a denɛ a, n mbe an fan ma.

Chɛ ɛ ma wan, koe min na mu, n ko a di Fa ye. A sin, ɛ koe miin gbɛɛ ma, ɛ an dɔ yian fan n na. A sin mbe kamaya koe n dɔ yian‑da wan n na, miin benden mu chɛ ma kaka, miin mbe wo gbɛɛ da n dɔ gbaa a.
N Fa, ɛ mɔɛ n kɔɔ sɔ wan, a ka saya ɔ, ɛ fɔɛ be an ma. A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a mu, n bɛɛ, n mbe fɔɛ be‑a chɛ n ma, n toen mu n ni a be miin ma.
A yɛ to, Fa wandi sin, a ee kaa a tɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ wakoe ma. Chɛɛ a‑a a nɛnɛ gbasaya gbɛɛ be n fan ma.
A‑a chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, mɔɛ n gbɛɛ ni basɔmaya be n ma, yɔ an mbe a be buɛ min dɔ Fa ma. Mɔ ɔ mɔ min ma basɔmaya be ni n ma, a mɔɛ chɛ ma a be ni ka Fa an ma, min‑na n sɔ.

“N mbe chɛ ma din tena wo tena, mbɛ mɔɛ min mbe n da a bai a min‑da, a ni a kai fa Fa Yataa a, min‑na n sɔ, a mɔɛ chɛ ɛ kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da wan. A mɔɛ chɛ, kaa a ee tɛ‑a a wakoe ma, a ni tɔɔ. A ban‑da saya ɔ tandin‑da, a ta kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ɔ.

Ka n mbe chɛ ma din wo tena, mbɛ tima ɛ che tena wan, a gbu sin che‑a, tima min na, mɔ faenɛ n mbe n kuiɛ a min‑da, n fan, Yataa 'a denɛ. An fɛn sin mbe an too ma sɔ‑a a ma, an mbe kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da wan.
N Fa ɛ a ma wan, mɔɛ n mbe fɔɛ ma sɔn. A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, n bɛɛ, a 'a denɛ, a‑a a ma, n mbe fɔɛ be.
A sin‑na n si ka wan to a gbasaya chɛ ɔ, kaa a tɛ koe a. Koe min na mu a‑a chɛ ma, n fan mu Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ a.
Bai chɛ ma wo da ɔ gbaa, n mbe na tena min fɔ‑a. Tima ɛ che‑a wan, mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ faen mu, an ni n kuiɛ a min.
Mbɛ an bɔ‑a, a ka saya ɔ. Chɛ nu, miin na‑a ko chɛndɛ ma, an mbe ma‑a wan to fɔɛ ɔ. Chɛ n sin, miin na‑a ko yama ma, an mbe yɛ‑a wan to fɔɛ ɔ, mbɛ kaa a tɛ‑a an bakoe ma, tɔɔya sa‑a an ma.”

Chisɔsi ɔ, “N mbe ee ko ɔ ko ma n ta gbasaya ɔ. Fa Yataa ɛ a fɔ buɛ min dɔ n ye, n mbe kaa a tɛ ka wan. Chɛ an fɛ mu, n sin mbe tea kaa an na tɛ. Tea mu chɛ a, koe min na mu, n mbe koe miin ma, n fandi faa ma koe n ma. Chɛɛ n mbe koe miin ma dechee, an fan nɛ chɛ n na, min‑na n sɔ, a toen mu miin na.
“Ni n ma‑a siiya a, n fandi ko a, mbɛ n mbe min fɔ‑a, fanka ee ma a.
Chɛɛ siiya ɛ bai sa tena wan, a si n bakoe ma. N sin‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ a 'a siiya a si n ma, tea mu a a.
Wo na‑a mɔɛ n sɔ wan, an ta‑a Chɔn tena. A wɛɛ sin‑na tea fɔ wan, a si n ma.
N mbe ee chɛ ma tena, min mbe a ma, n ni mɔ gbu 'a siiya ma sɔn. N mbe Chɔn 'na siiya wakoe fɔ tena dechee, min mbe a ma, wo ni Yataa 'a bauncha ma sɔn.
Chɔn na‑a bai min sa, min ni yɔ manɛ wo tena, a na‑a a ma wan, wo bu ɔ dia‑a. Tima dɔ ko a, wo ma bɛnden fan ni a 'a bai a min koe a, min ni yɔ manɛ, a sin na‑a wo bu ɔ dia wan.

Chɛɛ siiya ɛ wan nɔ n ko a, n faen mu min na, a ben Chɔn ta siiya ma. N mbe koe miin ma, chɛ chɛ wai chɛ nu, Fa Yataa‑a n sɔ miin chɛ koe a, an fan mbe koɔ n ko a. N mbe an chɛ buɛ min dɔ, an fan mbe a ɔ yian, mbɛ Fa an‑na n sɔ.
A yɛ to, Fa min‑na n sɔ, a wɛɛ‑a tea ɔ yian fan mɔɛ n na, a si n ma. Chɛɛ wo ma a kuiɛ a min nin bɛ, tee dɔndɔ wɛɛ ko a, wo ma a yen nin bɛ wo ya a.
A sin, a 'a sakana bai ma si tena sɔn ni wo faa n dɔ. Koe min na mu, wo ma dan ni n na, a‑a n fɛn sɔ.
Wo e Yataa 'a gboo kan fan chɛndɛ chɛ, koe min na mu, ɛ wo yii ma, an mbe a ma‑a, wo ni kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn. Bai miin gbu sin nyɛnden mu gboo chɛ ɔ, an sien mu n fan ma.
Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, wo ma to ni wo ni na n tena, min mbe a ma, wo gbu ni an fɔɛ chɛ ma sɔn.
“Mɔ gbu 'a tando n ko a, n ma a yen ni fen kɔ fen na.
Chɛɛ a ka chɛ ma, n‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mɔɛ min nyɔn sima mu wo a. A sin gbu, n‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ koadia kan kɔ kan, a ee wo faa n dɔ Yataa ko a.
N fan mu mɔɛ a, Fa‑a min na na, ma koe a a ya a wo tɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ wo ma wo boo si ni n kɔɔ. Chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin mbe na dechee an fandi kun ye, wo e wo boo si an fan kɔɔ.
Wo bu ɔ dia‑a wan, wo e ma wo nyɔn bai‑a. Chɛɛ wo ee koe n ma, an ma buɛ n na, min mbe a ma, a wɛn mu dechee Yataa a, a ni wo bai. Mbɛ wo e che ka ma, wo ni dan n na?
Chɛ wɛɛ ni ma, a ma ma wo yii ma, mbɛ n fan mbe kun yama si‑a wo kun ma Fa tena. Chɛɛ Mosisi wandi gbu, wo yii sɔen mu min ma, sɔ koe a wo kɔ, an mbe an kun chɛ si‑a wo kun ma.
Ni wo na‑a dan fan gbu Mosisi a tea tea gbu a, wo ni dan‑da wan n na, a mu min na, a‑a gboo nyɛn a si n fan ma.
Chɛɛ ni wo ma dan ni bai chɛ a, a‑a min nyɛn, wo ee kun wo ni dan n da a bai a.”
Chɛ gbakɔ, mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a Kadidi yii wa chɛ tɛ, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na. Mɔɛ dɔ n ni an yii chɛ chee, an dɔ, Tibɛyasi.
Mbɛ mɔ fanka wa n bea‑a a fɛ, koe min na mu, an na‑a a ɔ yen fan, a na‑a a ma buɛ min dɔ gbandi mɔɛ n baun‑da.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi sɛ‑a kɔnkɔɛ a, mbɛ a si‑a nɔ, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na.
A tima chɛ a, kun bɔ a ɔ bɛnɛ chɛ, a bia tima ma naen fan ni gbɛ.
Chisɔsi‑a a ya a ta, mbɛ a‑a mɔ fanka wa chɛ yen, an mbe na‑a a tena. Chɛ ko a, mbɛ a ɔ Fiipi ma, a ɔ, “Mmɔ ɛ daun fenɛ san mende, min mbe kun mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ ko a?”
A na‑a chɛ fɔ, min mbe a ma dechee, a ni Fiipi yiima sɔn. Tea ni min na, a wan Chisɔsi na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, ɛ koe min ma tena, a e na to tisa chɛ chɛ‑a.
Mbɛ Fiipi ɔ, “Min mbe a ma mɔ ɔ mɔ ni daun fenɛ sima daun, a kɔpɔɛ chɛ, ɛ ta wan kau sɛi pawa ɔ, daun fen chɛ san koe a.”
A fɛ den chɛ n dɔndɔ, min tɔ ni Anduu, Saimɔn Pita dɔɛ, a koɔ‑a wan,
a ɔ, “Kaienɛ yen ko nɛ, biidi gbugbu duu, ɛ min boo ɔ, a basan nyɛ gbaa fea a. Chɛɛ chɛ gbu, ɛ fen bɔ mɔ bonda chɛ n ko a?”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ a fɛ den chɛ n ma, a ɔ, “Wo a fɔ mɔɛ chɛ n ni si.” An kaina chɛ gbɛɛ yaen fan ni bin gbii a. Chɛ ko a, mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ si‑a wan ta‑a. Mɔ kaima miin gbɛɛ ni nɔ, an taen fan ni mɔ wu duu ɔ.

Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a biidi chɛ ya, a‑a Yataa wai bɔ, mbɛ a‑a a ma, a du‑a mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ ma, miin ni ka nɔ si ɔ. A‑a ko dɔndɔ gbe chɛ an ma nyɛ chɛ wɛɛ a, mbɛ a‑a a ma, a wɛɛ du‑a mɔɛ chɛ n ma. A sin, an gbɛɛ, an‑na an bu fa daunɛ chɛ wan, yɔ an toen ni min na.
An gbɛɛ bu fa‑a kɛn, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ a fɛ denɛ n ma, a ɔ, “Wo an da tɔɛ chɛ n na sɔn sɔn, mmɔ ma a pɛɛ ɛndenɛ wɛɛ yayi.”
Mbɛ an‑na mɔɛ chɛ n da tɔɛ chɛ gbɛɛ a sɔn sɔn. A bɛn‑da samba fa tan kun ma fea an ma, biidi gbugbu duu chɛ.
Mɔɛ chɛ n‑na kamaya koe chɛ ɔ yen kɛn, Chisɔsi‑a min ma, mbɛ an dɔ, “Tea ko a, kamin chɛ, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛ an nɛ. Mosisi na‑a chɛ an na koe kɔɔ fɔ dunya ɔ.”
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi na‑a a ɔ sɔn kɛn, mbɛ an toen ni, an ni a bia gbasaya a, an ni a din a ma, ma koe a mansa a, a bɔ‑a wan an tɛ ɔ. Mbɛ a dɔndɔ gbe, a‑a a ma sɛ to kɔnkɔɛ ɔ.
Yɛɛ ma tee che‑a kɛn, Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ n yii‑a wan yii wa da a.
Fitii che‑a ka wan aan, Chisɔsi nii ma na nin bɛ an tena. Mbɛ an sɛ‑a dɛndɛ ɔ, an bun‑da yii chɛ tɛ‑a, an mbe yɛ‑a Kapanaun teen na.
A tima chɛ a, fia‑a a kuu sɔ wan bɔ‑a gbasaya a, mbɛ yii wa chɛ yaua‑a, a tɛ koe a.

Chisɔsi fɛ den chɛ nu, an na‑a dɛndɛ chɛ wii wan gbɛ mai sawa nyɔn ko a, chɛ ma, mai naanin, an mbe e na to a yen‑da, ɛ na‑a tachɛ chɛ‑a yii wa chɛ a, dɛndɛ chɛ baima. Mbɛ an gbɛɛ, chiandia‑a an gboo fa gban.
Mbɛ a ɔ an ma, a ɔ, “Wo ma chian, n fan mu.”
Mbɛ an‑na an boo si Chisɔsi kɔɔ dɛndɛ chɛ ɔ, buɔdia a. Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a ka, an 'na dɛndɛ chɛ gbu, a che‑a an na tindi ma, an ni ta tena kaina min.

Banda ɔ ka‑a kɛn, mɔ fanka chɛ nu, miin na‑a to nɔ yii chɛ kaka dɔndɔɛ chɛ ma, an na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ dɛndɛ dɔndɔɛ an ni nɔ. An na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan to, mbɛ Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ n ni ta tena tima min na, an bɛ an nii ma ta ni a a. Chɛɛ an na‑a a to an gbaa wan.
Chɛɛ dɛndɛ dɔ gbɛɛ nu, an na‑a wan, a ka Tibɛyasi duu ɔ. An na‑a an kaina chɛ baima, Mansa Chisɔsi na‑a Yataa wai bɔ kaina min, mbɛ mɔ fanka wa chɛ‑a biidi chɛ daun.
Mɔ fanka wa chɛ‑a a ɔ yen fan, mbɛ Chisɔsi nii nɔ, n mbe ee baa a fɛ denɛ n ma. Mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ n sɛ‑a dɛndɛ chɛ n dɔ, nɔ tindi chɛ ma, mbɛ an ta‑a Kapanaun, an mbe an ya a kan‑da Chisɔsi a.
An‑na a yen kɛn, yii chɛ kaka dɔndɔɛ ma, an dɔ, “Kan mɔ, i‑a a fo nɛ tima minan na?”
Chisɔsi ɔ, “N mbe chɛ ma din tena wo tena, koe min na mu, wo e n yan tena. Wo‑a biidi miin daun, wo bu fa‑a gban, an fɛ mu. Chɛɛ an ma a fɔ ni, mbɛ wo‑a kamaya koe chɛ n dɔ gbɛ wan, n‑na miin ma.

Chɛɛ wo ma butuinɛ chɛ daun fenɛ ko a, min mbe yɔn. Wo e min ma, wo butuinɛ chɛ daun fenɛ ko a, min mbe mɛ, min mu kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ a. Daun fen chɛ mu, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe a be‑a wo ma. Koe min na mu, Fa Yataa‑a a ɔ yian, mbɛ a boo ɛ wan n kɔɔ.”
Mbɛ an dɔ, “Nn mbe fen gbu n ma gbɛ, Yataa toen mu nn ni koe miin ma?”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Yataa toen mu wo ni koe min ma, an nɛ wo dan koe a n na, a‑a n fɛn sɔ.”
Mbɛ an dɔ, “Mɔɔ ni i‑a kamaya koe ma, nn ni a ɔ yen, a ma koe a, nn ni dan i da a bai a. E fen ma‑a?

Koe tɔmɔsi chɛ yen bɛ, mmɔ bemba n ta bemba nu, an‑na daun fenɛ daun fan suun fuinɛ ma, an ni min chee, an dɔ, mana. A na‑a ma wan dechee, yɔ a nyɛnden mu buɛ min dɔ Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ a‑a daun fenɛ be wan an ma, a ka banda bu ɔ, a daun koe a.”
Chisɔsi ɔ, “N mbe chɛ ma din tena wo tena, mbɛ Mosisi an nii ma daun fen chɛ be ni wo ma, min ka‑a banda bu ɔ. Chɛɛ Fa Yataa, an mbe daun fenɛ chɛndɛ chɛndɛ be wo ma, a ka banda bu ɔ.
A mu min na, daun fen chɛ, Yataa‑a min be, a mu chɛ an na, min ka‑a banda bu ɔ, a yii‑a, a‑a fɔɛ be dunya ma.”
Mbɛ an dɔ, “Kai, an daun fen chɛ be nn ma, tima ɔ tima ko a.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N fan mu daun fen chɛ a, kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ be koe a. Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ na‑a n tena, mbɛ a‑a a kai fa n na, kɔnkɔ ee a mɔɛ chɛ bia‑a to kuɔ fɔ, a sin, a kanɛ wɛɛ a ee gbaa‑a to.
Chɛɛ n‑na a fɔ wan wo ye, mbɛ wo e n yen tena wɛɛ ka boo ɔ boo, wo ee wo kai fa‑a n na.
Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, Fa Yataa‑a miin be n ma, an mbe na‑a wan n tena. N sin, n mbe ee mɔ ɔ mɔ a yɛ‑a, min mbe na‑a n tena.
A mu min na, n yii‑a dunya ɔ, Fa Yataa faa ma koe an chɛ koe a, a wan‑na n sɔ. Chɛɛ n ma na ni n fandi ta faa ma koe an fan chɛ koe a.
A sin, a wɛn‑na n sɔ, a faa ma koe n fan nɛ. Mbɛ n ma fo a 'a mɔɛ chɛ n dɔndɔ wɛɛ a, mɔɛ chɛ nu, a‑a miin be n ma. Chɛɛ tee dankama ma, n ni a ma, an gbɛɛ kɔɔ ni sɔ, a yɛ fɔɛ ɔ.

A mu min na, Fa Yataa toen mu min na, an nɛ. Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe dɔn‑da a ma, mbɛ Yataa 'a denɛ mu n na, mbɛ a‑a a kai fa n na, n ni a ma, a ni kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn. A sin, n mbe an kɔɔ sɔ‑a wan, a ka saya ɔ tee dankama ma.”
Mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ n bun‑da gbonyɛ‑a an nyɔn tɛ ɔ, a si a ma. An dɔ, fen mu ɛ a fɔ, a ɔ, a wan mu daun fenɛ chɛ a, Yataa na‑a min na yii a ka banda bu ɔ.
Chɛ‑a a ma wan, an dɔ, “Mɔna chɛ an nɛ, Chisɔsi, Chosɛfi 'a den chɛ. An ma chɛ a? Mmɔ‑a a fa sɔn fan, an fea a de a. Ɛ ma ka ma gbɛ, a ni a fɔ to mmɔ ye, mbɛ a ka‑a banda bu ɔ wan, a yii‑a nɛ?”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo sɛmbɛ wo kunɛ ma tɔɔ koe a.
Mɔ ɔ mɔ ee che na‑a n tena, mɔɔ ni Fa‑a a ma, a na‑a n tena. A sin, n mbe a ma‑a wan, a ni a kɔɔ sɔ saya ɔ tee dankama ma.
Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔ dɔndɔ‑a a nyɛn fan a 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, ‘Yataa ɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ kan‑da wan.’ A sin, mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe a too ma sɔ‑a Fa kuiɛ ma, a ni a 'a kanɛ sɔn, a mɔɛ chɛ ɛ na wan n tena.
Chɛ ma a ɔ yian ni, mbɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ ɛ wan nɔ, min‑na Fa Yataa yen bɛ, mɔɔ dechee mɔɛ chɛ, min ka‑a a tena, a dechee, an‑na a yen bɛ.
N mbe chɛ ma din tena wo tena, mbɛ mɔɛ min mbe a kai fa‑a n na, an mbe kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da.
N fan mu daun fen chɛ a, fɔɛ be koe a.
Wo bemba n ta bemba nu, an‑na daun fen chɛ, an ni min chee, an dɔ, mana, an‑na a daun bɛɛ boo ɔ boo fuinɛ ma, an fa‑a wan chɛ gbakɔ.
Chɛɛ daun fen chɛ yen ko, min ka‑a banda bu ɔ, a ee ka, ni mɔ‑a a daun. A tana, ɛ a ma wan, mɔɛ ni kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn.

N fan mu fɔɛ be daun fen chɛ a, min yii‑a a ka banda bu ɔ. Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a daun fen chɛ daun, ɛ kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da wan. N mbe daun fen chɛ min sin be‑a a ma, a mu n gboo an na. N mbe a be‑a wan, fɔɛ ko a dunya ɔ.”
Chɛ ko a, mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ n bun‑da kɔɔsa bia wa chɛ‑a an nyɔn tɛ ɔ, an dɔ, “Mɔna chɛ ɛ kun ka ma, a ni a gboo be koe fɔ mmɔ ma, a daun koe a?”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ka n mbe a ma din to wo tena, mbɛ mɔɔ ni wo‑a n gboo daun, n fan Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, wo ni n wii min, wo e na to ma‑a fɔɛ ɔ.
Chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe n gboo daun‑da, mbɛ a‑a n wii min, kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ an mbe a ko a. A sin, n mbe a kɔɔ sɔ‑a wan saya ɔ, a yɛ to fɔɛ ɔ, tee dankama ma.
Koe min na mu, n gboo an mu daun fenɛ chɛndɛ chɛndɛ a, n wii wɛɛ mu min fenɛ chɛndɛ chɛndɛ a.
Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe n gboo daun‑da, a ni n wii min, nn fea a mɔɛ chɛ a, nn mbe ma‑a wan mɔ dɔndɔɛ a.
Fa min mbe fɔɛ be, an‑na n sɔ dunya chɛ ɔ, a sin fan‑na a ma to, n mbe fɔɛ ɔ. A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe n gboo daun‑da, n bɛɛ, n mbe a ma‑a ka wan, an ni ma fɔɛ ɔ.

Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, daun fen chɛ an yii‑a, a ka banda bu ɔ. Wo bemba n ta bemba n‑na daun fen chɛ daun fan, an ni min chee, an dɔ, mana, chɛɛ an fa‑a wan a gbakɔ. Chɛɛ chɛ tana, a ee ka. Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe daun fen chɛ daun‑da, ɛ a ma‑a wan, a ni kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn.”
Chisɔsi na‑a chɛ fɔ tima min na, a ni kan chɛ tena Kapanaun duu ɔ wan, Chu n 'na samun chɛ chenɛ a.
Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ n sɛsɛ, an fandi gbu na‑a a fɔ wan, an dɔ, “Kan chɛ nɛnɛ kɔ gbɛ. Nyɔn mbe che a too ma sɔ‑a chɛ ma?”
Mɔ ɔ mɔ nii ma a fɔ ni a ye, chɛɛ Chisɔsi na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ an ni gbonyɛ tena a 'a kan chɛ an na. Chɛ ko a, a‑a a fɔ an ma, a ɔ, “Chɛ‑a a kun gbɛ, wo yiima mun koe a, ae?”
Mbɛ a ɔ, “Chɛ ɛ wo faa mun‑da wan gbɛ yama yama. Ni wo‑a a ya gbɛ, mbɛ wo‑a n yen, n fan Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe sɛ‑a to kaina chɛ, n ka‑a kaina min.
Yataa Nyina, an mbe fɔɛ be, chɛɛ mɔ gbu ta gbasaya ma fen kɔ fen na ɛnden bɛɛ a. N‑na bai miin fɔ ka wo ye, an fan mbe na Yataa Nyina a, min mbe fɔɛ be.

Chɛɛ wo dɔ n ban‑da wo kai fa koe a n na.” Chisɔsi na‑a chɛ fɔ, koe min na mu, a na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, a ka a fɛ denɛ n chee tima ma, an fɛn mbe ee na‑a an kai fa‑a a a. A yɛ to, an tɛ ɔ, min bɛɛ ɛ na‑a a ma tachɛ‑a, a chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ n ma.
Mbɛ a yɛ‑a to, a ɔ, “Kun chɛ gbu ko a mu, n‑na a fɔ wo ye, n dɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee che na‑a n tena, mɔɔ ni Fa Yataa‑a gbasaya be a ma, a mɔɛ chɛ ma koe a n fɛ denɛ a.”
A ka gbɛ a tima chɛ ma, Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ n sɛsɛ yiima mun‑da, an ka‑a a fɛ.
Chɛ ko a, Chisɔsi‑a a fɛ den tan kun ma fea n dɔ tisa, a ɔ, “Wo wɛɛ to, wo e to‑a wan, wo ni ka n fɛ?”
Mbɛ Saimɔn Pita ɔ, “Mansa, nn mbe ta‑a gbɛ nyɔn tena? A yen ko, i da a bai, an mbe a ma kɛn, mɔ gbu ni kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn.
A sin yen ko gbɛ, nn‑na a ɔ sɔn, a sin, nn dan‑da a a, mbɛ i wan mu mɔɛ a tenchen Yataa 'a wai chɛ koe a, a‑a min sɔ.”
Chisɔsi ɔ, “N fan‑na n boo sɔ wo mɔ tan kun ma fea n chɛ n ma, ma koe a n fɛ, a ee ka wan? Chɛɛ Sitana faa an mbe wo dɔndɔ bu ɔ.”

A da a bai chɛ sien ni ka Chudasi an ma, kai Saimɔn Isikayɔti 'a denɛ. Koe min na mu, Chudasi ni wɛɛ boo ɔ boo Chisɔsi fɛ den tan kun ma fea chɛ n dɔndɔ a, chɛɛ a wan ni danka tena Chisɔsi ma tachɛ‑a, chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ n ma.
Chɛ gbakɔ, mbɛ Chisɔsi ben ben‑da Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ. A nii ma to ni, a ni gbɛn Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ ma ɛnden bɛɛ a. A mu min na, Chu n ya ɔ sɔɛ nu nɔ, an ma bɛnden fan ni a fa koe a.
Chɛɛ tima gbɛnden fan ni gbɛ, bɛn chɛ ko a, Chu mɔɛ n ni kuu n sɔ tima min na.
Chɛ ko a, mbɛ Chisɔsi suun ma nyɔɛ kaima nu, an dɔ a ma, an dɔ, “Bɔ nɛ chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ, i ni ta Chudia, min mbe a ma, i fɛ mɔɛ n ni a ɔ yen, e kamaya koe miin ma tena.
Mɔ ɔ mɔ ee che a chɛ chɛ wai nun‑da mɔɛ n ma, ni a toen mu dunya ni a wakoe ɔ sɔn chɛndɛ chɛ. Ni e kamaya ko bonda chɛ n ma wan sanche, a ma to dunya chɛ gbɛɛ ni i wakoe ɔ sɔn.”
A suun ma nyɔɛ kaima n gbu wɛɛ, an na‑a chɛ fɔ, a mu min na, an nii ma dan ni a a.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ an ma, a ɔ, “Wo tana tima ee wo ko a, tima min kɔ min nyin fan, wo ta koe a. Chɛɛ n tana, tima gbu ma che nin bɛ n ko a, n ta ta koe a.
Dunya chɛ ee che chia sɔn‑da too koe a wo nan na, chɛɛ n tana, a tooen fan mu n na. Koe min na mu, n ma n da a tɔn ni, a fɔ koe a mɔɛ n ye, mbɛ an chɛ chɛ wai n yau Yataa ya a.
Wo e ka wɛ ta‑a Chuusaɛn bɛn chɛ ɔ. N mbe ee ta tena wɛ, koe min na mu, n ta tima gbu ma che nin bɛ, ta koe a.”
A na‑a chɛ fɔ kɛn, mbɛ a to‑a wɛ gbaa Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ.
A suun ma nyɔɛ kaima n taenɛ gbakɔ an bɛnɛ chɛ ɔ, Chisɔsi wɛɛ na‑a ta wan. Chɛɛ chɛ wɛɛ ma‑a, a nii ma a ya kɔɔɛ a bɔ ni ya a ma, chɛɛ a na‑a a ya kɔɔɛ nun fan.
Chu mɔɛ n ya ɔ sɔɛ chɛ nu, an ni wan ben‑da an ya a kan‑da a a, bɛn chɛ ɔ. An dɔ, “An mɔna chɛ ɛ mende?”
Mɔ fanka chɛ ni wan bai sɛsɛ sa‑a an da kɔɔ, a si Chisɔsi ma. An dɔ n dɔ, “Mɔ chɛndɛ an nɛ mɔna chɛ a.” Dɔ n sin dɔ, “A ee ka. Mɔ bun mɔɛ gbama an nɛ.”
Chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ nii a kuiɛ ma sɛ, an ni ma bai sa‑a a si Chisɔsi ma. Koe min na mu, an chianden fan ni ya ɔ sɔɛ chɛ n ma.
An ni gbɛ bɛnɛ chɛ tɛtɛ ma wan, mbɛ Chisɔsi sɛ‑a Yataa 'a kata chɛ ɔ, a bun‑da an kan‑da.
Chu mɔɛ n ya ɔ sɔɛ chɛ nu, an da ɔ gbaa‑a wan kaka. Mbɛ an dɔ, “Mɔna chɛ ɛ ma ka ma, a ni koe sɔn buɛ chɛ ɔ, a nii kɛn mɔ kɔɔ kandencha a?”
Chɛ ko a, mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N mbe kanɛ miin chɛ, an mbe ee bɔ n ta yiimatɛ an dɔ. Chɛɛ Fa Yataa, min‑na n sɔ, an mbe an be n ma.

Mɔ ɔ mɔ min ma bɛnden mu, Yataa faa ma koe ma koe a, an mbe a ɔ sɔn, n mbe kanɛ min chɛ tena. A mɔɛ chɛ, an mbe a ɔ sɔn, ni n mbe Yataa da a bai an na ben tena. Chɛ ma, an mbe a ɔ sɔn, ni n mbe a chɛ tena n fandi kun ma an na.
Mɔɛ min mbe kanɛ chɛ, a wandi kun ma a a, a toen mu a ni a wandi an na buu fɛ. Chɛɛ mɔɛ min toen mu, mɔɛ min‑na a sɔ, a ni tando ma sɔn, a mɔɛ chɛ tea mɔɛ mu. A ee fania kan kɔ kan fɔ.
Wo gbɛɛ dɔnden fan mu a ma, mbɛ Mosisi an‑na sawa chɛ n be wo ma. Chɛɛ wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ ee tachɛ tena sawa chɛ n na chɛndɛ. Fen ko a mu, wo toen mu wo ni n fa?”
Mbɛ mɔ fanka chɛ ɔ, “Nyina yama an mbe i fɛ. Mɔɛ minan mu, min mbe i fɛ i fa koe a?”
Chisɔsi ɔ, “N‑na tee dɔndɔ 'a kamaya koe an ma wɛ ka, a sin‑na wo gbɛɛ da ɔ gbaa wan.

Wo e wo 'a denɛ n na kamincha wan, tima ɔ tima, a ni ma suin tee wɛɛ ma a. Mosisi na‑a a fɔ ka wan wo ye, a ma koe a. Chɛɛ Mosisi gbu, an nii ma mɔɛ saa saa a, min na‑a chɛ kuu sɔ. Wo bemba n ta bemba nu, an fan gbu na‑a a kuu sɔ.

Wo ee che tandin‑da suin tee wɛɛ ɔ, wo 'a denɛ n 'na kamincha koe a, wo ma na sawa chɛ yɔn, min be‑a Mosisi ma. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo faa ee che tɛ‑a n ma, koe min na mu, n‑na a ma, gbandi bɔ‑a mɔna chɛ gboo gbɛɛ ɔ, suin tee ma. Fen ko a wo faa ɛ tɛ?
Wo sɛmbɛ koe n yen koe a dechee, mbɛ wo‑a kaa a tɛ an ma. Chɛɛ wo koe n dɔ gbɛ pɛn, mbɛ tea nu mu, mbɛ wo‑a tea kaa n na tɛ an ma.”
Mbɛ an mɔɛ chɛ dɔ nu, Chuusaɛn duu ɔ mɔɛ chɛ nu, an bun‑da wan a fɔ‑a, an dɔ, “Mɔna chɛ chɛndɛ chɛndɛ an nɛ, mmɔ ya ɔ sɔɛ chɛ n mbe min yan tena, a fa koe a.
A yen ko, ɛ koɔ‑a fanka ɔ den, a sin, an mbe ee che gbukuu wɛɛ tɛ‑a a ma, a si a ma. A e na ma wan gbɛ, mbɛ ya ɔ sɔɛ chɛ n yiima bɛn‑da kaina dɔndɔ, mbɛ an mu kunka mansa a?
Chɛɛ nn‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, kamin chɛ ka‑a duu min dɔ. Chɛɛ kunka mansa chɛ, ɛ na‑a tima min na, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee a ka tena sɔn‑da.”

Chisɔsi to‑a kan chɛ an na, Yataa 'a kata chɛ ɔ, mbɛ a koɔ‑a gbankon, a ɔ, “Wo‑a n sɔn fan tea gbu ko a? Wo‑a n ka tena sɔn fan? N mbe ee nɛ n fandi an ko a. Chɛɛ a nyin wo ni dan a a, min‑na n sɔ. Wo ma a sɔn chɛndɛ chɛ.
Chɛɛ n tana, n‑na a sɔn fan chɛndɛ chɛ. Koe min na mu, a wan‑na n sɔ, a sin, n ka‑a a tena wan.”
Chisɔsi kuiɛ chɛ gbakɔ, mɔɛ chɛ dɔ n toen ni an ni a bia fɔin. Chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ ma a boo tu ni a a. Koe min na mu chɛ ma‑a, tima nii ma chɛ a, tima min yianden ni a 'a fɔɛ ɔ, a bia koe a.
Chɛɛ mɔ fanka chɛ nu, an sɛsɛ na‑a an kai fa wan a a. Mbɛ an dɔ, “Kunka mansa chɛ gbu, a ɛ na‑a tima min na, kamaya koe ee to nɔ, a ɛ min ma‑a, a ni ben kamin chɛ ma.”

Mbɛ Chu mɔɛ chɛ dɔ nu, miin ni Fayisii n na, an‑na fanka chɛ wɛwɛɛ kuiɛ a min bai chɛ n na, a si Chisɔsi ma. Chɛ ko a, an fan, an bɛ Chu n tɛ mɔɛ n na Yataa a, an 'na mansa n na, an‑na kata chɛ ɔ poesi n sɔ, a bia koe a.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N mbe ma tena wɛ wo tɛ ɔ, tima ɛnden fan ko a dechee. Mbɛ a gbakɔ, n mbe yɛ‑a wan a tena, a wɛn‑na n sɔ.
N yen sɔɛ ɛ ma‑a wan wo a, wo ni n yan, chɛɛ wo ee n yen‑da. Koe min na mu, n mbe ma‑a kaina min, wo ee che‑a ta‑a nɔ.”

Mbɛ Chu mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin ni Chisɔsi chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ n na, an bun‑da a da a bai chɛ tɛnsɛ‑a an nyɔn tɛ ɔ, an dɔ, “A e na ma ta‑a mende, mmɔ ee a yen kaina min? Kɔkɔɛ a ɛ ta tena duu dɔ mende n fan dɔ, mmɔ 'a mɔɛ dɔ n mbe kaina min, mbɛ a‑a mɔɛ n kan, miin ma mmɔ 'a mɔɛ n na.
A ɔ te to, mbɛ a yen sɔɛ ɛ mmɔ bia wan, mmɔ ni a yan, chɛɛ a ɔ, mmɔ ee na‑a a yen‑da. A sin, a ɛ ta‑a kaina min, mmɔ ee che‑a ta‑a nɔ. Fen bai nu mu chɛ n na?”
An bɛnɛ chɛ tee dankama ma, mɔɛ n 'na buɔdia bɔɛ, a kun tɛ tee ni an na. Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, a koɔ‑a gbankon, a ɔ, “Mɔ ɔ mɔ min kanɛ a gbaaen mu, a mɔɛ chɛ ɛ na n fan tena, a ni a min.
A sin, mɔ ɔ mɔ min kai faen mu n na, yii min mbe fɔɛ be, a ɔ ee tɛ‑a bɔ koe a, a ka an mɔɛ chɛ faa ɔ. Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ ka wan.”

Chisɔsi na‑a chɛ fɔ, a yii ni Yataa Nyina chɛ an ma, min mbe ma‑a mɔɛ n fɛ, miin kai faenɛ ɛ ma‑a a a. Chɛɛ a tima chɛ a, Yataa Nyina chɛ nii ma yii nin bɛ, a ni ma an mɔɛ chɛ n fɛ. Koe min na mu, Chisɔsi kɔɔ ni ma sɔ nin bɛ, a ka saya ɔ, a ni sɛ manɛ ɔ.
Mɔɛ dɔ nu, an mɔ fanka chɛ n tɛ ɔ, an‑na a da a bai chɛ n na min kɛn, mbɛ an dɔ, “Tea ko a, kamin chɛ, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ an nɛ, min na koe fɔen mu.”
Mbɛ an dɔ n sin, an dɔ, “Kunka mansa gbu an nɛ.” Chɛɛ dɔ n bɛɛ to, an dɔ, “Kunka mansa ee che bɔ‑a Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ.
Yataa 'a gboo ɔ te, mbɛ kunka mansa ɛ na‑a bɔ‑a Mansa Defidi 'a dambi ɔ wan. A sin mbe suun‑da Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ wan, Bɛtɛɛn duu ɔ, a wan Mansa Defidi waa a.”
Chɛ ko a, kuiɛ a kanɛ sima wɛɛ nii mɔ fanka chɛ n tɛ ɔ, a si Chisɔsi ma.
An dɔ nu, an toen fan ni, an ni a bia fɔin, chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ ma a boo tu ni a a.
Yataa 'a kata ɔ poesi chɛ n yɛ‑a kɛn, Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa chɛ n tena, an bɛ Fayisii chɛ n na, an‑na tisa chɛ, an dɔ, “Fen mu wo ma na ni an mɔna a?”
Mbɛ an dɔ, “Kamin chɛ, a da a kuiɛ, a kaen fan mu mɔ gbu kan kɔ kan ta ma.”
Mbɛ Fayisii chɛ n dɔ, “Wo ma a ma nn ni dan a a, mbɛ a‑a wo wɛɛ kunɛ ɔ fii fii.
Nn mbe ee dan‑da a a, mbɛ mmɔ 'a gbakoo dɔndɔ wɛɛ ɛ wan nɔ, chɛ ma, ni Fayisii mɔ kan kɔ kan mbe wan nɔ, min kai faen mu a a.
A sin, mɔɛ chɛ n ma sawa chɛ n sɔn, Yataa na‑a miin be Mosisi ma. Chɛ ko a, Yataa ɛ a ma‑a wan, an ni tɔɔya ɔ yen.”
Chɛɛ kamin chɛ ni wan nɔ, min tɔ mu Nikɔdemɔsi. Fayisii chɛ nu, an ya ɔ sɔɛ dɔndɔ ni a a. A sin fan na‑a ta tima dɔndɔ a, a‑a Chisɔsi tan. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ a bɔɛ chɛ n ma, a ɔ,
“Mmɔ 'a sawa n‑na a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, mbɛ mmɔ ee kaa a tɛ, a si mɔɛ ma, ni mmɔ ma a kan dɔ kuiɛ a min ni, mmɔ ni a ɔ gbɛ, a‑a koe min gbu ma. A ee ka wan?”
Mbɛ a bɔɛ chɛ n dɔ, “Aa, i wɛɛ ka‑a Kadidi wan? Yataa 'a gboo ɔ fɛn bɛ kan kɔ kan, e ee yiima chɛ yen‑da a ɔ. Yiima chɛ, mbɛ Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔ dɔndɔ wɛɛ ɛ ka‑a wan Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ.” [
Mbɛ an gbɛɛ yɛ‑a an 'na chenɛ n na.
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi tana, bɛn chɛ fasandenɛ gbakɔ, a sɛ‑a kɔnkɔɛ chɛ an dɔ, an ni min chee, an dɔ, Wodifi kɔnkɔɛ.
Banda ka dɔndɔɛ ma, sayi ma, mbɛ a yɛ‑a to Yataa 'a kata chɛ ɔ. Mbɛ mɔɛ n gbɛɛ na‑a a 'a tindanɛ. A sin, a si‑a wan, mbɛ a bun‑da an kan‑da.
Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ nu, an bɛ Fayisii mɔɛ dɔ n na, an don‑da wan musu dɔndɔ a. An na‑a a bia, an dɔ, a‑a waa ma basan mɔ kaima a, min ma a fuu kai a. Mbɛ an‑na a ma, a sɔ‑a den, mɔɛ gbɛɛ ya kɔɔ.
Mbɛ an dɔ, “Ticha, musu chɛ, nn‑na a bia tɔgbaa, ɛ waa ma basan‑da, an fea kai a, min ma a fuu kai a.
Mmɔ 'a sawa n dɔ, Mosisi na‑a a fɔ wan, mbɛ musu bonda chɛ, mmɔ ɛ a bon fan senɛ a, a ni fa. Mmɔ ɛ fen ma gbɛ a a, sanche?”
An‑na chɛ fɔ, min mbe a ma, an ni Chisɔsi bia a chen kɔ, a da a bai ɔ, mbɛ an‑na kun yama si a kun ma. Chɛɛ a‑a a kunɛ a bun fan, a bun‑da nyɛnɛ sa‑a gbangbanɛ ɔ, a boo denɛ a.

An to‑a a ɔ tisa chɛ an na tun tun, mbɛ a‑a a kɔɔ sɔ. A‑a a tɛ ɔ sawan, mbɛ a ɔ, “A ma yau. Chɛɛ wo gbɛɛ tɛ ɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ min ma ko yama kan kɔ kan ma nin bɛ, an mɔɛ chɛ, an ni senɛ saa saa bondan musu chɛ a fasa.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a ma bun to, mbɛ a bun‑da to nyɛnɛ sa‑a gbangbanɛ chɛ ɔ.

A tima chɛ a gbɛ, mɔɛ chɛ miin gbɛɛ na‑a a da a bai chɛ a min, an bun‑da an fandi kanka‑a dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a. Chenanɛ n pɛn tuin‑da, mbɛ a tɔɛ n‑na a sɔ an fɛ. Chisɔsi ma gbaaenɛ to‑a nɔ, an fea an musu chɛ a sɔ ɔ tun.
Chisɔsi‑a a kɔɔ sɔ to, a‑a a tɛ ɔ sawan, mbɛ a ɔ, “Bɔɔɛ, i 'a mɔɛ n gbɛɛ ta‑a mende? An dɔndɔ wɛɛ ma bɔ ni nɔ, a ni kaa a tɛ i wakoe ma?”
Mbɛ a ɔ, “Kai, an dɔndɔ wɛɛ ma a ma ni e.” Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N bɛɛ, n fan mbe ee kaa a tɛ‑a, a si i ma. E ka gbɛ ta‑a. Chɛɛ a ka bi ma, i boo bɔ ko yama ma ɔ.”]

Chisɔsi koɔ‑a wan to mɔɛ chɛ n tena, a ɔ, “N fan mu manɛ a dunya chɛ gbɛɛ ko a. Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe bea‑a n fɛ, ɛ manɛ ma sɔn‑da wan, min mbe a ma, mɔɛ ni ma fɔɛ ɔ. A yɛ to, a mɔɛ chɛ ee tachɛ‑a kuɔ fɔ ko a pimbi pimbi ɔ.”
Mbɛ Fayisii mɔɛ n dɔ, “Sanche gbɛ, e ka i wandi an na siiya bɔ‑a. E bai miin gbɛɛ fɔ tena, an ma nn kun bia ni.”

Chisɔsi ɔ, “A ee ka. Mmɔ a ya, mbɛ n mbe siiya an bɔ tena n fandi ko a. Chɛɛ n mbe bai miin fɔ tena, tea mu. Koe min na mu, n ka‑a kaina min, n‑na nɔ sɔn fan. A sin to, n‑na n ta tena sɔn fan. Chɛɛ wo tana, wo ma an kaina chɛ n dɔndɔ wɛɛ sɔn.
Wo tana, wo e kaa a tɛ mɔɛ n bakoe ma mɔgbuya ta fɛ chia an na. Chɛɛ n tana, n mbe ee kaa a tɛ tena mɔ ɔ mɔ wako ma.
Chɛɛ ni n‑na a ma wɛɛ ka, n mbe kaa min na tɛ‑a, ɛ ma‑a tea nɛnɛ an na. Koe min na mu, n dɔndɔ gbe an mbe ee na‑a a ma‑a n kun ma gbasaya a. Fa min‑na n sɔ, nn fea an mbe nn kun puin‑da kaina dɔndɔɛ.
A nyɛnden fan mu wo 'a sawa gboo ɔ, mbɛ sii fea nu, ni an kuiɛ bɛn‑da kaina dɔndɔ an 'na siiya bɔɛ ɔ, mbɛ an da a kuiɛ mu tea an na.
N mu siiya, n fandi ko a. Fa wɛɛ, min‑na n sɔ, a wɛɛ ɛ siiya bɔ tena wan, a si n ma.”
Mbɛ an dɔ, “I fa chɛ gbu ɛ mende?” Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo ma n sɔn buɛ min dɔ, wo ma Fa wɛɛ sɔn ka wan. Ni wo na‑a n sɔn fan, wo ni Fa wɛɛ sɔn‑da wan.”

Chisɔsi na‑a chɛ gbɛɛ fɔ tima min na, a ni Yataa 'a kata ɔ wan, ɛ mɔɛ n kan‑da. A ni kaina chɛ baima wan, kakaa chɛ n ni ka si ɔ kaina min, an ni boo fenɛ n be ka Yataa ma, kakaa miin dɔ. Mɔ ɔ mɔ nii ma a bia ni nɔ, a mu min na, a bia tima min yianden ni, a nii ma che nin bɛ.

Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ to an ye, a ɔ, “N mbe na tena wan ta‑a, a sin, n yen sɔɛ ɛ wo bia‑a wan, wo ni wo ya a kan n na. Chɛɛ wo e fa‑a ka wan aan, Yataa ee a boo bɔ‑a wo 'a ko yama n dɔ. Wo ee kun‑da wo ni ta kaina chɛ, n mbe ma‑a kaina min.”
Mbɛ Chu mɔɛ chɛ n dɔ, “Mɔna chɛ yii e na ma ta‑a a wandi fa koe an dɔ? A yen ko, a ɛ a fɔ‑a, a ɔ, a ɛ ta‑a kaina min, mmɔ ee kun‑da mmɔ ni ta nɔ.”
Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo tana, dunya chɛ nɛ, a ɔ mɔɛ n mu wo a. Chɛɛ n tana, n ka‑a pande wan, banda bu ɔ. Dunya chɛ ɔ mɔɛ mu wo a, chɛɛ a ɔ mɔɛ ma n nan sin na.

Chɛ an fɛ mu, n‑na a fɔ wo ye, n dɔ, wo e fa‑a ka wan, Yataa ee a boo bɔ‑a wo 'a ko yama n dɔ. Ni wo ma dan ni a a, mbɛ n fan mu mɔɛ chɛ a, n‑na a fɔ, n mu mɔɛ min na. Ni wo ma dan ni chɛ a, wo e fa‑a ka wan, Yataa ee a boo bɔ‑a wo 'a ko yama n dɔ.”
Mbɛ an dɔ, “Nyɔn gbu sin mu i a?” Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N‑na a fɔ wan wo ye a saa saa, n mu mɔɛ min na. N mu mɔɛ chɛ chɛndɛ chɛndɛ an na, n‑na a fɔ wo ye sɛsɛ, n mu mɔɛ min na.

Bai kɔkoo n yii ma, a si wo ma, a kɔkoo kaa a tɛ koe a wo wakoe ma. Chɛɛ an sin gbu, n fan yiima ko ma an na. Min‑na n sɔ, a wan yii ma koe nu mu, a sin mbe tea an fɔ. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, ɛ min fɔ n ye dechee, n mbe an na ben mɔ ɔ mɔ tena dunya chɛ ɔ.”
Chɛɛ an dɔndɔ wɛɛ nii ma a ɔ gbɛ ni, mbɛ Chisɔsi ni koɔ tena a si a Fa Yataa an ma.

Mbɛ a ɔ an ma, a ɔ, “Tima min na mu, wo e n na sɛ‑a kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma, n fan Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, wo e n sɔn‑da a tima an na. Mbɛ n fan mu mɔɛ chɛ a, n fɛn mbe ka koɔ tena wo tena. Mbɛ wo‑a a ɔ sɔn to, mbɛ n mbe ee ko ɔ ko chɛ n kun ma a a. Chɛɛ Fa ɛ min fɔ n ye, a fɔ koe a, n mbe an fɔ dechee.
A sin, a wɛn‑na n sɔ, nn fea an mbe nn kun puin kaina dɔndɔɛ, a ee n dɔndɔ gbe boo ka tee dɔndɔ wɛɛ. Koe min na mu, a faa chima koe nu, n mbe an fan ma tima ɔ tima.”
Mɔ sɛsɛ nu, miin‑na Chisɔsi da a bai chɛ n na min, an‑na an kai fa wan a a.
Mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin dan‑da ka Chisɔsi a, a koɔ‑a an tena, a ɔ, “Ni wo‑a wo too ma sɔ n da a kuiɛ ma, wo e ma‑a n fɛ mɔɛ chɛndɛ chɛndɛ n fan na.
Wo e tea ɔ gbɛ‑a wan, a si Yataa ma, a sin fan mbe a ma‑a, wo kunɛ ni bɔ yɔncha ɔ.”
Chɛɛ an dɔ, “Nn tana, Ebeami dambi ɔ mɔɛ mu nn na. A sin, kɛn gba, nn ma don nin bɛ mɔ 'a yɔncha kɔɔ. E a fɔ‑a sanche, i ɔ, nn mbe bɔ‑a wan yɔncha ɔ. Fen mbe i yii ma?”
Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ka n mbe chɛ ma din wo tena, mbɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe ko yama ma, yɔnɛ mu a mɔɛ chɛ a, a 'a ko yama n boo ɔ.
Yɔnɛ ee to a yɔn fa 'a suunɛ ɔ kuɔ fɔ ko a. Chɛɛ an suun chɛ ɔ denɛ tana, ɛ to wan a ɔ kuɔ fɔ ko a.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, ni Yataa 'a denɛ‑a i kun bɔ yɔncha ɔ, mbɛ i kun bɔ‑a a ɔ chɛndɛ chɛ.
N‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ Ebeami cheeya mu wo a. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, wo toen mu wo ni n fa. Koe min na mu, n mbe wo kan tena bai miin na, wo ma to ni, wo ni wo boo si an kɔɔ.
Fa na‑a koe miin yian n na, n mbe koɔ tena a si an fan ma. Wo sin, wo fa na‑a koe miin fɔ wo ye, wo e an fan ma ka.”
Mbɛ an dɔ, “Nn bemba n ta bemba, a mu Ebeami an na.” Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ni Ebeami cheeya chɛndɛ chɛndɛ gbu ni wo a, wo chɛ chɛ wai n ni ma‑a ka wan dechee, yɔ a ta ni buɛ min dɔ.
Chɛɛ wo tana, wo ma bɛndenɛ min chɛen mu ka, n fa koe a, Ebeami nii ma a ma ni ka. N sɔnɛ gbɛɛ wɛ wo tena, an nɛ tea bai chɛ n na, miin kaen mu Yataa tena, n mbe miin fɔ.
Chɛɛ wo sɔnɛ n mbe wan dechee, yɔ wo fa ta ni buɛ min dɔ.” Mbɛ an dɔ, “I ma chɛ fɔ nn ye. Nn tana, nn fa ɛ dɔndɔ gbe, a sin fan nɛ Yataa a. A 'a denɛ chɛndɛ chɛndɛ mu nn na.”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ni Yataa an ni wo fa a, wo nii too‑a n na. Koe min na mu, n ka‑a Yataa an tena, n na‑a nɛ chɛ. N fandi an ma si ni ka dechee, n ni na n kun ye, n kun ma gbasaya ɔ. Chɛɛ Yataa an‑na n sɔ.
N‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, koe min‑na a ma, wo ee n da a bai n dɔ gbɛ. Ko dɔ gbɛɛ ma, wo ma to ni, wo ni wo too ma sɔ n da a bai n ma.

Sitana wandi gbu, an mu wo fa a. A sin, wo e bea tena koe chɛ n fan fɛ, wo fa toen mu miin na. Suun gba wɛ, mɔ fa mɔɛ mu a a, a sin tima ee a boo ɔ tea ko a. Koe min na mu, tea ma bɔ nin bɛ a da ɔ tee dɔndɔɛ wɛɛ. Ni a ma‑a fania fɔ‑a tima ɔ tima, ɛ ma ka dɔn‑da a tɔɛ gbu an ma. Koe min na mu, fania fɔ mɔ dechee ma a a, chɛɛ fania fa mu a a.
Chɛɛ n tana, n mbe tea gbu an fɔ, a sin fan fɛ mu, wo ma dan ni n da a bai a.
Wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ ee nɛ, min mbe kun a ɔ yian‑da, mbɛ ko yama ma mɔɛ mu n na. N mbe tea an fɔ, a sin nyin fan wo ni dan n da a kuiɛ a.
Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mu Yataa 'a denɛ a, a bu ɔ di wan tima ɔ tima, a too ma sɔ koe a Yataa bai ma. Chɛɛ wo tana, a 'a denɛ ma wo a, an fɛ mu, wo e ban wo too ma sɔ koe a, a da a bai n ma.”
Mbɛ Chu mɔɛ chɛ n dɔ Chisɔsi ma, an dɔ, “I‑a a ɔ yen gbɛ, mbɛ nn‑na min fɔ, nn teaen fan mu. Nn‑na a fɔ wan, mbɛ Samayia mɔɛ mu i a, a sin, nyina yama an mbe i fɛ.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Nyina yama ee n fɛ. N mbe basɔmaya an be Fa ma, chɛɛ wo tana, wo e baa an bɔ n ma.
N mbe ee chia an yan tena, min mbe a ma, mɔɛ n ni baa be n ma. Min mbe chia chɛ yan tena, n ko a, ɛ nɔ. A sin, a wan mbe tea kaa a tɛ.
N mbe chɛ ma din tena wo tena, mbɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe ma‑a a da a kuiɛ ma, a mɔɛ chɛ ee fa‑a.”

Mbɛ Chu mɔɛ chɛ n dɔ, “Nn‑na a ɔ sɔn gbɛ tea a, mbɛ nyina yama an mbe i fɛ. Ebeami wɛɛ gbu fa‑a wan, mbɛ Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n bɛɛ fa‑a. Chɛɛ i tana, i ɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a boo si kan chɛ kɔɔ, e min chɛ tena, a ee fa‑a kuɔ fɔ ko a.
Nn bɔ kɔnkɔɛ, Ebeami, a fa‑a wɛɛ, chɛɛ i ma i wandi ya, mbɛ i benden fan mu a ma, ɛnden bɛɛ a. A yɛ to, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n bɛɛ fa‑a wan. I‑a i wandi ya fen mɔ a?”

Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ni n gbu, n‑na basɔmaya be n fandi ma, an basɔmaya chɛ nɛnɛ, fen kɔ fen mbe ee a ɔ. Fa dechee, an mbe a ma tena, n mbe basɔmaya ma sɔn tena. Fa min ka, wo e a fɔ tena, wo ɔ, an mu wo 'a Yataa a.

Wo ma a sɔn bɛɛ boo ɔ boo, chɛɛ n tana, n‑na a sɔn fan. Ni n‑na a fɔ, n dɔ, n ma a sɔn, n mbe ma‑a ka fania an fɔ‑a, yɔ wo e fania fɔ tena buɛ min dɔ, a sɔn koe a. Chɛɛ n gbu sin‑na a sɔn fan, a sin, n mbe wan a da a kuiɛ ma.
Wo bɔ kɔnkɔɛ, Ebeami, a bu ɔ ni di wan, a ni tima min na tee chɛ ma kɔn‑da, n na koe a. A na‑a n yen fan, a sin, a bu ɔ dia‑a wan.”
Mbɛ an dɔ, “Chɛɛ i gbu suun sanɛ ni san bi duu bɔ pɛn, e na to Ebeami yen koe fɔ‑a.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N mbe chɛ ma din tena wo tena sanche, mbɛ Ebeami e na to ma‑a fɔɛ ɔ, n ni wan gbɛ fɔɛ ɔ.”
Chɛ ko a, mbɛ an‑na senɛ n ya, a bondan koe a Chisɔsi a, an ni a fa. Chɛɛ a bɔ‑a wan an tɛ ɔ, Yataa 'a kata chɛ ɔ, kai wɛɛ, a a ma tɛ ni a ma.
Chisɔsi to‑a ta an na, mbɛ a‑a kaminɛ yen, min suun‑da a fiondenɛ ɛ.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ n‑na a ɔ tisa, an dɔ, “Kan mɔ, mɔ ma a ɔ sɔn, mɔɛ min 'na ko yama maenɛ‑a kamin chɛ fion buɛ chɛ ɔ. A e na ma a wandi ta an na ba, kɔ a woo mɔɛ nu?”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “A 'a fioncha chɛ ma bɔ ni ko fea chɛ dɔndɔ wɛɛ ɔ, a wandi‑a ko yama maenɛ ma, a woo mɔɛ n ta ma. Chɛɛ a suun‑da ka buɛ chɛ ɔ, min mbe a ma, mɔɛ n ni a ɔ yen a ta chɛ kun ma, kamaya koe miin mbe ma, Yataa dɔndɔ gbe gbaa chia a.
Tee ɛ wɛ nɔ tima min na, fɔ ni mmɔ‑a a tun wai chɛ n chɛ koe a, n sɔen mu miin chɛ koe a. Pimbi ɛ bun‑da tima min na, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee che‑a ko ɔ ko ma‑a.
N mbe tima min na dunya chɛ ɔ, n fan mu manɛ a dunya ko a.”
Chisɔsi‑a bai chɛ fɔ kɛn dechee, mbɛ a‑a a da yii fu gbangbanɛ ɔ. Mbɛ a‑a a ɔ ma ma, mbɛ a‑a boobo chɛ sin kamin chɛ ya gbingbii kɔɔ.

Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ kamin chɛ ma, a ɔ, “Ta yii pai chɛ da a, an mbe min chee Sidowan, i ni i ya a ko” (Sidowan chɛ, a fasai an nɛ, an‑na min sɔ). Mbɛ kamin chɛ ta‑a, a‑a a ya chɛ a ko nɔ. Mbɛ a‑a kaina yen kɛn, a yɛ‑a a waa a.

Mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu, an bɛ ɛ miin na fɔn dɔndɔɛ ɔ, an basan mɔɛ chɛ n na, miin ni a yen tee si ɔ fen fuinɛ a, a fiondenɛ ɛ, an na fii‑a. An dɔ, “Kou, kamin chɛ an mbe ma nɛ si ɔ fen fuinɛ a, an ya a ka‑a ka. An ma chɛ a?”
An dɔ nu, an dɔ, “An nɛ ka.” Chɛɛ an dɔ nu, an dɔ, “An ma chɛ a o, a bɔen fan mu dechee a a.” Chɛɛ kamin chɛ wandi koɔ‑a, a ɔ, “N fan gbu e nɛ.”
Chɛ ko a, an dɔ kamin chɛ ma, an dɔ, “I ma‑a ka ma gbɛ, i‑a kaina yen?”

Mbɛ a ɔ, “Kamin chɛ min tɔ mu ka Chisɔsi, an‑na a ma ka n baun‑da. A‑a boobo an dɔ fa, mbɛ a‑a a sin n ya gbingbii kɔɔ. A‑a a fɔ n ye, a ɔ, n ni ta n ya a ko yii pai chɛ ɔ, min tɔ mu ka Sidowan. Mbɛ n ta‑a, a sin, n‑na a ma kɛn dechee, n‑na kaina yen.”
Mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ n dɔ, “A gbu ɛ mende?” Mbɛ a ɔ, “N bɛɛ n ma a ɔ sɔn.”
Mbɛ kamin chɛ, min ya a ka‑a ka, mɔɛ chɛ n bɛ ta‑a an na Fayisii n chen kɔɔ.
Koe min na mu, Chisɔsi na‑a boobo chɛ sin ka a ya a tee min ma, mbɛ a ya a ka‑a, Chu mɔɛ n 'na suin tee ni.

Mbɛ an Fayisii chɛ n bɛɛ, an bun‑da kamin chɛ ɔ tisa‑a to, an dɔ, a ni a ɔ yian an bɛɛ a, a ya a ka‑a buɛ min dɔ. Mbɛ a ɔ, “A‑a boobo an sin n ya gbingbii kɔɔ, mbɛ n‑na n ya a ko yii ɔ. Chɛ an‑na a ma, n mbe kaina yen tena ka gbɛ.”

Mbɛ Fayisii chɛ dɔ nu, an dɔ, “Mɔɛ min‑na chɛ ma, suin tee sawa yɔn koe a, an mɔɛ chɛ, Yataa an ma a sɔ ni a ma.” Chɛɛ an dɔ n sin, an dɔ, “Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mu ko yama ma mɔɛ a, a ee kamaya ko bonda chɛ sima ma.” Chɛ‑a a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ an kuiɛ a nii ma kan ni, a si Chisɔsi ma.
Mbɛ a danka a, Fayisii chɛ n yɛ‑a to kamin chɛ tena, min ya a ka‑a ka. An dɔ, “A‑a i wan ya a ka. E che fen fɔ‑a, a si a ma?” Mbɛ kamin chɛ ɔ, “N ta yiima ɔ, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ mu a a.”

Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, Chu mɔɛ n ya ɔ sɔɛ chɛ nu, an nii ma to ni, an ni dan a a, mbɛ kamin chɛ fionden fan ni tee, chɛɛ a ya a ka‑a gbɛ sanche. Mbɛ an‑na an da a kuiɛ a ben, min mbe a ma, a woo mɔɛ n ni bɔ ya a ma.
Mbɛ an‑na a woo mɔɛ n dɔ tisa, an dɔ, “Wo 'a denɛ an nɛ mɔna chɛ a? Wo‑a a fɔ kɛn, mbɛ wo‑a a fiondenɛ an suun, chɛɛ ɛ kaina yen gbɛ sanche. Chɛ ma‑a ka ma a ma‑a?”
Mbɛ a woo mɔɛ chɛ n dɔ, “Nn 'na denɛ chɛndɛ chɛndɛ an nɛ. A sin gbu, nn‑na a suun, a fiondenɛ ni.
Chɛɛ nn ma a ɔ sɔn, a ma‑a buɛ min dɔ sanche ɛ kaina yen. Nn sin ma a gbu ɔ sɔn to, mɔɛ min‑na a ma, a ya a ka‑a. Musu si kai mu gbɛ a a, wo a ɔ tisa, ɛ che wan a ɔ yian‑da a wandi ko a.”

A woo mɔɛ chɛ n na‑a chɛ fɔ, ya ɔ sɔɛ chɛ n ma chianɛ an dɔ. Koe min na mu, a ɔ bɛnden fan ni, mbɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe a fɔ‑a den, mbɛ Chisɔsi an mu kunka mansa a, a ma nyin a ko a. A mɔɛ chɛ ka‑a mɔɛ tɔɛ n ma fɛsɛ fɛsɛ, na koe a an fan Chu n 'na samun chɛ chenɛ a.
Chɛ an‑na a ma, a woo mɔɛ chɛ nu, an dɔ, “Musu si kai mu gbɛ a a, wo a wandi ɔ tisa.”

Mbɛ an kamin chɛ, min fionden ni ka a kɔma a, an‑na a chee to, a gba fean bɔɛ ko a. Mbɛ an dɔ, “Yataa ɛ i yen tena wan i sɔ gba chɛ ɔ, tea fɔ wɛɛ nn ye, a tɔɛ ko a. Nn danden fan mu a a, mbɛ kamin chɛ, mbɛ ko yama ma mɔɛ mu a a.”
Mbɛ a ɔ, “A ni ma ko yama ma mɔ a, a ma ma a a, n mbe ee kun n ni a ɔ sɔn. N‑na koe min dɔ sɔn dechee, an nɛ chɛ a. N fionden fan ni tee, chɛɛ n mbe kaina yen fan gbɛ.”
Mbɛ an yɛ‑a to, an dɔ, “A na‑a fen ma i a, i baun koe a fioncha chɛ ɔ?”

Mbɛ kamin chɛ ɔ, “N ban‑da a ɔ yian‑da wo a, chɛɛ wo ma to ni, wo ni wo too ma sɔ a ma. Wo e n sɔ‑a to yɛ‑a n da a kuiɛ ɔ. Fen mu? N mbe ee che dan‑da a a, mbɛ wo wɛɛ, wo toen mu wo ni ma a fɛ mɔɛ n na.”
Mbɛ an‑na a main, an yɛ‑a to, an dɔ, “I wan mu mɔna chɛ fɛ mɔɛ a, chɛɛ nn tana, Mosisi fɛ mɔɛ mu nn na.
Nn‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ Yataa wandi gbu, an na‑a koɔ Mosisi tena. Chɛɛ mɔna chɛ tana, Chisɔsi chɛ, nn gbu ma a ka tena wɛɛ gbu an sɔn.”
Mbɛ kamin chɛ ɔ, “N ma kamaya koe chɛ sima ɔ yen nin bɛ. Wo ma kamin chɛ ka tena sɔn, chɛɛ a yen ko, a‑a a ma, n‑na kaina yen.
Mmɔ‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ Yataa ee mɔɛ n 'na samunɛ a min, miin mbe ko yama ma. Chɛɛ ɛ mɔɛ chɛ n 'na samunɛ a min fan, miin mbe a tɔɛ fai, an mbe a faa ma koe n ma.
A ka dunya a dan tima ma, aan sanche, mɔ ɔ mɔ ma a a min nin bɛ, mbɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a ma wan, mɔɛ‑a kaina yen, min suun‑da a fiondenɛ ɛ.
Ni kamin chɛ nii ma ka ni Yataa tena wan, a nii kun‑da a ni n ya chɛ a ka.”
Chɛɛ ya ɔ sɔɛ chɛ n dɔ, “I wan, i suun‑da ko yama an dɔ. E ee kun i ni nn kan fen kɔ fen na.” Mbɛ an‑na a gbain nɔ fɛsɛ fɛsɛ, an 'na samun chɛ chen chɛ a.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a a min kɛn, koe min ma‑a, a‑a a ya a kan kamin chɛ a, an‑na min gbain ka. A‑a a yen kɛn, a ɔ, “I danden fan mu Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ a?”
Mbɛ kamin chɛ ɔ, “Kai, a wakoe ɔ yian bɛ n na, min mbe a ma, n ni n kai fa a a.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Chɛɛ i ban‑da gbɛ a yen‑da. A sin, n fan gbu mu a a, n fɛn mbe ka koɔ‑a i tena.”
Mbɛ kamin chɛ ɔ gbɛ, a ɔ, “Mansa, n‑na n kai fa i a.” Mbɛ a‑a a kumbai gbangban Chisɔsi chen kɔɔ, a‑a a fai.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N na‑a dunya chɛ ɔ, n ni mɔɛ n 'na ko yama n na bɔ ya a ma. Min mbe a ma, mɔɛ miin fiondenɛ ɛ, an ya ni kaina yen. Miin sin, an ya ɛ kaina yen, an ni ma fion tɔɛ n na.”
A ni chɛ fɔ tena tima min na, Fayisii chɛ n dɔ n ni wan nɔ. Mbɛ an dɔ, “I ɔ fen? Nn ma dan ni a a, mbɛ i toen mu i ni a fɔ, mbɛ nn bɛɛ, nn fionden fan mu.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ni fion tɔɛ ni wo a, Yataa ni a ya ka‑a wan wo 'a ko yama n na. Chɛɛ wo e a fɔɛ min chɛ, wo ɔ, fion tɔ ma wo a, an fɛ mu, a ee a ya ka‑a wo 'a ko yama n na.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “Ka n mbe chɛ ma din wo tena. Mɔɛ min mbe ee don‑da sa kuii ɔ, a da 'a chia a, chɛɛ ɛ sɛ‑a chia dɔ mende a, a mɔɛ chɛ mu kanka kona wa an na.
Mɔɛ min mbe don a da 'a chia a, an mu sa kun ma fɛn mɔɛ gbu a.
Ni a na‑a sa kuii chɛ da a, mɔɛ min mbe ma nɔ, a kun ma fɛnɛ a, ɛ a da a ka wan a ye. Ni a sin don‑da, a ni bun a 'a sa n chee‑a an tɔɛ ma, an mbe a kuiɛ a min fan. Mbɛ a bɔ‑a an na kuii gbu ɔ.
Ni a ban‑da bɔ‑a a ta sa chɛ n gbɛɛ a, ɛ sɔ wan an ya ɔ, mbɛ sa chɛ n‑na a sɔ a fɛ, a mu min na, an‑na a kuiɛ sɔn fan.
Sa chɛ n mbe ee bea mɔ dɔ mende fɛ. Chɛɛ an mbe min ma, an mbe ben fan bui a, a ka mɔ dɔ mende baima. Koe min na mu, a mɔɛ chɛ kuiɛ ma bɔ ni an ti kuiɛ a.”
Chisɔsi na‑a tai chɛ an tɛ, chɛɛ an nii ma a ɔ gbɛ ni, a ni min fɔ tena an ye.
Chɛ‑a a ma wan, mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ka n mbe chɛ ma din wo tena. N mbe wan dechee yɔ sa kuii chɛ da, sa chɛ n mbe don min na, an mbe bɔ.
Chɛɛ mɔɛ tɔɛ n gbɛɛ, miin sɔ‑a n ya ɔ, miin na‑a a ma, yɔ an ni sa chɛ n kun ma fɛn tena wan, kanka kona wa mu an na. Chɛɛ sa chɛ n gbu ma an too wɛɛ ma sɔ ni an ma.
N fan mu sa kuii chɛ da a. Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ben‑da n tena chia a, a ni don, a mɔɛ chɛ ɛ kun ka ma sɔn‑da wan. Ɛ don‑da wan, a ni bɔ, a faa ma a. A sin mbe a daun fenɛ ma sɔn‑da wan.

Kanka tana, ɛ na dechee kanka chɛ koe an na, fen fa koe a, a basan kasaa chɛ koe a. Chɛɛ n fan, n na‑a, min mbe a ma, n 'na sa n ni fɔɛ ma sɔn, kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ. An sin, an fɔɛ chɛ ɔ, an mbe n 'na dua gbɛɛ ma sɔn‑da wan.
“N mbe wan yɔ sa kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛndɛ, min ma bɛnden mu a fɔɛ be koe a, a 'a sa n ko a.

Chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ tana, an mbe min pawa sa chɛ n kun ma fɛn koe a, a ee chɛ ma. Ni a‑a kui yen na‑a, ɛ sa chɛ n to wan, mbɛ a ben‑da bui‑a, a mu min na, a wan ta ma an na. Chɛ ɛ a ma wan, kui chɛ ni chɛ dɔndɔ ma, mbɛ a tɔɛ n fasan‑da a ɔ.
Mɔɛ min yaen mu ka, sa chɛ n kun ma fɛn koe a, ɛ ben fan bui‑a, koe min na mu, bɔi den gbama mu a a. A sin, a ma a gbɔsɔɛ ni sa chɛ n ko a.
N fan mu sa kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛndɛ a. N‑na n ta sa n sɔn fan, a sin, n 'na sa n bɛɛ, an‑na n sɔn fan.
Ɛ ka wan dechee, yɔ Fa‑a n sɔn buɛ min dɔ chɛndɛ chɛ, n bɛɛ, n‑na a sɔn ka wan. A sin, n ma bɛnden fan mu, n fandi be koe a, n 'na sa n na tɔnɔnɛ ko a.

N 'na sa dɔ n mbe wan nɔ, miin mbe ee sa kuii chɛ ɔ. N mbe na tena wan an bɛɛ a. An bɛɛ, an mbe an too ma sɔ‑a wan n da a kuiɛ ma, a sin, an gbɛɛ, an mbe ma‑a wan sa dɔndɔɛ a, an kun ma fɛn mɔɛ dɔndɔɛ ko a.
“Fa Yataa toen fan mu n na, koe min na mu, n ma bɛnden fan mu, n ni n fɔɛ be, min mbe a ma, n ni danka to ma‑a fɔɛ ɔ.

Mɔ ɔ mɔ ee kun a ni n fɔɛ ya n sun da a. Chɛɛ n fandi gbu, n fan mbe n fɔɛ be‑a. Gbasaya been mu n fandi an ma, n fandi fɔɛ be koe a, an ni n fa. A gbasaya chɛ ɛ to n fandi an boo ɔ, a ma koe a to, n ni yɛ fɔɛ ɔ. Fa na‑a a fɔ ka wan n ye, a ma koe a.”
Chisɔsi 'a bai chɛ n‑na a ma wan to, kuiɛ a fasanɛ don‑da to Chu mɔɛ chɛ n tɛ ɔ.
An sɛsɛ nu, an ni wan a fɔ‑a, an dɔ, “Nyina yama min mbe a fɛ, an‑na a woo ka. Wo e wo too ma sɔ a ma fen ko a?”
Chɛɛ an dɔ nu, an ni wan a fɔ‑a, an dɔ, “Nyina yama ɛ ma mɔɛ min fɛ, a ee koɔ ka. Nyina yama ee che a ma‑a fion tɔɛ ya a ni ka.”
Chima tima dɔndɔ a, Chisɔsi ni wan Chuusaɛn. A sin, a tima chɛ a, Chu n 'na bɛn dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, an ni min chee, an dɔ, Yataa 'a kata da a ka. An ni buɔdia wa an bɔ a tima chɛ a.
A tee chɛ ma, Chisɔsi ni wan Yataa 'a kata ɔ, ɛ sɛ ɛ yii an kaina chɛ, an ni min chee, an dɔ, Mansa Sɔɔmon 'na Pɛsa.
Mbɛ Chu mɔɛ n na sɔn sɔn‑da a 'a tindanɛ. Mbɛ an dɔ, “I ma a ma nn ni ma kɔndɔfii ɔ tima ɔ tima ko a, a si i wakoe ma. A ma gbu nn ni a ɔ sɔn, tea chɛndɛ chɛndɛ ko a, ni i wan mu kunka mansa chɛ a.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N banden fan mu gbɛ a fɔ‑a wo ye, chɛɛ wo ma to ni wo ni dan n na. Fa 'a gbasaya ɔ, n mbe kamaya koe miin ma, an fan mbe siiya bɔ n ko a.
Chɛɛ wo ma dan ni n na, koe min na mu, wo ma ma ni yɔ n 'na sa nu.
N 'na sa n mbe an too ma sɔ wan n da a bai ma, n mbe min fɔ. N‑na an sɔn, a sin, an mbe bea wan n fɛ.
N fɛ mɔɛ nu, n mbe kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ an be‑a an ma, min mbe a ma, an mbe ee fa‑a, an ni to saya ɔ. Mɔ ɔ mɔ ee che an bɔ‑a n boo ɔ.
Fa min‑na an be n ma, a 'a gbasaya benden mu fen kɔ fen ma. A sin, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee che an bia‑a gbasaya a, an ni bɔ Fa boo ɔ.
Nn fea Fa a, mɔ dɔndɔɛ mu nn na.”
Mbɛ Chu mɔɛ chɛ nu, an‑na senɛ ya to, a bon koe a fasa.

Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ an ma, a ɔ, “Wo‑a wai chɛndɛ sɛsɛ yen fan, n‑na miin chɛ. Fa 'a gbasaya ɔ mu, n mbe kun tena wai chɛ n chɛ koe a. N ma a ɔ sɔn, an wai chɛndɛ chɛ nu, ni a minan ko a mu, wo toen mu wo ni n bon, n ni fa.”

Mbɛ Chu mɔɛ chɛ n dɔ, “I 'a wai chɛndɛ chɛ nu, an dɔndɔ wɛɛ ko a ma, nn toen mu nn ni i bon, i ni fa. Chɛɛ e baa bɔ tena buɛ min dɔ Yataa ma, an donden mu nn ma. I mɔ gbu gbama gbama, e i wandi ya‑a Yataa a.”
Chisɔsi ɔ, “A nyɛnden fan mu, wo wandi gbu 'a sawa gboo ɔ, mbɛ Yataa na‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, ‘Wo mu Yataa dɔma n fan na.’

Wo 'a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ Yataa 'a gboo, ɛ bai miin fɔ, tea bai nu mu kuɔ fɔ ko a. A sin, Yataa wandi gbu, an na‑a mɔɛ chɛ n chee yataa dɔma n na. Mɔɛ chɛ nu, a wandi gbu, a ni a 'a sakana bai n na ben mɔɛ miin dɔ.
N tana, Fa an‑na n ya, a‑a n sɔ dunya chɛ ɔ. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo ee kun, wo ni kunɛ si n kun ma, baa bɔ koe a a ma. Koe min na mu, n‑na a fɔ, n dɔ, a 'a denɛ mu n na.
Ni Fa‑a n sɔ wai miin chɛ koe a, n mbe ee an fan chɛ tena, wo ma dan n na.
Chɛɛ ni n mbe Fa 'a wai an chɛ tena, wo ma dan nin bɛɛ n na boo ɔ boo, a nyin wo ni dan n chɛ chɛ wai n nan gbu n na. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, wo ni a ɔ gbɛ fɛsɛ fɛsɛ, mbɛ nn fea Fa a, mɔ dɔndɔɛ mu nn na.”
A tima chɛ a to, Chu mɔɛ chɛ nu, an toen ni to, an ni Chisɔsi bia fɔin. Chɛɛ a bɔ‑a wan an boo ɔ yɛdɛn.
Mbɛ a yɛ‑a a gbaa chia a, a‑a Chɔdan yii chɛ tɛ to. A yɛ‑a kaina chɛ, Chɔn na‑a a kuu sɔ ka yii chɛ‑a kaina min mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a.
Mɔ sɛsɛ na‑a wan, an‑na Chisɔsi tan. Mbɛ an nyɔn tɛ ɔ, an dɔ, “Chɔn nii ma kamaya ko kan kɔ kan ma ni. Chɛɛ bai n gbɛɛ, a‑a miin fɔ, a si kamin chɛ ma, an ma‑a tea a.”
Mbɛ mɔ sɛsɛ, miin ni nɔ, an‑na an kai fa a a.
Mbɛ kaminɛ yen ko, min tɔ ni Dasayɔsi, a bea‑a gbandi a. A waa tɔ ni Bɛtani. An duu chɛ ɔ, a tensa musu fea nu, an ni wan nɔ, Mɛi an fea Mata a.
Mɛi chɛ, an mbe na tena na‑a tu kunyɛ a diama fasi fasi‑a Chisɔsi chenɛ n ma, mbɛ a‑a an ma fian chɛndɛ chɛ, a kundi a. A tensa kai an nii nɛ Dasayɔsi chɛ a, min ni ka sa ɔ gbandi ɔ.
Mbɛ tensa musu fea chɛ nu, an‑na sakana a ta Mansa Chisɔsi tena, an dɔ, an ni a fɔ a ye, mbɛ a dia nyɔɛ Dasayɔsi gbandi‑a.

Chisɔsi‑a sakana chɛ a min kɛn, a ɔ, “Dasayɔsi 'a gbandi chɛ, a ee che‑a a ma‑a a ni fa kudai. Chɛ ɛ ma tena, min mbe a ma, mɔɛ n ni Yataa 'a gbasaya ɔ yen. A sin, ɛ ma tena to chia an na, n fan, Yataa 'a denɛ, mɔɛ n mbe n 'na kamaya ɔ yen‑da chia min na.”
Chisɔsi toen ni suun ma nyɔ n sawa chɛ n na, Mɛi, Mata, a basan an tensa Dasayɔsi a.
Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, a‑a Dasayɔsi gbandi koe chɛ a min kɛn, a nii ma a chen ma bɔ ni nɔ, aan tee fea benden gbakɔ.
Mbɛ chɛ gbakɔ, a‑a a fɔ gbɛ a fɛ denɛ n ye, a ɔ, “Mmɔ ɛ yɛ tena gbɛ Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ wan.”
Mbɛ an dɔ, “Kan mɔ, mmɔ ka kundu chɛ ɔ nɔ, mɔɛ chɛ n toen ni an ni i ma bon bon senɛ a, i ni fa. I toen mu to, mmɔ ni yɛ nɔ wan ka to?”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Awa tan kun ma fea an mbe tee ɔ, ae? Chɛ an fɛ mu, mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe tachɛ chɛ‑a tee a den, a ee a chenɛ a tu, a ni bea. Koe min na mu, ɛ manɛ yen tena wan.
Chɛɛ ni a ma‑a tachɛ chɛ‑a pimbi pimbi ɔ, ɛ a chenɛ a tu wan, mbɛ a bea‑a. Koe min na mu, manɛ ee nɔ, kaina yen koe a.”
Chisɔsi‑a chɛ fɔ kɛn, mbɛ a yɛ‑a to, a ɔ, “Mmɔ dia nyɔɛ Dasayɔsi, chinɔɛ ben‑da a a. Chɛɛ n mbe ta tena wan, a sin, n mbe a a kunɛ‑a wan.”
Mbɛ a fɛ den chɛ n dɔ, “Mansa, ni gbandi mɔɛ chɛ chinɔ‑a, mbɛ ɛ baun tena wan.”
Chisɔsi ni ka a fɔ an na an ye, mbɛ Dasayɔsi fa‑a. Chɛɛ an tana, an‑na a ya, mbɛ ɛ chinɔɛ chɛndɛ chɛndɛ an dɔ.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a bai gbu bu ka an ye, a ɔ, “Dasayɔsi fa‑a.
Chɛɛ wo ko a, n bu ɔ di, n nii nɔ a fa tima a, min mbe a ma, wo ni wo kai fa n na. Wo na, mmɔ ni ta a su tan.”
Mbɛ Tɔmɔsi, an ni min tɔɛ ma si, an dɔ, Fɛn Kai, a koɔ‑a a bɔɛ chɛ n tena, a ɔ, “Mmɔ gbɛɛ mmɔ bɛ mmɔ kan mɔ a, mmɔ ta, min mbe a ma, mmɔ ni fa dɔndɔ a.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fo Bɛtani duu ɔ, an bɛ a fɛ den chɛ n na. A‑a a fo kɛn, a fɔ‑a a ye, mbɛ tee sawa ben‑da gbɛ, kɛn an‑na Dasayɔsi sa a kamba ɔ.
Bɛtani chɛ, an tɛ ɔ nii ma yansan Chuusaɛn na, a nii ma mai fea bɔ ni.
Chɛ na‑a a ma wan, mɔ sɛsɛ ka‑a Chudia, an na‑a Mata sɛbɔ‑a, an fea Mɛi a, a si an tensa kai a saya ma.
Mata‑a a a min kɛn, mbɛ Chisɔsi ɛ chia a, ɛ na tena, mbɛ a ta‑a a ya ɔ. Chɛɛ Mɛi tana, a to‑a wan chenɛ a.
Mata‑a Chisɔsi tan kɛn, a ɔ, “Mansa, ni i ni nɛ wan, n tensa chɛ nii fa‑a.
Chɛɛ n‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ sanche chɛ wɛɛ ɔ, ni i‑a Yataa ɔ tisa fen kɔ fen ko a, ɛ a be‑a wan i ma.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ te a ma, a ɔ, “I tensa ɛ a kɔɔ sɔ tena wan to, a ni yɛ fɔɛ ɔ.”
Mbɛ a ɔ, “N‑na chɛ ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ ɛ a kɔɔ sɔ‑a wan to saya ɔ, a ni yɛ fɔɛ ɔ. Chɛ ɛ ma‑a wan, tee dankama nɛnɛ ma, mɔɛ gbɛɛ ɛ ma‑a a kɔɔ sɔ‑a, a ka saya ɔ.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ te to a ma, “N fan mbe a ma, mɔɛ n mbe an kɔɔ sɔ, a ka saya ɔ, mbɛ n‑na a ma to, an‑na fɔɛ ma sɔn. An ni a fɔ mɔɛ ni fa wɛɛ, ɛ a tun fan ma koe a fɔɛ ɔ, ni a kai faen fan ni n na.
A sin, mɔ ɔ mɔ miin mbe fɔɛ chɛ ɔ, an sin kai faen mu n na, an mbe kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da wan n na. I danden fan mu chɛ a?”
Mbɛ a ɔ, “A ɛ ka wan, mansa. N danden fan mu a a, mbɛ i wan mu kunka mansa a, Yataa 'a denɛ. Yataa na‑a i wan na koe fɔ dunya chɛ ɔ.”
Bai chɛ n fɔenɛ gbakɔ, mbɛ Mata yɛ‑a, a‑a a dɔ Mɛi chee. Mbɛ an fea gbe tɛ ɔ, a ɔ, “Mmɔ 'a ticha na‑a, a sin, a toen mu a ni i yen.”
Mɛi‑a bai chɛ a min kɛn dechee, a ma a ɔ si chɛ ni, a ta‑a a tan dɔndɔ gbe.
Chisɔsi nii ma don nin bɛ konko chɛ gbu ɔ, chɛɛ a ni kaina chɛ wan tun, Mata na‑a a tan kaina min.
Mɔɛ miin na‑a na ka sɛbɔ chɛ tena, an na‑a Mɛi yen fan ɛ a kɔɔ sɔ‑a bui a. Mbɛ an‑na a yen kɛn ta‑a, an bea‑a wan a fɛ. A ni an yii ma, mbɛ a ni ta tena kamba ma wan, di chɛ koe a.
Mbɛ Mɛi‑a a fo Chisɔsi ni kaina. A sin‑na a yen kɛn dechee, a bea‑a dɔndɔ gbe a chenɛ a. A ɔ, “Mansa, ni i ni nɛ wan, n tensa chɛ nii fa‑a.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a yen Mɛi puyɛ‑a di a. Mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ, miin na‑a ka a san‑da, an bun‑da di chɛ‑a. Chɛ‑a Chisɔsi faa mɔnɛ wan, a ma a to ni ɛnden bɛɛ a.
Mbɛ a ɔ, “Wo‑a a sa mende kamba ɔ?” Mbɛ an dɔ, “Mansa, na, i ni nɔ yen.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ya yii yii‑a wuu.
Mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ n dɔ an nyɔn ma, an dɔ, “Wo a ɔ yen gbɛ, a toen ni buɛ min dɔ Dasayɔsi a.”
Chɛɛ an dɔ nu, an dɔ to, “A wan na‑a a ma fion tɔɛ chɛ‑a kaina yen. A ni a ma wan to Dasayɔsi nii fa.”
A fean bɔɛ ɔ to, koe chɛ nii ma Chisɔsi to ni. Mbɛ an‑na a fo kamba chɛ tena. Kamba ni a a, fanɛ ni, sen dɛnfɛ bunden ni min da a.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ an ma, a ɔ, “Wo sen chɛ ka a da a.” Chɛɛ Dasayɔsi tensa musu Mata, a ɔ, “Mansa, a tui kunyɛ yama an mbe bɔ‑a.” A ɔ, “Tee naaninɛ an nɛ ka gbɛ, kɛn a sa‑a a kamba chɛ ɔ.”
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi wɛɛ ɔ, “N na‑a a fɔ wan i ye, mbɛ ni i‑a i kai fa n na, e a ɔ yen‑da wan, Yataa ɛ kamaya koe miin ma.”
Mbɛ an‑na senɛ chɛ bɔ kamba chɛ da a. Chisɔsi‑a a ya a si banda a, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “Fa, n ni i wai bɔ, a mu min na, i‑a n 'na samunɛ a min fan.
N gbu n‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ e a a min fan tima ɔ tima. Chɛɛ n‑na chɛ fɔ dechee mɔɛ chɛ n fan ko a nɛ, min mbe a ma, an ni dan a a, mbɛ i wan gbu‑a n sɔ nɛ dunya chɛ ɔ.”
Samunɛ chɛ chɛenɛ gbakɔ Chisɔsi boo ɔ, mbɛ a‑a chee chɛ gbankon, a ɔ, “Dasayɔsi, bɔ nɛ.”

Mbɛ Dasayɔsi bɔ‑a kamba chɛ gbu ɔ. A bɔ‑a kamba chɛ ɔ, fen gbɛ mendemendeenɛ ɛ a a. A chenɛ n ni ma e, a boo nu, ni a kunɛ gbɛɛ dondenɛ ni fen gbɛ chɛ ɔ. Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ an ma, a ɔ, “Wo kasanche chɛ gbɛɛ bɔ a ma, a ni ben ben.”
Mɔɛ chɛ n sɛsɛ, miin na‑a na ka Mɛi sɛbɔ‑a, an na‑a a ɔ yen fan Chisɔsi na‑a koe min ma ka, mbɛ an‑na an kai fa a a.
Chɛɛ an dɔ nu, an yɛ‑a wan Fayisii dɔ n tena, mbɛ an‑na a ɔ yian an na, Chisɔsi‑a koe min ma.

Chɛ ko a, Fayisii chɛ nu, an bɛ Chu n tɛ mɔɛ n na Yataa a, an 'na mansa n na, an‑na Chu kuti wa si kaina dɔndɔ. Mbɛ an dɔ, “Mmɔ ɛ fen ma tena gbɛ? Mmɔ a ɔ yen gbɛ sanche, kamin chɛ ɛ kamaya koe min gbɛɛ a tachɛ tena.

Ni mmɔ‑a a to nɔ, a ni ma kamaya koe chɛ n ma‑a tun tun, mɔ ɔ mɔ ɛ na‑a wan an kai fa a a. A sin, kun ti nu Domi chɛnyɛ ɔ, an mbe ee na‑a mmɔ to‑a nɔ. An mbe na‑a wan, mbɛ an‑na Yataa 'a kata chɛ yɔn nɛ, a basan mmɔ 'a mɔɛ n bɛɛ a.”
Chɛɛ an dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, min tɔ ni Kayafasi. An ni tɛ mɔ wa a, Chu n tɛ Yataa a, an san chɛ a. Mbɛ a koɔ‑a, a ɔ, “Wo gbɛɛ, wo ma ko ɔ gbɛ nin bɛ.
A nyin, wo gbu ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ a fisa mɔ dɔndɔ ni fa, mɔɛ gbɛɛ ko a. Chɛ ma che ni mɔɛ gbɛɛ faenɛ ɔ, chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ.”

Tea gbu a, Kayafasi nii ma bai chɛ fɔ ni, a wandi kun ma gbasaya an na. A ni ka a kɔɔ fɔ an na an ye, Yataa ni na tena koe min ma‑a. A ni ka a fɔ tena wan, mbɛ Chisɔsi ni na tena wan fa‑a Chu mɔɛ n ko a. Chɛ ma‑a koe min na mu, a san chɛ a, a wan ni Chu n 'na tɛ mɔ wa Yataa tena.
A sin, Chisɔsi nii fa tena an dechee ko a, chɛɛ a ma koe ni to, a ni na Yataa 'a denɛ n na kaina dɔndɔɛ. Yataa 'a denɛ nu, miin gbɛɛ a fasandenɛ ni ben‑da, an ni ma mɔ dɔndɔɛ a.
A ka a tee chɛ ma, aan a ta gbɛ, Chu n ya ɔ sɔɛ chɛ dɔ nu, an ni wan gbɛ dɔbɛnɛ ɔ, Chisɔsi fa koe a.

Chɛ na‑a a ma wan, Chisɔsi nii ben ben to fanka ya kɔɔ Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ a‑a min ma, a ka‑a wan nɔ, mbɛ a ta‑a kaina dɔndɔ, min ni fuinɛ baima. Mbɛ a si‑a nɔ duu dɔndɔ ɔ, min tɔ ni Ɛfan, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na.

A tima chɛ a, tee kuunden fan na‑a to, Chu n 'na kun bɔ a ɔ bɛnɛ ko a. A sin, mɔ sɛsɛ na‑a sɛ wan Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, a ka duu tɔɛ chɛ n dɔ Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ. An na‑a na, min mbe a ma, an ni an ko an 'na manda ɔ, bɛnɛ chɛ e na to che‑a.
An ni wan an ya a kan‑da Chisɔsi a. A sin, an na ni kɛn sɔn‑da Yataa 'a kata chɛ ɔ, mbɛ an bun‑da an nyɔn dɔ tisa‑a, an dɔ, “Wo gbu danden fan mu a a, tea ko a, mbɛ ɛ na‑a wan bɛnɛ chɛ ɔ?”

Mɔɛ miin ni Chu n tɛ ɔ Yataa a, an 'na mansa nu, an bɛ Fayisii n na, an na‑a sawa a ben fan. An na‑a a fɔ wan, an dɔ, ni mɔ ɔ mɔ na‑a a ɔ sɔn, Chisɔsi ni kaina min, an dɔ, an ni a fɔ an ye, an dɔ, min mbe a ma, an ni a bia.
Tee wɔdɔ an na‑a to, kun bɔ a ɔ bɛn chɛ ko a, mbɛ Chisɔsi ta‑a Bɛtani duu ɔ, Dasayɔsi waa a. Dasayɔsi chɛ ni, Chisɔsi na‑a a ma, a kɔɔ sɔ‑a, a ka saya ɔ.
An na‑a yɛɛ ma daun fenɛ ɔ bɛn fan Chisɔsi ko a, Mata ni min dɔ du tena. Dasayɔsi ni mɔɛ dɔndɔ an na, miin bɛ ni daunɛ chɛ tena tebu ma Chisɔsi a.

Chisɔsi to‑a daun chɛ chɛ an na, an bɛ gbɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ n na, mbɛ Mɛi‑a tu kunyɛ a diama ya, sani dɔndɔ faa gban. Tu chɛ baa ni gbɛ sai ma, mbɛ a bun‑da a fasi fasi‑a Chisɔsi chenɛ n ma. Mbɛ tu chɛ kunyɛ, a‑a chenɛ gbu gbɛɛ ya. Mɛi yɛ‑a wan, a‑a Chisɔsi chenɛ n ma fian fian a kundi a.
Chisɔsi fɛ den dɔndɔ min tɔ ni Chudasi Isikayɔti, a ni wan nɔ mɔɛ chɛ n tɛ ɔ. A wan ni na tena Chisɔsi ma tachɛ‑a, chɛɛ ma nyɔnɛ nu ma. Mbɛ a ɔ,
“A ni nyan‑da wan, sunkun chɛ ni ma‑a tu bonda chɛ ma tachɛ‑a, tee chɛmɛ sawa debea pawa a, mbɛ a‑a a 'a kɔpɔɛ chɛ be yɔn tɔɛ n ma.”

A nii ma chɛ fɔ ni, a ɔ yian koe a, mbɛ yɔn tɔɛ n bakoe ɛ wan a faa ɔ. Chɛɛ a na‑a a fɔ, koe min na mu, kanka ni a a. A wan ni an 'na kɔpɔɛ kun ma, a bɔɛ n gbɛɛ ko a. A sin, tima sɛsɛ ko a, a ni kɔpɔɛ chɛ dɔ ya wan, ɛ a don a ta faa ma koe ɔ.
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “A to nɔ dechee. A‑a min ma ka, a‑a n ma bɛn fan ka n tɔn koe a, n fa tima ya ɔ.
Yɔn tɔɛ n tana, wo bɛ an mbe ma tena an na tima ɔ tima. Chɛɛ n tana, mmɔ bɛ ee ma tena tima ɔ tima.”

Chɛ ɛ ma‑a tima min na, mɔ fanka wa n‑na Chisɔsi wakoe a min Bɛtani duu ɔ, mbɛ an na‑a wan nɔ. An nii ma na ni, an ni Chisɔsi dɔndɔ gbe an yen. Chɛɛ an na‑a, min mbe a ma, an ni Dasayɔsi wɛɛ yen, Chisɔsi na‑a min kɔɔ sɔ a ka saya ɔ.
Mbɛ a tima chɛ a gbɛ, Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa nu, an‑na dɔbɛnɛ chɛ Dasayɔsi wɛɛ fa koe a.
A mu min na, an bakoe a ni to, an bɔ Chu mɔɛ n sɛsɛ, an ni ka tena an fɛ, an mbe an kai fa‑a Chisɔsi a.
Banda ɔ ka dɔndɔɛ ma, fanka wa chɛ, miin na‑a na ka kun bɔ a ɔ bɛn chɛ ɔ, an‑na a a min, mbɛ Chisɔsi ɛ na tena Chuusaɛn duu ɔ.

Chɛ ko a, mbɛ an‑na gbɛ nyanda an bia an boo ɔ, an mbe ta‑a buɔdia yee tɛ‑a, a ya ɔ chia a. An dɔ, “Mmɔ Yataa tando. Mansa Yataa ni mɔɛ chɛ dua, min na‑a a tɔɛ ɔ. Mansa Yataa ni mansa wa chɛ dua, min mbe na tena ma‑a Isɔɛɛ chɛnyɛ kun ma.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a sofɛ tɔngbɔ dɔndɔ ma sɔn, a sɛ‑a min kun ma, a bun‑da na‑a Chuusaɛn. Yataa 'a gboo na‑a a fɔ ka wan dechee, a ɔ,
“Chuusaɛn mɔɛ nu, wo ma chian ko ɔ ko ma. Wo 'a mansa yen ko na‑a, ɛ si ɔ sofɛ tɔngbɔɛ kun ma.”

A tima chɛ a, Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ n nii ma koe chɛ n dɔ gbɛ ni. Chɛɛ kɛn Yataa na‑a Chisɔsi kɔɔ sɔ, a sɛ‑a banda bu ɔ manɛ ɔ, mbɛ a puin‑da an yii ma, Yataa 'a gboo na‑a chɛ fɔ wan, a si a ma. A sin, an‑na an chɛ ka a ko a.
Tima min na Chisɔsi na‑a Dasayɔsi chee, mbɛ a bɔ‑a kamba chɛ ɔ, a kɔɔ sɔ‑a saya ɔ, mɔ fanka miin ni nɔ, an na‑a an koe chɛ ɔ yian fan, min na‑a ma ka.
Chɛ an na‑a a ma, mɔ fanka chɛ wɛɛ na‑a a ya ɔ, koe min na mu, an na‑a a a min fan, mbɛ Chisɔsi an‑na kamaya koe wa chɛ ma.
Mbɛ Fayisii chɛ nu, an bun‑da a fɔ‑a an nyɔn tɛ ɔ, an dɔ, “Wo‑a a yen, ko ɔ ko ee bɔ tena ɔ mmɔ boo ɔ. Wo ko bonda chɛ yen bɛ, dunya gbɛɛ ɛ a sɔ tena gbɛ a wan fɛ.”
Mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin na‑a sɛ ka Chuusaɛn bɛn chɛ ɔ, Yataa fai koe a, mɔɛ n ni wan an tɛ ɔ, miin nii ma Chu mɔ a.
Mbɛ an mɔɛ chɛ nu, mbɛ an ta‑a Fiipi tena, min na‑a ka Besaida duu ɔ, Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ. Mbɛ an‑na a fɔ a ye, an dɔ, “Kai, nn toen mu nn ni Chisɔsi an yen ka.”
Mbɛ Fiipi ta‑a a ɔ yian Anduu a, mbɛ an fea chɛ ta‑a a ɔ yian Chisɔsi a, mɔɛ chɛ n‑na min fɔ.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Tima che‑a gbɛ sanche, Yataa ni a ɔ yian, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n kamayaen mu buɛ min dɔ.
Ka n mbe chɛ ma din wo tena, mbɛ chin fen kuu, a mu chin fen kuu dɔndɔɛ an na, aan a ni chin, mbɛ a tui‑a. Ni a tui‑a wan, min mbe bɔ gbɛ, mbɛ a‑a gbɔɛ be kaka.
Mɔɛ miin gbɔsɔen mu an fandi ko a dechee, an mbe fo‑a wan an fɔɛ a. Chɛɛ mɔɛ miin mbe an fɔɛ be‑a Yataa ma dunya chɛ ɔ, an mbe kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da wan.
Mɔ ɔ mɔ min toen mu, a ni ma n kɔɔ, mɔɔ ni a bea‑a n fɛ. Koe min na mu, n 'na bɔi denɛ ɛ ma kaina chɛ wan, n mbe ma‑a kaina min. A sin, Fa Yataa ɛ baa be‑a wan mɔ ɔ mɔ ma, min mbe ma‑a n kɔɔ.
“Sanche chɛ ɔ, n faa ɛ mɔnɛ tena. A sin, n ma a ɔ sɔn ni n mbe fen fɔ. N mbe che wan a fɔ‑a, n dɔ, ‘Fa, n kunɛ bɔ koe chɛ ɔ, n ya ɔ.’ Chɛɛ n na‑a chɛ gbu an ko a dunya chɛ ɔ, tima chɛ a.
Fa, i 'a kamaya ɔ yian dunya chɛ ɔ.” Mbɛ kuiɛ a min‑da, a ka banda bu ɔ, a ɔ, “N ban‑da a ɔ yian‑da mɔɛ n na, n kamayaen mu buɛ min dɔ, a sin, n mbe na‑a wan to a ɔ yian‑da an na.”
Mɔ fanka chɛ miin ni ka nɔ sɔ ɔ, an‑na kuiɛ chɛ a min fan. A sin, an dɔ nu, an dɔ, “Banda an na‑a koɔ ka.” Mbɛ an dɔ n sin, an dɔ, “Maeka an koɔ‑a a tena.”
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ an ma, a ɔ, “Bai chɛ miin na min‑da ka, a ka banda bu ɔ, basan koe ma n ma, chɛɛ basan koe mu wo ma.
Tima an che‑a ka gbɛ sanche, Yataa ni kaa a tɛ dunya chɛ wakoe ma. Sanche chɛ ɔ, nyina yama min 'na mansaya ɛ dunya chɛ ɔ, a a bea tima an nɛ.
Chɛɛ n fan, tima min na an mbe n na sɛ‑a kɔn gbengbanden chɛ ma, n mbe a ma‑a wan, mɔ ɔ mɔ ni na n tena.”
A na‑a chɛ fɔ tima min na, a ni ka a fɔ an na, a ni na tena fa‑a buɛ min dɔ.

Mbɛ fanka chɛ koɔ‑a, an dɔ, “Mmɔ 'a sawa‑a a fɔ wan mmɔ ye, mbɛ kunka mansa ɛ ma‑a wan nn tɛ ɔ kuɔ fɔ ko a. Chɛɛ e gbɛ a fɔ‑a nn ye, mbɛ an mbe Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ a sɛ‑a wan kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma, a ni fa. Nyɔn mu an Mɔ Gbu 'a Den chɛ a?”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ an ma, a ɔ, “Manɛ chɛ ɛ ma‑a wan bɛ wo tɛ ɔ tima ɛnden ko a. Wo a a tun tachɛ chɛ koe a, manɛ ɛ wɛ nɔ tima min na, min mbe a ma, pimbi ee bun‑da wo ma. Ni mɔɛ a ma‑a tachɛ chɛ‑a pimbi pimbi ɔ, a ee a chen kɔɔ yen, a ta chia sɔn koe a.

Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo wo kai fa man chɛ a, tima min na mu wɛ ɛ wo tɛ ɔ. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, wo ni ma mɔɛ n na, miin mbe manɛ ɔ tima ɔ tima ko a.” Bai chɛ fɔenɛ gbakɔ Chisɔsi boo ɔ, mbɛ a ta‑a, a‑a a wandi ya kɔɔɛ nun an mɔɛ chɛ n ma.
Chisɔsi na‑a kamaya koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ma boo ɔ boo an ya kɔɔ, chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, an nii ma an kai fa ni a a.

Chɛ ma‑a, min mbe a ma, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ Aisaya na‑a bai min fɔ, a ni bɔ a a. A na‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “Mansa, mɔ ɔ mɔ ma dan ni nn 'na sakana bai a, nn‑na min fɔ. I sin‑na a ɔ yian fan, i gbasayaen mu buɛ min dɔ.”
An nii ma dan ni sakana bai chɛ a, koe min na mu, Aisaya na‑a a fɔ wan to, a ɔ, “Yataa na‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ,
“N‑na an ya n na pimbi, an ma na kaina yen. N‑na an yiima n bɛɛ a fa fa‑a, an ma na koe n dɔ gbɛ chɛndɛ chɛ. N‑na chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, an ma na an ya a mun n ma, an ni bauncha ma sɔn.”
Aisaya na‑a chɛ fɔ, koe min na mu, a na‑a a yen fan, Chisɔsi ni na tena ma‑a kamaya tɔɛ min na. A sin, chɛ an na‑a a ma, a na‑a a kɔɔ fɔ mɔɛ n ye.

Chu n ya ɔ sɔɛ n sɛsɛ nu, a tima chɛ a, an bɛɛ kai faen fan ni Chisɔsi a. Chɛɛ Fayisii n bakoe na‑a a ma wan, an nii an 'na danaya chɛ a bɔ ya a ma. Koe min na mu, an nii ma to ni an ni an gbain kuɔ fɔ an 'na samun chɛ chen chɛ a.
An na‑a chɛ ma, koe min na mu, an toen ni mɔ gbu n ta tando an na, a ni ben Yataa ta ma.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi koɔ‑a gbankon, a ɔ, “Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe a kai fa‑a n na, a ma a kai fa ni n dɔndɔ gbe a, chɛɛ a‑a a kai fa Fa Yataa wɛɛ an na, min‑na n sɔ.
Mɔ ɔ mɔ min‑na n yen, a‑a Fa an yen ka, min‑na n sɔ.
N na‑a dunya chɛ ɔ, a ma koe a, mɔɛ n ni manɛ ma sɔn. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe a kai fa‑a n na, a ee ma‑a kaina ɔ pimbienɛ ɔ.
Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a a min, n‑na bai miin fɔ, a sin, a ma a boo si ni an kɔɔ, n fan mbe ee na‑a kaa a tɛ‑a a mɔɛ chɛ ma, a ni tɔɔya. N na‑a dunya chɛ ɔ, mɔɛ n baun koe an na, chɛɛ an 'na tɔɔya koe ma.

Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe ban‑da n dɔ, a ni a boo bɔ n 'na sakana bai kɔɔ, min mbe kaa a tɛ‑a a wakoe ma, ɛ nɔ. N‑na bai miin fɔ, an fan mbe kaa a tɛ‑a a wakoe ma, a ni tɔɔ. Chɛ ɛ ma‑a wan tee dankama ma, mɔɛ n mbe an kɔɔ sɔ‑a saya ɔ tee min ma.
N mbe ee koɔ n fandi 'a gbasaya an kɔɔ. Chɛɛ Fa min‑na n sɔ, ɛ min fɔ n ye a fɔ koe a, n mbe an fɔ.
A sin, n‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ ɛ min sin fɔ n ye, an mbe a ma mɔɛ n ni kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn. Chɛ an fɛ mu, n mbe min fɔ, an nɛ dechee Fa‑a min fɔ n ye, a fɔ koe a.”

Tima ni gbɛ che koe an na, kun bɔ a ɔ bɛn chɛ kuu sɔ koe a. Chisɔsi na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ tima an ni ka gbɛ che‑a, a ni dunya chɛ to, a ni yɛ a fa tena. Mɔɛ miin ni a fɛ dunya chɛ ɔ, a na‑a to wan an na tima ɔ tima ko a. A sin, mmɔ ɛ na tena a ɔ yen‑da, a to‑a buɛ min dɔ an na, a da faenɛ ɔ gban.

Chisɔsi ni gbɛ yɛɛ ma daun fenɛ an ma kɔn tena, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na. A tima chɛ a, Sitana chɛen fan ni gbɛ Chudasi faa ɔ, Chisɔsi ma tachɛ koe a, chɛɛ ma nyɔnɛ n ma. Chudasi chɛ ni kai Saimɔn Isikayɔti 'a denɛ an na.
Chisɔsi na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ a fa ban‑da gbasaya gbɛɛ be‑a a ma, ko ɔ ko ma koe a. A na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan to, mbɛ a ka‑a Yataa tena wan, a sin mbe yɛ tena to nɔ wan.
Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, doma kai min ni ka a ma, a‑a a bɔ, mbɛ a‑a tawa chii a bu tɛ.
Chɛ gbakɔ, mbɛ a‑a yii chɛ feanka ɔ, mbɛ a bun‑da a fɛ den chɛ n chenɛ n ma ko‑a, dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a. A sin, ɛ ta‑a an chen chɛ n ma fian‑da a 'a tawa chɛ a a bu tɛ, aan an ma ɛ ta‑a gbaa gbechee.
Mbɛ a che‑a Saimɔn Pita ma, min‑na a fɔ, a ɔ, “Mansa, i wan mbe na tena n chenɛ ma ko‑a. I wan to?”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N mbe ka koe min ma tena, e ee che a ɔ gbɛ‑a sanche chɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ e a ɔ gbɛ‑a wan ya ɔ ma.”
Mbɛ Pita ɔ, “N mbe ee dɔn a ma, tima kan kɔ kan ko a, i ni n chenɛ ma ko.” Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ni i sin ma dɔn ni, n ni i chen chɛ ma ko, mbɛ i ta ka‑a n bakoe ma.”
Mbɛ Saimɔn Pita ɔ te gbɛ, a ɔ, “Mansa, mbɛ i ma n chen dechee ma ko, chɛɛ n boo n bɛɛ ma ko, mbɛ i‑a n kunɛ wɛɛ ɔ ko.”
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ni mɔɛ‑a a ko fion, ɛ a chenɛ an ma ko gbɛ dechee, a mu min na, nɔɛ ee to a gboo tɔɛ gbɛɛ ma. A sin, wo koen fan mu gbɛ, chɛɛ wo dɔndɔ ma ko ni fion.”
Chisɔsi na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan gbɛ, mɔɛ min ni na tena a ma tachɛ‑a, chɛɛ ma nyɔnɛ n ma. Chɛ an‑na a ma, a na‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, an gbɛɛ koen fan mu gbɛ, chɛɛ an dɔndɔ ma ko ni fion.

Chisɔsi ban‑da kɛn an chenɛ n ma ko‑a, mbɛ a 'a doma kai chɛ, a na‑a min bɔ ka, a‑a a don, mbɛ a si‑a to daun chɛ tena. Mbɛ a ɔ a fɛ den chɛ n ma, a ɔ, “Wo‑a koe chɛ ɔ gbɛ wan, n‑na min ma ka sanche wo tena?”
A ɔ, “Wo e ma koɔ‑a n tena, tima dɔ n na, wo e n chee, wo ɔ, kan mɔ, dɔ n na, wo ɔ, mansa. A sin, wo e ma ka tea an fɔ‑a, koe min na mu, n fan nɛ.
N fan, n fɛn mu wo 'a mansa a, ni wo kan mɔ, n‑na wo chenɛ n ma ko ka sanche. Chɛ ni a ma, wo wɛɛ, wo ni wo nyɔn chenɛ n ma ko.
N‑na tɔmɔsi an yian ka wo a, min mbe a ma, wo ni a ma, yɔ n‑na a ma dechee buɛ min dɔ wo ko a.
Ka n mbe chɛ ma din wo gbɛɛ tena, yɔnɛ ma ben ni a ti ma, a sin, sɔ mɔ kan kɔ kan ma ben ni mɔɛ ma, min‑na a sɔ.
Wo‑a koe chɛ n dɔ sɔn ka buɛ min dɔ gbɛ, dua ɛ ma‑a wan wo ma kaka, ni wo‑a an koe chɛ n ma.

“N mbe ee bai chɛ fɔ tena wo gbɛɛ an ko a. N‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, n‑na n boo sɔ mɔɛ miin sima ma, ma koe a n fɛ. Chɛɛ Yataa 'a gboo‑a min fɔ, ɛ bɔ‑a wan a a. A‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, ‘Nn fea mɔɛ min na, nn mbe n 'na daun fenɛ ɔ du, a bun‑da n chɛɛ‑a.’
Koe min mbe na tena ma‑a, n mbe an dɔ yian tena wo a sanche, a e na to ma‑a. Min mbe a ma, ɛ ma‑a tima min na, wo ni dan a a, mbɛ n fan, kunka mansa mu n fan na.

N mbe chɛ ma din wo tena, mbɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe a boo si‑a mɔɛ kɔɔ, n‑na miin sɔ, a‑a a boo si ka n fandi wɛɛ an kɔɔ. A sin, mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe a boo a si‑a n kɔɔ, ɛ ma‑a ka a boo a si‑a Yataa an kɔɔ, min‑na n sɔ.”
Bai chɛ fɔenɛ gbakɔ Chisɔsi boo ɔ, a faa ni mɔnɛ tena wan kaka. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ den a fɛ denɛ n ye, a ɔ, “N mbe chɛ ma din‑da wan wo tena, mbɛ wo dɔndɔ, ɛ na tena wan n ma tachɛ‑a, chɛɛ ma nyɔnɛ n ma.”
Bai chɛ‑a Chisɔsi fɛ den chɛ n gbɛɛ da a fa wan gban. Mbɛ an bun‑da an nyɔn ma fɛn‑da, an ma a ɔ sɔn ni a yii ni min ma an tɛ ɔ.
Chisɔsi fɛ den chɛ n dɔndɔ, min ko a ni di a ye kaka, a ni wan Chisɔsi tɔnfɛ daun chɛ‑a.
Mbɛ Saimɔn Pita‑a a ya kai an fɛ den chɛ ma, a ɔ, a ni tisa chɛ ni Chisɔsi ɛ bai sa tena, a si nyɔn ma an tɛ ɔ.
Mbɛ an fɛ den chɛ, a‑a a da ma ta Chisɔsi too tena, mbɛ a ɔ, “Mansa, i yii mbe nyɔn na?”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N mbe biidi sima tɛ‑a wan a a, mbɛ n‑na a don supu ɔ, mbɛ n‑na a be a mɔɛ chɛ ma.” A sin, a‑a biidi chɛ don kɛn supu chɛ ɔ, a‑a a be wan Chudasi ma, kai Saimɔn Isikayɔti 'a denɛ chɛ.
Chudasi ɛ biidi chɛ bia‑a dechee, mbɛ Sitana bea‑a a fɛ. Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ a ma, a ɔ, “I 'a wai i boo ɔ, a chɛ, a a gbandia.”
An fɛn gbɛɛ ni daun chɛ‑a, an dɔndɔ wɛɛ nii ma a ɔ gbɛ ni, koe min na‑a a ma, Chisɔsi‑a bai chɛ fɔ Chudasi ye.

A ni fɛ den chɛ n dɔ n yii ma, mbɛ Chisɔsi na‑a a sɔ wan ka, a ni ta daun fenɛ san, kun bɔ a ɔ bɛn chɛ ko a. Ni chɛ ma, a ni fen den be yɔn tɔɛ n ma. A yen ko, a wan Chudasi, an ni an 'na kɔpɔ sa tena ɔ bɛn mɔɛ a.
Chudasi‑a biidi kundu chɛ bia kɛn dechee, mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, a bɔ‑a baa ma. A tima chɛ a, pimbi bundenɛ ni gbɛ.

Chudasi bɔ‑a kɛn, a ta‑a. Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “A ɔ ma yansan to, mbɛ mɔɛ n‑na a ɔ yen, kamaya mɔɛ min mu n na, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ. A ɔ ma yansan to, mbɛ n‑na a ma, Fa Yataa 'a kamaya ɔ ni yen chɛndɛ chɛ.
A sin, ni n‑na a ma, mɔɛ n ni Fa Yataa 'a kamaya ɔ yen, mbɛ a wɛɛ, ɛ a ma‑a wan, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ wandi, mɔɛ n ni n 'na kamaya ɔ yen. A sin, ɛ na tena wan chɛ ma‑a, a ya kɔɔɛ a.

N 'na denɛ nu, n mbe ma tena gbɛ wo tɛ ɔ tima kunduenɛ an ko a. Wo e wo ya a kan‑da wan n na. Chɛɛ ka n mbe chɛ fɔ wo ye, n na‑a min fɔ Chu ya ɔ sɔɛ n ye, mbɛ n mbe ma‑a kaina min, an mbe ee na‑a che‑a nɔ. A ɛ ma‑a ka wan wo wɛɛ a.
A sin sanche, n yen ko sawa nama be‑a wo ma, n ma min be nin bɛ a kɔma a, mbɛ wo ni to wo nyɔn na. N to‑a buɛ min dɔ wo a, wo wɛɛ, wo to wo nyɔn na ka.
Ni wo toenɛ ma‑a wo nyɔn na, mbɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a ɔ gbɛ, mbɛ n fɛ denɛ n mu wo a.”
Mbɛ Saimɔn Pita ɔ, “Mansa, e na tena ta‑a mende?” Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “E ee che‑a a sɔ‑a n fɛ dɔndɔ a, n mbe ta tena kaina min, chɛɛ ni a ɔ mɛ‑a, e a sɔ‑a wan n fɛ.”
Mbɛ Pita ɔ, “Mansa, n mbe ee a sɔ i fɛ sanche, fen mu? I fa tena, n fa tena.”

Chisɔsi ɔ, “Tea ko a, i ma bɛndenɛ mu, i ni fa n ko a, ae? Ka n mbe chɛ ma din i tena, e na tena min ma‑a. Tɛ kɔnɛ e na konchee banda ɔ ka da ma, e a fɔ‑a wan, gba sawa ko a, mbɛ i ma n sɔn ɛnden bɛɛ a.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ an ma, a ɔ, “Chɛ ma wo faa mɔnɛ. Wo a a tun wo kai fa koe a Yataa a, wo ni a a tun wo kai fa koe a n bɛɛ a.
Fa Yataa waa banda bu ɔ, sa tena kɔkoo nɔ kaka. N mbe chɛ fɔ tena wo ye, koe min na mu tea mu. A sin, n mbe ta tena wan kaina ɔ bɛn‑da wo ko a.
A sin, ni n ta‑a, mbɛ n‑na kaina chɛ ɔ bɛn wo ko a, n mbe yɛ‑a wan to nɛ wo ya ɔ. Mbɛ n‑na a ma, mmɔ ta‑a, min mbe a ma‑a, n mbe ma‑a kaina min, wo wɛɛ, wo ni ma nɔ.
A sin, wo‑a an chia chɛ sɔn fan, a ta an kaina chɛ, n mbe ta tena kaina min.”
Mbɛ Tɔmɔsi ɔ, “Mansa, e ta tena kaina min, a yiima kan kɔ kan mbe ee nn ma. Nn mbe ee kun, nn ni chia sɔn ta koe a nɔ. Chɛ ɛ ma wan?”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N fan mu dechee chia a, tea ɔ sɔn koe a mɔɛ n boo ɔ, a si Fa Yataa ma, mbɛ an‑na fɔɛ ma sɔn, Fa ɛ min be. Mɔ ɔ mɔ ee che ta‑a Fa tena, mɔɔ ni a ben‑da n tena chia a.
Ni wo na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan chɛndɛ chɛ, n mu mɔɛ min sima a, mbɛ wo ni Fa wɛɛ sɔn‑da wan. Chɛɛ a ka gbɛ sanche ma, aan a ta, wo‑a a sɔn gbɛ, a sin, wo ban‑da a yen‑da.”
Mbɛ Fiipi ɔ, “Mansa, a ma nn ni i fa chɛ yen, mbɛ nn faa chima‑a.”
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Fiipi, mmɔ mɛ buɛ chɛ mmɔ bɛ, a ni nyan fan wo gbɛɛ ni n sɔn gbɛ. Mɔ ɔ mɔ min‑na n yen, a‑a Fa an yen ka. E ee kun to, i ni n dɔ tisa, n ni Fa yian wo a. Chɛ ɛ ma wan?

A nyin i ni dan a a, mbɛ nn fea Fa a, mɔ dɔndɔɛ mu nn na. Bai chɛ nu, n‑na miin fɔ ka wo ye, an ma ka ni ka dechee n kun ma yiinachii an dɔ. Fa, nn fea mu min na mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, tima ɔ tima ko a, an mbe ma ka wai chɛ‑a.
N‑na a fɔɛ min chɛ, n dɔ, nn fea Fa a, n dɔ, mɔ dɔndɔɛ mu nn na, dan chɛ a. Ni chɛ ma, Fa ɛ a ma, n mbe wai miin bɛɛ chɛ, an mbe che wan a ma‑a, wo ni dan n na.

N ni chɛ ma din wo tena, mbɛ mɔɛ miin mbe an kai fa‑a n na, an mɔɛ chɛ nu, an mbe wai bonda chɛ n chɛ‑a wan, n mbe miin chɛ. A sin gbu, an mɔɛ chɛ nu, an chɛ chɛ wai n mbe koa‑a wan. Koe min na mu, n mbe yɛ tena Fa tena, nn ni ma kaina dɔndɔɛ ɛ.
A sin, n mbe ko ɔ ko chɛ‑a wan wo ye, wo e n dɔ tisa‑a min chɛ koe a, n tɔɛ ɔ. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, n ni a ma, mɔɛ n ni a ɔ yen, Fa kamayaen mu buɛ min dɔ.
Ni wo‑a tisa chɛ ko ɔ ko ko a, n tɔɛ ɔ, n mbe a chɛ wan wo ye.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ a fɛ denɛ n ma, a ɔ, “Wo e koe chɛ n ma‑a wan, n‑na miin fɔ wo ye an ma koe a, ni wo toen fan mu n na.
N mbe fa ɔ tisa‑a wan, a ni a ma, wo ni demanɛ dɔ mende ma sɔn. A sin, ɛ a Nyina a na‑a wan, a ni ma wo fɛ tima ɔ tima ko a.

An Nyina chɛ, an mbe a ma, mɔɛ n ni tea ɔ sɔn a si Yataa ma. Chɛɛ Yataa wakoe ee mɔɛ miin faa ɔ, an mbe ee che an boo si‑a a kɔɔ. Koe min na mu, an mbe ee che a yen‑da, an sin ma a sɔn. Chɛɛ wo tana, wo‑a a sɔn fan, koe min na mu, wo bɛ mu sanche chɛ ɔ, a sin mbe ma‑a wan wo fɛ ya ɔ ma.
“Ni n ta‑a, n mbe ee wo boo ka‑a. N mbe yɛ‑a wan wo tena.
A ɔ ma yansan to, mbɛ Yataa wakoe ee mɔɛ miin faa ɔ dunya chɛ ɔ, an mbe ee n yen‑da to. Chɛɛ wo tana, wo e n yen‑da wan, koe min na mu, ni n yɛ‑a fɔɛ ɔ, wo wɛɛ, wo e ma‑a wan fɔɛ ɔ.
Ni a tima chɛ che‑a, wo e a ɔ gbɛ‑a wan, mbɛ nn fea Fa a, mɔ dɔndɔɛ mu nn na. A sin, wo wɛɛ, wo e ma‑a wan mɔ dɔndɔya ɔ n na, yɔ n bɛɛ, n mbe ma‑a buɛ min dɔ dechee mɔ dɔndɔya ɔ wo a.

“Mɔɛ min mbe koe n ma‑a, n mbe miin fɔ an ma koe a, an mɔɛ chɛ an toen mu n na. A sin, an mɔɛ chɛ, a toen min chɛ‑a ka n na, Fa wɛɛ, a ɛ to‑a wan a a. N bɛɛ, n mbe to‑a wan a mɔɛ chɛ a, mbɛ n‑na a ma, a‑a n sɔn chɛndɛ chɛ.”

Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ dɔndɔɛ wɛɛ ni wan nɔ, min tɔ ni to Chudasi, Chudasi Isikayɔti nii ma o. Mbɛ an fɛ den chɛ ɔ, “Mansa, e a ma‑a nn fan ni i yen dechee, chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu, Yataa wakoe ee miin faa ɔ dunya chɛ ɔ, an mbe ee i yen‑da. Fen mu chɛ ɛ ma‑a?”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Mɔɛ min toen mu n na, ɛ koe chɛ n ma wan, n‑na miin fɔ a ye, an ma koe a. Fa ɛ to‑a wan a mɔɛ chɛ a. A sin, Fa ni ma, ni n fan, nn mbe na‑a wan a tena, mbɛ nn bɛ gbɛɛ ɛ ma‑a kaina dɔndɔ.
Mɔɛ min ma to ni n na, a ee che koe chɛ n ma‑a, n‑na miin fɔ a ye. A sin, n mbe bai chɛ miin gbɛɛ fɔ, n mbe ee an tɛ n fandi gboo an ma, chɛɛ Fa min‑na n sɔ, a 'a sakana bai nu mu, n mbe an na ben.
“N mbe bai chɛ n gbɛɛ fɔ tena wo ye, tima min na mu wɛ mmɔ bɛ ɛ.

Min mbe wo deman‑da, Yataa Nyina, Fa ɛ na‑a min na na‑a n gba ɔ, an mbe wo kan‑da ko ɔ ko ma, a si n 'na bai n ma. A sin mbe a ma‑a wan, n 'na bai chɛ n ni puin wo yii ma, n ni bai miin fɔ, mmɔ bɛ ni tima min na.

“N mbe wo to tena faachima an dɔ. Faachima min nyɔn sima ɛ n dɔ, n mbe an be tena wo ma. N ta faachima, n mbe min be, a ee ka yɔ dunya chɛ ɔ nɛnɛ. Wo ma ma faamɔnɛ ɔ, a sin to, wo ma chian, a si koe chɛ n ma, miin mbe ma‑a.
Wo‑a a a min fan, n‑na min fɔ wo ye, mbɛ n mbe na tena wan ta‑a, chɛɛ n mbe yɛ‑a wan to wo ya ɔ. Ni n ko a di wan wo ye, wo bu ɔ dia‑a wan, a si n yɛ koe ma Fa tena. Koe min na mu, a benden mu n ma.
N mbe chɛ gbɛɛ fɔ tena wan wo ye sanche, an mbe e na to ma‑a. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, an mbe ma‑a tima min na, wo e dan‑da wan n da a bai n na.
Mmɔ ee che to chia ɔ bɔ yansama chɛ‑a mmɔ bɛ, a mu min na, nyina yama min 'na gbasaya ɛ dunya chɛ ɔ mɔɛ n kun ma, ɛ chia a. Chɛɛ gbasaya ee a boo ɔ n kun ma.
Chɛɛ a nyin dunya chɛ ɔ mɔɛ nu, an ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ n toen mu Fa a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, ko ɔ ko ɛ min fɔ, n mbe an ma a buɛ an dɔ. “Wo wo kɔɔ sɔ, mmɔ ni bɔ nɛ.”
Chisɔsi ɔ, “N fan mu kɔnɛ chɛndɛ chɛndɛ a, min mbe gbɔ chɛndɛ be. A sin, Fa an mu yadi ti a.
N bonɛ kan kɔ kan, min mbe ee gbɔ chɛndɛ be, ɛ a ka wan a ma. N bonɛ min sin mbe ee gbɔ a tenden be, ɛ a tɛ‑a wan a a, min mbe a ma, a ni nyan chɛndɛ, mbɛ a gbɔ‑a wɔsɔkɔɔ.
Bai chɛ nu, n‑na miin fɔ wo ye, an‑na a ma, wo bon chɛ n tɛ‑a wo ma, wo ni gbɔɛ be chɛndɛ chɛ.

Mmɔ ma mɔ dɔndɔya ɔ, wo ma n boo ka, n bɛɛ, n mbe ee wo boo ka‑a. Kɔnɛ bonɛ ee kun a ni gbɔ be, ni a kaenɛ ma‑a kɔnɛ kuu ba ma. A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, wo wɛɛ, wo ee kun wo ni ko ɔ ko ma, mɔɔ ni mmɔ bɛ ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔya ɔ.

“N fan mu kɔnɛ a, wo sin, n bonɛ n mu wo a. Nn mbe ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔya ɔ, mɔɛ min na, a ma n boo ka ni, n bɛɛ, n ma a boo ka ni, a mɔɛ chɛ ɛ gbɔ sɛsɛ be‑a wan. Koe min na mu, wo ee che ko ɔ ko ma‑a, wo kun ma a a, ni n mbe ee wo kɔ.

Nn fea mɔɛ min na, nn mbe ee mɔ dɔndɔya ɔ, a mɔɛ chɛ ɛ ma‑a wan yɔ kɔnɛ bonɛ, ɛ tɛ‑a wan a a, mbɛ a gbaa‑a. Kɔn bonɛ gbaaenɛ bonda chɛ nu, mɔɛ n mbe an na sɔn‑da wan, an ni sa ta a, minda koe a sɔɛ a.
Ni mmɔ bɛ ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔya ɔ, mbɛ wo‑a n 'na bai n sa wo yii ma gban, ɛ nyan‑da wan. Fen kɔ fen, wo toen mu min na, mbɛ wo‑a Fa Yataa ɔ tisa a ko a, ɛ a be‑a wan wo ma.
Wo e ko chɛndɛ min ma‑a, ni an da a koa‑a, wo e ma‑a ka a ɔ yian fan na, mbɛ n fɛ denɛ mu wo a. An ko chɛndɛ chɛ n sin mbe a ɔ yian‑da wan to mɔɛ n na, Fa kamayaen mu buɛ min dɔ.
N toen fan mu wo a, yɔ Fa wɛɛ toen mu buɛ min dɔ n na. Wo ma wo kan kɔ sɔ n 'na koadia a.
Ni wo e koe chɛ n ma‑a, n mbe miin fɔ wo ye an ma koe a, wo ee na‑a wo kan kɔ sɔ‑a n 'na koadia a. N bɛɛ, n‑na koe chɛ n ma wan, Fa ɛ miin fɔ n ye, mbɛ n ma n kan kɔ sɔ ni a 'a koadia a.
“N mbe koe chɛ n fɔ tena wo ye, min mbe a ma, buɔdia min mbe n dɔ, a ni ma wo wɛɛ ɔ. An mbe a ma‑a wo 'a buɔdia da ni fa gban.
N mbe chɛ an fɔ tena wo ye a ma koe a, mbɛ wo ni to wo nyɔn na, yɔ n toen mu buɛ min dɔ wo a.
Ni mɔɛ fa‑a mɔɛ n ko a, a toen mu miin na, chia dɔ mende ee to nɔ, koadia ɔ yian koe a, a ni ben chɛ ma.
A sin, wo e ma‑a wan mɔɛ n na, n toenɛ ɛ ma‑a miin na tima ɔ tima, ni wo‑a koe chɛ n ma, n mbe miin fɔ‑a wo ye.

N mbe ee wo ya to n 'na bɔi den na, koe min na mu, bɔi den ma a kan mɔ yiima sɔn. N mbe min ma tena, n mbe wo ya tena gbɛ n bɔɛ n fan na. Koe min na mu, ko ɔ ko, Fa‑a min fɔ n ye, n‑na a gbɛɛ ɔ yian wo a.

Wo wan ma n ya ni, ma koe a wo kan mɔ a, chɛɛ n fan‑na wo ya, ma koe a n fɛ mɔɛ n na. N fan‑na wo ya, mbɛ n‑na wai be wo ma, wo ni ta, wo chɛ chɛ wai ni koa. Wo chɛ chɛ wai chɛ n sin, an ni ma kuɔ fɔ wai n na. Ni wo‑a chɛ ma, Fa ɛ fen kɔ fen be‑a wan wo ma, wo e a ɔ tisa‑a min ko a, n tɔɛ ɔ.
N mbe chɛ an fɔ tena wo ye, mbɛ wo ni to wo nyɔn na.
“Mɔɛ miin ma to ni Yataa a dunya chɛ ɔ, ni an too‑a wo a, a ni ma wo yii ma, mbɛ an too‑a n pɛn na.

Ni wo ni wan an 'na kuiɛ dɔndɔya ɔ dunya chɛ ɔ, an ni wo ya wan an sima a, mbɛ wo ko a dia‑a an ye. Chɛɛ n‑na wo bɔ wan an 'na dunya ɔ, a sin‑na a ma, wo bɛ ma to an na. Chɛ an fɛ mu, an tooenɛ ɛ wo a.

N da a bai chɛ ni to wo yii ma, n na‑a min fɔ wo ye, mbɛ bɔi den mbe ee nɔ, min benden mu a kan mɔ ma. Ni an‑na a ma wan n tɔɔ‑a, wo wɛɛ, an mbe a ma‑a ka wan wo ni tɔɔ. Chɛɛ ni an dɔ nu, an na‑a an too ma sɔ wan n da a kuiɛ ma, mbɛ an mbe an too ma sɔ‑a wan wo ta wɛɛ ma.
Chɛɛ an mbe a ma‑a wan wo ni tɔɔ, n bakoe fɛ. An mbe chɛ ma‑a wan, koe min na mu, an ma Fa Yataa sɔn, min‑na n sɔ.
Ni n nii ma na ni, n ni koɔ an tena, a si Yataa wakoe ma, Yataa nii a tɛɛ si‑a an ma, ko yama ma koe a. Chɛɛ ɛ ka gbɛ buɛ min dɔ sanche, an mbe ee che to a fɔ‑a an nii ma an 'na ko yama n sɔn.
Mɔɛ min mbe too‑a n na, ɛ too‑a ka Fa an na.

Yataa nii a tɛɛ si‑a an ma, ko yama ma koe a, ni n nii ma koe n ma ni an tɛ ɔ. Kamaya koe chɛ nu, n‑na miin ma, mɔ ɔ mɔ ma miin ma nin bɛ an ya kɔɔɛ. Chɛɛ an ban‑da gbɛ kamaya koe chɛ n gbɛɛ yen‑da, n‑na miin ma. Chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, an too‑a wan n na, a basan Fa wɛɛ a.
Chɛ ma‑a, min mbe a ma, min nyɛnden ni an 'na sawa n dɔ, a ni bɔ a a. A nyɛnden ni ka wan, ‘An too‑a wan n na dechee, n nii ma ko ɔ ko yɔn ni an ma.’

“Chɛɛ min mbe wo deman‑da, n mbe a sɔ‑a wan, a ka Fa tena. Fa Yataa Nyina chɛ, an mbe tea ɔ yian‑da wo a, a si a wandi ma. N mbe a ma‑a wan a ni ka Fa tena, a ni na wo tena. A sin, ɛ n bakoe ɔ yian‑da wan wo a.
A sin gbu, wo wɛɛ, wo e n bakoe ɔ yian‑da wan mɔɛ n na. Koe min na mu, kɛn n‑na a kuu sɔ kanɛ chɛ‑a, mmɔ bɛ an mbe ben ben tena.
“N mbe chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ yian tena wo a, min mbe a ma, wo ma na sɛmbɛ wo kai fa koe a n na.
An mbe wo gbain‑da wan fɛsɛ fɛsɛ, a bɔ an 'na samun chɛ chenɛ a. A sin gbu, tima ɛ che‑a wan, mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ fa‑a, ɛ ma‑a wan a yii ma, mbɛ a‑a Yataa faa ma koe an ma ka.
Mɔɛ n mbe koe chɛ n ma‑a wan wo a, koe min na mu, an ma Fa Yataa sɔn tee dɔndɔ wɛɛ, chɛ ma, n fandi gbu wɛɛ.

Chɛɛ n mbe koe chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ yian tena wo a, a tima an ko a. Min mbe a ma, ni a che‑a, an ni koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ma wo a, n na‑a min gbɛɛ ɔ yian wo a, ɛ ma‑a wan wo yii ma. N nii ma koe chɛ n dɔ yian ni wo a, a ka wo bea tima chɛ gbɛɛ ma n fɛ. N‑na chɛ ma koe min na, mmɔ bɛ an ni chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ ben ben‑da.
“Chɛɛ sanche chɛ ɔ, n mbe ta tena gbɛ Fa tena wan, min‑na n sɔ. Chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ ee n dɔ tisa tena, ni n mbe ta tena mende.
A sin, n‑na a ɔ yian ka gbɛ buɛ min dɔ wo a sanche, faamɔnɛ koa‑a wo ma.

Chɛɛ n mbe chɛ ma din tena wo tena, mbɛ a nyin fan wo ko a, n ni ta. Koe min na mu, ni n ma yɛ ni, Yataa Nyina min mbe wo deman‑da, a ee na‑a wo tena. Chɛɛ ni n yɛ‑a, n mbe a ma‑a wan, a ni na wo tena.

Ni n sin‑na a ma a na‑a, ɛ a ma‑a wan, mɔɛ dɔ nu dunya chɛ ɔ, an ni a ɔ sɔn fen mu ko yama a. A yɛ to, an ni a ɔ sɔn, an mbe ma buɛ min dɔ an ni tan Yataa tena. Mbɛ a yɛ‑a to, a‑a a ɔ yian an na, Yataa ɛ kaa a tɛ‑a buɛ min dɔ.
Yiima min mbe an dɔ, a si ko yama ma, tea yiinachii ma, koe min na mu, an ma an kai fa ni n na.
An sin ma a ɔ sɔn to, koe min nyin a ma koe a, koe min na mu, n mbe yɛ tena Fa Yataa tena wan. A sin, wo ee a a tun‑da to n yen koe a.
An sin ma a ɔ sɔn, kaa chɛ a tɛ‑a buɛ min dɔ. Koe min na mu, Yataa ban‑da kaa a tɛ‑a Sitana wakoe ma, min mbe dunya chɛ kun ma.
“Bai sɛsɛ ɛ wan n da a, a fɔ koe a wo ye, chɛɛ wo ee na‑a kun‑da, wo ni an gbɛɛ sa wo yii ma.

Chɛɛ ni Yataa Nyina chɛ na‑a, min mbe tea ɔ yian a si Yataa ma, ɛ a ma‑a wan, wo ni tea gbɛɛ ɔ sɔn. A ee koɔ‑a wo tena a kun ma gbasaya n dɔ, chɛɛ ɛ min na min‑da Yataa a, ɛ an fɔ‑a wo ye. A sin, koe miin mbe na tena ma‑a, ɛ an fan dɔ yian‑da wo a.
Ɛ a ɔ yian‑da wan wo a, n kamayaen mu buɛ min dɔ. Koe min na mu, n da a bai nu, ɛ an fan na ben‑da wo tena.
Fen kɔ fen Fa ta mu min na, n fan ta mu a a. An fɛ mu, n‑na a fɔ, n dɔ, Yataa Nyina chɛ ɛ a too ma sɔ‑a wan n da a bai ma, mbɛ a‑a a ɔ yian wo a.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “A to‑a gbɛ fen den, mbɛ wo ee na‑a n yen‑da to, chɛɛ tima kundu ɛnden tɛ ɔ, wo e n yen‑da wan to.”

Mbɛ a fɛ den chɛ dɔ nu, an bun‑da a tɛnsɛ‑a an nyɔn tɛ ɔ, an dɔ, “A yen ko, a ɔ, mmɔ ee na tena to a yen‑da, a ɔ, a ɔ ee mɛ tena to. Mbɛ a yɛ‑a to, a ɔ, mmɔ ɛ a yen‑da wan, a ɔ, a ɔ ee mɛ tena to. A ɔ te to, mbɛ mmɔ ee na‑a a yen‑da, a ɔ, koe min na mu, a ɔ, ɛ ta tena a fa tena wan. A e na ma ka fen fɔ‑a mmɔ ye?
Mmɔ gbu an mbe ee che a ɔ gbɛ‑a, ɛ bai miin fɔ tena. Chɛ yen bɛ, ‘a ɔ ee mɛ tena to,’ mmɔ ɛ fen dɔ gbɛ chɛ ma?”

Chisɔsi na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ an toen fan ni ka, an ni a ɔ tisa. Mbɛ a ɔ, “N dɔ, wo ee na tena to n yen‑da, n dɔ, a ɔ ee mɛ tena to. Mbɛ n dɔ te to, wo e n yen‑da wan, n dɔ, a ɔ ee mɛ tena to. N‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ chɛ gbu an‑na wo kɔndɔ fii ka.

Ka n mbe chɛ ma din wo tena, mbɛ wo e di chɛ‑a wan gbafi gbafi, wo ya yii ni bɔn, a si koe chɛ n ma, miin mbe na tena n tan‑da. Chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ n tana dunya ɔ, Yataa wakoe ee miin faa ɔ, an mbe ma‑a buɔdia an dɔ. Wo e ma‑a wan faamɔnɛ ɔ, chɛɛ wo 'a faamɔnɛ chɛ ɛ mun‑da buɔdia an na wo ma.
