Koe min na mu, Fiipi‑a a ma wan, mbɛ nyina yama n ka‑a mɔ sɛsɛ fɛ, an ni miin fɛ. A sin, an nyina yama chɛ n ni yee tɛ wan gbankon, an mbe e na to ka‑a mɔɛ chɛ n fɛ. A‑a namaa n sɛsɛ baun fan, an bɛ tamban tɔɛ n na.
Chɛ ko a, buɔdia wa dɛgbɛ ni wan an duu chɛ ɔ.
Chɛɛ kamin dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, min tɔ ni Saimɔn. Tima ɔ yansama ko a, kamin chɛ na‑a Samayia mɔɛ n na fii wan a 'a nkofo koe n na, a ni miin ma. A na‑a a fɔ wan mɔɛ chɛ n ye, a ɔ, mɔ chenama mu a a.

Chɛ na‑a a ma wan, mbɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ kan kɔ kan duu chɛ ɔ, an‑na an too ma sɔ a da a bai chɛ ma. A ka mɔ chenama n ma, a ta mɔɛ tɔɛ n tena, an‑na a fɔ, an dɔ te, “Mɔna chɛ, Yataa 'a gbasaya an mbe a ɔ, an mbe min chee Gbasaya Wa.”
An sin na‑a an too ma sɔ wan a ma. Koe min na mu, tima ɔ yansama ko a, an da ɔ gbaaen fan ni a wan Saimɔn 'na nkofoya a.
Chɛɛ Fiipi‑a sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian kɛn an na, a si Yataa 'a mansaya ma, a basan Chisɔsi Chasi tɔɛ a, mɔ sɛsɛ dan‑da wan a a. Mbɛ a‑a yii chɛ an kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, musu nu, an bɛ kai n na.

Saimɔn wandi gbu wɛɛ, a tima chɛ a, a‑a a kai fa wan Chisɔsi a. Yii chɛ‑a wan a kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, a sin, a nii ma ka ni to Fiipi fɛ. A da ɔ na‑a gbaa wan, a na‑a kamaya ko wa sɛsɛ chɛ n dɔ yen kɛn, Fiipi ni miin ma tena. An koe chɛ n sin ni a ɔ yian tena wan, mbɛ a 'a sakana bai chɛ ka‑a Yataa an tena.
Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ miin ni gbɛ Chuusaɛn, an‑na a a min fan, mbɛ Samayia mɔɛ n‑na an boo si Yataa bai kɔɔ. An‑na chɛ a min kɛn, mbɛ an‑na Pita sɔ, an fea Chɔn n na, ta koe a an tena.
An sin yii‑a wan nɔ an tena, mbɛ an‑na samunɛ chɛ, min mbe a ma, mɔɛ miin‑na an kai fa Chisɔsi a, Yataa Nyina ni bea an fɛ.
Koe min na mu, Yataa Nyina nii ma bea nin bɛ an dɔndɔ wɛɛ fɛ. An na‑a yii an chɛ an kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, Mansa Chisɔsi tɔɛ ɔ.
Mbɛ Pita an fea Chɔn na, an‑na an boo bun mɔɛ chɛ n ma, an‑na samunɛ chɛ, mbɛ Yataa Nyina bea‑a mɔɛ chɛ n fɛ.
Saimɔn‑na a ɔ yen fan, mbɛ Yataa Nyina bea‑a mɔɛ chɛ n fɛ, kɛn Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n‑na an boo bun an ma. Chɛ ma‑a kɛn, a toen ni a ni kɔpɔɛ be Pita ma, an fea Chɔn na, an gbasaya chɛ ko a.
Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Wo gbasaya chɛ be n ma, min mbe a ma, n bɛɛ, ni n‑na n boo bun mɔ ɔ mɔ ma, Yataa Nyina ni bea a mɔɛ chɛ fɛ.”
Chɛɛ Pita ɔ, “Yataa ni i a ta ta ɔ, i 'a kɔpɔɛ chɛ a i boo ɔ. Koe min na mu, ɛ wan i yii ma, mbɛ e kun fan i ni kɔpɔɛ be, min mbe a ma, Yataa ni gbasaya chɛ be i ma.
E ee kun mmɔ bɛ ni wai chɛ chɛ, koe min na mu, i faa ɔ ma gbɛ ni Yataa chen kɔɔ.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, i kan kɔ sɔ i 'a yiinachii yama chɛ a, mbɛ i‑a samunɛ chɛ Mansa Chisɔsi tena. Kɔkɔɛ ɛ chinchin‑da wan i ma, yiinachii yama chɛ ko a.
Koe min na mu, n‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ faa yama an mbe i ɔ, a yɛ to, i ma‑a yɔnɛ a, ko yama boo a.”
Mbɛ Saimɔn dɔ, “Wo dimu, wo Mansa Yataa fai n ko a, min mbe a ma, wo‑a koe miin gbɛɛ fɔ ka, an ma na ma n na.”

Pita an fea Chɔn na, an ban‑da wan koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ɔ yian‑da mɔɛ n na, an‑na min dɔ sɔn a si Mansa Chisɔsi ma. Mbɛ an yɛ‑a Chuusaɛn, an mbe ta‑a sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian‑da mɔɛ n na, duu sɛsɛ n dɔ Samayia chɛnyɛ ɔ.
Mbɛ Mansa Yataa‑a maeka sɔ Fiipi tena. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ Fiipi ye, a ɔ, “I ma bɛn, i ni yii denka ɔ, chia chɛ a, min kaen mu Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. Ta, aan a che Kasa fuinɛ ma. Chia chɛ mu fuinɛ ma chia an na.”

Mbɛ Fiipi‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, mbɛ a ta‑a chia chɛ a. Mbɛ a yen ko, a tima dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, kai dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, min na‑a ka Itiopia chɛnyɛ ɔ. A ni ben tena wan a chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, a yɛ a waa a. Mɔ chenama ni a a Itiopia chɛnyɛ ɔ, mansa de chɛ 'a kɔpɔɛ kun ma. A na‑a ka samun chɛ tena wan Chuusaɛn, a ɛ yɛ‑a Itiopia. A ni si ɔ mɔto gbingbi an dɔ, soo n mbe min sawan. A ni kɛn si ɔ mɔto gbingbi chɛ ɔ, a ni wan gboo kan‑da, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ Aisaya na‑a min nyɛn.
Mbɛ Yataa Nyina‑a a fɔ Fiipi ye, a ɔ, “I ma tundu gbɛdɛn mɔto gbingbi chɛ baima.”
Fiipi wɛɛ‑a bui sa wan a a mɔto chɛ tena, mbɛ a‑a a a min, mɔɛ ɛ Aisaya 'a gboo chɛ kan‑da. Mbɛ Fiipi‑a kamin chɛ ɔ tisa, a ɔ, “E gboo chɛ ɔ gbɛ tena wan chɛndɛ chɛ, e ka min kan‑da?”
Mbɛ a ɔ, “N mbe ee che a ɔ gbɛ‑a, mɔɔ ni mɔɛ‑a n sɔ chia ma.” Mbɛ a gbu‑a a fɔ Fiipi ye, a ɔ, a ni sɛ mɔto gbingbi chɛ ɔ, a ni si a baima.
A ni ka kaina min kan‑da Yataa 'a gboo chɛ ɔ, an nii nɛ: “An ta‑a wan a a, a fa koe a yɔ sa, A yɛ to, bai ɔ bai ma bɔ ni a da a. yɔ sa tɔngbɔɛ ma maun buɛ, ni an ma‑a a ti tɛ‑a a a.
An‑na baa bɔ wan a ma. A sin, mɔ ɔ mɔ ma dɔn ni, a 'a tea fɔ koe a. Mɔ ee che bai fɔ‑a, a si a 'a den ma, a mu min na, an‑na a wandi gbu ta fɔɛ ya wan banda kun ma.”
Mbɛ mɔ chenama chɛ‑a a fɔ Fiipi ye, a ɔ, “A fɔ wɛ n ye, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛ ɛ bai chɛ sa tena ka a si mɔɛ min ma. Ɛ a sa tena, a si a wandi an ma, chɛ ma, a sien mu mɔ dɔ mende an ma?”
Mbɛ Fiipi‑a an kaina chɛ fasai kamin chɛ ye, a ni ka kaina min kan tena. Mbɛ a‑a sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian kamin chɛ a, a si Chisɔsi ma.

Mbɛ an mbe kɛn ta‑a chia chɛ a, an che‑a wan kaina, yii ni kaina min. Mbɛ Itiopia mɔ chenama chɛ‑a a fɔ Fiipi ye, a ɔ, “Yii yen ko nɛ. Ko ɔ ko ɛ wan nɔ, min mbe i ka‑a to yii chɛ‑a n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a?”
Mbɛ kamin chɛ‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, soo chɛ ni sɔ, mbɛ a sɔ‑a. Mbɛ an fea Fiipi a, an puin‑da, an yii‑a yii chɛ ɔ. Mbɛ Fiipi‑a yii chɛ mɔ chenama chɛ kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a.
An fea chɛ gbɛɛ bɔ‑a kɛn yii chɛ ɔ, mbɛ Yataa Nyina‑a Fiipi a tuin. Kai chɛ ma a yen ni to, mbɛ a wɛɛ‑a a 'a tachɛ a tun a ma. A bu ɔ diama wa ni gbɛ, ɛ ta‑a.
Chɛɛ Fiipi‑a a wandi yen fan gbɛ duu dɔndɔ ɔ, an mbe min chee, an dɔ, Asotɔsi. A sin ben‑da wan nɔ ma, a ɛ ta‑a sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ sa‑a duu kan kɔ kan dɔ, aan a che Sisayea duu ɔ.
Chɛɛ a tima chɛ a, Sɔɔ ni wan tun ko ma gbaaenɛ sa‑a mɔɛ chɛ n ma, miin na‑a an kai fa Mansa Chisɔsi a. A sin, a toen fan ni to, a ni an fa. Mbɛ a ta‑a Chu n 'na tɛ mɔ wa chɛ tena,

mbɛ a‑a a ɔ tisa, gboo be koe a a ma. Gboo nyɛndenɛ chɛ, ɛ kun fan a ni a wakoe ɔ yian, ya ɔ sɔɛ chɛ n na, Chu n 'na samun chɛ chenɛ n na, Damasikɔsi duu ɔ. A na‑a chɛ ma koe min na, a toen ni, ni a‑a mɔ ɔ mɔ tan, min‑na a sɔ chia chɛ fɛ, Chisɔsi‑a min yian ka a sɔ koe a a fɛ, a ni a bia. A ni ma mɔ kaima a, chɛ ma, musu wɛɛ, a ni na a a Chuusaɛn duu bu ɔ.
A ni kɛn gbɛ ta‑a, mbɛ a gbɛn‑da Damasikɔsi duu ɔ ma. Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, man ba‑a a a bɛn, a ka banda a.
A bea‑a wan duu ma, mbɛ a‑a mɔɛ kuiɛ a min, a ɔ, “Sɔɔ, Sɔɔ, fen mu e ko ma gbaaenɛ sa tena ka n ma?”
Mbɛ Sɔɔ ɔ, “Nyɔn mu chɛ a?” Mbɛ a ɔ, “N fan mu, n fan Chisɔsi, e ko ma gbaaenɛ sa tena ka min ma.
Chɛɛ i kɔɔ sɔ, i ni ta Damasikɔsi duu wa chɛ ɔ. Mɔɛ ɛ a ɔ yian‑da wan i a nɔ, e koe min ma.”
Sɔɔ ni ka ta tena, an bɛ mɔɛ miin na, an bɛɛ na‑a sɔ wan, chɛɛ an ma bai tɛ ni a ma gbukuu wɛɛ. An bɛɛ na‑a mɔɛ chɛ kuiɛ a min fan, chɛɛ an nii ma an mɔɛ chɛ gbu yen ni an ya a.
Mbɛ Sɔɔ‑a a kɔɔ sɔ duu ma, a‑a a ya a ka paden, chɛɛ a nii ma kaina kan kɔ kan yen ni to. Mbɛ an‑na a bia a boo ma, an ta‑a a a Damasikɔsi duu ɔ.
A sin ni wan tee sawa ko a, a ee kaina yen. A tima chɛ sin gbɛɛ ɔ, a nii daun chɛ, n mbe ee baa, yii min ko ma.

Mbɛ a yen ko gbɛ, Chisɔsi fɛ den dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ Damasikɔsi, min tɔ ni Ananiyasi. A na‑a ma wan yɔ a ni cho ɔ wan, mbɛ Mansa Chisɔsi‑a a chee, a ɔ, “Ananiyasi!” Mbɛ a dɔn‑da, a ɔ, “Mansa, n yen ko nɛ.”

Mbɛ Mansa Chisɔsi ɔ, “I ma bɛn, mbɛ i ta‑a dani chɛ a, an mbe min chee, an dɔ, Dani Tandenɛ. An dani chɛ a, chenɛ ɛ wan nɔ, min mu Chudasi ta a a. Tisa chɛ nɔ kamin dɔndɔ ko a, min tɔ mu Sɔɔ. A ka‑a Tasɔsi duu ɔ wan. A yen ko samunɛ chɛ‑a, sanche wɛɛ.

A sin na‑a koe ɔ yen fan, yɔ a ni cho ɔ wan. A na‑a mɔ dɔndɔ yen fan, min tɔ mu Ananiyasi. Ananiyasi chɛ na‑a wan, mbɛ a don‑da chen chɛ a, ɛ ka kaina min. Mbɛ a‑a a boo bun a ma, min mbe a ma, a ni kaina yen to.”
Chɛɛ Ananiyasi ɔ, “Mansa, mɔ sɛsɛ n‑na kamin chɛ wakoe ɔ yian fan n na. A‑a ko ma gbaaenɛ miin sa i 'a mɔɛ n ma Chuusaɛn, a koo.

Mbɛ a sin gbu na‑a ka wan gbɛ Damasikɔsi, gboo nyɛndenɛ a a boo ɔ. Gboo chɛ sin, a‑a gbasaya be wan a ma, a ka Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa n tena, mɔɛ n gbɛɛ bia koe a, miin mbe i fai tena.”
Chɛɛ Mansa Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ wan a ye, a ɔ, “Ta, mɔna chɛ mu, n‑na n boo sɔ min ma, wai chɛ koe a n ko a. A ni n bakoe ɔ yian mɔɛ n na, miin ma Chu mɔɛ n na, a basan mansa n na, an bɛ Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n na.
A sin, n mbe a ɔ yian‑da wan a a gbɛ, a wɛɛ, ɛ mɔnɛ min nyɔn sima ɔ bia‑a n ko a.”

Mbɛ Ananiyasi ta‑a, a don‑da chen chɛ a, Sɔɔ ni min na. Mbɛ a‑a a boo bun a ma, a‑a samunɛ chɛ. A ɔ, “Sɔɔ, n suun ma nyɔɛ Mansa Chisɔsi ɔ, a wandi gbu, an‑na n sɔ ka i tena. An na‑a bɔ ka i ya a, chia chɛ a, kɛn i ni na tena nɛ duu chɛ ɔ. A‑a n sɔ, min mbe a ma, i ni kaina yen to. A yɛ to, Yataa Nyina ni bea i fɛ gban.”
Mbɛ Ananiyasi‑a bai chɛ fɔ kɛn, a ya kɔɔɛ a, fenɛ bea‑a, a bɔ Sɔɔ ya a yɔ nyɛ wɔnbɔɛ, mbɛ a‑a kaina yen to. Mbɛ a‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, a sɔ‑a, mbɛ Ananiyasi‑a yii chɛ a kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a.
Mbɛ a‑a daunɛ chɛ kɛn, a fanka yɛ‑a wan to a ɔ. Sɔɔ ya chɛ a ka‑a kɛn, a ni wan Damasikɔsi, an bɛ Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ n na, tee kuunden ko a.
A nii ma tima yayi ni, chɛɛ a ta‑a wan dɔndɔ gbe Chu n 'na samun chɛ chenɛ n na. Mbɛ a bun‑da bai sa‑a, a si Chisɔsi ma, a ɔ, Yataa 'a denɛ an nɛ.

Mbɛ mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ‑a a da a kuiɛ chɛ a min ka, an na fii‑a wan. Mbɛ an dɔ, “Wuo, kamin chɛ an ni mɔɛ n fa pan Chuusaɛn, miin ni kamin chɛ fai, min mu Chisɔsi a. An ma chɛ a? A gbu sin, a na‑a nɛ ka mɔɛ chɛ n fan gbu bia koe a, ta koe a an na Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa n tena. Ae?”

Yataa‑a gbasaya be wan Sɔɔ ma, a 'a Yataa bai sa ɔ. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, ni a‑a a ɔ yian mɔɛ n na, mbɛ Chisɔsi an mu kunka mansa a, dɔ tisa nii ma nɔ. A da a bai kɔ ni gbɛɛ buɛ min dɔ, Chu mɔɛ miin ni Damasikɔsi, an nii che bai ɔ bai sa‑a.
Tee sɛsɛ bendenɛ gbakɔ, Chu mɔɛ n bɛn‑da wan kaina dɔndɔ, mbɛ an‑na a ɔ bɛn Sɔɔ fa koe a,
chɛɛ mɔɛ n‑na an 'na dɔbɛn chɛ kɔɔ yian fan Sɔɔ a. Su ɔ tee a, mɔɛ n ni wan Sɔɔ ma kɔn tena, a fa koe a. Kanda wa chɛ min tindandenɛ ni duu wa chɛ a, an ni wan sɔ ɔ a da gbɛɛ ma kɔn‑da.
Chɛɛ su dɔndɔ ɔ, Sɔɔ fɛ mɔɛ n‑na a si wan tɛngbɛ ɔ, mbɛ an‑na a a ben sonɛ a, min ni kanda wa chɛ ma. An‑na a a yii wan, a che duu ma.

Sɔɔ ta‑a wan Chuusaɛn, mbɛ a ta‑a Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ n tena. A toen ni an ni sa an kaa a. Chɛɛ an nii ma dan ni a a, mbɛ a wan Sɔɔ wɛɛ mu gbɛ an dɔndɔ an na. A sin, an gbɛɛ chiandenɛ ni a wan Sɔɔ gbu ma.

Chɛɛ Banabasi basan‑da wan Sɔɔ ma, a yian koe a Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n na. A‑a a ɔ yian fan an na, Mansa Chisɔsi bɔ‑a buɛ min dɔ Sɔɔ ya a, kɛn a ni ta tena Damasikɔsi. A yɛ to, Mansa Chisɔsi koɔ‑a buɛ min dɔ a tena. Banabasi yɛ‑a wan to, a‑a a ɔ yian, Sɔɔ na‑a Yataa bai sa buɛ min dɔ faagbɛa a, mɔɛ n tena Damasikɔsi, a si Chisɔsi ma.
Chɛ ko a, an dɔn‑da wan, an bɛ ni ma Sɔɔ a. A ka gbɛ a tee chɛ gbu sin ma, a ben ben‑da Chuusaɛn gbɛɛ ɔ, ɛ ta‑a bai sa‑a, a si Mansa Chisɔsi ma, faagbɛa wandi a.
A‑a bai sa wan Chu mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ tena, miin ni Kiisi koɛ fɔ ka. An ni ma bai ɔ, a ni sɔ wan an kanɛ ɔ kaka. Chɛ an fɛ ni, an toen ni, an ni a fa.
Sɔɔ suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ nu Chasi ɔ, an‑na koe chɛ kɔɔ sɔn kɛn, an yii‑a wan Sɔɔ a Sisayea duu ɔ, mbɛ an‑na a a ta Tasɔsi duu ɔ.

Mbɛ a ka gbɛ a tima chɛ ma, faachima yɛ‑a wan to mɔɛ chɛ n ma, chɔchi n gbɛɛ ɔ. A ka Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ, a ta Kadidi, ni Samayia chɛnyɛ ɔ. Yataa Nyina basan‑da wan an ma, an dɔ gbɛa koe a. A sin, an ma munda‑a wan kaka, a mu min na, an gbɛɛ ni basɔmaya wa be wan Mansa Chisɔsi ma.
Tima che‑a wan, Pita ni ben ben Chisɔsi fɛ mɔɛ chɛ n kun ma. Tima dɔndɔ a, a ta‑a wan Yataa 'a mɔɛ n kɔndɔn‑da, miin ni si ɔ Dida duu ɔ.
An duu chɛ ɔ, kamin dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, min tɔ ni Ainɛasi. A namaaenɛ ni. A sin, san sɛin ko a, a nii ma che ni puin‑da a sa sofa gbu a.
Mbɛ Pita‑a a fɔ a ye, a ɔ, “Ainɛasi, Chisɔsi Chasi‑a i baun. I kɔɔ sɔ, i ni i 'a sofa ɔ bɛn.” A ya kɔɔɛ a, Ainɛasi‑a a kɔɔ sɔ.
Mɔɛ gbɛɛ, miin ni ka Dida duu chɛ ɔ, an fea Saon na, an‑na kamin chɛ yen fan tachɛ a. Mbɛ an gbɛɛ‑a an ya a mun, Mansa Chisɔsi ma, a tima chɛ a gbɛ.

Chɔpa duu wɛɛ ɔ, musu dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, min tɔ ni Tabita. A na‑a a kai fa wan Chisɔsi a. Kiisi mɔɛ n ni a chee, an dɔ, Dɔkasi, min fasaien ni dɔmba. A 'a fɔɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, a ni wai nyima wa an chɛ, a ɛ basan yɔn tɔɛ n bɛɛ ma.
Tima che‑a wan gbɛ, a gbandi‑a, mbɛ a fa‑a. An‑na a su koe chɛ wan, an‑na a ma bɛn, mbɛ an‑na a sa dumu dɔndɔ ɔ, a 'a banda a chenɛ a.
Chɔpa ɔ nii ma yansan Dida a. Mbɛ Chisɔsi fɛ mɔɛ nu Chɔpa, an‑na a a min kɛn, mbɛ Pita ɛ Dida, an‑na mɔ fea n sɔ wan a tena. An dɔ, a dimu, a ni na bui chɛ a nɔ an tena, Chɔpa.

Mbɛ Pita‑a a ma bɛn, an bɛ ta‑a mɔ fea chɛ n na. An‑na a fo kɛn, mɔɛ chɛ n‑na Pita ya wan, mbɛ an sɛ‑a a a banda chenɛ chɛ dumu chɛ ɔ. Fuinya musu n gbɛɛ, an tindan‑da wan Pita a, an mbe di chɛ‑a fiko fiko. An mbe ta‑a to koa n yian‑da Pita a, Dɔkasi na‑a miin nyan, a ni kɛn fɔɛ ɔ.

Mbɛ Pita‑a an gbɛɛ a bɔ dumu gbu ɔ, mbɛ a‑a a kumbai gbangban, a‑a samunɛ chɛ. Mbɛ a‑a a ya a mun su chɛ ma, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “Tabita, i kɔɔ sɔ.” Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, Tabita‑a a ya a ka. A sin‑na Pita yen kɛn, a‑a a kɔɔ sɔ wan, mbɛ a si‑a.

Mbɛ Pita‑a a bia a boo ma, mbɛ a basan‑da a ma, a kɔɔ sɔ koe a, a ni sɔ. Mbɛ Pita‑a mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ chee, miin na‑a an kai fa ka Chisɔsi a, a basan fuinya musu chɛ n na, mbɛ a‑a musu chɛ a yɛ an ma, a fɔɛ ɛ a sun da a.
Mɔɛ n gbɛɛ Chɔpa duu ɔ, an‑na koe chɛ a min fan, a si musu chɛ ma. Chɛ‑a a ma wan to, mɔ sɛsɛ n‑na an kai fa Mansa Chisɔsi a.
Pita ni wan Chɔpa tee sɛsɛ ko a, kamin dɔndɔ a sondaya a, min tɔ ni Saimɔn. Saimɔn chɛ ni kanche an na.

Kamin dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ Sisayea duu ɔ, min tɔ ni Kɔniyɔsi. A ni soya gbakoo dɔndɔ an na, Domi soya chɛmɛ dɔndɔ kun ma. Chɛ ni kaka dɔndɔ an na, soya chɛ n tɛ ɔ, an ni miin chee, an dɔ, Itadi mɔɛ n 'na soya nu.

An kamin chɛ ni mɔɛ an na, min ni kooya be Yataa ma. A ni Yataa fai wan tima ɔ tima ko a, an bɛ a 'a chen 'na mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a. A boo fenɛ nii ma dɔɔ, a ni min be, basan koe a yɔn tɔɛ n ma. A gboo ɔ nii fa, samunɛ chɛ koe a.
Tee kɔ kai ma ni, tee dɔndɔ a, mbɛ Kɔniyɔsi‑a koe ɔ yen, yɔ a ni cho ɔ wan. A‑a maeka yen fan pɛnɛnɛ a wandi ya a, a na‑a a tena, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ a ye, a ɔ, “Kɔniyɔsi!”

A‑a maeka chɛ ma fɛn fan tidan, a chianden ba ɛ. Mbɛ a‑a a ɔ tisa, a ɔ, “Mansa, fen mu?” Mbɛ maeka chɛ ɔ, “Yataa‑a i 'a samunɛ n na min. A‑a a ɔ yen, e boo fenɛ miin be tena yɔn tɔɛ n ma. A sin, a ma bɛnden mu, a ni i 'a samunɛ a bia.
A sin, sanche gbɛ, mɔɛ n na ta Chɔpa duu ɔ, kamin dɔndɔ chee koe a, min tɔ mu Saimɔn. A tɔɛ dɔndɔɛ an nɛ, Pita.
Ɛ kamin dɔndɔ an 'na sondaya a, min tɔ mu Saimɔn. Kanche mu an kamin chɛ a, a sin, a 'a chenɛ ɛ kɔ yii kaa a wan.”

Mbɛ maeka chɛ ban‑da kɛn koɔ‑a Kɔniyɔsi tena, a ta‑a gbae. Mbɛ Kɔniyɔsi‑a bɔi den fea n ya, miin ni wai chɛ tena a kɔɔ a 'a chenɛ a, ni soya mɔ dɔndɔ. An soya mɔɛ chɛ wɛɛ, a Yataa koen ni kaka, a sin fan ni Kɔniyɔsi fɛ basan koe a a ma.
A‑a a ɔ yian fan an na, maeka chɛ na‑a bai min fɔ a ye, mbɛ a‑a an na ta Chɔpa duu ɔ.
Mbɛ banda ɔ ka‑a kɛn, Kɔniyɔsi‑a mɔɛ miin sɔ ka, an che‑a wan Chɔpa baima, tee kun tɛ. Pita wɛɛ sɛ‑a wan chen chɛ kun tɛ, a tima chɛ a, min mbe a ma, a ni samunɛ chɛ.
Kɔnkɔɛ‑a Pita bia wan, daun fen daun sɔɛ ɛ a a. An ni daun fen nyan tena wan a ye, mbɛ a‑a koe ɔ yen, yɔ a ni cho ɔ wan.
A‑a banda bu ɔ yen fan a a ka‑a, mbɛ a‑a fenɛ yen yii‑a dunya ɔ, yɔ koa wa, a biaenɛ ɛ a tɔnkɔn naaninɛ ma.
An koa chɛ ɔ, soe kan kɔ kan ni wan a ɔ, ni ka kan kɔ kan, a basan konde kan kɔ kan na.
Mbɛ a‑a mɔɛ kuiɛ a min, a‑a a fɔ a ye, a ɔ, “Pita, i kɔɔ sɔ, i ni min kɔ min fa, i ni a daun.”
Chɛɛ Pita‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “Mansa, a ma ma ka. N ma fen kɔ fen daun nin bɛ, nn 'na Chu sawa ɛ min ma bɔ, mbɛ a ma nyamuien fan mu Yataa tena nn ko a, nn ni a daun.”
Mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ kuiɛ chɛ‑a a fɔ to a ye, a ɔ, “Yataa ɛ a fɔ fenɛ min ma, a nyin, i ma a fɔ, mbɛ a ma nyamuienɛ mu.”
Kuiɛ chɛ‑a bai chɛ fɔ si tena sawa, mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, koa chɛ tuin‑da, a yɛ banda bu ɔ.

Pita ni tun a yii na chii tena koe chɛ an ma, a‑a min dɔ yen ka, yɔ a ni cho ɔ wan. A toen ni a ni a ɔ sɔn, ni a sien mu fen ma. Mbɛ Kɔniyɔsi na‑a mɔɛ miin sɔ ka, an‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, a wan Saimɔn 'na chenɛ ni kaina min. An gbu sin ni gbɛ sɔ ɔ wan baa ma, an chen chɛ kata chɛ da a.
Mbɛ an‑na chee chɛ, an dɔ, “Mɔ ɔ mɔ ɛ wan nɛ sondaya a, min tɔ mu Saimɔn Pita?”
Pita ni tun yiinachii an dɔ, a tima chɛ a, an koe chɛ ɔ gbɛ koe a, min mbe ka yɔ cho. Yataa Nyina‑a a fɔ a ye, a ɔ, “A yen ko, mɔ kaima sawa n na‑a, an mbe an ya a kan‑da i a.
I kɔɔ sɔ, i ni yii, i ni an tan, mbɛ wo bɛ ta‑a an na. I ma sika, koe min na mu, n fan‑na an sɔ i tena.”
Mbɛ Pita‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, a yii‑a an tena, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ mɔ sawa chɛ n ye, a ɔ, “Wo e ka wo ya a kan tena n fan na. Fen mu wo na‑a?”

Mbɛ an dɔ, “Kaminɛ min mbe soya chɛmɛ dɔndɔɛ chɛ n ya ɔ, an‑na nn sɔ. A tɔ mu Kɔniyɔsi. A ɛ kooya be wan Yataa ma, a sin tanden mu. A sin to, Chu mɔɛ n gbɛɛ‑a basɔmaya be wan a ma. Maeka an bɔ‑a Kɔniyɔsi chɛ ya a, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ a ye, a ɔ, a ni i chee a 'a chenɛ a. A ɔ, a ni i da a bai a min, e min fɔ‑a.”

Mbɛ Pita‑a kamin chɛ n chee a 'a chenɛ a, an yɛɛ chɛ ma, an ma‑a sonda n na a tena. A banda ɔ ka ma, an ta‑a wan, an bɛ mɔɛ chɛ n na. A sin, suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ dɔ nu Chasi ɔ, a ka Chɔpa duu ɔ, an bɛɛ‑a a sɔ wan an fɛ.
An che‑a wan Sisayea duu ɔ, tee dɔndɔɛ ma. Kɔniyɔsi ni wan a ma kɔn tena kaina. A sin na‑a a suun ma nyɔɛ n gbɛɛ a sɔn sɔn fan, an bɛ a dia nyɔɛ n na.
Pita‑a a kunɛ a don kɛn chen chɛ a, Kɔniyɔsi bea‑a wan a chen kɔɔ, a bun‑da a fai‑a.
Chɛɛ Pita‑a a ma wan, Kɔniyɔsi‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, a ɔ, “I kɔɔ sɔ, i ni sɔ. N bɛɛ mu dechee mɔ gbu an na.”
Pita to‑a wan koɔ‑a Kɔniyɔsi tena, aan an don‑da chen chɛ a, a‑a mɔ sɛsɛ n na sɔndenɛ tan kaina.

Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Wo wandi gbu, wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ nn 'na Chu sawa‑a min fɔ. Mbɛ nn fan Chu mɔ kan kɔ kan, nn mbe ee ta mɔ ɔ mɔ dɔ gbɛɛ 'a chen na. Chɛ ma, nn ni gbɛn an ma, miin ma Chu mɔ a. Chɛɛ Yataa ban‑da a ɔ yian‑da n na, mbɛ n ma tɛ mɔ gbu kan kɔ kan dɔ, n gbu ma mɔ ma nyamui koe fɔ.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, i‑a mɔɛ n na ta kɛn n chee‑a, n ma n kun dɔ nyan ni, na koe a. A ɔ yian gbɛ n na, i‑a n chee fen ko a?”
Mbɛ Kɔniyɔsi ɔ, “Bi an‑na a ma gbɛ tee naanin, koe chɛ ma‑a. N ni wan samun chɛ‑a, tee kɔ kai ma, nɛ n 'na chenɛ a. Mbɛ a yen ko, n‑na mɔ kaima yen sɔ ɔ, a ma koa ɛ man‑da taun.
Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, ‘Kɔniyɔsi, Yataa‑a i 'a samunɛ a min. A sin, a‑a a ɔ yen, e boo fenɛ miin be yɔn tɔɛ n ma.

Chɛ an fɛ mu, mɔɛ a ta Chɔpa, kamin dɔndɔ chee koe a, min tɔ mu Saimɔn. A tɔɛ dɔndɔɛ an nɛ Pita. Ɛ kamin dɔndɔ an 'na sondaya a, min tɔ mu to Saimɔn. Saimɔn chɛ mu kanche an na, a sin, a 'a chenɛ ɛ kɔ yii kaa a wan.’

Mbɛ an‑na a ma, n‑na mɔɛ n sɔ i chee‑a bui chɛ a. I wɛɛ, i‑a ko chɛndɛ ma wan, i na koe a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, sanche gbɛ, mmɔ gbɛɛ a sɔn sɔn‑da nɛ Yataa chen kɔɔ. Nn gbɛɛ sin too ma sɔen mu ka gbɛ i wan ma, Mansa Yataa‑a bai min don i da a, nn ko a, nn ni an bai a min.”
Mbɛ Pita bun‑da koɔ‑a, a ɔ, “Sanche mu ka gbɛ, n‑na a ɔ sɔn, tea ko a, mbɛ Yataa ee mɔ gbu gbɛɛ tɛ bɔ.
Chɛɛ mɔ gbu kan kɔ kan dunya chɛ ɔ, i wɛn mbe chian Yataa ma, mbɛ i‑a a faa ma koe ma, ɛ a boo si‑a wan i mɔɛ chɛ kɔɔ.
Wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, Yataa‑a bai min na ta Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n tena. A ni wan sakana bai chɛ ɔ yian‑da, mbɛ faachima ɛ sɔn fan Yataa a, Chisɔsi Chasi 'a gbasaya ɔ, min mu mɔ gbu gbɛɛ 'a mansa a.
Wo‑a a sɔn fan, min ma‑a Chu chɛnyɛ gbɛɛ ɔ. A kuu sɔ‑a Kadidi wan, Chɔn ban‑da kɛn a ɔ yian‑da mɔɛ n na, a si yii chɛ koe ma an kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a.

A yɛ to, wo‑a Chisɔsi wakoe ɔ sɔn fan, min ka‑a Nasaɛti duu ɔ. Yataa na‑a a Nyina be buɛ min dɔ a ma, a basan gbasaya a. Chisɔsi ben ben‑da wan a ɔ gbɛɛ, ɛ ta‑a ko chɛndɛ ma‑a mɔɛ n na, mbɛ a yɛ‑a, a‑a mɔɛ n gbɛɛ baun, miin ni Sitana 'a gbasaya kɔɔ. Koe min ni a ma, a ni chɛ ma, Yataa ni wan a fɛ.
Siiya mu nn fan na, a si koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ma, a‑a miin ma Chu mɔɛ n 'na chɛnyɛ ɔ, ni Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. An na‑a a gbangban fan kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma, a fa‑a nɔ.
Chɛɛ Yataa‑a a kɔɔ sɔ wan, a ka saya ɔ, tee sawan bɔɛ ma, mbɛ a‑a a ma, a bɔ‑a mɔɛ n ya a.

Chisɔsi nii ma bɔ ni mɔɛ gbɛɛ an ya a, chɛɛ a bɔ‑a dechee nn fan ya a. Yataa na‑a a boo sɔ nn fɛn ma, ma koe a sii n na. Nn fan‑na daun dɔndɔɛ chɛ, nn‑na nn min kaina dɔndɔɛ, Chisɔsi a sɔenɛ gbakɔ saya ɔ.
A sin‑na a fɔ wan nn ye, a ɔ, nn ni Yataa bai sa mɔɛ n tena. Mbɛ nn‑na siiya bɔ, a si a wakoe ma. A ɔ yian koe a, mbɛ Yataa‑a a wan Chisɔsi an yian, kaa a tɛ koe a, chɛndɛ ba n ko a, an bɛ fuɛ n na.
Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n gbɛɛ na‑a bai sa wan, a si Chisɔsi chɛ ma. An dɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe an kai fa‑a Chisɔsi chɛ a, Yataa ɛ a boo bɔ‑a wan an mɔɛ chɛ a ko yama n dɔ, Chisɔsi ko a.”
Pita to‑a koɔ tena wan, mbɛ Yataa Nyina bea‑a mɔɛ n gbɛɛ fɛ, miin ni an too ma sɔ tena a 'a sakana bai chɛ ma.

Pita n bɛ na‑a wan Chɔpa duu ɔ, an bɛ Chu mɔɛ n na, miin na‑a an kai fa Chisɔsi a. An da ɔ gbaa‑a wan, koe chɛ ɔ yen koe a. Mbɛ Yataa ɛ kun fan, a ni a ma, a Nyina ni ma mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ fɛ, miin ma Chu mɔ a.
Koe min na mu, an‑na a a min fan, mɔɛ chɛ n mbe kamaya bai n fɔ‑a, mɔɛ n mbe ee miin dɔ gbɛ ka dechee, an mbe ta‑a Yataa tando‑a. Mbɛ Pita‑a a fɔ, a ɔ,
“Yataa Nyina bea‑a ka wan mɔɛ chɛ n fɛ, yɔ a bea‑a buɛ min dɔ nn bɛɛ fɛ. Chɛ an fɛ mu gbɛ, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee to nɔ, min mbe an ka‑a yii chɛ koe a an kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a.”
Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, an ni yii chɛ an kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, Chisɔsi Chasi tɔɛ ɔ. Mbɛ an‑na a fɔ a ye, an dɔ, an ni ma nɔ an tɛ ɔ, tee kuunden ko a.

Bai ben‑da wan gbɛ a ɔ, Chudia chɛnyɛ gbɛɛ ɔ. A che‑a Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ n ma, an bɛ suun ma nyɔɛ tɔɛ n na Chasi ɔ, a si mɔɛ chɛ n ma, miin ma ka Chu mɔ a. Mbɛ an bɛɛ, an‑na an boo si Yataa 'a bai kɔɔ.

Chɛ‑a a ma wan, Pita yɛ‑a kɛn Chuusaɛn, Chu mɔɛ dɔ nu, miin‑na an kai fa Chisɔsi a, an bu ɔ nii ma di a wakoe a. An danden ni ka a a, mbɛ ni mɔɛ a ma kamincha ni, a ee che a kai fa‑a Chisɔsi a. Mbɛ an‑na Pita ma nyin fan,
an dɔ, “I ta‑a wan mɔɛ chɛ n 'na chenɛ a, mɔɛ miin na ma kamincha ni ka, mbɛ wo gbu sin yɛ‑a to, wo bɛ an na, wo‑a daunɛ chɛ kaina dɔndɔ. Fen ko a mu, i‑a chɛ ma?”
Mbɛ Pita wɛɛ si‑a ko ɔ ko ma, a‑a a gbɛɛ ɔ yian an na dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a.

A ɔ, “N ni tee dɔndɔ a samun chɛ‑a Chɔpa duu chɛ ɔ, n‑na koe ɔ yen fan, yɔ n ni cho ɔ wan. N‑na fenɛ yen fan yii‑a, a ka banda bu ɔ, yɔ koa wa, a biaenɛ ɛ a tɔnkɔn naaninɛ ma. Mbɛ a che‑a kɛn n baima, a sɛmbɛ‑a yii koe a.
N‑na koa chɛ bu ɔ fɛn fan chɛndɛ chɛ, a sin, n‑na soe sɛsɛ yen fan a ɔ, ka sɛsɛ nu, an bɛ konde sɛsɛ n na.
Mbɛ n‑na mɔɛ kuiɛ a min, a ɔ, ‘Pita, i kɔɔ sɔ, i ni min kɔ min fa, i ni a daun.’
Chɛɛ n‑na a fɔ wan, n dɔ, ‘Mansa, a ma ma ka. N ma fen kɔ fen daun nin bɛ, mabɔɛ ɛ min ma, nn 'na Chu sawa ta fɛ chia a, fenɛ min ma nyamuien mu Yataa tena.’
Mbɛ kuiɛ chɛ ɔ te to, a ɔ, ‘Yataa ɛ a fɔ fenɛ min ma, a nyin, i ma a fɔ, mbɛ a ma nyamuienɛ mu.’
Chɛ ma‑a si tena sawa, mbɛ koa chɛ basan fen chɛ n na, miin ni a ɔ, a tuin‑da, a yɛ banda bu ɔ.
A tima dɔndɔ gbe chɛ kɔɔ, nn ni ka chenɛ min na, mɔ kaima sawa n na‑a wan nɔ. An na‑a an sɔ wan, a ka Sisayea duu ɔ, an na‑a n tena.

A sin, Yataa Nyina‑a a fɔ wan n ye, mbɛ n ma sika, chɛɛ nn bɛ ni ta an na. Suun ma nyɔn wɔdɔɛ chɛ nu, Chasi ɔ, an bɛɛ‑a n ma sɔ wan. Nn ka‑a wan Chɔpa, nn ta‑a Sisayea duu ɔ, mbɛ nn don‑da kamin chɛ 'a chenɛ a.
Nn don‑da kɛn, a‑a a ɔ yian fan nn na, a na‑a Yataa 'a maeka yen buɛ min dɔ sɔ ɔ a 'a chenɛ a. Mbɛ maeka chɛ ɔ, ‘Mɔɛ a ta Chɔpa duu ɔ, kamin dɔndɔ tena min tɔ mu Saimɔn. A tɔɛ dɔndɔɛ an nɛ, Pita.
Ɛ sakana bai fɔ‑a wan i ye, min mbe na‑a bauncha a i tena, wo bɛ i 'a chen 'na mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a.’
Mbɛ n‑na a kuu sɔ kɛn koɔ‑a an tena, Yataa Nyina bea‑a wan an fɛ, yɔ a na‑a bea buɛ min dɔ nn bɛɛ fɛ, a saa a.
Chɛ‑a a ma wan, n yii puin‑da Mansa Chisɔsi 'a bai chɛ ma. A na‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, ‘Chɔn ni yii an chɛ wo kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, chɛɛ Yataa ɛ a ma‑a wan, a Nyina ni bea wo fɛ.’
Yataa wandi‑a a Nyina dɔndɔ gbe chɛ an be an ma, a na‑a min be mmɔ wɛɛ ma, mmɔ‑a mmɔ kai fa kɛn Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi a. Ni a‑a chɛ ma, n mbe ee che n kun si‑a Yataa a. Nyɔn mu n na, chɛ ma koe a?”

An‑na bai chɛ a min kɛn, an sɛmbɛ‑a wan a ma nyin koe a. Mbɛ an‑na Yataa tando, an dɔ te, “Mbɛ Yataa deman‑da mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ ma, miin ma Chu mɔ a. A‑a chia sa wan an bɛɛ ye, an ni an kan kɔ sɔ an 'na ko yama a, mbɛ an‑na kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn.”

An na‑a Sitibin fa tima min na, mɔɛ n‑na a a kuu sɔ wan ko ma gbaaenɛ sa‑a mɔɛ chɛ n ma, miin na‑a an kai fa Chisɔsi a. Chɛ na‑a a ma wan, mɔɛ miin na‑a an kai fa ka Chisɔsi a, an gbɛɛ fasan‑da a ɔ gbuu. An ta‑a wan aan a che Fonisia chɛnyɛ ɔ. Dɔ n sin ta‑a wan Saipɔsi yii tinɛ ɔ, ni Andiɔki duu wa chɛ ɔ. An nii bai ɔ yian mɔ dɔ gbɛɛ n na, a si Chisɔsi wakoe ma, mɔɔ dechee Chu mɔɛ nu.

Chɛɛ an dɔ nu, miin na‑a an kai fa ka Chisɔsi a, a ka Saipɔsi ni Sayini duu wa ɔ, an ta‑a wan Andiɔki. Mbɛ sakana bai chɛ, a si Mansa Chisɔsi ma, an‑na a ɔ yian fan an bɛɛ a, miin nii ma ka Chu mɔ n na.
A sin, Mansa Yataa 'a gbasaya ni wan an kun ma. Mɔ sɛsɛ sin‑na an kai fa wan Mansa Chisɔsi a, mbɛ an‑na an ya a mun a ma.
Mbɛ an koe chɛ che‑a chɔchi mɔɛ n ma, Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. Mbɛ an‑na Banabasi a ta wan Andiɔki.

A che‑a kɛn nɔ, mbɛ a‑a a ɔ yen, Yataa‑a koadia demanɛ chɛ buɛ min dɔ, an mɔɛ chɛ n na, a bu ɔ dia‑a wan kaka. A‑a an disa wan, min mbe a ma, an ni a tun an kai fa koe a Mansa Chisɔsi a, an faa gbɛɛ a.
Banabasi chɛ ni mɔ chɛndɛ an na, min danayaen ni, a sin Yataa Nyina ni wan a fɛ gban. Mbɛ a‑a a ma wan, mɔ sɛsɛ sa‑a chɛ n kun ma, miin faa mun‑da Mansa Chisɔsi tena.
Mbɛ Banabasi ta‑a Tasɔsi duu wa ɔ, ɛ a ya a kan‑da Sɔɔ a.

A‑a a yen kɛn, a‑a a ma wan, mbɛ an fea yɛ‑a a a Andiɔki duu ɔ. An ni bɛn fan, an bɛ chɔchi mɔɛ chɛ n na, an mbe ta‑a an sɛsɛ kan‑da. An ni wan nɔ san dɔndɔ ko a. Andiɔki ni, tɔɛ chɛ si‑a an kun ma, an dɔ, Chisianɛ nu, an fɛn kai faen ni Chisɔsi a.
A tima chɛ a ni gbɛ, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ dɔ n yii‑a, a ka Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, mbɛ an na‑a Andiɔki.
An tɛ ɔ, mɔ dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, min tɔ ni Akabɔsi. Yataa Nyina‑a a ma wan, Akabɔsi chɛ sin, a‑a kɔnkɔ wa na koe kɔɔ fɔ wan dunya ɔ. An kɔnkɔɛ chɛ sin na‑a Mansa Kaudiyɔsi 'a tima an na, Domi chɛnyɛ ɔ.

Chisian chɛ n‑na a ɔ bɛn fan, an sɔɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, an ni an boo fenɛ n na ta, basan koe a an suun ma nyɔɛ n ma Chasi ɔ, miin ni Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ. An dɔ, an ni chɛ ma yɔ an 'na gbasaya ɛ kun min nyɔn sima ma.
An sin‑na an boo fenɛ n na sɔn sɔn fan, mbɛ an‑na an be Banabasi ma, an fea Sɔɔ a. An bɛɛ‑a boo fen chɛ n na ta wan, chɔchi gbakoo n tena Chuusaɛn duu ɔ.
Koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ni kɛn chɛ tena a ɔ, a tima dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a ni, Mansa Ɛdɔdi‑a a kuu sɔ ko ma gbaaenɛ sa‑a chɔchi mɔɛ dɔ n ma.
A‑a a ma wan, an‑na Chimisi fa chɛɛ chɛ mɛ a, Chɔn kɔɔ kaima.
A sin, a‑a a ɔ yen kɛn, mbɛ a‑a Chu n faa ma koe an ma ka, a ma yɛ ni to kuu kɔ, a‑a Pita wɛɛ bia wan. Chɛ ma‑a tima chɛ an na, Chu mɔɛ n 'na biidi dɛnfɛ daun bɛn chɛ kun ma.

A sin‑na a ma kɛn, Pita bia‑a, a‑a a sa wan pimbi chenɛ a. Pita be‑a pimbi chen kun ma fɛn mɔɛ kun naanin fan ma, a kun ma fɛn koe a. An ni naanin naaninɛ an ma. Mansa Ɛdɔdi toen ni, a ni Pita 'a bai sa fanka ɔ wan, ni an kun bɔ‑a ɔ bɛn chɛ ka‑a a a.
Mbɛ an‑na Pita ma gban pimbi chenɛ a. Chɛɛ a tima chɛ a, chɔchi mɔɛ chɛ n ni wan Yataa fai‑a a ko a, an faa gbɛɛ a.

Mbɛ Mansa Ɛdɔdi yiima ɔ, banda dɔndɔ ɔ ni ka wan, a ni Pita a bɔ pimbi chenɛ a, a 'a bai sa koe a fanka ɔ. An pimbi chɛ ɔ, Pita ni wan sa ɔ chinɔɛ ɔ, soya mɔ fea n tɛ. A chiien ni yɔɔ fea an na. A sin, pimbi chen kun ma fɛn mɔɛ n ni wan nɔ, pimbi chenɛ gbu da a, an mbe a kun ma fɛn‑da.

Mbɛ a yen ko, Mansa Yataa 'a maeka bɔ‑a a pimbi chen chɛ a. Pimbi chenɛ gbu, a dumu bu ɔ, Pita ni kaina, maeka chɛ 'a manɛ‑a a ɔ ka wan. Mbɛ maeka chɛ‑a Pita tɔnfɛ ma gbasi, a‑a Pita a kunɛ, a ɔ, “I a sɔ bui chɛ a.” Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, yɔɔɛ min ni ka Pita boo ma, a fuin‑da, mbɛ a bea‑a.
Mbɛ maeka chɛ‑a a fɔ a ye, a ɔ, “I ma bɛn, i ni i 'a kɔɔwa don i chenɛ a.” Mbɛ Pita wɛɛ‑a a ma ka. Mbɛ maeka chɛ‑a a fɔ to a ye, a ɔ, “I 'a doma don, i ni a sɔ n fɛ, mɔ ni ta.”
Pita‑a a sɔ wan maeka chɛ fɛ, a bɔ pimbi chenɛ chɛ a. A gbu nii ma a ɔ gbɛ ni pɛnɛnɛ, maeka chɛ ni koe min ma tena. A ni wan a yii ma, mbɛ a ni ka cho an dɔ.

Pita an fea maeka chɛ a, an ben‑da wan soya mɔɛ saa saa ma, a basan a fean bɔɛ a. Mbɛ a danka a, an che‑a pimbi chenɛ da chɛ ma, min nyandenɛ ni kundu a, duu wa chɛ teen na. Pimbi chenɛ chɛ da a ka‑a wan, a wandi kun ma a a, mbɛ an bɔ‑a. An ta‑a wan, mbɛ an‑na dani dɔndɔ ɔ tandin. Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, maeka chɛ‑a Pita to, a ta‑a.

Mbɛ a tima gbu a ni gbɛ, Pita‑a a wandi a tinsɔn. Mbɛ a ɔ, “Sanche mu gbɛ, n‑na a ɔ gbɛ, mbɛ n nii ka cho ɔ. Mansa Yataa an‑na a 'a maeka a na ka, n bɔ koe a Mansa Ɛdɔdi boo ɔ. A ni n bɔ koe gbɛɛ ɔ, miin ni Chu mɔɛ n 'na yiinachii ɔ, n ko a.”
Pita ban‑da chɛ ɔ sɔn‑da kɛn, a ta‑a wan Mɛi 'a chenɛ a, min 'na denɛ tɔ ni Chɔn. A tɔ ni to Maki. Mɔ sɛsɛ a kanden fan ni an chen chɛ a, an mbe samun chɛ‑a.
Mbɛ Pita‑a chenɛ kata da tu. A‑a a tu kɛn, yɔn musu dɔndɔ, min tɔ ni Doda, a dɔn‑da wan a bu ɔ.
A‑a Pita kuiɛ ɔ gbɛ kɛn, a bu ɔ dia‑a wan, a ɔ benden ba a. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, a ma chenɛ da gbu a ka ni. Chɛɛ a yɛ‑a wan bui a, a‑a a fɔ mɔɛ chɛ n ye, mbɛ Pita ɛ sɔ ɔ chenɛ da a.
Mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ n‑na a fɔ a ye, an dɔ, “I wooen fan mu.” Chɛɛ yɔn musu chɛ chii‑a wan a ma, mbɛ tea mu. Mbɛ an‑na a fɔ a ye, an dɔ, mbɛ Pita 'a maeka an nɛ.
Chɛɛ Pita ma sɛmbɛ ni, chen chɛ da tu koe a. An sin‑na chen chɛ da a ka kɛn, an‑na Pita yen fan, mbɛ an gbɛɛ da ɔ gbaa‑a gbechee.

Chɛɛ Pita ni wan a boo kai‑a an ma, an ma na sɔnkɔɛ chɛ. Mbɛ a si‑a a gbɛɛ ma, a‑a a ɔ yian, Mansa Yataa‑a a ma buɛ min dɔ, a bɔ‑a pimbi chen chɛ a. Pita‑a a fɔ wan an ye, a ɔ, an ni a ɔ yian Chimisi a, a basan an suun ma nyɔɛ n na Chasi ɔ. Mbɛ a ka‑a nɔ, a ta‑a kaina dɔ mende.
A banda ɔ ka ma, sau ma che‑a kɛn gbɛ, pimbi chen kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ n 'na ma samba nii ma dɔɔ. An gbu nii ma a ɔ sɔn, koe min ma‑a Pita a.

Mansa Ɛdɔdi‑a a ma kɛn, an‑na an ya a kan Pita a, chɛɛ an ma a yen ni, a faa tɛ‑a wan gbeden. Mbɛ a‑a pimbi chenɛ chɛ kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ n dɔ tisa gbɛɛ ɛ. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, an ni an fa. Chɛ gbakɔ, Mansa Ɛdɔdi yii‑a wan, a ka Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ, mbɛ a ta‑a Sisayea duu ɔ tima ɛnden ko a.

Mansa Ɛdɔdi faa tɛen fan ni gbɛ Taya duu ɔ mɔɛ n ma, an bɛ Sidon mɔɛ n na. A sin, an duu fea chɛ ɔ mɔɛ n na‑a wan kaina dɔndɔɛ. An‑na kai Basɔsi pɛn tan, min ni Mansa Ɛdɔdi 'a kata kun ma, ni a boo fenɛ gbɛɛ. An‑na a ɔ tisa wan, an dɔ, a ni an deman, an ni koɔ Mansa Ɛdɔdi tena. An toen ni, Mansa Ɛdɔdi faa ni chima an boo ɔ, koe min na mu, an 'na daun fenɛ ni ka nɔ, a 'a chɛnyɛ chɛ an dɔ.
Tee chɛ ma, Mansa Ɛdɔdi‑a min yian ka an tɛ ɔ bai sa koe a, an bɛ an na, a‑a a ma chii wan a 'a mansa ma chii a. Mbɛ a si‑a, a 'a mansa sea a, koɔ koe a an tena, a ma kawaen ba ɔ.
A ni kɛn koɔ tena, mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ‑a yee tɛ wan, an dɔ te, “Mɔ gbu ee koɔ ka. Yataa an mbe ka koɔ tena.”
A ya kɔɔɛ a, Mansa Yataa 'a maeka‑a a boo yii wan Mansa Ɛdɔdi a. Koe min na mu, a nii ma basɔmaya be ni Yataa ma. A sin, tɔnɛnɛ n fan‑na a daun, mbɛ a fa‑a.
Chɛɛ Yataa 'a sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ tana, a fasan‑da wan a ɔ gbɛɛ ben‑da, mbɛ mɔ nama sɛsɛ‑a an kai fa Chisɔsi a.
Mbɛ Banabasi n fea Sɔɔ a, an ban‑da kɛn an 'na wai ma, an ta‑a min chɛ koe a Chuusaɛn, an yɛ‑a wan Andiɔki. An na‑a Chɔn dɔndɔ an na an boo a, min tɔ ni to Maki.

Mɔɛ n ni wan nɔ Andiɔki duu ɔ, miin ni Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n na, a basan a 'a kan chɛ mɔɛ n na. Banabasi ni an mɔɛ chɛ n dɔndɔ an na, ni Simiyɔn bɛɛ, an ni min chee, an dɔ, Simiyɔn finɛ. A yɛ to, Sɔɔ wɛɛ, ni Dusiɔsi, min ka‑a Sayini duu ɔ, an fea Manaɛn na, min bɔ‑a a ɔ chen dɔndɔɛ a, an fea Mansa Ɛdɔdi Andipasi a.
Tee dɔndɔ a, an ni kɛn sun bia a, an mbe ta‑a Mansa Yataa fai‑a, Yataa Nyina‑a a fɔ wan an ye, a ɔ, “Wo a ma n ye, Banabasi, an fea Sɔɔ a, an ni ma tenchen wai chɛ ko a, n‑na an chee min chɛ koe a.”
Mbɛ an ban‑da sun bia‑a, a basan samun chɛ a, an‑na an boo bun fan an ma, an‑na an dua, mbɛ an‑na an na ta.

Mbɛ Yataa Nyina chɛ‑a Banabasi sɔ kɛn, an fea Sɔɔ a, ta koe a baa kɔ, an yii‑a wan Sɛdusia duu ɔ. An bɛ an ta‑a Chɔn Maki a, basan koe a an ma an 'na wai chɛ koe a. An ka‑a wan nɔ, mbɛ an‑na yii tɛ dɛndɛ ɔ Saipɔsi yii tinɛ ɔ. An che‑a wan Sadamisi duu ɔ, an don‑da Chu n na samun chɛ chenɛ a, mbɛ an‑na Yataa bai ɔ yian mɔɛ n na.
An‑na an tinɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ ban kɛn, benbenɛ a, aan a che Pafɔsi duu ɔ, an‑na nkofo kamin dɔndɔ tan fan. A tɔ ni Baa Chisɔsi. A ni Chu mɔɛ an na, min ni fania fɔɛ a, mbɛ Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ mu a a.
An nkofo chɛ, a dia nyɔɛ an nii nɛ kɔfana a nɔ, an yii tin chɛ ɔ. An kɔfana chɛ tɔ ni Sachɔsi Pɔdɔsi, min yiima tɛen ni kaka. A‑a Banabasi chee wan, an fea Sɔɔ a, Yataa bai a min koe a an na.
Chɛɛ nkofo chɛ, min tɔɛ dɔndɔɛ ni Ɛdimasi (a tɔɛ chɛ fɔɛ an nii nɛ, nkofo tɔɛ), a‑a Banabasi n kɔɔsa bia wan kaka. A nii ma to ni, kɔfana chɛ ni dan bai chɛ n na, an ni min fɔ tena a si Chisɔsi ma.
Chɛɛ Yataa Nyina bea‑a wan Sɔɔ fɛ gban, min tɔɛ dɔndɔɛ ni Pɔɔ. A‑a a ya gbangban fan nkofo chɛ a,
mbɛ a ɔ, “I wan, Sitana 'a denɛ. Ko chɛndɛ kan kɔ kan chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ mu i a. Chɛwɛɛ yama yama gbɛɛ ɛ i ɔ, mɔɛ n bun koe a. A sin, e butuin chɛ tena wan tima ɔ tima, i ni Mansa Yataa 'a tea mun fania a.

Mbɛ a yen ko gbɛ sanche, Mansa Yataa‑a a boo bun i ma. I ya a ɛ pimbi‑a wan tee kuunden ko a.” A ya kɔɔɛ a, mbɛ dingbii bun‑da Ɛdimasi ya a, a don‑da pimbi ɔ, mbɛ a bun‑da a boo mɛmɛ‑a. A toen ni, mɔɛ ni a bia a boo ma, a ni ta a a.
Kɔfana chɛ‑a a ɔ yen kɛn koe min ma‑a, a‑a a kai fa wan Chisɔsi a. Koe min na mu, a da ɔ gbaa‑a wan kan chɛ a, a si Mansa Chisɔsi ma.
Mbɛ Pɔɔ n bɛ a bɔɛ n na, an si‑a dɛndɛ ɔ, mbɛ an bɔ‑a Pafɔsi duu ɔ, an ta‑a Paaka duu ɔ, min ni Panfidia chɛnyɛ ɔ. An che‑a kɛn nɔ, Chɔn Maki‑a an to wan, mbɛ a yɛ‑a Chuusaɛn duu ɔ.
Chɛɛ an‑na an 'na tachɛ a tun fan a ma, a ka Paaka, a ta Andiɔki duu dɔ mende ɔ, min ni Pisidia chɛnyɛ ɔ. A sin, Chu n 'na suin tee ma, an don‑da wan Chu n 'na samun chenɛ a, mbɛ an si‑a.

Mbɛ mɔɛ ban‑da sawa gboo chɛ kan‑da, Mosisi na‑a min nyɛn, a basan bai n na, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ na‑a min nyɛn. Mbɛ ya ɔ sɔɛ chɛ nu, Chu n 'na samun chɛ chen chɛ a, an‑na sakana a ta Pɔɔ n tena, an dɔ te, “Nn suun ma nyɔɛ nu, ni bai ɔ bai ɛ wan wo da a, a fɔ koe, min mbe mɔɛ n faa ma nande, wo e ka a fɔ‑a.”
Mbɛ Pɔɔ‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, a‑a a boo a sɛ an too ma sɔ koe a, mbɛ a bun‑da koɔ‑a. A ɔ, “N bɔ Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ nu, wo wo too ma sɔ, wo wɛn bɛɛ ma Chu mɔ a, wo wo too ma sɔ n ma.

Mmɔ wan Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n mbe Yataa min fai, an‑na a boo sɔ nn bemba n ta bemba n ma, ma koe a a ta mɔɛ n na. Mbɛ a‑a a ma, an da a koa‑a, tima min na, an ni sondaya a Ichipi chɛnyɛ ɔ. Yataa 'a gbasaya, an‑na a ma to, an bɔ‑a Ichipi chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ.
Mbɛ a sin, san bi naanin chɛ gbɛɛ ko a, an ni tima min na fuinɛ ma, an 'na ko yama gbɛɛ bɛn‑da wan a ma.
Yataa‑a chɛnyɛ mɔ kun wɔnfea n kasaa wan, Kenaan chɛnyɛ ɔ. Mbɛ a‑a a ma, a 'a mɔɛ nu, Kenaan chɛnyɛ chɛ ma‑a an ta a.
Koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ma‑a san chɛmɛ naanin, ni san bi duu an tɛ ɔ. “Chɛ gbakɔ, a‑a a ma wan, an‑na ya ɔ sɔɛ n ma sɔn, miin ni an kun ma fɛn, aan Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ Samɛɛ ta tima che‑a.
Mbɛ an‑na Yataa ɔ tisa, min mbe a ma, a ni mansa be an ma. Yataa‑a Sɔɔ be wan an ma, min ni kai Kisi 'a denɛ a. A bɔ‑a Bɛnchamin 'na dambi an dɔ. A ni wan mansaya chɛ ɔ, san bi naanin ko a.

Yataa‑a Sɔɔ bɔ kɛn mansaya chɛ ma, a‑a a boo sɔ wan Defidi ma, ma koe a mansa a, Sɔɔ gba ɔ. Yataa‑a bai chɛ an fɔ a si Defidi ma, a ɔ, ‘Defidi wakoe‑a n ya fa, Chɛsi 'a den chɛ. Koe min na mu, n‑na a ɔ yen, mbɛ ɛ kun fan n faa ma koe ma‑a, yɔ n toen mu a a buɛ min dɔ.’
Defidi chɛ, a 'a dambi ɔ mu, Yataa‑a a ma, mmɔ‑a baun mɔɛ ma sɔn, min mu Chisɔsi a. A‑a Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n too ɔ dia an na.
Chisɔsi e na to a 'a wai kuu sɔ‑a dunya chɛ ɔ, Chɔn‑na Yataa bai sa wan Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n gbɛɛ tena, an kan kɔ sɔ koe a, an 'na ko yama n na, a ni yii chɛ an kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a.

A sin, Chɔn ni kɛn gbɛ a 'a wai a ban tena dunya chɛ ɔ, a‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, ‘Ɛ wo yii ma, mbɛ nyɔn mu n na? N fan ma mɔɛ chɛ a, wo yii na chiien mu min na. Chɛɛ wo wo too ma sɔ, a ɛ na tena n gbaa chia a. Kɔɔwa gbu wɛɛ a chenɛ a, n mbe ee che a yuu wɛɛ fuin koe a.’
“N suun ma nyɔɛ nu, wo wɛn mu Ebeami cheeya n na, ni wo wɛɛ, wo wɛn ma Chu mɔ a, chɛɛ wo wɛn mbe kooya be Yataa ma, wo chɛ a min. Sakana bai chɛ, min mbe na bauncha a, a naen mu mmɔ gbɛɛ an ko a.

Chɛɛ mɔɛ miin mbe Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, an bɛ an ya ɔ sɔɛ n na, an nii ma a wakoe ɔ gbɛ ni. An nii ma Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n 'na bai n nan fan bɛɛ ɔ gbɛ ni, an ni min kan Chu n 'na samun chɛ chenɛ a, suin tee kan kɔ kan ma. Chɛɛ an‑na kaa a tɛ wan, a wakoe ma, a ni fa, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n da a kuiɛ bɔ koe a a.
An nii ma chia ɔ chia sɔn ni kaa a tɛ koe a, a fa koe ma. Chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, an‑na Kɔfana Padeti ɔ tisa wan, a ni a ma, an ni a fa.
An sin ban‑da wan koe chɛ n gbɛɛ a tachɛ‑a Chisɔsi a, yɔ a na‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, a si a ma Yataa 'a gboo ɔ. Mbɛ an‑na a a yii kɔn chɛ ma, an‑na a tɔn.
Chɛɛ Yataa‑a a kɔɔ sɔ wan, a ka saya ɔ,
a sin, tee sɛsɛ ko a, a ni bɔ wan mɔɛ chɛ n ya a, an bɛ ni ta miin na chia a a ka Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ, a sɛ Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. An fan mu sanche sii n na, a wan Chisɔsi ko a, mɔɛ n tena.
A sin, nn mbe ka nɛ, min mbe a ma, nn ni sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian wo a. Mbɛ Yataa na‑a tooɔdia min chɛ mmɔ bemba n ta bemba n na,

a‑a an chɛ ka mmɔ ye, mmɔ wɛn mu an cheeya n na. Koe min na mu, a‑a Chisɔsi kɔɔ sɔ wan, a ka saya ɔ. A‑a chɛ ma wan, yɔ a nyɛnden mu buɛ min dɔ si fean bɔɛ chɛ ɔ, Yataa tando si gboo ɔ. A‑a a fɔ wan a ɔ, a ɔ, ‘N 'na denɛ mu i a. N ma‑a i fa a bi.’

Yataa sin‑na Chisɔsi a sɔɛ min chɛ ka, a ka saya ɔ, a ee a ma‑a a gboo ni tui kuɔ fɔ ko a. Yataa na‑a a fɔ ka wan a 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, ‘Dua min mbe ee bea duu ma, n mbe a chɛ‑a wan wo a, n na‑a Mansa Defidi too ɔ dia min na.’
Chɛ an fɛ mu, a‑a a fɔ wan to si dɔ mende ɔ, Yataa tando si gboo chɛ ɔ, a ɔ, ‘E ee dɔn‑da i 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ chɛ, n fɛn‑na n fandi be i ma, n su ni tui kamba ɔ.’
Defidi tana, a ta tima a, a na‑a ban fan wai chɛ‑a Yataa ye, a chia ma yɔ a ɔ na‑a bɛn buɛ min dɔ. Mbɛ saya‑a a boo kana bia, a sin sa‑a a bemba n kaa a, mbɛ a gboo tui‑a kamba ɔ.
Chɛɛ chɛ nii ma ma ni mɔɛ chɛ a, Yataa‑a min na sɔ, a ka saya ɔ.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, n suun ma nyɔɛ nu, a nyin wo ni chɛ ɔ gbɛ. Mbɛ Chisɔsi chɛ an ko a mu, Yataa ɛ a boo bɔ mmɔ 'a ko yama n dɔ.

A sin, a wan ko a mu to, mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe a kai fa‑a a a, Yataa ɛ a ya‑a wan mɔ tandenɛ a a tena. Ɛ a boo bɔ‑a wan an mɔɛ chɛ a ko yama gbɛɛ ɔ. Ko yama chɛ nu, an mɔɛ chɛ kun mbe ee che bɔ‑a miin dɔ, Mosisi 'a sawa kɔɔ.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo wo kun ma fɛn, min mbe a ma, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n na‑a bai min fɔ, a ma na wo tan. An na‑a a fɔ wan Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, an dɔ te,

‘Wo a yen, bai yama sa mɔɛ nu, a si Yataa da a bai n ma. N mbe na tena wan koe ma‑a bi tee chɛ kɔɔ, wo ee dan‑da min na kuɔ fɔ, mɔɛ ni a ɔ yian bɛɛ wo a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo da a ɔ gbaa‑a wan, mbɛ wo fa‑a.’ ”
Pɔɔ n ni kɛn bɔ‑a Chu n 'na samun chɛ chen chɛ a, mɔɛ chɛ n‑na an disa wan. An dɔ, suin tee min ni na tena, an ni koe chɛ n dɔ yian to an na.

Mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, an ban‑da bɔ‑a Chu n 'na samun chɛ chen chɛ a. Chɛɛ Chu mɔɛ nu, ni an sɛsɛ miin boo fea sien ni Chu n 'na Yataa fai chia kɔɔ, an sɛsɛ‑a a sɔ wan Pɔɔ fɛ, an fea Banabasi a. An koɔ‑a wan mɔɛ chɛ n tena, an‑na a ma din an tena, mbɛ an ma an kan kɔ sɔ to Yataa 'a koadia deman chɛ a.
Suin tee dɔndɔɛ chɛ che‑a kɛn, ɛnden fan to‑a, mɔɛ n gbɛɛ an duu chɛ ɔ, an ni kuɛn, na koe a, an too ma sɔ‑a Mansa Yataa 'a bai ma.
Chu mɔɛ chɛ nu, an‑na fanka wa chɛ yen kɛn, toomaya‑a an faa fa wan gban. Mbɛ an‑na Pɔɔ da a bai gbɛɛ kɔɔsa bia, an yɛ‑a to, an‑na a main.

Chɛɛ a tima gbu a ni gbɛ, Pɔɔ, an fea Banabasi a, an‑na bai sa faagbɛa a. An dɔ, “A ni nyin, nn ni Yataa da a bai chɛ ɔ yian wo pɛn na. Chɛɛ wo‑a wo boo sɔ wan a ya ɔ, wo‑a a ɔ yian wo sɔnɛ ɔ, mbɛ a ma nyin, wo ni kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ chɛ ma sɔn. A yen ko gbɛ, nn bɛɛ, nn‑na nn ya a yɛ chɛ n ma, miin ma Chu mɔ a.
Koe min na mu, Mansa Yataa‑a a fɔ ka wan nn ye, a ma koe a. A‑a a fɔ wan a 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, ‘N‑na wo ma manɛ a, chɛ n ko a, miin ma Chu mɔ a. Chɛ ni a ma, wo ni na bauncha a dunya tɔnkɔnɛ gbɛɛ ɔ.’ ”

A sin, mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin nii ma Chu mɔ a, an‑na bai chɛ a min kɛn, an bu ɔ dia‑a wan, an bun‑da Yataa tando‑a, a 'a bai ko a. Mɔ sɛsɛ sin, Yataa na‑a a boo sɔ miin ma, kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn koe a, an‑na an kai fa wan Chisɔsi a.
Mbɛ bai chɛ, a si Mansa Chisɔsi ma, a fasan‑da wan a ɔ gbɛɛ an tanda chɛ ɔ ben‑da.

Chɛɛ musu gbakoo nu an duu chɛ ɔ, miin ni kooya be Yataa ma, an bɛ nɔ mɔ kaima gbakoo n gbɛɛ a, Chu mɔɛ chɛ n‑na an gbɛɛ a sɛ wan Pɔɔ n ma. An‑na ko ma gbaaenɛ sa wan Pɔɔ ma, an fea Banabasi a, mbɛ an gbu‑a an gbain an tanda gbu ɔ.
Chɛ ma‑a kɛn, Pɔɔ n‑na an chen 'na fifii a gbɔngbɔn fan an chenɛ a, ma koe a dasi a, an duu chɛ ɔ mɔɛ n ko a. Mbɛ an bɔ‑a nɔ, an ta‑a Ikoniɔn duu ɔ.
A sin, Chisɔsi fɛ mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ nɔ, buɔdia koa‑a wan an dɔ, Yataa Nyina wɛɛ sin ni wan an fɛ gban.

Koe min si‑a Pɔɔ a, an fea Banabasi a, Andiɔki duu chɛ ɔ, an si‑a to an na Ikoniɔn duu wɛɛ ɔ. Pɔɔ an fea Banabasi a, an don‑da Chu n 'na samun chɛ chenɛ a. An sin koɔ buɛ ma kawa‑a wan aan, min‑na a ma, mɔ sɛsɛ n‑na an kai fa Chisɔsi a. Chu mɔɛ dɔ nu, an bɛ mɔɛ chɛ n na, miin nii ma Chu mɔ a, an gbɛɛ‑a an kai fa a a.
Chɛɛ Chu mɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ nu, miin nii ma dɔn ni an kai fa koe a Chisɔsi a, an don‑da mɔɛ chɛ n dɔ, miin nii ma Chu mɔ a. A sin, an‑na an na sɛ wan Chisɔsi fɛ mɔɛ chɛ n ma.

Pɔɔ an fea Banabasi a, an ni wan nɔ an duu chɛ ɔ, tima ɔ yansama ko a. An ni bai sa wan faagbɛa a, a si Mansa Chisɔsi ma. Mansa Chisɔsi sin gbu‑a a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ sakana bai chɛ, an mbe min sa, a si a 'a koadia demanɛ ma, tea bai nu mu. Chisɔsi ni a ma wan, sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n ni kamaya ko wa sɛsɛ n ma, an kun ma a a.
Chɛɛ mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ ni an duu chɛ ɔ, an duen fan ni fea a. Dɔ n sɔ‑a wan Chu mɔɛ chɛ n kɔ, mbɛ dɔ n sin sɔ‑a Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n kɔ.
Mbɛ mɔɛ dɔ nu, miin nii ma ka Chu mɔ a, an bɛ Chu mɔɛ dɔ n na, an‑na a siman fan, maumaya koe sɛ koe a an ma, an ni an ma bon bon senɛ a, aan an ni fa.
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔ fea chɛ nu, an‑na an 'na yiinachii chɛ kɔɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ an bui‑a, an ta‑a Dikawonia chɛnyɛ ɔ. An ta‑a wan nɔ duu fea ɔ, Diisa an fea Dabi a, a basan nɔ tanda n na,
mbɛ an‑na sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian nɔ gbɛɛ.
Kamin dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ si ɔ, Diisa duu chɛ ɔ, min nii che sɔ‑a a chen fea gbɛɛ a. A namaaenɛ ni, a ka a suun tima ma. Tee dɔndɔ wɛɛ, a nii ma tachɛ chɛ ni.
An kamin chɛ too ma sɔen fan ni, Pɔɔ ni kɛn koɔ‑a. A sin, Pɔɔ‑a a ya sɔ wan a a. Mbɛ a‑a a ɔ yen, mbɛ an kamin chɛ, danaya ɛ wan a ɔ, min mbe che a ma‑a, a ni baun,
mbɛ Pɔɔ kuiɛ ma sɛenɛ ɔ, a ɔ, “I kɔɔ sɔ, i ni sɔ den i chenɛ a.” Mbɛ kamin chɛ tin‑da kosa, a bun‑da tachɛ chɛ‑a.
Mbɛ fanka fanka chɛ‑a a ɔ yen kɛn, Pɔɔ na‑a koe min ma, an bun‑da koɔ‑a an 'na Dikawonia chɛnyɛ koɛ chɛ ɔ. An dɔ te, “Mmɔ ɛ yataa miin fai ka, an fan mun‑da mɔ gbu n na, mbɛ an yii‑a mmɔ tɛ ɔ.”
Mbɛ an‑na Banabasi chee, an dɔ, yataa min tɔ ni Suusi, mbɛ an‑na Pɔɔ sin chee, an dɔ, yataa min tɔ ni Amesi, koe min na mu, an ni koɔ pɛpɛ.

Chen dɔndɔ ni wan sɔ ɔ an duu sundu kunɛ a, yataa Suusi chɛ fai koe a. Mɔɛ min ni mɔɛ n tɛ ɔ yataa Suusi a, a na‑a ninchi kai n na, a basan kɔn fu chii a, yataa Suusi 'a chenɛ kata da a. Koe min na mu, a wan an bɛ mɔɛ chɛ n na, an toen ni an ni yasi bɔ Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n tena.

Chɛɛ Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ nu, Banabasi an fea Pɔɔ a, an nii ma to ni, an ni chɛ a min. An‑na a ma, an‑na an ma koa a panda wan, mbɛ an‑na bui don a ɔ mɔ fanka chɛ n tɛ ɔ. Pɔɔ an fea Banabasi a, an ni wan yee te‑a, an dɔ,

“N bɔ nu, wo toen mu wo ni ko bonda chɛ ma, fen ko a? Nn bɛɛ, mɔ gbu mu nn na, yɔ wo e ka buɛ min dɔ. Nn mbe nɛ, sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian koe a wo a, wo ni wo boo bɔ tataya ko bonda chɛ n dɔ. Wo ni wo ya a mun Yataa ma, min mbe ee fa kuɔ fɔ ko a. A wan‑na banda a dan, an fea duu gboo a, kɔ yii wɛɛ, a basan fen kɔ fen na, miin be an dɔ.
Suun tima a, a nii mɔ ɔ mɔ a gban, ta koe a a ta chia a.

Chɛɛ tima ɔ tima ko a, ɛ a ɔ yian tena wan gbɛ wo a, mbɛ ɛ wan wo tɛ ɔ. Koe min na mu, ɛ wan wai chɛndɛ chɛ‑a wo tɛ ɔ, tee ɔ tee a. Ɛ a ma tena wan, sona ɛ chɛ a ka banda a, mbɛ wo 'a chin fenɛ n nyan‑da a tima ma. Ɛ daun fenɛ be wan wo ma, mbɛ a‑a wo faa bu ɔ dia, a ɔ bendenɛ a.”
An koɔ‑a wɛɛ ka boo ɔ boo, an tena, an kun‑da wan kayiin, a ma koe a, mɔɛ chɛ n ni sɛmbɛ yasi chɛ bɔ koe a.

Chɛɛ Chu dɔ n ka‑a wan Andiɔki duu ɔ, Pisidia chɛnyɛ ɔ, dɔ n bɛɛ ka‑a Ikoniɔn duu ɔ. An‑na a ma wan, mɔ fanka chɛ n yiima mun‑da, an‑na Pɔɔ ma bon bon fan, mbɛ an‑na a konkon, a bɔ duu ɔ. A ni an yii ma, mbɛ a fa‑a.
Chɛɛ Chisɔsi fɛ mɔɛ chɛ n na kan‑da kɛn a a tindanɛ, a‑a a kɔɔ sɔ wan, mbɛ a yɛ‑a duu chɛ gbu ɔ to. Tee dɔndɔɛ ma, an fea Banabasi a, an ta‑a wan Dabi duu ɔ.
Sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ, a si Chisɔsi ma, an‑na a sa wan an duu wa chɛ ɔ. An sin‑na a ma wan, mɔ sɛsɛ bea‑a Chisɔsi fɛ. Mbɛ an yɛ‑a Diisa duu ɔ, an ta‑a Ikoniɔn, aan a che Andiɔki, Pisidia chɛnyɛ ɔ.

Mbɛ an‑na a ma, mɔɛ chɛ n 'na danaya ɔ gbɛa‑a, miin ni ka Chisɔsi fɛ mɔɛ n na. An mbe ta‑a an faa n ma nande‑a, an ni to tun an kai fa‑a Chisɔsi a. Mbɛ an‑na an kan, an dɔ te, “Mɔ ɔ mɔ ɛ mɔnɛ sɛsɛ ɔ bia pɛn, a e na to don‑da Yataa 'a mansaya chɛ kɔɔ.”
Mbɛ an‑na gbakoo n yian, an 'na chɔchi n gbɛɛ ɔ. Mbɛ an 'na sunɛ bia, an mbe ta‑a samunɛ chɛ‑a, mbɛ an‑na an konan Mansa Chisɔsi ma, an kai faen ni min na.
Mbɛ an ben‑da Pisidia chɛnyɛ ɔ, an ta‑a Panfidia chɛnyɛ ɔ chia a.
An ban‑da kɛn sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian‑da mɔɛ n na Paaka duu ɔ, a si Chisɔsi ma, mbɛ an yii‑a Atadia duu ɔ.
An ka‑a Atadia chɛ wan, mbɛ an si‑a dɛndɛ ɔ, a yɛ to Andiɔki duu ɔ. An duu chɛ ɔ ni, Chisɔsi fɛ mɔɛ na‑a an konan Yataa ma, koadia demanɛ ɔ, an 'na wai ko a, an‑na min na ban ka gbɛ.

An sin, an che‑a kɛn Andiɔki duu ɔ, an‑na chɔchi mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ a kan fan kaina dɔndɔ, mbɛ an si‑a ko ɔ ko ma, an‑na a ɔ yian, Yataa‑a miin chɛ an ye. A yɛ to, Yataa‑a chia sa buɛ min dɔ mɔɛ chɛ n ko a, miin ma Chu mɔ a, an kai fa koe a Chisɔsi a.
Mbɛ an sin‑na tima ɔ yansama ya wan nɔ, an duu chɛ ɔ, an bɛ Chisɔsi fɛ mɔɛ n na.

Chɛɛ mɔɛ dɔ n ka‑a wan Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ, an na‑a Andiɔki duu chɛ ɔ. Mbɛ suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ nu Chasi ɔ, mɔɛ chɛ n‑na a kuu sɔ an kan‑da nɔ, an dɔ, “Yataa ee che wo baun‑da, mɔɔ ni an‑na wo a kamincha, yɔ Mosisi‑a mmɔ kan buɛ min dɔ.”

Chɛ‑a a ma wan, koɛ basan kɔɔsa yama yama a, a don‑da mɔɛ chɛ n tɛ ɔ, an bɛ Pɔɔ an fea Banabasi a. Mbɛ Pɔɔ an fea Banabasi a, an bɛ mɔɛ dɔ n na, an‑na an yian fan, sɛ koe a Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. An dɔ, an ni Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n yen, an bɛ chɔchi gbakoo n na, a si an bai chɛ ma.

Mbɛ chɔchi mɔɛ chɛ n‑na an ma saa kɛn, an ben‑da wan Fonisia chɛnyɛ ɔ, an fea Samayia chɛnyɛ a. An ni a ɔ yian fan mɔɛ n na, mbɛ mɔɛ miin ma ka Chu mɔ a, an‑na an kai fa buɛ min dɔ Chisɔsi a. An sin ma‑a wan buɔdia wa a, suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ tena, Chasi ɔ.

An che‑a kɛn gbɛ Chuusaɛn, chɔchi mɔɛ n‑na an boo si wan an kɔɔ, an bɛ Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ n na nɔ, ni gbakoo n gbɛɛ. A sin, Pɔɔ an fea Banabasi a, an si‑a wan ko ɔ ko ma, Yataa‑a min chɛ an ye, an‑na a ɔ yian.

Chɛɛ mɔɛ miin kai faen ni ka Chisɔsi a, Chu mɔɛ dɔ n ni wan an tɛ ɔ, miin ni dɔbɛn chɛ ɔ, an ni min chee, an dɔ, Fayisii dɔbɛnɛ. An‑na an kɔɔ sɔ wan, mbɛ an dɔ, “A nyin fan mmɔ ni an na kamincha. A sin to, mmɔ ni a din an ma, an ni a sɔ sawa chɛ n gbɛɛ fɛ, Yataa‑a miin be Mosisi ma.”
Mbɛ Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ nu, an bɛ gbakoo n na, an bɛnden fan ni kaina dɔndɔɛ, an yii na chii koe a, bai chɛ ma.

An‑na a tɛnsɛ kɛn pien, an nyɔn tɛ ɔ, mbɛ Pita‑a a kɔɔ sɔ. A ɔ, “N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, Yataa‑a koe min ma. Mbɛ tima ɛnden ko a gbɛ, Yataa na‑a a boo sɔ wan n ma wo tɛ ɔ, n ni sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ, a si Chisɔsi ma, a ɔ yian mɔɛ chɛ n na, miin ma Chu mɔ a. An ni an bai chɛ a min, mbɛ an‑na an kai fa Chisɔsi a.
A sin, Yataa min‑na mɔ ɔ mɔ faa ɔ koe sɔn, a dɔn‑da wan an ma koe a ka. A‑a a ma wan, Yataa Nyina bea‑a an bɛɛ fɛ, yɔ a‑a a ma buɛ min dɔ mmɔ ko a.
A sin ma tɛ bɔ kan kɔ kan yian ni mmɔ tɛ, mmɔ bɛ an na. Chɛɛ a‑a a ma wan, an faa ɔ gbɛ‑a, koe min na mu, an‑na an kai fa Chisɔsi a.
Chɛ an fɛ mu gbɛ, wo ma suun feanka si mɔɛ chɛ n kun ma, feanka min mu mmɔ bɛ mmɔ bemba n ta bemba n na, mmɔ ee che min kɔɔ. Wo e ma‑a ka Yataa an dɔ siman‑da, ni wo‑a chɛ ma.
Chɛɛ mmɔ danden fan mu a a, mbɛ mmɔ ɛ bauncha ma sɔn‑da wan, koadia demanɛ 'a gbasaya ɔ, Mansa Chisɔsi ɛ min chɛ, yɔ an bɛɛ an mbe a ma sɔn‑da buɛ min dɔ.”

Pita ban‑da kɛn koɔ‑a, mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ a kanden ni ka, an‑na a ɔ maun fan don. Mbɛ an‑na an too ma sɔ Banabasi ma, an fea Pɔɔ a. An‑na a ɔ yian fan gbɛɛ, Yataa na‑a a ma, an‑na kamaya ko wa miin ma, mɔɛ chɛ n tɛ ɔ, miin nii ma Chu mɔ a.
An ban‑da kɛn koɔ‑a, Chimisi wɛɛ koɔ‑a wan, a ɔ te, “N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo wo too ma sɔ n ma.
Saimɔn Pita ban‑da a ɔ yian‑da mmɔ a, Yataa na‑a a 'a koadia ɔ yian buɛ min dɔ, tima saa saa ko a, mɔɛ chɛ n na, miin nii ma Chu mɔ a. A na‑a a boo sɔ wan an dɔ n ma, ma koe a a ta mɔɛ n na.
An koe chɛ sin, an fea bai chɛ a, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n na‑a min fɔ, bai dɔndɔɛ mu an na. Ɛ ka wan dechee yɔ Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, a ɔ,
‘Mansa Yataa ɔ te, a ɔ, “Chɛ gbakɔ, n mbe yɛ‑a wan to, mbɛ n‑na chen chɛ sɔ to, Mansa Defidi 'a chen chɛ min bea‑a tee. N mbe chen gbaa chɛ a yɛ‑a wan to mbɛ n‑na a sɔ to.
A tima chɛ a mu, mɔɛ tɔɛ nu, an mbe an ya a mun‑da n ma, an bɛ mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ a, miin ma Chu mɔ a, n‑na n boo sɔ miin ma, ma koe a n ta mɔɛ n na. N fan, Mansa Yataa, n fan‑na chɛ fɔ.
N sin‑na koe chɛ n kɔɔ fɔ wan, kɛn suun tima a.” ’
“Chɛ an fɛ mu, n ta yiima ɔ, n ma to ni mmɔ ni mɔɛ chɛ n tɔɔ, miin ma Chu mɔ a, miin mbe an ya a mun tena Yataa tena.

Chɛɛ mmɔ ɛ min ma, mmɔ gboo nyɛn an tena. Mmɔ ni a fɔ an ye, mbɛ an ma daun fɛnɛ daun, mɔɛ n‑na min bɔ yasi a, fen chɛ n tena, miin ma Yataa a. A yɛ to, an ma koe tɛ, an sin ma soe kan kɔ kan daun, min kanɛ a ma tɛ ni, an gbu ma wii daun.

Koe min na mu, Yataa‑a sawa miin be Mosisi ma, a kanden fan mu gbɛ san chɛmɛ sɛsɛ ko a, Chu 'na samun chɛ chenɛ a, suin tee kan kɔ kan ma. A sin, Mosisi da a bai chɛ nu, an dɔ yianden fan mu gbɛ duu wa kan kɔ kan dɔ.”

Mbɛ Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ nu, ni gbakoo nu, an bɛ chɔchi mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ a, an‑na dɔbɛnɛ chɛ. An boo sɔ koe ma mɔɛ dɔ n ma an tɛ ɔ, an bɛ ni ta Pɔɔ an fea Banabasi a, Andiɔki duu ɔ. An‑na an boo sɔ wan mɔ fea n ma, basɔmaya ni miin ma mɔɛ chɛ n boo ɔ, miin‑na an kai fa ka Chisɔsi a. An mɔ fea chɛ n ni Chudasi an na, min tɔ ni to Basabasi, an fea Sidasi a.

An‑na gboo nyɛnden chɛ an be an ma. An‑na a nyɛn fan a ɔ, an dɔ te: Nn fan, Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ nu, nn bɛ gbakoo n na, nn fɛn mu wo suun ma nyɔɛ n na Chasi ɔ, nn fan mbe ka gboo chɛ nyɛn tena. Nn mbe a nyɛn tena wo wan tena. Wo wan, wo wɛn ma Chu mɔ a, wo wɛn‑na wo kai fa Chisɔsi a. A yɛ to, wo wɛn mbe sanche Andiɔki duu ɔ, ni wo wɛn mbe Siyia chɛnyɛ tɔɛ ɔ, wo bɛ chɛ n na, miin mbe Sidisia chɛnyɛ ɔ. Nn‑na wo kɔndɔn.
Nn‑na a a min, mbɛ mɔɛ n dɔ n bɔ‑a wan nn tɛ ɔ, an ta‑a wo tena, an‑na wo kɔndɔ fii an 'na kanɛ a, an mbe min chɛ tena. An gbu sin mbe ka min ma‑a, nn fan ma an sɔ ni.
Nn gbɛɛ nn‑na chɛ an dɔ yen, nn dɔn‑da, mbɛ a nyin fan, nn boo sɔ koe a mɔɛ dɔ n ma, nn ni an sɔ wo tena. An bɛ an mbe na tena nn dia nyɔɛ Banabasi an fea Pɔɔ a.
Mɔ fea an fan nɛ, miin‑na an fɔɛ be, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi 'a wai ko a.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, nn‑na Chudasi wɛɛ sɔ wan, an fea Sidasi a, wo tena. An ni bai dɔndɔ gbe chɛ bɔ an da a, an ni a ɔ yian wo a, yɔ nn‑na a nyɛn buɛ min dɔ gboo chɛ ɔ.

Koe min na mu, nn‑na a ɔ yen fan, mbɛ a nyin fan nn tena, ni Yataa Nyina gbu wɛɛ tena, mbɛ yakɔɔtawa dɔ mende kan kɔ kan ma si to wo kun ma. Chɛɛ wo ni bea dechee sawa chɛ n fan fɛ, miin nyin wo ko a, yɔ chɛ nu.

Wo ma daun fenɛ daun, mɔɛ n‑na min bɔ yasi a, fen chɛ n tena, miin ma Yataa a. Wo ma soe kan kɔ kan daun, min kanɛ a ma tɛ ni, wo gbu sin ma wii daun. A yɛ to, wo ma koe tɛ. Ni wo ma wo boo chɛ ni to chɛ n dɔ, a nyin fan wo ko a. Wo mmɔ a gbɛ.
Mbɛ an‑na an boo ka kɛn ta koe a, an ta‑a wan Andiɔki duu ɔ. An sin‑na chɔchi mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ a kan kɛn kaina dɔndɔ, mbɛ an‑na gboo chɛ be an ma.
A sin, an‑na a kan kɛn, faamanande bai miin ni ka ɔ, a ma‑a wan an ma buɔdia wa a.
Chudasi, an fea Sidasi a, miin bɛɛ ni Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n na, an bɛɛ‑a faamanande bai sɛsɛ sa wan an tena. Chɛ‑a an dɔ gbɛa wan, an kai fa koe a Chisɔsi a.
Suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ nu Chasi ɔ, an‑na tima ɛnden ya wan nɔ, mbɛ an‑na an du faachima ɔ, an bɛ an suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ n na Chasi ɔ, Andiɔki duu ɔ. Mbɛ an yɛ‑a suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ n tena, miin na‑a an sɔ.
Chɛɛ Pɔɔ an fea Banabasi a, an to‑a wan Andiɔki, mɔɛ n kan koe a, a basan bai ɔ yianɛ a, a si Mansa Chisɔsi ma. An bɛ ni wai chɛ ma, an bɛ mɔ sɛsɛ n fan na.

Tima ɛnden gbakɔ, mbɛ Pɔɔ‑a a fɔ Banabasi ye, a ɔ, “Na, mɔ ni ta ben ben mɔɛ n kun ma, duu chɛ n gbɛɛ ɔ, mɔ na‑a sakana bai chɛ sa miin tena, a si Mansa Chisɔsi ma. Mɔ ni a ɔ yen, ni an mbe buɛ min dɔ.”
Banabasi toen ni, an ni ta Chɔn na an fɛ, min tɔ ni to Maki,
chɛɛ Pɔɔ ta yiima ɔ, a nii ma nyin, ta koe a Maki chɛ a. Koe min na mu, a na‑a ka wan an fɛ Panfidia chɛnyɛ ɔ, mbɛ a yɛ‑a. A nii ma to ni an fɛ, an ni an 'na wai a ban.
Chɛ na‑a koɛ a an tɛ ɔ, min‑na a ma, an tɛ du‑a. Banabasi‑a Maki ya wan, an si‑a dɛndɛ ɔ, mbɛ an ta‑a Saipɔsi, yii tinɛ ɔ.
Chɛɛ Pɔɔ‑a Sidasi an ya, mbɛ an suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, an‑na an konan Mansa Yataa ma. An dɔ, Mansa Chisɔsi 'a koadia demanɛ ni an kun ma fɛn.
A sin ben‑da wan Siyia, an fea Sidisia chɛnyɛ ɔ a, ɛ ta‑a a ma‑a mɔɛ chɛ n dɔ ɛ gbɛa‑a chɔchi n dɔ, an 'na kaifaya ɔ.

Pɔɔ an fea Sidasi a, an ta‑a pɛn Dabi duu ɔ, mbɛ an ben‑da Diisa duu ɔ chia a. An‑na Chisɔsi fɛ mɔ dɔndɔ tan fan nɔ, min tɔ ni Timoti. A de ni Chu mɔɛ an na, min na‑a a kai fa Chisɔsi a. Chɛɛ a fa ni Kiisi mɔɛ an na.
Suun ma nyɔɛ n gbɛɛ Chasi ɔ, miin ni Diisa duu ɔ, an fea Ikoniɔn na, an‑na bai chɛndɛ sa wan, a si Timoti ma.
Pɔɔ toen ni Timoti ni bea a fɛ, min‑na a ma, a‑a a a kamincha. A‑a chɛ ma koe min na, Chu mɔɛ n gbɛɛ an tanda chɛ n dɔ, an‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ Timoti fa ni Kiisi mɔɛ an na.

An ni ben ben tena kɛn duu wa chɛ n dɔ, an ni koe chɛ n dɔ yian fan mɔɛ chɛ n na, miin na‑a an kai fa Chisɔsi a, an ni an ma mɛn. Koe chɛ nu, an fan, Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ nu, an bɛ gbakoo n na, an kuiɛ na‑a bɛn miin ma Chuusaɛn duu ɔ.
Mbɛ chɔchi mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ ɔ gbɛa‑a gbau, an 'na kaifaya ɔ Chisɔsi a, a sin, an ma ni mun‑da wan tee ɔ tee a.
An ta‑a wan aan Fichiya chɛnyɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, a basan Kadesia chɛnyɛ ɔ a. Koe min na mu, Yataa Nyina nii ma dɔn ni, an ni Yataa bai sa Esia chɛnyɛ ɔ.
An che‑a kɛn Misia chɛnyɛ bandoe ma, an‑na butuin chɛ wan, ta koe a Bitinia chɛnyɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ Chisɔsi Nyina nii ma dɔn ni, an ni ta nɔ.
Mbɛ an bɛɛ‑a Misia chɛnyɛ ɔ tandin fan, an yii‑a Towasi duu ɔ.
A yɛɛ chɛ ma, Yataa‑a koe ɔ yian fan Pɔɔ a, yɔ a ni cho an dɔ. A‑a mɔ kaima yen fan, min ka‑a Masidonia chɛnyɛ ɔ, a ɛ sɔ ɔ a disa‑a, a ɔ, “Na nɛ nn tena Masidonia, i ni nn deman.”

Pɔɔ ban‑da kɛn dechee an koe chɛ ɔ yen‑da, a ya kɔɔɛ a, a wan Pɔɔ ni ma, ni nn fan, nn bun‑da nn ma bɛn‑da, ta koe a Masidonia chɛnyɛ ɔ. Koe min na mu, nn‑na nn yii na chii wan, mbɛ Yataa an‑na nn chee ka, ta koe a nɔ. Chɛ ni a ma, nn ni sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian nɔ mɔɛ n na, a si Chisɔsi ma.

Nn si‑a wan dɛndɛ wa dɛgbɛ ɔ, a ka Towasi duu ɔ, mbɛ nn‑na kɔ yii tɛ, a ta Samɔtesi yii tinɛ ɔ. Nn nii ma te ni a ma, nn ta tena. Mbɛ banda ɔ ka‑a kɛn, nn‑na kɔ yii tɛ wan to dɛndɛ ɔ, a ta Niapɔdisi duu ɔ.
Nn ka‑a nɔ wan, mbɛ nn ta‑a Fiipai duu ɔ. An ni duu chenama wa a, a tɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ ma Masidonia chɛnyɛ ɔ. A ni to duu an na, Domi mɔɛ n na‑a min na tɛ. Nn‑na tee sɛsɛ ya wan nɔ.

Suin tee che‑a kɛn, nn bɔ‑a wan an duu wa dɛgbɛ chɛ ɔ, mbɛ nn ta‑a yii a sanɛ. A ni wan nn yii ma, mbɛ Chu mɔɛ chɛ n na sɔndenɛ ɛ ma‑a wan nɔ, samun chɛ koe a. Nn‑na musu chɛ n tan fan nɔ, an na sɔndenɛ ɛ kaina dɔndɔɛ, mbɛ nn koɔ‑a an tena.

Musu dɔndɔ an tɛ ɔ, min‑na a too ma sɔ nn ma, a tɔ ni Didia. A ka‑a Tiyatiya duu ɔ wan. A ni koa baa gbanden ba an ma tachɛ. Musu ni a a, min ni Yataa fai kaka. A ni kɛn a too ma sɔ tena nn ma, Mansa Yataa‑a a ma wan, a‑a a faa be bai chɛ ko a, Pɔɔ ni ka min fɔ‑a.

Chɛ gbakɔ, Pɔɔ‑a yii chɛ wan a kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, a basan a 'a chen 'na mɔɛ n na. Mbɛ Didia‑a a fɔ nn ye, a ɔ, “Ni wo‑a a fɔ, mbɛ n‑na n kai fa Mansa Chisɔsi a tea tea gbu a, mbɛ wo na, wo ni ma n 'na chenɛ a.” A sin‑na nn ma nande wan kaka, min‑na a ma, nn ta‑a a waa a.

Tee dɔndɔ a, nn ni ta tena kɛn kaina chɛ, mɔɛ n ni ta samun chɛ koe a Yataa tena kaina, yɔnɛ den musuma dɔndɔ‑a nn tan fan. Nyina yama an ni a fɛ, min ni a ma, a ɛ mɔɛ n ma koe kɔɔ fɔ an ye, min mbe na tena an tan‑da. An yɔnɛ chɛ, a ni kɔpɔ sɛsɛ nyan fan a ti n ye, a 'a yawa gbasi chɛ ɔ.
A bea‑a wan nn fɛ, nn bɛ Pɔɔ a, ɛ ta‑a yee tɛ‑a, a ɔ, “Kamin chɛ nu, Mansa Yataa Wa 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ n fan nɛ. An fan mbe a ɔ yian tena wo a, Yataa ɛ wo baun buɛ min dɔ.”

A sin‑na chɛ ma wan tee sɛsɛ ko a, min‑na a ma, Pɔɔ faa tɛ‑a. Mbɛ a‑a a ya a mun an yɔnɛ chɛ ma, a‑a a fɔ nyina yama chɛ ma, a ɔ, “Chisɔsi Chasi tɔɛ ɔ, n mbe a fɔ tena i ye, mbɛ i ni ka den musuen chɛ fɛ.” A ya kɔɔɛ a, nyina yama chɛ ka‑a wan den den chɛ fɛ.
Chɛɛ yɔnɛ chɛ ti n‑na a ɔ yen kɛn, mbɛ an 'na kɔpɔ sɔn chia den den chɛ a, a ban‑da, an dɛ‑a wan Pɔɔ ma, an fea Sidasi a. Mbɛ an‑na an konkon, a ta mansa n tena, kuti tongbo kɔɔ.
An na‑a an na, mansa chɛ n chen kɔɔ, an‑na a fɔ an ye, an dɔ, “Kamin fea chɛ nu, Chu mɔɛ n fan nɛ. An toen mu, an ni na gbunɛ a, duu wa chɛ ɔ.
An mbe mmɔ 'a mɔɛ n kan tena manda n fan na, mmɔ ta sawa n ma min fɔ ni. Domi mɔɛ mu mmɔ a, mmɔ ee mmɔ boo si an kɔɔ, mmɔ sin mbe ee an na tachɛ.”
Mbɛ fanka fanka chɛ n bɛɛ‑a an kaa sa Pɔɔ ma koe a, an fea Sidasi a. Mbɛ mansa chɛ n‑na Pɔɔ n 'na doma a panda panda, an fea Sidasi a. Mbɛ an‑na a ma, an‑na an gbasi kɔnɛ a.
An‑na an faa ma gbasi chɛ kɛn an na, an‑na a ma wan an na dɛ‑a pimbi chenɛ a. Mbɛ an‑na a fɔ, pimbi chenɛ kun ma fɛn mɔɛ ye, an dɔ, a ni a da a tɔn gban.
Da a kuiɛ chɛ saen chɛ a an kun ma, pimbi chen kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ, a‑a an na dɛ wan pimbi chenɛ tɛ tɛ ma dumu ɔ, mbɛ a‑a an chenɛ n don kɔnɛ a.
Chɛɛ su tɛ tɛ ma an to‑a, Pɔɔ an fea Sidasi a, an ni wan samun chɛ‑a, an mbe ta‑a si sa‑a Yataa tena. Pimbi chen na sa mɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ nu, an too ma sɔenɛ ɛ an ma.

Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, duu gboo samba‑a wan, a chenama wa a. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, pimbi chenɛ gbu gbɛɛ ɔ ma‑a ma‑a. Mbɛ pimbi chenɛ gbu da nu, an sa‑a a teen na gbasi. Mbɛ yɔɔɛ wɛɛ, miin chɛen ni pimbi chen na sa mɔɛ chɛ n boo ma, ni an chenɛ n bɛɛ ma, an gbɛɛ fuin‑da an ma.

Mbɛ pimbi chen kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ kunɛ‑a, mbɛ a‑a pimbi chenɛ gbu da n na kaenɛ n yen. A‑a chɛ ɔ yen kɛn, a ni wan a yii ma gbɛ, mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ pimbi chen chɛ a, an ben‑da bui‑a. Mbɛ a‑a a 'a chɛɛ chɛ mɛ bɔ a sa a, a toen ni, a ni a wandi fa.
Chɛɛ Pɔɔ‑a yee tɛ wan a ma gbankon, a ɔ, “I ma i wandi fa gbama a, nn gbɛɛ yen ko nɛ.”
Mbɛ a‑a dambo ma chee, a don‑da nɔ. A sin, a ma samba sambaenɛ ɛ, a bea‑a wan Pɔɔ chen na, an fea Sidasi a.
Mbɛ a sɔ‑a an ya ɔ, a bɔ pimbi chen chɛ a. Mbɛ a ɔ, “Fa nu, n mbe fen ma gbɛ, bauncha ma sɔn koe a?”
Mbɛ Pɔɔ an fea Sidasi a, an dɔ te, “I kai fa Mansa Chisɔsi a, mbɛ i‑a bauncha ma sɔn, a basan i 'a chen 'na mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a.”
Mbɛ sakana bai chɛ, a si mansa Chisɔsi ma, an‑na a sa a tena, a basan a 'a chen 'na mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a.

A tima dɔndɔ gbe chɛ kɔɔ yɛɛ chɛ ma, pimbi chen kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ‑a an ya wan, mbɛ a‑a an ma gba tena n na ko fo. A sin, a ya kɔɔɛ a, Pɔɔ an fea Sidasi a, an‑na yii chɛ wan a kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, a basan a 'a chen 'na mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a.
Mbɛ a sɛ‑a Pɔɔ, an fea Sidasi a, a waa chenɛ a, a‑a an da kɔ. Buɔdia wa ni wan a ɔ, a basan a 'a chen 'na mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a. Koe min na mu, an‑na an kai fa gbɛ Yataa a.
Banda ɔ ka‑a kɛn, Domi mansa chɛ n‑na poesi n na ta wan. An dɔ te, “Mɔɛ chɛ n boo ka, an ni ta.”
Mbɛ pimbi chen kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ, a‑a bai chɛ ɔ yian Pɔɔ a, a ɔ, “Mansa n‑na sakana a na, mbɛ wo ni ta, wo fea Sidasi a. Chɛ an fɛ mu gbɛ, wo bɔ gbɛ, wo ni ta wo faa chimaenɛ a.”

Chɛɛ Pɔɔ‑a a fɔ wan an ye, a ɔ, “Nn ma ko kan kɔ kan yɔn ni, chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, an‑na nn gbasi fanka ɔ den. Min gbu sin mu ka Domi mɔɛ tiki tiki mu nn na. Mbɛ an yɛ‑a to, an‑na nn na dɛ pimbi chenɛ a. Mbɛ sanche gbɛ an toen mu, an ni nn na bɔ pimbi chenɛ a, nun dɔ. Chɛ ee ma. Ɛ nyan fan, Domi mansa chɛ n fandi gbu, an ni na nn na bɔ.”
Mbɛ poesi mɔɛ chɛ n yɛ‑a wan, an‑na ko ɔ ko ɔ yian, Domi mansa chɛ n na. Mbɛ Domi mansa chɛ n chian‑da, an‑na bai chɛ a min kɛn, mbɛ Pɔɔ an fea Sidasi a, Domi mɔɛ nu mu.
Chɛ ko a, an ta‑a wan, mbɛ an koɔ‑a Pɔɔ n tena disa ɔ, an fea Sidasi a. Mbɛ an‑na a ma, an bɔ‑a pimbi chen chɛ a, an‑na an ma nande bɔ koe a, an duu chɛ ɔ.

Pɔɔ an fea Sidasi a, an bɔ‑a wan pimbi chen chɛ a, mbɛ an ta‑a wan Didia 'a chenɛ a. A sin, an suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, an‑na an tan fan nɔ. An‑na an yen kɛn, an‑na an faa ma nande wan, mbɛ an bɔ‑a an duu chɛ ɔ, an ta‑a.
Mbɛ Pɔɔ an fea Sidasi a, an ben‑da Anfipɔdisi duu ɔ chia a, an fea Apodonia duu a. Mbɛ an na‑a Tɛsadonika duu ɔ, Chu mɔɛ n 'na samun chɛ chenɛ ni kaina min.
Mbɛ Pɔɔ don‑da nɔ, yɔ a ta manda ni buɛ min dɔ. A sin wichi sawa ko a, an bɛ an na, an ni koe n tɛnsɛ wan, an nyɔn tɛ ɔ, Yataa 'a gboo ɔ.

A ni a ɔ yian fan chɛndɛ chɛ, an ni a ɔ gbɛ, mbɛ ɛ nyan‑da wan chɛ ni ma. Mbɛ kunka mansa chɛ ɛ tɔɔya ɔ bia‑a wan, a ni a kɔɔ sɔ a ka saya ɔ. Pɔɔ ni a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “Chisɔsi chɛ, n mbe min bakoe ɔ yian tena wo a, an mu kunka mansa a.”
A sin, an dɔ n dan‑da wan a a, min‑na a ma, an bea‑a Pɔɔ fɛ, an fea Sidasi a. Kiisi mɔɛ n sɛsɛ wɛɛ, miin ni kooya be Yataa ma, an bɛɛ‑a a ma ka wan, an bɛ musu gbakoo sɛsɛ a.

Chɛɛ toomaya faa chɛ‑a wan Chu mɔɛ n dɔ, min‑na a ma, an‑na tataya tɔɛ n na sɔn sɔn dani ma ben‑da, gbunɛ a bea koe a. An ben‑da wan duu ɔ yee tɛ‑a, mbɛ an‑na butuinɛ a bea kamin dɔndɔ 'a chenɛ a. Kamin chɛ tɔ ni Chason. A ni wan an yii ma, mbɛ Pɔɔ an fea Sidasi a, an ni an bɔ nɔ, mbɛ an ta‑a an 'na mɔɛ n tena baa ma.

Chɛɛ an ma an yen ni kɛn, an bea‑a gbɛ Chason fan ma, mbɛ an‑na a konkon, a basan Chisianɛ dɔ n na. Mbɛ an na‑a an na duu ɔ gbakoo n tena, an dɔ, “Mɔɛ chɛ n fan‑na dunya gbɛɛ a mun mun ben‑da. Sanche gbɛ, an na‑a nɛ mmɔ 'a duu wɛɛ ɔ,
Chason chɛ sin fan‑na a boo si an kɔɔ. An gbɛɛ sin, an mbe Domi kun ti wa 'a sawa n fan yɔn tena. An mbe a fɔ tena wan, mbɛ mansa dɔ mende ɛ wan nɔ, min benden mu a ma. An dɔ, a tɔ mu Chisɔsi.”
Mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, an bɛ an 'na duu ɔ gbakoo chɛ n na, an faa bɔ‑a wan, bai chɛ a min koe a.
Duu ɔ gbakoo chɛ n‑na Chason na bɔnɔ wan, an bɛ a bɔɛ n na, yɔ an 'na sawa‑a min fɔ, mbɛ an‑na an boo ka, an ta koe a.
Pimbi ɛ bun‑da dechee, mbɛ mɔɛ miin‑na an kai fa Chisɔsi a, an‑na Pɔɔ a ta wan Bɛyia duu ɔ, an fea Sidasi a. An che‑a kɛn nɔ, an ta‑a wan Chu n 'na samun chɛ chenɛ a.

Mɔɛ miin ni Bɛyia, an ta mɔya kɔ ni gbɛ, a ben chɛ n ma, miin ni Tɛsadonika. Koe min na mu, a ma bɛndenɛ ni, an too ma sɔ koe a Yataa 'a bai ma. Pɔɔ ni ma koɔ‑a tee ɔ tee a, an ni Yataa 'a gboo ma mɛn fan, a ɔ sɔn koe a, ni tea mu.
Chɛ ko a, Chu mɔɛ n sɛsɛ‑a an kai fa wan Chisɔsi a. A yɛ to, duu ɔ gbakoo n sɛsɛ, musu an bɛ kai n na, miin ni Kiisi mɔɛ n na, an bɛɛ‑a an kai fa wan a a.
Chɛɛ Chu mɔɛ chɛ nu Tɛsadonika, an‑na a a min kɛn, mbɛ Pɔɔ ɛ Yataa bai sa‑a Bɛyia wɛɛ, an na‑a wan nɔ. Mbɛ an bun‑da mɔ fanka chɛ a sɛ‑a Pɔɔ ma, gbunɛ a bea koe a.
A ya kɔɔɛ a, mɔɛ chɛ nu nɔ, miin‑na an kai fa ka Chisɔsi a, an‑na Pɔɔ a ta kɔ yii da a. Chɛɛ Sidasi an fea Timoti a, an to‑a wan Bɛyia.

Mɔɛ miin ta‑a Pɔɔ ma sɔ‑a, an ta‑a wan a a, aan a che Atɛnsi duu ɔ. Mbɛ Pɔɔ‑a mɔɛ chɛ n na yɛ Bɛyia, sakana chɛ a, an boo ɔ. A ɔ, an ni a fɔ, Timoti an fea Sidasi a, an ni na a san‑da, bui chɛ bui chɛ a.
Tima min na Pɔɔ n ni an ma kɔn tena, na koe a, a faa yɔn‑da wan yama yama. Koe min na mu, a‑a a ɔ yen fan, mbɛ Atɛnsi duu a faen fan ni fania yataa n na.

Chɛ ko a, a ni ma wan Chu n 'na samun chen chɛ a. An bɛ an na, an ni koe n tɛnsɛ wan, an nyɔn tɛ ɔ. Mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ, miin ni kooya be Yataa ma, an ni ma wan nɔ. A yɛ to, Pɔɔ ni ta wan machiti ɔ tee ɔ tee a, mbɛ a‑a koe n tɛnsɛ chɛ n tena, miin ni che ma‑a nɔ.

Kan chɛ mɔɛ dɔ nu to, miin ni kanɛ chɛ a si Ɛpikuyian koe ma, ni dɔ nu, miin ni kanɛ chɛ a si Sitoiki koe ma, an bɛɛ‑a Pɔɔ kɔɔsa bia wan. An dɔ, “Gboo kaa ma chɛ ɛ ka fen fɔ tena?” Mbɛ dɔ n sin‑na a fɔ, an dɔ, “Mɔɛ ɛ a yen, yɔ ɛ ka bai sa tena, a si sonda yataa n fan ma.” An‑na chɛ fɔ koe min na, Pɔɔ ni Yataa bai sa tena, a si Chisɔsi an ma, ni a kɔɔ sɔ koe a, a ka saya ɔ.

Mbɛ an‑na Pɔɔ ɔ tisa, an dɔ, a ni na duu gbakoo chɛ n tena, miin ni bɛn kɔnkɔɛ chɛ bu kɔɔ, an ni min chee, an dɔ, Ayiopakɔsi kɔnkɔɛ. Mbɛ an dɔ te, “Nn toen mu nn ni a ɔ sɔn, ni i 'a kan nama chɛ sien mu fenɛ min ma.
Koe min na mu, nn sɛsɛ ma bai chɛ n na min nin bɛ, e ka miin fɔ tena. Chɛ an fɛ mu, nn toen mu, i ni an fasai nn ye.”

Koe min na mu, Atɛnsi mɔɛ nu, ni sonda n bɛɛ miin ni nɔ, an gbɛɛ nii an 'na tima yɔn koe dɔ mende kan kɔ kan ma. An ni ma dechee bai n fan dɔ yian‑da, an mbe ta‑a an too ma sɔ‑a ko nama ma, tima ɔ tima ko a.
Mbɛ Pɔɔ sɔ‑a duu ɔ gbakoo chɛ n ya kɔɔ, mbɛ a ɔ, “Atɛnsi mɔɛ nu, n‑na a ɔ yen, mbɛ chia ɔ chia a, wo toen mu kaka yataa sɛsɛ fai koe a.

Koe min na mu, n mbe ma ben ben‑da wo 'a duu chɛ ɔ, n mbe fenɛ n yen fan, wo e miin fai. A yɛ to, n‑na gbengbe yen fan, yasi bɔ koe a, a nyɛndenɛ ɛ min ma, a ɔ, ‘Yataa tena, nn ma min sɔn.’ An Yataa chɛ, wo e min fai ka, chɛɛ wo sin ma a sɔn, n mbe ka gbɛ an bakoe ɔ yian tena wo a.
Yataa, min‑na dunya a dan, a basan fen kɔ fen na, miin mbe a ɔ, an mu Mansa Yataa a dunya chɛ ɔ ni banda a. A sin mbe ee ma chenɛ a, mɔ gbu ɛ min sɔ a boo a.
A sin, mɔ gbu boo ee ko chɛ a ko a, ni a toen mu ko kan kɔ kan na. A wan Yataa, an mbe fɔɛ be mɔɛ gbɛɛ ma, an mbe fia chɛ mɔɛ ɔ, a wan mbe fen kɔ fen be mɔɛ ma.

A‑a mɔ gbu gbɛɛ nyan dunya chɛ ɔ, a bɔ mɔ kaima dɔndɔ gbe an dɔ. Mbɛ a‑a an na fasan dunya chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ ben‑da. A wandi gbu sin fan‑na a ɔ bɛn, mbɛ mɔ gbu n ni ma dunya gbɛɛ ɔ. Mɔɛ n sin mbe kaina min chee an 'na chɛnyɛ n na, a wan‑na a ɔ bɛn to an ma koe a nɔ, an tima chɛ kɔɔ.
A‑a chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, an ni an ya a kan a a. Kɔkɔɛ an mbe a yen‑da wan, ni an‑na an boo mɛmɛ mɛmɛ. Chɛɛ Yataa gbu tena ɔ ma yansan, mmɔ dɔndɔ wɛɛ a.

A ɛ wan dechee, yɔ mɔ dɔndɔ na‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, a ɔ, ‘A 'a gbasaya ɔ mu mmɔ ɛ ben ben, a yɛ to, mmɔ ɛ ma fɔɛ chɛ ɔ.’ A ɛ wan, yɔ wo 'a gboo nyɛn mɔ wa dɔ n‑na a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, an dɔ te, ‘Mbɛ tea gbu ko a, a 'a denɛ n mu mmɔ gbɛɛ a.’

Mmɔ mu gbɛ buɛ min dɔ Yataa 'a denɛ n na, mmɔ ma mmɔ yii na chii a bɔ nyɔɛ dɔ mende wa koe a. Mbɛ a bɔen mu fenɛ an na, min nyanden mu sanu ɔ, chɛ ma, kain gbɛ ɔ, chɛ ma, senɛ ɔ. Mɔ gbu wandi 'a yiinachii, a‑a miin nyan.
Tima min na ni wo nii ma a ɔ sɔn, wo ni koe miin ma tena, Yataa‑a a ya ka a nɛnɛ a. Chɛɛ sanche gbɛ, ɛ a fɔ tena mɔ ɔ mɔ ye, dunya gbɛɛ ɔ, mbɛ an ni an kan kɔ sɔ an 'na ko yama n na.

Koe min na mu, a‑a tee yian, ɛ tea gbɛmbo chɛ‑a mɔ gbu gbɛɛ a, dunya ɔ tee min ma. Ɛ a ma‑a wan, a na‑a a boo sɔ mɔɛ min ma, a ni mɔɛ n gbɛmbo. A sin‑na yiinatɛ be wan mmɔ ma, a‑a a ma kɛn, kamin chɛ‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, a ka saya ɔ.”
An‑na a a min kɛn gbɛ, Pɔɔ‑a bai sa, a si mɔ gbu kɔɔ sɔ koe ma, a ka saya ɔ, dɔ n‑na a ma yɛn fan. Chɛɛ dɔ n sin, an dɔ, “Nn mbe to‑a wan to, nn ni bai a min, a si koe chɛ ma.”
Mbɛ Pɔɔ bɔ‑a an bɛn chɛ ɔ.

Mɔɛ dɔ n sa‑a wan a kaa a, mbɛ an‑na an kai fa Chisɔsi a. An mɔɛ chɛ n tɛ ɔ, mɔɛ ni wan nɔ min tɔ ni Diɔnisiɔsi, a sin ni gbakoo dɔndɔ an na bɛn chɛ ɔ. Musu dɔndɔ wɛɛ‑a a kai fa wan Chisɔsi a, min tɔ ni Damayisi, ni mɔ dɔ mende nu.
Chɛ gbakɔ, Pɔɔ bɔ‑a wan Atɛnsi duu ɔ, mbɛ a ta‑a Kɔyindi duu ɔ.

Kɔyindi ni, a‑a Chu mɔ dɔndɔ tan, min tɔ ni Akuida, a sin suun‑da Pɔndɔsi chɛnyɛ ɔ wan. A na nama ni ka, a ka Itadi chɛnyɛ ɔ, an fea a 'a musu Pisida a. Koe min na mu, Domi kun ti wa chɛ, min tɔ ni Kaudiyɔsi, a na‑a sawa a ben fan, mbɛ Chu mɔɛ n gbɛɛ ni bɔ Domi duu ɔ. Pɔɔ ta‑a wan an yen koe a,
mbɛ an bɛ ni wan an na. Koe min na mu, an bɛ ni wai dɔndɔ gbe an chɛ. Pɔɔ ni a 'a daun fenɛ ma sɔn tɛndi nyan wai an dɔ, yɔ Akuida wɛɛ, an fea a 'a musu a.
Suin tee kan kɔ kan ma, a ni koe tɛnsɛ wan mɔɛ chɛ n tena, Chu n 'na samun chɛ chen chɛ a. A sin, a ni butuin chɛ tena wan, Chu mɔɛ nu, an bɛ Kiisi mɔɛ n na, an yiima ni mun Chisɔsi tena.
Sidasi an fea Timoti a, an na‑a kɛn a ka Masidonia chɛnyɛ ɔ, Pɔɔ‑a a 'a tima gbɛɛ be Yataa bai sa koe an na. A ni wan a fɔ tena Chu mɔɛ n ye, Chisɔsi an mu kunka mansa a.

An‑na a kɔɔsa bia wan, mbɛ an‑na bai yama gbɛɛ sa a ma. An‑na chɛ ma kɛn, Pɔɔ‑a a 'a doma ɔ gbɔngbɔn fan, ma koe a dasi a an tena. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Ni wo ma bauncha ma sɔn ni, wo ee wo tɛɛ si‑a to n ma. Wo e wo tɛɛ si‑a gbɛ wo wandi an ma. A ka gbɛ sanche ma, n mbe Yataa bai sa‑a gbɛ chɛ n fan tena, miin ma Chu mɔ a.”
Mbɛ a bɔ‑a an tɛ ɔ, a ta‑a kamin dɔndɔ 'a chenɛ a, min nii ma Chu mɔ a. A tɔ ni Titiyɔsi Chɔsitɔsi, min ni Yataa fai mɔɛ a. A 'a chenɛ ni Chu n 'na samun chɛ chen chɛ baima wan.

Chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, Kisipɔsi, ni a 'a chen 'na mɔɛ n gbɛɛ, an‑na an kai fa wan gbɛ Mansa Chisɔsi a. Kisipɔsi chɛ ni ya ɔ sɔɛ an na, Chu n 'na samun chɛ chenɛ a. Mɔ sɛsɛ nu Kɔyindi duu ɔ, an‑na sakana bai chɛ a min kɛn Pɔɔ a, an dan‑da wan a a, mbɛ yii chɛ‑a an kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a.

Yɛɛ dɔndɔ ma, Mansa Yataa‑a koe ɔ yian fan Pɔɔ a, yɔ a ni cho an dɔ. Yataa‑a a fɔ wan Pɔɔ ye, a ɔ, “Pɔɔ, i ma chian, koe min na mu, n mbe i fɛ. Mɔ ɔ mɔ ee che ko yama ma‑a i a. E Yataa bai sa min na, a a tun, i ma sɛmbɛ. Koe min na mu, mɔ sɛsɛ n mbe wan nɛ duu chɛ ɔ, miin mu n 'na mɔɛ n na.”
Chɛ ko a, Pɔɔ ni wan Kɔyindi duu ɔ, san dɔndɔ ni a tɔ, ɛ nɔ mɔɛ n kan‑da Yataa 'a bai n na.
Chɛɛ an‑na Kadio ma tima min na kɔfana a, Akaya chɛnyɛ kun ma, Chu n‑na kuiɛ a kanɛ chɛ Pɔɔ ma, mbɛ an‑na a bia, an na‑a a a kɔfana chɛ 'a kuti ɔ.
Mbɛ an dɔ, “Kamin chɛ toen mu, a ni a ma mmɔ 'a mɔɛ n yiima ni mun, Yataa fai gbee dɔ mende ma, mmɔ 'a sawa ma dɔn ni min ma.”
Chɛɛ Pɔɔ toen ni kɛn a ni koɔ, Kadio‑a a fɔ wan Chu chɛ n ye, a ɔ, “Wo wan Chu nu, a ni nyan‑da wan, n ni n too ma sɔ wo ma. Ni kamin chɛ na‑a sawa an yɔn, chɛ ma, a ni ko yama wa ma.
Chɛɛ a sien mu ka buɛ min dɔ kɔɔsa bia ma, bai n dɔ, a basan tɔɛ n na, ni wo ta Chu sawa nu, wo wandi an mbe bai chɛ nɛnɛ sa tena. N fan mbe ee kaa a tɛ tena, a si ko bonda chɛ n ma.”
Mbɛ a‑a an gbain, an kuti gbu ɔ.
Mbɛ an gbɛɛ bea‑a Sositɛnesi ma gbasi a, min ni ya ɔ sɔɛ a, Chu n 'na samun chɛ chenɛ kun ma. An‑na a gbasi wan, kuti chenɛ gbu ya kɔɔ. Chɛɛ Kadio‑a a ka wan a too kɔ.

Koe chɛ maenɛ gbakɔ, Pɔɔ ni wan Kɔyindi tee kuun ko a. Mbɛ a‑a a saa suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ n na nɔ Chasi ɔ, a si‑a dɛndɛ ɔ, an bɛ Pisida an fea a chɛɛ Akuida a, ta koe a Siyia chɛnyɛ ɔ. An mbe e na to si‑a dɛndɛ ɔ, a ka Sɛnkea duu ɔ, an‑na a kunɛ gbanan fan. Koe min na mu, a na‑a a kai wan tee a kɔma a, Yataa tena.
An che‑a kɛn Ɛfisɔsi duu ɔ, Pɔɔ n tɛ du‑a wan Pisida, an fea a chɛɛ Akuida a. A ta‑a wan Chu n 'na samun chɛ chen chɛ a, koe n tɛnsɛ koe a, an bɛ Chu mɔɛ chɛ n na nɔ Ɛfisɔsi.
An‑na a ɔ tisa kɛn, a ma koe a nɔ tima ɔ yansama ko a, a nii ma dɔn ni.
Chɛɛ a ni kɛn a saa an na, a‑a bai chɛ an fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Ni Yataa dɔn‑da, n mbe yɛ‑a wan to wo tena.” Mbɛ a si‑a dɛndɛ ɔ, a ka Ɛfisɔsi, mbɛ a ta‑a.
A che‑a kɛn Sisayea duu ɔ, a bɔ‑a wan dɛndɛ ɔ, mbɛ a sɛ‑a Chuusaɛn. A che‑a kɛn nɔ, a‑a chɔchi mɔɛ n kɔndɔn fan, mbɛ a ben‑da, a ta Andiɔki duu ɔ.
A‑a tima ɛnden ya kɛn nɔ wɛɛ, a bɔ‑a wan nɔ, mbɛ a ta‑a Kadesia an fea Fichiya chɛnyɛ ɔ a. A ta‑a wan duu sɛsɛ ɔ, an chɛnyɛ chɛ n dɔ. A ni wan a ma tena, Chisɔsi fɛ mɔɛ n gbɛɛ, an dɔ ɛ gbɛa‑a.
A tima chɛ a, Chu mɔ dɔndɔ, min tɔ ni Apɔdɔsi, min suun‑da Adɛsandia duu ɔ, a na‑a wan Ɛfisɔsi duu ɔ. A ni kosan kaka bai sa a, a sin to, a‑a Yataa 'a gboo ɔ gbɛ wan chɛndɛ chɛ.

A kanden fan ni gbɛ, chia chɛ ma, Mansa Chisɔsi‑a min yian. A sin ni bai sa wan a si Chisɔsi ma, a sɔɛ gbɛɛ a, paa ee a ma. A‑a chɛ ma wɛɛ, chɛɛ a‑a koe chɛ an dɔ gbɛ dechee, min sien ni yii chɛ ma mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, Chɔn na‑a min fɔ.

A‑a a kuu sɔ wan koɔ‑a, faagbɛa a, Chu n 'na samun chɛ chen chɛ a. Chɛɛ Pisida an fea a chɛɛ Akuida a, an‑na a da a bai chɛ a min kɛn, an‑na a ya wan, an ta‑a a a an 'na chenɛ a. Mbɛ an‑na chia chɛ wakoe ɔ yian a a chɛndɛ chɛ, Yataa‑a min yian.

Chɛ gbakɔ, a toen ni kɛn a ni ben Akaya chɛnyɛ ɔ, suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ nu Chasi ɔ, an‑na a faa ma nande wan. Mbɛ an‑na gboo nyɛn an suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ n tena Akaya, an dɔ, an ni an boo si a kɔɔ chɛndɛ chɛ. A che‑a kɛn Akaya, a basan‑da wan mɔɛ chɛ n ma kaka, miin na‑a an kai fa Chisɔsi a, koadia demanɛ 'a gbasaya ɔ, Yataa ɛ min chɛ.
Koe min na mu, a ni ma koe n tɛnsɛ‑a, Chu mɔɛ n nii sɔ a a ɛnden bɛɛ a. A‑a a ɔ yian fan an na, a ka Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ kunka mansa mu Chisɔsi an na.
Apɔdɔsi ni kɛn Kɔyindi duu ɔ, Pɔɔ bɔ‑a wan chɛnyɛ kun ma chia a, mbɛ a che‑a Ɛfisɔsi duu ɔ, a‑a Chisɔsi fɛ mɔɛ dɔ n tan kaina min.
Mbɛ a‑a an dɔ tisa, a ɔ, “Yataa Nyina na‑a bea wan wo fɛ, wo na‑a wo kai fa kɛn Chisɔsi a?” Mbɛ an dɔ te, “A an. Nn gbu ma chɛ a min nin bɛ, mbɛ nyina ɛ wan nɔ, min tɔɛ ɛ ka.”
Mbɛ Pɔɔ ɔ te, “Mbɛ yii minan sima chɛ‑a gbɛ wo kunɛ ɔ?” Mbɛ an dɔ te, “Chɔn‑na yii chɛ buɛ min dɔ mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a.”

Mbɛ Pɔɔ ɔ, “Chɔn ni yii min chɛ mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, a sien ni mɔɛ n kan kɔ sɔɛ koe an na, an 'na ko yama n na. A ni a fɔ wan to mɔɛ n ye, mbɛ an ni an kai fa mɔɛ chɛ a, min mbe na tena a gbaa chia a. A wan Chɔn chɛ sin, a ni ka bai sa‑a a si Chisɔsi an ma.”
Mɔɛ chɛ n‑na Pɔɔ da a bai chɛ a min kɛn, an‑na a ma wan, Pɔɔ‑a yii chɛ an kunɛ ɔ, Mansa Chisɔsi tɔɛ ɔ.
A sin, Pɔɔ‑a a boo bun an ma, mbɛ Yataa Nyina bea‑a an fɛ. An‑na kamaya bai n fɔ wan, mɔɛ n mbe ee miin dɔ gbɛ ka dechee. Mbɛ an yɛ‑a, an‑na Yataa bai ɔ yian.
An gbɛɛ, an taen fan ni mɔ kaima tan kun ma fea nyɔn sima ɔ.
Kau sawa ko a, Pɔɔ ni ta wan Chu n 'na samun chɛ chen chɛ a, a sin ni koɔ wan nɔ faagbɛa a. A ni koe n tɛnsɛ wan, an bɛ an na, a sin ni an disa wan, a si Yataa 'a mansaya wakoe ma.

Chɛɛ dɔ n too ɔ ni gbɛ wan, min‑na a ma, an nii ma dɔn ni dan koe a Pɔɔ a. A sin, mɔɛ n gbɛɛ ya kɔɔ ni, an ni bai yama n sa, a si chia ma, Mansa Chisɔsi‑a min yian mɔ gbu a, a sɔ koe a a fɛ. Mbɛ Pɔɔ sɛmbɛ‑a koɔ koe a an tena, a ka‑a an fɛ. Mbɛ a‑a Chisɔsi fɛ mɔɛ chɛ n bɔ an ya a, an ta‑a a a. A sin ni koe n tɛnsɛ wan, tee ɔ tee a, an bɛ an na, chen ba dɔ mende a, min ni Tayanɔsi ta a, kanɛ ni chɛ kaina min.

Chɛ a tun‑da wan a ma san fea ko a, min‑na a ma, mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ ni Esia chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ, an‑na sakana bai a min fan, a si Mansa Chisɔsi ma. Chu mɔɛ n‑na a a min fan, an bɛ mɔɛ chɛ n na, miin nii ma Chu mɔ a.
Yataa‑a gbasaya be wan Pɔɔ ma, kamaya ko wa n ma koe a.

Ni a 'a yenkisa wɛɛ, chɛ ma, a kana doma gbu wɛɛ, ni an ta‑a a a, tu koe a gbandi mɔ kan kɔ kan na, a ni chɛndɛya ma sɔn fan. Gbandi ni bɔ wan an mɔɛ chɛ gboo ɔ, chɛ ma, nyina yama wɛɛ ni ka wan a fɛ.

Chu mɔɛ n ni wan nɔ, miin ni ben ben, nyina yama gbain‑da mɔɛ n fɛ. An bɛɛ ni tima ya wan, wai chɛ koe a Mansa Chisɔsi tɔɛ ɔ. An ni a fɔ wan, an dɔ te, “N mbe a fɔ tena i ye, mbɛ i ni ka a fɛ, Chisɔsi tɔɛ an dɔ, Pɔɔ ɛ bai sa ka a si min ma.”
Den kaien wɔnfea nu, miin fa ni Sifa a, an fan ni chɛ ma. Sifa chɛ ni Chu mɔɛ n 'na tɛ mɔ wa an na, Yataa tena.
Chɛɛ tee dɔndɔ a, an ni wan nyina yama chɛ gbain‑da kamin dɔndɔ fɛ. Nyina yama chɛ ni a fɔ wan an ye, a ɔ, “N‑na Chisɔsi sɔn fan, n‑na Pɔɔ wɛɛ sɔn. Chɛɛ wo tana, nyɔn mu wo a?”
Mbɛ kamin chɛ, nyina yama chɛ ɛ ka min fɛ, a chɛ‑a an ma gbasi a. A kun‑da wan an ma, mbɛ a‑a an gbɛɛ pɛndɛn chɛndɛ chɛ. Mbɛ an bɔ‑a bui a an chenɛ chɛ a, an ma senɛ ɛ, a yɛ to, wii ɛ bɔ‑a an ma.
Mbɛ Chu mɔɛ nu, an bɛ chɛ n na, miin nii ma Chu mɔ a, an‑na koe chɛ a min fan Ɛfisɔsi. Chiandia dɛ‑a wan an gbɛɛ ɔ, mbɛ an‑na basɔmaya wa be wan gbɛ Mansa Chisɔsi tɔɛ ma.
Mɔ sɛsɛ nu, miin bɛɛ na‑a an kai fa Chisɔsi a, an na‑a wan fanka ɔ, mbɛ an dɔn‑da an chɛ chɛ wai yama n ma, an sin‑na an dɔ yian fan.

An sɛsɛ nu, miin boo ni nkofo koe n dɔ, an na‑a wan an 'na nkofo gboo n na kaina dɔndɔ, mbɛ an‑na an minda fanka ɔ. A tima chɛ a, an gboo chɛ n gbɛɛ sɔnkɔɛ, a ni wai chɛ mɔ chɛmɛ dɔndɔ, mɔ bi wɔdɔ pawa wan, san dɔndɔ ko a.
Chia chɛ a ni, sakana bai chɛ, a si Mansa Chisɔsi ma, a fasan‑da a ɔ gbɛɛ. A sin, an sakana chɛ ni koe miin ma mɔɛ n 'na fɔɛ ɔ, a nii ma dɔɔ.

Koe chɛ n gbɛɛ gbakɔ, Pɔɔ‑a a yiima ɔ bɛn fan, Yataa Nyina 'a gbasaya ɔ, ben koe a Masidonia chɛnyɛ ɔ, a basan Akaya a, ta koe a Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. A‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “Ni n ta‑a Chuusaɛn, n mbe che‑a wan Domi bɛɛ.”
Mbɛ a‑a Timoti a ta Masidonia, an fea Ɛyasitɔsi a, mɔ fea miin ni basan a ma. Mbɛ a sin to‑a tima ɛnden ko a, Esia chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ.
A tima chɛ a, gbunɛ min‑na a kuu sɔ Ɛfisɔsi, a nii ma dɔ, a si mɔɛ n ma, Chisɔsi fɛ chia a.

A kuu sɔ‑a kamin dɔndɔ an ma, min tɔ ni Demetiɔsi. Demetiɔsi chɛ ni tonkan ti an na, min na‑a mɔ sɛsɛ ya, wai chɛ koe a a kɔɔ. Ɛfisɔsi duu chɛ ɔ, chen chenama sɔen fan ni nɔ, Kiisi mɔɛ n 'na musu yataa chɛ, min tɔ ni Atɛmisi, a fai koe a. Demetiɔsi, an bɛ a 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n na, an ni chen mɛsɛ mɛsɛ n nyan fan, kain gbɛ ɔ, miin ni yɔ chen chenama chɛ. An ni kɔpɔ sɛmbɛndenɛ sɔn fan, an wai chɛ ɔ.

Mbɛ tee dɔndɔ a, a‑a a 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ n chee kaina dɔndɔ, an bɛ mɔ dɔ mende n na, miin bɛɛ ni an wai dɔndɔ gbe chɛ. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “N bɔ nu, wo gbɛɛ wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ mmɔ 'a nyanɛ gbɛɛ, ɛ bɔ wai chɛ an dɔ, mmɔ ɛ ka min na.

Sanche gbɛ, wo wandi, wo e a ɔ yen tena wan, koe min mbe chɛ tena a ɔ. A yɛ to, wo e a a min tena wan. Ɛfisɔsi dechee ma, chɛɛ a maen fan mu gbɛ yɔ Esia chɛnyɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, Pɔɔ chɛ ɛ mɔɛ n yiima mun tena buɛ min dɔ, a si mmɔ 'a wai ma. A ɛ a fɔ tena wan mɔɛ n ye, mbɛ mmɔ ɛ yataa miin nyan ka mmɔ boo a, yataa kan kɔ kan ma an na.

N mbe ee bai sa tena dechee a si mmɔ 'a kɔpɔ sɔn koe an ma, ni mmɔ ɛ fo‑a buɛ min dɔ kɔpɔɛ a. Chɛɛ tima ɛ che‑a wan, mɔɛ n mbe ee na‑a baa be‑a chen chɛ ma to, mmɔ 'a musu yataa wa chɛ, a 'a chen chɛ. An gbu sin mbe na‑a wan a bɔ‑a a 'a basɔmaya chɛ ɔ, min mbe a boo ɔ. A wɛn mu ka, mɔɛ gbɛɛ Esia chɛnyɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, a basan dunya chɛ gbɛɛ a, an mbe a fai.”
Fanka chɛ‑a bai chɛ a min kɛn, an faa tɛ‑a wan gbeden. Mbɛ an bun‑da yee te‑a, an dɔ te, “Atɛmisi min mbe Ɛfisɔsi, yataa an nɛ, min gbasayaen mu.”

Mbɛ mɔɛ n sɔnkɔ sɔnkɔ chɛ kuiɛ‑a duu wa gbu ɔ bɔ, a si an koe chɛ ma. Mbɛ an gbɛɛ‑a bui sa a a, mɔɛ n gbɛɛ bɛn tena chɛ duu chɛ ɔ. An‑na Kayɔsi bia wan, an ta‑a a a an boo ɔ, an fea Ayisitakɔsi a. Kayɔsi chɛ, an fea Ayisitakɔsi a, Masidonia chɛnyɛ mɔɛ n ni an na, miin bɛ na‑a na Pɔɔ a.
Pɔɔ wandi gbu toen fan ni don koe a, an kaina chɛ, fanka chɛ ni ka kaina min. Chɛɛ Chisɔsi fɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu, an nii ma dɔn ni, a ni don nɔ.
Mɔɛ dɔ n bɛɛ gbu, miin ni mɔ chenama n na nɔ, an Esia chɛnyɛ ɔ, an‑na sakana a ta wan disa ɔ, Pɔɔ ma na don nɔ. A dia nyɔɛ ni an mɔɛ chɛ n na.
Mɔɛ chɛ nu an bɛn chɛ ɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ too nii a bɔɛ da a kuiɛ ma. Mɔɛ dɔ n ni wan bai fɔ‑a ka, dɔ n sin mbe ta‑a bai dɔ gbɛɛ fɔ‑a. An gbu nii ma a ɔ sɔn, fen na‑a a ma, an mbe an bɛn chɛ ɔ.

Chu mɔɛ n‑na Adɛsanda yian fan, koɔ koe a mɔɛ n tena. A tima chɛ a, mɔɛ dɔ n ni wan bai don‑da a da a, a fɔ koe a. Mbɛ Adɛsanda‑a a boo kai mɔɛ chɛ n ma, min mbe a ma, a ni koɔ an tena, Chu mɔɛ n ko a.
Chɛɛ an‑na a ɔ sɔn kɛn, mbɛ Chu mɔɛ ni a a, an‑na yee tɛ wan to dɔndɔ a, an dɔ te, “Atɛmisi min mbe Ɛfisɔsi, yataa an nɛ, min gbasayaen mu.” An‑na chɛ ma wan, awa fea ko a.

Mbɛ a danka a, gboo nyɛn mɔɛ min ni an duu chɛ ɔ, a kun‑da wan mɔɛ chɛ n ma, an ma maun koe a. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “N bɔ Ɛfisɔsi mɔɛ nu, mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ mmɔ 'a duu wa chɛ, an mbe chenɛ kun ma fɛn Atɛmisi ye, mmɔ 'a yataa tɔ bɔen ba chɛ. A yɛ to, an mbe sen chɛ wɛɛ kun ma fɛn, sen ma chianden ba chɛ, min bea‑a a ka banda bu ɔ.
Mɔ ɔ mɔ ee che mmɔ kɔɔsa bia‑a, a si ko bonda chɛ ma. Chɛ an fɛ mu gbɛ, a nyin wo ni wo faa chima, wo ma na ko kan kɔ kan ma, yiimatɛ ee min dɔ.
Wo na‑a ka nɛ mɔɛ miin na, an ma fen kanka ni mmɔ 'a yataa chɛ 'a chenɛ chɛ a nɛ, n mbe ee baa, an ni bai yama kan kɔ kan sa, a si mmɔ 'a musu yataa chɛ ma.
Ni mɔɛ an‑na ko yama ma Demetiɔsi a, an bɛ a 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ n na, mmɔ 'a gbakoo n mbe wan nɔ, miin mbe kuti si. An ni ta a mɔɛ chɛ n na nɔ, an ni an ma sii bia.
Chɛɛ ni ko dɔ mende kan kɔ kan mbe wan nɔ, wo toen mu min ma koe a, a bai chɛ ɛ sa bɛn chɛ an dɔ, chɛnyɛ ti n mbe min chee.
Ni mmɔ ma mmɔ kun ma fɛn ni koe chɛ a, min ma‑a ka bi, Domi gbakoo n mbe kunɛ si‑a wan mmɔ kun ma, gbunɛ a bea koe a. Mmɔ dɔndɔ wɛɛ ee che‑a a fɔ‑a, mbɛ tea ɛ wan mmɔ 'a faatɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ bi.”
A ban‑da kɛn bai chɛ fɔ‑a, mbɛ a‑a mɔɛ chɛ n na ta an baa nu.
An gbun chɛ ɔ chima‑a kɛn, mbɛ Pɔɔ‑a Chisɔsi fɛ mɔɛ chɛ n chee kaina dɔndɔ. A ban‑da kɛn an faa chima bai fɔ‑a an ye, a‑a a saa wan an na. Mbɛ a‑a an to, a ta‑a Masidonia chɛnyɛ ɔ.
A ben ben‑da wan Masidonia chɛnyɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, ɛ ta‑a nɔ mɔɛ chɛ n faa ma nande‑a bai sɛsɛ a. Mbɛ a ka‑a nɔ, a ta‑a Kiisi chɛnyɛ ɔ,
a ni kaina kau sawa ko a. A ɛ gbɛ a ma bɛn tena wan, ta koe a Siyia chɛnyɛ ɔ dɛndɛ ɔ, mbɛ a‑a a ɔ gbɛ, mbɛ Chu mɔɛ n ni dɔbɛnɛ an dɔ, a fa koe a. A wɛɛ‑a a yiima mun fan, mbɛ a yɛ‑a to Masidonia.

Kai Piyɔsi 'a den kaienɛ Sopata, min ka‑a Bɛyia duu ɔ, a bea‑a wan Pɔɔ fɛ, mbɛ an fea ta‑a a a. Mɔ dɔ mende nu, miin bɛɛ bea‑a a fɛ, an fan nii nɛ, Ayisitakɔsi a, an fea Sɛkundɔsi a, miin ka‑a Tɛsadonika duu ɔ. A yɛ to, ni Kayɔsi, min ka‑a Dabi duu ɔ, an fea Tikikɔsi a, ni Tɔfimɔsi miin ka‑a Esia chɛnyɛ n dɔ. Mɔɛ dankama ni Timoti an na.
An fan ta‑a nn ya ɔ, mbɛ an‑na nn ma kɔn Towasi duu ɔ.
