Chɛɛ biidi dɛnfɛ daun bɛn ba chɛ ben‑da kɛn, nn si‑a wan dɛndɛ ɔ, a ka Fiipai duu ɔ. Tee duu gbakɔ, nn‑na an tan fan Towasi, nn ni kaina tɛn sɔngbɔ dɔndɔ ko a.
Tɛnɛ kan kɔ dɔɛ ma, nn bɛn‑da wan kaina dɔndɔɛ, daun chɛ koe a. Pɔɔ‑a Yataa bai sa wan mɔɛ chɛ n tena. A toen ni ben koe an na, a banda ka. Chɛ an fɛ mu, a koɔ‑a wan an tena, aan su ta‑a a tɛ ma.
Dambo sɛsɛ a manden fan ni, banda a chen chɛ a, nn ni ka kaina bɛnɛ chɛ ɔ.

A tima chɛ a, kamin tɔngbɔ dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, min tɔ ni Yutikɔsi. Pɔɔ ni koɛ chɛ gbɛɛ chɛ tena tima min na, a ni si ɔ wunda a wan, a gbu chinɔenɛ ɛ. Mbɛ Pɔɔ che‑a kaina wan, Yutikɔsi boo tɛ‑a wunda chɛ a, mbɛ a bea‑a duu ma, a bɔ chenɛ chɛ si tena sawa chɛ ɔ. An mbe gbɛ a ya‑a, a faenɛ ni don.
Chɛɛ Pɔɔ yii‑a wan nɔ duu ma, mbɛ a‑a a ma bun su chɛ kun ma. Mbɛ a‑a su chɛ bia a boo fea a, a ɔ, “Wo ma wo faa gbaa, a ɛ fɔɛ ɔ.”
Mbɛ a sɛ‑a to banda a chen chɛ a, a‑a biidi tɛ kai, mbɛ an bɛ gbɛɛ‑a a daun kaina dɔndɔ. A to‑a wan koɔ‑a an tena, aan banda ɔ ka‑a, mbɛ a ta‑a.
Pɔɔ ta‑a kɛn, mɔɛ chɛ n‑na kamin tɔngbɔɛ chɛ ya wan, a chɛndɛ chen, an ta‑a a ma sɔ‑a a waa a. Chɛ‑a an bu ɔ dia wan, a ɔ benden ba a.
Pɔɔ na‑a dɔbɛnɛ chɛ wan nn na, mbɛ a ɛ ta‑a nn ya ɔ, a chenɛ ma, Asɔsi duu ɔ. A ɔ, nn sin tana, nn ni si dɛndɛ ɔ, a ta Asɔsi, a ya ɔ. A ɔ, a ɛ nn tan‑da nɔ wan, mbɛ nn ta‑a a ya ɔ.
A‑a nn tan kɛn Asɔsi duu ɔ, a sɛ‑a wan dɛndɛ ɔ nn kun ma, mbɛ nn bɛ ta‑a Mitidene duu ɔ.

Nn ka‑a wan nɔ dɛndɛ ɔ, mbɛ nn ta‑a Kiɔsi ya teen ma, tee dɔndɔɛ ma. Tee dɔndɔ gbakɔ to, nn che‑a wan dɛndɛ ɔ Samɔsi yii tinɛ ɔ. Nn chi‑a nɔ wan. Mbɛ banda ɔ ka‑a kɛn, nn che‑a wan gbɛ Midetɔsi duu ɔ.

Pɔɔ yiima ɔ bɛnden fan ni, a ni Ɛfisɔsi ma sangba. Koe min na mu, a nii ma to ni tima kan kɔ kan yayi koe a Esia chɛnyɛ ɔ. A toen ni tachɛ a gbandi ma an chɛ koe a. Ni a ni bɛn fan, a ni che Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, tee chɛ ma, an ni min chee Pɛndekɔsi.
Pɔɔ to‑a Midetɔsi wan, mbɛ a‑a sakana a ta Ɛfisɔsi chɔchi gbakoo n tena, an na koe a, a tan‑da.
An che‑a kɛn Pɔɔ ma, a‑a a fɔ wan an ye, a ɔ, “Wo‑a a ɔ yen fan, n ni buɛ min dɔ wo tɛ ɔ, tima ɔ tima ko a. A ka n 'na tee saa saa ma Esia chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ, aan a sɔ n ka tee ma nɔ.

Chu mɔɛ n‑na kun puinɛ chɛ wan, a yama boo a, a si n ma. Chɛɛ n‑na n fandi ma yii wan, n‑na wai chɛ wan Mansa Chisɔsi ko a, di ni wɛɛ n ya a, n faa wɛɛ yɔndenɛ ɛ, a si ko ma gbaaen chɛ n ma, Chu mɔɛ n‑na min sa n ma.
Wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan to, mbɛ n ma ko ɔ ko ɔ nun ni wo ma, n ni ma Yataa bai sa‑a wo tena. Chɛɛ fanka ɔ den, a basan wo 'a chenɛ n bɛɛ a, n‑na wo kan fan koe n na, miin mu demanɛ a wo tena.
N‑na dasi gbau gbau be wan Chu mɔɛ n ma, ni miin bɛɛ ma Chu mɔ a, a si an kan kɔ sɔ koe a, an 'na ko yama n na, an ni an ya a mun Yataa ma. A yɛ to, a si an kai fa koe ma mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi a.
Sanche gbɛ sin, n yen ko, n mbe ee che Yataa Nyina da a kuiɛ bɔ a ɔ, n mbe ka ta‑a Chuusaɛn duu ɔ wan. N gbu ma a ɔ sɔn, koe min mbe n tan‑da nɔ.
Mɔɔ dechee Yataa Nyina ɛ min fɔ tena n ye, duu kan kɔ kan dɔ, n mbe ta min dɔ. Mbɛ tɔɔya sɛsɛ, a basan pimbi chenɛ a sa a, ɛ wan n ya ɔ.

Chɛɛ ni n 'na wai chɛ koe mu, n ma n ta fɔɛ chɛ ya ni fen kɔ fen na. Wai chɛ, Mansa Chisɔsi‑a min be n ma, n ni a a ban koe mu. N ni sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian mɔɛ n na, a si Yataa 'a koadia demanɛ ma.
“A sin, a yen ko gbɛ, n‑na chɛ ɔ sɔn. Mbɛ n ben ben‑da wo wɛn gbɛɛ tɛ ɔ, n mbe ta‑a koɔ‑a wo tena, a si Yataa 'a mansaya ma, wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ ee na‑a n yen‑da to.
Chɛ an fɛ mu gbɛ, n mbe chɛ ma din tena wo tena bi. Mbɛ ni wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ nɛ, wo ma bauncha ma sɔn ni, wo ee na‑a wo tɛɛ si‑a n ma.
Koe min na mu, n ma ko kan kɔ kan dɔ nun ni wo ma, a si koe n gbɛɛ ma, miin mbe Yataa yii ma, an ma koe a.

Wo wo wandi kun ma fɛn, ni mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, Yataa Nyina‑a miin kai fa wo a. Wo Yataa 'a chɔchi mɔɛ n kun ma fɛn. Yataa gbɔgbɔɔ denɛ, Chisɔsi, a ta wii min bɔn‑da, a fa tima a, an‑na a ma, chɔchi mɔɛ chɛ n ma‑a a wan Yataa ta mɔɛ n na.
N‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ ni n ta‑a, fania kan chɛ mɔɛ n mbe na‑a wan n gbaa. An mbe ma‑a wan, yɔ nya fenɛ nu wo tɛ ɔ, a sin, an mbe ee sai bɔ‑a, wo 'a mɔɛ n na.
A sin, tima ɛ che‑a wan, mɔɛ dɔ n ni bɔ wo wandi gbu tɛ ɔ, miin mbe bai n fɔ‑a, miin mbe ee a chia ma. An mbe chɛ ma‑a wan, mɔɛ dɔ n ka koe a Chisɔsi 'a chia ma, an ni bea an fɛ.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo wo wandi kun ma fɛn, mɔ bonda chɛ n boo ɔ. Wo wo yii na chii, mbɛ su ɔ tee a, n ni wo a si wan. N‑na chɛ ma wan san sawa ko a, di a n ya a.

“Sanche gbɛ, n mbe wo kai fa tena Yataa an na. Wo a a tun dan koe a sakana bai chɛ a, a si Yataa 'a koadia demanɛ chɛ ma wo tena. Ɛ kun fan, a ni a ma, wo 'a danaya n dɔ ni gbɛa. A yɛ to, ɛ kun fan, a ni dua chɛ be wo ma, min mbe Yataa boo ɔ, a 'a mɔɛ n gbɛɛ ko a.
N nii ma to ni, mɔ ɔ mɔ ta boo fen kan kɔ kan na.
Wo wandi gbu‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ n fandi gbu 'a taa sende, n mbe an daun, nn bɛ chɛ n na, miin mbe n fɛ.

N‑na a ɔ yian fan wo a, chia ɔ chia a, mɔɛ ɛ wai chɛ buɛ min dɔ a boo a, basan koe a mɔɛ n ma, boo ee miin ma, an ma koe chɛ koe a. Mmɔ yii ɛ ma‑a wan bai chɛ kɔ, Mansa Chisɔsi na‑a min fɔ, a ɔ, ‘Dua ɛ fenɛ be mɔɛ ma kaka, a ni ben a bia mɔɛ ma.’ ”
Pɔɔ ban‑da kɛn koɔ‑a ka mɔɛ chɛ n tena, a‑a a kumbai gbangban fan, an bɛ gbɛɛ an na, mbɛ an‑na samunɛ chɛ Yataa tena.
A sin, an ni kɛn an saa a a, an gbɛɛ gbaun‑da wan di a, an bea‑a a kaa ɔ, koadia wa ɔ.
Pɔɔ‑a bai min fɔ an ye, an gbu‑a an faa mɔnɛ kaka. A‑a a fɔɛ min chɛ, a ɔ, an mbe ee na‑a an nyɔn yen‑da to. Mbɛ an ta‑a a ma sɔ‑a, dɛndɛ tena, an kɔ yii da a.

Mbɛ nn tɛ du‑a kɛn, nn bɛ Ɛfisɔsi mɔɛ chɛ n na, nn si‑a wan dɛndɛ ɔ. Mbɛ nn ta‑a dɔndɔ gbe Kɔsi yii tin chɛ ɔ. Tee fean bɔɛ ma, nn bɔ‑a Kɔsi, mbɛ nn ta‑a Dɔdɛsi yii tinɛ ɔ, nn ka‑a kaina min, nn ta‑a Pataa duu wɛɛ ɔ.
A sin, nn‑na dɛndɛ dɔ gbɛɛ tan fan Pataa, min ni ta tena Fonisia chɛnyɛ ɔ. Nn sɛ‑a wan a ɔ, mbɛ nn ta‑a Fonisia.

Nn che‑a kɛn kaina, nn ni Saipɔsi yii tinɛ yen kaina min, nn‑na a ma sangba wan. Mbɛ nn‑na boo nyima ɔ chia bia wan, nn‑na nn kun sɔ Saipɔsi a, mbɛ nn che‑a tindi ma Taya duu ɔ. Koe min na mu, nɔ ni feanka a ni yii, a bɔ dɛndɛ wa chɛ ɔ.
Nn‑na nn ya a kan fan Chisɔsi fɛ mɔɛ dɔ n na nɔ, nn sin bɛ ni wan an na tɛn sɔngbɔ dɔndɔ ko a. Yataa Nyina 'a gbasaya ɔ, fɛ mɔɛ chɛ n‑na a fɔ wan Pɔɔ ye, a ma tachɛ a tun, a ta Chuusaɛn duu ɔ.

Chɛɛ nn 'na tima ban‑da kɛn nɔ duu chɛ ɔ, nn‑na nn saa wan an na, ta koe a. An gbɛɛ, musu nu, kai nu, an bɛ an 'na denɛ n na, an‑na nn ma sɔ wan. Nn che‑a kɛn yii da a, nn gbɛɛ, nn‑na nn kumbai gbangban fan, nn‑na samunɛ chɛ Yataa tena.
Nn ban‑da kɛn nn saa nn nyɔn na, mbɛ nn sɛ‑a dɛndɛ gbu ɔ, an sin yɛ‑a an baa a.
Nn ban‑da kɛn nn 'na tachɛ ma Taya duu ɔ, mbɛ nn‑na a fo Tɔdɛmaisi duu ɔ. A sin, suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ nu nɔ Chasi ɔ, nn‑na an kɔndɔn fan tee dɔndɔ ko a.

Banda ɔ ka‑a kɛn, nn bɔ‑a wan nɔ, mbɛ nn na‑a Sisayea duu ɔ. Nn ta‑a wan kamin dɔndɔ 'a chenɛ a, sondaya a. A tɔ ni Fiipi, min ni ben ben sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian‑da, a si Chisɔsi ma. A ni mɔ dɔndɔ an na to, mɔ wɔnfea chɛ n tɛ ɔ, Chuusaɛn mɔɛ n na‑a an boo sɔ miin ma.
Den musuma naanin fan ni a boo ɔ, miin nii wɛ kai boo ɔ. An ni Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n fan na.
Nn ni ka nɔ tee kuunɛ min ko a, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔ dɔndɔ, min tɔ ni Akabɔsi, a yii‑a wan, a ka Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ.

Akabɔsi chɛ na‑a wan nn tena, mbɛ a‑a Pɔɔ 'a bu tɛ chii yuu ya, a‑a a wandi chenɛ ɔ chii, a basan a boo a. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “Yataa Nyina ɔ te, a ɔ, mɔɛ min ta mu bu tɛ chii yuu chɛ a, Chu mɔɛ n mbe a chii‑a ka wan Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. A ɔ, an sin mbe a be‑a wan mɔɛ chɛ n ma, miin ma Chu mɔ a.”
Nn‑na bai chɛ a min kɛn, nn fan, nn bɛ mɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ n na nɔ, nn‑na Pɔɔ disa wan, a ma na ta Chuusaɛn duu ɔ.
Chɛɛ Pɔɔ ɔ te, “Wo e di chɛ tena ka, n faa yɔn koe an na. Fen mu wo e chɛ ma tena? N ma ma bɛn ni, n sa koe dechee an ko a pimbi chenɛ a, chɛɛ n fa koe wɛɛ gbu a, Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, Mansa Chisɔsi ko a.”
Nn sin‑na a ɔ yen kɛn, mbɛ nn nii che a yiima mun‑da, nn bɛɛ sɛmbɛ‑a. Nn dɔ, Mansa Chisɔsi faa ma koe ni ma.
Nn‑na tima ɛnden ya kɛn nɔ, nn‑na nn 'na feanka n dɔ bɛn fan, mbɛ nn ta‑a Chuusaɛn duu ɔ.

Mbɛ Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ dɔ nu, a ka Sisayea, an bea‑a wan nn fɛ. An sin‑na nn ya wan, nn ta‑a kamin dɔndɔ 'a chenɛ a, nn ni ma tena min 'na sondaya a. A tɔ ni Nason. A ka‑a Saipɔsi yii tinɛ ɔ wan, a sin‑na a kai fa Chisɔsi a tima min na, a ɔ ni yansan.
Nn na‑a kɛn Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, nn suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ nu Chasi ɔ, an‑na an boo si wan nn kɔɔ, buɔdia wa a.
Banda ɔ ka dɔndɔɛ ma, nn bɛ ta‑a wan Pɔɔ a, Chimisi yen koe a. Nn che‑a kɛn Chimisi tena, chɔchi gbakoo n gbɛɛ a sɔnden fan ni nɔ.

Pɔɔ‑a an gbɛɛ kɔndɔn fan. Mbɛ a si‑a ko ɔ ko ma, a‑a a ɔ yian an na, dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a. A‑a a ɔ yian fan, Yataa na‑a koe miin chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n ye, miin nii ma ka Chu mɔ a. Chɛ sin bɔ‑a a wan Pɔɔ 'a wai an dɔ.

An sin‑na Pɔɔ 'a bai chɛ n na min kɛn, an‑na tando be wan Yataa ma. Mbɛ an‑na a fɔ Pɔɔ ye, an dɔ, “Nn suun ma nyɔɛ Chasi ɔ, i wandi‑a a ɔ yen, mbɛ Chu mɔ wu sɛsɛ nu, an‑na an kai fa buɛ min dɔ Chisɔsi a. A yɛ to, an‑na a ma wan, an ma gbɔsɔɛ a, mmɔ 'a Chu sawa n bia koe a.

A sin, a fɔen fan mu an ye, mbɛ e ben tena Chu mɔɛ n gbɛɛ, miin mbe mɔɛ n 'na chɛnyɛ ɔ, miin ma Chu mɔ a, an kan‑da koe miin na. Mbɛ an ni an kan kɔ sɔ mmɔ 'a sawa chɛ n na, Yataa na‑a miin be Mosisi ma. An dɔ te to, i ɔ, an ma an 'na denɛ n na kamincha to, n mbe ee baa, Chu n 'na manda n na tachɛ koe a.
Mmɔ ɛ fen ma‑a gbɛ sanche? Koe min na mu, an mbe na‑a wan kɛn a a min‑da, mbɛ e nɛ duu chɛ ɔ.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, nn toen mu i ni koe chɛ an ma. Chu mɔ kaima naanin mbe wan nɛ, miin‑na an kai Yataa tena.

Wo bɛ ni ta an na, mbɛ wo bɛ‑a manda chɛ a tachɛ, min mbe a ɔ yian‑da, mbɛ wo ma ko‑a fion Yataa tena. Bɔnɔɛ gbɛɛ, an ko a, a chɛ, an ma ko koe chɛ a Yataa tena. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, an ni kun an kunɛ n sin koe ma. Ni i‑a chɛ ma, mɔɛ n mbe ee na‑a dan‑da bai chɛ n na to, an‑na miin gbɛɛ fɔ an ye, a si i ma. Chɛɛ an mbe a ɔ yen‑da wan, mbɛ i wɛɛ‑a koe chɛ n ma wan, miin mbe sawa chɛ ɔ, Yataa‑a sawa miin be Mosisi ma.

Chɛɛ chɛ n tana, miin ma Chu mɔ a, chɛɛ an‑na an kai fa Chisɔsi a, nn‑na gboo nyɛndenɛ a ta wan an tena. Nn‑na a fɔ wan an ye, mbɛ nn ta yiima ɔ, an ma daun fen kan kɔ kan daun, mɔɛ n‑na min bɔ yasi a, fen chɛ n tena, miin ma Yataa a. A yɛ to, an ma wii daun, an gbu ma soe kan kɔ kan daun, min kanɛ a ma tɛ ni. A sin to, an ni an boo bɔ ko tɛ ɔ.”

Mbɛ Pɔɔ‑a mɔɛ chɛ n ya, tee dɔndɔɛ ma, mbɛ an bɛ gbɛɛ an na, an‑na manda chɛ a tachɛ, an ma ko koe a Yataa tena. Mbɛ a don‑da Yataa 'a kata ɔ, a fɔ koe a, ni ɛ tima yuu ya‑a, aan an ma ko tima chɛ ni ban. A tima chɛ a mu, yasi ɛ bɔ‑a an gbɛɛ ko a, dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a.
Chɛɛ tee wɔnfea chɛ, a ni gbɛ ban koe an na, mbɛ Chu mɔɛ dɔ nu, a ka Esia chɛnyɛ ɔ, an‑na Pɔɔ yen fan Yataa 'a kata ɔ. An‑na fanka a sɛ wan Pɔɔ ma, mbɛ an‑na a bia fɔin.

An‑na yee tɛ wan, an dɔ te, “Nn bɔ Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ nu, wo na, wo ni basan nn ma. Kamin chɛ, an mbe ben tena bai yama sa‑a, a si mmɔ 'a mɔɛ n ma. An mbe a fɔ tena to mɔ ɔ mɔ ye, mbɛ an ma ma sawa chɛ n kɔɔ, Yataa‑a sawa miin be Mosisi ma. Ɛ bai yama n dechee an sa, a si mmɔ 'a Yataa 'a kata chɛ wɛɛ ma. A yɛ to, a‑a Yataa 'a kata chɛ tana yɔn, don koe a nɛ mɔɛ n na, miin ma Chu mɔ n na.”
Koe min‑na a ma, an‑na chɛ fɔ, an na‑a a yen fan an duu chɛ ɔ, an fea Tɔfimɔsi a, min ka‑a Ɛfisɔsi duu ɔ. A ni wan an yii ma, mbɛ Pɔɔ na‑a don fan Tɔfimɔsi chɛ a, Yataa 'a kata ɔ.

Mbɛ gbunɛ bea‑a an duu wa chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ ben‑da, mɔɛ n mbe ta‑a ben‑da bui chɛ‑a dɔndɔ a. Mbɛ an‑na Pɔɔ bia fɔin, an‑na a konkon, a bɔ Yataa 'a kata chɛ ɔ. A sin, a ya kɔɔɛ a, an‑na Yataa 'a kata chɛ da n na tɔn tɔn fan.
An toen ni kɛn an ni Pɔɔ fa, sakana na‑a wan kun ti chɛ tena, Domi mɔɛ n 'na soya n ko a. Mbɛ gbunɛ bea‑a Chuusaɛn duu wa chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ.
A ya kɔɔɛ a, a‑a soya gbakoo dɔ n ya, an bɛ soya n na, mbɛ an yii‑a butuin chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n kun ma. Mɔɛ chɛ n‑na a yen kɛn na‑a, an bɛ soya chɛ n na, an sɛmbɛ‑a wan Pɔɔ gbasi koe a.
Mbɛ soya chɛ n kun ti chɛ, a ta‑a, mbɛ a‑a Pɔɔ bia. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, an ni yɔɔɛ fea chɛ a ma. Mbɛ a‑a dɔ tisa chɛ gbɛ, a ɔ, “Nyɔn mu kamin chɛ a, a yɛ to, a gbu sin‑na fen ma?”

Mbɛ mɔɛ dɔ nu fanka chɛ ɔ, an ni bai dɔndɔɛ fɔ wan, dɔ n sin mbe ta‑a bai dɔ mende fɔ‑a. Sɔnkɔ sɔnkɔɛ da a ni koo aan, soya chɛ n kun ti, a nii ma che ni, a ni a ɔ sɔn, ni fen ko gbu na‑a ma. Mbɛ a wɛɛ‑a a fɔ soya chɛ n ye, a ɔ, an ni ta Pɔɔ a an tena, baachi chɛ ɔ.
An sin che‑a kɛn sitɛpi ma, soya chɛ nu, an fan‑na Pɔɔ ya gba, an‑na a si an kanɛ ma. Koe min na mu, an nii ma to ni, fanka fanka chɛ ni koe ma a a.
An gbɛɛ‑a a sɔ wan an fɛ, yee tɛ‑a, an dɔ te, “Mmɔ a fa.”
Soya chɛ n toen ni kɛn an ni don Pɔɔ a baachi chɛ ɔ, a koɔ‑a wan soya chɛ n kun ti tena. Pɔɔ‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “E dɔn fan, n ni koɔ i tena?” Mbɛ soya n kun ti chɛ, a ɔ, “Mbɛ e Kiisi koɛ fɔ wan ka?
Chɛ‑a a ɔ yian, mbɛ Ichipi mɔɛ chɛ mu i wan na, min‑na butuinɛ si nɛ tee kɔmende a. A sin to, i wan na‑a a ma mɔ wu naaninɛ nu, miin wokoya‑a Domi kɔmende a, an bea‑a i fɛ, a ta fuinɛ ɔ. A e ka wan?”
Mbɛ Pɔɔ ɔ te, “Chu mɔɛ mu n na. N suun‑da Tasɔsi duu ɔ wan, Sidisia chɛnyɛ ɔ. N suun‑da duu min dɔ, duu nɔmɛ nɔmɛ ma a a, Sidisia chɛnyɛ ɔ. I dimu, a ma n ni koɔ mɔɛ chɛ n tena.”

Mbɛ soya n kun ti chɛ dɔn‑da a ye, a ni koɔ mɔɛ chɛ n tena. A dɔn‑da kɛn, mbɛ Pɔɔ sɔ‑a sitɛpi chɛ a. Mbɛ a‑a a boo a ben ben mɔɛ chɛ n tena, an too ma sɔ koe a. An‑na a ɔ maun kɛn, Pɔɔ‑a bai chɛ an sa an tena, Ibu koɛ ɔ.
A ɔ, “Fa nu, n suun ma nyɔɛ n gbɛɛ, wo wɛn na sɔndenɛ ɛ nɛ bi, wo wo too ma sɔ n ma, n mbe koɔ n fandi ko a.”
An‑na a min kɛn, ɛ koɔ‑a an fandi ta chɛnyɛ koɛ ɔ, an‑na a ɔ maun fan gbɛ don. Mbɛ Pɔɔ‑a a 'a bai sa a tun an tena, a ɔ,

“Chu mɔɛ mu n na. N suun‑da Tasɔsi wan, Sidisia chɛnyɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ n bɔ‑a a ɔ nɛ wan, Chuusaɛn chɛ. Kamadiɛɛ 'a kan denɛ ni n na. A‑a n kan fan chɛndɛ chɛ, mmɔ bemba n ta bemba n ta sawa bia koe a gbau gbau gbu a. A sin, n‑na n fandi be wan, Yataa 'a wai chɛ koe a, n faa gbɛɛ a, n sɔɛ a. N bankan‑da wan, Yataa 'a wai chɛ koe a, yɔ wo wɛɛ, wo wɛn mbe ka bi nɛ.

N‑na mɔnɛ sɛsɛ sa wan mɔɛ chɛ n ma, miin na‑a a sɔ chia chɛ fɛ, Chisɔsi‑a chia min yian, a sɔ koe a a fɛ. N‑na a ma wan, an‑na saya ma sɔn. N‑na an bia wan, kai nu, an bɛ musu n na, n‑na an sa pimbi chenɛ a.

Chu n tɛ mɔ wa Yataa a, ni Chu kuti wa ɔ mɔɛ n gbɛɛ, an mbe kun fan an ni siiya bɔ chɛ ma. N‑na gboo nyɛndenɛ ma sɔn, a ka an fan na, ta koe a mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ n tena, Damasikɔsi duu ɔ. A sin, n ni ta tena nɔ, chɛ n bɛɛ bia koe an na, n ni na an na, an chiienɛ ɛ, Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, an tɔɔya koe a.
“N to‑a ben ben‑da an tachɛ ɔ, mbɛ n che‑a Damasikɔsi baima. Tee cheenɛ ni a kun tɛ, a sin, man ba sɔ‑a wan, a‑a n na bɛn a ka banda a.
A sin, n bea‑a wan duu ma, mbɛ n‑na mɔɛ kuiɛ a min, ɛ a fɔ‑a n ye, a ɔ, ‘Sɔɔ, Sɔɔ, fen mu e ko ma gbaaenɛ sa tena ka n ma?’
“Mbɛ n‑na a fɔ, n dɔ te, ‘Nyɔn mu chɛ a?’ “Mbɛ a ɔ te n ma, ‘N fan mu, n fan Chisɔsi, min ka‑a Nasaɛti duu ɔ, e ko ma gbaaenɛ sa tena ka min ma.’
Nn bɛ ni mɔɛ miin na, an‑na man chɛ yen fan gbɛ, chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ min ni koɔ tena n tena, an nii ma a kuiɛ chɛ ɔ gbɛ ni ɛnden bɛɛ a.

“Mbɛ n‑na dɔ tisa chɛ wan, n dɔ te, ‘Mansa, n mbe fen ma gbɛ?’ “Mbɛ Mansa Chisɔsi ɔ te n ma, ‘I kɔɔ sɔ, i ni don Damasikɔsi duu ɔ. E ma‑a nɔ wan, mbɛ ko ɔ ko ɔ yian‑da i a, Yataa‑a koe min dɔ bɛn i ko a, a ma koe a.’
Man ba chɛ‑a a ma wan, n nii che to kaina yen‑da. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, nn bɛ ni ka mɔɛ miin na, an‑na n boo bia wan, an don‑da n na Damasikɔsi duu ɔ.

“Damasikɔsi duu chɛ ɔ, kamin dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, min tɔ ni Ananiyasi. A ni mɔɛ an na, min ni Yataa fai a faa gbɛɛ a, a sin ni koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ma wan, Chu n 'na sawa‑a miin fɔ. Chu mɔɛ n gbɛɛ Damasikɔsi, an mbe basɔmaya be wan a ma, a sɛmbɛnden na.
Mbɛ an Ananiyasi chɛ, a na‑a wan n tena, mbɛ a sɔ‑a n baima. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ n ye, a ɔ, ‘N suun ma nyɔɛ Sɔɔ, i ya a ni ka.’ Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, bai chɛ fɔ tima kɔɔ, n ya a ka‑a, mbɛ n‑na a yen.

Mbɛ a ɔ, ‘Yataa, mmɔ bemba n ta bemba n ni min fai, an‑na a boo sɔ bi i ma, i ni a faa ma koe ɔ sɔn. Chɛ ni a ma, i ni mɔɛ chɛ yen, min tanden mu Yataa tena gbeden, a yɛ to, i ni bai a min, min mbe bɔ‑a a da ɔ.
Koe min na mu, a toen mu i ni ma siiya a a ko a, mɔɛ gbɛɛ tena dunya ɔ, a si koe chɛ ma, i‑a min dɔ yen, a basan chɛ a, i‑a min na min.
A sin, e gbɛ fen ma kɔnun tena? I kɔɔ sɔ, i ni Mansa Chisɔsi chee basan koe a i ma, mbɛ yii chɛ‑a i kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, i ni ko fion, a bɔ i 'a ko yama n dɔ.’
“N yɛ‑a kɛn Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, mbɛ n bun‑da samunɛ chɛ‑a, Yataa 'a kata ɔ. Mbɛ a ma‑a, yɔ n ni cho ɔ wan,
mbɛ n‑na Mansa Chisɔsi yen. A ni wan a fɔ tena n ye, a ɔ, ‘A a gbandia, i ni bɔ dɔndɔ gbe nɛ chɛ Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. Koe min na mu, an mbe ee an boo si‑a bai chɛ kɔɔ, e miin fɔ‑a, a si n ma.’

“Mbɛ n dɔ te, ‘Mansa, an‑na a ɔ sɔn fan tea gbu a, n ni koe miin si i 'a mɔɛ n na. Nn 'na samun chɛ chenɛ kan kɔ kan na, n ni ta kaina, n ni an gbasi wan, n mbe yɛ, n mbe an sa pimbi chenɛ a, a si kaifa ma, an mbe min chɛ i a.

A sin, an ni kɛn Sitibin wii a bɔn‑da, min ni koɔ ka mɔɛ n tena a si i ma, n fandi gbu ni nɔ wan sɔ ɔ. N ni wan n kunɛ ɔ dondon‑da, a fa koe ma. A sin mɔɛ miin ni ka a fa tena, n ni wan an 'na doma n kun ma fɛn‑da.’
“Mbɛ Mansa Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ n ye, a ɔ, ‘Ta, koe min na mu, n mbe i sɔ tena kaina ɔ yansama wan, pande, mɔɛ chɛ n tena, miin ma Chu mɔ a.’ ”
Mɔɛ chɛ nu, an‑na an too ma sɔ wan Pɔɔ ma, aan a che‑a bai chɛ kaina chɛ ma. Mbɛ an‑na yee tɛ, an dɔ, “Wo mɔ bonda chɛ ka dunya ɔ ka! Koe min na mu, a ma nyin, a ni ma fɔɛ chɛ ɔ!”
An‑na yee tɛ buɛ min dɔ, an ni an 'na doma n na meche meche ka wan banda a, mbɛ an yɛ‑a, an‑na gbangbanɛ a sɛ banda a, faatɛ ɔ Pɔɔ ma.

Mbɛ Domi mɔɛ soya n kun ti chɛ, a‑a a fɔ a 'a mɔɛ n ye, a ɔ, an ni ta Pɔɔ a baachi ɔ. A‑a a fɔ wan to an ye, a ɔ, an ni a gbasi pien bosa a, mbɛ an yɛ‑a, an‑na a ɔ tisa, ni fen‑na a ma, mɔɛ n mbe yee bonda chɛ tɛ tena ka a ma.

Chɛɛ an‑na a kuu sɔ kɛn a chii‑a yuu a, a gbasi koe a, mbɛ soya gbakoo chɛ, min ni ka nɔ sɔ ɔ, Pɔɔ‑a a ɔ tisa. A ɔ, “Mmɔ 'a sawa dɔnden fan mu a ma, Domi mɔɛ gbasi koe a bosa a pien, kaa a ma tɛ nin bɛ min ma, ko yama ma koe a?”
Soya gbakoo chɛ‑a bai chɛ a min kɛn, a ta‑a wan an kun ti tena, mbɛ a ɔ, “E fen ma‑a gbɛ? A yen ko, kamin chɛ mu Domi mɔɛ an na.”
Mbɛ soya n kun ti chɛ, a ta‑a Pɔɔ tena, mbɛ a ɔ, “Domi mɔɛ mu i a? A fɔ wɛ n ye, tea gbu a?” Mbɛ Pɔɔ‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “Tea a, Domi mɔɛ mu n na.”
Mbɛ soya n kun ti chɛ, a‑a a fɔ Pɔɔ ye, a ɔ, “N tana, n‑na kɔpɔ chenama wa an be, ma koe a Domi mɔɛ a.” Pɔɔ sin dɔ te, “Chɛɛ n tana, Domi mɔɛ tiki tiki mu n na.”

Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, mɔɛ miin ma bɛndenɛ ni ka Pɔɔ ɔ tisa koe a, an gbɛɛ‑a an ma yɛ kuu kɔ, an ka‑a a baima. A sin, soya n kun ti chɛ wɛɛ, a chian‑da wan. Koe min na mu, a‑a a ɔ sɔn fan gbɛ, mbɛ a‑a yɔɔɛ chɛ Pɔɔ min ma, mbɛ Domi mɔɛ chɛndɛ chɛndɛ mu.

Chɛɛ an ban‑da ɔ ka dɔndɔɛ ma, soya n kun ti chɛ, a toen ni kɛn a ni a ɔ sɔn, koe min gbu na‑a a ma, Chu mɔɛ n‑na kunɛ si Pɔɔ kun ma, a‑a a fuin. Mbɛ Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa nu, a‑a a fɔ an ye, an bɛ Chu kuti wa ɔ mɔɛ n na, a ɔ, an ni na, an ni bɛn. An bɛn‑da kɛn, a yii‑a wan Pɔɔ a, a‑a a sɔ an chen kɔɔ.
Mbɛ Pɔɔ‑a kuti wa chɛ ma fɛn, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “N suun ma nyɔɛ nu, a ka n suun tima ma, aan a sɔ tee chɛ ma, n ma sika ni n fandi ɔ. A sin, n mbe tachɛ tena tea chia an na, Yataa chen kɔɔ.”
Mbɛ Ananiyasi, min ni Chu mɔɛ n 'na tɛ mɔ wa a Yataa tena, a‑a a fɔ mɔɛ n ye, miin ni sɔ ɔ Pɔɔ baima, a ɔ, an ni a da ɔ gbasi.

Mbɛ Pɔɔ‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “Yataa wɛɛ, ɛ i da ɔ gbasi‑a wan, i nɛnɛn fea ti chɛ. E si ɔ pan, kaa a tɛ koe an na, yɔ mmɔ 'a sawa, a‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, sawa chɛ ma min fɔ ni, e ka an ma‑a, a fɔ koe a, i ɔ, an ni n gbasi.”
Mbɛ mɔɛ miin ni ka sɔ ɔ Pɔɔ baima, an‑na a fɔ a ye, an dɔ, “E ka koɔ‑a mɔɛ min tena, an mu Chu n tɛ mɔ wa a Yataa tena. E chɛ main fan?”
Mbɛ Pɔɔ ɔ te, “N suun ma nyɔɛ nu, n nii ma a ɔ sɔn ka, mbɛ an mu mmɔ 'a tɛ mɔ wa a Yataa tena. Koe min na mu, Yataa 'a gboo ɔ te, a ɔ, ‘Mɔ ee bai yama sa, a si i 'a mɔɛ n 'na mansa ma.’ ”

Pɔɔ‑a a ɔ yen fan, mbɛ fanka chɛ tɛ ɔ, mɔɛ dɔ n ni Sadusii mɔɛ n fan na, mɔɛ dɔ n sin ni Fayisii n fan na. A‑a chɛ ɔ yen kɛn, mbɛ a koɔ‑a, a kuiɛ ma sɛenɛ a, Chu kuti wa chɛ tena, a ɔ te, “N suun ma nyɔɛ nu, n mbe dɔbɛn chɛ an dɔ, an mbe min chee Fayisii dɔbɛnɛ. N‑na n woo mɔɛ n tan an dɔ, n mbe e na to suun‑da. A sin, n mbe nɛ kuti chɛ ɔ, koe min na mu, n yii na tɛen fan mu, mbɛ ni mɔ gbu fa‑a, ɛ a kɔɔ sɔ wan to a ka saya ɔ.”
A‑a chɛ fɔ kɛn dechee, mbɛ Fayisii mɔɛ chɛ nu, nɔ kuti wa chɛ ɔ, koɛ bea‑a an tɛ ɔ, an bɛ Sadusii mɔɛ n na. Mbɛ an kuti wa chɛ, a gbu du‑a kaina fea a.

Koe min na mu, Sadusii mɔɛ n mbe a fɔ wan, mbɛ ni mɔ gbu fa‑a, a ee che to a kɔɔ sɔ‑a kamba ɔ. A yɛ to, an dɔ, maeka n mbe ee nɔ, nyina dɔ mende wɛɛ ee nɔ. Chɛɛ Fayisii n tana, an danden fan ni ko sawa chɛ n gbɛɛ a.

Mbɛ an gbɛɛ bun‑da sɔnkɔ sɔnkɔ wa chɛ‑a. Mbɛ Chu mɔɛ n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ dɔ nu, miin ni Fayisii gbee a, an sɔ‑a. Mbɛ an dɔ, “Nn ma bai yama kan kɔ kan yen ni, Pɔɔ‑a min fɔ. Mmɔ ma a ɔ sɔn, kɔkɔɛ maeka mu, min koɔ‑a a tena, chɛ ma, kɔkɔɛ nyina dɔ mende nu mu.”

An to‑a kɔɔsa chɛ an dɔ, mbɛ a ma‑a sɔnkɔ sɔnkɔ wa a. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, soya chɛ n kun ti chɛ chian‑da, mbɛ a‑a a yii na chii Pɔɔ bɔ koe a an tɛ ɔ, an ma na a a panda panda an boo a. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ a 'a soya mɔɛ n ye, a ɔ, an ni ta, an ni Pɔɔ bɔ an tɛ ɔ gbasaya a, an ni na a a baachi ɔ.

Mbɛ a yɛɛ dɔndɔ gbe chɛ ma, Mansa Chisɔsi na‑a, a sɔ‑a Pɔɔ baima. Mbɛ Chisɔsi gbu ɔ, “I ma chian. I‑a a ɔ yian buɛ min dɔ, mɔɛ n na Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, i‑a koe min dɔ sɔn, a si n ma, e an ma tena to pan bɛɛ Domi duu ɔ.”
Banda ɔ ka‑a kɛn, mbɛ Chu mɔɛ dɔ nu, an bɛn‑da, an‑na dɔbɛnɛ chɛ, a si Pɔɔ ma. Mbɛ an‑na an gboo, an dɔ, an mbe ee fen kɔ fen daun, an sin mbe ee yii wɛɛ min, aan an ni Pɔɔ fa.
Mɔɛ miin‑na koe chɛ ɔ bɛn, an benden ni mɔ bi naaninɛ ma.
Mbɛ an‑na an kɔɔ sɔ, an ta‑a Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa n tena, an bɛ Chu gbakoo n na. Mbɛ an‑na a fɔ, an dɔ te, “Nn‑na nn gboo kaina dɔndɔ, mbɛ nn ma fen kɔ fen daun, aan nn ni Pɔɔ fa.

Nn toen mu min na sanche gbɛ, a ma wɛ, wo bɛ mmɔ 'a kuti wa chɛ a, wo ni sakana a ta Domi soya n kun ti chɛ tena, na koe a an Pɔɔ a, wo tena. Wo a ma, yɔ wo toen mu, wo ni a ɔ tisa wan chɛndɛ chɛ, a 'a bai ɔ gbɛ koe a. Chɛɛ a e na to a fo‑a wo tena, nn mbe ma‑a wan gbɛ a ma kɔn‑da, a fa koe a.”
Chɛɛ boo kɔɔ mɔnɛ chɛ, a puin‑da wan Pɔɔ bain denɛ too ɔ. Mbɛ a don‑da baachi chɛ ɔ, a‑a an yii ma koe ɔ yian Pɔɔ a.
Mbɛ soya gbakoo dɔndɔ, Pɔɔ‑a a chee. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ a ye, a ɔ, “Ta n ye kamin tɔngbɔɛ chɛ a, wo kun ti chɛ tena. Bai chenama an mbe a da a, a ɔ yian koe a a a.”

Mbɛ soya gbakoo chɛ‑a kamin tɔngbɔɛ chɛ ya, a ta‑a a a, an kun ti chɛ tena. Mbɛ a ɔ, “Kamin chɛ mmɔ boo ɔ bia ɔ, min tɔ mu ka Pɔɔ, an‑na n chee, mbɛ a‑a n dɔ tisa, a ɔ, n ni na kamin tɔngbɔɛ chɛ a i tena. Koe min na mu, a ɔ, bai chenama an mbe a da a, a ɔ yian koe a i a.”
Mbɛ soya n kun ti chɛ, a‑a kamin tɔngbɔɛ chɛ bia a boo ma. Mbɛ an fea ta‑a, mɔ dɔ mende nii kaina min, mbɛ a‑a a ɔ tisa, a ɔ, “Fen mbe i da a, a fɔ koe a n ye?”

Mbɛ kamin tɔngbɔɛ chɛ ɔ, “Chu gbakoo chɛ nu, an gbɛɛ‑a an kun puin kaina dɔndɔ, i ɔ tisa koe a, i ni Pɔɔ a ta Chu kuti wa chɛ ɔ. An mbe a ma tena wan, yɔ an toen mu, an ni a wakoe an kɔɔ gbɛngbɛn chɛndɛ chɛ.

Chɛɛ i ma i too ma sɔ an ma. Koe min na mu, mɔɛ n mbe wan nun dɔ, Pɔɔ ma kɔn tena. An mɔɛ nu, an benden mu mɔ bi naanin bɛɛ ma. An‑na an gboo wan, mbɛ an mbe ee daun chɛ, an sin mbe ee yii wɛɛ min, aan an ni Pɔɔ fa. An gbu sin ma bɛndenɛ mu gbɛ sanche, a ma koe a. An mbe gbɛ dechee i wan ma kɔn tena, an ni a a min, ni e bai min fɔ‑a.”
Mbɛ kun ti chɛ‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “I ma a ɔ yian mɔ ɔ mɔ a, mbɛ i‑a koe chɛ kɔɔ fɔ wan n ye.” Mbɛ a‑a a ma, kamin tɔngbɔɛ ɛnden chɛ, a ta‑a a waa a.

Mbɛ soya n kun ti chɛ, a‑a soya gbakoo fea chee, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Wo wo ma bɛn soya mɔ chɛmɛ fea a, an ta koe a Sisayea duu ɔ, ni awa sawan bɔɛ ben‑da pimbi bundenɛ a. An bɛ ni ta soya mɔ bi wɔnfea a, miin mbe soo n kɔ, a basan an mɔ chɛmɛ fea a, miin mbe tamba a dɛ.
A yɛ to, wo soo ɔ bɛn Pɔɔ ko a, a ni si a kɔ, mbɛ wo‑a a kun ma fɛn, aan a ni che Kɔfana Fedisi tena.”
Mbɛ soya n kun ti chɛ, a‑a gboo sin nyɛn fan kɔfana chɛ tena, a si Pɔɔ ma.
N fan, Kaudiyɔsi Disiyasi, n fan mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena kai wa chɛ tena, Kɔfana Fedisi. Fa, n ni i kɔndɔn.
Chu mɔɛ chɛ n‑na kamin chɛ an bia. An toen ni, an ni a fa. N‑na a a min fan, mbɛ Domi mɔɛ an nɛ a a. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, nn bɛ ta‑a n 'na soya mɔɛ n na, mbɛ nn‑na a bɔ an boo ɔ.
N toen fan ni, n ni a ɔ sɔn, ni an‑na a bia koe min ko a. Mbɛ n ta‑a an Pɔɔ a, an 'na kuti wa chɛ ɔ.
N‑na a kɔɔ gbɛngbɛn fan, n‑na a ɔ yen, mbɛ a ma ko yama kan kɔ kan ma ni, ɛ saya ma sɔn min ko a. Chɛ ma, an ni a sa pimbi chenɛ a. An‑na a bia dechee, an ta sawa n fan ko a, an dɔ, a‑a an yɔn.

Chɛ an fɛ mu, mɔɛ‑a a fɔ kɛn n ye, mbɛ Chu mɔɛ n mbe dɔbɛnɛ chɛ tena, a fa koe a, n ma tima yayi ni. N‑na a ma wan, an na‑a i tena. Mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ, miin‑na a bia, n‑na a fɔ wan an bɛɛ ye, mbɛ an ni ta an 'na bai a i tena.
Mbɛ soya chɛ n‑na a ma ka wan, yɔ an kun ti chɛ‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ an ye, a ma koe a. An ta‑a wan Pɔɔ a pimbi ɔ, Andipatisi duu ɔ.
Banda ɔ ka‑a kɛn, soya mɔɛ chɛ dɔ n yɛ‑a wan baachi ɔ, chɛɛ an‑na an bɔɛ dɔ n to wan nɔ, miin ni soo a bui, ta koe a Pɔɔ a.
An che‑a kɛn Sisayea duu ɔ, an ta‑a wan Pɔɔ a kɔfana chɛ tena, mbɛ an‑na gboo nyɛndenɛ chɛ wɛɛ be a ma.
Mbɛ kɔfana chɛ‑a gboo chɛ kan. Mbɛ a‑a Pɔɔ ɔ tisa, a ɔ, “I ka‑a kaka minan ma?” A‑a a ɔ sɔn kɛn, mbɛ Pɔɔ ka‑a Sidisia chɛnyɛ ɔ wan,
mbɛ a‑a a fɔ a ye, a ɔ, “N mbe n too ma sɔ‑a wan i 'a bai chɛ ma, ni mɔɛ chɛ n na‑a, koɛ ɛ wo tɛ miin na.” A ɔ, an ni Pɔɔ a don kata chɛ ɔ, Mansa Ɛdɔdi Wa na‑a min sɔ.

Tee duu gbakɔ, an na‑a kɛn Pɔɔ a Sisayea duu ɔ, mbɛ Ananiyasi, min ni tɛ mɔ wa a, Chu n tɛ Yataa a, a yii‑a wan nɔ an duu chɛ ɔ, an bɛ Chu gbakoo dɔ n na. Dɔya dɔndɔ wɛɛ ni wan an tɛ ɔ, min tɔ ni Tatudɔsi. An ta‑a wan Kɔfana Fedisi 'a kuti ɔ, mbɛ an‑na koe gbɛɛ ɔ yian, Pɔɔ‑a miin ma.

A sin, an na‑a kɛn Pɔɔ a, kuti chɛ ɔ, Tatudɔsi chɛ bun‑da bai ɔ yian‑da, a si Pɔɔ ma. Tatudɔsi chɛ ɔ, “Kɔfana Fedisi, i mu ka buɛ min dɔ mɔ chenama a, sawa n na teen koe a, a sin, i yiima tɛen mu, an‑na a ma ka faachima ɛ chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ, aan a sɔ bi nyɔn tima ma. I‑a ko sɛsɛ sɔ wan a chia ma chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ, min mbe a ma, nn ni ko chɛndɛ ma sɔn nɛ.
Chɛ sin ko a, nn bu ɔ di chia ɔ chia a, a yɛ to, nn mbe i wai bɔ tena kaka, a si i 'a wai chɛndɛ chɛ n ma.
N ma to ni, n ni ta to pɔɔ, i 'a tima yɔn koe a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, n mbe i disa tena, i ni i too ma sɔ bai kundu ɛndenɛ chɛ ma, n mbe na tena min dɔ yian tena i a, nn gbɛɛ ko a.

Koe min na mu, nn‑na a ɔ yen gbɛ, mbɛ kamin chɛ mu mɔ gbu yama yama an na. A wan mbe gbunɛ a bea kan kɔ kan, Chu mɔɛ n mbe kaina min kan kɔ kan dunya ma. A yɛ to, a wan mu ya ɔ sɔɛ a dɔbɛn chɛ ko a, an mbe min chee, an dɔ, Nasaɛti mɔɛ n 'na dɔbɛnɛ.
A sin gbu, a toen ni a ni baa bɔ Yataa 'a kata chɛ ma, min‑na a ma, nn‑na a bia. Ni i‑a a ɔ tisa, i‑a a ɔ yen‑da wan, mbɛ nn‑na bai miin gbɛɛ ɔ yian, a si a ma, mbɛ nn ma saman ni kan kɔ kan.”
Chu mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ‑a toa si wan a da a bai dɔndɔ gbe chɛ kɔɔ, an dɔ, a gbɛɛ ɛ ka wan.

Mbɛ kɔfana chɛ, a‑a a boo kai Pɔɔ ma, koɔ koe a. Mbɛ Pɔɔ‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “N‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ i mɛen mu mɔɛ n 'na bai sa‑a chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ, nɛ i 'a kuti chɛ ɔ. Chɛ an fɛ mu, n bu ɔ diaen mu, koɔ koe a n fandi ko a, i chen kɔɔ.
Ni i‑a mɔɛ n dɔ tisa, e a ɔ yen‑da wan, mbɛ n sɛ‑a Chuusaɛn duu ɔ wan, Yataa 'a kata ɔ, a fai koe a. A sin, a ka a tee chɛ ma, a sɔ bi ma, a‑a tee tan kun ma fea ya gbɛ.

An sin nii ma n tan ni gbunɛ a bea‑a, a yɛ to, an ma n tan ni a fɔ‑a mɔɛ n ye, an ni koɛ a bea. An ma n tan ni chɛ ma‑a Yataa 'a kata ɔ, an ma n tan ni a ma‑a mmɔ 'a samun chɛ chenɛ n na, n mbe ee baa, a ma koe ma kan kɔ kan an duu gbu ɔ.
An gbu ee che koe ɔ yian‑da, min mbe toa si, an 'na bai chɛ n kɔɔ, a si n ma.

Chɛɛ n mbe dɔn tena chɛ an ma, i chen kɔɔ. Mbɛ nn bemba n ta bemba n 'na Yataa chɛ, n mbe an fai, a sɔ koe a chia chɛ fɛ, Chisɔsi‑a min yian, a sɔ koe a a fɛ. An‑na a fɔ an ma, mbɛ tea chia ma chɛ a. Chɛɛ n danden fan mu ko ɔ ko a, min mbe sawa chɛ ɔ, Yataa na‑a min be Mosisi ma, a basan koe chɛ n na, miin mbe Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n 'na gboo n dɔ.
Yiinatɛ dɔndɔ gbe chɛ, an mbe n dɔ, nn bɛ an na, a si Yataa ɛ min ma‑a. Mbɛ mɔ gbu kan kɔ kan, min tanden mu, ni min ma tan ni, ni a fa‑a, Yataa ɛ an mɔɛ chɛ kɔɔ sɔ wan to, a ka saya ɔ.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, tima ɔ tima ko a, n mbe ko sɛsɛ ɔ bia wan, n yiima a koenɛ ni ma Yataa tena, a basan n bɔ mɔ gbu n bɛɛ a.
“N‑na san sɛsɛ ya wan, n ka‑a kɛn Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. Chɛɛ chɛ gbakɔ, n ta‑a wan nɔ, fen den be koe a yɔn tɔɛ n ma, a yɛ to, yasi bɔ koe a Yataa tena.
N to‑a chɛ an ma‑a, mbɛ an‑na n tan nɔ, Yataa 'a kata chɛ ɔ. An‑na a ɔ yen fan gbɛ, mbɛ n koenɛ ni fion. A tima chɛ a, mɔ fanka fanka nii nɔ, sɔnkɔ sɔnkɔ nii nɔ.
Chɛɛ Chu mɔɛ dɔ nu, miin ka‑a Esia chɛnyɛ ɔ, an ni wan nɔ a tima chɛ a, a sin mbe nyan fan an bɛɛ ni ma nɛ, i chen kɔɔ. An bɛɛ ni an ta koe ɔ yian, ni bai ɔ bai ɛ wan an da a, a si n ma.
Ni chɛ ma, an fandi gbu, an fɛn na‑a ka n na, an ni a ɔ yian, ni n‑na koe min ma, min ma nyin. Tima min na n ni sɔ ɔ, an 'na kuti wa chɛ chen kɔɔ, n‑na ko yama min ma,

min kaen mu ko dɔndɔ gbe chɛ ma. Koe chɛ, n‑na yee tɛ min na, n ni sɔ ɔ an tɛ tima min na. N dɔ, ‘Wo e n dɔ tisa dechee, a si mɔɛ kɔɔ sɔ koe chɛ an ma, a ka saya ɔ. N danden mu an na, wo sin na‑a nɛ n na, kuti chɛ ɔ an ko a.’ ”

Mbɛ Kɔfana Fedisi, min‑na ko ɔ ko ɔ sɔn, a si Chisɔsi 'a chia chɛ ma, a‑a kuti da a tɔn fan a tee chɛ a. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “N mbe wo 'a bai sa‑a wan, ni soya n kun ti Disiyasi na‑a tima min na.”

Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ soya gbakoo chɛ ye, min ni pimbi chenɛ kun ma, a ɔ, an ma Pɔɔ a bɔ pimbi chen chɛ a. Chɛɛ a ɔ, an ni a ma, Pɔɔ ni bun fia sima bia‑a. A sin, a ɔ, an ma Pɔɔ dia nyɔɛ kan kɔ kan bai basan koe a a ma.

Tee kuunden gbakɔ, Kɔfana Fedisi na‑a wan, an fea a 'a musu Dusida a, min ni Chu mɔɛ a. Mbɛ a‑a mɔɛ n sɔ, an ni ta Pɔɔ bi. Mbɛ an‑na an too ma sɔ wan Pɔɔ ma, a ɛ bai ɔ yian‑da, a si kaifa ma Chisɔsi Chasi a.

Pɔɔ‑a koe n tɛnsɛ wan, a si koe n ma Yataa chen kɔɔ, tea ɛ koe miin dɔ. A yɛ to, ni mɔɛ e kun buɛ min dɔ, i ni tachɛ i wandi a chɛndɛ chɛ. A‑a koe n tɛnsɛ wan to, a si gbɛmbo tee ma, min mbe na tena. Kɔfana Fedisi chian‑da wan, mbɛ a ɔ, “E ka‑a gbɛ ta‑a. N mbe i chee‑a wan to, ni n‑na tima ma sɔn, tima min na.”
A tima dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, a ni wan a yii ma, mbɛ Pɔɔ ɛ don too ɔ woo be‑a wan a ma. Chɛ an fɛ ni, a ni Pɔɔ chee wan pɛɛpɛɛ, chia ɔ bɔɛ chɛ koe a.

Chɛɛ san fea ben‑da kɛn, Kɔfana Fedisi bɔ‑a wan kɔfanaya ma. Mbɛ Pɔsiyɔsi Fesɔsi yɛ‑a a gba ɔ. Kɔfana Fedisi toen fan ni, a ni a ɔ yian, mbɛ a ni deman tena wan Chu mɔɛ n ma, min‑na a ma, a‑a Pɔɔ da a tɔndenɛ to pimbi chenɛ a.
Tee sawa gbakɔ kɛn Kɔfana Fesɔsi na‑a Sisayea duu ɔ, a 'a kɔfana wai kuu sɔ koe a, a sɛ‑a wan Chuusaɛn duu ɔ.
A che‑a kɛn Chuusaɛn, Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa nu, ni Chu n ya ɔ sɔɛ nu, an‑na a ɔ yian Kɔfana Fesɔsi a, mbɛ Pɔɔ‑a sawa sɛsɛ yɔn fan. An‑na Kɔfana Fesɔsi disa wan,
a ni basan an ma, a ma koe a, an ni na Pɔɔ a Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. An‑na chɛ fɔ, koe min na mu, an na‑a a ɔ bɛn fan, a fa koe a chia tɛ.
Mbɛ Kɔfana Fesɔsi ɔ, “Pɔɔ ɛ ma gbanɛ ɔ Sisayea. N fandi gbu wɛɛ, n mbe yɛ tena wan nɔ sanche.
Wo a ma, nn bɛ ni ta wo 'a ya ɔ sɔɛ dɔ n na, an ni a ɔ yian nɔ, ni kamin chɛ‑a ko yama min nyɔn sima ma.”

Kɔfana Fesɔsi‑a tee sɛin ya wan Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, chɛ ma, tee tan nyɔn sima, a e na to yii‑a Sisayea duu ɔ. A che‑a tee min na, a banda ɔ ka da ma, a si‑a wan kuti ɔ, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, an ni na Pɔɔ a, a chen kɔɔ.
An na‑a kɛn Pɔɔ a, Chu mɔɛ miin ka‑a Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, an sɔ‑a wan gbɛɛ Pɔɔ 'a tindanɛ. Mbɛ an Chu mɔɛ n bun‑da kun sɛsɛ si‑a Pɔɔ kun ma, an nii che toa si‑a miin kɔɔ.
Chɛɛ Pɔɔ koɔ‑a wan a wandi ko a, a ɔ, “N ma ko yama kan kɔ kan ma ni, a si Chu sawa ma, n ma a ma ni, a si Yataa 'a kata ma, n mbe ee baa, a ma koe a, a si Domi kun ti wa ma.”
Chɛɛ Kɔfana Fesɔsi toen ni, a wakoe a ni dia Chu mɔɛ n ye, mbɛ a‑a Pɔɔ ɔ tisa, a ɔ, “E dɔn‑da wan, n ni i a ta Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, i 'a bai chɛ sa koe a nɔ?”
Chɛɛ Pɔɔ ɔ te, “N mbe ka sɔ ɔ, Domi kun ti wa ta kuti tongbo gbu an kɔɔ ka, n 'na bai chɛ ɛ sa kaina. I wandi gbu ban‑da a ɔ yen‑da, mbɛ n ma ko yama kan kɔ kan ma ni, Chu mɔɛ n na.

Ni n na‑a sawa an yɔn, n ni ko yama ma, an mbe che n fa‑a min ko a, n mbe ee che an disa‑a n bɔ koe ma a ɔ. Chɛɛ ni tea ee koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ɔ, an‑na miin si ka n kun ma, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee che n be‑a an ma. Chɛ an fɛ mu, n 'na bai ni ta Domi kun ti wa tena.”
Mbɛ Kɔfana Fesɔsi‑a a kun puin kɛn a 'a gbakoo n ma, mbɛ a ɔ, “I‑a a fɔ wan, i ɔ, i 'a bai a ni ta Domi kun ti wa tena, a sin, e ta tena gbɛ nɔ wan.”
Tima ɛnden gbakɔ, Mansa Akipa an fea a tensa musu Banisi a, an na‑a wan Sisayea duu ɔ, Kɔfana Fesɔsi kɔndɔn koe a.
An‑na tee kuunden ya kɛn nɔ, Kɔfana Fesɔsi‑a Pɔɔ wakoe ɔ yian fan mansa chɛ a. A ɔ te, “Kaminɛ ɛ wan nɛ, Kɔfana Fedisi‑a min to pimbi chenɛ a.

A sin, n ta‑a kɛn Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa nu, an bɛ Chu gbakoo n na, an‑na kun sɛsɛ si wan Pɔɔ chɛ kun ma. Mbɛ an yɛ‑a, an‑na n dɔ tisa, an dɔ, n ni kaa a tɛ, a fa koe ma.

Chɛɛ n‑na a fɔ wan an ye, mbɛ Domi mɔɛ n mbe ee koe ma ka. An mbe ee kaa a tɛ ka dechee mɔɛ a bai ma. Chɛɛ mɔɛ miin mbe a ma siibia, fɔ ni an‑na a ɔ yian, an mɔɛ chɛ‑a koe min ma. A sin, an mɔɛ chɛ wɛɛ, a ɛ koɔ wan, a si an siibia ma. Chɛ an mbe a ɔ yian, mbɛ tea ɛ wan siibia chɛ mɔɛ n boo ɔ, chɛ ma, ni tea ee an boo ɔ.
An na‑a kɛn nɛ, n nii ma tima kan kɔ kan yayi ni. Chɛɛ tee dɔndɔɛ ma, n‑na kuti si wan, n dɔ, an ni na Pɔɔ a, n chen kɔɔ, an bai chɛ sa koe a.
A koɔ nyɔɛ n bɔ‑a wan ya a ma, an sɔ‑a. Chɛɛ an nii ma che ni bai ɔ bai sa‑a, a si Pɔɔ ma, min mu bai yama a, yɔ n yii ni buɛ min dɔ a ɔ.
Koe miin don‑da an tɛ ɔ dechee, an mu kɔɔsa an na, a si an 'na Yataa fai buɛ ma. A yɛ to, a si kamin dɔndɔ wakoe ma, min tɔ mu Chisɔsi. Kamin chɛ fa‑a wan, chɛɛ Pɔɔ ɔ te, a ɛ fɔɛ ɔ.
N kɔndɔ fii‑a wan, a si n mbe kun buɛ min dɔ, yiima sɛsɛ ma sɔn‑da, a si bai bonda chɛ ma. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, n‑na Pɔɔ ɔ tisa, n dɔ, ni ɛ dɔn fan, n ni a 'a bai a ta Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, a sa koe a nɔ.
Chɛɛ Pɔɔ‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, an ni a to pimbi chenɛ a, aan a 'a bai ni ta Domi duu wa ɔ. N bɛɛ, n‑na a ma gban fan bia ɔ, aan a ta tima a, Domi kun ti wa wandi tena, a 'a bai chɛ sa koe a.”
Mbɛ Mansa Akipa ɔ Kɔfana Fesɔsi ma, a ɔ, “Ɛ nyan‑da wan, n fandi gbu, n ni kamin chɛ kan dɔ kuiɛ a min.” Mbɛ Kɔfana Fesɔsi ɔ, “E a a min‑da wan sinan.”

Banda ɔ ka‑a kɛn, mbɛ Mansa Akipa na‑a, an fea Banisi a, basɔmaya wa ɔ, mɔɛ ni min be tena an ma. Mbɛ an don‑da tongbo wa chɛ kɔɔ, an bɛ soya n ya ɔ sɔɛ chɛ n na, a basan duu ɔ gbakoo n na. Mbɛ Kɔfana Fesɔsi‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, an ni na Pɔɔ a, kuti chen kɔɔ.

Mbɛ Kɔfana Fesɔsi ɔ, “Mansa Akipa, a basan wo gbɛɛ a, wo wɛn mbe nɛ sanche. Wo‑a kamin chɛ yen nɛ sɔ ɔ, kuti chen kɔɔ. Chu mɔɛ n gbɛɛ, sanche nɛ chɛ, ni miin mbe Chuusaɛn, an fan‑na a ma siibia n tena. An ni wan yee tɛ tena, mbɛ n ni a ma, an ni a fa.

Chɛɛ n ma che ni, ko yama kan kɔ kan dɔ yen‑da, kamin chɛ‑a min ma, n mbe kaa a tɛ min ma, a ni fa. A sin, a wandi ban‑da ka buɛ min dɔ a fɔ‑a, mbɛ a 'a bai ni ta Domi kun ti wa tena, n dɔn‑da a ta koe ma nɔ.

Chɛɛ ko gbu ee nɔ, n mbe min nyɛn, a si a ma, kun ti wa chɛ tena. Chɛ an fɛ mu, n na‑a Pɔɔ chɛ a, wo gbɛɛ chen kɔɔ, a bɛɛ bɛɛ i wan Mansa Akipa, wo wandi ni a a bai kɔɔ gbɛngbɛn. Koe ɛ ma‑a wan nɔ, n mbe min nyɛn.
Koe min na mu, n ma yiimatɛ yen ni a ɔ, n ni pimbi chen na sa mɔɛ a ta, kun ti chɛ tena, ni n ma a ɔ yian ni, a‑a ko yama min ma.”
Mbɛ Mansa Akipa‑a a fɔ Pɔɔ ye, a ɔ, “Pɔɔ, n too ɛ wan gbɛ i ma, koɔ koe a i wandi ko a.” Mbɛ Pɔɔ‑a a boo ɔ fuin, a bun‑da koɔ‑a a wandi ko a.
A ɔ, “Mansa Akipa, n‑na a ya wan, mbɛ n duaen mu bi, koɔ koe a n fandi ko a, i chen kɔɔ. N ni n fandi kun bɔ koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ɔ, Chu mɔɛ chɛ n‑na miin si n kun ma.
Tea gbu bɛɛ bɛɛ mu, mbɛ i‑a Chu manda n sɔn fan, a basan kɔɔsa chɛ n na, an mbe miin bia. Chɛ an fɛ mu, n mbe i disa tena, i ni i too be n ma chɛndɛ chɛ.

“Chu mɔɛ n gbɛɛ‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, n ni fɔɛ min nyɔn sima ɔ, n kamin tɔngbɔ tɔɛ a. An‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, a ka a tima chɛ ma, n tachɛ‑a buɛ min dɔ, n 'na fɔɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, n ta chɛnyɛ ɔ, a basan Chuusaɛn duu wɛɛ ɔ a.

Tima ɔ tima ko a, an‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ a saa gbu a, n ni dɔbɛn chɛ an dɔ, min nii sai bɔ. An dɔbɛn chɛ, Yataa fai koe a, an ni min chee, an dɔ, Fayisii dɔbɛnɛ. Ni an mbe dɔn‑da wan, an mbe che wan siiya bɔ‑a chɛ ma.
Mbɛ sanche gbɛ, n mbe ka sɔ ɔ nɛ, n gbɛmbo koe a an ko a. Tooɔdia chɛ an ko a mu, n yii na tɛen mu min ma, Yataa na‑a min chɛ mmɔ bemba n ta bemba n na.

An tooɔdia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ, mmɔ 'a dambi tan kun ma fea chɛ n gbɛɛ, an yii na tɛen mu an ma sɔn koe a. A sin fan mbe a ma tena, an mbe Yataa fai tena, su ɔ tee a, an faa gbɛɛ a. Mansa Akipa, yiinatɛ chɛ an ko a mu ka, n mbe nɛ sɔ ɔ kuti chen kɔɔ.
Wo wan, wo e a ya tena wan, mbɛ a ee che ma‑a, wo ni dan chɛ a, mbɛ Yataa ɛ mɔɛ kɔɔ sɔ wan, a ka saya ɔ. Fen mu, wo e wo yii na chii tena ka?
“N fandi gbu wɛɛ, n ni n yii na chii wan, ko kan kɔ kan ma koe a, min ni a ma, Chisɔsi tɔɛ ni fa, Nasaɛti mɔɛ chɛ.

N‑na chɛ an ma Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. N‑na a ma wan, Chu mɔɛ n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa, a‑a gbasaya be n ma, n‑na Yataa 'a mɔɛ n sa pimbi chenɛ a. Chɛ dechee nii ma, chɛɛ an ni kɛn kaa a tɛ‑a, an fa koe ma, n‑na toa si wan a kɔɔ.

Tima sɛsɛ ko a, n‑na an na mɔnɛ wan, Chu n 'na samun chɛ chenɛ n na. A sin to, n‑na butuin chɛ wan, a ma koe a, an ni Yataa main. Mbɛ n yɛ‑a, faatɛ wa ɔ, n‑na ko yawaenɛ sa an ma. N ni ta wan duu wa dɔ mende n bɛɛ ɔ, chɛnyɛ dɔ mende n dɔ.
“Chɛ ko a, n‑na chia bia wan, n bun‑da ta‑a Damasikɔsi duu ɔ. Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa nu, an fan‑na gbasaya be n ma, ta koe a nɔ, an da a kuiɛ kɔɔ.

Mansa Akipa, n ni Damasikɔsi chia chɛ ma wan, tee dɔndɔ a, mbɛ tee che‑a kɛn kun tɛ, n‑na man ba yen, a‑a n na tindan, nn bɛ mɔɛ chɛ n na, nn ni ta tena tachɛ chɛ ɔ miin na. Man chɛ ka‑a banda a wan, min ni man tena taun, a ben tee ma.
Nn gbɛɛ bea‑a kɛn duu ma, mbɛ n‑na mɔɛ kuiɛ a min, ɛ a fɔ‑a n ye, Ibu koɛ ɔ, a ɔ, ‘Sɔɔ, Sɔɔ, fen mu e ko ma gbaaenɛ sa tena ka n ma? E ka i wandi an tɔɔ tena fuu.’
“Mbɛ n‑na a fɔ, n dɔ te, ‘Nyɔn mu chɛ a?’ “Mbɛ mansa chɛ ɔ, ‘N fan mu, n fan Chisɔsi, e ko ma gbaaenɛ sa tena ka min ma.

Chɛɛ i kɔɔ sɔ, i ni sɔ. Koe min na mu, n‑na n fandi yian i a, n boo sɔ koe mu i ma, wai chɛ koe a n ye. I ni siiya bɔ mɔɛ tɔɛ n tena, a si koe chɛ n ma, i‑a miin dɔ yen bi, a yɛ to, n mbe a ma‑a, e min dɔ yen‑da ya ɔ ma.
N mbe ma‑a i kun bɔ‑a Chu mɔɛ n boo ɔ, an bɛ chɛ n na, miin ma Chu mɔ a. N mbe na tena i sɔ‑a miin tena,

i ni an ya a ka, i ni an bɔ pimbi ɔ, a na manɛ ɔ, i ni an bɔ Sitana boo ɔ, an ni ma Yataa 'a gbasaya kɔɔ. Chɛ ni a ma, Yataa ni a boo bɔ an 'na ko yama n dɔ, mbɛ an‑na an si tena ma sɔn, Yataa 'a mɔɛ n tɛ ɔ. Mɔɛ chɛ nu, Yataa ɛ a ma, miin mbe ma tenchen a ko a, koe min na mu, an‑na an kai fa n na.’
“Chɛ an fɛ mu, Mansa Akipa, n nii ma koe chɛ kɔɔsa bia ni, n‑na min dɔ yen, a ka banda bu ɔ, yɔ n ni cho ɔ wan.

N‑na a ɔ yian Damasikɔsi pɛn, mbɛ n‑na a ɔ yian Chuusaɛn duu ɔ wɛɛ. A yɛ to, n‑na a ɔ yian Chudia chɛnyɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, ni mɔɛ chɛ n tena, miin nii ma Chu mɔɛ n na. N‑na a ɔ yian fan an gbɛɛ a, mbɛ an ni an kan kɔ sɔ an 'na ko yama n na, an ni an ya a mun Yataa ma. A sin, an ni koe n ma, yɔ mɔɛ nu, miin‑na an kan kɔ sɔ an 'na ko yama n na.
Wai chɛ an ko a mu, Chu mɔɛ chɛ n chɛ‑a n ma, n ni tima min na Yataa 'a kata ɔ, an sin toen ni, an ni n fa.

Chɛɛ a ka a tee chɛ ma, a sɔ bi ma, Yataa basan‑da wan n ma. A sin, n mbe bi nɛ sɔ ɔ, bai ɔ yian koe a wo gbɛɛ a, a ni ma mɔ chenama n na, chɛ ma, an ni ma chɛ n bɛɛ a, baa ee miin ma. N mbe ka min fɔ tena wo ye, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n bɛɛ, an‑na an ko dɔndɔ gbe chɛ an fɔ wo ye. Mosisi wɛɛ, a‑a an fɔ,
mbɛ mmɔ kun ka mansa ɛ mɔnɛ ɔ bia wan. A yɛ to, a wan mbe ma‑a mɔɛ saa saa a, min mbe a kɔɔ sɔ‑a, a ka saya ɔ. A sin, a wan mbe manɛ yian‑da Chu mɔɛ n na, an bɛ chɛ n na, miin ma Chu mɔ a.”
A sin koɔ‑a kɛn ka buɛ chɛ ɔ, a wandi kun bɔ koe a mɔɛ chɛ n boo ɔ, Kɔfana Fesɔsi dee‑a wan, a kuiɛ ma sɛenɛ a, a ɔ, “Pɔɔ, i wooen fan mu. Gboo kan ba chɛ, an mbe i yii bɔ tena i ɔ.”
Mbɛ Pɔɔ ɔ te, “Kɔfana Fesɔsi, n ma woo ni. N mbe ka tea ma gbaaenɛ an fɔ tena.

Koe min na mu, Mansa Akipa‑a koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ɔ sɔn fan. A sin fan tena mu, n mbe koɔ tena ka, ko ɔ ko boo ee n na. Koe min na mu, n yiima a koen fan mu, mbɛ a chen kɔɔ mu, koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ma‑a. Koe min na mu, an nii ma chɛ ni a ɔ nun dɔ.
Mansa Akipa, i danden fan mu Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n na, ae? N‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ i danden fan mu an na.”
Mbɛ Mansa Akipa‑a a fɔ Pɔɔ ye, a ɔ, “I toen mu gbɛ, i ni n ma Chisianɛ a, a ɔ wuuma wuuma chɛ a. Ae?”

Mbɛ Pɔɔ‑a a fɔ, “A ɔ ni yansan fan, a ɔ ni wua wan, n ma to ni i dɔndɔ gbe a, chɛɛ mɔɛ tɔɛ gbɛɛ, miin mbe n kuiɛ a min tena ka bi, an ni ma Yataa tena, yɔ n mbe buɛ min dɔ. Yɔɔɛ chɛ dechee, n boo ma, an ma ma an ta ma.”
Mbɛ mansa chɛ‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, an fea kɔfana a, ni Banisi, an bɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ a, an bɛ ni si ɔ miin na,
mbɛ an ta‑a pɔɔ, an sɔ‑a. An sɔ‑a kɛn, mbɛ an dɔ an nyɔn ma, an dɔ te, “Kamin chɛ ma ko yama kan kɔ kan ma ni, a ɛ saya ma sɔn min ko a, chɛ ma, ni a ee sa pimbi chenɛ a.”
Mbɛ Mansa Akipa‑a a fɔ Kɔfana Fesɔsi ye, a ɔ, “I ni i boo ka‑a wan kamin chɛ a, ni a nii ma a 'a bai a ta koe fɔ ni Domi kun ti wa tena.”

A tima che‑a, dɔbɛnɛ chɛ‑a wan nn si koe a dɛndɛ ɔ, a ta Itadi chɛnyɛ ɔ. An‑na Pɔɔ be wan, a basan pimbi chenɛ a sa mɔɛ dɔ mende n na, Chudiɔsi dɔndɔ ma. Chudiɔsi chɛ, a ni soya gbakoo an na, soya chɛmɛ dɔndɔ ko a, an ni miin chee, an dɔ, Domi Kun Ti Wa Soya nu.
Nn sɛ‑a wan dɛndɛ ɔ, min ka‑a Adamitiɔn duu ɔ, min ni gbɛ ta koe a duu chɛ n dɔ, yii a sanɛ Esia chɛnyɛ ɔ. Mbɛ nn ta‑a, nn bɛ Ayisitakɔsi a, min ni Tɛsadonika duu ɔ mɔɛ a, a ka Masidonia chɛnyɛ ɔ.
Tee dɔndɔɛ ma, mbɛ nn che‑a Sidon duu ɔ. Chudiɔsi‑a Pɔɔ bia wan chɛndɛ chɛ, mbɛ a‑a a boo ka a ma. A ɔ, Pɔɔ ni ta, a ni a dia nyɔɛ n yen, basan koe a a ma, mbɛ a yɛ‑a.
Mbɛ nn ka‑a nɔ, nn bun‑da ta‑a. Chɛɛ nn‑na chia dɔ gbɛɛ bia wan, Saipɔsi yii tinɛ ɔ baima, fia nii nn ya kɔɔ tawa kaina min, koe min na mu, fia wa an ni bɔ tena.
Nn‑na kɔ yii gbu tɛ kɛn, nn ben‑da Sidisia a san‑da, an fea Panfidia chɛnyɛ a. Mbɛ nn ta‑a Miya duu ɔ, min ni Disia chɛnyɛ ɔ.
Nɔ ni soya gbakoo chɛ‑a dɛndɛ tan, a ka Adɛsandia duu ɔ, min ni ta tena Itadi chɛnyɛ ɔ. Mbɛ a‑a nn na sɛ an dɛndɛ gbu ɔ.

Nn ni dɛndɛ min dɔ, a ni ta tena wan yɛdɛn yɛdɛn, tee sɛsɛ ko a. Nn ya kɔɔ tawa‑a wan, nn mbe e na to che‑a Nidɔsi duu ɔ. Fia nii ma tima be ni nn ma, min‑na a ma, nn‑na dɛndɛ mun Keti yii tinɛ kaka dɔndɔɛ ma, fia nii nn ya kɔɔ tawa kaina. Mbɛ nn ben‑da Samone chia a, min ni yii chɛ sunɛ a den.
Nn tɔɔ‑a wan, ben koe a kɔ yii tindi a sanɛ. Mbɛ n che‑a kaina, an ni min chee, an dɔ, Yii Tɛnda Nyima. A tena ɔ nii ma yansan, an fea Dasiya duu a.

Nn na‑a tima ɔ yansama ya wan, nn 'na tachɛ chɛ ɔ. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, a nii ma nyin to ta koe a yii a, koe min na mu, sanɛ ma taen fan ni gbɛ. Chɛ ko a, Pɔɔ‑a dasi be wan mɔɛ chɛ n ma, miin ni dɛndɛ chɛ kun ma, a ɔ,
“N bɔ nu, n‑na a ɔ yen, mbɛ mmɔ 'a tachɛ a ka nɛ, a ee ma‑a tachɛ chɛndɛ a. Gbunɛ ɛ mmɔ tan‑da wan yii chɛ a. Fenɛ miin gbɛɛ n mbe dɛndɛ chɛ ɔ, an mbe to‑a wan a ɔ, mbɛ mɔ sɛsɛ fɔɛ ɛ to‑a wan a ɔ.”
Chɛɛ soya gbakoo chɛ, a ma a too ma sɔ ni Pɔɔ ma, mɔɔ dɛndɛ wii mɔɛ chɛ, ni dɛndɛ ti n‑na min fɔ, a‑a a too ma sɔ an fan ma.

An ni kaina, a nii ma nyin ma koe a nɔ, chima tima a. Chɛ ko a, mɔɛ miin sɛsɛ ni dɛndɛ chɛ ɔ, an toen ni an ni an tundun yii ɔ, min mbe a ma, an ni che Finisi duu ɔ, ni an mbe kun fan. Finisi ni duu an na, Keti yii tinɛ ɔ. Yii Tɛnda Nyima wɛɛ ni an yii tinɛ dɔndɔ gbe chɛ an dɔ. Chɛɛ tɛnda ni wan nɔ Finisi, min ya a munden ni tee bea boo nyima ɔ, ni a man dɔɛ. An toen ni an ni ma nɔ wan, aan tima chɛ ni ban, tima min na fia wa dɛgbɛ chɛ ɛ bɔ sanɛ ma.

Mbɛ a ɔ ma yansan ni, mbɛ fia‑a a kuu sɔ bɔ‑a tɛfɛɛ, tee bɔ boo nyima ɔ, mbɛ an‑na an yii na chii, mbɛ tee chɛndɛ an nii nɛ, an 'na tachɛ kuu sɔ koe a. Mbɛ an‑na yɔɔɛ chɛ fuin, min chiien ni dɛndɛ gbu ma, mbɛ an bun‑da ta‑a Keti yii tindi a sanɛ.
Chɛɛ a ɔ ma yansan ni to, mbɛ fia wa dɛgbɛ bɔ‑a, a ka yii tin chɛ ɔ. An ni fia wa chɛ sima chee, an dɔ, fia min ka‑a man dɔ chia a, tee bɔ.
A‑a dɛndɛ chɛ ɔ ma ma‑a wan a yama boo a, nn nii ma che ni min dɔ bia‑a, ta koe ya ɔ chia a. Nn bɛɛ, nn‑na nn boo ka dɛndɛ gbu a, an fia boo ɔ.

Fia chɛ sin‑na nn 'na dɛndɛ chɛ tundun fan, aan nn‑na kaina dɔndɔ a ben, yii tinɛ dɔɔma ɔ. An yii tinɛ chɛ tɔ ni Kauda, fia nii ma nn ya kɔɔ tawa ni kaina min. Nɔ ni, nn‑na nn ma chɛɛ chɛ, ya kɔɔ sisi a, dɛndɛ dɔɔma chɛ, nn ni min sawan nn gbaa, a ɔ bɛn koe a.

Nn‑na a bɔ wan yii ɔ, mbɛ nn‑na a a sɛ dɛndɛ wa chɛ bu ɔ. Mbɛ an‑na yuu chii gban dɛndɛ wa chɛ 'a tindanɛ, a ɔ gbɛa koe a. An chianden fan ni, min mbe a ma, dɛndɛ chɛ ma na si tɛɛ kuu ma yii kɔɔ, Dibia chɛnyɛ baima. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, an‑na koa chɛ a mɔndɔ mɔndɔ, min ni fia ya ka dɛndɛ chɛ a bui koe a, min mbe a ma, fia wandi ni ta dɛndɛ gbu a.
A sin, fia to‑a wan nn fichi fichi‑a aan, mbɛ tee dɔndɔɛ ma, an bun‑da feanka n na dɛ‑a yii ɔ, miin ni ka dɛndɛ wa chɛ gbu ɔ.
Mbɛ tee sawan bɔɛ ma, an‑na dɛndɛ gbu ma feanka n bɛɛ a dɛ wan yii ɔ, an fandi gbu boo a.
Tee sɛsɛ ko a, nn nii tee yen, nn nii tɔmbuaka n bɛɛ yen. Fia fichi fichi chɛ ni bɔ tena wan tun gbasaya a. A danka a, nn‑na nn yii bɔ nn fɔɛ kɔ, a nii to nn yii ma, mbɛ nn kunɛ n mbe bɔ‑a wan a ɔ.

Tee sɛsɛ ben‑da ka buɛ min dɔ, mɔɛ chɛ n nii ma daun fen daun ni, Pɔɔ bɔ‑a wan gbɛ, a sɔ‑a an tɛ, mbɛ a ɔ, “N bɔ nu, a ni nyan‑da wan, ni wo na‑a wo too ma sɔ n ma, a saa a. Mmɔ nii bɔ‑a Keti, mmɔ ni fo feanka bonda chɛ n gbɛɛ a, a yɛ to, mmɔ nii kasaa bonda chɛ ɔ yen‑da.
Chɛɛ sanche gbɛ, n mbe wo disa tena, mbɛ wo ni wo faa bia. Koe min na mu, mmɔ wɛn gbɛɛ ɛ ka nɛ, mmɔ dɔndɔ wɛɛ kun mbe ee to tena koe chɛ ɔ, mmɔ 'a dɛndɛ an kun mbe to‑a a ɔ dechee.
Koe min na mu, kunun yɛɛ ma, Yataa min ta mu n na, a yɛ to, n mbe min fai, a 'a maeka ni wan sɔ ɔ n baima,
mbɛ a ɔ, ‘Pɔɔ, i ma chian. E sɔ‑a wan Domi kun ti wa chɛ chen kɔɔ. A sin yen ko, Yataa chinchin‑da i ma, a basan mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ a, wo bɛ ɛ ka miin na dɛndɛ chɛ ɔ.’
Chɛ an fɛ mu, n bɔ nu, wo wo faa bia. Koe min na mu, n kai faen fan mu Yataa a, mbɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, yɔ a 'a maeka chɛ‑a a ɔ yian buɛ min dɔ n na.
Chɛɛ dɛndɛ chɛ ɛ a fo tena wan mmɔ a, yii tinɛ dɔndɔ ɔ.”

Tee tan kun ma naanin bɔɛ che‑a kɛn, yɛɛ ma, fia wa ni wan tun nn tundun‑da Mɛditeyenia kɔ yii chɛ a ta‑a faa. Su tɛ nyɔn sima a ɔ ni, mbɛ mɔɛ miin ni wai chɛ dɛndɛ chɛ ɔ, an yiima‑a an kɔ, mbɛ nn ni gbɛ gbaa gbaa baima wan.

Mbɛ an‑na yuu a yii yii chɛ ɔ, fen fankama chiien ni min na. Mbɛ an‑na a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ a ka yii chɛ kun ma, a yii a kɔɔ, a ɔ yiien fan ni fiti chɛmɛ dɔndɔ ni fiti bi fea. An ta‑a to ɛnden na, mbɛ an‑na yuu chɛ a yii to, mbɛ an‑na a ɔ yen, mbɛ a ɔ yiien ni gbɛ fiti bi kɔnɔntɔ.

An chianden fan ni, nn 'na dɛndɛ ma na bɛn senɛ n ma, min‑na a ma, mbɛ an‑na kundu wa naanin na yii yii ɔ, min chiien ni dɛndɛ chɛ ma, a gbaa chia a. Chɛ n fan mbe a ma, dɛndɛ ee bui, ni a sɔ‑a. Mbɛ an bun‑da Yataa fai‑a, banda ɔ ka koe a.

Wai chɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu, dɛndɛ chɛ ɔ, an toen ni an ni bɔ dɛndɛ gbu ɔ, an ni an nun. An‑na dɛndɛ ɛnden chɛ, dɛndɛ wa chɛ bu ɔ, an‑na a fuin fan, mbɛ an‑na a a yii yii ɔ. An‑na a ma, yɔ an mbe ka ta tena kundu wa dɔ mende n fan na yii‑a, dɛndɛ wa chɛ ya ɔ.
Chɛɛ Pɔɔ‑a a fɔ wan soya gbakoo chɛ ye, an bɛ soya tɔɛ chɛ n na, a ɔ, “Ni wai chɛ mɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ nu, an ma to ni dɛndɛ chɛ ɔ, wo kun mbe ee bɔ‑a a ɔ.”
Chɛ ko a, soya chɛ n‑na dɛndɛ ɛnden chɛ yuu tɛ, dɛndɛ gbu ta koe a, a wandi ko a.
Banda ɔ ni gbɛ ka tena wan, mbɛ Pɔɔ‑a a fɔ an gbɛɛ ye, a ɔ, an ni fen den daun. A ɔ te an ma, “Tee tan kun ma naanin ka gbɛ, wo e faagbaa ɔ tun, wo gbu sin ma daun fen kan kɔ kan daun ni ɛnden bɛɛ a.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, n mbe wo disa tena, wo ni daun fen den daun. An mbe a ma‑a fanka ni yɛ wo ɔ. Koe min na mu, ko ɔ ko ee ma‑a wo kundi dɔndɔ gbe wɛɛ a, wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ kun ma.”
A sin, Pɔɔ ban‑da kɛn chɛ fɔ‑a an ye, mbɛ a‑a biidi ya, a‑a tando be Yataa ma an gbɛɛ ya kɔɔ, a‑a a ɔ kai kai, mbɛ a bun‑da a daun‑da.
Mbɛ chɛ‑a an gbɛɛ faa chima wan, mbɛ an gbɛɛ‑a daunɛ chɛ, a tima chɛ a.
Nn fɛn gbɛɛ ni dɛndɛ chɛ ɔ, nn danɛ taen fan ni mɔ chɛmɛ fea, mɔ bi wɔnfea kun ma wɔdɔɛ ɔ.
An gbɛɛ‑a an bu fa daunɛ chɛ kɛn, an‑na daun fen chɛ tɔɛ gbɛɛ a dɛ wan yii ɔ, dɛndɛ chɛ fanka bɔ koe a ɔ.

Banda ɔ ka‑a kɛn, wai chɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu dɛndɛ chɛ ɔ, an‑na yii tinɛ yen fan, chɛɛ an nii ma ko ɔ ko ɔ sɔn, a si an kaina chɛ ma. Chɛɛ an‑na kaina yen fan an yii tin chɛ ɔ, min ni yii a, a doee taenɛ ɛ gbaa gbaa ɔ, tɛɛ kuu munyɛ nyima ni min ma. Mbɛ an‑na an yiima ɔ bɛn, ni an mbe kun fan, an ni ta dɛndɛ chɛ a nɔ tindi ma.

Mbɛ an‑na yuu chɛ n tɛ kundu wa chɛ n ma, mbɛ an to‑a gbaa yii chɛ kɔɔ. Mbɛ an yɛ‑a to, an‑na yuu chɛ n fuin kɔn chɛ n ma, miin ni dɛndɛ chɛ mun a ta tena. Mbɛ an‑na koa chɛ a sɛ, kɔnɛ ma dɛndɛ chɛ ya ɔ, fia si koe a ɔ, dɛndɛ chɛ a ta koe ma ya ɔ. Mbɛ dɛndɛ gbu, a‑a a kuu sɔ ta‑a tindi ma.

Chɛɛ dɛndɛ chɛ ya ɔ chia gban‑da wan kaina chɛ, tɛɛ kuu‑a kɔnkɔɛ nyan kaina yii kɔɔ. A nii che ka‑a a gba ɔ. Mbɛ fia wa dɛgbɛ chɛ, a‑a a ma, yii gbugbu chɛ‑a dɛndɛ chɛ ɔ, a gbaa chia ɔ tɛka tɛka‑a gbɛɛ.
Mbɛ soya chɛ n‑na a ɔ bɛn, an ni mɔɛ n gbɛɛ fa, miin ni an boo ɔ bia ɔ. Koe min na mu, an nii ma to ni, an dɔndɔ wɛɛ ni nɔɔɛ chɛ, a ni yii tɛ, mbɛ a‑a a nun, an boo ɔ.

Chɛɛ soya gbakoo chɛ, a nii ma to ni Pɔɔ ni fa. Mbɛ a‑a an na gban, an 'na dɔbɛn chɛ, a ta koe a ya ɔ ma. A‑a min ma dechee, a‑a a fɔ wan an gbɛɛ ye dɛndɛ chɛ ɔ, a ɔ, mɔɛ miin kosan nɔɔɛ chɛ‑a, an pɛn ni tin yii chɛ ɔ, an ni nɔɔɛ chɛ, a ta tindi ma.

Mbɛ mɔɛ tɔɛ n sin, miin mbe ee nɔɔɛ chɛ, an‑na a sɔ an fɛ. Chɛɛ an tana, an mbe ma bun dɔ gbembe tɛnɛ n fan kɔ, chɛ ma, dɛndɛ gbu pɛnchɛnɛ n kɔ. Mbɛ a sin ma‑a ka wan, nn gbɛɛ‑a yii tɛ tindi ma, nn chɛndɛ a.
Nn kun bɔ‑a kɛn a ɔ, mbɛ nn‑na a ɔ gbɛ, mbɛ an yii tinɛ chɛ, an ni a chee, an dɔ, Mata.

Mɔɛ miin sin ni nɔ an kaina chɛ, an‑na ko chɛndɛ min ma nn na, a ɔ gbɛ, an nyɔn sima a ɔ yen koe a. Koe min na mu, an‑na ta a dɛn fan, mbɛ an‑na an boo si nn gbɛɛ kɔɔ, buɔdia ɔ. Sona an ni na tena, a sin, kaina chimaen fan ni kaka.
Pɔɔ‑a sɔ chii kai wan, a bun‑da a chɛ‑a ta chɛ a. Pɔɔ ni kɛn sɔɛ chɛ chɛ‑a ta chɛ a, mbɛ win chɛ‑a a ma, ka yama bɔ‑a, mbɛ a dɛn‑da a boo a.

Duenɛ chɛ nu, an‑na ka chɛ yen kɛn, dɛn dɔ Pɔɔ boo a, an dɔ an nyɔn ma, an dɔ, “Mɔ fa mɔɛ an nɛ kamin chɛ a. Kɔɔsa bia ee chɛ ma. A bɔ‑a wɛɛ boo ɔ boo yii chɛ ɔ, a fɔɛ ɛ a sun da a, chɛɛ mmɔ 'a musu yataa, min mbe tea kaa a tɛ, a‑a a pawa. A kun mbe ee bɔ tena chɛ nɛnɛ ɔ.”
Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, Pɔɔ‑a ka chɛ a fasi wan ta a. Ka chɛ kona ma ko ɔ ko ma ni a a.

Mbɛ an bun‑da a ma kɔn‑da. A ni an yii ma, mbɛ a gboo ɛ fa fa‑a wan, chɛ ma, a ni bea duu ma, mbɛ a fa‑a. Chɛɛ an‑na a ma kɔn fan, tima ɔ yansama ko a, an nii ma a yen ni, ko yama kan kɔ kan ni Pɔɔ tan. Mbɛ an dɔ, yataa dɔndɔ mu a a.

Mɔɛ min ni nɔ mansa a, an yii tin chɛ ɔ, a tɔ ni Pubiɔsi. Sɛnɛ wa ni wan a boo ɔ nɔ, nn baima tanda chɛ ɔ. A bu ɔ dia‑a kaka, a‑a nn yen kɛn. Nn ni wan a 'a sondaya a, tee sawa ko a, a sin‑na nn bia wan chɛndɛ chɛ.

A tima chɛ a, nn‑na a wan Pubiɔsi fa tan fan sa ɔ gbandi ɔ. Chima an na‑a bɔn a ma, a basan wii chɛ a. A sin, Pɔɔ ta‑a wan a kɔndɔn‑da, mbɛ a‑a samunɛ chɛ a ma. A sin‑na a boo bun kɛn dechee Pubiɔsi fa gbandien chɛ ma, a gbu baun‑da.
Chɛ sin ma‑a kɛn dechee, gbandi mɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, an yii tin chɛ ɔ, an na‑a wan Pɔɔ tena, an sin baun‑da wan.
An‑na boo fenɛ sɛsɛ be wan nn ma. A sin, nn 'na dɛndɛ ni ka tena nɔ tima min na, an‑na fen kɔ fen chɛ wan nn 'na dɛndɛ ɔ, nn toen ni miin na.
Kau sawa gbakɔ, nn bɔ‑a wan Mata, dɛndɛ ɔ, mbɛ nn ta‑a. An dɛndɛ chɛ, a na‑a ka Adɛsandia wan. An dɛndɛ chɛ sin, a tɔ ni Banda Bu Ɔ Fɛnɛ Nu. Dɛndɛ chɛ‑a chima tima gbɛɛ ya Mata wan, yii tinɛ chɛ ɔ.
Nn che‑a wan duu dɔndɔ ɔ, min tɔ ni Siyakusi, mbɛ nn si‑a nɔ tee sawa ko a.
Nn ka‑a Siyakusi kɛn, mbɛ nn che‑a Dekiɔn duu ɔ. Nn‑na tee dɔndɔɛ ben kɛn nɔ, fia bun‑da bɔ‑a, a ka tee bɔ boo nyima ɔ. Mbɛ tee fean bɔɛ ma, nn na‑a Putiɔdi duu ɔ.
Suun ma nyɔɛ dɔ nu Chasi ɔ, nn‑na an tan fan nɔ, a sin, an‑na nn dɔ bia wan, ma koe a an 'na sondaya a, tɛn sɔngbɔ dɔndɔ ko a. Mbɛ nn danka‑a gbɛ na‑a Domi duu ɔ.

A sin, suun ma nyɔɛ nu nɔ, Chasi ɔ, an‑na nn ma tɔɛ a min kɛn, an‑na nn tan. An na‑a wan nn ya ɔ, aan a che machiti chɛ ɔ, an mbe min chee, an dɔ, Apiyɔsi Machiti. An dɔ n sin, an na‑a wan, aan a che kaina chɛ, an mbe min chee, an dɔ, Sonda Yia Chen Sawa. Pɔɔ‑a an yen kɛn, a ma‑a wan a ma faachima a, mbɛ a‑a Yataa wai bɔ.
A sin, nn che‑a kɛn Domi duu ɔ, an‑na a ma wan, Pɔɔ ma‑a a kun ma chenɛ a. Chɛɛ soya mɔɛ ya gba ni wan a fɛ.

Tee sawa gbakɔ, Pɔɔ‑a Chu mɔɛ n kun ti n chee wan, miin ni Domi bɛnɛ ɔ. An bɛn‑da kɛn, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “N suun ma nyɔɛ nu, n ma ko yama kan kɔ kan ma ni, mmɔ 'a mɔɛ n na, n ma mmɔ fa n 'na manda yɔn ni. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, an‑na n ma wan pimbi chenɛ a sa mɔɛ a Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, mbɛ an‑na n be Domi mɔɛ n ma.
An ban‑da kɛn n bakoe kɔɔ gbɛngbɛn‑da, an toen ni, an ni n boo ka. Koe min na mu, an nii ma chia kan kɔ kan yen ni, kaa a tɛ koe a, n ni saya ma sɔn.

Chɛɛ Chu n‑na kɔɔsa bia chɛ kɛn chɛ ma, chɛ an‑na a ma, n bɛɛ, chia dɔ gbɛɛ nii n ye, fɔ n 'na bai a ta koe Domi kun ti wa tena. Chɛ ma‑a wɛɛ boo ɔ boo, chɛɛ chɛ ma a ɔ yian ni, mbɛ koe an ni n yii ma, n 'na mɔɛ n ko a.
Chɛ an fɛ mu gbɛ, n‑na wo chee, wo yen koe a, n ni koɔ wo tena. Koe min na mu, n boo ɔ chiien mu ka yɔɔɛ a, a si an koe chɛ an ma, Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n yii na tɛen mu min ma.”

Mbɛ an dɔ a ma, an dɔ, “Nn ma‑a gboo nyɛnden kan kɔ kan ma sɔn ni, a ka Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ, a si i ma. A yɛ to, mmɔ suun ma nyɔ kan kɔ kan, a ma ka ni nɔ, a ni na i 'a siibia a, chɛ ma, a ni bai yama ɔ yian, a si i ma.
Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, nn toen mu, nn ni i wandi kanɛ ɔ kuiɛ a min, nn ni i ta yiima sɔn. Koe min na mu, koe min sien mu Chisian dɔbɛn chɛ ma, nn‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ kan kɔ kan, mɔɛ n mbe a ma nyin fan.”

Mbɛ an‑na tee yian Pɔɔ a, an mbe bɛn tee min ma, a yia chenɛ a. An tee chɛ che‑a kɛn, an na‑a wan a tena, an da a koaen ba. Mbɛ a ka sau ma ma, aan yɛɛ ma tee a, Pɔɔ si‑a wan ko ɔ ko ma, a‑a a ɔ yian mɔɛ chɛ n na. Pɔɔ‑a bai ɔ yian fan, a si Yataa 'a mansaya ma, an yiima mun koe a Chisɔsi tena. A‑a bai chɛ bɔ sawa chɛ an dɔ, Yataa‑a miin be Mosisi ma, a basan gboo chɛ ɔ a, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n 'na gboo chɛ.
A sin, a 'a bai chɛ‑a a ma wan, an dɔ n yiima mun‑da Chisɔsi ma, chɛɛ dɔ n sin, an nii ma dan ni a da a kuiɛ chɛ a.

An mbe e na to bɔ‑a an bɛn chɛ ɔ, Pɔɔ danka‑a bai chɛ an ma an tena, a ɔ, “Yataa Nyina‑a tea an fɔ. A‑a chɛ fɔ wo bemba n ta bemba n fan ye, a‑a bai don kɛn Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ Aisaya da ɔ. Aisaya‑a a fɔ wan Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, ‘Ta Chu mɔɛ chɛ n tena, i ni a fɔ, i ɔ te, “Wo too gbu, ɛ koe a min‑da wan, chɛɛ wo ee ko ɔ ko ɔ gbɛ a, a sin, wo ya gbu, ɛ kaina yen‑da wan, chɛɛ wo ee ko ɔ ko ɔ gbɛ a. Koe min na mu, wo yiima a faen mu, wo too n sin sɔsɔenɛ mu, koe a min koe a, wo ya sin, wo‑a an na chii. Ni chɛ ma, wo ya n ni kaina ɔ yen‑da wan, wo too n ni koe a min, wo yiima ni koe ɔ gbɛ, a sin, wo e wo ya a mun‑da wan n ma, n sin, n fan Yataa, n mbe wo baun‑da wan.” ’ ” Mbɛ Pɔɔ ɔ te gbɛ, a ɔ, “A nyin wo ni a ɔ sɔn gbɛ, mbɛ Yataa 'a bauncha chɛ, a‑a a a che gbɛ mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ ma, miin ma Chu mɔ a. An sin mbe an too ma sɔ‑a wan.” Mbɛ an bɔ‑a kɛn an bɛn chɛ ɔ, an gbɛɛ ni wan an nyɔn kɔɔsa bia‑a, mbɛ an ta‑a an baa nu.
San fea ko a, Pɔɔ ni wan nɔ Domi duu ɔ, an chen chɛ a, a wandi kun ma a a. A sin, a ni a boo si wan mɔɛ gbɛɛ kɔɔ, miin ni na a tena.
A ni bai sa wan an tena, a si Yataa 'a mansaya ma. A yɛ to, a ni mɔɛ n kan fan, a si Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi ma. A nii chɛ ma nun dɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ sin nii a a gban.

N fan Pɔɔ, Chisɔsi Chasi 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ, n fan mbe ka gboo chɛ nyɛn‑da. Yataa an‑na n chee ma koe a a 'a sɔ mɔɛ a, mbɛ a‑a a ma, n ma‑a tenchen mɔɛ a, min mbe a 'a sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian mɔɛ n na.
A 'a sakana bai chɛ, a na‑a a ma wan suun tima a gbɔɔ, a 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n‑na tooɔdia chɛ a a. A sin nyɛnden fan mu a 'a gboo ɔ.
An sakana bai chɛ sien mu a 'a denɛ an ma. A 'a den chɛ a 'a mɔgbuya ta fɛ chia sin, min sien mu a ma, a bɔ‑a Mansa Defidi 'a dambi ɔ wan.
Chɛɛ Yataa Nyina‑a a ɔ yian fan gbasaya wandi ɔ, mbɛ Chisɔsi mu to Yataa 'a denɛ an na. A‑a a ma wan, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi‑a a kɔɔ sɔ a ka saya ɔ.
Yataa‑a a ma wan, Chasi 'a duaya ɔ, nn ma‑a a 'a sɔ mɔɛ a. A‑a chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, nn ni a ma mɔɛ n gbɛɛ dunya ɔ, danaya ni ma an dɔ Yataa ko a, mbɛ an‑na kooya be Chisɔsi ma.
Wo wɛɛ, wo wan Domi mɔɛ chɛ nu, an mɔɛ chɛ n dɔ mu wo a. Wo cheeenɛ mu gbɛ Yataa boo ɔ, ma koe a Chisɔsi Chasi 'a mɔɛ n na.

Chɛ an fɛ mu, n mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena wo tena, wo gbɛɛ Domi duu ɔ. Wo ko a di Yataa ye, a sin‑na wo ya ma koe a a 'a mɔɛ n na. Mmɔ Fa Yataa, an fea Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi a, an 'na dua ni ma wo ma, a basan an 'na faachima a.
Koe saa mu min na, n mbe Yataa wai bɔ tena wo gbɛɛ ko a, Chisɔsi Chasi 'a gbasaya ɔ. N mbe Yataa wai bɔ tena, koe min na mu, dunya gbɛɛ, an mbe a fɔ tena wan danaya min mbe wo ɔ Chisɔsi Chasi ko a.

Yataa an mu n 'na sii a, mbɛ n mbe bai min fɔ tena, tea bai mu. A sin, n mbe wai chɛ tena an ko a n faa gbɛɛ a. Sakana bai chɛ, a si a 'a denɛ ma, n mbe a ɔ yian‑da mɔɛ n na. Yataa‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ wo e wan n 'na yiinachii ɔ tima ɔ tima ko a.
N mbe samunɛ chɛ tena wo ko a tima ɔ tima. A sin, n mbe samunɛ chɛ tena sanche, Yataa ni a ma, n ni kun na‑a wo kɔndɔn‑da nɔ.
Wo yen sɔɛ ɛ n na kaka, min mbe a ma, Yataa Nyina ɛ dua min chɛ tena n na, a ni a chɛ wo wɛɛ ko a, wo ni sɔ gban.
N ta yiima ɔ, n toen mu mmɔ ni basan mmɔ nyɔn ma mmɔ 'a danaya ɔ. Wo 'a danaya ɛ kun‑da wan a ni basan n ma, mbɛ n ta danaya wɛɛ ɛ basan‑da wo ma.

N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, n toen mu wo ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ tima sɛsɛ ko a, mbɛ ɛ ma wan n yii ma tima ɔ tima, n ni na wo kɔndɔn. Chɛɛ koe an‑na a ma, n ma che nin bɛ na‑a wo tena. N toen mu n ni na, min mbe a ma, n ni mɔɛ n ma sɔn wo tɛ ɔ, Domi duu ɔ, miin mbe an kai fa‑a Chisɔsi a. N‑na a ma ka wan kaina sɛsɛ nu mɔɛ n tɛ ɔ, miin ma Chu mɔɛ n na.

Koe min na mu, n gbɔsɔen fan mu mɔ gbu gbɛɛ ko a. N gbɔsɔen fan mu chɛ n ko a, miin bonchenden mu, a basan chɛ n bɛɛ a, miin ma bonchen ni. A yɛ to, chɛ n ko a, miin‑na koe sɔn, a basan chɛ n bɛɛ a, miin ma ko sɔn.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, n ma bɛnden mu tima ɔ tima ko a, Yataa 'a sakana bai ɔ yian koe a wo wɛɛ a Domi duu ɔ.

N 'na danaya Yataa 'a sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a, a da faenɛ mu gban. Koe min na mu, Yataa 'a gbasaya ɛ wan sakana bai chɛ ɔ. Chia mu an na, Yataa ɛ a 'a mɔɛ n baun min na, a 'a mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, miin‑na an kai fa Chisɔsi a. A saa mu Chu mɔɛ n fan na, mbɛ chɛ n bɛɛ, miin ma Chu mɔ a, an na‑a an gbaa chia a.

Koe min na mu, sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɛ a ɔ yian tena wan, Yataa ɛ a ma buɛ min dɔ, mmɔ ni tan a tena. Chɛ ee bɔ ko dɔ mende kan kɔ kan dɔ, mɔɔ dechee danaya dɔndɔ gbe Yataa a. Ɛ wan dechee, yɔ Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, a ɔ, “Mɔɛ min mbe a kai fa‑a Yataa a, ɛ an ya mɔ tandenɛ a, a sin fan mbe kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn.”
Chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, miin mbe ko yama n ma, an fan mbe a ma, mɔɛ n mbe ee tea ɔ sɔn a si Yataa ma. A ka banda bu ɔ, ɛ a ɔ yian‑da wan a faa tɛen mu buɛ min dɔ.
Yataa ɛ an tɔɔ‑a wan, a mu min na, an‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, koe min nyin a ma koe a, a si a ma. Yataa wandi gbu an‑na koe chɛ n yian an na den.

A ka dunya a dan tima ma, mmɔ ee Yataa yen tena, chɛɛ mmɔ ɛ a 'a gbasaya a tinsɔn tena wan. A 'a gbasaya chɛ kuɔ fɔ ko a, a basan a 'a gbasaya a, fenɛ n gbɛɛ a dan koe a dunya ma. Chɛ an fɛ mu, bai ee ma‑a an da a, koe min‑na a ma, an ma Yataa sɔn ni.

An‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ Yataa ɛ wan nɔ, chɛɛ an mbe ee a tando a chia ma, an sin mbe ee a wai bɔ. An mbe yiinachii miin chɛ, ko ɔ ko ee bɔ an dɔ. Fen kɔ fen mbe ee an 'na yiinachii n dɔ, a mu min na, yiinachii yama n fan mbe an dɔ.
A ni an yii ma, mbɛ an yiima tɛen mu kaka, chɛɛ wooya tɔ wa mu an na.

An mbe e na Yataa fai, kuɔ fɔ mansa, an mbe fenɛ n fan fai, an mbe miin nyan. Fenɛ miin bɔen mu mɔ gbu a, mɔ gbu min mbe fa. Chɛ ma, fenɛ miin bɔen mu konde n na, an bɔenɛ ɛ soe n na, an bɔenɛ ɛ sawan fenɛ n bɛɛ a.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, Yataa‑a an to an fandi boo ɔ, ko yama chɛ nu, miin na di an ye, an ni an ma. An sin, an mbe maumaya koe tɛ wan an nyɔn na.

An mbe ee dɔn, an ni dan tea koe n na, a si Yataa ma. An mbe dɔn dechee fania fania bai chɛ n fan ma. An mbe fen chɛ n fan fai, Yataa wandi‑a miin nyan. Chɛɛ an mbe ee dɔn, an ni Yataa wandi gbu sin fai, min‑na an fen chɛ n sin nyan. A wan gbu mu, a ma biaen mu, tando ni be min ma, kuɔ fɔ ni kuɔ fɔ ko a. A ni ma ka.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, Yataa‑a an to nɔ, an ni maumaya koe tɛ. Musu n bɛɛ an tɛ ɔ, an mbe waa ma basan fan an nyɔn na. Yataa ma chɛ a bɔ ni dunya chɛ ɔ.

Mɔ kaima n bɛɛ, an mbe ko dɔndɔ gbe chɛ ma wan, Yataa ma min na bɔ ni. An mbe musu n to wan, mbɛ an faa bɔ‑a waa ma basan koe a an bɔ kai n na. Mɔ kaima chɛ n mbe maumaya koe n sɛ wan an nyɔn ma. An sin, chɛ‑a a ma wan, Yataa‑a tɔɔya si an na, min na kanden mu an 'na ko yama a.

An gbu sin nii ma to ni, tea yiinachii chɛ koe a, a si Yataa ma. Chɛ ko a, Yataa‑a an to wan nɔ, an ni ma an kun ye, an 'na yiinachii yama chɛ a. Chɛ ɛ a ma wan, an ni koe n ma, miin ma nyin an ma koe a.

Ko yama nu, an fan faenɛ an faa an na gban. An toen mu an bɔ n boo fenɛ n fan na, an toen mu to fen fen ni ma an dɔndɔ gbe ta a, an ma to ni an nyɔn na, an sin mbe an nyɔn fa wan. A yɛ to, an mbe butuinɛ chɛ, an mbe an nyɔn bun, an mbe ta‑a yiinachii yama chɛ‑a an nyɔn na. A sin to, an mbe an nyɔn tɔɛ ɔ tɛ ka wan.

An mbe bai yama sa a si an nyɔn ma, an ma to ni Yataa nan fan na. An mbe an nyɔn main fan, mbɛ an‑na dɔpandaya bɔ, an mbe ta‑a yonka tɛ‑a. Tima ɔ tima ko a, an mbe yiinachii an na, ko yama ma munda ma koe a. An mɔɛ chɛ nu, an mbe ee baa be an woo mɔɛ n bɛɛ ma.
Ko yama ma koo an dɔ, an mbe ee an da a kuiɛ to a ma. An sin, an mbe ee an bɔ n bia chɛndɛ chɛ, an mbe ee chinchin an bɔ n ma.

An‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ Yataa ɔ te, mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe koe ma‑a ka buɛ chɛ ɔ, ɛ fa‑a wan. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, an mbe a a tun tena an koe chɛ n ma koe a. A yɛ to, an sin mbe ta‑a to mɔ dɔ mende n pɛmbɛ‑a, miin mbe an ko yama dɔndɔ gbe chɛ n ma tena.

Wo wan, wo wɛn mbe kaa a tɛ, a si wo bɔɛ n ma, wo ni ma mɔ kan kɔ kan na, wo ee che wo ka‑a ko yama ma koe a. Koe min na mu, bai ee ma‑a wo da a, min mbe wo kun bɔ‑a a ɔ. Ni wo‑a kaa a tɛ, a si mɔ dɔ mende n ma koe ko a, chɛɛ wo wɛɛ, wo e an ko dɔndɔ gbe chɛ ma, wo e ma‑a ka kaa a tɛ‑a, a si wo wandi an ma.
Mmɔ gbɛɛ‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ tea ɛ Yataa an boo ɔ, ni a‑a kaa a tɛ, a si mɔɛ chɛ n ma, miin mbe ko bonda chɛ n ma.
Chɛɛ wo tana, wo e kaa tɛ mɔɛ n bakoe ma, a si koe miin ma koe ma, wo wɛɛ wo e an ko dɔndɔ gbe chɛ n fan ma. A ma ma wo yii ma, mbɛ Yataa ee kaa a tɛ‑a, a si wo wakoe ma.

Wo e Yataa wakoe bia tena baa baa an na, koe min na mu, a chinchinden mu wo ma. A faa ma gbandi wo tɔɔya koe a a ya kɔɔɛ a, a sin mbe a faa bia wan wo a tima sɛsɛ ko a. A nyin wo ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ Yataa ɛ chinchin tena wan wo ma. Koe min na mu, ɛ chia yian tena wan wo a faachima ɔ, wo ni wo kan kɔ sɔ wo 'a ko yama n na.
Chɛɛ wo faa a kɔɔen mu, wo too wɛɛ ɔ gbɛ. Chɛ ko a, wo 'a tɔɔya ma ɛ munda‑a wan, tee chɛ ma, tee min ma mɔɛ n mbe Yataa 'a faatɛ ɔ yen‑da. A sin, an mbe a ɔ gbɛ‑a wan, mbɛ ɛ tea kaa an na tɛ.
Koe min na mu, an tee chɛ ma, mɔ ɔ mɔ na‑a wai chɛ buɛ min dɔ, Yataa ɛ a ma‑a wan, a ni a tɔnɔnɛ ma sɔn a buɛ ɔ.
Mɔɛ dɔ nu, an mbe ko chɛndɛ an ma tima ɔ tima, an mbe Yataa 'a dua yanɛ a, a 'a tando, a basan kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ a, ɛ min be. An mɔɛ chɛ nu, Yataa ɛ an kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ be‑a wan an ma.
Chɛɛ mɔɛ nu, miin toen mu dechee an fandi a, an sin ma to ni tea a, an mbe bea ko yama n fan fɛ. An mɔɛ chɛ n tana, Yataa faa ɛ tɛ‑a wan an ma yama yama, a ni an tɔɔ.
Ko ma gbaaenɛ ɛ ma‑a wan nɔ, a basan tɔɔya a, mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ ko a, miin mbe ko yama chɛ n ma. Chɛ ɛ ma‑a wan Chu mɔɛ n na, a ni ma mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ a, miin ma Chu mɔɛ n na.

Chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, miin mbe ko chɛndɛ ma, Yataa ɛ a ma‑a wan, an ni a 'a dua ma sɔn, a 'a tando, a basan a 'a faachima a. Chɛ ɛ chɛ‑a wan Chu mɔɛ n ye, a ni chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ ye, miin ma Chu mɔɛ n na.
Koe min na mu, Yataa ee a 'a mɔɛ n tɛ bɔ, ɛ ma a 'a kaa a tɛ‑a.

Mɔɛ miin ma Chu mɔɛ n na, sawa chɛ ee an boo ɔ, min na‑a be Mosisi ma. Chɛɛ ni an mɔɛ chɛ n‑na ko yama ma, Yataa ɛ an tɔɔya‑a wan, a ee ma‑a wɛɛ sawa chɛ ta fɛ chia a. Chu mɔɛ n sin, Mosisi na‑a sawa chɛ a ben miin tena, ni an‑na ko yama ma, Yataa ɛ sawa chɛ an ya‑a, mbɛ a‑a kaa a tɛ an bakoe ma, an ni tɔɔya.
An ma a fɔ ni, mbɛ sawa chɛ, a a min koe dechee an mbe a ma, mɔɛ ni ma mɔ tandenɛ a Yataa tena. Chɛɛ mɔɛ min mbe a a min‑da, mbɛ a tachɛ‑a a a chɛndɛ chɛ, Yataa ɛ an ya‑a mɔ tandenɛ a.

Mɔɛ miin ma Chu mɔɛ n na, sawa chɛ nii an boo ɔ. Chɛɛ tima ɔ tima ko a, ni an‑na koe chɛ n ma an kun ma a a, miin nyin an ma koe a sawa chɛ ta fɛ chia a, a nyin an ko a. An‑na a ɔ yian fan ka, mbɛ Mosisi nii ma sawa chɛ a ben nin bɛɛ an tena, chɛɛ an‑na ko chɛndɛ tɛ bɔɛ sɔn fan ko yama a.

An sɔnɛ n fan mbe a ɔ yian, mbɛ sawa‑a miin fɔ, a nyɛndenɛ mu an faa an dɔ. An 'na yiinachii wɛɛ ɔ, chɛ ɔ yianden fan mu, mbɛ tea mu. Tima dɔ a, an 'na yiinachii, an mbe a fɔ an ye, mbɛ an‑na koe min ma, a ma nyin a ma koe a. Tima dɔ a, an yiima ɛ a fɔ wan an ye, mbɛ an‑na ko chɛndɛ an ma.

Chɛ an fɛ mu, koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ɛ ma‑a wan tee chɛ ma, Yataa ɛ a ma‑a tee min na Chisɔsi Chasi ni kaa tɛ koe ma, miin mbe nun dɔ mɔɛ n yiima ɔ. N mbe bai chɛ an fɔ tena mɔɛ n ye, sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ, n mbe min dɔ yian ka.
Chɛɛ wo tana, wo wɛn yii na koen mu, mbɛ Chu mɔɛ mu wo a, wo yii faen mu Yataa 'a sawa chɛ an ma, Mosisi na‑a min na ben wo tena. A sin, wo e yonka tɛ tena wan, mbɛ Yataa faa ma mɔɛ n mu wo a.
Wo e a fɔ wan to, mbɛ wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, Yataa toen mu koe miin na, a ma koe a. A sin, wo ɔ, sawa ban‑da wo kan‑da ko chɛndɛ n ma, wo e miin ma.
Wo danden fan mu a a, mbɛ wo wan mbe chia yian ya te tɔɛ n na. A yɛ to, mbɛ wo wan mu manɛ a chɛ n ko a, miin mbe pimbi pimbi ɔ.

A sin to, wo wan mbe chɛ n sɔ chia ma, miin kunɛ ɔ banden mu, wo e mɔɛ n kan to miin yiima ma kɔɔ ni. Wo danden fan mu a a, mbɛ wo‑a ko ɔ ko sɔn fan chɛndɛ chɛ. A yɛ to, wo da a kuiɛ ma bɔ chia ee, koe min na mu, sawa chɛ ɛ wo boo ɔ, Mosisi na‑a min na ben wo tena.
Wo sin, a yen ko, wo e mɔ dɔ mende n kan, a gbu nyin wo ni wo wandi kan. Wo e a fɔ wan mɔɛ n ye, mbɛ an ma kanka chɛ, chɛɛ wo wandi sin mbe a chɛ wan.

Wo e a fɔ wan mɔɛ n ye, wo ɔ, an ma waa ma basan mɔɛ a, an mbe ee fuu ɔ min na, chɛɛ wo wandi sin mbe a ma wan. Wo ma to ni mɔɛ n ni fenɛ n fai, miin ma Yataa a, chɛɛ wo e fenɛ n ya wan kaina chɛ nu, an mbe fen chɛ n fai kaina min.
Wo e yonka tɛ, mbɛ Yataa 'a sawa ɛ wo boo ɔ, chɛɛ wo e Yataa a mau tena wan, wo e ma ka an sawa yɔnɛ min chɛ‑a.
Ɛ wan dechee yɔ Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, a ɔ, “Wo wan Chu mɔɛ chɛ n fan mbe a ma tena, mɔɛ miin ma Chu mɔɛ n na, an mbe baa bɔ Yataa ma.”
Mɔɛ a kamincha chɛ, Yataa boo ɛ wan a kɔɔ, ni a mɔɛ chɛ ɛ tachɛ tena wan Yataa 'a sawa chɛ n na. Chɛɛ ni a mɔɛ chɛ ɛ sawa chɛ yɔn tena wan, mbɛ a ni fisa wɛɛ ni a a nii ma kamincha nin bɛɛ.
Chɛɛ ni mɔɛ min ma Chu mɔ a, a sin na ma kamincha ni, a tachɛ‑a sawa chɛ gbee a, Yataa ɛ a boo a si wan a kɔɔ, yɔ mɔɛ min na kaminchaen mu.

A gbu sin, mɔɛ chɛ n yen bɛ, an na ma kamincha nin bɛɛ ka boo ɔ boo, chɛɛ an mbe tachɛ wan sawa chɛ n na chɛndɛ. Chɛ ɛ a ɔ yian‑da wan, mbɛ wo wan Chu nu, wo wɛn na kaminchaen mu bɛɛ, Yataa 'a sawa ɛ wo boo ɔ, mbɛ wo e sawa chɛ yɔn tena wan. Yataa sin mbe kaa a tɛ‑a wan wo wakoe ma.
Ni an‑na mɔɛ a kamincha, chɛ ma a ɔ yian ni, mbɛ a ma‑a Chu mɔɛ chɛndɛ chɛndɛ a. Mbɛ a a kamincha chɛ sin, a ma dechee gboo ma nɛn chɛ an na, dunya ta manda chɛ.

A ee ka, Chu mɔɛ mu a faa an na, min mbe a bu ɔ. Yataa Nyina an mbe a ma, mɔɛ ni a faa gbɛɛ be Yataa ma, chɛɛ sawa nyɛnden fan mbe ee a ma chɛ ni ma. An mɔɛ chɛ, ɛ a 'a tando sɔn‑da wan Yataa a, ni mɔ gbu ma a tando nin bɛɛ.
Mɔɛ dɔ n mbe tisa chɛ wan, ni ma koe a Chu mɔɛ a, ni tɔnɔnɛ ɛ wan a ɔ, a ben ma koe a mɔɛ a, min ma Chu mɔ a. Chɛ ma, ni tɔnɔn kan kɔ kan mbe wan a ɔ, mɔ gbu a kamincha koe a.
Ma koe a Chu mɔɛ a, tɔnɔnɛ gbu an kɔkoo a ɔ chia sɛsɛ a. A saa mu min na, an nɛ, Yataa na‑a a 'a sakana bai gbɛɛ fɔ an fan ye.
Tea mu a a, mbɛ Chu mɔɛ dɔ n nii ma dan ni sakana bai chɛ a. Chɛɛ chɛ ma a ɔ yian ni, mbɛ Yataa ɛ a da a kuiɛ ka‑a wan a gba ɔ, koe min na mu, an dɔ n‑na chɛ ma.

A an, chɛ ma ma wo 'a yiinachii ɔ. Mɔ gbu da a kuiɛ ma funka nin bɛɛ boo ɔ boo tima ɔ tima ko a, chɛɛ Yataa tana, ɛ a da a kuiɛ to wan a ma. A sin, a 'a gboo‑a a fɔ ka wan, a si Yataa wandi ma, a ɔ, “Ni a koɔ‑a tima ɔ tima, mɔɛ gbɛɛ‑a a ɔ yen fan, mbɛ a teaen fan mu. A sin to, mɔɛ min mbe kunɛ si‑a a kun ma, ni a koɔ‑a dechee, fanka ee ma‑a to a mɔɛ chɛ da a kuiɛ a, a mu min na, Yataa gbu ma ko yama ma ni.”

Chɛɛ a yen ko, ni mɔɛ n‑na ko yama ma, a tima a mu mɔ dɔ mende n mbe a yen gbadan, Yataa ɛ ko chɛndɛ min ma. Chɛɛ chɛ tɛ bɔ buɛ ɛ wan nɔ. Mɔɛ dɔ nu, an mbe a fɔ wan gbu, mbɛ Yataa ee tea ko ma, ɛ ma ka mmɔ tɔɔya min chɛ‑a mmɔ 'a ko yama n ko a. (Chɛɛ n mbe ka koɔ tena dechee, yɔ mɔgbuya ɛ a tasi buɛ min dɔ tima dɔsa a).
Chɛɛ a gbu ee ka chia kan kɔ kan na. Ni Yataa ee tea ko ma, a ee che‑a kaa a tɛ‑a mɔɛ gbɛɛ a ko yama ma dunya chɛ ɔ.
Chɛɛ a yen ko, mbɛ nn 'na fania fɔɛ, ɛ a ma‑a mɔɛ n ni Yataa 'a tea fɔɛ ɔ yen. Nn ma chia yen ni to, min mbe a ma, Yataa ɛ a ma nn mbe tɔɔya, ko yama ma koe a.

Ni tea mu chɛ a, mbɛ mɔɛ dɔ n mbe a fɔ‑a wan gbɛ, an dɔ, “Mmɔ ko yama ma, min mbe a ma, ko chɛndɛ ni bɔ a ɔ.” Mɔɛ dɔ n‑na kun chɛ an si n kun ma, mbɛ n fan, n‑na chɛ an fɔ chinɛn, mbɛ an‑na n main a ko a. Chɛɛ mɔɛ miin mbe chɛ fɔ tena, an fandi an mbe tɔɔya ɔ fai tena Yataa ma.

Chɛ ee a ɔ yian tena gbɛ, mbɛ nn fan Chu mɔɛ n tana, nn fisa wan Yataa chen kɔɔ, a ben mɔ dɔ gbɛɛ chɛ n ma. A ee ka ɛnden bɛɛ a. A mu min na, nn ban‑da a ɔ yian‑da, mbɛ mɔɛ gbɛɛ mu ko yama ma mɔɛ an na. Chu mɔ ta ma ka ni chɛ ma, mɔɛ miin ma Chu mɔɛ n na, an ta ma ka ni chɛ ma.
Ɛ wan yɔ Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, a ɔ, “Mɔ dɔndɔ wɛɛ ee nɔ, min tanden mu Yataa chen kɔɔ.
Mɔ ɔ mɔ ee nɔ, min‑na a ɔ gbɛ fen mu tea koe a, mɔ ɔ mɔ sin mbe ee nɔ, min mbe chia yan tena, ma koe a an fea Yataa a.
Mɔ gbu n gbɛɛ, an‑na an kan kɔ sɔ Yataa a, an gbɛɛ sɔ‑a chia yama ma, an dɔndɔ wɛɛ ee nɔ, min mbe koe ma tena, min nyin.
An da a bai n mbe mɔɛ n kasaa wan. An 'na kana nɛnɛn chɛ n na, tea ee bɔ an da an dɔ. An da a bai n mu ka kona an na, miin mbe mɔɛ n fa.
Tima ɔ tima ko a, an mbe an bɔ n danka wan, faamɔnɛ ɔ.
A ɔ wuu an boo ɔ, mɔɛ tɔɔya koe a, mbɛ an‑na a fa.
Ni an ta‑a kan kɔ kan, tɔɔya basan kasaa a, an fan mbe ma nɔ.
An tana, an ma chia sɔn, a ma koe a an ni ma faachima ɔ mɔ dɔ mende n na,
n mbe ee baa a chianɛ sima wɛɛ ni ma an dɔ Yataa ko a.”

Mmɔ‑a a ɔ sɔn gbɛ sanche, mbɛ sawa chɛ‑a min gbɛɛ fɔ, a sien mu chɛ n fan ma, miin mbe sawa gbu kɔɔ. An mbe a ma, an mbe ee kafai kan kɔ kan be ko yama ma koe a. A sin to, ɛ a ma‑a wan Yataa ni kaa a tɛ, a si mmɔ gbɛɛ a ko yama ma.
Koe min na mu, ni mɔɛ toen mu Yataa ni a ya mɔ tandenɛ a, sawa a tachɛ koe a gbee a, an mbe ee a ma chɛ ni ma. Chɛɛ sawa chɛ ɛ koe min ma, ɛ a ma wan mɔɛ n ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ ko yama ma mɔɛ mu mmɔ a.

Chɛɛ sanche chɛ ɔ, Yataa ban‑da a ɔ yian‑da mmɔ a, a ta chia mu min na, mmɔ ma koe a mɔ tandenɛ n na, a chen kɔɔ. A sin, a ta chia chɛ ma a fɔ ni, mbɛ mɔɛ ɛ koe chɛ an ma dechee, sawa‑a min fɔ a ma koe a. Yataa‑a sawa min na ben Mosisi a, a basan Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n na, an‑na siiya bɔ wan chɛ ma.

Yataa ɛ mmɔ ya wan mɔ tandenɛ n na a chen kɔɔ, ni mmɔ‑a mmɔ kai fa Chisɔsi Chasi a. Yataa ɛ chɛ ma wan mɔ ɔ mɔ ko a, min kai faen mu Chisɔsi a. Koe min na mu, a ni ma Chu mɔ a, a ma ma Chu mɔ a, Yataa ɛ mɔɛ gbɛɛ bia dɔndɔ gbe.
A mu min na, mɔ gbu gbɛɛ‑a ko yama ma, a sin, mɔ gbu gbɛɛ ma bɔ ni Yataa faa ma chia a, an sɔnɛ n bɛɛ ka‑a Yataa ta fɛ.

Chɛɛ Yataa 'a chinchimaya an‑na a ma, a‑a mmɔ ya mɔ tandenɛ n na a chen kɔɔ. Ko kan kɔ kan dɔ gbɛɛ an ma a ma ni, a ni chɛ ma. A‑a chɛ ma koe min na, Chisɔsi Chasi‑a mmɔ kun ka wan mmɔ 'a ko yama n dɔ.

Yataa na‑a an be fa koe a mmɔ 'a ko yama n ko a. A 'a saya chɛ ni a ma, mɔ gbu ni kunka ma sɔn ko yama ɔ. A wii min sin bɔn‑da ka mɔ gbu gbɛɛ ko a, mɔɛ miin mbe an kai fa‑a a a, Yataa ɛ a boo bɔ‑a wan an 'na ko yama n dɔ. Yataa‑a chɛ ma, a ni a ɔ yian, mbɛ a wan mbe mɔ gbu ya mɔ tandenɛ a. A kɔma a, Yataa na‑a a faa bia wan, mbɛ a‑a a ya ka mɔɛ n 'na ko yama n na.

Chɛɛ sanche chɛ ɔ gbɛ, a ee a ya ka tena to mɔɛ n 'na ko yama n na. Chɛɛ ɛ a ɔ yian tena wan, mbɛ a wan mbe mɔ gbu ya dechee mɔ tandenɛ a. Ɛ ka a ɔ yian tena wan, mbɛ a wandi gbu tanden fan mu. A sin, ɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ ya wan mɔ tandenɛ a, mɔɛ min mbe i kai fa‑a Chisɔsi a.

Chɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ 'a yonkatɛ gbu kun mbe ee to. Koe min na mu, mmɔ ɛ bea min chɛ sawa chɛ fɛ, an mbe ee a ma, mmɔ ni ya mɔ tandenɛ n na Yataa chen kɔɔ. Chɛɛ mmɔ ɛ mmɔ kai min fa ka dechee Chisɔsi a, an mbe a ma, mmɔ ɛ ya mɔ tandenɛ a.
Mbɛ mmɔ‑a a ɔ yen gbɛ, mbɛ Yataa ɛ mmɔ ya dechee mɔ tandenɛ n na, ni mmɔ‑a mmɔ kai fa Chisɔsi a. Chɛɛ mmɔ ɛ bea min chɛ ka sawa chɛ fɛ, an mbe ee a ma, mmɔ ni ya mɔ tandenɛ n na.
Yataa ee dechee Chu mɔɛ n fan ko a, ɛ wan mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ ko a, miin ma Chu mɔɛ n na. Ɛ ka wan tea gbu a.
Yataa ɛ dɔndɔ gbe, a sin, Chu mɔɛ nu, ni miin ma Chu mɔɛ n na, ɛ an ma‑a wan mmɔ tandenɛ n na a chen kɔɔ. Chɛ ɛ bɔ‑a an 'na kaifa an dɔ Chisɔsi a.
Chɛ ma a ɔ yian ni chia kan kɔ kan na, mbɛ ni mmɔ‑a mmɔ kai fa Chisɔsi a, mmɔ ɛ mmɔ boo bɔ wan gbɛ sawa chɛ kɔɔ. Chɛɛ mmɔ‑a min ma, mmɔ‑a sawa gbu an kɔ gbɛa ka gbɛ chɛndɛ chɛ.
A nyin gbɛ mmɔ ni bai sa, a si nn fan Chu n bɔ kɔnkɔɛ ma, nn bemba Ebeami, a na‑a miin dɔ yen.
Ni Ebeami chɛ chɛ wai n fan na‑a a ma, mbɛ Yataa‑a a ya mɔ tandenɛ a, chɛ ni ma‑a yonkatɛ chia an na a boo ɔ mɔɛ n tena. Chɛɛ chia ee nɔ, ɛ yonka tɛ min na Yataa chen kɔɔ.
Koe min na mu, Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “Ebeami‑a a kai fa wan Yataa a. A sin, Yataa wɛɛ‑a a ya mɔ tandenɛ a a chen kɔɔ.”
Mɔɛ min mbe wai chɛ pawa ko a, ɛ pawa an ma sɔn. Mɔɛ 'a pawa ma ma ni, yɔ wai nyima, chɛɛ fenɛ mu a a, mɔɛ chɛ ɛ wai chɛ min ko a.

Chɛɛ mmɔ mɔɛ yen bɛ, a e na a chɛ chɛ wai n ya, mbɛ an fan mbe a ya mɔ tandenɛ a, a ni a kai fa Yataa a. Mbɛ Yataa ɛ a yii na chii wan, an mɔɛ chɛ‑a a kai fa min chɛ a a. Ni an mɔɛ na‑a ko yama ma boo ɔ boo, Yataa ɛ a fɔ wan, a ɔ, a ma ko yama ma ni. Yataa ɛ an mɔɛ chɛ ya ka wan mɔ tandenɛ a.

Mansa Defidi wɛɛ na‑a bai dɔndɔ gbe chɛ an fɔ tima dɔndɔ a. A na‑a bai sa tima min na, a si mɔɛ ma, Yataa‑a min ya mɔ tandenɛ a, a ɔ, mɔ duaen ba mu, a mu min na, Yataa ma a yii na chii ni a chɛ chɛ wai an ma. Mansa Defidi ɔ,
“Dua ɛ chɛ n ma, Yataa‑a a boo bɔ miin na ko yama maenɛ n dɔ, a‑a a ya ka miin na ko yama n na.
Dua min mbe chɛ n ma, a koo, Mansa Yataa ee miin na ko yama n sa tena ɔ bɛn‑da.”

Mansa Defidi na‑a bai sa ka a si dua min ma, a ee mɔɛ chɛ n dechee ko a, miin na kaminchaen mu. Chɛɛ ɛ wan chɛ n bɛɛ ko a, miin na ma kamincha ni. Mmɔ ban‑da a fɔ‑a, mbɛ Ebeami‑a a kai fa wan Yataa a, a sin, Yataa‑a a ya mɔ tandenɛ a a chen kɔɔ.
Mmɔ ma a ya, mbɛ Yataa na‑a chɛ ma tima min na, mbɛ kai Ebeami a kaminchaen fan ni. A na‑a a ma pɛn, Ebeami a e na to kamincha‑a.

A gbakɔ ni gbɛ, Ebeami a kamincha‑a. A sin, a a kamincha koe chɛ, a ni tɔmɔsi an na, a ɔ yian koe a, mbɛ Yataa na‑a a ya pɛn mɔ tandenɛ a, a a e na to kamincha‑a. Chɛ sin na‑a ma, a ɔ yian koe a, mbɛ mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ an kai fa‑a Yataa a, mbɛ a‑a an ya mɔ tandenɛ n na a chen kɔɔ, an mɔɛ chɛ n mbe ma‑a dechee yɔ Ebeami 'a denɛ nu Yataa ta fɛ chia a. An mbe ma‑a wan ka Ebeami tena, an ni a fɔ an na ma kamincha nin bɛɛ.

Ebeami sin fan mu mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ gbu fa a, mɔɛ miin na kaminchaen mu ka. Chɛ ma si ni an na kamincha koe chɛ an ma, chɛɛ a sien mu an tachɛ buɛ dɔndɔɛ an ma, an kai fa koe Yataa a. Mmɔ fa Ebeami a e na to kamincha‑a, a tachɛ buɛ ni ka wan gbɛ Yataa a.

Yataa na‑a Ebeami too ɔ dia wan, an bɛ a cheeya n na, mbɛ ɛ dunya chɛ gbɛɛ ma‑a an ta a. Yataa na‑a tooɔdia chɛ chɛ Ebeami a, koe min na mu, a na‑a a kai fa wan Yataa a. Chɛɛ Ebeami na‑a bea min chɛ sawa chɛ fɛ, an ko a nii ma. Chɛ ko a, Yataa‑a a ya wan mɔ tandenɛ a a chen kɔɔ.

Mmɔ a ya wɛ, mbɛ Yataa na‑a tooɔdia min chɛ, a ni be dechee chɛ n fan ma, miin mbe a sɔ sawa chɛ fɛ. Ni chɛ na‑a ma, mbɛ tɔnɔn mbe ee a ɔ mɔɛ kai fa koe a Yataa a. A sin, a fɔ koe a to, mbɛ Yataa‑a tooɔdia chɛ wan, bai ma fanka ɛ min na.
Yataa faa ɛ tɛ wan, ni mɔɛ‑a a 'a sawa yɔn, a na‑a min be Mosisi ma. Chɛɛ ni sawa kan kɔ kan mbe ee kaina min, sawa yɔn mbe ee ma nɔ.

Chɛ an fɛ mu, Yataa 'a tooɔdia chɛ, a kuu si‑a danaya an ma, Ebeami na‑a min chɛ a a. Yataa 'a tooɔdia chɛ ma fen dɔ mende a, chɛɛ a mu wai nyima chɛ an na, a na‑a min chɛ Ebeami cheeya n na. Cheeya chɛ nu, an ma dechee chɛ n fan na, miin boo a sien mu Mosisi 'a sawa n kɔɔ. Chɛɛ an mu wan chɛ n bɛɛ a, miin danden mu Yataa a, yɔ Ebeami na‑a dan buɛ min dɔ a a. Koe min na mu, mmɔ gbɛɛ bemba n ta bemba mu Ebeami an na, danaya ko a Yataa a.

Chɛ fɔen fan mu Yataa 'a gboo wɛɛ ɔ, mbɛ a wan Yataa 'a gbasaya ɔ, mɔ sɛsɛ dunya ɔ, Ebeami an mu an bemba n ta bemba a. A sin, a wan Yataa Mansa ko a, a 'a tooɔdia chɛ baa ɛ wan a ma. Ebeami sin na‑a dan Yataa an na. Yataa an mbe a ma mɔɛ min fa‑a, a ni yɛ to fɔɛ ɔ. A da a kuiɛ to, an mbe a ma, fenɛ miin nii dunya chɛ ɔ tee, a ni bɔ a ɔ.

Ebeami na‑a dan fan Yataa a tima chɛ a, tima min na, a yii nii sɔ ɔ fen kɔ fen ma. Chɛ ko a, a ma‑a wan fa a mɔ sɛsɛ ko a dunya ɔ. A sin nyɛnden mu ka wan Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ a cheeya n mbe kɔkoa‑a wan dunya ɔ.

A tima chɛ a, Ebeami suun sanɛ ni gbɛ san chɛmɛ dɔndɔɛ an gbain tena. A gboo ɔ ni gbɛ buɛ min dɔ, a ni gbɛ faa chia ma wan. A 'a musu Seda wɛɛ, gbandayaen fan ni. Chɛ gbɛɛ ni wan Ebeami yii ma. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, a 'a danaya Yataa a, a kɔ ni gbɛ wan tun.
A yiima nii fea, a si tooɔdia chɛ ma, Yataa na‑a min chɛ a a. Chɛɛ a sɔ‑a wan gban a 'a danaya ɔ Yataa ko a. A 'a danaya chɛ sin‑na gbasaya fa wan a gboo a, Yataa tando koe a.
A dandenɛ ni a a chɛndɛ chɛ, mbɛ Yataa‑a tooɔdia min chɛ a a, mbɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan.
Chɛ ko a, Yataa‑a a ya wan mɔ tandenɛ a a chen kɔɔ.
Bai chɛ sin, min nyɛnden mu, mbɛ Yataa‑a Ebeami ya wan mɔ tandenɛ a, a ee a wan Ebeami dɔndɔ gbe an ko a.
Chɛɛ a nyɛnden fan mu mmɔ wɛɛ ko a, mmɔ wɛn kai faen mu Yataa a, min‑na mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi kɔɔ sɔ saya ɔ. Ɛ mmɔ wɛɛ ya a wan mɔ tandenɛ n na.
Chisɔsi be‑a wan, fa koe a mmɔ 'a ko yama n ko a. A sin, a kɔɔ sɔ‑a wan, a ka saya ɔ, min mbe a ma, Yataa ni mmɔ ya mɔ tandenɛ n na.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ ya‑a mɔ tandenɛ n na, mmɔ 'a danaya ko a Yataa a. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ gbɛ, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi‑a a ma, mmɔ ɛ faachima ɔ Yataa a.

Mmɔ 'a danaya chɛ ko a Yataa a, Chasi‑a a ma, mmɔ boo kun‑da Yataa 'a koadia deman chɛ ma, min mbe ka mmɔ ko a sanche. Mmɔ ɛ buɔdia bɔ wan gbɛ sanche, koe min na mu, mmɔ yii na tɛen fan mu gbɛ, mbɛ Yataa sɔnɛ dɔ ɛ ma‑a wan mmɔ ɔ ya ɔ ma.
Chɛ dechee ma, chɛɛ mmɔ buɔdia bɔ mmɔ 'a tɔɔya n dɔ. Koe min na mu, mmɔ‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ tɔɔya an mbe na faabia a mmɔ tena.
Mmɔ sin mbe mmɔ faa bia min chɛ, ɛ a ma wan, mmɔ yiima ni kɔɔ mmɔ 'a koe a dan buɛ ɔ. Chɛ sin mbe a ma wan mmɔ yii na tɛenɛ ni ma Yataa ma.
Yiinatɛ chɛ mmɔ ɔ, a ee ma fania a, koe min na mu, Yataa 'a koadia koo mmɔ faa an dɔ. Yataa Nyina, min mbe mmɔ fɛ, Yataa wandi‑a min be mmɔ ma, an‑na koadia chɛ chɛ mmɔ ɔ.
Tima min na mmɔ nii che basan‑da mmɔ wandi ma, Chasi fa‑a wan mmɔ ko a, mmɔ ko yama ma mɔɛ chɛ nu. Yataa na‑a tima min yian, a fa‑a a tima chɛ an na.
A ɔ gbɛ ka, mɔɛ ni dɔn fa koe a mɔɛ ko a, min tanden mu sawa bia ɔ. Chɛɛ mɔɛ dɔ n mbe kun fan an fɔɛ be‑a mɔɛ ko a, min mu mɔ chɛndɛ wa a fɔɛ ɔ.
Chɛɛ Yataa‑a a ɔ yian fan mmɔ a, mbɛ a toen mu mmɔ a kaka. Koe min na mu, mmɔ to‑a mmɔ 'a ko yama n fan dɔ, mbɛ Chasi fa‑a mmɔ ko a.
A wii min sin bɔn‑da, an‑na mmɔ ya sanche gbɛ mɔ tandenɛ n na Yataa chen kɔɔ. Ni Chasi ɛ kun fan a ni chɛ ma mmɔ ko a, mmɔ ni dan a a, mbɛ ɛ mmɔ kun bɔ‑a wan Yataa 'a faatɛ ɔ.

Mmɔ ni Yataa chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ n fan na, chɛɛ a 'a denɛ Chisɔsi 'a saya‑a a ma, a‑a mmɔ ma gbɛ a dia nyɔɛ n na. Mmɔ ma‑a ka gbɛ buɛ min dɔ sanche Yataa dia nyɔɛ n na, bauncha ɛ gbɛ mmɔ wan ko a, koe min na mu, Chasi ɛ fɔɛ ɔ.
Chɛɛ chɛ dechee ma, a mu min na, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi an‑na a ma, mmɔ bu ɔ dia‑a Yataa ko a. An‑na a ma gbɛ sanche, Yataa ma‑a mmɔ dia nyɔɛ a.
Mɔ dɔndɔ gbe an‑na a ma, ko yama don‑da dunya chɛ ɔ. A 'a ko yama maen chɛ sin na‑a saya an na a boo ɔ. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, saya fasan‑da dunya gbɛɛ ɔ, a mu min na, mɔ gbu gbɛɛ ma‑a ko yama ma mɔɛ a.
Yataa e na to sawa chɛ be‑a Mosisi ma tima min na, mɔɛ n ni wan gbɛ ko yama ma‑a dunya ɔ. Chɛɛ ni sawa ee kaina min, Yataa ee mɔ ɔ mɔ 'a ko yama sa tena ɔ bɛn.

Chɛɛ a ka Adami ta tima ma, a ta Mosisi ta ma, saya 'a gbasaya ɛ wan mɔɛ gbɛɛ kun ma dunya ɔ. Mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ kun ma, miin gbu nii ma ko yama chɛ ma ni, Yataa da a kuiɛ yɔn koe a, yɔ Adami na‑a min ma. Chia dɔ n na, Adami chɛ bɔen fan ni mɔɛ chɛ a, mɔɛ n ya ni min ya ɔ na koe a dunya ɔ.

Chɛɛ mɔ fea chɛ n ni dama. Koe min na mu, Yataa 'a koadia demanɛ, a ee ka yɔ Adami 'a ko yama maenɛ. Tea gbu mu a a, mbɛ mɔ sɛsɛ faen mu mɔ dɔndɔ gbe chɛ 'a ko yama maenɛ ko a.
