Chɛɛ Yataa ɛ a 'a koadia demanɛ chɛ chia min na a koo kaka. A sin chia chɛ a mu, a 'a ko chɛndɛ chɛen mu mɔ gbu gbɛɛ ko a, gbama gbama a. Chɛ maen mu mɔ dɔndɔ gbe a ko chɛndɛ ma an dɔ, Chisɔsi Chasi.

Yataa ɛ ko chɛndɛ min ma, an fea Adami 'a ko yama a, tɛ bɔɛ ɛ wan an ma. Adami na‑a ko yama ma kɛn, Yataa na‑a kaa a tɛ wan a ma, mbɛ ko yama mu. Chɛɛ mɔ sɛsɛ‑a ko yama ma kɛn sɛsɛ, Yataa 'a koadia demanɛ ɔ, a‑a an ya mɔ tandenɛ n na.

Tea gbu mu a a, mbɛ mɔ dɔndɔ gbe 'a ko yama maenɛ, an‑na a ma, saya 'a gbasaya kun‑da dunya ma, mɔ dɔndɔ gbe wakoe. Chɛɛ chɛ ma che ni koe chɛ ɔ, mɔ dɔndɔɛ chɛ wɛɛ, Chisɔsi Chasi, a‑a min ma. Mɔɛ n gbɛɛ, Yataa ɛ a 'a koadia demanɛ yian miin na, a ɔ benden ba a, mbɛ a‑a an ya mɔ tandenɛ n na. An mbe gbasaya sɔn‑da wan fɔɛ ɔ Chisɔsi a, a si kun koe a ko yama ma an fea saya a.
Chɛ an fɛ mu gbɛ, mɔ dɔndɔɛ 'a ko yama‑a mɔ gbu gbɛɛ ma ko yama ma mɔɛ n na. Mbɛ mɔɛ dɔndɔ wɛɛ, a 'a tea wai Yataa tena, a‑a mɔ gbu gbɛɛ kun ka, mbɛ a‑a fɔɛ be an ma.

Adami dɔndɔ gbe na‑a Yataa da a kuiɛ bɔ wan a ɔ, min na‑a a ma, mɔ sɛsɛ ma‑a ko yama ma mɔɛ n na. A ma‑a ka wan to, Chisɔsi dɔndɔ gbe dechee, an‑na Yataa da a kuiɛ a min, min‑na a ma, Yataa ɛ a a tun‑da wan mɔ sɛsɛ ya koe a mɔ tandenɛ n na.
Yataa na‑a sawa a, min mbe a ma, mɔ gbu ni ko yama kun ma sa. Chɛɛ mɔɛ n 'na ko yama kun ma ɛ chɛ buɛ min dɔ, Yataa 'a koadia demanɛ wɛɛ, a ma ɛ munda ka wan.

N da a bai kunɛ a bia koe a, ko yama‑a gbasaya ɔ yian buɛ min dɔ saya ɔ, Yataa 'a koadia demanɛ a ta gbasaya wɛɛ ɔ, mmɔ ya‑a ka wan mɔ tandenɛ n na a chen kɔɔ. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, mmɔ‑a kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi‑a min be.
Mmɔ ɛ fen fɔ‑a gbɛ? Mmɔ ee kun to a fɔ‑a, mbɛ mmɔ ni a a tun ko yama ma koe a, min mbe a ma, Yataa ni a 'a ko chɛndɛ ma munda mmɔ tena.
Tea ko a, chɛ ee ma. Ni ko yama ma koe mu to, mbɛ mmɔ faenɛ mu gbɛ. Mmɔ ee kun to ma‑a fɔɛ ɔ, mmɔ ɛ ta‑a ko yama ma‑a tun tun.

Koe min na mu, a nyin wo ni chɛ ɔ sɔn tea ko a. Mbɛ yii chɛ‑a wan mmɔ kunɛ ɔ Yataa chia a, mmɔ ma koe a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Chisɔsi Chasi a. Yii chɛ sin chɛ‑a kɛn mmɔ kunɛ ɔ Yataa chia a, a ma‑a wan yɔ mbɛ Chisɔsi 'a saya ma‑a mmɔ 'a saya a.

Yii chɛ min chɛ‑a ka mmɔ kunɛ ɔ Yataa chia a, a‑a a ɔ yian fan ka, mbɛ mmɔ bɛ fa‑a, a yɛ to, mmɔ bɛ tɔn‑da Chisɔsi a. Chɛ an mbe a ma, yɔ Yataa 'a kamaya gbasaya na‑a Chasi kɔɔ sɔ buɛ min dɔ, a ka saya ɔ, mmɔ wɛɛ ni ma fɔɛ nama ɔ, a chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a.
Chasi fa min chɛ‑a, mmɔ wɛɛ, a ma‑a wan mmɔ 'a saya a, kɛn yii chɛ‑a mmɔ kunɛ ɔ Yataa chia a. Chasi a sɔ‑a buɛ min dɔ a ka saya ɔ, a chia dɔndɔ gbe a mu, Yataa ɛ mmɔ wɛɛ kɔɔ sɔ‑a a ka saya ɔ.

Mmɔ‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ Chisɔsi ni gbangban tena tima min na kɔn gbengbanden chɛ ma, mmɔ sɔn kɔma n bɛɛ gbangban‑da wan a ma. Chɛ ma‑a min mbe a ma, Yataa ni mmɔ sɔn kɔma n bɔ mmɔ faa n dɔ. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, mmɔ ee ma‑a to yɔnɛ n na mmɔ 'a ko yama n boo ɔ.
A mu min na, ni mɔ gbu fa‑a, a kun ka‑a, ko yama 'a gbasaya ee to a kun ma.
Ni a na‑a ma wan, yɔ a ma‑a buɛ min dɔ, mbɛ mmɔ bɛ an na‑a fa dɔndɔ a Chasi a, mmɔ ɛ dan fan a a, mmɔ bɛ ɛ ma‑a wan fɔɛ ɔ.
Koe min na mu, mmɔ‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ Chasi a sɔ‑a wan a ka saya ɔ. A sin, gbasaya ee to saya boo ɔ a kun ma, fa koe a to.
A na‑a saya min chɛ ka, mmɔ 'a ko yama ko a, ko yama 'a gbasaya ee to a kun ma kuɔ fɔ ko a. Ɛ ka gbɛ fɔɛ min dɔ, fɔɛ mu Yataa ko a.
A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, wo wɛɛ ni wo wandi ya gbɛ mɔ faenɛ n na, ko yama 'a gbasaya ee to wo kun ma. Chɛɛ wo e gbɛ fɔɛ min dɔ, wo e Yataa an ko a, mɔ dɔndɔɛ mu gbɛ wo a Chisɔsi Chasi a.
Wo ma dɔn to, ko yama ni gbasaya sɔn wo kun ma wo 'a mɔgbuya ɔ, min mbe danka dunya ma. Mɔgbuya chɛ ɔ, wo ma bea wo faa ma koe yama n fɛ.

Wo sin gbu ma wo wandi be chia ɔ chia a ko yama ma, wo ma wo boo chɛ ko yama n dɔ. Chɛɛ wo e min ma, wo wo wandi be Yataa ma. Wo a ma yɔ mɔɛ nu, miin‑na fɔɛ ma sɔn, a ka saya ɔ. Wo wo wandi gbɛɛ be a ma, a ma koe a wo ni tea koe n ma.
Wo ma dɔn to ko yama ni gbasaya sɔn wo kun ma. Wo ee sawa chɛ an kɔɔ, chɛɛ wo e Yataa 'a koadia demanɛ an kɔɔ.
Mmɔ ɛ fen ma gbɛ? Sawa an mbe ee wai tena to mmɔ a, chɛɛ Yataa 'a ko chɛndɛ an mbe gbɛ wai tena mmɔ a. Mmɔ ee che to a a tun‑da ko yama ma koe a.

Mmɔ‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ ni mmɔ‑a mmɔ wandi gbɛɛ be fen kɔ fen ma, mmɔ ma‑a a fen chɛ 'a yɔnɛ a. Ni mmɔ ma‑a ko yama 'a yɔnɛ a, a gbaa chia a mu saya an na. Chɛɛ ni mmɔ‑a kooya be Yataa ma, ɛ mmɔ ya‑a wan mɔ tandenɛ n na.

Wo ni tee yɔnɛ n fan na, wo 'a ko yama n boo ɔ. Chɛɛ n mbe Yataa wai bɔ wan gbɛ wo ko a. Koe min na mu, wo‑a kooya be wo faa gbɛɛ a, wo‑a a be tea chɛ a min koe a, min mbe kan chɛ ɔ, Yataa‑a wo don kanɛ min kɔɔ.
Wo na‑a kunka ma sɔn fan, a bɔ ko yama 'a yɔncha ɔ. Mbɛ wo don‑da Yataa ta yɔncha ɔ, min mu tea ko ma a.

N mbe koɔ tena ka, wo ni a ɔ gbɛ chɛndɛ chɛ, koe min na mu, mɔgbuya gboo ɔ faen fan mu koe ɔ gbɛ koe a. Wo na‑a wo wandi be wan gbae a saa a, ma koe a yɔnɛ a ko tɛ boo ɔ, a basan ko yama sɛsɛ n na. Wo yii ma koe yama n fan ni a ma wo ni ka. Sanche chɛ ɔ, wo wo wandi be gbae, ma koe a yɔnɛ a, tea koe ma koe a, wo ni ma tenchen Yataa ko a.
Wo ni tima min na yɔnɛ n na wo 'a ko yama n kɔɔ, a nii ma din ni wo ma Yataa faa ma koe n ma koe a.
Wo na‑a tɔnɔnɛ minan sɔn a ɔ? Tea ko a, wo nii ma tɔnɔn kan kɔ kan sɔn ni an koe chɛ n dɔ. An koe n mu ka sanche maumaya koe n na wo tena. Saya an bɔ‑a a koe n dɔ.
Chɛɛ sanche chɛ ɔ, wo kun bɔ‑a wo 'a ko yama n dɔ, wo ma‑a gbɛ Yataa 'a yɔnɛ n na. Wo 'a fɔɛ chɛ ɔ gbɛ, wo e gbɛ tenchen Yataa an ko a. Chɛ sin tɔnɔnɛ mu kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ an na wo ko a.

Ko yama tana, saya an mu a tɔnɔnɛ a, a wandi ɛ na min na. Chɛɛ Yataa ɛ min be mmɔ ma gbama gbama a, an nɛ kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ a. Chɛ ɛ ma wan, koe min na mu, mmɔ ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Chisɔsi Chasi a, mmɔ 'a mansa.
N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, tea ko a, wo e a ɔ gbɛ‑a wan, n mbe na tena min fɔ‑a. Koe min na mu, sawa chɛ tana, wo gbɛɛ‑a a sɔn fan. Tima min na wɛ mɔ gbu ɛ fɔɛ ɔ, ɛ tun sawa chɛ an kɔɔ.
A tɔmɔsi yen ko, min mu fuu musu a. Musu si sawa, ɛ an kɔɔ a chɛɛ tena, an mbe wɛ tima min na fɔɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ ni a chɛɛ fa‑a, mbɛ sawa chɛ‑a a boo ka musu chɛ ma fion a wandi ko a.

Chɛ an fɛ mu, a chɛɛ ɛ wɛ fɔɛ ɔ tima min na, a ee kai dɔ gbɛɛ sɔn. Ni a‑a chɛ ma, mɔɛ n mbe a chee ko tɛ musu an na. Chɛɛ sawa‑a min fɔ, ni a chɛɛ fa‑a, a ee to musu si sawa chɛ kɔɔ. Ni an musu chɛ‑a kai dɔ gbɛɛ sɔn, mɔɛ n mbe ee a chee ko tɛ musu a.

N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo wɛɛ ɛ ka wan. Sawa ta fɛ chia a, a maen fan mu dechee yɔ wo wɛɛ na‑a fa wan. Chasi‑a saya min chɛ, a‑a a ma yɔ wo wɛɛ fa‑a sawa tena. A sin sanche gbɛ, wo e Chasi an ko a, min kɔɔ sɔ‑a saya ɔ. Chɛ ma‑a, min mbe a ma, mmɔ ni gbɔɛ be Yataa ko a.
Tima min na mmɔ ni mmɔ kun ye, sawa chɛ na‑a mmɔ 'a ko yama n na kunɛ wan mmɔ ɔ, mmɔ gboo bankandenɛ ni miin ma koe a. A sin, mmɔ faa ma koe yama chɛ n fan‑na a ma, mbɛ saya‑a mmɔ boo kana bia.

A ni ma boo ɔ boo gbɛ sanche chɛ ɔ, mmɔ kunɛ bɔen fan mu gbɛ sawa chɛ boo ɔ. Koe min na mu, mmɔ fa‑a sawa ta fɛ chia a, min na‑a mmɔ bia pimbi chenɛ a. Mmɔ ee ma‑a to Yataa ko a, chia chɛ n na, sawa nyɛnden chɛ‑a min fɔ. Chɛɛ kuɔ fɔ ko a gbɛ, mmɔ ɛ ma‑a gbɛ chia nama an na, chia chɛ, Yataa Nyina‑a mmɔ sɔ min ma.

Mmɔ ɛ che gbɛ fen ko fɔ‑a? Mmɔ ee che a fɔ‑a, mbɛ sawa mu ko yama an na. A ee ka sima wɛ. Sawa chɛ an‑na a ma, n‑na a ɔ sɔn, ko yama mu fenɛ min na. Sawa na‑a a fɔɛ min chɛ, a ɔ, mɔ ee to i bɔɛ ta boo fenɛ a yama yama, an na‑a a ma, n‑na chɛ ɔ gbɛ.
Ko yama‑a a chenɛ sɔ sawa an na, mbɛ a kun‑da a ma koe a mɔɛ n boo fenɛ wakoe a dia‑a n ye kaka. Sawa ee kaina min, ko yama ee nɔ.

N fandi gbu wɛɛ, n ni wan fɔɛ ɔ tima min na, n nii ma sawa chɛ wakoe ɔ sɔn, a ɔ yian koe a n na, koe min ma nyin a ma koe a. Chɛɛ n‑na a ɔ sɔn kɛn, koe miin ma nyin an ma koe a, sawa chɛ ɔ, ko yama koa‑a n dɔ.
A sin, yɔ a fɔen mu buɛ min dɔ, a ma‑a wan yɔ n fa‑a. Sawa chɛ sin, min be‑a Mosisi ma, fɔɛ be koe a, a ma n kun bɔ ni saya boo ɔ.
Sawa chɛ, ko yama‑a a chen sɔ an na, n bun koe a. Ko yama‑a sawa chɛ an ya, n fa koe a.
Chɛ an fɛ mu gbɛ, Yataa wandi an ta mu sawa a. Sawa chɛ sin, Yataa an‑na a be. A sin, sawa chɛ ɛ a ɔ yian fan mɔ gbu ɛ koe miin ma, miin mu tea a. A yɛ to, ni koe miin nyin mɔ gbu ko a.

Chɛ ma a ɔ yian ni, mbɛ n mbe a fɔ tena wan, mbɛ fen chɛndɛ‑a a ma n fa‑a. Chɛ ma ma ni ɛnden bɛɛ a. Ko yama‑a a chen fan sɔ dechee ko chɛndɛ a, mbɛ a na‑a saya a n kun ma. Ko yama‑a chɛ ma, a ni kun a ɔ yian‑da mɔɛ n na, ɛ buɛ min dɔ a sɔnɛ gbu ɔ. Chɛ‑a a ɔ yian fan ka mmɔ a, mbɛ ko yama gbu ma chian‑da gbɛ a yama buɛ ɔ.
Mmɔ gbu‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ sawa sien mu Yataa an ma. Chɛɛ n tana, mɔ gbu gbama gbama mu n na, min mbe fa. N ma‑a gbɛ yɔ ko yama 'a yɔnɛ, n kooenɛ ɛ a ye.
N mbe ee a ɔ gbɛ, n mbe koe miin ma. Chɛ ɛ ma koe min na, n toen mu koe miin na, n mbe ee an fan ma. Chɛɛ n mbe min ma, n ma to ni koe miin na, n mbe an fan ma.
Ni n‑na ko yama n ma, n ma to ni miin ma koe a, chɛ ɛ a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ n dɔn‑da a ma, mbɛ sawa chɛ nyin fan.
Chɛ ɛ a yian fan, mbɛ n mbe ee n fandi boo ɔ, koe chɛ n ma koe a. Chɛɛ ko yama min mbe n faa ɔ, an mbe a ma tena n mbe an ma.
N‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ mɔgbuya chɛ ɔ min ma nyin, ko chɛndɛ ma koe gbasaya, a ee n faa ɔ. Koe min na mu, n toen mu bɛɛ boo ɔ boo n ni ko chɛndɛ ma, chɛɛ n mbe ee che a ma‑a.
N mbe ee ko chɛndɛ ma, n toen mu n ni min ma. Chɛɛ min mbe ma, n mbe ko yama an ma, n ma to ni n ni min ma.
Ni n‑na koe ma, n ma to ni n ni min ma, ɛ a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ n fandi an mbe ee a ma tena. Chɛɛ min mbe ma tena, ko yama min mbe n faa ɔ, an mbe a ma tena.
Mbɛ chɛ‑a a ɔ yian gbɛ n na, mbɛ ɛ ma tena ka wan n ta fɔɛ ɔ. N toen mu bɛɛ n ni ko chɛndɛ ma, koe min ma nyin a ma koe a, n mbe an ya a ma koe a.
N faa gbɛɛ ɔ, n bu ɔ di wan Yataa 'a sawa ko a.
Chɛɛ n‑na a ɔ sɔn gbɛ n faa ɔ, mbɛ n mbe bea tena sawa dɔ gbɛɛ an fɛ. An sawa chɛ, ɛ butuinɛ chɛ tena wan sawa chɛ a, n toen mu min na n yiima ɔ. A‑a n ma yɔnɛ a, sawa chɛ boo ɔ, min mbe n yiima ɔ.
N faa yɔnden mu a ɔ benden ba a. N toen mu mɔɛ a, min mbe che n bɔ‑a ko yama ma fɔɛ chɛ ɔ, min mbe a ma tena n mbe fa‑a.

Yataa ɛn wai! A‑a a ma, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi‑a n kun bɔ a ɔ. Chɛ an fɛ mu, n ma buɛ ɛ gbɛ ka wan. N mbe bea tena wan Yataa 'a sawa n fɛ n yiima gbɛɛ a. Chɛɛ yɔnɛ mu n na, ko yama 'a gbasaya kɔɔ, mɔgbuya ɔ min ma nyin.
Chɛ an fɛ mu sanche chɛ ɔ, ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Chisɔsi Chasi a, Yataa ee kaa a tɛ‑a a wakoe ma, a ni tɔɔ.
A mu min na, Chisɔsi Chasi 'a gbasaya ɔ, mmɔ kunɛ bɔ‑a ko yama 'a gbasaya ɔ, min mbe na saya a. Yataa Nyina min mbe fɔɛ chɛndɛ be, an‑na a ma chɛ ma‑a.

Mmɔ ɛ koe miin ma, mɔgbuya ɔ min ma nyin, an na‑a a ma wan, sawa chɛ ma kun ni mmɔ kun ka‑a. Chɛɛ Yataa na‑a dɔbɛn dɔ gbɛɛ chɛ wan, mmɔ kun ka koe a. A na‑a a 'a denɛ a na wan dunya chɛ ɔ, mɔgbuya ɔ. A na‑a a 'a den chɛ ma wan yasi a mmɔ 'a ko yama n ko a. A na‑a chɛ ma, kaa an na tɛ koe a, a si mmɔ 'a ko yama n ma.

Yataa na‑a chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, sawa na‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ mmɔ tan koe a a tena, mmɔ ɛ a ma‑a wan ka chɛndɛ chɛ. Mmɔ gbɛɛ, mmɔ wɛn mbe tachɛ Yataa Nyina gbee a, mmɔ ɛ a ma‑a ka wan. Chɛɛ mmɔ ee na‑a tachɛ‑a gbee a, mɔgbuya ɔ min ma nyin.

Mɔɛ chɛ min mbe fɔɛ ɔ, mɔgbuya ɔ min ma nyin, ɛ koe n fan ma dechee, miin na di a ye. A yiima gbɛɛ ɛ ma gbasaya an kɔɔ, mɔgbuya ɔ min ma nyin. Chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu fɔɛ ɔ, miin mbe koe ma, min na di Yataa Nyina ye, an yiima gbɛɛ ɛ ma Nyina chɛ 'a gbasaya an kɔɔ.
Mɔɛ yii ma ma koe a, gbasaya kɔɔ, mɔgbuya ɔ min ma nyin, ɛ na saya an na. Chɛɛ mɔɛ yii ma ma koe a Yataa Nyina 'a gbasaya kɔɔ, ɛ na kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ an na, a basan faachima a.
A sin fan fɛ mu, mɔɛ min yiima ɛ gbasaya kɔɔ mɔgbuya ɔ min ma nyin, Yataa chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ mu a a. Koe min na mu, a mɔɛ chɛ ma kun ni ma koe a Yataa 'a sawa kɔɔ. A gbu sin, a ee che ma‑a a kɔɔ.
Mɔɛ miin mbe koe n ma gbasaya kɔɔ, mɔgbuya ɔ min ma nyin, an mbe ee che Yataa faa ma koe n ma‑a.
Ni Yataa Nyina gbu ɛ wan wo fɛ, wo ee koe n ma mɔgbuya ɔ, miin ma nyin. Chɛɛ Yataa Nyina ɛ koe miin fɔ wo ye, an ma koe a, wo e an fan ma. Chasi Nyina ee mɔɛ min fɛ, a mɔɛ chɛ ee Chasi an ko a.

Chɛɛ ni Chasi ma‑a wo wɛn fɛ, ɛ a ma wan, wo ni ma fɔɛ ɔ. Chɛ ɛ ma‑a wan wo a, wo gboo ɛ fa‑a wɛɛ boo ɔ boo, wo 'a ko yama boo ɔ. Chasi sin mbe chɛ ma‑a wan wo ko a, koe min na mu, wo ya‑a mɔ tandenɛ a Yataa tena.

Yataa Nyina, min‑na a ma, Chisɔsi Chasi‑a a kɔɔ sɔ a ka saya ɔ, ɛ wan wo fɛ. A Nyina chɛ sin, min‑na chɛ ma ka, ɛ fɔɛ be‑a wan wo ma, wo wɛn mbe fa ka. Ɛ chɛ ma‑a wan, yɔ a na‑a a ma buɛ min dɔ dechee Chasi a.
N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, chɛ an fɛ mu gbɛ, Yataa Nyina ɛ min fɔ mmɔ ye a ma koe a, mmɔ a ma. Mmɔ ma koe chɛ n ma, mmɔ 'a mɔgbuya ɔ min ma nyin.
Koe min na mu, ni wo ma‑a an gbasaya chɛ kɔɔ, wo e na‑a wan fa‑a kuɔ fɔ ko a. Chɛɛ ni Yataa Nyina chɛ‑a a ma, wo sɛmbɛ‑a fion an ko yama n na, wo e kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da wan.
Yataa Nyina ɛ chia yian mɔɛ miin na, an fan mu Yataa 'a denɛ n na.

A mu min na, Yataa‑a a Nyina min be wo ma, ma koe a wo fɛ, a ee wo ma yɔnɛ n na, a ni a ma chiandia ni ma wo ɔ. Chɛɛ min mbe ma, Yataa Nyina ɛ wo ma Yataa 'a denɛ n fan na. A sin Yataa Nyina chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, wo ni Yataa chee, wo ɔ, wo fa.
Yataa Nyina chɛ, an sa‑a mmɔ ta nyina n kaa a, a fɔ koe a, mbɛ Yataa 'a denɛ n mu mmɔ a.

Mmɔ mu ka buɛ min dɔ a 'a denɛ n na, a‑a dua miin sa tena ɔ bɛn a 'a mɔɛ n ko a, mmɔ wan ta ɛ ma an na. A na‑a min sa tena ɔ bɛn Chasi wɛɛ ko a, ɛ ma‑a wan to mmɔ ta a. Mmɔ na‑a Chasi 'a tɔɔya ɔ bia wan, mmɔ ɛ a 'a basɔmaya wɛɛ dɔ sɔn‑da wan ya ɔ ma.
Sanche, mmɔ ɛ mɔnɛ ɔ bia tena. Chɛɛ n danden mu a a chɛndɛ chɛ, mbɛ mmɔ ɛ ka mɔnɛ min dɔ bia tena sanche, a a ma kan ni basɔmaya chɛ a, Yataa ɛ min be‑a mmɔ ma ya ɔ ma.
Yataa‑a fenɛ miin gbɛɛ a dan, an gbɛɛ ɛ wan gbɛ makɔnɛ chɛ‑a nyaka, nyaka, tima chɛ ko a, tima min na Yataa ɛ a 'a denɛ n yian‑da.

A mu min na, Yataa‑a fenɛ miin gbɛɛ nyan, a‑a an baa yɔn ka wan. Yataa 'a fen nyanden chɛ nu, an fandi nii ma to ni an baa ni yɔn, chɛɛ Yataa toen ni a ma koe a ka wan. Chɛɛ a na‑a chɛ wɛɛ ma, koe ni wan nɔ a yii na tɛen ni min ma.
A wan Yataa na‑a a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ tee dɔndɔ ɛ che‑a wan, a‑a fenɛ miin nyan ka, a ni an kun ka, an ma na tui to. A sin, an tee chɛ ma, Yataa 'a den chɛ n mbe ma‑a wan buɔdia ɔ, kamaya kun ka chɛ boo ɔ.

A mu min na, mmɔ gbɛɛ‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ a ka suun ma, aan sanche chɛ ɔ, Yataa‑a fenɛ miin gbɛɛ nyan, an mbe kuun tena wan pinia an dɔ. An mbe wan dechee yɔ musu bu ɔ tɛ buɛ min dɔ, a e na to a suun‑da.

Chɛɛ chɛ ee ma fen chɛ n dechee a, Yataa‑a miin nyan. Mmɔ wɛɛ, Yataa Nyina pɛn be‑a mmɔ ma. Chɛ sin ma‑a wɛɛ ka mmɔ ye, mmɔ ɛ kuun tena wan tun mmɔ faa ɔ. Mmɔ ɛ wan chɛ a, mmɔ ɛ ta‑a Yataa ma kɔn‑da, a ni mmɔ ma fion a 'a denɛ n na, gboo nama ɔ ya ɔ ma.

Koe min na mu, a ka mmɔ 'a bauncha ma sɔn tima ma, yiinatɛ chɛ an mbe mmɔ ɔ. Chɛɛ mmɔ yii na tɛen mu fenɛ min ma, ni mmɔ‑a a yen gbɛ, mbɛ mmɔ yii ee che to ma‑a a kɔ. Koe min na mu, mɔ yii ee che ma‑a fenɛ kɔ, mmɔ ban‑da min yen‑da.
Chɛɛ ni mmɔ yii ma‑a fenɛ kɔ, mmɔ ma min yen nin bɛ, mmɔ ɛ mmɔ faa bia wan a ma kɔnɛ a.

Yataa Nyina wɛɛ, ɛ na ka wan, a chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, mbɛ a‑a mmɔ deman, mmɔ ɔ gbɛa koe a danaya ɔ Yataa a. Koe min na mu, mmɔ gbu ma a ɔ sɔn, mmɔ ɛ samunɛ chɛ buɛ min dɔ. Yataa Nyina wandi an mbe samunɛ chɛ mmɔ ko a. Ɛ samunɛ chɛ chɛ mmɔ ko a kuunɛ an dɔ, mmɔ ee kun min dɔ yian‑da.

Yataa sin gbu, a‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, koe miin mbe mmɔ faa n dɔ. Chɛ an fɛ mu, ɛ a Nyina chɛ yii ma sɔn fan. A mu min na, Yataa Nyina chɛ ɛ a disa tena wan mmɔ ko a, a 'a mɔɛ nu. A Nyina chɛ sin mbe samunɛ chɛ tena koe chɛ an ko a, Yataa toen mu min na an ko a.
Mmɔ‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ ko ɔ ko kan kɔ kan dɔ, mɔɛ miin toen mu Yataa a, a wɛɛ, ɛ wai chɛndɛ n fan chɛ an ko a. An mɔɛ chɛ nu, an fan cheeen mu, a 'a dɔbɛnɛ ta fɛ chia a.
An mɔɛ chɛ nu, Yataa na‑a an sɔn pɛn chɛndɛ chɛ, mbɛ a‑a a boo sɔ an ma. An mbe ma‑a wan gbɛ yɔ a 'a denɛ Chisɔsi. A 'a den chɛ ɛ ma‑a gbɛ denɛ saa an na, den sɛsɛ wa chɛ n ya ɔ.

Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, Yataa‑a a boo sɔ ka miin ma, a‑a an chee. A sin‑na miin chee ka, a‑a an ya mɔ tandenɛ n na a wandi tena. Mɔɛ chɛ n sin ɛ miin ya mɔ tandenɛ n na, ɛ a ma‑a wan an ni a 'a basɔmaya dɔ ma sɔn.
A si koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ma, mmɔ‑a miin dɔ sɔn ka, mmɔ ɛ kun chɛ an fɔ‑a, mbɛ ni Yataa ɛ mmɔ ko a, mmɔ chɛɛ ma nyɔ kan kɔ kan mbe ee kun mmɔ ma.

Yataa ma a boo a ben ni a wandi gbu 'a denɛ wɛɛ kɔ, a kunɛ bɔ koe a tɔɔya ɔ. Chɛɛ a‑a Chisɔsi be wan yasi a mɔ gbu gbɛɛ ko a. Ni ɛ chɛ ma wan mmɔ ko a, ɛ kun fan a ni fen kɔ fen be mmɔ ma gbama gbama a, a faa gbɛɛ a.
Mɔ ee nɔ min mbe kunɛ si chɛ n kun ma, Yataa‑a a boo sɔ ka a 'a mɔɛ miin ma. Yataa wandi ban‑da a fɔ‑a, mbɛ mɔ chɛndɛ mu an na.

Mɔ ɔ mɔ ee nɔ min mbe kaa a tɛ, a si an mɔɛ chɛ n tɔɔya koe ma. Chisɔsi Chasi an fa‑a mmɔ ko a, chɛ ma, an kɔɔ sɔ‑a a ka saya ɔ, mbɛ a yɛ‑a to fɔɛ ɔ. A sin, ɛ si ɔ kaina ma bɛndenɛ Yataa boo nyima ɔ. Ɛ wan tun koɔ‑a Yataa tena mmɔ ko a.

Ko ɔ ko ee nɔ, min mbe a ma, mmɔ ko sɔɔ ni bɔ Chasi ɔ. Ko yawaenɛ ee kun chɛ ma‑a, yakɔɔtawa ee a ma, mɔɛ n mbe ko ma gbaaenɛ min sa mmɔ ma, a nan fan mbe ee a ma. A yɛ to, kɔnkɔ ee a ma, mmɔ yɔn koe ee a ma, ko yama ma chiandenɛ ee a ma, saya wɛɛ ee kun a ma‑a, mmɔ ko sɔɔ ni bɔ Chisɔsi ɔ.
Yɔ Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, a ɔ, “I wan Yataa ko a, nn mbe wan saya ma chianɛ kɔɔ tee ɔ tee a, nn mbe wan gbɛ dechee yɔ sa miin mbe sɔ ɔ yuu a, fa koe a.”
Chɛɛ koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ni mmɔ tan bɛɛ, a wɛn toen mu mmɔ a, an mbe mmɔ kunɛ bɔ‑a an dɔ fion.

N danden fan mu a a chɛndɛ chɛ, mbɛ ko ɔ ko ee che a ma‑a, mmɔ sɔɔ ni bɔ Chasi ɔ. Mmɔ ni fa wan, mmɔ ni ma fɔɛ ɔ wan, mmɔ ko a di wan a ye. Maeka n ni ma, ni nyina yama nu, a basan gbasaya gbɛɛ n na, an mbe ee che mmɔ ko sɔɔ bɔ‑a a ɔ. A sin to, koe min gbɛɛ ɛ ma tena sanche chɛ ɔ, a basan koe n na, miin mbe na tena ma‑a ya ɔ ma, an bɛɛ ee che chɛ ma‑a.

Fen mbe ee nɔ banda wɛɛ a pechenden, fen mbe ee nɔ yii wa kɔɔ wɛɛ pɔɔ, min mbe mmɔ ko sɔɔ bɔ Chasi ɔ. Fen kɔ fen mbe ee nɔ, Yataa‑a min gbɛɛ nyan, min mbe kun‑da chɛ ma koe a kuɔ fɔ. Yataa 'a koadia chɛ, mmɔ‑a min ma sɔn mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi a, fen kɔ fen mbe ee a yɔn.
N mbe ka tea bai an fɔ tena. N mbe ee fania fɔ tena, a mu min na, Chasi an ta mu n na. N 'na yiinachii gbu wɛɛ, an fea Yataa Nyina a, ɛ min 'na gbasaya kɔɔ, an dɔnden fan mu n 'na tea chɛ ma.
N 'na chinchincha koo, mɔnɛ wɛɛ ee ban n faa ɔ.

Chɛ ɛ ma tena n na, n suun ma nyɔɛ n fan ko a, Chu mɔɛ nu, n chɛnyɛ mɔɛ nu. Ni chɛ ɛ ma wan demanɛ a an tena, ɛ ma wan n 'na yiinachii ɔ, n fandi gbu, Yataa ni n danka, mbɛ nn fea tɛ du‑a Chasi a, an ko a.

An mu Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n fan na, Yataa‑a a boo sɔ miin ma, a ɔ, a ta mɔɛ mu an na. A na‑a an ma wan a 'a denɛ n na, mbɛ a‑a a ɔ yian an na, a kamayaen mu buɛ min dɔ. A na‑a a 'a dɔbɛnɛ n chɛ wan an na, mbɛ a‑a a 'a sawa wɛɛ be Mosisi ma an ko a. Yataa na‑a a ɔ yian fan to an na, an mbe a fai buɛ min dɔ teaya ɔ. Yataa na‑a tooɔdia sɛsɛ chɛ wan an na.

An bɔ kɔnkɔɛ nu, baa ni wan an ma kaka Yataa tena. A sin, Chasi 'a mɔgbuya ta fɛ chia a, a wɛɛ danka‑a bɔ‑a an 'na dambi dɔndɔ gbe chɛ an dɔ. Mɔɛ n gbɛɛ ni tando be a ma kuɔ fɔ ko a. An mu Yataa a fen kɔ fen ko a dunya chɛ ɔ. A ni ma ka.
Chɛ ma a yian ni gbɛ, mbɛ Yataa na‑a an too ɔ dia koe miin chɛ koe a an ye, a ma an chɛ ni. Koe min na mu, a ma ma ni, mbɛ Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n gbɛɛ mu mɔɛ n fan na, miin‑na Yataa sɔn. An dɔ n ma a sɔn.

A ka chɛ gbu ma, a ma ma ni to, mbɛ Ebeami cheeya n gbɛɛ, an mu Yataa 'a denɛ n chɛndɛ chɛndɛ an fan na. Yataa na‑a a fɔ wan Ebeami ye, a ɔ, “I 'a denɛ Aisaki cheeya nu dechee, an fan mbe ya‑a i cheeya chɛndɛ chɛndɛ n na.”

Chɛ‑a a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ denɛ miin suun‑da mɔgbuya ta fɛ chia a, an fan ma Yataa 'a denɛ chɛndɛ chɛndɛ n na. Chɛɛ mɔɔ dechee cheeya chɛ nu, Yataa na‑a a too ɔ dia denɛ miin na, an fan yaen mu Yataa 'a denɛ chɛndɛ chɛndɛ n na.
Yataa ni an tooɔdia chɛ chɛ tena tima min na, a na‑a bai chɛ n fan fɔ, a ɔ, “Tima chɛ kɔɔ, min dɔ bɛnden mu, n mbe yɛ‑a wan nɛ, a sin Seda ɛ den kaienɛ suun‑da wan.”
A sin nii ma danka ni chɛ ma. Debɛka 'a fɛn kaima fea nu, an fa ni Aisaki an na, mmɔ bɔ kɔnkɔɛ.
Chɛɛ an fɛn chɛ nu, an nii na to suun‑da, an dɔndɔ e na to koe ma‑a min nyin, chɛ ma, min ma nyin, Yataa na‑a koɔ wan Debɛka tena. Chɛ ɛ a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ Yataa ɛ koe ma, a ta chia an na.
Yataa ee koe ma mmɔ sɔn chɛndɛ ko a, a ee a ma mmɔ sɔn yama ko a. A na‑a a fɔ wan Debɛka ye to, mbɛ a 'a den kaienɛ chenama, a ɔ, an mbe ma‑a a dɔ kaima kɔɔ.
Chɛ ɛ wan dechee yɔ Yataa na‑a min fɔ a 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, a‑a a boo sɔ Chekɔpi ma, a ɔ, mbɛ a ban‑da Isɔ sin dɔ.
Mmɔ ɛ fen fɔ‑a gbɛ? Mmɔ ee kun to a fɔ‑a, mbɛ Yataa ma tea ni.
Koe min na mu, a na‑a a fɔ wan Mosisi ye, a ɔ, ɛ koadia yian‑da dechee mɔɛ chɛ an na, a toen mu a ni a yian min na. Mbɛ a‑a chinchincha yian mɔɛ chɛ a, a toen mu a yian koe min na.
Chɛ an fɛ mu gbɛ, a gbɛɛ mu dechee Yataa 'a chinchimaya an na. Chɛɛ mmɔ 'a faagbaa ee Yataa 'a chinchincha be mmɔ ma, mmɔ chɛ koe wɛɛ ee a be mmɔ ma.

Koe min na mu, a nyɛnden fan mu Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ Yataa na‑a Fɛdo ma Ichipi mansa a koe n fan ko a. A na‑a a ma mansa a, a ɔ yian koe an na, a wan Yataa gbasayaen mu buɛ min dɔ. A yɛ to, min mbe a ma, dunya gbɛɛ ni a wan Yataa 'a gbasaya chɛ ɔ yen.
Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, Yataa ɛ chinchin fan mɔ ɔ mɔ ma, a toen mu a ni chinchin min ma. A sin to, ni a toen mu a ni a ma mɔ ɔ mɔ too ɔ ni gbɛa, ɛ a ma wan.
Chɛ ko a, wo dɔndɔ ɛ a fɔ‑a wan, a ɔ, mbɛ ni Yataa ɛ a ma ka wan, mbɛ a wan Yataa ee kun to, a ni a tɛ si mɔ ɔ mɔ ma. A ɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee che a kunɛ bɔ‑a koe chɛ kɔɔ, a wan Yataa toen mu min ni ma.
Chɛɛ n dia nyɔɛ nu, mɔ ɔ mɔ ma wo a, Yataa ɔ tisa koe a. Koe min na mu, fenɛ min nyan‑da, a ee a fɔ a nyan mɔɛ ma, a ɔ, “Fen mu i‑a n nyan buɛ chɛ ɔ?”

Boo da nyan mɔɛ dɔndɔ yen ko, a ɛ dia a wandi an ye, ɛ a 'a boo a wai buɛ min dɔ. A ɛ da fea nyan fan boo dɔndɔɛ ɔ. A sin, a da dɔndɔɛ ɛ ma wan wai chɛ koe a tee ɔ tee ko a. Mbɛ dɔndɔɛ ma‑a nɔ tenchen, bɛn chenama ko a.

Yataa‑a koe min ma, a wɛɛ ɛ ka wan. A toen ni a ni a ɔ yian, a faa ɛ tɛ buɛ min dɔ. A yɛ to, an ni a ɔ sɔn, a gbasayaen mu buɛ min dɔ. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, a na‑a a faa bia wan mɔɛ chɛ n na, a ni na tena miin tɔɔya‑a, miin ma bɛndenɛ ni gbɛ kasaa koe a.
Mbɛ a sin to, a toen ni a ni a ɔ yian, mbɛ a 'a basɔmaya danka ee. Yataa na‑a mɔɛ miin ya a 'a chinchimaya sɔn koe a, a na‑a a yian fan an na.
Koe min na mu, a na‑a mɔɛ miin chee, an mu mmɔ wan na. A nii ma mmɔ wan Chu mɔɛ n dechee an chee ni, chɛɛ mmɔ dɔ n bɛɛ, mmɔ wɛn ma Chu mɔ a, a na‑a mmɔ wɛɛ chee wan.

A mu min na, kai Wosea 'a gboo ɔ, Yataa na‑a a fɔ wan, mbɛ ɛ mɔɛ n chee‑a wan a 'a mɔɛ n na, mɔɛ miin nii ma tee a 'a mɔɛ n na. A ɔ, a nii ma to ni miin na tee, ɛ an chee wan a 'a mɔɛ n na, a toen mu miin na.

A ɔ, a sin, an kaina chɛ gbu, Yataa na‑a a fɔ kaina an ye, mbɛ a 'a mɔ ma an na, a ɔ, a wan Yataa ɛ a fɔ‑a to an kaina dɔndɔ gbe chɛ wan an ye, a ɔ, a wan Yataa min mbe ee fa kuɔ fɔ ko a, a ɔ, a 'a denɛ mu an na.

A sin to, kai Aisaya na‑a bai chɛ an fɔ a si Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n ma, a ɔ, mbɛ Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n kɔ ni koa wɛɛ, yɔ tɛ kuu mɛsɛ mɛsɛ yii da a, a ɔ, chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, an mɔ kuundenɛ dechee, a ɔ, an fan mbe bauncha ma sɔn‑da.
A ɔ, ya ma kai fisɔɛ ɔ mu, Mansa Yataa ɛ na‑a kaa a tɛ‑a mɔɛ gbɛɛ wakoe ma dunya ɔ.
Ɛ wan dechee yɔ Aisaya na‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ suun, mbɛ ni Yataa Mansa Wa nii ma an bɔ kɔnkɔɛ dɔn to ni suun, an ni ma‑a wan yɔ duu wa chɛ nu, Sɔdɔn an fea Komoa a, an dɔ mɔɛ nu.

Nn mbe bai chɛ an fɔ tena, a si mɔɛ chɛ n ma, miin nii ma Chu mɔ n na. An nii butuin chɛ tena, an ni ma mɔ tandenɛ n na Yataa tena. Chɛɛ an‑na an kai fa wan Yataa a. Chɛ ko a, Yataa‑a a ma wan an tan‑da a tena.
Chɛɛ Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ n tana, Yataa na‑a a boo sɔ ka miin ma, ma koe a a ta mɔɛ n na, an nii ma ma ni mɔ tandenɛ n na Yataa tena. Chɛ ma‑a wɛɛ, an ni bea tena sawa n fan fɛ, tan koe a Yataa tena.

Fen na‑a a ma, an nii ma tan ni Yataa tena? Koe min na mu, an yii faen ni an chɛ chɛ wai n fan ma, an yii na nii ma tɛ ni an kai fa buɛ ma Yataa a. An na‑a nama wan sen chɛ ma, sen chɛ min mbe a ma ka, mɔɛ n mbe bea.

Yataa 'a gboo na‑a bai sa a si an sen chɛ an ma, a ɔ, “A yen ko, n 'na senɛ si Sayɔn duu ɔ, mɔɛ n mbe an chenɛ n na tu‑a min na, an sen chɛ, mɔɛ n mbe nama‑a min ma, mbɛ an bea‑a. Chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ, i wɛn mbe i kai fa‑a a a, i mɔɛ chɛ ee che‑a mau‑a.”
N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, n faa ma koe chenama wa an nɛ, n 'na Chu mɔɛ n koa. N mbe Yataa fai tena chɛndɛ chɛ, min mbe a ma, an ni a 'a bauncha ma sɔn.
N danden fan mu a a, mbɛ an‑na an fandi be wan Yataa ma. Chɛɛ an fandi be chɛ, a ma a ɔ yian ni, mbɛ an‑na Yataa wakoe ɔ gbɛ wan chɛndɛ chɛ.

Chɛɛ an ma a ɔ gbɛ ni, Yataa ɛ a ya buɛ min dɔ mɔɛ ni tan a tena. An‑na min ma, an bea‑a wan an ta sawa n fɛ, a si an mbe ma buɛ min dɔ an ni tan Yataa tena. An ma bea ni chia fɛ, Yataa ɛ mɔɛ ya buɛ min dɔ mɔ tandenɛ a a tena.
Chasi‑a a ma wan, sawa chɛ, a 'a gbasaya ee to mɔ gbu kun ma. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, Yataa ɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ ma wan mɔ tandenɛ a a tena, i wɛn mbe i kai fa‑a a a.

Mosisi na‑a chɛ an nyɛn Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, a si mɔ ɔ mɔ ma, min toen mu don koe a sawa chɛ kɔɔ, a ni tan Yataa tena. A ɔ, mɔɛ miin mbe sawa chɛ n gbɛɛ bɔ‑a a gbee a chɛndɛ chɛ, a ɔ, an mɔɛ chɛ n fan mbe kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da.
Yataa 'a gboo‑a chɛ an fɔ, a si mmɔ 'a kaifa ma Yataa a, ɛ mmɔ ma buɛ min dɔ mɔ tandenɛ n na a tena. Gboo chɛ ɔ, mmɔ ma a fɔ, mbɛ mɔ ee nɔ sɛ koe a banda bu ɔ, Chasi yii koe a dunya ɔ.
A ɔ, chɛ ma, mmɔ ni a fɔ, mbɛ mɔ ee nɔ ta koe a faa a sɛ koe a Chasi a dunya ɔ.

Yataa 'a gboo chɛ‑a a fɔ ka wan, a si a 'a sakana bai ma. A ɔ, Yataa 'a sakana bai chɛ ɛ mmɔ boo ɔ wan, ɛ mmɔ da ɔ, a sin mbe mmɔ faa ɔ. Sakana bai dɔndɔ gbe chɛ tun, nn mbe ka an dɔ yian tena, mbɛ mɔɛ miin mbe an kai fa‑a Chasi a, an fan mbe bauncha ma sɔn.
E bauncha ma sɔn‑da wan, ni i‑a da a bai chɛ fɔ den faaɔgbɛya ɔ, mbɛ Chisɔsi Chasi an mu i 'a mansa a. A sin i danden mu a a i yiima ɔ, mbɛ Yataa na‑a Chisɔsi chɛ kɔɔ sɔ wan a ka saya ɔ.
Koe min na mu, ni mmɔ‑a mmɔ kai fa Chisɔsi a, an mbe mmɔ ma mɔ tandenɛ n na a tena. Mmɔ 'a danaya chɛ sin, ni mmɔ‑a a ɔ yian den, an mbe na bauncha a mmɔ ko a.
Ɛ wan dechee yɔ Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, mbɛ mɔɛ min mbe a kai fa a a, a mɔɛ chɛ ee che‑a mau‑a.

Mɔ ɔ mɔ ɛ wan chɛ ɔ. Koe min na mu, tɛ bɔ ee Chu mɔɛ n ma, an bɛ mɔɛ n na miin nii ma Chu mɔɛ n na. Mansa Yataa dɔndɔ gbe an mbe mɔɛ gbɛɛ ko a, a sin‑na mɔ ɔ mɔ dua wan chɛndɛ chɛ, mɔɛ min mbe a tɔɛ chee demanɛ ko a.
Ɛ ma wan yɔ a nyɛnden mu buɛ min dɔ Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ, i wɛn mbe Mansa Yataa chee‑a, basan koe a i ma, e bauncha ma sɔn‑da wan.

Chɛɛ mɔɛ n mbe ee kun, an ni a tɔɛ chee bauncha ko a, ni an ma an kai fa ni Chisɔsi a. Chɛɛ ni an ma Yataa 'a sakana bai chɛ a min ni, an mbe ee che an kai fa chɛ chɛ a. An sin mbe ee kun, an ni sakana bai chɛ a min, ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ma a fɔ ni an ye.

A sin to, sakana bai chɛ ɔ ee che yian‑da mɔɛ n na, ni Yataa ma mɔɛ n na fasan ni dunya ɔ, a ɔ yian koe a. A ni ma yɔ Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, mbɛ a ma kawaen mu kaka, mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ n mbe chia a, miin mbe na tena sakana bai chɛndɛ a.
Chɛɛ mɔɛ gbɛɛ ma, miin‑na an boo si sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ kɔɔ. Kai Aisaya wandi gbu na‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “Mansa Yataa, mɔ ɔ mɔ ma dan ni nn 'na sakana bai a, nn‑na min fɔ.”

Chɛ ɛ a ɔ yian fan gbɛ, mbɛ mɔɛ n mbe sakana bai chɛndɛ min na min tena ka, an mbe a ma tena an mbe an kai fa tena Chisɔsi Chasi a. A sin to, mɔɛ n mbe sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a min tena wan, mɔɛ n mbe min fɔ tena an ye a si Chisɔsi ma.

Chɛɛ chɛ ɛ ma wan tea a gbau gbau, mbɛ an na‑a sakana bai chɛ a min fan. Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, a nyɛnden fan mu, mbɛ a wan Yataa 'a fenɛ miin gbɛɛ a dan, an‑na sakana bai chɛ fɔ wan. A yɛ to, an da a kuiɛ na‑a a fo wan dunya danka a.

A yɛ to, n mbe chɛ an fɔ tena, mbɛ Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n na‑a sakana bai chɛ gbu ɔ sɔn fan chɛndɛ chɛ. Mosisi wandi gbu, a ni koɔ tena tima min na Yataa ko a, a pɛn na‑a chɛ fɔ, mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin nii ma Chu mɔ a, Yataa ɛ an na sɛ‑a wan, Chu mɔɛ n faa ni yɔn. Mbɛ an Chu mɔɛ n yɛ‑a, an faa bɔ‑a an mɔɛ chɛ n ma, miin kunɛ ɔ bandenɛ ɛ.

Kai Aisaya nan gbu, a na‑a Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ wan faagbɛa wandi gbu a. A ɔ, Yataa na‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, mɔɛ miin nii an ya a kan tena Yataa a, a ɔ, an fan‑na a yen. A ɔ, a wan Yataa sin na‑a a wandi yian fan chɛ n na, miin nii a wakoe ɔ tisa tena.

Chɛɛ min sien ni Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n ma, Aisaya na‑a a fɔ wan, mbɛ an sɔen fan mu Yataa a kan, a ɔ, an mbe ee kooya be tena Yataa ma. A ɔ, chɛɛ Yataa na‑a butuin chɛ wan a sɔɛ gbɛɛ a, a ɔ, min mbe a ma, an ni ma faachima ɔ.

Chɛɛ n mbe chɛ an fɔ tena gbɛ. Yataa nii ma Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n na yɛ ni a boo kɔ. A nii ma chɛ ma ni ɛnden bɛɛ a. N fandi gbu wɛɛ, Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ mu n na. Ebeami an mu n bemba a. N bɔ‑a Bɛnchamin 'na dambi an dɔ.

Yataa ma ban ni a 'a mɔɛ chɛ n dɔ, a na‑a a boo sɔ ka miin ma kɛn suun, ma koe a a ta mɔɛ n na. Kai Idaicha na‑a gbonyɛ wan Yataa tena a si an ma. Wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan a nyɛnden mu buɛ min dɔ an disa chɛ tena chɛ Yataa 'a gboo ɔ.
A ɔ, “Mansa Yataa, an‑na kaina chɛ gbɛɛ yɔn, nn mbe i fai kaina min nu, an‑na i 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n fa. N dɔndɔ gbe min bɛɛ toen mu an tɛ, an toen mu an ni n bɛɛ fa.”

Yataa na‑a a da a bai yɛman fan, a ɔ, mbɛ a dɔndɔ gbe ma dechee, a ɔ, a‑a mɔ wu wɔnfea n dɔ bɛn, a wandi ko a. A ɔ, an mu, an nii ma dɔn ni an ni fen chɛ fai, min nii ma Yataa a, fen chɛ min tɔ ni Bee.

Chɛ an fɛ mu, ɛ ka wan sanche wɛɛ. Chu mɔɛ n gbɛɛ ma, miin‑na an kan kɔ sɔ Yataa a. An kuunden mbe wan nɔ, miin kun bɔ‑a a ɔ. Koe min na mu, Yataa‑a koadia demanɛ chɛ wan an na, mbɛ a‑a a boo sɔ an ma, ma koe a a ta mɔɛ n na.

Yataa 'a koadia demanɛ an‑na a ma, a‑a a boo sɔ an ma, ma koe a a ta mɔɛ n na. A ee mɔ ya i chɛ chɛ wai an ko a. A mu min na, ni Yataa ni mɔ ya a ta mɔɛ a, mɔ chɛ chɛ wai an ko a, mbɛ mɔ ɛ a yen, a ee mɔɛ chɛ ya tena koadia demanɛ ta fɛ chia an na.

Fen mu to? Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n gbɛɛ ma fen chɛ yen ni, an ni min yan tena, mɔɔ dechee mɔ kuunden chɛ nu, Yataa na‑a miin ya a ta mɔɛ n na, an fan na‑a a yen. Yataa na‑a a ma wan, mɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ n‑na an boo don an too n dɔ, kɛn a ni an chee tena tima min na.
Ɛ ka wan dechee yɔ Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, a ɔ, “Yataa‑a an ma wan tindo. Aan a sɔ bi nyɔn tima ma, an ya ee che koe ɔ yen‑da, an ni a ɔ gbɛ ni fen mbe ma tena.”
Mansa Defidi na‑a bai dɔndɔ gbe chɛ an fɔ suun, a ɔ, “Yataa ni gbai a sɛ an mɔɛ chɛ n ma,” a ɔ, “an ni chɛɛ a a, daun fen chɛ a, min mbe dia an da a.” A ɔ, “Yataa ni an na bea, a ni an tɔɔ.”
A ɔ, “Yataa ni a ma an ni fion, an ma kaina yen.” A ɔ, “Tima ɔ tima ko a, an kɔɛ bɔenɛ ni ma, an 'na tɔɔya kɔɔ.”

N mbe chɛ an fɔ tena gbɛ. Chu mɔɛ n na‑a nama wan, chɛɛ an nii ma bea chɛ ni, an mbe ee che an kɔɔ sɔ‑a min dɔ. Chɛ nii ma ma ni ɛnden bɛɛ a. An na‑a ko yama miin ma, an na‑a a ma mɔɛ miin ma Chu mɔɛ n na, an‑na bauncha ma sɔn. Chɛ ma‑a, min mbe a ma, Yataa ni an na sɛ, Chu mɔɛ chɛ n faa ni yɔn.

Chu mɔɛ n na‑a ko yama min ma, an na‑a a ma, mɔɛ chɛ n‑na bauncha wa ma sɔn, mɔɛ miin nii ma Chu mɔ a. Chɛɛ ni Chu mɔɛ n bɛɛ‑a bauncha chɛ ma sɔn gbɛ, ɛ ma‑a gbɛ ko ma kawaen ba an na, a ka Yataa tena.

N mbe chɛ gbɛɛ fɔ tena wo wan ko a, wo wɛn ma Chu mɔ a. N mu ka buɛ min dɔ Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ a, wo ko a, n bu ɔ diama mu tima ɔ tima ko a, n 'na wai chɛ koe a. N ni chɛ ma din ka wo tena. Ka wɛ n mbe koɔ gbɛ wo tena, wo wan mɔɛ chɛ nu, wo wɛn ma Chu mɔɛ n na. Tima min na wɛ n mbe Chisɔsi 'a sɔ dencha ɔ wo ko a, n bu ɔ diama mu, wai chɛ ɔ.
Kɔkɔɛ chɛ ɛ che‑a wan a ma‑a, n ta mɔɛ nu, miin mu Chu n na, n ni a ma toomaya ni chɛ an faa ɔ. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, an dɔ n ni bauncha ma sɔn.
Koe min na mu, Yataa na‑a ban an dɔ tima min na, mɔɛ tɔɛ nu dunya ɔ, an na‑a ma wan a dia nyɔɛ n na. Chɛ ma‑a wɛɛ, Yataa ɛ a boo a si‑a to kɛn an kɔɔ, ɛ ma‑a wan yɔ ni mɔɛ fa‑a, mbɛ a yɛ‑a to fɔɛ ɔ.
Ni chin fenɛ gbɔɛ saa a be‑a Yataa ma, mbɛ a tɔɛ gbɛɛ ma‑a Yataa ta a. A sin to, ni kɔnɛ suu be‑a Yataa ma, an kɔnɛ gbu bonɛ n gbɛɛ ma‑a Yataa ta a.

A maen fan mu ka gbɛ yɔ an kɔn chɛ bonɛ dɔ n ka‑a a ma, mbɛ fia kɔnɛ dɔ gbɛɛ bonɛ ya a, mbɛ a chii‑a kɔnɛ bonɛ chɛ gba ɔ. Fia kɔn chɛ ɛ ka gbɛ kana‑a kɔn chɛ a tifa an dɔ. Wo wan mɔɛ chɛ nu, wo wɛn ma Chu mɔ a, wo e ka wan. Wo e ka gbɛ kana‑a mɔɛ chɛ n na tifa an dɔ Yataa tena, mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin mu Chu mɔɛ n na.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo ma yonka tɛ an na. Ni wo‑a chɛ ma, chɛ ni ma wo 'a yiinachii ɔ, mbɛ wo wan mbe ee a be tena an ma, chɛɛ an fan mbe an fandi kɔ tena, ni wo wɛɛ.
Chɛɛ wo dɔ nu, wo e a fɔ‑a wan, wo ɔ, tea mu a a. Wo ɔ, mbɛ an ka‑a kɔnɛ kuu ba ma, min mbe a ma, wo ni chii an gba n dɔ.

Tea gbu mu chɛ a. Chɛɛ an ma danɛ min chɛ ni Yataa a, an‑na a ma, an wagban‑da a ma. Wo tana sin, wo chii‑a gban a ma, koe min na mu, wo danda a a. Chɛɛ wo ma dɔpandaya bɔ, a si chɛ ma. Wo e min ma, chianɛ ni ma wo ɔ Yataa ko a.
Ni Yataa ma kaa ni Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n ka‑a a ma, miin mbe yɔ kɔnɛ bonɛ wandi gbu, a ee che‑a a to‑a a ɔ wo wɛɛ ye. Chɛ ee che ma‑a.

Chɛ ɛ kun fan a ni a ɔ yian wo a, Yataa sɔnɛ nyin buɛ min dɔ, a yɛ to, a faa a kɔɔen mu buɛ min dɔ. A ee chinchin‑da chɛ n ma, miin‑na an kan kɔ sɔ a a, chɛɛ ɛ chinchin‑da wan wo ma, wo wɛn mbe a a tun‑da wo kai fa koe a a a, a wɛn sɔnɛ nyin. Chɛɛ ni wo ma wo kai fa ni a a, Yataa ɛ wo wɛɛ bonɛ n ka‑a ka wan a ma.
A sin ni an bun‑da an kai fa‑a Chisɔsi a, an mbe chii‑a wan to kɔnɛ kuu ba ma. Yataa ɛ kun fan a ni chɛ ma an ko a.

Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo wan, wo wɛn ma Chu mɔɛ n na, wo e ka wan yɔ wodifi min mbe nyan a wandi ko a. Wo ka‑a wan a ma, mbɛ wo chii‑a kɔn dɔ gbɛɛ ma min chin‑da. Koe ma chɛ a, min mbe ma tee. Chu mɔɛ n sin tana, an mbe wan yɔ wodifi kɔn chɛ, min chin‑da ka. Ni an kɔn chɛ bonɛ ka‑a a ma, a ɔ ee gbɛa Yataa boo ɔ, an kɔn bon chɛ‑a yɛ koe a, a gba ɔ.

N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, tea ɛ wan nɔ, min dɔ nunden mu wo ma tee. N toen mu, n ni an tea chɛ an dɔ yian wo a. Ni wo sin‑na a ɔ gbɛ, wo ee a a tun‑da dɔpanda bɔ koe a. An tea gbu yen ko gbɛ. Chu mɔɛ n sɛsɛ na‑a tooɔgbɛa bɔ wan, dan koe a Yataa a. An sin mbe to‑a an tooɔgbɛa chɛ an dɔ aan, mbɛ wo wɛn ma Chu mɔ a, wo‑a wo kai fa Yataa a. Wo gbɛɛ, Yataa na‑a a boo sɔ ka wo ma, ma koe a a ta mɔɛ n na.

Yataa sin mbe Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n gbɛɛ baun‑da ka wan. Ɛ ma‑a wan yɔ a wan Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, a ɔ, “Mɔɛ min mbe mɔ gbɛɛ kun ka‑a, ɛ bɔ‑a Sayɔn duu ɔ wan.” A ɔ, “Ɛ a ma‑a wan, Chekɔpi cheeya nu, ko yama ma ni bɔ an faa ɔ.”
Mbɛ Yataa ɔ te to a 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, “Chɛ sin fan mbe ma‑a n 'na dɔbɛnɛ ɔ, an bɛ an na, tima min na n mbe n boo bɔ‑a an 'na ko yama n dɔ.”

Chu mɔɛ n ban‑da wan Yataa 'a sakana bai ɔ, min‑na an ma Yataa chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ n na. Chɛ ma min chɛ‑a, wo‑a a tɔnɔnɛ ma sɔn fan. Chɛɛ chia dɔndɔɛ a, Yataa‑a a yian fan, mbɛ a toen mu Chu mɔɛ n na. Koe min na mu, a na‑a an bemba n ta bemba n too ɔ dia wan chɛndɛ chɛ.
Koe min na mu, ni Yataa ban‑da a boo sɔ‑a mɔɛ miin ma, a ban‑da a sɔ‑a an ma. Ni a‑a mɔɛ miin dua, a ban‑da an dua‑a. A ee a da a kuiɛ yɔn.
Wo nan sin, wo wɛn ma Chu mɔ a, wo na‑a Yataa da a kuiɛ yɔn fan tee. Chɛɛ Chu mɔɛ n‑na Yataa da a kuiɛ min yɔn, an mbe a ma tena ka gbɛ, a wan Yataa ɛ chinchin‑da wo ma.

An ko dɔndɔ gbe chɛ an maen mu ka wo ta wɛ ɔ. Wo na‑a Yataa da a kuiɛ bɔ wan a ɔ, chɛɛ a chinchin‑da wan wo ma. Chɛ an fɛ mu, Chu mɔɛ n bɛɛ, an mbe a da a kuiɛ yɔn tena, min‑na a ma, a chinchin‑da an bɛɛ ma.

Koe min na mu, Yataa‑a a ɔ gbɛ wan, mbɛ mɔ gbu gbɛɛ‑a a da a kuiɛ bɔ a ɔ. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, Yataa‑a a ma, mɔɛ gbɛɛ ma‑a yɔ mɔɛ nu, miin mbe pimbi chenɛ a. A‑a chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, a ni chinchincha yian mɔ gbu gbɛɛ a.
O Yataa wa. A 'a yiimatɛ koo. A 'a ko sɔnɛ wɛɛ koo ka wan to. Mɔ ɔ mɔ ee che a yii ma koe ɔ yian‑da. Mɔ ɔ mɔ ee a chɛ chɛ wai ɔ gbɛ.
A sin gbu, Yataa 'a gboo gbu‑a a fɔ ka wan mbɛ, “Mɔ ɔ mɔ ma Mansa Yataa yiima sɔn, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee che Yataa a si‑a.
Mɔ ɔ mɔ 'a wai nyima ee a ma, mɔ ee nɔ, ɛ min ta wai nyima a yɛ.”

A yen ko o, Yataa an‑na fen kɔ fen na dan. Fen kɔ fen, min mbe dunya chɛ ɔ, Yataa an mbe a ma an mbe nɔ. Fen kɔ fen dunya chɛ ɔ, an mbe nɔ, Yataa tando koe an na. Dua ni ma a tɔɛ ma, kuɔ fɔ ko a. A ni ma ka.

N bɔ Chisianɛ nu, Yataa 'a chinchincha koo mmɔ tena. Chɛ an fɛ mu, n mbe wo disa tena, min mbe a ma, wo ni wo wandi be a 'a wai ko a. Wo ni ma tenchen an ko a. Wo wo fɔɛ gbɛɛ be a ma, wo ni ma yasi a a ko a, min mbe na faachima a a tena. Chia chɛndɛ gbu sin mu chɛ an na, Yataa fai koe a.

Wo ma a a tun koe n ma koe a, dunya chɛ ɔ mɔɛ n mbe miin ma. Chɛɛ wo faa an dɔ, Yataa ni wo mun, mbɛ a‑a yiima nama chɛndɛ chɛndɛ be wo ma. A tima chɛ a mu, wo e kun‑da wo ni a ɔ sɔn, Yataa toen mu koe miin na. Wo ni a ɔ sɔn, koe miin nyin Yataa tena, a yɛ to, mabɔ ee miin ma, an sin mbe a faa chima wan.

N‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, Yataa‑a min chɛ n ye, koe min na mu a chinchin‑da wan n ma. Chɛ an fɛ mu, n mbe chɛ fɔ tena wo gbɛɛ ye, mbɛ wo ma wo wandi a sɛ, a ni ben wo e buɛ min dɔ. Chɛɛ wo e min ma, wo tea yiinachii chɛ, a si wo wandi ma. A sin, wo yiinachii chɛ, Yataa‑a min chɛ wo ye, a mu min na, wo‑a wo kai fa a a.
Chɛ ɛ wan yɔ mɔ gbu gboo, mmɔ sɔna n da a koo a ma. Mmɔ sɔna chɛ n sin gbɛɛ mbe wai chɛ dama dama.
A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, mmɔ kɔkoo wɛɛ ka boo ɔ boo Chisiancha chɛ ɔ, mmɔ ma‑a gbɛ mɔ dɔndɔ a mmɔ bɛ Chasi a. A yɛ to, mmɔ‑a tun tunden fan mu, mmɔ nyɔn na.
Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, Yataa‑a koadia demanɛ chɛ mmɔ a. A‑a mmɔ gbɛɛ kɔ wan mmɔ ta chia n na. Mmɔ wɛn, Yataa‑a mmɔ kɔ a 'a bai sa koe a mɔɛ n tena, mmɔ a sa danaya ɔ min nyɔn sima ɛ mmɔ ɔ.
Ni Yataa‑a yiimatɛ chɛ mmɔ ɔ, basan koe an na mɔ dɔ gbɛɛ n ma, mmɔ basan an ma chɛndɛ chɛ. Ni an kan koe mu, mmɔ an kan chɛndɛ chɛ.

Ni an faa ma nande koe mu chɛndɛ chɛ, mmɔ a ma ka. Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe mɔ dɔ gbɛɛ n deman‑da, a ni an deman a faa gbɛɛ a. Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ma‑a gbasaya ɔ, a mɔɛ chɛ ni wai chɛ chɛndɛ chɛ. A sin, ko chɛndɛ ma faa ɛ mɔɛ min dɔ, a mɔɛ chɛ ma a ya kɔɔɛ sisi, ni a ma‑a an ko chɛndɛ ma‑a mɔɛ n na.
Ni i bɔɛ ko a dia‑a i ye, a ko a ni dia i ye i faa gbɛɛ a. Wo ma to ko yama a, chɛɛ wo ko chɛndɛ ma an bia wo boo fea a.
Wo to wo nyɔn na chɛndɛ chɛ wo faa gbɛɛ a, yɔ mɔɛ ɛ to buɛ min dɔ a suun ma nyɔɛ n na. A sin, wo ma bɛndenɛ ni ma basɔmaya be koe a wo nyɔn ma, tima ɔ tima ko a.
Wo ma ma gboo ɔ fa tɔɛ n na, wo wai chɛ wo sɔɛ gbɛɛ a. Wo wo wandi be Mansa Yataa ma, wo ni a 'a wai chɛ wo faa gbɛɛ a.
Wo ma buɔdia ɔ, tima ɔ tima ko a. Koe min na mu, wo yii na tɛ tena ɛ wan. Ni yakɔɔtawa‑a wo tan, wo wo faa bia. A sin, wo samunɛ chɛ tima ɔ tima ko a.
Ni Yataa 'a mɔɛ n ma‑a yakɔɔtawa ɔ, an kɔ i boo fenɛ dɔ ɔ. Ni ben sonda na‑a i waa tima ɔ tima ko a, i boo si a kɔɔ i 'a chenɛ a.
Ni mɔɛ n‑na ko ma gbaaenɛ sa wo ma, wo Yataa ɔ tisa, a ni an dua. Wo a ma ka wan gbu. Wo a ɔ tisa, a ni an dua, chɛɛ wo ma a ɔ tisa, a ni an danka.
Mɔɛ miin mbe buɔdia ɔ, wo bɛ ni an buɔdia bɔ an na. Mbɛ miin mbe chinchin di chɛ‑a, wo‑a an kan dɔ bia.
Wo wo boo a si wo nyɔn kɔɔ chɛndɛ chɛ. Wo ma ma dɔpanda tɔɛ n na. Baa ee ka mɔɛ miin ma, wo an ma wo dia nyɔɛ n na. Wo ma wo ta mansaencha a sɛ kaka.
Ni mɔɛ n‑na ko yama ma wo a, wo ma wo ta a yɛ ko yama a. Chɛɛ wo butuin chɛ, wo ni koe n ma, miin ma ɛ kawa mɔ ɔ mɔ ya a.
Wo ta nan gbu, wo butuin chɛ chia ɔ chia a, wo ni ma faachima ɔ mɔ ɔ mɔ a.

N dia nyɔɛ nu, ni mɔɛ n‑na ko yama ma wo a, wo ma wo ta a yɛ an ma. Chɛɛ wo e min ma, wo an to nɔ, Yataa wandi ni kaa a tɛ. Koe min na mu, a nyɛnden fan mu a 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ a wan Yataa ɛ ta ɔ nyɔnɛ chɛ‑a wan, ko yama chɛ n ko a, an‑na miin ma.

Chɛ an fɛ mu, yɔ Yataa 'a gboo chɛ‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, wo e a ma ka wan. A ɔ, “Ni kɔnkɔɛ ma‑a wo ko don ma nyɔɛ n na, wo daun fenɛ be an ma. Ni an kanɛ n na gbaaenɛ ma‑a, wo min yii be an ma. Koe min na mu, wo e ma‑a chɛ ma‑a, wo e ma‑a ka an mɔɛ chɛ n na mau‑a wan kaka.”
Ko yama ni ma i a boo ɔ boo, chɛ ma a ma, i wɛɛ ni ko yama ma. Chɛɛ ko chɛndɛ an ma, i chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ n bɛɛ a.
Mɔ ɔ mɔ ni kooya be mɔɛ chɛ n ma, miin mu ka ya ɔ sɔɛ n na. Koe min na mu, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee gbasaya ma sɔn, ni Yataa ma dɔn ni a ye. A sin, mɔɛ miin mbe gbasaya ɔ ka, Yataa an‑na a be an ma.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe ban‑da kooya be koe a ya ɔ sɔɛ ma, a mɔɛ chɛ‑a Yataa 'a dɔbɛnɛ an kɔɔsa bia ka. Mɔɛ min sin mbe chɛ ma‑a, ɛ na‑a gbɛmbo an na a wandi kun ma.

Koe min na mu, ko chɛndɛ ma mɔ ee chian ya ɔ sɔɛ n ma. Chɛɛ ko yama ma mɔɛ n fan mbe chian ya ɔ sɔɛ n ma. Ni i ma to ni chianɛ ni ma i ɔ ya ɔ sɔɛ n ko a, mbɛ ko chɛndɛ ma. Chɛ an mbe a ma an ni i tando.

Koe min na mu, ya ɔ sɔɛ mu Yataa 'a yɔnɛ an na, min mbe wai chɛ koe a i ko a, i ni baka. Chɛɛ ni i‑a ko yama ma, chian ya ɔ sɔɛ ma. Koe min na mu, gbasaya ɛ wan a boo ɔ i tɔɔya koe a. Yataa 'a yɔnɛ mu ya ɔ sɔɛ kan kɔ kan na, an fan mbe a 'a kaa a tɛ, an ni ko yama ma mɔɛ n tɔɔ.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo ya ɔ sɔɛ n da a kuiɛ a min. Wo tɔɔya koe dechee ma a ma, wo ni an da a kuiɛ a min. Chɛɛ wo yiima wandi gbu ni a fɔ wo ye, mbɛ a nyin fan wo ni a ma ka.
A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, wo wo 'a pawa n bɛɛ chɛ. Koe min na mu, a nyin kɔmende wai chɛ mɔɛ n ni an 'na pawa ma sɔn. Chɛ an mbe a ma, an gboo ɔ ee fa‑a wai chɛ chɛ koe a, Yataa‑a an sɔ min chɛ a.
Ni mɔɛ n ta ma‑a wo ma, wo a be an ma. Ni chɛnyɛ pawa kan kɔ kan mbe wan nɔ, wo ma min chɛ nin bɛ, wo a chɛ. A sin to, ya ɔ sɔɛ n gbɛɛ, wo basɔmaya be an ma, a basan kooya a.

Mɔ ɔ mɔ 'a kuiɛ ma to wo ma kuɔ fɔ. Kuiɛ min mbe ma dechee wo ma, an nɛ koadia a. Koadia ni ma wo faa n dɔ, wo nyɔn ko a. Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe to‑a a fian mɔ gbu a, a mɔɛ chɛ don‑da ka sawa chɛ n gbɛɛ fan kɔɔ, Yataa 'a sawa chɛ nu.

Yataa‑a sawa miin be Mosisi ma, an dɔ, wo ma waa ma basan mɔɛ a, wo ee fuu ɔ min na. A yɛ to, wo ma mɔ fa, ni sawa ma min fɔ ni. A sin, wo ma kanka chɛ, wo sin ma kawa mɔ dɔ mende n boo fenɛ n ma, an ma koe a wo ta n na. Sawa chɛ n gbɛɛ, an basan dɔ mende n na, an kuiɛ bɛnden mu sawa kun dɔndɔɛ chɛ an ma, mbɛ wo ni to wo 'a mɔɛ n na, yɔ wo toen mu buɛ min dɔ wo wandi n na.
Mɔ ɔ mɔ min toen mu a fian mɔ gbu n na, a ee ko yama ma an na. Chɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ to koe mmɔ nyɔn na, an mu sawa gbu gbɛɛ kun tɛ a.

N‑na koe miin fɔ ka wo ye, an ma koe a, wo an ma. Koe min na mu, wo‑a tima sɔn fan sanche, mmɔ ɛ tima min kɔɔ. Tima an nɛ gbɛ, wo ni kunɛ chinɔɛ ɔ, wo e min dɔ. Koe min na mu, tima min na mmɔ ɛ bauncha ma sɔn‑da, an tima chɛ ɔ ma yansan to mmɔ a. A gbɛnden mu gbɛ, a ni ben tima saa ma, tima min na mmɔ‑a mmɔ kai fa Chisɔsi a.
Banda ɔ ka tena wan gbɛ, a ɔ ma yansan to tee bɔ‑a. A nyin fan mmɔ ni sɛmbɛ koe chɛ n ma koe a, pimbi ɔ ko yama chɛ nu. Mbɛ mmɔ‑a butuin chɛ feanka chɛ n ya, mmɔ ɛ butuinɛ chɛ‑a miin na tee a den.

Mmɔ a kuu sɔ tachɛ‑a chɛndɛ chɛ mmɔ wandi a, fɔɛ ɔ. Wo a ma yɔ mɔɛ nu miin mbe koe n na tachɛ tena chɛndɛ tee a. A yɛ to, wo ma wo boo chɛ gbɛ min kɔmpini ɔ, a basan ko tɛ gbɛɛ a. A sin, wo ma butuin chɛ, wo sin ma too wo nyɔn na.
Chɛɛ wo e min ma, wo to mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi kɔ, a ni butuinɛ chɛ wo ko a. Wo sɛmbɛ wo yiima a ta koe a wo faa ma koe yama chɛ n tena, bea koe a an fɛ.
Wo wo boo a si wo bɔɛ chɛ n kɔɔ, wo tɛ ɔ, miin 'na Chisian danaya ɔ ma gbɛ. Chɛɛ wo ma wo da a kuiɛ ɔ fan an na, a si koe n ma, miin nyin an ma koe a an boo ɔ, a basan miin ma nyin an ma koe a.
Mɔɛ dɔ nu, miin 'na Chisian danaya ɔ gbɛ, an daun fen tɛ bɔ kan kɔ kan mbe ee. Chɛɛ mɔɛ dɔ nu, miin 'na Chisian danaya ɔ ma gbɛ, an mbe chin fenɛ dechee an daun.

Mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin daun fen tɛ bɔɛ ee, an ma an kunɛ dɛn chɛ n kun ma, miin mbe an daun fenɛ tɛ bɔ. Mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ to, miin mbe an daun fenɛ tɛ bɔ, an ma kaa a tɛ, an ni a fɔ, mbɛ miin mbe ee an daun fen tɛ bɔ, an mbe ko yama an ma ka. Koe min na mu, Yataa ma a boo bɔ ni an mɔɛ chɛ n kɔɔ, miin daun fen tɛ bɔ ee ka.

Yataa 'a yɔnɛ n fan nɛ, i wan ta ma an na. Gbasaya kan kɔ kan mbe ee i boo ɔ, kaa a tɛ koe a mɔ dɔ mende a yɔnɛ sɔnɛ ma. Gbasaya ɛ an yɔnɛ chɛ kun ti an boo ɔ, kaa a tɛ koe a a sɔn chɛndɛ ma, a basan a yama a. A sin, an yɔnɛ chɛ chenɛ ɛ sɔ‑a wan gban, koe min na mu, Mansa Yataa an mbe a ma‑a a ni sɔ.

A yɛ to, ɛ ma wan mɔɛ dɔ n yii ma, mbɛ tee ɛ wan nɔ, min benden mu tee tɔɛ gbɛɛ ma Yataa tena. Chɛɛ mɔɛ dɔ n ta yiima ɔ, tee gbɛɛ a kanden fan mu, dɔndɔ wɛɛ ma ben ni a nyɔn ma. Mɔɛ si tena fea chɛ n tɛ ɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ ni yiinachii chɛ a wandi ko a.

An mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin mbe a ma tena, mbɛ tee ɛ wan nɔ, min mu tee wa a, an mɔɛ chɛ n mbe chɛ ma tena Mansa Yataa 'a basɔmaya an ko a. Mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin daun fen tɛ bɔ ee, an bɛɛ an mbe ma ka chɛ ma‑a Mansa Yataa 'a basɔmaya an ko a. Koe min na mu, daun fenɛ kan kɔ kan, an ni ma a daun‑da, an mbe Yataa wai bɔ pɛn, a be koe a an ma. Mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ, miin mbe an daun fenɛ tɛ bɔ, an bɛɛ ɛ ma ka basɔmaya be‑a Mansa Yataa an ma. Koe min na mu, an mbe ma ban‑da daun fen kan kɔ kan dɔ, an mbe Yataa wai bɔ wan, a ma koe a an ni ban a ɔ.
Mmɔ dɔndɔ wɛɛ ma ma ben‑da, mmɔ kun ye. A yɛ to, fɔɛ chɛ ɔ, mmɔ dɔndɔ wɛɛ ma fa mmɔ kun ye.

Ni mmɔ ma‑a fɔɛ chɛ ɔ, mmɔ ni ma ɔ Mansa Yataa ko a. Ni mmɔ fa‑a wɛɛ tima min na, mmɔ ni fa Mansa Yataa 'a gbee a. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, mmɔ fɔɛ chɛ ni ma mmɔ ɔ, chɛ ma, mmɔ ni fa wan, Mansa Yataa an ta mu mmɔ a.
Koe min na mu, Chisɔsi Chasi fa‑a wan, mbɛ a‑a a kɔɔ sɔ a ka saya ɔ. Chɛ na‑a ma, min mbe a ma, a ni ma mansa a mmɔ gbɛɛ ko a, mmɔ wan chɛndɛ ba nu, mmɔ bɛ fuɛ n na.

Wo dɔ nu, wo ma kaa a tɛ, wo bɔ Chisianɛ n ma, ko yama ma koe a. A sin to, wo dɔ n bɛɛ, wo ma wo kunɛ dɛn wo bɔ Chisianɛ n kun ma. Koe min na mu, mmɔ gbɛɛ, mmɔ ɛ sɔ‑a wan Yataa chen kɔɔ tee dankama tee ma, a ni kaa a tɛ mmɔ wakoe ma.

Koe min na mu, a nyɛnden fan mu Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ Mansa Yataa ɔ te, ɛ ka buɛ min dɔ fɔɛ a fɛ‑a, mɔɛ gbɛɛ, mmɔ ɛ mmɔ kumbai gbangban‑da wan a chen kɔɔ. A sin, mɔɛ gbɛɛ, an mbe a fɔ‑a wan, mbɛ a wan mu Yataa a.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ gbɛɛ, dɔndɔ, dɔndɔɛ a, mmɔ ɛ a ɔ yian‑da wan Yataa a, mmɔ ɛ wai min chɛ‑a dunya chɛ ɔ.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ sɛmbɛ kaa a tɛ koe a, mmɔ bɔ Chisianɛ n bakoe ma, ko yama ma koe ko a. Chɛɛ wo e chɛ an ma. Wo ma koe ma, min mbe a ma, wo bɔɛ n ni ka Yataa 'a chia ma.

N fan, nn fea Mansa Chisɔsi a, nn ma‑a gbɛ mɔ dɔndɔɛ a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, n‑na a sɔn fan, tea tea ko a, mbɛ daun fen kan kɔ kan mbe ee nɔ, mmɔ ɛ min daun, min ma nyamuien mu Yataa tena. Chɛɛ ni mɔ gbu dan‑da a a, mbɛ fenɛ ma nyin a daun koe a, an fen chɛ, mbɛ a ma nyamui‑a Yataa tena, a daun koe a an mɔɛ chɛ boo ɔ.
Ni e daun fenɛ min daun, a ee na buɔdia a i bɔɛ Chisianɛ n tena, mbɛ koadia an mbe ee ka i faa ɔ an ko a. Koe min na mu, a ma nyin e daun fenɛ min daun, a ni mɔɛ n kasaa, Chasi fa‑a mɔɛ miin ko a.
Fenɛ min nyin i ta yiima ɔ, i ma a ma, mɔ dɔ mende n ni a yen fen yama a.
Koe min na mu, mmɔ ɛ fenɛ miin daun, mmɔ ɛ miin min, an fan mbe ee Yataa ma mmɔ 'a mansa a. Chɛɛ a kuu si mu tan koe an na a tena, ni faachima, a basan buɔdia chɛ a, Yataa Nyina ɛ min be mmɔ ma.
A sin, mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe wai chɛ a buɛ chɛ ɔ ka Chisɔsi Chasi ko a, ɛ ma‑a Yataa faa ma koe an na, mɔɛ n bɛɛ bu ɔ dia‑a wan a mɔɛ chɛ ko a.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, tima ɔ tima ko a, mmɔ butuin chɛ an koe chɛ n fan ma koe a. Koe chɛ nu, miin mbe na faachima a mɔɛ n tɛ ɔ, an sin mbe a ma to, mmɔ ɛ mmɔ nyɔn dɔ gbɛa, mmɔ 'a danaya ɔ Yataa a.

Daun fenɛ gbɛɛ, Yataa‑a min na bɔ, a nyin fan mɔ gbu ni an daun. Chɛɛ chɛ ma a ɔ yian ni, mbɛ mɔ gbu ɛ daun fenɛ gbɛɛ an daun. Ni mɔɛ‑a a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ a daun fenɛ ma nyin mɔ dɔ mende ko a, an mɔɛ chɛ ma an daun fen chɛ nɛnɛ daun, a ma na an mɔɛ chɛ ka Yataa 'a chia ma. A ma nyin ɛnden bɛɛ a, mmɔ daun fenɛ ni a ma Yataa boo gba ma ni yɔn.

A nyin wo ni dasi chɛ n na min, ni an fan mbe a ma, wo ee mɔ dɔ mende n ka‑a Yataa 'a chia ma. Wo ma soe daun, a sin wo ma gbɛ min. A yɛ to, wo ma ko yama kan kɔ kan ma, min mbe a ma, wo bɔ Chisianɛ n bɛɛ ni ka Yataa 'a chia ma.
Ko ɔ ko kan kɔ kan, wo danden mu min na, a si koe chɛ n ma, a ni ma dechee wo tɛ ɔ, wo bɛ Yataa an na. A sin, mɔɛ min yii a koen mu, a si a chɛ chɛ wai ma, a duaenɛ an mbe ma.

Chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ sin, sika ɛ min dɔ, a daun fenɛ wakoe a, danaya ee a mɔɛ chɛ ɔ. Chɛ ko a, Yataa ɛ kaa a tɛ‑a wan a mɔɛ chɛ wakoe ma, a ni tɔɔ. Koe min na mu, ko ɔ ko mɔ ɛ min ma, danaya ee min dɔ, ko yama ma mu a a.
Mmɔ gbɛɛ, mmɔ wɛn 'na danaya Yataa a, a ɔ gbɛ gbechen, mmɔ faa ma gbaa dechee mmɔ wandi an deman koe a. Chɛɛ mmɔ mɔɛ chɛ n deman, miin 'na Chisian danaya ɔ ma gbɛ.
A nyin mmɔ ni chɛ an ma. Koe min na di an ye, min mu an faa ma koe a, mmɔ an koe chɛ an chɛ mmɔ bɔ Chisianɛ n ye. Chɛ an mbe a ma‑a, an 'na fiienɛ ee ma‑a.
Koe min na mu, Chisɔsi wandi gbu wɛɛ, a nii a wandi faa ma koe n fan ma. Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ, a si a ma, a ɔ, “Main chɛ, mɔɛ n‑na min chɛ Yataa a, an‑na a chɛ ka n fan na.”

Koe min na mu, bai miin gbɛɛ mbe Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, an nyɛnden mu mmɔ wan ko a, mmɔ kan koe a. Koe min na mu, gboo chɛ ɛ mmɔ faa ma nande wan, mbɛ mmɔ‑a mmɔ faa bia gban Yataa 'a wai ɔ, yiinatɛ ni ma mmɔ ɔ.
Yataa an mbe mmɔ faa ma nande, a sin fan mbe a ma to mmɔ ɛ mmɔ faa bia. Chɛ an fɛ mu, Yataa ni a ma wo ni sɔ Chasi chen gba ɔ, faachima ni ma wo ɔ wo nyɔn ko a.
Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, wo yiima ni ma kaina dɔndɔɛ, wo kuiɛ ni ma dɔndɔ, wo ni tando be Yataa ma. A wan mu mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi fa a, ni a 'a Yataa.
Wo wo boo si wo nyɔn kɔɔ, yɔ Chasi‑a a boo si buɛ min dɔ wo kɔɔ. Chɛ an mbe a ma‑a mɔɛ n ni tando be Yataa ma.

A ni ma wo yii ma, mbɛ Chisɔsi Chasi na‑a na dunya chɛ ɔ, ma koe an na yɔnɛ a Chu mɔɛ n ko a. A na‑a chɛ ma, koe an dɔ yian koe an na, mbɛ Yataa tanden mu. An ni a ɔ yen, Yataa na‑a tooɔdia min chɛ an bemba n ta bemba n na, a ni bɔ a a.

A ni a ma to, mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ miin ma Chu mɔ a, an ni Yataa tando a 'a chinchimaya ko a. A nyɛnden mu ka wan Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ, “Chɛ an fɛ mu, n mbe tando be‑a i tɔɛ ma, mɔɛ chɛ n tɛ ɔ, miin ma Chu mɔ a, n mbe i tɔɛ sa‑a wan si a.”
Gboo chɛ na‑a a fɔ wan to, a ɔ, “Chu mɔ ma wo wɛn na, wo buɔdia bɔ. Wo a bɔ, wo bɛ Yataa 'a mɔɛ n na, Chu mɔɛ chɛ nu.”
A ɔ te to, “Wo wɛn ma Chu mɔ a, wo tando be Mansa Yataa ma. Mɔɛ gbɛɛ dunya ɔ, wo a tando.”

Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ Aisaya na‑a a fɔ wan to, a ɔ, mɔ dɔndɔ ɛ bɔ‑a wan kai Chɛsi 'a dambi ɔ. A ɔ, Yataa ɛ a mɔɛ chɛ ma‑a wan, a ɔ, a ni ma mansa a, a ɔ, mɔɛ chɛ n ko a, miin ma ka Chu mɔ a. A ɔ, an sin mbe an yii na tɛ‑a wan a ma gbae.

Yataa, min‑na yiinatɛ chɛ be, a ni buɔdia be wo ma. Yataa, a ni faachima be wo ma. A ni koe chɛ n ma wo ye, koe min na mu, wo kai faen mu an na. Yiinatɛ chɛ ma ni mun‑da wo ɔ kaka, Yataa Nyina 'a gbasaya ɔ.
N bɔ Chisianɛ nu, n fandi gbu wɛɛ danden fan mu a a, mbɛ mɔ chɛndɛ wa mu wo wɛɛ gbu a. Wo‑a wo boo nyima tɛ bɔɛ sɔn fan wo manɛ a chɛndɛ chɛ. Wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, wo e dasi be buɛ min dɔ wo nyɔn ma.
Chɛɛ gboo chɛ ɔ, n ma ko ɔ ko ɔ nun ni wo ma, a si koe dɔ n ma, wo na‑a miin na min tee. Yataa 'a dua an na‑a a ma, n‑na n faa gbɛa bai chɛ n fɔ koe a.

A‑a a boo sɔ wan n ma, ma koe a Chisɔsi Chasi 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ a, mɔɛ chɛ n ko a, miin ma ka Chu mɔ a. N mbe wai chɛ wan an ye, yɔ Yataa 'a tɛ mɔɛ. N mbe Yataa 'a sakana bai sa wan an tena. Chɛ ɛ ma, min mbe a ma, Yataa ni a boo si an kɔɔ, yɔ yasi miin mbe tenchen a ko a. An ni ma yasi chɛ a, Yataa Nyina wandi gbu‑a min be tenchen a ma.
Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, n mbe Chisɔsi Chasi a sɛ, chia ɔ chia a, min sien mu Yataa ma.

N mbe ee chian ɛnden bɛɛ a, bai sa koe a, a si Chasi chɛ chɛ wai n fan ma dechee. Chisɔsi‑a a ma wan, mɔɛ miin ma ka Chu mɔ a, n‑na a ma an na kooya be Yataa ma. Chɛ bɔ‑a n da a bai n fan dɔ, a basan n chɛ chɛ wai n na.

A yɛ to, a bɔ‑a to koe n tɔmɔsi gbau gbau n dɔ, a basan kamaya koe wa n na, n‑na miin ma. A sin, Yataa Nyina‑a gbasaya be n ma koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ma koe a. A sin chia chɛ a mu, Yataa 'a sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a si Chasi ma, n‑na a sa wan kan kɔ kan, a ka Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, a ta Idiikɔn chɛnyɛ ɔ.

Tima ɔ tima ko a, n toen mu ko dɔndɔ gbe an ma koe a. An koe chɛ mu Chisɔsi 'a sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ sa koe an na, kaina kan kɔ kan mɔɛ n tena miin nii ma a min ni tee. Koe min na mu, n ma to ni, mɔ dɔ mende 'a wai min kuu sɔ, n ni an na ban.
Yataa 'a gboo wɛɛ‑a a fɔ wan, a si Chisɔsi ma, a ɔ, “A nii ma a fɔ ni miin ye wɛ, an mbe a yen‑da wan. Chɛ n bɛɛ, miin nii ma a wakoe a min ni, an mbe a wakoe ɔ gbɛ‑a wan.”
Wai chɛ n koo n boo ɔ, a chɛ koe a. An mbe a ma tena, tima sɛsɛ ko a, ni n toen mu n ni che wo ma, n mbe ee kun.
Chɛɛ sanche gbɛ, wai min ni n boo ɔ a chɛ koe a nɛ ta‑a, n ban‑da a chɛ‑a gbae. A sin‑na san sɛsɛ ya, kɛn wo yen sɔɛ‑a n bia.

Chɛ an fɛ mu, n toen mu n ni na gbɛ, n ni wo yen. N mbe ma‑a ta‑a Sipen chɛnyɛ ɔ, n mbe ben‑da wan wo tena chia a, n ni wo yen. Ni n‑na tima ɛnden ya wo tena, buɔdia ɔ, mbɛ wo basan‑da n ma ben koe a Sipen chɛnyɛ ɔ.
N ni chɛ gbɛɛ fɔ wɛɛ, chɛɛ n mbe gbɛ sanche chia a ta koe a Chuusaɛn duu ɔ wan. N mbe ta tena nɔ Yataa 'a mɔɛ n 'na wai an dɔ.

Koe min na mu, chɔchi mɔɛ chɛ nu Masidonia chɛnyɛ ɔ, an bɛ Akaya chɛnyɛ ɔ nɛnɛ n bɛɛ a, an‑na an boo fenɛ a bɔ faaɔgbɛ ɔ. An toen mu an ni chɛ n deman, miin yakɔɔtawaen mu Yataa 'a mɔɛ n tɛ ɔ Chuusaɛn duu ɔ.

An fandi gbu an si‑a, an‑na an yii na chii chɛ ma koe a. Chɛɛ tea gbu ko a, a gbu dinden fan mu an ma a ma koe a ka. Koe min na mu, Yataa‑a dua min chɛ Chu mɔɛ n na, an na‑a a du wan, an‑na mɔɛ chɛ n kɔ miin nii ma Chu mɔ a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, ni Yataa‑a boo fenɛ be an bɛɛ ma, an mbe Chu mɔɛ n bɛɛ kɔ wan.
N‑na an kɔpɔɛ chɛ ma kain fan, n sin mbe ka an be‑a an ma. Ni n ban‑da a be‑a an ma gbae, n mbe na‑a wan. N mbe bɔ‑a wo tena chia wan, mbɛ n ta‑a Sipen.
N mbe na‑a wan, mbɛ n‑na a ma, wo‑a dua da faenɛ ma sɔn gban. Dua chɛ, Chisɔsi Chasi ɛ min be.
N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi an ta mu mmɔ a. A sin, Yataa Nyina‑a koadia chɛ mmɔ ɔ mmɔ nyɔn ko a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, n mbe wo disa tena, mmɔ ni chɛɛ chɛ chɛ. Wo Yataa fai n ko a.

Wo samunɛ chɛ n ko a, min mbe a ma, mɔɛ miin ma dan ni ka Chisɔsi Chasi a Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ, an ma na ko yama ma n na. A yɛ to, Yataa 'a mɔɛ miin mbe Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, n mbe demanɛ min chɛ‑a an na, an bu ɔ ni dia a ko a.
Chɛ ni a ma, Yataa 'a gbasaya ɔ, n ni na‑a wo tena, n bu ɔ diaenɛ ni ma. Ni n sin‑na wo tan, n mbe ma‑a wan faachima ɔ.
Yataa min mbe faachima be mmɔ ma, a boo ni ma wo kɔɔ. A ni ma ka.
N toen mu n ni a ɔ yian wo a, mbɛ mmɔ tensa musu min tɔ mu Fɔibe, min bɛɛ kai faen mu Chisɔsi Chasi a, mbɛ mɔ chɛndɛ wa mu a a. Ɛ demanɛ chɛ chɔchi chɛ an dɔ pan Sɛnkea duu ɔ.
Wo wo boo si a kɔɔ chɛndɛ chɛ, yɔ Yataa 'a mɔɛ n mbe an nyɔn bia buɛ min dɔ. A sin, ni a toen mu basɔmaya kan kɔ kan na, wo a chɛ a a. Koe min na mu, a‑a ko chɛndɛ ma wan mɔ sɛsɛ a, a basan n bɛɛ a.
N bɔ wai chɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu Chisɔsi ye, Pisida an fea Akuida a, n mbe an kɔndɔn tena kaka.
An ma chian ni an fɔɛ ko a, n bakoe a. An 'na wai bɔɛ ɛ wan n da a tima ɔ tima ko a. N dechee an mbe ee an wai bɔ tena, chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ miin ma ka Chu mɔ a, an 'na chɔchi n gbɛɛ.
N mbe chɔchi mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ kɔndɔn tena, miin mbe bɛn n bɔɛ chɛ n na chenɛ a. N mbe n dia nyɔɛ Ɛpainɛtɔsi kɔndɔn tena. An mu mɔɛ saa saa a Esia chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ, min‑na a kai fa Chisɔsi Chasi a.
N mbe Mɛi wɛɛ kɔndɔn tena, min bɛɛ‑a wai chɛ wo ko a a sɔɛ gbɛɛ a.

Andɔnikɔsi an fea Chunia, n mbe an bɛɛ kɔndɔn tena. N bɔ Chu mɔɛ n fan nɛ, nn bɛ ni miin na pimbi chenɛ a. Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ nu, an‑na an sɔn fan chɛndɛ chɛ. An sin pɛn pɛn na‑a an kai fa Chisɔsi Chasi a, n ya ɔ.
N mbe Ampiatɔsi wɛɛ kɔndɔn tena. N dia nyɔ chɛndɛ an nɛ, koe min na mu, a kai faen mu Mansa Chisɔsi a.
N mbe Wubanɔsi wɛɛ kɔndɔn tena. A wɛɛ mu mmɔ bɔ wai chɛ mɔɛ dɔndɔ an na Chisɔsi Chasi ye. N mbe n dia nyɔɛ chɛndɛ chɛ wɛɛ kɔndɔn tena, min mu Sitakisi a.
N mbe Apɛdesi wɛɛ kɔndɔn tena. A‑a a ɔ yian fan a sɔnɛ ɔ, mbɛ ɛ Chisɔsi an ko a gbu. N mbe mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ kɔndɔn tena, miin mbe Ayisɔbudɔsi 'a chenɛ a.
N bɔ Chu mɔɛ chɛ wɛɛ, Ɛdɔdiɔn, n mbe a kɔndɔn tena. Chisian chɛ n gbɛɛ, miin mbe Nasisɔsi 'a chenɛ a, n mbe an kɔndɔn tena.
N mbe Tifaina ni Tifosa n kɔndɔn tena. An mbe wai chɛ tena an sɔɛ a Mansa Chisɔsi an ye. N ni n dia nyɔɛ chɛ wɛɛ kɔndɔn min mu Pasisi a. A wɛɛ‑a wai chɛ wan a sɔɛ a Mansa Chisɔsi ye.
N mbe Dufɔsi wɛɛ kɔndɔn‑da. Mansa Chisɔsi fɛ mɔɛ gbau gbau wa mu a a. A de wɛɛ, ɛ n bia wan tima ɔ tima yɔ a 'a denɛ. N mbe a kɔndɔn tena.
N mbe mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ kɔndɔn tena. An fan nɛ, Asinkitɔsi, Fɛkon, Amesi, Patɔbasi ni Amasi, an bɛ Chisianɛ tɔɛ n gbɛɛ a, an bɛ ɛ miin na.
N mbe Fidɔɔkɔsi kɔndɔn tena, an fea Chudia a. N ni Neyɛɔsi kɔndɔn, an fea a tensa musu a. Mbɛ n‑na Wɔdimpasi kɔndɔn, a basan Yataa 'a mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a, an bɛ ɛ miin na.
Ni wo bɛn‑da, mbɛ wo‑a wo nyɔn kɔndɔn koadia faa a. Chisian chɛ n gbɛɛ chɔchi tɔɛ chɛ n dɔ, an mbe wo gbɛɛ kɔndɔn tena ka.

N bɔ Chisianɛ nu, n mbe wo disa tena wo ni wo kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ n boo ɔ. Mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin mbe mɔɛ n dɔ fasan, an mbe sɔnkɔ sɔnkɔɛ a bea an tɛ ɔ. Mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin mbe an bɔɛ n ka tea chia ma. A yɛ to, wo kan‑da ko chɛndɛ miin ma, an mɔɛ chɛ n mbe wo kan ko dɔ gbɛɛ n na, miin mbe ee a chia ma. Wo ma gbɛn an mɔ bonda chɛ n ma.

A mu min na, an mɔɛ chɛ nu miin mbe ko bonda chɛ n ma, an mbe ee ma ka mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi 'a wai an chɛ‑a. An gbɔsɔen mu dechee an faa ma koe n fan ko a. An da ɔ di, an sin mbe mɔɛ n yii a faa faa wan bai sɛsɛ a, mɔɛ miin woo koe ma gbɛ, mbɛ an‑na an bun.

Mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a min fan, wo kooen mu buɛ min dɔ Mansa Chisɔsi tena. Chɛ gbu sin‑na a ma, n bu ɔ dia‑a wo ko a kaka. N toen mu, fen kɔ fen min nyin, wo 'a yiimatɛ ni koa an ma koe a. Chɛɛ ko ɔ ko min yau, a yiima gbu ma ma wo ɔ a ma koe a.
A sin dɔ ee yansan tena to, Yataa min mbe faachima be mmɔ ma, mbɛ a kun‑da Sitana ma wo ko a. Mansa Chisɔsi ni wo dua.
Timoti, nn fea ɛ wai chɛ min na, a‑a wo kɔndɔn ka. N bɔɛ Chu mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ, Dusiɔsi, ni Chason, ni Sosipata, an‑na wo kɔndɔn ka.
N fan, Tatiɔsi, n fɛn‑na Pɔɔ da a bai chɛ n nyɛn gboo chɛ ɔ, n bɛɛ n mbe wo kɔndɔn tena kaka, Chisian chia a.

N mbe mɔɛ min bɛɛ 'a sondaya a, chɔchi ɛ si to nɛ an 'na chenɛ a, kai Kayɔsi, ɛ wo kɔndɔn tena ka. Ɛyasitɔsi wɛɛ, min mbe kɔpɔɛ sa tena ɔ bɛn duu chɛ ko a, an fea mmɔ bɔɛ Chisianɛ Kuatɔsi a, an mbe wo kɔndɔn tena ka.

Mmɔ tando be Yataa ma. A wan mbe kun a ma‑a mmɔ gboo ɔ ee fa‑a, dan koe a a a. N mbe chɛ an fɔ wo ye, n mbe ma sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian‑da wo a, a si Chisɔsi Chasi ma. A sin fɔen mu ka wan ko ɔ nunden chɛ wɛɛ ɔ, min na bɔ‑a ya a ma. An tea ɔ nunden chɛ, Yataa nii ma a ma ni mɔ gbu ni fua min dɔ sɔn‑da san sɛsɛ sɛsɛ ko a suun.

Chɛɛ sanche gbɛ, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n‑na fenɛ miin nyɛn Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, a‑a a ma wan mɔ sɛsɛ n‑na tea ko ɔ nunden chɛ ɔ sɔn. A sin, mɔɛ gbɛɛ dunya ma, an‑na an ko ɔ nunden chɛ ɔ sɔn gbɛ. Yataa Mansa, min mbe kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ be, an‑na chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, mɔɛ n ni an kai fa a a, mbɛ an‑na kooya be a ma.
Mmɔ Yataa tando kuɔ fɔ ko a. An mu dechee yiimatɛ koaenɛ dɛgbɛ ɛ min dɔ, a ni ben fen kɔ fen ma. Dua ni ma a tɔɛ ma, kuɔ fɔ ko a, Chisɔsi Chasi 'a gbasaya ɔ. A ni ma ka.
N fan Pɔɔ, n fan mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena wo tena, nn fea Sositɛnesi a, mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ Chasi ɔ. Yataa wandi gbu, an dɔn‑da, a boo sɔ koe a n ma, n ni ma Chisɔsi Chasi 'a sɔ mɔɛ a.

Nn mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena, wo wan tena, wo wɛn mbe Yataa 'a chɔchi ɔ, Kɔyindi duu ɔ. Yataa na‑a wo wɛn chee, wo ni ma tenchen a ko a. Yataa‑a wo ma a ta mɔɛ n na, koe min na mu, a‑a wo ma mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Chisɔsi Chasi a. A‑a a ma ka wan mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a, miin mbe Mansa Chisɔsi tɔɛ chee tena, mmɔ 'a mansa, ni an 'na mansa, an baun koe a.
Mmɔ Fa Yataa, an fea Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi a, an 'na dua ni ma wo ma, a basan an 'na faachima a.
N mbe Yataa wai bɔ tena wan wo ko a, tima ɔ tima. A sien mu koadia deman chɛ an ma, a‑a min chɛ wo a, wo wɛn mu mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Chisɔsi Chasi a.
Wo ma min chɛ‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, wo bɛ a a, a‑a wo kɔ wan chia a, a chenama ɔ. A‑a wo kɔ wan chia a, bai gbɛɛ ɔ, wo e min sa. A yɛ to, yiimatɛ kan kɔ kan ko a.
Chɛ‑a a ɔ yian fan ka, mbɛ nn‑na bai min fɔ wo ye, a si Chisɔsi Chasi ma, mbɛ wo boo a sien mu a kɔɔ chɛndɛ chɛ.
Chɛ ko a, Yataa Nyina ɛ dua kan kɔ kan min mbe, koe n ma koe a, wo‑a an ma sɔn, wo e ta‑a mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi yɛ tima ma kɔn‑da.
Ɛ wo 'a danaya n dɔ gbɛa‑a wan, aan a sɔ tee danka chɛ ma. Ɛ a ma‑a wan, mabɔ kan kɔ kan mbe ee ma‑a wo ma, an tee wa chɛ ma, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi ɛ na‑a to tima min na.
Yataa ee a da a kuiɛ yɔn. A wan‑na wo chee, ma koe a dia nyɔncha wa chɛ ɔ, wo bɛ a 'a denɛ a, Chisɔsi Chasi, mmɔ 'a mansa.
N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, n mbe wo disa tena, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi tɔɛ ɔ, kuiɛ dɔndɔya ni ma wo tɛ. Wo sɛmbɛ wo nyɔn kɔɔsa bia koe a. Wo dɔn wo nyɔn ye, wo yiima ni ma dɔndɔ gbe, a ɔ ma du du.
Koe min na mu, n suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, n‑na a a min, mbɛ bɛn mbe ee wo tɛ, an fɛ mu n mbe koɔ tena ka wo tena. Mɔɛ dɔ nu Kowɛ 'a chenɛ a, an ban‑da a ɔ yian‑da n na.

N mbe min fɔ tena wo ye, an nɛ. Mbɛ wo gbɛɛ, wo da a kuiɛ ee kaina dɔndɔ. Wo dɔ n mbe a fɔ wan, wo ɔ, “Pɔɔ fɛ mɔɛ mu n na.” Mbɛ wo dɔ n‑na a fɔ, wo ɔ, “N mbe Apɔdɔsi an fɛ,” dɔ n dɔ, “Pita,” dɔ n sin dɔ, “Chasi fɛ mɔɛ chɛndɛ mu n na.”
Chasi chɛ dɔndɔ gbe, a ɔ ee che du‑a kaina sɛsɛ. N fan Pɔɔ ma a a, an na‑a min gbangban kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma, wo ko a. Wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ ee nɔ, yii na‑a chɛ min kunɛ ɔ, Pɔɔ tɔɛ ɔ.
Yataa ɛn wai, n ma yii chɛ ni wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a. N‑na a chɛ dechee Kisipɔsi an kunɛ ɔ, an fea Kayɔsi a.
Wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ ma na a fɔ, mbɛ yii chɛ‑a wo kunɛ ɔ, n tɔɛ an dɔ, wo ni bea n fɛ.
(A puin‑da gbɛ n yii ma, mbɛ n na‑a yii chɛ wan Sitɛfanasi kunɛ ɔ, a basan a 'a chen na mɔɛ n na. Chɛɛ a ma to ni n yii ma, n ni yii chɛ mɔ dɔ mende kan kɔ kan kunɛ ɔ to).

Koe min na mu, Chasi ma n sɔ ni, yii an chɛ koe a mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ. A‑a n sɔ, n ni sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian mɔɛ n na. N sin mbe ee a ɔ yian tena, mɔ gbu 'a yiimatɛ an na, daɔdiaya a. Ni n‑na chɛ ma, ɛ ma‑a wan, yɔ Chasi‑a saya min chɛ kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma, gbasaya ban‑da a ɔ.

A mu min na, sakana bai chɛ a si Chisɔsi Chasi fa koe ma kɔn gbengbanden chɛ ma, a mu wooya bai an na mɔɛ dɔ n tena. Chɛ nu, miin mbe ee na‑a bauncha ma sɔn‑da. Chɛɛ mmɔ wɛn mbe bauncha chia ma, bai chɛ mu Yataa 'a gbasaya an na.
A nyɛnden fan mu Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ Yataa ɔ te, ɛ yiimatɛ tɔɛ chɛ nu, an 'na yiimatɛ ɔ yɔn‑da wan. A sin, an 'na ko sɔnɛ gbɛɛ, a ee a ya a fen kɔ fen na.

Yataa‑a a ɔ yian, mbɛ dunya chɛ ɔ yiimatɛ, tɔnɔn mbe ee a ɔ. Mɔɛ yiima ni tɛ wɛɛ dunya chɛ ɔ, chɛ ee che a ma‑a Yataa sɔn mɔɛ a. A ni Chu n 'na sawa sɔn boo ɔ boo, chɛ wɛɛ ee a ma Yataa sɔn mɔɛ a. A ni ma wɛɛ mɔɛ a, min kosan koɔ‑a, chɛ nan fan gbu wɛɛ ee a ma, a ni ma Yataa sɔn mɔɛ a.

Yataa yiima tɛen ba mu, an‑na a ma, a‑a a ma mɔɛ n 'na yiimatɛ ee che a ma‑a, an ni a ɔ gbɛ a gbu ɛ ka ma. A‑a chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, mɔɛ chɛ n ni bauncha ma sɔn. Mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin mbe an kai fa‑a a a, ni an‑na wooya sakana bai chɛ a min, nn mbe min dɔ yian.
Chu mɔɛ n tana, an toen mu kamaya koe n fan dɔ yen koe a, dan koe a a a. Mɔɛ chɛ n sin, miin ma Chu mɔ a, an mbe dan fan a a, ni an ta yiimatɛ‑a a fɔ an ye, mbɛ tea mu.
Chɛɛ nn‑na a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ mɔɛ n na‑a kunka mansa fa wan, kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma. Chu mɔɛ n tana, an mbe chɛ ya mainɛ an na. Chɛ n sin, miin ma Chu mɔ a, an mbe a ya dechee wooya bai an na.

Chɛɛ mɔɛ dɔ n‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ Chasi chɛ, an mu Yataa 'a gbasaya a, an mu a 'a yiimatɛ a. Mɔɛ chɛ nu, Yataa‑a miin chee bauncha ma sɔn koe a. An ni ma Chu mɔ a, an ma ma Chu mɔ a, an‑na chɛ ɔ sɔn fan.
Yataa 'a dɔbɛn chɛ, min yaen mu ka wooya a, yiimatɛ koo a ɔ, a ben mɔ gbu 'a yiimatɛ a sɛnden kan kɔ kan ma. Yataa 'a gboo ɔ fa nan fan gbu wɛɛ, a benden mu mɔ gbu 'a gbasaya ma.

N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, a ni ma wo yii ma, dunya ta yiinachii ɔ, wo sɛsɛ an nii ma yiimatɛ tɔɛ a, Yataa na‑a wo chee tima min na. Wo sɛsɛ, an nii ma wo ya ni gbasaya tɔ a, an ma wo ya ni nyan tɔ a.

Chɛɛ Yataa‑a a a wii wan a ma, fenɛ n ya koe a fen chɛndɛ a, miin ma dunya ya a fen fen na. A‑a chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, dunya ɔ yiimatɛ tɔɛ n ni mau. Mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu, gbasaya nii miin ye dunya ɔ, a‑a an ma mɔɛ a, gbasaya tɔɛ n na mau koe a.
Mɔɛ n gbɔsɔ ma fenɛ miin ko a, an ma miin ya ni fen fen na, Yataa‑a an fen chɛ n fan ya. A‑a an ya, a ma koe a, fenɛ miin yaen ni tɔnɔnɛ a dunya ɔ, a ni ma fen fufafuu n na.
Chɛ ni a ma, mɔ gbu kan kɔ kan mbe ee yonka tɛ Yataa chen kɔɔ.

A wan Yataa dɔndɔ gbe, a wan‑na a ma, wo ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Chisɔsi Chasi a. Ni mmɔ‑a a fɔ, yiimatɛ ɛ mmɔ ɔ, Chasi mu. Ni mmɔ‑a a fɔ, mmɔ tanden mu, a wan mu. A‑a mmɔ kun bɔ mmɔ 'a ko yama n dɔ, mmɔ ma‑a Yataa 'a mɔɛ n na.
Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, a nyɛnden fan mu Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ mɔɛ min toen mu a ni yonka tɛ, a ni a tɛ koe a ma dechee, Mansa Yataa‑a min chɛ a ko a.
N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, n na‑a na wan wo tena. Chɛɛ n nii ma na ni daɔdia an na, Yataa na‑a koe min nun tee, a ɔ yian koe a wo a. N sin nii ma a ya ni, mbɛ n yiima tɛen ni.
Koe min na mu, tima min na n ni wo tɛ ɔ, ko dɔ gbɛɛ kan kɔ kan nii n yii ma wo kan koe a. Min ni dechee n yiima ɔ, an nɛ min sien mu Chisɔsi Chasi ma, a‑a saya min chɛ kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma.
Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, mmɔ bɛ ni kɛn, n gboo ɔ nii ma gbɛa nin bɛ. A yɛ to, chianɛ ni wan n dɔ, a basan ma samba a.
A sin, n da a bai nu, daɔdia nii ma, yiimatɛ ɔ yian koe a. Chɛɛ n ni sakana bai miin dɔ yian, an ni a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ Yataa Nyina an ni n fɛ, an wai chɛ n chɛ‑a.
Chɛ ni a ma, wo ma wo kai fa mɔ gbu 'a yiimatɛ a. Chɛɛ wo ni wo kai fa Yataa 'a gbasaya an na.

Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, nn mbe sakana bai min sa ka, yiimatɛ ɛ wan a ɔ, chɛ n tena, miin kai faen mu Chasi a chɛndɛ chɛ. Mɔɛ miin mbe dunya chɛ ɔ, an 'na yiimatɛ ma. Gbasaya ɛ miin boo ɔ dunya chɛ ɔ, an ta ɔ ma, an 'na gbasaya min mbe ka gbɛ che‑a a danka a.
Nn mbe bai sa wo tena, a si yiimatɛ an ma, Yataa‑a miin nun tee. A e na to dunya a dan‑da, a‑a a fɔ wan, mbɛ an yiimatɛ chɛ, an mbe na‑a basɔmaya a mmɔ tena.

Yiimatɛ an nɛ, min nii an mɔɛ chɛ n dɔndɔ wɛɛ ɔ, mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, gbasaya ɛ miin boo ɔ dunya chɛ ɔ. Koe min na mu, a ni ma‑a an dɔ, an nii Mansa Chisɔsi fa‑a kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma, a wɛn mbe si ɔ a 'a gbasaya ɔ.

Chɛɛ min maen mu, ɛ ka wan dechee yɔ min nyɛnden mu Yataa 'a gboo ɔ. A ɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ ma koe chɛ n dɔ yen nin bɛ, a ya a, a ɔ, a ma an na min ni, a too a, a ɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ sin ma an dɔ gbɛ ni, a yiima ɔ. A ɔ, koe chɛ nu, Yataa‑a min sa tena ɔ bɛn mɔɛ n ko a, a ɔ, miin toen mu a a.
Chɛɛ Yataa‑a koe chɛ n dɔ yian mmɔ a, a Nyina 'a gbasaya an dɔ, a‑a min na na mmɔ tena. Koe min na mu, Yataa Nyina chɛ ɛ ko ɔ ko kɔɔ gbɛngbɛn fan, a ni ma Yataa yii ma koe wɛɛ a.
Mɔ gbu yii ma koe chɛndɛ wɛɛ gbu, mɔ dɔ gbɛɛ ee a sɔn, fɔ a wandi dɔndɔ gbe dechee. Yataa Nyina wɛɛ ɛ ka wan, a dɔndɔ gbe an mbe ko ɔ ko ɔ sɔn, a si Yataa ma.
An Nyina chɛ mu, mmɔ‑a min ma sɔn, a ka Yataa tena. Chɛɛ mmɔ ma chɛ an ma sɔn ni, min mbe dunya chɛ ɔ. Mmɔ ni kun gbɛ, mmɔ ni a ɔ gbɛ, Yataa‑a koe min chɛ mmɔ ye.

An fɛ mu, nn mbe bai chɛ n fan fɔ mɔ dɔ gbɛɛ ye. N sin mbe ee a fɔ an ye, daɔdia bai n fan dɔ, yɔ mɔɛ n mbe an yii na chii miin na, mɔɛ n kan koe a. Chɛɛ nn mbe min ma, nn mbe bai n fan sa, Yataa Nyina ɛ min don nn da ɔ, an sa koe a. Nn mbe Yataa Nyina ta bai ɔ yian, a wandi ta bai an na, ɛ min fɔ nn ye.

Chɛɛ mɔɛ nu, Yataa Nyina ee miin fɛ, an mbe ee dɔn, an ni an boo si fen chɛ n kɔɔ, Yataa Nyina ɛ miin be. Koe min na mu, an mbe an ya wooya fenɛ n fan na. An mbe ee che an dɔ gbɛ‑a. Koe min na mu, Yataa Nyina dechee, an mbe a ma, mɔɛ n ni koe n dɔ gbɛ miin ka‑a Yataa tena.
Chɛɛ Yataa Nyina ɛ mɔɛ min fɛ, ɛ kun fan a ni ko ɔ ko ɔ gbɛ, a si ko ɔ ko ma. Chɛɛ a sin, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee kun a ni a wandi gbu wakoe ɔ gbɛ.

Tea an nɛ, koe min na mu, a nyɛnden fan mu Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ ee Yataa Mansa yii ma koe ɔ sɔn, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee a sɔ chia ma. Chɛ wɛɛ ni ma, mmɔ wɛn, Yataa Nyina 'a gbasaya ɛ mmɔ ɔ, Chasi 'a yiinachii ɛ wan mmɔ ɔ.

N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chisɔsi ɔ, mmɔ bɛ ni tima min na, n fandi gbu nii ma koɔ ni wo tena, yɔ Yataa Nyina ɛ mɔɛ miin fɛ. Chɛɛ n na‑a wo ya wan yɔ mɔɛ nu, miin mbe bea an ta faa ma koe n fɛ. Wo e wan dechee yɔ den toa nu, miin mbe ka dechee a kuu sɔ‑a an kai fa koe a Chisɔsi Chasi a.

N ni ma wo kan‑da, n ni wo da kɔ tee susu yii an na, n nii daun fen dɔ gbɛama be wo ma. Koe min na mu, wo ma nii ma bɛn nin bɛ daun fen dɔ gbɛama ko a. Tea gbu ko a, wo gbu sin ma ma bɛn nin bɛ a ko a sanche wɛɛ.
Koe min na mu, wo mu tun mɔɛ n fan na, miin faa ma koe n benden mu an ma. Toomaya ɛ wo tɛ ɔ, a basan koɛ a. Chɛ ɛ a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ wo e koe ma tena wan yɔ mɔɛ nu, miin mbe ee Yataa chia ma.
Koe min na mu, wo dɔ n mbe a fɔ tena wan, mbɛ wo e n fan Pɔɔ an ko a. Mbɛ dɔ n sin dɔ, an mbe Apɔdɔsi an ko a. Ni wo ma‑a chɛ ma‑a, wo e ma‑a ka koe ma‑a na yɔ mɔɛ nu, miin mbe ee Yataa chia ma.

Chɛɛ n fan Pɔɔ, n ma mɔ a, Apɔdɔsi wɛɛ ma mɔ ɔ mɔ a. Min sin sien mu nn ma, Yataa 'a yɔnɛ gbama mu nn na, miin‑na a ma, wo dan‑da Chisɔsi Chasi a. Mansa Yataa‑a nn sɔ wai chɛ‑a buɛ min dɔ, nn‑na a chɛ ka wan.
N fan‑na wai chɛ kuu sɔ, mbɛ Apɔdɔsi‑a toa si a kɔɔ. Chɛɛ Yataa wandi gbu an‑na a ma, a ta‑a ya ɔ ma.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, mɔɛ min mbe chin fenɛ chin‑da, a ma wai chɛ ni, an fea mɔɛ chɛ a, min bɛɛ ɛ yii chɛ‑a a ma. Chɛɛ Yataa, min mbe a ma chin fen chɛ, ɛ koa, a ta wai an koo.
Mɔɛ min mbe chin fenɛ chin, an fea mɔɛ chɛ a, min mbe yii chɛ a ma, an mbe wai dɔndɔɛ an chɛ. Yataa ɛ an fea gbɛɛ pawa‑a wan, yɔ an‑na wai chɛ buɛ min dɔ.
Koe min na mu, nn mbe wai chɛ tena Yataa an ko a. Wo sin, wo e wan yɔ wo e a 'a yadi ɔ wan. A yɛ to, wo e wan bɛɛ yɔ a 'a chen sɔenɛ.
N 'na wai maen fan ni, yɔ chen sɔ mɔ wa. N fan‑na chenɛ chɛ kuu si. Yataa an‑na mɔnɛ chɛ be n ma. Mbɛ mɔ dɔ mende sin mbe ta‑a chen chɛ sɔɛ a ya ɔ ma. An fɛ mu, mɔ ɔ mɔ ni tima ya, chen chɛ sɔ buɛ a.
Koe min na mu, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee an chen chɛ kuu sɔ, ni a ma a kuu si ni Chisɔsi Chasi a.
Chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a fen sɛsɛ ya wan, chen chɛ sɔ koe a. Mɔɛ n‑na sanu ya wan, an‑na kain gbɛ ya, a basan sen baa gbɛama a. Mɔɛ dɔ n‑na kɔnɛ ya wan, an‑na nyanda ya, a basan nungbu a.
Chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ ta wai chɛ buɛ, ɛ bɔ‑a wan ya a ma, kaa a tɛ tee chɛ ma. A sin, ta an mbe a ɔ yian‑da, mɔ ɔ mɔ kan kɔ kan‑na a ta wai min chɛ.
Ni a‑a chenɛ min sɔ, ni a sɔ‑a chidi, ɛ a 'a pawa ma sɔn‑da wan.
Chɛɛ ni a minda‑a, ɛ fo‑a wan fen kɔ fen na. A wandi kunɛ ɛ bɔ‑a wan a ɔ, yɔ mɔɛ min ma chɛ chɛ‑a ta manɛ boo ɔ.
Wo gbu sin‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ wo gbɛɛ mu Yataa 'a chenɛ an na. A sin, Yataa Nyina ɛ wan wo tɛ ɔ.
Chɛ ko a, mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe na‑a kasaa a Yataa 'a chenɛ a, Yataa wɛɛ, ɛ a mɔɛ chɛ kasaa‑a wan. A mu min na, Yataa 'a chenɛ ɛ tenchen a wandi an ko a. Wo sin fan mu an chen chɛ a.
Mɔ ɔ mɔ ma a wandi woo. Wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ ma a wandi ya yiimatɛ tɔ wa a, dunya chɛ ta chia a. Wo wo wandi woo mɔ a bɔɛ chɛ pɛn, min mbe a ma, wo ni ma yiimatɛ tɔ wa an na, Yataa ta chia a.
Koe min na mu, dunya chɛ ɔ yiimatɛ, a mu wooya koe an na Yataa tena. A 'a gboo‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “Yataa ɛ yiimatɛ tɔ wa an bia, an 'na yaa wa an fan dɔ.”
Yataa 'a gboo chɛ‑a a fɔ wan to, a ɔ, “Mansa Yataa‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ koe miin mbe yiimatɛ tɔɛ n yii ma dunya chɛ ɔ, wooya koe nu mu.”
Chɛ an fɛ mu, mɔ ɔ mɔ ma yonka tɛ, a si ma koe ma mɔ dɔ mende fɛ mɔɛ a. Yataa ban‑da fen fen ma‑a wo ta a.
Pɔɔ ni ma, Apɔdɔsi, ni Pita, an mbe wo wan ko a. Dunya chɛ wɛɛ, fɔɛ chɛ, saya, fenɛ miin mbe sanche, ni miin mbe kɔkɔɛ ya ɔ ma, an gbɛɛ, an mbe wo wan ko a.
Wo sin mbe Chisɔsi Chasi an ko a, a wɛɛ sin mbe Yataa ko a.
Chɛ ko a, wo nn ya, mbɛ bɔi denɛ mu nn na, Chasi ko a. Nn‑na ko sɛsɛ ɔ sɔn fan, a si Yataa ma, mɔ dɔ gbɛɛ ma min dɔ sɔn. Nn sin fan yaen mu, a ɔ yian koe a mɔɛ n na.
A yɛ to, bɔi den kan kɔ kan gbu sin, a dinden fan mu a ma, wai chɛ koe a danaya ɔ.
Ni n fan ko a mu, n ma n gbɔsɔ ni, ni wo wan‑na n gbɛmbo, chɛ ma, ni mansa nu mu kuti ɔ. N mbe ee kun n ni kaa a tɛ n fandi wakoe ma.
N yiima a koenɛ mu fion. Chɛ ma a yian ni, mbɛ ko yama ma mɔ ma n na. Mansa Chisɔsi dɔndɔ gbe an mbe kaa a tɛ, a si n ma.

Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo ma a a gbandia, kaa a tɛ koe a mɔ ɔ mɔ ma, tima ya ɔ, Mansa Chisɔsi e na to na‑a. A wan mbe koe n na bɔ‑a ya a ma, miin mbe nun dɔ, ni koe nu miin mbe mmɔ faa ɔ. A sin, tando min nyin, Yataa ɛ a be‑a wan mɔ ɔ mɔ ma, a be koe nyin mɔɛ miin ma.

N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, n‑na nn fandi ya tɔmɔsi a, nn fea Apɔdɔsi a, wo 'a tɔnɔnɛ an ko a. Chɛ ni a ma, Yataa 'a gboo‑a min fɔ, wo ma na tandin a ɔ. Wo ma na yonka tɛ, mɔɛ dɔndɔɛ wakoe ma, mbɛ wo tɛ‑a dɔndɔɛ sin dɔ.

Wo ta mɔgbuya, a a ma sɛ ni, a ni ben mɔ ɔ mɔ ta ma ɛnden bɛɛ a. Fen kɔ fen min mbe wo boo ɔ, Yataa an‑na a be wo ma. Ni wo‑a an ma sɔn Yataa an na, tea kan kɔ kan mbe ee wo boo ɔ, yonka tɛ koe a, yɔ wo ma an ma sɔn ni an na gbama a.

Wo tana, ɛ wo yii ma, Chisian fɔɛ chɛ ɔ, mbɛ wo ban‑da gbɛ wo faa ma fenɛ n gbɛɛ ma sɔn‑da. Mbɛ wo ban‑da gbɛ nyan‑da, Yataa chia a. A yɛ to, mbɛ wo ban‑da ma‑a mansa wa n na, nn tana, nn to‑a. Yataa ni a ma, wo ni ma mansa wa n na, min mbe a ma, mmɔ gbɛɛ ni ma an mansaya chɛ ɔ dɔndɔ a.

Chɛɛ n ta yiinachii ɔ, mansa ma nn na. Nn fan, Chasi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ nu, nn maen fan mu yɔ mɔɛ nu, Yataa‑a miin ma yii, ma yii dankama a. Nn mbe wan yɔ mɔɛ nu, ya ɔ sɔɛ n mbe ta miin na, an mbe an fa mɔɛ gbɛɛ ya kɔɔ. Ɛ ka wan, koe min na mu, mɔɛ gbɛɛ ya an mbe nn na. Mɔ gbu n bɛ maeka n na, an ya an mbe nn na, kɔ an ni a ɔ yen, koe min mbe ma‑a nn na.

Nn tana, mɔɛ n mbe nn ya woo mɔɛ n fan na, wai chɛ koe a Chasi ko a. Chɛɛ wo tana, wo e wo wandi ya yiimatɛ tɔ wa n fan na, koe min na mu, mɔ dɔndɔɛ mu wo a, wo bɛ Chisɔsi Chasi a. Mɔɛ n mbe nn ya, mbɛ gbasaya ee nn boo ɔ, wo sin tana, wo‑a wo wandi ya, mbɛ ɛ wan wo boo ɔ. Wo e baa be wan wo wandi ma, chɛɛ nn tana, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee baa be nn ma.
A sɔ sanche ma, nn mbe ee daun chɛ tima dɔ a, nn sin kanɛ a ɛ gbaa wan. Nn ma chiienɛ ɛ koa taa an na, nn mbe ee si kaina dɔndɔ, nn sin mbe gbasi ɔ yen ka wan.
Nn mbe wai chɛ wan, nn sɔɛ a, nn boo n na, nn da a daun fenɛ ma sɔn koe a. Ni an‑na nn main, nn mbe dua wan an ko a. Ni an‑na ko yawaenɛ sa nn ma, nn mbe nn faa bia wan.
Ni an‑na nn ma yaua, nn mbe bai chɛndɛ an sa, a si an ma. Sanche wɛɛ, an mbe nn bia yɔ bubuu, an‑na nn ya mɔ gbu tɔɛ a banɛ n na, dunya chɛ ɔ.
N ma gboo chɛ nyɛn ni wo tena, wo a mau koe an na. Chɛɛ n‑na a nyɛn wo tena, n ni wo sɔ chia ma, yɔ n faa ma denɛ nu.
Wo kan mɔɛ n ni ma wu sɛsɛ wɛɛ, ni wo ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, wo bɛ Chasi a, wo fa ɛ dɔndɔ gbe. Koe min‑na a ma, n ma‑a wo fa a, an nɛ sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a, a si Chisɔsi ma, n na‑a min na wo tena.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo dimu, wo sɔ n chen gba ɔ, wo ni tachɛ Yataa a, yɔ n mbe a ma tena buɛ min dɔ.

Chɛ gbu an fɛ mu, n mbe Timoti sɔ tena wo tena. Mɔɛ mu a a, mɔɛ ɛ che i yii sɔ‑a min ma gbau gbau, wai chɛ koe a Chisɔsi Chasi ko a. N 'na denɛ mu gbɛ a a, n toen mu min na kaka. Ɛ a ma‑a wan wo ee nyina‑a koe n ma, n mbe bea tena miin fɛ, n 'na fɔɛ ɔ, Chisɔsi 'a sɔmɔya ɔ. N ni mɔɛ n kan ko dɔndɔ gbe chɛ n fan na, chɔchi kan kɔ kan dɔ, n ni ta miin dɔ.
Ɛ wo dɔ n yii ma, mbɛ n mbe ee na tena to wo tena. A sin, chɛ bun‑da a ma‑a, wo bun‑da dɔpanda bɔ‑a.
Chɛɛ ni Mansa Yataa dɔn‑da, n mbe na tena wo tena sanche. A tima chɛ a gbɛ, n mbe a ɔ yen‑da wan, dɔpanda tɔɛ chɛ n mbe che koe min ma‑a, a fɔ koe ma dechee.
Koe min na mu, Yataa 'a mansaya wakoe, a ee dechee mɔ da an dɔ, chɛɛ a gbasaya gbu ɛ ma wan nɔ.
Ni n na‑a tima min na, wo wandi an mbe wo faa ma ya a gbɛ. Ni n mbe sɔnkɔ wan wo ma, n ni wo a tɔɔya. Chɛ ma, ni n mbe koadia an dɔ yian wo a, mbɛ n‑na wo bia chɛndɛ chɛ.

A che‑a n ma, mbɛ mɔ dɔndɔ wo tɛ ɔ nɔ, Kɔyindi chɔchi ɔ, ɛ ko yama ma tena, an fea musu a. Mɔɛ miin ma Yataa sɔn, an mbe ee ko yama miin nyɔn sima n ma, wo bɔɛ chɛ ɛ an fan ma tena. An‑na a gbu fɔ n ye, mbɛ ɛ waa ma basan tena wan, a de tinanɛ a.
Koe an nɛ, wo e di chɛ min na. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, wo e dɔpanda an bɔ tena. Chɛɛ wo ni an mɔ bonda chɛ gbain fan, min‑na ko bonda chɛ ma, a ni bɔ wo tɛ ɔ chɔchi ɔ.
N tana, n mbe ee wɛɛ ka boo ɔ boo wo tɛ ɔ, n fandi gbugbu gbu a, chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, n faa ɛ wan wo tena. N gbu sin ban‑da kaa a tɛ‑a, a si a ma.
Ni wo bɛn‑da kaina dɔndɔ, Mansa Chisɔsi tɔɛ ɔ, n mbe ma‑a wan wo tɛ ɔ, n faa ɔ. A sin, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi 'a gbasaya ɔ, ɛ ma‑a wan mmɔ tɛ ɔ.
Wo an mɔ bonda ya, wo ni a be Sitana ma, a ni tɔɔya. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, mbɛ a wandi‑a bauncha ma sɔn, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi ɛ na‑a to tima min na.
Wo e yonka min tɛ ka, a si wo 'a chɔchi ma, a yau gba wo ko a. An mbe a fɔɛ min chɛ, an dɔ, yisin denɛ chɛenɛ feawa funku ɔ, an dɔ, an mbe a ma, feawa funku gbu ɛ sɛ wa chɛ, wo‑a a tɛnsɛ buɛ sɔn fan.

Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo mɔ yama chɛ bɔ wo tɛ ɔ, min mbe a ma, wo ni to Yataa gbee ma. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, wo ni ma yɔ feawa funku nama, yisinɛ ee min dɔ. Tea gbu sin ko a, n‑na wo sɔn ka wan. Koe min na mu, Chasi wandi gbu fa‑a wan mmɔ ko a. A sin mbe wan yɔ sa chɛ, Chu mɔɛ n mbe min bɔ yasi a, kun bɔ a ɔ bɛnɛ kun ma.

Chɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ tachɛ Yataa faa ma a, yɔ Chu mɔɛ n ni kun bɔ a ɔ bɛn chɛ bia buɛ min dɔ, a chia ma. Mmɔ ma mmɔ 'a bɛn chɛ bia faa yama a, mmɔ ma a bia, mmɔ ɛ tun mmɔ 'a ko yama kɔma n dɔ. Chɛɛ mmɔ Yataa 'a sawa bia mmɔ boo fea a, mmɔ ni sɔn yama boo ka. Mmɔ ni Chu mɔɛ n ya tɔmɔsi a, miin ni biidi dɛnfɛenɛ daun, yisin nii min dɔ, bɛn chɛ tima kɔɔ. Chɛ ɛ a ɔ yian tena wan, mbɛ mmɔ tandenɛ ni ma Yataa chen kɔɔ.
N na‑a gboo nyɛn wo tena, tima dɔndɔɛ min na, n‑na wo a si wan, mbɛ wo ma gbɛn mɔɛ ma, min‑na waa ma basan buɛ yau.

N mbe ee chɛ fɔ tena mɔɛ n fan ko a, dunya chɛ ɔ, miin mbe waa yama ma basan. A yɛ to, an kanka, an fen ko yaen mu kaka, an mbe fenɛ n bɛɛ fai, miin ma Yataa a. Ni wo‑a a fɔ, wo ɔ, wo ee gbɛn an ma a sima wɛɛ, mbɛ fɔ ni wo ta ka‑a dunya chɛ wakoe ma gbae.

N ni min fɔ tena gboo chɛ ɔ, an nɛ, mbɛ wo ma gbɛn mɔɛ chɛ n ma, miin‑na an fandi chee Chisianɛ n na, chɛɛ an mbe ko tɛ an nyaa ma. Ni chɛ ma, an fen ko yaen mu kaka, an mbe fenɛ n fai miin ma Yataa a, an mbe an bɔɛ n tɔ yama ɔ tɛ, an mbe gbɛ wa min, chɛ ma, an mbe kanka chɛ. Wo gbu ma si wɛɛ, wo ni daunɛ chɛ mɔɛ bonda chɛ a, min boo ɛ chɛ dɔndɔ wɛɛ ɔ.

Yataa an 'na wai mu, kaa a tɛ koe a mɔɛ chɛ n bakoe ma, miin mbe ee chɔchi ɔ. N 'na wai ma chɛ a, kaa a tɛ koe a, a si an ma. Chɛɛ wo 'a wai an nɛ, wo ni kaa a tɛ, a si wo bɔɛ n ma, miin mbe chɔchi ɔ. Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ ka wan, mbɛ wo ni mɔ yama gbain, a ni bɔ wo tɛ ɔ.

Ka n mbe chɛ wɛɛ fɔ wo ye. Tea ee ma‑a wo boo ɔ, ta koe a wo bɔɛ chɔchi mɔɛ a, kuti ɔ, ni koɛ ma‑a wo tɛ. Ni wo‑a chɛ ma, wo e ma‑a ka ta‑a a mɔɛ chɛ a Yataa sɔn bai n fan chen kɔɔ. Chɛɛ wo e min ma, wo a sa chɔchi ɔ mɔɛ dɔ n chen kɔɔ, an ni a sa Yataa chia a.

Wo gbu ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ mɔɛ miin mbe chɔchi ɔ, an fan mbe na‑a kaa a tɛ‑a, a si mɔɛ n gbɛɛ ma dunya ɔ. Ni wo sin fan mbe na tena chɛ ma‑a, wo ee che wo ni tɛ wo wandi ɔ sanche, kaa a tɛ koe a tataya bai n ma.
Wo gbu sin ni a ɔ sɔn to, mbɛ mmɔ wan mbe na tena kaa a tɛ‑a, maeka n bɛɛ wakoe ma. Chɛ gbu ko a, wo e che wan, wo ni tataya bai n sa wo nyɔn tɛ, nɛ dunya ma.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, ni bai bonda chɛ n ma‑a wo tɛ ɔ, wo ma ta a a mɔɛ tena, min mbe ee chɔchi ɔ, baa ni ma a ma boo ɔ boo. Chɛɛ wo ta a chɔchi ɔ, mɔɛ chɛ tena, baa sima wɛɛ ee min ma, a ni a sa.
Bai chɛ ma mauen mu, wo ko a. Mɔ dɔndɔ gbe gbu wɛɛ, ɛ wan nɔ wo tɛ ɔ, min yiima tɛen mu, bai sa koe a, wo dechee tɛ ɔ chɔchi ɔ.
Chɛɛ wo suun ma nyɔn dechee dechee nu Chasi ɔ, wo wan mbe ta wo nyɔn na, kuti ɔ. Wo e ta mɔɛ chɛ n chen kɔɔ, miin ma an kai fa ni Chisɔsi a, wo 'a bai sa koe a.
Siibia bonda chɛ chɛ koe wo boo ɔ gbu, a ɔ yiandenɛ an nɛ, mbɛ wo bea‑a fo. A fisa wɛɛ, wo ni an baamaya an dɔ bia. A fisa wɛɛ to, wo bɔɛ n ni wo boo fenɛ n ma kafaya.
Chɛɛ wo e min ma, wo wandi gbu an mbe wo nyɔn kafa, wo e baa wo nyɔn ma. Wo suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo e chɛ n ma an nan fan bɛɛ a.

Wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan pɛnɛnɛ, mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ n mbe ee don Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ, mɔɛ miin mbe ko yama ma. Wo ma wo wandi woo. An mɔɛ chɛ n fan nɛ, miin mbe waa yama ma basanɛ a, ni miin mbe fɛnɛ n fai miin ma Yataa a. Chɛ ma, miin mbe waa ma basan an bɔ kai n na, an bɛ chɛ n na, miin mbe waa ma basan an bɔɛ n ta si nyɔɛ n na.

N mbe ee a fɔ, chɛ n bɛɛ, miin mbe kanka chɛ, ni miin fen ko yaen mu kaka. A yɛ to, gbɛ min mɔ wa an bɛɛ, ni miin mbe tɔ ɔ tɛ yama chɛ, an bɛ kafa tɔɛ n na. An dɔndɔ wɛɛ ee don‑da Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ.

Wo dɔ n ni ka wan tee. Chɛɛ sanche gbɛ, wo ko‑a fo, wo 'a ko yama n boo ɔ. Wo ma‑a tenchen Yataa ko a. Yataa‑a wo ya mɔ tandenɛ n na, a chen kɔɔ, Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi 'a gbasaya ɔ, an fea Yataa Nyina a.

Wo dɔ n mbe a fɔ wan, wo ɔ, “Kɔn mbe ee sa ɔ n ya ɔ, ko ɔ ko ma koe a.” Chɛɛ wo koe gbɛɛ ma, min nyin a ma koe a wo boo ɔ. Wo ɔ te to, wo ɔ, “Kɔn mbe ee sa ɔ n ya ɔ, ko ɔ ko ma koe a.” Chɛɛ n mbe ee dɔn‑da, n ni ma yɔnɛ a koe n boo ɔ, n mbe miin ma.

Wo dɔ n sin mbe a fɔ, wo ɔ, “Daun fenɛ ɛ bu an ko a,” wo ɔ, “bu wɛɛ ɛ daun fenɛ ko a.” A gbu sin mbe ka wan. Chɛɛ tee dɔndɔ a, Yataa ɛ a ma‑a wan, an fea gbɛɛ ee ma‑a to nɔ. Wo gboo ee nɔ, min mbe a ma, wo ni koe tɛ. Chɛɛ wo tachɛ koe mu Chisɔsi ko a, mbɛ wo gboo kɔ koe sin, a ma‑a Mansa Chisɔsi wɛɛ ma.
Yataa‑a Mansa Chisɔsi kɔɔ sɔ wan, a ka saya ɔ. A sin mbe a ma‑a ka wan, mmɔ wɛɛ ni mmɔ kɔɔ sɔ, a ka saya ɔ, a 'a gbasaya dɔndɔ gbe chɛ ɔ.
Wo gbu ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ wo gboo mu Chasi wandi sɔna n fan na. Mɔɛ sin mbe ee a gboo ya, min mu Chasi ta a, a ni a a tun ko tɛ mɔɛ ta a. Chɛ ee ma ɛnden bɛɛ a.
Wo ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ mɔɛ min mbe a gboo be‑a ko tɛ musu ma, mbɛ an fea ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a. A nyɛnden mu den Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ an fea ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a.
Chɛɛ mɔɛ min ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, an fea Mansa Chisɔsi a, a Nyina an mbe ma an mɔɛ chɛ fɛ.
Wo wo boo bɔ waa ma basan ko yama kan kɔ kan dɔ. Koe min na mu, ko yama kan kɔ kan, mmɔ ɛ min ma, a ee mmɔ gboo tɔɔ. Chɛɛ mɔɛ min mbe koe tɛ, a‑a ko yama si a wandi gboo a.
Wo ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ wo gboo mu Yataa Nyina 'a chenɛ n fan na, miin mbe tenchen a ko a. Yataa an‑na an Nyina chɛ be wo ma, an ni ma wo fɛ. Wo ee wo wandi an ko a, chɛɛ wo e Yataa an ko a.
