Yataa‑a wo sɔnkɔɛ bɔ wan. Chɛ ko a, wo wo gboo bia chia an na, min mbe na tando a a tena.
N mbe na tena gbɛ n da tu‑a koe chɛ n na, wo‑a miin nyɛn wo 'a gboo ɔ. N dɔnden fan mu a ma, mbɛ a nyin ni mɔ ma tu ni musu a.
Chɛɛ mɔ sɛsɛ ɛ waa ma basan ko yama ma wan. Chɛ an fɛ mu, a nyin kai kan kɔ kan ni a ta musu ma sɔn, musu kan kɔ kan bɛɛ.
Mɔ kaima min sin mbe musu fuu‑a, a ni ko ɔ ko chɛ musu si kai, ɛ min chɛ a 'a musu ye. Fuu musu wɛɛ ni ko ɔ ko chɛ, kai sɔn musu ɛ min chɛ, a chɛɛ ye. Mɔɛ ɛ i bɔɛ faa ma koe an ma.
Gbasaya kan kɔ kan mbe ee musu boo ɔ, a gboo kun ma. Gbasaya chɛ ɛ a chɛɛ an boo ɔ. Mɔ kaima wɛɛ ɛ ka wan. Gbasaya ɛ a 'a musu an boo ɔ, a gboo kun ma.

Wo ma ban waa ma basan koe a, wo nyɔn na. Fɔ ni a ma‑a wo 'a dɔbɛnɛ an na, a ma koe a ka, tima kundu ɛnden ko a. Chɛ ni a ma, wo ni tima ya samun chɛ koe a. Chɛɛ chɛ gbakɔ wɛɛ, wo yɛ to wo gba ɔ, fuu ta chia a. Ni wo‑a chɛ ma, wo e na‑a bɔ‑a wan Sitana 'a dɔsimanɛ boo ɔ. Koe min na mu, wo ee na‑a kun‑da wo ni wo wandi kun ma fɛn.
N mbe chɛ fɔ tena wo ye, gbasaya an kɔɔ ma. Chɛɛ a ɔ yian koe mu wo a, wo e min ma.
A ni ma‑a wan buɔdia a, ni wo ni wan yɔ n mbe buɛ min dɔ. Chɛɛ Yataa ɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ kɔ wan, a ta chia a. Ɛ mɔɛ dɔndɔɛ kɔ chia chɛ a, mbɛ a‑a dɔndɔɛ kɔ chia dɔ mende a.
N mbe dasi chɛ an be tena gbɛ fuinya n ma. A nyin an ni ma an 'na dɔndɔ gbeya chɛ ɔ, yɔ n fan.
Chɛɛ ni wo ee che wo wandi bia‑a a chia a a, mbɛ wo dɛ fuu ɔ. Koe min na mu, a nyin mɔ ni ma fuu ɔ, a ben dunya ma koe ben koe ma mɔɛ ɔ.
Wo wɛn mbe fuu ɔ, sawa chɛ an mbe n boo ɔ wo ko a. Musu ma a chɛɛ boo ka. N fan ma sawa chɛ sa ni, chɛɛ Mansa Chisɔsi mu.
Chɛɛ ni musu‑a a chɛɛ boo ka, a ma kai dɔ gbɛɛ sɔn to. Ni chɛ ma, a ni yɛ a chɛɛ tena, an 'na bai ni ban. Mɔ kaima nan fan bɛɛ ma a 'a musu boo ka.

Ka n mbe chɛ fɔ gbɛ mɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ n sin ye. (N fandi an mbe chɛ fɔ tena, Mansa Chisɔsi an ma a don ni n da ɔ.) Mbɛ mɔ kaima min mu Chisianɛ a, ni a 'a musu sin ma Chisian na, kai chɛ ma a boo ka chɛ ko a. Ni an musu chɛ dɔnden fan mu, an ni ma tun an si chɛ ɔ.
Ni musu wɛɛ mu Chisianɛ a, a chɛɛ sin ma a, a wɛɛ ma a boo ka chɛ ko a. Ni a chɛɛ chɛ dɔnden fan mu tun, an ni ma an si chɛ ɔ.

Koe min na mu, mɔɛ min ma Chisianɛ a, ni a‑a musu fuu min mu Chisianɛ a, an fea chɛ ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a. Mɔ kaima chɛ, min ma ka Chisianɛ a, Yataa ɛ a ya wan yɔ a ta. Musu wɛɛ ɛ ka wan, ni a ma Chisianɛ a, chɛɛ a fuu kai mu Chisianɛ a, an bɛɛ ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a. Musu chɛ, Chisianɛ ma ka min na, Yataa ɛ a ya wan yɔ a ta. Ni chɛ ma, an 'na denɛ n mbe ma‑a wan, yɔ denɛ nu, miin ma Yataa sɔn. Chɛɛ Yataa ban‑da ka buɛ min dɔ an fa ya‑a, ni an de, mbɛ a wan ta mu an na, a ban‑da an 'na denɛ n bɛɛ ya‑a, mbɛ a wan ta mu an bɛɛ a.

Chɛɛ ni mɔɛ n ma‑a fuu ɔ, min ma ka Chisianɛ a, a toen mu an ni du, yuu tɛen fan mu an ma, du koe a. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, ni ɛ bɛn fan, an ni to an fuu chɛ ɔ. Yataa toen mu, mmɔ ni ma faachima an dɔ, mɔ dɔ mende n na.

Wo wɛn mu fuu musu n na, n ni a fɔ wo ye, mbɛ kɔkɔɛ wo chɛɛ n mbe an kai fa‑a wan Chisɔsi Chasi a, a si wo wakoe ma. A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, kɔkɔɛ wo wan Chisian kai n bɛɛ, wo e ma‑a ka wan demanɛ a wo 'a musu n tena, miin ma Chisianɛ n na.

Sawa mu chɛ an na, n mbe wo kan tena min na chɔchi n gbɛɛ ɔ. Mansa Chisɔsi‑a mɔ ɔ mɔ ma koe fɔ buɛ min dɔ fɔɛ chɛ ɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ ni ma ka a ɔ. Mɔ ɔ mɔ 'a fɔɛ ni ma, yɔ a ni buɛ min dɔ, Yataa‑a mɔ ɔ mɔ chee tima min na, ma koe a a ta mɔɛ n na.

Ni mɔɛ min na kaminchaenɛ ɛ, Chu mɔɛ n 'na sawa chia a, mbɛ a dɔn‑da Yataa 'a chee ma, a ma a fɔ, mbɛ ɛ kamincha paa chɛ ka wan a gboo ma. Ni mɔɛ min na ma kamincha ni, a dɔn‑da Yataa 'a chee ma, a ma a fɔ, mbɛ a ɛ kamincha wan to.
Mɔɛ a ni kamincha wan, a a ma kamincha ni fan, ko ɔ ko ma chɛ a. Koe mu min na dechee, an nɛ, Yataa 'a sawa bia koe a chɛndɛ chɛ.
Mɔ ɔ mɔ ni to ka, yɔ a ni buɛ min dɔ, a e na to dɔn‑da Yataa 'a chee ma, ma koe a a ko a.
Tima min na Yataa‑a i chee, ni i ni yɔnɛ an na, chɛ ma i faa gbaa. Chɛɛ ni i‑a chia ma sɔn, bɔ koe a an yɔncha ɔ, an chia chɛ bia i boo fea a.
Koe min na mu, Mansa Chisɔsi ɛ yɔnɛ min chee, a ma‑a mɔ kun kaenɛ a. A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, mɔɛ min mbe ee yɔncha ɔ, ni Mansa Chisɔsi‑a a chee, a mɔɛ chɛ ma‑a a 'a yɔnɛ a.
Yataa‑a wo sɔnkɔɛ an bɔ. Wo ma Yataa to, wo ni don mɔɛ n kɔɔ.
N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ ni to ka, yɔ a ni buɛ min dɔ Yataa ya kɔɔ, a e na to dɔn‑da Yataa 'a chee ma, ma koe a a ko a.

Ka n mbe koɔ gbɛ, a si den tɔngbɔɛ n ma, miin ma si nin bɛ fuu ɔ, wo‑a gboo nyɛn a si miin ma. Mansa Chisɔsi an ma chɛ don ni n da ɔ, n mbe ka min fɔ‑a. Chɛɛ bai min mbe n da a, n mbe ka an fɔ‑a. N mbe koɔ tena wan, yɔ mɔɛ, wo e kun wo ni dan min na. Koe min na mu, Yataa chinchinden fan mu n ma.
N ta yiima ɔ, ni n‑na a ma fɛn faayɔnɛ min mbe sanche, a nyin mɔ ɔ mɔ ni to ka, yɔ ɛ buɛ min dɔ.
Ni musu ɛ wan i boo ɔ, i ma a boo ka. Ni musu sin mbe ee i boo ɔ, mbɛ i ma i ya a kan musu a.

Chɛɛ ni i gbu sin‑na musu si, i ma ko yama ma ni. A sin to, ni sɛnama‑a kai sɔn, a wɛɛ ma ko yama ma ni. Chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin mbe fuu ɔ, an 'na kun dumɛ koo. Chɛ an fɛ mu, n bu ɔ ɛ dia‑a wan, ni wo ma dɛ ni an tee ɔ tee a kun dumɛ ɔ.
N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, min mbe n yii ma, tima min yianden mu, a ɔ wua‑a gbɛ. A ka gbɛ sanche ma, aan a ta, musu si kai n ni ma, yɔ mɔɛ nu, musu ee miin boo ɔ.

Mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ, miin mbe di chɛ‑a, an ni a ma yɔ an faa ma yɔn ni. Miin mbe yɛn chɛ‑a, an ni a ma yɔ an bu ɔ ma di. Miin‑na fee fenɛ n san, an ni a ma yɔ an‑na fenɛ miin san ka, mbɛ an fan ta ma an na.
Mɔɛ miin mbe wai chɛ tena, dunya ma fenɛ n na, an ma an faa gbɛɛ chɛ an fen chɛ n bakoe ɔ. Koe min na mu, dunya chɛ ɛ ka buɛ min dɔ, a ee to tena a gba ɔ.

N ma to ni, faagbaa kan kɔ kan ni ma wo ma. Chisianɛ n tɛ ɔ, mɔ kaima miin ma musu si nin bɛ, an gbɔsɔen mu Mansa Chisɔsi 'a wai an na. Koe min na mu, an toen mu an ni koe n ma, miin mbe Mansa Chisɔsi faa chima.
Chɛɛ musu si kai tana, a faa gbaaen mu dunya chɛ ma koe an na. Ɛ ma buɛ min dɔ, a ni a 'a musu faa chima.

A sin to, a faa ma ko ee dɔndɔ. Musu wɛɛ, a ni ma sunkun tɔngbɔ a, a ni ma sɛnama a, ni a ee kai boo ɔ, a gbɔsɔen mu Mansa Chisɔsi 'a wai an ko a. A toen mu, a ni Mansa Chisɔsi faa chima koe ma, a chɛ chɛ wai gbɛɛ ɔ, ni a 'a yiinachii gbɛɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ fuu musu tana, a faa gbaaen mu dunya chɛ ɔ koe an na, ɛ ma buɛ min dɔ, a ni a chɛɛ faa chima.

N mbe chɛ fɔ tena, wo deman koe mu. Chɛɛ n mbe ee wo a gban tena wan. Chɛɛ n toen mu min na, an nɛ, koe ma koe a, min nyin, a sin tea ɛ a ɔ, a ma koe a. A yɛ to, min mbe a ma, wo ni wo wandi be Mansa Chisɔsi ma gbae, wai chɛ koe a a ko a, wo faa gbɛɛ a.

Chɛ an mbe n da a chɛ n ko a, miin‑na woo sa musu n ko a. Chɛɛ ni mɔ kaima yiima‑a a fɔ a ye, mbɛ a ee tachɛ chɛ tena musu chɛ a a chia ma, ni a to‑a musu a kaka, a fuu koe chɛ‑a a faa ɔ, a ni a fuu, a faa ni chima. Ko yama kan kɔ kan ma chɛ a.
Chɛɛ ni mɔ kaima‑a a yiima ɔ bɛn, mbɛ a ee fuu chɛ tena, mɔ ɔ mɔ sin ma a din ni a ma, a nyin fan. Ni ɛ kun fan tachɛ koe a a wandi a chɛndɛ, a 'a woo chɛ saenɛ ni ma tun musu chɛ ko a.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, mɔɛ min mbe musu fuu, a‑a ko chɛndɛ ma. Chɛɛ mɔɛ min gbu sin ma musu fuu ni, a nan gbu ta ko chɛndɛ koo.
Fuu musu ɛ a chɛɛ an ko a, kai ɛ wɛ tima min kɔɔ fɔɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ ni a chɛɛ fa‑a, yuu tɛ‑a a ma, kai dɔ gbɛɛ sɔn koe a, Mansa Chisɔsi ta chia a.
Chɛɛ n ta yiinachii ɔ, musu chɛ 'a buɔdia ma ɛ munda‑a wan, ni a ma si ni kai ko a. N sin danden fan mu a a, mbɛ Yataa Nyina ɛ wan n bɛɛ fɛ, n sɔ koe a chia ma.

Ka n mbe koɔ gbɛ, a si daun fenɛ n ma, mɔɛ ɛ miin bɔ yasi n na, fen chɛ n tena, miin ma Yataa a. Wo‑a gboo nyɛn fan, a si a ma. Mmɔ gbɛɛ, yiimatɛ ɛ wan mmɔ ɔ, yɔ wo e a fɔ buɛ min dɔ. Chɛɛ an yiimatɛ chɛ sima, ɛ mmɔ kunɛ koa dɔpanda an na. Chɛɛ koadia tana, ɛ chen sɔ wan mmɔ kɔɔ.
Ni a ma‑a mɔ ɔ mɔ 'a yiinachii ɔ, mbɛ a‑a koe sɔn fan, a ni ma a yii ma, mbɛ a ma ko sɔn, yɔ a gbu ɛ min sɔn.
Chɛɛ ni Yataa ko a dia‑a mɔɛ ye, ɛ a mɔɛ chɛ sɔn fan.

Chɛ sin fan mbe n da a gbɛ, a si an daun fenɛ daun koe ma, mɔɛ n mbe min bɔ yasi a, fen chɛ n tena, miin ma Yataa a. Mmɔ gbu‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ an fen chɛ n mbe ee fɔɛ ɔ. Mmɔ‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ Mansa Yataa ɛ dɔndɔ gbe.
Tea gbu mu a a, mbɛ mɔɛ n mbe bai sa wan, a si fenɛ n ma banda bu ɔ, ni dunya chɛ ɔ, an mbe miin chee Yataa a. An fen chɛ n kɔkoo wan, an sin mbe miin bɛɛ chee, an dɔ, mansa, an bɛɛ kɔkoo.

Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, Yataa ɛ dɔndɔ gbe mmɔ ko a. An mu mmɔ Fa a, min‑na fen kɔ fen na dan dunya ɔ. An 'na fɔɛ ɛ mmɔ sun da a. Mmɔ 'a Mansa wɛɛ, ɛ dɔndɔ gbe, min mu Chisɔsi Chasi a. Yataa 'a gbasaya ben‑da an dɔ, fen fen na dan koe a dunya chɛ ɔ. A sin fan‑na a ma, mmɔ ɛ fɔɛ chɛ ɔ, mmɔ ɛ ka min na fɛ‑a.

Chɛɛ mɔɛ gbɛɛ an ma tea chɛ ɔ sɔn. Mɔɛ dɔ n dii‑a gbɛ bea koe a an 'na fania yataa chɛ n fɛ kaka. Bi tee chɛ wɛɛ a, mɔɛ dɔ n mbe daun fenɛ n daun fan, miin been mu an fania yataa chɛ n ma. An sin mbe ma a daun‑da, an gbu dandenɛ an mbe ma an na tun, mbɛ an daun fen chɛ n mbe an 'na yataa chɛ n fan ko a. An 'na Chisian danaya ɔ ma gbɛ wɛ kaka. An mbe ma an fen chɛ n daun‑da, ɛ ma wan an yii ma, mbɛ an mbe ee ka tea ko ma‑a, mbɛ an ma‑a ko yama ma mɔɛ n na.
Chɛɛ mmɔ ɛ daun fenɛ min daun, an mbe ee na mmɔ a Yataa baima. Mmɔ ni daunɛ chɛ, tɔnɔn kan kɔ kan mbe ee a ɔ, mmɔ ma a chɛ, mmɔ ee fo fen kɔ fen na.
Chɛɛ wo tima an ya dechee, wo e koe n ma buɛ min dɔ. Min mbe a ma, gbasaya min been mu ka wo ma daun chɛ koe a, a ma na a ma miin 'na danaya ɔ ma gbɛ, an ni ko yama ma.

Mmɔ a ya, mbɛ mɔɛ min 'na danaya ɔ ma gbɛ, a‑a wo yen daun chɛ‑a. Wo wan, an dɔ, yiimatɛ ɛ wo wɛn dɔ, wo e daun chɛ‑a an 'na fania Yataa chɛ n fai tena. Wo ni dan gbɛ a a, mbɛ chɛ ɛ ma wan a ma buɔdia a daun fen bonda chɛ daun koe a tima ɔ tima.
Ni wo‑a chɛ ma, mbɛ wo 'a yiimatɛ chɛ, an‑na a ma ka, wo suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ Chasi ɔ, min 'na danaya ɔ ma gbɛ ka, a kasaa‑a. Wo suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ, Chasi fa‑a ka min ko a.
An chia chɛ sin na, wo e ma‑a ka ko yama an ma‑a wo bɔɛ Chisianɛ n na, wo e paa to‑a an yii ma, miin 'na danaya ɔ ma gbɛ. Wo sin mbe ka ko yama ma‑a Chasi an na.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, ni n daun fenɛ an mbe a ma, n suun ma nyɔɛ ɛ ko yama ma, mbɛ n mbe ee soe daun‑da to. Min mbe a ma, n ma na n suun ma nyɔɛ a dɛ ko yama ɔ.
Ko ɔ ko boo ee n na, ae? Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ mu n na, ae? N‑na a yen fan n ya a pɛnɛnɛ, mmɔ 'a mansa chɛ. A sin, wo ma min chɛ a Chisianɛ n na, a bɔ‑a wai chɛ an dɔ, n‑na min chɛ Mansa Chisɔsi ko a.
Ni mɔ dɔ mende nu, an ma n ya nin bɛɛ Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ a, wo nɛnɛ tana, wo ee ka ɛnden bɛɛ a. Wo wan mu tɔmɔsi gbau gbau a, mbɛ Mansa Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ mu n na.
N mbe chɛ an fɔ mɔɛ chɛ n ye, miin mbe n ma nyin.
Nn bɛɛ, tea ɛ wan nn boo ɔ, nn ya sɔ koe a wo ya ɔ, daun fɛnɛ wakoe a, ae?

Tea ɛ wan to nn boo ɔ, nn mbe ma n 'na wai chɛ a, ben ben koe a, nn bɛ nn 'na musu n na, Chisianɛ nu. Ni musu ɛ wan nn boo ɔ, nn mbe chɛ ma wan, ae? Tea ɛ wan nn boo ɔ nn ni chɛ ma, yɔ Mansa Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ tɔɛ nu, ni a suun ma nyɔɛ nu, a che kai Pita wɛɛ ma, an gbɛɛ‑a a ma buɛ min dɔ.
Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ tɔɛ nu, an mbe ee wai chɛ an da a daun fen ko a. Nn fea Banabasi a, nn fan mbe wai chɛ gbɛ dechee nn da a daun fenɛ ma sɔn koe a. Fen ko a chɛ ɛ ma?

Soya mɔ kan kɔ kan mbe ee nɔ, min mbe a wandi pawa. Chin fen chin mɔ kan kɔ kan bɛɛ ee nɔ, min mbe a 'a chin fenɛ ya, chɛɛ dɔndɔ wɛɛ ee tu a da a. Ninchi kun ma fɛn mɔ nan fan mbe ee nɔ, min mbe a fɔ, mbɛ a 'a ninchi nɔnɔnɛ ee che a da ma.
N mbe ee chɛ fɔ tena dechee mɔgbuya ta fɛ chia an na. Sawa chɛ wɛɛ, min be‑a Mosisi ma, a‑a bai dɔndɔ gbe chɛ an fɔ.
Koe min na mu, an sawa chɛ, a ɔ te, mbɛ mɔ ma ninchi da a chii, a ɔ, ni a ma‑a fenɛ tɛn‑da. A sin ma ma wo yii ma, mbɛ Yataa ni bai sa tena a si ninchi dechee an ma, an sawa chɛ ɔ.

Yataa‑a bai chɛ n gbɛɛ fɔ, mmɔ wan ko a. Mɔɛ miin mbe wai chɛ tena Chisɔsi Chasi ko a, an ni pawa ma sɔn mɔɛ n na, an mbe wai chɛ tena miin ko a. Ɛ wan dechee yɔ chin fen wai chɛ mɔɛ nu, miin mbe chin fenɛ tɛn, an yii na tɛenɛ ɛ ma buɛ min dɔ an ta ma sɔn koe ma.
Nn‑na koe n sa wan wo faa ɔ, Yataa Nyina ɛ miin be. Chɛ ko a, kafa ma, ni nn‑na wo ɔ tisa dunya chɛ ɔ tɔnɔnɛ ko a.

Ni wo e wo boo fenɛ n be wan mɔ dɔ mende n ma, miin mbe Yataa 'a bai sa wo tena, tea ɛ wan a ɔ wo gbu ni wo boo fenɛ chenama be nn fan ma. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, nn ma bea nin bɛ tea chɛ fɛ. Nn mbe e na kɔnɛ sɔ sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ya ɔ, nn mbe nn faa bia wan ko ɔ ko a.

Wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mɔɛ miin mbe Yataa 'a kata ɔ, an mbe an daun fenɛ ma sɔn buɛ min dɔ. An mbe a ma sɔn wai chɛ an dɔ, an mbe min chɛ nɔ. Mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ, Chu mɔɛ n tɛ Yataa a, miin mbe yasi minda sen gbengbe ma nɔ, an mbe kana an yasi n fan dɔ.
A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, Mansa Chisɔsi‑a chɛ an fɔ, a si a 'a sakana bai chɛndɛ ɔ yian mɔɛ n ma. Mbɛ an bɛɛ, mɔɛ miin mbe an sakana bai chɛ a min, an ni an ma koe chɛ.

Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, n ma bea nin bɛ tea chɛ dɔndɔ wɛɛ fɛ. N sin mbe ee gboo chɛ nyɛn tena an tea chɛ konde gbain koe an na. Koe min na mu, n mbe ee chia be tena mɔ ɔ mɔ ma, n da tɔn koe a tea yonka chɛ tɛ koe a. A fisa wɛɛ n ni fa.

N mbe sakana bai chɛndɛ min dɔ yian tena mɔɛ n na, a si Chisɔsi Chasi ma, an mbe ee che a ma‑a n ni yonka tɛ. A dinden fan mu n ma, a ma koe a ka. A sin, a ma ɛ chian‑da gba n ko a, ni n ma sakana bai chɛ ɔ yian ni mɔɛ n na.
N mbe ka wai min chɛ‑a, ni n fandi kun ma a ni, n ni pawa ɔ tisa‑a wan. Chɛɛ a ee ka wan. N mbe wai chɛ chɛ tena, koe min na mu, Yataa wandi an‑na n sɔ a chɛ koe a.
N 'na pawa sin gbu ɛ ma chɛ an na. Mbɛ n ni ma‑a sakana bai chɛ ɔ yian‑da, n ma tisa chɛ pawa ko a. N mbe ee bea tena n 'na tea fɛ, n ni che a ɔ nyɔɔ.
Chɛ ɛ a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ 'a yɔn ma n na. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, n‑na n fandi ma yɔnɛ a mɔ ɔ mɔ ko a. Chɛ ni a ma, n ni na mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a, n mbe che na‑a miin na Chisɔsi Chasi tena.

Ni n ma‑a wai chɛ‑a Chu mɔɛ n tɛ ɔ, n mbe mun fan Chu mɔɛ a, an ma sawan koe a Chasi tena. A sin, n mbe ee wɛɛ ka boo ɔ boo an sawa chɛ kɔɔ, Yataa‑a min mbe Mosisi ma, n 'na fɔɛ ɛ wan yɔ miin mbe a kɔɔ, an mɔɛ chɛ n mun koe a, Chasi 'a mɔɛ n na.

A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a mu, ni n ma‑a wai chɛ‑a mɔɛ chɛ n tɛ ɔ, miin mbe ee an sawa chɛ kɔɔ, n mbe bɛn fan an bɛɛ tɛ ɔ. Chɛ ma a ɔ yian ni, mbɛ sawa chɛ ee nan gbu ko a. N sin gbu, n mbe wan Chasi 'a sawa kɔɔ chɛndɛ chɛ. Chɛɛ n mbe chɛ ma, an ma sawan koe an na Chasi tena.

Ni n ma‑a wai chɛ‑a mɔɛ chɛ n tɛ ɔ, miin 'na danaya ɔ ma gbɛ, Chisɔsi a, n bɛɛ, n mbe a ma wan yɔ n ta wɛɛ ɔ ma gbɛ. N mbe chɛ ma, n ni an ma sawan Chasi tena. Chɛ ɛ a ɔ yian, mbɛ n mbe mun fan mɔ kan kɔ kan na, mɔɛ kan kɔ kan tena. N mbe chɛ ma, an dɔ n baun koe an na, chia ɔ chia a.
N mbe chɛ gbɛɛ ma, min mbe a ma, sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ni fasan a ɔ kan kɔ kan. A ni a ma, mmɔ ni dua chɛ ma sɔn, bai chɛ ɛ na min na.

Wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan gbu, mbɛ bui chɛ tɔmbɔɛ ɔ, bui chɛ mɔɛ gbɛɛ an mbe ee a to a ɔ an nyɔn ko a. Chɛɛ dɔndɔ gbe, an mbe boo ɔ gbasi woo ma sɔn, sɔ koe a a bɔɛ n ya ɔ. Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo bui chɛ chɛ, wo ni boo ɔ gbasi woo chɛ ma sɔn.

A sin, bui chɛ mɔɛ kan kɔ kan, ɛ tachɛ wan a wandi a chɛndɛ chɛ koe gbɛɛ ɔ. An mbe chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, an ni mansa banfua ma sɔn, min gbu ee mɛ. Chɛɛ mmɔ tana, mmɔ ɛ bui chɛ tena boo ɔ gbasi woo an ko a, min mbe ma‑a kuɔ fɔ ko a.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, n tana, n mbe ee bui chɛ n kun fan ye. N mbe ee botani a dɛ, fia gbama ɔ.
Chɛɛ n mbe n fandi gboo ma wan tindin, mbɛ n‑na n tachɛ buɛ ma mɛn. N mbe chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, Yataa ma na n na yɛ a boo kɔ, ni n ban‑da mɔɛ n chee‑a bui chɛ koe a.

N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo wo yii na chii, koe miin ma‑a suun mmɔ 'a mɔɛ n na. Yataa‑a an bɔ kɛn Ichipi chɛnyɛ ɔ, a‑a banda gbii a tachɛ wan an kun ma, an kun ma fɛn koe a. A sin, an‑na kɔ yii wa chɛ tɛ wan. Yataa‑a a du wan fea a, mbɛ an ben‑da.
An to‑a banda gbii chɛ an kɔɔ, kɔ yii chɛ ɔ, mbɛ yii chɛ‑a an gbɛɛ kunɛ ɔ Yataa chia a, an ma koe mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Mosisi a.
An sin gbɛɛ‑a kamaya daun fen dɔndɔ gbe chɛ daun fan.
Mbɛ an gbɛɛ yɛ‑a, an‑na kamaya yii dɔndɔ gbe chɛ min. Koe min na mu, kamaya senɛ min ni an fɛ an tachɛ chɛ ɔ, an yii chɛ bɔ‑a an dɔ, an na‑a min min ka. An sen chɛ sin ni Chasi an na.
Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, Yataa faa nii ma chima ni an sɛsɛ a. Chɛ sin‑na a ma wan, a‑a an sɛsɛ kasaa an fuinɛ ma.
Koe chɛ n ma‑a, ma koe a dasi an na mmɔ tena. An ni a ma, mmɔ ma mmɔ faa chɛ koe n ma koe ɔ, miin yau, yɔ an na‑a miin ma.

Ni chɛ ma, mmɔ ni fenɛ n fai, miin ma Yataa a, yɔ an dɔ n ni a ma buɛ min dɔ. A sin nyɛnden mu ka wan Yataa 'a gboo ɔ. A ɔ, an‑na buɔdia bɔ wan, a ɔ, daun ba chɛ a, a ɔ, a basan gbɛ minɛ a. A ɔ, an‑na tɔmbɔɛ don fan, a ɔ, an mbe ta‑a fɔɛ yama 'a tachɛ a.
Mmɔ ma mmɔ boo chɛ waa ma basan yama ɔ, yɔ an dɔ n ni a ma buɛ min dɔ. An‑na a ma, an mɔ wu bi fea kun ma sawa an fa‑a tee dɔndɔɛ a.
Mmɔ ma Chasi yiima yan, a ɔ yen koe a, ni ko yama yuu mu mmɔ ɛ miin ma, mbɛ a‑a mmɔ tɔɔya. An dɔ n‑na a yiima yan ka wan, mbɛ ka n‑na an chin, an fa‑a.
Wo sin gbu ma gbonyɛ wɛɛ chɛ. An dɔ n‑na a ma ka wan to, mbɛ kasaa chɛ maeka na‑a, a‑a an kasaa.

Koe chɛ gbɛɛ miin ma‑a ka, an‑na a ɔ yian fan, koe min mbe ma mɔɛ a, ni i wɛɛ i‑a ko dɔndɔ gbe chɛ an ma, mɔɛ chɛ n‑na miin ma. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, mɔɛ n‑na a nyɛn Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, ma koe a dasi a mmɔ ko a. A mu min na, mmɔ ɛ ka tee min kɔɔ, a ɔ ma yansan to mbɛ dunya ban‑da.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, ni ɛ wan mɔ ɔ mɔ 'a yiinachii ɔ, mbɛ ɛ wan sɔ ɔ gban Yataa ko a, a mɔɛ chɛ ni a kun ma fɛn, min mbe a ma, a wɛɛ ma na bea.

Dɔsiman kan kɔ kan mbe ee wo tan, min sima ma mɔ gbu tan nin bɛ. Chɛɛ Yataa ee a da a kuiɛ yɔn, a sin mbe ee dɔn dɔsimanɛ ni na mɔ gbu tena, i 'a danaya ɔ ma gbɛ min dɔ bia koe a. Ni dɔsimanɛ na‑a i tena tima min na, a tima dɔndɔ gbe chɛ kɔɔ, ɛ chia yian‑da wan e kun buɛ min dɔ, i ni bɔ a ɔ. Ɛ i ɔ gbɛa‑a wan a ɔ bia koe a.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, n dia nyɔɛ nu, wo ma wo boo chɛ fenɛ n fai koe ɔ, miin ma Yataa a.
Yiimatɛ tɔɛ mu wo a, chɛ an fɛ mu, n mbe koɔ tena wo tena. Wo ni bai chɛ tɛnsɛ wo yii ma, n mbe ka min fɔ‑a wo ye.

Ni mmɔ ma‑a Mansa Chisɔsi 'a tebu chɛ ma, a yɛ to, ni mmɔ ma‑a gbɛ min‑da kɔpu chɛ ɔ, mmɔ‑a Yataa fai min dua koe a, mmɔ ɛ ma ka Chasi wii an ma sɔn‑da kuiɛ dɔndɔya ɔ. A sin to, ni mmɔ‑a biidi ɔ kai, mmɔ ni a daun, mmɔ ɛ ma‑a ka Chasi gboo an ma sɔn‑da kuiɛ dɔndɔya ɔ.
Mmɔ da a koo, chɛɛ mɔ dɔndɔ gbe mu mmɔ a, a mu min na, mmɔ ɛ biidi gbugbu dɔndɔ gbe an daun.
A sin, wo Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n ma fɛn, ni an mbe koe miin ma. Ni an‑na soe chɛ n daun, an mbe min bɔ ka yasi n na Yataa tena, an mbe ma ka a ɔ yian fan na, mbɛ an bɛ mu Yataa 'a kuiɛ dɔndɔɛ ɔ.
N mbe ee ka a fɔ an na, mbɛ yasi min mbe bɔ fen chɛ n tena, miin ma Yataa a, mbɛ yasi mu, tɔnɔnɛ ee min dɔ. Chɛ ma, mbɛ an fen chɛ n gbu, mbɛ baa kan kɔ kan mbe wan an ma.
Chɛɛ n mbe min fɔ tena, mbɛ an mbe yasi miin bɔ tena, an mbe an bɔ tena nyina yama n fan ma, an mbe ee an bɔ tena Yataa an tena. A ee dia n ye, n ni wo yen kuiɛ dɔndɔɛ ɔ, wo bɛ nyina yama n na.

E ee che ma‑a nɔ, e a min Mansa Chisɔsi 'a kɔpu ɔ, mbɛ e a min nyina yama n ta wɛɛ ɔ. A yɛ to, e ee ma nɔ, e si daun chɛ tena Mansa Chisɔsi 'a tebu ma, mbɛ e si daun chɛ tena nyina yama n bɛɛ a tebu ma.
Ni i‑a chɛ ma, e a ma tena koe min na, i toen mu Mansa Chisɔsi faa ni yɔn a si i ma. Tea gbu sin ko a, i ɔ ma gbɛ a ni ben Mansa Chisɔsi ma.

Wo dɔ n mbe a fɔ wan, wo ɔ, “Kɔn mbe ee sa ɔ n ya ɔ, ko ɔ ko ma koe a.” Chɛɛ koe gbɛɛ ma, min nyin a ma koe a wo boo ɔ. Wo ɔ te to, wo ɔ, “Kɔn mbe ee sa ɔ n ya ɔ, ko ɔ ko ma koe a.” Tea gbu mu, chɛɛ mɔ gbu ɛ koe miin gbɛɛ ma, an gbɛɛ an mbe ee che ma‑a basamaya a Chisianɛ n tena.
Wo ma ma nɔ koe n fan ko a dechee, miin ko a di wo ye. Chɛɛ wo ma nɔ koe n ko a, miin ko a di mɔ dɔ mende n ye.
Koe yen ko, wo e min ma. Wo e kun fan wo ni fen kan kɔ kan daun, an mbe miin ma tachɛ machiti ɔ. Yiinachii kan kɔ kan mbe ee che ma‑a wo ɔ, an daun fen chɛ daun koe a.
Koe min na mu, a nyɛnden fan mu Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ “Dunya chɛ, ni fen kɔ fen min mbe a ɔ, Mansa Yataa an ta mu an gbɛɛ a.”

Ni mɔɛ min ma Chisianɛ a, a‑a wo chee daun fenɛ ma, mbɛ wo ta‑a nɔ, wo fen kɔ fen daun, ɛ min be‑a wo ma a daun koe a. Wo ma tisa kan kɔ kan chɛ, a si an daun fen chɛ ma, wo ma a ma, mbɛ yiinachii an mbe wo ɔ.

(Chɛɛ ni mɔɛ‑a a fɔ wo ye, a ɔ, an daun fen chɛ bɔen mu yasi an na, fenɛ n tena, an mbe miin fai, wo ma an daun fen chɛ daun. Wo ee a daun tena koe min na, an mɔɛ chɛ an ko a mu, ni wo 'a yiinachii gbu ko a.
N mbe ee a fɔ tena, mbɛ wo ta yiinachii ɔ mu o. Chɛɛ an mɔɛ chɛ ta yiinachii ɔ mu). Koe min na mu, mɔ dɔ mende 'a tataya koe, an mbe ee n ka‑a n faa ma koe ma‑a.
Ni n‑na Yataa wai bɔ pɛn, mbɛ n‑na daun fen chɛ daun, mɔ ee n ma nyin chɛ ko a. Mɔ ee n ma nyin, koe min na mu, n‑na Yataa wai bɔ.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, mɔ ni ma ko ɔ ko kan kɔ kan ma‑a, basɔmaya ni ma i boo ɔ Yataa ko a. A ni ma daun chɛ ko a, a ni ma fen min koe wɛɛ a.
Wo ma mɔ ɔ mɔ sɔ chia yama ma, wo 'a fɔɛ ɔ. Wo ma Chu mɔ sɔ a ma, ni chɛ n bɛɛ miin ma Chu mɔ a. Wo gbu ma chɔchi ɔ mɔɛ n sɔ chia yama ma.

Wo koe n ma dechee, yɔ n mbe a ma buɛ min dɔ. N mbe butuinɛ chɛ wan mɔ ɔ mɔ faa chima koe a, n tachɛ buɛ gbɛɛ ɔ. N mbe ee n yii na chii, n fandi a tɔnɔnɛ an ko a. Chɛɛ tɔnɔnɛ chɛ mu, mɔɛ gbɛɛ ko a, an ni bauncha ma sɔn.
Chasi na‑a min ma, n mbe bea tena an fan fɛ. Wo wɛɛ, n mbe min ma tena, wo bea an fan fɛ.
N mbe wo wai bɔ tena, koe min na mu, wo e wo yii na chii tena n na tima ɔ tima ko a. Wo sin mbe bea tena wan kan chɛ fɛ, n‑na min chɛ wo a.
Chɛɛ n toen mu wo ni a ɔ gbɛ, mbɛ musu kan kɔ kan kun ti mu a chɛɛ an na. Mɔ gbu kan kɔ kan sin dunya ɔ, a kun ti mu Chasi an na. Chasi sin kun ti mu Yataa an na.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, mɔ kaima kan kɔ kan, min mbe ma samunɛ chɛ‑a, chɛ ma, ɛ ma Yataa bai ɔ yian‑da fanka ɔ, banfua ee ma a kunɛ a. Min mbe banfua si‑a a kunɛ a, a‑a baa bɔ a kun ti ma, min mu Chasi a.

Musu kan kɔ kan sin, min be ma samunɛ chɛ‑a, chɛ ma, ɛ ma Yataa bai ɔ yian‑da fanka ɔ, a kunɛ a chiienɛ ni ma. Min mbe ee a kunɛ a chii‑a, a‑a baa bɔ a kun ti ma, min mu a chɛɛ a. Ɛ ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ an na, an fea musu a, min kunɛ gbanan‑da, a a mau koe a.
Ni musu min mbe ee na‑a to‑a a kunɛ a chii koe a, ɛ nyan fan a gbu ni a kunɛ ma tɛ wɛɛ. A sin, musu kun gbananɛ ma mauen mu ka buɛ min dɔ, a ma tɛenɛ wɛɛ ɛ yau, mbɛ a ni a kunɛ a chii.
Mɔ kaima tana, banfua si ko ee a ma. Koe min na mu, Yataa bɔ nyɔɛ mu a a, a sin, a nyin a ni basɔmaya be Yataa ma. Chɛɛ musu tana, a nyin a ni basɔmaya be a chɛɛ an ma.
Koe min na mu, Yataa ma mɔ kaima a dan ni musu an dɔ. Chɛɛ a‑a musu a dan, a bɔ mɔ kaima an dɔ.
Mɔ kaima gbu sin, Yataa nii ma a nyan ni musu an ko a. Chɛɛ a na‑a a yii na chii wan, mbɛ a‑a musu a dan, mɔ kaima ko a.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, kun na chii ɛ musu ko a, a ɔ yian koe a, mbɛ ɛ gbasaya an kɔɔ, ni maeka n bɛɛ gbu ko a to.
Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ni ma wɛɛ, mmɔ mu buɛ min dɔ ka mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Mansa Chisɔsi a, ɛ ka wan. Mɔ kaima, a ee ma dechee a wandi ko a, musu wɛɛ, a ee ma dechee a wandi ko a.
Chɛɛ a gbu ma‑a boo ɔ boo, mbɛ musu saa bɔ‑a mɔ kaima an dɔ, a ka gbɛ a tima chɛ ma, mɔ kaima gbɛɛ ɛ bɔ tena musu an dɔ. Yataa sin fan mbe fen kɔ fen na dan tena.
Wo wandi gbu, wo e kun fan gbɛ wo yiima a tachɛ‑a chɛ ma. Mbɛ tea ee a ɔ, musu ni Yataa fai fanka ɔ, a kunɛ a chii wai a.
Mauma ko wa mu, mɔ kaima kundi yansanden ba ni ma. Yataa‑a mɔ gbu a dan buɛ min dɔ, a dechee gbu, a‑a mmɔ kan fan chɛ a.
A sin, mmɔ gbu‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ kundi bɔndenɛ mɔɛ kan kɔ, a mu basɔmaya an na musu ko a. Koe min na mu, Yataa‑a a be a ma, ma koe a gbasa an na.
Chɛɛ ni mɔ ɔ mɔ toen mu, a ni chɛ ma nyin, bai chɛ an mbe n da a dechee a ko a. Mbɛ manda dɔ mende ee nn boo ɔ, a ee Chisian chɔchi tɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ boo ɔ, a ka chɛ ma.
N mbe ka gbɛ na‑a bai miin fɔ‑a wo ye, n mbe ee wo bai tena wan. Koe min na mu, wo e bɛnɛ min chɛ, Yataa fai koe a, wo deman ko ma, wo tɔɔ koe mu.
Koe saa saa mu min na, mɔɛ n‑na a ɔ yian fan n na, koe min mbe ma, ni wo bɛn‑da chɔchi si tena. Wo kuiɛ a ee kan ɛnden bɛɛ a. N sin danden fan mu chɛ a ɛnden na.
Tɛnɛ ko ma chɛ a n tena. A gbu nyin fan, wo ni ma sɔ ɔ wo nyɔn kanɛ ɔ. Chɛ an mbe a ma‑a, tea ɛ miin boo ɔ, an ma ni gbɛ chɛndɛ chɛ.
Ni wo bɛn‑da kaina dɔndɔ, daun chɛ koe a, wo ee ma ka Mansa Chisɔsi 'a daun chɛ bɛnɛ an dɔ.
Koe min na mu, wo e ma daunɛ chɛ‑a, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee a chɛ a nyɔn ko a. A sin, mɔɛ dɔndɔɛ kɔnkɔ tɔɛ ɛ ma, mɔɛ dɔndɔɛ sin gbɛ tɔɛ ɛ.

Gba! Chenɛ n mbe wan wo boo ɔ, wo e daunɛ chɛ kaina min, wo e fenɛ n min nɔ. Chɛ ma, wo ma wo yii dɛn Yataa 'a chɔchi kun ma. Wo ma mɔɛ chɛ n na mau, fen mbe ee miin boo ɔ. N ma a ɔ sɔn, n mbe fen fɔ wo ye, a si chɛ ma. Wo toen mu, n ni wo tando wan. Chɛɛ n mbe ee che wo tando‑a chɛ ko a, ɛnden bɛɛ a.
Koe min na mu, n bɛɛ n‑na min na ben wo tena, n‑na a ma sɔn Mansa Chisɔsi an na. An na‑a a ma tachɛ ka yɛɛ min ma, a‑a biidi gbugbu ya wan.
Mbɛ a‑a Yataa wai bɔ, mbɛ a‑a a ɔ kai kai. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “N gboo an nɛ, min mbe wo ko a. Wo chɛ ma tima ɔ tima ko a, wo yii na chii koe a n na.”

A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a to, an ban‑da kɛn kun bɔ a ɔ daunɛ chɛ‑a, a‑a an ko dɔndɔ gbe chɛ an ma kɔpu wɛɛ a. A‑a a ya wan, mbɛ a ɔ, “N wii an nɛ. Yataa ɛ an ya tena, mbɛ a‑a dɔbɛn nama chɛ a 'a mɔɛ n na. Tima ɔ tima ko a, wo ni ma chɛ min‑da, wo yii na chii koe a n na.”
Koe min na mu, wo e biidi chɛ daunɛ min chɛ‑a tima sɛsɛ ko a, wo ni gbɛ chɛ wɛɛ min kɔpu ɔ, wo e ma‑a Mansa Chisɔsi 'a saya an dɔ yian‑da den, aan a ni na to.

Chɛ an fɛ mu, mɔ ɔ mɔ kan kɔ kan, ni i ma‑a Mansa Chisɔsi 'a biidi chɛ daun‑da, i ma baa bɔ a ma. A 'a gbɛ chɛ wɛɛ min koe ɛ ka wan. Ni i‑a chɛ ma, mbɛ i‑a ko yama an ma ka, Chisɔsi gboo a, i‑a a ma a wii a.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, mɔ ɔ mɔ ni a wandi faa ma mɛn pɛn, a e na to biidi chɛ daun‑da, a basan gbɛ chɛ min koe a.

Koe min na mu, mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe a daun‑da, a ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ Mansa Chisɔsi gboo an nɛ. Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ma‑a gbɛ chɛ wɛɛ min‑da, a ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ a wii wɛɛ an nɛ. Chɛɛ ni a ma koe chɛ n ma ni a chia ma, ni a gbu ma a ɔ sɔn an sien mu fen ma, Yataa ɛ kaa tɛ‑a wan a ma, a ni a tɔɔ.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo sɛsɛ, wo gboo fanka wo ma, gboo ɔ bɔ wɛɛ ee wo ma. A sin, dɔ n gbu fa‑a.
Chɛɛ ni mmɔ‑a mmɔ wandi ma mɛn pɛn, Yataa ee na‑a kaa a tɛ‑a mmɔ wakoe ma.
Chɛɛ Mansa Yataa ɛ kaa a tɛ‑a wan mmɔ ma gbɛ, mbɛ a‑a mmɔ koo. Chɛ an mbe a ma‑a, tee dankama tee kɔɔ, ɛ ma‑a kaa a tɛ‑a dunya chɛ ma mɔɛ n ma, a ee na‑a mmɔ wɛɛ sa‑a an kun ma, a ni mmɔ a tɔɔya.
Chɛ an fɛ mu gbɛ, n suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, ni wo bɛn‑da kaina dɔndɔɛ daun chɛ chɛ tena, wo wo nyɔn ma kɔn.

Ni kɔnkɔɛ ma‑a mɔ ɔ mɔ a, a ni daunɛ chɛ pɛn a waa chenɛ a. Wo ni chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, ni wo bɛn‑da kaina dɔndɔɛ, wo ee na‑a koe ma‑a, Yataa ni kaa a tɛ wo wakoe ma. Min sien mu koe tɔɛ n ma, n mbe chia n yian‑da wan wo a, ni n na‑a tima min na.
N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, n mbe koɔ tena gbɛ wo tena, a si dua chɛ n fan ma, Yataa Nyina ɛ miin be. Wo na‑a gboo nyɛn, a si an ma. N toen mu wo ni tea ɔ sɔn, a si an ma.
Wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ tima min na wo nii ma Yataa sɔn, wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan wo ni min ma. An‑na wo ka wan a ma, chia sɛsɛ a, wo e ben fenɛ n fai‑a, miin mbe ee koɔ.
Sanche gbɛ, n toen mu wo ni chɛ an dɔ sɔn. Mbɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ, Yataa Nyina ɛ min fɛ, a ee Chisɔsi main. A sin, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee a bɔ a da ɔ, a ni Chisɔsi chee mansa a, ni Yataa Nyina ma a sɔ ni chia ma.
Dua tana, a ma bɔ ni a nyɔn na. Chɛɛ Yataa Nyina tana sin, min mbe dua be, ɛ dɔndɔ gbe.
Chia wɛɛ kɔkoo, mɔɛ ɛ bɔ min na Yataa koe ɔ. Chɛɛ Mansa Chisɔsi ɛ dɔndɔ gbe, mmɔ ɛ min ko a.
A sin to, mɔ ɔ mɔ ɛ che wai chɛ‑a a ko a chia miin na, an kɔkoo wan. Chɛɛ a wan Yataa dɔndɔ gbe chɛ, an mbe mɔ ɔ mɔ ta chia be a ma, wai chɛ koe a a ko a.
Chɛ an mbe a ɔ yian, mbɛ Yataa Nyina ɛ wan mmɔ tɛ ɔ. Yataa ɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ dua wan, dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a, wai chɛ koe a mɔɛ tɔɛ n ni ta ya ɔ ma.
Mɔɛ dɔndɔɛ ɛ nɔ, Yataa Nyina‑a sakana bai min don a da a, a fɔ koe a mɔɛ n ye, yiimatɛ wa an be a ɔ. Mɔɛ dɔndɔɛ sin, Nyina dɔndɔ chɛ‑a a ma wan, yiimatɛ bai wa, ɛ ma a da a bai ɔ.
Nyina chɛ an mbe a ma to, mɔɛ dɔndɔɛ wɛɛ, ɛ a kai fa Chisɔsi a gban. Mbɛ mɔɛ dɔndɔɛ wɛɛ, a‑a gbasaya be a ma, mɔɛ n baun koe a gbandi n dɔ.

A Nyina dɔndɔ gbe chɛ, an mbe gbasaya be mɔɛ dɔndɔɛ ma, kamaya koe n ma koe a. Mbɛ a‑a a be to dɔndɔɛ sin ma, Yataa bai sa koe a. Mbɛ a yɛ‑a to, gbasaya min mbe a ma, mɔɛ ni nyina n tɛ bɔɛ sɔn, a‑a a be dɔndɔɛ wɛɛ ma. Kamaya bai n fɔ koe wɛɛ to, miin dɔ ee gbɛ ka dechee, ɛ a be wan mɔɛ dɔndɔɛ ma. Mbɛ a yɛ‑a, an kamaya bai chɛ n fasai koe, a‑a a gbasaya sin be mɔɛ dɔndɔɛ nan ma.
Yataa Nyina dɔndɔ gbe, an mbe a ma koe chɛ n gbɛɛ, an mbe che ma‑a, a ta faa ma a a. Mɔ gbu gbɛɛ, dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a, mmɔ ɛ dua chɛ ma sɔn an na.
Mɔ gbu gboo ɛ dɔndɔ gbe, chɛɛ a sɔna n kɔkoo. Chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, gboo dɔndɔ gbe chɛ mu tun, sɔna sɛsɛ n mbe wɛɛ a ma. Chisɔsi Chasi wɛɛ ɛ ka wan.

A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, mmɔ wan mɔ gbu gbɛɛ, mmɔ ɛ ka wan. Mmɔ ni ma Chu mɔ a, chɛ ma, mɔɛ nu miin ma Chu mɔ a, mmɔ ni ma yɔn fan na, mmɔ ma ma yɔn na. Yii min chɛ‑a mmɔ kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, a Nyina‑a mmɔ ma mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, gboo dɔndɔɛ sɛ‑a mmɔ ma. A sin, Yataa‑a an Nyina dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a na, ma koe a mmɔ fɛ.
Mmɔ ɛ a fɔ min chɛ ka, mmɔ gboo, mmɔ sɔna dɔndɔ gbe ma.
Mmɔ a ya gbɛ, mbɛ mmɔ chenɛ gbu ni a fɔ, a ɔ, boo ma a a, a ɔ, chɛ ko a, a ɔ, mmɔ sɔna ma a a. Chɛ ee che a ma‑a, a ta ni ka mmɔ gboo wakoe ma.
Mmɔ a ya to, mbɛ mɔ gbu too wɛɛ ni a fɔ, a ɔ, a tana, a ɔ, ya ma a a. A ɔ, chɛ ko a, a ɔ, a ta ee gboo koe ma. Chɛ ee che a ma‑a, a ta ni ka mmɔ gboo wakoe ma.
Ni mɔ gbu gboo gbɛɛ ni dechee ya kuu an na, ko a minɛ nii ma‑a a ɔ. A yɛ to, ni mɔ gbu gboo ni dechee mmɔ too an na, fen kunyɛ a minɛ nii ma‑a a ɔ.
Chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, koe n mbe ka buɛ min dɔ, mmɔ sɔna n gbɛɛ, mmɔ gboo ma, Yataa‑a an dɔ bɛn bɛn fan, a ta faa ma a a.
Mɔ gbu gboo nii ma‑a nɔ, ni sɔna dɔndɔ gbe ni.
Tea gbu mu min na, mɔ gbu sɔna n kɔkoo wan, chɛɛ a gbɛɛ mu mɔ gboo dɔndɔɛ a.
Chɛ an fɛ mu gbɛ, ya ee che a fɔ‑a boo ye, a ɔ, a ma gbɔsɔ ee a ma. A yɛ to, n mbe ee a fɔ, kunɛ wɛɛ ni a fɔ chenɛ ma, a ɔ, a ma gbɔsɔ kan kɔ kan mbe ee a ma.
A ka chɛ gbu ma, mmɔ sɔna n gbu wɛɛ, miin dɔ ma gbɛ, mmɔ ee che an to‑a gbaa ko ɔ ko ɔ.
A sin, mmɔ sɔna chɛ nu, ɛ ma mmɔ yiima baa ee miin ma, kaka, mmɔ ɛ an fan gbu bia chɛndɛ chɛ. Mmɔ sɔna chɛ n sin, miin ma ma kawa ni mmɔ ye, mmɔ ɛ tima ya an fan na.

Mmɔ ee an tima chɛ ya, mmɔ sɔna chɛ n na, miin ma kawaen mu kaka. Mmɔ gboo chɛ, Yataa wandi gbu wɛɛ, a‑a a ɔ bɛn, a buɛ ɔ, min mbe a ma, mɔ ni baa chenama be i gboo kaka n ma, baa bɛnden mu a ni be miin ma.
Chɛ ni a ma, koɛ ma ma mmɔ sɔna n tɛ, mmɔ gboo ma. Chɛɛ mmɔ sɔna n gbɛɛ, an gbɔsɔenɛ ni ma an nyɔn ko a kuiɛ a kanɛ ɔ.
Ni mɔ gbu sɔna dɔndɔ wɛɛ tɔɔya‑a, a ni ma a tɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ a tɔɔya a. Ni an sɔna dɔndɔ a basɔmaya ma sɔn, a tɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ ni buɔdia bɔ a a.
Sanche chɛ ɔ, wo gbɛɛ, wo mu Chasi gboo dɔndɔɛ chɛ an na. A sin, dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a, wo mu a sɔna n fan na.

Yataa‑a sɔ tena koe ɔ bɛn fan, Chisianɛ n tɛ chɔchi ɔ. A saa ma‑a min na, a‑a a boo sɔ wan Chasi 'a sɔ mɔɛ n ma. A fean bɔɛ mu, a wan Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n fan na. A sawan bɔɛ mu, mɔɛ n kan mɔɛ n fan na. Chɛ gbakɔ, mɔɛ miin mbe kamaya koe n ma, ni chɛ nu gbasaya be‑a miin ma, mɔɛ n danda koe a, deman koe a an ma, an sɔ koe wɛɛ a chia chɛndɛ ma, a basan kamaya bai n fɔ koe a, miin dɔ ee gbɛ ka dechee.
Mɔɛ gbɛɛ, an ma Chasi 'a sɔ mɔɛ n na, an ma Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n na, an ma mɔɛ n kan mɔɛ n na. A sin, an gbɛɛ an mbe ee kamaya koe n ma.

Yataa Nyina ma mɔɛ gbɛɛ an dua ni, mɔɛ n baun koe a gbandi n dɔ. A ma mɔɛ gbɛɛ dua ni, kamaya bai n fɔ koe a, miin dɔ ee gbɛ ka dechee. A yɛ to, a ma mɔɛ gbɛɛ dua ni, an kamaya bai chɛ n na ben koe a.
Chɛɛ wo butuin chɛ, wo faa gbɛɛ a, Yataa Nyina ɛ dua miin chɛ, a kuu ba n fan ko a ni dia wo ye. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, min benden mu chɛ n gbɛɛ ma, an nɛ yɔ n mbe ka na‑a chia min yian‑da wo a.

Chɛnyɛ koɛ sɛsɛ wa chɛ nu, mɔ gbu n mbe miin fɔ, maeka n bɛɛ an mbe miin fɔ, n ni an gbɛɛ fɔ wɛɛ, koadia ni ma n faa ɔ. Chɛɛ ni koadia ee n faa ɔ, n bɔ mɔ gbu ko a, n da a bai chɛ n mbe wan dechee yɔ tainɛ sɔnkɔ sɔnkɔ kuiɛ, chɛ ma, pani tata n mbe ma bɛn bɛn‑da an nyɔn na.

Chɛ n bɛɛ, n mbe na tena ka miin ma dan‑da, an ni ma wɛɛ n boo ɔ, koadia ni ma n faa ɔ. Gbasaya ni ma n boo ɔ, Yataa da a kuiɛ ɔ yian koe a mɔɛ n na. A ni ma n boo ɔ, koe gbɛɛ mɔ gbu ee kun min dɔ gbɛ koe a, n ni an dɔ gbɛ. A ni ma to n boo ɔ, n ni n kai fa Chisɔsi a gbeden, min mbe che a ma‑a, n ni a fɔ kɔnkɔɛ ma, n dɔ, a ni ka a gba ɔ, mbɛ a kuɛn‑da. Chɛ n gbɛɛ ni ma wɛɛ n boo ɔ, ni koadia ee n faa ɔ, mɔ ma n na.
N gbu ni n boo fenɛ gbɛɛ be wɛɛ mɔɛ n ma, n ni n fandi gbu be, an ni n minda, koadia ni ma n faa ɔ. Chɛɛ ni a ee a ɔ, n mbe ee ko chɛndɛ kan kɔ kan ma sɔn chɛ gbakɔ.
Faabia, an mbe koadia ɔ, a basan chinchimaya a. Toomaya ee koadia ɔ, yonkatɛ ee a ɔ, dɔpandaya wɛɛ ee a ɔ.
Kanbaiya ee koadia a ɔ, faagbandia ee a ɔ, mɔ sin mbe ee i gbɔsɔ dechee i ta ma koe n fan na, a ni ben i bɔɛ ta ma. Koadia ɔ, kakaa ee nɔ, kodomaya sa koe a ɔ.
Koadia ɔ, mɔ bu ɔ ee dia ko yama ma koe a, mɔ bu ɔ ni dia tea koe an ma koe a.
Koadia ɔ, mɔ sɔɛ ee bɔ, i bɔɛ ko a. A sin, danaya, yiinatɛ, ni faabia, mɔ gboo ɔ ee fa an na.

Kuɔ fɔ koe mu koadia a. Sakana bai n mbe wan nɔ a ka Yataa tena, mɔɛ n mbe miin ma sɔn. Chɛɛ an mbe ma tima kundu an ko a. Dua sɛsɛ ɛ wan nɔ, kamaya bai n fɔ koe a, miin dɔ ee gbɛ dechee. Chɛɛ dua chɛ ɛ ban fan. Yiimatɛ ɛ wan nɔ. Chɛɛ a nan fan bɛɛ danka ɛ.
Koe min na mu, mmɔ 'a ko sɔnɛ, a a ma ban ni. Yataa da a bai chɛ wɛɛ, mmɔ ɛ min dɔ yian mɔɛ n na, a a ma ban ni.
Chɛɛ ni koe min na banden mu, ni a che‑a a ma, koe min na ma ban ni, ɛ tuin‑da wan.
N ni denmɛsɛya ɔ tima min na, n 'na bai sa buɛ, n 'na ko a tisɔn buɛ, a basan n yii si buɛ a koe n ma, an ni wan yɔ den mɛsɛ. Chɛɛ n ma‑a kɛn kai da faenɛ a, n‑na n boo bɔ n 'na den mɛsɛ sɔnɛ n dɔ.

Sanche gbɛ, mmɔ ɛ koe ɔ yen mia mia, yɔ mɔɛ ɛ ma mɛmɛ ɔ fɛn‑da. Chɛɛ tima ɛ che‑a wan, mmɔ ɛ a yen‑da tima min na gboden, mmɔ ya fea sɔenɛ a nyɔn na. N ma ko a tenden sɔn bɛ, chɛɛ a da ɛ na‑a wan fa a. A da ɛ fa‑a wan, yɔ n bakoe ɔ sɔn koe da faen mu buɛ min dɔ Yataa boo ɔ.
Chɛ ni ma wɛɛ ma‑a, ko sawa an fan mbe nɔ, miin mbe ma‑a nɔ tun. An mu kai fa an na Chisɔsi a, yiinatɛ a ma, ni a ko a dia koe a mmɔ ye. Ko sawa chɛ n tɛ, a kuu ba mu koadia an na.
Koadia ni ma wo faa ma koe a, a ben fen fen ma. Chɛɛ wo to chia sɛsɛ chɛ n bɛɛ a, Yataa Nyina ɛ wo dua‑a miin na. A bɛbɛɛ dua chɛ, min mu Yataa da a bai ɔ yian koe a.

Koe min na mu, mɔɛ min mbe kamaya bai n fɔ, mɔɛ n mbe ee miin dɔ gbɛ ka dechee, a ee koɔ ka mɔ gbu n fan tena. Chɛɛ ɛ ma ka koɔ‑a Yataa an tena. Koe min na mu, Yataa Nyina ɛ ma wan a fɛ, ɛ ma kamaya bai miin fɔ‑a, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee an dɔ gbɛ.
Chia dɔndɔɛ a, mɔɛ min mbe Yataa da a bai ɔ yian mɔɛ n na, an deman koe mu. Mbɛ a‑a an faa ma nande, an bu ɔ ni dia.
Mɔɛ min mbe kamaya bai n fɔ, mɔ ee miin dɔ gbɛ ka dechee, ɛ a wandi an deman dechee. Chɛɛ mɔɛ min mbe Yataa da a bai ɔ yian mɔɛ n na, ɛ basan ka mɔɛ gbɛɛ an ma, miin mbe chɔchi ɔ.

N toen fan mu, wo gbɛɛ ni kamaya bai sɛsɛ fɔ, mɔ ee miin dɔ gbɛ ka dechee. Chɛɛ min benden mu chɛ ma, n toen mu, wo ni Yataa da a bai ɔ yian mɔɛ n na. Mɔɛ min mbe chɛ ma, a benden mu mɔɛ chɛ ma, min mbe kamaya bai sɛsɛ fɔ. Koe min na mu, ni mɔɛ ma a da a bai ɔ yian ni, mɔɛ n mbe ee demanɛ sɔn chɔchi ɔ.

N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, ni n na‑a wo tena, n mbe kamaya bai sɛsɛ fɔ‑a, wo ee miin dɔ gbɛ ka dechee, wo ee a tɔnɔnɛ ma sɔn. Wo ee a sima wɛɛ ma sɔn, mɔɔ ni n‑na a tɛnsɛ wo tena, Yataa ɛ min fɔ tena. Chɛ ma, yiima miin mbe a ɔ, chɛ ma, sakana min nyɔn sima mu a a, chɛ ma, kanɛ minan sima mu.
A ni ma kuiɛ fenɛ n bɛɛ a, miin mbe ee fɔɛ, yɔ koee, chɛ ma, koninka, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee a kuiɛ sɔn, ɛ ma koɔ‑a. Mɔ ee a sɔn, mɔɔ ni a kuiɛ ma‑a bɔ‑a chɛndɛ chɛ.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, mɔɛ min mbe potani fɛ, ni a ma a fɛ ni chɛndɛ chɛ, soya n mbe ee an ma bɛn chɛɛ chɛ koe a.
Ɛ ka wan dechee wo wɛɛ ko a. Ni wo ma koɔ ni gbadan, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee che a ɔ gbɛ‑a, wo e ma‑a bai min fɔ‑a. Koe min na mu, wo e ma‑a wo da a kuiɛ sa‑a fia an na.
Chɛnyɛ koɛ sɛsɛ ɛ wan dunya ɔ, chɛɛ dɔndɔ wɛɛ ee nɔ, mɔ ee min dɔ gbɛ.
Chɛɛ ni n ma chɛnyɛ koɛ sɔn, mɔɛ min mbe a fɔ tena n ye, sonda mu a a n tena. N bɛɛ, n mu sonda an na a wɛɛ tena.
Wo wɛɛ, wo ma bɛndenɛ ɛ ka buɛ min dɔ Yataa Nyina 'a dua ma sɔn koe, wo chɛ ma. Wo e min ma, koe gbɛɛ ya ɔ, dua miin mbe na demanɛ a, chɔchi ɔ, wo ni wai chɛ an pɛn na.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, mɔɛ min mbe kamaya bai n fɔ, mɔ ee miin dɔ gbɛ ka dechee, a ni samunɛ chɛ, gbasaya ni ma nɔ a a ben koe a.
Ni n‑na samunɛ chɛ kamaya bai bonda chɛ n dɔ, n mbe a chɛ Yataa Nyina 'a gbasaya an dɔ. Chɛɛ n ta yiima, an mbe ee a ma tena, n mbe a ma.
Ni ɛ ka wan, n mbe fen ma gbɛ? N mbe samunɛ chɛ‑a wan Yataa Nyina 'a gbasaya ɔ, mbɛ n‑na a chɛ to n yiima wɛɛ ɔ. N mbe tando si be‑a wan Yataa Nyina 'a gbasaya ɔ, mbɛ n‑na a be n yiima wɛɛ ɔ to.

Ni wo‑a Yataa fai kamaya bai n dɔ, mɔ ee miin dɔ gbɛ ka dechee, wo e a ma tena Yataa Nyina 'a gbasaya an dɔ. Ni mɔ gbama ma‑a wo tɛ ɔ, mbɛ wo ban‑da Yataa wai bɔ‑a an samunɛ chɛ ɔ, mɔɛ chɛ ee che a fɔ‑a, a ɔ, “A ni ma ka.” Koe min na mu, chia kan kɔ kan mbe ee a boo ɔ, a ɔ gbɛ koe a, samun chɛ sien mu koe min ma.
Samunɛ chɛ, i‑a min chɛ ka, a ni nyan bɛɛ boo ɔ boo, a ee che ma‑a demanɛ a mɔɛ dɔ mende tena.
Yataa ni wai. Wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ ee nɔ, min mbe kamaya bai n fɔ, a ni che n dɔ.
Chɛɛ n ni chɔchi ɔ, n mbe ee bai wuu tanɛ sa, kamaya bai n dɔ, mɔ ee miin dɔ gbɛ ka dechee. A fisa, n ni bai duu gbe sa, chɛnyɛ koɛ ɔ, mɔɛ n mbe min dɔ gbɛ. Chɛ an mbe a ma, n ni an kan.
N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo wo boo bɔ den mɛsɛ n 'na yiinachii ɔ. Wo wo yii na chii, yɔ gbakoo nu. Chɛɛ ni ko yama ma ɔ mu, wo ma den toa n na.

A nyɛnden fan mu Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ, Mansa Yataa ɔ, mbɛ ɛ koɔ‑a wan a 'a mɔɛ n tena, a ɔ, mɔɛ n dɔ, miin mbe koɔ chɛnyɛ koɛ dɔ mende n dɔ. A ɔ, sonda nu, a ɔ, ɛ koɔ‑a an fan dɔ, a ɔ, chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, a ɔ, a 'a mɔɛ n mbe ee an too ma sɔ‑a a ma.

Chɛ an fɛ mu, dua chɛ, min mu kamaya bai n fɔ koe a, mɔ ee miin dɔ gbɛ ka dechee, a mu tɔmɔsi an na. A sin, ɛ mɔɛ n fan ko a, miin ma an kai fa ni Chisɔsi a. A ee mɔɛ chɛ n fan ko a, miin kai faen mu Yataa a. Dua chɛ wɛɛ, min mu bai ɔ yian koe a mɔɛ n na den, a si Yataa ma, a nɛnɛ ɛ mɔɛ n fan ko a, miin kai faen mu Chisɔsi a. A ee chɛ n ko a, miin ma an kai fa ni a a.

Chɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ a ya wɛ, mbɛ mɔɛ n gbɛɛ chɔchi ɔ, an bun‑da kamaya bai n fɔ‑a, mɔ ee miin dɔ gbɛ ka dechee. Mbɛ ko sɔn bai nu, chɛ ma, mɔɛ nu, miin ma an kai fa ni Chisɔsi a, mbɛ an don‑da an chɔchi chɛ ɔ. An mbe a fɔ‑a wan, an dɔ, koɔ chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n wooenɛ mu.

Chɛɛ ni mɔɛ gbɛɛ ma‑a Yataa bai sa an na, mɔɛ n tena, mbɛ ko sɔn bai don‑da, a yiima ɛ mun‑da wan. Chɛ ma, mɔɛ wɛɛ, min ma a kai fa ni Chisɔsi a, a wɛɛ ta ɛ mun‑da wan. An mbe min na min‑da, ɛ a ma‑a wan, an 'na ko yama ma ni boo an ma. An mbe min gbɛɛ a min‑da, an mbe kaa a tɛ‑a, a si an tachɛ buɛ ma.
An‑na koe miin ma nun dɔ, miin mbe sa ɔ an yii ma, an mbe bɔ‑a wan ya a ma. An sin, an mbe an kumbai gbangban‑da wan, mbɛ an‑na a fɔ, an dɔ, tea mu, an dɔ, Yataa ɛ wan nɔ an tɛ ɔ.

N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, n mbe chɛ an fɔ tena. Ni wo bɛn‑da samun chɛ tena, mɔ dɔndɔ ni ma si sa kun ma, dɔndɔɛ ɛ kan chɛ kun ma. Dɔndɔɛ nan sin, a ni ma nɔ koe ɔ yian koe a, min dɔ nunden mu Yataa boo ɔ. Dɔndɔɛ wɛɛ, a ni ma sakana bai fɔ‑a kamaya bai n dɔ, mɔ ee miin dɔ gbɛ ka dechee. A yɛ to, mɔɛ dɔndɔɛ ni ma nɔ, a gbɛɛ ɔ yian koe a, sakana chɛ sien mu koe min ma. Ko ɔ ko min mbe chɛ‑a a ɔ, an ni ma tɔnɔnɛ an na chɔchi tena.

Ni mɔɛ ɛ bɔ‑a wan wo tɛ ɔ, kamaya bai n fɔ koe a, mɔ ee miin dɔ gbɛ ka dechee, a ni ma mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, chɛ ma, mɔ fea a, chɛ ma, a ni danka mɔ sawa ma. An sin mbe ma koɔ‑a, an ma koɔ dɔndɔ a, an ni koɔ dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ an na. A sin, mɔɛ ni ma nɔ, an da a kuiɛ a ben koe a.
Chɛɛ ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ee nɔ, min mbe an da a kuiɛ a ben, an ni a ɔ maun don chɔchi ɔ. Ni an ma‑a kamaya bai chɛ n fɔ‑a, mɔ ee miin dɔ gbɛ ka dechee, an ni koɔ an da kɔɔ wan, Yataa tena.
Mɔ fea, chɛ ma, mɔ sawa, an fan mbe Yataa 'a sakana bai ɔ yian. Mɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ n sin, an mbe ma nɔ a tɛnsɛ koe an na, an ni tachɛ chɛndɛ.
Chɛɛ ni mɔɛ dɔ mende to‑a nɔ, chɔchi chɛ ɔ, mbɛ a bun‑da sakana ma sɔn‑da, a ka Yataa tena, mɔɛ dɔndɔɛ min ni koɔ tena, a ni a bia a ma.
Wo gbɛɛ, dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a, wo e kun fan Yataa bai ɔ yian koe ma. Wo ni a ɔ yian, mɔɛ gbɛɛ ni a ɔ gbɛ, an bu ɔ ni dia.
Dua, Yataa bai ɔ yian koe a, a ɛ Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n fan boo ɔ.
Koe min na mu, Yataa ee koe ɔ basan basan, ɛ na kuiɛ dɔndɔya an na mɔɛ n tɛ ɔ. A sin mbe ka wan chɔchi n gbɛɛ ɔ, Yataa 'a mɔɛ n tɛ ɔ,
mbɛ musu n koɔ koe chɔchi ɔ, ko ma kawaen ma, an ni an ma maun don bɛnɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ yɔ Chu mɔɛ n 'na sawa‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, an ni ma kooya gbee an na.
Ni ko ɔ ko ɛ wan nɔ, an toen mu an ni min dɔ gbɛ, an ni an chɛɛ n dɔ tisa chenɛ a. Koe min na mu, a ma mauen mu, musu ni koɔ bɛnɛ ɔ, chɔchi ɔ.
Gba! Sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ, a si Chisɔsi Chasi ma, a ma ka ni wo wan tena. A sin, a ma na ni wo dechee an ko a.

Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a wandi ya Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ a, chɛ ma, a ni a wandi ya, mbɛ dua ɛ wan a boo ɔ, Yataa Nyina‑a a min be. An mɔɛ chɛ ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ n mbe ka min gbɛɛ nyɛn tena wo tena, mbɛ Mansa Chisɔsi 'a sawa an nɛ.
Chɛɛ ni a ma chɛ ya ni sɔɛ ma koe a, a wɛɛ ee a ya‑a sɔɛ ma ya mɔɛ a.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, n suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo wo faa chɛ Yataa bai ɔ yian koe a, mɔɛ n na. Chɛɛ wo ma mɔɛ n na gban, kamaya bai n fɔ koe a, mɔ ee miin dɔ gbɛ ka dechee
Chɛɛ ko ɔ ko, min mbe chɛ‑a a ɔ, a ni ma chɛndɛ chɛ, a chia ma.
N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, ka n mbe chɛ puin gbɛ wo yii ma, a si sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ma, n ni min fɔ wo ye. Wo na‑a min na min, a sin, wo 'a kaifa gbu Chisɔsi a, a kuu sien mu an ma gbau gbau.
An mu sakana bai chɛndɛ a, min mbe che wo baun‑da, ni wo‑a a a tun wo boo si koe a a kɔɔ. Ni wo ma chɛ an ma ni, wo kai faen fan mu fuu Chisɔsi Chasi a.
A nyɛnden mu buɛ min dɔ Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, n‑na a a ben ka wan wo tena. Chɛ an mu koe chenama saa saa a, a ɔ gbɛ koe a. Mbɛ Chasi fa‑a mmɔ 'a ko yama n fan ko a.
Mbɛ an‑na a tɔn kɛn, tee fea a sawan bɔɛ ma, Yataa‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, a ka saya ɔ. A ma‑a wan ka, yɔ a nyɛnden mu buɛ min dɔ to Yataa 'a gboo ɔ.
A sin gbu, a‑a a wandi yian Pita pɛn na, mbɛ an sɔ mɔɛ tan kun ma fea chɛ nu, a‑a a wandi yian to an gbɛɛ a.
Mbɛ a‑a a ma wan to, a fɛ mɔɛ nu, miin benden ni mɔ chɛmɛ duu ma, a‑a a wandi yian an na, dɔndɔ a. An fɛ den chɛ n dɔ nu, a faen bɛɛ mu gbɛ, chɛɛ an sɛsɛ, an mbe wan bɛ tun ka fɔɛ ɔ sanche.
Chɛ gbakɔ to, a‑a a wandi yian fan Chimisi a, mbɛ a yɛ‑a, a‑a a wandi yian a 'a sɔ mɔɛ tɔɛ n gbɛɛ a.
A danka‑a gbɔdɛ, a‑a a wandi yian n bɛɛ a. N fan maen mu wɛɛ, yɔ mɔɛ min suun‑da kɔndɔfii ɔ.
Koe min na mu, Chasi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, an benden mu n ma. N gbu sin, mɔ a tenden ma n na, a chee koe a a 'a sɔ mɔɛ a. Koe min na mu, n‑na ko ma gbaaenɛ sa wan Yataa 'a mɔɛ n ma, chɔchi ɔ.

Chɛɛ Yataa 'a koadia demanɛ ɔ, n ma‑a mɔɛ a, n mu mɔɛ min na. A 'a koadia demanɛ chɛ sin, a‑a min be n ma, chia yen‑da wan a ma. Chia dɔ mende sin gbu a, n‑na wai chɛ wan, a ben Chasi 'a sɔ mɔɛ tɔɛ kan kɔ kan ma. A maen mu wɛɛ ka boo ɔ boo, mbɛ n fandi an ma a ma ni, n ni koe chɛ n ma. Chɛɛ Yataa 'a koadia demanɛ an na wai chɛ n na.
Chɛ ko a gbɛ, a ni ma n na, a ni ma a 'a sɔ mɔɛ tɔɛ n na, nn gbɛɛ nn mbe na tena Yataa 'a bai dɔndɔ gbe chɛ an na. Wo sin bɛɛ, wo danden mu an na.
Mmɔ 'a sakana bai sanche chɛ ɔ, an nɛ, mbɛ Chasi‑a a kɔɔ sɔ wan, a ka saya ɔ. Chɛ ko a, wo dɔ nu, wo ee che to a fɔ‑a, mbɛ kɔɔ sɔ ee nɔ, a ka saya ɔ.
Ni tea mu an na, mbɛ Chasi wɛɛ, a nii ma a kɔɔ sɔ ni, a ka saya ɔ.
A sin, ni Chasi chɛ nii ma a kɔɔ sɔ ni, a ka saya ɔ, mbɛ fufafuu mu, Yataa 'a bai ɔ yian koe a. Mbɛ wo kai fa koe wɛɛ Chisɔsi a, fufafuu mu.

A ka chɛ gbu ma, mmɔ ɛ ma‑a ka fania an fɔ‑a, a si koe ma, Yataa‑a min ma. Koe min na mu, mmɔ wan mbe a fɔ, mbɛ a‑a Chasi kɔɔ sɔ wan, a ka saya ɔ. Chɛɛ ni mmɔ‑a a fɔ, mbɛ kɔɔ sɔ ee nɔ, a ka saya ɔ, chɛ‑a a ɔ yian fan ka, mbɛ Chasi nii ma a kɔɔ sɔ ni, a ka saya ɔ.
Koe min na mu, ni mɔ ee a kɔɔ sɔ, a ka saya ɔ, mbɛ Chasi nii ma a kɔɔ sɔ ni.
Chasi chɛ sin, ni a nii ma a kɔɔ sɔ ni, a ka saya ɔ, mbɛ wo kai faen mu a a fuu. A sin, wo e wan tun wo 'a ko yama boo ɔ.
A gbu ɛ ma‑a wan to, yɔ mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ, miin na‑a an kai fa Chasi a, mbɛ an fa‑a, an to‑a saya ɔ.
Yiinatɛ chɛ, min mbe mmɔ ɔ Chasi ko a, ni a sien mu dunya chɛ ɔ fɔɛ chɛ an ma dechee, ko ee to a gbaa chia a, mbɛ mmɔ ma chinchin‑da. Mmɔ ma chinchin‑da, a ben mɔɛ tɔɛ gbɛɛ ma dunya ɔ.

Chɛɛ tea gbu ko a, Chasi na‑a a kɔɔ sɔ wan, a ka saya ɔ. A ma‑a mɔɛ saa a, a kɔɔ sɔ koe a, chɛ n tɛ ɔ, miin na‑a an kai fa a wan Chasi a, mbɛ an fa‑a. Chɛ ni a ma, mmɔ ni dan a a, mbɛ mmɔ wɛɛ ɛ na‑a wan mmɔ kɔɔ sɔ‑a, a ka saya ɔ.
Koe min na mu, mɔ kaima dɔndɔ na‑a buɛ min dɔ saya a, dunya ɔ, mɔ kaima dɔ mende na‑a ka wan to kɔɔ sɔɛ a, a ka saya ɔ.
Adami‑a a ma buɛ min dɔ saya‑a mmɔ gbɛɛ fa, Chasi wɛɛ, ɛ a ma‑a ka wan, mmɔ gbɛɛ ni yɛ fɔɛ ɔ, mmɔ bɛ mu ka buɛ min dɔ mɔ dɔndɔɛ a a a.
Chɛɛ ni a tima che‑a, chɛ ɛ ma‑a dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ an na. Chasi pɛn mbe a kɔɔ sɔ‑a. Mbɛ ɛ yɛ‑a to tima min na dunya chɛ ɔ, ɛ a ma‑a wan, a ta mɔɛ n bɛɛ ni an kɔɔ sɔ, a ka saya ɔ.

Chɛ gbakɔ, tima ɛ che‑a wan, dunya ban koe a. A tima chɛ a, Chasi ɛ kun‑da wan nyina n gbɛɛ ma, miin mbe sɔ tena nu. Ɛ kun‑da wan ya ɔ sɔɛ n ma, ni fen kɔ fen miin gbasa dunya chɛ ɔ. Ɛ a ma‑a wan fen kɔ fen ni yɛ, mmɔ Fa Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ.
Koe min na mu, ɛ ma‑a wan mansaya ɔ, aan Yataa ni kun chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ ma, mbɛ a‑a an si Chasi chen kɔɔ.
Chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ dankama, Yataa ɛ kun‑da min ma, an nɛ saya a.

Yataa‑a a fɔ wan a 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, a‑a a ma wan fen fen si‑a Chasi chen kɔɔ. Chɛɛ chɛ ma a ɔ yian ni, mbɛ ni a fɔ‑a, fen fen, mbɛ a wan Yataa wandi wɛɛ si‑a wan Chasi chen kɔɔ. Koe min na mu, a wan‑na a ma, fen fen si‑a Chasi chen kɔɔ.

Yataa ban‑da wan a ma‑a, mbɛ fenɛ n gbɛɛ don‑da Chasi 'a mansaya kɔɔ. Chɛ ɛ ma‑a kɛn, mbɛ a tima chɛ a gbɛ, Chasi wandi gbu, a wan denɛ, ɛ don‑da wan gbɛ a Fa 'a mansaya kɔɔ. A Fa Yataa, min‑na a ma, fenɛ n gbɛɛ si‑a Chasi chen kɔɔ. A sin, a wan Yataa 'a mansaya ɛ ma‑a wan fenɛ n gbɛɛ kun ma chɛndɛ chɛ.

Mbɛ mmɔ mmɔ yii na chii gbɛ bai chɛ ma. Mbɛ yii, ɛ chɛ wan mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ Yataa chia a, miin mbe fɔɛ ɔ, mɔɛ chɛ n ko a miin faen mu. N ma a ɔ sɔn, ni an yii na tɛen mu fenɛ min ma, ko bonda chɛ ɛ min chɛ an ye. Mmɔ a ya, yɔ mbɛ tea gbu mu, a si bai chɛ ma mɔɛ dɔ n mbe min fɔ tena. Mbɛ mɔ ee i kɔɔ sɔ, a ka saya ɔ, ni i fa a. Ni chɛ mu tea an na, mbɛ yiimatɛ ee a ɔ, yii chɛ koe a mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ Yataa chia a, mɔɛ n ko a miin faen mu.
Nn ta nan gbu, ni kɔɔ sɔ ee nɔ, a ka saya ɔ, mbɛ nn mbe ka nn fɔɛ ma tachɛ‑a gbama gbama an ko a.

N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, tee ɔ tee a, n kaa ɔ kaen fan mu saya ko a. N mbe yonka tɛ wan wo wakoe ma, a si fɔɛ chɛ ma, mmɔ ɛ min dɔ. Mmɔ ɛ wan kuiɛ dɔndɔya ɔ, mmɔ bɛ mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi a. An fɛ mu, n mbe chɛ fɔ tena den.

N‑na butuinɛ chɛ wan, Ɛfisɔsi duu ɔ, nn fea nyima soe a. N nii ma chɛ ma ni dechee, mɔgbuya ɔ koe an ko a. Chɛɛ tɔnɔnɛ kan kɔ kan mbe ee bɔ‑a chɛ ɔ, ni faa mɔɛ ee a kɔɔ sɔ, a ka saya ɔ. Mbɛ ɛ ma‑a wan dechee, yɔ an mbe a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, an dɔ, “Mmɔ ni daunɛ chɛ, mbɛ mmɔ‑a mmɔ min,” an dɔ, “koe min na mu, saya ɛ na tena wan sinan bɛɛ.”
Wo ma a ma mɔɛ n ni wo woo. An mbe a fɔ wan to, an dɔ, “Mmɔ dia nyɔɛ yama nu, an mbe a ma wan, mmɔ wɛɛ sɔnɛ ni yaua.”
Wo yiima chɛndɛ ni ma gbɛ wo baima, wo ni sɛmbɛ ko yama ma koe a kuɔ fɔ. N mbe chɛ fɔ tena den, mbɛ wo dɔ nu, wo ma ko ɔ ko sɔn, a si Yataa ma. Chɛ ni a ma wo ni mau.
Chɛɛ mɔɛ dɔndɔɛ ɛ to‑a wan, a ni a ɔ sɔn, ni mɔɛ miin faen mu, an mbe an kɔɔ sɔ‑a ka ma, a ka saya ɔ. Ɛ to‑a wan to a ɔ sɔn koe a, ni an‑na an kɔɔ sɔ, an mbe na‑a to dunya chɛ ɔ gboo min nyɔn sima ɔ.
Woo mɔ tisa an nɛ, e ka min chɛ‑a. Ni i‑a chin fenɛ chin duu gboo ɔ, ɛ tui pɛn, mbɛ a fɛn‑da gbɛ.
E chin fenɛ min fasi tena, chin fen kuu gbama mu. E ee chin fen fɛnɛ wandi gbu an chin tena, min mbe danka koa‑a.
Chɛɛ Yataa wandi, an mbe gboo nama be‑a chin fen kuu chɛ ma, a toen mu min be koe a a ma. Gboo min ma bɛnden mu chin fen kuu kan kɔ kan ko a, ɛ an be‑a a ma.
A sin, fɔɛ fenɛ n gbɛɛ, an soe ee dɔndɔ. Mɔ gbu n ta soe, ɛ dama. Soe n ta ɛ dama, konde n bɛɛ ta ɛ dama, nyɛ n ta ɛ dama.

A sin to, fenɛ nu, miin mbe banda a, an ta ma buɛ ɛ wan nɔ. Fen chɛ n bɛɛ, miin mbe yii kɔɔ, an ta gboo n mbe wan nɔ. Fenɛ miin mbe banda a, an nyan buɛ ɛ dama. Fen chɛ n bɛɛ, miin mbe duu gboo ma, an nyan buɛ, a wɛɛ ɛ dama.
Tee ta nyan buɛ ɛ dama, kau ta ɛ dama, tɔmbuaka n bɛɛ ta nyanɛ ɛ dama. Tɔmbuaka n dechee nan fan gbu wɛɛ, an 'na nyanɛ n ma bɔ ni an nyɔn na.
Mɔɛ miin bɛɛ fa‑a ka, an kɔɔ sɔ koe chɛ wɛɛ, a ka saya ɔ, ɛ ma‑a ka wan. Ni mɔɛ su tɔn‑da, ɛ tui wan. Chɛɛ ni Yataa‑a a ma, a‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, a ka saya ɔ, an gboo chɛ tana, a ee tui to kuɔ fɔ ko a.
Mɔ su ɛ ma tɔn‑da, baa ee ma to a ma. Chɛɛ a kɔɔ sɔ buɛ nan tana, a ka saya ɔ, baa ɛ ma wan a ma. Mɔɛ ɛ ma tɔn‑da, a su chɛ, gbasaya ee ma a boo ɔ. Chɛɛ a kɔɔ ɛ ma sɔ‑a, ɛ ma gbasaya an dɔ.

Mɔ gbu gboo min mbe tɔn, dunya ma gboo gbama mu. Chɛɛ a kɔɔ ɛ ma sɔ‑a, an gboo chɛ nɛnɛ tana, Yataa Nyina an mbe a be a ma. Mmɔ gbu sin‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ dunya ma gboo ɛ wan nɔ. Chɛ ko a mu, gboo wɛɛ ɛ wan nɔ, Yataa Nyina ɛ min be.
A gbu sin, a nyɛnden mu ka wan Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ mɔ kaima saa saa, min tɔ ni Adami, Yataa‑a fɔɛ be wan a ma. Mbɛ Adami dankama sin, a mu Yataa Nyina an na, min mbe fɔɛ be.
Chɛɛ mmɔ 'a dunya ma gboo pɛn mbe sɔ ya ɔ, mbɛ Yataa Nyina ɛ gboo min be, a na‑a a gbaa chia a.
Mɔ kaima saa saa chɛ, a bɔ‑a duu gboo an dɔ, a nyan‑da fifii ɔ. Mɔ kaima fean bɔɛ chɛ sin, a ka‑a banda bu ɔ wan.

A ni ka buɛ min dɔ fifii ɔ mɔɛ a, mɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, miin bɔ‑a fifii ɔ, an mbe ka wan. A sin to, mɔ dɔndɔɛ mu buɛ min dɔ mɔɛ chɛ a, min ka‑a banda bu ɔ, chɛ n bɛɛ, miin mbe gbɛ banda bu ɔ ko a, an mbe ka wan.
Sanche, mmɔ bɔen mu ka buɛ min dɔ mɔɛ chɛ a, min bɔ‑a fifii ɔ, mmɔ ɛ na‑a bɔ‑a ka wan to mɔɛ chɛ wɛɛ a, min ka‑a banda bu ɔ.
N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, n toen mu wo ni chɛ ɔ sɔn. Mbɛ mɔ gbu e ma i gboo ɔ, wii ɛ i ɔ, e ee don Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ. N mbe baa a, fenɛ min mbe fa, a ni che ma‑a fenɛ a, min mbe ee fa.
Wo wo too ma sɔ koe chɛ ma, tea chɛ, min dɔ nunden ni tee. Mmɔ gbɛɛ, mmɔ ee na‑a fa a. Chɛɛ mmɔ gbɛɛ, mmɔ ma ɛ fan‑da wan.

A tima chɛ a, ɛ na‑a ka wan, a ya kɔɔɛ a. Ɛ ma‑a bui chɛ an na, yɔ mɔɛ e i ya ma kai buɛ min dɔ kabu kabu. Koe min na mu, ni buu chɛ kuiɛ bɔ‑a, buu dankama nɛnɛ chɛ, faa mɔɛ n kɔɔ ɛ sɔ‑a wan, a ka saya ɔ. A sin, an mbe ee na‑a fa a to kuɔ fɔ ko a. A sin to, mmɔ gbɛɛ, mmɔ ma ɛ fan‑da wan.
Koe min na mu, mmɔ gboo chɛ, min mbe tui ka, ɛ fan‑da wan gboo a, min mbe ee fa a to, a ni tui.
Ni fenɛ min mbe fa, ɛ tui, a ma‑a gbɛ fenɛ a, min mbe ee fa, a ee tui, mbɛ bai chɛ ɛ bɔ‑a wan a a, min nyɛnden mu Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, “Kunɛ chɛ‑a saya ma, buɔdia kun tɛ‑a gbɛ.”
Yataa ' a gboo‑a a fɔ wan to, a ɔ, “Saya gbu, buɔdia ee to a boo ɔ. A yɛ to, saya 'a gbasaya ban‑da, kasaa chɛ koe a.”
Ko yama, mmɔ ɛ miin ma, an fan mbe gbasaya be saya ma, mmɔ kasaa koe a. Sawa sin, min be‑a Mosisi ma, an mbe gbasaya be ko yama ma.
Chɛɛ Yataa ni wai. A‑a buɔdia be mmɔ ma. Mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi 'a gbasaya ɔ, Yataa‑a a ma mmɔ kun‑da saya ma.

Chɛ an fɛ mu, n faa ma suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo sɔ gban wo 'a danaya ɔ. Wo ma ka wo gba ɔ, wo ma Mansa Chisɔsi 'a wai a tima ɔ tima ko a. Koe min na mu, wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, wai ɔ wai, wo e min chɛ‑a Mansa chɛ ko a, a ee ma wai gbama a.

N mbe chɛ an fɔ tena gbɛ wo ye, a si kɔpɔ kain koe chɛ ma, Yataa 'a mɔɛ n deman koe a, wo‑a gboo nyɛn a si min ma. Chɔchi chɛ nu pan Kadesia chɛnyɛ ɔ, n‑na an sɔ buɛ min dɔ chia ma, wo wɛɛ, wo a ma ka.

Tɛnɛ kan kɔɔ dɔɛ kan kɔ kan ma, mɔ ɔ mɔ ni kɔpɔɛ ɛnden dɔ bɛn, a ni a sa tena ɔ bɛn. Mɔɛ ɛ kɔpɔɛ ma sɔn buɛ min dɔ, ɛ a boo ma sɛ ka wan, mbɛ a‑a a sa tena ɔ bɛn. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, n mbe a fo‑a nɔ tima min na, kɔpɔ ma kain mbe ee ma‑a to nɔ.
N sin mbe a fo‑a kɛn, n mbe gboo be‑a wan mɔɛ chɛ n ma, wo‑a miin yian ma koe a wo 'a sɔ mɔɛ n na. N mbe wo boo fenɛ be‑a wan an ma, an ni ta a a Chuusaɛn duu ɔ.
Ni a sin mbe nyan fan, n fandi gbu, n bɛɛ n ni ta, nn bɛ an na, nn mbe ta‑a wan.
N mbe na‑a wan wo kɔndɔn‑da, ni n‑na Masidonia chɛnyɛ ɔ tandin, koe min na mu, n toen mu, n ni ben nɔ chia an na.

N mbe na‑a tima ɛnden ya‑a wan wo tena. Chɛ ma, kɔkɔɛ mmɔ bɛ ɛ ma‑a wan, aan chima tima chɛ ni ban. A tima chɛ a gbɛ, wo e kun fan wo ni basan n ma, n 'na tachɛ ɔ, n ta koe a kaina dɔ mende, a ni ma kan kɔ kan na.
N ma to ni, n ni na sanche, wo kɔndɔn‑da, min mbe ma dechee tima ɔ wuuma ko a. Ni Mansa Yataa dɔn‑da, n toen mu, n ni tima ɔ yansama ya wan nɔ, mmɔ bɛ ɛ.
N mbe to‑a nɛ wan Ɛfisɔsi, aan tima min na, Pɛndekɔsi tee chɛ ni che.
Tima an nɛ n ko a nɛ, Chisian wai kɔkoo tima min na. Wai n fan nɛ, miin nyin an chɛ koe a, n chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ n kɔkoo wɛɛ ka boo ɔ boo.
Ni Timoti che‑a wo ma, wo a ma wo ni a ɔ yian a a, mbɛ a che‑a ka a waa wan. Koe min na mu, ɛ ka Mansa Chisɔsi 'a wai an na, yɔ n mbe a a buɛ min dɔ.

Chɛ ko a, wo ma dɔn mɔ ɔ mɔ wo tɛ ɔ, a ni baa bɔ a ma. Chɛɛ wo ni basan a ma, a ni a 'a tachɛ a tun a ma, faachima ɔ. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, a ni yɛ to nɛ, n tena. Koe min na mu, n mbe ma tena wan, a ya ɔ fɛn‑da nɛ, an bɛ mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ n na Chasi ɔ.

Wo 'a gboo‑a min fɔ, a si mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ ma Chasi ɔ, min mu Apɔdɔsi a, ka n mbe koɔ gbɛ a si a ma. N mbe a ma nande n faa gbɛɛ ɔ, a ta koe a wo kɔndɔn‑da, an bɛ mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ dɔ n na Chasi ɔ. A bu ɔ nii ma di ɛnden bɛɛ a, na koe a nɔ sanche. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, ni a‑a tima ma sɔn, ɛ na‑a wan nɔ.
Wo ma bɛndenɛ ni ma, tima ɔ tima. Wo sɔ gban, wo 'a danaya ɔ, Chisɔsi Chasi a, wo sin ma chian. Wo ɔ ni gbɛa gbau.
Wo e koe min gbɛɛ ma, wo a ma koadia faa a.

N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, sanche chɛ ɔ, wo‑a a koe ɔ sɔn fan, a si Sitɛfanasi ma, ni a 'a chen na mɔɛ nu. An fan pɛn‑na an kai fa Chisɔsi Chasi a, Akaya chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ. A sin, an‑na an fandi be, wai chɛ koe a, Yataa 'a mɔɛ n ko a. N mbe chɛ ma din wo tena,
wo ni don ya ɔ sɔɛ sima chɛ n kɔɔ. Wo gbu ni don mɔ ɔ mɔ kan kɔ kan kɔɔ, miin mbe wai chɛ chɛ tena.
N bu ɔ di kaka, Sitɛfanasi na koe a, an fea Fɔtunatɔsi a, ni Akaikɔsi. Wo ee nɛ chɛ, an fan yɛ‑a ka wo gba ɔ.
Chɛ‑a a ma wan, n faa chima‑a, yɔ wo ta wɛɛ ɛ ma buɛ min dɔ. A nyin wo ni baa be mɔ bonda chɛ n ma chɛndɛ chɛ.
Chɔchi mɔɛ miin mbe Esia chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ, an ni wo kɔndɔn. Akuida wɛɛ, an fea a 'a musu Pisida a, an‑na wo kɔndɔn. Mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ, miin mbe bɛn an 'na chenɛ a, an bɛɛ‑a wo kɔndɔn, buɔdia kɔndɔnɛ a.
Mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ n gbɛɛ Chasi ɔ, an mbe wo kɔndɔn tena. Wo wɛɛ, ni wo bɛn‑da, mbɛ wo‑a wo nyɔn kɔndɔn koadia faa a.
N fandi gbu, n fan Pɔɔ, n fan mbe ka gboo chɛ nyɛn‑da, n ni wo kɔndɔn.
Mɔ ɔ mɔ, Mansa Chisɔsi ko a ee dia min ye, danka ni ma a fɛ. Mansa Chisɔsi, na wɛ nn ye.
Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi ni wo dua.
Chisɔsi Chasi 'a gbasaya ɔ, n 'na koadia ni ma wo gbɛɛ fɛ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: N fan Pɔɔ, n fan mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena, nn fea mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ a Chasi ɔ, min mu Timoti a. Chisɔsi Chasi 'a sɔ mɔɛ mu n na. Yataa wandi an dɔn‑da, n ma koe a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ a. N mbe a nyɛn tena wo wan tena, wo wɛn mbe Yataa 'a chɔchi ɔ, Kɔyindi duu ɔ, wo bɛ Yataa 'a mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a, miin mbe nɔ Akaya chɛnyɛ tɔɛ gbɛɛ ɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Mmɔ Fa Yataa, an fea Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi a, an 'na dua ni ma wo ma, a basan an 'na faachima a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Tando ni be Yataa ma. A wan mu mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi fa a, ni a 'a Yataa. Chinchincha Fa mu a wan Yataa an na. A sin fan mbe mmɔ nande chia kan kɔ kan na.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Ko gbɛama gbɛɛ ɔ, ɛ nn nande wan. Ɛ chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, nn bɛɛ ni che mɔ dɔ mende nande‑a, miin mbe ko gbɛama dɔ mende n dɔ. Yataa ɛ nn nande buɛ min dɔ, nn bɛɛ ni mɔ dɔ mende bɛɛ nande a buɛ ɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Ko gbɛama miin dɔ ɛ bia, Chisɔsi Chasi ko a, a koo kaka. Ɛ ka wan to, yɔ nn mbe nande min ma sɔn, Chisɔsi Chasi a, a wɛɛ koo kaka.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Ni nn‑na ko yawaenɛ ɔ bia tima ɔ tima, wo nande koe mu, wo ni bauncha ma sɔn. Ni nn‑na nande ma sɔn, mbɛ wo wɛɛ‑a a ma sɔn. Mbɛ wo‑a fanka ma sɔn, wo faa bia koe a, wo ni ko yawaen chɛ n dɔ bia, nn bɛɛ‑a miin dɔ bia.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Nn faa ma gbaa ni ɛnden bɛɛ a, a si wo ma. Nn‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ nn‑na ko yawaenɛ min dɔ bia, wo wɛɛ‑a an dɔ bia. Chɛɛ nn‑na a ɔ sɔn ka wan to, mbɛ nn‑na nande min bɛɛ ma sɔn, wo wɛɛ‑a a ma sɔn fan.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, nn ma to ni wo ni ma ka, ni nn ma‑a chɛ ɔ yian ni wo a. Ko gbɛama chɛ, nn‑na min dɔ bia Esia chɛnyɛ ɔ, nn ni a ɔ yian wo a. Suunɛ min na‑a si nn kun ma, a ni koo, a ni fanka ka wan to. A na‑a a ma wan, nn yii nii to ma koe a fɔɛ ɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: A ni wan gbɛ nn yii ma, mbɛ saya ni gbɛ nn ma chen da a wan. Chɛɛ chɛ ma‑a, min mbe a ma, nn ni sɛmbɛ dan koe a nn fandi 'a gbasaya a. Nn ni nn yii sɔ Yataa ma, a dechee, a wɛn mbe a ma, faa mɔɛ n mbe an kɔɔ sɔ a ka saya ɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: A na‑a nn kun bɔ wan saya ma chianden ba ɔ. A sin mbe na‑a nn kun bɔ‑a ka wan to a ɔ. Nn sin yii na tɛen fan mu a ma, mbɛ a gboo ɔ ee fa‑a nn kun bɔ koe a a ɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Wo basan nn ma, samunɛ chɛ koe a nn ko a. Ni mɔ sɛsɛ n ma‑a samunɛ chɛ‑a nn ko a, Yataa ɛ an 'na samunɛ n na min‑da wan, mbɛ a‑a nn dua. Ni chɛ ma‑a, mɔ sɛsɛ n bɛɛ, an mbe Yataa wai bɔ‑a wan nn ko a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Nn mbe yonka tɛ ko dɔndɔ gbe an na, nn gbu sin yii na koen mu an na dechee. An nɛ, mbɛ nn mbe fɔɛ min dɔ dunya chɛ ɔ, a bɛbɛɛ nn tachɛ buɛ wo tena, mbɛ Yataa fɔɛ mu, tea ɛ min dɔ. Nn mbe chɛ ma tena Yataa 'a duaya an dɔ, mɔgbuya ta yiimatɛ ɔ ma.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Nn mbe gboo min nyɛn wo tena dechee, an nɛ gboo a, wo e che min kan‑da, wo e min dɔ gbɛ. Chɛɛ wo‑a nn dɔ gbɛ ka buɛ min dɔ chia dɔ a, ɛ wan n yii ma, mbɛ wo e nn dɔ gbɛ‑a wan chia gbɛɛ a. Chɛ ni a ma, tee chɛ ma, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi na tee, wo ni yonka tɛ nn ma, yɔ nn bɛɛ a tɛ‑a buɛ min dɔ wo ma.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: N danden fan mu chɛ a. An fɛ mu, n toen ni, n ni na wo kɔndɔn. N ni na, min mbe a ma, wo ni dua ma sɔn gba fea ko a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: N toen ni n ni che wo ma, ni n ma‑a ta‑a Masidonia chɛnyɛ ɔ. A yɛ to, ni n ma‑a yɛ‑a a ka nɔ. N ni chɛ ma‑a, min mbe a ma, wo ni n deman, n 'na ta chɛ ɔ Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: N ni yiinachii chɛ chɛ tena tima min na, n ma a ɔ sɔn ni yiima fea an ni n dɔ. N ma a ɔ sɔn, n mbe ma yiinachii chɛ chɛ‑a, ni n mbe a chɛ mɔgbuya ta fɛ chia an na. Ni n ma bɛndenɛ an mbe ma, dɔn koe a, ni ban koe ma, fɔɛ dɔndɔɛ ɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Yataa ee a da a kuiɛ ka a gba ɔ tima dɔndɔ wɛɛ ko a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, n bɛɛ n mbe ee che wo too ɔ dia‑a bi koe a, mbɛ sinan n‑na n yiima mun, n dɔ n mbe ee a ma to.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, Yataa 'a denɛ Chisɔsi Chasi, a ee ka. Sidasi ni ma, Timoti, ni n fan, nn na‑a a wakoe ɔ yian fan wo a. A wan Chisɔsi ee dɔn koe ma, mbɛ a ban‑da to a ma. Chɛɛ a ta nan gbu, tima ɔ tima ko a, a dɔndenɛ an mbe ma a ma.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, Yataa ɛ tooɔdia min gbɛɛ chɛ, Chisɔsi an mbe a gbɛɛ a tachɛ. Chɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ ɛ a fɔ, mmɔ ɔ, “A ni ma ka,” Chisɔsi tɔɛ ɔ, basɔmaya be koe a Yataa ma.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chɛɛ Yataa wandi an‑na nn ma chɛndɛ chɛ mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Chisɔsi a, a basan wo wɛɛ a. Yataa wandi an‑na a boo sɔ nn ma, wai chɛ koe a a ko a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: A sin fan‑na a boo gba to nn ma, a ɔ yian koe a, mbɛ nn mbe a wan ko a. A Nyina wɛɛ, a‑a a be wan nn ma to ma koe a nn fɛ. A ni a ma, nn ni dan a a, koe miin gbɛɛ a a boo ɔ nn ko a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chɛɛ Yataa an mu n 'na sii a, a si bai chɛ ma, n mbe ka min fɔ‑a wo ye. Mbɛ n toen ni, n ni wo to wan nɔ, an na‑a a ma n ma yɛ ni nɔ wo tena Kɔyindi duu ɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Nn mbe ee a din tena wo ma fɔsɛɛ a, wo e dan koe min na. Nn‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, wo kai faen fan mu Chisɔsi a gban. Nn mbe a ma tena, tee ɔ tee a, mmɔ bɛ ɛ wai chɛ tena, wo 'a buɔdia ko a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chɛ an fɛ mu, n‑na n yii na chii, mbɛ n ma na to wo tena, n ni wo faa yɔn.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, ni n‑na wo faa yɔn, mɔ dɔ gbɛɛ ee ma‑a to nɔ n bu ɔ dia koe a. Chɛ ee ma‑a, fɔ wo wan dechee, n‑na wo wɛn faa yɔn, wo wan mbe n bu ɔ dia.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chɛ an fɛ mu, n‑na gboo saa chɛ nyɛn wo tena, n na‑a min nyɛn ka. N nii ma to ni, n ni na nɔ, mbɛ n‑na faayɔnɛ ma sɔn wo a, wo wɛn mbe a ma, n bu ɔ ni dia. Koe min na mu, n danden fan mu a a, mbɛ ni n bu ɔ dia‑a, mbɛ wo gbɛɛ bu ɔ dia‑a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: N‑na gboo saa chɛ nyɛn wo tena tima min na, n faa yɔnden ni kaka, n bu ɔ nii ma di ɛnden bɛɛ a, di an ni n ya a. N 'na yiinachii nii ma, n ni wo faa yɔn. Chɛɛ n toen ni wo ni a ɔ sɔn, wo 'a koadia da a koo buɛ min dɔ n faa ɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: N fan tena ma, chɛɛ mɔɛ ɛ nɔ wo tɛ ɔ, min naen mu faayɔnɛ a wo gbɛɛ tena. N ni a fɔ wo ye, tea ɔ, mbɛ a naen mu faayɔnɛ a wo tena, chia dɔndɔ an na. Chɛɛ n ma to ni, n ni an koe chɛ ma chian, a ben a gbu ɛ buɛ min dɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Wo sɛsɛ, wo e tɔɔya min chɛ‑a a mɔɛ chɛ a, a‑a a kun a ko a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, ɛ nyan fan gbɛ wo ni a to nɔ, mbɛ wo‑a a nande. Ni chɛ ma, faayɔnɛ ɛ koa‑a wan a ma.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chɛ an fɛ mu, n mbe wo disa tena, wo ni a ɔ yian to a a, mbɛ wo toen fan mu a a chɛndɛ chɛ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: N na‑a gboo chɛ nyɛn wo tena chɛ an na, n ni wo yiima yan. N ni a ɔ gbɛ, ni n 'na dasi nu, wo ma bɛnden fan mu tima ɔ tima ko a a ya koe a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Mɔ ɔ mɔ, wo e min to‑a nɔ, a 'a ko yama ko a, n bɛɛ n mbe a to‑a wan nɔ. N‑na ko ɔ ko min to nɔ, ni tataya koe gbu ma wɛɛ, n mbe a ma‑a wan wo ko a, Chasi chen kɔɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chɛ ni a ma, Sitana ma na mmɔ bɔ yaa a. Koe min na mu, mmɔ‑a a ɔ sɔn fan a yiima ɛ buɛ min dɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: N che‑a wan Towasi duu ɔ, sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian koe a nɔ, a si Chasi ma. N che‑a kɛn, n‑na a ɔ yen fan, mbɛ Mansa Chisɔsi na‑a chia sa wan nɔ, a 'a wai chɛ koe a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chɛɛ n faa nii ma chima ni, koe min na mu, n nii ma Taitɔsi tan ni nɔ, n suun ma nyɔɛ Chasi ɔ. Chɛ na‑a a ma wan, n‑na n saa nɔ mɔɛ n na, mbɛ n ta‑a Masidonia chɛnyɛ ɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chɛɛ n mbe Yataa wai bɔ tena. Nn ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, Chisɔsi Chasi a. An mbe a ma tena tima ɔ tima ko a, nn mbe kun Sitana ma. A sin, Yataa ɛ a ma wan, nn mbe sakana bai chɛ ɔ yian kan kɔ kan, a si Chasi ma, yɔ fen kunyɛ a diama ɛ ta buɛ min dɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: A mu min na, nn mbe wan yɔ fen kunyɛ a diama, Chasi‑a min be Yataa ma. Fen kunyɛ a diama chɛ, min mbe che chɛ n ma, miin mbe gbɛ bauncha ma sɔn‑da, ni chɛ nu, miin mbe kasaa tena, an 'na ko yama n boo ɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin mbe kasaa tena, an mu fen kunyɛ yama an na, min mbe na saya a. Chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ n tana, miin mbe bauncha ma sɔn tena, kunyɛ a diama mu, min mbe fɔɛ be. Mɔ bonda chɛ sima ee to nɔ gbɛ, min mbe kun ko bonda chɛ sima ma koe ma, a ta gbasaya a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, nn mbe ee ka yɔ mɔ sɛsɛ dɔ nu, miin mbe Yataa 'a bai ya, fen sɔn koe a a ɔ dechee. Chɛɛ Yataa an‑na nn sɔ. An fɛ mu, nn fan wai chɛ mɔɛ nu Chasi ye, nn mbe a 'a sakana bai ɔ yian tea chia a, a chen kɔɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Nn‑na gboo min nyɛn ka, a ee a ɔ yian tena, mbɛ nn bun‑da ka yonka an tɛ‑a, a si nn fandi ma. Nn mbe ee ka yɔ mɔɛ dɔ nu. Nn ma to ni mɔ ni nn pɛmbɛ gboo chɛ nyɛn koe a wo tena. Nn ma to ni wo wɛɛ, wo ni a nyɛn, a si nn bakoe ma.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chɛɛ wo wandi gbu wɛɛ, wo wan mu nn 'na gboo a, min mbe nn pɛmbɛ. Gboo chɛ sin nyɛnden mu nn faa n fan dɔ, mɔɛ gbɛɛ‑a a kan kaina min, an ni a ɔ gbɛ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Wo gbu sin mbe a ɔ yian tena wan, mbɛ nn‑na wai min chɛ, a gbɔɛ mu wo wan na. Mbɛ gboo mu wo a, min ka‑a Chisɔsi Chasi tena. Wo ta gbooya sin dɔ, wo ma nyɛn ni pɛnɛ inki an na. Chɛɛ Yataa Nyina, min mbe fɔɛ be, an‑na wo nyɛn. A yɛ to, wo ma nyɛn ni sen sɛndenɛ an ma, chɛɛ a‑a wo nyɛn mɔɛ n faa ɔ wan.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Nn mbe chɛ fɔ tena, koe min na mu, danaya koo nn dɔ Yataa ko a, Chasi 'a gbasaya ɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Nn fandi gbu, an ma a fɔ ni, mbɛ nn mbe kun fan nn ni wai chɛ chɛ nn ta gbasaya a. Nn 'na gbasaya, ɛ ka Yataa an tena.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: An‑na a ma nn ma‑a wai chɛ mɔɛ chɛndɛ n na, Yataa 'a dɔbɛn nama chɛ ko a. Dɔbɛn nama chɛ sin, sawa ma min nyɛnden mu, chɛɛ Yataa Nyina mu. Sawa min nyɛnden mu, ɛ na saya an na, chɛɛ Yataa Nyina ta na, ɛ na fɔɛ an na.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Sawa kɔma n nyɛndenɛ ni senɛ an ma. A sin, a ni be tena tima min na Mosisi ma, Yataa 'a manɛ na‑a yen fan. Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ nii ma che ni Mosisi ma fɛn‑da kaka, koe min na mu, a manɛ kɔ ni gbɛɛ. Chɛɛ a ya kɔɔɛ chɛ gbu nii ma man ni tima ɔ yansama ko a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, sawa chɛ min mbe na ka saya a, ni a manɛ ma‑a ka, chɛ ɛ koe an dɔ yian tena.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Mbɛ Yataa Nyina ɛ wai min chɛ, a manɛ ɛ koa‑a wan, a ni ben sawa ta ma. Tea mu chɛ a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, sawa chɛ, min mbe a ma kaa ɛ tɛ mmɔ ma, mmɔ ni tɔɔ, ɛ na wan manɛ a. Ni chɛ ɛ ma wan, mbɛ Yataa Nyina ta manɛ tana, ɛ koa‑a wan kaka. Koe min na mu, a wan mbe mɔɛ n ya mɔ tandenɛ n na Yataa chen kɔɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Mmɔ a fɔ gbɛ tea ko a, mbɛ manɛ min mbe sanche, a koo a ɔ benden ba a. Chɛ ko a, manɛ chɛ min ni nɔ a kɔma a, a ma to ko a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, koe min mbe tuin gbae, ɛ ma wan manɛ a, mbɛ koe min nan gbu sin mbe ma nɔ kuɔ fɔ, a ta manɛ ɛ koa‑a wan kaka.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chɛ an fɛ mu, yiinatɛ chɛ sima ɛ ka buɛ min dɔ nn dɔ, chian mbe ee nn dɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Nn mbe ee ka yɔ Mosisi, min na‑a koa bun a ya a. A na‑a chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n ma na a ya kɔɔɛ yen, ɛ man‑da, mbɛ an man chɛ tuin‑da.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: An gbu sin, tea ko a, an na‑a fo wan ko ɔ gbɛ yiimatɛ a. Koe min na mu, bi tee chɛ wɛɛ a, Yataa 'a dɔbɛnɛ kɔma chɛ, an mbe ma a kan‑da, a maenɛ mu yɔ an yiima ɛ koa an kɔɔ. Koa chɛ sin, min mbe mɔɛ yii kun ma, ɛ bɔ nɔ dechee tima min na, an nɛ tima chɛ a, mɔɛ ɛ ma tima min na mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Chisɔsi a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Bi tee chɛ wɛɛ a, tima ɔ tima ni an ma‑a sawa chɛ n kan‑da, miin na‑a be Mosisi ma, an yiima ɛ tun koa chɛ an kɔɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chɛɛ koa chɛ, ɛ ka wan mɔɛ ya a, tima ɔ tima dechee, ni mɔɛ a a ya a mun Mansa Chisɔsi ma.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Mansa chɛ mu gbɛ Yataa Nyina an na. A sin, Yataa Nyina chɛ ɛ ma kaina min, yɔncha ee ma nɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Mmɔ gbɛɛ sin, koa kan kɔ kan mbe ee to bun dɔ mmɔ ya a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ ɛ Mansa 'a manɛ an na ta, yɔ mɛmɛ. Yataa Nyina sin, min mu Mansa chɛ a, ɛ a ma tena wan, mmɔ ma‑a tee ɔ tee a Yataa bɔ nyɔɛ a, manɛ ɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chɛ an fɛ mu, nn faa ee yɔn wai chɛ chɛ koe a. Koe min na mu, Yataa 'a chinchincha ɔ mu, a‑a wai chɛ be nn ma a chɛ koe a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chɛɛ nn‑na nn yii na chii, nn ma nn boo chɛ ni mauma koe kan kɔ kan dɔ, a ni ma nun dɔ wɛɛ a. Nn sin mbe ee koe n ma, miin mbe mɔɛ n bun. Nn gbu sin mbe ee Yataa 'a bai ma sa chia ɔ chia a. Chɛɛ nn mbe fɔɛ min dɔ, Yataa chen kɔɔ, basɔmaya da faenɛ kɔɔ mu. A sin, chɛ ɛ na tena wan pɛmbɛ a nn ko a, mɔɛ gbɛɛ tena, yiinachii chɛndɛ ɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: A sin, nn mbe chɛ ma tena wɛɛ, mɔɛ dɔ n mbe ee che Yataa bai chɛ ɔ gbɛ‑a, nn mbe min dɔ yian tena. An mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin mbe ee a ɔ gbɛ, an mu chɛ n fan na, miin mbe kasaa tena.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: An mbe ee che dan‑da Yataa bai chɛ a. Koe min na mu, an yiima ɛ tun pimbi an dɔ, Sitana boo ɔ, min 'na gbasaya ɛ dunya chɛ kun ma. A wan mbe a ma tena, an mbe ee man chɛ yen, ɛ ma man‑da an ma. Manɛ chɛ, min mbe ka sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ, a si Chisɔsi ma. A wan Chasi chɛ, an mu Yataa bɔ nyɔɛ a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Nn mbe sakana bai min dɔ yian, a ma si ni nn fandi an ma. Chɛɛ a gbu an nɛ, mbɛ Chisɔsi Chasi an mu mansa a. Nn tana sin gbɛ, nn mu wo 'a yɔnɛ n fan na, Chisɔsi ko a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: A sin, Yataa na‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “Manɛ ni be, a bɔ pimbi ɔ.” A wan Yataa dɔndɔ gbe chɛ, an mbe a ma a 'a manɛ ɛ ma mmɔ faa n dɔ. A ni man, a ni a ma, mmɔ ni yiimatɛ sɔn, a si Yataa 'a manɛ ma. Man chɛ, min mbe yen tena man‑da, a ka Chisɔsi Chasi ya kɔɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, Yataa Nyina 'a tɔnɔnɛ ma kawaenɛ ɛ ka mmɔ wɛn boo ɔ, mmɔ ɛ wan yɔ boo da. Chɛ ɛ a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ gbasaya ɛ Yataa an boo ɔ, mmɔ wan ma.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Tima sɛsɛ ko a, ko gbɛama ɛ nn tan fan, chɛɛ a ee nn nimisa‑a. Tima dɔsa an na, nn kɔndɔ fiien ba an mbe ma, chɛɛ nn yii fa tena ɛ wan.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: An mbe ko ma gbaaenɛ n sa wan nn ma, chɛɛ chɛ ma a ɔ yian ni, mbɛ Yataa ɛ a boo bɔ wan nn kɔɔ. A sin, dumɛ ɛ si wɛɛ nn na tima dɔ n na, chɛɛ a ee ma kasaa a nn ma.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Tima ɔ tima ko a, Chisɔsi na‑a saya min chɛ, ɛ wan ben tena nn fɛ nn gboo ɔ. Chɛ ni a ma, ɛ fɔɛ nama min dɔ, a ni yen nn dɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Nn 'na fɔɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, saya ɛ wan tun ben‑da nn na san‑da, Chisɔsi wakoe a. Chɛ ni a ma, a ni fɔɛ min nyɔn sima ɔ, a ni yen nn gboo chɛ ɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chɛ a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ saya ɛ wan tun ben‑da nn na san‑da. Chɛɛ wo tana, kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ an mbe wo ko a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Yataa 'a gboo ɔ te, “N‑na n kai fa Yataa a, an fɛ mu, n mbe bai chɛ sa.” A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, nn bɛɛ, nn na‑a bai sa wan, koe min na mu, nn bɛɛ kai faen mu Yataa an na.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Nn‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ Yataa an‑na a ma, Mansa Chisɔsi kɔɔ sɔ‑a a ka saya ɔ. Ɛ a ma‑a wan nn bɛɛ kɔɔ ni sɔ, a ka saya ɔ, nn ni bɔ Chisɔsi gba ɔ. A sin mbe ta‑a wan nn na, a basan wo wɛɛ a, mmɔ ni ma a chen kɔɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, wo ko a mu, koe chɛ n gbɛɛ n mbe ma tena. A sin, Yataa 'a koadia demanɛ ɛ che tena buɛ min dɔ mɔ sɛsɛ ma, an bɛɛ, an mbe Yataa wai bɔ ka wan, min mu basɔmaya a a tena.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chɛ an fɛ mu, nn faa ee yɔn. Nn gboo chɛ, mɔgbuya ɔ, ɛ na tena wɛɛ ka boo ɔ boo tui‑a, chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, Yataa Nyina min mbe nn fɛ, a ɔ gbɛama mu tee ɔ tee a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Nn mbe ko gbɛama miin dɔ bia tena ka sanche, ɛndenɛ mu, a sin, an dɔ ee mɛ tena. Chɛ an mbe na‑a kuɔ fɔ tɔnɔnɛ wa an na, min benden mu kaka ko gbɛama chɛ n ma.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, nn yiima ee koe chɛ n fan ma, mɔ gbu ɛ miin yen a ya a. Chɛɛ ɛ fen chɛ n fan ma, mɔ gbu ee min yen a ya a. Mɔ gbu ɛ fenɛ min yen ka a ya a, ɛ ma dechee tima kundu an ko a. Chɛɛ mɔ gbu ee fenɛ min yen a ya a, ɛ ma wan kuɔ fɔ ko a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, mmɔ‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ ni mmɔ ɛ ka nɛ tɛndi gbama min kɔɔ, min mu mmɔ gboo chɛ a nɛ dunya chɛ ɔ, ni a kasaa‑a, Yataa ɛ chenɛ be‑a wan mmɔ ma. A wandi gbu an‑na chen chɛ a dan, mmɔ ma koe a nɔ. An chen chɛ sin, banda bu ɔ, a ee te kuɔ fɔ ko a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Mmɔ ɛ wan gbɛ nɛ dunya ma, mmɔ ɛ kuun tena wan. Buɔdia min mbe mmɔ ɔ, a koo kaka an gboo nama chɛ ko a. Mmɔ toen mu gbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ ma, mmɔ 'a gboo nama chɛ, min mbe banda bu ɔ, a ni sɛ gbɛ mmɔ ma.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Gboo nama chɛ sɛenɛ ɛ ma‑a mmɔ ma, mmɔ ma senɛ ee ma‑a to.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Tima min na wɛ mmɔ ɛ dunya ma gboo chɛ ɔ, mmɔ ɛ kuun tena wan, tɔɔya ɔ. An ma a fɔ ni, mbɛ mmɔ toen mu mmɔ ma senɛ ni ma. Chɛɛ mmɔ toen mu, banda bu ɔ gboo chɛ, a ni sɛ mmɔ ma. Chɛ ni a ma, mmɔ 'a dunya ma gboo chɛ, a ni mun kuɔ fɔ nɛnɛ a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Yataa wandi gbu, an‑na a ma, mmɔ ma bɛndenɛ mu koe chɛ a. A sin to, a wan‑na a Nyina be mmɔ ma, a ɔ yian koe a mmɔ a, mbɛ ɛ fen chɛ n gbɛɛ be‑a wan mmɔ ma, miin mbe sa ɔ a boo ɔ mmɔ ko a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chɛ an fɛ mu, tima ɔ tima ko a, faachima koo mmɔ ɔ. Mmɔ gbu‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ ni mmɔ ɛ wɛ tun dunya ma gboo chɛ an dɔ, mbɛ mmɔ ee ma‑a Mansa Chisɔsi waa a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Mmɔ ɛ tachɛ buɛ min dɔ fɔɛ ɔ, ɛ bɔ mmɔ kai fa buɛ an dɔ Chisɔsi Chasi a, a ee bɔ koe n fan dɔ, mmɔ ɛ miin dɔ yen.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chɛ ko a, faachima koo mmɔ ɔ. A sin, mmɔ ɛ to‑a wan mmɔ ni bɔ dunya ma gboo chɛ ɔ, mmɔ ɛ min dɔ, mbɛ mmɔ ma‑a, mmɔ bɛ Mansa Chisɔsi a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, mmɔ ni ma nɛ wan, mmɔ ni ma pan fan, mmɔ toen mu, mmɔ ni a faa chima koe n ma. An mu mmɔ faa ma koe chenama a, a ben ko ɔ ko ma.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, mmɔ gbɛɛ, mmɔ ɛ sɔ‑a wan Chisɔsi chen kɔɔ tee dankama tee ma, a ni kaa a tɛ mmɔ wakoe ma. Ɛ mmɔ gbɛmbo‑a wan dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a. Mɔ ɔ mɔ sin mbe koe miin ma‑a, dunya ma gboo chɛ ɔ, an koe n ni nyan, an ni yaua wan, mɔ ɔ mɔ ɛ an pawa ma sɔn‑da.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Nn‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, Mansa Yataa ma chianɛ mu koe min na. Chɛ an fɛ mu, nn mbe butuin chɛ mɔ dɔ mende yiima mun koe a chɛndɛ, a si a ma. Yataa‑a nn sɔn fan chɛndɛ chɛ. A sin, n yii na tɛen fan mu, wo ta yiinachii gbu wɛɛ ɔ, wo‑a n sɔn fan.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Wo ma a yen, mbɛ nn mbe nn fandi pɛmbɛ tena wan to wo tena. Chɛɛ nn mbe ka min ma‑a, nn mbe dɔ yian chɛndɛ an chɛ tena wo a, min mbe a ma, wo ni yonka tɛ nn ma. Chɛ ni a ma, wo ni che mɔɛ dɔ n da a kuiɛ yɛman‑da. Mɔɛ dɔ nu, miin mbe yonka tɛ mɔɛ ma buɛ ma a gboo ma, an mbe ee na a tɛ a sɔnɛ ma.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, ni nn wooen bɛɛ mu, mbɛ Yataa an ko a mu. Chɛ ma, ni nn yiima tɛen fan mu, mbɛ wo sin fan ko a mu.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chisɔsi Chasi 'a koadia, an mbe tachɛ tena mmɔ a. Mmɔ ban‑da ka gbɛ buɛ min dɔ a ɔ sɔn‑da, mbɛ a dɔndɔ gbe an fa‑a mɔ gbu gbɛɛ ko a. Chɛ ɛ a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ mɔɛ gbɛɛ fa‑a wan, a 'a saya chɛ ɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: A sin gbu, a na‑a fa mɔɛ gbɛɛ an ko a. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, mɔɛ gbɛɛ, miin mbe fɔɛ ɔ, an mbe ee to a ɔ an fandi an ko a. Chɛɛ an mbe gbɛ fɔɛ ɔ, Chasi an ko a. A wan fa‑a, mbɛ a kɔɔ sɔ‑a, a ka saya ɔ, an ko a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chɛ an fɛ mu, a ka gbɛ sanche ma, mmɔ ee mɔ ɔ mɔ ya to mɔgbuya ta fɛ chia a. Mmɔ na‑a Chasi wɛɛ ya boo ɔ boo mɔgbuya ta fɛ chia a, tima dɔndɔ a, mmɔ ee an yiinachii chɛ chɛ tena to a a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chɛ ko a, ni mɔ ma‑a gbɛ mɔ dɔndɔɛ a mmɔ bɛ Chasi a, mmɔ ma‑a mɔ nama a. Mmɔ ka‑a mmɔ tachɛ buɛ kɔma kun ma, mmɔ dɛ‑a a nama ɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Yataa an‑na koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ma, mmɔ ko a. A wan‑na a ma, Chasi‑a a ma, mmɔ ma‑a Yataa dia nyɔɛ a, mmɔ bɔ‑a chɛɛ ma nyɔncha ɔ. A sin fan‑na nn sɔ, mɔ dɔ mende n ma sawan koe a Yataa tena, dia nyɔncha ɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Nn 'na sakana yen ko. Mbɛ Yataa‑a a ma wan, Chasi‑a a ma, mɔɛ gbɛɛ dunya ɔ, an ni ma a wan Yataa dia nyɔɛ a. Yataa nii ma mɔɛ gbɛɛ 'a ko yama n sa tena ɔ bɛn ni. A sin, a‑a an sakana bai chɛ be wan nn ma. Sakana bai chɛ, min mbe a ɔ yian, mmɔ gbɛɛ ɛ ma buɛ min dɔ a dia nyɔɛ a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chɛ ko a, nn yen ko gbɛ nɛ, nn mu Chasi 'a sɔ mɔɛ a. Nn mbe a ɔ yian‑da, a maenɛ mu yɔ Yataa wandi an mbe koɔ tena nn dɔ. Nn mbe wo disa tena, yɔ Chasi wandi an mbe koɔ tena, Yataa ni a ma wo ni mun chɛɛ ma nyɔncha ɔ, wo ni ma a dia nyɔɛ n na.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Mmɔ ko a ni, Yataa‑a ko yama gbɛɛ si Chasi kun ma. Chɛɛ Chasi chɛ nii ma ko yama kan kɔ kan ma ni. Yataa‑a chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, mmɔ ni ma mɔ tandenɛ a a chen kɔɔ. Koe min na mu, mmɔ ma‑a mmɔ dɔndɔɛ a Chasi a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Nn bɛ an mbe wai chɛ tena dɔndɔ a, nn bɛ Yataa wandi a. Chɛ ko a gbɛ, nn mbe wo disa tena, wo wɛn‑na Yataa 'a koadia demanɛ ma sɔn, wo ni a bia wo boo fea a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: A mu min na, Yataa‑a a fɔ wan a 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, “Tima min na n ni basan wo ma, n‑na n ya a mun fan wo ma. Mbɛ n‑na wo deman bauncha sɔn tee ma.” A yen ko, tima che‑a, Yataa basan koe a wo ma. Bi tee chɛ, a mu tee an na, bauncha ma sɔn koe a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Nn ma to ni, nn ni kɔnɛ sɔ mɔ ɔ mɔ ya ɔ. Chɛ an mbe a ma‑a, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee wai chɛ ma bɔ‑a, nn mbe min chɛ ka.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chɛɛ nn mbe min ma, nn 'na wai chɛ buɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, nn mbe nn tachɛ buɛ ma mɛn fan, yɔ Yataa 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ nu. A chia chɛ a, nn mbe nn faa bia wan ko gbɛama n dɔ, yakɔɔtawa n dɔ, a basan ko yawaenɛ n dɔ a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: A yɛ to, an‑na nn gbasi wan, an‑na nn sa pimbi chenɛ a, an‑na koɛ bun nn ma. A ma‑a wan nn‑na wai chɛ, a ɔ benden ba gbu a. A sin to, chinɔ nii nɔ, daun fen bɛɛ nii nɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Nn‑na a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ nn mbe wai chɛ tena Yataa an ko a. Nn sɔnɛ a koen fan mu Yataa tena, a 'a yiimatɛ ɛ wan nn dɔ, nn mbe nn faa bia wan. A sin to, nn mbe ko chɛndɛ ma wan mɔɛ n na. Yataa Nyina ɛ wai chɛ tena wan nn dɔ, koadia wɛɛ ɛ nn faa ɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Sakana bai chɛ wɛɛ, nn mbe min sa, Yataa 'a gbasaya an mbe a ɔ. Chɛɛ chɛ fenɛ miin mbe nn boo nyima a, an mbe to nn manɛ a, an mu nn tan buɛ an na, nn tandenɛ min chɛen mu Yataa tena.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Mɔɛ dɔ n mbe basɔmaya be wan nn ma, dɔ n sin mbe baa bɔ nn ma. Dɔ n mbe nn tɔɛ a dia, dɔ n sin mbe a yɔn. Mɔɛ dɔ n mbe nn ya fania fɔ mɔɛ n na. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, nn mbe tea an fɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Mɔɛ dɔ n sin dɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ ma nn sɔn. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, mɔɛ n‑na nn sɔn fan. Saya ɛ ben‑da nn san‑da, chɛɛ yɔ wo‑a a ɔ yen buɛ min dɔ, nn mbe wɛ tun fɔɛ ɔ. An mbe nn tɔɔya tena wɛɛ boo ɔ boo, chɛɛ nn ma fa ni.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Faayɔnɛ ɛ nn tan tena wɛɛ, chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, nn mbe buɔdia bɔ wan tee ɔ tee a. Nn maen mu bɛɛ yɔn tɔɛ n na, chɛɛ nn mbe mɔ sɛsɛ n ma tena wan nyan tɔɛ n na. Nn maen mu mɔɛ n fan na, fen kɔ fen mbe ee miin boo ɔ. Chɛɛ fen kɔ fen gbu, ɛ nn fan boo ɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Nn dia nyɔɛ nu Kɔyindi, nn‑na ko ɔ ko yian wo a, nn‑na nn faa gbɛɛ be.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Wo 'a koadia nn tena, a danka ee. Chɛɛ wo wandi gbu, wo wan mbe ban tena koadia yian koe a nn na.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chɛ ko a, n mbe koɔ tena gbɛ wo tena yɔ n 'na denɛ nu. Wo a ma, nn ko a ni dia ka wo wɛɛ ye. Wo wo faa n bu ka nn ye.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Wo wo boo bɔ ma koe a kuiɛ dɔndɔya ɔ, wo bɛ mɔɛ n na, miin ma an kai fa ni Chisɔsi Chasi a. Tea an fea ko yama a, an mbe ee bɛn. Manɛ ɛ ma kaina min, pimbi ee che ma‑a nɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chasi n fea Sitana a, an mbe ee che bɛn‑da. Mɔɛ wɛɛ, min‑na a kai fa Chasi a, an mbe ee che ma‑a ko dɔndɔɛ ɔ, an mɔɛ chɛ a, min ma a kai fa ni a a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Yataa 'a chenɛ nu, an bɛ fen chɛ n na, an‑na miin ya Yataa a, ko dɔndɔ ee che ma‑a an tɛ ɔ. Koe min na mu, mmɔ mu chenɛ an na, Yataa ko a, min mbe ma‑a kuɔ fɔ ko a. Yataa wandi gbu sin‑na a fɔ ka wan, a ɔ, “N mbe ma‑a wan an tɛ ɔ, n mbe ben ben an tɛ ɔ. N sin mbe ma‑a wan an 'na Yataa a, an bɛɛ, an mbe ma‑a wan n 'na mɔɛ n na.”
