book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chɛ an fɛ mu, Mansa Yataa‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “Wo bɔ mɔɛ chɛ n tɛ ɔ, wo wo wandi ka an kaa a. Wo sin ma wo boo chɛ ko kan kɔ kan dɔ, min ma nyamuien mu n tena. N sin, n mbe n boo si‑a wan wo kɔɔ.”

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Yataa Mansa Wa‑a a fɔ wan to, a ɔ, “N mbe ma‑a wan wo fa a, mbɛ wo wɛɛ ma‑a n 'na denɛ kaima n na, a basan n 'na denɛ musuma an na.”

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: N dia nyɔɛ nu, tooɔdia chɛ n fan mbe mmɔ ko a. Chɛ ko a, mmɔ mmɔ boo a ko, a bɔ ko yama gbɛɛ ɔ. Fen kɔ fen, miin mbe a ma, mmɔ ma ɛ nyamui Yataa tena, mmɔ 'a fɔɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, mmɔ ni mmɔ boo a ko an ma. Mmɔ gbu sin, mmɔ 'a fɔɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, mmɔ ni ma tenchen Yataa ko a, a ma chianɛ ni ma mmɔ ɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Kaina ni ma wo faa ɔ, nn ko a. Koe min na mu, nn ma baa ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ma, nn ma mɔ ɔ mɔ sɔ ni chia yama ma, nn ma mɔ ɔ mɔ kafa ni.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: N ma bai chɛ fɔ ni, n tɛɛ si koe an na wo ma. Koe min na mu, yɔ n na‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ tee, wo ko a di nn ye kaka. Mmɔ bɛ, mmɔ ɛ ma‑a wan tima ɔ tima ko a. Mmɔ tɛ ee ka‑a fɔɛ chɛ ɔ, saya wɛɛ ee mmɔ tɛ ka‑a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: N yii faen mu wo ma kaka. N mbe yonka min tɛ wo ma, a da a koo. Ko gbɛama chɛ n gbɛɛ ɔ, nn mbe miin dɔ bia tena, buɔdia koo n dɔ, a gbu danka ee.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, nn cheenɛ gbakɔ wɛɛ Masidonia chɛnyɛ ɔ, nn nii ma nn suin ni ɛnden bɛɛ a. Gbun koe dechee an ni a ɔ ben‑da, kan kɔ kan nn 'na tindanɛ. Mɔɛ n mbe koɔ‑a, an bɛ an bɔɛ n na, min gbu‑a a ma nn chian‑da.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chɛɛ Yataa, min mbe faayɔn tɔɛ n faa ma nande, a‑a a ma wan nn faa chima‑a, kɛn Taitɔsi na‑a nn tena.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: A na koe dechee nii ma, min na‑a a ma, nn bu ɔ dia‑a. Chɛɛ a na‑a konanɛ min bɛɛ chɛ, a si bia ma, wo‑a min chɛ a a. A‑a a ɔ yian fan to nn na, wo toen mu buɛ min dɔ wo ni n yen. A sin to, a ɔ, mbɛ wo faa yɔnden mu. A yɛ to, mbɛ wo ma bɛnden mu sɔ koe a n ko a. Chɛ gbu an ko a mu gbɛ, n 'na buɔdia gbu ma munda‑a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, n‑na gboo min nyɛn wo tena, ni a na‑a wɛɛ faayɔnɛ a wo ma, n ma n gbɔsɔ ni chɛ a. Chɛɛ n gbu sin, kɛn n‑na a ɔ yen, mbɛ an gboo chɛ‑a wo faa yɔn fan, a ma‑a wan n ma faagbaa a, tima ɛnden ko a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Koe n sin mbe ka gbɛ buɛ min dɔ sanche, n bu ɔ di. A ɔ ma di faayɔn chɛ an ko a, n‑na gboo a min be wo ma. Chɛɛ a ɔ di koe min na, faayɔn chɛ‑a a ma, wo ka‑a wo sɔn yama n kun ma. Wo 'a faayɔn chɛ, Yataa‑a an ma ka ko chɛndɛ a. Chɛ ni a ɔ yian, mbɛ nn ma ko yama kan kɔ kan ma ni wo a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, faayɔnɛ min mu Yataa 'a dɔbɛnɛ a, ɛ a ma wan mmɔ ni mmɔ kan kɔ sɔ ko yama ma a, a ni na bauncha a. A sin, n ni ma‑a a ɔ sɔn‑da ee a ɔ. Chɛɛ faayɔnɛ min mbe bɔ mɔgbuya ta chia a, ɛ na kuɔ fɔ saya an na.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Wo wandi gbu, wo a ɔ yen bɛ, wo 'a faayɔnɛ chɛ, Yataa‑a min dɔ bɛn wo ko a, a ma‑a koe min na wo tena. Wo ma‑a gbɛ tea mɔ wa an na, wo ma bɛndenɛ ɛ a ɔ yen koe a, mbɛ wo ma ko yama ma ni. Wo faa tɛ‑a wan, wo chian‑da, yiinachii ko a wo ɔ, mbɛ wo‑a wo wandi be, wo ma bɛndenɛ ɛ ko yama ma mɔɛ n tɔɔya koe a. Wo gbu, wo‑a a ɔ yian, mbɛ mabɔ ee wo ma, chia ɔ chia a, an koe gbu gbɛɛ ɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: A sin gbu, n‑na gboo chɛ nyɛn bɛɛ wo tena, n ya nii ko yama ma mɔɛ an na, chɛ ma, ko yama ma‑a mɔɛ min na. Chɛɛ n‑na a nyɛn, n ni a ɔ yian wo a gbadan, Yataa chen kɔɔ, wo e buɛ min dɔ nn ko a tea tea ɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo‑a nn faa ma nande. A sin, a ka nn ta ma, Taitɔsi wɛɛ‑a a ma wan, nn bu ɔ dia‑a kaka, a si a ta buɔdia ma, wo tɛ ɔ. Koe min na mu, a‑a a ɔ yian fan nn na, wo gbɛɛ‑a a deman buɛ min dɔ, a bu ɔ ni dia.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: N gbu na‑a wo ma yonka tɛ wan a tena, wo sin ma n na mau ni. Tima ɔ tima ko a, nn‑na bai miin gbɛɛ fɔ wo ye, tea nu mu. A sin, a chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a mu, nn‑na yonka min tɛ Taitɔsi tena, a si wo ma, a wɛɛ ma‑a tea a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: A sin, chɛ ko a, wo 'a koadia ma ɛ munda tena wan a faa ɔ, ɛ ma a yii na chii‑a wo a. A si wo gbɛɛ ma bɛnden ni buɛ min dɔ, bea koe a dasi chɛ n fɛ, a ni miin be wo ma. A yɛ to, wo gbɛɛ, wo‑a wo boo si buɛ min dɔ a kɔɔ ma samba ɔ, chianɛ ɛ wo ɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: N mbe buɔdia bɔ wan, koe min na mu, n danden mu wo a chɛndɛ chɛ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Nn suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, nn toen mu wo ni koe ɔ sɔn, a si Yataa 'a koadia demanɛ ma. Wo ni a ɔ sɔn, ɛ koe miin ma tena chɔchi n dɔ Masidonia chɛnyɛ ɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: An‑na ko gbɛama sɛsɛ ɔ bia wan, an sin ni wan to yɔnɛ wɛɛ ɔ, min ni koo. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, buɔdia min ni an dɔ, a ni koo kaka an ma. Mɔ ni chɛ gbu sin yen fan an boo fen ba n dɔ, an ni miin be an faa gbɛɛ a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: N mbe che wan a fɔ‑a wo ye, tea ɔ, mbɛ an‑na an boo fenɛ be wan, an 'na gbasaya ni kun min ma. An gbu sin, an‑na a be wan, a ni ben an 'na gbasaya ni kun min ma. An‑na chɛ ma, an fandi gbu kun ma an na.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: An ni ma chɛ ma‑a, an mbe disa chɛndɛ gbu chɛ‑a nn na. An dɔ deman ba mu, nn mbe min chɛ tena an na, a ma koe a, an ni kun basan‑da Yataa 'a mɔɛ n ma Chuusaɛn duu ɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: A sin, an‑na koe chɛ wan, nn yii nii min dɔ. An‑na koe saa min ma, an‑na an fandi be wan Mansa Chisɔsi ma. Mbɛ an yɛ‑a gbɛ, Yataa wandi dɔndenɛ ma, an‑na an fandi be nn bɛɛ ma.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chɛ ko a, nn bɛɛ, nn‑na a din fan Taitɔsi ma, min‑na wai chɛ kuu sɔ, a ni a a tun. A ni basan wo ma, wo ni wai chɛ nɛnɛ a ban, min mu koadia wai a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Wo nyanden mu gbɛ kaka, fenɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, miin mbe wo boo ɔ. Wo nyanden mu wo 'a kaifa ɔ, Chisɔsi a, wo nyandenɛ ɛ bai n dɔ, wo e miin sa. A yɛ to, yiimatɛ wɛɛ ɔ, teaya gbɛɛ ɔ, a basan koadia a, min mbe wo ɔ, n ko a. Chɛ ko a, wo e ka koadia wai min chɛ‑a, nn toen mu, wo nyandenɛ ni ma ko chɛndɛ ma wɛɛ ɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: N mbe ee ka sawa an sa tena, wo ko a. Chɛɛ ni n‑na a ɔ yian, mɔɛ n ma bɛnden ni buɛ min dɔ, deman chɛ koe a, n mbe ma‑a ka a ɔ gbɛ an na, wo 'a koadia nyin buɛ min dɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, wo‑a koadia deman chɛ ɔ sɔn fan, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi‑a min chɛ. Mbɛ a nyanden ni wɛɛ, chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, wo ko a, a‑a a wandi ma yɔn tɔɛ a. A‑a chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, a 'a yɔncha chɛ ɔ, wo wɛɛ ni ma nyan tɔɛ n na.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: A sin, n mbe dasi chɛ an be tena. A nyin fan gbɛ, wo‑a wai min kuu sɔ banun, wo ni a a ban. Wo wan nii ma dechee mɔɛ saa n na, a kuu sɔ koe a, chɛɛ wo wan ni mɔɛ saa a, a ma faa ni wo wɛn dɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Wo a a gbandia, mbɛ wo‑a a a ban. Wo ma bɛndenɛ ni buɛ min dɔ, a kuu sɔ koe a, wo ma bɛndenɛ ni ma ka, a a ban koe a. Wo sin, wo a chɛ wo boo fenɛ ɔ, min mbe wo boo ɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, ni wo ma bɛnden mu fen be koe a, Yataa‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, wo e che min be‑a. A sin, ni wo‑a a be, ɛ a ya wan. A ee a fɔ, ɛ boo fenɛ ya wan, min mbe ee mɔɛ boo ɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: N mbe ee butuin chɛ tena, min mbe a ma, n ni feanka ka wo bɔ n kun ma, mbɛ n‑na a si wo sin kun ma. Chɛɛ wo gbɛɛ, wo a kanden fan mu n boo ɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chɛ an fɛ mu, ni boo fenɛ koa‑a wo boo ɔ, a nyin wo ni chɛ n kɔ, a ee miin boo ɔ. An mbe ma demanɛ a an ko a. Chɛ an mbe a ma, an bɛɛ, ni a ma‑a an boo ɔ kaka tima min na, a ee wo sin boo ɔ, an bɛɛ, an mbe wo deman‑da wan. Chɛ an mbe a ma‑a, wo ni wai chɛ kuiɛ dɔndɔɛ ɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: A ni ma yɔ Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, a ɔ, “Mɔɛ min‑na daun fen sɛmbɛndenɛ a sɔn, a tɔɛ ma to ni a boo ɔ. Mɔɛ chɛ wɛɛ sin, min bɛɛ‑a ɛndenɛ a sɔn dechee, min to‑a a boo ɔ, a‑a a bɔ wan a ko a.”

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Nn mbe Yataa wai bɔ wan, a ma koe a, wo wakoe chɛ‑a Taitɔsi faa ɔ, basan koe a wo ma, yɔ ɛ buɛ min dɔ n bɛɛ faa ɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, nn‑na a disa min chɛ, basan koe a wo ma, a nii ma a boo si ni a dechee an kɔɔ. Chɛɛ a wandi gbu, a ni wan a faa ɔ chɛndɛ chɛ, a na koe a wo tena.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Nn mbe Taitɔsi a na tena wo tena, an fea mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ dɔndɔ a, Chasi ɔ. An suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ sin, mɔɛ n mbe a bai tena kaka chɔchi n gbɛɛ ɔ, a si Yataa 'a bai ma, ɛ min sa ben‑da gbɛɛ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chɛ an dechee ko a ma. Chɛɛ a gbu, chɔchi n gbɛɛ‑a an boo sɔ an ma, an‑na a yian, an 'na kɔpɔɛ ni ma a boo ɔ, a ni bea nn fɛ nn 'na tachɛ ɔ. Ni nn ma‑a wai chɛ chɛ‑a, nn bɛ ni ma. Nn gbɛɛ, nn ni wai chɛ, baa be koe a Mansa Chisɔsi tɔɛ ma. A yɛ to, min mbe a ma, nn ni a ɔ yian, mbɛ nn toen mu, nn ni basan mɔ dɔ mende n ma.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Nn mbe nn fandi kun ma fɛn tena wan, mɔɛ n boo ɔ. An ma na gbonyɛ nn na, a si nn tachɛ buɛ ma, boo fen chɛ a, min mbe nn boo ɔ an ko a gbama gbama a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Nn 'na yiinachii mu chɛ an na. Mbɛ nn ni koe ma, tea ɛ min dɔ, Mansa Yataa chen kɔɔ, ni mɔ gbu n bɛɛ ya a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ suun ma nyɔ dɔ mende, Chasi ɔ, nn mbe a bea tena an fɛ, na koe a wo tena. An suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ, a wakoe ɔ gbɛen mu nn boo ɔ, a sin, a ɔ yendenɛ mu, mbɛ mɔ chɛndɛ mu a a, chia sɛsɛ a. A 'a mɔ chɛndɛya gbu, a kun ma chɛ‑a gbɛ, a ben a kɔma ma. Koe min na mu, a yii na tɛen mu wo ma, a sin, ɛ a faa ɔ basan koe a wo ma.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Taitɔsi nan tana, nn bɔɛ mu a a, nn fea, nn mbe wai chɛ tena min na, basan koe a wo ma. Mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ n tana sin Chasi ɔ, chɔchi n 'na sɔ mɔɛ mu an na. An sin mbe na basɔmaya an na Chisɔsi Chasi tena.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Nn‑na yonka tɛ wan, a si wo ma, mɔna chɛ n tena. Chɛ ko a, wo a ɔ yian mɔɛ chɛ n na, a basan chɔchi n gbɛɛ a, mbɛ nn‑na tea yonka an tɛ, a si koadia ma wo faa ɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Tima yayi mu gbɛ sanche, n ni bun to gboo nyɛn‑da, a si wo boo fenɛ n ma, miin mbe be mmɔ bɔ Chisian chɛ n ma Chuusaɛn duu ɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: N‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ wo ma bɛndenɛ mu, basan koe a an ma. N gbu sin, n mbe yonka tɛ wan, a si wo ma mmɔ bɔɛ Chisian chɛ n tena Masidonia chɛnyɛ ɔ. N mbe a fɔ wan an ye, mbɛ an bɔɛ Chisianɛ nu, miin mbe Akaya chɛnyɛ ɔ, an ma bɛndenɛ mu, kɛn banun, demanɛ chɛ koe a. Faa min mbe wo ɔ demanɛ chɛ koe a, a‑a a ma wan, an sɛsɛ faa bɔ‑a gbɛ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chɛɛ mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ nu, Chasi ɔ, n yen ko gbɛ an na na‑a sanche wo tena, nn 'na yonka ɔ siman koe a. A ɔ ni sɔn, mbɛ nn mbe yonka min tɛ, a si wo ma, mbɛ fania ma. Chɛ ni a ma, wo ma bɛndenɛ ni ma, yɔ n‑na wo ma bɛn koe fɔ buɛ min dɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, ni Masidonia mɔɛ n bea‑a nn fɛ, na koe a, an ni a ɔ yen, mbɛ wo ma wo ma bɛn ni, mau wa mu nn ko a. Wo ta nan tana, n yii na tɛen mu ka buɛ min dɔ wo ma, n mbe ee a fɔ, wo ta mau ɛ ma‑a buɛ min dɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chɛ an fɛ mu, n‑na n yii na chii, mbɛ a nyin fan, n ni mmɔ bɔɛ Chisian chɛ n disa, an ni na n ya ɔ wo tena. Mbɛ wo na‑a wo boo fenɛ miin be koe fɔ, wo sin‑na a sa tena ɔ bɛn, a be koe a, wo ni a be. An ni a sa tena ɔ bɛn, n ya ɔ. Chɛ sin mbe a ɔ yian‑da wan, mbɛ wo ta faa ɔ mu, wo‑a a be, chɛɛ mɔ an ma a din ni wo ma.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Koe gbu mu chɛ an na, a nyin wo ni min sa wo yii ma. Mbɛ mɔɛ min mbe chin fen pɛɛ chin, ɛ chin fen pɛɛ an ma sɔn. Chɛɛ mɔɛ min mbe chin fen chenama chin, ɛ chin fen sɛmbɛndenɛ an ma sɔn.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Mɔ ɔ mɔ yiima, ɛ min fɔ a ye, a be koe a, a ni an be. A ma a gbɔɔ a be‑a, a sin ma din a ma a be koe a. Koe min na mu, Yataa toen mu mɔɛ a, min mbe ma fenɛ be‑a, a bu ɔ diama ɛ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: A sin, Yataa kundenɛ mu, a ni mɔɛ kɔ boo fen chɛndɛ a, a ɔ benden ba a. Chɛ ni a ma, a mɔɛ chɛ toen mu fenɛ min na tima ɔ tima ko a, a ni ma a boo ɔ. A sin gbu, fenɛ ɛ ma‑a wan a boo ɔ, ko kan kɔ kan ma koe a, min nyin a ma koe a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Ɛ wan dechee yɔ Yataa 'a gboo‑a min fɔ, a ɔ, “A mɔɛ chɛ ni wai nyima chɛ wan kaka, yɔn tɔɛ n na. A 'a ko chɛndɛ sin, a ni min ma, a danka ee ma‑a.”

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Yataa sin fan mbe chin fen kuu be chin fen chin mɔɛ ma, ɛ daun fenɛ be mɔ gbu ma, a daun koe a. Chin fen kuu gbɛɛ, i toen mu min na, ɛ a be‑a wan i ma. Ɛ i boo fenɛ ma munda‑a wan, min mbe a ma, e fenɛ min be yakɔɔtawa tɔɛ n ma, a ni koa.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Ɛ a ma‑a wan i nyanden ba ni ma, ko chɛndɛ ma koe a, tima ɔ tima ko a. Chɛ ɛ a ma wan, mɔ sɛsɛ ni Yataa wai bɔ, i boo fenɛ chɛ n ko a, an mbe miin ma sɔn, a ka nn na.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, wo e wai min chɛ tena ka, a ee Yataa 'a mɔɛ n ma gbɔsɔɛ an bɔ tena dechee. Chɛɛ ɛ a ma tena wan, mɔ sɛsɛ n ni Yataa wai bɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: A sin, wo e wai min chɛ tena ka, ɛ koe min dɔ yian tena, ɛ a ma tena wan, mɔ sɛsɛ ni basɔmaya be Yataa ma. Koe min na mu, wo‑a wo boo si wan sakana bai chɛ kɔɔ, wo e min dɔ yian, a si Chisɔsi ma. A yɛ to, wo 'a wai nyima wɛɛ ko a, wo e min chɛ an na, a basan mɔ dɔ mende n bɛɛ a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chɛ sin ko a, an toen mu wo a kaka, an mbe samunɛ chɛ tena wo ko a. Koe min na mu, Yataa 'a koadia demanɛ koo, min been mu wo ma.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Yataa ɛn wai, a 'a wai nyima ko a, a‑a min chɛ mmɔ a. An wai nyima chɛ sɔnkɔ ee.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: N fan Pɔɔ, n fan mbe ka wo disa tena. N fɛn mu ka, an dɔ, n ma chimaen mu, n mbe ma wo baima, n sin mbe wo bia wan chinchincha a. An dɔ, chɛɛ ni n ka‑a wo baima, n mbe wo bia wan faaakɔɔɛ a. N mbe wo disa tena, machimaya ɔ, a basan chinchincha a, Chasi ni min yian.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: N mbe wo disa tena, wo ma a ma, n ni n faa a kɔɔ wo ma, ni n che‑a nɔ wo tena tima min na. Koe min na mu, n‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ n mbe che wan n faa sɔ‑a mɔɛ chɛ n ma. Mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin mbe a fɔ, mbɛ nn mbe koe n ma dunya chɛ ɔ yiinachii an na.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, nn mbe wɛɛ dunya chɛ ɔ, chɛɛ nn mbe ee butuin chɛ tena a ɔ yiinachii an na.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Nn mbe chɛɛ chɛ tena feanka miin na, dunya chɛ ta ma. Chɛɛ nn mbe Yataa 'a gbasaya an ya tena, nn ni kaina n yɔn, Sitana kai fa tena nu.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Kɔɔsa bia gbɛɛ, nn mbe a yɔn fan. Nn ni yɛ, dɔpandaya min mbe mɔɛ n dɔ, min mbe an ka‑a tena Yataa sɔn‑da, nn ni a yɔn. Yiima kan kɔ kan ni ma nn boo ɔ bia ɔ, don koe a Chasi kɔɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: A sin, ni wo ban‑da a ɔ yian‑da gbae, mbɛ wo e Chisɔsi an ko a, nn ma bɛndenɛ ɛ ma‑a wan, mɔ ɔ mɔ tɔɔ koe a, min mbe koe ma‑a, min mbe a ɔ yian ɛnden bɛɛ a, mbɛ a ee an ko a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Wo ya ɛ dechee fen chɛ n fan na, miin mbe wo ya kɔɔ. Ni mɔɛ ɛ wan nɔ wo tɛ ɔ, min danden mu a a, ɛ Chasi an ko a, chɛ wɛɛ ni ma a yii ma. Mbɛ Chasi ɛ buɛ min dɔ a mɔɛ chɛ ko a, nn bɛɛ, ɛ ka wan nn ko a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, n mbe ee mau, ni n‑na yonka tɛ wɛɛ kaka, a si gbasaya ma, Mansa Chisɔsi‑a min be nn ma, wo kun ma. An gbasaya chɛ, ɛ wo ɔ gbɛa koe an na, wo a bea koe ma bun.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: N ma to ni wo ni a yen, mbɛ n mbe wo a chian tena wan, n 'na gboo nyɛndenɛ n na.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Mɔɛ n mbe a fɔ wan, an dɔ, “Pɔɔ ɛ bai miin nyɛn a 'a gboo n dɔ, an kɔɔ fanka wan, dimaya wɛɛ an dɔ. Chɛɛ,” an dɔ, “ni a ma‑a mmɔ tɛ ɔ, a ma chimaen mu, baa wɛɛ ee a da a kuiɛ ma.”

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: An mɔ bonda chɛ nu, miin mbe bai chɛ fɔ tena ka, an ni chɛ ɔ gbɛ. Mbɛ ni nn ma‑a wo tɛ ɔ, nn mbe bai min fɔ, an fea bai a, nn mbe min nyɛn wo tena gboo ɔ, bai dɔndɔ gbe nu mu, tɛ bɔ ee an ma.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Nn mbe ee nn fandi siman tena mɔɛ n ma, chɛ ma, nn ni nn fandi a kan an na. Mɔɛ nu, miin mbe an fandi bai. A yɛ to, an mbe an yii na chii, mbɛ an fisa a ben an bɔɛ n ma. Chɛɛ an mbe ma ka an fandi simanɛ min chɛ‑a an fandi ma, an mbe an fandi a kan an fandi a, yiimatɛ ee a ɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, nn tana, nn mbe ee yonka tɛ, nn ni a ɔ ben. Nn mbe yonka tɛ dechee, a si wai chɛ an ma, Yataa‑a min be nn ma a chɛ koe a. An wai chɛ sin, a dɔndɔ mu wai chɛ an na, nn mbe min chɛ tena ka wo tɛ ɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, wo e ka nn 'na wai chɛ tena tinɛ ɔ wan, nn mbe ee nn doo bun tena wo kun ma, che koe a wo ma wai chɛ a. Nn na‑a wan sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a wo tena, a si Chisɔsi Chasi ma.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chɛ an fɛ mu, nn mbe ee yonka tɛ, mɔ dɔ mende n‑na wai chɛ gba ma, min mbe ee tinɛ chɛ ɔ, Yataa‑a min yian nn na. Chɛɛ nn yii na tɛen mu, mbɛ wo 'a danaya ma ɛ munda‑a buɛ min dɔ, nn bɛɛ, nn mbe wai chenama chɛ‑a ka wan wo tɛ ɔ. A sin, tima ɔ tima ko a, nn mbe ma‑a a tinɛ chɛ an dɔ, Yataa‑a min yian nn na.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, nn ni kun sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian‑da mɔɛ n na, chɛnyɛ dɔ mende n dɔ, miin dɔ yansan wo a. Chɛ ee ma‑a yonka tɛ‑a, a si mɔ dɔ mende n ta wai ma, tanda dɔ mende ɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “Mɔɛ min toen mu a ni yonka tɛ, a ni a tɛ koe a ma dechee, Mansa Yataa‑a min chɛ a ko a.”

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, mɔɛ min mbe a wandi tando, ko gbama mu. Chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ, Mansa Chisɔsi wandi ɛ min bai, an mu tea tando a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Ɛ n bu ɔ dia‑a wan, ni wo‑a wo faa bia n na, n ni wooya bai ɛnden sa. Wo dimu.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: N faa gbaaen mu kaka wo ko a, yɔ Yataa faa gbaaen mu buɛ min dɔ. Koe min na mu, wo e wan yɔ sɛnama, min ma kai koe ɔ sɔn. N‑na wo yan mɔ dɔndɔ gbe an ko a, min mu Chasi a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chɛɛ n chianden mu ko dɔndɔ an ko a. Mbɛ ka chɛ na‑a Ifi bun buɛ min dɔ, yaa a, wo wɛɛ, wo yiima ɔ ma na chɛ. Wo ee na‑a ma‑a teaya ɔ, Chisɔsi Chasi a, wo ni ma a ko a chɛndɛ chɛ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, wo e wo boo a si wan mɔɛ kɔɔ, buɔdia ɔ, min mbe na wo tena, ɛ bai ɔ yian, a si Chisɔsi dɔ mende ma. Chisɔsi chɛ ma, nn‑na sakana bai chɛndɛ ɔ yian, a si min ma. Mbɛ wo‑a wo boo si nyina dɔ mende kɔɔ, min ma Yataa Nyina a. Wo‑a wo boo si to sakana bai dɔ mende kɔɔ, min kaen mu chɛ ma, wo na‑a wo boo si tee min kɔɔ. Wo‑a wo wandi be a ma, ko ɔ wuu ma a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chɛɛ n ta yiinachii ɔ, n ma dan ni a a, mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ n benden fan mu n ma ɛnden bɛɛ a, wo e mɔɛ miin ya ka Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔ wa an na.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: An ni a fɔ wɛɛ n ma kosan koɔ‑a, chɛɛ yiimatɛ nan tana, a been fan mu n ma. Chia ɔ chia a, nn‑na chɛ ɔ yian fan wo a, ko ɔ ko ɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: N ma ko yama an ma ni ka, n fandi ma yii koe a, min mbe a ma, n ni wo a sɛ. N‑na Yataa 'a sakana bai chɛ ɔ yian fan wo a, n ma wo ɔ tisa ni fen kɔ fen be koe a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chɔchi mɔɛ dɔ mende nu, an‑na an boo fenɛ n be wan, basan koe a n ma, n ni wai chɛ wo tɛ ɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Mmɔ bɛ sin ni tima min na, n sin toen ni demanɛ a, n nii ma n 'na yakɔɔtawa si ni mɔ ɔ mɔ kun ma. Mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, miin na‑a ka Masidonia chɛnyɛ ɔ, an fan‑na fen kɔ fen be n ma, min ma gbɔsɔɛ ni n ma. N ni buɛ min dɔ, a kɔma a, n mbe ma‑a ka wan, ya ɔ ma wɛɛ. N mbe ee n 'na yakɔɔtawa sa‑a wo kun ma, chia ɔ chia a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chasi 'a tea, ɛ ka buɛ min dɔ n dɔ, n mbe ka yonka min tɛ‑a, a ɔ ee maun‑da Akaya chɛnyɛ gbɛɛ ɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: N mbe chɛ fɔ tena, wo wakoe an ma don ni n ma, n toen fan mu wo a. Yataa‑a chɛ ɔ sɔn fan.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: N sin mbe ka koe min na, n mbe an na tun‑da, a ma koe a. N mbe chɛ ma‑a wan, mɔɛ chɛ n kɔɔ bɔ koe a. Mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin mbe an fandi ya Chasi 'a sɔ mɔɛ n na, an ma chia sɔn, yonka tɛ‑a. An mbe ta‑a a fɔ‑a, an dɔ, nn bɛ an na, nn mbe wai dɔndɔɛ an na.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: An mɔɛ chɛ nu, fania mɔɛ nu mu, an fandi ya koe a sɔ mɔɛ n na. Wai chɛ mɔɛ n fan nɛ, miin mbe mɔɛ n bun, an mbe ben an fandi ya‑a mɔɛ n na, miin mu Chasi 'a sɔ mɔɛ n na.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chɛɛ tɛnɛ ko ma chɛ nɛnɛ a. Sitana wandi gbu wɛɛ, ɛ kun fan, a ni a wandi ma yɔ maeka, min mbe man taun Yataa 'a manɛ a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chɛ an fɛ mu, kɔndɔfii ko ma, ni Sitana 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ n bɛɛ, an‑na an fandi mun tea wai chɛ mɔɛ n na. A dankama a, an mbe pawa min sɔn‑da, a ɛ kan‑da an wai chɛ buɛ an na.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Ka n mbe a fɔ to. Wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ, wo ma n ya woo mɔɛ a. Chɛɛ ni wo‑a n ya wɛɛ ka, wo wo boo a si n kɔɔ n 'na wooya ɔ. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, n bɛɛ, n ni yonka tɛ ɛnden na.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: N gbu sin, mbe ka miin fɔ‑a gbɛ, bai ma a, Mansa Chisɔsi toen mu min na. Chɛɛ n mbe a fɔ tena wan, yonka chɛ a, yɔ woo mɔɛ ɛ koɔ buɛ min dɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Mɔɛ sɛsɛ nu, an mbe yonka tɛ kɛn dunya ma mɔɛ n ta chia an fan na, n bɛɛ, n mbe yonka tɛ‑a wan.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Wo e wo faa bia wan woo mɔɛ n na, buɔdia a, a yen ko wo wandi gbu yiima tɛen ba mu.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Wo gbu sin mbe wo faa bia wan, mɔɛ ni wo yɔn bia wɛɛ chɛ. Chɛ ma, mɔɛ ni wo boo fenɛ daun, chɛ ma, a ni wo chii, chɛ ma, a ni a yombo sɔ a ma, chɛ ma, a ni wo ya a gbasi.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: A ma ɛ che wan mau‑a n ye, n ni dɔn a ma, mbɛ nn dɔ nii ma gbɛ, koe chɛ n ma koe a. Chɛɛ ni mɔ ɔ mɔ faa na‑a gbɛa, tima kan kɔ kan ko a, yonka tɛ koe a, a si ko kan kɔ kan ma, n bɛɛ, n faa ɛ gbɛa wan n ni yonka tɛ an koe chɛ ma. N mbe ka koɔ an na, yɔ woo mɔɛ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Ni Ibu mɔɛ mu an na, n bɛɛ, Ibu mɔɛ mu ka wan n na. Ni Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ mu an na, n bɛɛ, Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ mu ka wan n na. Ni Ebeami cheeya mu an na, n bɛɛ, a cheeya mu ka wan n na.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Ni wai chɛ mɔɛ mu an na, Chasi ko a, n mbe wɛɛ ka koɔ‑a yɔ woo mɔɛ, chɛɛ an wai chɛ mɔɛ chɛndɛ gbu mu n na, a ben an ma. N‑na wai chɛ, a ben an ma, n ta‑a pimbi chenɛ a, a ben an ma. N‑na gbasi min sin dɔ yen, dan mbe ee a ma. Tima sɛsɛ ko a, n ni ma wan saya baima, a ben an ma.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: N‑na gbasi ma sɔn fan, si tena duu, Chu mɔɛ n boo ɔ. An ni n bosa wan, gba bi sawa, kun ma kɔnɔntɔ ko a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Si tena sawa gbɛ, Domi mɔɛ n ni n gbasi kɔnɛ an na. Mɔɛ n‑na n ma bon bon gba dɔndɔ, senɛ a, n fa koe a. Gba sawa gbɛ, dɛndɛ wɛɛ ɛ gban‑da n na, yii a. A sin, n ni wan yii a su ɔ tee a, tima dɔndɔ ko a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: N 'na tachɛ sɛsɛ n dɔ, n ni wan chianɛ kɔɔ, yii fa boo ɔ, a basan kanka n na. N ni wan chianɛ kɔɔ, n bɔ Chu mɔɛ n boo ɔ, ni mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ boo ɔ, miin ma Chu mɔ a. Ko ma chiandenɛ n ma‑a wan duu wa n dɔ, an ma‑a fuinɛ ma, an ma‑a kɔ yii a. N suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ n gbu wɛɛ Chasi ɔ, a wakoe ni sa ɔ dechee miin ya kɔɔɛ, chɛɛ a ee an faa ɔ, n chiandenɛ ni wan an ma.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: N‑na wai chɛ wan n sɔɛ gbɛɛ a. Tima sɛsɛ ko a, n ni chi wan n ya a. Tima sɛsɛ ko a, kɔnkɔɛ‑a n bia wan, n kanɛ a gbaa‑a, a sin n nii daun fen ma sɔn. Tima sɛsɛ ko a, chima ni n bia wan, koa a tenden bɛɛ nii n ma.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: A sin, a ka ko dɔ gbɛɛ chɛ n ma, n faa gbaaen fan ni tima ɔ tima ko a, chɔchi n gbɛɛ ko a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Ni mɔɛ ɛ nɔ min gboo ɔ faenɛ ɛ, n bɛɛ, n gboo ɔ fa wan a mɔɛ chɛ ko a. Ni mɔɛ‑a a ma, a bɔɛ ni ko yama ma, n faa ɛ gbandia wan yɔ ta.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Ni n mbe kun fan n ni yonka tɛ, n mbe yonka tɛ‑a, a si koe chɛ n fan ma, miin mbe a ɔ yian, mbɛ gbasaya ee n boo ɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Tando ni be Yataa ma kuɔ fɔ ko a. A wan mu Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi fa a, ni a 'a Yataa. A‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ n mbe ka tea an fɔ tena.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: N ni kɛn Damasikɔsi, duu mansa min ni nɔ Mansa Ayetasi kɔɔ, a‑a mɔɛ n sɔ wan chia kunɛ gbɛɛ a, duu wa chɛ a tindanɛ. A ɔ, an ni n bia.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chɛɛ n si‑a wan tɛngbɛ ɔ, mbɛ an‑na n na yii duu ma, kanda wa chɛ gbaa, a bɔ woe a, kanda wa chɛ ɔ. Mbɛ n bɔ‑a a boo ɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: N mbe yonka a tun‑da wan a ma. Fen kɔ fen mbe ee wɛɛ ka boo ɔ boo yonka ɔ. Chɛɛ n mbe a a tun‑da wan gbɛ koɔ koe a, a si koe n ma, miin dɔ nunden ni, Mansa Chisɔsi‑a miin dɔ yian n na.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: N‑na kamin dɔndɔ sɔn fan, min ni Chisianɛ a. Yataa‑a an kamin chɛ ya wan, mbɛ a sɛ‑a a a pɔɔ banda bu ɔ. San tan kun ma naanin fan ben‑da gbɛ, kɛn koe chɛ chɛ‑a a ɔ. Chɛɛ n ma a ɔ sɔn, ni a gbugbu an ya a, a sɛ‑a, chɛ ma, ni a ma‑a cho ɔ wan. Yataa dɔndɔ gbe, an‑na a ɔ sɔn.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: A sin, n gbu ni a fɔ to, n‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ kamin chɛ ya‑a wan, a sɛ‑a banda bu ɔ. N ma a ɔ sɔn, ni a gbugbu an ya a, a sɛ‑a, chɛ ma, ni a ma‑a cho ɔ wan. Yataa dɔndɔ gbe, an‑na a ɔ sɔn. A sin, a‑a koe n na min fan, miin dɔ ee che yian‑da. Koe nu, mɔ gbu ee che a da tu‑a miin na.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chɛ an fɛ mu, n mbe yonka tɛ‑a wan, a si kamin chɛ ma. Chɛɛ n mbe ee yonka tɛ, a si n fandi ma. N mbe yonka tɛ dechee, a si fen chɛ n fan ma, miin mbe a ɔ yian, mbɛ gbasaya ee n boo ɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Ni n toen mu wɛɛ, n ni yonka tɛ, n mbe ee che ma‑a woo mɔɛ a. Koe min na mu, n mbe ma‑a ka tea an fɔ‑a. Chɛɛ n mbe ee yonka tɛ. Koe min na mu, n ma to ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ni n ya mɔ chenama a, a ben koe n ma, an mbe n yen miin ma‑a, a ni ben to koe n ma, an mbe miin na min n da a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: A sin to, Yataa nii ma to ni n kunɛ ni koa, yonka a, a si ko ɔ nunden chɛ n ma, miin dɔ yian‑da n na. Yataa‑a mɔnɛ ma koe si wan n na. An koe chɛ ma‑a wan Sitana 'a bosa a, n gbasi koe a, n kunɛ ma na koa n na.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: N‑na Mansa Chisɔsi fai wan, gba sawa ko a, an koe chɛ ma, n dɔ, a ni n boo ka.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chɛɛ a‑a a fɔ wan n ye, a ɔ, “N 'na koadia demanɛ, a‑a a kun i ko a. Koe min na mu, tima min na ee kun ko ma, n 'na gbasaya danka ee a tima chɛ a.” Chɛ an fɛ mu, n bu ɔ di yonka tɛ koe a kaka, a si gbasaya ma min mbe ee n boo ɔ, min mbe a ma, Chisɔsi 'a gbasaya ni ma n kun ma.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Gbasaya ee ka buɛ min dɔ n boo ɔ, chɛ‑a n faa chima, Chasi ko a. N faa chimaen mu, mainɛ ɔ bia koe a, yakɔɔtawa bia koe a, ko ma gbaaenɛ ɔ bia koe a, a basan ko gbɛama n na. Koe min na mu, gbasaya ee n boo ɔ tima min na, a tima chɛ a mu, n dɔ gbɛ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: N mbe ka wooya koe n fan ma tena, chɛɛ wo wan‑na a din n ma, a ma koe a. Koe min na mu, a ni nyan fan, wo ni n pɛmbɛ. Ni mɔ a tenden bɛɛ gbu ma n na, chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu, wo e miin chee ka Chasi 'a sɔ mɔɛ wa n na, an ma ben ni n ma chia ɔ chia a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Yataa‑a a ma wan, n‑na kamaya ko wa sɛsɛ ma, a ɔ yian koe a wo a, mbɛ Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ mu n na. N na‑a an ma wan, faabia wa ɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: N nii ma wo bia boo yama chɛ ni, ko kan kɔ kan dɔ, n ni wo ka chɔchi tɔɛ chɛ n ma. Fɔ dechee, n nii n 'na suun feanka sa wo kun ma. Ni chɛ mu ko yama an na, mbɛ wo dimu.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Sanche gbɛ, gba sawan bɔɛ an nɛ ka, n ma bɛndenɛ ɛ, na koe a wo kɔndɔn‑da. A sin, n mbe ee wo ɔ tisa fen kɔ fen ko a. Koe min na mu, n ma to ni wo boo fenɛ an na, n toen mu wo wandi gbu an na. A ni ma boo ɔ boo gbɛ, denɛ n fan mbe ee an woo mɔɛ n da kɔ. Chɛɛ an woo mɔɛ n fan mbe an da kɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Ɛ ma wan buɔdia n ma, n ni n boo fenɛ gbɛɛ be, a basan n fandi gbu wɛɛ a, basan koe a wo ma. N mbe chɛ ma‑a wan, n 'na koadia kun ma ɛ sa‑a wan wo ko a, n ta ma ni dɔɔya wɛɛ wo faa ɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chɛɛ wo dɔ nu, wo dɔnden fan mu a ma, mbɛ n ma n 'na suun feanka si ni wo kun ma. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, ɛ wo 'a yiinachii ɔ, mbɛ yaa tɔɛ mu n na, a sin n na‑a wo boo bia wan yii kɔɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chɛɛ a ma to ni n yii ma, n ni ben mɔɛ chɛ n dɔndɔ wɛɛ ɔ, n na‑a miin sɔ wo tena, n ni wo kafa. Ae?

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: N na‑a Taitɔsi disa wan na koe a wo tena. Mbɛ mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ Chasi ɔ, n‑na a sɔ, an fea a a. Taitɔsi nii ma wo kafa ni, ae? Nn fea Taitɔsi a, nn yiima ni dɔndɔ gbe, a basan nn 'na ko ma buɛ wɛɛ a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: A ma ma wo yiima chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, mbɛ nn mbe nn fandi an ma fɔ tena wo tena. Nn mbe ma ka Yataa chen kɔɔ wan, nn mbe ma bai sa‑a, Chasi faa ma a. A sin, nn dia nyɔɛ nu, nn na‑a a gbɛɛ ma, basan koe mu wo ma.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: N faa gbaaenɛ mu, kɔkɔɛ ni n che‑a wo tena, n mbe ee na‑a wo tan‑da, yɔ n toen mu n ni wo tan buɛ min dɔ. A sin to, kɔkɔɛ wo wɛɛ, wo ee na‑a to‑a n ma buɛ a, wo ta faa ma ɔ. N chiandenɛ mu, n ma na koɛ tan wo tɛ ɔ, a basan toomaya a. A yɛ to, faagbandia basan wo ta diana koe n dechee a, main chɛ basan ko ɔ fɔɛ a, dɔpanda basan ko a fasanɛ a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: N faa gbaaenɛ mu, mbɛ ni n yɛ‑a to nɔ wo tena, n 'na Yataa ɛ a ma‑a wan, a ni n ma yii, wo ya kɔɔ. A sin, n mbe na‑a di chɛ‑a wan, a si mɔɛ chɛ n sɛsɛ wakoe ma, miin na‑a ko yama ma, an sin ma an kan kɔ sɔ ni ko yama ma a. An 'na ko tɛ chɛ, min danka ee ka.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chɛ an mbe ma‑a gba sawan bɔɛ a, n mbe na‑a wo kɔndɔn‑da. Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “Ni an‑na kunɛ si mɔ ɔ mɔ kun ma, siiya fea, sawa an mbe bɔ a ma, an mbe e na to kaa a tɛ‑a, a si an bai chɛ ma.”

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: N‑na wo a si wan, n 'na gba fean bɔɛ ɔ, wo kɔndɔn‑da. N‑na wo a si wan, wo wɛn na‑a ko yama ma, a kɔma a, a basan mɔɛ tɔɛ n gbɛɛ a. Chɛɛ n mbe a fɔ‑a wan to sanche, mbɛ n mbe ee ka buɛ min dɔ wo tɛ ɔ, mbɛ n mbe na‑a to tima min na, mɔ ɔ mɔ kun mbe ee bɔ‑a tɔɔya ɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Wo toen mu, wo ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ n mbe koɔ tena, Chasi 'a gbasaya an dɔ. Wo sin mbe a ɔ sɔn‑da wan. Ni a ma‑a tachɛ‑a wo a, a ee ma gboo ɔ fa ɔ. Chɛɛ ɛ min ma, ɛ a 'a gbasaya ɔ yian fan wo tɛ ɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, tima min na an ni Chasi gbangban tena kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma, a fa koe a, a nii ma gbasaya yian ni. Chɛɛ ɛ tun fɔɛ ɔ, Yataa 'a gbasaya ɔ. Chɛ an fɛ mu, gbasaya ee nn bɛɛ boo ɔ, nn mu ka buɛ min dɔ mɔ dɔndɔɛ n na Chasi a. Chɛɛ wo e a ɔ yen‑da wan, Yataa 'a gbasaya ɔ, nn mbe fɔɛ ɔ, nn bɛ Chasi a, wai chɛ koe a wo ko a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Wo wo wandi ma mɛn, wo ni a ɔ yen, ni wo boo a chiien fan mu, wo kai fa koe a Chasi a. Wo ni a ya, mbɛ wo ma‑a gbɛ mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, wo bɛ Chisɔsi Chasi a. Fɔ dechee, ni chia ɔ chia ee wo ye, wo wandi ma mɛn koe chɛ a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: N ko a, ɛ wan n yii ma, mbɛ wo e a ɔ gbɛ‑a wan, mbɛ nn ban‑da nn fandi ma mɛn‑da, ko ee nn ma.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chɛɛ nn mbe samunɛ chɛ tena, wo ma na ko yama kan kɔ kan ma. Nn mbe ee a ɔ yian tena wan ka, mɔɛ n na, mbɛ nn‑na wai chɛndɛ an chɛ wo tɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ nn toen mu, wo ni koe n ma, miin nyin, a ma koe a. A ni ma wɛɛ, mbɛ nn‑na wai min chɛ, ko ma bɔ ni a ɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, nn mbe ee ko ɔ ko ma, miin mbe ee tea gbee a. Chɛɛ ɛ ma tea gbee an na, a si Chisɔsi ma.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, n bu ɔ diama an mbe ma, tima ɔ tima ko a, gbasaya ee wɛɛ nn boo ɔ, chɛɛ wo sin dɔ gbɛama ɛ. Nn mbe samunɛ chɛ min ko a, an nɛ, mbɛ mabɔ ma na ma wo ma.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Chɛ an fɛ mu, n mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena, wo tena, n mbe ee tima min na wo baima. N mbe chɛ ma tena, min mbe a ma, ni n‑na a fo wo ma tima min na, n mbe ee na‑a wo bia‑a faaakɔɔɛ a. N mbe ma‑a gbasaya chɛ a tachɛ‑a, Mansa Chisɔsi‑a min be n ma, wo ɔ gbɛa koe mu, wo yɔn koe ma.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, an nɛ, wo buɔdia bɔ. Wo butuin chɛ, wo ni wo tachɛ buɛ n dɔ bɛn. Wo wo too ma sɔ n 'na dasi n ma. Wo ma kuiɛ dɔndɔɛ ɔ, wo ni ma faachima ɔ. A sin, Yataa min mbe faachima be, koadia ɛ to a faa ɔ, ɛ ma‑a wan wo kɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Ni wo bɛn‑da, mbɛ wo‑a wo nyɔn kɔndɔn koadia faa a. Yataa 'a mɔɛ n gbɛɛ nɛ, an‑na wo kɔndɔn.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ KƆYINDI KO A
verse_text: Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi 'a dua ni ma wo ma. Yataa 'a koadia ni tachɛ wo a. A sin, wo ni ma yiima dɔndɔɛ ɔ Yataa Nyina a.

N fan Pɔɔ, n fan mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena, nn bɛ mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ n gbɛɛ n na Chasi ɔ, miin mbe nɛ. Chisɔsi Chasi 'a sɔ mɔɛ mu n na. Mɔ gbu an ma a ma ni, chɛ ni ma. Chɛɛ Chisɔsi Chasi wandi, an‑na a ma, an fea mmɔ Fa Yataa a, min‑na Chasi chɛ kɔɔ sɔ a ka saya ɔ. N mbe a nyɛn tena wo wan tena, wo wɛn mbe chɔchi n dɔ, Kadesia chɛnyɛ ɔ.
Mmɔ Fa Yataa, an fea Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi a, an 'na dua ni ma wo ma, a basan an 'na faachima a.
Mansa Chisɔsi chɛ, an na‑a a wandi be a fa koe a, mmɔ 'a ko yama n ko a. A na‑a chɛ ma, mɔ kun ka koe an na, mmɔ 'a ko yama n boo ɔ dunya chɛ ɔ. Mmɔ Fa Yataa sin faa ma koe, Chasi na‑a an ma ka.
Tando ni ma a tɔɛ ma, kuɔ fɔ, ni kuɔ fɔ ko a. A ni ma ka.
Da ɔ gbaa koe mu n tena, mbɛ wo‑a wo ya a mun sakana bai dɔ mende ma. A ɔ wuuma a, wo bun‑da ka‑a Yataa fɛ, min‑na wo chee, Chasi 'a koadia demanɛ ɔ.
N mbe ee a gbu fɔ tena, mbɛ sakana bai chɛndɛ dɔ mende an mbe to nɔ. Chɛɛ mɔɛ dɔ n fan mbe nɔ, miin mbe wo tɔɔ tena. An toen mu, an ni sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ, a si Chisɔsi ma, a ka a chia ma.
Chɛɛ an ni a fɔ wɛɛ, nn fan, nn ni sakana bai dɔ mende sa, a si Chisɔsi ma, Yataa ni nn danka kuɔ fɔ ko a. Chɛ ma, maeka gbu wɛɛ, min ka‑a banda bu ɔ, ni a wɛɛ‑a chɛ ma, danka ni ma a ma kuɔ fɔ ko a.
Nn‑na min fɔ wo ye tee, n mbe ka to an fɔ tena wo ye. Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a sakana bai chɛndɛ dɔ mende sa wo tena, a ka chɛ ma wo na‑a wo boo si ka min kɔɔ, Yataa ni a mɔɛ chɛ danka kuɔ fɔ ko a.

Ni n ma‑a chɛ fɔ‑a, n mbe ee ka a ma‑a na tea tea ɔ, mɔ gbu n ni to n na. Chɛɛ n mbe a ma tena wan ka, Yataa faa ni chima n na. Ni n toen ni tun mɔ gbu n faa ma koe an na, n nii che ma‑a tima chɛ a, Chasi 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ a.
Chɛɛ n suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, n toen mu, wo ni ko dɔndɔ an dɔ sɔn. Mbɛ n mbe sakana bai chɛndɛ min sa ka, a si Chisɔsi Chasi ma, mɔ gbu n fan ma a kuu sɔ ni a fɔ‑a.
Koe min na mu, mɔ gbu an ma a be ni n ma, mɔ ɔ mɔ wɛɛ ma n kan ni a ma. Chɛɛ koe ɔ nunden chɛ, Chisɔsi Chasi wandi gbu, an‑na a ɔ yian n na.
Chɛɛ wo gbu, wo na‑a a a min fan, n ni Chu n 'na sawa n bia buɛ min dɔ gbau gbau, a si Yataa fai koe ma. N‑na ko yawaenɛ sa wan mɔɛ n ma, a yama boo a, chɔchi ɔ. N gbu toen ni, n ni an kasaa wan.
A gbu sin, Chu mɔɛ n 'na sawa chɛ ɔ, n tɔɛ na‑a bɔ wan, a ben n ya teen ma an sɛsɛ ma, n 'na mɔɛ n tɛ ɔ. N bemba n ta bemba n 'na manda chɛ ko a, mɔ nii sai bɔ n na ɛnden bɛɛ a.
Chɛɛ Yataa‑a a boo sɔ wan n ma, n suun‑da tima min na. A‑a n chee wan, a 'a koadia demanɛ ɔ. A bu ɔ dia‑a wan,
a 'a denɛ yian koe a n na. A na‑a chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, n ni a wakoe ɔ yian mɔɛ n na, miin nii ma Chu mɔ a. A‑a a yian kɛn, n nii ma n kun puin ni mɔ gbu kan kɔ kan ma.
N mbe ee n sɛ koe fɔ, Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, chɛ n tan koe a, miin ni Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ n na, n ya ɔ. Chɛɛ n ta‑a a ya kɔɔɛ a, Adebia chɛnyɛ ɔ, a sin, n yɛ‑a wan to Damasikɔsi duu ɔ.
Mbɛ san sawa gbakɔ, n sɛ‑a Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, Pita kɔndɔn tena. A sin, nn fea ni wan nɔ, aan tee tan kun ma duu ko a.
Chɛɛ n nii ma Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔ dɔ gbɛɛ yen ni, mɔɔ dechee Chimisi, Mansa Chisɔsi suun ma nyɔɛ.
N mbe ka min nyɛn tena, wo tena, tea mu. N mbe ka a fɔ‑a Yataa chen kɔɔ wan.
Chɛ gbakɔ, n ta‑a wan Siyia chɛnyɛ ɔ, an fea Sidisia a.
Chɛɛ a tima chɛ a, mɔɛ miin mbe chɔchi n dɔ Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ, miin kai faen ni Chasi a, an nii n yen, an ni n sɔn.
An na‑a chɛ an na min dechee, mɔɛ n mbe a fɔ, an dɔ, “Kaminɛ min ni ko yawaenɛ sa mmɔ ma, a yɛ‑a mmɔ kaa a. An mbe gbɛ mɔɛ n kan‑da a si ko dɔndɔ gbe chɛ ma, a toen ni min kasaa koe a.”
A sin, n bakoe na‑a a ma wan, an‑na Yataa tando.
San tan kun ma naanin gbakɔ, mbɛ n sɛ‑a to Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, nn fea Banabasi a. Nn ta‑a wan Taitɔsi a, nn boo ɔ.

Chisɔsi na‑a koe min dɔ yian n na, an na‑a a ma, n sɛ‑a Chuusaɛn. A sin, n‑na a sa wan an kɔɔ, chɛɛ nn dechee ni bɛnɛ ɔ, nn bɛ an 'na gbakoo n na. N‑na sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian an na, n na‑a min dɔ yian mɔɛ chɛ n na, miin ma Chu mɔ a. N‑na chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, n‑na wai min chɛ, a ma na to n ma gbama gbama a.
Chɛɛ Taitɔsi nan fan bɛɛ gbu, nn fea ni wɛɛ, a sin Kiisi mɔɛ mu a a, a nii ma din ni a ma, a a ni kamincha.

Chɛɛ mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ dɔ nu Chasi ɔ, a wakoe ɛ sa ɔ dechee miin ya kɔɔɛ, chɛɛ a ee an faa ɔ, an toen ni chɛ an na. A sin, an na‑a wan nn tɛ ɔ yɛdɛn, min mbe a ma, an ni nn na tɛ. An ni a ɔ gbɛ, Chisɔsi‑a mmɔ bɔ buɛ min dɔ sawa chɛ boo ɔ, mbɛ an‑na a ma to, mmɔ yɛ‑a an yɔncha ɔ.
Chɛɛ tima kundu ɛndenɛ wɛɛ ko a, nn ma dɔn ni an ye. Chɛ ni a ma, sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ, a si Chisɔsi ma, tea min mbe a gbaa, a ma na ka a chia ma wo ko a.

A sin, mɔɛ chɛ nu, baa ni miin ma (Yataa ee mɔ gbu tɛ bɔ, chɛ ko a mu, n ma n gbɔsɔ ni an ni buɛ min dɔ), an nɛnɛ nu, an nii ma fen fen na. Ka n ni chɛ fɔ to, mɔɛ miin mu, baa ni an ma, an nii ma fen kɔ fen sa ni n 'na sakana bai kun ma.

Chɛɛ an na‑a a ɔ yen fan, mbɛ Yataa ban‑da gbɛ n ya a, sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian koe mɔɛ n na, miin ma Chu mɔ a. A maen fan mu dechee, yɔ Yataa na‑a Pita ya buɛ min dɔ, a ɔ yian koe a mɔɛ chɛ n na, miin mu Chu mɔɛ a.
Koe min na mu, Yataa min na‑a a ma, Pita ta‑a wai chɛ koe a mɔɛ chɛ n tena, miin mu Chu mɔɛ n na, an Yataa dɔndɔ gbe chɛ an‑na n bɛɛ sɔ, mɔɛ n tena, miin ma Chu mɔ a.

Chimisi, Pita, ni Chɔn, mɔɛ n na‑a an ya, mɔ gbau gbau wa n fan na. An‑na a ɔ yen kɛn, mbɛ Yataa wandi an na‑a wai chɛ be n ma, koadia demanɛ ɔ, an‑na an boo si wan nn kɔɔ, nn fea Banabasi a. An dɔn‑da wan nn ta koe ma mɔɛ n tena, miin ma Chu mɔ a, mbɛ an sin ta‑a Chu mɔɛ n tena.
An dechee mu, miin‑na nn dɔ tisa, yɔn tɔɛ n deman koe a tima ɔ tima ko a. A sin, koe chɛndɛ chɛndɛ gbu an nii nɛ, n ma bɛnden ni min ma koe a.
Chɛɛ Pita na‑a kɛn Andiɔki duu ɔ, n‑na a ma nyin fan, a wandi ya kɔɔɛ ma, koe min na mu, a na‑a ma bɔ koe an ma.

A na‑a a fo kɛn nɔ a saa saa a, an bɛ an ni daunɛ chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n na, miin ma Chu mɔ a. Chɛɛ mɔɛ dɔ n na‑a kɛn, a ka Chimisi tena, a wan Pita sɛmbɛ‑a wan daun chɛ koe a, an bɛ an mɔɛ n na, a ka‑a an kaa a. Koe min na mu, a chianden ni mɔɛ chɛ n fan ma, miin ni a fɔ, mbɛ mɔɛ ee ma Chasi fɛ mɔɛ chɛndɛ chɛndɛ a, ni a a ma kamincha ni yɔ Chu mɔɛ nu.
Pita dɔndɔ gbe nii ma, chɛɛ Chisianɛ tɔɛ n bɛɛ, miin mu Chu mɔɛ a, an na‑a a ma ka wan. Chɛ na‑a a ma wan, Banabasi wɛɛ, a bea‑a an fɛ, bɔ koe mɔɛ chɛ n kaa a, miin ma Chu mɔ a.

Chɛɛ n na‑a a ɔ yen fan, mbɛ an nii ma tan ni, min sien mu tea ma, sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ. Mbɛ n‑na a fɔ Pita ye, an gbɛɛ ya kɔɔɛ ma, n dɔ, “I wan Pita, i wɛn mu Chu mɔɛ a, chɛɛ e koe ma‑a yɔ mɔɛ min ma Chu mɔ a. Fen ko a, e a din‑da mɔɛ n ma, miin ma Chu mɔ a, an ni koe ma yɔ Chu mɔɛ nu?”
Mmɔ wandi gbu, mmɔ wɛn mu ka Chu mɔɛ n na, mmɔ ma mɔɛ chɛ n na, mɔɛ min nii sɔ ɔ Yataa 'a chia ma, mɔɛ miin ma ka Chu mɔ a.

Chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, mmɔ wɛn mu Chu mɔɛ n na, mmɔ ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ mɔɛ ɛ wai min chɛ, an mbe ee a ma, Yataa ni a ya mɔ tandenɛ a, a tena. Chɛɛ chɛ ɛ bɔ kai fa an dɔ, mɔɛ ɛ min chɛ Chisɔsi Chasi a. Chɛ ko a, mmɔ wɛɛ mmɔ‑a mmɔ kai fa Chisɔsi Chasi a, min mbe a ma, Yataa ni mmɔ ya mɔ tandenɛ n na, a tena, mmɔ 'a kaifa chɛ ko a. A ee bɔ wai an dɔ, sawa ɛ a ma, mɔɛ ɛ min chɛ. Koe min na mu, ni wai ta fɛ chia a mu, sawa ɛ a ma mɔɛ ɛ min chɛ, Yataa ee mɔ ɔ mɔ ya mɔ tandenɛ a, a tena.

Ɛ wan Chu mɔɛ dɔ n yii ma, mbɛ mmɔ ee sɔ ɔ Yataa chia ma. Koe min na mu, mmɔ kai faen mu Chasi an na, min mbe a ma, Yataa ni mmɔ ya mɔ tandenɛ n na. Ni mmɔ‑a chɛ ma, mmɔ ɛ ma‑a ka a ɔ yian fan na, mbɛ Chasi wandi an mbe a boo si ko yama ma kɔɔ. A sin, a ee ka buɛ chɛ ɔ.
Chɛɛ n ni yɛ wan to, n ni n kunɛ don Chu sawa kɔɔ, n kunɛ na‑a bɔ min kɔɔ, mbɛ n‑na a yian, mbɛ ko yama ma mɔɛ mu n na.

Koe min na mu, Yataa 'a sawa ko a ni dechee, Chasi fa‑a. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, n fa‑a wan, sawa chɛ ta fɛ chia a, min mbe a ma, n ni ma Yataa ta fɔɛ ɔ. An ban‑da gbɛ n fa‑a, kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma, nn fea Chasi a.
N fandi gbu wɛɛ, n faenɛ mu gbɛ, chɛɛ Chasi ɛ sɔ ɔ n kɔ. Chɛ ko a, n mbe buɛ min dɔ fɔɛ chɛ ɔ, n kai faen mu Yataa 'a denɛ an na. A wan to‑a n na, mbɛ a‑a a fɔɛ be n ko a.
N mbe ee dɔn, n ni Mansa Chisɔsi 'a koadia demanɛ kɔɔsa bia. Koe min na mu, ni Yataa 'a sawa nu, an fan mbe mɔɛ ma mɔ tandenɛ a Yataa tena, mbɛ Chasi fa‑a wan fuu.
Wo wan Kadesia mɔɛ nu, wo wooen mu. N ma a ɔ sɔn mɔɛ min nya‑a wo a. Wo wandi gbu, wo too n‑na a a min fan, mɔɛ n‑na Chisɔsi Chasi gbangban buɛ min dɔ kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma, a fa‑a nɔ.
N mbe chɛ an fɔ tena dechee wo ye. Wo bea koe a sawa chɛ fɛ, an mbe ee a ma, Yataa Nyina ni bea wo fɛ. Chɛɛ wo dan sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a, ni wo‑a a min, an mbe a ma, ɛ bea wo fɛ.
Wo wooen ba mu. Wo wɛn‑na a kuu sɔ, Yataa Nyina ɛ wo fɛ, wo wan mbe ka gbɛ danka‑a tachɛ‑a mɔgbuya ta fɛ chia a.
Wo tɔɔen mu kaka, ma koe a Chasi ko a. N ma dan ni gbu a a, mbɛ wo‑a koe miin gbɛɛ ɔ bia, mɔnɛ fuu mu.

Yataa‑a a Nyina bea wan wo fɛ, a‑a kamaya koe n ma wo tɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ chɛ an‑na a ma, Yataa na‑a chɛ ma. Wo na‑a sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a min fan, a si Chisɔsi ma, a yɛ to, wo‑a wo kai fa wan Chisɔsi a. A nii ma chɛ ma ni, a mu min na, wo bea‑a sawa fɛ.
Wo wo yii na chii wɛ, koe min ma‑a Ebeami a. Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “Ebeami‑a a kai fa wan Yataa a. A sin, Yataa wɛɛ‑a a ya mɔ tandenɛ a a chen kɔɔ.”
Chɛ ni a ɔ yian wo a, mbɛ mɔɛ miin kai faen mu Yataa a, an fan mu Ebeami cheeya chɛndɛ chɛndɛ n na.

A sin, Yataa 'a gboo‑a chɛ kɔɔ fɔ wan. Mbɛ Yataa ɛ a ma‑a wan, mɔɛ miin ma Chu mɔ a, an ni an kaifa a a, mbɛ a‑a an ya mɔ tandenɛ n na, a chen kɔɔ. Chɛ an‑na a ma, a fua‑a sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian‑da Ebeami a. A‑a a fɔ wan a ye, a ɔ, “Dunya ɔ mɔɛ tɔɛ n gbɛɛ, an mbe dua sɔn‑da, ɛ ka‑a i wan na.”
Chɛ ko a, mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin kai faen mu Chisɔsi a, an duaenɛ mu, an bɛ Ebeami a, min kai faen ni Yataa a.

Mɔɛ gbɛɛ, miin too ma sɔen mu Mosisi 'a sawa ma, an tan koe a Yataa chen kɔɔ, an mbe Yataa 'a danka an kɔɔ. Koe min na mu, Yataa 'a gboo ɔ te, a ɔ, “Yataa ɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ danka‑a wan, min mbe ee don‑da koe chɛ n gbɛɛ kɔɔ, miin mbe a 'a sawa gboo ɔ, a ni an gbɛɛ ma.”

Mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a ɔ yen fan gbɛ, mbɛ Yataa ee mɔ ɔ mɔ ya mɔ tandenɛ a, a 'a sawa wakoe a. Koe min na mu, a nyɛnden fan mu Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, “Mɔɛ min mbe a kai fa‑a Yataa a, ɛ an ya mɔ tandenɛ a, a sin fan mbe kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn.”

Chɛɛ bea koe sawa chɛ fɛ, ko dɔndɔ ma, an fea mɔɛ kai fa koe ma Yataa a. Koe min na mu, Yataa 'a gboo ɔ te, “Mɔɛ miin mbe sawa chɛ n gbɛɛ bɔ‑a a gbee a chɛndɛ chɛ, an mɔɛ chɛ n fan mbe kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da.”

Chasi‑a mmɔ kun ka wan, a bɔ sawa chɛ 'a danka kɔɔ. Mmɔ wakoe an na‑a a ma, a‑a danka chɛ ɔ bia, a ka koe a mmɔ kun ma. Koe min na mu, a nyɛnden fan mu Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, “Mɔ ɔ mɔ, min mbe fa‑a dɛn dɔ kɔnɛ ma, Yataa ni a danka.”

Chɛ ni a ma, Chisɔsi Chasi 'a gbasaya ɔ, Yataa 'a dua min mbe Ebeami ma, a ni ma mɔɛ chɛ n kun ma, miin ma Chu mɔ a. Chɛ an mbe a ma, mmɔ ni kun Yataa Nyina ma sɔn‑da, mmɔ too ɔ dia‑a min ma sɔn koe a, ni mmɔ‑a mmɔ kai fa Chisɔsi Chasi a.

N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, ka n mbe tɔmɔsi yian, mɔgbuya ɔ. Mɔ fea nu, ni an‑na dɔbɛnɛ chɛ, mbɛ an kuiɛ bɛn‑da a ma, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee a ka a gba ɔ, chɛ ma, mɔ ɔ mɔ ni a kun ma sa. Ni mɔɛ gbɛɛ ban‑da dɔn‑da a ma, ɛ to ka wan.
Yataa‑a tooɔdia sɛsɛ chɛ wan Ebeami a, ni a cheeya. Yataa 'a gboo ma a fɔ ni, “cheeya nu,” min mbe a ɔ yian, mbɛ an kɔ koo wan. Chɛɛ a yii ni dɔndɔɛ an na, a ɔ, “mbɛ ni i cheeya,” min mu Chasi a.

N toen mu n ni min fɔ, an nɛ. Mbɛ Yataa‑a sawa be wan Mosisi ma. A ban‑da kɛn dɔbɛnɛ chɛ‑a Ebeami a, san chɛmɛ naanin, san bi sawa gbakɔ, mbɛ a‑a sawa chɛ be Mosisi ma. Chɛ an fɛ mu, an sawa chɛ ee che dɔbɛn chɛ yɔn‑da, Yataa ban‑da min chɛ‑a. Chɛ ee che ma‑a, min mbe a ma, Yataa‑a tooɔdia min chɛ Ebeami a, a ni ma fuu gbama a.

Koe min na mu, Yataa ɛ koe min chɛ mɔ gbu ye, ni sawa an mbe a chɛ, mbɛ fanka ee to tooɔdia chɛ a, Yataa‑a min chɛ. Chɛɛ Yataa gbu, a‑a tooɔdia min chɛ Ebeami a, an na‑a a ma, a‑a koadia demanɛ chɛ a a.

Chɛɛ sawa chɛ nii ma sa ni gbama a. Ko yama ma, an fɛ mu, Yataa‑a sawa chɛ sa dɔbɛn chɛ kaa a. Koe ni ma ka, aan Ebeami cheeya chɛ ni na, tooɔdia chɛ chɛ‑a min na. A sin, Yataa‑a sawa chɛ a ben maeka n fan dɔ, a be koe a Mosisi ma, min ni mɔ gbu n tɛ ɔ an bɛ Yataa a.
Tɛ mɔɛ tana, a 'a wai mu kaka fea gbɛɛ faa chima koe an na. Chɛɛ Yataa dɔndɔ gbe, an‑na tooɔdia chɛ Ebeami a.
Chɛɛ chɛ ma a ɔ yian ni, mbɛ sawa chɛ ma to ni ko ɔ ko a, a si Yataa 'a tooɔdia ma. Koe min na mu, ni sawa been fan mu, min mbe fɔɛ be, mbɛ sawa an mbe a ma, Yataa ni mɔ ya mɔ tandenɛ a.
Chɛɛ Yataa 'a gboo ɔ te, dunya gbɛɛ, ɛ ko yama 'a gbasaya an kɔɔ. Chɛ ko a, Yataa na‑a tooɔdia min chɛ, ɛ a be‑a chɛ n fan ma, miin mbe an kai fa‑a Chisɔsi Chasi a.
Mmɔ e na to mmɔ kai fa‑a Chisɔsi Chasi a, mmɔ ni sawa an kɔɔ. Sawa chɛ‑a mmɔ bia wan, yɔ pimbi chenɛ a sa mɔɛ nu, aan tima chɛ, mmɔ kai fa koe Chisɔsi a, a ɔ yian‑da mmɔ a tima min na.
Chɛ‑a a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ Yataa‑a sawa an sa mmɔ kun ma, aan Chasi na tima a. A sin na‑a, min mbe a ma, mmɔ ni mmɔ kai fa a a, mbɛ Yataa‑a mmɔ ya mɔ tandenɛ a.
Mmɔ sin‑na mmɔ kai fa ka gbɛ buɛ min dɔ Chasi a, mmɔ ee to an sawa kɔɔ, mmɔ kun ma fɛn koe a.
Koe min na mu, ni wo‑a wo kai fa Chisɔsi Chasi a, wo gbɛɛ mu Yataa 'a denɛ n fan na, wo gbɛɛ mu gbɛ mɔ dɔndɔɛ an na, wo bɛ Chisɔsi Chasi a.
Koe min na mu, yii chɛ‑a wo gbɛɛ kunɛ ɔ Yataa chia a, wo ma koe mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Chasi a. A sin, wo‑a Chasi sɔnɛ ya gbɛ.

Wo gbɛɛ, wo bɛ Chisɔsi Chasi a, wo ma‑a gbɛ mɔ dɔndɔɛ a. Tɛ bɔ kan kɔ kan mbe ee to Chu mɔɛ n ma, an bɛ mɔɛ n na, miin ma Chu mɔɛ n na. Tɛ bɔ ee chɛ n ma miin mu yɔnɛ n na, an bɛ chɛ n na, miin mbe an fandi ko a. Tɛ bɔ ee mɔ kaima an ma, an bɛ musu n na. Mɔ tɛ bɔ ee to nɔ.
A sin, ni wo e gbɛ Chasi an ko a, mbɛ wo mu gbɛ Ebeami cheeya n fan na. Wo wan yɛ‑a a gbaa a, tooɔdia chɛ ko a.

Chɛɛ ka n mbe tɔmɔsi chɛ be, wo ni n da a kuiɛ ɔ gbɛ. Ni den mɛsɛ ma‑a wɛ tima min na denmɛsɛya ɔ, ɛ wan yɔ yɔnɛ. Boo fenɛ min mbe a fa boo ɔ, a mu wɛɛ a ta a, chɛɛ gbasaya ee wɛ a boo ɔ, an boo fen chɛ n kun ma.
Ɛ ma gbakoo n fan na gbasaya kɔɔ, miin mbe a sɔ chia ma aan tima ni che, a fa na‑a tima min yian.
A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, mmɔ wɛɛ, mmɔ ni wan denmɛsɛya ɔ. A sin, yɔnɛ ni mmɔ a, nyina yama n 'na gbasaya kɔɔ dunya chɛ ɔ.
Chɛɛ tima che‑a kɛn chɛndɛ chɛ, Yataa‑a a wandi gbu ta denɛ a na wan dunya ɔ. Musu an‑na a bu ya, mbɛ a‑a a suun mɔgbuya chia a. A sin, a ni sawa an kɔɔ, fɔɛ ɔ.
Yataa‑a a sɔ, min mbe a ma, mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin ni an sawa kɔɔ, an ni bɔ a kɔɔ. Chɛ ni a ma, Yataa ni mmɔ ya a 'a denɛ n na.
Yataa sin, a‑a a ma wan, a 'a denɛ Nyina, ɛ mmɔ fɛ. A‑a chɛ ma, koe min na mu, a 'a denɛ mu mmɔ a. A 'a denɛ Nyina chɛ sin, ɛ Yataa chee tena wan, a ɔ, “Fa.”
Chɛ ko a, yɔn ma to wo a, Yataa 'a denɛ mu gbɛ wo a. Wo sin ma‑a ka buɛ min dɔ a 'a denɛ a, a‑a dua miin sa tena ɔ bɛn a 'a mɔɛ n ko a, wo wan ta ɛ ma‑a an na.
Wo nii ma Yataa sɔn tima min na suun, wo ni yɔncha ɔ wan, nyina yama n boo ɔ, miin nii ma Yataa a.

Chɛɛ sanche chɛ ɔ, wo‑a Yataa sɔn gbɛ. Chɛɛ tea gbu ko a, Yataa an‑na wo sɔn. Tea gbu ko a, a ee che ma‑a wo 'a yiinachii ɔ, wo ni mun to, wo ni bea nyina yama chɛ n fɛ, fanka ee ka miin na, a sin, an mbe ben‑da fen fuinɛ a. Wo e chɛ ma wan? A ee ma to wo 'a yiinachii ɔ ɛnden bɛɛ a, wo ma koe a to, an 'na yɔnɛ n na.
Wo e tee n ya wan, a ben tee dɔ nu ma. Wo e kau dɔ n bɛɛ ya ka wan, ni tima dɔ nu, a basan sanɛ dɔ n bɛɛ a.
N mbe faagbaa an dɔ, mbɛ n tɔɔya‑a wo ko a fuu.
N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, n mbe wo disa tena, wo ni bea n 'na ko ma buɛ fɛ. Koe min na mu, n bɛɛ, n na‑a koe n ma wan wo ta chia a. Wo nii ma ko yama ma ni n na.
Wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ a saa a, gboo ɔ gbandi, an na‑a a ma, n‑na sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ sa wo tena, a si Chisɔsi ma.
A sin, n gboo ɔ yauaen ni boo ɔ boo, min ni kɔndɔfii a wo tena, wo nii ma n tinɔ ni, chɛ ma, wo ni wo boo bɔ n kɔɔ. Chɛɛ wo na‑a n bia wan, yɔ Yataa 'a maeka, yɔ Chisɔsi Chasi wɛɛ.
Buɔdia min ni wo ɔ, n ma a ɔ sɔn ɛ gbɛ buɛ min dɔ. Ni wo ni kun fan, wo ni wo ya n bɔ, wo ni an be n ma, wo ni a ma‑a wan. N mbe chɛ siiya bɔ wan.
N yen ko gbɛ, n‑na tea bai fɔ wo ye. Chɛ ee na n ma gbɛ wo chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ an na?
Mɔɛ dɔ nu, an mbe a ɔ yian tena wan wo a, mbɛ an toen mu wo a kaka, chɛɛ ko chɛndɛ ma wo ko a. An toen mu an ni mmɔ tɛ du, mbɛ wo ma‑a gbɛ chia dɔndɔɛ a, wo bɛ an na.
A gbu nyin gbɛ, wo faa ni ma koe ɔ, min mu ko chɛndɛ a. A sin, wo ma chɛ ma dechee, n mbe ma wo tɛ ɔ tima min na, chɛɛ wo an ma tima ɔ tima ko a.
N 'na den toa nu, n mbe tɔɔya ɔ bia tena wo ko a, aan wo sɔnɛ ni bɔ Chasi ta a.
Sanche chɛ ɔ, ɛ ma wan n ma buɔdia a, n ni ma wo tɛ ɔ, n ni n koɔ buɛ mun. Koe min na mu, n kɔndɔ fiien mu, wo wakoe a.
Wo wɛn toen mu, wo ni ma sawa chɛ kɔɔ, ka wɛ n mbe wo ɔ tisa. Wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, sawa chɛ‑a min fɔ?
Koe min na mu, a nyɛnden fan mu Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ Ebeami‑a den kaima fea an fan suun. Dɔndɔɛ de ni yɔnɛ an na, dɔndɔɛ sin de nii ma yɔnɛ a.
Chɛɛ yɔnɛ chɛ ta den kaima chɛ, a na‑a suun mɔgbuya ta fɛ chia an na. Musu dɔndɔɛ chɛ sin, min nii ma yɔnɛ a, a 'a den kaima suun‑da tooɔdia ta fɛ chia an na, Yataa‑a min chɛ Ebeami a.

Chɛ mu gbondoma an na, a ɔ gbɛ koe a. Musu fea chɛ nu, an mu dɔbɛn fea chɛ n fan na, Yataa na‑a miin chɛ. Dɔbɛnɛ dɔndɔ chɛ‑a kɔnkɔɛ chɛ an ma, min tɔ mu Saina. A na‑a chɛ wan, mbɛ musu min tɔ mu Aka, ɛ denɛ n suun‑da wan, miin mbe ma‑a yɔnɛ n na.
Aka chɛ mu gbɛ kɔnkɔɛ chɛ an na, min tɔ mu Saina, Adebia chɛnyɛ ɔ. A sin, a sɔen mu duu wa chɛ an ko a sanche, min mu Chuusaɛn na. Koe min na mu, nɔ ɛ yɔncha an dɔ, a basan a ɔ mɔɛ n na.
Chɛɛ Chuusaɛn tana, min mbe banda bu ɔ, a ee yɔncha ɔ. A sin, a ɛ wan dechee yɔ mmɔ de.

Koe min na mu, Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “Gbanda musu, i wɛn mbe ee den suun, buɔdia bɔ. Yee tɛ, buɔdia bɔ, a ɔ benden ba a, i wɛn mbe ee bu ɔ tɛ bu dumɛ ɔ. Koe min na mu, musu boo kaenɛ, ɛ denɛ suun‑da wan kaka ɛ ben‑da wan musu ma, kai ɛ min boo ɔ.”
N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo e wan yɔ Aisaki, min suun‑da yɔ Yataa‑a Ebeami too ɔ dia buɛ min dɔ.
Chɛɛ a tima chɛ a, denɛ min suun‑da mɔgbuya ta fɛ chia a, a‑a ko yawaenɛ sa wan den chɛ ma, min suun‑da Yataa Nyina ta fɛ chia a. A sin, sanche wɛɛ, a ɛ ma tena ka wan.
Chɛɛ Yataa 'a gboo‑a chɛ an fɔ. A ɔ, “Yɔnɛ chɛ gbain, an fea a 'a denɛ a. Koe min na mu, yɔn musu 'a denɛ, a ee a fa boo fenɛ ma chɛɛ chɛ‑a, an fea a 'a fuu musu 'a denɛ a.”
N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, chɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ ma yɔn musu 'a den na, mmɔ mu fuu musu 'a denɛ n fan na.
Ni yɔncha tana mu, Chasi‑a mmɔ bɔ a ɔ. Chɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ sɔ chidi, a ko a. Wo butuin chɛ, min mbe a ma, wo ma na don to an yɔncha fanka ma chɛ kɔɔ.
Sanche gbɛ, n fan, Pɔɔ, n mbe chɛ an fɔ tena wo ye. Ni wo dɔn‑da an ni wo a kamincha, Chasi ee na‑a wo deman‑da ɛnden bɛɛ a.
N mbe chɛ fɔ tena to mɔ ɔ mɔ ye, min ma Chu mɔ a, chɛɛ a dɔn‑da a a ni kamincha. Mbɛ a dindenɛ mu an mɔɛ chɛ ma, don koe a an sawa gbɛɛ kɔɔ.
Wo tɛ du‑a gbɛ, wo bɛ Chisɔsi Chasi a. Wo wan, ɛ wo wɛn yii ma, mbɛ ni wo‑a sawa chɛ gbɛɛ a tachɛ, Yataa ɛ wo ya wan mɔ tandenɛ n na, a tena. Wo nɛnɛ nu, wo fo‑a gbae, Yataa 'a koadia demanɛ a.
Koe min na mu, mmɔ tana, Yataa Nyina 'a gbasaya ɔ, yiinatɛ ɛ ka mmɔ wɛn dɔ, mbɛ Yataa ɛ mmɔ ya wan mɔ tandenɛ n na, a tena. Mmɔ kai faenɛ ɛ Chasi a, mbɛ chɛ ɛ ma‑a wan.

Koe min na mu, mmɔ mu ka buɛ min dɔ mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, mmɔ bɛ Chisɔsi Chasi a, Yataa ee ko dɔ gbɛɛ kan kɔ kan ma fɛn. A ee a ma fɛn, ni mɔɛ a kaminchaen fan mu, chɛ ma, ni a a ma kamincha ni. Ɛ min yen dechee, an nɛ, ni mmɔ‑a mmɔ kai fa wan a a, min dɔ ɛ yian koadia ɔ.
Wo na‑a a kuu sɔ wan ta koe a ya ɔ ma chɛndɛ chɛ. Chɛɛ n ma a ɔ sɔn, mɔɛ min‑na a fɔ wo ye, wo ni sɛmbɛ bea koe a tea chia chɛ fɛ.
Wo yiima mun koe chɛ, a ma ka ni Yataa an na, min‑na wo chee, a‑a a boo sɔ wo ma, ma koe a a ta mɔɛ n na.
An mbe chɛ an fɔ, an dɔ, yisin denɛ chɛenɛ feawa funku ɔ, an dɔ, an mbe a ma, feawa funku gbu ɛ sɛ wa chɛ.
N yii faen fan mu Mansa Chisɔsi ma, mbɛ wo ee bea‑a mɔ dɔ mende da a kuiɛ fɛ, chɛɛ wo e bea‑a n ta an fɛ. A sin, mɔɛ min mbe wo tɔɔ‑a, gbɛmbo ɛ wan a ko a. Chɛ ɛ ma‑a wan, a ni ma mɔ ɔ mɔ a.

Chɛɛ n suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, n tana, n‑na n boo bɔ kanɛ chɛ koe a, mbɛ ni mɔɛ a ma kamincha ni, a ee ya mɔ tandenɛ a Yataa tena. Chɛ an fɛ mu, an mbe tun ko yawaenɛ sa‑a n ma. Ni chɛ sin ko a mu, Chu mɔɛ n faa nii tɛ‑a n ma, ni n ni mɔɛ n kan, a si an na kamincha koe an ma. Chɛɛ n mbe mɔɛ n kan, a si Chisɔsi 'a saya an ma, kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma.
Ɛ wan n yii ma, mbɛ mɔɛ miin mbe ka wo yiima ɔ basan basan tena, an mbe an fandi ma‑a wan kai busi a.

Koe min na mu, n suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, Yataa‑a wo chee wan, a bɔ yɔncha ɔ. Chɛɛ yuu min tɛ‑a ka wo ma, wo ma ben ko yama ma‑a, wo gboo faa ma koe nu, wo ni a dɛn wo bɔ koe ma yɔncha ɔ. Chɛɛ koadianyɔncha ɔ, wo ma bɔi denɛ a wo nyɔn ko a.
Koe min na mu, Yataa‑a sawa miin gbɛɛ be Mosisi ma, a kun tɛen mu bai dɔndɔ gbe an na. A ɔ, “Wo to wo 'a mɔɛ n na, yɔ wo toen mu buɛ min dɔ wo wandi a.”
Chɛɛ ni wo‑a wo nyɔn chin, wo ni wo nyɔn kasaa, chɛ ni ma wo yii ma. Mbɛ ni wo ma tima ya ni, wo e ban‑da wan wo nyɔn kasaa‑a gbae.
Chɛɛ n ni chɛ fɔ wo ye. Wo tachɛ Yataa Nyina gbee a. Wo faa ma ta wo faa ma koe yama chɛ n tena, bea koe a an fɛ.

Koe min na mu, mmɔ faa ma koe yama nu, an ko a ma di Yataa Nyina ye. Yataa Nyina wɛɛ, a toen mu koe miin na, mmɔ wɛɛ ma to ni an na. Mɔgbuya chia, a kan kɔ sɔenɛ mu Yataa Nyina a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, tima ɔ tima ko a, wo ee che koe ma‑a wo toen mu min ma koe a.
Chɛɛ ni Yataa Nyina‑a wo sɔ chia ma, mbɛ wo ee to sawa kɔɔ.
Mmɔ faa ma koe yama nu, an mbe wan sa ɔ den. Ko tɛ an mbe ma a ɔ, a boo a ee ko ɛnden bɛɛ a, a maenɛ ɛ yɔ ba tana ti.

A mu to fenɛ n fai koe an na, fenɛ miin ma Yataa a, ni yawa gbasi, a basan chɛɛ ma nyɔncha a. A yɛ to, koɔ wa, toomaya, ni faa gbandiaya. A sin, an mbe to dechee an fandi an na, mbɛ an du‑a ben‑da gbambe ma.

An ya ɛ ma an bɔɛ n boo fenɛ n fan fɛ, an mbe gbɛ wa min, an mbe daun chɛ bɛnɛ bia wan tima ɔ tima ko a, an mbe ko sɛsɛ dɔ gbɛɛ ma. N sin, n na‑a wo a si buɛ min dɔ a saa a, ka n mbe wo a si to sanche. Mbɛ mɔɛ miin mbe koe chɛ n ma‑a, an mbe ee na‑a don‑da Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ.
Chɛɛ ni Yataa Nyina ma‑a mɔɛ fɛ, ɛ a mɔɛ chɛ ma ka wan. An fan nɛ koadia a, buɔdia, faachima, faabia, ko chɛndɛ ma, mɔ chɛndɛya, ni mɔɛ ma koe danaya tɔɛ a.
A yɛ to, mɔɛ ni a ma chima, a sin, mɔɛ e kun fan i faa ma. Chɛ nɛnɛ nu, sawa kan kɔ kan mbe ee sɔ an na.
Mɔɛ chɛ n sin, miin gbɛɛ, an mbe Chisɔsi Chasi ko a, an‑na chɛ an ma. Koe gbɛɛ, min ma nyin an 'na mɔgbuya ɔ, an faa ɛ miin dɔ chɛndɛ chɛ, an‑na an gbangban kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma.
Ni mmɔ ɛ fɔɛ chɛ ɔ, mmɔ tachɛ Yataa Nyina gbee a, mbɛ mmɔ bea‑a chia chɛ fɛ, Yataa Nyina ɛ mmɔ sɔ‑a min ma.
Mmɔ ma yonka tɛ, mmɔ sin ma sɛ mmɔ nyɔn faa ma, mmɔ sin ma toomaya bɔ mmɔ nyɔn na.

N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo e a ɔ yen‑da wan, mbɛ mɔɛ ɛ wo tɛ ɔ, ko yama kun‑da min ma. Yataa Nyina ɛ wo wɛn sɔ tena wɛ chia chɛndɛ ma, wo tima ya, wo ni an mɔɛ chɛ sɔ chia chɛ ma. Wo wandi gbu wɛɛ, wo wo kun ma fɛn, wo yiima ma na mun, a ka an chia ma.
Wo wo boo si wo nyɔn na ya kɔɔ tawa kɔɔ, min mbe a ma, wo ni Chasi 'a sawa bia a chia ma.
Koe min na mu, ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a yiinachii chɛ, mbɛ mɔɛ mu a a, min sin mu ka mɔ a tenden ma a, ɛ a wandi an bun tena ka.
Chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ ni a wandi gbu tachɛ buɛ ma mɛn. A tima a mu, mɔ ɔ mɔ ɛ a ɔ yen‑da, mbɛ mɔɛ e yonka tɛ i wandi an ko a dechee, chɛɛ i bɔɛ ma.
Koe min na mu, Yataa ee mɔ ɔ mɔ bia a nyɔn sɔnɛ a.
Ni an‑na mɔɛ min kan, Yataa bai ma, a ni a boo fenɛ chɛndɛ gbɛɛ ɔ du, a ni a kan mɔɛ kɔ.
Wo ma wo wandi bun, mbɛ wo e kun fan wo ni Yataa ma yɛn. Koe min na mu, chin fen kan kɔ kan, mɔɛ ɛ min chin, ɛ danka an gbɔɛ ya a.
A sin, ni mɔɛ ma‑a dechee a faa ma koe yama ma‑a mɔgbuya ɔ, a gbɔɛ ɛ ma‑a kuɔ fɔ saya an na, a danka a. Chɛɛ mɔɛ min mbe ma‑a Yataa Nyina gbee a, a gbɔɛ ɛ ma‑a kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ an na.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ gboo ɔ ma fa ko chɛndɛ ma koe a. Koe min na mu, tima ɛ che‑a wan, ni mmɔ ma sɛmbɛ ni, mbɛ mmɔ‑a a tɔnɔnɛ ma sɔn.
Chɛ ko a, Yataa ɛ mmɔ kɔ‑a buɛ min dɔ, mmɔ ni ko chɛndɛ ma tima ɔ tima, mɔ ɔ mɔ a. A sin, a bɛɛ bɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu, mmɔ kai faen mu Chisɔsi a, mmɔ bɛ miin na.
Wo gboo chɛ yen bɛ, n fandi gbu, n mbe min nyɛn tena gboso gboso wo tena, n ta boo a.

Mɔ dɔ gbɛɛ ee a din‑da wo ma, wo a kamincha koe a. Mɔɔ dechee mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin toen mu an ni an fandi ɔ yian, mɔ gbu gboo ta chia a. A sin, an mbe chɛ ma‑a dechee chia an na, an mbe ee kun, an ni ko yawaenɛ sa an ma chia min na, Chasi 'a kɔn gbengbandenɛ ko a.
Koe min na mu, mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ gbu, miin na kaminchaen mu, an bɛɛ gbu ee an sawa bia tena. Chɛɛ an toen mu, wo a ni kamincha, min mbe a ma, an ni tɔmbɔɛ chɛ wo gboo a.

Chɛɛ n tana, n mbe ee tɔmbɔɛ chɛ ɛnden bɛɛ a, fen dɔ mende ko a, mɔɔ dechee kɔn gbengbanden chɛ, Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi fa‑a min ma. An kɔn gbengbandenɛ chɛ, a‑a a ma gbɛ, n boo ee to dunya chɛ ma koe ɔ, dunya chɛ wɛɛ boo ee n ma koe ɔ.
An ni mɔ a kamincha, an ma i a kamincha, chɛ ma ko a, ɛnden bɛɛ a. Min mu dechee koe a, an nɛ, Yataa‑a a mɔɛ chɛ ma mɔ nama a.
Mɔɛ n gbɛɛ, miin mbe bea‑a chia chɛ fɛ, Yataa ni faachima be an ma, a ni chinchincha yian an na. Mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, an fan mu Yataa ta mɔɛ n na.
A ka gbɛ sanche ma, aan a ta, mɔ ɔ mɔ ma n ya kɔɔ tawa. Koe min na mu, paa, an mbe n gboo ma, min mbe a ɔ yian, mbɛ Chisɔsi 'a yɔnɛ mu n na.
N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi ni wo dua. A ni ma ka.

N fan Pɔɔ, n fan mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena. Chisɔsi Chasi 'a sɔ mɔɛ mu n na, yɔ Yataa toen ni buɛ min dɔ a ni ma. N fan mbe ka gboo chɛ nyɛn tena wo tena, wo wɛn mu Yataa 'a mɔɛ n na, wo wɛn mbe a a tun tena wo kai fa koe a Chisɔsi Chasi a, Ɛfisɔsi duu ɔ.
Mmɔ Fa Yataa, an fea Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi a, an 'na dua ni ma wo ma, a basan an 'na faachima a.

Tando ni be Yataa ma. A wan mu Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi fa a, ni a 'a Yataa. A wan Yataa, a‑a mmɔ dua wan dua chɛ n gbɛɛ a, miin mbe banda bu ɔ. A‑a chɛ ma, koe min na mu, mmɔ ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, mmɔ bɛ Chasi a.

A e na to dunya gbu a dan‑da wɛɛ, a na‑a ban fan gbɛ a boo sɔ‑a mmɔ ma, mmɔ ma koe a a ta mɔɛ n na, mmɔ wɛn mu mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Chisɔsi Chasi a. A na‑a chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, mmɔ ni ma a ko a tenchen, mɔɛ nu, mabɔ kan kɔ kan mbe ee miin ma. Koadia ɔ,
a ban‑da wan gbɛ a ɔ bɛn‑da suun, mmɔ ma koe a a 'a denɛ n na, Chisɔsi Chasi 'a gbasaya ɔ. Yataa toen ni an ni ma, a‑a a sin dɔ bɛn ka wan.
Mmɔ Yataa tando kamaya chia chɛ ko a, a‑a a 'a koadia demanɛ ɔ yian mmɔ a min na, a faa gbɛɛ a. A‑a chɛ sin ma, a faa ma denɛ an dɔ.
Mmɔ mu mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, mmɔ bɛ Chasi chɛ an na. A na‑a mmɔ kun ka wan, a wii chɛ a min bɔ‑a, a fa tima a. Yataa‑a a boo bɔ wan mmɔ 'a ko yama n dɔ. Yataa 'a koadia demanɛ da a ko gba.
A sin mbe an koadia chɛ, a ɔ yian fan mmɔ a, a ɔ bendenɛ a. Koe min na mu, a 'a yiinachii ɔ yansama ɔ, a 'a ko sɔn ba ɔ,
a‑a a faa ma koe ɔ yian fan mmɔ a, min dɔ nunden ni tee mmɔ ma. A toen ni chɛ an ni ma, a sin, a‑a Chasi a na, an ma koe a.
Dɔbɛnɛ an nii nɛ, Yataa ɛ min na ban‑da, ni a tima che‑a. A sin, fen kɔ fen, banda bu ɔ, ni duu gboo ma, na koe mu kaina dɔndɔɛ, mbɛ Chasi ma‑a an kun ma.

Nn ma min chɛ‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, nn bɛ Chasi a, an fɛ mu Yataa‑a a boo sɔ nn ma gbɔɔ, min mbe a ma, nn ni ma tenchen a ko a. Koe min na mu, a toen ni chɛ an ni ma, a sin‑na chɛ an dɔ bɛn. A sin, kan kɔ kan, ɛ a ma wan, yɔ a‑a a ɔ bɛn buɛ min dɔ.
Nn fan, nn fɛn ma‑a mɔɛ saa n na, nn kai fa koe a Chasi a, Yataa ban‑da gbɛ a boo sɔ‑a nn ma, tando be koe a a ma, basɔmaya wa ɛ a wɛn boo ɔ.

A sin, a ma‑a ka wan wo wɛɛ a. Wo wan, wo wɛn‑na sakana bai chɛ a min, tea mu min na, min mbe wo baun. Wo sin‑na wo kai fa wan Chisɔsi Chasi a, mbɛ a‑a Yataa Nyina a na, wo too ɔ dia‑a min na, wo kun ma fɛn koe a.

Yataa Nyina ɛ wan mmɔ fɛ. Chɛ ko a, mmɔ yii na tɛenɛ ni ma gbɛ, mbɛ ɛ fen chɛ n be‑a wan mmɔ ma, a‑a mmɔ too ɔ dia miin na. Mmɔ wɛn sin mu ka a ta mɔɛ n na, mmɔ ɛ fen chɛ n ma sɔn‑da wan, tima min‑na, ɛ mmɔ kun ka‑a gbae. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, Yataa ni tando ma sɔn, basɔmaya wa ɛ a wɛn ma.

Chɛ ko a, n ma sɛmbɛ ni, Yataa wai bɔ koe a wo ko a. Koe min na mu, n‑na a a min wo kai faen mu buɛ min dɔ Mansa Chisɔsi a. A yɛ to, wo toen mu buɛ min dɔ Yataa 'a mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a. N mbe n yii na chii wan wo a, tima ɔ tima, ni n ma‑a samunɛ chɛ‑a.

N dɔ, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi 'a Yataa a, mmɔ fa min kamayaen mu, a ni a Nyina a yii ma koe a wo fɛ. An Nyina chɛ ni a ma, wo ni yiimatɛ wa ma sɔn, koe n dɔ gbɛ koe a chɛndɛ chɛ. A yɛ to, koe miin dɔ nundenɛ ɛ, a si a ma, wo ni an dɔ gbɛ.

N mbe samunɛ chɛ tena to, Yataa ni a ma, wo ni a 'a manɛ yen, a ɔ sɔn koe a, fen chɛndɛ miin mbe a boo ɔ wo ko a. Wo wan, a‑a wo wɛn chee, ma koe a a ta mɔɛ n na. N mbe samunɛ chɛ tena to, wo ni a ɔ sɔn to, mbɛ wo too ɔ diaen mu dua miin na, an koo kaka.
N mbe samunɛ chɛ tena to, wo ni a ɔ sɔn, mmɔ wɛn kai faen mu Chisɔsi a, mbɛ Yataa 'a gbasaya mmɔ ɔ, a danka ee ɛnden bɛɛ a. An gbasaya wa dɔndɔ gbe chɛ,
a‑a a kun tɛ Chasi an dɔ, kɛn a‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, a ka saya ɔ. Mbɛ a‑a a ma, a‑a a si kaina ma bɛndenɛ banda bu ɔ, a boo nyima ɔ.
Chasi chɛ, a 'a mansaya, a 'a gbasaya, a danka ee. A benden mu fen kɔ fen ma, dunya chɛ ɔ, a basan dunya a, min bɛɛ ɛ na tena. A benden mu nyina yama n 'na mansa n gbɛɛ ma.
Yataa sin gbu, a‑a Chasi chɛ si fen kɔ fen kun ma, chɔchi ko a. A‑a fen kɔ fen don Chasi kɔɔ.
Chɔchi gbu sin, an mu Chasi gboo a. An mbe a ma, a da ni fa gban, yɔ a wandi wɛɛ, ɛ a ma buɛ min dɔ, fen kɔ fen da ɛ fa.
A saa a, wo faenɛ ni, Yataa Nyina ta fɛ chia a. Koe min na mu, wo ni koe n ma wan, miin mbe ee a chia ma, ko yama nu.

An tima chɛ a, wo ni tachɛ tena wan, wo 'a fɔɛ ɔ, wo beaenɛ ɛ dunya chɛ ɔ mɔɛ n ta chia fɛ. Nyina yama n ya ɔ sɔɛ, dunya chɛ ɔ, gbasaya ɛ min boo ɔ ben‑da banda a, wo beaen ni an fɛ. An nyina chɛ, sanche chɛ ɔ, an mbe wai chɛ tena mɔɛ n na, miin mbe ee dɔn an too ma sɔ koe a Yataa ma.

Mmɔ wɛɛ, tima dɔndɔ a, mmɔ bɛ ni wan ben‑da mmɔ bɛ an mɔ bonda chɛ n na, mmɔ ɛ bea mmɔ faa ma koe n fɛ. Mmɔ ni mmɔ yii ma koe n fan na tachɛ, a basan mɔgbuya yama a. A chia chɛ a, tɛ bɔ nii mmɔ ma, mmɔ bɛ an na. Mmɔ ni mɔɛ n fan na, Yataa ni miin tɔɔ‑a.

Chɛɛ chinchimaya koo, Yataa boo ɔ. An fɛ mu, mmɔ faen chɛ ni wɛɛ, mmɔ 'a ko yama n boo ɔ, a‑a fɔɛ nama be wan mmɔ ma, mmɔ bɛ Chasi a. A toen mu buɛ min dɔ mmɔ a, a koo. Chɛ an fɛ mu, a 'a koadia demanɛ dechee, an‑na mmɔ baun.
A sin, Yataa‑a mmɔ kɔɔ sɔ, a ka saya ɔ, mmɔ bɛ Chasi a. Mbɛ a‑a a ma to, mmɔ si‑a banda bu ɔ, mmɔ wɛn mu mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Chasi a.
Chɛ ni a ma, a ni a ɔ yian, mbɛ ɛ koadia demanɛ min chɛ‑a mmɔ a ya ɔ ma, a danka ee ma a. Chɛ sin mbe bɔ‑a chinchimaya an dɔ, Chisɔsi 'a gbasaya ɔ.
Koe min na mu, koadia demanɛ ɔ mu, wo‑a bauncha ma sɔn. A sin ma‑a koe min na mu, wo‑a wo kai fa wan Chasi a. Chɛ sin, wo wan ma a ma ni. Chɛɛ Yataa wandi, an‑na a ma wo ko a, gbama gbama a.
Wo chɛ chɛ wai nu, an fan ma a ma ni, chɛ ni ma, ɛnden bɛɛ a, mɔ ɔ mɔ ma na yonka tɛ, a si a ma.

Koe min na mu, Yataa boo gba mu mmɔ a. A‑a mmɔ a dan, koe min na mu, mɔ dɔndɔɛ mu mmɔ a, mmɔ bɛ Chisɔsi a, mmɔ chɛ chɛ wai chɛndɛ ko a. Mmɔ chɛ chɛ wai chɛ nu, Yataa‑a miin to mmɔ ya ɔ, mmɔ ni tachɛ an chia chɛ n na.

Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo wan, wo wɛn ma ka Chu mɔɛ n na, wo wo yii na chii chɛ ma. Chu mɔɛ n ni wo chee, an dɔ, Yataa sɔn bai nu, koe min na mu, wo a nii ma kamincha ni, yɔ Chu mɔɛ nu. Chɛɛ da kamincha chɛ sin, a mu dechee manda an na, mɔ gbu ɛ min na tachɛ a boo a.

Chɛ ni ma wo yii ma, mbɛ a tima chɛ a, wo tɛ duen fan ni wo bɛ Chisɔsi Chasi a. A yɛ to, wo kaen fan ni mɔɛ tɔɛ n kaa a, a bɔ kuiɛ dɔndɔya dɔbɛn chɛ ɔ Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n tɛ. A sin, wo ma‑a sonda n na, dɔbɛn nama chɛ kɔɔ, Yataa‑a Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n too ɔ dia min na. Yataa ee wo boo ɔ, dunya chɛ ɔ, wo sin yii na ma tɛ ni fen kɔ fen ma.
Wo tɛ ɔ ni yansan fan tee Yataa a. Chɛɛ sanche gbɛ, wo ma min chɛ‑a mmɔ dɔndɔɛ a Chasi a, a‑a wo ma sawan Yataa tena. Chɛ bɔ‑a a wii chɛ an dɔ, min bɔ‑a a fa tima a, mmɔ ko a.
Chasi wandi, an na‑a kuiɛ dɔndɔya a mmɔ tɛ ɔ. A‑a a ma, wo bɛ Chu mɔɛ n na, wo ma‑a gbɛ mɔ dɔndɔɛ a. A‑a a ma, kodomaya min ni mmɔ tɛ ɔ, yɔ simɛndi fɛnsi, a ban‑da. A 'a saya‑a a ma,

a‑a Chu sawa n ka wan an gba n dɔ, ni koe chɛ nu, sawa chɛ ni miin din mɔɛ n ma, an ma koe a. A toen ni, a ni Chu mɔɛ n na gbuu, an bɛ mɔɛ n na, miin ma Chu mɔ a, an ni ma mɔ nama dɔndɔɛ a, a wan Chasi ɔ. Chia chɛ a mu, a na‑a kuiɛ dɔndɔya a an tɛ ɔ.
A sin, a 'a saya kɔn gbengbanden chɛ ma, ɛ na‑a wan mmɔ chɛ‑a mmɔ nyɔn dɔ, mmɔ bɛ Yataa a, mmɔ ni ma kuiɛ dɔndɔya ɔ. Chɛ an mbe a ma‑a, kodomaya chɛ ni ban.
A sin, a na‑a wan, a‑a sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian wo a, wo wɛn nii Yataa baima, a basan chɛ n na, miin gbɛndenɛ ni Yataa ma.
Chasi an‑na a ma, Chu mɔɛ nu, ni miin ma Chu mɔ a, mmɔ bɛ, mmɔ ɛ si mmɔ Fa Yataa chen kɔɔ. Mmɔ‑a chia chɛ ma sɔn Yataa Nyina 'a gbasaya an dɔ.
Chɛ an fɛ mu gbɛ, wo wan, wo wɛn ma ka Chu mɔ a, sonda ma to wo a, ben‑da dechee chia a, Yataa waa a. Chɛɛ wo e wan gbɛ yɔ mɔɛ nu, nn bɛ suun‑da miin na chɛnyɛ dɔndɔ gbe ɔ, Yataa 'a mɔɛ nu.

Wo sin, wo kuu sien fan mu gban, yɔ chenɛ. Chisɔsi Chasi 'a sɔ mɔɛ nu, an bɛ Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n na, an fan‑na a ma, mbɛ wo kuu si‑a. Chen chɛ gbu sin, a sɔ senɛ kuu ba mu Chisɔsi Chasi wandi an na.
Yataa 'a mɔɛ n gbɛɛ, an mbe wan yɔ chen dɔndɔ gbe, koe min na mu, mɔ dɔndɔɛ mu an na, an bɛ Chasi a. A sin, ɛ koa‑a wan, a ni ma tenchen Mansa Yataa 'a chenɛ a.
Wo wandi gbu wɛɛ, mɔ dɔndɔɛ mu wo a, wo bɛ Chasi a. Chɛ ko a, ɛ wo a tun tena wan, wo bɛ Yataa 'a mɔɛ tɔɛ n na, wo ni ma yɔ a 'a chenɛ, ɛ ma kaina min a Nyina 'a gbasaya ɔ.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, n fan Pɔɔ, n mbe samunɛ chɛ tena wo ko a. N fɛn mu ka, n mbe sa ɔ pimbi chenɛ a, koe min na mu, n mbe wai chɛ tena Chisɔsi Chasi ye wo ko a, wo wɛn ma ka Chu mɔ a.
Mmɔ a ya wɛ, mbɛ wo‑a a a min fan, Yataa‑a n ma buɛ min dɔ wai chɛ mɔɛ a, a ko a. Wo wan ko a mu, a‑a koadia deman chɛ chɛ n na.
N‑na a sima ɔ yian fan wo a gboo ɔ, a si koe chɛ ma, min dɔ nunden ni, Yataa‑a a ɔ yian buɛ min dɔ n na.
Ni wo‑a gboo nyɛnden chɛ kan, wo yii ɛ ta‑a wan nɔ, mbɛ n‑na koe chɛ n dɔ gbɛ wan, a si Chisɔsi Chasi ma.
Suun, koe n fan nɛ, miin dɔ nii yian mɔ gbama n na. Yataa Nyina‑a a ɔ yian fan mɔɛ n na, miin mbe tenchen Yataa ko a. A‑a a ɔ yian Chasi 'a sɔ mɔɛ n na, an bɛ Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n na.

Yataa‑a dɔbɛn chɛ an yian an na. Mbɛ Chisianɛ miin ma Chu mɔ a, an mbe an ta ma sɔn‑da wan dua gbɛɛ ɔ, Yataa ɛ min be. Ɛ ma‑a wan dechee yɔ Chisianɛ nu, miin mu Chu mɔɛ n na, an mbe a ma sɔn‑da buɛ min dɔ. Mɔɛ miin ma Chu mɔ a, an ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, an bɛ Chu mɔɛ n na. Yataa‑a a 'a mɔɛ n too ɔ dia min na, mɔɛ miin ma Chu mɔ a, an bɛɛ an mbe a ma sɔn‑da wan. Koe min na mu, an mu mɔ dɔndɔɛ an na Chisɔsi Chasi a. Yataa 'a sakana bai chɛndɛ‑a a fɔ ka wan.
Sakana bai chɛ, an ko a mu, Yataa‑a n ma a 'a sɔ mɔɛ a. Chɛ bɔ‑a a 'a koadia demanɛ an dɔ, n‑na min ma sɔn, a 'a gbasaya ɔ.

N fan, n fɛn ma wɛɛ ka mɔ a tenden na, Yataa 'a mɔɛ n gbɛɛ tɛ ɔ, chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, a‑a koadia deman chɛ chɛ n fan na. A ɔ, Chisɔsi na‑a ko chɛndɛ miin ma, n ni a ɔ yian chɛ n na, miin ma Chu mɔ a. An ko chɛndɛ chɛ nu, koe n fan nɛ, miin nyin a danka ee.
A sin, n ni a ma to, mbɛ mɔɛ n gbɛɛ ni koe ɔ gbɛ, a si koe chɛ ma, Yataa‑a min dɔ nun kɛn a‑a dunya a dan suun tima min na.

A‑a chɛ ma, min mbe a ma sanche, a ni a ɔ yian nyina yama n na, an bɛ an ya ɔ sɔɛ n na, gbasaya ɛ miin boo ɔ banda a, mbɛ yiimatɛ koo a ɔ kaka. A‑a chɛ ɔ yian an na koe n fan dɔ, a‑a miin chɛ chɔchi ko a.
Yataa‑a a ɔ bɛn chɛ ma koe a suun pɔɔ, a e na to dunya chɛ a dan‑da. A sin, a‑a chɛ ma, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi an dɔ.
Mmɔ kai faen fan mu a a, an fɛ mu, mmɔ dɔndɔɛ mu mmɔ a, mmɔ bɛ a a. Chia a kaen fan mu mmɔ ya ɔ Yataa tena, mmɔ sin mbe sɔ wan a chen kɔɔ, chian mbe ee ma mmɔ ya a.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo dimu, wo faa ma yɔn, a si tɔɔya chɛ ma, n mbe min chɛ tena wo ko a. A gbu sin ni na basɔmaya a wo tena.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, n mbe n kumbai gbangban tena mmɔ Fa Yataa chen kɔɔ.
Mmɔ Fa chɛ sin, dambi kan kɔ kan, banda bu ɔ, ni nɛ dunya chɛ ɔ, a wan mbe an sɔnɛ be.
Dua sɛsɛ ɛ wan a boo ɔ, banda bu ɔ. A sin, n mbe samunɛ chɛ tena, a ni a ma wo ɔ ni gbɛa, wo 'a danaya ɔ. Chɛ ni ma, Yataa Nyina 'a gbasaya ɔ
A sin ni a ma to, Chasi wakoe ni ma wo faa ɔ, koe min na mu, wo‑a wo kai fa a a. N mbe samunɛ chɛ tena, wo ni sɔ gban koadia ɔ, wo ni yɛ, wo ɔ ni gbɛa chɛndɛ chɛ.
Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, wo ni a ɔ gbɛ chɛndɛ chɛ, wo 'a koadia da a koo buɛ min dɔ Chasi faa ɔ. A yɛ to, Yataa 'a mɔɛ tɔɛ n gbɛɛ, an bɛɛ ni a ɔ gbɛ a buɛ chɛ ɔ.
A gbu sin nyin, n mbe samunɛ chɛ tena, wo ni a 'a koadia a tinsɔn. Chɛɛ a gbu sin, a ma koe a, mɔɛ ee min dɔ gbɛ, ɛnden bɛɛ a. Chɛ sin fan fɛ mu, wo sɔnɛ n ni ma yɔ Yataa wandi gbu ta.
Mmɔ Yataa tando, min 'na gbasaya ɛ wai chɛ tena mmɔ ɔ. A gbasaya ɛ wan Yataa boo ɔ, koe n ma koe a mmɔ yii nii miin dɔ. Ɛ koe n ma wan, miin koo an ni ben chɛ n ma, mmɔ ɛ a ɔ tisa miin ma koe a.
Mmɔ wɛn mbe chɔchi ɔ, miin mu mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, mmɔ bɛ Chisɔsi Chasi a, mmɔ Yataa tando tima ɔ tima ko a, kuɔ fɔ ni kuɔ fɔ ko a. A ni ma ka.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, n fan, n fɛn mbe ka bia ɔ, Mansa Chisɔsi ko a, n mbe wo disa tena wo ni chɛ ma. Yataa‑a wo chee ka buɛ min dɔ a ta mɔɛ n na, wo ma an fɔɛ ɔ, min ma biaen mu an chee chɛ ko a.
Tima ɔ tima ko a, wo ni wo wandi ma yii, wo faa ma gbandia, wo sin ni wo faa bia. Wo wo faa bia wo nyɔn na. Wo e kun‑da wan koadia yian‑da.
Yataa Nyina‑a wo ma mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo ko ɔ ko ma, wo e che min ma koe a, wo ni ma faa chima ɔ, tima ɔ tima ko a.
Mmɔ gbɛɛ, mmɔ dɔndɔɛ mu mmɔ a, yɔ Chasi gboo ɛ buɛ min dɔ. Koe min na mu, Yataa Nyina, min mbe mmɔ fɛ, ɛ dɔndɔ gbe. Ɛ ka wan dechee, yɔ yiinatɛ chɛ wɛɛ, Yataa‑a mmɔ chee min ko a, a sin mbe mmɔ ɔ.
A yɛ to, mmɔ 'a mansa ɛ dɔndɔ gbe, mmɔ kai fa tena ɛ dɔndɔ gbe, yii chɛ wɛɛ, Yataa chia a, ɛ dɔndɔ gbe.
A sin, mmɔ gbɛɛ, mmɔ Fa, Yataa ɛ dɔndɔ gbe. A sin, a wan 'na gbasaya ɛ mmɔ gbɛɛ kun ma, a yɛ to, a wan mbe wai chɛ mmɔ ɔ, mbɛ a ma‑a mmɔ gbɛɛ fɛ.
Chɛɛ mmɔ gbɛɛ, Chasi‑a koadia demanɛ chɛ wan mmɔ a, dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a, yɔ ɛ mɔɛ n kɔ buɛ min dɔ a faa ma a.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, a nyɛnden mu Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, “A sɛ‑a kɛn aan, a sɛ‑a, a na‑a mɔ sɛsɛ chɛ wan bia ɔ, a sɛ‑a an na. A sin, a‑a boo fenɛ sɛsɛ be wan mɔɛ n ma.”
A fɔ koe chɛ, “a sɛ‑a aan, a sɛ‑a” a ma sɔ ni ko dɔ mende ko a. Chɛɛ a fɔenɛ an nɛ, mbɛ Chasi e na to sɛ‑a, a na‑a yii wan faa mɔɛ n tena, duu gboo kɔɔ.
A wɛn na‑a yii ka duu gboo kɔɔ, a wan sɛ‑a to aan, a sɛ kaina, min dɔ yansan kaina tɔɛ gbɛɛ ma. Chɛ ni a ma, Chasi ni a ma, fen kɔ fen dunya ɔ, a da ni fa.

A wan‑na koadia demanɛ chɛ mɔɛ n na, ma koe dama dama. A‑a mɔɛ dɔ n ma a 'a sɔ mɔɛ n na, mbɛ a‑a dɔ n ma Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n na. Dɔ n sin, a‑a an ma Yataa bai sa mɔɛ n na, mbɛ a‑a gbasaya be dɔ n sin ma, an bɔɛ n sɔ koe a chia ma, a basan an kan koe a Yataa bai a.
A‑a chɛ n ma, min mbe a ma, mmɔ wɛn mu ka Yataa 'a mɔɛ n na, mmɔ ma ni bɛn an wai chɛ koe a. Chɛ ni a ma, mmɔ ɔ ni gbɛa gbau gbau, mmɔ wɛn mu Chasi gboo a.
Chɛ an mbe ma‑a, aan mmɔ gbɛɛ ni Yataa 'a denɛ wakoe ɔ gbɛ, mbɛ mmɔ‑a mmɔ kai fa a a, mmɔ ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a. Mbɛ mmɔ 'a mɔgbuya da fa‑a, a ni che Chasi wandi gbu ta ɔ, a da faenɛ ɛ gban.
Chɛ an mbe a ma‑a, mmɔ ee ma‑a yɔ den mɛsɛ nu, an mbe miin woo, fania fania kanɛ kan kɔ kan na. Mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin yaaen mu ka, an fan mbe an bun ka, yaa chia a.
Chɛɛ mmɔ ɛ min ma, mmɔ tea fɔ, koadia ta fɛ chia a. Mmɔ ni koa chia ɔ chia a, Chasi ta chia a, a wɛn mu mmɔ kun ti a.

Chasi an mbe na a 'a mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a kaina dɔndɔɛ. Ɛ wan dechee yɔ mɔ gbu gboo, ni a sɔna nu, an gbɛɛ‑a tun tunden mu buɛ min dɔ. Fasa mɛsɛ chɛ nu, miin mbe an dɔ, an tɛ ma tɛ ni, a sin an mbe wai chɛ kuiɛ dɔndɔya an dɔ. Ni an gbɛɛ ma‑a wai chɛ‑a chɛndɛ chɛ, mbɛ mɔ gbu gboo koa‑a, a ɔ gbɛa‑a gbechen. Mɔɛ n bɛɛ, miin mbe chɔchi ɔ, ni an to‑a an nyɔn na, an ni wai chɛ kuiɛ dɔndɔya ɔ, chɔchi ɛ koa wan Chasi 'a gbasaya ɔ.

Sanche gbɛ, n mbe chɛ an fɔ tena, n ni a kɔ din, Mansa Chisɔsi 'a gbasaya ɔ. Wo ma ma, yɔ mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin ma Yataa sɔn, an mbe koe n ma buɛ min dɔ. An mbe an yii na chii buɛ min dɔ, wooya wa an mbe a ɔ.

An mbe an yii na chii buɛ min dɔ, an mbe pimbi an dɔ, koe ɔ gbɛ koe a ɛnden bɛɛ a. Kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ee an boo ɔ, Yataa ɛ min be. Chɛ sien mu an 'na ko sɔn baiya an ma. Koe min na mu, an faa a kɔɔen mu kaka.
An ma‑a gbɛ mɔɛ n na, ko ee miin faa gbaa, a sin, an‑na an kunɛ a fuin gbɛ ko yama ma koe a. An ma bɛndenɛ mu, tima ɔ tima ko a, ko yama ma koe a.
Chɛɛ wo nii ma kan ni ko bonda chɛ n fan na, a si Chasi ma.

Wo wandi gbu‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ an‑na bai sa wan wo tena, a si a ma. A sin, an‑na wo kan fan, wo ma koe a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, wo bɛ Chasi chɛ a. Tea chɛ sin, sakana chɛndɛ chɛ, ɛ min fɔ, a sien mu a wan Chisɔsi an ma.

Wo kan‑da wan, mbɛ wo ni wo sɔn kɔma chɛ n boo ka. Wo sɔn chɛ nu, miin beaen mu, wo tachɛ buɛ kɔma chɛ n fɛ, fɔɛ ɔ. A tima chɛ a, wo wakoe ni yɔn tena wan gbata gbata. Koe min na mu, wo toen ni ko yama n fan ma koe a, a sin, an ko yama chɛ ni wo bun tena wan.
Wo ma yɔ mɔ nama nu, yiinachii n dɔ, wo e miin chɛ.
Wo sɔnɛ nama n ya, yɔ mɔɛ nu, miin nyanden mu Yataa bɔ nyɔɛ n na. A‑a wo nyan wo ni ma mɔ tandenɛ n na, miin mbe tenchen a ko a. Koe chɛ n mbe bɔ tea an dɔ.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo wo boo bɔ fania fɔɛ ɔ. Wo gbɛɛ, wo tea fɔ wo nyɔn ye. Koe min na mu, mmɔ gbɛɛ, mmɔ mu gboo dɔndɔɛ an na, Chasi ɔ.
Wo faa ni tɛ wɛɛ, wo ma ko yama ma. Wo faa gbu sin, a ma tɛ, a ka sauma ma, aan tee ni bea.
Wo ma na chia yian Sitana a, wai chɛ koe a.

Mɔɛ min mbe kanka chɛ, a ma a chɛ to. Chɛɛ ɛ min ma, a ni a gboo be wai chɛ koe a. A ni wai chɛ tea chia a, a boo fea a. Chɛ an mbe a ma‑a, a bɔɛ chɛ nu, fen mbe ee miin boo ɔ, a ni kun basan koe an ma.
Ni wo ma‑a koɔ‑a, bai yama ma bɔ wo da ɔ. Chɛɛ bai miin nyin dechee a fɔ koe a, a tima chɛ kɔɔ, wo e an fan fɔ. Bai chɛ nu, miin mbe mɔɛ n faa ma nande, a yɛ to, miin mbe basan an ma.
Wo sin ma a ma, Yataa Nyina faa ni yɔn. An mbe a ɔ yian, mbɛ Yataa an ta mu wo a, aan tee chɛ ko a, wo e bauncha ma sɔn‑da tee min ma.
Faa yama gbɛɛ, faagbandia gbɛɛ, faatɛ gbɛɛ, wo wo boo bɔ an gbɛɛ ɔ. A yɛ to, gbonyɛ wa gbɛɛ, nyɔn ma bɔ wa gbɛɛ, ni toomaya wa, wo an boo ka.

A sin to, wo faa ni nyan wo nyɔn ko a, wo ni ko chɛndɛ ma wo nyɔn na. A yɛ to, wo ni wo boo bɔ ko yama n dɔ, wo bɔɛ n mbe miin ma wo a, yɔ Yataa‑a a ma buɛ min dɔ, Chisɔsi Chasi ɔ, ɛ a boo bɔ wo 'a ko yama n dɔ.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo mu ka buɛ min dɔ Yataa faa ma denɛ n na, a nyin gbu wo ni butuin chɛ, wo ni a sɔnɛ ya.
Koadia faa ni ma wo ɔ, yɔ Chasi to‑a buɛ min dɔ mmɔ a. A sin, a‑a a wandi fɔɛ be wan mmɔ ko a, a ma‑a yɔ yasi, min mbe Yataa faa chima.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo ma dɛ waa ma basanɛ ɔ, ni wo ee wɛ fuu ɔ. A yɛ to, maumaya ko tɛ, chɛ ma, fenkoya wa kaka. Chɛ ma nyin Yataa 'a mɔɛ n ko a, miin mbe tenchen a ko a.
Wo ma maumaya ko ma, wo gbu sin ma kun dɔ ban bai sa. A yɛ to, wo ma damba dambaya koe ma. Koe chɛ n dɔndɔ wɛɛ, a ma ma bɛn ni an ma koe a. Chɛɛ wo e min ma, tima ɔ tima ko a, wo Yataa wai bɔ.

Wo dan chɛ a, mbɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ, ko yama‑a min dɔ chɛ chɛ, a ee don‑da mansaya kɔɔ, Chasi ɛ min dɔ, an fea Yataa a. Wo ma ma mɔɛ n na, miin mbe waa ma basan, an ma dɛ ni fuu ɔ tima min na. Chɛ ma, wo ni ma mɔɛ n na, miin mbe maumaya koe tɛ, an sin fenkoyaen mu, an mbe an boo fenɛ n ya yɔ Yataa.
Koe chɛ nu, an fan mbe a ma, Yataa ɛ faatɛ a bɔ mɔɛ chɛ n ma, miin mbe ee a kuiɛ ma. Mɔ ɔ mɔ kan kɔ kan, a ma daɔdia bai gbama n fɔ wo ye, wo bun koe a.
Chɛ an gbu fɛ mu, wo ma bea an mɔ bonda chɛ n fɛ.
Koe min na mu, wo ni wan tee pimbi ɔ, chɛɛ sanche gbɛ wo e wan manɛ kɔɔ. Koe min na mu, wo ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Mansa Chisɔsi a. A nyin wo tachɛ buɛ ni bɔ mɔɛ n na, miin mbe manɛ kɔɔ.
Koe min na mu, a ɔ ɛ yen ka wan, mbɛ mɔɛ ɛ wan manɛ kɔɔ. Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe manɛ chɛ kɔɔ, ɛ ko chɛndɛ an ma tea tea ɔ, a sin, a tanden mu Yataa tena.
Wo sin, wo a ma wo ma gbɔsɔɛ a, wo ni koe n sɔn, miin mbe Mansa Chisɔsi faa chima.
Wo ma wo boo chɛ ko ɔ pimbienɛ ɔ, miin mbe ee den chɛndɛ suun. Chɛɛ an ko bonda chɛ nu, wo a ma mɔɛ n ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ an ma nyin.
A gbu sin ma mauen ba mu, mɔɛ ɛ ma bai sa‑a, a si an koe chɛ n ma, an mbe miin ma nun dɔ.
Ni manɛ sɔ‑a fen kɔ fen na, mbɛ an fen chɛ yen‑da gbadan.

A sin gbu, fen kɔ fen min mbe yen‑da gbadan, an mu manɛ a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “Wo wo kɔɔ sɔ, wo wɛn mbe sa ɔ chinɔɛ ɔ, mbɛ wo‑a wo kɔɔ sɔ a ka saya ɔ, a sin, Chasi ɛ a 'a manɛ be‑a wo ma.”
Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo wo tachɛ buɛ ma mɛn. Wo ma koe ma, yɔ mɔɛ miin kunɛ ee nɔ, chɛɛ wo a ma, yɔ mɔɛ miin 'na yiimatɛ da a koo.
Ni wo‑a gbasaya ma sɔn tima ɔ tima ko chɛndɛ ma koe a, wo a ma. Koe min na mu, ko yama ma koa‑a gbɛ sanche.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo ma ma woo mɔɛ n na. Chɛɛ wo butuin chɛ, wo ni Mansa Chisɔsi faa ma koe ɔ gbɛ.
A sin, wo wo boo bɔ gbɛ min ba ɔ, a ma na wo wakoe ɔ chɛ chɛ. Chɛɛ Yataa Nyina, an ni tachɛ gbɛ wo a.
Wo ni koe ma ka wo nyɔn tɛ ɔ. Wo si kan kɔ kan sa Yataa ye, a ɛ tando min dɔ. Wo si a diama n na bɔ Yataa tena, wo faa gbɛɛ a.
Tima ɔ tima ko a, mmɔ Yataa wai bɔ, mmɔ Fa. Mmɔ a wai bɔ fen kɔ fen ko a. Mmɔ chɛ ma, Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi tɔɛ ɔ.
Wo chian‑da ka buɛ min dɔ Chasi ma, wo don wo nyɔn kɔɔ.
Wo wan fuu musu nu, wo don wo chɛɛ n kɔɔ, yɔ wo donden mu buɛ min dɔ Mansa Chisɔsi kɔɔ.
Koe min na mu, gbasaya ɛ wan mɔ kaima boo ɔ, a 'a musu kun ma, yɔ gbasaya ɛ buɛ min dɔ Chasi boo ɔ, chɔchi kun ma. Chasi wandi gbu sin, an mbe mɔɛ n gbɛɛ baun chɔchi ɔ, miin maen mu yɔ a gboo wandi.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, a nyin musu ni don a chɛɛ kɔɔ, chia kan kɔ kan na, yɔ chɔchi mɔɛ n donden mu buɛ min dɔ Chasi kɔɔ.
Musu si kai nu, wo to wo 'a musu n na, yɔ Chasi to‑a buɛ min dɔ chɔchi a, mbɛ a‑a a fɔɛ be a ko a.
A‑a chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, a ni a ma, mɔɛ miin mbe chɔchi ɔ, an ni ma tenchen Yataa ko a. A ni an ko fion, yii a, mbɛ a‑a a da a bai sa an yii kun ma.

Chɛ ni a ma, a ni chɔchi yian a wandi gbu a, a nyandenɛ ɛ chɛndɛ chɛ. Tɔmbɛ ee ma‑a a ma, a wakoe ɔ sisienɛ ee ma‑a, ko kan kɔ kan mbe ee ma‑a a ma. Mɔ ɔ mɔ ma a fɔ, mbɛ ɛ ka wan, chɛɛ ɛ ma‑a tenchen Chasi an ko a.
A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, mɔ kaima n ni to an 'na musu n na chɛndɛ chɛ, yɔ an toen mu buɛ min dɔ an gboo a. Mɔɛ min toen mu a 'a musu a, a toen mu ka a wandi gbu an na.
Koe min na mu, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee nɔ, min mbe toomaya sɔ a wandi gboo ma. Chɛɛ ɛ to wan a a, a ni a bia chɛndɛ chɛ, yɔ Chasi ɛ a ma buɛ min dɔ chɔchi ko a.
Koe min na mu, mmɔ maen fan mu yɔ a sɔna nu, a gboo chɛ ko a.
A nyɛnden fan mu Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ “Chɛ an ko a mu, mɔ kaima ɛ a de to‑a wan, a ni a fa to, an ni chɛ an nyɔn dɔ, an fea a 'a musu a. A sin, an fea chɛ, an mbe ma‑a wan mɔ dɔndɔɛ a.”
Ko wa dɛgbɛ, an dɔ nundenɛ ɛ ka. Chɛɛ n mbe a fɔ tena, mbɛ a sien mu Chasi an ma, an fea chɔchi a.
