Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, bai chɛ n mbe wan wo wɛɛ ko a. Mɔ ɔ mɔ ni to a 'a musu a, yɔ a toen mu buɛ min dɔ a wandi gbu a. Musu n sin, an ni a ɔ yen, mbɛ chianɛ ɛ wan an dɔ, an chɛɛ n ko a.
Wo wan denɛ nu, wo ma‑a ka buɛ min dɔ mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, wo bɛ Mansa Chisɔsi a, wo kooya be wo woo mɔɛ n ma. Chɛ an nyin a ma koe a.
Yataa 'a sawa saa saa, an nɛ, tooɔdia saen mu min kun ma. A ɔ, “Wo kooya be wo fa ma, a basan wo de a,
min mbe a ma, dunya ni nyan wo ko a, mbɛ wo mɛ‑a fɔɛ ɔ, dunya chɛ ɔ.”
Wo wan, wo wɛn mu denɛ n fa n na, wo ma a ma, an faa ni tɛ. Chɛɛ wo an bɔ a ɔ chɛndɛ chɛ, an ni kanɛ sɔn, Mansa Chisɔsi ta chia a.
Wo wan yɔnɛ nu, wo kooya be wo ti n ma. Wo chian an ma, a sin, masamba ni ma wo ɔ an ko a. Wo kooya be an ma wo faa gbɛɛ a, yɔ wo e a be buɛ min dɔ Chisɔsi Chasi ma.
Wo ma chɛ ma dechee an ya kɔɔɛ ma wan, an faa chima koe a mɔgbuya ɔ. Chɛɛ wo a ma, wo faa gbɛɛ a, yɔ Chasi 'a yɔnɛ nu, miin mbe Yataa faa ma koe ma.
Wo wai chɛ wo faa gbɛɛ a, yɔ wo e ma ka a chɛ‑a Mansa Chisɔsi an ye. Wo ma a ya, mbɛ wo e ma ka a chɛ‑a wo fian mɔ gbu an ye.
Wo ni a ɔ sɔn, ko chɛndɛ kan kɔ kan, mɔɛ ɛ min ma, Mansa Chisɔsi ɛ a nyɔn sima tɔnɔnɛ be wan a ma. Chɛ ɛ ma wan, a mɔɛ chɛ ni ma yɔn fan na, chɛ ma, a ni ma mɔ dɔ mende wɛɛ a.

Wo wan yɔn ti nu, wo wɛɛ, wo wo 'a yɔnɛ n bia a buɛ chɛ ɔ. Wo sɛmbɛ a ma koe a, tima ɔ tima ko a, an ni chian wo ma. Wo ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ wo bɛ an na, wo e min ko a, ɛ banda bu ɔ wan. A sin, a ee mɔ gbu n tɛ bɔ, ɛnden bɛɛ a.
N ni a fɔ gbɛ wo ye, mbɛ wo ɔ ni gbɛa, koe min na mu, mɔ dɔndɔɛ mu wo a, wo bɛ Mansa Chisɔsi a. Gbasaya wa min nyɔn sima ɛ a ɔ, a ni ma wo ɔ.
Wo ni Yataa 'a chɛɛ chɛ fenɛ n gbɛɛ bia. Chɛ an mbe a ma‑a, wo ni che sɔ‑a chidi, Sitana ee che‑a wo bɔ‑a a 'a yaa yaa koe n na.

Koe min na mu, mmɔ ee butuinɛ chɛ tena mmɔ fian mɔ gbu n fan na, chɛɛ mmɔ ɛ a chɛ tena nyina yama n fan na. An fan mu ya ɔ sɔɛ n na, gbasaya ɛ miin boo ɔ kaina nu, banda a. A sin, an pimbi bundenɛ ɛ dunya chɛ kun ma.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo wo ma chii gbae, Yataa 'a chɛɛ chɛ koe a. Chɛ an mbe a ma‑a, wo ni kun sɔ‑a gban, ko yama ma tee chɛ kɔɔ. A ni a ma, wo ni butuinɛ chɛ, aan a danka a, wo e sɔ ɔ chidi.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo sɔ gban, wo ni tea ɔ gbɛ a si Yataa ma. A sin ni ma yɔ yuu wo bu tɛ. Wo ma nyina, mbɛ Yataa‑a wo ya mɔ tandenɛ n na a tena. Chɛ ɛ wo konde gbain‑da wan, yɔ soya 'a chɛɛ chɛ doma.
Sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ, min mbe faa chima be, ɛ a ma‑a wan wo ma bɛndenɛ ni ma. A ni ma yɔ kɔɔwa wo chenɛ a.

A ka chɛ gbɛɛ ma, wo wo kai fa Chisɔsi Chasi a, tima ɔ tima ko a. Chɛ ɛ ma‑a wan, yɔ chɛɛ chɛ fenɛ wo boo a, min mbe a ma, soya mɔ dɔ gbɛɛ ee che wo sɔɔ‑a. Chɛ ɛ wo konde gbain‑da wan chia gbɛɛ a, an nyina yama, Sitana ɛ bɔ miin na.
Wo dan chɛ a chɛndɛ chɛ, mbɛ Yataa‑a wo baun. A ni ma yɔ chɛɛ chɛ banfua, wo kunɛ a. Mbɛ Yataa 'a bai sin, a ma‑a wo boo a chɛɛ chɛ mɛ a, Yataa Nyina 'a gbasaya ɔ.

Wo samunɛ chɛ, tima ɔ tima ko a, Yataa Nyina ɛ wo sɔ‑a buɛ min dɔ chia ma. Wo 'a samunɛ sin gbɛɛ ɔ, wo Yataa ɔ tisa, a ni basan wo ma. Chɛ ko a, ko ɔ ko ma a ma, wo gboo ɔ ni fa. Ni wo sin ma‑a samunɛ chɛ‑a tima ɔ tima ko a, wo a chɛ Yataa 'a mɔɛ n gbɛɛ ko a.

Wo samunɛ chɛ to, n bɛɛ ko a. Yataa ɛ bai don‑da wan n da ɔ, n mbe min fɔ. A ni a ma, chianɛ ma na ma n dɔ, n da a ka koe a, n ni bai sa mɔɛ n tena, a si sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ma, min dɔ nunden ni mmɔ ma a kɔma a.
Koe min na mu, bai chɛ an ko a mu ka, n mbe sa ɔ pimbi chenɛ a. Wo samunɛ chɛ n ko a, min mbe a ma, n ni koɔ mɔɛ gbɛɛ tena, faagbɛa ɔ, yɔ a nyin n ni koɔ buɛ min dɔ.

N toen mu wo wɛɛ ni a ɔ sɔn, n mbe buɛ min dɔ sanche nɛ. Chɛ an fɛ mu, n mbe Tikikɔsi a na tena wo tena, a ni ko ɔ ko ɔ yian wo a, min mbe si tena n na. Mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ an nɛ, min ko a di n ye, a sin, ɛ wai chɛ tena wan Mansa Chisɔsi ye, teaya ɔ.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, n mbe a sɔ tena wo tena, a ni a ɔ yian wo a, nn gbɛɛ, nn mbe buɛ min dɔ sanche nɛ. A yɛ to, a ni wo faa n ma nande.
Fa Yataa, an fea Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi a, an ni faa chima be wo ma, wo wan suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ. An ni koadia yian wo a, a sin, wo ni wo kai fa an na.
Koadia ɛ miin gbɛɛ faa ɔ, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi ko a, koadia min mbe ee danka kuɔ fɔ, Yataa ni an gbɛɛ dua.

N fan Pɔɔ, n fan mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena, nn fea Timoti a. Chisɔsi Chasi 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ mu nn na. Nn fan mbe ka gboo chɛ nyɛn tena wo tena, wo wɛn mu Yataa 'a mɔɛ n na, miin ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Chisɔsi Chasi a, Fiipai duu ɔ. A yɛ to, ni chɔchi ya ɔ sɔɛ n tena, an bɛ mɔɛ chɛ n na, miin mbe deman chɔchi ma.
Mmɔ Fa Yataa, an fea Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi a, an 'na dua ni ma wo ma, a basan an 'na faachima a.
Tima ɔ tima, ni n‑na n yii na chii wo a, n mbe n 'na Yataa wai bɔ wan.
A sin, tima ɔ tima, ni n ma‑a samunɛ chɛ‑a wo gbɛɛ ko a, n mbe a chɛ buɔdia an dɔ.
Koe min na mu, a ka tee saa saa ma, aan sanche, wo e basan tena wan n ma, sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a che koe a mɔɛ n ma.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, n danden fan mu a a, mbɛ Yataa boo ɛ ka gbɛ buɛ min dɔ wo baun koe ɔ, a ee sɛmbɛ‑a to. A ɛ wo baun‑da wan, aan a ni che a danka a gbɔdɛ, aan Chisɔsi Chasi na tima a to.

A nyin yiinachii chɛ sima ni ma n dɔ, a si wo ma. Koe min na mu, wo wakoe ɛ wan n faa ɔ. A mu min na, wo gbɛɛ, wo e basan tena wan n ma, wai chɛndɛ chɛ chɛ koe a, Yataa‑a min be n ma, a chɛ koe a. Wo basan‑da wan n ma, tima min na n ni ben‑da sɔ‑a sawa ti n na, sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ko a, a kɔ ni gbɛa. A sin to, n mbe wɛɛ ka sa ɔ pimbi chenɛ a sanche, wo e basan tena wan n ma.
Koe min na mu, n toen mu wo a, yɔ Chisɔsi Chasi 'a koadia ɛ buɛ min dɔ. Yataa wandi an mu n 'na siiya a, ni tea ma chɛ a.
A sin, chɛ an mu samunɛ a, n mbe min chɛ tena, mbɛ koadia min mbe wo faa ɔ, a ma ni munda tima ɔ tima ko a. A yɛ to, yiima ni ma wo ɔ, wo ni koe n tɛ bɔɛ sɔn,
min mbe a ma, wo ni a ɔ sɔn koe min nyin chɛndɛ chɛ Yataa chen kɔɔ, mabɔ kan kɔ kan mbe ee min ma. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, Chasi na tee ma, mabɔ ee na‑a ma‑a wo ma, ko yama kan kɔ kan ko a.
Chisɔsi Chasi 'a gbasaya ɔ, wo sɔnɛ a dondandenɛ ni ma. Chɛ an mbe ma tando a, Yataa tena, a basan basɔmaya a.
N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, n toen mu wo ni chɛ ɔ gbɛ. Mbɛ koe gbɛɛ, miin sien mu n na, an gbu an‑na a ma, sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a si Chisɔsi ma, a ta‑a ya ɔ ma.

Chɛ‑a a ma gbɛ, mɔɛ gbɛɛ, an‑na a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ n mbe sa ɔ pimbi chenɛ min na, Chasi an fɛ mu. Soya chɛ n gbɛɛ nɛ, miin mbe Domi kun ti wa 'a kata kun ma fɛn, an‑na chɛ ɔ sɔn fan, a basan mɔ sɛsɛ dɔ gbɛɛ n bɛɛ a nɛ.
N mbe sa ɔ pimbi chenɛ min sin na, Mansa Chisɔsi‑a a ma gbɛ, n suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ n sɛsɛ Chasi ɔ, an faa sɔ‑a gbɛ a ko a. An mbe ee chian to ɛnden bɛɛ a, a 'a sakana bai chɛ ɔ yian koe a mɔɛ n na.
An dɔ n gbu, an mbe sakana chɛ, a si Chasi ma, a ɔ yian toomaya faa an na, a basan koɔ yanɛ a. Chɛɛ an dɔ n sin, an mbe a ma, yiinachii chɛndɛ an na.
Mɔɛ dankama chɛ nu, koadia an mbe a ma, an mbe bai chɛ sa ka. Ɛ ma wan an yii ma, n mbe ka nɛ sa ɔ pimbi chenɛ min na, sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ an ko a mu, n sɔ‑a min ko a.
Chɛɛ mɔɛ saa chɛ n sin, an mbe ee a sa tena faa ɔ gbɛ an na, an gbɔsɔen mu dechee an fandi an ko a. An ta yiinachii ɔ, an dɔ, an ni a ma, n 'na mɔnɛ ma ni munda pimbi chen chɛ a nɛ.
Chɛ ma faagbaa a, n tena. N buɔdia koe mu, an mbe ma ka dechee sakana bai chɛ ɔ yian‑da, a si Chasi ma. A ni ma tea chia an na, a ni ma fania chia wɛɛ a. Tea gbu sin ko a, n mbe buɔdia bɔ‑a wan.
Koe min na mu, wo e samunɛ min chɛ n ko a, ɛ a ma‑a wan, n kunɛ ni bɔ a ɔ. A sin to, Chisɔsi Chasi Nyina wɛɛ, ɛ deman chɛ chɛ‑a wan n na.

A mu min na, ɛ wan n 'na yiinatɛ ɔ, ni n 'na yiinachii, mbɛ n mbe ee na‑a mau‑a ɛnden bɛɛ a. Chɛɛ tima ɔ tima ko a, a bɛbɛɛ sanche, n faa ɛ sɔ‑a wan gban. Chɛ ni a ma, n 'na fɔɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, n ni na basɔmaya a Chisɔsi tena, n ni ma wan fɔɛ chɛ ɔ, chɛ ma, n ni fa wɛɛ.
N mbe fɔɛ min dɔ, basɔmaya be koe a mu Chasi ma, nn fea a, nn ni ma mɔ dɔndɔɛ a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, ni n fa‑a, a nyin kaka. Koe min na mu, nn fea a Chasi a, nn fan mbe ma‑a gbɛ.
Chɛɛ n mbe ka gbɛ kɔndɔfii an dɔ, n ma a ɔ sɔn, n mbe fen ma. Ni n ma‑a tun fɔɛ chɛ ɔ, ɛ a ma‑a wan, n ni kun wai chɛndɛ chɛ‑a Chasi ko a.
Chɛɛ n gbu toen mu gbɛ n ni fa, nn fea ni ma Chasi a, min mu ko nyima wa a. A ɔ gbɛ n ko a, n faa ma ya koe a ko fea chɛ tɛ ɔ.
Chɛɛ wo ko a, a nyin kaka, n ni ma tun fɔɛ ɔ.

N danden fan mu chɛ a. A sin, n ko a, n‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ n mbe ma‑a wan fɔɛ chɛ ɔ. N mbe ma‑a wan tun wo gbɛɛ tɛ ɔ, n ni basan wo ma, wo‑a wo kai fa min chɛ Chasi a, a ma ni munda. Chɛ ni a ma, wo bu ɔ ni dia, a chenama ɔ, Chisɔsi Chasi a.
Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, ni mmɔ bɛ ma‑a tima min na, wo e yonka tɛ‑a wan, a si Chasi ma. Koe min na mu, an mbe che‑a a ma‑a, n ni na wo tena.

Koe chenama mu gbɛ min na sanche, an nɛ. Wo koe n ma, wo 'a fɔɛ ɔ, yɔ mɔɛ nu miin dan‑da sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a, a si Chasi ma. Chɛ an mbe a ma‑a, n ni na wo tena, n ma na wɛɛ wo tena, n mbe wo ma tɔ chɛndɛ a min‑da wan. Mbɛ wo e sɔ ɔ gban, wo yiima a kandenɛ ɛ, wo kuiɛ a kandenɛ ɛ. A sin, wo e wan wo boo si‑a wo nyɔn kɔɔ wo sɔɛ gbɛɛ a, danaya chɛ ko a, min mbe bɔ sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ.

A sin, chian mbe ee wo ɔ, a si ko ɔ ko ma, wo chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ n mbe min ma. Chɛ ɛ wan yɔ gbau an nɛ, an tena, mbɛ an mbe na tena wan kasaa a. Chɛɛ wo tana, a mu bauncha an na wo ko a. A sin, ɛ ka tena Yataa an na.
Koe min na mu, ɛ wan gbɛ Yataa boo ɔ wo ko a, mbɛ Chasi chɛ wakoe, wo kai fa koe ma dechee a a. Chɛɛ wo gbu, wo e tɔɔya ɔ bia‑a wan a ko a.
A sin, wo‑a n yen tɔbu min dɔ bia‑a, wo wɛɛ wo e ka an sima ɔ yen tena. A sin, wo e ka tɔbu min dɔ yen tena, an mbe ka tun n bɛɛ ma.

Tea ko a, mɔ dɔndɔɛ mu wo a Chasi a. Chɛ sin ma‑a wo tena faamanande a. Chasi toen mu wo a, wo sin mbe an buɔdia ɔ. Wo e wan ko dɔndɔɛ ɔ, wo bɛ Yataa Nyina a. A sin, koadia ɛ wan wo faa ɔ, a basan chinchimaya a.
Koe chɛ n gbɛɛ mu ka buɛ min dɔ tea a, wo a ma, n 'na buɔdia da ni fa gbɛ. Wo ma kuiɛ dɔndɔɛ ɔ, wo ko a ni dia wo nyɔn ye. Wo yiima ni ma dɔndɔ, kuiɛ kanɛ da faenɛ ɔ.
Wo ma ko ɔ ko ma, wo wandi ta tɔnɔnɛ ko a dechee. Wo ma yonka tɛ, wo wandi ɔ koa koe a. Chɛɛ wo wo wandi ma yii, wo ni mɔ dɔ mende n ya, a ben wo wandi gbu ma.
A sin, wo ma gbɔsɔɛ ni ma wo bɔɛ n ta faa ma koe n na, chɛɛ wo ta faa ma koe nu ma dechee.
Ni wo ma‑a ko ɔ ko ma‑a, wo sɔnɛ ma ka Chisɔsi Chasi ta fɛ.
A maen nin bɛɛ chia ɔ chia a yɔ Yataa, chɛɛ a nii ma butuin chɛ ni podon, min mbe a ma, an na kandenɛ ni ma tun, an fea Yataa a.
A‑a a kan kɔ sɔ wan a gbɛɛ a. A‑a a wandi ma yɔnɛ a. A na‑a kɛn mɔgbuya ɔ,
a‑a a wandi ma yii wan, mbɛ a‑a kooya be Yataa ma, aan a che a fa tima ma, kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma.
Chɛ an‑na a ma, Yataa‑a a ya, mbɛ a sɛ‑a basɔmaya dankama ɔ. Mbɛ a yɛ‑a, a‑a tɔɛ be a ma, min benden mu tɔ kan kɔ kan ma.
A sin, chɛ an mbe ma‑a, basɔmaya be koe a Chisɔsi tɔɛ chɛ ma. Fɔɛ fenɛ gbɛɛ, banda bu ɔ, ni duu gboo ma, dunya gbɛɛ ɔ, an mbe an kumbai gbangban‑da wan.
An gbɛɛ, an ni a bɔ an da ɔ, an dɔ, Chisɔsi Chasi an mu mansa a. Chɛ an mbe na basɔmaya a, mmɔ Fa Yataa tena.

N dia nyɔɛ nu, mmɔ bɛ ni tima min na, wo ni wan n da a kuiɛ ma. N mbe ee ka tima min na wo ya kɔɔ, a gbu nyin gbɛ sanche wan, wo ni ma n da a kuiɛ ma chɛndɛ chɛ. Wo ma yɛ kuu kɔ koe n ma koe a, miin ma biaen mu wo ko a, Yataa‑a wo wɛn baun. Wo an ma ma samba ɔ, wo an ma chiandia ɔ.
Koe min na mu, Yataa an mbe wai chɛ tena wo ɔ. A wan mbe a ma tena, wo ma bɛndenɛ ɛ kooya be koe a a ma. A sin, ɛ gbasaya chɛ wo ɔ, a faa ma koe ma koe a.
Wo ma tisa chɛ, wo sin ma gbonyɛ, ni wo ma‑a ko ɔ ko ma‑a.

Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, tɛɛsi ee ma‑a wo ma, wo wɛn mu ka Yataa 'a denɛ n na. Wo tachɛ buɛ mɔ yama wa chɛ n tɛ ɔ, a ni nyan, a ma bɔ an ta a ɛnden bɛɛ a. Mabɔ ee ma‑a wo ma, mɔɛ chɛ n tɛ ɔ, miin dɔ chɛ chɛen mu, ko yama ma mɔ wa chɛ nu. Wo e man‑da wan an tɛ ɔ, yɔ tɔmbuaka n mbe man buɛ min dɔ pimbi ɔ.
Bai chɛ, min mbe fɔɛ be, wo a bia wo boo fea a. Chɛ an mbe a ma‑a Chasi na tee ma, n bu ɔ diama an mbe ma‑a, n kunɛ kɔɔ sɔenɛ ɛ, mbɛ n ma bui chɛ ni gbama a, n ma sɛchɛ chɛ ni gbama a, wo tɛ ɔ.

Wo e wo wandi be tena wan yɔ yasi, wai chɛ koe a Chasi ko a. Koe min na mu, wo‑a wo kai fa a a. N bu ɔ di, n sin mbe buɔdia bɔ‑a wan wo gbɛɛ a, an ni a ma wɛɛ, n wii ni bɔn, yɔ an mbe gbɛ bɔ buɛ min dɔ yasi a.
A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, wo wɛɛ, a ni ma koe a, min na di wo ye, a sin, wo ni buɔdia bɔ n na.
Mansa Chisɔsi 'a gbasaya ɔ, n yii na tɛenɛ ni ma, mbɛ n fua‑a Timoti a na‑a wo tena. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, n ni sakana a min, a si wo ma, min mbe n bu ɔ dia‑a.
Mɔ ee n boo ɔ, a ni che a ɔ, min ma bɛndenɛ ɛ che ma‑a, teaya ɔ, basan koe a wo ma.
Mɔɛ tɔɛ n gbɛɛ, an gbɔsɔen mu an faa ma koe n fan na, an ma an gbɔsɔ ni Chisɔsi Chasi ta ko a.
Chɛɛ wo wandi gbu, wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, ɛ buɛ min dɔ n tena. Ɛ wan n tena, yɔ denɛ n fea a fa a. Nn fea chɛ, nn‑na wai chɛ wan, sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian koe a.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, n yii na tɛen mu, a a na koe a wo tena, ni n‑na a ɔ yen dechee, koe min mbe na tena ma‑a n na.
A sin, Mansa Chisɔsi‑a yiinatɛ be n ma, mbɛ a ɔ ee yansan tena to, mbɛ n fandi gbu na‑a wo tena.
N‑na n yii na chii wan a a, mbɛ a nyin fan n ni Ɛpafɔditɔsi a yɛ to wo tena. N suun ma nyɔɛ an nɛ, n bɔ soya mɔɛ, n bɔ wai chɛ mɔɛ Chasi ko a. A sin, wo‑a an sɔ, basan koe a n ma nɛ.
Koe min na mu, wo gbɛɛ, wo sɔɛ ɛ gbɛ a a kaka. A sin faa yɔndenɛ mu chɛ gbɛɛ a, a mu min na, wo na‑a a gbandi koe a min fan.

Tea gbu sin ko a, a gbandi‑a wan kaka, ɛnden fan na‑a to a ni fa. Chɛɛ Yataa chinchin‑da wan a ma. A nii ma chinchin ni a dechee an ma, chɛɛ n fandi gbu wɛɛ, a ma na a ma faa yɔnɛ ni sa faa yɔnɛ kun ma.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, n fan gbu sin faa bɔen mu kaka, n ni a sɔ wo tena. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, wo ni buɔdia bɔ, ni wo‑a a yen to. An mbe a ma‑a, faagbaa ma ni dɔɔya n ma.
Wo bu ɔ ni dia, wo boo si koe a a kɔɔ, Mansa Chisɔsi tɔɛ ɔ. Wo sin ni basɔmaya be an mɔɛ chɛ sima ma.
Koe min na mu, a‑a a wandi fɔɛ ma tachɛ wan, wo 'a wai a ban koe a n tena. A na‑a to fen den, a ni fa, Chasi 'a wai chɛ ko a.
N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo e ka buɛ min dɔ, wo ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Mansa Chisɔsi a, wo buɔdia bɔ. N mbe ee sika tena, yɛ koe a n da a kuiɛ ɔ wo tena. A sin, an mbe nyan‑da wo ko a.
Wo wo kun ma fɛn, wuu chɛ n boo ɔ, mɔ yama chɛ nu. An fɛn mbe mɔɛ n na kamincha ka, wo wo kun ma fɛn an boo ɔ.

Mmɔ wan mu Yataa 'a mɔɛ n na, tea tea ko a. Koe min na mu, mmɔ wan mbe Yataa fai a Nyina 'a gbasaya ɔ. Mbɛ mmɔ yɛ‑a, mmɔ‑a buɔdia bɔ, mmɔ ma koe a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Chisɔsi a. Mmɔ ma mmɔ kai fa ni ko dɔ mende kan kɔ kan na, mɔ gbu ɛ che min ma‑a.

N ni chɛ fɔ wɛɛ, chɛɛ n fan Pɔɔ, tea ɛ wan n boo ɔ, n ni n kai fa koe n na, mɔ gbu ɛ che miin ma‑a. Ni ɛ wan mɔ ɔ mɔ yii ma, mbɛ tea ɛ wan a boo ɔ, a kai fa koe a an koe chɛ n na, n ta tea koo a ta ma.
Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ mu n na, n de Ibu mɔɛ, fa wɛɛ Ibu, n sin bɔ‑a Bɛnchamin 'na dambi an dɔ. An‑na n na kamincha wan, tee sɛi n bɔɛ ma kɛn n suun‑da. A sin, Chu n 'na sawa ta fɛ chia a, Fayisii mɔɛ mu n na.

Ko ɔ ko kan kɔ kan, n ta yiima ɔ, Yataa toen ni n ni min ma, n ni a ma wan n sɔɛ gbɛɛ a. N fan ni a ma, ko yawaenɛ ni sa chɔchi mɔɛ n ma. Chu n 'na sawa nan sin, min sien ni tachɛ koe ma a a teaya ɔ, mabɔ nii ma a ɔ.
Chɛɛ ni tɔnɔnɛ kan kɔ kan ni wan a ɔ, n‑na n kan kɔ sɔ an na, bea koe a Chisɔsi Chasi fɛ.

Tea ko a, n‑na n kan kɔ sɔ an gbɛɛ a. Koe min na mu, n‑na Chisɔsi Chasi sɔnɛ min chɛ ka mansa a, a benden mu ko ɔ ko ma. A wan ko a mu, n mbe fo tena fen kɔ fen na, n sin mbe an ya tena bubuu an na. N‑na chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, n ni a wan Chasi ma sɔn,

mbɛ nn fea ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a. N ni nn fan Chu n 'na sawa miin bia, an fan ma a ma ni, n ma‑a mɔ tandenɛ a Yataa chen kɔɔ. Chɛɛ min ma‑a, n‑na n kai fa wan Chasi a. Chɛ an‑na a ma dechee, Yataa‑a n ya mɔ tandenɛ a, a chen kɔɔ.

N toen mu, n ni Chisɔsi sɔn, n ni gbasaya chɛ a tisɔn, Yataa‑a min ya, a‑a Chisɔsi kɔɔ sɔ, a ka saya ɔ. N toen mu to, n ni tɔɔya chɛ sima ɔ bia, a‑a min dɔ bia, n ni ma yɔ a wan, a 'a saya ta fɛ chia a.
Chɛ ko a, n bɛɛ, n ni ma mɔɛ dɔndɔ a, Yataa ɛ min kɔɔ sɔ‑a, a yɛ to fɔɛ ɔ.

N mbe ee a fɔ tena, mbɛ n ban‑da an koe chɛ n gbɛɛ chɛ‑a, miin mbe chɛ. Chɛ ma, mbɛ n ban‑da ma‑a gbae mɔɛ gbu a, n ni ma min na. N gboo ɔ ee fa, butuinɛ chɛ koe a, n ni tɔnɔnɛ chɛ ma sɔn, Chisɔsi Chasi‑a a ma, n bea‑a a fɛ min ko a.

N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, n mbe ee a ya tena gbɛ, mbɛ an fen chɛ ma‑a n ta a. Chɛɛ ko dɔndɔ ɛ nɔ, n mbe gbɛ min ma‑a. N yii ee to koe kɔma chɛ kɔ, chɛɛ n mbe gbɛ butuin chɛ tena ya ɔ ma an ma sɔn koe a.
N mbe n fɔsɔ tena, ya ɔ ma an ko a, n ni tɔnɔnɛ chɛ ma sɔn. Mɔɛ min fea Chisɔsi Chasi a, an ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, ɛ tɔnɔnɛ min ma sɔn, ni Yataa‑a an mɔɛ chee banda bu ɔ.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ wɛn yii kɔɔen mu gbɛ, Chisiancha chɛ ɔ, mmɔ yiima ni ma a buɛ chɛ ɔ. A sin, ni wo yiima ma‑a dama ko ɔ ko ɔ, Yataa ɛ a ma‑a wan wo ni a ɔ sɔn.
Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, mmɔ‑a kanɛ min ma sɔn, mmɔ tachɛ a chia a.
N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo bea n sɔnɛ fɛ. A sin, wo ya ma ka chɛ n fɛ, miin mbe koe n ma tena, yɔ nn na‑a miin tɔmɔsi a tachɛ.

Koe min na mu, mɔɛ sɛsɛ nu, n na‑a miin bakoe ɔ yian wo a tima sɛsɛ ko a, n mbe an bakoe fɔ tena to wo ye, di ɛ n ya a. Mbɛ an mu mɔɛ n fan na, miin mu chɛɛ ma nyɔnɛ n na, kɔn gbengbanden chɛ ko a, Chasi fa‑a min ma.
An 'na Yataa mu an 'na dunya ma buɔdia an na. Koe min ma mauen mu, a ma koe a, an mbe yonka tɛ an ma koe a. A sin, an yiima gbɛɛ ɛ dunya ma koe n fan ma. An danka, ɛ ma‑a kasaa an na.
Chɛɛ mmɔ tana, mmɔ waa chɛndɛ chɛndɛ mu banda bu ɔ an na. A sin, mmɔ kun ka mɔɛ chɛ, Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi, mmɔ ɛ min ma kɔn tena, ɛ ka tena nɔ wan.

Mmɔ gboo chɛ, baa a tenden mbe ee ka min ma, a wan mbe a mun‑da. A sin, ɛ a ma‑a wan, yɔ a ta gboo, min kamayaen mu. A 'a gbasaya min mbe a ɔ, min mbe a ma, fen kɔ fen mbe don a kɔɔ, ɛ an na tachɛ a a.

Chɛ an fɛ mu, n suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, n toen mu wo a, wo sin yen sɔɛ ɛ n na. N bu ɔ di wo ko a, a yɛ to, wo wan mu tɔnɔnɛ a, n 'na wai ko a. N dia nyɔɛ nu, wo bɛ Mansa Chisɔsi a, wo ma‑a ka buɛ min dɔ mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, wo ma yɛ to kuu kɔ chɛ ɔ.
N mbe Yuodia disa tena, an fea Sintiche a, an ni ma kuiɛ dɔndɔya ɔ, yɔ wo suun ma nyɔɛ nu Mansa Chisɔsi ɔ.

A sin, n mbe i wɛɛ ɔ tisa tena, i wɛn mbe wai chɛ tena danaya ɔ, n toen mu i ni musu fea chɛ n deman. Koe min na mu, an‑na toa si wan n kɔɔ, n 'na wai ɔ, sakana bai chɛ a ta koe a ya ɔ ma. An bɛ ni Kemendi a, a basan n bɔ wai chɛ mɔɛ tɔɛ n na. A sin, an tɔɛ ɛ wan gboo chɛ ɔ, mɔɛ n tɔɛ ɛ min dɔ, miin mbe kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da.
Wo e ka buɛ min dɔ, wo ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Mansa Chisɔsi a, wo buɔdia bɔ tima ɔ tima ko a. Ka n mbe a fɔ to wo ye, wo buɔdia bɔ.
Mansa Chisɔsi na tima ɔ ma yansan to. Wo a ma, mɔ ɔ mɔ ni a ɔ sɔn, wo faa chimaen mu buɛ min dɔ.

Ko ɔ ko kan kɔ kan ma wo faa gbaa. Chɛɛ wo 'a samunɛ ɔ, wo 'a Yataa ma nande ɔ, wo a ma, a ni a ɔ sɔn, wo toen mu a ni koe miin chɛ wo ye, tima ɔ tima ko a. A sin, wo a wai bɔ koe n gbɛɛ ko a, a‑a miin chɛ wo ye.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, Yataa ɛ faachima min be, min benden mu mmɔ 'a ko sɔnɛ gbɛɛ ma, ɛ wo faa kun ma fɛn‑da wan, a ni wo yiima wɛɛ kun ma fɛn. Koe min na mu, mɔ dɔndɔɛ mu wo a, wo bɛ Chisɔsi Chasi a.

N mbe min fɔ tena gbɛ sanche, n suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo wo yii na chii koe chɛ n ma, baa ɛ miin ma, Yataa toen mu koe miin na. Koe nu, miin nyin, mabɔ ee miin ma ɛnden bɛɛ a, basɔmaya koe nu. Mɔɛ n mbe che kawa‑a koe miin ma, an mbe koe miin bai, dua ɛ koe miin dɔ.
Ko ɔ ko, wo‑a n yen miin ma‑a, wo‑a miin kan, an to‑a wo yii ma, wo an ma. An ni ma n da a bai n na, chɛ ma, an ni ma n chɛ chɛ wai n na. A sin, Yataa min mbe faa chima be mmɔ ma, ɛ ma‑a wan wo kɔ.

N mbe buɔdia bɔ tena wan, a chenama ɔ, a sin to, n mbe Mansa Chisɔsi wai bɔ tena wan. Mbɛ sanche chɛ ɔ, n bakoe ni buɛ min dɔ wo faa ɔ, wo‑a a kun ma sa. Tea gbu ko a, n bakoe ni wan wo faa ɔ, chɛɛ a chia nii wo ye, a ɔ yian koe a.
An ma a fɔ ni, n mbe ka gbonyɛ an na, mbɛ fen mbe ee n boo ɔ. Koe min na mu, n dii koe mu gbɛ, mbɛ fɔɛ ɛ ma buɛ min dɔ n ko a, tima ɔ tima, a ni ma faachima a n tena.

N‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, n mbe ma buɛ min dɔ, ni fen na tenden mbe ee n boo ɔ, chɛ ma, ni boo fenɛ chenama ɛ n boo ɔ. N‑na chɛ kan gbɛ, mbɛ n ni ma‑a kan kɔ kan, ko ɔ ko ni n tan, n faa chimaenɛ ni ma tun. N bu faenɛ ni ma, kɔnkɔ ni ma n na, fen ni ma n boo ɔ a chenama ɔ, fen den bɛɛ ni ma n boo ɔ.
Chasi 'a gbasaya ɔ, ɛ min be n ma, n mbe che wan, n ni ko ɔ ko kan kɔ kan ma.
Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, mɔ chɛndɛ mu wo a, n 'na ko yawaenɛ ya koe a.

Wo sin gbu, wo wan Fiipai mɔɛ nu, wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, min ma‑a a saa a, n‑na a kuu sɔ tima min na sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian‑da mɔɛ n na. A tima chɛ a, kɛn n ni ka tena nɔ an Masidonia chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ, chɔchi kan kɔ kan dɔ gbɛɛ nii ma toa si ni n 'na wai kɔɔ, mɔ dechee wo wan. Wo wan ni wo boo fenɛ be.
Koe min na mu, Tɛsadonika duu ɔ nan fan bɛɛ, n ni nɔ tima min na, wo ni wo boo fenɛ a ta wan n ye, gba sɛsɛ ko a.
An ma a fɔ ni, mbɛ n toen mu dechee wo boo fenɛ n fan ma sɔn koe a. Chɛɛ n toen mu n ni a ɔ yen, Yataa ni wo deman, basan koe chɛ a n ma.

N‑na fen kɔ fen ma sɔn fan, wo‑a miin na na n ye. A sin, n yii nii min dɔ, n‑na an gbu ma sɔn. N mbe wo wai bɔ tena, wo 'a samba fen chɛ n ko a, n‑na miin ma sɔn, a ka Ɛpafɔditɔsi a. A‑a a bɔ n ko a, chɛndɛ chɛ. An samba fen chɛ, ɛ wan dechee yɔ yasi, min kunyɛ a di, a sin, a ko a di Yataa ye, a sin, Yataa toen fan mu a a.
A sin, nyan fen ba chɛ n gbɛɛ Yataa boo ɔ, miin ma gbɔsɔɛ ɛ wo ma, wo e an ma sɔn‑da wan. Chɛ ɛ bɔ‑a koe chɛ an dɔ, Chasi‑a min ma wo ko a. N 'na Yataa, ɛ a ma‑a wan chɛ ni ma.
Tando ni be mmɔ Fa Yataa tɔɛ ma, kuɔ fɔ ni kuɔ fɔ ko a. A ni ma ka.
Wo ni Yataa 'a mɔɛ n gbɛɛ kɔndɔn n ye, miin mu mɔ dɔndɔɛ n na, an bɛ Chisɔsi Chasi a. Mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ n bɛɛ Chasi ɔ, miin mbe nɛ n tena, an‑na wo kɔndɔn.
Yataa 'a mɔɛ n gbɛɛ nɛ, a bɛɛ bɛɛ chɛ nu, miin mbe wai chɛ tena Domi kun ti wa 'a kata ɔ, an bɛɛ, an‑na wo kɔndɔn.
Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi ni wo dua. A ni ma ka.
N fan Pɔɔ, n fan mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena, nn fea mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ a Chasi ɔ, min mu Timoti a. Chisɔsi Chasi 'a sɔ mɔɛ mu n na. Yataa wandi an dɔn‑da, n ma koe a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ a.
N mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena wo wan tena, wo wan Yataa 'a mɔɛ chɛ nu, Kɔdɔsai duu ɔ. Wo gbɛɛ, wo wɛn danayaen mu, wo maenɛ ɛ mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, wo bɛ Chasi a. Mmɔ Fa Yataa ni wo dua, a ni faachima be wo ma.
Nn mbe ma samunɛ chɛ‑a tima ɔ tima, nn mbe Yataa wai bɔ wan wo ko a, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi fa.
Koe min na mu, nn‑na a a min, wo kai faen mu buɛ min dɔ Chisɔsi Chasi a. A sin to, koadia min nyɔn sima ɛ wo faa ɔ, Yataa 'a mɔɛ gbɛɛ ko a.

Wo e chɛ ma, a mu min na, wo yii na tɛenɛ mu koe chɛ an ma, Yataa‑a min sa tena ɔ bɛn wo ya ɔ banda bu ɔ. Tea bai chɛ, min mu sakana bai chɛndɛ a, a‑a a fo kɛn wo ma tima saa saa ko a, wo‑a a a min fan, ɛ na yiinatɛ min na.

Sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɛ a ma tena wan, ko chɛndɛ sɛsɛ ɛ mɔɛ n tan tena tima ɔ tima ko a dunya gbɛɛ ɔ. A sin, wo wandi wɛɛ tɛ ɔ, ɛ ma tena ka wan. A bia tee saa saa chɛ ma, wo na‑a a a min kɛn, mbɛ wo dan‑da koadia demanɛ a chɛndɛ chɛ, Yataa ɛ min chɛ tea tea ɔ.
Wo‑a a min ka wan Ɛpafasi a, nn bɛ ɛ Yataa 'a wai chɛ min na. A mu mɔɛ an na, min ko a di nn ye, koe min na mu, ɛ Chasi 'a wai chɛ tena nɔ danaya ɔ, nn ko a.
A sin‑na a ɔ yian nn na, Yataa Nyina‑a a ma buɛ min dɔ, koadia ɛ wo faa ɔ.

Chɛ ko a, a bia an tee chɛ ma, nn‑na a a min tee min na, nn ma sɛmbɛ ni samunɛ chɛ koe a wo ko a. Nn mbe samunɛ chɛ tena wan tima ɔ tima ko a, Yataa ni a ma, a toen mu koe miin na, wo ni an dɔ gbɛ chɛndɛ chɛ. A sin, n mbe a ɔ tisa tena, a ni yiimatɛ gbɛɛ be wo ma, a wan Yataa Nyina ɛ min be.
Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, wo ni kosan tachɛ‑a fɔɛ ɔ, min mbe nyan Mansa Chisɔsi tena, a faa ni chima a da faenɛ ɔ. Tima ɔ tima, wo e ko chɛndɛ sɛsɛ ma‑a wan. Wo 'a yiimatɛ ma ni mun‑da a si Yataa wakoe ma.
Nn mbe samunɛ chɛ tena, Yataa ni gbasaya gbɛɛ be wo ma, a 'a gbasaya kamayaen ba ɔ. Wo ni ko gbɛama kan kɔ kan dɔ bia, faabia ɔ, wo bu ɔ diama ɛ.
Nn mbe Yataa wai bɔ tena tima ɔ tima, tɔnɔnɛ chɛ n bɛɛ ma sɔn koe a, a‑a miin be koe fɔ a ta mɔɛ n ma, miin mbe a 'a manɛ kɔɔ. A wan Yataa dɔndɔ gbe, an mbe a gbasaya be wo ma, an ma sɔn koe a.
A‑a mmɔ bɔ wan ko yama pimbi 'a gbasaya boo ɔ, mbɛ a‑a mmɔ don a faa ma denɛ 'a mansaya kɔɔ yɛdɛn.
Mmɔ‑a kunka ma sɔn, mmɔ bɔ‑a mmɔ 'a ko yama n dɔ, koe min na mu, a 'a den chɛ, mɔ dɔndɔɛ mu gbɛ mmɔ a.
Mmɔ ee Yataa min yen, a bɔ nyɔɛ chɛndɛ chɛndɛ, mɔ gbu na‑a min yen, a mu Chisɔsi Chasi an na. Yataa 'a denɛ mu an na, a sin, gbasaya ɛ wan a boo ɔ fen kɔ fen kun ma, min na dan‑da dunya chɛ ɔ.

Yataa‑a a gbu ma, fenɛ tɔɛ gbɛɛ n na dan‑da, banda bu ɔ ni dunya chɛ ɔ, Chasi chɛ an boo ɔ. Mmɔ ɛ fenɛ miin yen, ni mmɔ ee miin yen. A yɛ to, nyina yama n ya ɔ sɔɛ wɛɛ, ni maeka n ya ɔ sɔɛ. Fen kɔ fen, an na dan‑da Chisɔsi boo ɔ wan, a sin fan ko a mu.
Chasi ni pɛn fɔɛ ɔ, fen kɔ fen ya ɔ, a sin fan‑na a ma, fen kɔ fen mbe kun dɔndɔɛ kɔɔ, a yɛ to, an mbe wai chɛ kuiɛ dɔndɔya ɔ.
Chisɔsi Chasi an mu chɔchi kun ti a. Chɔchi mu a gboo an na. A wan mbe fɔɛ be a 'a mɔɛ n ma. Koe min na mu, Yataa‑a a pɛn kɔɔ sɔ, a ka saya ɔ, min mbe a ma, a ni ma gbasaya tɔɛ a fen kɔ fen kun ma.
Yataa sɔnɛ ni wan Chasi ɔ chia ɔ chia a. Yataa wandi sin fan na‑a chɛ ɔ bɛn.
Yataa‑a a ɔ bɛn fan to, fen kɔ fen dunya chɛ ɔ, ni banda bu ɔ, Chisɔsi‑a a ma, an ma‑a a wan Yataa dia nyɔɛ n na. Yataa‑a chɛ ma wii chɛ an dɔ, Chisɔsi‑a min na bɔn kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma.
A sin, tima dɔndɔ a, wo dɔ nu, wo nii kuiɛ dɔndɔ ɔ Yataa a, wo yiima nii ma nyin a ko a. Wo ni Yataa chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ n fan na, wo 'a yiinachii yama n dɔ, ni ko yama nu, wo ni miin ma.

Chɛɛ sanche gbɛ, wo ma‑a gbɛ Yataa dia nyɔɛ n na, min mbe a ma, wo ni ma gbɛ tenchen a ko a, mabɔɛ sima wɛɛ ma na ma wo ma, a chen kɔɔ. A‑a chɛ ma saya chɛ an dɔ, Chasi‑a min chɛ kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma, mɔgbuya gboo ɔ.

Chɛɛ, chɛ ɛ ma dechee, ni wo ma sɛmbɛ ni wo kai fa koe a Chasi a. Wo ma yɛ kuu kɔ, wo sin ni sɔ gban. Wo‑a sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a min tima min na, wo‑a yiinatɛ min ma sɔn, wo ma dɔn mɔ dɔ gbɛɛ ni wo ka an chia chɛ ma. Yataa‑a n ma a 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ a, an sakana bai chɛ an ko a. Sakana bai chɛ, a ɔ yianden fan mu gbɛ dunya gbɛɛ ɔ.
Sanche chɛ ɔ, n mbe tɔɔya min gbɛɛ chɛ tena, wo ko a, n bu ɔ diama mu. A sin, n gboo chɛ ɔ, n mbe tɔɔya chɛ a ban‑da wan, Chasi‑a min dɔ bia, a gboo ko a, min mu chɔchi a.
A sin, wo ko a, Yataa‑a n ma wan a 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ a, basan koe a chɔchi ma. A‑a chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, a 'a sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ ni yian wo a chɛndɛ chɛ.
Bai an nii nɛ, min dɔ nunden ni san wu sɛsɛ ko a, a ka mɔ bemba n ta bemba n na tima ma. Chɛɛ sanche gbɛ, a ɔ yian‑da Yataa 'a mɔɛ n na.

Yataa toen ni, a ni a ɔ yian mɔɛ chɛ n na, a‑a koe min dɔ nun an ma. An koe ma kawaen ni, a sin dua wa ni, mɔɛ n ko a, miin nii ma Chu mɔ a. An koe ɔ nundenɛ gbu an nɛ, mbɛ Chasi wakoe ɛ wan wo wɛɛ faa ɔ, min mu wo 'a yiinatɛ a, Yataa 'a basɔmaya ma sɔn koe a.

A wan Chasi chɛ, nn mbe an bakoe ɔ yian mɔ ɔ mɔ a. Nn mbe dasi be tena wan, nn mbe ta‑a mɔɛ gbɛɛ kan‑da nn ta yiimatɛ chia gbɛɛ a. Chɛ ni a ma, nn ni kun a ma‑a, mɔɛ gbɛɛ ni na Yataa chen kɔɔ, an yiima da faenɛ ɛ, a si Chasi ma.
N mbe wai chɛ tena n sɔɛ gbɛɛ a, chɛ an ko a. Chasi wan sin‑na an gbasaya wa chɛ chɛ n dɔ.
N toen mu wo ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ n mbe mɔnɛ ɔ bia tena wan pien wo ko a. N‑na a chɛ wan mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ ko a, miin mbe Daɔdisia duu ɔ, ni mɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ ko a, nn ma nyɔn yen nin bɛ, nn bɛ miin na.

N‑na chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, wo wan, ni an fan, wo gbɛɛ ni wo faa gbɛa, mbɛ wo ko a dia‑a wo nyɔn ye, wo ni ma kuiɛ dɔndɔya ɔ. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, yiinatɛ chenama ni ma wo ɔ, koe ɔ gbɛ koe a chɛndɛ, ɛ na min na. An chia chɛ a mu, wo e Chasi wakoe ɔ gbɛ, min mu Yataa 'a koe ɔ nundenɛ a tee.
Chasi an mu mɔɛ a, min mbe a ma, mɔ gbu ni Yataa 'a yiimatɛ gbɛɛ ɔ gbɛ, min maen mu yɔ nyan fenɛ min nundenɛ ɛ.
N mbe chɛ fɔ tena, min mbe a ma, mɔ ɔ mɔ ma na wo bun, an 'na daɔdia bai ma kawaenɛ n na, an mbe miin dɔ yian‑da.
N mbe wɛɛ nɛ pɔɔ, chɛɛ n faa ɛ wo tena. N bu ɔ diama mu, koe min na mu, wo e chia chɛndɛ ma, wo ma ka ni ɛnden bɛɛ a wo gba ɔ, wo kai fa koe a Chasi a.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo‑a Chisɔsi Chasi ma sɔn ka buɛ min dɔ, wo kun ka mansa a, wo ma‑a ka buɛ min dɔ mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, wo tachɛ buɛ ma ka a ta fɛ.

Wo ban‑da wo kai fa‑a a a gban. Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo a a tun wo kai fa koe ma a a, wo ma yɛ kuu kɔ. A sin, wo‑a wo kai fa ka buɛ min dɔ a a, wo ma yɛ to kuu kɔ, yɔ a fɔen mu buɛ min dɔ wo ye. Tima ɔ tima ko a, wo Yataa wai bɔ.
Wo wo kun ma fɛn, wo ma na ma yɔnɛ a, mɔ dɔ mende n 'na yiinachii ɔ yansama boo ɔ. An ma na wo bun, wo ni bea mɔ gbu ta manda n fɛ, wo ni bea dunya chɛ ma nyina n fɛ. An mbe ee ma‑a Chasi ta chia fɛ.
Koe min na mu, Chasi ni mɔ gbu gboo an dɔ nɛ dunya ma, chɛɛ Yataa ni a a, chia ɔ chia a.
A wan mu mansa a, mansa kan kɔ kan ko a, maeka kan kɔ kan ko a, ni nyina kan kɔ kan ko a. A sin, wo wɛɛ, wo fɔɛ da fa‑a gban, koe min na mu, wo ma‑a gbɛ mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, wo bɛ Chasi a.
Wo ma min chɛ‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, wo bɛ Chasi a, wo a ban‑da kamincha‑a. Mɔ gbu ta da kamincha ma, chɛɛ Chisɔsi ta mu. A sin‑na a ma, mbɛ wo kunɛ bɔ‑a wo 'a ko yama n dɔ, miin ma nyin mɔgbuya chɛ ɔ.

Yii chɛ‑a kɛn wo kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, a tima chɛ a, a ma‑a wan yɔ wo tɔn‑da wan ka, wo bɛ Chasi a. A yɛ to, mbɛ Yataa‑a wo kɔɔ sɔ, a ka saya ɔ, wo bɛ Chasi a to. Danaya ni wan wo ɔ Yataa 'a gbasaya ko a, min‑na Chisɔsi kɔɔ sɔ, a ka saya chɛ ɔ. An danaya chɛ sin fan‑na a ma, chɛ ma‑a.

Tima ni wan nɔ, wo faenɛ ni wo 'a ko yama n boo ɔ, Yataa tena. A sin, wo kunɛ nii ma bɔ ni wo 'a ko yama n dɔ, miin nii ma nyin mɔgbuya ɔ. Chɛɛ Yataa‑a wo a yɛ to fɔɛ ɔ, wo bɛ Chasi a. Mmɔ gbɛɛ, Yataa‑a a boo bɔ mmɔ 'a ko yama n dɔ.
A‑a mmɔ kun ka wan, a bɔ mmɔ 'a ko yama n dɔ, Yataa ni mmɔ gbɛmbo‑a miin ko a. A‑a saya min chɛ kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma, Yataa‑a a boo bɔ nɔ wan an ko yama chɛ n dɔ.
An kɔn gbengbanden chɛ ma, Chasi‑a a ma wan, nyina yama n 'na gbasaya ban‑da. A‑a an nyina yama chɛ n ma wan tɔmɔsi a, fanka ɔ den, mbɛ a wan Chasi, a kun‑da an ma.

Chɛ an fɛ mu, miin sien mu wo daun fenɛ ma, ni fenɛ min mbe min, mɔ ɔ mɔ ma kaa a tɛ, a si a ma. A yɛ to, kaa a ma tɛ, a si bɛn ba chɛ n ma, wo e miin bia, a a ma tɛ kau nama ma, a a ma tɛ suin tee wɛɛ wakoe ma.
Koe min na mu, koe miin mbe na tena ma‑a, an nininɛ gbama gbama n fan nɛ. Koe kuu ba gbu, a sien mu Chasi an ma.

Wo ma dɔn mɔɛ chɛ n ni a fɔ wo ye, mbɛ wo ee Yataa chia ma. Mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin toen mu chii koe a wo ma, kooya be koe a maeka n ma, mbɛ wo‑a an fai. A yɛ to, an mbe a fɔ, an dɔ, an mbe koe n dɔ yen fan, miin dɔ nunden mu. An mbe ma‑a ka fania an dɔ, an mbe yonka tɛ‑a, mɔgbuya chia a, tea sin mbe ee a ɔ.

An mbe ee Chasi bia‑a an boo fea a, a wɛn mu mmɔ kun ti a. Chasi an mbe na a 'a mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a kaina dɔndɔɛ. Ɛ wan dechee yɔ mɔ gbu gboo, ni a sɔna nu, an gbɛɛ‑a tun tunden mu buɛ min dɔ. Fasa mɛsɛ chɛ nu, miin mbe an dɔ, an tɛ ma tɛ ni, a sin an mbe wai chɛ kuiɛ dɔndɔya an dɔ. An mbe koa wan, yɔ Yataa toen mu an ni koa buɛ min dɔ.
Wo bɛ Chasi a, wo wan fa‑a dɔndɔ a, mbɛ nyina yama n 'na gbasaya ee to wo kun ma dunya ɔ. Chɛ an fɛ mu, ko ɔ ko ma a ma to, wo ni bea dunya chɛ ɔ fɔɛ fɛ, ko ɔ ko ma a ma, wo ni bea a ɔ sawa n fɛ.
Sawa chɛ nu, miin‑na a fɔ, an dɔ, “Wo ma tu daun fen chɛ a, wo ma chɛ bia, wo gbu ma chɛ n ma fɛn.”
Mɔ gbu n fan‑na sawa chɛ n sa, mbɛ an‑na mɔɛ n kan an ma. Chɛɛ ni mɔɛ ban‑da dechee daun fen chɛ n daun‑da, ko ɔ ko ee to chɛ gbakɔ, an mbe tui wan.

Ni mɔɛ‑a sawa chɛ n gbu ma fɛn, a maenɛ mu yɔ tea ɛ koe miin dɔ. Koe min na mu, an mbe a din fan mɔɛ n ma, samunɛ ɛ chɛ buɛ min dɔ. A yɛ to, an mbe an fandi ma yii buɛ min dɔ, a basan koe n na, an mbe miin si an gboo a. Chɛɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, tea ee an dɔ. An gbɛɛ ma fen kɔ fen na, ni mɔɛ gbu‑a a yii na chii chia n ma, mɔɛ ɛ kun buɛ min dɔ, a ni a gboo bia, Yataa chia a.

Tima min na Yataa‑a Chasi a yɛ to fɔɛ ɔ, a‑a a ma wan, wo wɛɛ‑a fɔɛ nama ma sɔn. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo to fen chɛ n na, Yataa‑a miin sa tena ɔ bɛn wo ko a banda bu ɔ. Chasi ɛ nɔ wan si ɔ kaina a ma bɛndenɛ, Yataa boo nyima ɔ.
Wo wo yii sɔ gban fen chɛ n ma banda bu ɔ, fen chɛ nu ma nɛ dunya chɛ ɔ.
Koe min na mu, wo fa‑a wan. A sin, wo 'a fɔɛ nama, ɛ sa ɔ nun dɔ, Yataa boo ɔ, Chasi ɛ kaina min.
Chasi dɔndɔ gbe, an mbe a ma wo ni ma fɔɛ nama ɔ. A sin, ni a yɛ‑a to dunya chɛ ɔ, wo bɛ an mbe ma‑a a a. A sin mbe ma‑a Yataa 'a manɛ min dɔ, wo wɛɛ, wo e ma‑a an dɔ.

Chɛ an fɛ mu, dunya chɛ ɔ koe nu, miin na di wo ye, wo faa ni fa an ko a. Koe nu, yɔ ko tɛ kan kɔ kan, wo e na to dɛ‑a fuu ɔ, ni ko yama dɔ mende nu. A yɛ to, yiinachii yama, ni dunya ma koe ben koe a mɔɛ ɔ, a basan fenkoya wa a. Chɛ nɛnɛ ɛ wan dechee, yɔ fenɛ fai koe a, min ma Yataa a.
Mmɔ ɛ na‑a wan Yataa 'a faatɛ ɔ yen‑da, a si koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ma.
A saa a, wo ni tachɛ ka wan, koe min na mu, wo ni an koe chɛ n fan ma.
Chɛɛ sanche gbɛ, wo koe chɛ n gbɛɛ boo ka. Koe nu, yɔ faatɛ, ni faagbandia. A yɛ to, toomaya wɛɛ, ni tɔ ɔ tɛ yama chɛ, a basan bai yama sa a.
Wo ma fania fɔ wo nyɔn ye, koe min na mu, wo‑a wo boo bɔ wan wo sɔn kɔma n dɔ.
A sin, an sɔn nama chɛ, Yataa wandi an‑na a chɛ wo ɔ. A sin, ɛ a ma tena wan tun tun, wo ni ma yɔ ɛ buɛ min dɔ, wo ni a sɔn chɛndɛ chɛ.

Chɛ an fɛ mu, sɔn nama chɛ ɔ, tɛ bɔ kan kɔ kan mbe ee Chu mɔɛ n ma, an bɛ mɔɛ n na, miin ma Chu mɔɛ n na. Tɛ bɔ ee chɛ n ma miin na kaminchaen mu, an bɛ chɛ n na, miin na ma kamincha ni. Tɛ bɔ ee chɛ n bɛɛ ma, miin ka‑a chɛnyɛ dɔ mende n dɔ, a ee yɔnɛ n ma, a ee fia ɔ mɔɛ n ma, an bɛ mɔɛ n na, miin mu mansaenɛ a. Chɛɛ Chasi an mu koe a, a sin mbe wan gbɛ wo gbɛɛ 'a fɔɛ ɔ.

Wo gbɛɛ, wo e gbɛ Yataa an na boo ma. A to‑a wan wo a, a sin‑na a boo sɔ wan wo ma, a ta mɔɛ n na. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, chinchimaya faa ni ma wo ɔ, ni ko chɛndɛ ma faa. A yɛ to, wo ni wo wandi ma yii, wo ni wo ma chima, a sin, wo ni wo faa bia.

Wo gboo ɔ ma fa, wo faa bia koe a wo nyɔn na. A sin, ni gbonyɛ ma‑a wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ da a, a bɔɛ ko a, a ni a boo bɔ an bai chɛ ɔ. Wo wo bɔɛ n to nɔ, ni an‑na ko yama ma wo a, yɔ Mansa Chisɔsi wɛɛ‑a wo to buɛ min dɔ nɔ, wo 'a ko yama n ko a.
Wo ni chɛ gbɛɛ ma wɛɛ, wo koadia sa a kun ma. Koe min na mu, an mbe ko ɔ ko kunɛ a bia, kuiɛ a kanɛ chɛndɛ ɔ.

Chasi ɛ faachima min be, a ni ma wo faa ɔ wo nyɔn ko a. Koe min na mu, Yataa‑a wo chee kaina dɔndɔɛ faachima chɛ an ko a, yɔ mɔ gbu sɔna n mbe buɛ min dɔ an nyɔn boo ɔ. A sin nyin wo ni Yataa wai bɔ tima ɔ tima.

Sakana bai chɛ, a si Chasi ma, a ni sa wo faa ɔ chɛndɛ chɛ. Wo wo nyɔn kan, wo ni wo nyɔn na si yiimatɛ chia gbɛɛ a. Wo si kan kɔ kan sa, Yataa ɛ tando min dɔ, wo e ta‑a Yataa wai bɔ‑a, wo faa gbɛɛ a.
A sin, ni wo ma‑a ko ɔ ko ma‑a, wo da ɔ, ni wo chɛ chɛ wai n dɔ, wo an ma Mansa Chisɔsi tɔɛ ɔ. Ni wo ma‑a chɛ gbɛɛ ma‑a, wo Fa Yataa wai bɔ, Mansa Chisɔsi 'a gbasaya ɔ.
Wo wan fuu musu nu, wo don wo chɛɛ n kɔɔ, yɔ a ma biaen mu buɛ min dɔ musu ko a, miin mu mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, an bɛ Mansa Chisɔsi a.
Wo wan musu si kai n bɛɛ, wo to wo 'a musu n na, wo ma faa ma gbaa koe ma an na.
Wo wan denɛ nu, wo kooya be wo woo mɔɛ n ma, chia ɔ chia a. Koe min na mu, chɛ an mu Mansa Chisɔsi faa ma koe a.
Wo wan fa nu, wo ma tɛn wo 'a denɛ n faa n na, an faa ma na yɔn wo ma.

Wo wan yɔnɛ nu, chia ɔ chia a, wo kooya be chɛ n ma, miin mu wo ti n na dunya chɛ ma. Wo ma a be dechee an ya kɔɔ wan, mɔ gbu n faa chima koe a dechee. Chɛɛ wo a be wo faa gbɛɛ a, Mansa Chisɔsi ma chianɛ ɛ wo ɔ.
A ni ma wai kan kɔ kan na wo boo ɔ, wo a chɛ wo faa gbɛɛ a. Wo a chɛ yɔ wo e ka a chɛ‑a Mansa Chisɔsi an ko a, chɛɛ mɔ gbu an ma.
Wo e ma‑a ka wai chɛ‑a kun ti min ko a, a mu Chasi an na. A sin ni ma wo yii ma, mbɛ wo e wo 'a tɔnɔnɛ ma sɔn‑da Mansa Chisɔsi an na.
Chɛɛ ko yama ma mɔɛ, ɛ a 'a pawa ma sɔn‑da wan an koe chɛ ko a, a‑a min ma. A sin, Yataa ee mɔ ɔ mɔ a yɛ‑a a boo kɔ, ɛ ma‑a chɛ ma‑a.
Yɔnɛ n mbe wo wɛn boo ɔ, wo kosan wo 'a yɔnɛ n bia‑a, a chia ma. A ni ma wo yii ma, mbɛ wo wɛɛ, wo kun ti ɛ wan banda bu ɔ.
Wo ma sɛmbɛ samunɛ chɛ koe a pien. Wo e ma chɛ a, wo wo yii si koe n ma, wo e ta‑a Yataa wai bɔ‑a, tima ɔ tima ko a.

A sin, wo samunɛ chɛ nn ko a, min mbe a ma, Yataa ni chia yian nn na, a 'a bai chɛ ɔ yian koe a. Sakana bai chɛ, Yataa‑a min dɔ nun tee mɔɛ n ma, n ni a ɔ yian den mɔɛ n na. Sakana bai chɛ, a si Chasi ma, n mbe ka sa ɔ pimbi chenɛ a min ko a.
Wo samunɛ chɛ n ko a, min mbe a ma, n ni bai chɛ ɔ yian gbadan, yɔ a nyin n ni koɔ buɛ min dɔ.
Mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin nii ma an kai fa ni Chisɔsi a, ni wo‑a chia ɔ chia ma sɔn, Chasi wakoe ɔ yian koe a an na, wo wo sɔɛ gbɛɛ chɛ a ɔ.
Wo da a bai a ni dia mɔɛ n too ɔ, a ma ni kawa an ye. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, wo ni kosan mɔɛ gbɛɛ da a bai ma yɛman‑da.

Mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ Tikikɔsi, min ko a di n ye, nn bɛ ɛ wai chɛ tena min na Chasi ko a, ɛ si‑a wan ko ɔ ko ma min ma‑a n na, a ni a ɔ yian wo a. Nn toen mu a a kaka, a sin mbe wai chɛ tena danaya ɔ, Chasi ko a.
N toen mu, a ni a ma wo ni a ɔ sɔn, nn mbe buɛ min dɔ nɛ, a yɛ to, a ni wo faa ma nande. Chɛ an fɛ mu, n‑na a sɔ wo tena.

An fea, wo bɔɛ dɔndɔ a, min tɔ mu Wɔnesimɔsi, an fan mbe na tena. A wɛɛ, suun ma nyɔɛ an nɛ Chasi ɔ, nn toen mu min na, a sin mbe wai chɛ tena a faa gbɛɛ a, Chasi ko a. An mbe si‑a wan ko ɔ ko ma, min mbe nɛ, an ni a ɔ yian wo a.

Nn fea ɛ nɛ n bɔɛ min na pimbi chenɛ a, Ayisitakɔsi, a wɛɛ ɛ wo kɔndɔn tena. Maki wɛɛ, Banabasi suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ, ɛ wo kɔndɔn tena. Min sien mu mɔna chɛ ma, n ban‑da a ɔ yian‑da wo a, wo e min ma, ni a che‑a wo ma. Wo wo boo si a kɔɔ chɛndɛ chɛ.

Chisɔsi chɛ wɛɛ, min tɔɛ mu ka to Chɔsitɔsi, a wɛɛ ɛ wo kɔndɔn tena. Nn bɛ ɛ wai chɛ mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ a, Yataa 'a mansaya ko a, an sawa chɛ dechee, an fan mu Chu mɔɛ n na. A sin, tima ɔ tima ko a, an bakoe mu buɔdia wa an na n tena.

Wo bɔɛ dɔndɔ wɛɛ to, Ɛpafasi, min mu to Yataa 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ a, ɛ wo kɔndɔn tena. Tima ɔ tima ko a, ɛ samunɛ chɛ tena wan wo ko a, a faa gbɛɛ a. A ɔ, Yataa ni a ma, wo ni sɔ gban a ko a, wo yii na tɛenɛ ɛ gbae Yataa faa ma koe gbɛɛ ma, min mbe wo ko a.
Koe min na mu, n fandi gbu, n mbe siiya bɔ wan a ko a. N‑na a ɔ yen fan, a‑a wai chɛ buɛ min dɔ a sɔɛ gbɛɛ a, basan koe a wo ma, wo bɛ Daɔdisia a, ni Iyapɔdisi duu ɔ mɔɛ n na.
Kai Duku wɛɛ, mmɔ faa ma danda chɛ mɔɛ, an fea Demasi a, an mbe wo kɔndɔn tena.
Mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, Daɔdisia duu ɔ, wo an kɔndɔn n ye. Bɔɔɛ Nimfa wɛɛ, wo ni a kɔndɔn, a basan chɔchi mɔɛ chɛ n na, miin mbe bɛn a 'a chenɛ a.
Ni wo ban‑da gboo chɛ kan‑da, wo a ma, an ni a kan chɔchi mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ tena Daɔdisia chɔchi ɔ. Wo wɛɛ wo gboo chɛ kan, n‑na min na ta chɔchi mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ tena Daɔdisia. An mbe a a na tena wo tena.
Wo a fɔ Akipɔsi ye, wo ɔ, a ni a ɔ yen, mbɛ ɛ wai chɛ chɛ tena wan, Mansa Chisɔsi‑a a boo bun a ma, min chɛ koe a.
N fandi gbu, n fan Pɔɔ, n fɛn mbe ka gboo chɛ nyɛn‑da, n ni wo kɔndɔn. A ni ma wo yii ma, mbɛ n mbe sa ɔ pimbi chenɛ a. Yataa ni wo dua.

Nn fan mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena, n fan Pɔɔ, Sidasi, ni Timoti. Nn mbe a nyɛn tena wo wan chɔchi mɔɛ chɛ n fan tena pan Tɛsadonika duu ɔ. Wo wɛn mbe kuiɛ dɔndɔya ɔ, wo bɛ mmɔ Fa Yataa a, an fea Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi a. Yataa ni wo dua, a ni faachima be wo ma.
Tima ɔ tima ko a, wo e wan nn 'na samunɛ ɔ. Nn mbe Yataa fai wan wo gbɛɛ ko a.

Nn mbe ma samunɛ chɛ‑a tima ɔ tima mmɔ Fa Yataa tena, wo wakoe ɛ ma wan nn yii ma. Nn mbe Yataa wai bɔ tena wo ko a, wo e wai min chɛ tena. Koe min na mu, wo kai faen mu Mansa Chisɔsi a. Nn mbe a wai bɔ tena, koadia ko a, min mbe a ma tena wo e wai chɛ tena wo sɔɛ a. Nn mbe a wai bɔ tena, yiinatɛ ko a, wo gboo ɔ ma fa ni min chɛ koe a mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi a.
Nn suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chisɔsi Chasi ɔ, nn‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ Yataa toen mu wo a kaka. A sin, a‑a a boo sɔ wo wan ma, ma koe a a ta mɔɛ n na.

A mu min na, nn‑na sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian wo a, a si Chisɔsi Chasi ma. Nn ma a ɔ yian ni dechee nn da n fan dɔ. Chɛɛ Yataa Nyina an bɛɛ ni ka wai chɛ‑a gbasaya wa ɔ. A sin, nn danden fan ni a a, mbɛ nn mbe tea bai n fan fɔ. Wo sin gbu na‑a nn yen fan, mmɔ bɛ ni tima min na, nn ni fɔɛ min nyɔn sima ɔ. Nn‑na chɛ gbɛɛ ma, basan koe an na wo ma.

Wo bea‑a wan nn chen gba fɛ, a basan Mansa Chisɔsi wɛɛ ta a. Wo‑a wo boo si wan a 'a sakana bai chɛ kɔɔ, a ma‑a wɛɛ ko yawaen dɔ bia a wo ma. Chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, Yataa Nyina gboo ɔ ma fa ni a ma koe a wo bu ɔ ni dia.
Chɛ‑a a ma wan, wo ma‑a tɔmɔsi a mɔɛ n tena. Mɔɛ chɛ nu, Masidonia, ni Akaya chɛnyɛ ɔ, miin kai faen ni Chisɔsi Chasi a.

A sin, Mansa Chisɔsi 'a sakana bai chɛ, ɛ che tena wan kan kɔ kan, a ka wo tena. A ma che ni mɔɛ chɛ n dechee ma, miin mbe Masidonia, a basan Akaya a. Nn fan mbe ee bai dɔ gbɛɛ fɔ to, a si a ma. Koe min na mu, nn ma ta kan kɔ kan, mɔɛ n ban‑da a a min‑da.

Mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ mbe wan bai sa‑a, a si nn bia buɛ ma, wo boo ɔ, nn na‑a wo kɔndɔn‑da tima min na. A yɛ to, a si wo‑a wo kan kɔ sɔ buɛ min dɔ fen chɛ n na, miin ma Yataa a. Wo‑a chɛ ma tea Yataa an fai koe a, min mbe ma‑a nɔ kuɔ fɔ ko a.
A sin, a 'a denɛ na koe, a ka banda bu ɔ, wo e a ma kɔn tena wan. A 'a denɛ Chisɔsi, a‑a a ma min na a kɔɔ sɔ, a ka saya ɔ. A 'a den chɛ sin fan‑na mmɔ kun ka, Yataa ma na faatɛ a bɔ mmɔ ma ya ɔ ma.
Nn suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo wandi a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ nn na‑a min chɛ‑a nɛ, mbɛ na yama ma.

Wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, nn‑na tɔɔya min dɔ bia Fiipai duu ɔ, nn mbe na to na‑a wo tena Tɛsadonika. An‑na nn bia buɛ min dɔ, a yama yama boo a. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, Yataa‑a nn sɔɛ don fan a 'a sakana bai chɛndɛ ɔ yian koe a. An 'na chɛɛ ma nyɔncha ma a ma ni, nn ni sɛmbɛ ɛnden bɛɛ a.
Wo e a ɔ yen tena wan gbɛ, nn ni Yataa bai sa tena buɛ min dɔ. Nn ma saman ni, yiima yama nii nn dɔ, a sin to, nn ma wo bun ni.

Chɛɛ nn mbe koɔ wan, yɔ Yataa toen mu nn ni a 'a sakana bai chɛ fɔ buɛ min dɔ, nn sɔen mu min fɔ koe a. A‑a nn dɔ siman fan, a‑a a yen gbɛ mbɛ ɛ che wan dan‑da nn na. Nn ta wai mu min na, an nɛ, Yataa faa ma koe n ma koe a. Chɛɛ nn mbe ee mɔ gbu n faa ma koe n fan ma. An‑na nn yii ma koe n dɔ sɔn.
Wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan chɛndɛ chɛ, mbɛ nn ma na ni wo tena wo bun bai n fan na. Nn mbe ee koɔ, min mbe a ma, nn ni tɔnɔnɛ ma sɔn wo a. Nn sii mu Yataa an na.
Nn tando koe nɛnɛ, a ee nn yii ma. Nn ma wo ɔ tisa ni a ma koe a, mɔ dɔ gbɛɛ n bɛɛ a.

Sɔ mɔɛ mu buɛ min dɔ wo a Chasi ko a, nn ni kun fan boo fenɛ n ma kain‑da wo ma. Chɛɛ nn ni tima min na wo tɛ ɔ, nn‑na tima ya wan wo bia koe a. Wo maen fan ni nn tena yɔ denɛ n bɛ an de n na, an mbe bia chɛndɛ min chɛ an na.
Wo ko a dia‑a wan nn ye kaka. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, nn 'na fɔɛ gbu ɔ, nn ma bɛnden ni basan koe a wo ma. Nn ma Yataa 'a sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ dechee an sa ni wo tena.

Nn suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo wandi gbu‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ nn‑na wai chɛ wan nn sɔɛ gbɛɛ a. Tima min na nn ni nɔ, su ɔ tee a nn‑na wai chɛ wan, nn fandi deman koe a. Nn nii ma to ni, nn 'na suunɛ ni ma si ɔ wo kun ma, nn mbe ma Yataa 'a sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ sa‑a.
Wo wandi gbu an mu nn 'na sii n na, ni Yataa wɛɛ. Mbɛ tɔmbɛ kan kɔ kan nii nn ma. Nn tanden fan ni, a yɛ to, nn sɔnɛ a koe n ni wo gbɛɛ tena, wo wɛn kai faen mu Chasi a.
Wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, nn‑na wo bia buɛ min dɔ dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a, yɔ fa n bɛ denɛ n na.
Nn‑na wo nande wan, nn‑na wo bu ɔ dia. Nn‑na a ma din fan wo tena, mbɛ wo ni ma fɔɛ ɔ, min na di Yataa ye. A wan mbe wo chee tena, ma koe a a 'a mansaya kɔɔ, manɛ ɔ.

Nn mbe Yataa wai bɔ tena ko dɔndɔ an ko a, tima ɔ tima. Nn na‑a a 'a sakana bai chɛ ɔ yian wo a tima min na, wo‑a wo boo si wan a kɔɔ. Wo ma a ya ni da a bai gbama a. Chɛɛ wo‑a a ya, a wan Yataa 'a sakana bai an na. A gbu sin mu an na. A sin mbe wai tena wo a, wo wɛn kai faen mu Chasi a.

Chɛ sin fan fɛ mu, nn suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo na‑a ko yawaenɛ ɔ bia wo chɛnyɛ nyɔɛ n boo ɔ. Wo na‑a bɔ ka chɛ n fan gba ɔ, chɔchi nu Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ, miin kai faen ni Chisɔsi Chasi a. An bɛɛ na‑a ko yawaenɛ n dɔ bia ka wan, Chu mɔɛ n boo ɔ, an chɛnyɛ nyɔɛ nu.

An dɔ n‑na Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n fa wan suun. Mbɛ an dɔ n sin‑na a ma, an‑na Mansa Chisɔsi wandi wɛɛ fa. Mbɛ sanche gbɛ, an dɔ n‑na ko yawaenɛ si mmɔ a, an gbu‑a nn gbain. Mɔ ɔ mɔ mu an chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ an na. Yataa faa tɛen mu an ma gbeden.

Nn ni sakana bai chɛ sa wan, mɔɛ chɛ n tena, miin ma Chu mɔ a. Chɛ an ni a ma, an mbe bauncha ma sɔn Yataa a. An‑na butuin chɛ wan, min mbe a ma, nn ni sɛmbɛ chɛ ma koe a to. Chɛ gbu‑a a ma gbɛ, an 'na ko yama maenɛ da fa‑a gban. A sin, Yataa ɛ a faatɛ a bɔ tena gbɛ an ma, mbɛ a sin ɛ ko ma gbaaenɛ si‑a wan an na.

Nn suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, mmɔ tɛ ka‑a tima kundu min kɔɔ, nn faa gbɛɛ nii ma bɔ ni wo tena. Nn nii wɛɛ nɔ, chɛɛ nn yiima ni wan wo kɔ. Wo sɔɛ‑a nn bia wan kaka, a sin, nn‑na butuin chɛ wan, na koe a to wo kɔndɔn‑da.
Nn toen ni, nn ni yɛ wo tena. N fandi gbu, n‑na a chɛ wan gba sɛsɛ na koe a, chɛɛ Sitana ma dɔn ni.

Ko dɔ gbɛɛ kan kɔ kan mbe ee to nɔ, min mbe yiinatɛ be nn ma, a ni nn bu ɔ dia, a ben wo ma. Wo wan, nn mbe wo wɛn ya a tɔnɔnɛ a, mbɛ nn‑na nn kunɛ kɔɔ sɔ den, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi chen kɔɔ, a na tima ma.
Tea ko a, wo wan mbe a ma‑a nn bu ɔ ni dia, nn kunɛ kɔɔ sɔenɛ ni ma den.
Mbɛ a danka a gbɛ, nn ma che ni to nn faa bia‑a. Nn‑na nn yiima ɔ bɛn fan, min mbe a ma, nn ni to nɛ Atɛnsi duu ɔ.

Mbɛ Timoti sin, nn‑na a sɔ wo tena. Mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ, nn bɛ ɛ wai chɛ tena min na Yataa ko a, sakana bai chɛndɛ sa koe a, a si Chasi ma. Nn‑na a ta wo tena, a ni a ma, wo ɔ ni gbɛa, wo ni wo kai fa Chisɔsi a gbau gbau.
Chɛ an mbe a ma‑a, an ni ko yawaenɛ sa wɛɛ wo ma, wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ ee mun‑da to. Koe min na mu, tɛnɛ ko ma a Yataa wandi tena, mbɛ mmɔ ɛ ko yawaen bonda chɛ n dɔ bia wan.
Koe min na mu, mmɔ bɛ ni wɛ tima min na, nn‑na a fɔ wan wo ye pɔɔ, mbɛ ko yawaen dɔ bia ɛ mmɔ ya ɔ. A sin, yɔ wo wandi‑a a ɔ sɔn gbɛ buɛ min dɔ, a ma‑a ka wan.

N nii ma a ɔ sɔn, wo ni gbɛ buɛ min dɔ. Ni wo ni wan tun sɔ ɔ gban, Chasi ko a. Chɛ ma, ni Sitana kun‑da wan wo ma, wo ni wo kan kɔ sɔ Chasi a. Mbɛ nn 'na wai nyima gbɛɛ, a ma‑a fufafuu a. N ma che ni to chɛ ɔ bia‑a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, n‑na Timoti a na wo tena, a ni a gba bɔ.

Chɛɛ Timoti yɛ‑a sanche gbɛ nɛ, a ka wo tena. A na‑a bai min na, a si koadia ma, ni wo kai fa buɛ Chisɔsi a, buɔdia mu. A ni a fɔ nn ye, mbɛ tima ɔ tima ko a, wo e yii na chii chɛndɛ an chɛ nn na. A sin, nn toen mu nn ni wo yen buɛ min dɔ, wo wɛɛ wo toen mu ka wan nn yen koe a.
Chɛ mu nn ma faachima an na, nn 'na ko yawaen dɔ bia chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, a basan faamɔnɛ a. Nn suun ma nyɔɛ nu, wo kai fa buɛ chɛ Chisɔsi a, a ma‑a faamanande a nn ma.
A mu fɔɛ nama an na nn tena, wo kai fa buɛ chɛ gban Mansa Chisɔsi a.
Nn mbe tando be tena gba Yataa ma, wo ko a. Koe min na mu, nn 'na buɔdia koo, a chen kɔɔ, wo ko a.
Su ɔ tee a, nn mbe samunɛ chɛ tena wo ko a, nn faa gbɛɛ a. Nn mbe a ɔ tisa tena, a ni a ma mmɔ bɛ ni mmɔ nyɔn ye, nn ni wo deman chia dɔ n na, miin nyin wo 'a danaya ko a.
Mmɔ Fa Yataa wandi, an fea mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi a, an ni chia a ka nn ye, nn ni na wo tena.
Koadia min mbe wo faa ɔ, wo nyɔn ko a, a basan mɔɛ tɔɛ gbɛɛ a, Mansa Chisɔsi ni a ma munda ta‑a. A ni koa yɔ nn ta koadia wo ko a.
Chia chɛ a mu, ɛ wo ɔ gbɛa‑a, min mbe a ma, mmɔ Fa chen kɔɔ, mabɔ ee ma‑a wo ma. Chɛ ɛ ma‑a wan, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi ɛ na‑a tima min na, an bɛ gbɛɛ chɛ n na, miin mu a ta n na.

A danka a gbɛ, nn suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo‑a a kan fan nn ma, wo e ma fɔɛ min sima ɔ, min mbe Yataa faa chima. Wo sin, tea ko a, wo e tachɛ tena ka wan fɔɛ ɔ. Sanche gbɛ sin, a dinden fan mu wo ma, mbɛ wo ma yɛ to kuu kɔ. Mmɔ ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, mmɔ bɛ Mansa Chisɔsi a. An fɛ mu, nn mbe wo faa ma nande tena, wo ni a a tun tachɛ koe a chɛndɛ chɛ.
Wo wandi‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, Mansa Chisɔsi 'a gbasaya ɔ, nn‑na koe miin fɔ wo ye a ma koe a.
Yataa toen mu wo ni ma tenchen a wan ko a, wo ni wo boo bɔ ko tɛ kan kɔ kan dɔ.
Wo gbɛɛ ni wo gboo bia basɔmaya ɔ, Yataa chia a.
Wo ma ma koe tɛ mɔɛ n na, yɔ mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin ma Chisɔsi sɔn.
Mbɛ an chia chɛ a, mɔ ɔ mɔ ma ko yama ma a bɔ Chisianɛ a, a ma gbasaya din a ma. Nn‑na chɛ fɔ wan wo ye a kɔma a gbau gbau, mbɛ Mansa Yataa ɛ mɔɛ n tɔɔ‑a wan, miin mbe ko bonda chɛ sima ma‑a.
Yataa ma mmɔ chee ni a ta mɔɛ n na, ma koe a fɔɛ yama an dɔ. Chɛɛ ma koe a mu tenchen a ko a.
Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe ban‑da kan chɛ ɔ, a ee ma‑a ka ban‑da mɔ gbu an dɔ. Chɛɛ ɛ ma‑a ka a kan kɔ sɔ‑a Yataa an na, min‑na a Nyina bea wo fɛ.
Tima yayi mu, gboo nyɛn koe a wo tena, a fɔ koe a wo ye, mbɛ wo ni to wo bɔ Chisianɛ n na. Yataa wandi‑a wo kan, wo e kun buɛ min dɔ to koe a wo nyɔn na.
Wo sin gbu, tea ko a, wo sɔnɛ ɛ ka wan Chisian chɛ n gbɛɛ tena, miin mbe Masidonia chɛnyɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ nn suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, nn mbe wo disa tena, min mbe a ma, wo gbu ni to an na, a ben chɛ ma.

Wo a ɔ yen, mbɛ wo e ma‑a fɔɛ min dɔ, sɔnkɔ sɔnkɔ fɔɛ ma. Wo ma wo da chɛ mɔɛ n 'na koe n dɔ. Wo ma wo boo chɛ mɔɛ n ta koe n dɔ, wo ni wo ta to. Wo wai bia wo boo fea a. A kɔma wɛɛ a, nn na‑a a fɔ ka wan wo ye, a ma koe a.
Ni wo‑a chɛ ma, basɔmaya ɛ ma‑a wan wo ma chɛ n tena, miin mu Yataa sɔn bai n na. A sin, wo ee na‑a mɔ ɔ mɔ ya ɔ fɛn‑da fen fen ko a, wo e to‑a min na.
Nn suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, nn toen mu wo ni tea ɔ sɔn, a si chɛ n ma, miin na‑a an kai fa Chisɔsi a, an mbe e na to fa‑a. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, wo faa ee yɔn‑da, yɔ mɔɛ chɛ nu, yiinatɛ ee miin dɔ.

Mmɔ gbɛɛ danden fan mu chɛ a, mbɛ Chisɔsi fa‑a wan, a‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, a ka saya ɔ. A sin, mmɔ danden fan mu to chɛ a, Yataa ɛ min ma‑a mɔɛ chɛ n na. Mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin na‑a an kai fa Chisɔsi a, aan an fa‑a. Ni Chisɔsi na‑a to, Yataa ɛ a ma‑a wan, an bɛɛ ni na, an bɛ Chisɔsi a.

Mansa Chisɔsi ɛ na‑a tee min na, mmɔ wɛn mbe ma‑a fɔɛ a, mmɔ pɛn mbe ee a tan‑da. Mmɔ ee mmɔ kɔɔ sɔ‑a, mɔɛ chɛ n ya ɔ, miin na‑a fa, ta koe a mmɔ ni a tan. Nn mbe ka wo kan‑da min na, Mansa Chisɔsi wandi da a bai an nɛ.

Kuiɛ ɛ a fɔ‑a wan mɔɛ n ye, an mbe koe min ma. Chɛ ɛ ma‑a Yataa 'a maeka chenama kuiɛ an na, Yataa 'a buu kuiɛ. A sin, Mansa Chisɔsi wandi ɛ yii‑a wan, a ka banda bu ɔ. Chɛ gbakɔ, mbɛ mɔɛ miin na‑a an kai fa Chisɔsi a, aan an fa‑a, an pɛn mbe an kɔɔ sɔ‑a, an ni yɛ fɔɛ ɔ.
Mbɛ a tima chɛ a, mmɔ wɛn mbe ma‑a fɔɛ ɔ, mmɔ bɛ an na, mmɔ gbɛɛ ɛ ya a wan, mmɔ a ni sɔn dugbu ɔ banda a. Chɛ an mbe ma‑a, mmɔ ni Mansa Chisɔsi tan. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, mmɔ bɛ ni ma kuɔ fɔ ko a.
Chɛ ko a gbɛ, wo wo nyɔn faa ma nande bai chɛ n na.
Nn suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, gboo nyɛn gbu ee nn ma, a ɔ yian koe a wo a, koe chɛ n gbɛɛ n mbe ma‑a tima min na. Chɛ ma, nn ni a ɔ yian, ni an gbu an mbe ma‑a buɛ min dɔ.
Koe min na mu, wo wandi gbu‑a a ɔ sɔn fan chɛndɛ chɛ, mbɛ mmɔ 'a mansa na tima ɛ che tena wan. Ɛ ma‑a wan, yɔ kanka ɛ mɔɛ tɛnɛ buɛ min dɔ pimbi ɔ.

Mɔɛ n mbe ma‑a a fɔ‑a dechee, an dɔ, “A yama ee nɛ,” an dɔ, “koe n dɔ chimaen mu,” a tima chɛ a mu, kasaa ɛ an tan‑da. Ɛ an tɛnɛ‑a wan, yɔ bu ɔ tɛ ɛ musu tɛnɛ buɛ min dɔ. A sin, mɔɛ n kun mbe ee bɔ‑a a ɔ.
Chɛɛ nn suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo tana, wo ee pimbi ɔ. Chɛ an fɛ mu, an tee chɛ ee che wo tɛnɛ‑a yɔ kanka ɛ na buɛ min dɔ.
Wo gbɛɛ mu mɔɛ n fan na, miin mbe manɛ kɔɔ, miin mbe an tee chɛ ko a. Mɔɛ nu ma mmɔ a, miin mbe ee manɛ kɔɔ, miin mbe pimbi pimbi ɔ.
Chɛ ko a, mmɔ ma ma chinɔɛ ɔ, yɔ mɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ nu. Chɛɛ mmɔ ni ma mmɔ ya a tima ɔ tima ko a, mmɔ yiima sienɛ ɛ chidi.
Pimbi ɔ mu, mɔɛ n mbe chinɔ. A yɛ to, pimbi ɔ mu, gbɛ ɛ mɔɛ n bia.

Chɛɛ mmɔ tana, tee kɔɔ mɔɛ mu mmɔ a, mmɔ yiima sien fan mu chidi. Mmɔ kai faenɛ ni ma Yataa a, mmɔ ni to mɔ dɔ mende n na. Chɛ ni mmɔ konde gbain, yɔ a 'a chɛɛ chɛ doma an mbe mmɔ ma. Yiinatɛ ni ma mmɔ ɔ, mbɛ bauncha ɛ wan mmɔ ko a. Chɛ ni ma chɛɛ chɛ banfua a mmɔ kun na.
Yataa ma mmɔ ya ni a ta mɔɛ n na, a ma koe an na, a ni faa tɛ‑a bɔ mmɔ ma, mmɔ ni tɔɔya ɔ bia. Chɛɛ a ma koe mu, mmɔ ni bauncha ma sɔn, a ka mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi a.
A wan fa‑a mmɔ ko a, min mbe a ma, mmɔ bɛ ni ma fɔɛ dɔndɔɛ ɔ. Tima min na ɛ na‑a to, mmɔ ni ma fɔɛ ɔ wan, mmɔ faen fan ni ma, chɛ ɛ ma‑a wan.
Chɛ ko a, wo e ka a ma‑a buɛ min dɔ sanche, wo ma yɛ to kuu kɔ. Wo wo nyɔn faa ma nande, wo ni basan wo nyɔn ma.

Nn suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, nn mbe wo disa tena, wo ni basɔmaya da faenɛ be wo ya ɔ sɔɛ n ma, wo bɛ ɛ miin na. An fan mbe wai chɛ tena wo ko a, an mbe koe n dɔ yian wo a, an mbe wo sɔ‑a chia ma, koe n dɔ, a si Mansa Chisɔsi ma.
Wo basɔmaya wa be an ma, wo ni koadia yian an na, an 'na wai ko a, an mbe min chɛ tena. Faachima ni ma wo gbɛɛ tɛ ɔ.
Nn suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, nn mbe wo ɔ tisa tena, wo ni dasi be baa baa tɔɛ n ma. Chiandia koo miin gboo ɔ, wo ni an faa ma nande, mbɛ wo‑a chɛ n deman, miin dɔ ma gbɛ. Wo wo faa bia mɔ ɔ mɔ a.
Wo a ɔ yen, mbɛ wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ ma ko yama a yɛ ko yama ko a. Chɛɛ wo a ma wo ma gbɔsɔɛ a, tima ɔ tima ko a, wo ni ko chɛndɛ ma wo nyɔn na, wo ni a ma mɔ dɔ gbɛɛ n bɛɛ a.
Wo bu ɔ diama ni ma tima ɔ tima.
Wo samunɛ chɛ tima ɔ tima.
Wo ma min chɛ‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Chisɔsi Chasi a, Yataa toen mu wo ni chɛ an ma. Ko ɔ ko ni wo tan, wo ni a wai bɔ.
Wo ma wo boo sɔ Yataa Nyina ya ɔ, a 'a wai chɛ koe a wo ɔ.
Yataa ɛ a 'a sakana bai min be mɔɛ n ma, a ɔ yian koe a wo a, wo ma ban an bai chɛ n dɔ.
Chɛɛ wo an gbɛɛ ma fɛn bɛ, min nyin, mbɛ wo‑a wo boo a chii a ma.
Min kɔ min sin mu ko yama a, wo ma wo boo chɛ a ɔ.

Yataa wandi, min mbe faachima be mmɔ ma, a ni a ma wo ni ma a ko a tenchen chia ɔ chia a. A ni wo kun ma fɛn chia gbɛɛ a. Mabɔ kan kɔ kan ma ma wo ma, wo 'a fɔɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, tima min na mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi ɛ na‑a.
Yataa min‑na mmɔ chee a ta mɔɛ n na, ɛ chɛ ma‑a wan. A ee a da a kuiɛ yɔn mmɔ tena.
Nn suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo samunɛ chɛ nn ko a.
Mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, miin kai faen mu Chisɔsi a, wo an kɔndɔn koadia faa a.
Mansa Chisɔsi ɛ mmɔ yen tena. N mbe na tena chɛ an ma din‑da wo tena gbau gbau. Mbɛ wo ni gboo nyɛnden chɛ kan chɛ n gbɛɛ tena, miin kai faen mu a a.
Mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi ni wo dua.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ TƐSADONIKA KO A
verse_text: Nn fan mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena, n fan Pɔɔ, Sidasi, ni Timoti. Nn mbe a nyɛn tena wo wan chɔchi mɔɛ chɛ n fan tena, pan Tɛsadonika duu ɔ. Wo wɛn mbe kuiɛ dɔndɔya ɔ, wo bɛ mmɔ Fa Yataa a, an fea Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ TƐSADONIKA KO A
verse_text: Mmɔ Fa Yataa, an fea Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi a, an 'na dua ni ma wo ma, a basan an 'na faachima a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ TƐSADONIKA KO A
verse_text: Nn suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, nn mbe samunɛ chɛ tena tima ɔ tima wo ko a. A sin nyin fan nn ni a ma ka. Koe min na mu, wo 'a kaifa Chisɔsi a, a ma ɛ munda tena wan kaka. A sin to, koadia ma ɛ munda tena wan wo faa ɔ, wo nyɔn ko a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ TƐSADONIKA KO A
verse_text: Chɛ an fɛ mu, nn bɛɛ, nn mbe koɔ chɔchi tɔɛ chɛ n dɔ, nn kunɛ kɔɔ sɔenɛ a, a si wo ma. A si wo e koe n dɔ bia tena buɛ min dɔ. An mbe a ma tena wɛɛ wo e tɔɔ tena, wo kai faenɛ mu tun Chisɔsi a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ TƐSADONIKA KO A
verse_text: Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɛ a ɔ yian tena wan, mbɛ Yataa ɛ tea kaa an na tɛ. Wo e tɔɔya min dɔ yen tena, Yataa 'a mansaya an ko a mu, banda bu ɔ. Wo e ka tɔɔ‑a buɛ min dɔ, an mbe wo ma‑a mɔɛ n na, miin mbe kun an ni don a 'a mansaya kɔɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ TƐSADONIKA KO A
verse_text: Yataa ɛ ma‑a an tea kaa chɛ sin na tɛ‑a, ɛ a ma‑a wan mɔɛ chɛ n ni ko yawaenɛ ɔ yen, miin‑na ko yawaenɛ sa wo ma.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ TƐSADONIKA KO A
verse_text: Mbɛ wo wɛn sin na‑a an ko yawaen chɛ ɔ bia, Yataa ɛ bauncha be‑a wan wo ma. Ɛ a be‑a wan n bɛɛ ma, a basan nn bɔɛ n bɛɛ a. Ɛ chɛ ma‑a wan, tima min na Yataa ɛ Mansa Chisɔsi yian‑da, a ka banda bu ɔ, an bɛ a 'a maeka wa n na.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ TƐSADONIKA KO A
verse_text: Ɛ na‑a wan ta man ba ɔ, an bɛ a 'a maeka n na, mɔɛ chɛ n tɔɔ koe a, miin ban‑da Yataa ɔ. An sin nii ma bea ni sakana bai chɛ fɛ, a si mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi ma.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ TƐSADONIKA KO A
verse_text: Yataa ɛ a ma‑a wan, an ni tɔɔya ɔ yen, an ni kasaa kuɔ fɔ ko a. An tɛ duenɛ an mbe ma‑a mmɔ 'a mansa a, an mbe ee ma‑a a 'a manɛ kɔɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ TƐSADONIKA KO A
verse_text: Chɛ an mbe ma‑a, ɛ na‑a tima min na an tee wa chɛ ma, tando ma sɔn koe a, a basan basɔmaya a. A ma sɔn koe a, a ka a ta mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ a, miin kai faen mu a a. Wo wɛɛ, wo e ma‑a wan an tɛ ɔ. Koe min na mu, wo‑a wo kai fa sakana bai chɛ a, nn‑na min fɔ wo ye.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ TƐSADONIKA KO A
verse_text: Chɛ an fɛ mu, nn mbe samunɛ chɛ wo ko a tima ɔ tima ko a. Nn mbe mmɔ 'a Yataa fai tena, min mbe a ma, wo ni kun ma koe a fɔɛ chɛ ɔ, a‑a wo chee ma koe a min dɔ. A ni a ma, a 'a gbasaya ɔ, wo ni che wo faa ma koe chɛndɛ gbɛɛ ma‑a. A yɛ to, wo kai faenɛ min chɛenɛ ɛ Chisɔsi a, a ni a ma wo ni koe gbɛɛ ma, wo e min ma.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ TƐSADONIKA KO A
verse_text: Chia chɛ a mu, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi tɔɛ ɛ basɔmaya ma sɔn‑da, a ka wo a. A sin, wo wɛɛ, wo e basɔmaya ma sɔn‑da wan, a ka a a. Yataa 'a koadia demanɛ, an fea mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi a, an mbe a ma‑a chɛ ni ma.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ TƐSADONIKA KO A
verse_text: N mbe bai sa tena gbɛ, a si mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi yɛ koe ma to dunya chɛ ɔ, a ni mmɔ a sɔn sɔn kaina dɔndɔɛ, a wandi tena. Nn suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, nn mbe wo disa tena wan.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ TƐSADONIKA KO A
verse_text: Nn ma to ni wo 'a fiienɛ ni ma, a si a ma. Wo ma don faagbaa ɔ, ni mɔɛ dɔ n‑na a fɔ wo ye, mbɛ Mansa Chisɔsi na tee wa gbu che‑a. Kɔkɔɛ ɛ wan an mɔɛ chɛ n yii ma, mbɛ nn na‑a chɛ fɔ wo ye chia chɛ an na. A ni ma kɔɛ tima chɛ a, nn ni bai chɛ fɔ tena tima min na, Yataa na‑a min fɔ nn ye, a fɔ koe a mɔɛ n ye. Chɛ ma, tima chɛ a, da ɔ sakana gbama mu, nn‑na min na ben gboo nyɛndenɛ ɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ TƐSADONIKA KO A
verse_text: Wo ma dɔn mɔ ɔ mɔ ni wo bun ɛnden bɛɛ a. Koe min na mu, an tee chɛ ee na tena wɛ, aan tima ni che, mɔɛ sɛsɛ n mbe na‑a wan sɔ‑a Yataa a kan. Mbɛ mɔɛ min mbe ee sawa kɔɔ, a bɔ‑a ya a ma. A tana, ɛ gbɛ nɔ kasaa koe an na.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ TƐSADONIKA KO A
verse_text: Ɛ Yataa ma bɔ‑a wan, a ni fen fen ma bɔ, an mbe miin fai an 'na Yataa a. Ɛ na‑a a wandi a sɛ‑a wan peche peche, a maenɛ ɛ mbɛ a kan nyɔ ee. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, a ni don Yataa 'a chenɛ a, a ni si nɔ. A ni a wandi yian nɔ mɔ ɔ mɔ a, mbɛ a wan gbu mu Yataa a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ TƐSADONIKA KO A
verse_text: N na‑a chɛ gbɛɛ fɔ wan wo ye, mmɔ bɛ ni tima min na. A gbu sin mbe wan wo yii ma gban.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ TƐSADONIKA KO A
verse_text: Chɛɛ wo‑a a sɔn fan, koe min‑na a ma, a ma na nin bɛ. Wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ tima chɛndɛ kɔɔ mu, ɛ a wandi yian‑da.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ TƐSADONIKA KO A
verse_text: Mɔ sɛsɛ n gbu, an mbe gbɛ koe chɛ n ma‑a nun dɔ, Yataa ma dɔn ni mmɔ ni miin ma. Chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ, min mbe a a gban tena, ɛ to‑a wan a a gban‑da, aan ɛ ka‑a chia a tima min na.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ TƐSADONIKA KO A
verse_text: A tima chɛ a mu, mɔɛ min mbe ee sawa kɔɔ, ɛ yen‑da wan. Chɛɛ ni Mansa Chisɔsi na‑a to, fia min mbe bɔ‑a dechee a da ɔ, an mbe an mɔɛ chɛ fa‑a. Chisɔsi ɛ ma‑a man ba min dɔ, an mbe an mɔɛ chɛ kasaa‑a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ TƐSADONIKA KO A
verse_text: Mɔɛ chɛ, min mbe ee sawa kɔɔ, Sitana 'a gbasaya kan kɔ kan mbe ma‑a wan a boo ɔ. Ɛ na‑a kamaya ko wa sɛsɛ ma‑a wan, fania nu.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ TƐSADONIKA KO A
verse_text: Ɛ chia yama sɛsɛ ya‑a wan, a ni mɔɛ n bun. Mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin mbe na‑a kasaa‑a. An mbe kasaa‑a koe min na, an ma an boo si ni tea bai kɔɔ, a si Chisɔsi ma. A ma to ni a 'a tea a, min mbe a ma, an ni bauncha ma sɔn.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ TƐSADONIKA KO A
verse_text: Chɛ an‑na a ma, Yataa‑a gbasaya be, an bun koe a. Chɛ ni a ma, an ni dan fania chɛ gbɛɛ a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ TƐSADONIKA KO A
verse_text: Chɛ ɛ denɛ min suun‑da, an nɛ, Yataa ɛ kaa a tɛ‑a wan an gbɛɛ ma, an ni tɔɔ. An gbɛɛ, miin ma dan ni tea chɛ a, a si Chisɔsi ma. A yɛ to, an faa ma koe mu ko yama ma an na.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ TƐSADONIKA KO A
verse_text: Nn suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, a dindenɛ mu nn ma, Yataa wai bɔ koe a wo ko a tima ɔ tima. Wo ko a di mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi ye kaka. Yataa wɛɛ na‑a wo pɛn ya, bauncha ma sɔn koe a. A saa saa a, ɛ wo baun fan Yataa Nyina 'a gbasaya ɔ, min mbe a ma‑a, wo ni ma tenchen Yataa ko a. A yɛ to, wo dandenɛ min chɛen mu tea chɛ a, a si Chisɔsi ma, ɛ wo baun fan.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ TƐSADONIKA KO A
verse_text: Nn ni sakana bai chɛndɛ min sa ka wo tena, Yataa na‑a wo chee an dɔ, bauncha chɛ ma sɔn koe a. A na‑a wo chee, min mbe a ma, a ni basɔmaya be wo ma, yɔ a na‑a min nyɔn sima be mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi ma.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ TƐSADONIKA KO A
verse_text: Nn suun ma nyɔɛ nu, chɛ an fɛ mu, wo sɔ chidi, wo ni wo boo a chii tea bai chɛ n ma, nn na‑a wo kan miin na, nn ni Yataa bai sa wo tena tima min na, a basan chɛ n na, nn na‑a miin nyɛn gboo ɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ TƐSADONIKA KO A
verse_text: Nn mbe samunɛ chɛ tena, Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi tena, an fea mmɔ Fa Yataa a, min toen mu mmɔ a. A sin, ɛ mmɔ faa ma nande tima ɔ tima ko a. Koe min na mu, a 'a koadia demanɛ, a ma mmɔ a bea ni kuɔ fɔ. A sin, a na‑a yiinatɛ be wan mmɔ ma chɛndɛ chɛ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ TƐSADONIKA KO A
verse_text: A ni wo faa ma nande, wo ɔ ni gbɛa. Chɛ ni a ma, tima ɔ tima ko a, wo ni bai sa min nyin, a yɛ to, wo ni koe ma min nyin.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ TƐSADONIKA KO A
verse_text: A danka a gbɛ, nn suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo samunɛ chɛ nn ko a. An mbe a ma, sakana bai chɛ, a si Mansa Chisɔsi ma, a tɛ ma tɛ, a ni fasan a ɔ ben‑da bui chɛ bui chɛ a. A sin to, mɔɛ n ni an boo a si a kɔɔ basɔmaya a, yɔ wo‑a a ma buɛ min dɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ TƐSADONIKA KO A
verse_text: Wo samunɛ chɛ to nn ko a, Yataa ni nn kunɛ bɔ faa kɔɔen tɔɛ n boo ɔ, mɔ yama nu. Koe min na mu, mɔɛ gbɛɛ ma, min kai faen mu Chisɔsi a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ TƐSADONIKA KO A
verse_text: Chɛɛ Mansa Chisɔsi ee a da a kuiɛ yɔn. Ɛ a ma‑a wan wo faa ni sɔ, a ni wo kun ma fɛn Sitana boo ɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ TƐSADONIKA KO A
verse_text: Mansa Chisɔsi sin mbe a ma tena wan, nn mbe nn yii fa wo ma. Nn sin danden fan mu a a, mbɛ wo e wan koe chɛ n ma‑a, nn na‑a miin fɔ wo ye an ma koe a. Wo sin, wo e an fan na tun‑da an ma koe a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ TƐSADONIKA KO A
verse_text: Nn mbe samunɛ chɛ tena Mansa Chisɔsi tena, wo ni a ɔ sɔn chɛndɛ chɛ, Yataa toen mu wo a buɛ min dɔ. Wo ni a ɔ sɔn to, Chisɔsi na‑a ko yawaenɛ min nyɔn dɔ bia, a sin mbe a ma tena wo wɛɛ, wo e a ɔ bia.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ TƐSADONIKA KO A
verse_text: Nn suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, nn mbe chɛ fɔ tena wo ye gbau gbau, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi tɔɛ ɔ. Wo ma gbɛn suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ ma, miin mbe gboo ɔ fa bɔ tena an 'na fɔɛ ɔ. A sin, an mbe ee bea tena koe chɛ n fɛ, nn na‑a min fɔ an ye.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ TƐSADONIKA KO A
verse_text: Gboo ɔ fa tɔ nii ma nn na, tima min na mmɔ bɛ ni. Wo sin gbu‑a a ɔ sɔn fan chɛndɛ chɛ, mbɛ wo e bea nn chen gba chɛ an fɛ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ TƐSADONIKA KO A
verse_text: Nn nii ma dɔn ni, nn ni fen kɔ fen bia mɔ ɔ mɔ boo ɔ, gbama gbama a. Nn na‑a wai chɛ wan nn sɔɛ gbɛɛ a, su ɔ tee a, min mbe a ma, nn ma koe ma na si wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ kun ma.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ TƐSADONIKA KO A
verse_text: Nn na‑a chɛ ma koe min na, an nii ma a fɔ ni, mbɛ tea nii nn boo ɔ, wo ɔ tisa koe a nn kɔ koe a. Chɛɛ nn na‑a chɛ ma, ma koe an na tɔmɔsi a, wo e che bea‑a min fɛ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ TƐSADONIKA KO A
verse_text: Nn ni chɛ an fɔ wo ye, mmɔ bɛ ni tima min na. Mbɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ, min ban‑da wai ma, wo ma a ma a ni daunɛ chɛ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ TƐSADONIKA KO A
verse_text: Nn‑na a a min fan, mbɛ wo bɔɛ dɔ n mbe wan wo tɛ ɔ, miin gboo ɔ faen mu. An mbe ee wai ɔ wai chɛ, fɔ dechee an da chɛ koe a an bɔ n ta koe n dɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ TƐSADONIKA KO A
verse_text: Nn mbe an mɔɛ chɛ n na si tena, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi tɔɛ ɔ, an ni ma fɔɛ chɛndɛ ɔ. An ni wai chɛ, an da a daun fenɛ ko a. An dimu, an ni chɛ ma.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ TƐSADONIKA KO A
verse_text: Chɛɛ wo wan, nn suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo gboo ɔ ma fa ko chɛndɛ ma koe a.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ TƐSADONIKA KO A
verse_text: Mɔɛ ɛ ma‑a wan kɔɛ nɔ, min ban‑da koe chɛ n ma koe a, nn‑na koe miin nyɛn gboo chɛ ɔ wo tena. Ni ɛ ka wan, wo wo ya gba sa an mɔɛ chɛ ma. Wo sin gbu ma gbɛn a ma, min mbe a ma, a ni mau a wandi ma.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ TƐSADONIKA KO A
verse_text: Chɛɛ wo ma a ya, wo chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ a. Wo e min ma, wo a a si, yɔ wo suun ma nyɔnɛ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ TƐSADONIKA KO A
verse_text: Nn mbe samunɛ chɛ tena, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi wandi, mmɔ 'a faachima ɛ ka min tena, a ni faachima be wo ma tima ɔ tima ko a. A ni a be wo ma, chia ɔ chia a. A ni ma wo gbɛɛ kɔ.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ TƐSADONIKA KO A
verse_text: N fandi gbu, n fan Pɔɔ, n fan mbe ka gboo chɛ nyɛn‑da, n ni wo kɔndɔn. N mbe n tɔɛ nyɛn ka wan n 'na gboo nyɛndenɛ n gbɛɛ ɔ. N mbe n 'na gboo n nyɛn ka wan.

book_name: GBOO FEAN BƆƐ TƐSADONIKA KO A
verse_text: Mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi ni wo gbɛɛ dua.

N fan Pɔɔ, n fan mbe ka gboo chɛ nyɛn‑da i tena, i wan Timoti. N 'na denɛ mu gbɛ i a, i 'a danaya ko a Yataa a. Mɔ yii na tɛen mu Chisɔsi Chasi an ma. A sin, a 'a sɔ mɔɛ mu n na, mɔ baun mɔɛ Yataa 'a gbasaya ɔ, an fea a wan Chisɔsi Chasi a. Mmɔ Fa Yataa, an fea mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi a, an 'na dua ni ma i ma, an 'na chinchimaya ni ma i ma, a basan an 'na faachima a.

N toen mu i ni ma Ɛfisɔsi duu ɔ wan. I ma ka nɔ, yɔ n na‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ i ye, tima min na ni n mbe ta‑a Masidonia chɛnyɛ ɔ. Mɔɛ chɛ nu Ɛfisɔsi, miin mbe ka fania kan chɛ a, a fɔ an ye an ni sɛmbɛ a a.

An na si an ni sɛmbɛ tai a bɔɛ a, an mbe ta‑a suunɛ ma dan‑da ta‑a aan. Chɛ ɛ na dechee kɔɔsa an na, an mbe ee deman chɛ, Yataa 'a yiinachii mmɔ ko a, a ni ta ya ɔ ma. Danaya an mbe a ma Yataa 'a yiinachii mmɔ ko a, a ni ta ya ɔ ma.
Chɛ fɔen mu i ye, min mbe a ma, koadia ni ma nɔ. Koadia min kaen mu faa ɔ gbɛenɛ ɔ, yiima a koenɛ fion, a basan danaya gbau gbau a Yataa a.
Dɔ n‑na an kan kɔ sɔ dan koe a chɛ n na, mbɛ an‑na an boo chɛ wooya kɔɔsa bia n dɔ.
An toen mu an ni mɔɛ n kan Mosisi 'a sawa a, an kuiɛ ma sɛenɛ a. Chɛɛ an ma sawa gbu ɔ gbɛ ni, a basan koe chɛ n na, sawa ɛ min fɔ tena.
Mɔ‑a a ɔ yen gbɛ, mbɛ ni sawa chɛ bia‑a chɛndɛ chɛ, sawa chɛndɛ mu a a.

Mɔɛ miin mbe don sawa kɔɔ, a ee sa an fan ko a. Chɛɛ ɛ sa mɔ yama n fan ko a, miin mbe ee sawa ya, an mbe ee don a kɔɔ, Yataa sɔn bai nu, miin mbe a gbɛnɛ ma bon. Ɛ chɛ n fan ko a, miin mbe an fa n fa, an ni an de n fa, an bɛ mɔ fa mɔɛ n na.

A yɛ to, ɛ ko tɛ mɔɛ chɛ n fan ko a, mɔɛ miin mbe an bɔ mɔ kaima mun an 'na musu a. Mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ, miin mbe fania fɔ, ni miin mbe fania siiya chɛ. Mɔ ma tachɛ mɔɛ nu, ni miin mbe koe n ma, min kaen mu kan chɛndɛ chia ma.
Kan chɛ ɛ kamaya sakana bai chɛndɛ an dɔ, Yataa wandi, mmɔ ɛ min tando, a‑a min be n ma.
N mbe Chisɔsi Chasi wai bɔ tena, mmɔ 'a mansa. An‑na a yii na chii n na, mbɛ n danayaen fan mu wai chɛ koe a a ko a. A‑a gbasaya wɛɛ be n ma a chɛ koe a.
N na‑a a main fan, mbɛ n‑na ko ma gbaaenɛ si a 'a mɔɛ n na. Chɛɛ Yataa chinchin‑da wan n ma, koe min na mu, danaya nii n dɔ a tima a Chisɔsi Chasi ko a, a sin, n nii ma a ɔ sɔn n ni koe min ma tena.
Mmɔ 'a mansa 'a bauncha koadia yii‑a n kun na. Chɛ‑a danaya chɛ wan n dɔ Chisɔsi Chasi ko a, a basan koadia a. Chɛ an mbe ma mmɔ a, ni mmɔ ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, mmɔ bɛ Chisɔsi Chasi a.
Tea bai yen ko, Chisɔsi Chasi na‑a dunya ɔ ko yama ma mɔɛ n baun koe an na. Kɔɔsa bia kan kɔ kan mbe ee chɛ ma, a sin mbe nyan fan mɔ ni dan a a. N fan Pɔɔ, ko yama ma mɔɛ n 'na mansa mu n na.

Chɛɛ Yataa chinchin‑da n ma, min mbe a ma, Chisɔsi Chasi ni kun a ɔ yian‑da mɔɛ n na, ɛ a faa bia buɛ min dɔ ko yama ma mɔɛ n na. A 'a tɔmɔsi ma‑a n fan na, n fan mansa chɛ, ko yama ma mɔɛ n ko a. A 'a tɔmɔsi ma‑a n na, mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ tena, miin mbe an kai fa‑a Chasi a, kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ko a.
Tando ni ma gbɛ Mansa Wa tɔɛ ma, basɔmaya ni be a ma kuɔ fɔ, mansa min mbe ee fa, mɔ sin mbe ee a yen. Yataa dɔndɔ gbe mu an na. A ni ma ka.

N 'na den, Timoti, n toen mu n ni chɛ an fɔ i ye a ma koe a. I yii na chii bai chɛ n ma, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n na‑a min fɔ tee, a si i ma. An ya i faa a, min mbe a ma, i ni butuinɛ chɛ Chasi ko a, yɔ soya chɛndɛ.
Danaya Chisɔsi Chasi ko a, a fea yiima a koenɛ a, a bia i boo fea a. Mɔɛ dɔ n mbe sɛmbɛ wan dan koe a Chasi a, koe min na mu, an mbe koe ma an yiima ma dɔn ni, min ma koe a.
Mɔ dɔndɔ mu Imenayɔsi a, an fea Adɛsanda a. N‑na an be Sitana ma, a ni an na tɔɔya, min mbe a ma, an ni sɛmbɛ Yataa main‑da.
N mbe a fɔ tena wo ye, a saa saa a ɔ, mbɛ wo ni samunɛ chɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ ko a. A sin, ni wo ma‑a Yataa ɔ tisa‑a, wo a disa chinchin koe a an ma, wo ni yɛ to, wo ni a wai bɔ.

Samunɛ ni chɛ mansa n ko a, a basan mɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ n na, miin mbe sɔ tena nu. Chɛ ni ma, min mbe a ma, sɔnkɔ sɔnkɔɛ ni bɔ mmɔ 'a fɔɛ ɔ, mbɛ faachima ma‑a mmɔ ma, mmɔ ɛ ta‑a ma‑a Yataa fɔɛ ɔ, basɔmaya wɛɛ ɛ mmɔ ɔ chia ɔ chia a.
Samun bonda chɛ an nyin, a sin mbe mmɔ baun mɔɛ Yataa faa chima wan.
A mu min na, a toen mu mɔ ɔ mɔ ni tea chia sɔn, mɔ ɔ mɔ ni bauncha ma sɔn.
Koe min na mu, Yataa ɛ dɔndɔ gbe. A sin, mɔ dɔndɔ gbe an mbe mmɔ tɛ mmɔ bɛ a a. A mɔɛ chɛ mu Chisɔsi Chasi an na,
min‑na a wandi fɔɛ be, min mbe a ma, a ni mmɔ gbɛɛ kun ka. Chɛ‑a a ɔ yian fan a tima chɛ a, mbɛ tima gbu an che‑a ka, Yataa toen mu mmɔ gbɛɛ ni bauncha ma sɔn.
Chɛ ko a mu, a‑a n ya sɔ mɔɛ a, sakana bai chɛndɛ ɔ yian koe a. N ni mɔɛ n kan, Chu mɔ ma miin na, dan koe a Chisɔsi a, a basan tea sakana bai chɛndɛ a. N mbe ka tea an fɔ‑a, fania ma chɛ a.
Ɛ n ta faa ɔ, mbɛ mɔ kaima nu kan kɔ kan an ni samunɛ chɛ Yataa tena. Ni an sin ma‑a a chɛ‑a, an tandenɛ ni ma, an faa ee tɛ, an mbe ee koɛ wɛɛ chɛ.
N toen mu to musu n bɛɛ ni basɔmaya ma bɛnɛ chɛ. An ma an fandi a bonchen ba chɛ. An ma an kunɛ ma chɛ, an ni sanu chii, an ni fen baa gbɛ ma chɛ an ma, a basan koa baa gbanden ba a.
Chɛɛ an ni an fandi a bonchen an chɛ chɛ wai chɛndɛ ɔ, min ma biaen mu Yataa sɔn mɔɛ ko a.
Ni an ma‑a kanɛ kɔɔ, musu n ni an fandi ma yii chia ɔ chia a, an sin ma an da a kuiɛ ma sɛ.
Musu n ta mu si koe an na gbɛ. N mbe ee dɔn musu ni sɔ mɔ kaima n ya ɔ, n mbe ee dɔn a ni an kan.
Koe min na mu, Yataa‑a Adami pɛn pɛn nyan, a e na to Ifi a dan‑da.
A sin, ka nii ma Adami an woo ni, a na‑a Ifi an woo, min‑na a ma, a ma‑a ko yama ma mɔɛ a.
Chɛɛ musu n mbe bauncha sɔn‑da wan den suunɛ ɔ. Chɛ ɛ ma wan, ni yiimatɛ ma‑a an tachɛ buɛ ɔ, koadia ɛ an faa ɔ, an sin tandenɛ ɛ Yataa tena, an mbe ta‑a an kai fa‑a a a.
Tea bai yen ko, ni mɔɛ toen mu ya ɔ sɔ ya a chɔchi ɔ, a‑a wai chɛndɛ an ya ka.
A mɔɛ chɛ ɛ ma mɔ tandenɛ an na. Musu dɔndɔ gbe an mbe ma a boo ɔ, mɔɛ min kosan a wandi bia‑a, basɔmaya tɔɛ, sonda bia mɔɛ, a sin kosan mɔɛ n kan‑da.
A ee gbɛ wa min, faagbandia tɔ ma a a, chɛɛ a ni ma mɔɛ a min faa chimaen mu, a ee koɔ yan. A sin, kɔpɔɛ wako ee a faa ɔ kaka.
Ɛ ma mɔɛ an na min kunden mu a 'a chenɛ ma chɛndɛ chɛ, a 'a denɛ n kooenɛ a ye, an sin kanden mu chia ɔ chia a.
A mu min na, ni mɔɛ ma kun ni a wandi gbu ta chenɛ ma, a ee kun a ni che koe ɔ bɛn‑da chɔchi ɔ.
A ni ma mɔɛ an na min kai faen mu Chisɔsi a tima dɔ ko a. Chɛɛ ni tima kundu ko a mu dechee, kɔkɔɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, a ni dɔpandaya bɔ. A sin, Yataa ee a tɔɔya‑a, yɔ Sitana ma‑a buɛ min dɔ.
A sɔnɛ ma ni kawa mɔɛ chɛ n ye, miin mbe baa kɔ, min mbe a ma, an mbe ee tɔ yama si‑a a kun ma, mbɛ a chɛɛ‑a Sitana 'a gbai a.
Mɔɛ miin bɛɛ ɛ chɔchi ɔ demanɛ chɛ‑a, an ni ma basɔmaya tɔɛ n na. An ma ma nɛnɛn fea ti n na, an ma gbɛ wa min, an sin, kɔpɔɛ koe ma ma an faa ɔ kaka.
An ni an boo a chii tea chɛ ma, Yataa‑a min kɔɔ yian. An yiima, a ni ko, a si an tea chɛ ma.
An dɔ ni siman pɛn. Ni an‑na an dɔ siman chɛ ben, mbɛ an‑na a kuu sɔ demanɛ chɛ‑a chɔchi ɔ.
A musu n bɛɛ sɔnɛ a ni dondan, an ma tɔ ɔ tɛ chɛ, an ni ma basɔmaya tɔɛ n na, an tandenɛ ni ma ko ɔ ko ɔ.
Mɔɛ miin mbe demanɛ chɛ chɔchi ɔ, musu dɔndɔ an mbe ma an boo ɔ. An ni kun an 'na chenɛ bia‑a chɛndɛ chɛ, a basan an 'na denɛ n na.
Deman chɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin mbe an 'na wai chɛ‑a chɛndɛ chɛ, an mbe baa sɔn‑da wan an fandi ko a. An sin mbe kun‑da wan an ni koɔ, an kuiɛ ma sɛenɛ a, a si an 'na danaya ma Chisɔsi Chasi a.
N toen mu n ni na i tan sanche. Chɛɛ n mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena i tena, min mbe a ma,

ni n ma fua ni na‑a, gboo nyɛnden chɛ, ɛ a ɔ yian‑da wan i a, mɔɛ ɛ tachɛ buɛ min dɔ, Yataa 'a mɔɛ n tɛ ɔ. An mu chɔchi an na, Yataa, min mbe ee fa kuɔ fɔ ko a, a waa a, Chisian danaya kuu si tena, ni a kɔɔ sɔ kɔnɛ.

Mɔ ɔ mɔ ee che chɛ kɔɔsa bia‑a, mbɛ koe nu, Yataa‑a min dɔ yian mmɔ a, tea mu an na. A na‑a mɔgbuya an dɔ. Yataa Nyina‑a tea be a ma. Maeka n‑na a yen. A wakoe ɔ yian‑da wan dunya a. A sin dunya‑a a kai fa a a. Yataa‑a a ya a sɛ‑a manɛ ɔ.
Chɛɛ Yataa Nyina ɔ, tima ɛ che‑a wan mɔɛ n ni sɛmbɛ dan koe a Chisɔsi Chasi a, mbɛ an bea nyina yama da a kuiɛ fɛ, a basan fania kanɛ a.
Kan yama bonda chɛ nu, ɛ ka fania yama kan chɛ mɔɛ n fan na. Gbasaya min mbe a ma, an ni ko chɛndɛ ya bɔ ko yama a, a ee to an dɔ. A maen mu yɔ an yiima faen fan mu an dɔ.

An dɔ, mɔ ee musu si, a ee kai sɔn, a basan daun fenɛ dɔsa daun koe a. Chɛɛ Yataa‑a daun fen chɛ n na bɔ an daun koe an na, mɔɛ n boo ɔ, miin danden mu a a. An sin mbe a wai bɔ pɛn samunɛ ɔ, mbɛ an‑na a daun.
Yataa‑a fenɛ min gbɛɛ a dan, a nyin fan. A dɔndɔ wɛɛ ma nyin mɔ ni ban a ɔ, ni mɔ‑a min kɔ min ma sɔn wai bɔɛ ɔ.
Koe min na mu, Yataa 'a bai a basan samunɛ a, ɛ fen chɛ n dua wan.
Ni i gboo ɔ ma fa ni dasi chɛ be koe a suun ma nyɔɛ n ma, ni i‑a Chisian danaya ɔ bai sa i faa ɔ, a basan kan chɛndɛ a, i bea‑a min fɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, e ma‑a wan wai chɛ mɔɛ chɛndɛ a Chisɔsi Chasi ko a.
I ma i boo chɛ tai ɔ, yiimatɛ ee min dɔ, a sin ma gbiti ni Yataa koe ma. Chɛɛ i wandi kan wai chɛ koe a Yataa ko a.
Ni wai mɛsɛ chɛ ɛ gboo ɔ gbɛa be wan mɔ ma, mbɛ Yataa 'a wai sin nyin fan chia ɔ chia a. A mu min na, mmɔ‑a a 'a tɔnɔnɛ ma sɔn fan bi tee chɛ a, a basan ya ɔ ma a.
Tea bai an nɛ. Kɔɔsa bia kan kɔ kan mbe ee chɛ ma, a sin mbe nyan fan mɔ ni dan a a.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ ɛ tɔɔ, mmɔ ɛ sɛchɛ kaka. Koe min na mu, mmɔ yiima gbɛɛ a tɛen mu Yataa an ma. A ee chinɔ ɛnden bɛɛ a, ɛ mmɔ baun, a bɛbɛɛ mmɔ wɛn danden mu a a.
N toen mu i ni gboo nyɛnden chɛ a ben an tena, mbɛ i‑a an kan.
I ma a ma mɔ ɔ mɔ ni a yii dɛn i ta kun ma, i kamin tɔngbɔya koe a. Chɛɛ ma tɔmɔsi a an ko a chia sɛsɛ a, i da a bai basan i sɔnɛ ɔ, koadia ɔ, danaya ɔ Chisɔsi a, a sin ma bɔ ee i sɔnɛ ma.
Yataa 'a gboo chɛ kan an tena, i ni an faa ma nande, mbɛ i‑a an kan, aan n ni na tima min na.
Yataa Nyina‑a fenɛ min be i ma, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n koɔ‑a tima min na, mbɛ chɔchi gbakoo n‑na an boo bun i ma, a bia i boo fea a.
Koe chɛ n ma i ma gbɔsɔɛ a, i ni i wandi be an ma koe a, min mbe a ma, mɔ ɔ mɔ ni a ɔ yen, e ta tena buɛ min dɔ ya ɔ ma.
Tima ya i ben buɛ a fɔɛ ɔ, a basan i‑a kan chɛ buɛ a. A ma yɔ n‑na a fɔ buɛ min dɔ i ye, min mbe a ma, i ni bauncha ma sɔn, wo bɛ i kuiɛ a min mɔɛ n na.
I ma koɔ ma sɛen chɛ chenan kai n tena. Chɛɛ koɔ a tena basɔmaya a, yɔ e koɔ buɛ min dɔ i fa tena. Kamin tɔngbɔɛ n bia yɔ i dɔ kaima nu.
Sunkun tɔngbɔɛ n bia yɔ i tensa musu nu, musu ko kan kɔ kan ma na i yii ma an ko a, mbɛ i‑a chenan musu n bia yɔ i de.
Basɔmaya demanɛ be fuinya musu n ma, miin mbe an fandi kun ye.

Chɛɛ ni denɛ n ma‑a fuinya musu min boo ɔ, ni mama n denɛ ma‑a min boo ɔ, an mbe e na to ko ɔ ko ma‑a, an ni an 'na Yataa wai ɔ yian chenɛ pɛn na. An mbe koe min chɛ‑a ka an woo mɔɛ chɛ n ye, an mbe ma‑a ka an ta kuiɛ an na yɛ‑a. Koe min na mu, Yataa faa ma koe an nɛ.
Fuinya musu chɛndɛ chɛndɛ, mɔ ee min boo ɔ, a yii faen mu Yataa an ma. Su ni tee a, ɛ samunɛ chɛ wan, ɛ ta‑a Yataa ɔ tisa‑a a deman koe a.
Chɛɛ fuinya musu min kunɛ a fuinden mu buɔdia bɔ koe a, a nɛnɛ ban‑da, a fɔɛ ɛ wɛɛ boo ɔ boo a sun da a.
Dasi chɛ n din mɔɛ n ma, min mbe a ma, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee a tɛɛ si‑a an ma, ko ɔ ko ko a.
Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ma a ya a mun ni a 'a mɔɛ n ma, a bɛbɛɛ a ta chenɛ a mɔɛ nu, a‑a a kan kɔ an sɔ ka a 'a danaya an na Chisɔsi a. A mɔɛ chɛ yau, a ni ben mɔɛ ma min ma a kai fa ni Chisɔsi a tee dɔndɔ wɛ.
Ni i ma‑a fuinya musu kan kɔ kan tɔɛ sa‑a tɔɛ chɛ n kun ma, a ni ma fuinya an na min benden mu san bi wɔdɔɛ ma. A sin a tanden fan ni a chɛɛ tena.

Mɔɛ n sin mbe a bai wan a 'a ko chɛndɛ maenɛ wɛɛ ko a, min ni a ɔ. Mbɛ musu mu a a, min‑na a 'a denɛ n bɔ a ɔ chɛndɛ chɛ, a‑a a boo si sonda n kɔɔ a 'a chenɛ a, a‑a ko chɛndɛ sɛsɛ ma Chisianɛ n na. Mɔɛ miin bɛ ni yakɔɔtawa ɔ, a‑a an deman, a sin‑na a wandi be ko chɛndɛ ma a a.
Chɛɛ fuinya musu miin ma che ni san bi wɔdɔɛ ɔ, i ma an tɔɛ chɛ a ɔ. A mu min na, ni kai sɔn sɔɛ‑a an bia, an mbe an kan kɔ sɔ‑a wan Chasi 'a wai a.
Ni an‑na chɛ ma, Yataa ɛ an bia‑a wan an da a kuiɛ saa a bɔ koe ma a ɔ.
A ka chɛ ma, an mbe a kuu sɔ wan nyapen nyapencha ma yan‑da, benbenɛ a chenɛ n kun ma. Min yau chɛ ma, an mbe tɔ tɛ chɛ wan a basan ko ɔ fɔɛ ma yanɛ a, bai n fɔɛ a min ma an fɔ bai a.
Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, n mbe to‑a wan fuinya musu tɔngbɔɛ ni kai sɔn to, an ni denɛ n suun, an ni an 'na chenɛ n kun ma fɛn. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan mmɔ chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ ee chia sɔn‑da, mmɔ tɔ yama a fasan koe a.
A mu min na, dɔ n ban‑da an kan kɔ sɔ‑a, bea koe a Sitana fɛ.

Ni musu kan kɔ kan, min kai faen mu Chisɔsi a, ni fuinya musu ma‑a a 'a suunɛ ɔ, a ni a kun ma fɛn. A ma a ma fuinya chɛ 'a suun fanka ma ni sa to chɔchi kun ma. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan fuinya musu chɛndɛ chɛndɛ n mbe ee na‑a demanɛ ma sɔn‑da.

Gbakoo chɛ nu, miin mbe chɔchi wai ma ti bia chɛndɛ chɛ, ɛ nyan fan an ni tɔnɔn fea ma sɔn, an 'na pawa basan basɔmaya a. A bɛbɛɛ chɛ nu, miin‑na an boo a chii kan chɛ ma, an sɔɛ dondenɛ ɛ Yataa 'a bai sa ma.
A mu min na, Yataa 'a gboo ɔ te, a ɔ, “I ma ninchi da a chii, ni a ma‑a fenɛ tɛn‑da,” a sin to, a ɔ, “Wai chɛ mɔɛ 'a tea mu a 'a pawa sɔn koe a.”
I ma koe ya ka dechee a si gbakoo ma, ni mɔ fea, sawa ma siiya bɔ ni a ma.
Tea fɔ an ye fanka ɔ, an fɛn mbe ko yama ma‑a, min mbe a ma, mɔɛ tɔɛ n ni chian.
N toen mu i ni dasi chɛ ya i sɔɛ a, i ma a to mɔ ko a, i sin ma a ɔ sii mɔ ko a. Yataa ɛ mɔ yen tena wan, Chisɔsi Chasi ɛ mɔ yen‑da, maeka n bɛɛ, Yataa‑a min ya, an‑na mɔ yen.
I 'a tima ya i boo bun koe a mɔɛ kun ma, a yian koe a gbakoo ya a. I 'a tima ya, mɔ dɔ mende 'a ko yama maenɛ a ee na sin i ma. To Yataa gbee an na tun.
A yen ko gboo ɔ bɔ tɔ ma i a. I ma yii dechee min, chɛɛ gbɛ sima wɛɛ, i bu ko a.
Mɔɛ dɔ n 'na ko yama maenɛ ɛ sa ɔ wan den, mɔ ɔ mɔ e na kaa a tɛ a ma. Chɛɛ dɔ n ta ɔ nunden fan mu, a ee fua bɔ‑a a yen koe a.
Ko chɛndɛ ma wɛɛ ɛ ka wan to, a ɔ yen fan paden. Chɛɛ ni a sin dɔ ma fua nin bɛ sɔn‑da, a ee to nun dɔ.
Mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ mbe yɔncha kɔɔ, an ni baa be an yɔn fa nu ma, min mbe a ma, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee na‑a bai yama sa‑a a si Yataa ma, a basan mmɔ 'a kan chɛ a.

Yɔn fa nu miin kai faen mu Chisɔsi a, an 'na yɔnɛ n ma tɛ an dɔ, kun dɔ an‑na a yen, mbɛ an gbɛɛ an mbe chia dɔndɔɛ an na. Chɛɛ an yɔn chɛ n ni wai chɛ an ko a an sɔɛ gbɛɛ a, a mu min na, an 'na tɔnɔnɛ ɛ ta tena an kai fa tena dɔndɔ gbe wan. N toen mu i ni koe chɛ n kan, i ni an ma din.
Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ 'a kanɛ ka‑a chia chɛ ma, a ma bea ni mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi 'a kan chɛ fɛ, a basan kan chɛ a a si ma koe ma Yataa fɔɛ ɔ,

a mɔɛ chɛ mu dɔpanda tɔɛ an na, a ma ko ɔ ko sɔn. Koɔ chɛ gbandi an mbe an ma, an sin mbe kɔɔsa bia chɛ wan kɔnɔ bai kan kɔ kan ma. Chɛ ɛ na toomaya an na, ko a fasanɛ, nyɔn mainɛ, a basan yii sɔ yama a an nyɔn na.
An sin mbe ma an nyɔn dɔ sawan sawanɛ an na su ɔ tee a, mɔɛ miin yiima a ma ko ni, a sin tea sima wɛɛ ee a ɔ. Ɛ wan an yii ma, mbɛ Yataa koe ee ta nyanɛ gbaa.
Tea gbu sin na, mɔɛ ɛ faachima min ma sɔn, ni mɔ ma‑a Yataa chia ma, an mu mmɔ 'a tɔnɔnɛ a.
Koe min na mu, mɔ ma na ni fen fen na dunya chɛ ɔ, mɔ sin mbe ee ta‑a fen fen na mɔ boo ɔ.
Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, ni mmɔ‑a daun fenɛ ma sɔn, a basan chii koa a, mmɔ faa ni chima chɛ a.
Chɛɛ miin toen mu an ni nyan, an mbe dɛ kan gbɛnɛ an dɔ, mbɛ an chɛɛ‑a Sitana 'a gbai a. An mbe ko sɛsɛ ma wan yiimatɛ ee min dɔ, a basan ko yama a. Chɛ ɛ an yɔn fan gbɔkɔɔ.
A mu min na, kɔpɔɛ koe, ko yama sɛsɛ ɛ a kuu sɔ an ma. Kɔpɔ koe wa dɛgbɛ chɛ, an‑na a ma, mɔɛ dɔ n ka‑a danaya chia ma Chisɔsi a, a sin‑na an na dɛ faa yɔn koe n dɔ.
Chɛɛ min sien mu i ma, i wɛn‑na i wandi be Yataa ma, i ya ka chɛ gbɛɛ a. I tana, tan Yataa tena, ma Yataa fɔɛ ɔ, danaya ni ma i ɔ Chisɔsi ko a, a basan koadia a, faabia, ni machimaya.
Butuinɛ chɛ i 'a danaya ko a Chisɔsi a, butuin chɛndɛ an nɛ. I che‑a wan kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da. I sin‑na a fɔ wan den mɔ sɛsɛ ya kɔ, mbɛ i‑a i kai fa Chisɔsi Chasi a. Kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ chɛ bia i boo fea a.
Yataa ɛ mmɔ yen tena wan, min‑na fɔɛ be fen fen ma, Chisɔsi Chasi wɛɛ ɛ mmɔ yen‑da, min ma a nun ni Kɔfana Pɔnchɔsi Padeti ma, danaya min nyɔn sima ɛ a ɔ. N toen mu i ni
dasi chɛ ya i sɔɛ a. I ni tachɛ teaya ɔ, mabɔ ee min ma, aan tee chɛ ni che, tee min ma mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi ɛ na‑a to.
An na chɛ, a tima ɛ Yataa an boo ɔ, tando ɛ min ma, mansa n kun ma mansa dɔndɔ gbe, mansa wa mansa n gbɛɛ ko a.

A dɔndɔ gbe an mbe ee fa kuɔ fɔ ko a, ɛ tun man ba an dɔ, mɔ ee che gbɛn‑da manɛ min ma, a sin mɔ ɔ mɔ ma a yen nin bɛ fɔɛ ɔ, mɔ sin mbe ee che a yen‑da. Basɔmaya fea kuɔ fɔ gbasaya ni ma a ma. A ni ma ka.

N toen mu i ni a fɔ chɛ n ye, miin nyanden mu dunya chɛ ɔ, an ma dɔpandaya bɔ, an sin ma an yii sɔ an 'na nyanɛ ma, fenɛ mu a a, min ma namaen mu. Chɛɛ an ni an yii sɔ Yataa an ma, min mbe fen kɔ fen be mmɔ ma, mmɔ 'a buɔdia ko a.
N toen mu i ni a fɔ an ye, an ni ko chɛndɛ ma, an ni nyan wai chɛndɛ ɔ, an ni ma boo ka tɔ wa a, an ma bɛndenɛ ni ma tima ɔ tima chɛ a.
Ni an‑na chɛ ma, an mbe ma‑a ka nyanɛ an kuu chɛ‑a an fandi ko a, dunya nama chɛ ɔ min mbe na tena. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, an ni fɔɛ ma sɔn, min mu tea fɔɛ a.
