Timoti, fen chɛ bia i boo fea a, Yataa‑a fenɛ min be i ma. I ma i too ma sɔ wooya chia ɔ bɔɛ ma, chian mbe ee min dɔ Yataa ko a, mɔɛ dɔ n mbe min chee an dɔ yiimatɛ.
Mɔɛ dɔ n bea‑a an yiimatɛ chɛ an fɛ, min‑na a ma, an‑na an kan kɔ sɔ chɔchi a. Yataa ni wo dua.

N fan Pɔɔ, n fan mbe ka gboo chɛ nyɛn‑da i tena, i wan Timoti. N faa ma denɛ mu gbɛ i a. Chisɔsi Chasi 'a sɔ mɔɛ mu n na, yɔ Yataa toen ni buɛ min dɔ a ni ma. A‑a n sɔ, n ni a ɔ yian mɔɛ n na, mbɛ ni mmɔ ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, mmɔ bɛ Chisɔsi Chasi a, an mbe a ma, mmɔ ni kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn. Yataa na‑a a fɔ ka wan. Mmɔ Fa Yataa, an fea mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi a, an 'na dua ni ma i ma, an 'na chinchimaya ni ma i ma, a basan an 'na faachima a.
N mbe Yataa wai bɔ tena i ko a, n mbe wai chɛ tena min ye n yiima a koenɛ a fion, yɔ n bemba n ta bemba n ni a ma tee buɛ min dɔ. N mbe samunɛ chɛ tena i ko a su ɔ tee a.
A a ma nyina nin bɛ n na, faayɔn ba min ni i ɔ, mɔ‑a mɔ saa mɔ nyɔn na tima min na. A sin, i yen sɔɛ an mbe n na kaka, min mbe a ma, n bu ɔ ni dia.
Danaya gbau gbau min mbe i ɔ Chisɔsi ko a, a puin‑da n yii ma. Danaya min nyɔn sima ni i mama Doyisi ɔ an fea i de Yunisi a, n danden fan mu a a, mbɛ an mbe i ɔ.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, n mbe a fɔ tena i ye to, mbɛ i ni tachɛ fen chɛ a chɛndɛ chɛ, Yataa‑a boo fenɛ min be i ma, n na‑a n boo bun i ma tima min na i dua koe a.
Koe min na mu, Yataa Nyina min be mmɔ fɛ, a ee a ma mmɔ ni chian. Chɛɛ ɛ gbasaya an chɛ mmɔ ɔ, a basan koadia a, ni mɔɛ e kun buɛ min dɔ i faa ma.

Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, i ma mau mmɔ 'a mansa wakoe ɔ yian koe a mɔɛ n na. N bɛɛ wakoe, i ma mau n ko a, koe min na mu, n mbe pimbi chenɛ a a si Chasi ko a. Chɛɛ Yataa 'a gbasaya ɔ, i wɛɛ i ta mɔnɛ ɔ bia a 'a sakana bai chɛndɛ ko a. A sin mbe a 'a gbasaya be‑a wan i ma.

A‑a mmɔ baun fan, mbɛ a‑a mmɔ chee ma koe a a ta mɔɛ n na. A ma chɛ ma ni mmɔ sɔn chɛndɛ an ko a. Chɛɛ Yataa e na to dunya a dan‑da, a wandi na‑a a ɔ bɛn ka wan, a 'a koadia demanɛ ɔ, a‑a min dɔ yian Chisɔsi Chasi ɔ.

Chɛɛ sanche gbɛ, mmɔ baun mɔɛ Chisɔsi Chasi na‑a dunya ɔ, min mbe a ma, mmɔ ni a 'a koadia deman chɛ ɔ yen. Chasi‑a a ma gbasaya ee to saya boo ɔ mmɔ kun ma. Sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ, a‑a kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ yian mmɔ a.
Sakana bai chɛ ko a mu, a‑a n ya sɔ mɔɛ a, n ni kanɛ chɛ, mbɛ n‑na a ɔ yian mɔɛ n na.

A sin, chɛ an fɛ mu n mbe ka mɔnɛ bonda chɛ ɔ bia tena. Chɛɛ mau ee n dɔ, koe min na mu, n‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, n kai faen mu min na. A sin n danden fan mu a a, mbɛ a‑a fenɛ min be n ma, ɛ che wan a kun ma fɛn‑da aan a tee dankama chɛ ni che.
Bea tea bai chɛ n fɛ, n‑na i kan miin na. An ni ma tɔmɔsi a i tena. Koe min na mu, mmɔ ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Chisɔsi Chasi a, a sin i ma sɛmbɛ dan koe ma a a, a basan koadia a.
Yataa Nyina 'a gbasaya ɔ, min mbe mmɔ fɛ, tea chɛ min been mu i ma, a bia i boo fea a.
I‑a a ɔ sɔn fan mbɛ an gbɛɛ, an fɛn mbe Esia chɛnyɛ ɔ, an ka‑a n fɛ, an bɛ Fichɛdɔsi a, ni Amɔchɛnesi.
Mansa Chisɔsi ni chinchin Wɔnesifɔyɔsi 'a chenɛ ma, koe min na mu, a ni buɔdia be wan n ma tima sɛsɛ ko a. A ma mau ni n ma, n 'na pimbi chen na sa ko a.
Chɛɛ a‑a a fo kɛn Domi duu ɔ, a‑a a ya a kan fan n na a sɔɛ gbɛɛ a, aan a‑a n yen.
I sin‑na a ɔ sɔn fan chɛndɛ chɛ, a‑a min chɛ n ko a Ɛfisɔsi duu ɔ. Mansa Yataa ni chinchin a ma tee dankama ma.
I tana, n 'na den, Yataa ni i ɔ gbɛa koadia demanɛ chɛ ɔ, mmɔ‑a min ma sɔn kɛn mmɔ ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, mmɔ bɛ Chisɔsi Chasi a.
N na‑a i kan fan koe n sɛsɛ ma, a sin, mɔ sɛsɛ ni wan nɔ siiya a. An kan chɛ a ben mɔ dɔ mende n tena, miin danayaen mu, an ni mɔ dɔ mende n bɛɛ kan.
I ta mɔnɛ ɔ bia, yɔ Chisɔsi Chasi 'a soya chɛndɛ.
Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe soya ɔ, a ma bɛnden mu tima ɔ tima don koe an na ya ɔ sɔɛ da a kuiɛ kɔɔ. A ee a boo chɛ koe n dɔ, mɔ gbama n mbe miin ma.
A yɛ to, ni i ma‑a Yataa 'a wai chɛ‑a, bea a 'a sawa fɛ. A ɛ wan yɔ bui chɛ tɔmbɔɛ, mɔɛ ee a bɔɛ n gbasi, a ni boo ɔ gbasi woo ma sɔn, ni a ma don ni sawa gbɛɛ kɔɔ.
A sawan bɔɛ mu sɛnɛ sa mɔɛ an na, min sɔɛ donden mu kaka, an pɛn pɛn ta ɛ che a da ma.
I yii si koe chɛ n ma, n mbe miin fɔ tena, koe min na mu, mansa Chisɔsi ɛ a ma‑a wan, i ni an gbɛɛ ɔ gbɛ.
I yii ni to Chisɔsi Chasi kɔ, min bɔ‑a Mansa Defidi 'a dambi ɔ, a yɛ to, a wɛn kɔɔ sɔ‑a a ka saya ɔ. Sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ, n mbe min kan, a‑a a fɔ ka wan.
Sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ an fɛ mu n mbe tɔɔ tena ka, n chenɛ ɔ chiienɛ ɛ yɔ sawa yɔn mɔɛ. Chɛɛ Yataa 'a bai chen dɔ ma chii ni.

Chɛ an‑na a ma, n mbe ko ɔ ko ɔ bia tena mɔɛ chɛ n ko a, Yataa‑a miin ya a ta mɔɛ n na. Yataa 'a bai, an bɛɛ ni ma mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, an bɛ Chisɔsi Chasi a, an ni bauncha ma sɔn. An mbe ma‑a wan, an bɛ Yataa a, kuɔ fɔ ko a.
Tea bai yen ko. Mmɔ ma min chɛ‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Chasi a, mmɔ sɔn kɔma n bɛɛ, an na‑a fa‑a wan, an bɛ Chasi a, mmɔ bɛ ɛ ma‑a wan to a a banda bu ɔ.
Ni mmɔ‑a mɔnɛ ɔ bia, mmɔ wɛɛ ɛ ma‑a wan mansa a a mmɔ bɛ. Ni mmɔ ban‑da a ɔ, a wɛɛ ɛ ban‑da wan mmɔ ɔ.
Ni danaya ee mmɔ ɔ a ko a, ɛ a 'a danaya a tun fan, koe min na mu, a ee che a kan kɔ sɔ‑a a wandi a.
Chɛ puin i 'a mɔɛ n yii ma, mbɛ i‑a dasi gbau gbau be an ma Yataa chen kɔɔ, i ɔ an ma koɔ kɔnɔ bai kun ma. Chɛ ee den chɛndɛ suun an ye, chɛɛ ɛ chɛ n fan yɔn gbɔkɔɔ, miin mbe an too ma sɔ‑a a ma.
Butuin chɛ, min mbe a ma, Yataa faa ni chima i a. I ni ma wai chɛ mɔɛ chɛndɛ a, min mbe ee mau, a wandi gba ma, min mbe Yataa 'a bai kan tena teaya buɛ ɔ.
I ma i too ma sɔ wooya bai chɛ n ma, baa ee miin dɔ Yataa ko a, koe min na mu, chɛ ɛ a ma wan mɔɛ n ni ka Yataa chia ma.
A bai chɛ n mbe wan yɔ tɛɛ boo kaenɛ, min mbe fui, mbɛ a‑a gboo daun ta‑a. Imenayɔsi mu mɔ dɔndɔ a, an mɔɛ chɛ n tɛ ɔ, a basan Fidetɔsi a.
An ka‑a tea chia ma, mbɛ an bun‑da an bɔɛ n bɛɛ ɔ chɛ‑a, danaya ɛ miin dɔ Chisɔsi ko a. An mbe kanɛ chɛ‑a, an dɔ, mɔɛ n ban‑da an kɔɔ sɔ‑a saya ɔ.

Chɛɛ Yataa‑a fenɛ min kuu si gban, a ɔ ee ma‑a. A sin, bai chɛ, an nyɛnden mu a si a ma, a ɔ, “Mansa Yataa‑a a ɔ sɔn fan mɔɛ miin mbe a ko a,” a sin to, a ɔ, “Miin mbe a fɔ‑a, mbɛ an mbe Mansa Yataa an ko a, an ni an kan kɔ sɔ an 'na ko yama a.”
Chen ba a, feanka sɛsɛ ɛ wan nɔ. Sanu pani n mbe wan nɔ, kain pani n mbe nɔ. Kɔn nɛnɛ n bɛɛ mbe nɔ, a basan boo nɛnɛ n na, baa ɛ wan dɔ n ma, baa ee dɔ n sin ma.

A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, mɔɛ min mbe a wandi boo a ko‑a ko yama ma a, baa ɛ ma‑a wan a ma Yataa tena. A mu min na, ɛ tenchen a kun ti an ko a, a sin ma gbɔsɔɛ ɛ wan a ma. A mɔɛ tana, a ma bɛnden fan mu wai chɛndɛ chɛ koe a.

Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, i boo bɔ kamin tɔngbɔya fɔɛ ɔ, i ni ma mɔ tandenɛ a, danaya ni ma i ɔ Chisɔsi ko a, koadia wɛɛ ni ma i ɔ, a basan faachima a. Chɛ ma, wo bɛ mɔɛ chɛ n na, wo bɛ ɛ Chisɔsi chee, miin na faa ɔ gbɛenɛ ɔ.
I ma i boo chɛ wooya kɔɔsa bia ɔ, yiimatɛ ee min dɔ. I‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ chɛ ɛ na koɛ an na.
Mansa Yataa 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ sin ma koɔ yan mɔ a. Chɛɛ mɔ chɛndɛ mu a a mɔɛ gbɛɛ tena, kan chɛndɛ chɛ mɔɛ, a sin mbe koe a bia a ma.

A mu mɔɛ an na, min mbe tima ya, a chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ n gba yama yian koe a an na, a faa chimaenɛ ɔ. Koe min na mu, kɔkɔɛ Yataa ɛ a ma‑a wan, an ni an kan kɔ sɔ an 'na ko yama a, mbɛ an‑na an ya a mun tea ma.
Mbɛ an mbe yiimatɛ ma sɔn‑da wan, an ni bɔ gbai chɛ a, an na‑a chɛɛ ka Sitana 'a gbai min na, an ni min 'na sawa kɔɔ.
Chɛ ni ma i yii ma, mbɛ tee dankama nɛnɛ chɛ n kɔɔ, Chisɔsi e na to na‑a, ko ɔ gbɛaya ɛ ma‑a wan nɔ.

Koe min na mu, mɔɛ n mbe to‑a an fandi an na dechee, a basan kɔpɔɛ a. An mbe ma‑a dɔdia tɔɛ n fan na, an dɔ pandaenɛ ɛ, an mbe ee baa be mɔ ɔ mɔ ma, an mbe ee an woo mɔɛ n da a kuiɛ ma, an ma wai nyima sɔn, Yataa sɔn bai nu.
Mɔgbuya ee an dɔ, an faa a kɔɔen ba ɛ. An mbe koe ɔ fɔ kaka, an mbe ee an fandi boo ɔ, nimisa don mɔ wa nu, miin ma to ni fen chɛndɛ a.
Mɔ bun mɔɛ mu an na, mɔɛ miin mbe ee an yii na chii an mbe ma koe ma‑a, dɔ diaya faenɛ ɛ an gboo a gban. An ma to ni Yataa a, an toen mu dechee dunya ma buɔdia an na.
An 'na Yataa koe ɛ an da ɔ wan, chɛɛ a ee an faa ɔ. Ka a mɔ bonda chɛ n bai ma.

An dɔ n mbe ta mɔ n 'na chenɛ n fan na domɛɛ, an mbe ben‑da musu dɔ n yiima ɔ chɛ chɛ‑a, musu miin yiima ɔ dɔɔ. An musu chɛ n sin to, an 'na ko yama maenɛ tagbaenɛ an da ma, an mbe yɔncha ɔ an faa ma koe n boo ɔ.
An ma bɛnden fan mu tima ɔ tima ko nama kan koe a. Chɛɛ an mbe ee che an ni tea ɔ sɔn.
Yɔ Chanesi ni buɛ min dɔ, an fea Chambesi a, an ni Mosisi ma bɔ wan, kamin chɛ n bɛɛ, an mbe ka wan tea ma bɔ‑a. Mɔɛ n fan nɛ miin yiima ɔ chɛ chɛenɛ ɛ, an sin 'na danaya ban‑da an dɔ Chisɔsi ko a.
Chɛɛ an mbe ee ta‑a ya ɔ ma, koe min na mu, mɔ ɔ mɔ ɛ an 'na wooya ɔ yen‑da wan, yɔ mɔ fea chɛ n na‑a ma buɛ min dɔ.
Chɛɛ i tana gbɛ, i ban‑da n 'na kan chɛ buɛ ma mɛn‑da, ni n sɔnɛ, n yii ma koe fɔɛ ɔ, n 'na danaya Chisɔsi a, n 'na faabiaya, koadia n dɔ, a basan n 'na ko ɔ bia a.

I‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, an‑na ko yawaenɛ min si n na, ni tɔɔya gbɛɛ n‑na miin dɔ bia. I‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, fen ko si‑a n na kɛn n ni Andiɔki duu ɔ, ni Ikoniɔn duu ɔ, a basan Diisa duu ɔ a, n tɔɔ‑a buɛ min dɔ duu chɛ n dɔ. Chɛɛ Mansa Chisɔsi‑a n kun bɔ wan an gbɛɛ ɔ.
Tea ko a, ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a wandi be Yataa chia ma, ni an ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Chisɔsi Chasi a, ɛ ko yawaenɛ ɔ yen fan.
A sin, mɔ yama nu, ni kankancha tɔɛ nu, an kun ma ɛ chɛ‑a wan tun tun. An mbe mɔɛ n na bea‑a wan, a sin mbe ma‑a an fandi wɛɛ a da bea an na.
Chɛɛ i tana, a a tun dan koe a tea chɛ n na, nn‑na i kan miin na, an bia i boo fea a. I‑a a ɔ sɔn fan mɔɛ miin nyɔn sima an na i kan.

A sin, a ni ma i yii ma, mbɛ i‑a bai chɛ kan fan a ka i den mɛsɛ tɔɛ ma, bai chɛ min mbe Yataa 'a gboo ɔ. Chɛ ɛ kun fan a ni yiima be i ma, min mbe che i sɔ‑a chia ma bauncha ma sɔn koe a, min mbe ka danaya ɔ Chisɔsi Chasi a.

Bai ɔ bai min mbe Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, Yataa da a bai mu. Chɛ an fɛ mu, bai chɛ n kan kɔ kan, an mbe mmɔ kan fan ko sɛsɛ ma. A sin nyin fan mmɔ kan koe a tea ma, mmɔ ni mmɔ sɔn yama yen, mbɛ mmɔ sɔ‑a chia chɛndɛ ma, mmɔ ni a ɔ sɔn mmɔ ɛ tan buɛ min dɔ fɔɛ ɔ.
Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, Yataa 'a mɔɛ ma bɛndenɛ ni ma chɛndɛ chɛ, a kandenɛ ɛ wai chɛndɛ kan kɔ kan chɛ koe a.

Chisɔsi Chasi ɛ ma‑a tima min na a 'a mansaya ɔ, ɛ mɔɛ gbɛɛ gbɛmbo‑a wan, fuɛ n bɛ chɛndɛ ba n na. Chɛ an fɛ mu, Yataa an fea Chasi a, an mbe mɔ yen tena wan. N mbe na tena chɛ an ma din‑da i tena gbau gbau.
Sakana bai chɛ ɔ yian mɔɛ n na, tee kɔɔ sona kɔɔ, i ma bɛn a ɔ yian koe a. Mɔɛ n yiima mun, an‑na ko yama fɔ an ye, mbɛ i‑a an faa ma nande, e ta‑a i faa bia‑a an na, ni i ma‑a an kan‑da.

Koe min na mu, tima ɛ che tena wan, mɔɛ n mbe ee an too ma sɔ‑a kan chɛ buɛ chɛndɛ ma. Chɛɛ an mbe bea‑a an fandi faa ma koe an fɛ, mbɛ an‑na kan chɛ mɔ sɛsɛ a sɔn sɔn an 'na tindanɛ, an too faa ma koe ɔ yian koe an na.
An mbe ban‑da wan an too ma sɔ koe a tea ma, mbɛ an‑na an too be tai n ma.
Chɛɛ i tana, sɔ chidi. Ko yawaenɛ ɔ bia, i ni i sɔɛ gbɛɛ chɛ Yataa 'a sakana bai chɛndɛ ɔ yian koe a mɔɛ n na. I 'a wai gbɛɛ chɛ, Yataa 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ ɛ min chɛ.
N tana, n mbe ka gbɛ chia an ma. Tima che‑a gbɛ Yataa boo ɔ n ya koe a fɔɛ chɛ ɔ.
N‑na butuin chɛndɛ chɛ chɛ, n che‑a a danka a. N sin ma ka ni n 'na danaya gbee a.

A ka gbɛ sanche ma, boo ɔ gbasi woo ɛ n ma kɔn tena banda bu ɔ, Mansa Chisɔsi boo ɔ, a wɛn tanden mu kaa a tɛ ɔ. Ɛ a be‑a wan n ma a tee chɛ ma. A sin mbe ee ma‑a n dɔndɔ gbe an na, chɛɛ chɛ n bɛɛ miin ya ɛ chia a, a na tima ma kɔnɛ a.
A ma i ma gbɔsɔɛ a, i ni na n tan sanche.
Demasi tana, a ka‑a n fɛ dunya chɛ ko a, a ta‑a Tɛsadonika duu ɔ. Kesensi ta‑a Kadesia chɛnyɛ ɔ, mbɛ Taitɔsi sin ta‑a Damatia chɛnyɛ ɔ.
Duku dɔndɔ gbe an mbe nɛ n tena. Ni i ma‑a na‑a, wo fea ni na Maki a, a mu min na, ɛ n deman‑da wan n 'na wai a.
Tikikɔsi sin, n mbe ka gbɛ a na‑a na nɔ Ɛfisɔsi duu ɔ.
Ni i ma‑a na‑a, na n 'na doma kai chɛ a, n‑na min to Kapɔsi boo ɔ Towasi duu ɔ. Na n 'na gboo chɛ n bɛɛ a, a bɛbɛɛ miin nyandenɛ ɛ ka soe gboo ma.
Adɛsanda, tonkan ti chɛ, a‑a ko yama wa an ma n na. A sin, Mansa Yataa ɛ a pawa‑a wan a chɛ chɛ wai chɛ ko a.
I kun ma fɛn a boo ɔ, a mu min na, a ni chɛɛ ma nyɔn ba an na, mmɔ 'a sakana bai ko a.
N sɔ saa a kuti ɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ kan kɔ kan ma a ya a bɔ ni nɔ n ko a. Yataa ni a boo bɔ an sɔn chɛ ɔ.
Chɛɛ Mansa Chisɔsi sɔ‑a wan n kɔ gban, a‑a a ma n che‑a a 'a sakana bai fɔ‑a chɛndɛ chɛ. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, mɔɛ miin ma Chu mɔ a, an gbɛɛ‑a a a min. A sin to, a‑a n kun ka wan.
Ɛ n kun bɔ‑a wan ko yama kan kɔ kan dɔ, mbɛ a‑a n baun, a ta‑a n na a 'a banda bu ɔ mansaya ɔ. Tando ni ma a tɔɛ ma, kuɔ fɔ ni kuɔ fɔ. A ni ma ka.
N mbe Akuida kɔndɔn tena, an fea Pisida a, a basan Wɔnesifɔyɔsi 'a chen na mɔɛ n na.
Ɛyasitɔsi to‑a Kɔyindi duu ɔ wan, mbɛ n‑na Tɔfimɔsi sin to Midetɔsi duu ɔ, a gbandienɛ ni a tima chɛ a.
A ma i ma gbɔsɔɛ a, i ni na chima na tima ya ɔ. Chɛ n gbɛɛ an‑na i kɔndɔn, Yubusi ni ma, ni Pudensi, ni Dinɔsi, ni bɔɔɛ Kaudia, a basan mɔ suun ma nyɔɛ tɔɛ n na.
Mansa Chisɔsi ni tachɛ i a. A 'a dua ni ma wo ma.

N fan Pɔɔ, n fan mbe ka gboo chɛ nyɛn‑da i tena, i wan Taitɔsi. N 'na denɛ mu gbɛ i a, danaya dɔndɔɛ ɔ Chisɔsi ko a. Yataa 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ mu n na, ni Chisɔsi Chasi 'a sɔ mɔɛ to. A‑a n sɔ, min mbe a ma, Yataa‑a a boo sɔ ka mɔɛ miin ma dan koe a a a, n ni a ma, an ni a 'a tea sakana bai a min. Mbɛ n‑na an sɔ chia chɛndɛ ma, ma koe a Yataa fɔɛ ɔ. Mbɛ an yii na tɛenɛ ɛ ma‑a kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma, Yataa min mbe ee fania fɔ, a‑a tooɔdia chɛ min na, a e na to dunya a dan‑da. Mmɔ baun mɔɛ Yataa‑a sakana bai chɛ ɔ yian fan, tima chɛndɛ ma, mbɛ a‑a n sɔ a ɔ yian koe a mɔɛ n na. Mmɔ Fa Yataa, an fea Chisɔsi Chasi a, mmɔ baun mɔɛ, an ni i dua, an ni faachima be i ma.
Chɛ an‑na a ma, n‑na i to Keti yii tinɛ ɔ duu n dɔ, min mbe a ma, i ni koe n dɔ bɛn. A yɛ to, i ni chɔchi gbakoo n yian duu kan kɔ kan dɔ, yɔ n‑na a fɔ buɛ min dɔ i ye.
A sin ma bɔ ee ma a ma, musu dɔndɔ gbe an mbe ma a boo ɔ. A 'a denɛ n kai faenɛ ɛ Chisɔsi a. An mbe a kuiɛ ma, an mbe ee wooya koɛ yan.
Chɔchi ya ɔ sɔɛ sin, min mbe Yataa 'a wai kun ma, mabɔ ee ma a ma, dɔpanda tɔ ma a a, a faa ma gbandi, a sin mbe ee gbɛ wa min. Kɔpɔɛ wakoe ee koa a faa ɔ, a sin mbe ee ma gbun na bea mɔ a.
Chɛɛ mɔɛ min ya kɔɔɛ di sonda n tena, ko chɛndɛ ko a di min ye. Mɔɛ min mbe yiinatɛ bɔ a tachɛ buɛ a, a tanden mu, baa ɛ a boo ɔ Yataa ko a, a sin kosan a wandi bia‑a.
Ɛ ma mɔɛ an na, min danden mu tea sakana bai chɛ a, an‑na a kan min na. Chɛ an mbe a ma, a ni che kan chɛndɛ chɛ a, a ni chɛ n na ten, miin mbe kɔɔsa bia chɛ tena.

Koe min na mu, mɔɛ n mbe nɔ kaka, miin mbe an kaa sa tena kan chɛndɛ chɛ a, fia faenɛ an da ɔ ben‑da an bɔɛ n bun koe a. A bɛbɛɛ gbu chɛ nu, miin ni a fɔ, an dɔ, mɔ ee bauncha ma sɔn, ni i a ma kamincha ni.
An da a ni tɔn, koe min na mu, an mbe chenɛ n dɔ chɛ chɛ tena wan, an mbe an ka‑a tea chia ma, an 'na kan yama chɛ chɛ a. Chɛ gbɛɛ sin kaen mu mau bandaya kɔpɔ yan chɛ an ma.

An bɔɛ dɔndɔ gbu, an fandi gbu ta ko sɔn mɔɛ, a‑a a fɔ wan, mbɛ Keti mɔɛ n mu tima ɔ tima fania fɔ mɔ wa an fan na, an gboo ɔ faen mu, an sin bɛnchɛ. A yɛ to, koe a fasan mɔ wa mu an na, kan baiya tɔ wa nu.
A‑a tea bai an fɔ ka. Chɛ an fɛ mu, an tɛn dɔ tɛ chɛndɛ chɛ, min mbe a ma, an na ni ten Chisian danaya ɔ.
Mbɛ an sɛmbɛ‑a an too ma sɔ koe a Chu n 'na tai chɛ n ma, ni bai chɛ n ma, mɔɛ miin‑na an kan kɔ sɔ tea a, an mbe min fɔ‑a a ma koe a.

Mɔ ɔ mɔ tena min yiima a koen mu, fen kɔ fen nyin fan. Chɛɛ mɔɛ min yiima a ma ko ni, danaya ee mɔɛ min dɔ Chisɔsi ko a, fen kɔ fen ma nyin. Koe min na mu, a yiima ɔ chɛen fan mu, a basan a 'a yiinachii a.
An‑na Yataa sɔnɛ ɛ an da ɔ wan, chɛɛ a ee an sɔnɛ ɔ. An ma nyin, an mbe ee Yataa 'a sawa ya, an sin ma nyin fen kɔ fen ko a.
Chɛɛ i tana, i wan Taitɔsi, e kanɛ min chɛ, a ni ma kan chɛndɛ an na.
A fɔ mɔ kaima ma taenɛ n ye, an ma gbɛ wa min, an ni ma basɔmaya tɔɛ n na, yiimatɛ tɔɛ nu, danaya ɛ miin dɔ Chisɔsi ko a chɛndɛ chɛ, a basan koadia a, ni faabia.
A fɔ musu ma taenɛ n bɛɛ ye, an ni baa be Yataa ma an sɔnɛ n dɔ. An ma ma yɔnɛ a gbɛ ko a, an ma tɔ ɔ tɛ yama chɛ. An mbe kanɛ min chɛ, a ni ma kan chɛndɛ a.
Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, an ni sunkun tɔngbɔɛ n kan to koe a an chɛɛ n na, a basan an 'na denɛ n na.
A yɛ to, an yiima ni tɛ chɛndɛ chɛ, an sɔnɛ a koenɛ ni ma, an ni ma musu chɛndɛ a chenɛ a, miin kooenɛ an chɛɛ n ye. Chɛ ɛ ma‑a wan, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee bai yama sa a si Yataa 'a sakana bai ma.
A fɔ kamin tɔngbɔɛ n bɛɛ ma, an ni tachɛ yiimatɛ a.
A ɔ yian chia ɔ chia a, ko chɛndɛ ma ɔ, mbɛ mɔ chɛndɛ mu i a. A sin, ni i ma‑a kanɛ chɛ a, a yian mbɛ mɔ tandenɛ mu i a, basɔmaya ni ma i a kan chɛ ma.
I da a bai tandenɛ ni ma, mabɔ ee ma min ma. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ n ni mau, bai yama ee ma‑a an da ɔ a fɔ koe a a si mmɔ ma.
A fɔ yɔnɛ n ye, an ni kooya be an ti n ma, an ni wai ma kawaenɛ chɛ an ko a tima ɔ tima, an sin ma an kuiɛ ɔ kai an ma.
An gbu sin ma kanka chɛ ɛnden bɛɛ a. Chɛɛ an ni an 'na danaya gbɛɛ yian. Chɛ ɛ a ɔ yian‑da wan chia ɔ chia a, mbɛ mmɔ baun mɔɛ Yataa 'a kanɛ nyin.
Koe min na mu, Yataa‑a a 'a koadia demanɛ ɔ yian, min mbe a ma, mɔ gbu gbɛɛ ni bauncha ma sɔn.
A sin mbe mmɔ kan tena, mmɔ ni mmɔ boo bɔ Yataa sɔn baiya ɔ, a basan dunya ma buɔdia a. A yɛ to, mmɔ ni mmɔ wandi bia chɛndɛ, mmɔ tandenɛ ni ma, mmɔ ni ma Yataa sɔn mɔɛ a dunya chɛ ɔ.
Mmɔ ya ɛ ta‑a ma‑a tee duaen chɛ ya ɔ, mmɔ 'a Yataa wa Chisɔsi Chasi, mmɔ kun ka mɔɛ, ɛ na‑a manɛ ɔ tee min ma.
A wɛn‑na a wandi be mmɔ ko a, mmɔ bɔ koe a ko yama n dɔ, mmɔ ni ma mɔ ma koenɛ n na. Mmɔ ni ma a ta mɔɛ n na tenchen, mmɔ ma bɛndenɛ ni ma ko chɛndɛ ma koe a.
Yataa 'a gbasaya ɛ i boo ɔ gbɛ, i ni koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ɔ yian mɔɛ n na, i ni dasi be, i ni an 'na ko yama fɔ an ye. I ma a ma mɔ ɔ mɔ ni baa bɔ i ma.
A fɔ to an ye an ni don mansa n kɔɔ, a basan ya ɔ sɔɛ n na, an ni kooya be an ma, an ni an ma bɛn ko chɛndɛ ma koe a chia ɔ chia a.
An ma bai yama sa mɔ ɔ mɔ ma, an ni an boo bɔ koɛ ɔ, an ni ma mɔ ma chimaenɛ n na, miin mbe basɔmaya be mɔ ɔ mɔ ma.

Mmɔ wandi wɛɛ, tima dɔ a mmɔ wooen ni, mmɔ nii kooya be, mɔɛ n na‑a mmɔ sɔ wan chia yama ma. Mmɔ ni yɔnɛ n fan na, mmɔ faa ma koe n dɔ, a basan dunya ma koe n na. Mmɔ na‑a tima gbɛɛ ya fɔɛ ɔ toomaya an dɔ, mɔɛ n tooenɛ ɛ mmɔ a, mmɔ wɛɛ tooenɛ ɛ mmɔ nyɔn na.
Chɛɛ mmɔ baun mɔɛ Yataa, a‑a ko chɛndɛ ma mmɔ a, a‑a koadia yian mmɔ a.
A‑a mmɔ baun. Chɛ ma bɔ ni mmɔ sɔn chɛndɛ an dɔ, mmɔ 'a teaya ɔ ma. Chɛɛ a 'a chinchimaya ko a, a‑a mmɔ 'a ko yama n ko, a‑a fɔɛ nama be mmɔ ma, a Nyina 'a gbasaya ɔ.
Yataa‑a a ma, mmɔ‑a a Nyina ma sɔn gbama gbama a, Chisɔsi Chasi ɔ, mmɔ baun mɔɛ.
Yataa‑a chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, a ni mmɔ sɔ chia ma kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn koe a. Koe min na mu, a 'a koadia demanɛ ɔ, a‑a mmɔ ya mmɔ tandenɛ n na a tena.

Tea bai an nɛ, n mbe ka min fɔ tena. N toen mu i ni koe chɛ n ma i ma gbɔsɔɛ a, min mbe a ma, mɔɛ miin kai faen mu Yataa a, an ni tachɛ gbee chɛ a. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, an ni ko chɛndɛ ma bia an boo fea a, min nyin. A sin, tɔnɔnɛ ɛ wan a ɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ ko a.
Chɛɛ wooya kɔɔsa bia, ni suun ma danɛ, ni ko a fasanɛ, a basan koɛ a Mosisi 'a sawa kun ma, i ma i boo chɛ a ɔ.
Mɔɛ chɛ tana, min mbe mɔɛ n na fasan tena, a‑a si gba fea gbe. Ni a ma sɛmbɛ ni, i boo bɔ a ma koe ɔ.
Koe min na mu, i‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ mɔ bonda chɛ ma tan ni, a sin na ko yama maenɛ an mbe a ma konan tena Yataa tena.
Atɛmisi an fea Tikikɔsi a, ni n‑na an dɔndɔ sɔ i tena, a ma i ma gbɔsɔɛ a, i ni n tan pan Nikɔpɔdisi duu ɔ. Koe min na mu, n ma bɛndenɛ mu gbɛ chima tima chɛ bia koe a nɔ.
A ma i ma gbɔsɔɛ a, i ni Senasi deman, dɔya chɛ, an fea Apɔdɔsi a, an 'na tachɛ ɔ. An mbe ta fen kɔ fen na tachɛ chɛ ɔ, a be an ma.
A yɛ to, mmɔ 'a mɔɛ n ni an mayan ko chɛndɛ ma bia koe a an boo fea a, min mbe a ma, an ni che an fandi deman‑da ko gbɛa tima a, an ma na ma tataya tɔɛ n na.
N mbe nɛ nn bɛ miin gbɛɛ a, an ni i kɔndɔn. Mmɔ koadia nyɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ kɔndɔn nɔ, mmɔ bɛ ɛ miin na gbee dɔndɔɛ a danaya ɔ Chisɔsi ko a. Yataa ni wo gbɛɛ dua.

N fan Pɔɔ, n fɛn mbe nɛ pimbi chenɛ a Chisɔsi Chasi ko a, n fan mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena i tena, i wan Fidemɔn. Nn mbe a nyɛn tena, nn fea Timoti an na, mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ. Fidemɔn, nn wai chɛ nyɔɛ mu i a, i sin ko a di nn ye.
Nn mbe a nyɛn tena to, mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ musuma, Afia wɛɛ, a tena, ni Akipɔsi, mmɔ bɔɛ soya mɔɛ Chasi 'a wai ɔ, a basan chɔchi tɔɛ gbɛɛ a, miin mbe bɛn nɔ i 'a chenɛ a.
Mmɔ Fa Yataa, an fea Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi a, an ni wo dua, an ni faachima be wo ma.
N mbe Yataa wai bɔ wan tima ɔ tima, ni n‑na samunɛ chɛ i ko a, i wan Fidemɔn.
Koe min na mu, n‑na i 'a koadia ma tɔɛ a min, Yataa 'a mɔɛ n gbɛɛ ko a. A yɛ to, i kai faen mu buɛ min dɔ Mansa Chisɔsi a.
Kuiɛ dɔndɔya chɛ wo e min dɔ, wo bɛ chɛ n na, miin kai faen mu Yataa a, n mbe samunɛ chɛ tena a ni ta ya ɔ ma. Koe min na mu, Yataa‑a fen chɛndɛ min gbɛɛ be mmɔ ma Chasi ɔ, i‑a a ɔ sɔn fan.
I 'a suun ma nyɔncha koadia, a mu buɔdia a n tena, a‑a n faa chima wan. Koe min na mu, n suun ma nyɔɛ Chasi ɔ, i‑a buɔdia be wan Yataa 'a mɔɛ n gbɛɛ ma.
Chɛ ko a, Chasi 'a gbasaya ɔ, n mbe kun fan, n ni i chɛ koe chɛndɛ din i ma, a chɛ koe a.
Chɛɛ i 'a koadia n faa ɔ, a‑a a ma, n mbe i disa tena wan gbɛ. N fan Pɔɔ, n mbe chɛ ma tena wan, chenan kai mu wɛɛ n na, a sin, n mbe to sa ɔ pimbi chenɛ a Chisɔsi Chasi ko a.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, n mbe disa chɛ tena Wɔnesimɔsi an ko a. N 'na denɛ mu gbɛ a a Chasi ɔ. Koe min na mu, a‑a a kai fa Chasi a, n boo kɔɔ nɛ pimbi chenɛ a.
A kɔma a, mɔ a tenden nii ma a a i tena. Chɛɛ sanche chɛ ɔ, a ma gbɔsɔɛ ɛ wan mɔ fea gbɛɛ ma.
N mbe a ma tena wɛɛ gbɛ, a ni yɛ i tena, chɛɛ a 'a koadia koa‑a n faa ma kaka.
A ni wan n yii ma, n ni a bia nɛ ma koe a n baima, min mbe a ma, a ni basan n ma i gba ɔ, tima min na wɛ n mbe pimbi chenɛ a sakana bai chɛndɛ ko a.
Chɛɛ n ma to ni, n ni n deman koe din i ma. N mbe to‑a wan a a, i ni a chɛ i wandi faa ma a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, n mbe ee ko ɔ ko ma tena, ni i ma dɔn ni min ma.
Dɔndɔ kɔkɔɛ wo tɛ na‑a du Wɔnesimɔsi a, tima kundu ɛnden fan ko a, min mbe a ma, a ni yɛ wo fea ni ma a a, tima ɔ tima ko a.

Sanche gbɛ, yɔn dechee ma a a, chɛɛ a benden mu yɔnɛ ma kaka. A mu gbɛ mɔ faa ma suun ma nyɔɛ an na. N toen mu a a kaka, chɛɛ i sin mbe to‑a wan a a, a ben n ma. I 'a yɔnɛ mu a a, a yɛ to, i suun ma nyɔɛ mu a a Mansa Chisɔsi ɔ.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, ni i‑a n ya wan i bɔ wai chɛ mɔɛ a, i boo a si Wɔnesimɔsi kɔɔ, yɔ n fan Pɔɔ an nɛ.
Ni a na‑a ko ɔ ko kan kɔ kan yɔn fan i ma, ni i 'a kuiɛ kan kɔ kan mbe a ma, n mbe a be‑a wan.
N fan Pɔɔ, n fandi gbu boo gba an nɛ. N fan mbe a be tena, n‑na a ɔ sɔn bɛɛ ka boo ɔ boo, mbɛ n fan ta mu i wandi gbu a.
I dimu, suunɛ, koe chɛ chɛ n ye, Mansa Chisɔsi ko a, buɔdia be n ma Chasi ɔ.
N danden fan mu a a chɛndɛ chɛ, mbɛ ni n‑na chɛ nyɛn, e ee n da a kuiɛ a bea duu ma. A sin gbu, n‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ e ben‑da wan chɛ ma, n‑na min fɔ.
Ko dɔndɔ to, n yia chenɛ ɔ bɛn. Koe min na mu, ɛ n 'na yiinachii ɔ, mbɛ wo 'a samunɛ a ɛ min‑da wan, n ni bɔ nɛ, n ni na wo tan.
Nn fea mu nɛ Ɛpafasi a, pimbi chenɛ a, Chisɔsi Chasi ko a. A ni i kɔndɔn.
Chɛ n bɛɛ, n bɔɛ wai chɛ mɔɛ Maki, ni Ayisitakɔsi, ni Demasi, a basan Duku a, an mbe i kɔndɔn tena.
Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi ni wo dua.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Suun, tima sɛsɛ ko a, Yataa na‑a koɔ wan mmɔ bemba n ta bemba n tena, chia sɛsɛ a. A sin, a ni chɛ ma, a 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ sɛsɛ n fan dɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛɛ mmɔ ɛ ka tee dankama nɛnɛ chɛ miin kɔɔ, dunya e na to ban‑da, a koɔ‑a gbɛ mmɔ tena a 'a denɛ an dɔ. A‑a an yian, ma koe a fen kɔ fen kun ma dunya ɔ. A sin gbu ni dunya gbɛɛ a dan tena tima min na, a na‑a a ma a 'a den chɛ an na gbasaya ɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: An den chɛ sin, Yataa 'a kamaya ɛ yen fan a ɔ. Yataa ɛ buɛ min dɔ dechee, a wɛɛ ɛ ka wan. A da a bai gbasayaen mu, min mbe a ma tena dunya kunɛ a biaenɛ ɛ kaina dɔndɔɛ. A ban‑da kɛn mmɔ ma ko‑a, a bɔ mmɔ 'a ko yama n dɔ, a si‑a kaina ma bɛndenɛ Mansa Yataa boo nyima ɔ, pan banda bu ɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Yataa 'a denɛ benden mu maeka n ma, yɔ a tɔɛ gbu wɛɛ, Yataa‑a min si a kun ma, a benden mu buɛ min dɔ maeka n ta ma kaka.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, Yataa na‑a min fɔ a 'a denɛ ye, a nii ma a nyɔn fɔ ni maeka kan kɔ kan ye. A‑a a fɔ wan a 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, “N 'na denɛ mu i a. N ma‑a i fa a bi.” Chɛɛ a nii ma a fɔ ni a 'a gboo ɔ, maeka kan kɔ kan ma, a ɔ, “N mbe ma‑a wan i fa a, mbɛ i wɛɛ ma‑a n 'na denɛ a.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: A yɛ to, Yataa e na to a 'a denɛ saa chɛ a na‑a dunya ɔ, a na‑a a fɔ wan a 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, “N fan Yataa, n 'na maeka n gbɛɛ, an ni basɔmaya be n 'na den chɛ ma.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Min sien mu a 'a maeka n ma, Yataa‑a a fɔ wan a 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, “N mbe n 'na maeka n ma wan yɔ fia, n 'na bɔi den chɛ nu, n ni an ma yɔ ta manɛ nu.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛɛ a 'a denɛ wakoe tana, Yataa‑a a fɔ wan a 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, “Yataa mu i a, i 'a mansaya danka ee ma‑a, kuɔ fɔ ni kuɔ fɔ ko a. A sin, e gbasaya a tachɛ‑a wan i 'a mɔɛ n kun ma, teaya ɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: I toen mu tea an na, i ma to ni sawa yɔnɛ a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, n fan Yataa, i 'a Yataa, n‑na n boo sɔ i ma, ma koe a basɔmaya ɔ, min mu buɔdia a i tena, a ben i bɔɛ n ma.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Yataa na‑a a fɔ wan to a 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, “I wan, Mansa Chisɔsi, i wandi gbu an‑na duu gboo chɛ a dan a saa a. Banda gbu wɛɛ, i wan‑na a wɛɛ a dan.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Tima sin mbe che‑a wan, an gbɛɛ ni kasaa, chɛɛ i tana e ma‑a wan nɔ, kuɔ fɔ ko a. An gbɛɛ, an mbe chenancha‑a wan, yɔ doma kai wa ɛ taa‑a buɛ min dɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: E an dɔ kandu‑a wan, yɔ doma. A sin, an mbe mun‑da wan, yɔ chii koa ɛ mun buɛ min dɔ. Chɛɛ i tana ee ka i gba ɔ, a sin, e ma‑a wan fɔɛ ɔ kuɔ fɔ ko a.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛɛ maeka ee nɔ, Yataa‑a chɛ fɔ min ye, yɔ a‑a min fɔ a 'a denɛ ye a 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, “Si nɛ n boo nyima ɔ, aan n ni i chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ n don i kɔɔ, n ni an popoya i ya kɔɔ.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛɛ maeka chɛ n tana, Yataa‑a an sɔ, an ni na wai chɛ a ko a dunya ɔ. An ni basan mɔɛ chɛ n ma, miin mbe na‑a bauncha ma sɔn‑da.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ‑a tea bai chɛ min na min, mmɔ a bia mmɔ boo fea a, mmɔ ma na ka an chia chɛ ma.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, Yataa na‑a sawa min na ben suun maeka n na, mɔɛ n na‑a a ɔ yen fan, mbɛ tea mu. A sin, ni mɔ ɔ mɔ na‑a a yɔn, chɛ ma, a ni ko yama ma, a ni tɔɔya an dɔ bia.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛ mu ka buɛ min dɔ tea a, mmɔ ee kun mmɔ kunɛ ni bɔ tɔɔya ɔ, ni mmɔ‑a mmɔ too ka bauncha wa chɛ ma, Yataa na‑a min chɛ mmɔ a. Mansa Chisɔsi wandi gbu, an na‑a a ɔ yian, Yataa na‑a mmɔ baun chia min na. Mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ, miin na‑a a da a kuiɛ chɛ a min, an na‑a toa si wan a kɔɔ mmɔ tena.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Yataa wandi wɛɛ, a na‑a a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ tea mu sakana bai chɛ a. A na‑a chɛ ma kamaya koe sɛsɛ n fan dɔ. A yɛ to, a ni a ma wan to, a Nyina ni mɔɛ n dua chia sɛsɛ n na. Ni Yataa wandi toen ni chɛ ni ma, tima ɔ tima ko a, a ni ma wan.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, dunya chɛ min mbe ya ɔ ma, Yataa nii ma a fɔ ni, mbɛ maeka n fan mbe a kun ma. A sin, nn mbe ka koɔ tena, a si an dunya chɛ an ma.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Yataa 'a gboo kaka dɔndɔ ɔ, a ɛ ka wan, a ɔ, “Mansa Yataa, mɔ gbu ma fen kɔ fen na. Fen mu i‑a i yii na chii a a? Fen mu i gbɔsɔen mu a ko a?

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: I na‑a a ma wan, i‑a a don maeka n 'na gbasaya kɔɔ, tima ɛnden ko a dechee. Chɛɛ i yɛ‑a wan, i‑a a ma mansa a, tando ɛ min ma, a basan basɔmaya a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: A sin, i‑a gbasaya be wan a ma, fen kɔ fen kun ma dunya ɔ.” Yataa‑a gbasaya sin be kɛn a ma, fen kɔ fen kun ma, Yataa wɛɛ‑a fen kɔ fen don fan a 'a gbasaya kɔɔ. Chɛɛ koe n mbe buɛ min dɔ, mmɔ ma a ɔ yen nin bɛ, fen kɔ fen dondenɛ ni ma a kɔɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛɛ mmɔ‑a a ɔ sɔn fan Chisɔsi ɛ gbɛ buɛ min dɔ. Tima ɛnden ko a, Yataa na‑a a don fan maeka n 'na gbasaya kɔɔ. A na‑a a ma wan mansa a, tando ɛ min ma, a basan basɔmaya a. Chɛ ma‑a, a mu min na, a na‑a tɔɔ wan saya ɔ. Chɛ ko a, Yataa 'a koadia demanɛ ni a ma, a ni saya ɔ yen mɔɛ gbɛɛ ko a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Yataa an na‑a fen kɔ fen na dan, a sin fan mbe fɔɛ be fen kɔ fen ma. A na‑a a ma wan, mɔ sɛsɛ ma‑a a 'a denɛ n na, mbɛ an don‑da a waa banda bu ɔ. A ni chɛ ma tena tima min na, a na‑a a yii na chii wan, mbɛ a nyin Chisɔsi ni ma mɔɛ n baun mɔɛ chɛndɛ a. Chɛ ni bɔ tɔɔya chɛ ɔ, a wan Chisɔsi ni na tena min dɔ bia‑a. A wan mbe chia a ka‑a, mɔ gbu n gbɛɛ ni bauncha ma sɔn.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, Chisɔsi ni ma, ni mɔɛ chɛ nu, a 'a gbasaya ɛ a ma, miin mbe ma tenchen Yataa ko a, an fa ɛ dɔndɔ gbe. Chɛ an fɛ mu, Chisɔsi ee mau an chee koe a, a suun ma nyɔɛ n na.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: A ɛ a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “Yataa, n mbe i tɔɛ bai‑a wan n suun ma nyɔɛ n tena. I 'a mɔɛ n tɛ ɔ, n mbe i tando‑a wan.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: A yɛ to, Chisɔsi ɔ, “N mbe n kai fa‑a wan Yataa a.” A sin to, a ɔ, “N yen ko nɛ, nn bɛ a 'a denɛ n na, Yataa‑a miin be n ma.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛ an fɛ mu gbɛ, den chɛ nu, mɔ gbu gbama gbama mu an na. An fɛ mu, a wandi wɛɛ, a na‑a ma wan to mɔ gbu a, min mbe a ma, a ni fa. A 'a saya chɛ sin mbe a ma‑a wan, a ni Sitana kasaa, gbasaya ɛ ka min boo ɔ saya ko a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, miin ni yɔncha ɔ, an 'na fɔɛ gbɛɛ ko a, saya ma chianɛ fɛ, a‑a an kun bɔ a ɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, tea gbu ko a, a gbɔsɔen mu chɛ n fan ko a, miin mu Ebeami cheeya n na. A ma a gbɔsɔ ni maeka n fan ko a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛ an na‑a a ma, a na‑a ma wan mɔ gbu a, chia ɔ chia a, yɔ Yataa‑a a suun ma nyɔɛ n na dan buɛ min dɔ. Chɛ ni a ma, a ni chinchincha yian. A yɛ to, a ni ma tɛ mɔ wa a, mɔ gbu n tɛ Yataa a, min danayaen mu Yataa 'a wai ɔ. A ni a ma, Yataa ni a boo bɔ mɔɛ n 'na ko yama n dɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, a wandi gbu wɛɛ, Sitana na‑a a yiima yan fan, ko yama ma koe a. A sin, a tɔɔya‑a wan. Chɛ ko a, ɛ che wan, a ni mɔɛ n deman, Sitana ɛ miin yiima yan‑da, ko yama ma koe a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛ an fɛ mu, nn suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo wɛn mbe tenchen Yataa ko a, a sin na‑a wo wɛɛ chee wan, wo wo yii na chii wɛ Chisɔsi chɛ a. Mmɔ ɛ a fɔ wan, mbɛ Yataa 'a sɔ mɔɛ mu a a, a sin, tɛ mɔ wa mu a a, mɔ gbu n tɛ Yataa a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: A danayaen fan ni Yataa tena, min‑na a yian wai chɛ koe a. A ni wan dechee yɔ Mosisi danayaen ni buɛ min dɔ, wai chɛ koe a, Yataa 'a chenɛ a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ta basɔmaya, a benden mu Mosisi ta ma. Ɛ ka wan dechee yɔ chen sɔ mɔɛ wɛɛ, baa koo a ma, a ni ben chenɛ wandi ma.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, chenɛ kan kɔ kan, mɔɛ an mbe a sɔ. Chɛɛ fen kɔ fen dunya ma, a nyan mɔɛ mu Yataa an na.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Mosisi ni bɔi denɛ an na, min danayaen ni Yataa 'a chenɛ a. A ni koɔ wan mɔɛ n tena, a si koe n ma, Yataa ni na tena miin fɔ‑a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛɛ Chasi tana, Yataa 'a denɛ mu a a, a danayaen mu, a sin mbe Yataa 'a chenɛ an kun ma. A sin, mmɔ wan mu Yataa 'a chenɛ a, ni mmɔ‑a mmɔ faa sɔ, mmɔ ni dan a a, mmɔ yii a ni tɛ a ma.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛ an fɛ mu, Yataa Nyina ɛ a fɔ wan Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, “Ni wo‑a Yataa da a kuiɛ a min bi,

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: wo ma wo faa sɔ, yɔ wo bemba n ta bemba nu, an na‑a sɔ buɛ min dɔ n na, tima min na an na‑a n dɔ siman fuinɛ ma.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: An na‑a sɔ wan n na kan, an‑na n dɔ siman. A sin, san bi naanin ko a, an na‑a n chɛ chɛ wai yen fan.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛ an fɛ mu, n faa na‑a tɛ wan an mɔɛ chɛ n nɛnɛ ma, mbɛ n‑na a fɔ, n dɔ, ‘An faa ma nyin tima ɔ tima ko a. A sin, an mbe ee dɔn, an ni bea n fɛ.’

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: An faa tɛ chɛ sin ko a, n‑na n kai, n dɔ, ‘Kuɔ fɔ ko a, an mbe ee don‑da suin tena chɛ, n‑na min dɔ bɛn.’ ”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo wo kun ma fɛn, wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ, ko yama ma faa ma na dɛ wo ɔ. A ni a ma, wo ee dan Yataa a. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, wo ni wo kan kɔ sɔ Yataa a, min mbe ee fa.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛɛ wo wo nyɔn faa ma nande, tee ɔ tee ko a. Wo chɛ ma bi, tima min na wɛ Yataa ma sɛmbɛ ni deman koe a wo ma. Chɛ ni a ma, ko yama ma na chenɛ sɔ wo kɔɔ, a ni wo bun, wo ni too ɔ gbɛa bɔ Yataa a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, mmɔ gbɛɛ, mmɔ bɛ Chasi a, mmɔ ɛ ko dɔndɔɛ an dɔ. Ɛ ma‑a ka wan, ni mmɔ‑a danaya saa chɛ bia gban, aan mmɔ 'a fɔɛ danka a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Yataa 'a gboo sin mbe a fɔ tena ka wan, a ɔ, “Ni wo‑a Yataa da a kuiɛ a min bi, wo ma wo faa sɔ, yɔ wo bemba n ta bemba nu, an sɔ‑a tima min na Yataa a.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Nyɔn ni mɔɛ chɛ n na, miin na‑a Yataa da a kuiɛ chɛ a min, chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, an na‑a an kun si wan Yataa a? An ni mɔɛ chɛ n fan na, Mosisi na‑a sɔ miin ya ɔ, a bɔ Ichipi chɛnyɛ ɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: A sin, Yataa faa na‑a tɛ nyɔn ma, san bi naanin ko a? Mɔɛ chɛ nu ni, miin na‑a ko yama ma, a sin, an na‑a bea wan an fuinɛ ma, an fa‑a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: A sin, Yataa nii ma a kai ni mɔ dɔ gbɛɛ tena, mbɛ kuɔ fɔ ko a, an mbe ee don‑da suin tena chɛ, a‑a min dɔ bɛn. Chɛɛ a na‑a a fɔ chɛ n fan ye, miin nii ma an too ma sɔ ni a ma.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Mbɛ mmɔ ban‑da gbɛ a ɔ yen‑da, mbɛ an nii ma dan ni Yataa a. Chɛ an na‑a a ma, an ma che ni don‑da suin tena chɛ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛ an fɛ mu, tooɔdia ɛ wɛ ka nɔ tima min na, mmɔ don koe a suin tena chɛ, Yataa‑a min dɔ bɛn, mmɔ chiandenɛ ni ma, kɔkɔɛ mmɔ dɔ nu, mmɔ ee na‑a kun‑da don koe a suin tena chɛ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ, a che‑a buɛ min dɔ mmɔ ma, a che‑a ka wan an bɛɛ ma. Chɛɛ an sakana bai chɛ, an‑na min na min, an ma tɔnɔnɛ sɔn ni a ɔ. Koe min na mu, a nii ma danaya tan ni an dɔ, min sima ni ma an dɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Mmɔ wɛn sin danden mu Yataa 'a tooɔdia chɛ a, mmɔ wan mbe don an suin tena chɛ. A sin, a na‑a a fɔ ka wan, a ɔ, “An faa tɛ chɛ sin ko a, n‑na n kai, n dɔ, ‘Kuɔ fɔ ko a, an mbe ee don‑da suin tena chɛ, n‑na min dɔ bɛn.’ ” A maen mu wɛɛ boo ɔ boo, mbɛ a na‑a ban fan a 'a wai chɛ‑a, a ka dunya a dan tima ma.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, a na‑a chɛ an fɔ, Yataa 'a gboo kaka dɔndɔ ɔ, a si tee wɔnfean bɔɛ ma, a ɔ, “A wan Yataa, a na‑a wai gbɛɛ chɛ kɛn, a‑a a suin fan, tee wɔnfean bɔɛ ma.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: A sin, a yɛ‑a wan to, a kaka chɛ wɛɛ ɔ, a ɔ, “Kuɔ fɔ ko a, an mbe ee don‑da suin tena chɛ, n‑na min dɔ bɛn.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛ an fɛ mu, min toen mu gbɛ, an nɛ mɔɛ n don koe a nɔ. A sin, mɔɛ saa nu, miin na‑a sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a min, an nii ma kooya be ni, an na‑a a ma, an nii ma don ni nɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: A sin to, Yataa na‑a tee dɔ mende sa wan, a na‑a min chee, a ɔ, “Bi.” Bai chɛ, mmɔ ban‑da gbɛ min na min‑da, a ɔ mɛenɛ gbakɔ, a na‑a a a ben fan a 'a gboo ɔ, Mansa Defidi a, a ɔ, “Ni wo‑a Yataa da a kuiɛ a min bi, wo ma wo faa sɔ.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, ni Chɔsowa na‑a a ma wan, an ni an suin, Yataa nii koɔ‑a a si tee dɔ mende ma.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛ an fɛ mu, suin tena ɛ wan nɔ, Yataa 'a mɔɛ n ko a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, mɔ ɔ mɔ, min mbe don‑da Yataa tena, a suin koe a, a mɔɛ chɛ ɛ a suin‑da wan, wai chɛ koe a. Ɛ ma‑a ka wan dechee, yɔ Yataa wɛɛ na‑a a suin buɛ min dɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ butuin chɛ, mmɔ ni don an suin tena chɛ. Mmɔ butuin chɛ, mmɔ dɔndɔ wɛɛ ma na bea. Mmɔ ma na bɔ chɛ n gba ɔ, danaya nii miin dɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, Yataa 'a bai, fɔɛ an mbe a ɔ, a sin gbasa. A ɛ wan dechee yɔ mɛ, min na saen mu kaka. A ɛ kun fan don koe a mɔɛ gboo ɔ chɛndɛ chɛ, a ni che a faa ma. Mbɛ fenɛ min be a ɔ, a yen‑da. Mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ 'a yiinachii, a basan a faa ma koe n na, an dɔ sɔn‑da.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: A sin, Yataa chen kɔɔ, fen kɔ fen mbe ee nɔ, min mbe nun a ma. Chɛɛ ko ɔ ko kan kɔ kan, an mbe wan sa ɔ den, a ya kɔɔ. Mmɔ gbɛɛ sin, mmɔ ɛ mmɔ chɛ chɛ wai ɔ yian‑da a wan na.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: A ka gbɛ an tima chɛ ma, tɛ mɔ wa, mɔ gbu n tɛ Yataa a, an mbe gbɛ mmɔ boo ɔ, min ta‑a banda bu ɔ. A mu Chisɔsi an na, Yataa 'a denɛ. Chɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ ni mmɔ boo a chii, mmɔ kai fa koe ma a a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, tɛ mɔ wa an nɛ, mmɔ tɛ Yataa a, min mbe chinchin mmɔ ma, koe n dɔ miin mu mmɔ yama chia an na. Mɔɛ mu an na, chia ɔ chia a, Sitana na‑a a yiima yan fan, ko yama ma koe a, yɔ ɛ mmɔ ta yan buɛ min dɔ. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, Chasi ma ko yama ma ni.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛ ko a gbɛ, mmɔ ma sika, mmɔ ma na koe a Yataa 'a mansaya sea tena, koadia demanɛ ma ɛ sɔn kaina min. Chɛ an mbe a ma‑a, a ni chinchin mmɔ ma, mbɛ mmɔ‑a a 'a koadia demanɛ ma sɔn, tima min na mmɔ toenɛ ɛ ma‑a demanɛ a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, tɛ mɔ wa kan kɔ kan, Yataa ɛ a boo sɔ a ma wai chɛ koe a, a bɔɛ mɔ gbu n fan ko a. A ni ma nɔ, an tɛ, an bɛ Yataa a, yasi bɔ koe a an 'na ko yama n ko a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: An tɛ mɔ wa chɛ, ɛ kun fan, a ni a bɔɛ n bia faa chima a. Chɛ nu, miin ma ko sɔn, ni chɛ nu miin bia koe gbɛ, ɛ an bia wan. Koe min na mu, a wandi wɛɛ, a yama chia nu, an mbe wan sɛsɛ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛ an fɛ mu, a dindenɛ mu a ma, yasi bɔ koe a Yataa tena. A wandi gbu ta ko yama n ko a, a basan an mɔɛ chɛ n ta n na.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: An wai chɛ sin, mɔ wandi an mbe ee a ya i kun ma gbasaya a. Chɛɛ Yataa an mbe mɔɛ chee, yɔ a na‑a ma buɛ min dɔ Eyɔn na.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, Chasi gbu wɛɛ, a nii ma a wandi ya ni tɛ mɔ wa a, mɔ gbu n tɛ, an bɛ Yataa a. Chɛɛ Yataa wandi, an na‑a a boo sɔ a ma. Yataa na‑a a fɔ wan a 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, “N 'na denɛ mu i a. N ma‑a i fa a bi.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Yataa na‑a a fɔ wan to, a 'a gboo kaka dɔ mende ɔ, a ɔ, “Kuɔ fɔ ko a, e ma‑a wan mɔɛ n tɛ, n fan Yataa a. E ma‑a wan, yɔ Mɛchisɛdɛki ni buɛ min dɔ.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Tima min na Chisɔsi ni fɔɛ ɔ dunya chɛ ɔ, a ni samunɛ chɛ wan, a yɛ to, a ni Yataa ɔ tisa wan basan koe a a ma. A ni chɛ ma a kuiɛ ma sɛenɛ an na, a ya yii ɛ ta‑a bɔ‑a Yataa tena, min mbe che dechee a kun bɔ koe a saya ɔ. A sin ni baa be ka buɛ min dɔ Yataa ma, a wɛɛ, a ni a di kuiɛ a min fan.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛɛ a ni wɛɛ boo ɔ boo Yataa 'a denɛ a, a na‑a mɔnɛ ɔ bia wan. Chɛ an gbu na‑a a ma, a‑a a yiima ɔ bɛn, kooya be koe a Yataa ma.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: A sin, a na‑a ma wan mɔɛ a, min da faenɛ ɛ gban, Yataa tena. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, a ma‑a mɔɛ a, min mbe na kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ a mɔɛ n ko a, miin mbe kooya be‑a a ma.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: A gbu sin, Yataa wandi, an‑na a yian, ma koe a tɛ mɔ wa a, mɔ gbu n tɛ Yataa a. A ni ma yɔ Mɛchisɛdɛki ni buɛ min dɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Bai kɔkoo nn da a, a fɔ koe a, a si koe chɛ ma. Chɛɛ koe sin fan nɛ, min dɔ gbɛ, a ɔ yian koe a wo a. Koe min na mu, wo ee fua koe ɔ gbɛ‑a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Tima chɛ gbu sin na gbɛ, a ni ma‑a ko ma kawaenɛ an na, ni wo ni wan gbɛ mɔ dɔ mende n kan‑da. Chɛɛ sanche wɛɛ, mɔɔ ni mɔ dɔ mende‑a wo kan, a nama a, a si Yataa bai kuu sɔ tena ma. Wo e wan dechee yɔ den toa nu, miin mbe a kuu sɔ susu yii ma, an mbe ee daun fen dɔ gbɛama daun.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe susu minɛ a, den toa mu a a. Koe min na mu, a yiima ɔ dɔɔ, a si chia ma, tea ɛ min dɔ, Yataa tena.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛɛ daun fen dɔ gbɛama tana, ɛ mɔɛ n fan ko a, miin kunɛ kɔɔen mu. Mɔɛ nu, miin yiima kɔɔen mu, an‑na a kan, mɔ gbu ɛ ko chɛndɛ tɛ bɔ ka ma, a fea ko yama a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ koe chɛ n to, Chasi ni mmɔ kan miin na, yɔ den mɛsɛ nu. Mmɔ a kuu sɔ gbɛ mmɔ yii na chii‑a yɔ mɔɛ miin yii kɔɔen mu. Mmɔ sɛmbɛ mmɔ gba ɔ tɛn tɛn koe a, ko mɛsɛ chɛ n kan koe a, a si Chisɔsi ma. Koe chɛ nu, miin mbe a ma, an ni an mun, an ni sɛmbɛ ko yama chɛ n ma‑a, miin mbe a ma, an ni saya ma sɔn. Mmɔ yɛ to, mmɔ ni a ɔ yen, an ni an kai fa Yataa a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Mmɔ ma an kan to, a si yii chɛ koe ma mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ Yataa chia a. A yɛ to, boo bunɛ mɔɛ n ma, an ni dua ma sɔn, ni mɔɛ kɔɔ sɔ koe a, a ka saya ɔ, a basan kaa a tɛ a, min mbe ma‑a nɔ kuɔ fɔ ko a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛ sin, ni Yataa dɔn‑da, mmɔ ɛ a ma wan.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Mɔɛ dɔ nu, an ni wan tima dɔndɔ a pimbi ɔ, mbɛ Yataa‑a manɛ be an ma. An na‑a tɔnɔnɛ ma sɔn fan Yataa a, a sin, Yataa Nyina ni wan an bɛɛ fɛ. Mbɛ Yataa 'a bai, ɛ na ko chɛndɛ miin bɛɛ a, an‑na an bɛɛ sima ma fɛn. Fɔɛ chɛ wɛɛ, min mbe ya ɔ ma, gbasaya min mbe a ɔ, an‑na a wɛɛ ma fɛn fan. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, an ka‑a Chasi fɛ. A yɛ to, an mbe da mau koe n sɛ‑a Yataa 'a denɛ ma, fanka ɔ, an mbe a fa‑a to kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma. Chɛ an fɛ mu, chia ee che to sa‑a an ko a, gba fean bɔɛ ɔ, yɛ koe a to Yataa tena.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Tai chɛ yen ko. Sona ɛ chɛ duu gboo ma wan, mbɛ a‑a a chima dɔgbɔ. A sin, chin fenɛ min mbe chin an duu gboo ma, ɛ gbɔɛ be wan a chin mɔɛ n ma, miin nyin an ko a. Yataa sin mbe an duu gboo chɛ dua wan.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛɛ ni an duu gboo chɛ, wai nyan‑da a ma, a basan binɛ a, duu gboo a tenden ma. A to‑a ɛnden fan na, Yataa ni a danka, a sin, ta an mbe a kasaa‑a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛɛ wo wan, nn dia nyɔɛ nu, miin ko a di nn ye kaka, nn‑na chɛ fɔ wɛɛ boo ɔ boo, nn yii na tɛen fan mu wo ko a. Nn‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ wo e chia chɛndɛ an ma, bauncha ko a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, Yataa ee kaa yama a tɛ, a ni nyina wai chɛndɛ chɛ ma, wo‑a min chɛ. A yɛ to, wo na‑a Yataa 'a mɔɛ n bia wan chɛndɛ chɛ, wo sin mbe tun an bia‑a a buɛ ɔ. Chɛ‑a a ɔ yian fan Yataa a, mbɛ wo toen mu a a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Nn toen mu wo gbɛɛ, wo ni butuin dɔndɔ gbe chɛ chɛ wo faa gbɛɛ a, aan wo 'a fɔɛ danka a. Chɛ an mbe a ma, wo yii na tɛen mu koe miin ma, wo ni an ma sɔn.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, wo ee ma‑a gboo ɔ fa tɔɛ n na. Chɛɛ wo e bea wan mɔɛ chɛ n fɛ, miin‑na an kai fa Yataa a, an‑na an faa bia, mbɛ Yataa na‑a an too ɔ dia min gbɛɛ a, an‑na an ma sɔn.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛ wɛɛ yen ko. Tima min na Yataa na‑a tooɔdia chɛ Ebeami a, a nii ma a kai ni fen dɔ mende ɔ, fɔ a wandi. Koe min na mu, fen dɔ mende kan kɔ kan mbe ee nɔ, a ben a wandi ma.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Yataa na‑a a fɔ wan a 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, “Ko ɔ ko ee a yɔn, n mbe i dua‑a wan. N mbe a ma‑a wan, i ni ma mɔɛ a, min mbe po.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛ sin ko a, Ebeami na‑a a faa bia wan ko sɛsɛ a, mbɛ a too ɔ dia‑a min na, a‑a a ma sɔn.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Mɔ gbu n mbe an kai fenɛ n fan dɔ, an ta yiima ɔ, fenɛ miin benden mu an ma. A sin fan mbe a ma, koɛ gbɛɛ, an mbe miin chɛ, an mbe danka wan an kai a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛ an fɛ mu, mɔɛ chɛ nu, tooɔdia chɛen ni miin na, Yataa toen ni a ni a ɔ yian an na, mbɛ ɛ bai min fɔ, an mbe ma. A sɔnɛ chɛ ee a ɔ, bai fɔ koe a bi, mbɛ a‑a a ka a gba ɔ sinan. Chɛ an na‑a a ma, a‑a a kai, a da a bai kun ma.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛ ni a ma, mɔɛ n ni a ɔ yen, chia fea a, miin mbe ee mun, Yataa ɛ koe min ma. Yataa‑a a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ ko ee nɔ, min mbe a ma, a ni a da a kuiɛ yɔn. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, mmɔ wɛn na‑a bui‑a Chasi tena, mmɔ kun ma fɛn koe a, tooɔdia min mbe mmɔ ko a, mmɔ bu ɔ diama ɛ ma‑a wan, a bia koe a fɔin.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Mmɔ yii sɔen mu an ma, tima ɔ tima, mbɛ an mbe mmɔ fɔɛ si. A ɛ wan yɔ dɛndɛ chii yuu, ɛ a ma buɛ min dɔ ɛ sɔ chidi, a gba ɔ. Yiinatɛ chɛ, an mbe ma mmɔ ɔ, mmɔ ɛ ma don‑da Yataa 'a chenɛ bu ɔ, banda bu ɔ, Yataa chen kɔɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chisɔsi pɛn na‑a ta an kaina chɛ, mmɔ ko a. A sin, a ma‑a wan tɛ mɔ wa a, mmɔ ko a Yataa tena, kuɔ fɔ ko a. A na‑a ma wan, yɔ Mɛchisɛdɛki ni buɛ min dɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Mɛchisɛdɛki chɛ, mansa ni an na, Saden duu ɔ. A sin to, tɛ mɔɛ ni a a, Yataa Wa tena. Tima dɔndɔ a, Ebeami ni wan ka tena chɛɛ ɔ. An na‑a mansa naaninɛ n 'na chɛɛ chɛ mɔɛ n kun tɛ an chɛɛ an dɔ. Mɛchisɛdɛki na‑a an tan fan. A sin, a wan Mɛchisɛdɛki na‑a Ebeami dua wan.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: A sin, fenɛ gbɛɛ, Ebeami ka‑a miin na an chɛɛ chɛ ɔ, a na‑a an du wan, si tena tanɛ a, mbɛ a‑a si tena dɔndɔ be Mɛchisɛdɛki chɛ ma. An mu mɔɛ saa a, ni mmɔ‑a mmɔ yii na chii a tɔɛ fasai ma, mbɛ an mu mansa a, min tanden mu. An mu kɛn to mansa a, Saden, min fasaien mu, faa chima mansa.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: A fa ee, a de ee, mɔ sin mbe ee che a fɔ‑a, mbɛ a bɔ kɔnkɔɛ an nɛ. Mɔ ɔ mɔ ma a fɔɛ kuu sɔ tena sɔn, mɔ ma a fɔɛ a ban tena sɔn. Chɛɛ a bɔen mu Yataa 'a denɛ an na, ɛ ma‑a wan tɛ mɔɛ a, kuɔ fɔ ko a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wo a ɔ yen gbɛ, a mu mɔ chenama min nyɔn sima a. Mmɔ bɔ kɔnkɔɛ, Ebeami, a na‑a miin gbɛɛ ma sɔn chɛɛ ɔ, a na‑a wan si tena tanɛ a, mbɛ a‑a si tena dɔndɔɛ be Mɛchisɛdɛki chɛ ma.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: A sin, Yataa na‑a miin gbɛɛ ma to tɛ mɔɛ a, Difai cheeya n ni. Sawa min be‑a Mosisi ma, a na‑a a fɔ wan an ye, mbɛ an ni boo fenɛ n kain mɔɛ n boo ɔ, Isɔɛɛ chɛnyɛ ɔ. A dinden fan ni an ma, an boo fenɛ n gbɛɛ, du koe a si tena tanɛ a. Mbɛ an‑na a si tena dɔndɔɛ be. An ni chɛ kain ka an fandi gbu ta mɔɛ n fan ma, Ebeami cheeya ni an bɛɛ a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛɛ Mɛchisɛdɛki chɛ nii ma bɔ nin bɛɛ Difai dambi ɔ, chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, Ebeami na‑a boo fenɛ si tena dɔndɔɛ be an ma. Mbɛ a dua‑a Ebeami ye, Yataa na‑a too ɔ dia chɛ min na.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Mɔɛ sin, min mbe mɔɛ dua, a benden mu mɔɛ chɛ ma, ɛ min dua ka. Kɔɔsa bia kan kɔ kan mbe ee chɛ ma.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chu mɔɛ n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, ni an ta ɔ mu, boo fenɛ si tena dɔndɔɛ chɛ ɛ be an fan mɔ gbu n fan ma, miin mbe fa. Chɛɛ Mɛchisɛdɛki chɛ benden mu an ma. Koe min na mu, a fɔen fan mu mmɔ ye, mbɛ ɛ ma‑a wan fɔɛ ɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Mmɔ ɛ a fɔ wan, mbɛ Difai wandi gbu, boo fenɛ si tena dɔndɔɛ an ni be a ma. Mbɛ a wɛɛ‑a a be Ebeami ma, a be koe a Mɛchisɛdɛki ma.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, Ebeami na‑a Mɛchisɛdɛki tan tima min na, Difai ni wɛ a woo mɔɛ Ebeami gboo kɔɔ wan, a nii ma suun nin bɛ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin na‑a bɔ Difai 'a dambi ɔ, an sin ni mɔɛ n tɛ Yataa a, a ta nii ka sawa chɛ wakoe ma, min na‑a be Mosisi ma. Ni mɔɛ n tɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na wai na‑a Yataa faa chima wan, mbɛ tɛ mɔ ko dɔ mende nii ma‑a to nɔ. Tɛ mɔɛ dɔ mende na‑a na wan, yɔ Mɛchisɛdɛki. An sin, a nii ka yɔ Eyɔn.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, tɛ mɔɛ kan kɔ kan min mbe na, ɛ sawa wɛɛ ka wan a gba ɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chisɔsi chɛ sin, bai chɛ nu, an mbe sa tena a si min ma, a bɔ‑a dambi dɔ mende an dɔ. A sin, an dambi chɛ ɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ ma tɛ mɔya chɛ nin bɛ, gbengbe ma Yataa 'a kata ɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, a ɔ sɔnden fan mu chɛndɛ chɛ, mbɛ mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi bɔ‑a Chuda 'a dambi an dɔ. A sin, min sien mu an dambi chɛ ma, Mosisi nii ma bai ɔ bai sa ni, a si tɛ mɔɛ koe ma.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Mɔɛ ɛ chɛ gbu yen fan sa ɔ den, kɛn tɛ mɔɛ dɔ mende‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, min ni yɔ Mɛchisɛdɛki.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Mbɛ a ma‑a tɛ mɔɛ a, sawa ta fɛ chia a ma, min sien mu a bɔ dambi ma. Chɛɛ a bɔ‑a gbasaya chɛ an dɔ, fɔɛ min mbe ee che kasaa‑a, an mbe a ɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ wan, a si a ma, a ɔ, “Kuɔ fɔ ko a, e ma‑a wan mɔɛ n tɛ Yataa a. E ma‑a wan, yɔ Mɛchisɛdɛki ni buɛ min dɔ.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chia dɔndɔɛ a, sawa kɔma ee to wai tena. Koe min na mu, an sawa chɛ kɔ ma gbɛ, sawa a tenden gbu nii ma.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, chia dɔndɔɛ wɛɛ a, sawa gbu nii ma a ma ni, ko kan kɔ kan ni sɔ a chia ma chɛndɛ chɛ. Yiinatɛ chɛndɛ yian‑da wan mmɔ a, min mbe mmɔ ma sawan Yataa tena.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: A sin, chɛ nii ma ma ni gbama a. Yataa na‑a a kai wan. Yataa nii ma a kai ni, tima min na mɔ dɔ mende chɛ n ni ma tɛ mɔɛ a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛɛ chɛ nɛnɛ tana, Yataa na‑a a kai wan a 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, “N fan, Mansa Yataa, n‑na n kai, n sin mbe ee n da a kuiɛ yɔn. N dɔ, ‘Kuɔ fɔ ko a, e ma‑a wan mɔɛ n tɛ n fan Yataa a.’ ”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛ ɛ a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ Chisɔsi an mbe a ma, dɔbɛn nama chɛ mmɔ tɛ Yataa a, a ee yɔn. Chɛ an mbe a ɔ yian, mbɛ dɔbɛn nama chɛ nyin a ben a kɔma ma.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: A sin, tɛ mɔɛ nu, an kɔ ni koo, an dan koe a. Koe min na mu, saya an ni a ma, an nii che wai chɛ‑a, aan a ta.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛɛ Chisɔsi tana, a 'a tɛ mɔya, a danka ee. Koe min na mu, ɛ ma‑a wan fɔɛ ɔ, kuɔ fɔ ko a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: A sin fan fɛ mu, mɔɛ miin mbe na Yataa tena, a 'a gbasaya ɔ, ɛ an mɔɛ chɛ n kun bɔ wan tima ɔ tima an 'na ko yama n dɔ. Koe min na mu, tima ɔ tima ko a, ɛ wan nɔ, Yataa ma nande koe a, an mɔɛ chɛ n ko a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛ an fɛ mu, ko ma bɛndenɛ mu, tɛ mɔ wa chɛ, mɔ gbu n tɛ Yataa a, a sima ma sɔn koe a. A wɛn ma ko yama kan kɔ kan ma ni, ɛ tenchen Yataa ko a. A sin to, mabɔ ee a ma, an tɛ duenɛ ɛ, an bɛ ko yama ma mɔɛ n na. A ya‑a, a sɛ banda bu ɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: A ta nan gbu sin, a ee ka, yɔ tɛ mɔ wa tɔɛ chɛ nu, miin ma gbɔsɔɛ ni yasi bɔ koe a, tima sɛsɛ ko a. Koe saa ni min na, an ni yasi chɛ n bɔ tee ɔ tee a, an fandi gbu ta ko yama maenɛ n fan ko a. Mbɛ an yɛ‑a, an‑na a bɔ, mɔɛ tɔɛ n ko a. Chɛɛ Chisɔsi tana, a na‑a chɛ ma gba dɔndɔ gbe an ko a, tima min na a na‑a a wandi fɔɛ be.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Sawa min be‑a Mosisi ma, an mbe mɔ gbu n yian, dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a, ma koe a tɛ mɔ wa a, mɔ gbu n tɛ Yataa a. An ni a fɔ wɛɛ, an mɔɛ chɛ n gbu, wai chɛ gbasaya ee an ye. Chɛɛ Yataa sin mbe a kai wan a wandi ɔ, a ee na koe ma. A sin, a na‑a sawa chɛ be pɛn Mosisi ma, a ee na a boo sɔ a 'a denɛ ma. A den chɛ sin na‑a koe gbɛɛ ma wan tima ɔ tima, Yataa toen ni miin na.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Nn mbe bai min gbu fɔ tena, an nɛ. Tɛ mɔ wa min mbe mmɔ tɛ Yataa a, a koo sai ma. Ɛ wan si ɔ kaina ma bɛndenɛ, Mansa Yataa 'a mansaya sea boo nyima ɔ, pan banda bu ɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: A saa a, mɔɛ chɛ nu miin ni mɔɛ n tɛ Yataa a, an ni wai chɛ tɛndi an kɔɔ. A tɛndi chɛ sin, an ni yasi bɔ kaina min, mɔɛ n 'na ko yama n ko a, mɔ gbu an na‑a a sɔ. Chɛɛ Chisɔsi tana, ɛ wai chɛ Yataa 'a tɛndi an kɔɔ, banda bu ɔ, kaina min mbe tenchen Yataa ko a. An kaina chɛ sin, Mansa Yataa an‑na a sɔ, mɔ gbu ma.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, mɔ ɔ mɔ kan kɔ kan, min mu tɛ mɔ wa a, mɔ gbu n tɛ Yataa a, a yianden mu yasi bɔ koe an na, a basan boo fen be koe a Yataa ma. Chɛ an fɛ mu, a nyin an tɛ mɔ wa chɛ wɛɛ ko a, fenɛ ni ma a boo ɔ, a be koe a Yataa ma.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Sanche gbɛ, ni a ni dunya chɛ ɔ wan, a nii ma‑a mɔɛ n tɛ Yataa a, ɛnden bɛɛ a. Koe min na mu, mɔɛ n mbe wan nɔ mɔɛ n tɛ Yataa a, miin mbe boo fenɛ n be Yataa ma, sawa ta fɛ chia a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: An mbe wai min chɛ Yataa 'a tɛndi kɔɔ, a ɛ wan dechee yɔ koe miin mbe ma banda bu ɔ, an nininɛ gbama, an mbe buɛ min dɔ. Koe min na mu, Mosisi ni tima min na Yataa 'a tɛndi chɛ sɔ‑a, Yataa na‑a koɔ wan a tena, a ɔ, “Fen kɔ fen min sien mu tɛndi chɛ ma, a nyan yɔ i‑a a nyandenɛ yen buɛ min dɔ, Saina kɔnkɔɛ kun ma.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛɛ koe gbu, ɛ buɛ min dɔ, Chisɔsi 'a wai chɛ, a benden mu an 'na wai kɔma n ma. Ɛ wan dechee, yɔ a 'a dɔbɛn nama chɛ, a benden mu buɛ min dɔ a kɔma ma. Koe min na mu, a 'a dɔbɛn chɛ, a chɛen mu tooɔdia min na, a kɔ gbɛ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, ni mabɔ nii dɔbɛnɛ saa chɛ ma, mbɛ dɔbɛnɛ fean bɔɛ nii ma nɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛɛ Yataa na‑a a 'a mɔɛ n ma nyin fan. An fɛ ni, a‑a a fɔ a 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, “Tee ɛ bɔ‑a wan, n fan Yataa, n ni a fɔ, n dɔ, n mbe dɔbɛn nama chɛ‑a wan mɔɛ n na, miin ka‑a Isɔɛɛ chɛnyɛ ɔ, an bɛ chɛ n na, miin ka‑a Chuda chɛnyɛ ɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: A nɛnɛ ee ma‑a, yɔ dɔbɛn chɛ, n na‑a min chɛ an fa n na. N‑na an bia tee min na, an boo ma, sɔ koe a an ya ɔ, a bɔ Ichipi chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ, chɛɛ an nii ma an boo a chii ni n 'na dɔbɛnɛ ma. Chɛ sin ko a, n fan, Mansa Yataa, n ma n too kan kɔ kan sɔ ni an ma.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Mbɛ dɔbɛnɛ an nɛ, n mbe min chɛ‑a mɔɛ n na, miin ka‑a Isɔɛɛ chɛnyɛ ɔ. N fan Mansa Yataa, ni tee chɛ n ben‑da, n mbe n 'na sawa n sa‑a wan, an yii ma, n ni a sa an faa ɔ. A sin, n mbe ma‑a wan an 'na Yataa a, mbɛ an bɛɛ, an ma‑a n 'na mɔɛ n na.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: An dɔndɔ wɛɛ, an mbe ee an chɛnyɛ nyɔɛ n kan‑da, chɛ ma, an dɔndɔ wɛɛ ni an suun ma nyɔɛ n kan. An ni a fɔ, an dɔ, ‘Wo Mansa Yataa sɔn.’ Koe min na mu, mɔɛ gbɛɛ, an mbe na‑a wan n sɔn‑da, a ka mɔɛ ma, baa sima wɛɛ ee min ma, a ta mɔɛ tena, min mu mɔ chenama wa a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, n mbe chinchin‑da an ma, ko yama n ko a. A sin, n mbe ee n yii na chii‑a tun, an 'na ko yama n na.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Ni a ma‑a bai sa‑a, a si dɔbɛn nama chɛ ma, ɛ a ma wan yɔ a kɔma tana, a kɔkɔya‑a gbɛ. A sin, fenɛ min kɔkɔya‑a, a bun‑da chenancha‑a, a ma bɛndenɛ an nɛ ka gbɛ, tuin koe a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Yataa na‑a dɔbɛnɛ saa min chɛ, an bɛ Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n na, sawa n ni wan a ma, Yataa fai koe a. A sin, mɔ gbu n na‑a kaina nyan fan, samunɛ chɛ koe a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, an na‑a Yataa 'a tɛndi dɛn fan. An tɛndi chɛ dumu saa, an ni an chee, an dɔ, kaina min mbe tenchen Yataa ko a. A bu ɔ, tebu ni wan nɔ, ni kaina, dambo si koe a. A yɛ to, biidi gbugbu n ni wan sa ɔ an tebu chɛ ma. Mɔɛ miin ni mɔɛ n tɛ ɔ Yataa a, an ni an fan be Yataa ma.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Dumu fean bɔɛ ni wan nɔ, tɛndi chɛ bu ɔ, an ni min chee, an dɔ, kaina min mbe tenchen Yataa ko a, a bɛbɛɛ wandi a. Don koe a an dumu chɛ ɔ, koa an ni dɛn dɔ chia a, min‑na dumu fea chɛ n tɛ du.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: An kaina chɛ bu ɔ, gbengbe ni wan nɔ min nyanden ni sanu ɔ, an ni fen kunyɛ a diama minda kaina. Yataa na‑a dɔbɛnɛ min bɛɛ chɛ Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n na, a kakaa chɛ wɛɛ ni wan nɔ, min gboo gbɛɛ ma bandenɛ ni sanu a. An kakaa chɛ ɔ, sanu tɔmbua ni wan nɔ, daun fenɛ ɛ a ɔ. An ni an daun fen chɛ chee, an dɔ, mana. Eyɔn 'na tungbɔɛ wɛɛ, yamba kunɛ na‑a fɛn min ma, a ni wan kakaa chɛ ɔ. A yɛ to, sen dɛnfɛ fea chɛ nu, Yataa na‑a sawa chɛ nyɛn miin ma, mbɛ an be‑a Mosisi ma, an bɛɛ ni wan an kakaa dɔndɔ gbe chɛ ɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: An kakaa chɛ kun ma chia a, fenɛ n ni wan nɔ yɔ maeka nu, an kambanɛ ɛ an ma. An ni a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ Yataa ɛ wan an kaina chɛ. An kambanɛ chɛ nu, an dɔ fuindenɛ ni kaina chɛ kun ma, Yataa ɛ chinchin kaina min, mɔɛ n ma, ni an‑na ko yama ma. Min sien mu fen chɛ n gbɛɛ wakoe ma, mmɔ ee che bai sɛsɛ sa‑a sanche, a si an ma.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Fen chɛ n gbɛɛ ɔ bɛndenɛ ɛ ma ka wan. A sin, mɔɛ miin ni mɔ gbu n tɛ Yataa a, an fan ni don dechee dumu saa chɛ ɔ, tee ɔ tee a, an 'na tɛ mɔ wai chɛ koe a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛɛ tɛ mɔ wa sin, mɔ gbu n tɛ Yataa a, a ni don dechee dumu fean bɔɛ chɛ ɔ, gba dɔndɔ gbe sanɛ ma. A tima chɛ a, ɛ don nɔ wii an na a boo ɔ. Mbɛ a‑a a be Yataa ma, a wandi ko a, ni a 'a mɔɛ n ta ko yama ko a, an nii ma miin dɔ sɔn.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛ ko a, Yataa Nyina na‑a a ɔ yian fan ka, mbɛ chia chɛ, mɔɛ n don koe a Yataa ɛ kaina, a da a nii ma ka ni. A sin mbe ma‑a ka wan, tima min na wɛ tɛndi chɛ ɛ sɔ ɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Yataa 'a tɛndi chɛ ɔ, ɛ koe tɔmɔsi an yian mmɔ a bi tee chɛ kɔɔ. Mɔɛ n ni na nɔ wan boo fenɛ n na, a basan yasi n na, Yataa fai koe a. Chɛɛ an fen chɛ nu, an nii che a ma‑a an yiima a ni ko fion.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, chia kɔma chɛ sien ni daun fenɛ n fan bakoe ma. A yɛ to, mɔɛ ma ɛ ko buɛ min dɔ, Chu n 'na sawa ta fɛ chia a. Chɛ n gbɛɛ, sawa gbama n fan nɛ. An ni nɔ dechee aan tima chɛ an ko a, Yataa na‑a a ta dɔbɛn nama chɛ tima min na.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛɛ Chasi ban‑da gbɛ na‑a, ma koe a tɛ mɔ wa a, mɔ gbu n tɛ Yataa a, ko chɛndɛ chɛ n ko a, miin‑na mmɔ tan. A ben‑da ka tɛndi min kɔɔ, mɔ gbu an ma a nyan ni, a sin gbu ma dunya chɛ ɔ fen na.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Kaina chɛ, min mbe tenchen Yataa ko a, a bɛbɛɛ gbu, a don‑da nɔ dɔndɔ gbe, a sin, a danka‑a an ma. A nii ma ta ni nɔ ba wii a, a boo ɔ, a ma ta ni ninchi tɔngbɔ wɛɛ wii a, mɔɔ dechee a wandi wii. A na‑a che ka wan kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da mmɔ ko a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Sawa kɔma chɛ n tima a, ba wii min ni bɔn, a basan ninchi wii a, a ni mɔɛ n ko wan dechee an gboo ma. An soe chɛ n buwa wɛɛ ni ko dɔndɔ gbe chɛ an ma.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Ni soe wii ɛ chɛ ma wan, a ɔ gbɛ Chasi ta wii? A wɛn nii ma ko yama kan kɔ kan ma ni, chɛɛ a‑a a wandi fɔɛ be, mmɔ ko a, Yataa Nyina 'a gbasaya ɔ, min mbe kuɔ fɔ ko a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, Chasi wii ni mmɔ yiima a ko, a ni koe n ka mmɔ yii ma miin mbe na saya a, mmɔ ni Yataa fai, min mbe kuɔ fɔ ko a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛ an fɛ mu, Chasi an mbe mmɔ tɛ Yataa a, dɔbɛn nama chɛ ko a. Chɛ ni a ma, Yataa ɛ mɔɛ miin chee‑a, an ni kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ chɛ ma sɔn, min bakoe na‑a don an too ɔ. Koe min na mu, Chasi ban‑da gbɛ saya chɛ‑a, mɔɛ kun ka koe a, a bɔ an 'na ko yama n dɔ, an na‑a miin ma dɔbɛnɛ kɔma kɔɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Gboo nyɛndenɛ, a si fuɛ gbaa fenɛ ma sɔn koe ma, a ee che wai‑a, mɔɔ ni siiya ma‑a nɔ, tea ɔ yian koe a. Koe min na mu, mɔɛ min‑na a nyɛn, a fa‑a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, ni mɔɛ‑a gboo nyɛn, a si boo fenɛ n ma, ɛ miin to‑a, an gboo chɛ ee wai, ni a mɔɛ chɛ ɛ fɔɛ ɔ, mɔɔ ni a fa‑a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛ an fɛ ni, dɔbɛnɛ saa chɛ wɛɛ, a kun nii ma tɛ ni, wii gbaa a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, Mosisi ban‑da kɛn Yataa 'a sawa chɛ n gbɛɛ ɔ yian‑da mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a, a na‑a chɛ an ma. A na‑a ninchi tɔngbɔɛ wii ya wan, a basan ba wii a, ni yii wɛɛ. A na‑a sa ti mende mende wan kɔnɛ bonɛ ma, mbɛ a‑a a don an wii chɛ ɔ, a‑a a fasi fasi sawa gboo chɛ ma, a basan mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Mosisi ɛ a fɔ‑a, a ɔ, “Wii an nɛ, min mbe dɔbɛn chɛ ko a, Yataa‑a min chɛ wo a.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: A na‑a a ma ka wan to, a‑a wii fasi fasi wan tɛndi chɛ ma, a basan fen kɔ fen na nɔ, an ni Yataa fai miin na.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Tea gbu a, sawa ta fɛ chia a, fen kɔ fen ma ɛ ko dechee fion wii an na, Yataa chen kɔɔ. A sin gbu, ni wii a nii ma bɔn ni, Yataa nii a boo bɔ‑a mmɔ 'a ko yama n dɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛ ko a, koe ni min mbe ma, fen chɛ nu, miin bɔen mu fenɛ n na miin mbe banda bu ɔ, an ni ko fo chia chɛ a. Chɛɛ fen chɛ nu banda bu ɔ, yasi min mbe bɔ an ko koe a fion, a nyin an yasi chɛ ni ben dunya ɔ nɛnɛ ta ma.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, Chasi don‑da banda bu ɔ wan. A nii ma don ni kaina chɛ wan, Yataa ɛ fai kaina, mɔɛ n‑na min nyan. A don‑da gbɛ banda bu ɔ, ma koe an na, Yataa chen kɔɔ, mmɔ ko a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Tɛ mɔ wa chɛ tana, mɔ gbu n tɛ Yataa a, a ni don fan san kɔ san na, tɛndi chɛ ɔ, min mbe tenchen Yataa ko a. A sin, wii ni ma wan an boo ɔ, min nii ma an ta a. Chɛɛ Chasi tana, a nii ma a wandi be ni gba fea ko a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: A ni ma‑a chɛ ma‑a, a ni na‑a wan fa‑a, gba sɛsɛ ko a, a ka dunya kuu sɔ tima ma. Chɛɛ sanche gbɛ, dunya e na to ban‑da, Chasi bɔ‑a mɔɛ n tɛ, gba dɔndɔ gbe ko a, a sin, a danka an nɛ. A na‑a a wandi be wan, mɔɛ n bɔ koe a ko yama n dɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: A sin yianden mu ka wan, mbɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ kan kɔ kan mbe fa gba dɔndɔ gbe wan, mbɛ a gbakɔ, Yataa‑a gbɛmbo chɛ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a mu, Chasi wɛɛ na‑a a wandi be gba dɔndɔ gbe wan, mmɔ 'a ko yama n ko a. Chɛɛ Chasi ɛ bɔ‑a wan to a a dunya chɛ ɔ, a gba fean bɔɛ ko a. A sin, a nɛnɛ ee ma‑a ko yama n fan bakoe a. Chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ n fan kun ka koe mu, miin mbe a ma kɔn tena, an faa gbɛɛ a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Sawa chɛ nu, miin be‑a Mosisi ma, an mbe bai sa tena wan, a si fen chɛndɛ n ma, miin mbe banda bu ɔ. Chɛɛ an sawa chɛ n mbe wan dechee, yɔ banda bu ɔ fen chɛ n nininɛ gbama nu. An mbe ee koe chɛ n dɔ yian, tea chia a, ɛnden bɛɛ a. An mbe yasi dɔndɔ gbe an bɔ, san kɔ san na. Chɛ sin mbe ee a ma, mɔɛ miin mbe bea sawa chɛ n fɛ, an ni ma yɔ Yataa toen mu an ni ma buɛ min dɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Ni a ni kun fan chɛ ma‑a, mɔɛ chɛ n ni sɛmbɛ‑a wan, yasi chɛ n bɔ koe a. A nii ma‑a to an yii ma, ɛnden bɛɛ a, mbɛ an 'na ko yama ma wan.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛɛ an mbe yasi miin bɔ ka, a puin koe mu an yii ma, san kɔ san na, mbɛ ko yama ma mɔɛ mu an na.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, a ee che ma‑a, ɛnden bɛɛ a, ninchi wii basan ba wii a, an ni mɔɛ n ko, a bɔ an 'na ko yama n dɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛ an fɛ ni, Chasi na‑a tima min na dunya chɛ ɔ, a na‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “Yasi n bɛ mɔɛ n boo fenɛ n na, i wan Yataa ma to ni an fan na. Chɛɛ mɔ gbu gboo, i‑a a be n ma.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Soe miin mbe minda ka i tena, a basan yasi tɔɛ n na, mɔɛ n mbe miin bɔ an 'na ko yama n ko a, an ma fen na, miin mbe i bu ɔ dia.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Mbɛ n dɔ, ‘N yen ko nɛ, Mansa Yataa, i faa ma koe ma koe a, yɔ a nyɛnden mu buɛ min dɔ, i 'a gboo chɛ ɔ, a si n ma.’ ”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: A saa a, Chasi‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “Yasi n bɛ mɔɛ n boo fenɛ n na, i wan Yataa ma to ni an fan na. Soe miin mbe minda ka i tena, a basan yasi tɔɛ n na, mɔɛ mbe miin bɔ an 'na ko yama n ko a, an ma fen na, miin mbe i bu ɔ dia.” A‑a chɛ fɔ wɛɛ, chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, an mbe chɛ n bɔ sawa ta fɛ chia an na.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “N yen ko nɛ, Mansa Yataa, i faa ma koe n ma koe a.” A‑a dɔbɛnɛ saa ɔ yɔn, min mbe a ma, a ni a fean bɔɛ kuu sɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chisɔsi ni Yataa faa ma koe an ma. A sin, a chia chɛ a mu, mmɔ ma‑a tenchen Yataa ko a. Chisɔsi na‑a a wandi gboo min be yasi a, gba dɔndɔ gbe, a ma ma ni to fea, an na‑a a ma chɛ ma‑a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Mɔɛ miin ni mɔɛ n tɛ ɔ Yataa a, an mbe yasi n bɔ wan, tima ɔ tima ko a. Chɛɛ an yasi chɛ nu, an mbe ee an bɔ an 'na ko yama n dɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛɛ Chasi tana, a na‑a a wandi be dɔndɔɛ min chɛ ka, a ma‑a wan yasi a mmɔ 'a ko yama n ko a, tima ɔ tima ko a. A na‑a a sin ma kɛn, a si‑a wan kaina ma bɛndenɛ Yataa boo nyima ɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: A ka gbɛ a tima chɛ ma, ɛ nɔ gbɛ ma kɔn chɛ an na, aan Yataa ni a chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ n don a kɔɔ, a ni an popoya a ya kɔɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, a na‑a a wandi an ma yasi dɔndɔ gbe a. An yasi chɛ sin, a‑a a ma wan, a ban‑da wai chɛ‑a, an ma koe a tenchen Yataa ko a, kuɔ fɔ ko a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: A sin, Yataa Nyina wɛɛ, a koɔ‑a wan mmɔ tena, a si koe chɛ ma. A na‑a a fɔ ka wan Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ,

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: “Mansa Yataa ɔ, ‘Ni an tee chɛ n ben‑da, N mbe dɔbɛn chɛ an chɛ‑a, nn bɛ an na.’ A ɔ, ‘N mbe n 'na sawa n sa‑a wan an faa ɔ, mbɛ n yɛ‑a, n‑na a nyɛn, an yiima ɔ.’ ”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ to Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, “Kuɔ fɔ ko a, an 'na ko yama nu, a basan an 'na sawa yɔnɛ a, an mbe ee puin‑da to n yii ma.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛ an fɛ mu, Yataa ban‑da kaina a boo bɔ‑a chɛ n dɔ, yasi bɔ ee to nɔ, mmɔ 'a ko yama n ko a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛ an fɛ mu, n suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, mmɔ yii sɔen fan mu gbɛ gbae, Chisɔsi wii 'a gbasaya ɔ, don koe a kaina min mbe tenchen Yataa ko a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chisɔsi‑a a gboo be yasi a, min mbe a ma, a ni chia nama a ka mmɔ ko a, a ta Yataa tena. Mmɔ ɛ kun fan gbɛ, mmɔ ni ben tɛndi chɛ ɔ, a ta Yataa tena. Chisɔsi Chasi, an mu an chia chɛ a, min mbe fɔɛ ɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: A sin, a ka a tima ma, tɛ mɔ wa, mmɔ tɛ Yataa a, an mbe mmɔ boo ɔ. A sin fan mbe Yataa 'a chenɛ kun ma.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ na Yataa baima, faa chɛndɛ a, a yɛ to, mmɔ kai faenɛ a a gban. Mmɔ faa ɔ gbɛenɛ ni ma, mmɔ yiima a koenɛ ɛ fo, mmɔ gboo wɛɛ ma koenɛ, mmɔ gbɛenɛ fo.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Mmɔ ma a ɔ yian bi, mbɛ mmɔ yii na tɛen mu Chisɔsi an ma, mbɛ sinan, mmɔ‑a yiima dɔ mende ya. Koe min na mu, a wɛn‑na mmɔ too ɔ dia, a ee a da a kuiɛ yɔn.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: A sin, mmɔ yiinachii chɛ, mmɔ ɛ a ma buɛ min dɔ mmɔ ni mmɔ nyɔn deman, mbɛ mmɔ‑a ko chɛndɛ ma mmɔ nyɔn na.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Mmɔ ma ban bɛn koe a kaina dɔndɔ, yɔ mɔɛ dɔ n mbe a ma buɛ min dɔ. Chɛɛ mmɔ ni mmɔ nyɔn faa ma nande, a bɛbɛɛ tima ɔ ma yansan to ka buɛ min dɔ, Mansa Chisɔsi na koe a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Mmɔ ban‑da ka buɛ min dɔ tea ɔ sɔn‑da, a si Chisɔsi ma, mmɔ ma ko yama ma bia to mmɔ boo fea a. Ni mmɔ‑a chɛ ma, yasi kan kɔ kan mbe ee ma‑a nɔ, min mbe a ma, Yataa ni a boo bɔ mmɔ 'a ko yama n dɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛɛ ni mmɔ‑a chɛ ma, mmɔ ɛ ma‑a gbɛ ko dɔndɔ an ma kɔn‑da gbɛ dechee, chiandia ɔ. An nɛ gbɛmbo tee a, ni ta wa chɛ min mbe mɔɛ n kasaa‑a, miin mbe ee Yataa ko a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Sawa chɛ min be‑a Mosisi ma, mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe a yɔn‑da, siiya ɛ bɔ‑a wan a ma. Ni mɔ fea, sawa‑a a fɔ mbɛ tea mu, chinchin mbe ee a ɔ, an mbe an mɔɛ chɛ fa wan.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Ni tea mu chɛ a, fen koe ɛ na‑a ma‑a gbɛ mɔɛ chɛ a, min mbe ee a gbɔsɔ‑a Yataa 'a denɛ ko a? Yataa 'a dɔbɛn nama chɛ, Chisɔsi wii min bɔn‑da mmɔ 'a ko yama n ko a, mɔɛ min mbe ee a ya‑a fen kɔ fen na. Fen mbe ma‑a an mɔɛ chɛ a? Yataa Nyina, min mbe koadia demanɛ chɛ, mɔɛ min mbe a main. Fen mbe ma‑a an mɔɛ a? Wo wo yii na chii wɛ, ko yawaen chɛ a, Yataa ɛ min si‑a an mɔɛ chɛ a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, mmɔ‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ Yataa na‑a a fɔ wan a 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, “N mbe a ma‑a wan, wo ni tɔɔya ko yama chɛ n ko a, wo‑a miin ma.” A yɛ to, a ɔ, “N fan Mansa Yataa, n fan mbe n 'na mɔɛ n gbɛmbo‑a.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Yataa min mbe ee fa kuɔ fɔ ko a, a ma chianden mu, a boo ni sa mɔɛ ɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛɛ wo wo yii na chii koe miin na‑a si wo a, a saa a, tima min na wo na‑a manɛ ma sɔn, a si Chisɔsi ma. A tima chɛ a, wo na‑a tɔɔya ɔ gbɛama ɔ bia wan.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Tima dɔsa n na, mɔɛ n ni bai yama n sa wan wo ma fanka ɔ, an mbe faa ma gbaa koe n ma wo a. A yɛ to, tima dɔ gbɛɛ n na to, wo dɔn‑da wan sa koe chɛ n kaa a, an ni miin bia tena chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wo chinchin‑da chɛ n ma, miin ni sa ɔ pimbi chenɛ a. A yɛ to, an‑na wo boo fenɛ n bɔ kɛn wo boo ɔ gbasaya a, wo faa nii ma yɔn ni ɛnden bɛɛ a. Koe min na mu, wo na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, fenɛ ɛ wan wo ko a, min benden mu an ma, fenɛ min mbe ma‑a kuɔ fɔ ko a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo gboo ɔ ma fa. Koe min na mu, a dankama a, wo e tɔnɔnɛ ma sɔn‑da wan min koo.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Mɔɛ ɛ i faa bia wan, min mbe a ma, i ni che Yataa faa ma koe ma‑a. An mbe a ma, i ni fen chɛ ma sɔn, a na‑a tooɔdia chɛ min be koe a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, Yataa 'a gboo ɔ te, “Tima ɛnden fan toen mu gbɛ, mɔɛ min mbe na‑a, mbɛ a na‑a. A ee mɛ tena to, na koe a.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: A ɔ te to, “N 'na mɔɛ min mbe a kai fa‑a n na, n mbe an ya mɔ tandenɛ a, a sin fan mbe kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn. Chɛɛ ni min kɔ min‑na a kan kɔ sɔ n na, n bu ɔ ee dia‑a a mɔɛ chɛ a.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛɛ mɔɛ ma mmɔ wan na, miin mbe an kan kɔ sɔ, mbɛ an ka‑a Yataa chia ma. Chɛɛ mmɔ kai faen fan mu Chisɔsi a, a sin, mmɔ kun kaen fan mu.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Mɔɛ min yii na tɛen mu fen chɛ n ma, Yataa na‑a a too ɔ dia miin na, a yɛ to, mɔɛ min dandenɛ ɛ koe n na, a ya ma miin dɔ yen ni, a mɔɛ chɛ an kai faen mu Yataa a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Suun mɔɛ n na‑a an kai fa min chɛ Yataa a, an na‑a a ma, a faa chimaen ni an na.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Kaifa Yataa a, an na‑a a ma, mmɔ‑a a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ a da a bai ɔ mu dechee, dunya gbɛɛ a dan‑da. Chɛ ni a ɔ yian, mbɛ mmɔ ɛ fenɛ miin yen ka sanche, an ma bɔ ni fen kɔ fen dɔ, mɔɛ ɛ miin yen.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Ebɛɛ na‑a a kai fa wan Yataa a. An na‑a a ma, a‑a yasi be Yataa ma. An yasi chɛ ni nyin Yataa tena, a ben Ken ta ma. Yataa na‑a Ebɛɛ ya wan mɔ tandenɛ a, kaifa ɔ chia a, mbɛ a‑a a boo si a 'a yasi kɔɔ. Ebɛɛ faen mu wɛɛ boo ɔ boo bi tee chɛ kɔɔ, chɛɛ ɛ wɛ koɔ tena mmɔ tena tun. Koe min na mu, a na‑a a kai fa wan Yataa a, a sin mu tɔmɔsi an na mmɔ tena.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Ɛnoku na‑a a kai fa wan Yataa a, an na‑a a ma, a ma fa ni. Chɛɛ min na‑a ma, a gbafun‑da wan, a sɛ Yataa tena, mɔ ɔ mɔ nii ma a yen ni. Koe min na mu, Yataa wandi an na‑a a ya, a sɛ‑a a a. Yataa 'a gboo ɔ te, mbɛ Ɛnoku e na gbafun, a sɛ banda bu ɔ, a na‑a Yataa faa chima wan.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Mɔ ɔ mɔ ee che a ma‑a Yataa faa ni chima, ni an mɔɛ chɛ ma a kai fa ni Yataa a. Koe min na mu, mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe na Yataa chen kɔɔ, fɔ ni a dan‑da a a, mbɛ Yataa ɛ wan nɔ. A sin, mbɛ Yataa ɛ tɔnɔnɛ be wan chɛ n ma, miin mbe na a tena.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Nowa na‑a a kai fa wan Yataa a, an na‑a a ma, a na‑a a too ma sɔ Yataa 'a dasi ma, a si koe n ma miin ni na tena ma‑a, a nii ma miin sima ɔ yen nin bɛ. A na‑a Yataa da a kuiɛ a min fan, mbɛ a‑a dɛndɛ nyan, min na‑a a baun, an bɛ a 'a mɔɛ n na. Yataa na‑a Nowa ya wan mɔ tandenɛ a, min mbe bɔ dechee a 'a kaifa ɔ Yataa a. An kaifa chɛ sin dɔ, Nowa na‑a koe min ma ka, a na‑a a yian fan, mbɛ dunya ma mɔɛ n yau kaka.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Ebeami na‑a a kai fa wan Yataa a, min na‑a a ma, Yataa na‑a min fɔ a ye a ma koe a, a‑a a ma. Yataa na‑a a fɔ wan Ebeami ye, mbɛ a ni bɔ a waa a, a ni ta kaina, a nii ma ta ni kaina min tee dɔndɔ wɛɛ. Yataa na‑a a too ɔ dia wan an kaina chɛ be koe a a ma, a ta a. A nii ma a ɔ sɔn, ɛ ta tena kaina min. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, a bɔ‑a wan a 'a chɛnyɛ ɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: A na‑a a kai fa wan Yataa a, min na‑a a ma, a ni ma chɛnyɛ mɔ dɔ gbɛɛ a, chɛnyɛ ɔ, Yataa na‑a a too ɔ dia min na. A ni chi tɛndi kɔɔ wan, yɔ sonda. A 'a denɛ Aisaki wɛɛ, an fea a mama denɛ Chekɔpi a, an ni chi ka wan. An bɛɛ, an na‑a too ɔ dia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ an ma sɔn.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, Ebeami ni wan tima ma kɔn tena, duu wa chɛ ma sɔn koe a, Yataa na‑a a too ɔ dia min na. Duu wa chɛ, Yataa wandi na‑a min siman, a‑a a sɔ gban, a ee yɔn kuɔ fɔ ko a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: A chenanchaen ni boo ɔ boo, a yɛ to, a 'a musu gbandayaen ni, Ebeami na‑a a kai fa wan Yataa a. Chɛ an na‑a a ma, a che‑a denɛ ma sɔn‑da. A na‑a dan fan a a, mbɛ Yataa ee a da a kuiɛ yɔn.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, saya ni wɛɛ ka gbɛ a boo kana bia‑a, a mɔ dɔndɔ gbe chɛ cheeya nu, an kɔkoo. An kɔkoo yɔ tɔmbuaka nu banda a, ni yɔ tɛɛ kuu yii ɔ, mɔ ee che min dan‑da.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Mmɔ bɔ kɔnkɔɛ chɛ n sin, an nii ma sɛmbɛ ni an kai fa koe a Yataa a, aan an fa‑a a nyɔn na. An sin nii ma fen chɛ n ma sɔn ni, Yataa na‑a an too ɔ dia miin na. Chɛɛ an na‑a to pɔɔ wan, an‑na an fen chɛ n yen, mbɛ an bu ɔ dia‑a. An gbu sin dɔn‑da wan a ma den, mbɛ sonda mu an na, dunya chɛ ɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Mɔɛ miin sin mbe bai bonda chɛ n fɔ, an mbe ma ka a fɔ an na gboden, mbɛ an mbe an ya a kan tena an ta chɛnyɛ an na.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: An nii an yii na chii to chɛnyɛ chɛ a, an‑na min to an gbaa. Ni an na‑a chɛ ma wan, an ni kun‑da wan to yɛ koe a nɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛɛ an ni min ma gbɛ, an ni an yii na chii gbɛ chɛnyɛ an na, min nyin a ben a ma, banda bu ɔ. Chɛ ko a, mauma ko nii ma Yataa tena, ni an‑na a chee an 'na Yataa a. Koe min na mu, a na‑a duu wa ɔ bɛn fan an ko a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Ebeami na‑a a kai fa wan Yataa a. An na‑a a ma, Yataa na‑a a yiima yan kɛn, a dɔn‑da a 'a den dɔndɔ gbe bɔ koe a yasi a. Yataa sin na‑a a too ɔ dia wan, a ɔ, “I 'a denɛ Aisaki cheeya nu dechee, an fan mbe ya‑a i cheeya chɛndɛ chɛndɛ n na.” Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, Ebeami ma bɛnden fan ni a 'a den dɔndɔ gbe be koe a yasi a Yataa ma.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Ebeami yiima a koen fan ni, mbɛ ni a‑a Aisaki fa wɛ, Yataa ɛ a ma‑a wan, a ni a kɔɔ sɔ, a ka saya ɔ. A sin, mɔ gbu ni a fɔ, mbɛ Ebeami na‑a Aisaki fɔɛ ma sɔn fan, a bɔ saya ɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Aisaki na‑a a kai fa wan Yataa a. An na‑a a ma, Aisaki na‑a a 'a fɛnɛ n dua wan, Chekɔpi an fea Isɔ a. A danden fan ni a a, mbɛ dua chɛ ee bea‑a duu ma ya ɔ ma.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chekɔpi na‑a a kai fa wan Yataa a, an na‑a a ma, a e na to fa‑a, a na‑a Chosɛfi 'a den kaima fea an dua wan, dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a. A duuenɛ a 'a tungbɔɛ kun ma, ɛ ta‑a Yataa fai‑a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chosɛfi na‑a a kai fa wan Yataa a. An na‑a a ma, a na‑a bai fɔ, a si Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n bɔ koe ma Ichipi chɛnyɛ ɔ. A na‑a bai chɛ fɔ tima min na, a ni gbɛ fa tena wan. A sin, a na‑a a ɔ yian fan Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ n na, an mbe a tɔn buɛ min dɔ, ni a fa‑a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Mosisi suun‑da tima min na, a woo mɔɛ n kai faen fan ni Yataa a. An na‑a a ma, a woo mɔɛ n‑na a nun a den toa tɔɛ a, kau sawa ko a. Koe min na mu, an na‑a a yen fan, mbɛ den ma kawaen ba ni a a. Mbɛ an faa gbɛa‑a mansa wa chɛ da a kuiɛ bɔ koe ma a ɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Mosisi na‑a a kai fa wan Yataa a, kɛn a koa‑a. Chɛ an na‑a a ma, a nii ma dɔn ni an ni a fɔ, mbɛ Ichipi mansa wa chɛ 'a denɛ musuma chɛ, an‑na a wan Mosisi suun.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: A na‑a a ma bɛn fan, tɔɔya ɔ bia koe a, an bɛ Yataa 'a mɔɛ n na, a e na ma buɔdia wa ɔ, ko yama ɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: A na‑a a ma bɛn fan, mbɛ nyanɛ gbɛɛ Ichipi chɛnyɛ ɔ, a ma che ni mainɛ ɔ bia koe a, Chasi ko a. Koe min na mu, tɔnɔnɛ an mbe a ɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Mosisi na‑a a kai fa wan Yataa a, mbɛ a bɔ‑a Ichipi chɛnyɛ ɔ. A sin, chian bɛɛ nii a ɔ, a si mansa wa chɛ faa tɛ koe ma. A na‑a ma wan dechee, yɔ Yataa ni wan a ya kɔɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee min yen. A sin na‑a a ma wan, a na‑a a faa bia.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: A kai faen fan ni Yataa a, min na‑a a ma, a‑a a ma, Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n‑na a kuu sɔ kun bɔ a ɔ bɛnɛ bia‑a. A na‑a a fɔ wan Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n ye, a ɔ, an mbe sa tɔngbɔɛ min fa‑a, an ni a wii sin sin an 'na kankanɛ n ma. Chɛ an mbe a ma‑a, maeka min ni na‑a an 'na den kaima saa saa n fa koe a, a ni tin Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n 'na denɛ n kun ma.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n na‑a an kai fa wan Yataa a, an na‑a a ma, an na‑a tachɛ chɛ, an‑na kɔ yii dɔndɔ ɔ tandin, an ni min chee, an dɔ, Yii Yawa, yɔ an ni ka duu gboo gbanda ma wan. Chɛɛ Ichipi mɔɛ n tana, an toen ni kɛn an ni tandin, yii chɛ na‑a ben fan an kun ma, an to‑a a ɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Tima dɔndɔ a, Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n ni Chɛiko duu wa chɛ a bɛn fan, tee wɔnfea ko a. An na‑a an kai fa wan Yataa a, min na‑a a ma, kanda wa min ni an duu chɛ a tindanɛ, a bɔn‑da wuɔn.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Daabi na‑a a kai fa wan Yataa a. Chɛ na‑a a ma wan, a ni wɛɛ duu dia a, kanda chɛ na‑a bɔn tima min na, a kun ma to ni a ɔ. Koe min na mu, a na‑a a boo si wan mɔɛ chɛ n kɔɔ, miin na‑a na da tɛ chɛ tena. Mɔɛ tɔɛ n tana, miin nii Yataa da a kuiɛ ma, an kasaa‑a wan.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛɛ bai ee to n da a, a fɔ koe a. Koe min na mu, tima ee ma‑a nɔ, an gbɛɛ tɔɛ ɔ tɛ koe a dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a. Kideɔn ni ma, Baaki, Samisin ni Chɛfata. Mansa Defidi wɛɛ, an fea Samɛɛ a, ni Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ tɔɛ nu,

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: an 'na kai fa Yataa a, a na‑a a ma wan, an kun‑da chɛnyɛ sɛsɛ n ma chɛɛ ɔ. An na‑a tea din fan mɔɛ n ma. A sin, too ɔ dia na‑a chɛ wan an na, a yɛ to, an‑na a ma wan, yaa n ma che ni bia chɛ‑a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: An na‑a ta man ba n na dufɛn fan, mbɛ an bɔ‑a saya yuu a, chɛɛ chɛ boo ɔ. An na faen fan ni, chɛɛ an dɔ gbɛa‑a wan. An fanka ni koo chɛɛ ɔ, an sin na‑a chɛnyɛ dɔ gbɛɛ ɔ soya n bɔ wan chɛɛ ɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Musu chɛ n bɛɛ, an na‑a an kai fa wan Yataa a, min na‑a a ma, an‑na an boo si to an suun ma nyɔɛ n kɔɔ. An suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ nu, miin na‑a fa, chɛɛ an kɔɔ sɔ‑a to saya ɔ, a yɛ fɔɛ ɔ. Mɔɛ dɔ n sin, an nii ma dɔn ni an kan kɔ sɔ koe a Yataa a. Chɛ ko a, an fa‑a tɔɔya kɔɔ wan, min mbe a ma, an ni an kɔɔ sɔ, a ka saya ɔ, fɔɛ chɛndɛ ma sɔn koe a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Dɔ n sin, an‑na an ma yɛn fan, an‑na an bosa. Mbɛ an‑na dɔ n chii yɔɔɛ a, an ta‑a an na pimbi chenɛ a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: An‑na an ma bon bon fan, an fa koe a, an‑na dɔ n tɛka fea a, mbɛ dɔ n sin, an‑na an fa chɛɛ chɛ mɛ a. An ni ben ben fan, an ma chiienɛ ɛ sa gboo a, chɛ ma, ba gboo. An yɔnden ni, an mbe ko ma gbaaenɛ sa‑a an ma, an mbe an bia yama yama.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Mɔ chɛndɛ bonda chɛ nu, an nii ma bɛn ni an dunya chɛ ɔ, ɛnden bɛɛ a. An ni ben ben fan an kun ye, yɔ mɔɛ miin baa ee, an mbe ben fuinɛ n ma, ni kɔnkɔɛ n dɔ. A yɛ to, an ni chi fanɛ n fan na, a basan sonɛ n na, duu gboo ɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Tando ni koo, an gbɛɛ na‑a min ma sɔn, an 'na kaifa ko a Yataa a. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, Yataa na‑a an too ɔ dia min na, an nii ma a ma sɔn ni.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Yataa na‑a chɛ ma, koe min na mu, ko dɔ mende an ni a yii ma mmɔ gbɛɛ ko a, min benden mu an too ɔ dia chɛ ma. Yataa 'a yiima ni min na, an ni chɛ an na. Mbɛ an mbe ee che ma‑a, yɔ Yataa toen mu an ni ma buɛ min dɔ, mɔɔ ni mmɔ bɛ ma‑a an na.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛ gbɛɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ wɛɛ, mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ mbe wan nɛ mmɔ tɛ ɔ, miin na‑a a ɔ yian an chɛ chɛ wai n dɔ, mbɛ an kai faen fan mu Yataa a. Chɛ ko a, mmɔ ni mmɔ boo bɔ ko ɔ ko ɔ, miin mbe mmɔ ɔ chɛ chɛ. Chɛ n mu ko yama n fan na, miin mbe mmɔ bia gban. A sin, mmɔ ni mmɔ ma bɛn koe n ma koe a a chia ma, fɔɛ ɔ min mbe ya ɔ ma. Mmɔ an ma mmɔ sɔɛ gbɛɛ a, yɔ mɔɛ ɛ bui chɛ buɛ min dɔ, bui chɛ bɛnɛ ɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
