verse_text: Mmɔ ni mmɔ yii sɔ Chisɔsi ma, tima ɔ tima ko a. A wan mbe a ma, mmɔ ɛ mmɔ kai fa Yataa a, a ka fɔɛ kuu sɔ tena ma, a ta a danka a. An‑na a gbangban tima min bɛɛ a kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma, a nii ma a boo bɔ ni mmɔ wakoe ɔ. Koe min na mu, a na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ chia dɔndɔɛ a, buɔdia wa an mbe a ya ɔ. A nii ma a ya ni mauma ko kan kɔ kan na, fa koe a kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma. A sin mbe sanche gbɛ si ɔ wan, basɔmaya ɔ Yataa 'a mansaya sea boo nyima ɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wo wo yii na chii a mɔnɛ‑a buɛ min dɔ. A yɛ to, a‑a toomaya min dɔ bia, ko yama ma mɔɛ n boo ɔ. Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo ma a ma wo faa ni yɔn, wo ni sɛmbɛ wo kai fa koe a Yataa a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, wo e butuinɛ min dɔ, ko yama a, wo ma sɔ nin bɛ gban, an ni a fɔ, wo fa koe wɛɛ mu.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wo ma nyina Yataa 'a bai ma, a na‑a min fɔ, wo faa ma nande koe a, a 'a denɛ mu buɛ min dɔ wo a. A na‑a a fɔ wan a 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, “N 'na denɛ nu, wo wo too ma sɔ, ni n fan Mansa Yataa ma‑a wo sɔ‑a chia ma. A sin, wo faa ma yɔn, ni n ma‑a wo ma tɔɔ‑a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, n toen mu mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ a, n mbe an sɔ wan chia ma. A sin, n mbe mɔ ɔ mɔ tɔɔ wan, n‑na min ya n 'na denɛ a.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wo wo bia tɔɔya a, wo ta yiima ɔ, min mu wo Fa 'a tɔɔya a. Wo 'a tɔɔya chɛ ɛ a ɔ yian tena wan, mbɛ Yataa ɛ wo ya tena a 'a denɛ n fan na. Den mbe ee wɛ nɔ, kɛn gba, min mbe a fɔ, a ɔ, a fa ma tɔɔya si ni a a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Ni a ma wo tɔɔ ni, yɔ a 'a denɛ n gbɛɛ, mbɛ a 'a denɛ chɛndɛ chɛndɛ ma wo a, ko tɛ denɛ mu wo a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Min sien mu mmɔ fa n ma, dunya chɛ ɔ, an‑na tɔɔya si wan mmɔ a, mmɔ sin‑na baa be wan an ma. Fen mbe a ma gbɛ, mmɔ ee don mmɔ Fa kɔɔ, min mbe banda bu ɔ, mmɔ ni kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Mmɔ fa nu dunya chɛ ɔ, an mbe mmɔ tɔɔ tima kunduenɛ an ko a, yɔ an ta yiima ɛ a fɔ buɛ min dɔ an ye. Chɛɛ Yataa tana, ɛ a ma basan koe an na mmɔ ma, min mbe a ma, mmɔ wɛɛ sɔnɛ ni ma, yɔ a ta ɛ buɛ min dɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Ni mmɔ ma‑a tɔɔya kɔɔ, a tima chɛ a, mmɔ ɛ a yen koe an na, min mbe mmɔ faa yɔn, a ee mmɔ bu ɔ dia‑a. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, chɛ gbakɔ, an tɔɔya chɛ ɛ miin koo‑a, an mbe faa chima ma sɔn‑da wan, a bɔ tea koe n dɔ, an mbe miin ma‑a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo ɔ ni gbɛa, mbɛ wo faa sɔ‑a. Wo wo chenɛ n dɔ tan, an dɔ ni gbɛa gbau.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wo wo tachɛ buɛ ma mɛn, wo gboo ɔ ma na fa wo 'a fɔɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ wo ɔ ni gbɛa gbau.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wo butuin chɛ, ma koe a faachima ɔ mɔ ɔ mɔ a. A sin to, wo ni ma tenchen Yataa ko a. Koe min na mu, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee Mansa Yataa yen‑da, ni a ee ka.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wo tima ya, wo ma na wo kan kɔ sɔ koadia demanɛ a, Yataa ɛ min be. Wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ ma ma yɔ kɔn konama. Ni a koa‑a dechee, ɛ ma kɔn yama an na, a bɔɛ n tɛ ɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Mɔ ɔ mɔ ma ko tɛ ma a ma gbɔsɔɛ a, wo tɛ ɔ. Mɔ ɔ mɔ ma ma wo tɛ ɔ, Yataa wakoe ee min faa ɔ, yɔ Isɔ. Den saa ni a a, chɛɛ a tana, daun fen dɔndɔ gbe ko a, a‑a an tea ma tachɛ wan.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ chɛ gbakɔ, a toen ni a fa ni a dua, chɛɛ chɛ nii bɛn to. Koe min na mu, a na‑a chia yan fan boo ɔ boo, dua chɛ ma sɔn koe a, chɛɛ a nii ma a ma sɔn ni. A na‑a di chɛ wɛɛ, chɛɛ a nii ma che ni, ko ɔ ko ka‑a a gba ɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wo ma na ni ka yɔ Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ nu, miin na‑a an mbe koe a tisɔn kaina min. An na‑a wan Saina kɔnkɔɛ kɔɔ, ta man ba ni kaina min, a yɛ to, pimbi wa bundenɛ ɛ. Fia fichi fichi wa wɛɛ ni bɔ tena wan nɔ,

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: buu kuiɛ, a basan kuiɛ wɛɛ a min na min‑da. Mɔɛ chɛ n‑na kuiɛ chɛ a min kɛn, an‑na disa chɛ wan, an ma na bai dɔ mende a min to,

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: koe min na mu, an nii che an kun bɔ‑a Yataa da a bai chɛ kɔɔ, a na‑a min fɔ a 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, “Ni soe nan fan bɛɛ tu‑a kɔnkɔɛ chɛ a, a ma ɛ bon bon fan senɛ a, aan a ni fa.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: An koe ma chianden ni sai ma, min‑na a ma, Mosisi‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “N mbe samba tena wan, chiandia a.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛɛ wo‑a min ma gbɛ, wo na‑a Sayɔn kɔnkɔɛ kɔɔ, wo na‑a duu wa chɛ ɔ Yataa tena, min mbe ee fa kuɔ fɔ ko a. Wo na‑a Chuusaɛn, min mbe banda bu ɔ, maeka wu sɛsɛ n mbe kaina min, buɔdia ɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wo na‑a gbɛ Yataa 'a mɔɛ n 'na chɔchi ɔ, a 'a denɛ saa nu. A sin, an tɔɛ nyɛndenɛ mu banda bu ɔ gboo ɔ. Wo na‑a gbɛ Yataa tena, min mbe mɔ gbu gbɛɛ gbɛmbo‑a. Wo na‑a gbɛ fuɛ n tena, mɔɛ chɛ nu, Yataa na‑a miin ya mɔ tandenɛ n na, a chen kɔɔ, an fuɛ nu. A yɛ to, a‑a an ma yɔ a toen mu an ni ma buɛ min dɔ, banda bu ɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wo na‑a Chisɔsi tena, min ni wo tɛ wo bɛ Yataa a, dɔbɛn nama chɛ chɛ koe a. Wo na‑a a wii tena, min bɔn‑da, wo too ɔ dia koe a fen chɛndɛ a, a ben Ebɛɛ wii ta ma.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wo a ma wo ma gbɔsɔɛ a, wo too ma sɔ koe a Yataa ma, ni a ma‑a koɔ‑a. Mɔɛ miin na‑a ban an too ma sɔ koe a, tima min na a ni dasi be tena an ma dunya ɔ, an na‑a tɔɔya ɔ bia wan. Ni a ma‑a koɔ‑a, a ka banda bu ɔ, mbɛ mmɔ‑a mmɔ kan kɔ sɔ, mmɔ wɛɛ ɛ tɔɔya ɔ yen‑da wan.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: A kuiɛ na‑a duu gboo ɔ samba wan, a tima chɛ a. Chɛɛ sanche chɛ ɔ, a‑a tooɔdia chɛ mmɔ a, a ɔ, “A to‑a to dɔndɔ, dɔ samba chɛ koe a. Duu gboo dechee ma chɛ nɛnɛ ɔ, chɛɛ banda gbu wɛɛ a.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Bai chɛ ɛ a fɔ tena wan, mbɛ fenɛ gbɛɛ miin mbe samba, an mbe ban‑da wan dunya ma. Chɛɛ fen chɛ n sin gbɛɛ, miin mbe ee samba, an fan mbe to‑a an gba n dɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ Yataa wai bɔ. Koe min na mu, a‑a gbasaya be mmɔ ma, ma koe a mansaya ɔ a waa a, a sin mbe ee che yɔn‑da. Mmɔ a wai bɔ, mmɔ ni a fai chiandia ɔ, min mbe ma faachima a a tena.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Koe min na mu, mmɔ 'a Yataa ɛ wan yɔ ta min mbe fenɛ n minda fion.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wo to wo nyɔn na tima ɔ tima ko a, yɔ mɔɛ ɛ to buɛ min dɔ a suun ma nyɔɛ n na.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wo ma wo boo bɔ ko chɛndɛ ma koe ɔ, sonda n na. Koe min na mu, mɔɛ dɔ n to‑a ko chɛndɛ ma an na, a yiima wɛɛ nii an dɔ, mbɛ an‑na an boo si maeka n kɔɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Mɔɛ miin mbe sa ɔ pimbi chenɛ a, an bakoe ni ma wo faa ɔ, yɔ wo bɛ an mbe nɔ an na. Ni chɛ n bɛɛ, miin mbe tɔɔya ɔ bia tena. Wo a ma yɔ wo bɛ an mbe an tɔɔya chɛ ɔ bia tena.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Basɔmaya wa ni be fuu ma, wo gbɛɛ tɛ ɔ. A sin, wo ma waa ma basan mɔ dɔ mende n na, wo ee miin na fuu ɔ. Koe min na mu, mɔɛ min mbe koe tɛ, ɛ waa ma basan mɔ dɔ mende n na, Yataa ɛ a mɔɛ chɛ gbɛmbo‑a wan.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Kɔpɔɛ wakoe ma ma wo faa ɔ kaka. Chɛɛ fen kɔ fen min mbe wo boo ɔ, wo bu ɔ ni dia, mbɛ ɛ wo boo ɔ. Koe min na mu, Yataa‑a a fɔ wan a 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, “N mbe ee i dɔndɔ gbe to‑a, n sin, n mbe ee i boo ka‑a.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ yii na tɛenɛ ni ma Yataa ma, mbɛ mmɔ‑a a fɔ, mmɔ ɔ, “Mansa Yataa an mbe basan n ma, n mbe ee chian dɔ, mɔ gbu ee ko ɔ ko ma n na.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wo ma nyina wo ya ɔ sɔɛ n ma, chɛ nu, miin na‑a Yataa bai sa wo tena. Wo wo yii na chii min na‑a an tan fɔɛ ɔ, mbɛ wo‑a wo kai fa Yataa a, yɔ an ni buɛ min dɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chisɔsi Chasi ma mun ni a kɔma a, a ee mun bi tee chɛ kɔ, a sin mbe ee mun‑da kuɔ fɔ ko a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wo ma dɔn kan sɛsɛ nu, miin kaen mu sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ma, an ni wo ka Yataa chia ma. A nyin mmɔ ni faa sɔɛ ma sɔn, koadia demanɛ ɔ, Yataa ɛ min chɛ. Chɛ benden mu bea koe ma sawa n fɛ, miin sien mu daun fenɛ n ma. Mɔɛ miin mbe bea sawa chɛ n fɛ, an nii ma an deman ni.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Mɔɛ miin mbe an 'na tɛ mɔ wai chɛ tena Yataa 'a tɛndi ɔ, tea ee an boo ɔ, tɔnɔnɛ ma sɔn koe a yasi ɔ, min bɔ‑a Yataa tena mmɔ ko a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chu n 'na sawa kɔɔ, chɛ an ni ma. Chu n tɛ mɔ wa Yataa a, a ɛ na soe wii an na Yataa 'a tɛndi ɔ, san kɔ san na. Ɛ ta wan a a kaina chɛ, tɛndi chɛ ɔ, min mbe tenchen Yataa ko a. Mbɛ a‑a a be Yataa ma, mɔ gbu n 'na ko yama n ko a. Chɛɛ an soe su n tana, an ni an minda chia kunɛ a wan.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛ an fɛ mu, Chisɔsi wɛɛ nii ma fa ni duu wa chɛ bu ɔ wan. An bɔ‑a wan a a, mbɛ an‑na a fa. Chɛ ma‑a, a 'a mɔɛ n ni ma tenchen Yataa ko a, a wii chɛ 'a gbasaya ɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ ta a tena kaina chɛ, min mbe chia kunɛ a. Mbɛ mmɔ‑a mmɔ kunɛ don mau ɔ, yɔ a na‑a miin dɔ bia.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛ ko a, duu ee ma‑a nɛ mmɔ boo ɔ, dunya chɛ ɔ, min mbe ma‑a kuɔ fɔ ko a. Mmɔ ya ɛ an duu chɛ an ya ɔ, min mbe na tena.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Chɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ tando be Yataa ma, tima ɔ tima ko a. Mmɔ 'a yasi dɔndɔ mu chɛ an na, mmɔ ɛ min be a ma, Chisɔsi 'a gbasaya ɔ. Mɔɛ min mbe a fɔ, a ɔ, ɛ Yataa an ko a, a ɛ chɛ an fɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wo ma nyina ko chɛndɛ ma koe a, a basan wo nyɔn deman koe a. Koe min na mu, koe n fan nɛ miin mu yasi a, Yataa faa chima koe a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wo kooya be wo ya ɔ sɔɛ n ma, wo ni bea an da a kuiɛ n fɛ. An fan mbe wo kun ma fɛn tena, tima ɔ tima ko a. Koe min na mu, an mbe na‑a wan a ɔ yian‑da Yataa a, an ni wo kun ma fɛn buɛ min dɔ. Ni wo‑a kooya be an ma, an mbe an 'na wai chɛ‑a buɔdia an na. Ni wo ma kooya be ni an ma, an mbe a chɛ‑a faa yɔnɛ an na. A sin mbe ee ma‑a ko a tenden na wo tena.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wo wo boo a chii samunɛ ma, nn ko a. Nn danden fan mu a a, mbɛ nn yiima a koenɛ mu fion. Koe min na mu, nn mbe butuin chɛ tima ɔ tima ko a, tea koe an ma koe a.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: A sin, n mbe wo ɔ tisa tena n faa gbɛɛ a, samunɛ chɛ koe a n ko a, Yataa ni a ma, n ni na to wo tena.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Yataa‑a a ma wan, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, a ka saya ɔ. Mmɔ ɛ wan gbɛ yɔ sa nu, Chisɔsi ɛ miin kun ma fɛn. A‑a a wandi wii a bɔn fan, mmɔ ko a. Chɛ sin ma‑a wan dɔbɛn nama a, min mbe ma‑a kuɔ fɔ ko a. Chisɔsi wii chɛ 'a gbasaya ɔ, Yataa min mbe faa chima be,

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: a ni basan wo ma chia ɔ chia a, wo toen mu min na, a faa ma koe ma koe a. A sin ni a ma, Chisɔsi Chasi 'a gbasaya ɔ, mmɔ ni ko ɔ ko ma, min mbe a faa chima. A sin, tando ni ma Chasi tɔɛ ma, kuɔ fɔ ni kuɔ fɔ ko a. A ni ma ka.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wo dimu, n suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo wo too ma sɔ bai chɛ n ma. Bai chɛ nu, gboo chɛ ɔ, miin mbe wo faa ma nande. Koe min na mu, gboo kundu mu dechee, n‑na min nyɛn ka wo tena.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: N toen mu wo ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ Chasi ɔ, Timoti, an‑na a boo ka, a bɔ pimbi chenɛ a. Ni a fua‑a na‑a, nn fea, nn mbe na‑a wan wo tena.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wo wo 'a ya ɔ sɔɛ n gbɛɛ kɔndɔn n ye, a basan Yataa 'a mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a. Mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, miin mbe Itadi chɛnyɛ ɔ, an bɛɛ ni wo kɔndɔn.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Yataa ni wo gbɛɛ dua.

N fan Chimisi, n fan mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena. N mbe wai chɛ tena Yataa an ko a, an fea Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi a. N mbe a nyɛn tena wo wan tena, wo wan Yataa 'a mɔɛ nu, wo wɛn na fasandenɛ ɛ a ɔ gbɛɛ ben‑da dunya ɔ. N mbe wo gbɛɛ kɔndɔn tena kaka.
N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo bu ɔ ni dia, ni ko yawaen kan kɔ kan‑na wo tan.
Koe min na mu, wo‑a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ ni an koe chɛ n‑na wo tan, a ɔ sɔn koe mu ni wo kai faen fan mu Chisɔsi Chasi a. A sin, ni wo kai faen fan mu a a, mbɛ wo e kun‑da wan an dɔ bia‑a.
Wo 'a faabia ma ni munda, a da ni fa gban. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, wo ni ma yɔ Yataa toen mu buɛ min dɔ wo ma koe a. A sin, mabɔ kan kɔ kan mbe ee ma‑a wo ma fɔɛ ɔ.
Ni yiimatɛ ee wo ɔ, a ɔ sɔn koe a, Yataa toen mu wo ni ma buɛ min dɔ, wo a ɔ tisa. A ee ban‑da a be koe a wo ma. Koe min na mu, ɛ fen sɛsɛ be wan mɔ gbu ma, a bu ɔ diama ɛ.
Chɛɛ ni wo ma‑a a ɔ tisa‑a, sika ma ma wo ɔ, wo ni wo kai fa a a gban. Ni sika ma‑a mɔɛ min dɔ, a mɔɛ chɛ ɛ wan yɔ yii wa, fia ɛ min dɔ ma ma tangban tangban.
Mɔɛ n fan nɛ, miin mbe ee an yiima ɔ bɛn, a maenɛ ɛ taka taka. Mɔɛ chɛ n sima nu, a ni ma an yii ma, mbɛ Mansa Yataa ee fen kɔ fen be‑a an ma.
Yataa 'a mɔ kan kɔ kan, min mu yɔn tɔɛ a, a bu ɔ ni dia. Koe min na mu, Yataa‑a a ya mansaenɛ a.
Yataa 'a mɔ kan kɔ kan, min mu nyan tɔɛ a, a wɛɛ bu ɔ ni dia. Koe min na mu, a 'a nyanɛ ma Yataa ya a fen fen na. Nyan tɔɛ chɛ ɛ ma‑a wan, yɔ kɔn fu. Ɛ bi yen fan, mbɛ sinan a fa‑a.
Ni tee bɔ‑a, a a kɔɔen ba a, a winɛ ɛ kɔn fu a kɔnya‑a wan, mbɛ a fuu bɔn‑da. A 'a nyanɛ gbɛɛ yayi‑a. Nyan tɔɛ n bɛɛ, an mbe ka wan. An na ɛ kɔnya‑a wan, mbɛ an fa‑a, an 'na nyanɛ gbɛɛ ɔ.

Yataa ɛ mɔɛ chɛ n dua‑a wan, miin mbe an faa bia, ni ko yawaenɛ‑a an tan. Koe min na mu, ni an‑na an koe chɛ ɔ bia, Yataa ɛ boo ɔ gbasi woo min be‑a an ma, ɛ ma‑a kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ an na. Fɔɛ chɛ, a na‑a tooɔdia be koe an na mɔɛ n ma, miin toen mu a a.

Chɛ ni ma wo yii ma, mbɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ ee Yataa ɔ siman, ko yama ma koe a. A sin mbe ee mɔ ɔ mɔ yiima yan, ko yama ma koe a. Mɔ ɔ mɔ, min toen mu a ni ko yama ma, a ma a fɔ kuɔ fɔ, mbɛ Yataa an mbe ka a yiima yan‑da.
Chɛɛ mɔ faa ma koe nu, miin ma nyin, an fan mbe mmɔ nande ko yama ma koe a.
Mɔ faa ma koe yama chɛ nu, an fan mbe na ko yama n na. Mbɛ ko yama chɛ n sin ko a, a na‑a saya a.
N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo ko a di n ye. Wo ma dɔn mɔ ɔ mɔ ni wo bun.

Ko chɛndɛ gbɛɛ, mabɔ ee min ma, ɛ ka Yataa an tena. Manɛ gbɛɛ, miin na dandenɛ ɛ banda bu ɔ, a boo gba mu an na. Ko chɛndɛ kan kɔ kan, mabɔ ee min ma, a wan‑na an be mmɔ ma, a ka banda bu ɔ. A tana, a ee mun kuɔ fɔ. A ee ka yɔ nininɛ, min mbe ka a gba ɔ.
Yataa wandi gbu ta dɔbɛn chɛndɛ ɔ mu, a‑a mmɔ ya a ta denɛ n na. Yataa‑a a ma wan, a 'a bai, min mu tea a, a‑a fɔɛ nama be mmɔ ma. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, fen fen a na‑a min na dan, mmɔ wan mu a saa a.
N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo ko a di n ye. A sin, wo chɛ sa wo yii ma. Ni wo too ma sɔ koe mu, wo ma tima yayi a ma sɔ koe a. Chɛɛ wo tima ya koɔ koe a. Wo ni tima ya, faatɛ bɔ koe a.
Wo e faatɛ min bɔ ka, Yataa toen mu wo ni ma mɔ tandenɛ min na, a ee wo ma‑a a a, tima dɔndɔ wɛɛ ko a.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo ni wo boo bɔ ko yama gbɛɛ ɔ wo 'a fɔɛ ɔ. Wo ni wo boo si a 'a sakana bai chɛ kɔɔ, min been mu wo ma. Bai chɛ, a‑a a kun a ma koe a, wo ni bauncha ma sɔn.
A sin ni ma wo yii ma, mbɛ sakana bai chɛ ma bea dechee wo too an dɔ, wo ni wo wandi bun. Chɛɛ Yataa 'a bai chɛ‑a min fɔ, wo an ma.
Mɔɛ min mbe a too ma sɔ dechee bai chɛ ma, chɛɛ a ee koe ma, a chia ma, ɛ wan yɔ mɛmɛ ɔ fɛn mɔɛ chɛ. Ɛ a wandi ma fɛn tena wan.
Ɛ a wandi ma fɛn fan, mbɛ a ka‑a nɔ, a ta‑a a ye. A ya kɔɔɛ a, ɛ nyina wan a ni buɛ min dɔ. A gbu gbɔsɔ ma, a ma buɛ ɛ buɛ min dɔ.

Chɛɛ Yataa 'a sakana bai tana, a nyin kaka. An mbe mɔ gbu kun ka. Mmɔ ma nyina a ma, mmɔ a a tun mmɔ too ma sɔ koe a a ma, mmɔ tachɛ chɛ a gbee a. Yataa ɛ mmɔ dua wan ko ɔ ko ɔ, mmɔ ɛ min ma. Mmɔ ɛ ma‑a mɔɛ n fan na, miin mbe bai chɛ a min, an mbe tachɛ a gbee a.
Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a fɔ, mbɛ Yataa sɔn mɔɛ mu a a, a ni a da a kuiɛ kun ma fɛn. Ni a ma chɛ ma ni, ɛ ma‑a ka a wandi an woo a. A ma Yataa sɔn.

Mmɔ ɛ basan fan chiandenɛ n ma, an bɛ fuinya n na, ni an deman koe bɔ‑a. Mmɔ sin mbe ee a ma, dunya chɛ ɔ ko yama ma ni mmɔ wɛɛ ɔ chɛ. Chɛ an mu fɔɛ chɛndɛ a, mmɔ Fa Yataa toen mu min na, ma bɔ ee min ma.
N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo ma to mɔɛ dɔ n na, a ni ben dɔ n ma. Ni wo‑a chɛ ma, wo ee che a fɔ‑a, mbɛ wo kai faen fan mu mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi a, min mbe si ɔ a 'a basɔmaya ɔ.

Mmɔ a ya wɛ, mbɛ mɔ fea na‑a bɛnɛ ɔ. Mɔ dɔndɔɛ chɛ, a ma bɛndenɛ ɛ koa baa gbanden ba ɔ, yɔɔɛ basan chia baa gbandenɛ n na, an chɛenɛ ɛ a ma. Mbɛ dɔndɔɛ sin na‑a, min mu yɔn tɔɛ a, a ma bɛndenɛ ɛ koa taa wa ɔ.
Mbɛ wo sin ma samba‑a gbɛ, si tena chɛndɛ be koe a, mɔ ma bɛnden chɛ ma. Dɔndɔɛ chɛ sin, wo ɔ, ni a di a ye, a ee ka‑a sɔ‑a. Wo ɔ, ni chɛ ma, a ni si duu ma.
Wo ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ wo‑a wo boo don ka mɔɛ n tɛ an dɔ. Wo‑a wo yii na chii buɛ min dɔ, a ma nyin.

N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo ko a di n ye. Ka n mbe chɛ fɔ wo ye. Dunya chɛ na‑a miin ya yɔn tɔɛ n na, Yataa‑a a boo sɔ an mɔɛ chɛ n fan ma, an nyan‑da a ta chia a. An‑na an kai fa mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi a. A sin, an mbe ma‑a wan a 'a mansaya kɔɔ banda bu ɔ. Mansaya chɛ, a na‑a mɔɛ chɛ n too ɔ dia min na, mɔɛ miin toen mu a a.
Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, wo e tɛndɔya koe n ma wan yɔn tɔɛ n na. Min mu ka, nyan tɔɛ chɛ nu, an fan mbe wo konkon, an mbe ta wo a kuti ɔ.
An fan mbe baa bɔ tena mɔɛ chɛ tɔɛ chɛndɛ ma, Chisɔsi Chasi, min ta mu wo a.
Ko chɛndɛ mu, tea ko a, ni wo‑a mmɔ 'a sawa chɛ bia, min mbe Yataa 'a gboo ɔ. An gbu mu sawa chenama a. Sawa chɛ ɔ, mɔɛ n ni to an 'na mɔɛ n na, yɔ an toen mu buɛ min dɔ an fandi gbu a.
Chɛɛ ni wo ma samba‑a nyan tɔɛ n dechee an ko a, wo e ma‑a ka ko yama an ma‑a. Koe min na mu, wo e ma‑a ka sawa chɛ an yɔn‑da.
Mɔ sin mbe ee sawa gbɛɛ bia, i ni dɔndɔ yɔn. Mɔɛ min mbe chɛ ma, e wan dechee yɔ mɔɛ min‑na sawa gbɛɛ yɔn.

Koe min na mu, Yataa dɔndɔ gbe chɛ, an‑na a fɔ, a ɔ, mɔ ee waa ma basan mɔɛ a, wo ee fuu ɔ min na. An yɛ‑a to, a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, mɔ ee mɔ fa, sawa ma min fɔ ni. Chɛ an fɛ mu, mɔɛ min mbe mɔɛ fa, a mɔɛ ban‑da sawa gbɛɛ yɔn‑da, an ni a fɔ a ma waa ma basan bɛɛ mɔɛ a, an mbe ee fuu ɔ min na.
Chɛ ko a, ni wo ma‑a koɔ‑a tima ɔ tima, ni wo ma‑a koe ma‑a, a ni ma wo yii ma, mbɛ Yataa ɛ sawa chɛ an ya‑a, kaa a ni tɛ a si wo ma. Sawa chɛ, min mbe wo kun ka.
Koe min na mu, Yataa ɛ kaa a tɛ‑a wan chɛ n ma, miin nii chinchimaya yian, a ni an tɔɔ. Chinchimaya tɔɛ n sin, an mbe chinchimaya sɔn‑da wan.
N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, ni mmɔ‑a a fɔ, mbɛ mmɔ kai faen mu Yataa a, a ni yen mmɔ tachɛ buɛ ma fɔɛ ɔ. Ni mmɔ ma chɛ ma ni, mbɛ mmɔ kai fa buɛ chɛ Yataa a, a ee mɔ ɔ mɔ baun.
Wo gbu, wo a ya wɛ, mbɛ wo suun ma nyɔɛ Chasi ɔ, a yen ko. Wo‑a a yen, fai ɛ min ma, daun fen bɛɛ ee a boo ɔ.
Mbɛ wo dɔndɔ ni a fɔ a ma, a ɔ, Yataa ni a dua. A ɔ, a ni koa be a ma, a ɔ, a basan daun fenɛ a. A mɔɛ chɛ ma ko chɛndɛ ma ni ka, ni a ma a bɔɛ chɛ ma chii ni, a ni a da nyin.
Wo‑a yen gbɛ, mbɛ mɔ kai fa koe Chisɔsi Chasi a, a dechee ma koe a. Kai fa min, mɔɛ n mbe ee a ɔ yen ko chɛndɛ ma ɔ, ko ma a a. An kai fa chɛ ma fen kɔ fen na, a faenɛ mu.

Chɛɛ mɔɛ dɔ nu, an mbe a fɔ‑a gbɛ, an dɔ, Chisianɛ dɔ n yen ko, an kai faenɛ mu Chisɔsi a. An dɔ, Chisianɛ dɔ n sin, an mbe ko chɛndɛ an ma. Chɛɛ n ni chɛ fɔ gbɛ an mɔɛ chɛ n ye, mbɛ n mbe ee a ɔ yen, ni mɔɛ kai faen fan mu Chisɔsi a, ni n ma a 'a ko chɛndɛ ma gba yen ni. Chɛɛ n tana, n mbe a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ n kai faen fan mu Chisɔsi a, n 'na ko chɛndɛ ma an dɔ.
Wo dandenɛ mu a a, mbɛ Yataa ɛ dɔndɔ gbe. Chɛ ma a kun wo ko a. Nyina yama n bɛɛ, an danden fan mu chɛ a, an sin mbe samba wan, a ma chianɛ a.
Wo wooen fan mu. Wo toen mu, wo ni a ɔ gbɛ, mbɛ ni wo kai faenɛ ma‑a tenchen Yataa a, wo ee ko chɛndɛ wɛɛ ma, mbɛ yiimatɛ ma.
Wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mmɔ bemba n ta bemba, Ebeami, koe min na‑a a ma, Yataa na‑a a ya mɔ tandenɛ a. A 'a den dɔndɔ gbe, Aisaki, a ni an be tena yasi a, sen gbengbe ma.
Wo‑a a ɔ yen fan, mbɛ a kai faen ni buɛ min dɔ Yataa a, an fea a chɛ chɛ wai a, an na kanden fan ni. Koe min na mu, a chɛ chɛ wai na‑a a ɔ yian fan, a kai faen mu buɛ min dɔ Yataa a.
Chɛ na‑a a ma wan, Yataa 'a gboo na‑a bai min fɔ, a bɔ‑a a a. A ɔ, “Ebeami‑a a kai fa wan Yataa a. A sin, Yataa wɛɛ‑a a ya mɔ tandenɛ a a chen kɔɔ.” A yɛ to, Ebeami gbu chee‑a wan Yataa dia nyɔɛ a.
Chɛ‑a a ɔ yian wo a, mbɛ kaifa dechee Yataa a, a ma koe a. Chɛɛ mɔɛ ɛ ko chɛndɛ miin bɛɛ ma, an mbe wan nɔ, mɔ ya koe a mɔ tandenɛ a Yataa boo ɔ.
Ko tɛ musu dɔndɔ wɛɛ, min tɔ ni Daabi, wo a yen bɛ. Mɔɛ ni a a, min na‑a sonda chɛ n nun, mbɛ a‑a chia dɔ mende yian an na, an ta‑a min na. Chɛ na‑a musu chɛ ma wan mɔ tandenɛ a Yataa tena.
Mɔɛ min faen mu, a nyina ee ma to a fɛ. Ɛ ka wan dechee yɔ ni mɔɛ kai faenɛ ma‑a dechee Chisɔsi a, chɛɛ a ee ko chɛndɛ ma.

N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo sɛsɛ ma ma ticha n na, mɔɛ n kan koe a chɔchi n dɔ. Koe min na mu, mmɔ wan kan chɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu, Yataa ɛ kaa a tɛ‑a wan, a si mmɔ ma, faaakɔɔɛ wandi gbu a, a ben mɔɛ tɔɛ n ma.
Tima sɛsɛ ko a, mmɔ ɛ nyinamaya sɛsɛ bɔ wan, mmɔ gbɛɛ. Chɛɛ mɔɛ min mbe che tachɛ‑a fɔɛ ɔ, a ma nyinamaya bai sa ni, mabɔ ee an mɔɛ chɛ ma. A sin, ɛ kun fan tachɛ koe a a wandi gbu a.

Mmɔ a yen bɛ, mmɔ ɛ koe min ma. Mmɔ ɛ kun fan, mmɔ ni a ma sɔ fen chɛ, min mu soo a, a ni a mun, a ni ta chia kan kɔ kan na, mmɔ toen mu min na. Kundu ɛndenɛ, mmɔ ɛ min don a da a, an mbe a ma, mmɔ ɛ che a mun‑da mmɔ ta chia a.
Mmɔ dɛndɛ wa chɛ wɛɛ ya wɛ tɔmɔsi dɔndɔ a. Ni a wii mɔɛ toen mu, a ni a kun sɔ kaina min na, fia ni ma bɔ‑a a gbasayaen ba wɛɛ, fen denɛ an mbe a ma, a ni ta an chia chɛ a.
Mmɔ nɛnɛnɛ wɛɛ ɛ ka wan. A dɔɔ wɛɛ ka boo ɔ boo, chɛɛ ɛ bai wa wa n fan fɔ. Mmɔ mmɔ yii na chii wɛ, ta fuin fuinɛ ɛ woa wa minda buɛ min dɔ.

Nɛnɛnɛ nan gbu sin mu ta an na. Ko yama dechee an faenɛ ɛ a a, min mbe che wo gboo gbɛɛ a yɛ‑a kuu kɔ. Ɛ che wan a ma‑a, mmɔ 'a fɔɛ gbɛɛ ni mun, a ni chɛ ta ɔ, kasaa koe a. Koe min na mu, a 'a gbasaya kaen mu Sitana an tena.
Mɔ gbu ɛ kun fan, a ni fɔɛ fen yama kan kɔ kan ma man, yɔ a toen mu a a buɛ min dɔ. A ni konde n bɛɛ ma man, sawan fɛnɛ nu, an bɛ nyɛ n na.
Chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ ee kun, a ni nɛnɛnɛ ma man. Mɔ gbu kaka dɔndɔ an nɛ, min kun ma fɛn koe gbɛ. Ɛ mɔ dɔ gbɛɛ n tɔɔ wan, yɔ ka kona.
Tima dɔ n na, mmɔ ɛ mmɔ Fa Yataa Mansa tando wan, mmɔ nɛnɛnɛ a. Dɔ n na, mmɔ ɛ bai yama n sa mɔɛ n ma. Mɔɛ chɛ n sin, an nyanden mu Yataa miinɛ an dɔ.
Mmɔ da dɔndɔ gbe chɛ, an mbe Yataa tando, mbɛ a yɛ‑a to, bai yama bɔ‑a a ɔ. N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, chɛ ma nyin ɛnden bɛɛ a.
Mmɔ ma a ɔ yen nin bɛ, yii ni ma bɔ‑a duu gboo kɔɔ, a konama ɛ, a yɛ to, a nyima ɛ.
N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo ee che yii chɛndɛ bɔ‑a sonɛ ɔ, kuiɛ ɛ min dɔ. A sin, kɔnɛ sɔnden mu gbɔɛ min ko a, ɛ an be. Chɛɛ kɔnɛ ee kɔn dɔ mende ta gbɔɛ be.
Wo tɛ ɔ, ni mɔɛ min yiima tɛen mu, a‑a koe ɔ gbɛ, an mɔɛ chɛ ni chɛ ma. Mɔɛ n ni a ɔ yen, fɔɛ chɛndɛ ma, ɛ min dɔ. An ni a ɔ yen ko chɛndɛ ma, ɛ min ma, yonka ee a fɛ. Chɛ an mbe yiimatɛ ɔ yian.
Chɛɛ toomaya faenɛ ɛ mɔɛ min faa ɔ, a toenɛ ɛ dechee a faa ma koe n na, yiimatɛ tɔ ma a mɔɛ chɛ a. A yau ko yama tɔɛ gbɛɛ ma, a mɔɛ chɛ yii na chii koe a, mbɛ yiimatɛ tɔɛ mu a a.
Toomaya, ni mɔ gbu to koe a a wandi faa ma koe n na dechee, Yataa ta yiimatɛ ma an na. Dunya chɛ ma yiimatɛ an nɛ, Yataa Nyina ma to ni min na. Sitana an mbe dechee sɔ ɔ an yiimatɛ chɛ nyɔn sima kɔ.
Kan kɔ kan, toomaya ɛ kaina, a yɛ to, mɔɛ n toen mu kaina dechee an fan ni ta ya ɔ ma, ko yama kan kɔ kan mbe nɔ wan. An kaina chɛ, koe a fasandenɛ mu nɔ tima ɔ tima.

Chɛɛ koe saa saa mu min na, Yataa ta yiimatɛ, ko ɔ ko ee a ma. Sɔnkɔ sɔnkɔ ee a kɔ chia a, faachima an mbe a ɔ. A yɛ to, basamaya an be a ɔ, chinchimaya, ni ko chɛndɛ ma. Yiimatɛ an nɛ, min mbe ee mɔ ya bɔ, nɛnɛn feaya sin mbe ee a ɔ.
Mɔɛ miin tanden mu Yataa tena, an mbe a ma mɔ dɔ mende n mbe ma kuiɛ dɔndɔya ɔ, a nyin an ko a. Koe min na mu, ni an‑na koe n ma faachimaya ɔ, ɛ ma ko chɛndɛ n fan na.
Koe n fan mbe a ma wo ee bɛn, an mbe a ma, koɛ ɛ don wo tɛ. Wo faa ma koe chɛ nu, an fan mbe ma ka wo tɔɔ‑a.

Wo toen mu fenɛ n na, wo ee che miin ma sɔn‑da. Wo e to wo bɔɛ n boo fenɛ n na yama yama, chɛɛ wo ee an ma sɔn. Wo e koɔ, wo e butuinɛ chɛ. Wo e mɔɛ fa wan, boo fen koe a. Wo ee fen chɛ n gbɛɛ ma sɔn, wo toen mu miin na. Koe min na mu, wo ee Yataa ɔ tisa.
Chɛɛ wo sin gbu, wo ni Yataa ɔ tisa wɛɛ, wo ee an ma sɔn. Koe min na mu, wo 'a samunɛ ee ma a chia ma. Wo e samunɛ chɛ fen chɛ n fan ko a, wo faa ma koe n dɔ bɛn koe a.

Wo ma danaya ni gba Yataa tena. Wo gbu‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ ni dunya chɛ ko a dia‑a wo ye, mbɛ Yataa ɛ ma‑a wan wo chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ a. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, ni dunya chɛ ma‑a mɔ ɔ mɔ koadia nyɔɛ a, Yataa ma‑a a mɔɛ chɛ chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ a.
Bai min nyɛndenɛ ɛ Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, wo ma a ya bai fuu a. A ɔ, Yataa‑a a Nyina min be mmɔ ma, a ɔ, toomaya an mbe a ɔ, mmɔ ma koe a Yataa ko a.
Chɛɛ Yataa 'a koadia demanɛ koo, min been mu mmɔ ma. Chɛ an fɛ mu, Yataa 'a gboo chɛ‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “Yataa ma to ni dɔpanda tɔɛ n na, chɛɛ ɛ koadia demanɛ chɛ‑a wan mɔɛ chɛ n na, miin dɔ ma panda ni.”
Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo kooya be Yataa ma. Wo ma dɔn Sitana ni kun wo ma. Ni wo‑a chɛ ma, ɛ a bui‑a wan, a ni ka wo fɛ.
Wo gbɛn Yataa ma, mbɛ a wɛɛ, ɛ gbɛn‑da wan wo ma. Wo wo boo a ko, wo wan ko yama ma mɔɛ nu. Wo faa ɔ ni gbɛ, wo wan nɛnɛn fea ti nu.
Wo chinchin wo wandi ma, wo ni sɛmbɛ yɛn chɛ koe a, mbɛ wo‑a di chɛ gbafi gbafi, wo 'a ko yama ko a. Wo wo 'a yɛn chɛ mun di a. Wo 'a buɔdia ni ma faayɔnɛ a.
Wo kooya be Mansa Yataa chen kɔɔ, mbɛ a‑a wo a sɛ.

N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo ma wo nyɔn ma bɔ. Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe a bɔɛ ma bɔ‑a, a ni kaa a tɛ a ma, a mɔɛ chɛ ɛ ma‑a ka sawa chɛ an ma bɔ‑a, Mosisi‑a min be. Ɛ ɛ ma‑a ka kaa a tɛ‑a an sawa chɛ an ma. Ni mɔɛ sin‑na kaa a tɛ sawa chɛ ma, mbɛ a ee ma‑a to a kɔɔ. Koe min na mu, a ban‑da ma‑a kaa a tɛ mɔɛ a sawa gbu ko a.
Mɔ ɔ mɔ ma i a, kaa a tɛ koe a mɔ dɔ mende n ma. Yataa dɔndɔ gbe an‑na sawa be, a sin fan mbe kaa a tɛ. A dɔndɔ gbe an mbe baunɛ chɛ, an mbe kasaa wɛɛ chɛ.

Wo chɛ a min, wo wɛn mbe a fɔ, wo ɔ, wo e na‑a wan ta‑a duu dɔndɔ ɔ, wo ɔ, wo ni ma nɔ san dɔndɔ ko a. Wo ɔ, wo e ma‑a wan nɔ fee fen ma tachɛ‑a, wo ɔ, wo ni kɔpɔɛ sɛmbɛnden ma sɔn. Wo ɔ, ni wo ma ta ni bi, wo ɔ, wo e ta‑a wan sinan.
Wo ee kun wo ni chɛ fɔ. Wo gbu ma a ɔ sɔn, fen mbe ma‑a sinan wo a. Wo wo fɔɛ ma fɛn bɛ, ɛ wan dechee yɔ sisi. Ɛ si dechee tima kundu ɛnden fan ko a, mbɛ a gbu ban‑da.
Wo e a fɔ wan dechee, mbɛ ni Mansa Yataa dɔn‑da, wo fɔɛ ni ma wo sun da a, mbɛ wo e chɛ an ma‑a sinan.
Chɛɛ wo e min ma, wo e yonka an tɛ ben‑da, wo dandenɛ ɛ wo wandi a. Yonka chɛ gbɛɛ ma nyin.
A ni ma wo yii ma, ni mɔ‑a a ɔ sɔn, e koe min ma, min nyin, chɛɛ i sin ma an koe chɛ ma ni, ko yama mu a a.
Wo wan nyan tɔɛ nu, wo chɛ a min. Wo di chɛ, wo ni wo nyinɛ a daun, faayɔnɛ a. Koe min na mu, ko yawaenɛ ɛ wo ya ɔ min koo.
Wo 'a nyanɛ ɛ ban‑da wan tui‑a. Chisi n mbe wo 'a koa nyima n daun‑da wan.

Wo‑a sanu miin na sɔn ka, ni kain gbɛ nu, an mbe ee ma‑a fen fen na. Wo 'a nyan chɛ, wo na‑a wo fa min na, an mbe wo gboo kasaa‑a ta ɔ. Wo‑a an sa tena ɔ bɛn ka wo wandi ko a, tee chɛ ma kɔnɛ a, kaa a tɛ tee chɛ.
A yen ko, wo ni mɔɛ chɛ n pawa wan, miin‑na wai chɛ wo 'a yadi n dɔ. Chɛɛ wo‑a an 'na pawa bia kafaya ɔ. An di kuiɛ che‑a Yataa tena, Mansa Wa.
Wo 'a fɔɛ gbɛɛ ɔ nɛ dunya chɛ ɔ, wo e nyanɛ an dɔ, wo e wo faa ma koe kan kɔ kan ma‑a. Sanche gbɛ, wo bu ɔ di, wo sin tɔɔen mu. Kasaa chɛ tima an che‑a ka gbɛ.
Wo‑a kaa a tɛ, wo‑a mɔɛ chɛ n fa, miin ma ko ɔ ko ma ni. An sin nii ma sɔ ni wo a, wo ni an fa tena tima min na.

N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo ma faabia ɔ, wo e ta‑a mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi yɛ tima ma kɔn‑da dunya chɛ ɔ. Wo a ɔ yen bɛ sɛnɛ sa mɔɛ ɛ faabia min chɛ, sama ma kɔnɛ a, sona ni chɛ. Ɛ a faa bia wan aan, tima ma kɔnɛ a, a 'a chin fen nyima ni che a ya tena.
A nyin wo wɛɛ, wo ni wo faa bia. Wo faa n ma yɔn, a mu min na, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi na tima ɔ ma yansan to.
N suun ma nyɔɛ nu, wo ma gbonyɛ wo nyɔn na. Wo ma chɛ ma, Yataa wɛɛ ma na kaa a tɛ, a si wo ma. A yen ko, kaa a tɛ mɔɛ gbu ɛ sɔ ɔ chenɛ da a.
N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, faabia ko yawaen dɔ bia ɔ, a tɔmɔsi dɔndɔ yen ko. A mu Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n fan na, miin ni bai sa, Mansa Yataa tɔɛ ɔ.

Dua ɛ ma wan mɔɛ chɛ n ma, miin mbe faabia chɛ ko yawaenɛ ɔ. Kai Chobi mu an mɔɛ chɛ n dɔndɔ a. Wo‑a a a min fan, a na‑a a faa bia buɛ min dɔ. A sin, wo‑a a ɔ yen fan to, Mansa Yataa 'a dɔbɛnɛ na‑a bɔ buɛ min dɔ a gbee a. A mu min na, chinchimaya faa an mbe Yataa ɔ, a sin mbe chinchin.

N suun ma nyɔɛ nu, bai chɛ an mbe chɛ gbɛɛ kun ma. Ni wo ma‑a ko ɔ ko ma‑a, wo ma wo gboo. Wo ma wo gboo duu gboo ɔ, wo ma wo gboo banda bu ɔ ɔ, wo ma wo gboo fen fen dɔ. Ni wo‑a a fɔ, wo ɔ, wo dɔn‑da koe ma, wo dɔn a ma. Ni wo ma dɔn ni min ma, wo ma dɔn a ma. Wo chɛ ma, Yataa ma na kaa a tɛ, a ni wo tɔɔ.
Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ɛ wan wo tɛ ɔ, min mbe tɔɔya ɔ, a ni Yataa fai. Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ɛ wan wo tɛ ɔ, min mbe buɔdia ɔ, a ni tando be Yataa ma si ɔ.
Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ sin mbe wan nɔ to, wo tɛ ɔ, min gbandien mu, a ni mɔɛ n chee, gbakoo nu chɔchi ɔ. An ni samunɛ chɛ a ko a. An ni yɛ, an ni tu chɛ a ma, Mansa Chisɔsi tɔɛ ɔ.

An mɔɛ chɛ n 'na samunɛ, danaya ɔ, ɛ a ma‑a wan, Mansa Yataa ni an mɔɛ chɛ baun, a ni a kɔɔ sɔ gbandi chɛ ɔ. Ni a sin na‑a ko yama kan kɔ kan ma, Yataa ɛ a boo bɔ‑a wan a ɔ. A mu min na, an‑na a ɔ yian, mbɛ an kai faen fan mu Yataa a.

Chɛ ko a, wo wo 'a ko yama n kɔɔ yian wo nyɔn na. Mbɛ wo‑a samunɛ chɛ wo nyɔn ko a. Chɛ ɛ na‑a wan bauncha a wo tena, wo 'a gbandi n dɔ. Mɔɛ min tanden mu Yataa tena, ɛ samunɛ min chɛ, a faa gbɛɛ a, gbasaya koo min mbe bɔ a ɔ.
Kai Idaicha ni mɔ gbu an na, yɔ mmɔ ɛ buɛ min dɔ. Chɛɛ a na‑a samunɛ chɛ wan pien, min mbe a ma, sona ma na na. Sona sin dɔndɔ wɛɛ nii ma na ni, san sawa ni a tɔɛ ko a.
Mbɛ a yɛ‑a, a‑a samunɛ chɛ sona ko a. Mbɛ sona bun‑da na‑a. A tima chɛ a gbɛ, chin fenɛ n‑na a kuu sɔ nyan‑da.
N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, ni wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ ka‑a Yataa 'a tea chia ma, a suun ma nyɔɛ dɔ mende ni a ma, a ni yɛ a ma.

Mɔɛ miin mbe ko yama ma, a ni ma wo yii ma, mbɛ mɔɛ min mbe an dɔndɔɛ wɛɛ a yɛ‑a Yataa 'a chia ma, a‑a an mɔɛ chɛ baun fan ka. A‑a a ma, Yataa‑a a boo bɔ an mɔɛ chɛ a ko yama main sɛsɛ ɔ, a sin kunɛ bɔ‑a saya ɔ.

N fan Pita, Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ, n fan mbe ka gboo chɛ nyɛn‑da. N mbe a nyɛn tena wo wan tena, wo wan Yataa 'a mɔɛ chɛ nu, a na‑a a boo sɔ ka wo wɛn ma. Wo a fasandenɛ mu ben‑da, wo e sondaya ɔ chɛnyɛ sɛsɛ ɔ. Wo e pande Pɔndɔsi chɛnyɛ ɔ, wo dɔ n mbe Kadesia, a yɛ to, wo dɔ n mbe Kapadosia, wo dɔ n sin mbe Esia, a basan Bitinia chɛnyɛ ɔ a.

Mmɔ fa Yataa na‑a wo sɔn pɛn chɛndɛ chɛ, mbɛ a‑a a boo sɔ wo ma suun gbɔɔ. A sin, Yataa Nyina wɛɛ‑a a ma wan, wo ma‑a tenchen Yataa ko a. Chɛ sin mbe a ma tena wan, wo e kooya be tena Chisɔsi Chasi ma. A wii min sin bɔ‑a a fa tima a, a‑a wo ko fo. Yataa ni wo dua, a ni faachima ma munda wo ɔ.

Tando ni be Yataa ma. A wan mu Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi fa a, ni a 'a Yataa. Koe min na mu, a chinchin‑da wan mmɔ ma a ɔ benden ba a. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, mmɔ‑a fɔɛ nama ma sɔn. Chisɔsi Chasi na‑a a kɔɔ sɔ wan a ka saya ɔ. Chɛ naen mu gbɛ yiinatɛ ɔ benden ba an na mmɔ tena.

Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, fen kuu ma chɛ ɛ wan nɔ, Yataa‑a min sa tena ɔ bɛn a 'a denɛ n ko a. Ɛ wan nɔ banda bu ɔ, wo ko a. Ko ɔ ko ma ma ni a a, a sin, tɔmbɛ ee a ma. An fen chɛ ee tui, a sin mbe ee ka a gba ɔ.
Wo danɛ min chɛ‑a Chisɔsi Chasi a, an fɛ mu Yataa ɛ wo kun ma fɛn tena gbasaya ɔ, aan wo ni bauncha ma sɔn. Wo e an bauncha chɛ sin ma sɔn‑da tee dankama tee ma wan.
Chɛ ni ma buɔdia a wo ma. Buɔdia chenama wa ni ma wɛɛ wo ma ya ɔ ma, chɛɛ tima ɛnden ko a, wo e na‑a wan ma‑a faayɔnɛ ɔ. Koe min na mu, wo e ko gbɛama sɛsɛ n dɔ bia‑a wan.

Wo e chɛ n dɔ bia koe min na, a ɔ yian koe mu, mbɛ wo kai faen fan mu Chisɔsi Chasi a chɛndɛ chɛ. Ta an mbe a ma, mɔ ni sanu ma kawa koe ɔ sɔn. Sanu min ka, mɔɛ ɛ kun, a ni a yɔn. Kaifa nan gbu sin, wo‑a min chɛ, a sɔnkɔ ee, a benden mu sanu ma. Ko yawaenɛ chɛ nu, an fan mbe a ma, wo ee mun‑da, wo e sɔ‑a wan gban. Wo sin mbe na‑a boo ɔ gbasi ma sɔn‑da wan, wo ni tando ma sɔn, a basan dua a. Chɛ ɛ ma‑a wan an tee chɛ ma, Yataa ɛ Chisɔsi Chasi yian‑da tee min ma.
Wo ma a yen nin bɛ, chɛɛ wo toen fan mu a a. A yɛ to, wo kai faen fan mu a a, wo ee a yen tena wɛɛ. A sin, sanche chɛ ɔ wɛɛ, wo bu ɔ diama mu. An buɔdia chɛ danka ee, wo ee che bai fɔ‑a a si a ma.
Koe min na mu, wo e ka bauncha an ma sɔn‑da kuɔ fɔ ko a. Kaifa chɛ gbu sin wo ɔ, a kaen mu chɛ an ma.
Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n na‑a a ɔ gbɛngbɛn fan chɛndɛ chɛ suun, koe ɔ sɔn koe a, a si bauncha chɛ ma. A sin, an na‑a bai fɔ wan, a si an koadia deman chɛ ma, Yataa ɛ min chɛ‑a wo a.

Chasi Nyina min ni an fɛ, a ni wan chia yian‑da an na a tima chɛ a. An sin na‑a an sɔɛ don fan, a ɔ gbɛ koe a, Chasi ɛ na‑a tima min kɔɔ, a basan a na buɛ gbu a. An na‑a a kɔɔ fɔ wan to, a ni tɔɔya min nyɔn dɔ bia‑a. An‑na a fɔ wan to, mbɛ basɔmaya wa an mbe an tɔɔya chɛ gbaa.

Yataa na‑a a ma wan, a 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n‑na a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ an mbe ee wai chɛ tena an fandi an ko a. Chɛɛ an mbe a chɛ tena wo wan ko a. Koe min na mu, an na‑a bai sa suun a si koe chɛ n fan ma, wo‑a miin na min ka sanche mɔɛ chɛ n da ɔ, an mbe ma sakana bai chɛndɛ ɔ yian‑da. Yataa Nyina min ka‑a banda bu ɔ, an mbe gbasaya chɛ be an ma. An koe chɛ n fan gbu sin mu, maeka n bɛɛ toen mu, an ni miin dɔ gbɛ.

Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo wo yiima ɔ bɛn gbɛ chɛndɛ chɛ, wai n chɛ koe a, wo e min chɛ. Wo kun wo tachɛ buɛ kun ma fɛn‑da tima ɔ tima ko a, wai chɛ koe a. Wo yii na tɛenɛ ni ma gbae dua chɛ ma, min mbe be‑a wo ma. Dua chɛ, wo e min sɔn‑da, Yataa ɛ Chisɔsi Chasi yian‑da tima min na.

Wo ma yɔ den mɛsɛ nu, miin kooen mu Yataa tena. A sin, fɔɛ chɛ ɔ, wo faa ma koe n ma ben wo ma. Koe chɛ nu, wo toen ni miin na, tima min na wo nii ma sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a min nin bɛ, a si Chisɔsi Chasi ma.
Chɛɛ wo e koe miin ma, an ni ma ko chɛndɛ n dechee an na. Wo ni ma yɔ Yataa, min na‑a wo chee, a ee ko yama kan kɔ kan ma.
A mu min na, a nyɛnden fan mu Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ Yataa ɔ te, a ɔ, “Wo ma ko chɛndɛ ma a, yɔ n bɛɛ, n mbe buɛ min dɔ ko chɛndɛ ma a.”

Ni wo ma‑a samun‑da a tena, wo e a chee wo Fa an na. A sin mbe ma kaa a tɛ‑a, a ee a boo don mɔɛ n tɛ ɔ. Ɛ kaa a tɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ chɛ chɛ wai n fan ma. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, sonda mu ka buɛ min dɔ wo 'a fɔɛ chɛ ɔ nɛ dunya ma, wo chian Yataa ma, aan a che tee dankama tee ma.

Wo wandi gbu‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ wo ni wan baa baa fɔɛ ɔ, wo bemba n ta bemba n ni min dɔ. Yataa ma kain gbɛ an ya ni, chɛ ma sanu, miin mbe yɔn, a ni an be wo kun ka koe a, a bɔ an fɔɛ chɛ ɔ. Wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, a na‑a fenɛ min be.
Chɛ ni Chisɔsi Chasi wandi ta wii gbu an na, min be‑a wo kun ka koe a. Chasi ma‑a wan yɔ sa tɔngbɔɛ yasi, tɔmbɛ nii min ma, a sin, a wakoe ɔ nii ma chɛ chɛ ni.
Yataa e na to dunya chɛ a dan‑da, a na‑a a boo sɔ pɛn Chisɔsi ma, ma koe a ka. Chɛɛ tee dankama tee chɛ nɛnɛ n kɔɔ, Yataa‑a Chisɔsi yian wo deman koe an na.
Chisɔsi Chasi, min‑na a kɔɔ sɔ a ka saya ɔ, a chɛ chɛ wai n fan‑na a ma, wo‑a wo kai fa Yataa a. Mbɛ Yataa‑a baa be a ma. Chɛ an‑na a ma, wo kai faen mu a a. A sin, wo yii na tɛen mu a ma.

Wo‑a wo boo a si min chɛ sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ kɔɔ, tea mu min na, wo ko‑a gbɛ, a bɔ wo 'a ko yama n dɔ. Chɛ ni a ma, koadia chɛndɛ ni ma gbɛ wo ɔ. Ni a sin ma‑a ka, wo ni to wo nyɔn na pien, wo faa gbɛɛ a.

A mu min na, Yataa‑a a ma wan, wo suun‑da to a nama a. Wo 'a fɔɛ nama chɛ, wo woo mɔɛ nu dunya ma, an fan ma a be ni wo ma. Koe min na mu, an‑na fɔɛ min be wo ma, ɛ danka‑a saya an dɔ. Chɛɛ fɔɛ nama chɛ tana, ɛ ma‑a wan kuɔ fɔ ko a. Koe min na mu, Yataa da a bai chɛ, fɔɛ ɛ min dɔ, ɛ ma‑a wan nɔ kuɔ fɔ ko a.
Ɛ wan yɔ a nyɛnden mu buɛ min dɔ Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, “Mɔ gbu gbɛɛ maen fan mu yɔ bin gbii, an mbe fa wan. Mɔ gbu 'a dunya ma nyanɛ wɛɛ, ɛ wan yɔ kɔn fu, a ee mɛ a a.
Chɛɛ Mansa Yataa da a bai, ɛ ma‑a wan kuɔ fɔ ko a.” Bai chɛ mu sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ an na, min dɔ yian‑da wo a.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo wo boo bɔ ko yama ma gbɛɛ ɔ. Wo sɛmbɛ fania fɔ koe a. A yɛ to, wo sɛmbɛ ma koe a nɛnɛn fea ti n na. A sin, wo main chɛ kan kɔ kan boo ka, mbɛ wo sɛmbɛ‑a too koe a mɔ dɔ gbɛɛ n na.
Wo to Yataa 'a bai a min koe a, tima ɔ tima ko a, yɔ den toa toen mu buɛ min dɔ a de susu yii a. Wo a a min, min mbe a ma, wo ni kɔɔ Yataa sɔnɛ ɔ, mbɛ wo‑a bauncha ma sɔn.
A sin, wo wandi‑a a ɔ yen gbɛ, Mansa Yataa chinchinchaen mu buɛ min dɔ.
Wo na Chisɔsi tena. An mu senɛ chɛ a, min mbe fɔɛ ɔ. Mɔ gbu n ban‑da wan a ɔ, chɛɛ Yataa tana, a ma kawaen mu a tena, a sin‑na a boo sɔ a ma.

Wo na Chisɔsi tena yɔ senɛ miin mbe fɔɛ ɔ. Wo a ma Yataa ni a 'a chenɛ sɔ wo a. A yɛ to, wo e ma‑a tenchen tɛ mɔɛ n fan na, mɔ gbu n tɛ ɔ Yataa a. Nɔ mu wo e basɔmaya fenɛ n be‑a Yataa ma, ɛ a boo si‑a miin kɔɔ. Chɛ ɛ ma‑a wan, a mu min na, Chisɔsi na‑a a ma wan.

A mu min na, Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “A yen ko, n 'na senɛ si Sayɔn duu ɔ. Senɛ ma kawaenɛ an nɛ, senɛ kuu ba gbu, n‑na n boo sɔ a ma. Chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ, i wɛn mbe i kai fa‑a a a, i mɔɛ chɛ ee che‑a mau‑a”

Wo wɛn kai faen mu a a, senɛ chɛ mu tɔnɔn ba an na wo tena. Chɛɛ wo wɛn ma wo kai fa ni a a, Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “Chen sɔ mɔɛ n na‑a ban senɛ min dɔ, an dɔ, a ma nyin, an gbu ma‑a gbɛ senɛ kuu ba wandi a, chenɛ gbu ko a.”

Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ wan to, a ɔ, “Mɔɛ n mbe an chenɛ n na tu‑a sen chɛ an na, an sen chɛ, mɔɛ n mbe nama‑a min ma, mbɛ an bea‑a.” An mbe an chenɛ n na tu‑a wan, koe min na mu, an ma dan ni Yataa 'a bai a. Yataa sin‑na a ɔ bɛn ka wan an ko a.

Chɛɛ wo tana, boo sɔ chɛen mu wo wan ma, Mansa Yataa 'a tɛ mɔɛ nu, wo wɛn mu chɛnyɛ a tenchen a ko a. A yɛ to, a ta mɔɛ mu wo a, boo sɔ chɛen mu wo ma, min mbe a ma, wo ni Yataa 'a kamaya ɔ yian. A wan Yataa min‑na wo chee pimbi pimbi ɔ, an na‑a wo a a 'a kamaya manɛ kɔɔ.
A saa a, Yataa 'a mɔ nii ma wo a. Chɛɛ sanche gbɛ a 'a mɔɛ mu wo a. A saa a, wo nii ma Yataa 'a chinchimaya ɔ sɔn. Chɛɛ sanche gbɛ wo ban‑da a 'a chinchimaya sɔn‑da.

N dia nyɔɛ nu, sonda mu wo a nɛ dunya chɛ ɔ, mɔ gbama gbama nu. Chɛ an fɛ mu, n mbe wo disa tena, wo ma bea wo gboo faa ma koe n fan fɛ. Tima ɔ tima ko a, an koe chɛ n mbe butuin chɛ an na, wo fo koe a Yataa 'a bauncha a.

Wo sɔnɛ n ma ni kawa mɔɛ chɛ n tɛ ɔ, miin ma Yataa sɔn. An mbe a ma‑a, ni mɔɛ n‑na wo chee wɛɛ ko yama ma mɔɛ n na, an mbe wo sɔn chɛndɛ chɛ yen‑da wan. Chɛ an mbe a ma‑a an ni tando be Yataa ma, a na tee ma.
Wo kooya be chɛ n gbɛɛ ma, miin mbe gbasaya ɔ wo kun ma dunya chɛ ɔ. Mansa Yataa toen mu wo ni a ma ka wan. Wo kooya be chɛnyɛ ya ɔ sɔɛ ma, min mu kun ti wa a.
Mbɛ wo yɛ‑a, wo‑a kooya be kɔfana n bɛɛ ma, kun ti wa chɛ‑a gbasaya be miin ma, mɔɛ n kun ma. An fan mbe ko yama ma mɔɛ tɔɔ, mbɛ an‑na ko chɛndɛ ma mɔɛ tando.
Yataa toen mu, chɛ an ni ma. Wo 'a ko chɛndɛ ni a ma, baa baa mɔɛ chɛ n ni an da a tɔn, wooya bai n fɔ koe a wo ma.

Wo kooya be, yɔ Yataa 'a mɔɛ nu, miin mbe ee yɔncha ɔ mɔ dɔ gbɛɛ n kɔɔ. Chɛɛ yuu min tɛ‑a ka wo ma, wo ma ben ko yama ma‑a nun dɔ, wo ni a dɛn wo bɔ koe ma yɔncha ɔ. Chɛɛ wo tachɛ buɛ ni wo ma Yataa 'a yɔnɛ n na, tima ɔ tima ko a.
Wo basɔmaya be mɔ ɔ mɔ ma. Wo to wo bɔɛ Chisianɛ n na. Wo chian Yataa ma, mbɛ wo‑a basɔmaya be kun ti wa ma.

Wo wan bɔi denɛ nu, wo kooya be wo kun ti n ma, wo ni basɔmaya da faenɛ be an ma. Kun ti chɛ nu ma dechee, miin sɔnɛ n nyin, a yɛ to, an mbe chinchin wo ma. Chɛɛ wo a be chɛ n bɛɛ ma, miin mbe wo bia tena yama yama.
Yataa faa ɛ chima wan, ni wo‑a ko yawaenɛ n dɔ bia. Koe nu, wo sɔn dɔ ko ma miin na. Chɛ ni ma wo yiima ɔ, mbɛ chɛ ɛ ma wan Yataa chen kɔɔ.
Koe min na mu, ni wo‑a wo gbasi koe ma, mbɛ an‑na wo gbasi, wo ee tɔnɔn sɔn a ɔ. Chɛɛ ni wo‑a ko chɛndɛ ma, mbɛ wo‑a ko yawaenɛ ɔ bia a ko a, ɛ Yataa faa chima‑a wan.
An ko bonda chɛ mu, Yataa na‑a wo chee, a ɔ, wo ni a ma. Koe min na mu, Chasi wandi gbu‑a ko yawaenɛ ɔ bia wan wo ko a, min mu tɔmɔsi a wo tena. Chɛ ni a ma, wo wɛɛ ni puin a chen gba ɔ.
A nii ma ko yama kan kɔ kan ma ni. A sin, fania bai nii ma bɔ ni a da ɔ tee dɔndɔ wɛɛ.
Bai yama n sa‑a wan a ma, chɛɛ a nii ma a ta ɔ nyɔn ni ɛnden bɛɛ a. A na‑a ko yawaenɛ n bɛɛ ɔ bia wan, chɛɛ a nii ma a wandi ma chian ni. A ni a ta gbɛɛ kai fa dechee Yataa an ma, min mbe tea kaa tɛ.

Chisɔsi Chasi wandi gbu‑a mmɔ 'a ko yama n ya wan a gboo ɔ, a ta kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma, a‑a mɔnɛ ɔ bia an ko a nɔ. A na‑a chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, ni ko yama ma koe mu to, mbɛ mmɔ su mu gbɛ. Mmɔ ɛ gbɛ fɔɛ chɛndɛ an dɔ. Magba min chɛ‑a a a, an‑na a ma, wo‑a bauncha ma sɔn.
A saa a, wo ni wan ben‑da wo kun ye, yɔ sa miin toenɛ a ɔ. Chɛɛ wo ya a yɛ‑a gbɛ Yataa ma, min mbe wo kun ma fɛn.

A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, wo wɛɛ, wo wɛn mu kai sɔn musu n na, wo don wo chɛɛ n 'na gbasaya kɔɔ. Yataa da a bai chɛ, kɔkɔɛ an dɔ n mbe ban‑da wan an boo si koe a a kɔɔ. Ni chɛ ma‑a wɛɛ, wo e ma‑a ka Yataa fɔɛ min dɔ, ɛ an mun‑da wan Yataa tena, a ben wo da a bai ma.
Koe min na mu, an mbe a ɔ yen‑da wan wo sɔnɛ nyin buɛ min dɔ Yataa chen kɔɔ, wo sin chianden mu ka wan to a ma.
Gboo ma nyanɛ an ma ma dechee wo faa ma koe a. Wo ni wo kundi a bonchen, wo ni sanu chɛ wo ma, ni kainɛ a basan koa baa gbandenɛ n na.
Chɛɛ nyanɛ ɛ wan nɔ, min kun ma ee ka, an mu musu sɔnɛ a. Musu ni tima ya tachɛ koe a mɔ dɔ mende n na, a sin, sɔnkɔ sɔnkɔ nyina ma ma a fɛ. Nyan chɛ nyɔn sima, an ma kawaen mu Yataa tena.
Suun musu nu, miin ni tenchen Yataa ko a, an ni an fandi a bonchen ka wan. An yii na tɛen ni Yataa an ma, an mbe an chɛɛ n 'na gbasaya kɔɔ.
Seda ni musu dɔndɔ an na, min kooen ni a chɛɛ Ebeami ye. A ni a chee, a ɔ, a kun ti. Sanche gbɛ, wo e ma‑a wan Seda bɔ nyɔɛ n na, ni wo‑a koe ma min nyin Yataa chen kɔɔ, wo ee chian kan kɔ kan kɔɔ.

A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a to, wo wan mɔ kaima n bɛɛ ni baa be wo 'a musu n ma. A ni ma wo yii ma, mbɛ wo ɔ gbɛ a ben an ma. Chɛɛ fɔɛ nama ta fɛ chia a, wo e min ma sɔn‑da, wo a kanden fan mu Yataa tena. Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo wo 'a musu n bia chɛndɛ chɛ, wo bɛ an mbe Yataa 'a koadia demanɛ chɛ ma sɔn‑da. Ni wo‑a chɛ ma, ko ɔ ko ee wo 'a samunɛ ka‑a a chia ma.
Ka n mbe n da a bai chɛ kunɛ a bia nɛ, mbɛ wo yiima ni ma dɔndɔ. Wo ni to wo nyɔn na wo faa gbɛɛ a. Chinchimaya ni ma wo ɔ wo nyɔn ko a, wo sin ma dɔpandaya bɔ.
Wo ma ko yama a yɛ ko yama ko a. A yɛ to, wo ma mainɛ a yɛ mainɛ ko a. Chɛɛ dua an ni ma wo da ɔ. Koe min na mu, Yataa‑a wo chee tima min na, a na‑a wo too ɔ dia wan, mbɛ dua an ni ma wo ta a.
Ɛ wan yɔ Yataa 'a gboo‑a min fɔ. A ɔ, “Mɔ ɔ mɔ min toen mu a ni fɔɛ ɔ daun, tee chɛndɛ yen sɔɛ ɛ min yii ma, a ni a boo bɔ bai yama sa ɔ, mbɛ a sɛmbɛ‑a fania fɔɛ‑a.
A ni a kan kɔ sɔ ko yama ma a, a ni ko chɛndɛ ma. A ni yɛ, a ni butuinɛ chɛ, a faa gbɛɛ a, faachima ko a.
Koe min na mu, Mansa Yataa ɛ mɔɛ chɛ n kun ma fɛn‑da wan, miin tanden mu a tena. A sin mbe a too ma sɔ tena wan an 'na samunɛ ma. Chɛɛ ɛ mɔɛ chɛ n ma bɔ tena wan, miin mbe ko yama ma.”
Mɔ ɔ mɔ ee ko ma‑a wo a, ni wo ma bɛndenɛ ma‑a ko chɛndɛ ma koe a, tima ɔ tima.
Chɛɛ ni wo‑a tɔɔya ɔ bia wɛɛ, ko chɛndɛ ma gbaa chia a, dua wa mu wo ma. Mɔ ɔ mɔ ma a ma chianɛ ni ma wo ɔ, wo sin faa ma gbaa a.

Chɛɛ Chasi ma chianɛ ni ma wo faa ɔ, wo ni baa be a wan mansa ma. Wo ma bɛndenɛ ni ma, tima ɔ tima ko a, mɔɛ n 'na tisa yɛman koe a. Ni an‑na wo ɔ tisa, a si yiinatɛ ma min mbe wo ɔ, wo a ɔ yian an na.

Chɛɛ wo tima ya a ɔ yian koe a an na, basɔmaya chia a. Wo yiima a koenɛ ni ma, min mbe a ma, wo main mɔɛ n ni mau wo ma. Mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin mbe bai yama sa wo ma, wo e ma ko chɛndɛ n ma‑a. Wo e chɛ ma, koe min na mu, wo ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, wo bɛ Chasi a.
A mu koe min na, a ma bɛnden mu mɔ ni tɔɔya ɔ bia ko chɛndɛ fɛ, ni Yataa‑a a fɔ ka wan, a ben tɔɔya ɔ bia koe ma ko yama ko a.

An na‑a a ma, Chasi wɛn nii ma ko yama kan ko kan ma ni, a na‑a tɔɔya ɔ bia wan mmɔ ko a. A wɛn ni ka mɔ chɛndɛ wa a, a na‑a saya dɔndɔɛ chɛ chɛ wan. A sin mbe ee ma‑a to, mmɔ mɔ yama chɛ n 'na ko yama n ko a. A na‑a chɛ ma, mmɔ ma sawan koe an na Yataa tena. Mɔɛ n na‑a a fa wan kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma, a gboo ɔ, chɛɛ a yɛ‑a wan fɔɛ ɔ, Yataa Nyina ta fɛ chia a.
A tima chɛ a, mbɛ a ta‑a koɔ‑a faa mɔɛ n tena, miin nyina ni pimbi chenɛ a.

Mɔɛ chɛ n fan nii nɛ, miin nii ma kooya be ni Yataa ma. Yataa ni a faa bia tena wan an na, ɛ an ma kɔn‑da, tima min na Nowa ni a 'a dɛndɛ wa nyanɛ a. Mɔ kuundenɛ miin ni an dɛndɛ chɛ ɔ, an ni mɔ sɛi, yii chɛ na‑a miin baun.

Chɛ ni tɔmɔsi an na, yii ɛ chɛ buɛ min dɔ mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, bauncha sɔn koe a sanche. A ma dechee nɔɛ ko koe an na, mɔɛ n gboo ma. Chɛɛ tooɔdia mu, mɔɛ ɛ min chɛ Yataa a, yiima a koenɛ a. An mbe na bauncha a, min ma sɔn‑da, a bɔ Chisɔsi 'a sɔ koe ɔ, a ka saya ɔ.
A wan Chisɔsi Chasi chɛ sɛ‑a banda bu ɔ, ɛ kaina min si ɔ Yataa boo nyima ɔ. Ɛ nɔ mansaya ɔ maeka n gbɛɛ kun ma, ni fen fen min gbasa, a sin mbe gbasaya ɔ banda bu ɔ.

Chɛ an fɛ mu gbɛ, Chasi‑a tɔɔya ɔ bia ka buɛ min dɔ a gboo ɔ, wo wɛɛ wo sɔnɛ ni bɔ a ta a a. Wo ma bɛndenɛ ni ma tɔɔya ɔ bia koe a. Koe min na mu, ni wo‑a tɔɔya ɔ bia wo gboo ɔ Chasi ko a, wo ee ko yama ma.
A sin, wo ee ma‑a wo faa ma koe n fan ma‑a, aan wo ni fa. Chɛɛ wo ma bɛndenɛ ɛ ma‑a wan, tima ɔ tima ko a, Yataa faa ma koe ma koe a.

A saa a, wo‑a koe chɛ n ma kaka, miin ma koe a ni di gbeden mɔɛ chɛ n ye, miin ma Yataa sɔn. Wo 'a fɔɛ gbɛɛ ni yau kaka. Wo ni gbɛ wa min fan. Wo e dunya ma koe ma to fiti fata. Wo ni mauma koe n sɛsɛ ma wan to. A yɛ to, wo ni fenɛ n fai wan, wo e an ya Yataa a.

Sanche gbɛ sin, mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin ma an kai fa ni Chisɔsi a, an kɔndɔ fii‑a wo a. An‑na a yen, mbɛ wo ee bea tena to an fɛ, ben‑da mauma koe ma‑a, wo gbɔsɔ wɛɛ ma. Chɛ an mbe a ma tena, an mbe bai yama n sa tena wo ma.
Chɛɛ an‑na koe miin gbɛɛ ma, an mbe a ɔ yian‑da wan Yataa chen kɔɔ. A ma bɛndenɛ mu gbɛ kaa a tɛ koe a fuɛ n ma, an bɛ chɛndɛ ba an na.
Chɛ an na‑a a ma, sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ na‑a sa chɛ n bɛɛ tena, miin na‑a fa. Chɛ na‑a ma, min mbe a ma, ni an gboo na‑a tɔɔya wɛɛ saya a, an nyina ni ma nɔ fɔɛ ɔ, yɔ Yataa ɛ buɛ min dɔ.
A ɔ ma yansan to, mbɛ ko ɔ ko che‑a a danka a. Wo ma bɛndenɛ ni ma, wo ni kun tachɛ koe a wo wandi a chɛndɛ chɛ, wo ni kun samunɛ chɛ a, a chɛ buɛ a.
Min mbe ko ɔ ko kun ma, wo to wo nyɔn na wo faa gbɛɛ a. Koe min na mu, koadia ɛ a ma wan mmɔ ni mmɔ ya ka ko yama sɛsɛ a.
Ni wo bɔɛ n na‑a wo 'a chenɛ n na, sondaya a, wo ma gbonyɛ wo boo n si koe a an kɔɔ. An bɛɛ ni a ma ka wo ko a.

Wo gbɛɛ, Yataa‑a wo dua wan chia sɛsɛ a, dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a. An chia chɛ n sin, basan koe a mu wo nyɔn ma. Chɛ an mbe a ɔ yian‑da, mbɛ Yataa‑a koadia demanɛ min chɛ wo a, wo e tachɛ tena wan a a chɛndɛ chɛ.

Yataa 'a bai sa wai nyima, an chɛen mu wo dɔ n na. Chɛ ko a, wo Yataa 'a sakana bai ɔ yian mɔɛ n na, yɔ Yataa wandi an mbe ka koɔ‑a wo ɔ. Mɔ deman wai nyima an been mu wo dɔ n ma. Chɛ ko a, wo deman chɛ chɛ wo sɔɛ gbɛɛ a, Yataa‑a min be wo ma. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan tando ni be Yataa ma, ko ɔ ko kan kɔ kan ko a, Chisɔsi Chasi 'a gbasaya ɔ. Basɔmaya ɛ be an ma, a sin fan ta mu to gbasaya a, kuɔ fɔ ni kuɔ fɔ ko a. A ni ma ka.
N dia nyɔɛ nu, wo e ka tɔɔya ɔ gbɛama min dɔ bia‑a, a ma ma dɔsimanɛ a, min mbe wo tɛnɛ‑a. Chɛ ma ma koe a, min mbe ka ma‑a wo a, yɔ a nyɔn sima ma ma ni a kɔma a.
Chɛɛ a ni ma buɔdia a wo tena, mbɛ wo e ko yawaenɛ min dɔ bia tena, Chasi na‑a an sima ɔ bia. Chɛ ɛ ma‑a wan wo ni ma buɔdia da faenɛ ɔ, ɛ yen‑da tima min na gbasaya ɔ, dunya chɛ ɔ.
An mbe wo wɛn main‑da, an dɔ, Chisɔsi Chasi fɛ mɔɛ mu wo a, dua ɛ wo ma. Chɛ‑a a ɔ yian fan ka, Nyina gbasayaen chɛ, Yataa Nyina, ɛ gbɛ wo fɛ gban.
Ni wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ ma‑a ko yawaenɛ ɔ bia‑a, a ma ma mɔ fa ko a. A ma ma to kanka chɛ koe wɛɛ a. A yɛ to, ko yama dɔ gbɛɛ ma koe a, chɛ ma, wo da chɛ koe a mɔ dɔ mende n 'na koe ɔ.
Chɛɛ ni wo‑a ko yawaenɛ ɔ bia, Chisian koe an na, wo ma mau ɛnden bɛɛ a. Chɛɛ wo ni Yataa wai bɔ, a mu min na, wo e wan Chasi tɔɛ ko a.
Koe min na mu, Yataa 'a kaa a tɛ tee ɔ ma yansan to. A sin mbe kaa a tɛ kuu sɔ‑a mmɔ wan ma, a ta mɔɛ nu. Mɔɛ chɛ n sin, miin mbe ee don Yataa 'a sakana bai chɛndɛ kɔɔ, an ta ma ɛ chian‑da wan.
Ɛ wan yɔ Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, a ɔ, “Bauncha sɔn koe ɔ gbɛ, mɔ tandenɛ n boo ɔ. Mɔɛ chɛ n sin, miin mu Yataa sɔn bai wa an na, mmɔ ma ɔ sɔn an ta ɛ ma‑a buɛ min dɔ.”

Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo dɔ n mbe tɔɔya ɔ bia‑a wan, yɔ Yataa 'a dɔbɛnɛ‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ. Ni chɛ ma‑a, wo ni to wo chɛ chɛ wai chɛndɛ n kɔ, mbɛ wo‑a wo wandi kai fa gbae Yataa a, min‑na wo a dan. A ee a da a kuiɛ yɔn tee dɔndɔ wɛɛ.

Sanche gbɛ, bai ɛ n da a wo ko a, wo wan gbakoo nu chɔchi n dɔ. N fandi wɛɛ, n mu chɔchi gbakoo dɔndɔ an na. A sin, siiya dɔndɔ mu n na, tɔɔya chɛ ko a, Chasi na‑a min dɔ bia. N sin, n bɛɛ n mbe an basɔmaya chɛ ma sɔn‑da wan, min dɔ ɛ yen‑da. Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo wan, n bɔ chɔchi gbakoo nu, n mbe koɔ tena wo tena n faa gbɛɛ a.

Wo ni mɔɛ chɛ n kun ma fɛn chɔchi ɔ chɛndɛ chɛ, Yataa‑a miin be wo ma. Wo an kun ma fɛn wo faa gbɛɛ a, yɔ Yataa toen mu a buɛ min dɔ. Wo ma an kun ma fɛn faa ɔ nɔɛ a. Wo ma a chɛ pawa dechee an ko a. Chɛɛ wo‑a a chɛ, a chɛ koe a dia ko a.
Wo ma ma mansa n na mɔɛ chɛ n kun ma, Yataa‑a miin be wo ma an kun ma fɛn koe a. Chɛɛ wo sɔnɛ ni ma tɔmɔsi chɛndɛ a an tena, a nyin an ni bea min fɛ.
A sin, ni Chasi‑a a kunɛ a bɔ, a wɛn mu mɔɛ n kun ma fɛn mɔɛ n 'na mansa a, wo e banfua chɛ ma sɔn‑da wan, baa koo min ma. Banfua an nɛ, min mandenɛ ɛ ma‑a taun kuɔ fɔ ko a.

Wo wan mɔ tɔngbɔɛ n nan sin, a chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, a nyin wo ni kooya be chenanɛ n ma. Wo ma dɔpandaya bɔ, wo e ma wai chɛ‑a wo nyɔn ye. Koe min na mu, Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “Yataa ma to ni dɔpanda tɔɛ n na, chɛɛ ɛ koadia demanɛ chɛ‑a wan chɛ n na, miin dɔ ma panda ni.”
Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo ma dɔpandaya bɔ Yataa chen kɔɔ. Chɛ an mbe a ma‑a, a gbasa ka buɛ min dɔ, a ni wo a sɛ, a faa ma tima a.
Wo faa gbaaen mu koe miin gbɛɛ a, wo Yataa ma fɛn dechee. A gbɔsɔen mu wo ko a kaka.
Wo ma bɛndenɛ ni ma tima ɔ tima ko a, wo ya a kaenɛ ɛ. Wo chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ, Sitana, ɛ ben ben tena dau‑a, yɔ yaa ɛ ma mɔɛ yan‑da a nimisa koe a.
Wo sɔ chidi wo 'a danaya ɔ, Chasi a. Sitana ma kun wo ma. Koe min na mu, wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ wo bɔɛ miin bɛɛ kai faen mu Chasi a dunya gbɛɛ ɔ, an mbe ko yawaen dɔndɔ gbe chɛ an dɔ bia tena.

Chɛɛ wo ee tɔɔya‑a, a ɔ yansama a. Koadia demanɛ gbɛɛ, a ti mu Yataa an na. A wan‑na wo chee, wo ni ma a 'a basɔmaya kɔɔ kuɔ fɔ ko a, ni wo ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Chasi a. A wan mbe wo ma mɔɛ n na, miin dɔ gbɛ an 'na danaya ɔ, an sin mbe sɔ ɔ chidi. A wan mbe an kuu don gban.
Yataa gbasayaen mu kuɔ fɔ ni kuɔ fɔ ko a. A ni ma ka.

N mbe ka gboo kunduenɛ min nyɛn‑da wo tena, Sidasi an mbe basan tena n ma. N 'na yiinachii ɔ, suun ma nyɔɛ mu a a, Chasi ɔ, n danden mu min na chɛndɛ chɛ. N toen mu n ni wo faa n ma nande, n ni a ɔ yian to wo a, mbɛ Yataa 'a koadia demanɛ gbu ɛ wan wo ko a. Wo wo boo a chii a ma gban.
Mɔɛ miin mbe chɔchi ɔ Babidon duu ɔ, Yataa‑a a boo sɔ ka miin bɛɛ ma, an mbe wo kɔndɔn tena. Kamin tɔngbɔɛ chɛ wɛɛ, Maki, min ma‑a gbɛ n 'na denɛ a, a wɛɛ‑a wo kɔndɔn.
Ni wo bɛn‑da, wo wo nyɔn kɔndɔn koadia faa a. Yataa ɛ faachima min be, a ni ma wo ma, wo ma min chɛ‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Chasi a.

N fan, Saimɔn Pita, n fan mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena wo tena. Chisɔsi Chasi 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ mu n na, a 'a sɔ mɔɛ mu to n na. N mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena wo wan tena, wo wɛn danden mu Chasi a, yɔ nn mbe buɛ min dɔ. Mmɔ 'a Yataa mu an na, ni mmɔ baun mɔɛ, min‑na mmɔ ya mɔ tandenɛ a Yataa tena.
Yataa ni wo dua, a ni faachima ma munda wo ɔ. Koe min na mu, wo‑a a sɔn fan. A yɛ to, wo‑a mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi wɛɛ sɔn fan.

Chasi 'a gbasaya ɔ, fen kɔ fen been fan mu mmɔ ma, min mbe a ma, mmɔ ni ma mɔɛ n na, Yataa wakoe ɛ miin faa ɔ. Chɛ ɛ ma‑a koe min na, mmɔ ma‑a gbɛ Yataa sɔn mɔɛ n na. A wan Yataa an‑na mmɔ chee a tena. A‑a chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, mmɔ wɛɛ ni a 'a gbasaya ɔ daun. A yɛ to, a 'a ko chɛndɛ ma ni ma mmɔ 'a fɔɛ ɔ.

Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, a na‑a mmɔ too ɔ dia wai nyima ma kawaen ba min na, a na‑a a be wan mmɔ ma. An wai nyima chɛ ni a ma, wo kunɛ ni bɔ koe n boo ɔ, wo faa a miin ya kaka, miin mbe na kasaa a dunya chɛ ɔ. Mbɛ mmɔ sɔnɛ ta‑a Yataa ta fɛ.
Chɛ ko a, a nyin wo ni chɛ an ma, chia ɔ chia a. Danaya min mbe wo ɔ, wo a ma munda wo sɔn chɛndɛ a. Mbɛ wo‑a wo sɔn chɛndɛ ma munda yiima a, a si Yataa ma.
A yɛ to, wo wo 'a Yataa yiima ma munda wo tachɛ buɛ n na fɔɛ ɔ. Mbɛ wo‑a faabia sa wo tachɛ buɛ kun ma fɔɛ ɔ. Mbɛ wo yɛ‑a to, wo ma‑a mɔɛ n na, Yataa wakoe ɛ miin faa ɔ kaka.
Chɛ sin to, wo a wɛɛ ma munda bia chɛndɛ a, wo e min chɛ wo nyɔn na. A dankama nɛnɛ an nɛ, wo an ma munda koadia a, wo nyɔn ko a.
Ni sɔn chɛ n ma‑a wo ɔ chɛndɛ chɛ, a ɔ benden ba a, wo e mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi sɔn‑da wan chɛndɛ chɛ. Chɛ sin mbe na‑a ma‑a ko chɛndɛ an na wo 'a fɔɛ ɔ.
Chɛɛ ni sɔn chɛ n mbe ee mɔɛ min dɔ, a maen fan mu yɔ fion tɔɛ. A mɔɛ bonda chɛ sin nyina‑a, mbɛ Yataa na‑a a boo bɔ wan a 'a ko yama n dɔ, mbɛ a ma‑a mɔ chɛndɛ a.

Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, n suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo butuinɛ chɛ wo sɔɛ gbɛ a. Wo ni a ɔ yian, mbɛ Yataa‑a wo chee min chɛ, a‑a a boo min sɔ wo ma, ma koe a a ta mɔɛ n na, kuɔ fɔ koe mu. Chɛ sin mbe a ma‑a wan, wo ee sɛmbɛ‑a wo kai fa koe a Yataa a.
Chia chɛ sin na mu, wo e tea da faenɛ ma sɔn‑da ben koe a, a ta dɔndɔ gbe mmɔ 'a mansa, ni mmɔ baun mɔɛ Chisɔsi Chasi, ɛ kaina min mansaya ɔ kuɔ fɔ ko a. Yataa ɛ a boo si‑a wan wo kɔɔ.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, n mbe wo yiima n na che tena tun koe chɛ n ma. Wo‑a an tea n dɔ sɔn bɛɛ ka boo ɔ boo, min dɔ yian‑da wo a, a si Chisɔsi ma. A yɛ to, wo e a sɔ tena wan an tea chɛ fɛ gbau gbau.

N‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ n fɔɛ ɔ ma yansan to, n gboo gbama chɛ boo ka koe a. A ɛ ma‑a wan, yɔ mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, a boo kaenɛ ɛ a ma den. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, n ma fa nin bɛ ka tima min na, n‑na n yii na chii, mbɛ a nyin n ni wo yii na che koe chɛ n ma.
N mbe a ɔ yen‑da wan, n ni chia yan an to koe a wo yii ma, n faenɛ gbakɔ wɛɛ.
Nn‑na a ɔ yian fan wo a, mbɛ mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi ɛ na‑a wan gbasaya wa ɔ. Nn‑na a 'a gbasaya ɔ yen fan nn ya gbu a. Nn nii ma chɛ tɛ ni nn gboo an ma.

Koe min na mu, nn bɛ ni nɔ kɔnkɔ duaen chɛ ma, tima min na Fa Yataa‑a basɔmaya wa be mansa Chisɔsi ma. A sin, nn‑na kuiɛ chenama wa a min fan, kamaya ɔ, a ka banda bu ɔ Yataa tena. Kuiɛ chɛ ɔ, “N 'na denɛ an nɛ, a ko a di n ye kaka. N faa chimaen mu a ko a.” Nn fandi gbu an‑na kuiɛ chɛ a min, a ka banda bu ɔ.

Chɛ an fɛ mu gbɛ mmɔ gbu 'a danaya gbu ɔ gbɛa‑a gbɛ, sakana bai chɛ a, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n na‑a min dɔ yian suun. Ɛ nyan‑da wan wo ko a, ni wo‑a wo too ma sɔ a ma. Koe min na mu, ɛ wan yɔ dambo manɛ si ɔ pimbi pimbi ɔ. Ɛ ma wan man‑da aan banda ɔ ni ka, mbɛ sayi ma tɔmbuaka man‑da wo faa ɔ, min mu Chisɔsi wandi a.

Koe saa an nɛ, a nyin wo ni min dɔ gbɛ. Wo ni a ɔ gbɛ, mbɛ Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n dɔndɔ wɛɛ nii ma chɛ ma ni. An dɔndɔ wɛɛ, an na‑a Yataa 'a gboo nyɛn tima min na, an nii ma an fandi ta yiimatɛ an nyɛn ni dechee.
Koe min na mu, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n fandi an ma si ni an ni yiinachii chɛ, mbɛ an‑na bai chɛ n tɛ an gboo ma. Chɛɛ Yataa Nyina an na‑a bai chɛ n fɔ an ye, Yataa toen ni an ni min fɔ.

Chɛɛ mɔ sɛsɛ n bɛɛ bɔ‑a wan suun, Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n tɛ ɔ, an‑na fania fɔ, mbɛ Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ mu an na. A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a mu, fania kan chɛ mɔɛ n mbe bɔ‑a wo wɛɛ tɛ ɔ. An mbe fania kanɛ chɛ‑a wan, min mbe na kasaa a. An mbe mansa chɛ kɔɔsa bia wan, a wɛn‑na an kun ka. Chɛ sin fan mbe a ma‑a, an ni na kasaa a an fandi kun ma.
Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, mɔ sɛsɛ n mbe bea‑a wan an fɛ, an mbe ma‑a an 'na fɔɛ yama chɛ ɔ. An sɔn chɛ sin fan mbe a ma, mɔɛ n mbe bai yama sa chɛ n ma, miin mbe sɔ ɔ Yataa 'a tea chia ma.

Fania kan chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n fen ko yaen mu kaka. Chɛ an mbe a ma, an mbe tai n dɔ bɛn bɛn a fɔ koe a wo ye, min mbe na tɔnɔnɛ a an tena. Chɛɛ Yataa wɛn mbe kaa a tɛ tena an bakoe ma, a ni an tɔɔ, a ɔ mɛen mu gbɛ, a ma bɛndenɛ ɛ. A sin mbe an kasaa tena wan, a ee chinɔɛ ɔ ɛnden bɛɛ a.
Mmɔ‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ Yataa nii ma maeka chɛ n boo ka ni, miin na‑a ko yama ma. Chɛɛ a na‑a an na dɛ wan ta ɔ. An chiienɛ ɛ wan nɔ yɔɔɛ a, kaina ɔ pimbienɛ ɔ, an mbe an gbɛmbo tee ma kɔnɛ a.

Mmɔ‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ Yataa nii ma mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ to ni nɔ, miin ni suun. A na‑a an na mɔnɛ wan yii fa a, an fan Yataa sɔn bai chɛ nu. A na‑a mɔ wɔnfea an fan kunɛ bɔ a ɔ, a basan Nowa a, min ni mɔɛ n kan an ni tan Yataa tena.

Yataa na‑a kaa a tɛ wan mɔɛ chɛ n ba koe ma, a‑a an tɔɔya, mɔɛ miin ni Sɔdɔn an fea Komoa duu wa chɛ n dɔ. A na‑a an kasaa wan ta a. A na‑a an ma wan tɔmɔsi a, a si koe min mbe na‑a ma‑a mɔɛ chɛ n na, Yataa sɔn bai chɛ nu.
Yataa ni mɔ yama chɛ n kasaa tena tima min na, a na‑a kai Dɔti kun bɔ wan a ɔ suun. Dɔti chɛ ni mɔ chɛndɛ an na, a sin faa na‑a yɔn fan, tima min na an mɔɛ chɛ n ni ko yama yama chɛ n ma tena.
Kai chɛndɛ chɛ ni suun mɔ yama chɛ n tɛ ɔ wan, a sin nii a dia an sɔn yama an boo ɔ su ɔ tee a. A ni an sɔnɛ miin dɔ yen, a ni miin na min, faamɔnɛ wa ni a ma.
Chɛɛ Mansa Yataa an kosan kɛn gbɛ mɔɛ n kun bɔ‑a ko gbɛama n dɔ, mɔɛ miin mbe a ko a. A sin fan kosan to mɔɛ n chɛ‑a tɔɔya kɔɔ, aan gbɛmbo tee ma, mɔɛ miin sɔnɛ yau.

A gbu sin mbe ma‑a ka wan an na, miin boo chɛenɛ ɛ ko tɛ ɔ, an sin gbɔsɔ ma, mbɛ Yataa 'a gbasaya ɛ wan nɔ. Fania kan chɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu, chianɛ ee ka miin ya a, an toen mu koe min na, an mbe an ma. An mbe ee basɔmaya be an ma, gbasaya ɛ miin boo ɔ banda bu ɔ. Chɛɛ an mbe an main fan.
Maeka n gbu wɛɛ, gbasaya wa ɛ miin boo ɔ, a ben fania kan chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n ma, an maeka chɛ n mbe ee main chɛ Mansa Yataa chen kɔɔ.

Chɛɛ fania kan chɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu, koe min mbe na an yii ma, an mbe an ma. An maen mu yɔ fia ɔ soe nu, an bia koe a, mbɛ an fa‑a. An mbe mankan fan ko ɔ ko manyin koe a, ni an ma min dɔ gbɛ ni. An mbe kasaa‑a wan, yɔ fia ɔ soe nu.

An mbe mɔnɛ ɔ yen‑da wan, an na‑a a ma min chɛ mɔ dɔ mende n na mɔnɛ ɔ bia. Koe min na di an ye, an nɛ koe chɛ n ma koe a tee a den, koe miin mu an gboo faa ma koe a. An mu mau an na, a basan popoya a, wo bɛ ɛ ma daunɛ chɛ‑a an na. Koe min na mu, su ɔ tee a an boo ɛ ma an 'na da mau koe chɛ n fan dɔ.

An mbe ee musu ma fɛn gbama a, ni an ma an yii na chii ni ta koe ma a sofa a. An faa ee chima ko yama ma koe a. An mbe a ma wan mɔɛ chɛ n ni chɛɛ gbai a, mɔɛ miin yiima ɔ dɔɔ. An‑na an fandi kan fan to koe a fen kɔ fen na, an sin mbe ma‑a danka tɔɛ n fan na.

An ka‑a tea chia ma fion fion, an mbe gbɛ an kun fan ye. An beaen mu gbɛ Badaan na chia an fɛ, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛ, min ni kai Bɛɔ 'a denɛ a. Badaan nii ma a gbɔsɔ ni ko yama ma koe a, ni a‑a kɔpɔɛ an ma sɔn dechee.
Chɛɛ a 'a sofɛ na‑a a ma wan, a sɛmbɛ a wooya ko bonda chɛ ma koe a. Sofɛ chɛ na‑a koɔ wan a tena, mɔ gbu kuiɛ ɔ, mbɛ a‑a a ma tɔɔ an kun dɔ ban koe chɛ n ko a.
An mɔɛ chɛ nu, mɔ a tenden ma an na, yɔ yii mɛsɛ mɛsɛ nu, ni an gbaa‑a. An maenɛ ɛ to yɔ banda gbii, fia wa ɛ ben min na. Yataa‑a kaina ɔ bɛn an ko a, pimbi pimbi wa ɔ.

An mbe bai n fɔ wan, yiimatɛ ee miin dɔ, dɔpandaya bai nu. An mbe koe yama n ma to, miin na di an gboo n ye. An mbe chɛ n ma, mɔɛ chɛ n bia koe an na, mɔɛ chɛ miin‑na a kuu sɔ an kunɛ bɔ‑a an ko yama chɛ n dɔ.

An mbe mɔɛ n too ɔ dia, mbɛ an mbe yuu tɛ‑a wan an ma. Chɛɛ an fandi gbu mu yɔnɛ an na, sɔn yama n boo ɔ, min mbe an kasaa tena. Koe min na mu, fen kɔ fen min kun‑da gbɛ mɔɛ ma, a ma‑a yɔnɛ a an fen chɛ boo ɔ.

Mɔɛ n‑na a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ mmɔ baun mɔɛ, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi an mbe mmɔ baun. Chɛ‑a a ma, an kun bɔ‑a an 'na ko yama n dɔ, dunya chɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ an ma yɛ to an 'na ko yama kun ma, a ni kun an ma dɔgbɔ. Ni chɛ ma‑a, ɛ yaua‑a wan an mɔ bonda chɛ n ko a tee dankama tee ma, a ni ben a kuu sɔ tena ma.
A ni nyan‑da wan an ko a, ni an nii ma chia sɔn ni, an mbe tan buɛ min dɔ Yataa tena. Chɛɛ ni an‑na a sɔn, mbɛ an‑na an kan kɔ sɔ Yataa 'a sawa duaenɛ a, a yau an ko a.
Koe chɛ min sin ma‑a ka an na, a ɔ yiandenɛ an nɛ, mbɛ tai min na‑a tɛ suun, tea mu. Tai gbu ɔ, mbɛ wuu an mbe yɛ a fɔnɔɛ daun‑da. A ɔ, kɔɛnya wɛɛ ɛ yɛ wan to a ma chemen chemen‑da, a koenɛ gbakɔ.
N dia nyɔɛ nu, gboo fean bɔɛ an nɛ, n‑na min nyɛn gbɛ wo tena. Gboo fea chɛ n dɔ, n mbe wo yiima a che tena wan koe chɛ n ma chɛndɛ chɛ, wo ni ma wo yii na chii‑a an ma.

N toen mu wo ni wo yii na chii bai chɛ n ma, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n na‑a miin fɔ suun. Wo ni wo yii na chii to sawa chɛ ma, Mansa Chisɔsi‑a min be, mmɔ baun mɔɛ. A sin, a 'a sɔ mɔɛ n na‑a an sawa chɛ a ben fan wo tena.

Koe saa saa gbu, a nyin wo ni min dɔ sɔn an nɛ. Mbɛ tee dankama nɛnɛ chɛ n kɔɔ, Chisɔsi Chasi e na to na‑a, mɔɛ n mbe na‑a wan wo tɛ ɔ, miin mu yɔnɛ n na. An mu yɔnɛ n na, an 'na fɔɛ ɔ, an faa ma koe yama n boo ɔ. An mbe wo ma yɛn‑da wan.

An mbe a fɔ‑a wan, an dɔ, Chasi na koe min mbe a ɔ, an dɔ, an gbu ee a yen. An dɔ, chɛ an to‑a ka ɔ aan, an dɔ, an bemba n ta bemba n ka‑a banda kun ma. An dɔ, chɛɛ ko ɔ ko ma ka ni a gba kun ma, an dɔ, kɛn dunya a dan tima ma.
An mɔɛ chɛ n ma to ni dan koe a a a, mbɛ duu gboo fea banda chɛ a, Yataa da a bai an‑na a ma an na dan‑da suun. Mbɛ duu gboo bɔ‑a yii an dɔ, an nyanden mu yii an na.
A sin, mbɛ yii ni to, yii wa min na‑a dunya gbɛɛ ya, min na‑a dunya kɔma kasaa.

Chɛɛ mmɔ ta duu gboo chɛ wɛɛ, a fea banda chɛ a, Yataa da a bai dɔndɔ gbe chɛ an‑na a ma an mbe nɔ. A wan Yataa dɔndɔ gbe chɛ, ɛ an kun ma fɛn tena, min mbe a ma, ta ni danka an kasaa‑a. An mbe nɔ tee chɛ an ma kɔn koe a, Yataa sɔn bai chɛ nu, kaa a ɛ tɛ‑a an ma tee min na, an ni kasaa.
Chɛɛ n dia nyɔɛ nu, wo ma nyina ko dɔndɔɛ chɛ ma. Mbɛ tee tɛ bɔ ee Mansa Yataa tena. Tee dɔndɔɛ fea san wu dɔndɔ a, fen dɔndɔ gbe an nɛ a chen kɔɔ.

Ɛ mɔɛ dɔ n yii ma, mbɛ Mansa Yataa a nɛnchɛnden fan mu, a da a kuiɛ bɔ koe a a. Chɛɛ ɛ a faa bia wan dechee wo a, tima be koe a wo ma, wo ni wo kan kɔ sɔ wo 'a ko yama n na. Koe min na mu, a ma to ni wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ ni kasaa ma sɔn.

Chɛɛ Mansa Chisɔsi na tima, ɛ ma‑a wan tɛnɛ koe a, yɔ kanka ɛ na buɛ min dɔ. A tee chɛ ma, kuiɛ mau mau ɛ ka‑a wan banda a, mbɛ banda ee ma‑a to dunya ɔ. Ta ɛ tɛ‑a wan fen kɔ fen dɔ min mbe banda a, mbɛ an kasaa‑a. A sin duu gboo wɛɛ, ni fen kɔ fen min mbe a ma, an gbɛɛ ee ma‑a to dunya ɔ.
Fen kɔ fen sin gbu, ɛ na tena kasaa‑a ka buɛ min dɔ, a nyin wo ni a ɔ sɔn, ni wo e ma‑a mɔɛ miin nyɔn sima n na. Wo ma tenchen Yataa ko a, wo ni wo fɔɛ gbɛɛ be a ma.

Wo e ma‑a Yataa 'a tee chɛ ma kɔn‑da, wo a faa ma koe n ma, min mbe a ma, an tee ni fua che‑a. An tee chɛ ma, fenɛ miin gbɛɛ ɛ banda a, an mbe kasaa‑a wan, mbɛ an minda‑a. Win ba dɛgbɛ wɛɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, an fen chɛ n ni kunɛ banda a yɔ tu.
Chɛɛ Yataa na‑a mmɔ too ɔ dia min chɛ, mmɔ ɛ an ma kɔn tena. A‑a tooɔdia chɛ wan dunya nama be koe ma. A sin, an dunya nama chɛ ɔ, mɔɛ n tandenɛ ɛ ma‑a wan nɔ Yataa tena.
N dia nyɔɛ nu, chɛ an fɛ mu, wo e ka an tee chɛ ma kɔnɛ min chɛ a, wo wo wandi bia chɛndɛ chɛ. Tɔmbɛ ma ma wo ma, wo sin ni ma faachima ɔ Yataa a.

Chɛ an fɛ mu, faabia chɛ, mmɔ 'a mansa‑a min chɛ, wo a ya ka buɛ chɛ ɔ. Mbɛ ɛ ka tima an be‑a mɔɛ n ma, bauncha ma sɔn koe a. Ɛ wan dechee yɔ mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ Pɔɔ, min ko a di mmɔ ye, a na‑a min nyɛn wo tena. Yataa sin na‑a yiimatɛ min chɛ a ɔ, a na‑a an na wai ka.

A sin mbe bai fɔ tena, a si an ko dɔndɔ gbe chɛ ma, a 'a gboo n dɔ. Kaina dɔ n mbe wan a 'a gboo nyɛnden chɛ ɔ, miin dɔ gbɛɛ an dɔ gbɛ koe a. Ko sɔn bai nu, mɔɛ miin yiima ɔ basan basandenɛ ɛ, an mbe a ɔ yian fan fania chia a, yɔ an mbe a ma buɛ min dɔ Yataa bai dɔ gbɛɛ n bɛɛ a. Chɛ sin mbe a ma wan, an mbe an fandi kasaa‑a.

Chɛɛ n dia nyɔɛ nu, wo tana, wo‑a chɛ ɔ sɔn fan gbɛ. Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo wo kun ma fɛn, sawa sɔn bai chɛ n ma na a ma, wo ni saman, mbɛ wo ka‑a chia ma. An ni a ma, wo ni bea, a bɔ wo sɔ tena chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ.
Chɛɛ koadia demanɛ, a kun ma ni sa wo tena. A yɛ to, yiima min mbe wo ɔ, a si mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi ma, mmɔ baun mɔɛ, a kun ma ni sa. Tando ni ma a tɔɛ ma sanche, ni kuɔ fɔ ko a. A ni ma ka.

Nn mbe gboo chɛ min nyɛn tena ka, a sien mu mɔɛ chɛ an ma, an mbe min chee, an dɔ, Bai, min tɔ mu to Fɔɛ. A ni wan nɔ dunya a dan‑da tima min na. Nn‑na a yen fan nn ya a pɛnɛnɛ, nn‑na a kuiɛ a min, nn sin tindi tindi‑a wan nn nyɔn ma.

A wɛn tɔ mu ka Fɔɛ, a na‑a kɛn dunya chɛ ɔ, a ma na ni nun dɔ. Nn gbɛɛ, nn‑na a yen fan, nn sin mbe koe ɔ yian fan, a si a ma. Mbɛ nn‑na a wakoe ɔ yian wo a, a wɛn mu kuɔ fɔ Fɔɛ a. An fea ni mmɔ Fa Yataa a, a sin fan‑na a yian nn na.

Nn‑na koe min dɔ yen, nn‑na min na min nn too a, nn mbe ka an dɔ yian‑da wo a. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, mmɔ ni ma kuiɛ dɔndɔɛ ɔ, yɔ nn mbe buɛ min dɔ kuiɛ dɔndɔya ɔ, nn bɛ mmɔ Fa Yataa a, an fea a 'a denɛ Chisɔsi Chasi a.
Nn mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena wo tena, min mbe a ma, nn 'na buɔdia da ni fa gban.
Nn‑na sakana bai chɛ an na min a a, nn mbe ka min dɔ yian‑da wo a, mbɛ Yataa mu manɛ an na. Ko kan kɔ kan mbe ee an tɛ, an fea pimbi a.
Ni mmɔ‑a a fɔ, mbɛ mmɔ bɛ an mbe gbɛ a a kuiɛ dɔndɔɛ ɔ, chɛɛ mmɔ ɛ a a tun‑da tachɛ koe a pimbi ɔ, mmɔ ɛ ma‑a ka fania an fɔ‑a. Mmɔ sin mbe ee ma‑a ka tea koe ɔ.

Chɛɛ Yataa ɛ manɛ an dɔ. An fɛ mu, ni mmɔ wɛɛ tachɛ‑a a 'a man chɛ kɔɔ, mmɔ ɛ ma‑a wan kuiɛ dɔndɔɛ ɔ, mmɔ nyɔn na. A yɛ to, Yataa 'a denɛ Chisɔsi wii min bɔ‑a, ɛ mmɔ ko‑a wan, a bɔ mmɔ 'a ko yama n gbɛɛ n dɔ.
Chɛɛ ni mmɔ‑a a fɔ, mbɛ mmɔ ma ko yama ma ni, mmɔ‑a fania fɔ mmɔ wandi ma, a sin, tea ee mmɔ ɔ.
Chɛɛ ni mmɔ dɔn‑da a ma, mbɛ mmɔ‑a ko yama ma wan, Yataa danayaen mu, ɛ na‑a tea koe an ma‑a. Ɛ a boo bɔ‑a wan mmɔ 'a ko yama n dɔ, mbɛ a‑a mmɔ ko mmɔ 'a ko yama n gbɛɛ n dɔ, mmɔ ni gbɛ fo.
Ni mmɔ‑a a fɔ, mbɛ mmɔ ma ko yama kan kɔ kan ma nin bɛ, mmɔ ɛ ma‑a ka a fɔ an na, mbɛ Yataa ma teaya ni. A sin, a da a bai ee si tena sɔn‑da mmɔ faa ɔ.

N 'na denɛ nu, n mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena wo tena, min mbe a ma, wo ma na dɛ ko yama ɔ. Chɛɛ ni mmɔ dɔndɔ wɛɛ dɛen fan mu gbɛ ko yama ɔ, mɔɛ ɛ wan mmɔ boo ɔ, min mbe koɔ mmɔ Fa Yataa tena mmɔ ko a. A mɔɛ chɛ mu Chisɔsi Chasi an na, a wɛn tanden mu Yataa tena gbeden.
Chisɔsi chɛ an ma‑a yasi a mmɔ 'a ko yama n ko a. A sin, mmɔ 'a ko yama n dechee ko a ma, chɛɛ dunya gbɛɛ 'a ko yama n ko a.
Ni mmɔ dɔn‑da Yataa 'a sawa n na tachɛ koe a, yɔ ɛ a fɔ‑a buɛ min dɔ mmɔ ye, mbɛ mmɔ‑a a ɔ gbɛ, mbɛ mmɔ‑a a sɔn fan.
Mɔɛ min mbe a fɔ‑a, a ɔ, a‑a Yataa sɔn fan, chɛɛ a ee Yataa 'a sawa n na tachɛ‑a a gbee a, ɛ ma‑a ka fania an fɔ‑a, tea kan kɔ kan mbe ee a da ɔ.
Chɛɛ ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a da a kuiɛ a min, an mɔɛ chɛ an mu mɔɛ a, min toen mu Yataa a tea tea ko a. Mmɔ ɛ a ɔ sɔn‑da ka wan, mbɛ mmɔ ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Yataa a.
Mɔ ɔ mɔ, min mbe a fɔ‑a, mbɛ an ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Yataa a, a ni sɔ Chisɔsi chen gba ɔ.

N dia nyɔɛ nu, n mbe ee ka sawa nama an nyɛn tena wo tena, chɛɛ sawa kɔma mu. Wo boo ɔ sawa kɔma dɔndɔ gbe chɛ nu mu, a ka sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a min tima saa saa ma. Sawa kɔma chɛ mu sakana bai chɛ an na, wo na‑a min na min tee.

Chɛɛ chɛ ni ma wɛɛ, n‑na sawa min nyɛn ka wo tena, sawa nama mu to a a. Tea gbu sin ko a, mɔ ɛ a yen fan Chisɔsi ɔ, a basan wo wɛɛ a. A mu min na, pimbi ɛ ka gbɛ ben fan na, a sin, Yataa 'a manɛ bun‑da a yian‑da.
Mɔ ɔ mɔ min‑na a wandi ya, mbɛ ɛ Yataa 'a manɛ kɔɔ wan, chɛɛ a tooenɛ a suun ma nyɔɛ a, ɛ ka pimbi an dɔ tun tun.
Chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ min toen mu a suun ma nyɔɛ a, ɛ ka Yataa 'a manɛ an kɔɔ. A sin, ko ɔ ko ee a faa ɔ, min mbe a ma, a ni bea.
Chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ min tooen mu a suun ma nyɔɛ a, ɛ ka pimbi ɔ wan, ɛ tachɛ chɛ‑a pimbi ɔ, a ta chia toenɛ ɔ a boo ɔ. Koe min na mu, pimbi chɛ‑a a ma, a ee che kaina yen‑da.
N 'na denɛ nu, n mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena wo tena, koe min na mu, Yataa‑a a boo bɔ wo 'a ko yama n dɔ Chisɔsi ko a.

Wo wɛn mu chenanɛ n na, n mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena wo tena, koe min na mu, wo‑a mɔɛ chɛ sɔn fan, a wɛn mbe nɔ dunya a dan tima a. Wo wɛn mu den tɔngbɔɛ n na, n mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena wo tena, koe min na mu, wo‑a Sitana a bea.

N 'na denɛ nu, n mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena wo tena, koe min na mu, wo‑a Fa Yataa sɔn. Wo wɛn mu chenanɛ n na, n mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena wo tena, koe min na mu, wo‑a mɔɛ chɛ sɔn fan, a wɛn mbe nɔ dunya a dan tima a. Wo wɛn mu den tɔngbɔɛ n na, n mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena wo tena, koe min na mu, faa ɛ wo ɔ Yataa ko a. A sin, Yataa 'a bai ee ka wo yii ma. A yɛ to, wo‑a Sitana a bea.
Wo ma to dunya yama chɛ a, wo ma to fen yama n na a ɔ. Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ to‑a dunya chɛ a, a ee che to‑a Fa Yataa a.

Mɔ gbu 'a yonka wa gbɛɛ, ɛ bɔ dunya chɛ ɔ wan. Mɔ gbu faa ma koe yama n bɛɛ, a basan to koe a fen fen na, mɔ gbu ya ɛ min yen. Chɛ dɔndɔ wɛɛ ma Fa Yataa faa ma ko a. Chɛ gbɛɛ, an mu dechee dunya ma koe n fan na.
Ban fenɛ mu dunya chɛ a, a basan dunya ma koe n bɛɛ a. Chɛɛ mɔɛ min mbe Yataa faa ma koe ma‑a, ɛ kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da wan.

N 'na denɛ nu, mmɔ ɛ ka gbɛ tee dankama tee an kɔɔ, Chisɔsi Chasi na koe a to. A na‑a a fɔ wan wo ye, mbɛ Chasi chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ ɛ na tena wan, ɛ bɔ‑a mɔ gbu n tɛ ɔ wan. Sanche chɛ ɔ, a chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ n‑na an kun na bɔ. Chɛ an mbe a ɔ yian mmɔ a, mbɛ tee dankama tee che‑a.

Mɔɛ chɛ n ni wan dechee mmɔ tɛ ɔ, chɛɛ mmɔ yiima nii dɔndɔ an na. Chɛ an‑na a ma, an ka‑a mmɔ fɛ, an ta‑a. Ni mmɔ yiima ni wan dɔndɔ gbe, an nii ka‑a mmɔ fɛ. Chɛɛ an ka‑a min chɛ‑a mmɔ fɛ, chɛ‑a a ɔ yian fan ka, mbɛ mmɔ yiima nii kaina dɔndɔ.
Chɛɛ wo tana, Chisɔsi‑a a ma, Yataa Nyina ɛ wo fɛ, min‑na a ma, wo gbɛɛ‑a tea sɔn.

N mbe gboo chɛ nyɛnɛ min chɛ tena wo tena, n mbe ee a fɔ tena wan ka, mbɛ wo ma tea sɔn. Koe min na mu, wo‑a a sɔn fan. A sin to, wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan to, mbɛ fania kan kɔ kan mbe ee che a ma‑a, wo ni ka tea chia chɛ ma.
Fania fɔ mɔɛ, a mu mɔɛ chɛ an na, min mbe kɔɔ sa bia chɛ, mbɛ Chisɔsi an ma Chasi a, kunka mansa. An mɔ bonda chɛ an mu Chasi chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ a, mɔɛ min mbe ban Fa Yataa ɔ, an fea a 'a denɛ a.
Koe min na mu, ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ban‑da Yataa 'a denɛ ɔ, a mɔɛ chɛ ban‑da ka Fa Yataa wandi an dɔ. Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a boo si Yataa 'a denɛ kɔɔ, a‑a a boo si ka Fa Yataa wandi wɛɛ an kɔɔ.
Wo‑a min na min, a ka sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a min tima saa saa ma, wo a sa wo faa ɔ. Ni wo‑a an sa wo faa ɔ, wo e ma‑a wan mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Yataa 'a denɛ a, an fea Fa Yataa a.
A‑a mmɔ too ɔ dia chɛ an na, kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ.
N mbe bai chɛ n gbɛɛ nyɛn tena wo tena, a sien mu mɔɛ chɛ n fan ma, miin toen mu an ni wo bun.

Chɛɛ wo tana, Chisɔsi ban‑da Yataa Nyina a yii‑a, ma koe a wo fɛ. Tima min na mu wɛ, Yataa Nyina ɛ wo fɛ, mɔ dɔ mende ma gbɔsɔ ee wɛ wo ma, wo kan koe a. Koe min na mu, Yataa Nyina chɛ, an mbe wo kan tena ko kan kɔ kan ma. A sin tea mu, fania kan kɔ kan ma. Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo wo boo a chii, ma koe a mɔ dɔndɔya chɛ ɔ Chisɔsi a, yɔ Yataa Nyina chɛ‑a wo kan min na.
N 'na denɛ nu, tea ko a, wo wo boo a chii, ma koe a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, wo bɛ a a. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, mmɔ kunɛ kɔɔ sɔenɛ ni ma a tena, mmɔ ee na‑a mmɔ ya kɔɔɛ nun‑da a ma tima chɛ a, ɛ na‑a to tima min na.
Wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ Chisɔsi tanden fan mu Yataa tena. A sin mbe nyan fan gbɛ, wo ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ min tanden mu, Yataa 'a denɛ mu a a.

Wo a yen bɛ, Fa Yataa‑a koadia wa min nyɔn sima yian mmɔ a. Koe min na mu, a‑a a ma, an mbe mmɔ chee Yataa 'a denɛ n na. A sin gbu, Yataa 'a denɛ mu mmɔ a. Koe min‑na a ma, dunya ma mmɔ sɔn Yataa 'a denɛ n na, a nii ma Yataa wandi gbu sɔn.

N dia nyɔɛ nu, Yataa 'a denɛ mu gbɛ mmɔ a. A sin, mmɔ ma chɛ ɔ gbɛ nin bɛ, mmɔ ɛ ma‑a buɛ min dɔ ya ɔ ma. Chɛɛ mmɔ‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ ni Chisɔsi na‑a to, mmɔ ɛ ma‑a wan yɔ a wan. Koe min na mu, mmɔ ɛ a ma gbɛ‑a wan gbadan, yɔ ɛ buɛ min dɔ.
A sin, mɔ ɔ mɔ, danaya chɛ ɛ min dɔ a ko a, a mɔɛ chɛ ee dɔn a ni a boo chɛ ko yama kan kɔ kan dɔ. Koe min na mu, Chisɔsi ee a boo chɛ ko yama ɔ.
Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe ko yama ma, Yataa 'a sawa yɔn mɔɛ mu. Koe min na mu, ko yama ma, a mu Yataa 'a sawa yɔnɛ an na.
Chɛɛ wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ Chisɔsi na‑a, min mbe a ma, a ni tɔɔya ka mmɔ kun ma, mmɔ 'a ko yama n ko a. A sin tana, a ma ko yama kan kɔ kan ma ni.
Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mu mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, an fea Chisɔsi a, a mɔɛ chɛ ee ko yama ma a tun. Chɛɛ ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a boo a chii ko yama ma koe ma, a mɔɛ chɛ ma Chisɔsi yen nin bɛ a yiima ɔ, a gbu sin ma a sɔn.
N 'na denɛ nu, wo tima ya, mɔɛ n ma na wo bun. Mɔɛ min mbe tea koe ma, mɔ tandenɛ mu an na Yataa tena, yɔ Chisɔsi tanden mu buɛ min dɔ.

Sitana ɛ wan ko yama ma‑a tun, a ka dunya kuu sɔ tima ma. Chɛ an fɛ mu, mɔɛ chɛ min mbe a boo a chii‑a ko yama ma, Sitana 'a mɔɛ mu. Yataa 'a denɛ sin na‑a, min mbe a ma, a ni an Sitana 'a wai a fasan.
Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mu Yataa 'a denɛ a, a ee ko yama ma bia a boo fea a. Koe min na mu, Yataa wandi Nyina ɛ wan a fɛ. A sin, a ee a a tun‑da ko yama ma koe a. Koe min na mu, a ma‑a gbɛ Yataa 'a denɛ a.
Yataa 'a denɛ nu, ni Sitana 'a denɛ nu, mmɔ ɛ na tena an tɛ bɔɛ sɔn‑da ka wan. Mɔɛ min mbe ee tan‑da, Yataa 'a den ma a mɔɛ chɛ a, n mbe ee baa mɔɛ chɛ ma, min ma to ni a suun ma nyɔɛ a.
Wo na‑a min na min, tima min na wo na‑a sakana bai chɛ a min a saa saa a, an nɛ, mbɛ mmɔ ni to mmɔ nyɔn na.
Mmɔ ma ma yɔ mɔna chɛ, Ken, Sitana 'a mɔɛ, min‑na a dɔ kaima fa. A‑a chɛ ma koe min na, a na‑a a ɔ yen fan, mbɛ a ta chɛ chɛ wai nii ma nyin, chɛɛ a dɔɛ tanden fan ni Yataa tena.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, n suun ma nyɔɛ nu, a ma ma wo ma tɛnɛ ma koe a, ni dunya chɛ ɔ mɔɛ n too‑a wo wɛɛ a.
Ni mmɔ to‑a mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ n na, ɛ a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ mmɔ bɔ‑a saya 'a gbasaya kɔɔ, mmɔ‑a kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn. Chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ min ma to ni a suun ma nyɔɛ a, a mɔɛ chɛ ɛ wɛ tun saya 'a gbasaya an kɔɔ.
Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe too‑a a suun ma nyɔɛ a, mɔ fa mɔɛ mu a a. A sin, wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ mɔ fa mɔ kan kɔ kan, a ee kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn.
Chisɔsi Chasi‑a a fɔɛ be wan mmɔ ko a. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, mmɔ‑a a ɔ sɔn koadia mu fenɛ min nyɔn sima a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ wɛɛ, a nyin fan mmɔ ni mmɔ wandi be mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ n ko a.
Mɔ ɔ mɔ min boo cheen mu deman chɛ koe a, a ni a suun ma nyɔɛ deman, min ya kɔɔ tawaen mu. Chɛɛ ni a‑a a faa a kɔɔ a suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ ma, a ee che a fɔ‑a, mbɛ a toen fan mu Yataa a a faa ɔ.
N 'na denɛ nu, mmɔ 'a koadia, a ma ma dechee bai n na, mmɔ ɛ miin fɔ. A ni ma tea koadia a, min dɔ ɛ yian mmɔ chɛ chɛ wai an dɔ.
Ni mmɔ‑a a ma ka, an mbe a ɔ yian‑da, mbɛ tea ɛ wan mmɔ ɔ. An mbe a ma‑a, mmɔ faa ee gbaa, mmɔ ɛ ma‑a Yataa chen kɔɔ,
mmɔ faa gbaaenɛ ni ma wɛɛ, mmɔ 'a ko yama n ko a. Yataa benden mu mmɔ 'a ko yama n ma, a sin‑na ko ɔ ko sɔn fan.
N dia nyɔɛ nu, ni mmɔ ma ma ni faagbaa ɔ, mmɔ 'a ko yama ko a, mmɔ kunɛ kɔɔ sɔenɛ ɛ ma‑a wan Yataa chen kɔɔ.
A sin, mmɔ ɛ fen kɔ fen sɔn‑da wan, mmɔ ɛ min dɔ tisa‑a a ma. Koe min na mu, mmɔ ɛ a da a kuiɛ ma, a sin, mmɔ ɛ a faa ma koe ma.
A sin, a 'a sawa gbu an nɛ, mbɛ mmɔ ni mmɔ kai fa a 'a denɛ Chisɔsi Chasi a. A yɛ to, mmɔ ni to mmɔ nyɔn na, yɔ a 'a sawa‑a min fɔ mmɔ ye.

Mɔɛ miin mbe Yataa da a kuiɛ ma, an mbe ma wan mɔ dɔndɔya ɔ a a. A sin, Yataa wɛɛ, ɛ ma wan mɔ dɔndɔya ɔ an na. Mmɔ sin mbe a ɔ sɔn ka wan, mbɛ Yataa ɛ wan mmɔ dɔndɔya ɔ mmɔ a. Mmɔ ɛ a ɔ sɔn fan, koe min na mu, a Nyina ɛ mmɔ fɛ.

N dia nyɔɛ nu, wo ma dan mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a, miin mbe a fɔ‑a, mbɛ Yataa Nyina ɛ wan an fɛ. Wo an mɔɛ chɛ n fɔ bai ma mɛn pɛn, min mbe a ma, wo ni a ɔ sɔn, ni Yataa Nyina an mbe an fɛ tea ko a. Wo chɛ ma, koe min na mu, fania fɔ mɔɛ n sɛsɛ fasanden mu a ɔ, an mbe an fandi ya‑a Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n na.
Wo e kun‑da ka wan wo ni a ɔ sɔn, ni Yataa Nyina an mbe an fɛ. Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe a fɔ‑a fanka ɔ den, mbɛ Chisɔsi Chasi na‑a wan dunya chɛ ɔ mɔgbuya ɔ, Yataa Nyina an mbe a fɛ.

Chɛɛ ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a kɔɔsa bia chɛ chɛ ma, Yataa 'a Nyina ee a fɛ. A ta nyina chɛ nɛnɛ, an mbe ma mɔɛ chɛ n fɛ, miin mu Chasi chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ n na. Wo na‑a a mɔɛ chɛ nyɔn sima n na koe a min fan. A sin gbu na‑a. Sanche chɛ wɛɛ ɔ, ɛ nɛ dunya ɔ.
Chɛɛ wo tana, n 'na denɛ nu, wo e Yataa an ko a. A sin, wo kun‑da an fania mɔɛ chɛ n ma, koe min na mu, Yataa Nyina min mbe wo fɛ, a benden mu chɛ ma, min mbe dunya chɛ ma.
Dunya chɛ ɔ mɔɛ mu an na. Chɛ an‑na a ma, an mbe dunya chɛ ma bai n fan sa, a sin, dunya chɛ ɛ a too ma sɔ wan an ma.

Chɛɛ nn tana, nn mbe Yataa an ko a. Chia chɛ a mu, mmɔ ɛ tɛ bɔɛ sɔn mɔɛ ma, Yataa Nyina min mbe tea ɔ yian, ɛ min fɛ, an tɛ mɔɛ a, fania fɔ nyina gbama ɛ min fɛ. Mɔ ɔ mɔ min‑na Yataa sɔn, ɛ a too ma sɔ wan nn ma. Chɛɛ mɔɛ min mbe ee Yataa ko a, a mɔɛ chɛ ee a too ma sɔ nn ma.
N dia nyɔɛ nu, mmɔ a tun to koe a mmɔ nyɔn na, koe min na mu, koadia kaen mu Yataa an na. A sin, mɔ ɔ mɔ min to‑a a bɔɛ a, a mɔɛ chɛ mu Yataa 'a denɛ an na, a sin‑na Yataa sɔn fan.
Mɔ ɔ mɔ min ma to ni a bɔɛ a, a ma Yataa sɔn. Koe min na mu, Yataa mu koadia Yataa an na.
Yataa 'a koadia, a na‑a a ɔ yian ka wan mmɔ a. A na‑a a 'a den dɔndɔ gbe a na wan dunya chɛ ɔ, min mbe a ma, mmɔ ni kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn.
An ma a fɔ ni, mbɛ mmɔ wan to‑a Yataa a, chɛɛ a wan to‑a dechee mmɔ a. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, a wan Yataa, a‑a a 'a den chɛ a na, a ni ma yasi a mmɔ 'a ko yama n ko a. Koadia chɛ mu chɛ an na.
N dia nyɔɛ nu, ni Yataa toen mu ka wan mmɔ a, mbɛ mmɔ wɛɛ, mmɔ ɛ to wan mmɔ nyɔn na.
Kɛn gba, mɔ ɔ mɔ ma Yataa yen nin bɛ. Chɛɛ ni mmɔ to‑a mmɔ nyɔn na, mbɛ mmɔ ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Yataa a. A sin, a 'a koadia kuu, a si‑a mmɔ faa ɔ chɛndɛ chɛ.
Yataa sin‑na a Nyina be wan mmɔ ma, a ni ma mmɔ fɛ. Chɛ an mbe a ɔ yian, mbɛ mmɔ ɛ wan mɔ dɔndɔya ɔ Yataa a, a sin, a wɛɛ ɛ wan mɔ dɔndɔya ɔ mmɔ a.
A yɛ to, Fa Yataa‑a a 'a denɛ a na wan, min mbe a ma, a ni dunya kun ka. Nn‑na chɛ ɔ yen fan nn ya a, a sin, nn mbe koe ɔ yian fan, a si a ma.
Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a fɔ den, mbɛ Chisɔsi mu Yataa 'a denɛ an na, a ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, an fea Yataa a. Yataa wɛɛ, a ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, an fea an mɔɛ chɛ a.

Mmɔ sin danden fan mu a a, mbɛ mmɔ ko a di wan Yataa ye. Yataa mu koadia Yataa an na. A sin, mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe to‑a mɔ dɔ mende n na, a ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, an fea Yataa a. Yataa wɛɛ, a ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, an fea an mɔɛ chɛ a.
Ni Yataa 'a koadia kuu si‑a mmɔ faa ɔ, ni mmɔ tachɛ‑a fɔɛ ɔ yɔ Chisɔsi‑a a ma buɛ min dɔ, mmɔ faa ee gbaa, a si gbɛmbo tee ma Yataa boo ɔ.

Koe min na mu, Yataa 'a koadia mmɔ ko a, ɛ faagbaa bonda chɛ ban fan mmɔ ma. Ni mmɔ‑a mmɔ yii na chii, mbɛ tɔɔya ɛ wan mmɔ ya ɔ, an mbe a ma, mmɔ faa ɛ gbaa ka. Chɛ ɛ a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ Yataa 'a koadia kuu ma si nin bɛ mmɔ faa ɔ.
A nyin koadia ni ma mmɔ ɔ, koe min na mu, Yataa pɛn‑na koadia yian mmɔ a.

Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a fɔ, mbɛ a toen fan mu Yataa a, chɛɛ a ma to ni a suun ma nyɔɛ a, ɛ ka fania an fɔ‑a. Koe min na mu, mɔ ɔ mɔ min ma to ni a suun ma nyɔɛ a, ɛ min yen tee ɔ tee a, a mɔɛ chɛ ee che to‑a Yataa a, a ee min yen.
Yataa sin‑na chɛ an fɔ mmɔ ye, a ɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ, i wɛn mbe to‑a a wan Yataa a, a ɔ, i mɔɛ chɛ ni to i suun ma nyɔɛ wɛɛ a.
Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe dan‑da a a, mbɛ Chisɔsi an mu Chasi a, kunka mansa, a mɔɛ chɛ mu Yataa 'a denɛ an na. A yɛ to, mɔ ɔ mɔ min toen mu Fa Yataa a, a ni to a 'a denɛ n bɛɛ a.
Ni Yataa ko a dia‑a mmɔ ye, mmɔ ni ma a da a kuiɛ ma, mmɔ ɛ a ɔ sɔn‑da wan, mbɛ mmɔ ɛ to wan a 'a denɛ n bɛɛ a.
Mmɔ ɛ koadia yian ka wan Yataa a, ni mmɔ don‑da a da a kuiɛ kɔɔ. Chɛ sin, a ma gbɛ a a min koe a.
A mu min na, mɔ ɔ mɔ min mu Yataa 'a denɛ a, dunya chɛ ɛ ma a chen kɔɔ wan. A sin, mmɔ 'a danaya Yataa a, an‑na a ma, mmɔ kun‑da dunya chɛ ma.
Koe min na mu, mɔɛ min mbe kun dunya chɛ ma, an mu dechee mɔɛ chɛ a, min danden mu a a, mbɛ Chisɔsi mu Yataa 'a denɛ an na.

A wan mu, a wan Chisɔsi Chasi, min na‑a dunya ɔ. Yii chɛ‑a wan a kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, a sin, a fa‑a kɛn, a wii bɔn‑da wan. Yii dechee ma chɛ ni a kunɛ ɔ, a yɛ to, a wii bɔn‑da wan to. A sin, Yataa Nyina wɛɛ‑a siiya bɔ wan, mbɛ koe chɛ n mu tea an na.
A gbu sin, siiya sawa an mbe tea chɛ ma a si Chisɔsi ma.
Sii saa saa mu Yataa Nyina an na, a fean bɔɛ mu yii a, a sawan bɔɛ mu wii a. Chɛ n sin gbɛɛ kuiɛ ɛ dɔndɔ gbe.
Ni mmɔ ɛ dan fan mɔɛ n na, ni an‑na siiya bɔ mmɔ ye, a nyin fan mmɔ ni dan Yataa a, a ben mɔ gbu ma. Yataa wandi sin fan‑na siiya bɔ, a si a 'a denɛ Chisɔsi ma.

Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, mɔɛ min mbe a kai fa‑a Yataa 'a denɛ a, siiya chɛ ɛ wan a faa ɔ. Chɛɛ mɔɛ min mbe ee a kai fa‑a a a, a mɔɛ chɛ‑a Yataa ma fania fɔ mɔɛ a. Koe min na mu, a ma dan ni siiya a, Yataa‑a min bɔ, a si a 'a denɛ ma.
Yataa‑a siiya chɛ ɔ te, mbɛ a‑a kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ be wan mmɔ ma. A sin, a ma ɛ sɔn a 'a denɛ Chisɔsi an na.
Mɔ ɔ mɔ min ma‑a gbɛ mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, an fea Yataa 'a denɛ Chisɔsi a, a‑a fɔɛ chɛ ma sɔn. Chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ min ma ma ni mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, an fea a 'a denɛ chɛ a, a mɔɛ chɛ ee fɔɛ chɛ ma sɔn.
N mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena wo wan tena, wo wɛn kai faen mu Yataa 'a denɛ a, min mbe a ma, wo ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ wo‑a kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn.
Danaya wa chɛ an mbe mmɔ ɔ Yataa chen kɔɔ, mbɛ ni mmɔ‑a samunɛ chɛ fen kɔ fen ko a, min‑na a faa chima, mbɛ ɛ mmɔ 'a samunɛ a min fan.
A sin, ni mmɔ‑a a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ Yataa ɛ mmɔ 'a samunɛ a min fan, mmɔ ɛ dan fan gbɛ a, mbɛ mmɔ ɛ samunɛ chɛ tena fenɛ min ko a, mmɔ ɛ a ma sɔn‑da wan.

Ko kan kɔ kan, min mbe ee Yataa 'a chia ma, ko yama mu. Chɛɛ ko yama ɛ wan nɔ, min mbe ee mmɔ ka‑a kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ chɛ ma sɔn‑da. A ya wɛ, mbɛ i suun ma nyɔɛ dɔndɔ, a‑a ko yama ma. Chɛɛ an ko yama chɛ ee che a ma‑a, a ni fo kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ a. Samunɛ chɛ a mɔɛ chɛ ko a, min mbe a ma, a ni kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn. Chɛɛ ni ko yama mu, min mbe che a ma‑a, a ee kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn, n ma i kaa ni samunɛ chɛ‑a, a mɔɛ chɛ ko a.
Mmɔ danden fan mu chɛ a, mbɛ Yataa 'a denɛ nu, an mbe ee an boo a chii ko yama ma ma. Koe min na mu, Yataa 'a denɛ Chisɔsi ɛ an kun ma fɛn fan. Nyina yama chɛ sin, Sitana, a ee che ko ma‑a an na.
Mmɔ tana, mmɔ‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ Yataa 'a denɛ mu mmɔ a. Mbɛ a sin, dunya tɔɛ gbɛɛ, an mbe a wan Sitana 'a gbasaya an kɔɔ.

Mmɔ‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ Chisɔsi, Yataa 'a denɛ na‑a, mbɛ a‑a tea Yataa yian mmɔ a. Mmɔ mu gbɛ mɔ dɔndɔɛ an na tea Yataa chɛ a, koe min na mu, mmɔ dɔndɔɛ mu mmɔ a Chisɔsi a, a 'a denɛ. An mu tea Yataa a, min mbe kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ be.
N 'na denɛ nu, wo ma a ma, fen kɔ fen bakoe ni ben Yataa ma, wo faa n dɔ.
