N fan chɔchi gbakoo, n fan mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena i tena, i wan musu chɛ, Yataa faa ma chɛ, wo bɛ i 'a denɛ n na. Wo e Yataa 'a chia an ma, an fɛ mu, wo ko a di n ye. N dɔndɔ gbe ma to ni wo a, chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, miin‑na Yataa 'a tea sɔn, an gbɛɛ toen fan mu wo a.
Nn gbɛɛ, nn toen mu wo a, koe min na mu, tea chɛ ɛ gbɛ mmɔ faa n dɔ, a sin mbe ma‑a nɔ wan kuɔ fɔ ko a.

Mmɔ Fa Yataa, an fea Chisɔsi Chasi a, a 'a denɛ, an 'na dua ni ma mmɔ ma, an 'na chinchimaya ni ma mmɔ ma, a basan an 'na faachima a. Koe chɛ n mbe ma‑a wan tun tun mmɔ ta n na, koe min na mu, mmɔ danden mu Yataa 'a tea sakana a. A sin to, a toen fan mu mmɔ a.
A ma‑a wan n ma buɔdia chenama wa a, a ɔ sɔn koe a, mbɛ i 'a denɛ dɔ nu, an mbe wan tea chia ma, yɔ Fa Yataa‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ mmɔ ye.
Sanche gbɛ, bɔɔɛ, n mbe ee ka na tena sawa nama an nyɛn tena wo tena, chɛɛ sawa mu, min mbe mmɔ boo ɔ, a ka sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a min tima saa saa ma. An sawa chɛ ɔ, mmɔ ni to mmɔ nyɔn na.
Chɛ sin fan mu koadia a, bea koe a Yataa 'a sawa fɛ. A sin‑na a fɔ wan wo ye, a ka sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a min tima saa saa ma, mbɛ wo ni tachɛ chɛ koadia ɔ.
Fania fɔ mɔɛ sɛsɛ n mbe ben tena dunya ɔ. Mɔɛ nu, miin mbe ee dɔn a ma, mbɛ Chisɔsi Chasi na‑a wan dunya chɛ ɔ, mɔgbuya ɔ. An mɔ bonda chɛ nu, mɔ bun mɔɛ mu an na, Chasi chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ nu.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo wo kun ma fɛn, min mbe a ma, wo ee fo‑a fen chɛ a, wo‑a wai chɛ min ko a. Chɛɛ wo e wo 'a tɔnɔnɛ gbɛɛ ma sɔn‑da wan.

Mɔ ɔ mɔ min ma a too ma sɔ ni kan chɛ ma, Chasi‑a min chɛ, chɛɛ a‑a a ta sa a kun ma, a mɔɛ chɛ ma mɔ dɔndɔ a an fea Yataa a. Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe a too ma sɔ‑a kan chɛ ma, Chasi‑a min chɛ, a mɔɛ chɛ ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, an fea Fa Yataa a, a basan a 'a denɛ Chisɔsi a.
Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ na‑a wo 'a chenɛ a, kan dɔ mende a min kaen mu Chasi ta ma, wo ma wo ya kɔɔɛ yian a mɔɛ chɛ a, wo gbu ma a kɔndɔn.
Koe min na mu, mɔ ɔ mɔ i wɛn mbe i ya kɔɔɛ yian‑da a a, ɛ wan yɔ e ka i boo chɛ‑a a 'a ko yama ma an dɔ.

Ko sɛsɛ ɛ wan n yii ma, a fɔ koe a wo ye. Chɛɛ n mbe ee a finɛ puin tena a gbɛ ɔ. N mbe min ma tena, n yiima ɛ a fɔ tena wan n ye, n ni na wo kɔndɔn, mmɔ ni chia ɔ bɔ dɔndɔ chɛ. Chɛ an mbe a ma‑a, mmɔ gbɛɛ, mmɔ 'a buɔdia da ni fa gban.
I suun ma nyɔɛ musu ma, Yataa faa ma chɛ, a 'a denɛ n‑na i kɔndɔn.
N fan chɔchi gbakoo, n fan mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena i tena, i wan Kayɔsi. E Yataa 'a chia an ma, an fɛ mu i ko a di n ye.
N dia nyɔɛ, n‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ wo fea Yataa a, wo e wan kuiɛ dɔndɔya chɛndɛ ɔ. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, Yataa ni i gboo ɔ bɔ, Yataa ni i dua.
Suun ma nyɔɛ dɔ n na‑a wan, an‑na a fɔ n ye, mbɛ e wan sɔ ɔ den Chisɔsi ko a, yɔ e buɛ min dɔ Yataa 'a chia ma teaya ɔ, tee ɔ tee a. Chɛ‑a n bu ɔ dia wan kaka.
Koe min na mu, buɔdia dɔ gbɛɛ ee to nɔ n ko a, min benden mu chɛ ma, ni n‑na a a min, mbɛ n 'na denɛ n mbe tachɛ tena wan Yataa 'a chia ma teaya ɔ.
N dia nyɔɛ, i tanden mu i 'a wai ɔ, e min chɛ tena mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ n ye, an dɔ n mu wɛɛ sonda n na i tena.
Koadia min nyɔn sima e a yian tena an na, a a benden fan mu gbɛ chɔchi tena nɛ. An mbe ka tachɛ min dɔ, ɛ nyan‑da wan, i ni an na ben masaa chɛndɛ a, min mbe Yataa faa chima.
Koe min na mu, an mbe ka tachɛ min dɔ Chisɔsi Chasi ko a, an ma dɔn ni fen kɔ fen bia koe a, mɔɛ chɛ n na‑a min be, mɔɛ miin nii ma an kai fa ni Chisɔsi a.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, a nyin mmɔ wɛɛ, mmɔ ni toa si an kɔɔ, a nyin mmɔ ni a bun a a, wai chɛndɛ chɛ chɛ‑a, Yataa 'a sakana bai chɛ a ta koe a ya ɔ ma.
N na‑a gboo nyɛn fan nɔ chɔchi tena. Chɛɛ Diotɛfesi, min toen mu a wandi ma koe a an ya ɔ sɔɛ a, a ee dɔn a too ma sɔ koe a, nn da a kuiɛ ma.

Ni n na‑a nɔ, n mbe a fɔ‑a wan a ye den chɔchi ya kɔɔ, ɛ koe miin ma tena, nn tɔ yama min ɛ ben tena a ɔ tɛ‑a. Chɛ dechee ma, ni mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ n‑na a tan, a ee ko chɛndɛ ma an na. A ka chɛ ma, mɔɛ miin bɛɛ toenɛ ma, an ni ko chɛndɛ ma an na, ɛ a mɔɛ chɛ n na gban fan. A sin to, ni an mɔɛ chɛ n‑na ko chɛndɛ chɛ ma, ɛ an gbain fan a bɔ chɔchi ɔ.

N dia nyɔɛ, i ma bea mɔɛ n fɛ, miin mbe ko yama ma. Chɛɛ bea chɛ n fan fɛ, miin mbe ko chɛndɛ ma. Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe koe ma min nyin, Yataa 'a mɔɛ mu. Chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe koe ma, min ma nyin, a ma Yataa sɔn.
Demetiɔsi tana, mɔ ɔ mɔ ɛ a bai tena wan. A sin tea gbu sin ko a, nn bɛɛ, nn mbe wan a bai tena. I sin‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ ni nn na‑a chɛ ma, tea ɛ wan a ɔ.
Ko sɛsɛ ɛ wan n yii ma, a fɔ koe a i ye, chɛɛ n ma to ni, n ni a finɛ puin a gbɛ ɔ.
N toen mu n ni na i tan sanche, mɔ ni chia ɔ bɔ dɔndɔ chɛ.
Yataa ni faachima be i ma. I dia nyɔɛ n gbɛɛ nɛ, an‑na i kɔndɔn. Nn dia nyɔɛ nu nɔ, an kɔndɔn nn ye dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a.

N fan Chuda, n fan mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena wo tena, wo wan Chisian mɔɛ nu. Chisɔsi Chasi 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ mu n na, n fan Chimisi dɔ kaima. Fa Yataa toen mu wo a, a‑a wo chee wan a tena, a sin, Chisɔsi Chasi ɛ wo kun ma fɛn tena wan.
Yataa ni a a tun chinchin koe a wo ma, a ni faachima be wo ma, a ni a ma wo ni to wo nyɔn na.

N dia nyɔɛ nu, n toen ni kaka n ni gboo chɛ nyɛn a si bauncha ma, Chisɔsi‑a min be mmɔ ma. Chɛɛ n yiima dɔndɔɛ‑a a fɔ wan n ye, mbɛ n ni wo faa nande, wo ni butuinɛ chɛ, wo 'a danaya ko a Yataa a. Danaya chɛ sin, Yataa an‑na a ma, mmɔ‑a a ma sɔn, a sin mbe ee mun to.

Mɔɛ dɔ n yen ko, miin mbe ee Yataa kuiɛ ma, an mbe kan yama chɛ, an na‑a mmɔ tɛ ɔ yɛdɛn yɛdɛn. Mɔɛ chɛ n bakoe nyɛnden fan mu suun suun, mbɛ Yataa ɛ kaa a tɛ‑a wan an bakoe ma, a ni an tɔɔya. An ma Yataa sɔn, Yataa ɛ chinchin fan an ma. Chɛɛ an mbe an chinchincha chɛ an ya, mbɛ an ma‑a fɔɛ yama ɔ. An mbe yɛ wan to, mbɛ an ban‑da Chisɔsi Chasi ɔ, min mu mmɔ 'a mansa dɔndɔɛ a, mmɔ kun ti.

Wo‑a chɛ ɔ sɔn bɛɛ boo ɔ boo, chɛɛ n mbe a ɔ yian‑da wan to wo a. Mbɛ Yataa na‑a Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n bɔ wan yɔncha ɔ Ichipi chɛnyɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ chɛ gbakɔ, an dɔ nu, a‑a an kasaa wan, koe min na mu, an ma dɔn ni dan koe a a wan Yataa a.

Koe chɛ wɛɛ to‑a wan wo yii ma, a si maeka chɛ n bɛɛ ma, miin faa nii ma chima ni an 'na sɔ tena a banda bu ɔ. An na‑a a boo ka wan, mbɛ an bɔ‑a nɔ. Chɛ ko a, Yataa‑a a ma wan, an chii‑a yɔɔɛ a kuɔ fɔ ko a, pimbi pimbi ɔ. Yataa sin 'na gbasaya ɔ, an mbe ma tena nɔ wan chii chɛ ɔ, aan tee chɛ ni che, gbɛmbo tee wa chɛ. An tee chɛ ma mu, Yataa ɛ kaa a tɛ‑a an bakoe ma.

Sɔdɔn fea Komoa an bɛɛ mu to dɔndɔ an na. Duu wa fea chɛ nu, a basan konko mɛsɛ n na an 'na tindanɛ, an‑na ko yama sɛsɛ tɛ wan, an‑na Yataa 'a sawa sɛsɛ ka a chia ma. An 'na tɔɔya tana, a mu tɔmɔsi an na mɔɛ chɛ n tena, miin mbe na‑a ma‑a ta ɔ, kuɔ fɔ ko a.

Mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ, miin na‑a mmɔ tɛ ɔ yɛdɛn, an mbe an ko dɔndɔ gbe chɛ n fan ma tena. An 'na yiinachii ɛ a ma tena wan, an mbe ban‑da don koe a Yataa da a kuiɛ kɔɔ. Ɛ a ma tena wan to, an mbe an fandi gbu gboo bia‑a yama yama, a yɛ to, an mbe maeka n main‑da.

Chɛɛ maeka n 'na mansa dɔndɔ wɛɛ, min tɔ mu Maikɛɛ, a nii ma Sitana main ni. A na‑a a fɔ wan dechee a ma, a ɔ, Mansa Yataa ni a tɔɔya. Chɛ ma‑a Mosisi su kun ma wan. An fea chɛ dɔndɔ toen ni a ni su chɛ ya, min na ban‑da kɔɔsa ma an tɛ ɔ.

Chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ n tana, ni an ma koe min dɔ gbɛ ni, ma yɛn ma koe mu an tena, an sin mbe bai yama an sa a si a ma. An mbe wan dechee yɔ soe nu, koe min na mu, koe min mbe puin an yii ma, an mbe an ma. Koe n fan nɛ, miin mbe na kasaa a, an kun ma.

Koe min mbe an tan‑da, a yau gba an ko a. An puin‑da mɔna chɛ chen gba ɔ, mɔna min tɔ ni Ken, min na‑a a dɔɛ fa. Kɔpɔ koe‑a a ma, an bɔ‑a Badaan gba ɔ, an mbe ko ɔ ko ma wan kɔpɔ koe a. A yɛ to, Kɔya 'a gbunɛ nyɔn sima, an‑na a a bea, min‑na an kasaa pɔɛ.

Mɔ bonda chɛ nu, mɔ yama mu an na, miin mbe an bɔɛ n ka chia chɛndɛ ma. Ni wo ma‑a daun chɛ wɛɛ a, wo bɛ an na, kuiɛ dɔndɔya ɔ, an mbe an yii na chii dechee an fandi an na. An 'na yiima yaua daun chɛ, ɛ kuiɛ dɔndɔya chɛ a ɔ yɔn fan. Mɔ gbu a tenden ma an na. An mbe wan yɔ sona min mbe gbii teema ɔ, chɛɛ a ee na. An mbe wan to yɔ kɔnɛ, min yamba bandenɛ a a, a sin, a ee gbɔ be, kɔn fu tima wɛɛ a. Kɔn bonda chɛ kuu ɛ bɔ wan, a a ni dɛ, mbɛ a fa‑a gba fea.

A yɛ to, ni yii fa‑a, ɛ fenɛ n na fɔnɔ wan tindi ma, mbɛ a yɛ‑a. Mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ, an mbe ka wan. An mbe an 'na mauma koe n to ka wan an gbaa, mbɛ an ta‑a. An mbe wan to yɔ tɔmbuaka chɛ nu, miin ka‑a chia chɛ ma, Yataa‑a min yian an na, mbɛ an ta‑a an ta gbee a. Yataa‑a kaina ɔ bɛn an ko a, ma koe a pimbi pimbi ɔ kuɔ fɔ ko a.

Adami mama denɛ ta mama denɛ ta mama n denɛ dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, min tɔ ni Ɛnoku. A na‑a bai sa wan suun, a si an mɔ bonda chɛ n ma. A ɔ, a yen ko, mbɛ Mansa Chisɔsi ɛ na‑a wan, a ɔ, an bɛ a 'a maeka wu sɛsɛ sɛsɛ n na.

A ɔ, ɛ na‑a wan mɔɛ n gbɛɛ gbɛmbo koe a. A ɔ, mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin ma Yataa sɔn, a ɔ, mbɛ kaa a tɛ‑a an 'na ko yama n gbɛɛ ma. A ɔ, ko yama chɛ n gbɛɛ, a ɔ, a basan an 'na bai yama n gbɛɛ a, an‑na miin sa a si a ma.

An mɔ bonda chɛ nu, an faa ee chima, tima ɔ tima an mbe gbonyɛ‑a. An sin, an faa ma koe yama nu, an mbe bea an fan fɛ. A yɛ to, an da ɔ yonka koo, an sin mbe da ma dia bai n sa wan mɔ dɔ mende n tena, min mbe a ma dechee, an faa ma koe ni chɛ an ye.
Chɛɛ n dia nyɔɛ nu, ɛ wan wo yii ma, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi 'a sɔ mɔɛ nu, an na‑a bai min fɔ suun.

An na‑a a fɔ wan wo ye, an dɔ, mɔɛ n mbe na‑a wan tee dankama nɛnɛ chɛ n kɔɔ, an dɔ, miin mbe bea‑a an 'na Yataa sɔn baiya koe n fɛ, miin na di an ye. An dɔ, an mɔɛ chɛ nu, an mbe mayɛma bun‑da wo ma, wo bɛ Yataa a.
Dunya ma mɔ bonda chɛ nu, Yataa Nyina ee miin fɛ, an fan mbe na ko a fasanɛ a.
Chɛɛ wo tana, n dia nyɔɛ nu, wo ma yɛ kuu kɔ wo 'a danaya ɔ Yataa a. Wo samunɛ chɛ gbasaya chɛ ɔ, Yataa Nyina ɛ min be.
Wo ma bɔ Yataa 'a koadia kɔɔ. Wo chinchimaya chɛ ma kɔn, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi ɛ min chɛ‑a, min mbe na‑a kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ a.
Mɔɛ dɔ nu, sika ɛ miin dɔ, wo an deman.
Dɔ n bɛɛ baun, i ni an sogban, a bɔ ta ɔ. Chinchimaya, a basan sika a, a ni ma wo ɔ dɔ n sin ko a. Chɛɛ tima ya, an 'na ko yama maenɛ ma na sin i ma.

Sanche gbɛ, mmɔ tando be Yataa ma. An mu dechee mmɔ 'a Yataa a, an mbe mmɔ baun, a 'a denɛ Chisɔsi Chasi ɔ, mmɔ 'a mansa. A wan Yataa, an mbe a ma, mmɔ ee bea, mbɛ a‑a a ma, mmɔ sɔ‑a a chen kɔɔ manɛ ɔ, mabɔ kan kɔ kan mbe ee mmɔ ma, mɔɔ buɔdia mmɔ ɔ. Mansaya, ni bemaya, a basan gbasaya a, a ka suun ma, aan sanche, ɛ Yataa an boo ɔ, kuɔ fɔ, ni kuɔ fɔ ko a. A ni ma ka.

Yataa‑a koe chɛ n fan dɔ yian Chisɔsi Chasi a, koe miin ni na tena ma‑a sanche. Yataa na‑a chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, Chisɔsi wɛɛ ni an dɔ yian mɔɛ n na, miin mbe a ko a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, Chisɔsi‑a a 'a maeka sɔ wan, a ni an sakana chɛ a ben a 'a yɔnɛ Chɔn tena.
Chɔn chɛ koɔ‑a wan den, a si koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ma, maeka chɛ‑a miin yian a a, a si Yataa da a bai ma, a basan Chisɔsi Chasi 'a siiya a.

Mɔɛ miin mbe bai chɛ n kan‑da gboo chɛ ɔ, an duaen mu. Mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ, miin mbe bai chɛ a min‑da, min ka‑a Yataa tena, mbɛ an‑na an boo si a kɔɔ, an duaen mu. Koe min na mu, tima ɔ ma yansan to, mbɛ koe chɛ n gbɛɛ bɔ‑a a a.

N fan Chɔn, n fan mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena wo tena, wo wɛn mbe chɔchi wɔnfea n dɔ, Esia chɛnyɛ ɔ. Yataa ni wo dua, Yataa ni faachima be wo ma. Yataa min mbe nɔ sanche, a ni wan nɔ suun, a sin mbe ma‑a wan nɔ kuɔ fɔ ko a. Nyina wɔnfea n bɛɛ, miin mbe sɔ ɔ Yataa ya kɔɔ, ɛ si ɔ a 'a mansaya sea a.

A ka to Chisɔsi Chasi wɛɛ tena, tea bai sa mɔɛ, a wɛn pɛn‑na a kɔɔ sɔ saya ɔ, a sin‑na gbasaya benden mu mansa kan kɔ kan ma dunya ma, an mbe an kɔɔ. Chisɔsi toen mu mmɔ a, a sin‑na mmɔ kun ka wan, mmɔ 'a ko yama n dɔ, a wii a.

A‑a mmɔ ma mɔɛ n na, miin mbe a 'a mansaya kɔɔ, tɛ mɔɛ n mu miin na Yataa ko a. A wan mu Chisɔsi fa a, ni a 'a Yataa. Basɔmaya ni ma Chisɔsi Chasi ma, gbasaya ni ma a boo ɔ, kuɔ fɔ ni kuɔ fɔ. A ni ma ka.

A yen ko, Chisɔsi ɛ na tena wan dugbu ɔ. A sin, mɔ ɔ mɔ ɛ a yen‑da wan, a basan chɛ n bɛɛ a, miin na‑a a sɔɔ a kaa fɛ. A sin, mɔɛ n gbɛɛ dunya ɔ, an mbe di‑a wan gbafi gbafi a ko a. A ɛ ma‑a ka wan. A ni ma ka.

Yataa Mansa‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, a wan mbe a ma fen fen mbe a kuu sɔ, a wan mbe a ma to fen fen mbe che a danka a. A ɔ, a wan ni suun, a wan mbe sanche, a ɔ, a sin mbe ma‑a wan nɔ kuɔ fɔ ko a. A ɔ, a 'a gbasaya danka ee ma‑a.

N fan mu, n fan Chɔn, wo suun ma nyɔɛ Chasi ɔ. Mmɔ gbɛɛ, mɔ dɔndɔɛ mu mmɔ a, mmɔ bɛ Chisɔsi a, an mu mmɔ 'a mansa a. A sin, mmɔ gbɛɛ, mmɔ ɛ tɔɔya dɔndɔɛ an dɔ bia tena, mmɔ ɛ mmɔ faa bia‑a, a ko a. Yataa 'a sakana bai sa koe a, a basan Chisɔsi wakoe a, n na ta‑a Patimɔsi bia ɔ an ko a, yii tinɛ ɔ duu gboo chɛ ma.
Patimɔsi chɛ ni, Tɛnɛ kan kɔ dɔɛ ma, Yataa Nyina bea‑a n fɛ gban. A tima kɔɔ, n‑na mɔɛ kuiɛ a min fan, n gbaa chia a. Kuiɛ chɛ maen fan ni gbankon, yɔ buu fɛ kuiɛ.

Mbɛ an kuiɛ chɛ, a ɔ n ma, “E koe miin dɔ yen‑da, an nyɛn, i ni an na ta chɔchi wɔnfea chɛ n tena, duu wa chɛ n dɔ. Chɔchi chɛ ni ma Ɛfisɔsi, ni chɛ Simina, chɛ Pakamɔn, ni chɛ Tiyatiya. Chɔchi chɛ to Sadisi, ni chɛ Fidadɛfia, a basan chɛ a Daɔdisia.”
Mbɛ n‑na n ya a mun, n ni a ɔ yen, mɔɛ min ni koɔ tena n tena. Mbɛ n‑na dambo si fenɛ yen wɔnfea, an nyandenɛ ɛ sanu a.
Dambo si fen wɔnfea chɛ n tɛ ɔ, mɔɛ ni wan nɔ sɔ ɔ, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ. Doma min ni a ma, a kaen ni a chen kana a wan. A sin, fenɛ min bunden ni a kaa a, a nyanden ni sanu an na.
A kundi min ni a kun ma, a gbɛen fan ni fo yɔ fen gbɛ, yɔ fande funku wɛɛ. A ya sin ni man tena wan yɔ sanku manɛ.
A chenɛ ɛ man‑da taun yɔ kundu bɔenɛ faa ta a. A kuiɛ sin maenɛ ɛ yɔ yii fa ɛ tu buɛ min dɔ.
A‑a tɔmbuaka wɔnfea bia, a boo nyima a boo a. Mbɛ chɛɛ chɛ mɛ bɔ‑a a da ɔ, min da ɛ a bu ɔ, ɛ to a kɔɛ, an na saen ba ɛ. A ya kɔɔɛ sin ni man tena wan, yɔ ni tee che‑a a kun tɛ.
N‑na a yen kɛn, mbɛ n bea‑a a chen kɔɔ susu gbuu yɔ su. Chɛɛ a‑a a boo nyima bun n ma, a ɔ, “Sɛmbɛ chian koe a. N fan mbe a ma fen fen mbe a kuu sɔ, n fan mbe a ma to fen fen mbe danka.”
Mbɛ a ɔ, “A yen ko, chi ɛ n boo ɔ saya ko a, a basan ta koe a faa a. N faen fan ni, chɛɛ a yen ko, n mbe fɔɛ ɔ kuɔ fɔ ni kuɔ fɔ ko a. N fan, fɔɛ ɛ n fan boo ɔ.
E koe miin dɔ yen tena sanche, an nyɛn, a basan chɛ n bɛɛ a, miin mbe na tena ma‑a.

Ka wɛ n mbe a ɔ yian i a, tɔmbuaka wɔnfea chɛ nu n boo nyima a, an sɔen mu fenɛ miin ko a. Mbɛ n‑na a ɔ yian to i a, dambo si fen wɔnfea chɛ nu, an bɛɛ sɔen mu fenɛ miin ko a. Tɔmbuaka wɔnfea chɛ n mu maeka wɔnfea an fan na, chɔchi wɔnfea an ko a. Dambo si fen wɔnfea chɛ n sin, an mu chɔchi wɔnfea an fan na.”

Mbɛ a ɔ te to n ma, a ɔ, n ni chɛ nyɛn maeka chɛ tena chɔchi ko a, Ɛfisɔsi duu ɔ. A ɔ, “N fan, mɔɛ chɛ, tɔmbuaka wɔnfea chɛ n mbe min boo a,” a ɔ, “n fan, mɔɛ chɛ, min mbe tachɛ chɛ sanu dambo si fen wɔnfea chɛ n tɛ ɔ,” a ɔ, “n 'na sakana an nɛ.”

A ɔ, “N‑na ko ɔ ko kan kɔ kan dɔ sɔn fan a si wo ma. N‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, wo‑a min chɛ Ɛfisɔsi chɔchi ɔ. A yɛ to, n‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, wo e fɔɛ min nyɔn sima a tachɛ tena. N‑na a ɔ sɔn fan to, wo e wo faa bia tena buɛ min dɔ Chisian wai ɔ. N danden fan mu a a, mbɛ wo ee che wo boo si‑a mɔ yama n kɔɔ. Chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin mbe an fandi chee n 'na sɔ mɔɛ n na, wo‑a an dɔ siman fan. Mbɛ wo‑a a ɔ yen, mbɛ fania fɔ mɔ gbama mu an na.
Wo‑a wo faa bia kaka tɔɔya a n ko a, a sin, wo gboo ɔ ma fa ni ma koe a n fɛ.
Chɛɛ wo ma bɔ chia, ɛ dɔndɔ gbe. Koadia ee to wo faa ɔ chɛndɛ chɛ, yɔ a ni buɛ min dɔ a ɔ a saa a.

Wo wo yii na chii, wo ni buɛ min dɔ a kɔma a, mbɛ wo‑a wo kan kɔ sɔ wo 'a ko yama n na, wo ni yɛ wo chɛ chɛ wai kɔma n dɔ. Ni chɛ ma, n mbe na‑a wan, mbɛ n‑na wo 'a dambo si fen chɛ ka a sɔ gba ɔ, n‑na a ya, wo tɔɔ koe a.
Chɛɛ n mbe wo tando tena ko dɔndɔ an ko a. N ma to ni mɔɛ miin na, Nikodasi fɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu, wo wɛɛ ma to ni an chɛ chɛ wai n na.”

A ɔ, “Wo wɛn too ɛ koe a min, wo chɛ a min,” a ɔ, “Yataa Nyina ɛ bai min sa tena chɔchi chɛ n tena.” A ɔ, “Mɔ ɔ mɔ miin mbe sɔ‑a gban Yataa ko a, an mɔɛ chɛ nu, n mbe a ma‑a wan, an ni kɔnɛ chɛ gbɔɛ daun, kɔn chɛ Yataa 'a yadi ɔ banda bu ɔ, min mbe kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ be.”

Mbɛ a ɔ te to n ma, a ɔ, n ni chɛ nyɛn maeka chɛ tena chɔchi ko a, Simina duu ɔ. A ɔ, “N fan, mɔɛ chɛ, n fɛn mbe a ma fen fen mbe a kuu sɔ,” a ɔ, “n fɛn mbe a ma to fen fen mbe danka, n fan mɔɛ chɛ, n fɛn fa‑a, mbɛ n yɛ‑a to fɔɛ ɔ.”

A ɔ, “N‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, wo e mɔnɛ min dɔ bia tena, wo e yakɔɔtawa min dɔ. Chɛɛ tea gbu ko a, yɔn tɔ ma wo a. A yɛ to, n‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin‑na an fandi ya Chu mɔɛ n na, an mbe wo tɔ yama a fasan tena buɛ min dɔ. Chɛɛ Chu mɔ ma an na, Sitana 'a mɔɛ n fan nɛ.

Wo ma chian tɔɔya kan kɔ kan ma, wo e na tena min chɛ‑a. A yen ko, Sitana ɛ na tena a ma‑a wo dɔ n ni sa pimbi chenɛ a, wo ɔ siman koe a. A sin, wo e tɔɔya ɔ yen‑da wan tee tan ko a. Wo sɔ chidi wo 'a danaya ɔ n na, an ni a fɔ a ni ma saya wɛɛ a wo ko a, wo ma mun. N mbe kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ an be‑a wo ma, wo 'a boo ɔ gbasi woo a.”
A ɔ, “Wo wɛn too ɛ koe a min, wo chɛ a min,” a ɔ, “Yataa Nyina ɛ bai min sa tena chɔchi chɛ n tena.” A ɔ, “Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe sɔ‑a gban Yataa ko a, a mɔɛ chɛ ee saya fean bɔɛ chɛ‑a.”
Mbɛ a ɔ te to, a ɔ, n ni chɛ nyɛn maeka chɛ tena chɔchi ko a, Pakamɔn duu ɔ. A ɔ, “N fan, mɔɛ chɛ, n fɛn 'na chɛɛ chɛ mɛ da ɛ a bu ɔ, ɛ a kɔɛ, a a saenɛ ɛ chɛndɛ chɛ,” a ɔ, “n 'na sakana an nɛ.”

A ɔ, “N‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ wo e kaina min, Sitana an mu mansa a nɔ. Chɛɛ wo‑a n bakoe bia wan wo boo fea a, wo ma wo kan kɔ sɔ ni dan koe a n na. Wo dan‑da wan n na, tima chɛ wɛɛ a, tima min na an‑na Andipasi fa wo tɛ ɔ nɔ, Sitana waa chɛ. A ni mɔɛ an na, min‑na a ɔ yian tima ɔ tima, a da a bai ɔ, a basan a 'a chɛ chɛ wai a, mbɛ n 'na mɔɛ mu a a.

Chɛɛ n bu ɔ ma di koe dɔ n na, a si wo ma. Mɔɛ dɔ nu wo tɛ ɔ, an mbe bea tena kan chɛ an fɛ, Badaan ɛ min chɛ tena, Badaan min‑na Badaki kan, Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n na dɛ koe a ko yama ɔ. A‑a a ma wan, an‑na daun fenɛ n daun, miin ni bɔ yasi a fania yataa n tena. Mbɛ a yɛ‑a to, a‑a a ma, an‑na koe tɛ.
Wo wɛɛ, wo e ka wan. Mɔɛ dɔ n mbe wan wo tɛ ɔ, miin mbe bea tena kan chɛ n fɛ, Nikodasi fɛ mɔɛ n mbe kanɛ miin chɛ tena.
Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo wo kan kɔ sɔ wo 'a ko yama chɛ n na. Ni chɛ ma, a ɔ ee yansan tena, n na‑a wo tena, mbɛ n‑na butuinɛ chɛ an mɔɛ chɛ n na, chɛɛ chɛ mɛ chɛ a, min mbe n da ɔ.”

A ɔ, “Wo wɛn too ɛ koe a min, wo chɛ a min,” a ɔ, “Yataa Nyina ɛ bai min sa tena chɔchi chɛ n tena.” A ɔ, “Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe sɔ‑a gban Yataa ko a, a mɔɛ chɛ, n mbe daun fen chɛ dɔ be‑a wan a ma a daun koe a, daun fen nunden chɛ. A yɛ to, n mbe senɛ be‑a wan an mɔɛ chɛ ma, senɛ min gbɛenɛ ɛ, a sin, tɔ nama an nyɛndenɛ ɛ ma‑a a ma. Mɔɛ min mbe senɛ chɛ ma sɔn‑da, an mu dechee mɔɛ a, min mbe tɔɛ chɛ sɔn‑da.”

Mbɛ a ɔ te to, a ɔ, n ni chɛ nyɛn maeka chɛ tena chɔchi ko a, Tiyatiya duu ɔ. A ɔ, “N fan, mɔɛ chɛ, n fɛn mu Yataa 'a denɛ a,” a ɔ, “n fɛn ya ɛ yɔ sanku manɛ, n chenɛ ɛ man‑da taun, yɔ kundu min bɔ‑a faa ta ɔ,” a ɔ, “n 'na sakana an nɛ.”

A ɔ, “N‑na ko ɔ ko kan kɔ kan dɔ sɔn fan a si wo ma. N‑na wo 'a koadia ɔ sɔn fan, wo kai faen mu buɛ min dɔ Yataa a, wo 'a wai chɛndɛ, a basan wo 'a faabia a. A sin to, wo e wai min sin chɛ tena sanche, a benden mu a saa ma, tima min na wo ma‑a n fɛ mɔɛ n na.

Chɛɛ n bu ɔ ma di chɛ a, a si wo ma. Wo ee ko ɔ ko ma tena, a si musu chɛ ma, Chɛsibɛɛ musu chɛ, min‑na a wandi ya Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ a. Chɛɛ ɛ kanɛ min chɛ tena, ɛ n 'na mɔɛ n sɔ tena chia yama an ma, an mbe ko yama tɛ‑a, a basan daun fen daunɛ a, min mbe bɔ yasi a fenɛ n tena, an mbe miin ya yataa a.
N‑na tima be a ma, a kan kɔ sɔ koe a, a 'a ko yama n na, chɛɛ a ma to ni a ni a boo bɔ ko tɛ chɛ ɔ.
A yen ko, n mbe a sa tena gbɛ gbandi waa an ma. Mɔɛ chɛ n sin, miin‑na koe tɛ a a, n mbe tɔɔya wa an sa tena an bɛɛ ma. Ni an‑na an kan kɔ sɔ ko yama chɛ a, ɛ min ma tena, n mbe ee an tɔɔya‑a.

Mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, miin mbe a fɛ, n mbe an fa‑a wan. A sin chɔchi chɛ n gbɛɛ, an mbe a ɔ sɔn‑da wan, mbɛ n fan‑na mɔ ɔ mɔ yii ma sɔn, a basan mɔ ɔ mɔ faa ɔ koe a. Dɔndɔ, dɔndɔɛ a mu, n mbe an gbɛɛ pawa‑a, yɔ an mbe wai chɛ‑a buɛ min dɔ.”

A ɔ, “Musu chɛ 'a kan chɛ, an mbe min chee, an dɔ, tea ɔ nunden ba a si Sitana ma, kan yama mu. Chɛɛ wo tana, wo wɛn to‑a ka nɔ chɔchi ɔ, Tiyatiya duu chɛ ɔ, wo wɛn ma bea ni a 'a kan chɛ fɛ, bai ɛ wan n da a wo ko a. N mbe a fɔ tena wo ye, mbɛ n mbe ee suun fankama dɔ gbɛɛ si tena wo kun ma.
Chɛɛ wo gboo ɔ ma fa dan koe a n na.
Mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, miin sɔ‑a gban Yataa ko a, miin mbe ma‑a n da a kuiɛ ma, aan an 'na fɔɛ danka a, n mbe gbasaya be‑a wan an ma, Yataa sɔn bai n kun ma.

N mbe gbasaya be‑a wan an ma, yɔ Fa Yataa‑a min be n ma. An sin chinchincha ee ma‑a an faa ɔ, an mbe an bia‑a wan, yɔ mɔɛ ɛ boo da te buɛ min dɔ. N mbe tɔmbuaka be‑a wan an ma, min mbe ma man‑da banda ɔ ka da ma. Chɛ ɛ a ɔ yian‑da wan an na, mbɛ an sɔen fan mu gban Yataa ko a.”
A ɔ, “Wo wɛn too ɛ koe a min, wo chɛ a min,” a ɔ, “Yataa Nyina ɛ bai min sa tena chɔchi chɛ n tena.”

Mbɛ a ɔ te to, a ɔ, n ni chɛ nyɛn maeka chɛ tena chɔchi ko a, Sadisi duu ɔ. A ɔ, “N fan, mɔɛ chɛ, n fɛn ta mu Yataa 'a nyina wɔnfea chɛ a, tɔmbuaka wɔnfea chɛ n mbe n fɛn boo ɔ,” a ɔ, “n 'na sakana an nɛ.” A ɔ, “N‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, wo e tachɛ tena buɛ min dɔ. Wo tɔ a diama taen mu, mbɛ mɔɛ mu wo a, miin kai faen mu n na, chɛɛ n fɛ mɔ ma wo a ɛnden bɛɛ a.

Koe min na mu, n‑na a ɔ yen, mbɛ wo tachɛ buɛ ma Yataa faa chima nin bɛ. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo wo kunɛ kɔɔ sɔ wo 'a danaya ɔ Yataa a, wo ɔ ni gbɛa, a bɔ gboo ɔ fa chɛ ɔ wo 'a Chisiancha ɔ. Gboo ɔ fa chɛ ma a ma wo ni sɛmbɛ dan koe a n na.

Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo wo yii na chii, wo kan‑da min na, a yɛ to, wo‑a min na min. Wo wo too ma sɔ a ma, wo ni wo kan kɔ sɔ wo 'a ko yama n na. Ni wo ma wo kunɛ kɔɔ sɔ ni, n mbe na‑a wo tɛnɛ‑a wan, yɔ kanka ɛ a ma buɛ min dɔ. Wo ee na‑a tima gbu wɛɛ sɔn‑da, n mbe na‑a tima min na, wo tɔɔya koe a.

Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, wo dɔ n mbe wan nɔ Sadisi duu chɛ ɔ, wo wɛn tachɛ buɛ nyin Yataa tena. Wo mɔɛ chɛ nu, mmɔ bɛ, mmɔ ɛ doma gbɛ don‑da wan, mmɔ ni tachɛ chɛ. Chɛ ɛ ma‑a wan, koe min na mu, chɛ bɛnden fan mu an ma.

Mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, miin mbe sɔ‑a gban Yataa ko a, an ma bɛndenɛ ɛ ma‑a ka wan koa gbɛ a. A sin, n mbe ee an tɔɛ bɔ‑a gboo chɛ ɔ, mɔɛ miin mbe kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da, an tɔɛ ɛ ma‑a gboo min dɔ. N mbe a fɔ‑a wan den, Fa Yataa ya kɔɔ, an bɛ a 'a maeka n na, mbɛ n 'na mɔɛ n fan nɛ.”
A ɔ, “Wo wɛn too ɛ koe a min, wo chɛ a min,” a ɔ, “Yataa Nyina ɛ bai min sa tena chɔchi chɛ n tena.”

Mbɛ a ɔ te to, a ɔ, n ni chɛ nyɛn maeka chɛ tena chɔchi ko a, Fidadɛfia duu ɔ. A ɔ, “N fan, mɔɛ chɛ, n fɛn kan nyɔ ee, n fɛn teaen mu, a sin to, Mansa Defidi 'a chi ɛ n boo ɔ.” A ɔ, “N fan mbe chenɛ da a ka, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee a da a tɔn, a yɛ to, n fan mbe a da a tɔn, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee a da a ka.” A ɔ, “N 'na sakana an nɛ.”

A ɔ, “N‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, wo e tachɛ tena buɛ min dɔ. N‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ wo 'a gbasaya dɔɔ wɛɛ boo ɔ boo, chɛɛ wo bea‑a wan n da a kuiɛ fɛ, wo ma ka ni n fɛ. A yen ko, chenɛ da a kaenɛ mu gbɛ wo ya ɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ sin mbe ee nɔ, min mbe a a tɔn.
Mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin‑na an fandi ya Chu mɔɛ n na, chɛɛ fania mu, Sitana 'a mɔɛ chɛ nu, a yen ko, n mbe a ma‑a wan an ni na, an ni an bun wo chen kɔɔ. An gbɛɛ, an ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ n toen fan mu wo a.
Koe min na mu, wo‑a n da a kuiɛ a min, wo‑a wo faa bia. N bɛɛ, n mbe wo kun ma fɛn‑da wan tima chɛ a, tima min na dunya gbɛɛ ɛ ma‑a dɔsimanɛ kɔɔ, mɔɛ gbɛɛ ɛ ma‑a tɔɔya ɔ.
A ɔ ee yansan tena to, mbɛ n na‑a. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo gboo ɔ ma fa dan koe a n na, min mbe a ma, wo ee na‑a fo‑a wo 'a boo ɔ gbasi woo a.

Mɔɛ min mbe sɔ‑a gban Yataa ko a, n mbe a ma‑a wan soo ɔ bia‑a, Fa Yataa 'a chenɛ a. A sin, a ee bɔ‑a nɔ kuɔ fɔ ko a. N mbe n 'na Yataa tɔɛ nyɛn‑da wan a ma. A yɛ to, n mbe duu chɛ tɔɛ nyɛn‑da wan a ma, Chuusaɛn nama, Fa Yataa 'a duu wa chɛ, min mbe na‑a, a ka a tena banda bu ɔ. N mbe yɛ‑a wan to, n‑na n fandi gbu tɔ nama nyɛn a ma.”
A ɔ, “Wo wɛn too ɛ koe a min, wo chɛ a min,” a ɔ, “Yataa Nyina ɛ bai min sa tena chɔchi chɛ n tena.”

Mbɛ a ɔ te to, a ɔ, n ni chɛ nyɛn maeka chɛ tena chɔchi ko a, Daɔdisia duu ɔ. A ɔ, “N fan, mɔɛ chɛ, n fɛn mbe a ma Yataa da a kuiɛ ni to a gba ɔ, n fɛn mbe tea fɔ a si Yataa ma, n fɛn mbe a 'a dunya gbɛɛ kun ma,” a ɔ, “n 'na sakana an nɛ.”
A ɔ, “N‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, wo e tachɛ tena buɛ min dɔ. Wo e wan dechee yɔ yii, min ma gbandi, a sin ma chima ni to. A ni nyan fan, wo ni ma chia dɔndɔ a, an ni a ma‑a wo ma gbɔsɔɛ ni ma n ma.
Chɛɛ wo ee ka buɛ chɛ ɔ, mɔ fufafuu mu wo a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, n mbe wo a fu‑a wan, wo ni bɔ n da ɔ.

Koe min na mu, wo e a fɔ wan, wo ɔ, wo nyanden mu, wo ɔ, fen fen mbe wan wo boo ɔ, wo ɔ, fen fen ma gbɔsɔɛ ee wo ma. Chɛɛ wo ma a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ wo ma chinchinden mu, wo yɔnden mu, a ma boo kan kɔ kan mbe ee wo ye, wo fiondenɛ mu, wo ma senɛ ɛ.

Chɛ an fɛ mu, n mbe wo a si tena, wo ni sanu chɛndɛ chɛndɛ san n ma, min mbe a ma, wo ni nyan. A yɛ to, wo ni koa gbɛ wɛɛ san n ma, a ma koe a doma a, wo ma senɛ min mbe, a mau chɛ ni nun. Wo ni bui wɛɛ san to n ma, a chɛ koe a wo ya a ma, wo ni kaina yen.
Mɔɛ chɛ nu, n toen mu miin na, n mbe an fan ma nyin, mbɛ n‑na a ma, an tɔɔ‑a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo wo ma bɛn, mbɛ wo‑a wo kan kɔ sɔ wo 'a ko yama n na.
A yen ko, n sɔ‑a chenɛ da a, n mbe a tu‑a. Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a n kuiɛ a min, mbɛ a‑a chenɛ da a ka, n mbe don‑da wan a 'a chenɛ a. A sin, nn fea, nn mbe daunɛ chɛ‑a wan kaina dɔndɔɛ.
Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe sɔ‑a gban Yataa ko a, n mbe a ma‑a wan, a ni si n baima n 'na mansaya ɔ. An mɔɛ chɛ, ɛ ma‑a wan yɔ n fan, n sɔ‑a buɛ min dɔ gban, mbɛ n‑na si tena chɛ ya Fa Yataa tɔnfɛ.”
A ɔ, “Wo wɛn too ɛ koe a min, wo chɛ a min,” a ɔ, “Yataa Nyina ɛ bai min sa tena chɔchi chɛ n tena.”

Chɛ gbakɔ, mbɛ n‑na ko dɔ mende ɔ yen to. A yen ko, n‑na n ya a ta, n‑na chenɛ da a kaenɛ yen sɔ ɔ n ya kɔɔ banda bu ɔ. Mbɛ n‑na mɔɛ chɛ min kuiɛ a min a saa a, min na‑a koɔ n tena yɔ buu, n‑na a kuiɛ a min to. A ɔ, “Sɛ nɛ chɛ, min mbe a ma, n ni a ɔ yian i a, koe miin mbe na tena ma‑a.”
Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, a yen ko, Yataa Nyina bea‑a n fɛ gban. N‑na a yen, mbɛ nɔ banda bu ɔ, mansaya sea ɛ wan nɔ si ɔ, mɔɛ ɛ si ɔ a a.

Mɔɛ chɛ sin, min ni nɔ si ɔ, a ni man tena wan taun, yɔ dɛmunɛ, ni sen baa gbɛama a dɔ mende, min tɔ ni kanidian. Ninkinankantuu min ni man tena yɔ senɛ chɛ, puu mɔɛ n mbe min chee, an dɔ, ɛmɛyadi, an tindanden ni an mansa sea chɛ a.

Mansa sea bi fea kun ma naanin dɔ mende ni wan nɔ, an mansa sea dɔndɔɛ chɛ a tindanɛ. Gbakoo bi fea kun ma naaninɛ n ni wan si ɔ an mansa sea chɛ n na. An ma bɛnden ni koa gbɛ an dɔ, sanu mansa banfua sienɛ an kun na.

Mbɛ mansa sea dɔndɔɛ chɛ tena banda bu ɔ, banda man mia mia bɔ‑a nɔ, banda wɛɛ, ɛ ta‑a koɔ‑a gbau gbau, sɔnkɔ sɔnkɔ chɛ kuiɛ ɛ ta‑a bɔ‑a. N‑na dambo wɔnfea wɛɛ yen fan, an mbe man‑da nɔ mansa sea chɛ ya kɔɔ. Chɛ n ni Yataa 'a nyina wɔnfea chɛ n fan na.

A yɛ to, mansa sea chɛ ya kɔɔ to, yii wa wɛɛ ɔ fuinden fan ni, a maenɛ ɛ yɔ mɛmɛ. Mansa sea chɛ a tindanɛ, a tɔnfɛ gbɛɛ, fɔɛ fen naaninɛ n ni wan nɔ. Fɔɛ fen chɛ n ya n ni wan bɔn dɔ an ya ɔ chia a, an mbe bɔn dɔ an gbaa chia a.
Fɔɛ fenɛ saa ni wan yɔ yaa. A fean bɔɛ ni wan yɔ ninchi kai. A sawan bɔɛ chɛ, mɔ gbu ya kɔɔɛ an ni a ma. A naanin bɔɛ chɛ sin, a ni wan yɔ kochɛ, min mbe ben banda a.

Fɔɛ fen naanin chɛ n gbɛɛ, an kambanɛ ni wɔdɔ wɔdɔ. An sin, an ya ni wan bɔn dɔ an gboo gbɛɛ ma, a basan an kambanɛ n kɔɔ a. A sin to, su ɔ tee a, an mbe ee sɛmbɛ a fɔ koe a, an dɔ, “A kan nyɔ ee, a kan nyɔ ee, Yataa Mansa kan nyɔ ee. A 'a gbasaya danka ee. A ni wan nɔ suun, ɛ wan nɔ sanche, ɛ ma‑a wan nɔ kuɔ fɔ ko a.”
Fɔɛ fen naanin chɛ nu, an gboo ɔ ma fa ni tando be koe a, a basan basɔmaya a, ni wai bɔɛ. An‑na mansa chɛ an fai ka, min mbe si ɔ a 'a mansaya sea, min mbe ee fa‑a kuɔ fɔ ko a.

An mbe ma chɛ a, mbɛ gbakoo bi fea kun ma naanin chɛ nu, an‑na an kumbai gbangban a chen kɔɔ, a wɛn mbe si ɔ mansaya ɔ. Mbɛ an‑na a fai, a wɛn mbe ee fa kuɔ fɔ ko a. An 'na mansa banfua nu, an‑na an ya, mbɛ an‑na banfua chɛ n sa a chen kɔɔ, kooya ɔ. Mbɛ an dɔ,
“Nn 'na mansa, nn 'na Yataa, tando bɛnden mu i wan ma, basɔmaya bɛnden mu i ma, a basan gbasaya a. I wan‑na fen fen nyan, i 'a yiinachii, an‑na a ma, an gbɛɛ nyan‑da.”
Min ma‑a gbɛ, mbɛ a wɛn mbe ka si ɔ mansa sea chɛ a, n‑na fenɛ yen a boo nyima a. An fen chɛ ni gboo yamba an na, fenɛ nyɛndenɛ ɛ a ya fea gbɛɛ ma. A a mendemende n fan ni, a a chiienɛ ɛ gba wɔnfea.
Mbɛ n‑na maeka gbasaen ba yen, ɛ tisa chɛ‑a, a kuiɛ ma sɛenɛ a, a ɔ, “Gbasaya bɛnden mu nyɔn ma, yuu tɛ koe a gboo chɛ ma, a ni a a fuin?”
Chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ nii ma bɔ ni banda bu ɔ, min ni yuu chɛ tɛ gboo chɛ ma, a ni a ɔ fɛn. Mɔ ɔ mɔ nii ma bɔ ni dunya wɛɛ ma, a basan faa a, min ni chɛ ma.
N‑na chinchima di chɛ wan, kɛn mɔ ɔ mɔ ma a gbasaya chɛ ma sɔn ni yuu chɛ tɛ koe a, gboo chɛ ɔ ni fɛn.

Mbɛ gbakoo chɛ n dɔndɔ‑a a fɔ n ye, a ɔ, “Sɛmbɛ di chɛ‑a. A yen ko, an mbe a wɛn chee, an dɔ, Chuda dambi ɔ mɔɛ n 'na yaa, a wan bɔ‑a Mansa Defidi 'a dambi ɔ, a kun‑da a chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ n ma. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, ɛ kun fan a ni yuu wɔnfea chɛ n tɛ gboo chɛ ma, a ni a ma fɛn.”

Mbɛ n‑na sa tɔngbɔɛ yen sɔ ɔ, mansa sea chɛ tɛ ɔ fɔɛ fen naanin chɛ n na, gbakoo chɛ n tɛtɛ ma. Sa chɛ bena ni wɔnfea, a ya wɛɛ ni wɔnfea, miin ni Yataa 'a nyina wɔnfea chɛ n na, miin na naen mu dunya gbɛɛ ɔ. A maen fan ni yɔ sa min faenɛ yasi a.
Mbɛ sa tɔngbɔɛ chɛ ta‑a gboo chɛ bia, a boo nyima chɛ a, a wɛn ni ka si ɔ mansa sea chɛ a.

Sa tɔngbɔɛ chɛ‑a a bia kɛn, mbɛ fɔɛ fen naanin chɛ nu, an bɛ gbakoo bi fea kun ma naanin chɛ n na, an‑na an kumbai gbangban a chen kɔɔ. Kɔninka an ni gbakoo chɛ n gbɛɛ boo a, ni sanu pani nu. Fen kunyɛ a diama an ni pani chɛ n gbɛɛ ɔ. Fen kunyɛ a diama chɛ n sin ni samunɛ an na, Yataa 'a mɔɛ n ni miin chɛ.

Mbɛ an‑na si nama a bɔ, an dɔ, “Gbasaya bɛnden mu i wan ma, gboo chɛ bia koe a, yuu tɛ koe a a ma. An‑na i wan fa, i 'a saya chɛ sin‑na a ma, i‑a mɔ gbu gbɛɛ kun ka Yataa ko a. Chɛ nu chɛnyɛ kunɛ n dɔ, chɛnyɛ koɛ n dɔ, ni dambi nu, an bɛ mɔ gbu kan kɔ kan na.
I‑a an ma mɔɛ n na, Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ, tɛ mɔɛ mu miin na, miin mbe ma‑a mansa a dunya chɛ kun ma.”
Mbɛ n‑na n ya a ta to, mbɛ n‑na maeka n kuiɛ a min, an wu sɛsɛ, dan mbe ee an ma. An ni sɔ ɔ mansa sea chɛ 'a tindanɛ wan, fɔɛ fen chɛ n na tindanɛ, a basan gbakoo chɛ n na.

An mbe dau‑a si a, an dɔ, “Basɔmaya bɛnden mu i wan ma, sa tɔngbɔɛ chɛ, an‑na min fa. Tando bɛnden mu i ma, gbasaya bɛnden mu i ma, a basan nyanɛ a, yiimatɛ wɛɛ to, a basan dɔgbɛaya a. Chɛ bɛnden mu dechee i wan ma.”

Mbɛ n‑na fɔɛ fen kan kɔ kan kuiɛ a min. Fɔɛ fenɛ miin ni banda bu ɔ, chɛ nu dunya ma, faa nɛnɛ n bɛɛ, ni fɔɛ fen chɛ n gbɛɛ yii ɔ. An mbe a fɔ‑a, an dɔ, “Mɔɛ chɛ min mbe si ɔ mansa sea a, an fea sa tɔngbɔɛ chɛ a, an fan ta mu tando a, a basan basɔmaya a, dɔgbɛaya, a basan manɛ a, kuɔ fɔ ni kuɔ fɔ ko a.”
Mbɛ fɔɛ fen naanin chɛ n dɔ, “A ni ma ka.” Mbɛ gbakoo chɛ n gbɛɛ‑a an kumbai gbangban, an‑na Yataa fai, an fea sa tɔngbɔɛ chɛ a.
N ya to‑a ka wan sa tɔngbɔɛ chɛ a, mbɛ a‑a yuu saa tɛ gboo chɛ ma. Mbɛ fɔɛ fen naanin chɛ n dɔndɔ, n‑na a kuiɛ a min, min ni yɔ banda koɔ kuiɛ. A ɔ, “Na wɛ, i ni ta.”

Mbɛ n‑na n ya a sɛ, mbɛ n‑na soo gbɛ yen. Mɔɛ min ni si ɔ a kun ma, tamba a dɛ fenɛ an ni a boo a, mbɛ mansa banfua be‑a a ma. A ni ta tena a 'a soo chɛ a, a ni chɛɛ sɛsɛ kun bia, a ni kun a chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ n ma.
Sa tɔngbɔɛ chɛ‑a yuu fean bɔɛ tɛ kɛn, mbɛ n‑na fɔɛ fenɛ fean bɔɛ wɛɛ kuiɛ a min, a ɔ, “Na wɛ, i ni ta.”
Mbɛ soo dɔ mende bɔ‑a a a to, a yawaenɛ yɔ ta. Mɔɛ min ni si ɔ soo chɛ kun ma, gbasaya been ni an ma, na koe a chɛɛ a dunya ma. A ni a ma, mɔɛ n ni an nyɔn fa. Chɛɛ chɛ mɛ wa, an been ni a ma.

Sa tɔngbɔɛ chɛ‑a yuu sawan bɔɛ tɛ kɛn, n‑na fɔɛ fenɛ sawan bɔɛ kuiɛ a min fan, a ɔ, “Na wɛ, i ni ta.” N‑na soo finɛ yen, min sɔen mu tima ko a, daun fen koe gbɛ kaka tima min na. Mɔɛ min ni si ɔ a kun ma, sechee dɔndɔ an ni dɛn dɔ a boo a, daun fenɛ siman koe a.
Mbɛ n‑na fenɛ kuiɛ a min, yɔ mɔ gbu kuiɛ. An kuiɛ chɛ bɔ‑a fɔɛ fen naanin chɛ n fan tɛ ɔ. A ɔ, “Tee dɔndɔ pawa, ɛ biidi dɔndɔ gbe an san‑da. Chɛɛ i ma tu ban, a basan gbɛ a.”
Sa tɔngbɔɛ chɛ‑a yuu naanin bɔɛ tɛ kɛn, mbɛ n‑na fɔɛ fenɛ naanin bɔɛ kuiɛ a min, a ɔ, “Na wɛ, i ni ta.”

Mbɛ a yen ko, n‑na soo yen, a gboo maenɛ ɛ panfuan. Mɔɛ min ni soo chɛ kun ma, a tɔ ni Saya. A bɔɛ min sin ni na tena, a gbaa chia a, a tana, a tɔ ni Faa. Gbasaya been fan ni an ma, dunya chɛ ɔ mɔɛ n kaka dɔndɔ kun ma, ni an mɔɛ chɛ n du‑a kaina naaninɛ a. Gbasaya be‑a wan an ma mɔɛ n fa koe a, chɛɛ chɛ mɛ a. A yɛ to, an ni an fa daun fen daun sɔɛ a, ni gbandi yama a, a basan bia chɛ soe n na.
Sa tɔngbɔɛ chɛ‑a yuu duun bɔɛ tɛ kɛn, mbɛ gbengbe kɔɔ, fen kunyɛ a diama ɛ minda min ma, n‑na fuɛ n yen. An na‑a chɛ n fan fa tee, sɔ koe a den an 'na danaya ɔ Yataa a, a basan Yataa 'a bai sa koe a.

Mbɛ an‑na yee tɛ dɔndɔ a, an dɔ, “Yataa wa, nn 'na mansa, i kan nyɔ ee, i teaen mu. Mɔɛ n yen ko, miin‑na nn fa dunya ma. I ma tima ɔ yansama ya to, na koe a, i ni kaa a tɛ an ma, mbɛ i‑a tɔɔya si an bɛɛ a.”

Mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu, an‑na miin fa ka, doma wa dɔndɔ dɔndɔ be‑a an ma, doma gbɛ fo. Mbɛ a fɔ‑a an ye, mbɛ an ni a ma kɔn, aan an bɔɛ wai chɛ mɔɛ n da ni fa, an suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, miin mbe fa‑a yɔ an fan.
Sa tɔngbɔɛ chɛ‑a yuu wɔdɔn bɔɛ tɛ kɛn, n‑na n ya a ta, mbɛ a yen ko, duu gboo samba‑a. A sin to, tee wɛɛ fin‑da wan yɔ chɛmbu, mbɛ kau yawa‑a yɔ wii.
Mbɛ tɔmbuaka n bea‑a duu ma, yɔ kɔnɛ dau ɛ bɔn buɛ min dɔ, ni fia wa bɔ‑a.
Banda tuin‑da, yɔ gboo a konde kondeenɛ. A sin to, kɔnkɔ kan kɔ kan ka‑a wan a gba ɔ, a basan yii tinɛ ɔ duu gboo kan kɔ kan na.

Mbɛ mansa wa chɛ n gbɛɛ dunya ma, ya ɔ sɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, soya n ya ɔ sɔɛ n gbɛɛ, ni nyan tɔɛ n bɛ mɔ chenama n na, mɔɛ n gbɛɛ dunya ma, chɛ nu yɔncha ɔ ni chɛ nu an fandi ko a, an gbɛɛ bun‑da an nun‑da. An bun‑da an nun‑da fanɛ n na, an mbe an nun fa gban kɔnkɔɛ n dɔ.

An mbe ta‑a kɔnkɔɛ n chee‑a, a basan sen gbu wa an na, an dɔ, “Wo na, wo ni bun nn kun ma, wo ni nn nun. Wo nn nun mɔɛ chɛ ma, min mbe si ɔ mansa sea, a ma na nn yen. Wo nn nun, sa tɔngbɔɛ ma na faa tɛ‑a bɔ nn ma.
Koe min na mu, tee ma chianden ba che‑a, an mbe mɔ ɔ mɔ a tɔɔ‑a tee min ma. A sin, mɔ ɔ mɔ kun mbe ee bɔ tena a ɔ.”

Chɛ gbakɔ, n‑na min nɛnɛ ɔ yen gbɛ, n‑na maeka naaninɛ n yen fan, an mbe sɔ ɔ dunya tɔnkɔn naaninɛ ɔ. Mbɛ fia min ni bɔ tena dunya gbɛɛ ɔ, mbɛ maeka chɛ n‑na a a gban. An‑na chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, fia gbɛɛ duu gboo ma, a gbɛɛ kɔ yii a, ni kɔn kan kɔ kan dɔ, a ni sɛmbɛ bɔ koe a.

Mbɛ n‑na maeka dɔ gbɛɛ yen, ɛ ka‑a tee bɔ. Fenɛ ni wan a boo a, min mbe nyɛnɛ sa mɔɛ ma. Yataa, min mbe ee fa kuɔ fɔ ko a, an‑na fen chɛ be a ma. Mbɛ a‑a maeka naanin chɛ n chee gbankon, maeka chɛ nu, gbasaya beenɛ ɛ ka miin ma, ko yama ma koe a duu gboo ma, mbɛ an‑na a ma kɔ yii ɔ.
Maeka chɛ ɔ, “Wo sɛmbɛ, wo ma ko yama ma duu gboo a, wo ma a ma kɔ yii a, wo ma a ma kɔnɛ n na. Wo a ma kɔn, aan nn ni nyɛnɛ sa Yataa 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ n ya kɔɔ.”
Mbɛ an‑na mɔɛ n danɛ fɔ n ye, mɔɛ chɛ nu, maeka‑a nyɛnɛ sa miin ya kɔɔɛ. Mɔ wu chɛmɛ dɔndɔ, wu bi naanin kun ma naaninɛ ni (144,000). An mɔɛ chɛ n na‑a bɔ wan dambi kan kɔ kan dɔ Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n tɛ ɔ.
Mɔ wu tan kun ma fea (12,000), an na‑a bɔ Chuda dambi ɔ, wu tan kun ma fea (12,000) bɔ‑a Dubɛn dambi ɔ, wu tan kun ma fea (12,000) bɔ‑a Kadi dambi ɔ. An gbɛɛ‑a nyɛnɛ ma sɔn an ya kɔɔɛ.

Mɔ wu tan kun ma fea (12,000), an na‑a bɔ Asaa dambi ɔ, wu tan kun ma fea (12,000) bɔ‑a Nafadi dambi ɔ, wu tan kun ma fea (12,000) bɔ‑a Manasɛ dambi ɔ. An bɛɛ, an gbɛɛ‑a nyɛnɛ ma sɔn fan to an ya kɔɔɛ.

Mɔ wu tan kun ma fea (12,000), an na‑a bɔ Simiyɔn dambi ɔ, wu tan kun ma fea (12,000) bɔ‑a Difai dambi ɔ, wu tan kun ma fea (12,000) bɔ‑a Isaka dambi ɔ. An bɛɛ to, an gbɛɛ‑a nyɛnɛ ma sɔn fan to an ya kɔɔɛ.

Mɔ wu tan kun ma fea (12,000), an na‑a bɔ Sɛbudɔn dambi ɔ, wu tan kun ma fea (12,000) bɔ‑a Chosɛfi dambi ɔ, mbɛ wu tan kun ma fea (12,000) bɔ‑a Bɛnchamin dambi ɔ. An gbɛɛ‑a nyɛnɛ ma sɔn fan an ya kɔɔɛ.

Chɛ gbakɔ, mbɛ n‑na n ya a ta to, a yen ko, n‑na mɔ fanka wa yen, mɔ ee che an dan‑da. Mɔɛ chɛ n bɔ‑a wan chɛnyɛ kun kan kɔ kan dɔ, an bɔ‑a chɛnyɛ koɛ kan kɔ kan dɔ, ni dambi kan kɔ kan, a basan mɔ gbu kan kɔ kan na. An gbɛɛ ni wan sɔ ɔ, an ya a mundenɛ ɛ mansa sea chɛ ma, an ya a mundenɛ ɛ sa tɔngbɔɛ chɛ ma. An gbɛɛ ni koa gbɛ an dɔ, gbɛ nyanda bianɛ ɛ an boo a, buɔdia bɔɛ a.
Mbɛ an‑na chee chɛ gbankon, an dɔ, “Yataa an‑na mmɔ baun, a wɛn mbe si ɔ a 'a mansa sea a. Sa tɔngbɔɛ wɛɛ, a‑a mmɔ baun fan.”
Maeka n gbɛɛ ni wan sɔ ɔ mansa sea chɛ 'a tindanɛ, gbakoo chɛ n 'na tindanɛ, an bɛ fɔɛ fen naanin chɛ n na. Mbɛ an‑na an fandi ɔ fuin duu ma susu gbuu, mansa sea chɛ chen kɔɔ, an‑na Yataa fai.
An dɔ, “A ni ma ka. Basɔmaya ɛ be Yataa an ma. An gbasa, a 'a yiimatɛ koo, a sin dɔ gbɛ kaka. Tando ni be a ma, wai bɔɛ ni chɛ a a, kuɔ fɔ, ni kuɔ fɔ ko a.”
Mbɛ gbakoo chɛ n dɔndɔ, a‑a n dɔ tisa, a ɔ, “Mɔɛ chɛ nu koa gbɛ ɔ, nyɔn n mbe ee nɛ, an sin ka‑a gbɛ mende?”

Mbɛ n dɔ, “Kai, n ma ko ɔ sɔn chɛ ma. N mbe i wan dɔ tisa chɛ a.” Mbɛ a ɔ n ma, “Mɔɛ chɛ nu miin kun bɔ‑a ko gbɛama wa chɛ ɔ, an fan nɛ ka. An fan‑na an 'na koa n ko, an‑na an gbɛ fo, sa tɔngbɔɛ chɛ wii a.
Chɛ an fɛ mu, an mbe sɔ ɔ Yataa Mansa chen kɔɔ. Su ɔ tee a, an mbe a 'a chenɛ a, an mbe a fai‑a. A wɛn sin mbe si ɔ a 'a mansa sea, ɛ an konde gbain‑da wan nɔ.
Kɔnkɔɛ ee an bia‑a to kuɔ fɔ, an kanɛ, a ee gbaa‑a to kuɔ fɔ. Tee wa ee bɔ‑a an ma, a winɛ ni si an dɔ.
Koe min na mu, sa tɔngbɔɛ chɛ sɔ ɔ mansa sea chɛ baima, ɛ ma‑a wan an kun ma fɛn mɔɛ a. A sin mbe chia yian‑da wan an na, an ni yii ma sɔn, min mbe fɔɛ be. A sin to, Yataa ɛ di ka‑a wan an ya a.”
Mbɛ sa tɔngbɔɛ chɛ‑a yuu wɔnfean bɔɛ tɛ kɛn, kaina ɔ maun‑da wan don banda bu ɔ, miniti bi sawa ko a.
Mbɛ n‑na maeka wɔnfea n yen, miin mbe ma Yataa baima, wai chɛ koe a. An‑na buu wɔnfea an be wan an ma.

Mbɛ maeka dɔndɔ na‑a, a sɔ‑a gbengbe chɛ baima. Pani min mbe a boo a, a nyanden mu sanu an dɔ. Fen kunyɛ a diama been fan ni a ma, Yataa 'a mɔɛ n 'na samunɛ ma munda koe a. A yɛ to, a minda koe a sanu gbengbe chɛ ma, mansa sea chɛ ya kɔɔɛ.
Mbɛ fen kunyɛ a diama chɛ, a sisi sɛ‑a, a basan Yataa 'a mɔɛ n 'na samunɛ a. Sisi chɛ sɛ‑a wan, a bɔ maeka chɛ boo ɔ, min mbe Yataa baima.

Mbɛ maeka chɛ‑a sanu pani chɛ ya, mbɛ a‑a a a fa ta a, a‑a min ya gbengbe chɛ ma. Mbɛ a‑a fen kunyɛ a diama ta chɛ ya, a‑a a a bɔn dunya chɛ ɔ. A ya kɔɔɛ a, banda koɔ‑a gbau gbau, banda manɛ ɛ ta‑a ben‑da mia mia, sɔnkɔ sɔnkɔ chɛ kuiɛ ɛ ta‑a bɔ‑a, duu gboo wɛɛ samba‑a to gbididi.
Mbɛ maeka wɔnfea chɛ nu, buu wɔnfea chɛ ɛ miin boo ɔ, an‑na an ma bɛn an fɛ koe a.

Maeka saa‑a a ta buu fɛ kɛn, mbɛ ko sɛsɛ ma‑a. Sankɔɛ bɔn‑da wan, ni ta basan wii a dunya chɛ ma. Ni dunya chɛ du‑a si tena sawa a, a si tena dɔndɔɛ minda‑a wan. Kɔnɛ n bɛɛ si tena dɔndɔ minda‑a wan, a basan chin fen kan kɔ kan na.
Mbɛ maeka fean bɔɛ wɛɛ, a‑a a ta buu fɛ. Mbɛ fenɛ, yɔ kɔnkɔ wa dɛgbɛ, ta sonko sɔenɛ ɛ a ma, a a dɛ‑a kɔ yii ɔ. Kɔ yii chɛ, ni a du‑a si tena sawa a, a si tena dɔndɔɛ wɛɛ fan‑da wan wii a.
A yɛ to, fɔɛ fenɛ n gbɛɛ kɔ yii chɛ ɔ, ni an du‑a si tena sawa a, an si tena dɔndɔ fa‑a wan. Dɛndɛ wa n bɛɛ, ni an du‑a si tena sawa a, an si tena dɔndɔ yɔn‑da wan.
Maeka sawan bɔɛ‑a a ta buu fɛ. Mbɛ tɔmbuaka wa bea‑a a ka banda a, ɛ man‑da yɔ sanku. Mbɛ a bea‑a yii si tena dɔndɔ ɔ, ni a du‑a si tena sawa a.
Tɔmbuaka chɛ tɔ mu koee. A sin, min yii si tena dɔndɔɛ, ni a du‑a sawa a, a kona‑a wan. Mɔ sɛsɛ n fa‑a wan yii chɛ boo ɔ, koe min na mu, a ni kona a min koe a.

Mbɛ maeka naanin bɔɛ‑a a ta buu fɛ. Tee ni ma, kau, a basan tɔmbuaka n na, an gbɛɛ ma‑a dama. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, an ma manɛ be ni tima ɛnden ko a. Ni tee du‑a si tena sawa a, tee nii ma bɔ ni si tena dɔndɔ ko a. Ni pimbi wɛɛ du‑a si tena sawa a, kau basan tɔmbuaka n na, an ma manɛ be ni si tena dɔndɔ ko a.

Mbɛ n‑na n ya a ta, n‑na kochɛ yen ben‑da banda a. Mbɛ a koɔ‑a gbankon, a ɔ, “Kasaa na‑a, kasaa na‑a, kasaa na‑a dunya ma mɔɛ n ko a. Kasaa chɛ ma ɛ chian‑da wan, buu tɔɛ chɛ nu, maeka sawa chɛ n boo a, an fɛenɛ ma.”
Mbɛ maeka duun bɔɛ‑a a ta buu fɛ. Tɔmbuaka na‑a ka wan banda a, a bea‑a duu ma, mbɛ n‑na a yen. Chi been fan ni tɔmbuaka chɛ ma, son chɛ da a ka koe a, son chɛ min danka ee.
A‑a son chɛ da a ka kɛn, sisi sonko sɔ‑a a ɔ, yɔ sɛnɛ minda sisi. Mbɛ sisi fia‑a banda bia, a pimbi bun‑da tee ma, a ee yen to.
Mbɛ kondonɛ n bɔ‑a sisi chɛ ɔ banda a, an yii‑a dunya chɛ ɔ. A sin, gbasaya been fan ni an ma, yɔ gbasaya min nyɔn sima ɛ chinchima n boo ɔ dunya ma, mɔɛ n bon koe a.

A fɔen fan ni an ye, mbɛ an ma ko yama kan kɔ kan ma bin gbii a dunya chɛ ɔ. An ma a ma yamba kuunɛ n bɛɛ a, an ma a ma kɔnɛ n na. Chɛɛ an ni a ma mɔɛ chɛ n fan na dechee, Yataa 'a nyɛn chɛ ma sa ni miin ya kɔɔɛ.
A fɔen fan ni an ye, mbɛ an ma mɔɛ chɛ n fa. Chɛɛ an ni an tɔɔ kau duu ko a, tɔɔya min mbe ma, yɔ ni chinchima‑a mɔɛ bon.
An kau duu chɛ tɛ ɔ suun, mɔɛ n toen fan ni an ni fa, an ni bɔ tɔɔya ɔ, chɛɛ an ma fa ni. An‑na an fa chia yan fan, chɛɛ saya‑a an ma sangba wan.

Ni mɔ na‑a kondon chɛ n yen, an ni wan yɔ ni soo n sɔ‑a an gbee ma, an ma bɛndenɛ ɛ ta koe a chɛɛ ɔ. A maen fan ni yɔ sanu mansa banfua an ni si ɔ an kunɛ n na, an ya kɔɔɛ nan sin ni wan yɔ mɔ gbu ta.
An kundi maen fan ni yɔ musu n ta, an nyinɛ bɔenɛ a sa ɔ yɔ yaa nu.
An na‑a doma don fan, miin nyanden ni kundu ɔ. An kamban dɔ kuiɛ ni bɔ tena wan yɔ mɔto gbingbi nu, soo n mbe miin sawan, ta koe a chɛɛ ɔ.
An fɛ bɔen fan ni yɔ chinchima nu, an sin ni bonɛ chɛ wan. An fɛ bonda chɛ sin fan‑na gbasaya be an ma, mɔɛ n tɔɔya koe a kau duu ko a.

Mansa ni wan an kun ma, min ni maeka chɛ a, min ni son chɛ kun ma, sonɛ min danka ee ka. An mbe an maeka chɛ chee Ibu koɛ ɔ, an dɔ, Abadon. Kiisi mɔɛ n sin, an dɔ, Apɔdiyon, yɔ mɔɛ ɛ a fɔ, a ɔ, Fen yɔn fenɛ.
Kasaa saa ben‑da, chɛɛ chɛ gbakɔ, a yen ko, kasaa fea ɛ to gbaa a.
Mbɛ maeka wɔdɔn bɔɛ‑a a ta buu fɛ. Mbɛ n‑na kuiɛ a min, a bɔ sanu gbengbe chɛ tɔnkɔn naaninɛ ɔ, fen kunyɛ a diama ɛ minda ka min ma, Yataa chen kɔɔ.
Maeka wɔdɔn bɔɛ chɛ, buu chɛ ɛ ka min boo a, kuiɛ chɛ ɔ te a ma, a ɔ, “Maeka naanin chɛ nu, Yataa‑a a ma miin chiienɛ ɛ Yufatesi yii wa da a, yuu tɛ an ma.”

Maeka wɔdɔn bɔɛ chɛ‑a yuu tɛ wan maeka naanin chɛ n ma, miin ni bia a ɔ. An ni san chɛ an ma kɔn tena, kau chɛ ɔ, tee chɛ ma, ni tima chɛ kɔɔ, Yataa ni a boo ka an ma. Mɔɛ n gbɛɛ dunya ɔ, ni an du‑a si tena sawa a, maeka chɛ n ni si tena dɔndɔɛ chɛ n fa.
An‑na a fɔ wan n ye, mbɛ soya mɔɛ miin ni si ɔ soo chɛ n kun ma, an kɔ ni koo aan, dan nii an ma.

N‑na soo chɛ n yen, ni mɔɛ nu si ɔ an kun ma. An mɔɛ chɛ nu, kundu doma min ni an ma, an yawaenɛ ni yɔ tonkan ta. A yɛ to, a kɔ finden fan ni, a basan a man buɛ dɔ mende a. Soo chɛ n kunɛ sin maen fan ni yɔ yaa kunɛ. An da sin dɔ, ta an ni bɔ tena ɔ, a basan sisi a, ni senɛ min ni gbandi yɔ ta.
Ta chɛ, a basan sisi chɛ a, ni sen gbandima chɛ, miin ni bɔ tena an da ɔ, an‑na mɔɛ sɛsɛ fa wan. Mɔɛ miin ni dunya ɔ, an duenɛ si tena sawa a, kaka dɔndɔɛ fa‑a wan, kasaa sawa chɛ boo ɔ.
Soo chɛ nu, an ni mɔɛ fa gbasaya min na, a nii an da dechee ɔ, a ni wan an fɛ wɛɛ ɔ. An fɛ da ni wan a sunɛ a, yɔ ka, an sin ni mɔɛ n nimisa an na.

Chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin kunɛ bɔ‑a koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ɔ, an ma an kan kɔ sɔ ni an 'na ko yama n na. An ma an boo bɔ ni nyina yama n fai koe a, ni fen chɛ n fai koe a, miin ma Yataa a. Fen chɛ nu, an fandi, an mbe miin nyan senɛ ɔ, sanu ɔ, kainɛ ɔ, kɔnɛ ɔ, a basan fen dɔ mende n na. Fenɛ miin mu ka, an ya ee kaina yen, an too wɛɛ ee koe a min, an sin mbe ee tachɛ chɛ.
Mɔɛ fa koe wɛɛ, an ni miin ma, an ma an kan kɔ sɔ ni a a. An ma an kan kɔ sɔ ni an 'na suaya wa a, a basan an 'na ko tɛ a, ni an 'na kanka chɛ. An ma an kan kɔ sɔ ni chɛ dɔndɔ wɛɛ a.

Chɛ gbakɔ, mbɛ n‑na maeka dɔ mende yen yii‑a, a ka banda bu ɔ, min ni gbasa. A ma koa ni dugbu an na, ninkinankantuu tindandenɛ ɛ a kunɛ a. A ya kɔɔɛ ni man tena wan yɔ tee, a chenɛ n sin ni wan yɔ ta sanku manɛ.
Gboo nyɛndenɛ ni wan a boo a, min nii ma koo, a ɔ fuindenɛ ɛ. Mbɛ a‑a a boo nyima ɔ chenɛ sɔ kɔ yii ɔ, a man dɔ chenɛ sin to‑a sɔ ɔ duu gboo ma.
Mbɛ a‑a yee wa tɛ, yɔ yaa ɛ ma dau‑a. Mbɛ a‑a yee chɛ tɛ kɛn, banda koɔ‑a gba wɔnfea.
Banda chɛ sɛmbɛ‑a kɛn koɔ koe a, a‑a min gbɛɛ fɔ, n toen ni n ni a nyɛn. Chɛɛ n‑na kuiɛ a min fan, a ka banda bu ɔ, a ɔ, “Koe chɛ n sa i yii ma. I ma an nyɛn gboo ma.”
Mbɛ n‑na maeka wa chɛ min yen ka sɔ ɔ kɔ yii ɔ, ni duu gboo ma, a‑a a boo nyima a si banda a.

Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “Tima ban‑da, makɔn chɛ tima Yataa boo ɔ.” A ɔ, a ɛ ka tea an fɔ tena, a ɔ, Yataa tɔɛ ɔ. Yataa min mu, a ee fa kuɔ fɔ ko a, min‑na banda bu ɔ a dan, a basan fen fen na, miin mbe nɔ. A yɛ to, a‑a dunya a dan, a basan fen fen na dunya ɔ, a‑a kɔ yii wɛɛ a dan, ni fenɛ miin gbɛɛ ɛ a ɔ.

A ɔ, “Yataa na‑a a yii ma koe n fɔ wan a 'a yɔnɛ n ye, a 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ nu. Ni maeka wɔnfean bɔɛ chɛ‑a a ta buu fɛ, an koe chɛ nu, an mbe ban‑da wan ma‑a. An mbe ma‑a wan, yɔ a na‑a fɔ buɛ min dɔ an ye.”

Mbɛ kuiɛ chɛ, min ka‑a banda bu ɔ, a koɔ‑a to n tena, a ɔ, “Ta, i ni gboo nyɛnden chɛ bia. A bia maeka chɛ boo ɔ, min chenɛ dɔndɔɛ ɛ sɔ ɔ kɔ yii ɔ, dɔndɔɛ ɛ sɔ ɔ duu gboo ma, gboo chɛ da a kaenɛ ɛ a boo a.”
N ta‑a, n‑na maeka chɛ tan. N‑na a tan kɛn, a ɔ tisa koe a gboo chɛ be koe a n ma, a ɔ te n ma, “Gboo chɛ bia, i ni a daun. I da ɔ, ɛ chinchia‑a wan yɔ kuminɛ, chɛɛ a konama an mbe ma‑a i bu ɔ.”
Mbɛ gboo nyɛnden chɛ, min nii ma koo, n‑na a bia a boo ɔ, mbɛ n‑na a daun. A ni chinchi n da ɔ yɔ kuminɛ, chɛɛ a kona‑a wan n bu ɔ.
Mbɛ n‑na kuiɛ dɔ n na min, an dɔ, “Chɛnyɛ kun kan kɔ kan, chɛnyɛ koɛ kan kɔ kan, mɔ gbu kan kɔ kan, a basan an 'na mansa wa n gbɛɛ a dunya ɔ, Yataa 'a sakana bai ɔ yian, a si an gbɛɛ ma.”
Chɛ gbakɔ, mɔɛ‑a kɔn denɛ be wan n ma, a yansama yɔ fen siman fenɛ. Mbɛ Yataa‑a n sɔ, a ɔ, “Ta n 'na chenɛ a, i ni a siman, a basan a ɔ gbengbe a, mbɛ i yɛ‑a, i‑a mɔɛ chɛ n dan, miin mbe nɔ n fai‑a.”

A ɔ, “Chɛɛ chen chɛ baa ma, kata chɛ ɔ, i ma a siman, an nɛnɛ to ka.” A ɔ, “Koe min na mu, a been mu mɔɛ chɛ n fan ma, miin ma n sɔn.” A ɔ, “Mɔ yama mu an na, miin mbe gbasaya din‑da n 'na duu wa kun ma, kau bi naanin kun ma fea (42) ko a.”

A ɔ, “N mbe n 'na siiya fea n na na‑a wan, miin mbe n 'na sakana bai chɛndɛ ɔ yian‑da.” A ɔ, “An ma bɛndenɛ ɛ ma‑a wan yɔ sanka‑a mɔɛ miin tan an 'na chenɛ a.” A ɔ, “A sin, an mbe n 'na sakana bai ɔ yian‑da wan, an kau bi naanin kun ma fea (42) chɛ n dɔ.”

Mɔ fea chɛ n mu, miin mbe Yataa 'a sakana bai sa, an mbe sɔ ɔ wan a chen kɔɔ, a wɛn mu mansa a dunya chɛ kun ma. An mu kɔn fea chɛ n fan na, an mbe miin chee, an dɔ, wodifi kɔnɛ, an mu to, dambo si fen fea chɛ an na.
Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ toen mu, a ni ko yama ma an na, ta an mbe bɔ an da ɔ, mbɛ a‑a an chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ chɛ fa. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, mɔ ɔ mɔ min toen ni a ni ko yama ma an na, ɛ fa wan.

Gbasaya ɛ wan an boo ɔ, banda da a tɔn koe a, min mbe a ma, sona ee na‑a tee chɛ n ko a, an mbe ma‑a Yataa 'a sakana bai sa‑a. Gbasaya ɛ wan to an boo ɔ, yii kan kɔ kan mun koe a wii a, ko yama kan kɔ kan ma koe a dunya ma. A sin, ni an toen mu chɛ n ma koe a tima sɛsɛ ko a, an mbe an ma wan.
An mbe ban‑da kɛn Yataa 'a sakana bai chɛ sa‑a, soe ma chianden ba, ɛ bɔ‑a wan son chɛ ɔ, min danka ee ka, mbɛ a‑a chɛɛ bun an ma. Ɛ kun‑da wan an ma, mbɛ a‑a an fa.

A sin, an su n mbe ma‑a wan sa ɔ, dani wa dɔndɔ ma, duu wa chɛ ɔ. Duu wa chɛ, an 'na mansa, mɔɛ n na‑a a gbangban kaina min kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma. Mɔɛ n mbe duu wa chɛ chee‑a wan, yiima dɔ mende ɔ, an dɔ, Sɔdɔn, an ni a chee, an dɔ, Ichipi.

Mɔɛ n mbe na‑a wan, a bɔ chɛnyɛ kun kan kɔ kan dɔ, chɛnyɛ koɛ kan kɔ kan, dambi kan kɔ kan, ni mɔ gbu kan kɔ kan. An mbe na‑a wan, an ni an su chɛ n yen. A sin, an mbe ee dɔn‑da mɔ ɔ mɔ ni an su chɛ n ya, a ni an tɔn. An mbe chɛ ma‑a wan, tee sawa ni a tɔɛ ko a.
Dunya ɔ mɔɛ n bu ɔ dia‑a wan, a si mɔ fea chɛ n fa koe ma. An mbe buɔdia bɔ‑a wan, mbɛ an‑na samba fenɛ a ta an nyɔn tena, a mu min na, mɔ fea chɛ n na‑a wan tɔɔya an ma dunya chɛ ɔ.
Chɛɛ tee sawa, ni a tɔɛ chɛ ben‑da kɛn, Yataa‑a fɔɛ a yɛ wan an dɔ, mbɛ an‑na an kɔɔ sɔ, an sɔ‑a. A sin, mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ‑a chɛ ɔ yen, an chian‑da wan kaka.
Mbɛ mɔ fea chɛ n‑na kuiɛ wa a min, a ka banda bu ɔ, a ɔ, “Wo sɛ nɛ.” An chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ chɛ n ya to‑a ka wan an na, mbɛ an ya‑a, an sɛ‑a banda bu ɔ, dugbu wa ɔ.

A sin, a tima chɛ kɔɔ, duu gboo samba‑a wan, a ma chianden ba a. An duu wa duenɛ si tena tanɛ a, kaka dɔndɔɛ yɔn‑da gbae. Mɔ wu wɔnfea n (7,000) fa‑a. Mɔɛ tɔɛ n chian‑da wan, a ɔ benden ba a, mbɛ an‑na Yataa tando, banda bu ɔ mansa.
Kasaa fean bɔɛ chɛ ben‑da wan, chɛɛ a yen ko, kasaa sawan bɔɛ ɛ gbaa.

Mbɛ maeka wɔnfean bɔɛ‑a a ta buu fɛ. Mbɛ maeka nu banda bu ɔ, n‑na an kuiɛ a min, an mbe koɔ‑a gbankon, an dɔ, “Mmɔ 'a mansa Yataa, an fea kunka mansa a, a‑a a boo sɔ min ma, gbasaya ɛ gbɛ dechee an fan boo ɔ, ma koe a mansa a dunya chɛ gbɛɛ kun ma. A sin, Yataa ɛ ma‑a wan a 'a mansaya chɛ ɔ, kuɔ fɔ ni kuɔ fɔ ko a.”
Mbɛ gbakoo bi fea kun ma naanin chɛ nu, miin ni ka si ɔ an 'na mansa sea n na, Yataa chen kɔɔ, an‑na an fandi ɔ fuin susu gbuu, mbɛ an‑na a fai.
An dɔ, “Yataa mansa, i wɛn gbasa, i wɛn ni nɔ suun, e tun nɔ sanche. Nn mbe i wai bɔ tena, i 'a gbasaya wa, i‑a a ya, i bun‑da i 'a mansaya a tachɛ‑a.

Mɔɛ miin ma i sɔn, an faa tɛen fan ni yama yama, chɛɛ i ta faatɛ che‑a gbɛ a ma, kaa a tɛ tima che‑a gbɛ fuɛ n ma. I 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ nu, gbonka chɛ mɔɛ nu i ko a, an 'na tɔnɔnɛ tima che‑a gbɛ. I 'a mɔɛ nu, an bɛ mɔɛ n na, miin mbe chian i tɔɛ ma, yɔn tɔɛ n bɛ nyan tɔɛ n na, an 'na tima che‑a. Miin mbe kasaa‑a dunya ɔ, an kasaa tima che‑a.”

Mbɛ Yataa 'a chenɛ, banda bu ɔ, a da a ka‑a. Mbɛ a 'a chen chɛ bu ɔ, mɔ ni kakaa yen fan nɔ. An kakaa chɛ, an ni a ɔ yian, mbɛ Yataa na‑a dɔbɛnɛ chɛ wan a 'a mɔɛ n na, Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ nu. Mbɛ banda manɛ mia mia bun‑da ben‑da, banda ɛ ta‑a koɔ‑a gbau gbau, sɔnkɔ sɔnkɔ chɛ kuiɛ ɛ ta‑a bɔ‑a. Duu gboo samba‑a gbididi, sankɔɛ ɛ ta‑a bɔn‑da.

Mbɛ n‑na kamaya koe wa ɔ yen, ɛ ma‑a banda bu ɔ. N‑na musu yen, tee chɛndɛ chɛndɛ ni min ma koa a, a sin, a ni a chenɛ ɔ suin tena kau an ma. Mansa banfua ni wan a kun na, tɔmbuaka tan kun ma fean ni min ma.
A bu cheen ba ni, ɛ yee tɛ‑a, a bu ɔ tɛenɛ ɛ, ɛ a dumɛ‑a pien.

Mbɛ n‑na kamaya koe wa dɔ mende ɔ yen to ma‑a banda bu ɔ. A yen ko, n‑na fɔɛ fen ba dɛgbɛ wa yen, yii ɔ fenɛ, min gboo bɔen mu fai gboo a. A yawaenɛ ni, a kunɛ ɛ wɔnfea, a bena n sin mbe tan. A kun wɔnfea chɛ n na, mansa banfua ma bɛndenɛ an ni si ɔ an gbɛɛ a.

Tɔmbuaka chɛ nu, miin ni banda a, ni an du‑a sawa a, a fɛ‑a si tena dɔndɔɛ fian fan, a‑a an bondan duu gboo ma. Fɔɛ fen ma chianden chɛ sɔ‑a wan musu chɛ ya kɔɔ, a ma bɛndenɛ ɛ a 'a den chɛ kanun koe a, ni a‑a a suun dechee.

Mbɛ a‑a den kaienɛ suun, min mbe na tena ma‑a mansa a, dunya gbɛɛ ko a, a sin mbe ee a 'a mansaya a tachɛ‑a chinchincha ɔ. Maeka‑a den chɛ ya wan, a ya kɔɔɛ a, a sɛ‑a Yataa tena, si ɔ a 'a mansaya sea a.
Musu chɛ‑a bui sa wan a a, a ta‑a fuinɛ ma, Yataa na‑a kaina ɔ bɛn kaina a ko a. A ɛ ma‑a nɔ wan, a kun ma ni fɛn kau bi naanin kun ma fea (42) ko a.

Mbɛ chɛɛ bea‑a gbɛ banda bu ɔ. Maeka chɛ n 'na mansa dɔndɔ, min tɔ ni Maikɛɛ, an bɛ a bɔɛ n na, miin ni a kɔɔ, an‑na chɛɛ bun fɔɛ fen ba chɛ ma. Fɔɛ fen chɛ wɛɛ, an bɛ a 'a maeka n na, an‑na an kun si an na.
Chɛɛ an ma kun ni chɛɛ chɛ ma, a sin, an‑na an bai wan kaina a banda bu ɔ.

Fɔɛ fen ma chianden ba chɛ, a a bea‑a wan dunya ɔ, a ka banda bu ɔ. Ka kɔkɔ wa chɛ, min tɔ mu Sitana, nyina yama n 'na mansa, min mbe a ma mɔ gbu ɛ ko yama ma, a a bea‑a wan dunya ɔ, an bɛ a bɔɛ n na.

Mbɛ n‑na mɔɛ koɔ kuiɛ a min, a ka banda bu ɔ. A koɔ‑a gbankon, a ɔ, “Mmɔ 'a Yataa‑a chɛɛ fo gbɛ. Ɛ a 'a gbasaya a tachɛ wan gbɛ, a 'a mansaya dunya kun ma. Yataa 'a Chasi wɛɛ, mmɔ kun ka mansa, ɛ a 'a gbasaya yian‑da wan dunya ɔ. Nyina yama n 'na mansa chɛ ee to sɔ ɔ Yataa chen kɔɔ, a ee to nɔ, kun yama si koe a mmɔ bɔɛ n kun ma su ɔ tee. Nyina yama chɛ fesan‑da nɔ, a a dɛ‑a dunya ɔ.
Mmɔ 'a mɔɛ n‑na Sitana bea chɛɛ ɔ, sa tɔngbɔɛ wii 'a gbasaya an dɔ mu, a basan Yataa 'a sakana bai a, an ni min sa. An nii ma chian ni saya ma.

Wo buɔdia bɔ, wo gbɛɛ, wo wɛn mbe banda bu ɔ. Chɛɛ wo wɛn mbe duu gboo ma, miin mbe kɔ yii ɔ, kasaa naen mu gba wo ko a. Nyina yama n 'na mansa, a fesan‑da nɛ, a a yii‑a nɔ wo kun ma, a faa gbandima wa ɛ, a‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ tima ma dɔɔya‑a, a 'a wai chɛ koe a.”
Fɔɛ fen ma chianden ba chɛ, a‑a a ɔ yen kɛn mbɛ an‑na a a bea dunya ɔ, a faa gbandia‑a. Mbɛ a‑a a ma bɛn, a bun‑da a sɔ‑a musu chɛ fɛ, musu min na‑a den kaien chɛ suun ka.

Chɛɛ musu chɛ‑a kamban fea ma sɔn fan, a kambanɛ bɔ‑a yɔ kochɛ. Mbɛ a tin‑da, a ta‑a pɔɔ fuinɛ ma, a ka‑a ka chɛ baima. A ta‑a an kaina chɛ, Yataa‑a kaina min dɔ bɛn a ko a, an mbe a kun ma fɛn‑da kaina min san sawa, ni a tɔɛ ko a.
Mbɛ ka chɛ‑a yii a fu, min ma‑a yii wa a, a ni ta musu chɛ san‑da, a ni ta a a.
Chɛɛ duu gboo‑a musu chɛ deman fan. Duu gboo‑a a da a ka wan, mbɛ a‑a yii chɛ gbɛɛ kanun, ka chɛ na‑a min na fu ka a da ɔ.

Chɛ‑a a ma wan, fɔɛ fen ma chianden chɛ faa gbandia‑a kaka, musu chɛ boo ɔ. Mbɛ a‑a a kun sɔ gbɛ musu chɛ cheeya n na, a‑a chɛɛ bun an ma. Cheeya chɛ nu, an mu mɔɛ chɛ n fan na, miin mbe Yataa da a kuiɛ ma, an sin, an kai faen fan mu tea chɛ a, min ka‑a Chisɔsi tena.
Mbɛ fɔɛ fen ba chɛ sɔ‑a tɛ kuu ma, kɔ yii chɛ tindi ma.

Mbɛ n‑na n ya a ta, n‑na soe wa yen, soe ma chianden ba, ɛ bɔ‑a yii ɔ. Chɛ nɛnɛ bena ni tan, a kunɛ ɛ wɔnfea. Mansa banfua an ni si ɔ a bena tan chɛ n kan kɔ kan na. A kun chɛ n sin gbɛɛ, tɔɛ nyɛnden fan ni an ma, tɔɛ miin ni mainɛ a Yataa tena.

N na‑a soe min yen ka, a bɔen ni kui an na. Chɛɛ a chenɛ ni wan yɔ nyima soe dɔ mende, a nyɛnsenɛ n bɔenɛ a sa n dɔ, a da sin yɔ yaa da. Mbɛ fɔɛ fenɛ ma chianden ba saa chɛ, a‑a a 'a sɔ tena dɔ be soe yama nama chɛ ma, a basan a 'a mansaya gbasaya wa dɔ a dunya ma.
Mbɛ n‑na a yen, an soe yama chɛ kunɛ dɔndɔɛ, tɛɛ paa wa dɛgbɛ ɛ wan a ma, tɛɛ min, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee dan a a, mbɛ a ni baun fan. Dunya gbɛɛ da ɔ gbaa‑a wan chɛ a, mbɛ an bea‑a a fɛ.

Mbɛ an‑na fɔɛ fen yama chɛ fai yɔ Yataa, min‑na a 'a gbasaya dɔ be ka a bɔɛ chɛ ma. Gbasaya chɛ be‑a ka soe yama min bɛɛ ma, an‑na a wɛɛ fai wan, an dɔ, “Mɔ ɔ mɔ ma gbasa, a ni che i ɔ. Mɔ ɔ mɔ ee che kun‑da i ma butuinɛ ɔ.”
Mbɛ soe yama chɛ bun‑da yonka bai n sa‑a, ɛ ta‑a Yataa main‑da. Chɛɛ Yataa‑a a too ka wan a ma, ma koe a an gbasaya chɛ ɔ, kau bi naanin kun ma fea (42) ko a.
A bun‑da a da a ka‑a, ɛ Yataa main, ɛ a tɔɛ ɔ yɔn, ɛ a waa ma nyin, a basan mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ a, miin mbe nɔ banda bu ɔ.

Yataa‑a a to wan nɔ, a‑a chɛɛ bun Yataa 'a mɔɛ n ma, a sin kun‑da wan an ma. A yɛ to, gbasaya be‑a wan a ma mɔɛ gbɛɛ kun ma dunya ɔ. Chɛ nu chɛnyɛ kunɛ n dɔ, chɛnyɛ koɛ n dɔ, ni dambi nu, an bɛ mɔ gbu kan kɔ kan na.

A sin, mɔɛ gbɛɛ dunya ma, an mbe a fai wan. Mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, miin mbe ee a fai‑a, an fan nɛ dechee mɔɛ chɛ n na, miin tɔɛ nyɛndenɛ ɛ gboo chɛ ɔ, a ka dunya a dan tima ma. Gboo chɛ, mɔɛ miin mbe kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da, an mbe min dɔ. An gboo chɛ, ɛ sa tɔngbɔɛ an boo ɔ, an‑na min fa.
Wo wɛn too ɛ koe a min, wo chɛ a min.

Mɔ ɔ mɔ, Yataa‑a min ma bia mɔɛ a, a mɔɛ chɛ ɛ ma‑a bia an dɔ. Mɔ ɔ mɔ, Yataa‑a min ma fa mɔɛ a, chɛɛ chɛ mɛ a, chɛɛ chɛ mɛ an mbe a mɔɛ chɛ fa‑a pɔɛ. Chɛ gbɛɛ‑a a yian fan ka, mbɛ Yataa 'a mɔɛ n danayaen fan mu, an sin mbe an faa bia wan to.
Mbɛ n‑na soe yama dɔ gbɛɛ yen to, min nɛnɛ bɔ‑a duu gboo ɔ. A tana, a bena ni fea yɔ sa tɔngbɔɛ, chɛɛ a kuiɛ maen fan ni yɔ fɔɛ fen ma chianden ba koɔ kuiɛ.
A‑a gbasaya gbɛɛ a tachɛ wan, min ni soe yama chɛ boo ɔ, paa wa chɛ ɛ ka min kunɛ ɔ. A ya kɔɔɛ ma, a‑a a 'a gbasaya din fan dunya ma, mɔɛ gbɛɛ ma miin mbe dunya ma, an ni soe yama saa chɛ fai.
Soe yama fean bɔɛ chɛ‑a kamaya koe sɛsɛ ma wan. Mɔ ɔ mɔ ya kɔɔɛ ma, a‑a a ma wan, ta gbu wɛɛ, a yii‑a a ka banda a.

A sin, a 'a kamaya koe chɛ n‑na mɔɛ n gbɛɛ bun fan dunya ma, Yataa‑a a too ka a ma ka koe miin ma koe a, soe yama saa chɛ ya kɔɔ. Soe yama fean bɔɛ chɛ‑a a saa chɛ a gbasaya a tachɛ wan, a fɔ koe a mɔɛ n ye, an ni soe yama saa chɛ bɔ nyɔɛ nyan. Mɔɛ ɛ a yen, yɔ an na‑a an soe yama saa chɛ fa wan chɛɛ chɛ mɛ a, mbɛ a yɛ‑a to fɔɛ ɔ.

Soe yama fean bɔɛ chɛ, gbasaya be‑a wan a ma, a ni fɔɛ be fen chɛ ma, soe yama saa chɛ, a bɔ nyɔɛ chɛ, mɔɛ chɛ n‑na min nyan ka. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, a ni koɛ chɛ, ɛ a ma wan, mɔ ɔ mɔ min nii soe yama chɛ fai, an ni a fa.

A yɛ to, soe yama chɛ, a din‑da wan to mɔɛ n gbɛɛ ma, mɔ mɛsɛ n bɛ gbakoo n na, yɔn tɔɛ nu, an bɛ nyan tɔɛ n na, yɔnɛ nu, an bɛ mɔɛ n na, miin ma yɔn na, an gbɛɛ ni nyɛnɛ ma sɔn. A ni sa an boo nyima a boo a, chɛ ma, an ya kɔɔɛ.
A sin, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee fee chɛ, chɛ ma, mɔ ɔ mɔ ni fee fenɛ ma tachɛ, ni nyɛn chɛ ee a ma. An nyɛn chɛ, a mu soe yama saa chɛ tɔɛ an na, ni chɛ ma, nɔmba min sɔen mu a tɔɛ ko a.
Yiimatɛ wa, an mbe chɛ bɔ. Mɔɛ min sin yiima tɛen mu, an mbe a ɔ gbɛ nɔmba chɛ sɔen mu fen ko a. Mɔ gbu 'a nɔmba mu. A mu chɛmɛ wɔdɔ, ni bi wɔdɔ kun ma wɔdɔɛ (666) an na.

Mbɛ n‑na n ya a ta to, mbɛ a yen ko, kɔnkɔɛ chɛ, an mbe min chee, an dɔ, Sayɔn kɔnkɔɛ, n‑na sa tɔngbɔɛ chɛ yen a kun tɛ. A ni sɔ ɔ, an bɛ mɔ wu chɛmɛ dɔndɔ, mɔ wu bi naanin kun ma naaninɛ (144,000) n fan na. A tɔɛ an nyɛnden ni mɔɛ chɛ n ya kɔɔɛ, a basan a Fa Yataa tɔɛ a.
Mbɛ n‑na mɔɛ kuiɛ a min, a ka banda bu ɔ, kuiɛ gbankon ba yɔ yii tu kuiɛ, ni chɛ ma, banda tu kuiɛ. Kuiɛ chɛ bɔ‑a wan, yɔ kɔninka gbasi mɔɛ ɛ ma a boo a tɔmbɔ‑a a yuu a.

An gbɛɛ, an ni si nama an sa tena. An mbe sɔ ɔ mansa sea chɛ ya kɔɔ, fɔɛ fen naanin chɛ n ya kɔɔ, ni gbakoo chɛ n ya kɔɔɛ. Mɔ ɔ mɔ nii ma an si chɛ sɔn, mɔɔ dechee an fan, Yataa na‑a an fɛn kun ka. An mɔ wu chɛmɛ dɔndɔ, wu bi naanin kun ma naanin (144,000) chɛ.

Mɔɛ chɛ n fan nii nɛ, miin nii ma koa dɔndɔ bun ni, an bɛ musu kan kɔ kan na, an nii ma musu koe ɔ sɔn, an ma koenɛ ni fion. Mɔɛ chɛ n fan ni bea sa tɔngbɔɛ chɛ fɛ kan kɔ kan, a ni ta kaina min. Mɔ gbu n gbɛɛ tɛ ɔ, an tana, an‑na kunka ma sɔn fan. An ma‑a wan Yataa 'a mɔɛ saa n na, sa tɔngbɔɛ 'a mɔɛ saa nu, yɔ chin fenɛ saa, min mbe be Yataa ma.
An mɔɛ chɛ n da ɔ, fania nii bɔ nɔ, mabɔ chia kan kɔ kan nii an ma.

Mbɛ n‑na maeka dɔ mende yen, ɛ ben‑da banda a yɔ konde. Sakana bai chɛndɛ ɛ a boo ɔ, sakana min mbe ee tui kuɔ fɔ. Ɛ a boo ɔ, mɔɛ n gbɛɛ ko a dunya ma. Chɛ n ko a chɛnyɛ kunɛ kan kɔ kan dɔ, chɛnyɛ koɛ n dɔ, dambi n dɔ, ni mɔ gbu kan kɔ kan ko a.

A sin‑na a fɔ wan gbankon, a ɔ, “Wo chian Yataa ma, wo ni basɔmaya be a ma. Koe min na mu, tima che‑a, ɛ kaa a tɛ‑a mɔ ɔ mɔ wakoe ma tima min na dunya ɔ. Wo a fai, min‑na banda bu ɔ a dan, a basan dunya gbɛɛ a, kɔ yii gbɛɛ, a basan yii mɛsɛ mɛsɛ n gbɛɛ a.”

Maeka dɔ mende, a fean bɔɛ gbɛ, a na‑a a saa chɛ gbaa chia a. Mbɛ a ɔ, “A teen fan mu, Babidon duu wa chɛ teen fan mu. Duu chɛ, min‑na a ma mɔɛ gbɛɛ dunya ɔ, an‑na a 'a gbɛ yama chɛ min, min mbe yiinachii yama ma munda, a bɛbɛɛ ko tɛ.”

Mbɛ maeka dɔndɔ na‑a to, chɛ gbaa, a sawan bɔɛ. A wɛɛ, a koɔ‑a wan gbankon, a ɔ, “Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a soe yama chɛ fai, ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a fen chɛ fai, min bɔenɛ a a, ko yama mu.” A ɔ, “Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a nyɛn chɛ sa a ya kɔɔɛ, chɛ ma, a boo a, ko yama mu.”

A ɔ, “Yataa wɛɛ, ɛ a 'a faagbandia gbɛ be‑a wan an mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ ma.” A ɔ, “An mbe a 'a faatɛ tɔmbua a faenɛ ɛ gban, an mbe a min‑da wan.” A ɔ, “An mɔɛ chɛ n mbe tɔɔya‑a wan, ta a, a basan sen gbandi ma yawaenɛ a yɔ ta.” A ɔ, “Chɛ ɛ ma‑a wan an na, sa tɔngbɔɛ ya kɔɔ, a basan a 'a maeka n gbɛɛ a.”

A ɔ, “A sin, ni ta‑a a kuu sɔ an tɔɔya‑a, a sisi ɛ sɔ‑a wan banda ma, kuɔ fɔ ni kuɔ fɔ ko a.” A ɔ, “An sin, suin kan kɔ kan mbe ee ma‑a an ko a.” A ɔ, “An fɛn mbe soe yama chɛ fai ka, ni fen chɛ, min bɔenɛ a a, an mbe tɔɔya‑a wan.” A ɔ, “Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ nyɛnɛ saen mu min ma, soe yama chɛ 'a nyɛnɛ, an mbe tɔɔya‑a wan su ɔ tee a.”
Chɛ gbɛɛ‑a a yian fan ka, mbɛ faabia an nyin Yataa 'a mɔɛ n ko a. Mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin mbe Yataa 'a sawa bia chɛndɛ, an kai faenɛ ɛ Chisɔsi a gban.

Mbɛ n‑na mɔɛ kuiɛ a min to, a ka banda bu ɔ, a ɔ, “Bai chɛ nyɛn bɛ. I ɔ, a ka sanche ma, mɔɛ miin mbe an kai fa‑a Mansa Chisɔsi a, aan an ni fa, an duaen mu.” Mbɛ Yataa Nyina ɔ, “Tea ko a, an duaen mu. An mbe ee yakɔɔtawa kan kɔ kan dɔ yen‑da to, koe min na mu, an chɛ chɛ wai an mbe an ma konan‑da Yataa tena.”

Chɛ gbɛɛ gbakɔ, mbɛ n‑na n ya a si to, mbɛ a yen ko, n‑na mɔɛ yen si ɔ dugbu ɔ, dugbu gbɛenɛ fion. An mɔɛ chɛ ni Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ an na, mansa banfua ɛ si ɔ a kun na, min nyanden ni sanu a, ni mɛ wa ɛ a boo a, chin fen tɛ koe a.

Mbɛ maeka dɔ mende bɔ‑a nɔ Yataa 'a chenɛ a, banda bu ɔ. Mbɛ a‑a mɔɛ chɛ chee gbankon, min ni ka si ɔ dugbu chɛ ɔ. A‑a a chee, a ɔ, “I 'a mɛ wa ya, i ni i 'a chin fenɛ tɛ. Koe min na mu, a tɛ tima gbu che‑a, a mu min na, tima che‑a fen fen na sɔn koe a dunya ɔ, yɔ kɔɔ mɔenɛ a ɛ sɔn buɛ min dɔ.”
Mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ, min ni ka si ɔ dugbu chɛ ɔ, a‑a a 'a mɛ wa chɛ a ben dunya kun ma, mbɛ a toen mu min na ni sɔn, a gbɛɛ a sɔn‑da.
Mbɛ n‑na maeka dɔ mende yen to, a bɔ‑a Yataa 'a chen chɛ a, banda bu ɔ. A wɛɛ mɛ wa ni wan a boo a, mɛ a saenɛ, min ni chin fen chɛ kai, an ni min chee, an dɔ, keepi.

Mbɛ maeka dɔ mende bɔ‑a, min ni ta kun ma fɛn, fen kunyɛ a diama chɛ ɛ minda ka gbengbe min ma banda bu ɔ. Mbɛ a‑a yee tɛ gbankon maeka dɔndɔɛ chɛ tena, chin fen kai mɛ wa chɛ ɛ ka min boo a, a ɔ, “I 'a mɛ wa ya, i ni keepi chɛ kai, a ka a nɔmɔɛ ma, dunya chɛ ma. Koe min na mu, an keepi n gbu yawa‑a.”

Mbɛ maeka chɛ, a‑a mɛ chɛ a ben dunya kun ma, mbɛ keepi chɛ gbɛɛ kai‑a, a ka a nɔmɔɛ n gbɛɛ ma. Mbɛ a gbɛɛ a sɔn‑da bondonɛ da a, a ma ɛ tɛn‑da kaina min, a yii ni bɔ. Chɛ an mbe Yataa 'a faatɛ ɔ yian‑da.
An‑na a ma tɛn tɛn fan bondonɛ chɛ ɔ, duu wa chɛ tanda ɔ. A sin, wii wasa sa‑a wan, a bɔ bondon chɛ ɔ. Wii chɛ ta‑a wan aan mai chɛmɛ fea (200) nyɔn dɔ, a sin dɔ yiien ni. Soo gbugbu ni tunɛ wan a ɔ.

Mbɛ n‑na kamaya koe dɔ mende ɔ yen to ma‑a banda bu ɔ. Koe chenama wa ni, min mbe mɔ da ɔ gbaa. Maeka wɔnfea, an ni wan nɔ, kasaa si tena wɔnfea ni miin boo ɔ. Chɛ n mu kasaa dankama n fan na, koe min na mu, Yataa 'a faatɛ ɛ danka‑a an fan ma.

A yɛ to, mbɛ n‑na yii wa yen, a maenɛ ɛ yɔ mɛmɛ, a basan ta manɛ a. N‑na mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ yen fan, soe yama wa chɛ nii ma kun ni miin ma. Mɔɛ chɛ nu, fenɛ min bɔen ni an soe chɛ a, a ma kun ni mɔɛ miin ma, an sin nii ma nɔmba ya ni an soe chɛ tɔɛ ɔ. An mɔɛ chɛ n ni sɔ ɔ yii mia mia chɛ an kaa a, kɔninka min Yataa‑a a be an ma, ɛ an boo a.

Mɔɛ chɛ nu, an na‑a si dɔndɔ a bɔ wan, a si Yataa‑a gbasaya ɔ yian buɛ min dɔ a 'a yɔnɛ Mosisi 'a tima a. A yɛ to, a‑a a ɔ yian buɛ min dɔ sa tɔngbɔɛ chɛ a tima wɛɛ a. An dɔ, “Yataa Mansa Wa, i wɛn gbasa fen fen ma, i chɛ chɛ wai n koo, da ɔ gbaa koe nu mu. Dunya gbɛɛ ɛ i 'a mansaya an kɔɔ. I 'a ko ɔ ko a kanden mu, a sin kafa ee a ɔ.
Yataa Mansa, mɔ ɔ mɔ ɛ samba‑a wan i ma chianɛ a. Mɔ ɔ mɔ ɛ basɔmaya be wan i ma. I wan mu dechee tea Yataa a. Dunya gbɛɛ ɛ na‑a i tando‑a wan, i chɛ chɛ wai chɛndɛ ko a, mɔɛ gbɛɛ ɛ min yen.”
Mbɛ an gbɛɛ ban‑da si a bɔ‑a kɛn, n‑na n ya a ta. Mbɛ n‑na a ɔ yen, mbɛ kaina chɛ, ku tɛndi chɛ kɔɔ, Yataa 'a chen chɛ, n‑na a da a kaenɛ yen.

Mbɛ maeka wɔnfea chɛ n bɔ‑a Yataa 'a chen chɛ a, kasaa wɔnfea chɛ n mbe ka miin boo ɔ. An ma bɛnden ni doma min dɔ, a gbɛen fan ni fo fo, ɛ man‑da. Fenɛ min ni bun dɔ an kaa a, a nyanden ni sanu an dɔ.
Mbɛ fɔɛ fen naanin chɛ n dɔndɔ, a‑a sanu pani wɔnfea an be maeka wɔnfea chɛ n ma. Pani chɛ n na faen ni Yataa 'a faatɛ an na, a wɛn mbe ee fa kuɔ fɔ ni kuɔ fɔ ko a.
Yataa 'a gbasaya ɔ, a basan a 'a manɛ a, sisi fa‑a wan a 'a chen chɛ a. A sin, mɔ ɔ mɔ nii don to nɔ, aan kasaa wɔnfea chɛ, maeka wɔnfea chɛ n boo ɔ, an ni ban an si‑a mɔɛ n na a danka a gbɔdɛ.

Mbɛ kuiɛ gbankon ba, n‑na a a min, a ka Yataa 'a chen chɛ a, a ɔ, maeka wɔnfea chɛ n ma, a ɔ, “Pani wɔnfea chɛ nu wo boo n na, miin na faenɛ ɛ ka Yataa 'a faatɛ gbɛ chɛ a, wo ta, wo ni an dɔ wuyan dunya kun ma.”
Mbɛ maeka saa ta‑a, mbɛ a‑a a ta pani ɔ wuyan dunya ma. Mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, soe yama chɛ, a 'a nyɛnɛ saenɛ ɛ miin ma, miin ni fen chɛ fai, min bɔen ni a a, tɛ yama bɔ‑a an gbɛɛ gboo ma.
Mbɛ maeka fean bɔɛ tana, a‑a a ta pani ɔ wuyan kɔ yii ɔ wan. Mbɛ kɔ yii chɛ mun‑da, a ma‑a yɔ mɔ su wii, a chinɔenɛ ɛ. A sin, mbɛ fɔɛ fen kan kɔ kan a ɔ, an fa‑a wan.
Maeka sawan bɔɛ sin, a‑a a ta pani ɔ wuyan yii tɔɛ n gbɛɛ an dɔ, miin mbe yii. An gbɛɛ ma‑a wii a.

Mbɛ maeka chɛ, min ni yii gbɛɛ kun ma, n‑na a kuiɛ a min, ɛ koɔ‑a Yataa tena, a ɔ, “Tea ko a, i kan nyɔ ee. I ni wan nɔ suun, e tun nɔ sanche wɛɛ.” A ɔ, “E ka kaa min na tɛ‑a dunya chɛ ma, tea ɛ wan i boo ɔ.”
A ɔ, “I 'a mɔɛ n wii a bɔnden mu an boo ɔ, a basan i 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n wii a.” A ɔ, “I wɛɛ, i‑a wii dechee be an ma, a min koe a yii a. An‑na wai chɛ chɛ an ko a.”
Mbɛ n‑na mɔɛ kuiɛ a min, a ka gbengbe chɛ tena, a ɔ, “Yataa Mansa Wa, tea ko a, i danayaen mu, i 'a kaa a tɛ ɔ.”
Maeka naanin bɔɛ‑a a ta pani ɔ wuyan tee an kun na. A sin, gbasaya be‑a wan a ma, mɔɛ n minda koe a, a ta manɛ a.

Tee chɛ win ba chɛ‑a mɔɛ n ma fufu wan. Chɛɛ an ma an kan kɔ sɔ ni an 'na ko yama n na, an ma Yataa bai ni, a 'a gbasaya ko a. An‑na min ma, an‑na a main fan, gbasaya ɛ ka a wɛn boo ɔ kasaa koe chɛ n kun ma.
Maeka duun bɔɛ tana, a‑a a ta pani ɔ wuyan soe yama chɛ 'a mansa sea an na. Chɛnyɛ chɛ, min ni a 'a mansaya kɔɔ, a ni wan pimbi pimbi ɔ. Mɔɛ n‑na an nɛnɛnɛ n chin fan tɔɔya ɔ.
Chɛɛ an ma an kan kɔ sɔ ni an 'na ko yama n na. An sin‑na bai yama n sa wan Yataa ma, min mbe banda bu ɔ. Koe min na mu, an 'na tɛɛ chɛ n ni an tɔɔ tena wan kaka.
Maeka wɔdɔn bɔɛ‑a a ta pani ɔ wuyan yii chɛ an dɔ, an mbe min chee, an dɔ, Yufatesi. An yii chɛ gbaa‑a wan tado, chia be koe a mansa chɛ n ma, miin mbe ka tee bɔ.

Mbɛ n‑na a ɔ yen, nyina yama sawa, miin ni yɔ tui gbɔfɔɛ nu, an bɔ‑a. Dɔndɔ bɔ‑a fɔɛ fen ma chiandenɛ chɛ an da ɔ. Mbɛ dɔndɔɛ bɔ‑a soe yama wa chɛ da ɔ. A sawan bɔɛ chɛ sin bɔ‑a fania fɔ mɔɛ chɛ an da ɔ, min ni a wandi ya Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ a.

Nyina yama ni an na, miin mbe a ma, kamaya koe n mbe ma. An mbe ta wan mansa kan kɔ kan tena dunya ma, an na kan koe a kaina dɔndɔɛ. An ni chɛ ma tena, chɛɛ chɛ koe an na tee wa chɛ ma, Yataa Mansa Wa 'a tee chɛ.

Chisɔsi na‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “A yen ko, n mbe na‑a wo tɛnɛ‑a wan yɔ kanka. Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe ma‑a a ya a, ɛ a 'a koa n kun ma fɛn‑da wan. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, a ee ben‑da a ma senɛ a, a ni mau fanka ɔ den. A mɔɛ chɛ duaen mu.”
Mbɛ nyina yama chɛ nu, an‑na mansa chɛ n na kan kaina chɛ, Ibu mɔɛ n mbe min chee, an dɔ, Amakɛdon.
Mbɛ maeka wɔnfean bɔɛ sin, a‑a a ta pani a fasi wan, mbɛ fia ta‑a a a. Mbɛ kuiɛ wa a min‑da gbankon, a ka Yataa 'a chenɛ a banda bu ɔ, mansa sea chɛ tena, a ɔ, “Ko ɔ ko ban‑da.”

Mbɛ banda manɛ mia mia ben ben‑da, banda ɛ tu‑a diki diki, ɛ ta‑a koɔ‑a gbau gbau, mbɛ duu gboo wɛɛ samba‑a a ma chianden ba a. A ka mɔ gbu bɔ tima ma dunya chɛ ɔ, duu gboo ma samba nin bɛ, min yau kaka a ni che chɛ ɔ.

Mbɛ Babidon duu wa chɛ, a tɛka‑a sawa a, duu gboo chɛ sambaenɛ gbakɔ. Duu wa tɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ dunya ma, an bɛɛ yɔn‑da wan. Yataa nii ma nyina ni Babidon duu yama wa chɛ ma. Chɛ an fɛ mu, a‑a a gbɛ tɔmbua chɛ din nɔ mɔɛ n ma, gbɛ min‑na a 'a faatɛ dankama yian.
A sin, kaina kan kɔ kan yii tinɛ ɔ, an tuin‑da wan, mɔ sin nii kɔnkɔ kan kɔ kan yen to.
Mbɛ sankɔɛ gbugbu wa dɛgbɛ nu, miin dɔndɔɛ fanka ni che kɔɔ bɛchi dɔndɔɛ fanka ɔ, an bea‑a mɔɛ n ma, a ka banda a. Chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ n‑na Yataa main fan, koe min na mu, koe chɛ ma chianden ni kaka.

Mbɛ maeka wɔnfea chɛ n dɔndɔ, miin‑na pani chɛ n dɔ wuyan ka, a na‑a n tena, a ɔ, “Na wɛ, n ni a ɔ yian i a, duu dia wa chɛ, Yataa ɛ kaa a tɛ‑a buɛ min dɔ a wakoe ma.” A ɔ, “Duu dia chɛ mu duu wa chɛ an na, min sɔen mu ka yii sɛsɛ n kaa a.”

A ɔ, “Mansa wa chɛ nu dunya chɛ ɔ, an‑na waa ma basan fan an duu dia chɛ a.” A ɔ, “Mɔɛ miin sin gbɛɛ an mbe dunya ɔ, an‑na a 'a gbɛ yama chɛ min fan, min mbe yiinachii yama ma munda, a bɛbɛɛ ko tɛ. An gbɛ chɛ sin‑na an bia wan.”

Mbɛ Yataa Nyina bea‑a n fɛ gban, mbɛ maeka chɛ ta‑a n na fuinɛ ma. Nɔ ni, mbɛ n‑na musu yen si ɔ soe yawa kun ma, soe yama wa. An soe chɛ gboo gbɛɛ ma, Yataa main bai n dechee an nyɛnden ni a ma. A kunɛ ni wɔnfea, a bena n sin ni tan.

Musu chɛ ma bɛnden fan ni chɛndɛ chɛ, koa yawaenɛ ɔ, min ni man tena sanu a, ni sen baa gbanden ba nu, a basan fen baa gbanden dɔ mende n na a ma. Kɔpu ni wan a boo a, min nyanden ni sanu a, ko yama faenɛ a a gban, a basan a 'a duu dia wai yama a.
Musu chɛ ya kɔɔɛ ma, tɔɛ nyɛnden fan ni nɔ, min fasai nunden ni. Chɛ an nyɛnden ni a ma, a ɔ, “Babidon duu wa chɛ, an mu duu dia n gbɛɛ de a, mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, miin mbe ko yama kan kɔ kan ma.”
Mbɛ n‑na a ɔ yen, mbɛ musu chɛ gbɛ tɔɛ ni, mɔɛ chɛ n wii a, Yataa 'a mɔɛ chɛ nu, an na‑a miin fa, bea koe a Chisɔsi fɛ. N‑na a yen kɛn, n da ɔ gbaa‑a wan.

Chɛɛ maeka chɛ ɔ te n ma, a ɔ, “I da ɔ ma gbaa. N mbe koɔ nunden chɛ ɔ yian‑da wan i a, a si musu chɛ ma. N mbe a ɔ yian‑da wan i a, a si soe yama chɛ wɛɛ ma, ɛ ka si ɔ min kun ma, soe min kunɛ ɛ ka wɔnfea, a bena sin mbe tan.

I na‑a soe yama min yen ka sunɛ, a ni wan fɔɛ ɔ, chɛɛ a fa‑a gbɛ. A ɛ na tena wan bɔ‑a to, a ka son dɔ yiien ba chɛ ɔ, min danka ee ka. A sin, ɛ ta‑a wan kaina chɛ, Yataa ɛ a kasaa kaina min. Dunya chɛ ma mɔɛ nu, Yataa nii ma miin tɔɛ nyɛn ni a 'a gboo ɔ, an gbɛɛ, an da ɔ gbaa‑a wan, an mbe ma‑a soe yama chɛ ma fɛn‑da. A 'a gboo chɛ, mɔɛ miin mbe kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da, a na‑a an tɔɛ nyɛn min dɔ, a e na dunya a dan. Soe chɛ ni wan tee fɔɛ ɔ, a ee sanche fɔɛ ɔ, chɛɛ ɛ yɛ‑a wan to fɔɛ ɔ.”
A ɔ, “Yiimatɛ wa, an mbe chɛ nɛnɛ bɔ. Kun wɔnfea chɛ nu, an mu kɔnkɔ wɔnfea an fan na, musu chɛ ɛ si ɔ miin ma.
An mu to mansa wɔnfea an fan na. An mɔ duu nii to fɔɛ ɔ, dɔndɔɛ ɛ tun mansaya ɔ, a dankama sin ma na nin bɛ mansaya ɔ. A sin ni a na‑a, ɛ ma‑a mansaya ɔ tima kundu ɛnden fan ko a dechee.
Soe yama chɛ tana, min ni fɔɛ ɔ, chɛɛ a ee to fɔɛ ɔ, a sin fan mu to mansa sɛin bɔɛ a. A sin to, ɛ bɔ‑a mansa wɔnfea chɛ n fan tɛ ɔ, chɛɛ a wɛɛ ɛ kasaa‑a wan.”

A ɔ, “Bena tan chɛ n sin, i na‑a miin yen ka, mansa tanɛ n fan nɛ, miin ma si nin bɛ an 'na mansaya ɔ. Chɛɛ an mbe gbasaya ma sɔn‑da wan, mansaya wai chɛ koe a yɔ mansa nu, awa dɔndɔ gbe ko a, an bɛ soe yama chɛ a.
An mansa tan chɛ n gbɛɛ yiima ni dɔndɔ gbe, an sin gbɛɛ kuiɛ bɛn‑da wan kaina dɔndɔɛ, mbɛ an 'na mansaya gbasaya gbɛɛ, an‑na a be soe yama chɛ ma.

Soe yama chɛ, an bɛ mansa tan chɛ n na, an mbe chɛɛ bun‑da wan sa tɔngbɔɛ ma. Chɛɛ sa tɔngbɔɛ chɛ, an bɛ a fɛ mɔɛ n na, an mbe tu‑a wan an chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ chɛ n na chɛndɛ chɛ. Koe min na mu, sa tɔngbɔɛ an mu mansa wa a, mansa wa n gbɛɛ kun ma mansa. A fɛ mɔɛ nu, an mu mɔɛ chɛ n fan na, Yataa‑a a boo sɔ miin ma, mbɛ a‑a an chee. An sin, an fan kai faen mu a a.”
Mbɛ maeka chɛ a ɔ te n ma, a ɔ, “I na‑a yii miin sin yen ka, duu dia chɛ ni ka si ɔ miin kaa a, an mu mɔ gbu n fan na, mɔ fanka nu, chɛnyɛ kunɛ nu, a basan chɛnyɛ koɛ n na.

I na‑a bena tanɛ miin sin yen, an bɛ soe yama chɛ a, duu dia chɛ wakoe ɛ don‑da wan an ma. An mbe fen kɔ fen bɔ‑a wan a boo ɔ, an ni a ma senɛ to. An mbe a gboo daun‑da wan, mbɛ an‑na ta ya, mbɛ an‑na a minda.

Koe min na mu, Yataa an‑na a chɛ an faa ɔ, an yiima bɛn‑da kaina dɔndɔ, kuiɛ dɔndɔɛ ɔ, an ni an 'na mansaya be soe yama chɛ ma. Yataa faa ma koe ni a a, an ni ma soe yama chɛ kɔɔ, aan Yataa 'a dɔbɛnɛ gbɛɛ kunɛ a ni bia chɛndɛ chɛ.
“Musu chɛ sin, duu dia chɛ, i na‑a min yen, a mu duu wa chɛ an na, duu gbasayaen ba chɛ, dunya mansa n gbɛɛ, an mbe min kɔɔ.”
An musu chɛ yendenɛ gbakɔ, mbɛ n‑na maeka dɔ mende yen to yii‑a, a ka banda bu ɔ. Gbasaya min ni a boo ɔ, a ni koo kaka. A sin, dunya gbɛɛ ɔ kaen fan ni wandaun, a 'a manɛ a.
Mbɛ maeka chɛ‑a chee chɛ gbankon, a ɔ, “A teen fan mu, Babidon duu wa chɛ teen fan mu. A ma‑a gbɛ nyina yama n baa a, nyina yama kan kɔ kan bɛn tena, konde yama n gbɛɛ waa a.

Dunya gbɛɛ‑a Babidon 'na gbɛ yama chɛ min, a 'a gbɛ yama min mbe yiima yama ma munda ka, a bɛbɛɛ ko tɛ. Dunya ma mansa gbɛɛ, an‑na waa ma basan a a, yua mɔɛ n nyan‑da a ɔ, a kunɛ a fuindenɛ ɛ duu diaya a.”
Mbɛ n‑na kuiɛ dɔ mende a min to gbankon, banda bu ɔ, a ɔ, “N 'na mɔɛ nu, wo ka a fɛ, wo bɔ a ɔ, wo ni tanka a 'a ko yama ma koe ma, wo ni tanka a 'a kasaa n ma Yataa boo ɔ.
A 'a ko yama kɔnkɔɛ che‑a banda bu ɔ, Yataa sin ma nyina ni a gba yama n ma.
A bia ka wan, yɔ a‑a mɔɛ n bia buɛ min dɔ, a‑a min si mɔɛ n na, a si‑a gba fea ko a. A‑a gbɛ a kɔɔenɛ min be mɔ dɔ mende n ma, gbɛ min gbasa a ma, gba fea ko a, a fa a 'a kɔpu a.

Tɔɔya be a ma kaka, a basan faayɔnɛ a, a ni ka a 'a dɔpanda nyan tɔ fɔɛ min gbɛɛ ɔ, a nyɔn sima tɔɔya ni si a a. A ni a yonka wan tima ɔ tima, a ɔ, ‘N yen ko si ɔ n 'na mansaya wa ɔ, fuinya musu ma n na, n sin mbe ee fuinya musu di chɛ‑a fion.’

Chɛ ko a, kasaa sɛsɛ ɛ a tan‑da tee dɔndɔɛ an kɔɔ, saya, faayɔnɛ, a basan kɔnkɔ ma chianden ba a. A sin, ta an mbe a minda‑a, Yataa Mansa faa tɛ buɛ chɛ a ma, Yataa min mbe kaa a tɛ a wakoe ma, a gbasaen mu.”
Mbɛ dunya ma mansa chɛ nu, miin‑na waa ma basan a a, a 'a duu diaya chɛ ɔ, an mbe di chɛ‑a wan, an 'na duu wa chɛ ko a. Ni an‑na a sisi yen bɔ‑a, an mbe di chɛ‑a wan, aan an ya ni yawa.

An mbe sɔ‑a wan pɔɔ, an mbe chian‑da, an ma na tɔɔya chɛ ɔ bia, ɛ min dɔ. An mbe a fɔ‑a wan, an dɔ, “Kasaa ma chianden mu gba, kasaa ma chianden mu gba, i duu wa gbasayaen ba chɛ ko a. I wan Babidon duu chɛ, awa dɔndɔ gbe kɔɔ ka, i tɔɔ‑a ka.”
Yua mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ, an mbe dunya ma, an mbe di chɛ‑a wan a ko a, koe min na mu, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee to nɔ an 'na fee n chɛ koe a.

An 'na sanu chɛ nu, kain chɛ nu, yɔɔɛ nu an basan fen baa gbanden dɔ mende n na. A yɛ to, koa nyima kani kani kan kɔ kan, ni kɔn kunyɛ a diama kani kan kɔ kan, a basan fenɛ sɛsɛ a, miin nyanden ni kama nyinɛ ɔ. Fenɛ kani kani kan kɔ kan ni wan nɔ, a ka gbɛ kɔn baa gbandenɛ ma, a ta fen chɛ n tena miin nyanden mu kundu ɔ, miin bɛɛ nyanden mu sen baa gbandenɛ ɔ, a basan fen baa gbanden dɔ mende a.

A yɛ to, fenɛ miin mbe chɛ da ɔ, daun fenɛ dia koe a, an ni wan nɔ. Tu kunyɛ a diama kani kani kan kɔ kan, a basan pɔɔda kani kan kɔ kan na, an baa gbanden ba. Gbɛ wɛɛ, a basan tu a, min ni bɔ wodifi kɔnɛ gbɔɛ ɔ, ni feawa, a basan fen chɛ a, ɛ nyan fenɛ min dɔ. Ninchi n bɛɛ, an basan sa n na, soo nu, an basan mɔto gbingbi chɛ n na, soo n mbe miin sawan ka. Mɔɛ n bɛɛ ni wan nɔ, miin ni yɔnɛ n na, an basan mɔɛ n na, miin bia‑a chɛɛ ɔ.

Mbɛ yua mɔɛ chɛ n‑na a fɔ a ma, an dɔ, “I faa ma fen chɛ n gbɛɛ, an tuin‑da i ma, i 'a nyanɛ gbɛɛ, fenɛ miin gbɛɛ, miin mbe i 'a gboo ma nyanɛ kun ma chɛ, i fo‑a an na kuɔ fɔ ko a. A sin, an ma ee sɔn‑da to kuɔ fɔ.”

Yua mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin ta mu fee fen ba chɛ n na, miin‑na duu chɛ 'a nyanɛ ɔ daun ka, an mbe ee gbɛn‑da a ma. An mbe sɔ‑a wan pɔɔ, an mbe chian‑da a 'a tɔɔya ma, chɛɛ an mbe di chɛ‑a wan a ko a, aan an ya yii ni bɔn.

Mbɛ an dɔ, “Kasaa ma chianden mu gba, kasaa ma chianden mu gba, duu wa gbasayaen ba chɛ ko a. Duu min ma bɛndenɛ ɛ koa kani kani n dɔ, an baa gbanden ba nu, a yawaenɛ nu. A ni man tena sanu an na, sen baa gbanden ba nu, a basan fen baa gbanden dɔ mende n na.
Awa dɔndɔ gbe kɔɔ, nyan chɛ gbɛɛ kasaa‑a.” Dɛndɛ wa ti nu, dɛndɛ chɛ n wii mɔɛ n gbɛɛ, yii a ta yua n gbɛɛ, mɔɛ gbɛɛ sɔ‑a pɔɔ.
An‑na sisi yen kɛn bɔ‑a, an‑na yee tɛ wan gbankon, an dɔ, “Duu wa ma ben nin bɛ duu chɛ ma.”

Mbɛ an‑na sanka boo sin an ma, an kunɛ gbɛɛ a, an mbe ta‑a saya di chɛ‑a gbafi gbafi, an dɔ, “Kasaa ma chianden mu gba, kasaa ma chianden mu gba, duu wa gbasayaen ba chɛ ko a. Mɔɛ n gbɛɛ, dɛndɛ wa ni miin boo ɔ kɔ yii a, duu min 'na nyanɛ pɔpɔɛ‑a an nyan, awa dɔndɔ gbe kɔɔ, a kasaa‑a ka.”

Wo wɛn mbe banda bu ɔ, wo buɔdia bɔ, Babidon yɔn koe a Yataa boo ɔ. Yataa 'a mɔɛ nu, Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ gbau gbau nu, wo buɔdia bɔ, wo bɛ Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a. Koe min na mu, Yataa‑a kaa a tɛ Babidon duu wa chɛ ma koe chɛ n ko a, a na‑a miin ma wo a.
Chɛ gbakɔ, maeka dɔndɔ min ni gbasa, a‑a sen gbugbu wa ya, mbɛ a‑a a a dɛ kɔ yii ɔ, a ɔ, “Babidon duu wa chɛ, ɛ kasaa‑a ka wan gbasaya ɔ. Ɛ ma‑a duu wa tombo an na kuɔ fɔ.
Kɔninka kuiɛ, a basan mɔ gbu n ta a, koee fɛ mɔɛ nu, an bɛ buu fɛ n na, an na ee min‑da to nɔ. Wai chɛ mɔ ee ma‑a a ɔ, wai ee ma‑a, min mbe to‑a nɔ. Daun fen tu kuiɛ ee bɔ‑a to a ɔ.
Dambo wɛɛ ee manɛ be‑a to nɔ. Musu fuu mɔɛ nu, an 'na sɛnama nu, an kuiɛ a ee min‑da to nɔ. A 'a yua nu, an kan nyɔn nii dunya ɔ, a 'a suaya wa, a‑a dunya bun fan.”
Yataa 'a mɔɛ n wii, a 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n wii, a bɔn‑da nɔ, a sin‑na duu chɛ kasaa. An‑na mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ fa dunya ma, a boo ni wan an dɔ.
Maeka chɛ da a kuiɛ chɛ gbakɔ, a ma‑a wan yɔ n‑na mɔ fanka wa kuiɛ a min bɔ‑a gbankon, a ka banda bu ɔ. An dɔ, “Mmɔ Yataa tando, mmɔ 'a mansa, bauncha ɛ an boo ɔ, basɔmaya wɛɛ, a basan gbasaya a.
A 'a kaa a tɛ, tea ɔ, danaya ɔ. A‑a kaa a tɛ duu dia wa chɛ wakoe ma, dunya ɔ chɛ chɛ duu chɛ, ko tɛ a. A 'a mɔɛ n wii ko a, a‑a tɔɔya sa duu chɛ ma.”
Mbɛ fanka wa chɛ kuiɛ bɔ‑a to gbankon, an dɔ, “Mmɔ Yataa tando, duu chɛ minda sisi, a tɛ ee tɛ tena kuɔ fɔ.”
Mbɛ gbakoo bi fea kun ma naanin chɛ nu, an bɛ fɔɛ fen naanin chɛ n na, an‑na an kumbai gbangban, an‑na Yataa tando, min mbe si ɔ a 'a mansaya sea a. An dɔ, “A ni ma ka. Tando ni be Yataa ma.”
Mbɛ mansa sea chɛ tena, mɔɛ kuiɛ bɔ‑a nɔ, a ɔ, “Wo gbɛɛ, wo mmɔ 'a Yataa tando. Wo wɛn gbɛɛ mu a 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ n na, yɔn tɔɛ nu, nyan tɔɛ nu, wo wɛn mbe chian Yataa ma.”
Mbɛ a ma‑a, yɔ n‑na mɔ fanka kuiɛ a min. An kuiɛ chɛ maen fan ni gbankon, yɔ yii tu kuiɛ waa a, chɛ ma, banda tu kuiɛ gbau gbau. An dɔ, “Mmɔ Yataa tando, mmɔ 'a mansa, gbasaya mansa wa mu an na.
Mmɔ bu ɔ ni dia, mmɔ ni buɔdia wa bɔ, mmɔ ni basɔmaya be a ma. Sa tɔngbɔɛ 'a musu fuu tima che‑a, a sin, a 'a sɛnama‑a a ma bɛn, a fuu koe gbu a.
Sɛnama koa min be‑a a ma, a ni nyin, ɛ man‑da.” Koe min na mu, koa gbɛ chɛ‑a a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ Yataa 'a mɔɛ n chɛ chɛ wai an fan nɛ.

Mbɛ maeka chɛ ɔ te n ma, a ɔ, “Chɛ nyɛn gboo ɔ. Mɔɛ chɛ n duaen mu, miin cheeen mu sa tɔngbɔɛ 'a musu si tena, daun chɛ koe a.” Mbɛ maeka chɛ‑a a fɔ to n ye, a ɔ, “Bai chɛ nu, min fɔ‑a ka, Yataa da a bai chɛndɛ chɛndɛ n fan nɛ.”

Mbɛ n‑na n kumbai gbangban a chen kɔɔ, a fai koe a. Chɛɛ a ɔ te n ma, a ɔ, “I ma chɛ ma. Yataa an fai. N mbe wai chɛ an ko a, yɔ wo e wai chɛ buɛ min dɔ a ko a. Wo gbɛɛ, wo wɛn kai faen mu tea chɛ a, min ka‑a Chisɔsi tena. An tea chɛ, an mbe a ma, mɔɛ n ni Yataa bai sa.” Koe min na mu, Chisɔsi‑a bai min fɔ, an mu Yataa 'a sakana bai kunɛ a mɔ gbu n tena.

Chɛ gbakɔ, n‑na banda bu ɔ yen a a kaenɛ ɛ. Mbɛ a yen ko, soo gbɛ ɛ nɔ. Mɔɛ min mbe si ɔ an soo chɛ kun ma, a tɔ mu Danaya ni Tea. A sin, kaa min ɛ a a tɛ, tea an mbe ma a ɔ, a sin mbe ee ta chɛɛ ɔ fania kun ma.
A ya ni wan yɔ ta sanku manɛ, a kunɛ sin na, mansa banfua sɛsɛ an ni si ɔ a a. A gboo wɛɛ ma, tɔɛ nyɛnden fan ni a ma, mɔ ɔ mɔ ma min sɔn, fɔ a dɔndɔ gbe dechee.
Mbɛ a yɛ to, doma kai min ni a ma, a chimaenɛ ni wii a dɔgbɔ dɔgbɔ. A mɔɛ chɛ sin tɔ mu, Yataa Da 'a Bai.
Soya mɔɛ miin sin ni banda bu ɔ, an‑na an gbee gbasi wan a gbaa chia a, an mbe si ɔ soo gbɛ an kun ma. An ma bɛndenɛ ɛ koa nyima ɔ, a gbɛenɛ ɛ fo fo.

Yataa Da 'a Bai chɛ da ɔ, chɛɛ chɛ mɛ a saenɛ chɛndɛ chɛ, a bɔ‑a wan a ɔ. Ɛ an mɛ chɛ an ya tena, a ni kun dunya gbɛɛ ma chɛɛ ɔ. Ɛ ma‑a wan dunya kun ma mansa a, a sin mbe ee a 'a mansaya a tachɛ‑a chinchincha ɔ. A yɛ to, ɛ tɛn tɛn‑da wan fen chɛ ma bondonɛ ɔ, fen chɛ min tɔ mu keepi, a yii bɔ koe a a ɔ. Ɛ ma‑a ka Yataa 'a faatɛ wa an dɔ yian‑da.
Doma kai chɛ min ni a ma, a woo kun ma, tɔɛ an nyɛnden ni a ma, min ni Mansa Wa 'a Mansa a.
Mbɛ n‑na maeka yen, ɛ sɔ ɔ tee ɔ, ɛ yee tɛ‑a konde n tena ben‑da banda a. A ɔ, “Wo na, wo a ni kan Yataa 'a daun chɛ bɛn ba chɛ ko a.

Wo na, wo ni mansa n gboo daun, wo ni soya mansa n bɛɛ gboo daun, an bɛ an 'na soya mɔɛ n na. A yɛ to, soo n gboo wɛɛ, a basan soo ti n bɛɛ a, mɔɛ gbɛɛ gboo, yɔnɛ nu an bɛ chɛ n na, miin ma yɔn na, nyan tɔɛ n bɛ yɔn tɔɛ n na.”
Mbɛ n‑na soe yama wa chɛ yen, an bɛ dunya ma mansa n na. An 'na soya mɔɛ n na sɔnden fan ni gbɛ, chɛɛ bun koe a mɔɛ chɛ ma, min ni si ɔ soo chɛ kun ma, an bɛ a ta soya n na.

Mbɛ an‑na soe yama chɛ bia wan, an fea fania fɔ mɔɛ chɛ a, min ni a wandi ya Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ a. A‑a kamaya koe n ma wan an soe yama chɛ ya kɔɔɛ ma. An koe chɛ n fan na‑a mɔɛ chɛ n bun, miin na‑a soe yama chɛ 'a nyɛnɛ sa an ma, miin bɛɛ na‑a fen chɛ fai, fenɛ min bɔen ni soe yama chɛ a. Soe yama chɛ, an fea soe yama fean bɔɛ chɛ a, an na dɛ‑a wan ta man ba chɛ ɔ, sen gbandima wa faen ni min na.
An 'na soya mɔɛ n tana, chɛɛ chɛ mɛ a saen chɛ, min bɔ‑a mɔɛ chɛ da ɔ soo gbɛ chɛ kun ma, a‑a an gbɛɛ fa wan. Konde n gbɛɛ, an bu ni te tena wan an su daunɛ a.
Chɛ gbɛɛ gbakɔ, mbɛ n‑na maeka dɔ mende yen yii‑a, a ka banda bu ɔ. Chi ɛ a boo a, son dɔ yansama wa chɛ, min danka ee ka, min mbe a da a ka. Kundu yɔɔɛ fankama wɛɛ, a ni wan a boo a.

Mbɛ a‑a fɔɛ fen chɛ bia gban, fɔɛ fen ma chianden ba chɛ. An fɔɛ fen chɛ mu ka kɔkɔ wa chɛ an na, nyina yama n 'na mansa chɛ, min tɔ mu Sitana. Mbɛ maeka chɛ‑a a chii fɔin kundu yɔɔɛ chɛ a, san wu dɔndɔ (1,000) ko a.

Mbɛ a‑a a a dɛ son dɔ yansama wa chɛ ɔ, a‑a a da bun a a, mbɛ a‑a son chɛ da a tɔn gban. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, a ee dunya bun‑da to kuɔ fɔ, aan san wu dɔndɔɛ (1,000) chɛ ni ban. Chɛ gbakɔ, a ɛ fuin‑da wan tima kundu ɛnden ko a.

Mbɛ n‑na mansa sea n yen, mɔɛ miin sin ni si ɔ an sea chɛ n na, gbasaya been fan ni an ma, ma koe a mansa n na. A yɛ to, mɔɛ chɛ nu, an‑na miin kunɛ tɛ a a, sɔ koe a gban Chisɔsi ko a, a basan Yataa bai sa a, n‑na an fuɛ n yen fan. An mɔɛ chɛ nu, an nii ma soe yama chɛ fai ni, an nii ma fen chɛ wɛɛ fai ni, fenɛ min bɔen ni a a. A yɛ to, an nii ma soe yama chɛ 'a nyɛn chɛ sa ni an ya kɔɔ, an ma a sa ni a boo wɛɛ ma. An mɔɛ chɛ n yɛ‑a wan to fɔɛ ɔ, an ma‑a mansa a, san wu dɔndɔ (1,000) ko a, an bɛ Chasi a, kunka mansa.
Tima saa saa an nɛ, Yataa‑a a ma, mɔɛ n yɛ‑a to fɔɛ ɔ. Mɔɛ tɔɛ nu, miin faen ni, an ma yɛ ni to fɔɛ ɔ, aan san wu dɔndɔɛ ban‑da.
